HYP: Russian President and Supreme Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces Putin attended the military parade of the Baltic Fleet.

SRC: 约4000名军人、46艘舰艇和40余架战机参加了当地的阅兵式。
HYP: About 4000 soldiers, 46 ships and more than 40 fighters participated in the local military parade.

SRC: 普京首先在位于波罗的海喀琅施塔得海军基地水域检阅了舰艇列队。
HYP: Putin first inspected the fleet of ships in the waters of the Kronstadt naval base in the Baltic Sea.

SRC: 之后，他乘坐快艇抵达圣彼得堡市中心的涅瓦河水域并上岸，观看了在涅瓦河上举行的阅兵式。
HYP: After that, he took a speedboat to the waters of the Neva River in the center of St. Petersburg and went ashore to watch the military parade held on the Neva River.

SRC: 普京在阅兵式上发表讲话说，俄海军装备的现代化技术水平近年来持续提升，俄海军2020年将总共接收约40艘配备独特高超音速打击系统的新型舰艇。
HYP: Putin said in a speech at the military parade that the modern technical level of Russian naval equipment has continued to improve in recent years. The Russian navy will receive a total of about 40 new ships equipped with a unique hypersonic strike system in 2020.

SRC: 另外，俄海军总司令叶夫梅诺夫日前在接受俄国防部机关报《红星报》采访时说，俄建造舰艇的计划得到了有效落实，2020年俄海军计划接收的新舰艇数量是近年来规模较大的。
HYP: In addition, the Russian Navy's commander-in-chief Yevmenov recently said in an interview with the Russian Defense Ministry's newspaper “Red Star” that Russia's plan to build ships has been effectively implemented. The number of new ships that the Russian Navy plans to receive in 2020 is the lager number of new ships in recent years.

SRC: 1696年，沙皇彼得大帝着手组建海上舰队，开创了俄海军历史。
HYP: In 1696, Tsar Peter the Great set out to form a naval fleet, creating the history of the Russian navy.

SRC: <v>每年</v>7月最后一个星期日是俄罗斯海军节。
HYP: The last Sunday in July is the Russian Navy Day.

SRC: 针对疫情防控工作出现的新变化，自7月17日以来，新疆各级工会响应自治区总工会的号召，积极参与疫情防控工作。
HYP: In response to new changes in the epidemic prevention and control work, since July 17, the trade unions at all levels in Xinjiang have responded to the call of the Autonomous Region Federation of Trade Unions to actively participate in the epidemic prevention and control work.

SRC: 天山南北工会干部、职工、劳动模范走进街道社区、居民群众中，开展送菜送药、消毒灭菌、宣传防疫知识等活动，服务职工群众，用实际行动彰显工会“硬核力量”。
HYP: The cadres, employees, and model workers of the Tianshan North and South Trade Unions walked into the neighborhood communities and residents to carry out activities such as food delivery, disinfection and sterilization, and epidemic prevention knowledge to serve the employees and demonstrate the “hard core power” of the union with practical actions.

SRC: 天山南北工会干部、职工、劳动模范走进街道社区、居民群众中，开展送菜送药、消毒灭菌、<v>宣传</v>防疫知识等活动，服务职工群众，用实际行动彰显工会“硬核力量”。
HYP: The cadres, employees, and model workers of the Tianshan North and South Trade Unions walked into the neighborhood communities and residents to carry out activities such as food delivery, disinfection and sterilization, and epidemic prevention knowledge to serve the employees and demonstrate the “hard core power” of the union with practical actions.

SRC: 天山南北工会干部、职工、劳动模范走进街道社区、居民群众中，开展送菜送药、消毒灭菌、宣传防疫知识等活动，服务职工<v>群众</v>，用实际行动彰显工会“硬核力量”。
HYP: The cadres, employees, and model workers of the Tianshan North and South Trade Unions walked into the neighborhood communities and residents to carry out activities such as food delivery, disinfection and sterilization, and epidemic prevention knowledge to serve the employees and demonstrate the “hard core power” of the union with practical actions.

SRC: 近日，乌鲁木齐市天山区总工会慰问组一行，将一批急需的疫情防控生活物资送到了12个隔离点的工作人员手中。
HYP: Recently, the consolation team of the Tianshan District Federation of Trade Unions in Urumqi City sent a batch of urgently needed living materials for epidemic prevention and control to the staff in 12 quarantine points.

SRC: 疫情发生后，天山区总第一时间投入经费105万余元，紧急下拨给23个直属基层工会。
HYP: After the outbreak, Tianshan District invested more than 1.05 million yuan in the first time, which was urgently allocated to 23 directly affiliated grass-roots trade unions.

SRC: 中建新疆建工一建党委副书记、工会主席赵相国接到公司关于疫情防控的通知后，主动请缨，选择留在单位值班，为职工保驾护航。
HYP: Zhao Xiangguo, deputy secretary of the Party Committee of the First Construction of China Construction Xinjiang Construction Engineering Co., Ltd., and chairman of the labor union, received the company's notice on the prevention and control of the epidemic.

SRC: 他为居住在单位宿舍和新入职的职工送去做饭的炊具、食品及日用品，并组织人员每隔两天为他们送一次生活必备物资。
HYP: He sent cooking utensils, food and daily necessities for the workers who lived in the unit dormitory and newly recruited employees, and organized personnel to send them daily necessities every two days.

SRC: “7月21日起，对坚守战'疫'一线的干部职工进行摸底，并采取线上下单、商家送货上门的方式，先行为乌鲁木齐地区704名一线职工群众补充购买防疫用品和生活物资。”
HYP: “Starting from July 21, cadres and workers on the front line of the fight against the'epidemic' will be investigated, and orders will be placed online and merchants will deliver them to their door. First, 704 front-line workers in Urumqi will supplement the purchase of anti-epidemic supplies and living materials. ”

SRC: 新疆交通运输工会负责人告诉记者，面对突发疫情，他们全力做好疫情防控服务保障、稳步推进交通运输发展各项工作，营造齐心战“疫”的浓厚氛围。
HYP: The person in charge of the Xinjiang Transportation Union told reporters that in the face of sudden epidemics, they will do their best to ensure epidemic prevention and control services, steadily promote various tasks in transportation development, and create a strong atmosphere for fighting the “epidemic” together.

SRC: 当前正值夏季高温，各级工会紧盯疫情防控重点地区的一线职工，把“送清凉”关心关爱落到实处。
HYP: At present, it is the high temperature in summer. Trade unions at all levels are keeping an eye on front-line workers in key areas for epidemic prevention and control, and putting “sending coolness” into practice.

SRC: 7月19日，乌鲁木齐县总工会启动向疫情防控一线职工“送清凉”慰问活动，全县警务站、卡点和卫生系统收到了饮料、水果等慰问品。
HYP: On July 19, the Urumqi County Federation of Trade Unions launched a “sending cool” sympathy activity to front-line workers for epidemic prevention and control. Police stations, checkpoints, and health systems throughout the county received such sympathy as drinks and fruits.

SRC: “工会干部要进一步提高政治站位、强化责任担当，用关怀温暖人心，用行动鼓舞斗志。
HYP: “Trade union cadres must further improve their political positions, strengthen their responsibilities, warm people's hearts with care, and inspire fighting spirit with actions.

SRC: 要充分发挥工会组织凝聚职工、团结职工的作用，做好疫情防控服务保障，积极维护广大职工的健康权益，把关爱送到一线职工身边。”
HYP: It is necessary to give full play to the role of trade unions in rallying and uniting employees, ensure epidemic prevention and control services, actively safeguard the health rights and interests of employees, and send care to frontline employees. “

SRC: 自治区总工会相关负责人表示。
HYP: The relevant person in charge of the Autonomous Region Federation of Trade Unions said.

SRC: 2020年直招士官工作全面展开-新华网
HYP: Direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers is in full swing in 2020-Xinhuanet

SRC: 新华社北京7月26日电（记者贾启龙）军委政治工作部、军委国防动员部近日联合印发通知，部署展开2020年从普通高等学校毕业生中直接招收士官工作。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 26 (Reporter Jia Qilong) The Political Work Department of the Military Commission and the National Defense Mobilization Department of the Military Commission have recently jointly issued a notice to deploy the direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers from ordinary colleges and universities graduates in 2020.

SRC: 今年直招士官涵盖计算机、自动化、机械等64类270余个军地通用专业，重点加大无人机、航海、航空航天、电子信息、小语种等专业招收力度，招收规模相比去年增加近2000人。
HYP: This year's direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers covers more than 270 general military and civilian majors in 64 categories, including computer, automation, and machinery. The focus is on increasing the recruitment of drones, navigation, aerospace, electronic information, and minor languages. The scale of recruitment has increased by nearly last year. 2000 people.

SRC: 今年直招士官工作与义务兵征集同步组织实施，8月1日开始，9月30日结束。
HYP: This year, the direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers was organized and implemented simultaneously with the recruitment of conscripts, starting on August 1 and ending on September 30.

SRC: 应征青年可以通过全国征兵网（网址：http://www.gfbzb.gov.cn）查询直招士官条件和各地招收专业分布情况，符合专业范围和招收条件的在线提交报名信息，并根据应征地兵役机关统一要求，参加体格检查、政治考核等后续招收工作。
HYP: Young applicants can check the requirements for direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers and the distribution of recruiting majors in various regions through the National Recruitment Website (URL: http://www.gfbzb.gov.cn), and submit the registration information online if they meet the professional scope and recruiting conditions, and based on the land requisition The military service agencies uniformly require that they participate in follow-up recruitment work such as physical examinations and political assessments.

SRC: 因招收专业和计划限制未能被招收为士官的合格青年，可以参加义务兵征集，服义务兵役期满选取为士官时，在普通高等学校按规定学制就读的年数视同服役时间。
HYP: Qualified young people who cannot be recruited as non-commissioned officers due to the recruitment of majors and program restrictions can participate in the recruitment of conscripts. When they are selected as non-commissioned officers at the end of their compulsory military service, the number of years enrolled in ordinary colleges and universities according to the prescribed school system is regarded as service time.

SRC: 今年士官招收工作由省级或地市级人民政府征兵办公室统一组织，报名潜力丰富专业将在综合衡量报名对象学历层次、在校期间专业课成绩、取得职业资格证书等情况基础上择优遴选；稀缺专业将面向本地符合专业要求、具备招收优势的院校定向对口招收。
HYP: The recruitment of non-commissioned officers this year is organized by the recruitment office of the people's government at the provincial or municipal level. Majors with rich potential for registration will be selected on the basis of comprehensively measuring the academic level of the applicants, the performance of professional courses during the school period, and the vocational qualification certificates obtained; scarce majors Targeted recruitment will be directed to local colleges and universities that meet the professional requirements and have recruitment advantages.

SRC: 根据疫情常态化防控要求，今年直招士官原则上不安排自行报到，将与义务兵同步组织运输入营。
HYP: In accordance with the requirements for the normalization of the epidemic prevention and control, this year's direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers will not arrange self-registration in principle, and will organize operations in battalions simultaneously with conscripts.

SRC: 直接招收士官入伍时间从2020年9月1日起算，部队下达士官任职命令的时间为2020年12月1日。
HYP: The time for direct enlistment of non-commissioned officers shall be calculated from September 1, 2020, and the time for the army to issue the appointment of non-commissioned officers is December 1, 2020.

SRC: 部队接收单位将科学制定入伍和专业训练方案，认真组织施训；训练完成后按照专业对口、招用一致的原则，将招收士官统一精准分配到对口专业技术岗位。
HYP: The army receiving unit will scientifically formulate enlistment and professional training plans, and carefully organize training; after the training is completed, in accordance with the principle of professional counterparts and consistent recruitment, the recruited non-commissioned officers will be uniformly and accurately assigned to corresponding professional and technical positions.

SRC: 驻英使馆发言人：中国政府是网络安全的坚定维护者-中新网
HYP: Spokesperson of the Chinese Embassy in the UK: The Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security - chinanews.com

SRC: 中新网7月26日电据中国驻英国大使馆网站消息，25日，中国驻英国使馆发言人就有关网络攻击错误言论答记者问。
HYP: chinanews.com, July 26. According to the website of the Chinese Embassy in the United Kingdom, on the 25th, the spokesperson of the Chinese Embassy in the United Kingdom responded to reporters' questions about erroneous statements about cyber attacks.

SRC: 发言人强调，中国政府是网络安全的坚定维护者，一贯坚决反对并打击任何形式的网络攻击和网络犯罪。
HYP: The spokesperson emphasized that the Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security and has always resolutely opposed and combated any form of cyber attacks and cyber crimes.

SRC: 有记者提问：据媒体称，与中国有关的黑客组织曾干扰一家英国公司网络系统、向存有专利数据的英美技术公司发动攻击、入侵欧盟国家政府网络。
HYP: A reporter asked: According to the media, hacker organizations related to China have interfered with the network system of a British company, launched attacks on British and American technology companies that have patent data, and invaded the government networks of EU countries.

SRC: 发言人表示，中国政府是网络安全的坚定维护者，一贯坚决反对并打击任何形式的网络攻击和网络犯罪。
HYP: The spokesman said that the Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security and has always resolutely opposed and combated any form of cyber attacks and cyber crimes.

SRC: 网络空间虚拟性强，溯源难，行为体多样，在调查和定性网络事件的时候应拿出充分的证据，不能无端猜测。
HYP: Cyberspace is highly virtual, difficult to trace, and diverse actors. Sufficient evidence should be presented when investigating and identifying cyber incidents, and no unreasonable guesses should be made.

SRC: 发言人称，以往的“棱镜门”等一系列事件证明，美国一直都在进行全球最大范围的网络窃密行动。
HYP: The spokesperson said that a series of incidents such as the “Prism Gate” in the past proved that the United States has been conducting the world's largest cyber theft.

SRC: 维护网络空间的和平与稳定符合所有国家的共同利益。
HYP: Maintaining peace and stability in cyberspace is in the common interest of all countries.

SRC: 发言人指出，中国在科技创新方面的成就不是偷来的、不是抢来的，而是通过自力更生、艰苦奋斗得来的。
HYP: The spokesperson pointed out that China's achievements in technological innovation were not stolen or robbed, but were obtained through self-reliance and hard work.

SRC: 2019年中国通过《专利合作条约》(PCT)途径提交了约5.9万件专利申请，年增长率为10.6%，成为提交国际专利申请量最多的国家。
HYP: In 2019, China submitted about 59000 patent applications through the Patent Cooperation Treaty (PCT), with an annual growth rate of 10.6%, making it the country with the largest number of international patent applications.

SRC: 中国已经成为创新和知识产权大国。
HYP: China has become a country of innovation and intellectual property rights.

SRC: 乌鲁木齐免费核酸检测多数区已基本完成高风险地区进行二次检测-中新网
HYP: Free COVID-19 testing in Urumqi, most districts have basically completed secondary testing in high-risk areas - chinanews.com

SRC: 中新网乌鲁木齐7月26日电(记者孙亭文赵雅敏)乌鲁木齐市卫健委主任张卫26日在通报乌鲁木齐市最新疫情和核酸检测情况时称，目前，乌鲁木齐全市免费核酸检测工作多数区已基本完成。
HYP: chinanews.com, Urumqi, July 26 (Reporter Sun Tingwen and Zhao Yamin) Zhang Wei, director of the Urumqi Health and Health Commission, said on the 26th when reporting the latest epidemic situation and COVID-19 testing in Urumqi, at present, most areas of Urumqi's free COVID-19 testing work have been basically completed.

SRC: 国务院专家组和自治区、乌鲁木齐市专家正在根据核酸检测和流行病学调查结果，对疫情的发展做进一步评估。
HYP: The expert group of the State Council and the experts of the autonomous region and Urumqi City are making further assessments of the development of the epidemic based on the results of COVID-19 testing and epidemiological investigations.

SRC: 新疆维吾尔自治区新闻办公室26日召开新闻发布会通报新疆疫情和防控<v>情况</v>。
HYP: The Press Office of the Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region held a press conference on the 26th to report on the epidemic situation and its prevention and control in Xinjiang.

SRC: 据他介绍，7月25日0时至24时，乌鲁木齐市新增新冠肺炎确诊病例22例(其中5例为无症状感染者转确诊病例) ，新增无症状感染者38例。
HYP: According to him, from 0:00 to 24:00 on July 25, 22 new cases of COVID-19 were confirmed in Urumqi (5 of them were asymptomatic infections transferred to confirmed cases), and 38 new cases of asymptomatic infections were added.

SRC: 截至7月25日24时，乌鲁木齐市现有确诊病例135例，无症状感染者147例。
HYP: As of 24:00 on July 25, Urumqi City has 135 confirmed cases and 147 asymptomatic infections.

SRC: 25日新增的无症状感染者也基本上都是通过全市免费核酸检测、主动筛查出来的。
HYP: The newly-added asymptomatic infections on the 25th were basically detected through the city's free COVID-19 test and active screening.

SRC: 乌鲁木齐市卫健委主任张卫26日称，乌鲁木齐全市免费核酸检测工作多数区已基本完成。
HYP: Zhang Wei, director of the Urumqi Municipal Health Commission, said on the 26th that most districts in Urumqi Quanquan City have basically completed free COVID-19 testing.

SRC: 他还说，从国内其他地区的经验看，影响核酸检测结果的因素很多，比如检测试剂灵敏度、受检测人员的感染时间和排毒时间、标本取材时受检测者配合情况(配合度差可能导致标本没有取到位)以及检测环境、检验人员的操作熟练程度等。
HYP: He also said that from the experience of other regions in the country, there are many factors that affect the results of COVID-19 testing, such as the sensitivity of the test reagent, the infection time and detoxification time of the tested person, and the cooperation of the tested person when the specimen is taken (poor cooperation may lead to the specimen Not taken in place) and the testing environment, the operating proficiency of the inspectors, etc.

SRC: 由于各种原因，核酸检测也会出现假阴性的结果。
HYP: For various reasons, false negative results can also occur in COVID-19 testing.

SRC: 所谓假阴性，就是指受检测者确实是感染者，但是核酸检测结果却为阴性。
HYP: The so-called false negative means that the tested person is indeed an infected person, but the COVID-19 test result is negative.

SRC: 另外，对于和确诊病例、疑似病例有过密切接触的人员，通常需要两次核酸检测才能排除。
HYP: In addition, for people who have had close contact with confirmed or suspected cases, two COVID-19 tests are usually required to exclude them.

SRC: 对于去过疫情中高风险地区的人员，如果出现发热和呼吸道症状，一次核酸检测阴性存在假阴性可能，所以也需要两次核酸检测才能排除。
HYP: For people who have been to high-risk areas of the epidemic, if they have fever and respiratory symptoms, a negative COVID-19 test may have a false negative, so two COVID-19 tests are needed to rule out.

SRC: 他表示，鉴于以上情况，为了全市各族群众的身体健康，从今天开始，乌鲁木齐市将对天山区、沙依巴克区等重点地区进行二次免费核酸检测，同时开展“查遗补漏” 。
HYP: He said that, in view of the above situation, for the health of the people of all ethnic groups in the city, starting today, Urumqi City will conduct a second free COVID-19 test in key areas such as Tianshan District and Shayibake District, and carry out “checking for omissions” at the same time.

SRC: 据悉，天山区、沙依巴克区是疫情高风险地区。
HYP: It is reported that Tianshan District and Shayibak District are high-risk areas for the epidemic.

SRC: 白宫疫情专家福奇：对2021年初研制出疫苗持谨慎乐观
HYP: White House epidemic expert Fauci: cautiously optimistic about the development of a vaccine in early 2021

SRC: 福奇25日在国际领袖基金会主办的一场网络视频会议上作上述表示。
HYP: Fauci made the above remarks at an online video conference hosted by the International Leadership Foundation on the 25th.

SRC: 他提醒说，目前尚不清楚新冠疫情在秋冬季将如何发展，也不知道疫情的最终影响会如何，“而结束这一切的唯一办法就是我们每个人都选择成为解决问题的一部分”。
HYP: He reminded that it is not yet clear how the COVID-19 will develop in autumn and winter, nor what the ultimate impact of the epidemic will be. “The only way to end all this is for each of us to choose to be part of the solution.”

SRC: 据美国约翰斯·霍普金斯大学数据，截至25日21时，美国新冠确诊病例已达417.6万，死亡14.6万人。
HYP: According to data from Johns Hopkins University in the United States, as of 21.00 on the 25th, the number of confirmed cases of the COVID-19 in the United States has reached 4.176 million and 146000 have died.

SRC: 福奇表示，美国一些地区目前正在艰难地同反弹的疫情作斗争。
HYP: Fauci said that some parts of the United States are currently struggling to fight the rebounding epidemic.

SRC: 尽管各地疫情有所不同，需要因地制宜的应对方案，但多样化的抗疫策略并不意味着地区之间没有紧密联系。
HYP: Although the epidemic situation varies from place to place and requires a response plan tailored to local conditions, diversified anti-epidemic strategies do not mean that there is no close contact between regions.

SRC: 一个地区的疫情最终会影响到其他地区。
HYP: The epidemic in one area will eventually affect other areas.

SRC: “现在不是自满的时候”，福奇说，“我们的工作没有完成，必须加紧努力，也必须对未来的不确定性保持警惕。”
HYP: “Now is not the time to be complacent,” Fauci said. “Our work has not been completed. We must intensify our efforts and we must also be vigilant about the uncertainties in the future.”

SRC: 美国华裔医学专家、治疗艾滋病“鸡尾酒疗法”创始人何大一在会上指出，美国新冠疫情尚未到达顶峰。
HYP: He Dayi, a Chinese-American medical expert and founder of AIDS “cocktail therapy”, pointed out at the meeting that the COVID-19 in the United States has not yet reached its peak.

SRC: “我们每个人都必须尽自己的一份力来减缓这一病毒的传播。”
HYP: “Each of us must do our part to slow the spread of this virus.”

SRC: 何大一呼吁，公众用自己的实际行动为科学家争取时间，以加紧研发新冠治疗药物和疫苗。
HYP: He Dayi urged the public to use their own actions to buy time for scientists to speed up the development of COVID-19 treatment drugs and vaccines.

SRC: 国际领袖基金会是一家以促进美国及亚太地区国际交流活动为宗旨的非营利性组织，致力于提升美国亚太裔地位，培育国际青年领袖。
HYP: The International Leaders Foundation is a non-profit organization with the purpose of promoting international exchange activities in the United States and the Asia-Pacific region. It is committed to enhancing the status of Asian-Pacific Americans and cultivating young international leaders.

SRC: 当天，美国运输部长赵小兰、美联邦众议员孟昭文以及国际领袖基金会创会会长董继玲等分别在会上发言。
HYP: On the same day, US Secretary of Transportation Zhao Xiaolan, US Congressman Meng Zhaowen, and the founding chairman of the International Leaders Foundation Dong Jiling gave speeches at the meeting.

SRC: 他们特别向在一线抗疫的亚太裔医务工作者和志愿者致敬，并呼吁美国公众继续坚持“社交距离”等防疫准则，遏制疫情扩散。
HYP: They paid special tribute to Asian-Pacific medical workers and volunteers who were fighting the epidemic on the front line, and called on the American public to continue to adhere to anti-epidemic guidelines such as “social distancing” to curb the spread of the epidemic.

SRC: 美中贸谈代表传8月会面
HYP: Representatives of the US-China Business Talks meet in August

SRC: 香港《南华早报》25日引述一名匿名知情人士报导，中国贸易谈判团队负责人、国务院副总理刘鹤与美方团队共同领导人、贸易代表赖海哲可望在8月举行正式会谈，评估双方履行中美第一阶段贸易协议的情况。
HYP: Hong Kong's “South China Morning Post” quoted an anonymous person familiar with the matter as reporting that Liu He, the head of China's trade negotiation team and vice premier of the State Council, and Lai Haizhe, co-leader of the US team and trade representative, are expected to hold formal talks in August to assess the performance of the two parties. The situation of the first phase of the US trade agreement.

SRC: 报导说，虽然中国过去几个月已大幅提高采购美国农产品数量，但因新冠病毒疫情等因素，中方采购量距离贸易协议中承诺的数量仍有一段距离。
HYP: The report said that although China has substantially increased its purchases of American agricultural products in the past few months, due to factors such as the COVID-19, China's purchases are still some distance from the amounts promised in the trade agreement.

SRC: 分析家说，近来美中相互关闭对方领事馆，加上其他争端，可能破坏双方在贸易方面的任何进展。
HYP: Analysts say that the recent closure of each other's consulates by the United States and China, together with other disputes, may undermine any progress in trade between the two sides.

SRC: 中美第一阶段贸易协议在1月15日签署后一个月生效，协议中规定双方高层组成的贸易框架小组，每半年应举行一次会谈。
HYP: The first phase of the Sino-US trade agreement will take effect one month after it was signed on January 15. The agreement stipulates that the high-level trade framework group formed by the two sides should hold talks every six months.

SRC: 知情人士透露，此次会议将是“一个重要的转折点”，让双方得以评估协议进展。
HYP: According to people familiar with the matter, the meeting will be “an important turning point” for both parties to assess the progress of the agreement.

SRC: 但这名人士也说，若美中紧张关系导致此时会谈意愿不高，双方可能会同意，赖海哲与刘鹤5月8日的电话会议，即已满足贸易协议中每半年会谈一次的条款。
HYP: But this person also said that if the tension between the United States and China leads to a low willingness to talk at this time, the two parties may agree that the May 8 conference call between Lai Haizhe and Liu He has met the terms of the trade agreement to meet every six months.

SRC: 今年以来，中美关系急速恶化，双方争端包括新冠病毒起源、贸易、香港、新疆、南海与意识形态等一系列问题。
HYP: Since the beginning of this year, Sino-US relations have deteriorated rapidly. Disputes between the two sides include a series of issues such as the origin of the COVID-19 virus, trade, Hong Kong, Xinjiang, the South China Sea, and ideology.

SRC: 美国总统特朗普虽在年初吹嘘自己在首阶段协议中取得的成就，但近来态度改变。
HYP: Although US President Trump boasted about his achievements in the first phase of the agreement at the beginning of the year, his attitude has changed recently.

SRC: 他23日在白宫记者会上说，虽然中国近来单日采购美国玉米数量破纪录，也买了很多大豆，“但这份贸易协议现在对我的意义，已不如当初达成时” 。
HYP: He said at a White House press conference on the 23rd that although China has recently purchased a record-breaking amount of US corn in a single day and has also bought a lot of soybeans, “but this trade agreement is not as meaningful to me as it was when it was reached.”

SRC: 一位匿名北京政府顾问也认为，由于美中关系不佳，新一轮贸易谈判不太可能进行， “贸易议题在中美关系已失去分量”。
HYP: An anonymous Beijing government consultant also believes that due to poor US-China relations, a new round of trade negotiations is unlikely to take place, and “trade issues have lost weight in Sino-US relations.”

SRC: 但他透露，中国经贸相关单位23日仍开会讨论了一系列问题，包括如何增加从美国的进口量， “我们已经尽力买了，所以任何追加采购会有困难” 。
HYP: However, he revealed that Chinese economic and trade related units still met on the 23rd to discuss a series of issues, including how to increase imports from the United States. “We have tried our best to buy, so any additional purchases will be difficult.”

SRC: 美中贸易全国委员会副会长彭捷宁表示，保持首阶段协议动能“比以往任何时候都更重要”， 并指中国今年在进一步向美企开放金融市场上有所进展。
HYP: Peng Jiening, vice chairman of the US-China Business Council, said that maintaining the momentum of the first phase of the agreement is “more important than ever” and that China has made progress this year in further opening up its financial markets to US companies.

SRC: 独立研究公司Plenum分析师说：“谈比不谈好，尽管可能只被当成例行公事。”
HYP: An analyst at Plenum, an independent research firm, said: “It is better to talk than nothing, although it may only be regarded as a routine matter.”

SRC: 余额宝收益下行“90后”反而“报复性”存钱？
HYP: Yu'E Bao's revenue declines, “post-90s” but “retaliation” to save money?

SRC: 随着余额宝收益下行， “90后”不仅没有逃离余额宝，反而开始“报复性”存钱了？
HYP: With the decline in Yu'E Bao's income, the “post-90s” not only did not escape from Yu'E Bao, but began to “retaliate” to save money?

SRC: 中国新经济研究院联合支付宝日前发布的《余额宝90后攒钱报告》（2020版）显示，上半年，“90后”更爱攒钱了：人均攒钱金额比2019年增长近四成。
HYP: The Yu'E Bao Post-90s Post-90s Savings Report (2020 version) recently released by the China New Economic Research Institute and Alipay shows that in the first half of the year, post-90s are more likely to save money: the average amount of money saved per capita has increased by nearly 40% compared to 2019.

SRC: 有意思的是，“90后”更倾向于从一笔笔“小钱”开始攒，有六成平均每笔攒钱金额在20元以下… …
HYP: What's interesting is that “post-90s” tend to start saving from a small amount of money, and 60% of the savings are less than 20 yuan per transaction...…

SRC: 用余额宝攒钱，也成为“90后”的攒钱习惯。
HYP: Saving money with Yu'E Bao has also become the habit of saving money for “post-90s”.

SRC: 数据显示，在7亿余额宝用户中，有1.34亿用户是“90后” 。
HYP: Data shows that among the 700 million Yu'E Bao users, 134 million are “post-90s.”

SRC: 中国有1.74亿“90后” ，也就是说，全国每4个“90后”中约有3个在用余额宝攒钱。
HYP: There are 174 million “post-90s” in China, that is to say, about 3 out of every 4 “post-90s” in the country are using Yu'E Bao to save money.

SRC: 目前，余额宝等货币基金的7日年化收益率从年初高于2%的水平，下滑到1.5%左右。
HYP: At present, the 7-day annualized rate of return of currency funds such as Yu'E Bao has fallen to around 1.5% from a level of higher than 2% at the beginning of the year.

SRC: 即使如此，也没有影响“90后”攒钱的步伐。
HYP: Even so, it did not affect the pace of “post-90s” saving money.

SRC: 而在余额宝“攒钱效应”提升背景下，不少习惯使用余额宝的年轻人还直接转化为“基民”。
HYP: In the context of the enhancement of Yu'E Bao's “saving money effect”, many young people who are accustomed to using Yu'E Bao have directly transformed into “basic people”.

SRC: 支付宝数据显示，截至7月13日，近一个月支付宝上的新“基民”同比增长1倍多，越来越多年轻人在支付宝上实现“进阶”理财。
HYP: According to Alipay data, as of July 13, the number of new “basic people” on Alipay has more than doubled year-on-year in the past month, and more and more young people have achieved “advanced” financial management on Alipay.

SRC: 有分析师认为，资金从余额宝流入股市，也是6月货币基金份额明确下滑的重要原因。
HYP: Some analysts believe that the flow of funds from Yu'E Bao into the stock market is also an important reason for the clear decline in the share of money funds in June.

SRC: 报告还显示，“90后”女生更倾向于多攒钱，平均比男生攒钱金额高两成；在支付宝平台上持有基金的用户中，6成是男性，女性与男性相比倾向于选择更为稳健的理财方式。
HYP: The report also shows that “post-90s” girls tend to save more, on average 20% higher than boys. Among users who hold funds on the Alipay platform, 60% are men, and women tend to choose more than men. A more robust financial management method.

SRC: 存钱之后，“90后”有何计划？
HYP: After saving money, what plans does the “post-90s” have?

SRC: 支付宝数据显示，“90后”有为目标攒钱的习惯，将旅行作为攒钱目标的用户最多。
HYP: Alipay data shows that “post-90s” have the habit of saving money for their goals, and the most users make travel as their goal to save money.

SRC: 受疫情影响，许多“90后”攒钱为疫情后的旅行做准备；电影院恢复营业，也为从攒钱转向消费提供了新途径。
HYP: Affected by the epidemic, many “post-90s” save money to prepare for travel after the epidemic; the reopening of movie theaters also provides a new way to switch from saving money to consumption.

SRC: 让一面面鲜艳的党旗在抗洪大堤上高高飘扬
HYP: Let a bright party flag fly high on the flood-fighting embankment

SRC: 近期我国南方受连续降雨影响，防汛抗洪形势十分严峻，造成贵州、四川、湖南、广西、广东、湖北等26省(区、市)受灾。
HYP: Recently, under the influence of continuous rainfall in southern my country, the situation of flood prevention and flood fighting is very severe, causing 26 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities) including Guizhou, Sichuan, Hunan, Guangxi, Guangdong, and Hubei to suffer disasters.

SRC: 灾情就是命令，灾区就是战场，灾害面前，党旗就是战旗，各级党组织、广大党员干部、人民子弟兵坚决落实习近平总书记关于防汛救灾工作重要指示<v>精神</v>，迅速投身防汛抗洪抢险救灾第一线，成为灾区群众的主心骨、抗洪战斗的生力军。
HYP: The disaster situation is the command, the disaster area is the battlefield, and in front of the disaster, the party flag is the battle flag. Party organizations at all levels, the majority of party members and cadres, and the people's children have resolutely implemented the spirit of General Secretary Jinping's important instructions on flood prevention and disaster relief work, and quickly joined the front line of flood prevention, flood relief and disaster relief. Become the backbone of the people in the disaster area and a new force in the fight against floods.

SRC: 灾情就是命令，灾区就是战场，灾害面前，党旗就是战旗，各级党组织、广大党员干部、人民子弟兵坚决落实习近平总书记关于防汛救灾工作重要指示精神，迅速投身防汛抗洪抢险救灾第一线，成为灾区群众的主心骨、抗洪战斗的生力军。
HYP: The disaster situation is the command, the disaster area is the battlefield, and in front of the disaster, the party flag is the battle flag. Party organizations at all levels, the majority of party members and cadres, and the people's children have resolutely implemented the spirit of General Secretary Jinping's important instructions on flood prevention and disaster relief work, and quickly joined the front line of flood prevention, flood relief and disaster relief. Become the backbone of the people in the disaster area and a new force in the fight against floods.

SRC: 鲜艳的党旗在抗洪大堤上高高飘扬，是忠诚的体现，也是使命的召唤。
HYP: The bright party flag flying high on the flood-fighting embankment is a manifestation of loyalty and a call of duty.

SRC: 灾害面前，一个党组织就是一座战斗堡垒，一名党员干部就是一面旗帜。
HYP: In the face of disasters, a party organization is a battle fortress, and a party member and cadre is a banner.

SRC: 在各地的抗洪一线，各级党组织、广大党员干部体现高度的对党忠诚，听从党中央号召，以“看我的”的行动、“跟我来”的步伐、“我先上”的勇气，筑起一座座冲不垮的钢铁堡垒，挺起一个个压不弯的中国脊梁。
HYP: On the front line of flood fighting in various places, party organizations at all levels and the majority of party members and cadres have shown a high degree of loyalty to the party, heeded the call of the party central committee, and acted with “watch me”, “follow me” pace, and “I go first” , To build a steel fortress that can't be broken, and a Chinese backbone that can't bend is erected.

SRC: 在各地的抗洪一线，各级党组织、广大党员干部体现高度的对党忠诚，听从党中央号召，以“看我的”的行动、“跟我来”的步伐、“我先上”的<v>勇气</v>，筑起一座座冲不垮的钢铁堡垒，挺起一个个压不弯的中国脊梁。
HYP: On the front line of flood fighting in various places, party organizations at all levels and the majority of party members and cadres have shown a high degree of loyalty to the party, heeded the call of the party central committee, and acted with “watch me”, “follow me” pace, and “I go first” , To build a steel fortress that can't be broken, and a Chinese backbone that can't bend is erected.

SRC: 鲜艳的党旗在抗洪大堤上高高飘扬，是阵地的坚守，也是冲锋的号角。
HYP: The bright party flag flying high on the flood-fighting embankment is a stronghold of position and a clarion call for charge.

SRC: 面对洪涝灾害，各级党组织迅速行动，吹响抗洪“冲锋号”，把鲜艳的党旗插在抗洪的大堤上，广大党员干部、人民子弟兵坚守在抗洪的阵地上，用“党旗在阵地就在”、“洪水不退永不收兵”的意志和行动，成为灾区群众最放心也最值得信赖的坚固屏障。
HYP: In the face of flood disasters, party organizations at all levels acted swiftly and sounded the “Charge” to fight floods and planted bright party flags on the flood-fighting embankment. The majority of party members and cadres and the people's soldiers stood firmly on the flood-fighting positions and used the “party flags to fight the floods.” The will and actions of “in” and “the flood never retreats and will never retreat” have become the most assured and trustworthy solid barrier for the people in the disaster-affected areas.

SRC: 鲜艳的党旗在抗洪大堤上高高飘扬，是无私的奉献，也是责任的担当。
HYP: The bright party flag flying high on the flood-fighting embankment is a selfless dedication and responsibility.

SRC: 危难时刻，彰显党员本色，在人民群众生命财产受到严重威胁的时刻，党员干部、人民子弟兵舍小家、顾大家，无私奉献，敢于担当，把打赢防汛抗洪抢险救灾这场硬仗，作为全面检验能力、作风、素养的主战场、阅兵场，正是这种无私奉献和担当的精神，极大的鼓舞着灾区群众战胜灾情的信心和决心，凝聚起打赢防汛抗洪抢险救灾的强大精神力量。
HYP: In times of crisis, it shows the true qualities of party members. When people's lives and property are seriously threatened, party members and cadres, people's children's shelters, small families, care for everyone, selfless dedication, dare to take responsibility, and win the tough battle of flood prevention, flood relief and disaster relief as a comprehensive test The main battlefield and parade ground for ability, style, and quality are precisely this spirit of selfless dedication and responsibility that greatly inspires the confidence and determination of the people in the disaster-stricken areas to overcome the disaster, and gathers a powerful spiritual force to win flood prevention, flood relief and disaster relief.

SRC: “人民至上、生命至上”， 既在平时接受检验，更在关键时刻接受考验。
HYP: “The people are supreme, life is supreme” is not only tested in peacetime, but also tested at critical moments.

SRC: 在抗洪大堤上，广大党员干部和人民子弟兵，要让人民群众随时随处都能看到鲜红的党旗、奋斗的身影、鼓励的声音，用洪水冲不垮的钢铁堤坝为党旗增辉添彩，让一面面鲜艳的党旗在抗洪大堤上高高飘扬！
HYP: On the flood-fighting levee, the broad masses of party members and cadres and the people's children and soldiers should let the people see the bright red party flag, struggling figure, and voice of encouragement at any time and anywhere, and use the steel dam that can not be washed by floods to add luster to the party flag and make every facet. The bright party flags are flying high on the flood-fighting embankment!

SRC: APEC成员贸易部长会议表示将加速推动区域经济复苏-新华网
HYP: APEC member trade ministers meeting said it will accelerate regional economic recovery-Xinhuanet

SRC: 新华社吉隆坡7月25日电（记者林昊）亚太经合组织（APEC）成员贸易部长视频会议25日举行，会议承诺将致力于减少新冠疫情对本区域经济的影响，加速推动实现具有弹性、可持续性和包容性的区域经济复苏。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Kuala Lumpur, July 25 (Reporter Lin Hao) A video conference of APEC trade ministers was held on the 25th. The meeting promised to work to reduce the impact of the COVID-19 on the regional economy and accelerate the realization of flexibility and sustainability And inclusive regional economic recovery.

SRC: 会议由今年APEC领导人非正式会议主办方马来西亚主持。
HYP: The meeting was hosted by Malaysia, the host of this year's APEC informal leaders' meeting.

SRC: 会后发表的联合声明表示，APEC成员贸易部长认识到，在这一具有挑战性的时刻，一个自由、开放、公平、非歧视、透明和可预测的贸易和投资环境对于推动经济复苏的重要性。
HYP: The joint statement issued after the meeting stated that APEC member trade ministers recognize the importance of a free, open, fair, non-discriminatory, transparent and predictable trade and investment environment to promote economic recovery at this challenging time. .

SRC: 各方承诺，确保为应对疫情所采取的紧急措施是具有针对性、恰当、透明和临时的，不会制造不必要的贸易壁垒并扰乱全球供应链，同时遵守世界贸易组织规则。
HYP: All parties pledged to ensure that the emergency measures taken in response to the epidemic are targeted, appropriate, transparent and temporary, and will not create unnecessary trade barriers and disrupt the global supply chain, while complying with the rules of the World Trade Organization.

SRC: APEC成员贸易部长在声明中承诺，加强合作促进必要的商品和服务流动，通过加强供应链弹性促进互联互通，将医疗物资、食品和农业产品流动所受到的干扰最小化，以应对疫情。
HYP: In the statement, APEC member trade ministers promised to strengthen cooperation to promote the flow of necessary goods and services, promote interconnection through strengthening the flexibility of the supply chain, and minimize the interference in the flow of medical supplies, food and agricultural products in response to the epidemic.

SRC: APEC成员贸易部长一致认为，有必要讨论如何减少限制必要商品贸易的非关税壁垒，重申将致力于在不影响为阻止疫情蔓延所采取措施的情况下促进必要的跨境人员流动。
HYP: The trade ministers of APEC members agreed that it is necessary to discuss how to reduce non-tariff barriers restricting the trade of necessary commodities, and reiterated their commitment to promoting the necessary cross-border movement of people without affecting the measures taken to prevent the spread of the epidemic.

SRC: 会议还发布了有关促进必要商品流通的宣言。
HYP: The meeting also issued a declaration on promoting the circulation of necessary commodities.

SRC: 宣言表示，各经济体将确保其为应对疫情所采取的贸易措施符合世贸组织规定，并承诺在减少非关税贸易壁垒、贸易促进等方面采取行动，以促进疫情下必要的商品流动。
HYP: The declaration stated that the economies will ensure that the trade measures they take in response to the epidemic are in compliance with WTO regulations, and pledged to take actions in reducing non-tariff trade barriers and trade promotion to promote the flow of necessary commodities during the epidemic.

SRC: 主持会议的马来西亚国际贸易和工业部部长阿兹明·阿里表示，尽管受到疫情影响，马来西亚依然致力于推动今年APEC会议取得成功，制定APEC2020年后合作愿景的工作正有序推进。
HYP: The Minister of International Trade and Industry of Malaysia, Azmin Ali, who presided over the meeting, said that despite the impact of the epidemic, Malaysia is still committed to promoting the success of this year's APEC meeting, and the work of formulating a vision for APEC post-2020 cooperation is proceeding in an orderly manner.

SRC: 马来西亚同意以视频形式举行APEC相关会议，但不排除在年底APEC领导人非正式会议时安排实体会议的可能性。
HYP: Malaysia agreed to hold APEC-related meetings in the form of video, but it does not rule out the possibility of arranging physical meetings at the end of the APEC informal meeting of leaders.

SRC: 江西财政紧急下达2.8亿元资金支持各地灾后救助重建-中新网
HYP: Jiangxi Finance urgently releases 280 million yuan to support post-disaster relief and reconstruction in various regions - chinanews.com

SRC: 7月24日，江西省九江市湖口县，驰援当地抗洪的中国人民解放军第71集团军某部官兵利用备勤间隙，帮助湖口县一蔬菜种植<v>专业</v>合作社抢收辣椒。
HYP: On July 24, in Hukou County, Jiujiang City, Jiangxi Province, officers and soldiers of the 71st Group Army of the Chinese People's Liberation Army who rushed to help the local flood fight took advantage of the standby gap to help a vegetable planting cooperative in Hukou County grab peppers.

SRC: 7月24日，江西省九江市湖口县，驰援当地抗洪的中国人民解放军第71集团军某部官兵利用备勤间隙，帮助湖口县一蔬菜种植专业合作社抢收辣椒。
HYP: On July 24, in Hukou County, Jiujiang City, Jiangxi Province, officers and soldiers of the 71st Group Army of the Chinese People's Liberation Army who rushed to help the local flood fight took advantage of the standby gap to help a vegetable planting cooperative in Hukou County grab peppers.

SRC: 受此前强降雨影响，该合作社种植的上百亩红辣椒受灾严重，如不及时采摘损失会更加扩大。
HYP: Affected by the previous heavy rainfall, hundreds of acres of red peppers planted by the cooperative were severely affected, and the losses would increase if they were not picked in time.

SRC: 中新社记者富田摄
HYP: Photo by China News Service reporter Fu Tian

SRC: 中新网南昌7月26日电(袁汝晶)江西省财政厅26日消息，根据江西省防汛抗旱指挥部的工作部署和要求，该省财政紧急下达中央和省级救灾资金2.8亿元，为<v>防汛</v>抢险和受灾群众救助工作提供资金保障。
HYP: chinanews.com, Nanchang, July 26 (Yuan Rujing) Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance reported on the 26th that according to the work deployment and requirements of the Jiangxi Provincial Flood Control and Drought Relief Headquarters, the provincial government urgently issued 280 million yuan of central and provincial disaster relief funds for flood control. Provide financial guarantee for emergency rescue and disaster relief work.

SRC: 中新网南昌7月26日电(袁汝晶)江西省财政厅26日消息，根据江西省防汛抗旱指挥部的工作部署和要求，该省财政紧急下达中央和省级救灾资金2.8亿元，为防汛抢险和受灾群众救助工作提供资金保障。
HYP: chinanews.com, Nanchang, July 26 (Yuan Rujing) Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance reported on the 26th that according to the work deployment and requirements of the Jiangxi Provincial Flood Control and Drought Relief Headquarters, the provincial government urgently issued 280 million yuan of central and provincial disaster relief funds for flood control. Provide financial guarantee for emergency rescue and disaster relief work.

SRC: 中新网南昌7月26日电(袁汝晶)江西省财政厅26日消息，根据江西省防汛抗旱指挥部的工作部署和要求，该省财政紧急下达中央和省级救灾资金2.8亿元，为防汛抢险和<v>受灾群众</v>救助工作提供资金保障。
HYP: chinanews.com, Nanchang, July 26 (Yuan Rujing) Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance reported on the 26th that according to the work deployment and requirements of the Jiangxi Provincial Flood Control and Drought Relief Headquarters, the provincial government urgently issued 280 million yuan of central and provincial disaster relief funds for flood control. Provide financial guarantee for emergency rescue and disaster relief work.

SRC: 7月份以来，江西汛期、灾情不断升级。
HYP: Since July, the flood season and disaster situation in Jiangxi have been escalating.

SRC: 洪涝灾害已导致该省农业农村直接经济损失100.7亿元、受灾面积1316.9万亩。
HYP: The flood disaster has caused direct economic losses of 10.07 billion yuan in agriculture and rural areas in the province, and the disaster-affected area is 13.169 million mu.

SRC: 7月17和7月22日，江西省财政先后下达中央救灾资金6000万元和2亿元。
HYP: On July 17 and July 22, Jiangxi Provincial Finance successively issued 60 million yuan and 200 million yuan for the central disaster relief fund.

SRC: 同时根据灾情变化情况，从该省应急管理专项资金中连续分3批下达省级救灾资金2030万元，支持各地灾后救助和恢复重建。
HYP: At the same time, according to the changes in the disaster situation, from the provincial emergency management special funds, the provincial disaster relief funds of 20.3 million yuan were issued in three consecutive batches to support post-disaster relief and recovery and reconstruction.

SRC: 江西省财政厅相关负责人26日称，在汛期到来之前，已下达各类防灾减灾资金1.73亿元，确保风险防患早发现、早处置、早化解，为抗洪抢险工作提供经费支持。
HYP: The relevant person in charge of the Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance said on the 26th that before the arrival of the flood season, 173 million yuan of various disaster prevention and mitigation funds had been issued to ensure early detection, early disposal and early resolution of risks and provide financial support for flood fighting and rescue work.

SRC: 目前，长江江西段和中国最大淡水湖鄱阳湖水位呈高位缓退状态。
HYP: At present, the water level of the Jiangxi section of the Yangtze River and Poyang Lake, China's largest freshwater lake, is slowly receding from a high level.

SRC: 江西省防指于24日18时，将防汛应急响应下调至Ⅱ级；将省级救灾应急响应级别由II级调整为III级。
HYP: At 18:00 on the 24th, the Jiangxi Provincial Defense Command lowered the flood control emergency response to level II; the provincial disaster relief emergency response level was adjusted from level II to level III.

SRC: 灾情评估和灾后恢复重建等各项工作将持续进行。
HYP: Disaster assessment and post-disaster recovery and reconstruction work will continue.

SRC: 国家卫健委：7月25日新增确诊病例46例，新疆22例辽宁13例- 经济观察网
HYP: National Health Commission: 46 new confirmed cases on July 25, 22 in Xinjiang and 13 in Liaoning-Economic Observer Network

SRC: 据国家卫生健康委员会消息，7月25日0—24时，31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增确诊病例46例，其中境外输入病例11例（内蒙古5例，广东3例，天津1例，福建1例，山东1例），本土病例35例（新疆22例，辽宁13例）；无新增死亡病例；新增疑似病例2例，均为境外输入病例（内蒙古1例，上海1例） 。
HYP: According to the National Health Commission, 31 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities) and the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 46 new confirmed cases from 0-24 on July 25, including 11 imported cases (5 in Inner Mongolia and 3 in Guangdong). Cases, 1 in Tianjin, 1 in Fujian, 1 in Shandong), 35 local cases (22 in Xinjiang, 13 in Liaoning); no new deaths; 2 new suspected cases, all imported cases (Inner Mongolia 1 Case, 1 case in Shanghai).

SRC: 当日新增治愈出院病例19例，解除医学观察的密切接触者673人，重症病例较前一日增加7例。
HYP: On the same day, 19 new cases were cured and discharged, 673 close contacts were released from medical observation, and 7 more severe cases than the previous day.

SRC: 境外输入现有确诊病例82例（其中重症病例2例），现有疑似病例3例。
HYP: There are 82 confirmed cases imported from abroad (including 2 severe cases) and 3 suspected cases.

SRC: 累计确诊病例2045例，累计治愈出院病例1963例，无死亡病例。
HYP: A total of 2045 confirmed cases, a total of 1963 cured and discharged cases, and no deaths.

SRC: 截至7月25日24时，据31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告，现有确诊病例288例（其中重症病例18例），累计治愈出院病例78908例，累计死亡病例4634例，累计报告确诊病例83830例，现有疑似病例3例。
HYP: As of 24:00 on July 25, according to reports from 31 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities) and the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps, there are currently 288 confirmed cases (including 18 severe cases), a total of 78908 cured and discharged cases, and a total of 4634 deaths. A total of 83830 confirmed cases have been reported, and there are 3 suspected cases.

SRC: 累计追踪到密切接触者779000人，尚在医学观察的密切接触者11762人。
HYP: A total of 779000 close contacts have been traced, and 11762 close contacts are still under medical observation.

SRC: 31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增无症状感染者68例（境外输入8例）；当日转为确诊病例17例（无境外输入） ；当日解除医学观察10例（境外输入7例）；尚在医学观察无症状感染者292例（境外输入91例）。
HYP: 31 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 68 new asymptomatic infections (8 imported from abroad); 17 confirmed cases were converted to confirmed cases on the same day (no imported from abroad); 10 medical observations were lifted on the same day (from overseas) Enter 7 cases); 292 cases of asymptomatic infection are still under medical observation (91 cases imported from abroad).

SRC: 累计收到港澳台地区通报确诊病例3009例。
HYP: A total of 3009 confirmed cases have been notified from Hong Kong, Macao and Taiwan.

SRC: 其中，香港特别行政区2505例（出院1455例，死亡18例），澳门特别行政区46例（出院46例），台湾地区458例（出院440例，死亡7例）。
HYP: Among them, 2505 cases were in Hong Kong Special Administrative Region (1455 cases were discharged, 18 deaths), 46 cases were discharged from Macau Special Administrative Region (46 cases were discharged), and 458 cases were discharged in Taiwan (440 cases were discharged, 7 cases died).

SRC: 专家说通过美国人口普查收集移民资料用于众院席位分配违宪
HYP: Experts say it is unconstitutional to collect immigration data through the US Census for seat allocation in the House of Representatives

SRC: 一些民权组织和好几个美国城市和县对美国联邦政府提出起诉，称特朗普总统府试图将无证移民排除在美国人口普查之外是行不通的，也是违宪的。
HYP: Some civil rights organizations and several US cities and counties have sued the US federal government, claiming that Trump's Presidential Palace's attempts to exclude undocumented immigrants from the US Census are unworkable and unconstitutional.

SRC: 美国人口普查将决定美国国会众议院席位的分配。
HYP: The US Census will determine the distribution of seats in the US House of Representatives.

SRC: 美国民权自由联盟执行律师萨拉·布兰农对美国之音说，“这么做是行不通的。”
HYP: Sarah Brannon, the executive attorney of the American Civil Liberties Alliance, told VOA, “This will not work.”

SRC: 她接着说，特朗普要求在人口普查中确定接受普查的人的公民身份难以做到，而且“不是很可靠。”
HYP: She went on to say that Trump's requirement to determine the citizenship of the census in the census is difficult and “not very reliable.”

SRC: 另一个公民自由组织共同事业组织星期四提出诉讼，对特朗普的行政令提出挑战。
HYP: Another civil liberties organization Common Cause filed a lawsuit on Thursday to challenge Trump's executive order.

SRC: 新泽西州、乔治亚州的一些城市加入了诉讼。
HYP: Some cities in New Jersey and Georgia joined the lawsuit.

SRC: 维吉尼亚州的阿灵顿县星期五也加入了诉讼。
HYP: Arlington County, Virginia, also joined the lawsuit on Friday.

SRC: 阿灵顿县的管理董事会主席加维说，“美国宪法要求每10年准确地清点我们的人口。我们必须准确地清点居住在阿灵顿县的每一个人，不能让这种非法试图吓跑人和压缩我们的移民社区人数的做法得逞。”
HYP: Arlington County Board of Management Chairman Garvey said, “The US Constitution requires an accurate count of our population every 10 years. We must accurately count everyone who lives in Arlington County, and we must not let this illegal attempt scare away. People and shrinking the number of our immigrant communities have succeeded.”

SRC: 另一些组织和个人则赞扬特朗普总统的行政令。
HYP: Other organizations and individuals praised President Trump's executive order.

SRC: 阿拉巴马州司法部长马歇尔称，该行政令是该州的一个“胜利”。
HYP: Alabama Attorney General Marshall called the executive order a “victory” for the state.

SRC: 他说，“分配各州的国会众议院席位和选举团席位的时候，必须根据居住在各州的居民人数，而且是合法居住的居民的人数。”
HYP: He said, “The allocation of seats in the House of Representatives and electoral college seats in each state must be based on the number of residents living in each state, and the number of residents living legally.”

SRC: 美国最高法院去年阻止了特朗普行政当局将公民身份问题纳入2020年人口普查表中。
HYP: The US Supreme Court last year prevented the Trump administration from including citizenship issues in the 2020 census form.

SRC: 特朗普总统本星期早些时候签署一项行政令，指令监管美国人口普查局的商业部长<v>罗斯</v>提交人口普查所得的无证人口的数据，以便行政当局将这些无证人口排除在各州的人口普查数字之外，并以此确定每个州究竟是增加还是减少或保持众议院议员席位。
HYP: President Trump signed an executive order earlier this week instructing the Secretary of Commerce of the US Census Bureau to submit data on the undocumented population obtained from the census so that the administration can exclude these undocumented populations from the state census. In addition to the number, and use this to determine whether each state will increase or decrease or maintain the seats of the House of Representatives.

SRC: 美国每隔10年就要根据人口变化情况重新分配众议院席位。
HYP: The United States redistributes seats in the House of Representatives every 10 years based on demographic changes.

SRC: 新书爆料：哈利王子觉得哥哥“势利傲慢”
HYP: New book broke the news: Prince Harry thinks his brother is “snobbish and arrogant”

SRC: 英国《泰晤士报》和《星期日泰晤士报》连载名为《寻找自由》（Finding Freedom）的新书，内容描绘哈利王子（Prince Harry）与妻子梅根（Meghan Markle）的王室生活心路历程。
HYP: The British “Times” and “Sunday Times” serialized a new book titled “Finding Freedom”, which depicts the royal life of Prince Harry and his wife Meghan Markle.

SRC: 但路透社报导，哈利和梅根已和这本书撇清关系，说他们未接受作者访问，也未提供任何内容。
HYP: However, Reuters reported that Harry and Meghan had disassociated themselves from the book, saying that they had not accepted the author's interview or provided any content.

SRC: 《星期日泰晤士报》报导，新书引述消息人士表示，哈利和梅根婚前约会时，威廉王子（Prince William）想确认原是好莱坞女星的梅根对哈利是否别有用心。
HYP: The Sunday Times reported that the new book quoted sources as saying that when Harry and Meghan were dating before marriage, Prince William wanted to confirm whether Meghan, who was originally a Hollywood actress, had ulterior motives for Harry.

SRC: 根据消息人士转述，威廉当时曾对哈利说：“你别感觉有必要仓促（娶梅根）。
HYP: According to a source, William said to Harry at the time: “Don't feel the need to rush (marry Megan).

SRC: 你可以尽量花时间去了解这个女孩。”
HYP: You can spend as much time as possible to get to know this girl. “

SRC: 报导说，当哈利听到威廉用“这个女孩”形容梅根，他从哥哥语气中感受到傲慢势利，他也认为自己不再需要他人照顾提醒。
HYP: The report said that when Harry heard William describe Meghan as “this girl”, he felt arrogant and snobbish in his brother's tone, and he also believed that he no longer needed others to take care of him.

SRC: 哈利和梅根今年1月宣布计划过更独立的生活，并将自食其力。
HYP: Harry and Meghan announced in January this year that they plan to live a more independent life and will support themselves.

SRC: 两人3月正式卸下王室高阶成员身分后，目前带著儿子亚契（Archie）住在美国洛杉矶追求新事业。
HYP: After the two officially removed their status as high-ranking members of the royal family in March, they now live with their son Archie in Los Angeles to pursue a new career.

SRC: 哈利和梅根在2018年5月结婚。
HYP: Harry and Meghan got married in May 2018.

SRC: 当时这场婚姻被视为为英国王室注入好莱坞的光鲜亮丽和新时代气息，两人也因此成为当代全球最受瞩目的名人夫妻档之一。
HYP: At that time, the marriage was regarded as injecting the glamour of Hollywood and the new era into the British royal family, and the two became one of the most watched celebrity couples in the world.

SRC: 越南驻老挝大使馆公使衔参赞郑氏心、在老挝越南佛教协会、老挝越南人总会、万象省政府代表、老挝老兵协会等代表一同参加了祭奠仪式。
HYP: The Minister Counselor of the Embassy of Vietnam in Laos, Zheng Shixin, and representatives from the Lao Vietnamese Buddhist Association, the Lao Vietnamese Association, the Vientiane Provincial Government, and the Lao Veterans Association attended the memorial ceremony.

SRC: 英烈祭奠仪式在庄严肃穆的气氛中举行，各位代表陆续向英烈们上香，缅怀英烈们的丰功伟绩及越老特殊团结关系。
HYP: The memorial ceremony for the heroes was held in a solemn and solemn atmosphere. Representatives successively offered incense to the heroes and cherished the great achievements of the heroes and the special solidarity between Vietnam and Laos.

SRC: 公使衔参赞郑氏心在讲话中表示，这是在老越南人和老挝人民共同缅怀两国革命英烈，一起对为两国独立自由牺牲的英烈表达感恩之心的机会，同时也是两国人民回顾两国并肩协作打击共同敌人，争取民族独立，国家统一，共同建设国家发展，巩固两国关系的良好机会。
HYP: Minister Counselor Cheng Thi Xin said in his speech that this is an opportunity for the Lao Vietnamese and Lao people to cherish the memory of the revolutionary heroes of the two countries and express gratitude to the heroes who sacrificed for the independence and freedom of the two countries. It is also an opportunity for the people of the two countries to look back. The two countries work side by side to fight against common enemies, strive for national independence, national reunification, and jointly build a good opportunity for national development and consolidate relations between the two countries.

SRC: 74年前的1946年1月23日， 老越战斗联盟的28名战士在进攻Phonehe据点时英勇牺牲。
HYP: On January 23, 1946, 74 years ago, 28 soldiers of the Lao-Vietnam Fighting Alliance died heroically when attacking the Phonehe stronghold.

SRC: 此次进攻取得胜利，成为两国在争取民族解放革命斗争初期阶段的具有历史性意义的胜利。
HYP: The victory of this offensive became a historic victory for the two countries in the early stage of the revolutionary struggle for national liberation.

SRC: 郑氏心女士强调，两国人民永远铭记为两国民族解放斗争事业牺牲的各位英烈，同时强调两国年轻一带将继续发扬老前辈英勇、坚强的传统，为越老关系持续开花结果及两国的繁荣发展作出应有的贡献。
HYP: Ms. Cheng Shixin emphasized that the people of the two countries will always remember the heroes and martyrs who sacrificed for the national liberation struggle of the two countries. At the same time, she emphasized that the young areas of the two countries will continue to carry forward the heroic and strong traditions of their elders, and that the relationship between Vietnam and Laos will continue to blossom and bear fruit. Make due contributions to the prosperity and development of China.

SRC: 里程碑式跨越！
HYP: A milestone leap!

SRC: 国际米兰解锁第3000场意甲比赛-中新网
HYP: Inter Milan unlocks 3000th Serie A match

SRC: 国际米兰解锁第3000场意甲比赛-<v>中新网</v>
HYP: Inter Milan unlocks 3000th Serie A match

SRC: 中新网客户端7月26日电北京时间26日凌晨，意甲传统豪门国际米兰迎来了里程碑之战。
HYP: chinanews.com client, July 26, in the early morning of the 26th Beijing time, the traditional Serie A giant Inter Milan ushered in a milestone battle.

SRC: 据意大利媒体统计，客场对阵热那亚一役是国际米兰队史第3000场意甲联赛，蓝黑军团也是首个解锁这项里程碑的球队。
HYP: According to Italian media statistics, the away game against Genoa is the 3000th Serie A game in the history of Inter Milan, and the Nerazzurri is also the first team to unlock this milestone.

SRC: 自1929年联赛改制以来，国际米兰是唯一一支从未缺席意甲的队伍，也是唯一一支从未降级的球队。
HYP: Since the league reform in 1929, Inter Milan is the only team that has never missed Serie A and the only team that has never been relegated.

SRC: 据意大利媒体报道，国际米兰与热那亚的比赛是蓝黑军团队史第3000场比赛。
HYP: According to Italian media reports, the match between Inter Milan and Genoa is the 3000th match in the history of the Nerazzurri team.

SRC: 在这场里程碑之战中，国际米兰客场三球完胜热那亚。
HYP: In this milestone battle, Inter Milan defeated Genoa with three goals away.

SRC: 此役卢卡库梅开二度，替补出场的桑切斯也贡献一球。
HYP: In this campaign, Lukaku scored twice and Sanchez, who came off the bench, also contributed a goal.

SRC: 比赛从一开始就进入了国际米兰的节奏，强攻终于在第34分钟转化为进球。
HYP: The game entered the rhythm of Inter Milan from the beginning, and the storm finally turned into a goal in the 34th minute.

SRC: 比拉吉左路传中，卢卡库中路包抄头球破门。
HYP: Biraji made a pass from the left, Lukaku outflanked the header and scored the goal.

SRC: 第82分钟国际米兰如法炮制，摩西右路突破后传中，桑切斯中路包抄推射得手；终场前卢卡库完成梅开二度，反击中布罗佐维奇送出长距离直塞，卢卡库突入禁区晃过罗梅罗后推射空门得分，将比分定格在3：0。
HYP: Inter Milan did the same in the 82nd minute. Moses made a breakthrough from the right and crossed. Sanchez succeeded in an outflanking push. Before the end, Lukaku scored twice, and Brozovic sent a long-distance pass in the counterattack. Lukaku broke into the penalty area. After Romero, he scored an empty goal and set the score at 3:0.

SRC: 国际米兰客场3：0完胜热那亚，积分反超亚特兰大上升至第2，在多赛一场的情况下落后领头羊尤文图斯4分，仍保留着争冠希望。
HYP: Inter Milan defeated Genoa 3-0 in their away game, and the points overtook Atlanta to rise to second place. After more than one game, they fell behind the leader Juventus by 4 points, still retaining the hope of the championship.

SRC: 至此，在这跨越近90载光阴的3000场意甲联赛中，国际米兰赢得了其中的1489场，打平834场，输掉677场，胜率为49.6%。
HYP: So far, in the 3000 Serie A games spanning nearly 90 years, Inter Milan has won 1489 of them, tied 834 games, and lost 677 games, with a winning percentage of 49.6%.

SRC: 其间，球队共打进5038球，丢3102球，场均打进1.68球。
HYP: During the period, the team scored a total of 5038 goals and lost 3102 goals, averaging 1.68 goals per game.

SRC: 蓝黑军团18次获得联赛冠军，并且从未降级。
HYP: The Nerazzurri won the league championship 18 times and have never been relegated.

SRC: 谍战剧老面孔柳云龙演一个结巴男主角-新华网
HYP: Old face in spy war drama Liu Yunlong plays a stuttering actor-Xinhuanet

SRC: 由柳云龙监制、殷飞执导,柳云龙、苏青、梁冠华、李立群等主演的大型谍战剧《胜算》, 于7月16日晚7:30登陆广东卫视“活力剧场” 。
HYP: Supervised by Liu Yunlong, directed by Yin Fei, and starring Liu Yunlong, Su Qing, Liang Guanhua, Li Liqun, etc., the large-scale spy war drama “Winner” will land on Guangdong Satellite TV's “Vitality Theater” at 7:30 pm on July 16.

SRC: 该剧讲述了潜伏在日伪警察局的中共地下党员唐飞(柳云龙饰)联合苏联特工,刺杀日本特工头目,粉碎了日军的惊天阴谋。
HYP: The play tells the story of Tang Fei (Liu Yunlong), an underground member of the Communist Party of China lurking in the Japanese and puppet police station, and the Soviet agent, assassinating the leader of the Japanese agent and crushing the Japanese conspiracy.

SRC: 《胜算》根据史实改编,素材取自尘封多年的苏联军事档案。
HYP: “Winner” is adapted from historical facts, and the material is taken from the Soviet military archives that have been covered in dust for many years.

SRC: 莫斯科保卫战期间,苏联红军远东精锐西进驰援,此时日本关东军“北进派”认为有机可乘,意欲出兵。
HYP: During the defense of Moscow, the elites of the Soviet Red Army from the Far East rushed west to assist. At this time, the “Northern Movement” of the Kwantung Army of Japan thought it had an opportunity and wanted to send troops.

SRC: 为解腹背受敌之危,中共与苏共情报人员联手实施了“穆丹乌拉”计划。
HYP: In order to relieve the danger of the enemy, the CCP and CPSU intelligence personnel jointly implemented the “Mudan Ula” plan.

SRC: 根据此历史背景,知名编剧邓原几经打磨,令剧情曲折烧脑。
HYP: According to this historical background, the well-known screenwriter Deng Yuan has been polished several times, making the plot tortuous and brainstorming.

SRC: 柳云龙此次在《胜算》中同时担任监制和男主角。
HYP: Liu Yunlong is also the producer and actor in “Winner” this time.

SRC: 剧中,他饰演的唐飞是林河警察厅刑事科科长,是一位颇有喜感甚至有点痞气的结巴警察,真实的身份则是一名中共地下党员。
HYP: In the play, Tang Fei, who he plays, is the chief of the Criminal Division of Linhe Police Department. He is a happy and even a little stubborn policeman. His real identity is an underground member of the Communist Party of China.

SRC: 与其上演对手戏的女主角蔡梦是林河保安局科长,深得日本上司福原的赏识,与唐飞之间存在着<v>亦敌亦友、暧昧不清</v>的微妙关系。
HYP: The heroine Cai Meng, who is acting in the rival drama, is the head of Linhe Security Bureau, who has won the appreciation of the Japanese boss Fukuhara. There is a subtle and ambiguous relationship between him and Tang Fei.

SRC: 与其上演对手戏的女主角蔡梦是林河保安局科长,深得日本上司福原的赏识,与唐飞之间存在着亦敌亦友、暧昧不清的微妙关系。
HYP: The heroine Cai Meng, who is acting in the rival drama, is the head of Linhe Security Bureau, who has won the appreciation of the Japanese boss Fukuhara. There is a subtle and ambiguous relationship between him and Tang Fei.

SRC: 苏青近年来尝试了很多不同类型的角色,从《那些年我们正年轻》中的陆若文到《延禧攻略》中的尔晴,都给观众留下深刻印象,演技受到认可。
HYP: Su Qing has tried many different types of roles in recent years, from Lu Ruowen in “The Dream And The Glory” to Er Qing in “Story of Yanxi Palace”, all of which left a deep impression on the audience and his acting skills were recognized.

SRC: 此次苏青与柳云龙是首次搭档,结巴警长搭配妩媚女警的设置,颇有看点与新意。
HYP: This time, Su Qing and Liu Yunlong are partners for the first time. The setting of stuttering the sheriff with the charming policewoman is quite interesting and innovative.

SRC: 除了两位主角外,《胜算》中还有梁冠华、李立群、钱波、雷汉、申军谊等众多实力派演员加盟,老戏骨飙戏也是该剧看点之一。
HYP: In addition to the two protagonists, many powerful actors including Liang Guanhua, Li Liqun, Qian Bo, Lei Han, Shen Junyi, etc. are also included in “Winner”.

SRC: 据了解,《胜算》<v>制作上也十分精良</v>,剧组跨越江苏、浙江、辽宁3省近2000公里拍摄取景。
HYP: It is understood that the production of “Winner” is also very sophisticated, with the crew spanning nearly 2000 kilometers across Jiangsu, Zhejiang, and Liaoning provinces for shooting and framing.

SRC: 据了解,《胜算》制作上也十分精良,剧组跨越江苏、浙江、辽宁3省近2000公里拍摄取景。
HYP: It is understood that the production of “Winner” is also very sophisticated, with the crew spanning nearly 2000 kilometers across Jiangsu, Zhejiang, and Liaoning provinces for shooting and framing.

SRC: 为了还原东北日据时期光怪陆离的城市风貌,剧组美工道具组日夜赶工,仔细打磨场景搭建及道具的每一个细节,令剧中场景画面精致,富有历史质感。
HYP: In order to restore the bizarre city scenes during the Northeast Japanese Occupation period, the crew art and props team rushed to work day and night, carefully polishing every detail of the scene construction and props, making the scenes in the play exquisite and full of historical texture.

SRC: 绿地开启新一轮混改上海国资拟转让17.5%股份-经济观察网－专业财经新闻网站
HYP: Greenland opens a new round of mixed reform, Shanghai state-owned assets plans to transfer 17.5% of shares-Economic Observer Network-Professional Financial News Website

SRC: 经济观察网记者饶贤君7月26日，绿地控股（600606.SH）发布《关于国有股东拟通过公开征集受让方的方式协议转让公司部分股份暨复牌的提示性公告》。
HYP: Economic Observer reporter Rao Xianjun, on July 26, Greenland Holdings (600606.SH) issued the “Reminder Announcement on the Transfer of Part of the Company's Shares and the Resumption of Trading through Public Solicitation of Transferees by State-owned Shareholders.”

SRC: 公告内容显示，为进一步深化国资国企改革，优化国资布局结构调整，完善绿地股权结构，上海地产（集团）有限公司（以下简称“上海地产”）及上海城投（集团）有限公司（以下简称“上海城投” ）拟通过公开征集受让方的方式协议转让所持有的公司部分股份，拟转让的股份比例合计不超过绿地总股本的17.5% 。
HYP: The content of the announcement shows that in order to further deepen the reform of state-owned assets and state-owned enterprises, optimize the adjustment of state-owned assets layout and structure, and improve the equity structure of Greenland, Shanghai Real Estate (Group) Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as “Shanghai Real Estate”) and Shanghai Urban Investment (Group) Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as “Shanghai Urban Investment”) intends to transfer part of the company's shares held by agreement through public solicitation of transferees, and the total proportion of shares to be transferred shall not exceed 17.5% of the total share capital of Greenland.

SRC: 本次拟转让股份的价格不低于下列两者之中的较高者：提示性公告日（2020 年7月27日）前30个交易日的每日加权平均价格的算术平均值；最近一个会计年度公司经审计的每股净资产值。
HYP: The price of the shares to be transferred this time shall not be lower than the higher of the following two: the arithmetic average of the daily weighted average price of the 30 trading days before the informative announcement date (July 27, 2020); the most recent one The company's audited net asset value per share for the fiscal year.

SRC: 目前，对绿地的新战略投资者仍无定论，按照公告公示信息估算，新战略投资者要拿下绿地此次混改中转让的17.5%股权需要支付约140亿元的资金。
HYP: At present, the new strategic investor in Greenland is still inconclusive. According to the estimation of the public announcement, the new strategic investor will need to pay about 14 billion yuan to acquire the 17.5% of the equity transferred in the mixed reform of Greenland.

SRC: 值得注意的是，本次股份转让完成后，预计绿地仍无控股股东及实际控制人，但控制权结构可能发生较大变化。
HYP: It is worth noting that after the completion of the share transfer, it is expected that Greenland will still have no controlling shareholders and actual controllers, but the control structure may undergo major changes.

SRC: 绿地控股自创立以来进行了多次体制机制改革：1992年-1997年，在纯国有体制下按照市场化规则运行；1997年-2013年，建立并不断完善国有控股、职工持股的股份制；2013年-2015年，引进战略投资者，形成国有及非公有资本交叉持股、相互融合的混合所有制；2015年至今，整体上市，成为公众公司。
HYP: Since its establishment, Greenland Holdings has carried out many system and mechanism reforms: from 1992 to 1997, it operated in accordance with market-oriented rules under a purely state-owned system; from 1997 to 2013, it established and continuously improved the state-owned holding and employee-owned shareholding system; 2013 From 2015 to 2015, the company introduced strategic investors to form a mixed ownership system of cross-shareholding and mutual integration of state-owned and non-public capital; since 2015, it has been listed as a whole and has become a public company.

SRC: 绿地目前的混改方案与格力相似，2019年12月，高瓴资本领衔珠海明骏以416.62亿元接手格力电器（000651.SZ）15%<v>股权</v>，格力集团退居小股东，完成混改后，格力电器实施了高管激励计划、无实控人结构等现代化的企业管理方式。
HYP: Greenland's current mixed reform plan is similar to Gree. In December 2019, Hillhouse Capital led Zhuhai Mingjun to take over 15% of Gree Electric (000651.SZ) with 41.662 billion yuan. Gree Group retired to a minority shareholder. After the mixed reform was completed, Gree Electric has implemented modern corporate management methods such as the executive incentive plan and no actual control structure.

SRC: 绿地目前的混改方案与格力相似，2019年12月，高瓴资本领衔珠海明骏以416.62亿元接手格力电器（000651.SZ）15%股权，格力集团退居小股东，完成混改后，格力电器实施了高管激励计划、无实控人结构等现代化的企业管理方式。
HYP: Greenland's current mixed reform plan is similar to Gree. In December 2019, Hillhouse Capital led Zhuhai Mingjun to take over 15% of Gree Electric (000651.SZ) with 41.662 billion yuan. Gree Group retired to a minority shareholder. After the mixed reform was completed, Gree Electric has implemented modern corporate management methods such as the executive incentive plan and no actual control structure.

SRC: 上海地产、上海城投均为上海市国资委全资持有的国资企业集团，绿地控股董事长、总裁张玉良表示，绿地此举是上海按照党中央要求，推进国资国企综合性改革、加速新一阶段国资国企改革的重要举措，充分显示了因地制宜、量体裁衣的改革新思路，通过给上市公司引入新的优秀战略股东，支持企业进一步提高市场化程度，提升经营管理自由度，加速改革活力全面释放。
HYP: Shanghai Real Estate and Shanghai Urban Investment are both state-owned enterprise groups wholly-owned by the Shanghai State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission. Zhang Yuliang, Chairman and President of Greenland Holdings, said that the move by Greenland is Shanghai in accordance with the requirements of the Party Central Committee to promote the comprehensive reform of state-owned and state-owned enterprises and accelerate the new one. The important measures taken in the reform of state-owned assets and state-owned enterprises at this stage fully demonstrate the new thinking of reform in accordance with local conditions and tailor-made. By introducing new outstanding strategic shareholders to listed companies, supporting enterprises to further increase the degree of marketization, increase the degree of freedom of operation and management, and accelerate the full release of reform vitality.

SRC: 刘德华刘青云能否“拆”出新火花-新华网
HYP: Can Andy Lau and Liu Qingyun “dismantle” new sparks-Xinhua Net

SRC: 《拆弹专家2》近日宣布将于12月24日上映,成为贺岁档首部定档的影片。
HYP: “Shock Wave” recently announced that it will be released on December 24, becoming the first scheduled film for the Lunar New Year.

SRC: 第二部依然是邱礼涛导演,刘德华监制及主演,以全新的故事展开。
HYP: The second part is still directed by Qiu Litao, and Andy Lau is the producer and starring role, which unfolds with a new story.

SRC: 据悉,第二部中“核弹”元素的加入,也让此次拆弹专家面临的挑战更为艰难,预告里几个惊鸿一瞥的镜头,已令人心悬一线,大爆炸的蘑菇云,被火光吞没的机场,场面相当震撼。
HYP: It is reported that the addition of the “nuclear bomb” element in the second part also makes the challenge faced by the bomb disposal experts more difficult. The few stunning shots in the trailer have already made people hang on the line. The mushroom cloud of the big explosion has been burned by the fire. The scene of the engulfed airport was quite shocking.

SRC: 三年前,由原班人马制作出品的《拆弹专家》,斩获了当年的五一档票房冠军,并在香港电影金像奖拿下了7项提名,邱礼涛×刘德华也成为观众心目中的金牌搭档。
HYP: Three years ago, “Shock Wave” produced by the original team won the 51 box office champion of that year and won 7 nominations at the Hong Kong Film Awards. Qiu Litao × Andy Lau also became the audience's mind Gold medal partner.

SRC: 此次的《拆弹专家2》,也令人再次期待这对王牌组合能否擦出新火花。
HYP: This time, “Shock Wave” also makes people look forward to whether this pair of ace combinations can spark new sparks.

SRC: 《拆弹专家2》讲述了全新的故事:前拆弹专家潘乘风(刘德华饰)晕倒在爆炸案现场,被警方列为嫌疑犯。
HYP: “Shock Wave” tells a new story: The former bomb disposal expert Pan Chengfeng (Andy Lau) fainted at the scene of the bombing and was listed as a suspect by the police.

SRC: 为了寻找真相,他不得不向同是拆弹专家的好友董卓文(刘青云饰)求助。
HYP: In order to find the truth, he had to ask his friend Dong Zhuowen (Liu Qingyun), who is also a bomb disposal expert, for help.

SRC: 急于破案的女督查,也同时是潘乘风前女友的庞玲(倪妮饰)也被卷入其中。
HYP: The female inspector eager to solve the case and Pang Ling (Ni Ni), who is also Pan Chengfeng's ex-girlfriend, is also involved.

SRC: 依然是拆弹专家,但从定档预告中能感受到刘德华新角色的复杂:断了一条腿,戴上了义肢,一边被同是拆弹专家的刘青云追捕,一边又被前女友倪妮指挥行动。
HYP: I am still an expert in bomb disposal, but from the preview of the set files, I can feel the complexity of Andy Lau's new role: I broke a leg and put on a prosthetic leg. action.

SRC: 三人究竟是怎样的关系,刘德华到底在香岛酒店做了什么,被牵扯到怎样的案件中,他拆弹专家的职业生涯又经历了哪些波折,种种谜团让人好奇不已。
HYP: What kind of relationship is the three people, what exactly did Andy Lau do at the Island Hotel, what kind of cases he was involved in, and what twists and turns he has experienced in his career as a bomb disposal expert, all kinds of mysteries make people curious.

SRC: 据了解,电影的重头戏都是实地取景香港的世界地标性建筑,加上顶尖的特效制作团队,带来震撼逼真的视觉冲击。
HYP: It is understood that the highlight of the film is the scene view of Hong Kong's world landmark buildings, coupled with the top special effects production team, to bring shocking and realistic visual impact.

SRC: （记者聂青）
HYP: (Reporter Nie Qing)

SRC: 中新网7月26日电综合俄罗斯卫星网报道，7月26日是俄罗斯海军日，庆祝海军日的主要阅兵式在圣彼得堡和喀琅施塔得举行。
HYP: chinanews.com, July 26, according to a comprehensive Russian satellite network report, July 26 is the Russian Navy Day, and the main military parade to celebrate the Navy Day was held in St. Petersburg and Kronstadt.

SRC: 俄罗斯总统、俄联邦武装力量最高统帅普京抵达喀琅施塔得参加庆祝活动，该地15艘舰艇和潜艇接受了检阅。
HYP: Russian President and Supreme Commander-in-Chief of the Russian Federation's Armed Forces Putin arrived in Kronstadt to participate in the celebration. 15 ships and submarines there were inspected.

SRC: 当地时间2019年7月28日，俄罗斯圣彼得堡举行盛大阅兵式庆祝海军节。
HYP: On July 28, 2019 local time, a grand military parade was held in St. Petersburg, Russia to celebrate the Navy Day.

SRC: 据报道，普京向海军官兵祝贺海军日，并乘小艇在芬兰湾上从将要参加海上阅兵的舰艇旁边驶过，随后在主观礼台检阅受阅部队。
HYP: According to reports, Putin congratulated the navy officers and soldiers on the Navy Day, and took a small boat on the Gulf of Finland past the ships that were about to participate in the maritime parade, and then reviewed the troops under review at the subjective stand.

SRC: 普京表示，俄海军舰队列装了最新式的舰艇和特殊装备，装备水平不断提高。
HYP: Putin said that the Russian Navy's fleet is equipped with the latest ships and special equipment, and the level of equipment is constantly improving.

SRC: 普京在俄罗斯海军日的阅兵式上说：“俄罗斯海军舰队拥有配备了高精武器的军舰、战略潜水巡洋舰和多用途潜艇、最新式飞机等飞行器、独特的武器和特殊装备。”
HYP: Putin said at the military parade on Russian Navy Day: “The Russian naval fleet has warships equipped with high-precision weapons, strategic submersible cruisers and multi-purpose submarines, the latest aircraft and other aircraft, unique weapons and special equipment.”

SRC: 当地时间6月24日，俄罗斯纪念卫国战争胜利75周年红场阅兵式举行。
HYP: On June 24, local time, Russia held a military parade on Red Square to commemorate the 75th anniversary of the victory of the Great Patriotic War.

SRC: 他还表示，俄海军舰队将靠数字化和有效防御手段来取得独特优势。
HYP: He also said that the Russian navy fleet will rely on digitalization and effective defense methods to gain unique advantages.

SRC: 报道称，庆祝俄罗斯海军日的主要海军阅兵式在圣彼得堡和喀琅施塔得举行，共有46艘舰艇参加，包括“卡萨托诺夫上将”号护卫舰、“海军中将库拉科夫”号大型反潜舰，以及大型登陆舰、小型导弹舰、护卫舰、潜艇等。
HYP: According to reports, the main naval parade to celebrate the Russian Navy Day was held in St. Petersburg and Kronstadt. A total of 46 ships participated, including the frigate “Admiral Kasatonov” and “Lieutenant Admiral Kulakov.” The number of large anti-submarine ships, as well as large landing ships, small guided missile ships, frigates, submarines, etc.

SRC: 其中，系列舰艇在圣彼得堡冬宫桥旁进行静态展示，其中最引人瞩目的是经过复制的18世纪初俄罗斯首艘战列舰“波尔塔瓦”号。
HYP: Among them, the series of ships are statically displayed next to the Hermitage Bridge in St. Petersburg. The most eye-catching is the replica of Russia's first battleship “Poltava” in the early 18th century.

SRC: 其中，系列舰艇在圣彼得堡冬宫桥旁进行静态展示，<v>其中</v>最引人瞩目的是经过复制的18世纪初俄罗斯首艘战列舰“波尔塔瓦”号。
HYP: Among them, the series of ships are statically displayed next to the Hermitage Bridge in St. Petersburg. The most eye-catching is the replica of Russia's first battleship “Poltava” in the early 18th century.

SRC: 为避免新冠病毒传播，今年海军阅兵式期间只有当地居民和特邀来宾能够进入喀琅施塔得。
HYP: In order to avoid the spread of the COVID-19 virus, only local residents and special guests can enter Kronstadt during the naval parade this year.

SRC: 每年7月最后一个星期日是俄罗斯海军日。
HYP: The last Sunday in July is Russian Navy Day.

SRC: 中新网重庆7月26日电(记者刘贤)重庆市发展和改革委员会26日发布消息称，该市截至目前已退捕渔民4404人，占全部涉及渔民的42.54% 。
HYP: chinanews.com, Chongqing, July 26 (Reporter Liu Xian) The Chongqing Development and Reform Commission announced on the 26th that the city has so far returned 4404 fishermen, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.

SRC: 今年53岁的李代国接受中新网记者采访时说，爷爷辈就在龙溪河打鱼，自己11岁起就跟着父亲打鱼，摇着小船，沿着龙溪河前行，上到重庆梁平，下到长寿，每次一离开家就是十天半个月，靠打鱼维持家人生活。
HYP: In an interview with a reporter from Chinanews.com, the 53-year-old Li Daiguo said that his grandfathers had been fishing in the Longxi River. Since the age of 11, he has been fishing with his father, shaking his boat, and traveling along the Longxi River to Liangping, Chongqing. , Down to longevity, every time I leave home is ten and a half months, relying on fishing to support family life.

SRC: 但从1997年起，随着农村人口逐渐往场镇里涌，高安场镇里的居民越来越多，造成的环境污染也越来越严重。
HYP: However, since 1997, with the gradual influx of rural population into the township, there are more and more residents in Gaoanchang Town, which causes more and more serious environmental pollution.

SRC: 龙溪河沿线修建了造纸厂、化工厂、养殖场，也污染河水。
HYP: Paper mills, chemical plants, and breeding farms were built along the Longxi River, which also polluted the river.

SRC: 到2007年、2008年，龙溪河变成臭水沟。
HYP: By 2007 and 2008, Longxi River became a stinking ditch.

SRC: “捕上来的鱼鳞片都是黑的，剖开后里面也是黑的。”
HYP: “The scales of the fish caught are all black, and the inside is also black after being cut open.”

SRC: 李代国说，河水污染后打鱼越来越困难。
HYP: Li Daiguo said that fishing has become more and more difficult after river water pollution.

SRC: 当地开始下大力气治理龙溪河污染，包括清漂、巡河、水生资源管护等。
HYP: The local area began to make great efforts to control the pollution of the Longxi River, including cleaning up the river, patrolling the river, and managing and protecting aquatic resources.

SRC: 李代国也从渔民退捕转产，成为巡河队的一员，管护水生资源。
HYP: Li Daiguo also retired from fishermen's catch and switched to production, and became a member of the river inspection team to manage and protect aquatic resources.

SRC: 从2020年1月1日起，重庆市水生生物保护区以及主城区相关水域已实行全面禁捕。
HYP: Starting from January 1, 2020, Chongqing Aquatic Life Reserve and related waters in the main urban area have implemented a comprehensive ban on catching.

SRC: 据重庆市发展改革委数据，截至目前，重庆市已累计退捕渔船3403艘、已签订退捕协议渔船4643艘，分别占三年总任务的63.3% 、 86.3% 。
HYP: According to data from the Chongqing Development and Reform Commission, as of now, Chongqing has retired 3403 fishing vessels and 4643 fishing retreat agreements have been signed, accounting for 63.3% and 86.3% of the total three-year mission respectively.

SRC: 已退捕渔民4404人，占全部涉及渔民的42.54% 。
HYP: 4404 fishermen have been retired, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.

SRC: 已退捕4404人中，实现就业4267人，占已退捕渔民的96.89% 。
HYP: Among the 4404 people who have been retired, 4267 have been employed, accounting for 96.89% of the fishermen who have retired.

SRC: 养老保险保障覆盖2691人，占退捕渔民的61.10% 。
HYP: Pension insurance covers 2691 people, accounting for 61.10% of the fishermen who retreat.

SRC: 下一步，重庆市将深入开展各专项整治行动，加快推进长江干流岸线利用项目清理整治，完成新一轮长江入河排污口普查并开展相应整治行动，基本完成“三磷” ( 指磷矿、磷化工和磷石膏库)整治任务、小水电清理整改工作，推进长江两岸造林绿化专项行动，强化绿色矿山建设，巩固长江干流非法码头、非法采砂专项整治成果，深入推进长江流域禁捕退捕工作。
HYP: In the next step, Chongqing will carry out various special rectification actions in depth, accelerate the cleanup and rectification of the Yangtze River's shoreline utilization projects, complete a new round of surveys of the Yangtze River's sewage outfalls and carry out corresponding rectification actions, and basically complete the “three phosphorus” (referring to phosphate mines). , Phosphorus chemical industry and phosphogypsum reservoirs) rectification tasks, small hydropower cleanup and rectification, promote special afforestation and greening on both sides of the Yangtze River, strengthen the construction of green mines, consolidate the results of special rectification of illegal docks and illegal sand mining on the mainstream of the Yangtze River, and further promote the ban on catching and retreating in the Yangtze River Basin Catch work.

SRC: 新华社香港7月25日电香港特区政府财经事务及库务局局长许正宇表示，香港的金融市场仍保持活跃、运作有序。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 25. Xu Zhengyu, Director of the Financial Affairs and Treasury Bureau of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region Government, said that Hong Kong's financial market remains active and orderly.

SRC: 他对香港金融稳定及经济表示乐观。
HYP: He expressed optimism about Hong Kong's financial stability and economy.

SRC: 许正宇在香港驻多伦多经济贸易办事处及港加商会（加拿大总会）24日（多伦多时间）合办的网上研讨会上表示，香港因为“修例风波”和新冠肺炎疫情，经历着艰难的状况。
HYP: Xu Zhengyu said at an online seminar co-organized by the Hong Kong Economic and Trade Office in Toronto and the Hong Kong-Canada Chamber of Commerce (Canada) on the 24th (Toronto time) that Hong Kong is experiencing a difficult situation due to the “regulations” and the COVID-19. .

SRC: 港元汇价稳定并偏向强方兑换保证水平。
HYP: The exchange rate of the Hong Kong dollar is stable and favors the strong exchange guarantee level.

SRC: 银行体系没有明显的资金流出迹象，相反，自6月以来超过110亿美元资金流入。
HYP: The banking system has no obvious signs of capital outflows. On the contrary, more than 11 billion US dollars in capital has flowed in since June.

SRC: 银行的存款总额在过去几个月也持续增加，股票市场有一连串公开招股集资活动，市场成交屡见上升。
HYP: The total amount of bank deposits has also continued to increase in the past few months. There has been a series of public offerings in the stock market, and market transactions have repeatedly increased.

SRC: 许正宇说，新冠肺炎疫情为全球经济及金融市场带来压力，但香港的基本优势仍然保持不变。
HYP: Xu Zhengyu said that the COVID-19 has put pressure on the global economy and financial markets, but Hong Kong's basic advantages remain unchanged.

SRC: 香港拥有的多项优势，包括地理、法治、高速通讯、资讯和资金自由流通以及简单低税制，使香港持续成为领先的国际金融中心。
HYP: Hong Kong has many advantages, including geography, rule of law, high-speed communications, free flow of information and capital, and a simple and low tax system, making Hong Kong a leading international financial center.

SRC: 许正宇指出，特区政府在“防疫抗疫基金”预留60亿港元，未来两年在公营及私营界别创造约3万个有时限的职位，涵盖不同技能及学历人士。
HYP: Xu Zhengyu pointed out that the SAR government has set aside 6 billion Hong Kong dollars in the “epidemic prevention and anti-epidemic fund” to create about 30000 time-limited jobs in the public and private sectors in the next two years, covering people with different skills and academic qualifications.

SRC: 为支持金融科技的发展，特区政府也已推出“千人计划”，资助本地金融科技公司、初创及其他有金融科技相关业务的企业，以创造1000个新职位，聘用本地人才及丰富香港的金融科技人才库。
HYP: To support the development of fintech, the SAR government has also launched the “Thousand Talents Plan” to subsidize local fintech companies, start-ups and other companies with fintech-related businesses to create 1000 new jobs, hire local talents and enrich Hong Kong's finances Science and technology talent pool.

SRC: 展望未来，许正宇对香港的金融稳定及经济表示乐观。
HYP: Looking ahead, Xu Zhengyu is optimistic about Hong Kong's financial stability and economy.

SRC: 他鼓励加拿大企业善用香港的优势及其作为国际金融中心、国际资产及财富管理中心以及全球离岸人民币业务枢纽的地位，在粤港澳大湾区及附近地区发展及投资。
HYP: He encouraged Canadian companies to make good use of Hong Kong's advantages and its status as an international financial center, an international asset and wealth management center, and a global offshore RMB business hub to develop and invest in the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area and nearby areas.

SRC: 《柳叶刀》刊文赞扬中国抗疫努力鼓励各国学习经验<v>-中新网</v>
HYP: The Lancet published an article praising China's efforts to fight the epidemic and encouraging countries to learn from experience

SRC: 《柳叶刀》杂志25日刊文表示，中国作为一个拥有14亿人口，规模与欧洲或美国相似的国家，现阶段新冠疫情得到有效控制，而没有再出现大范围传播的情况，在很大程度上控制住了国内的疫情。
HYP: The Lancet magazine published an article on the 25th that China, as a country with a population of 1.4 billion and a scale similar to Europe or the United States, has effectively controlled the COVID-19 at this stage, and there has been no large-scale spread. China has brought the domestic epidemic under control.

SRC: 《柳叶刀》杂志25日刊文表示，中国作为一个拥有14亿人口，规模与欧洲或美国相似的国家，现阶段新冠疫情得到有效控制，而没有再出现大范围传播的情况，<v>在很大程度上</v>控制住了国内的疫情。
HYP: The Lancet magazine published an article on the 25th that China, as a country with a population of 1.4 billion and a scale similar to Europe or the United States, has effectively controlled the COVID-19 at this stage, and there has been no large-scale spread. China has brought the domestic epidemic under control.

SRC: 文章表示，在近十多年时间里，中国对国内研究和公共卫生建设方面进行了大量的投资，这使得中国对新冠的准备比<v>当年</v>严重急性呼吸道综合征(SARS)的准备要充分得多。
HYP: The article said that in the past ten years, China has made a lot of investment in domestic research and public health construction, which makes China's preparations for the COVID-19 much better than its preparations for severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS).

SRC: 文章表示，在近十<v>多</v>年时间里，中国对国内研究和公共卫生建设方面进行了大量的投资，这使得中国对新冠的准备比当年严重急性呼吸道综合征(SARS)的准备要充分得多。
