HYP: Greenland's current mixed reform plan is similar to Gree. In December 2019, Zhuhai Alum, led by Gaolu Capital, took over a 15% stake in Gree Electric (000651.SZ) for 41.662 billion yuan, and Gree Group retreated to a small shareholder. After completing the mixed reform, Gree Electric implemented a modern corporate management method such as executive incentive plan and no actual controller structure.

SRC: <v>上海地产、上海城投均为上海市国资委全资持有的国资企业集团，</v>绿地控股董事长、总裁张玉良表示，绿地此举是上海按照党中央要求，推进国资国企综合性改革、加速新一阶段国资国企改革的重要举措，充分显示了因地制宜、量体裁衣的改革新思路，通过给上市公司引入新的优秀战略股东，支持企业进一步提高市场化程度，提升经营管理自由度，加速改革活力全面释放。
HYP: Zhang Yuliang, chairman and president of Greenland Holdings, said that Greenland's move is an important measure for Shanghai to promote the comprehensive reform of state-owned state-owned enterprises and accelerate the reform of state-owned state-owned enterprises in a new stage in accordance with the requirements of the Party Central Committee. It fully demonstrates the new idea of reform tailored to local conditions and tailor-made. By introducing new outstanding strategic shareholders to listed companies, it supports enterprises to further improve the degree of marketization, enhance the freedom of operation and management, and accelerate the full release of reform vitality.

SRC: 上海地产、上海城投均为上海市国资委全资持有的国资企业集团，绿地控股董事长、总裁张玉良表示，绿地此举是上海按照党中央要求，推进国资国企综合性改革、加速新一阶段国资国企改革的重要举措，充分显示了因地制宜、量体裁衣的改革新思路，通过给上市公司引入新的优秀战略股东，支持企业进一步提高市场化程度，提升经营管理自由度，加速改革活力全面释放。
HYP: Zhang Yuliang, chairman and president of Greenland Holdings, said that Greenland's move is an important measure for Shanghai to promote the comprehensive reform of state-owned state-owned enterprises and accelerate the reform of state-owned state-owned enterprises in a new stage in accordance with the requirements of the Party Central Committee. It fully demonstrates the new idea of reform tailored to local conditions and tailor-made. By introducing new outstanding strategic shareholders to listed companies, it supports enterprises to further improve the degree of marketization, enhance the freedom of operation and management, and accelerate the full release of reform vitality.

SRC: 刘德华刘青云能否“拆”出新火花-新华网
HYP: Can Liu Dehua and Liu Qingyun "demolish" a new spark? - Xinhua

SRC: 《拆弹专家2》近日宣布将于12月24日上映,成为贺岁档首部定档的影片。
HYP: "Bomb Disposal Expert 2" recently announced that it will be released on December 24, becoming the first film scheduled for the Lunar New Year.

SRC: 第二部依然是邱礼涛导演,刘德华监制及主演,以全新的故事展开。
HYP: The second part is still directed by Qiu Litao, produced and starred by Andy Lau, with a new story.

SRC: 据悉,第二部中“核弹”元素的加入,也让此次拆弹专家面临的挑战更为艰难,预告里几个惊鸿一瞥的镜头,已令人心悬一线,大爆炸的蘑菇云,被火光吞没的机场,场面相当震撼。
HYP: It is reported that the addition of the "nuclear bomb" element in the second part has also made the challenge faced by the bomb disposal experts more difficult. Several shocking glimpses in the trailer have made people's hearts hang in the air. The mushroom cloud of the big explosion and the airport engulfed in flames are quite shocking.

SRC: 三年前,由原班人马制作出品的《拆弹专家》,斩获了当年的五一档票房冠军,并在香港电影金像奖拿下了7项提名,邱礼涛×刘德华也成为观众心目中的金牌搭档。
HYP: Three years ago, "The Bomb Disposal Expert," produced by the original team, won the May 1st box office champion of the year and won 7 nominations at the Hong Kong Film Awards. Qiu Litao and Andy Lau also became the gold medal partner in the minds of the audience.

SRC: 此次的《拆弹专家2》,也令人再次期待这对王牌组合能否擦出新火花。
HYP: This time, "Bomb Disposal Expert 2" also makes people once again look forward to whether this pair of aces can create new sparks.

SRC: 《拆弹专家2》讲述了全新的故事:前拆弹专家潘乘风(刘德华饰)晕倒在爆炸案现场,被警方列为嫌疑犯。
HYP: "Bomb Disposal Expert 2" tells a new story: former bomb disposal expert Pan Chengfeng (Liu Dehua) fainted at the scene of the bombing and was listed as a suspect by the police.

SRC: 为了寻找真相,他不得不向同是拆弹专家的好友董卓文(刘青云饰)求助。
HYP: In order to find the truth, he has to ask for help from his friend Dong Zhuowen (Liu Qingyun), who is also a bomb disposal expert.

SRC: 急于破案的女督查,也同时是潘乘风前女友的庞玲(倪妮饰)也被卷入其中。
HYP: Pang Ling (Ni Ni), a female inspector who is eager to solve the case and is also Pan's ex-girlfriend, is also involved.

SRC: 依然是拆弹专家,但从定档预告中能感受到刘德华新角色的复杂:断了一条腿,戴上了义肢,一边被同是拆弹专家的刘青云追捕,一边又被前女友倪妮指挥行动。
HYP: He is still a bomb disposal expert, but you can feel the complexity of Andy Lau's new role from the trailer: he has a broken leg, wears a prosthetic limb, and is chased by Liu Qingyun, who is also a bomb disposal expert, while being directed by his ex-girlfriend Ni Ni.

SRC: 三人究竟是怎样的关系,刘德华到底在香岛酒店做了什么,被牵扯到怎样的案件中,他拆弹专家的职业生涯又经历了哪些波折,种种谜团让人好奇不已。
HYP: What exactly is the relationship between the three, what did Andy Lau do at the Xiangdao Hotel, what kind of cases was he involved in, and what twists and turns did his career as a bomb disposal expert go through, all kinds of mysteries make people curious.

SRC: 据了解,电影的重头戏都是实地取景香港的世界地标性建筑,加上顶尖的特效制作团队,带来震撼逼真的视觉冲击。
HYP: It is understood that the highlight of the film is the on-the-spot filming of Hong Kong's world landmark buildings, coupled with the top special effects production team, bringing a shocking and realistic visual impact.

SRC: （记者聂青）
HYP: (Reporter Zou Qing)

SRC: 中新网7月26日电综合俄罗斯卫星网报道，7月26日是俄罗斯海军日，庆祝海军日的主要阅兵式在圣彼得堡和喀琅施塔得举行。
HYP: China News Service, July 26: According to the comprehensive Russian satellite network, July 26 is the Russian Navy Day, and the main military parades to celebrate the Navy Day were held in St. Petersburg and Kronstadt.

SRC: 俄罗斯总统、俄联邦武装力量最高统帅普京抵达喀琅施塔得参加庆祝活动，该地15艘舰艇和潜艇接受了检阅。
HYP: Russian President Vladimir Putin, the Supreme Commander of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation, arrived in Kronstadt to take part in the celebrations, where 15 ships and submarines were inspected.

SRC: 当地时间2019年7月28日，俄罗斯圣彼得堡举行盛大阅兵式庆祝海军节。
HYP: On July 28, 2019 local time, Russia held a grand military parade in St. Petersburg to celebrate the Navy Day.

SRC: 据报道，普京向海军官兵祝贺海军日，并乘小艇在芬兰湾上从将要参加海上阅兵的舰艇旁边驶过，随后在主观礼台检阅受阅部队。
HYP: According to reports, Putin congratulated the naval officers and soldiers on Navy Day, and sailed in a small boat on the Gulf of Finland next to the ships that will participate in the naval parade, and then reviewed the troops at the subjective podium.

SRC: 普京表示，俄海军舰队列装了最新式的舰艇和特殊装备，装备水平不断提高。
HYP: Putin said that the Russian naval fleet is equipped with the latest ships and special equipment, and the level of equipment is constantly improving.

SRC: 普京在俄罗斯海军日的阅兵式上说：“俄罗斯海军舰队拥有配备了高精武器的军舰、战略潜水巡洋舰和多用途潜艇、最新式飞机等飞行器、独特的武器和特殊装备。”
HYP: Putin said at the Russian Navy Day parade: "The Russian naval fleet has warships equipped with high-precision weapons, strategic diving cruisers and multi-purpose submarines, the latest aircraft and other aircraft, unique weapons and special equipment."

SRC: 当地时间6月24日，俄罗斯纪念卫国战争胜利75周年红场阅兵式举行。
HYP: On June 24 local time, Russia held a military parade on Red Square to commemorate the 75th anniversary of the victory in the Great Patriotic War.

SRC: 他还表示，俄海军舰队将靠数字化和有效防御手段来取得独特优势。
HYP: He also said that the Russian naval fleet will rely on digitalization and effective means of defense to achieve unique advantages.

SRC: 报道称，庆祝俄罗斯海军日的主要海军阅兵式在圣彼得堡和喀琅施塔得举行，共有46艘舰艇参加，包括“卡萨托诺夫上将”号护卫舰、“海军中将库拉科夫”号大型反潜舰，以及大型登陆舰、小型导弹舰、护卫舰、潜艇等。
HYP: According to the report, the main naval parade to celebrate the Russian Navy Day was held in St. Petersburg and Kronstadt, with a total of 46 ships participating, including the frigate Admiral Kasatonov, the large anti-submarine ship Vice Admiral Kurakov, as well as large landing ships, small missile ships, frigates, submarines, etc.

SRC: 其中，系列舰艇在圣彼得堡冬宫桥旁进行静态展示，其中最引人瞩目的是经过复制的18世纪初俄罗斯首艘战列舰“波尔塔瓦”号。
HYP: Among them, a series of ships were on static display next to the Winter Palace Bridge in St. Petersburg, the most notable of which was the replica of the first Russian battleship "Poltava" in the early 18th century.

SRC: 为避免新冠病毒传播，今年海军阅兵式期间只有当地居民和特邀来宾能够进入喀琅施塔得。
HYP: In order to avoid the spread of the new coronavirus, only local residents and special guests will be able to enter Kronstadt during this year's naval parade.

SRC: 每年7月最后一个星期日是俄罗斯海军日。
HYP: The last Sunday of July each year is the Russian Navy Day.

SRC: 中新网重庆7月26日电(记者刘贤)重庆市发展和改革委员会26日发布消息称，该市截至目前已退捕渔民4404人，占全部涉及渔民的42.54% 。
HYP: China News Service, Chongqing, July 26 (Reporter Liu Xian) The Chongqing Development and Reform Commission announced on the 26th that the city has so far returned 4404 fishermen, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.

SRC: 今年53岁的李代国接受中新网记者采访时说，爷爷辈就在龙溪河打鱼，自己11岁起就跟着父亲打鱼，摇着小船，沿着龙溪河前行，上到重庆梁平，下到长寿，每次一离开家就是十天半个月，靠打鱼维持家人生活。
HYP: In an interview with a reporter from China News Network, 53-year-old Li Daiguo said that his grandparents fished in the Longxi River, and since he was 11 years old, he has been fishing with his father, rocking a small boat, traveling along the Longxi River, going up to Liangping, Chongqing, and down to Longevity. Every time he leaves home, it is ten days and a half months, and he supports his family by fishing.

SRC: 但从1997年起，随着农村人口逐渐往场镇里涌，高安场镇里的居民越来越多，造成的环境污染也越来越严重。
HYP: However, since 1997, as the rural population has gradually flocked to the town, the number of residents in Gao'an town has increased, and the environmental pollution has become more and more serious.

SRC: 龙溪河沿线修建了造纸厂、化工厂、养殖场，也污染河水。
HYP: Paper mills, chemical factories and farms have been built along the Longxi River, which also pollutes the river.

SRC: 到2007年、2008年，龙溪河变成臭水沟。
HYP: By 2007 and 2008, the Longxi River had turned into a stinking ditch.

SRC: “捕上来的鱼鳞片都是黑的，剖开后里面也是黑的。”
HYP: "The fish scales that were caught were all black, and the inside was also black after being cut open."

SRC: 李代国说，河水污染后打鱼越来越困难。
HYP: Li Daiguo said that it is more and more difficult to fish after the river is polluted.

SRC: 当地开始下大力气治理龙溪河污染，包括清漂、巡河、水生资源管护等。
HYP: The local government began to make great efforts to control the pollution of Longxi River, including clear drifting, river patrol, and aquatic resources management and protection.

SRC: 李代国也从渔民退捕转产，成为巡河队的一员，管<v>护</v>水生资源。
HYP: Li Daiguo also switched from fishing to production and became a member of the river patrol team to manage aquatic resources.

SRC: 李代国也从渔民退捕转产，成为巡河队的一员，管护水生资源。
HYP: Li Daiguo also switched from fishing to production and became a member of the river patrol team to manage aquatic resources.

SRC: 从2020年1月1日起，重庆市水生生物保护区以及主城区相关水域已实行全面禁捕。
HYP: From January 1, 2020, the aquatic biological reserve of Chongqing and the relevant waters of the main urban area have been completely banned.

SRC: 据重庆市发展改革委数据，截至目前，重庆市已累计退捕渔船3403艘、已签订退捕协议渔船4643艘，分别占三年总任务的63.3% 、 86.3% 。
HYP: According to the data of Chongqing Development and Reform Commission, up to now, Chongqing has withdrawn a total of 3403 fishing vessels and 4643 fishing vessels that have signed a withdrawal agreement, accounting for 63.3% and 86.3% of the total three-year tasks, respectively.

SRC: 已退捕渔民4404人，占全部涉及渔民的42.54% 。
HYP: 4404 fishermen have been returned, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.

SRC: 已退捕4404人中，实现就业4267人，占已退捕渔民的96.89% 。
HYP: Of the 4404 people who have been recaptured, 4267 have been employed, accounting for 96.89% of the recaptured fishermen.

SRC: 养老保险保障覆盖2691人，占退捕渔民的61.10% 。
HYP: Pension insurance protection covers 2691 people, accounting for 61.10% of retired fishermen.

SRC: 下一步，重庆市将深入开展各专项整治行动，加快推进长江干流岸线利用项目清理整治，完成新一轮长江入河排污口普查并开展相应整治行动，基本完成“三磷” ( 指磷矿、磷化工和磷石膏库)整治任务、小水电清理整改工作，推进长江两岸造林绿化专项行动，强化绿色矿山建设，巩固长江干流非法码头、非法采砂专项整治成果，深入推进长江流域禁捕退捕工作。
HYP: In the next step, Chongqing will carry out in-depth special rectification actions, accelerate the clean-up and rectification of the Yangtze River main stream shoreline utilization project, complete a new round of Yangtze River inlet sewage outlet survey and carry out corresponding rectification actions, basically complete the "three phosphorus" (referring to phosphorus ore, phosphorus chemical industry and phosphogypsum depot) rectification task, small hydropower clean-up and rectification work, promote the special action of afforestation and greening on both sides of the Yangtze River, strengthen the construction of green mines, consolidate the results of the special rectification of illegal wharves and illegal sand mining on the Yangtze River main stream, and further promote the ban on fishing in the Yangtze River basin.

SRC: 新华社香港7月25日电香港特区政府财经事务及库务局局长许正宇表示，香港的金融市场仍保持活跃、运作有序。
HYP: HONG KONG, July 25 (Xinhua) -- Hong Kong's financial market remains active and orderly, said Xu Zhengyu, Secretary for Financial Services and the Treasury of the Hong Kong SAR Government.

SRC: 他对香港金融稳定及经济表示乐观。
HYP: He expressed optimism about Hong Kong's financial stability and economy.

SRC: 许正宇在香港驻多伦多经济贸易办事处及港加商会（加拿大总会）24日（多伦多时间）合办的网上研讨会上表示，香港因为“修例风波”和新冠肺炎疫情，经历着艰难的状况。
HYP: Xu Zhengyu said at an online seminar jointly organized by the Hong Kong Economic and Trade Office in Toronto and the Hong Kong and Canada Chamber of Commerce (Canada Association) on the 24th (Toronto time) that Hong Kong is experiencing a difficult situation due to the "revision storm" and the new coronavirus epidemic.

SRC: 港元汇价稳定并偏向强方兑换保证水平。
HYP: The Hong Kong dollar exchange rate is stable and biased towards the strong exchange guarantee level.

SRC: 银行体系没有明显的资金流出迹象，相反，自6月以来超过110亿<v>美元</v>资金流入。
HYP: There are no obvious signs of capital outflows from the banking system. On the contrary, more than $11 billion has flowed in since June.

SRC: 银行的存款总额在过去几个月也持续增加，股票市场有一连串公开招股集资活动，市场成交屡见上升。
HYP: The total deposits of banks have also continued to increase in the past few months, and there has been a series of public offering and fund-raising activities in the stock market, and market transactions have risen frequently.

SRC: 许正宇说，新冠肺炎疫情为全球经济及金融市场带来压力，但香港的基本优势仍然保持不变。
HYP: Xu Zhengyu said that the coronavirus outbreak has put pressure on the global economy and financial markets, but Hong Kong's basic advantages remain unchanged.

SRC: 香港拥有的多项优势，包括地理、法治、高速通讯、资讯和资金自由流通以及简单低税制，使香港持续成为领先的国际金融中心。
HYP: Hong Kong has a number of advantages, including geography, the rule of law, high-speed communications, the free flow of information and capital, and a simple and low tax system, making Hong Kong continue to be a leading international financial center.

SRC: 许正宇指出，特区政府在“防疫抗疫基金”预留60亿港元，未来两年在公营及私营界别创造约3万个有时限的职位，涵盖不同技能及学历人士。
HYP: Xu Zhengyu pointed out that the HKSAR government has set aside HK$6 billion in the "Epidemic Prevention and Control Fund" to create about 30000 time-limited jobs in the public and private sectors in the next two years, covering people with different skills and educational qualifications.

SRC: 为支持金融科技的发展，特区政府也已推出“千人计划”，资助本地金融科技公司、初创及其他有金融科技相关业务的企业，以创造1000个新职位，聘用本地人才及丰富香港的金融科技人才库。
HYP: To support the development of fintech, the HKSAR Government has also launched the "Thousand Talents Programme" to fund local fintech companies, start-ups and other enterprises with fintech-related businesses to create 1000 new jobs, employ local talents and enrich Hong Kong's fintech talent pool.

SRC: 展望未来，许正宇对香港的金融稳定及经济表示乐观。
HYP: Looking ahead, Xu Zhengyu expressed optimism about Hong Kong's financial stability and economy.

SRC: 他鼓励加拿大企业善用香港的优势及其作为国际金融中心、国际资产及财富管理中心以及全球离岸人民币业务枢纽的地位，在粤港澳大湾区及附近地区发展及投资。
HYP: He encouraged Canadian enterprises to make good use of Hong Kong's advantages and its status as an international financial center, an international asset and wealth management center, and a global offshore RMB business hub to develop and invest in the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area and nearby regions.

SRC: 《柳叶刀》刊文赞扬中国抗疫努力鼓励各国学习经验-中新网
HYP: Lancet article praises China's anti-epidemic efforts, encourages countries to learn from experience

SRC: 《柳叶刀》杂志25日刊文表示，中国作为一个拥有14亿人口，规模与欧洲或美国相似的国家，现阶段新冠疫情得到有效控制，而没有再出现大范围传播的情况，在很大程度上控制住了国内的疫情。
HYP: According to an article published in The Lancet on the 25th, China, as a country with a population of 1.4 billion and a size similar to that of Europe or the United States, has effectively controlled the new coronavirus epidemic at this stage, and there has been no further widespread transmission, which has largely controlled the domestic epidemic.

SRC: 文章表示，在近十多年时间里，中国对国内研究和公共卫生建设方面进行了大量的投资，这使得中国对新冠的准备比当年严重急性呼吸道综合征(SARS)的准备要充分得多。
HYP: The article said that in the past decade or so, China has invested heavily in domestic research and public health construction, which has made China much more prepared for the new coronavirus than it was for severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS).

SRC: 作者表示，2002年SARS暴发时，起初中国准备不足，尤其是病原体无法确定。
HYP: The authors said that when SARS broke out in 2002, China was initially ill-prepared, especially because the pathogen could not be identified.

SRC: 当2019年12月发现新冠病毒时，中国科学家很快就能够鉴定出病毒种类，并于2020年1月11日与国际共享了基因组测序数据。
HYP: When the new coronavirus was discovered in December 2019, Chinese scientists were quickly able to identify the virus species, and shared the genome sequencing data with the international community on January 11, 2020.

SRC: 到1月底，来自中国大陆和香港的医生阐明了该病毒的临床特征，通过在《柳叶刀》上发表的研究论文，向世界警告了新冠病毒的威胁。
HYP: By the end of January, doctors from mainland China and Hong Kong clarified the clinical characteristics of the virus and warned the world about the threat of the new coronavirus through research papers published in The Lancet.

SRC: 中国也一直处于疫苗研究的最前沿，在国家宣布紧急状态下，通过国内的紧密合作，这样的研究非常迅速而严格地展开，5月和7月，分别在《柳叶刀》上公布了中国开发的新冠疫苗早期试验取得进展的结果。
HYP: China has also been at the forefront of vaccine research. Under the state of emergency declared by the country, such research has been carried out very quickly and rigorously through close cooperation within the country. In May and July, the results of the progress of early trials of the new coronavirus vaccine developed by China were published in the Lancet.

SRC: 中国的经验表明，对国家卫生和研究体系进行投资，有效提高实验室能力是非常重要的。
HYP: China's experience shows that it is important to invest in national health and research systems to effectively improve laboratory capacity.

SRC: 这是国家对卫生紧急情况和全球卫生安全做出快速有效反应的基础。
HYP: This is the basis for a rapid and effective national response to health emergencies and global health security.

SRC: 其他国家，特别是低收入和中等收入国家来说，非常值得借鉴和学习。
HYP: Other countries, especially low- and middle-income countries, are well worth learning from.

SRC: 此外，中国的经验证明，在强大的研究基础上，必须有强有力的高层果断地凭借科学依据来作出正确决策，这才使得新冠疫情得到有效控制。
HYP: In addition, China's experience has proved that on the basis of strong research, it is necessary to have a strong high-level decisively rely on scientific evidence to make the right decision, which makes the new crown epidemic effectively controlled.

SRC: 文章强调，政府及其领导人必须尊重科学，理解科学的价值，并以对社会最有利的方式对其采取行动。
HYP: The article emphasizes that governments and their leaders must respect science, understand its value, and act on it in a way that is best for society.

SRC: 在暴发初期，中国国家卫建委派出三组传染病专家前往武汉，调查新冠病毒的风险和传播，他们的建议为1月23日武汉“封城”的决定提供了依据；当有专家提出建设方舱医院必要性和紧迫性时，政府很快做出了决定并快速实施；同时，社区和群众的广泛参与，也使得疫情快速有效地被控制。
HYP: In the early days of the outbreak, China's National Health Commission sent three groups of infectious disease experts to Wuhan to investigate the risk and spread of the new coronavirus. Their recommendations provided the basis for the decision to "close the city" of Wuhan on January 23; when some experts proposed the necessity and urgency of building a cabin hospital, the government quickly made a decision and implemented it quickly; at the same time, the widespread participation of the community and the masses also made the epidemic quickly and effectively controlled.

SRC: 文章最后强调，应对全球性的卫生紧急情况，各国需要加强全球合作，联合应对。
HYP: The article concludes by emphasizing that in response to the global health emergency, countries need to strengthen global cooperation and joint response.

SRC: 总台记者杨洪
HYP: Chief Taiwan Correspondent Yang Hong

SRC: 当地时间25日下午，一架小型飞机在德国北威州韦瑟尔县撞上一座多层住宅楼的顶层，事故共造成三人死亡。
HYP: On the afternoon of the 25th local time, a small plane crashed into the top floor of a multi-storey residential building in Wesel County, NRW, Germany, killing a total of three people.

SRC: 杜伊斯堡检方、韦瑟尔县警察局和韦瑟尔市消防部门当天晚间联合发布声明称，当天14时40分左右，一架两座小型飞机撞上位于韦瑟尔县辉柏斯坎普街一栋多层住宅楼顶层阁楼的住宅，造成三人丧生。
HYP: The Duisburg prosecutor's office, the Wesel County Police Department and the Wesel City Fire Department jointly issued a statement on the evening of the same day, saying that at about 14:40 on the same day, a two-seater small plane crashed into a residential building on the top floor of a multi-storey residential building on Huiberskamp Street in Wesel County, killing three people.

SRC: 其当天从北威州鲁尔区马尔市起飞，在韦瑟尔县的机场中途停靠后再度起飞，随后撞上住宅楼。
HYP: It took off from the city of Marl in the Ruhr region of North Rhine-Westphalia on the same day, stopped at the airport in Wesel County and took off again, then crashed into a residential building.

SRC: 死者身份或为遭撞击住宅内的一名女性住户和小型飞机上两名乘客。
HYP: The dead were identified as a female resident of the house that was hit and two passengers on the small plane.

SRC: 房内一名两岁儿童仅受轻伤，被平安救出。
HYP: A two-year-old child in the house suffered only minor injuries and was rescued safely.

SRC: 房内其余住户未在事故中受伤，但情绪仍未平复。
HYP: The rest of the residents in the house were not injured in the accident, but their emotions have not been calmed.

SRC: 德新社报道的现场画面显示，遭遇事故的住宅一度冒出滚滚浓烟，消防队员扑灭火情后可见房屋损毁严重。
HYP: The scene footage reported by the German news agency showed that smoke billowed from the house where the accident occurred. After the firefighters extinguished the fire, the house was severely damaged.

SRC: 目前，飞机失事原因尚不明确。
HYP: At present, the cause of the plane crash is not clear.

SRC: 《莱茵邮报》援引警方说法报道称，有线索表明，飞机或在撞上住宅楼前就已解体。
HYP: The Rheinische Post quoted police as saying there were indications that the plane may have broken up before hitting the residential building.

SRC: 警方表示，在事故现场一带发现了失事飞机的多块零部件。
HYP: The police said that many parts of the crashed aircraft were found in the area of the accident site.

SRC: 德国刑警正与杜伊斯堡检方、德国联邦航空事故调查局共同调查导致这一事故的原因。
HYP: German criminal police are working with Duisburg prosecutors and the German Federal Bureau of Aircraft Accident Investigation to investigate the cause of the accident.

SRC: 记者当天从中国驻杜塞尔多夫总领事馆了解到，该馆与当地警局及消防部门取得联系，据现场判断，伤亡人员中无中国公民。
HYP: On the same day, the reporter learned from the Chinese Consulate General in Dusseldorf that the consulate had contacted the local police station and fire department. According to the scene, there were no Chinese citizens among the casualties.

SRC: 大鹏导演《吉祥如意》入围金爵奖-新华网
HYP: Dapeng director's "Good Luck" shortlisted for Golden Goblet Award - Xinhua

SRC: 7月18日，第二十三届上海国际电影节公布了金爵奖官方入选影片名单。
HYP: On July 18, the 23rd Shanghai International Film Festival announced the official list of films selected for the Golden Goblet Award.

SRC: 大鹏导演的首部现实题材影片《吉祥如意》，成功入围本届上影节金爵奖，同时影片官方发布了首款海报。
HYP: Dapeng's first reality-themed film, "Good Luck," was successfully shortlisted for the Golden Goblet Award at this year's Shanghai Film Festival, and the film's first poster was officially released.

SRC: 海报片方供图
HYP: A poster for the film

SRC: 影片《吉祥如意》是大鹏导演的第一部现实题材作品，也是他与金爵奖的二度结缘。
HYP: The film "Jixiang Ruyi" is the first realistic work directed by Dapeng, and it is also the second time he has been associated with the Golden Goblet Award.

SRC: 该片讲述了这样一个故事：一位喜剧片导演突发奇想，回到东北农村老家，希望将一家人如何过年拍成一部文艺电影，结果遭遇一系列意外。
HYP: The film tells the story of a comedy film director who, on a whim, returns to his hometown in the rural northeast, hoping to make a literary film about how a family celebrates the New Year, only to encounter a series of accidents.

SRC: 因拍电影而聚齐的家庭成员们，完成了最后的聚会。
HYP: The family members who had gathered for the film completed the final gathering.

SRC: 在今日发布的电影海报中，这个家庭中的一员— — “三舅”王吉祥坐在画面中央抽着烟，背景是披上银装的东北黑土地，前景是中国人逢年过节必挂的红灯笼。
HYP: In the movie poster released today, a member of the family, "Third Uncle" Wang Jixiang, sits in the center of the picture smoking a cigarette. In the background is the northeastern black land dressed in silver, and in the foreground are the red lanterns that Chinese people must hang on New Year's Day.

SRC: 象征着喜庆、团圆的红灯笼与身影落寞的王吉祥形成了巨大反差，似乎也透露了这个大家庭关系中的复杂与纠结。
HYP: The red lantern, which symbolizes celebration and reunion, forms a huge contrast with the lonely Wang Jixiang, and seems to reveal the complexity and entanglement in this big family relationship.

SRC: 据悉，影片中，除了“三舅”王吉祥的女儿由演员刘陆扮演，其余戏份均由真实的导演家人完成，影片实验性的视听风格，打破了戏剧与真实的边界，带给观众全新的浸入式观影体验。
HYP: It is reported that in the film, except for the daughter of "third uncle" Wang Jixiang, who is played by actor Liu Lu, the rest of the scenes are completed by the real director's family. The film's experimental audio-visual style breaks the boundary between drama and reality, bringing the audience a new immersive viewing experience.

SRC: 据导演大鹏介绍，《吉祥如意》的创作源自“一场天意” ， 拍摄期间家庭突如其来的一系列变故，让原本的拍摄计划不得不随之改变，没有剧本的生活最终被记录成电影，却释放出超越设计的张力。
HYP: According to director Dapeng, the creation of "Jixiang Ruyi" originated from "a providence," a series of sudden changes in the family during the shooting, so that the original shooting plan had to be changed, and life without a script was finally recorded as a film, but it released tension beyond design.

SRC: 导演大鹏究竟如何面对这场“天意” ， 又该如何继续迎接这场天意带来的种种改变呢？
HYP: How does director Dapeng face this "providence," and how does he continue to meet the various changes brought about by this providence?

SRC: 毫无疑问《吉祥如意》是充满实验性的，几乎全素人的阵容和创新的视听风格将镜头前的生活变成了一部电影，在真实影像的包裹下，观众也会从影片所呈现的家庭中找到自己和家人的影子，随着影片中这场家庭聚会的落幕，唤起一系列思考。
HYP: There is no doubt that "Good Luck" is full of experimentation. The almost all-amateur lineup and innovative audio-visual style turn the life in front of the camera into a film. Under the wrapping of real images, the audience will also find themselves and their families from the family presented in the film. With the end of the family gathering in the film, it evokes a series of thoughts.

SRC: NEWS.GOV.MO: 新型冠状病毒感染应变协调中心查询热线统计数字(7月25日08H00-7月26日08H00)
HYP: NEWS.GOV.MO: New Coronavirus Infection Response Coordination Center Inquiry Hotline Statistics (July 25 08H00 - July 26 08H00)

SRC: 由2020年07月25日08H00 至7月26日08H00，新型冠状病毒感染应变协调中心的查询热线共接获292宗电话查询。
HYP: From 08H00 on July 25 to 08H00 on July 26, 2020, the inquiry hotline of the New Coronavirus Infection Response Coordination Center received a total of 292 telephone inquiries.

SRC: 关于疫情的291宗查询，已即时转线至相关部门代表跟进，<v>情况如下：</v>
HYP: 291 inquiries about the epidemic have been immediately transferred to representatives of relevant departments for follow-up.

SRC: 卫生局271宗(涉及：查询关于隔离；查询核酸检测；查询两地牌；健康码；其他。）
HYP: 271 cases in the Health Bureau (involving: inquiries about isolation; inquiries about nucleic acid testing; inquiries about two land marks; health codes; others.)

SRC: 治安警察局17宗(涉及：查询出入境措施；查询粤澳两地牌车辆出入境措施；查询珠海政务热线；查询证件逗留问题。）
HYP: 17 cases at the Public Security Police Station (involving: inquiring about entry and exit measures; inquiring about entry and exit measures for vehicles registered in Guangdong and Macao; inquiring about the Zhuhai government hotline; inquiring about the stay of documents.)

SRC: 旅游局1宗(涉及：查询隔离酒店<v>问题</v>。）
HYP: Tourism Bureau 1 case (involving: inquiries about quarantine hotels.)

SRC: 旅游局1宗(涉及：查询隔离酒店问题。）
HYP: Tourism Bureau 1 case (involving: inquiries about quarantine hotels.)

SRC: 教育暨青年局1宗(涉及：查询澳门学生返回英国读书的方法。）
HYP: Education and Youth Affairs Bureau 1 case (involving: enquiring about ways for Macao students to return to the UK to study)

SRC: 海事及水务局1宗(涉及：询问香港渔船进港是否需要向海事及水务局申报及核酸检测相关事宜。）
HYP: Marine and Water Bureau 1 case (involving: asking whether Hong Kong fishing vessels entering the port need to declare to the Marine and Water Bureau and nucleic acid testing related matters.)

SRC: 马里尼切夫说，价值的变化受卢布贬值和疫情等影响。
HYP: Marinichev said that the change in value was affected by the depreciation of the ruble and the epidemic.

SRC: 他说“服务成本正在增加。
HYP: He said: "The cost of services is increasing.

SRC: 由于疫情，人们开始在互联网上花费更多的时间。”
HYP: Because of the epidemic, people are starting to spend more time on the Internet."

SRC: 马里尼切夫不排除年互联网价格将严重上涨，认为运营商可以为客户提供更高的速度和更多服务抵消人们对价格上涨的不满。
HYP: Marinichev did not rule out a serious rise in Internet prices next year, arguing that operators could provide customers with higher speeds and more services to offset people's dissatisfaction with rising prices.

SRC: 《中国医生》筹拍致敬抗疫英雄-新华网
HYP: "Chinese Doctor" plans to pay tribute to anti-epidemic heroes - Xinhua

SRC: 近日，带着中国电影人对抗疫英雄的敬意，博纳影业集团董事长于冬、导演刘伟强(图左）在广州与钟南山院士，就抗疫题材影片《中国医生》的拍摄制作工作进行了座谈交流。
HYP: Recently, with the respect of Chinese filmmakers for anti-epidemic heroes, Yu Dong, chairman of Bona Film Group, and director Liu Weiqiang (pictured left) held a discussion with academician Zhong Nanshan in Guangzhou on the filming and production of the anti-epidemic film "Chinese Doctor."

SRC: 博纳影业希望能借由《中国医生》，向所有战斗在疫情防控一线的医护、防疫工作者致敬！
HYP: Bona Film hopes to use "Chinese Doctors" to pay tribute to all medical and epidemic prevention workers fighting on the front line of epidemic prevention and control!

SRC: 2021年，该片将作为庆祝中国共产党建党100周年献礼影片全国公映。
HYP: In 2021, the film will be released nationwide to celebrate the 100th anniversary of the founding of the Communist Party of China.

SRC: 目前，博纳影业正在中宣部和国家电影局的安排部署下，广东省电影局及湖北省电影局的支持下，组织电影《中国机长》原班人马筹拍电影《中国医生》，这是一部反映在党中央的坚强领导下，全国人民团结一心抗击新冠肺炎疫情的影片。
HYP: At present, under the arrangement and deployment of the Central Propaganda Department and the National Film Bureau, and with the support of the Guangdong Provincial Film Bureau and the Hubei Provincial Film Bureau, Bona Film is organizing the original team of the film "Chinese Captain" to make the film "Chinese Doctor," which is a film that reflects the unity of the people of the whole country under the strong leadership of the Party Central Committee to fight the new crown pneumonia epidemic.

SRC: 影片聚焦武汉抗疫一线，将以武汉医护人员及各省市援鄂医疗队为人物背景，从人性的角度，运用独特的叙事，以及极具冲击力的镜头语言，全景展现抗疫一线充满奉献和牺牲精神的中国医护人员的感人故事。
HYP: The film focuses on the front line of Wuhan's anti-epidemic, with Wuhan medical staff and medical teams from various provinces and cities as the background characters. From the perspective of human nature, using a unique narrative and a highly impactful camera language, the panorama shows the touching story of Chinese medical staff who are full of dedication and sacrifice on the front line of the anti-epidemic.

SRC: 据了解，武汉解封之日的第一时间，博纳公司便克服重重困难，派出采拍小组深入疫情一线，与数百位医护工作者面对面交流了解、搜集资料，目前已经采访到了包括钟南山院士本人、广州驰援武汉第一人、广东<v>援鄂</v>医疗队，以及武汉金银潭医院、武汉协和医院、武汉大学中南医院、武汉中心医院等抗疫战线最前沿的白衣天使们，拍下了大量珍贵的第一手视频资料。
HYP: It is understood that on the first day of the lifting of the lockdown in Wuhan, Bona Company overcame many difficulties and sent a filming team to the front line of the epidemic to communicate with hundreds of medical workers face to face to understand and collect information. At present, it has interviewed a large number of precious first-hand video materials, including Academician Zhong Nanshan himself, the first person in Guangzhou to help Wuhan, the Guangdong medical team, and the white angels at the forefront of the anti-epidemic front, such as Wuhan Jinyintan Hospital, Wuhan Union Hospital, Wuhan University Zhongnan Hospital, and Wuhan Central Hospital.

SRC: 据了解，武汉解封之日的第一时间，博纳公司便克服重重困难，派出采拍小组深入疫情一线，与数百位医护工作者面对面交流了解、搜集资料，目前已经采访到了包括钟南山院士本人、广州驰援武汉第一人、广东援鄂医疗队，以及武汉金银潭医院、武汉协和医院、武汉大学中南医院、武汉中心医院等抗疫战线最前沿的白衣天使们，拍下了大量珍贵的第一手视频资料。
HYP: It is understood that on the first day of the lifting of the lockdown in Wuhan, Bona Company overcame many difficulties and sent a filming team to the front line of the epidemic to communicate with hundreds of medical workers face to face to understand and collect information. At present, it has interviewed a large number of precious first-hand video materials, including Academician Zhong Nanshan himself, the first person in Guangzhou to help Wuhan, the Guangdong medical team, and the white angels at the forefront of the anti-epidemic front, such as Wuhan Jinyintan Hospital, Wuhan Union Hospital, Wuhan University Zhongnan Hospital, and Wuhan Central Hospital.

SRC: 钟南山院士在此次座谈会中亦对电影的拍摄提出了期待和希望：“ 我很期待，希望你们不仅要走访一些抛头露面比较多的专家，还要更多地采访在一线埋头苦干的医务人员，他们是大多数。”
HYP: Academician Zhong Nanshan also raised expectations and hopes for the filming of the film at this symposium: "I am looking forward to it, and I hope that you will not only visit some experts who have made a lot of appearances, but also interview more medical personnel who are working hard on the front line, which is the majority."

SRC: 他表示，他之前看过《我和我的祖国》《中国机长》，认为以普通人视角讲述大格局故事的方法就很好。
HYP: He said that he had seen "Me and My Motherland" and "Captain China" before, and thought that it was a good way to tell the big picture story from the perspective of ordinary people.

SRC: “现在一些国外朋友对中国还是有一些误解。”
HYP: "Now some foreign friends still have some misunderstandings about China."

SRC: 在谈到影片的传播时，钟南山院士表示，目前国外有些人喜欢将病毒贴上政治化标签，他希望电影能从人性的角度打动观众：“ 这部电影除了在中国放映以外，最好也能在国外放映，要用国内外观众都能理解的方式，用真正的人文精神打动观众。”
HYP: When talking about the spread of the film, Academician Zhong Nanshan said that at present, some people abroad like to label the virus as politicized, and he hopes that the film can impress the audience from the perspective of humanity: "In addition to screening in China, it is best to screen the film abroad, and to impress the audience with a true humanistic spirit in a way that both domestic and foreign audiences can understand."

SRC: 钟南山院士还深情回忆了上世纪80年代的影片《人到中年》，“这么多年过去了，我对改革开放后电影印象最深的还是《人到中年》，当时我国外的医生朋友们都看哭了，如果《中国医生》能够起到这样的作用，那就很了不起了。”
HYP: Academician Zhong Nanshan also fondly recalled the film "Man to Middle Age" in the 1980s. "After so many years, I was most impressed by the film "Man to Middle Age" after the reform and opening up. At that time, doctors' friends outside China were crying. If "Chinese Doctor" can play such a role, it will be very great."

SRC: 钟南山院士表示，如果《中国医生》能引起国外观众的共鸣，那就非常成功。
HYP: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that if "Chinese Doctor" can resonate with foreign audiences, it will be very successful.

SRC: 在座谈交流时，钟南山院士还分享了对当前国际疫情防控的意见和建议，“ 我相信人永远比病毒聪明。”
HYP: During the discussion and exchange, Academician Zhong Nanshan also shared his opinions and suggestions on the current international epidemic prevention and control. "I believe that people are always smarter than viruses."

SRC: 钟南山院士表示，虽说病毒难以预测，但从原始社会至今，人类已渡过了千难万险，如今现代社会有发达的医疗科技和社会管理措施，再加上全世界的医务人员、甚至老百姓都对科学应对新冠肺炎疫情有了基本认识，人们不会再像以前那么被动，“接下来要注意两个方面的工作，一是要研究全世界怎么加强合作，二是注重对人们心灵的抚慰” 。
HYP: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that although the virus is difficult to predict, from the primitive society to the present, human beings have overcome thousands of difficulties and dangers. Nowadays, modern society has developed medical technology and social management measures. In addition, medical personnel and even ordinary people all over the world have a basic understanding of the scientific response to the new crown pneumonia epidemic. People will not be as passive as before.

SRC: （记者王金跃）
HYP: (Reporter Wang Jinyue)

SRC: 文旅“红果”聚韶山—湘潭首届红博会见闻-今日要闻-湖南日报网-华声在线
HYP: The first Red Expo in Xiangtan - Today's news - Hunan Daily News - Huasheng Online

SRC: <v>文旅“红果”聚韶山</v>—湘潭首届红博会见闻-今日要闻-湖南日报网-华声在线
HYP: The first Red Expo in Xiangtan - Today's news - Hunan Daily News - Huasheng Online

SRC: 湖南日报·新湖南客户端记者蒋睿通讯员肖燕
HYP: Hunan Daily, New Hunan Client Reporter Jiang Rui, Correspondent Xiao Yan

SRC: 嘉兴红船模具、韶山毛泽东铜像、延安布堆花工艺品、湘西永顺腊肉…… 7月25日，2020湖南红色旅游文化节在韶山开幕。
HYP: Jiaxing red boat mold, Lushan Mao Zedong bronze statue, Yan'an cloth pile flower crafts, Xiangxi Yongshun bacon... On July 25, the 2020 Hunan Red Tourism and Culture Festival opened in Lushan.

SRC: 作为主体活动之一，湘潭首届红色文化产业博览会在韶山全域旅游咨询集散中心开展。
HYP: As one of the main activities, the first Xiangtan Red Cultural Industry Expo was held at the Lushan Global Tourism Consulting and Distribution Center.

SRC: 展览区红色文创产品、革命老区土特产品等琳琅满目，引来各地游客争相购买。
HYP: The red cultural and creative products in the exhibition area and the local products in the old revolutionary area are dazzling, attracting tourists from all over the world to buy.

SRC: 展览区红色文创产品、革命老区土<v>特产品</v>等琳琅满目，引来各地游客争相购买。
HYP: The red cultural and creative products in the exhibition area and the local products in the old revolutionary area are dazzling, attracting tourists from all over the world to buy.

SRC: “此次红博会，既是全国红色文化产业成果的一次展示，也是参展单位和企业交流经验、探讨发展路径的一个重要平台。”
HYP: "The Red Expo is not only a display of the achievements of the national red cultural industry, but also an important platform for exhibitors and enterprises to exchange experiences and discuss development paths."

SRC: 湘潭首届红博会执委会相关负责人介绍，这届红博会以“弘扬红色文化助推文旅升温”为主题，展览总面积近3000平方米，设置了氛围营造区、景区展示展陈区和红色文旅网游网购体验区。
HYP: According to the relevant person in charge of the executive committee of the first Red Expo in Xiangtan, the theme of this Red Expo is "promoting red culture to help the tweet brigade warm up," with a total exhibition area of nearly 3000 square meters, setting up an atmosphere-building area, a scenic display area and a red cultural tourism online shopping experience area.

SRC: 邀请浙江嘉兴、贵州遵义、陕西延安等8个外省地市以及我省长沙、株洲、岳阳、郴州等地137家企业、单位参展，共展出展品768种，包括红色文物、工艺品、食品特产、旅游线路、红色培训课程、红色文创产品等。
HYP: Eight provinces and cities, including Jiaxing in Zhejiang, Zunyi in Guizhou and Yan'an in Shaanxi, as well as 137 enterprises and units in Changsha, Zhuzhou, Yueyang and Zhangzhou in our province were invited to participate in the exhibition. A total of 768 kinds of exhibits were exhibited, including red cultural relics, handicrafts, food specialties, tourist routes, red training courses, and red cultural and creative products.

SRC: 展销区将展至7月29日。
HYP: The exhibition and sales area will be open until July 29.

SRC: 作为红博会东道主，湘潭展区亮点纷呈。
HYP: As the host of the Red Expo, the Xiangtan exhibition area is full of highlights.

SRC: 展区负责人介绍，湘潭展区分为红色工业、红色文化产业发展两大部分。
HYP: According to the person in charge of the exhibition area, the Xiangtan exhibition area is divided into two parts: red industry and red cultural industry development.

SRC: 红色工业展区展出华菱湘钢、华菱线缆、湘电动力等6家企业的展品31件，红色文化产业发展展区展出红色系列图书、红色系列食品、红色系列文创产品等27家单位产品近200个。
HYP: The red industrial exhibition area displayed 31 exhibits from six companies, including Hualing Xiangsteel, Hualing Cable, and Hunan Electric Power, and the red cultural industry development exhibition area displayed nearly 200 products from 27 units, including red series books, red series food, and red series cultural and creative products.

SRC: 在延安展区，不少游客被陈展的布堆花手工艺品和剪纸艺术品所吸引。
HYP: In the Yan'an exhibition area, many tourists were attracted by the display of cloth and flower handicrafts and paper-cut art.

SRC: 延安市文旅局局长马东坡介绍，此次参展精心选择了延安近两年来优秀的红色文创产品，其中16种产品是2019全国红色文创产品优秀作品。
HYP: Ma Dongpo, director of the Yan'an Municipal Bureau of Culture and Tourism, said that the exhibition carefully selected the outstanding red cultural and creative products in Yan'an in the past two years, of which 16 products are the outstanding works of the 2019 national red cultural and creative products.

SRC: 同时，他们邀请了国家级非物质文化遗产保护项目“安塞剪纸”、“陕北民歌”与省级非遗项目延川布堆画传承人，重点推介延安民俗特色产品，并借此机会与其他展区单位企业沟通交流，推动跨区域合作。
HYP: At the same time, they invited the inheritors of the national intangible cultural heritage protection project "Ansei Paper Cutting," "Northern Shaanxi Folk Song" and the provincial non-heritage project Yanchuan Cloth Painting, focusing on the promotion of Yan'an folk products, and took the opportunity to communicate with other exhibition area units and enterprises to promote cross-regional cooperation.

SRC: 膜分离技术助力破解“温室效应” - 中新网
HYP: Membrane separation technology helps to crack the "greenhouse effect"

SRC: 膜分离技术助力破解“温室效应”
HYP: Membrane separation technology helps crack the "greenhouse effect"

SRC: 新型混合基质膜制备技术示意图
HYP: Schematic diagram of the new hybrid matrix membrane preparation technology

SRC: 本报讯记者商瑞报道：日前，天津大学大气环境与生物能源团队针对“膜分离法捕集二氧化碳”取得重大进展，成功研发出新型混合基质膜制备技术，大幅提升膜材料二氧化碳捕集性能。
HYP: Our reporter Shang Rui reports: Recently, the atmospheric environment and bioenergy team of Tianjin University has made great progress in the "membrane separation method to capture carbon dioxide" and successfully developed a new hybrid matrix membrane preparation technology, which greatly improves the carbon dioxide capture performance of membrane materials.

SRC: 相关成果已作为国际期刊《温室气体：科学与技术》封面文章发表。
HYP: The related results have been published as the cover article of the international journal Greenhouse Gases: Science and Technology.

SRC: “温室效应”是困扰人类发展的重大环境问题，二氧化碳排放则是造成“温室效应”的元凶。
HYP: The "greenhouse effect" is a major environmental problem plaguing human development, and carbon dioxide emissions are responsible for the "greenhouse effect."

SRC: 如何高效捕获并利用人类排放的二氧化碳是科学家关注的焦点。
HYP: How to efficiently capture and use the carbon dioxide emitted by humans is the focus of scientists.

SRC: “膜分离法”是一种新兴的二氧化碳捕集技术，它在膜材料帮助下分离二氧化碳气体，具有高效节能、操作简单的特点。
HYP: "Membrane separation method" is an emerging carbon dioxide capture technology, which separates carbon dioxide gas with the help of membrane material, and has the characteristics of high efficiency, energy saving and simple operation.

SRC: 如何让膜材料“深呼吸”， 提高气体分离效率，是采用膜分离法捕集二氧化碳的瓶颈难点。
HYP: How to let the membrane material "breathe deeply" and improve the gas separation efficiency is the bottleneck difficulty of using membrane separation to capture carbon dioxide.

SRC: 天津大学科研团队创新思路，通过反复实验，探究不同溶剂对膜气体分离性能的影响。
HYP: Tianjin University research team innovative ideas, through repeated experiments, to explore the impact of different solvents on membrane gas separation performance.

SRC: 实验结果表明，以N-甲基吡咯烷酮作为制备溶剂，生成的膜材料中碳纳米管分布更加均匀，“更透气”，有效提升了膜材料气体分离效能和速率。
HYP: The experimental results show that with N-methylpyrrolidone as the preparation solvent, the distribution of carbon nanotubes in the generated membrane material is more uniform and "more breathable," which effectively enhances the gas separation efficiency and rate of the membrane material.

SRC: 用这种新技术制备的混合基质膜，二氧化碳分离性能接近目前此类膜材料的理论分离上限。
HYP: The carbon dioxide separation performance of the hybrid matrix membrane prepared by this new technology is close to the theoretical separation limit of such membrane materials at present.

SRC: “新技术为膜分离法捕集二氧化碳提供了新思路。”
HYP: "The new technology provides new ideas for the capture of carbon dioxide by membrane separation."

SRC: 天津大学大气环境与生物能源团队成员李润表示：“ 我们希望这种技术能够为未来燃煤电厂与化工企业处理烟气提供有力支持，在控制温室气体排放等领域发挥重大作用。”
HYP: Li Run, a member of the atmospheric environment and bioenergy team at Tianjin University, said: "We hope that this technology can provide strong support for the treatment of flue gas in coal-fired power plants and chemical companies in the future, and play a major role in controlling greenhouse gas emissions."

SRC: 首度成立专委会、集体签“长约” 第三届进博会参展商联盟构筑“进博纽带” - 新华网
HYP: For the first time, a special committee was set up to collectively sign a "long-term contract" for the third CIIE exhibitor alliance to build a "CIIE bond" - Xinhua

SRC: 7月26日在上海拍摄的第三届进博会参展商联盟第一次会议现场。
HYP: The scene of the first meeting of the 3rd CIIE Exhibitor Alliance in Shanghai on July 26.

SRC: 新华社上海7月26日电（记者周蕊）26日，第三届进口博览会参展商联盟在此间首次成立专业委员会，首批成立的专委会包括公共卫生防疫专委会和乳业专委会，35家成员企业还签订了3年长期参展合作备忘录，进博会参展商联盟的纽带作用不断增强。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Shanghai, July 26 (Reporter Zhou Rui) On the 26th, the Exhibitor Alliance of the Third Import Expo established a professional committee for the first time here. The first special committees established included the Public Health and Epidemic Prevention Special Committee and the Dairy Special Committee. 35 member companies also signed a three-year long-term exhibition cooperation memorandum, and the bond of the Expo Exhibitor Alliance continued to increase.

SRC: 26日在此间举行的第三届进博会参展商联盟第一次会议上，韩国现代、美国陶氏化学、日本资生堂、新西兰纽仕兰、德国西门子、法国米其林、英国阿斯利康等一批展盟成员企业签订了3年长期参展合作备忘录，修订和完善后的展盟章程也首次公布。
HYP: At the first meeting of the Exhibitor Alliance of the third CIIE held here on the 26th, a group of member companies of the exhibition alliance, including Hyundai of Korea, Dow Chemical of the United States, Shiseido of Japan, New Zealand New Zealand, Siemens of Germany, Michelin of France and AstraZeneca of the United Kingdom, signed a three-year long-term exhibition cooperation memorandum. The revised and improved exhibition alliance charter was also announced for the first time.

SRC: 7月26日在上海拍摄的乳业专业委员会成立仪式现场。
HYP: The scene of the founding ceremony of the Dairy Professional Committee in Shanghai on July 26.

SRC: 根据最新的章程，展盟将引入牵头单位轮值机制，加强专委会功能。
HYP: According to the latest charter, the exhibition alliance will introduce a rotation mechanism for leading units and strengthen the function of the special committee.

SRC: 专委会将为行业发展趋势分析提出建议，推动行业可持续发展。
HYP: The special committee will make recommendations for the analysis of industry development trends and promote the sustainable development of the industry.

SRC: 同时，整合行业全产业链资源，以大带小，带动关联企业参展，将进博会打造成为行业企业聚集高地。
HYP: At the same time, the integration of the industry's entire industrial chain resources, with large and small, will drive affiliated enterprises to participate in the exhibition, and build the Expo into a highland for industry enterprises to gather.

SRC: 首次成立公共卫生防疫专委会，对于当前抗击新冠肺炎疫情来说显得尤为重要。
HYP: The establishment of a special committee on public health and epidemic prevention for the first time is particularly important for the current fight against the new coronavirus.

SRC: 作为第三届进博会公共卫生防疫专委会副会长单位，雅培快速诊断业务大中华区总经理仇建平说，下一步，雅培会携手更多行业伙伴，探索新的解决方案和合作模式，助力中国以及全世界抗击新冠肺炎疫情。
HYP: As the vice chairman of the public health and epidemic prevention special committee of the third CIIE, Qiu Jianping, general manager of Abbott's rapid diagnosis business in Greater China, said that in the next step, Abbott will work with more industry partners to explore new solutions and cooperation models to help China and the world fight the new coronavirus epidemic.

SRC: 7月26日在上海拍摄的公共卫生防疫专业委员会成立仪式现场。
HYP: The scene of the founding ceremony of the Professional Committee for Public Health and Epidemic Prevention in Shanghai on July 26.

SRC: 据悉，第三届进博会首次设立公共卫生防疫专区，截至目前已有近50家全球企业报名参展，展览面积超过1万平方米。
HYP: It is reported that the third CIIE has set up a public health epidemic prevention zone for the first time. So far, nearly 50 global companies have registered to participate in the exhibition, with an exhibition area of more than 10000 square meters.

SRC: 在2018年首届进博会期间，进博会参展商联盟由展商自发倡议成立，旨在成为优质参展企业交流合作平台、连接参展各方信息与资源共享平台，以及为促进中国与世界各国（地区）之间经贸商务往来与发展建言献策的智囊平台。
HYP: During the first CIIE in 2018, the CIIE Exhibitor Alliance was established on the initiative of exhibitors. It aims to become a platform for high-quality exhibitors to exchange and cooperate, a platform for connecting exhibitors to share information and resources, and a think tank platform for promoting economic, trade and business exchanges and development between China and countries (regions) around the world.

SRC: 截至目前，已有142家企业加入参展商联盟，覆盖全球23个国家和地区。
HYP: Up to now, 142 companies have joined the exhibitor alliance, covering 23 countries and regions around the world.

SRC: 比利时3岁女童死于新冠病毒感染-新华网
HYP: Three-year-old girl dies of new coronavirus infection in Belgium - Xinhua

SRC: 比利时卫生部门24日说，一名3岁女童死于新冠病毒感染，是该国最年幼的新冠病亡患者。
HYP: Belgian health authorities said on the 24th that a 3-year-old girl died of new coronavirus infection, the youngest new coronavirus death in the country.

SRC: 比利时卫生部门发言人布德温·卡特里说，这名女童感染新冠病毒前已经有其他严重疾病；除了这名女童，近期还有一名18岁青年死于新冠病毒感染。
HYP: Budwin Katri, a spokesman for the Belgian health department, said that the girl had other serious diseases before she was infected with the new coronavirus; in addition to the girl, an 18-year-old recently died of the new coronavirus infection.

SRC: 卡特里说，上周比利时85%新增新冠确诊人员年龄在60岁以下。
HYP: Katri said that last week, 85% of the newly diagnosed people in Belgium were under the age of 60.

SRC: 他提醒身体健康、年龄较轻的民众不要掉以轻心。
HYP: He cautioned healthy, younger people not to take it lightly.

SRC: “虽然年轻人死于新冠病毒感染的情况较为罕见，但没有任何人现在具备免疫力。 ”
HYP: "Although it is rare for young people to die from the new coronavirus infection, no one is now immune."

SRC: 上周，比利时新增新冠确诊病例比前一周增长89 % ， 每日平均2.9人死于新冠病毒感染，高于前一周的日均1.7人。
HYP: Last week, Belgium's new confirmed cases of new coronavirus increased by 89% from the previous week, and an average of 2.9 people died of new coronavirus infection every day, up from an average of 1.7 people per day in the previous week.

SRC: 欧洲疫情高峰期间，比利时人口中新冠病毒感染者占比在欧洲“名列前茅” 。
HYP: During the peak of the European epidemic, the proportion of new coronavirus infections in the Belgian population was among the highest in Europe.

SRC: 比利时有1100多万人口。
HYP: Belgium has a population of more than 11 million.

SRC: 最新数据显示，比利时累计64847人感染新冠病毒。
HYP: The latest data shows that a total of 64847 people in Belgium have been infected with the new coronavirus.

SRC: 卡特里本周早些时候警告，在雪球越滚越大、最终造成“雪崩”前，人们必须采取行动。
HYP: Katri warned earlier this week that people must take action before the snowball gets bigger and bigger, eventually causing an "avalanche."

SRC: 为抑制疫情反弹，比利时首相索菲·维尔梅斯23日宣布，人们在公共场所佩戴口罩的有关规定将更加严格，8月进一步解除限制性措施的方案也将暂缓执行。
HYP: In order to curb the rebound of the epidemic, Belgian Prime Minister Sophie Vermes announced on the 23rd that the relevant rules for people to wear masks in public places will be stricter, and the plan to further lift restrictive measures in August will also be suspended.

SRC: （郭倩） 【 新华社<v>微特稿</v>】
HYP: (Guo Wei) (Xinhua News Agency)

SRC: 大型融媒体行动《走村直播看脱贫》出发- 今日要闻- 湖南日报网- 华声在线
HYP: Large-scale financial media campaign "Go to the village live to see poverty alleviation" starts - Today's news - Hunan Daily News - Huasheng Online

SRC: 湖南日报·新湖南客户端7月25日讯(本报记者)7月25日，由中央广播电视总台财经节目中心主办的大型融媒体行动《走村直播看脱贫》从江苏徐州出发，两辆携带5G新媒体移动云制播系统的大篷车在现场嘉宾目送下，缓缓驶出现场。
HYP: Hunan Daily · New Hunan Client July 25th (Reporter of this newspaper) On July 25th, the large-scale financial media action "Walking Village Live to See Poverty Alleviation" sponsored by the Financial Program Center of the Central Radio and Television General Station departed from Xuzhou, Jiangsu, and two caravans carrying 5G new media mobile cloud broadcasting system were sent by the guests on the scene and slowly drove out of the scene.

SRC: 习近平总书记指出，“2020年是具有里程碑意义的一年，我们将全面建成小康社会，实现第一个百年奋斗目标，2020年也是脱贫攻坚决战决胜之年”。
HYP: General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out that "2020 is a landmark year. We will build a moderately prosperous society in an all-round way and achieve the first centenary goal. 2020 is also the year of decisive victory in the fight against poverty."

SRC: 大型融媒体行动《走村直播看脱贫》是中央广播电视总台财经节目中心为配合这一重大主题，做好脱贫攻坚宣传的重要举措。
HYP: The large-scale financial media campaign "Going to the Village Live to See Poverty Alleviation" is an important measure for the financial program center of the Central Radio and Television General Station to cooperate with this major theme and do a good job in promoting poverty alleviation.

SRC: 该行动将走进全国20多个省、自治区、直辖市的脱贫村，挖掘鲜活脱贫故事，直击村容村貌巨变，展现村民如何突破生存发展困境、走向致富之路的历程。
HYP: The action will go into poverty-stricken villages in more than 20 provinces, autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government, dig up fresh stories of poverty alleviation, directly attack the dramatic changes in the appearance of villages, and show how villagers can break through the difficulties of survival and development and move towards the road to prosperity.

SRC: 这次行动将持续3个多月。
HYP: The operation will last for more than three months.

SRC: 记者从徐州出发，兵分两路，一路走西南线，途经安徽、湖北、江西、湖南、广西、贵州、四川、重庆、云南、西藏等地;另一路走西北线，途经河南、陕西、甘肃、青海、新疆、宁夏、内蒙古、山西、河北等地，行程超过1万公里。
HYP: Starting from Xuzhou, the reporter divided into two routes and took the southwest route, passing through Anhui, Hubei, Jiangxi, Hunan, Guangxi, Guizhou, Sichuan, Chongqing, Yunnan, Tibet and other places; the other route took the northwest route, passing through Henan, Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Xinjiang, Ningxia, Inner Mongolia, Shanxi, Hebei and other places, covering more than 10000 kilometers.

SRC: 在报道形式上，《走村直播看脱贫》大胆融合。
HYP: In the form of reporting, "Going to the village to see poverty alleviation" is boldly integrated.

SRC: 大篷车所到村庄的经济发展情况，都将通过中央广播电视总台央视财经频道、央广经济之声、中国交通广播、央视财经新媒体进行播出。
HYP: The economic development of the villages visited by the caravan will be broadcast through the CCTV Financial Channel of the Central Radio and Television General Station, the Voice of the Central Guangxi Economy, China Traffic Radio, and CCTV Financial New Media.

SRC: 其中，电视直播将主要在央视财经频道的午间新闻节目《天下财经》完成(首播时间：周一至周日12：00-13:00 )，央视财经频道的黄金档新闻栏目《经济信息联播》将开设脱贫报道专栏(首播时间：周一至周日20：30-21:30 )。
HYP: Among them, the live TV broadcast will be mainly completed in the midday news program "Tianxia Caijing" of CCTV Finance Channel (first broadcast time: Monday to Sunday 12:00-13:00), and the gold news program "Economic Information Network" of CCTV Finance Channel will open a column on poverty alleviation (first broadcast time: Monday to Sunday 20:30-21:30).

SRC: 同时，大篷车将对所到的每个村庄在央视财经客户端进行长达1小时的直播，观众通过下载央视财经APP，可以观看直播，参与抽奖活动。
HYP: At the same time, the caravan will conduct a one-hour live broadcast on the CCTV financial client for each village it visits. Viewers can watch the live broadcast and participate in the lottery by downloading the CCTV financial app.

SRC: 在技术应用和演播室设计上，《 走村直播看脱贫》勇于突破，首创了“外场新媒体大篷车”。
HYP: In terms of technology application and studio design, "Walking Village Live to See Poverty Alleviation" bravely broke through and pioneered the "New Media Caravan in the Outfield."

SRC: 该车搭载5G新媒体移动云制播系统，利用5G+4K/8K+AI技术，实现线上线下、大屏小屏，电视广播的有机结合。
HYP: The car is equipped with a 5G new media mobile cloud broadcasting system, using 5G + 4K / 8K + AI technology to realize the organic combination of online and offline, large screen and small screen, and television broadcasting.

SRC: 配置三讯演播区，演播区由集装箱改装而成，长12米、宽2.55米、高3.98米，箱体采用液压自动展开结构，最大可以上翻120度。
HYP: Equipped with a three-channel studio area, the studio area is converted from a container, with a length of 12 meters, a width of 2.55 meters, and a height of 3.98 meters. The box adopts a hydraulic automatic unfolding structure, which can be turned up to 120 degrees.

SRC: 演播区也可以自动展开，并外接扩展平台，面积50多平方米，可以满足大部分节目的场景要求。
HYP: The studio area can also be automatically expanded and connected to an external expansion platform, with an area of more than 50 square meters, which can meet the scene requirements of most programs.

SRC: 张继科林小宅组队力挺有肌少年-新华网
HYP: Zhang Jian Colin's small house team is a very muscular teenager-Xinhuanet

SRC: 运动少年热血竞技秀《运动吧少年》在7月11日正式登陆湖南卫视。
HYP: The sports youth hot-blooded competition show "Sports Boys" officially landed on Hunan Satellite TV on July 11.

SRC: 运动领队张继科和运动助理林小宅跨界同台,林丹和傅园慧点评各有风格,而“庞然大物”般的力量拔杆装置的硬核上场,更让节目“燃”力十足。
HYP: Sports leader Zhang Jike and sports assistant Lin Xiaojia cross-border on the same stage, Lindane and Fu Yuanhui commented on their own styles, and the hard core of the "giant" -like power pull device made the show "burning" more powerful.

SRC: 首集中,11位运动少年亮相力量赛道,外形惊艳现场观众的同时,竞技台上的“强冲突”“强对抗”“强心脏”也受到关注。
HYP: In the first episode, 11 sports teenagers appeared on the power track, and their appearance dazzled the audience on the scene. At the same time, the "strong conflict" "strong confrontation" and "strong heart" on the arena also attracted attention.

SRC: 其中,“ 强冲突”来自超A体育生乔文一,他在比赛前公然挑衅同赛道中有“花美男”之称的徐志滨,呛声徐志滨的外形条件应该去唱跳节目,甚至放出“输了别把妆哭花了”的狠话。
HYP: Among them, the "strong conflict" comes from Super A sports student Qiao Wenyi, who openly challenged Xu Zhibin, who is known as the "Flower Beautiful Man" on the same track before the race, choked that Xu Zhibin's appearance conditions should be sung and danced, and even released the harsh words "Don't cry your makeup when you lose."

SRC: 一番言论让场上的少年和运动领队们都倒吸一口凉气。
HYP: Some remarks made the teenagers and sports leaders on the field take a breath.

SRC: 而“强对抗”更像是神仙打架,被誉为“大魔王”的孙健淇碰上同样实力强劲的张鑫栋,上演强强对决。
HYP: The "strong confrontation" is more like a fight between gods. Sun Jianqi, known as the "Great Devil King", meets the equally powerful Zhang Xindong and staged a strong confrontation.

SRC: 而他们的身份也让人始料未及,孙健淇是热爱健身的演员,张鑫栋则是退役特战队员、三次勇士勋章获得者。
HYP: Their identities were also unexpected. Sun Jianqi is an actor who loves fitness, and Zhang Xindong is a retired special forces player and three-time Warrior Medal winner.

SRC: 比赛一开始,两位少年就拼尽全力快速拔出小杆,在大杆上的持久对抗让现场观众为他们捏了一把汗。
HYP: At the beginning of the game, the two teenagers tried their best to quickly pull out the small pole, and the lasting confrontation on the big pole made the audience sweat for them.

SRC: 在紧张的赛况下,张继科作为《运动吧少年》运动领队之一,也在一旁认真观战。
HYP: Under the tense situation, Zhang Jike, as one of the sports leaders of "Sports Boys", also watched the battle seriously.

SRC: 在点评环节,他也十分细心,对输了比赛的一方少年耐心鼓励,帮助复盘过程中的每一个失误点。
HYP: In the comments section, he was also very careful, patiently encouraged the teenager who lost the game, and helped every mistake in the process of restarting the game.

SRC: 而运动助理林小宅则是花式助攻,她毫不掩饰对<v>颜值实力</v>在线的少年们的欣赏。
HYP: Sports assistant Lin Xiaojia is a fancy assists, and she makes no secret of her appreciation for the teenagers who are online.

SRC: 而运动助理林小宅则是花式助攻,她毫不掩饰对颜值实力在线的少年们的欣赏。
HYP: Sports assistant Lin Xiaojia is a fancy assists, and she makes no secret of her appreciation for the teenagers who are online.

SRC: 在了解到运动少年们超负荷的日常训练时,更是心生敬佩。
HYP: When I learned about the daily training of sports teenagers who are overloaded, I admire them even more.

SRC: 同样是运动领队的林丹和傅园慧则各有风格,一个是气定神闲派“预言家” , 一个则是用笑容驱散紧张氛围的“洪荒少女” 。
HYP: Lindane and Fu Yuanhui, who are also sports leaders, have their own styles, one is a calm and relaxed "prophet" and the other is a "flood girl" who uses a smile to dispel the tension.

SRC: 另外,吉克隽逸和刘烨作为运动助理,也围绕运动少年制造了不少爆笑话题。
HYP: In addition, Jike Junyi and Liu Ye, as sports assistants, have also created a lot of hilarious topics around sports teenagers.

SRC: 法国南特教堂大火：教区志愿者承认纵火平时和善寡言-中新网
HYP: Church fire in Nantes, France: Diocese volunteers admit to arson and silence-Chinanews.com

SRC: 中新网7月26日电据外媒报道，7月18日，法国南特的宗教历史建筑瑰宝、著名的圣彼得与圣保罗大教堂，在一场火灾当中受到严重损毁，大管风琴完全毁坏。
HYP: China News Service, July 26. According to foreign media reports, on July 18, the treasures of religious and historical buildings in Nantes, France, and the famous Cathedral of St. Peter and St. Paul, were severely damaged in a fire, and the large pipe organ was completely destroyed.

SRC: 当地时间26日，南特检察官宣布，一名在大教堂当中负责保卫工作的教区志愿者已经被起诉，罪名是“纵火毁坏” 。
HYP: On the 26th local time, the Nantes prosecutor announced that a diocese volunteer who was responsible for defense work in the cathedral had been charged with "arson and destruction."

SRC: 他已承认，是自己在教堂里点火。
HYP: He has admitted that he set the fire in the church.

SRC: 报道称，当地检察官塞纳斯表示，这名39岁、来自卢旺达的教区志愿者承认，自己夜里在大教堂当中的三处点火。
HYP: According to the report, local prosecutor Senas said that the 39-year-old parish volunteer from Rwanda admitted that he had set fire to three places in the cathedral at night.

SRC: 此人的律师则表示，纵火者现在很后悔做出这种事。
HYP: The person's lawyer said that the arsonists now regret doing such a thing.

SRC: 此人几年前通过避难的途径，进入法国，在本次火灾事发地教区得到庇护，在教堂里得到收留。
HYP: This person entered France through the route of asylum a few years ago, was sheltered in the parish where the fire happened, and was taken in in the church.

SRC: 检方指出，最近，他尝试更新签证，正在和警察局对此进行对话沟通。
HYP: The prosecutor pointed out that recently, he tried to renew his visa and is talking to the police station about this.

SRC: 但教堂方面表示仍然不敢相信，这名平时非常善良、面带笑容，但不怎么说话的信徒，会毁坏他如此热爱的教堂。
HYP: But the church said it still cannot believe that this believer, who is usually very kind and smiling, but doesn't talk much, will destroy the church he loves so much.

SRC: 7月18日火灾发生的当天，这名志愿者就已经因为叙述当中出现逻辑不通的问题，而接受过警方问询调查，但他后来被释放。
HYP: On the day of the fire on July 18, the volunteer had already been questioned and investigated by the police because of illogical problems in the narrative, but he was later released.

SRC: 图为消防员在现场进行救援。
HYP: The picture shows firefighters rescuing at the scene.

SRC: 25日晚间，由于巴黎中央警察局实验室的专业工程师获取了新的证据，此人又再一次被传讯。
HYP: On the evening of the 25th, as professional engineers from the laboratory of the Paris Central Police Department obtained new evidence, this person was summoned again.

SRC: 这一次，男子承认了自己纵火的行为。
HYP: This time, the man admitted his arson.

SRC: 据报道，如果蓄意纵火毁坏的罪名成立，嫌犯将可能面临10年监禁和15万欧元的罚款。
HYP: According to reports, if the charge of deliberate arson and destruction is convicted, the suspect may face 10 years in prison and a fine of 150000 euros.

SRC: 报道称，此次大火给圣皮埃尔与圣保罗大教堂造成了严重损失，教堂内的管风琴被完全烧毁，管风琴后面的彩色玻璃窗也受损严重。
HYP: According to reports, the fire caused serious damage to the Cathedral of St. Pierre and St. Paul. The pipe organ in the church was completely burned, and the stained glass window behind the pipe organ was also severely damaged.

SRC: 法国历史保护建筑首席建筑师布鲁内认为，保守估计，南特大教堂复原工作至少要有3年。
HYP: Brunet, the chief architect of the French historic preservation building, believes that it is conservatively estimated that the restoration of the Nantes Cathedral will take at least three years.

SRC: 飓风“汉娜”登陆<v>美</v>得州或引发河水暴涨和山洪-中新网
HYP: Hurricane "Hannah" landed in Texas or caused river surges and flash floods-Chinanews.com

SRC: 飓风“汉娜”登陆美得州或引发河水暴涨和山洪-中新网
HYP: Hurricane "Hannah" landed in Texas or caused river surges and flash floods-Chinanews.com

SRC: 中新网7月26日电综合外媒报道，当地时间25日下午5时，飓风“汉娜”登陆美国得克萨斯州，将给得州带来强风暴雨、河水暴涨，还可能引发威胁生命的山洪。
HYP: China News Service, July 26, comprehensive foreign media reported that at 5: 00 pm local time on the 25th, Hurricane "Hannah" landed in Texas, United States, which will bring strong winds and heavy rains to Texas, soaring rivers, and may also cause life-threatening flash floods.

SRC: 国家飓风中心说，预计飓风“汉娜”会挟带暴雨，扫过得州南部与东北部部分地区，雨势或引发部分溪水暴涨以及威胁生命的山洪爆发。
HYP: The National Hurricane Center said that Hurricane Hannah is expected to carry heavy rains across parts of southern and northeastern Texas, and the rain may cause some streams to surge and life-threatening flash floods.

SRC: 报道称，受飓风“汉娜”影响最严重的是科珀斯克里斯蒂市以南到格兰德河河口地区，而里奥格兰德山谷可能爆发大范围的山洪。
HYP: According to the report, the worst affected by Hurricane "Hannah" is the area south of Corpus Christi to the mouth of the Rio Grande River, and the Rio Grande Valley may experience widespread flash floods.

SRC: 得州州长阿博特25日表示：“任何飓风都是一个巨大的挑战。”
HYP: Texas Governor Abbott said on the 25th: "Any hurricane is a huge challenge."

SRC: 该州有32个郡因为飓风进入灾难紧急<v>状态</v>。
HYP: Thirty-two counties in the state entered a disaster emergency due to the hurricane.

SRC: 科珀斯克里斯蒂市这座人口超32万的城市，已关闭图书馆与博物馆，居民严阵以待。
HYP: Corpus Christi, a city with a population of more than 320000, has closed libraries and museums, and residents are waiting.

SRC: 阿博特还说，在得州正在遭遇新冠疫情重创之际，不能再让这场飓风给得州带来更多伤亡。
HYP: Abbott also said that as Texas is being hit hard by the new crown epidemic, the hurricane cannot be allowed to bring more casualties to Texas.

SRC: 据报道，得州南部地区降水量预计将在26日夜间达到6至12英寸，得克萨斯州北部地区和路易斯安那州沿海地区也将出现3至5英寸的降雨。
HYP: According to reports, precipitation in southern Texas is expected to reach 6 to 12 inches on the night of the 26th, and 3 to 5 inches of rainfall will also occur in northern Texas and coastal areas of Louisiana.

SRC: 由于全球变暖等因素影响，“汉娜”的形成早于以往的大西洋飓风季。
HYP: Due to global warming and other factors, the formation of "Hannah" predates the previous Atlantic hurricane season.

SRC: 一般情况下，大西洋的第一场飓风通常要到8月中旬才会形成。
HYP: In general, the first hurricane in the Atlantic Ocean usually does not form until mid-August.

SRC: 波兰将退出欧洲防止对女子施暴的条约
HYP: Poland will withdraw from the European Treaty on the Prevention of Violence against Women

SRC: 波兰司法部星期六表示，波兰下个星期将采取步骤，退出欧洲防止对妇女施暴条约。
HYP: The Polish Ministry of Justice said Saturday that Poland will take steps next week to withdraw from the European Treaty on the Prevention of Violence against Women.

SRC: 波兰右翼的政府内阁表示，该条约要求学校教授学生有关性别问题的议题，践踏了学生父母的权利。
HYP: The cabinet of the Polish right-wing government said that the treaty requires schools to teach students about gender issues, trampling on the rights of students' parents.

SRC: 波兰司法部长焦布洛举行记者会说，他领导的司法部星期一将向劳工和家庭部提出开始退出条约的要求。
HYP: Polish Minister of Justice Giobro held a press conference and said that his Ministry of Justice will submit a request to the Ministry of Labor and Family to start withdrawing from the treaty on Monday.

SRC: 那项条约又名伊斯坦布尔公约。
HYP: That treaty is also known as the Istanbul Convention.

SRC: 焦布洛说，“该条约包含一些我们认为是有害的意思形态性质的元素。”
HYP: Jiaobo said, "The treaty contains some elements of ideological nature that we think are harmful."

SRC: 波兰执政的法律与公正党及其及其执政联盟伙伴跟罗马天主教教会有密切的同盟关系，提倡保守的社会议程。
HYP: Poland's ruling Law and Justice Party and its ruling coalition partners have a close alliance with the Roman Catholic Church and advocate a conservative social agenda.

SRC: 波兰总统杜达在这个月成功的连任竞选期间将敌视同性恋权利作为主要议题之一。
HYP: Polish President Duda made hostility to gay rights one of the main issues during his successful re-election campaign this month.

SRC: 星期五，成千上万的波兰人(其中大部分是妇女)在华沙和其他一些城市举行反对退出公约的抗议。
HYP: On Friday, thousands of Poles, most of them women, held protests against withdrawal from the convention in Warsaw and other cities.

SRC: 抗议的组织者之一莱姆帕特在华沙举行的抗议游行中说，“退出条约的目的就是将家暴合法化”。
HYP: Lempat, one of the organizers of the protest, said during a protest march in Warsaw that "the purpose of withdrawing from the treaty is to legalize domestic violence."

SRC: 一些抗议者举着横幅，上面写着“法律与公正党是妇女的地狱”。
HYP: Some protesters held up banners that read, "Law and Justice Party is a hell for women."

SRC: 法律与公正党长久以来抱怨伊斯坦布尔公约。
HYP: The Law and Justice Party has long complained about the Istanbul Convention.

SRC: 波兰先前的中间派执政的政府2015年批准了该公约。
HYP: The previous centrist government in Poland ratified the convention in 2015.

SRC: 法律与公正党政府表示，该条约不尊重宗教，要求在学校里教授自由派的社会政策。
HYP: The Law and Justice Party government stated that the treaty does not respect religion and requires that liberal social policies be taught in schools.

SRC: 但截至目前该党一直没有决定退出该公约。
HYP: But as of now, the party has not decided to withdraw from the convention.

SRC: （根据路透社报道）
HYP: (According to Reuters)

SRC: 据越通社报道，格里沃里认为，越南25年来为东盟的发展作出巨大贡献。
HYP: According to the Vietnam News Agency, Grivori believes that Vietnam has made great contributions to the development of ASEAN in the past 25 years.

SRC: 越南不仅是东盟负责任的一员，更是东盟的火车头。
HYP: Vietnam is not only a responsible member of ASEAN, but also the locomotive of ASEAN.

SRC: 格里沃里表示，俄罗斯乃至亚欧经济联盟认为，越南为东盟提高其地位，对外推广其形象做出贡献。
HYP: Grivori said that Russia and even the Asia-Europe Economic Union believe that Vietnam has contributed to the enhancement of ASEAN's status and the promotion of its image abroad.

SRC: 他强调，“东盟因此应该感谢越南。”
HYP: He stressed that "ASEAN should therefore thank Vietnam."

SRC: 格里沃里表示，分析人士对越南所提出的和平倡议给予认可。
HYP: Grivori said that analysts approved of Vietnam's peace initiative.

SRC: 越南愿意同东盟各国分享经验，对包括东海问题在内的亚太地区面临的问题提出建设性的和平措施。
HYP: Vietnam is willing to share its experience with ASEAN countries and propose constructive peace measures on the problems facing the Asia-Pacific region, including the East China Sea issue.

SRC: 关于越南与俄罗斯在东盟框架下的合作，格里沃里认为，越南为俄罗斯与东盟的合作关系提供支持，帮助俄罗斯在这一合作框架下获得利益。
HYP: Regarding the cooperation between Vietnam and Russia under the ASEAN framework, Grivori believes that Vietnam provides support for the cooperative relationship between Russia and ASEAN and helps Russia gain benefits under this cooperation framework.

SRC: 包括俄罗斯在内的亚欧经济联盟与越南签署自贸协定后能够进军东盟市场。
HYP: The Asia-Europe Economic Union, including Russia, can enter the ASEAN market after signing a free trade agreement with Vietnam.

SRC: 格里沃里建议最大限度扩大亚欧经济联盟与东盟各国的自由贸易区，进而创造经济和安全稳定的平台。
HYP: Greivoli proposes to maximize the free trade area between the Asia-Europe Economic Union and ASEAN countries, thereby creating a platform for economy, security and stability.

SRC: 格里沃里同时相信，俄罗斯、越南与东盟正在步入正轨并将实现其目标。
HYP: Grivori also believes that Russia, Vietnam and ASEAN are on the right track and will achieve their goals.

SRC: 从现在到2020年底，北江省将具备必要条件，尤其是在基础设施，人力资源和土地等方面，以便主动迎来外资流入，特别是拥有价值链和转让先进技术的跨国集团。
HYP: From now until the end of 2020, Beijiang Province will have the necessary conditions, especially in terms of infrastructure, human resources and land, in order to proactively welcome the inflow of foreign capital, especially multinational groups that have value chains and transfer advanced technology.

SRC: 此外，北江省将办理好递交政府总理决定对越韩工业区基础设施建设与经营项目投资的主张和批准将本省安山-北陇和安闾两个工业-城市-服务业区补充列入至2020年越南工业区发展总体规划的文件。
HYP: In addition, Beijiang Province will complete the submission of the Prime Minister's decision to invest in infrastructure construction and operation projects in the Vietnam-Korea Industrial Zone and approve the addition of the two industrial-urban-service areas in the province, Anshan-Beilong and Anlu, to the overall plan for the development of Vietnam's industrial zone up to 2020.

SRC: 与此同时，北江省着力加快各项目的进度，尤其是在和富、光州，双溪-内皇等工业园区集群的基础设施建设经营项目，为招商引资形成土地基金。
HYP: At the same time, Beijiang Province is working hard to accelerate the progress of various projects, especially the infrastructure construction and operation projects in the industrial park clusters of Hefu, Gwangzhou, Shuangxi-Neihuang, etc., to form a land fund for attracting investment.

SRC: 在2020年内，北江省工贸局参就定工业区、工业集群规划建言献策，以纳入省规划。
HYP: In 2020, the Beijiang Provincial Bureau of Industry and Trade will provide suggestions and suggestions on the planning of industrial zones and industrial clusters for inclusion in the provincial planning.

SRC: 北江省确定将发展工业园区集群与保障国防安全，保护生态环境，保障粮食安全相结合，进而助推工业均衡发展；拥有全面的电力，供水，交通和电信等基础设施，并与城市建设，贸易服务，工人住房和医疗卫生、教育等其他社会基础设施等相结合。
HYP: Beijiang Province has decided to combine the development of industrial park clusters with ensuring national defense security, protecting the ecological environment, and ensuring food security, thereby promoting balanced industrial development; it has comprehensive infrastructure such as electricity, water supply, transportation and telecommunications, and is integrated with urban construction, trade services, workers "housing and other social infrastructure such as health care, education, etc.

SRC: 在工业区，北江省着力呼吁对电力，电子，电信设备，精密机械，辅助工业等领域中的高科技，清洁技术的投资项目。
HYP: In the industrial zone, Beijiang Province strongly calls for investment projects in high-tech and clean technologies in the fields of electricity, electronics, telecommunications equipment, precision machinery, auxiliary industries, etc.

SRC: 在工业园区集群，该省呼吁对生产、利用就地劳动力、尤其是农产品、食品加工等领域的中小型规模投资项目。
HYP: In the industrial park cluster, the province calls for small and medium-sized investment projects in the production and use of local labor, especially in the fields of agricultural products and food processing.

SRC: 未来，北江省将着力加快对北江市后勤物流中心的基础设施的投资，与工业园区集群同步发展，以优化货物、货币流通和有助于降低生产成本，提高货物价值，优化供应链，发展多式联运，从而为投资者投资于本省创造吸引力。
HYP: In the future, Beijiang Province will focus on accelerating investment in the infrastructure of the logistics and logistics center of Beijiang City, and develop simultaneously with the industrial park cluster to optimize the circulation of goods and currency and help reduce production costs, increase the value of goods, optimize the supply chain, and develop multimodal transportation, thereby creating attractiveness for investors to invest in the province.

SRC: （德国之声中文网）过去两周内，西班牙的新冠确冠病例大幅回升，多日出现上千新增病例。
HYP: (Deutsche Welle Chinese website) In the past two weeks, the number of new crown confirmed cases in Spain has rebounded significantly, with thousands of new cases occurring in many days.

SRC: 英国政府周六（7月25日）晚间临时决定，从当地时间26日零点起，将西班牙从安全旅行名单中移除，从西班牙入境英国的人必须隔离14天。
HYP: The British government temporarily decided on the evening of Saturday (July 25) to remove Spain from the safe travel list from 0: 00 local time on the 26th, and people entering the United Kingdom from Spain must be quarantined for 14 days.

SRC: 正在西班牙度假的英国游客听闻此项决定纷纷表示惊讶、担心、甚至愤怒，因为消息突如其来，令人措手不及。
HYP: British tourists who were on holiday in Spain expressed surprise, worry, and even anger when they heard about this decision, because the news was sudden and caught off guard.

SRC: 据报道，英国交通大臣沙普斯（Grant Shapps）目前也在西班牙度假。
HYP: According to reports, British Transport Secretary Grant Shapps is also currently on vacation in Spain.

SRC: 英国发布隔离措施前，挪威也已宣布从西班牙返回挪威的人要进行为期10天的隔离。
HYP: Before the UK issued the quarantine measures, Norway has also announced that people returning to Norway from Spain will be quarantined for 10 days.

SRC: 法国和比利时建议本国居民放弃前方巴塞罗那以及周边地区度假的计划。
HYP: France and Belgium advise their residents to abandon plans for vacations in Barcelona and surrounding areas ahead.

SRC: 这些地区的海滩人满为患，人与人之间无法保持社交距离，警察一度需要采取措施，以减少海滩游客的数量。
HYP: The beaches in these areas are overcrowded, and people cannot maintain social distance from each other. At one time, the police needed to take measures to reduce the number of beach tourists.

SRC: 旅游业是西班牙的重要支柱产业
HYP: Tourism is an important pillar industry in Spain

SRC: 西班牙：这里是安全的
HYP: Spain: It's safe here

SRC: 针对英国做出的决定，西班牙外交部周日表示，该国疫情得到控制。
HYP: In response to the decision made by the United Kingdom, the Spanish Foreign Ministry said on Sunday that the epidemic in the country is under control.

SRC: 西班牙外交部长冈萨雷斯（Arancha Gonzalez Laya）向媒体强调：" 西班牙是安全的，不仅对西班牙人而言，对游客来说也是安全的。"
HYP: Spanish Foreign Minister Arancha Gonzalez Laya emphasized to the media: "Spain is safe, not only for Spaniards, but also for tourists."

SRC: 西班牙政府将试图说服英国政府将巴利阿里群岛（Balearic Islands）和加那利群岛（Canary Islands）排除在隔离措施之外。
HYP: The Spanish government will try to persuade the British government to exclude the Balearic Islands and Canary Islands from the isolation measures.

SRC: 理由是，这两个旅游胜地的感染率远低于英国本土。
HYP: The reason is that the infection rate of these two tourist resorts is much lower than that of the British mainland.

SRC: 为防止疫情扩散，西班牙加泰罗尼亚地区也已重启"禁足令"。
HYP: In order to prevent the spread of the epidemic, the Catalonia region of Spain has also restarted the "foot ban."

SRC: 旅游业是西班牙的重要支柱产业，而西班牙是最受英国游客青睐的度假地之一。
HYP: Tourism is an important pillar industry in Spain, and Spain is one of the most popular resorts for British tourists.

SRC: 英国的这一决定预计将会使西班牙的旅游业大受影响。
HYP: This British decision is expected to greatly affect Spain's tourism industry.

SRC: 安静/任琛（德新社，路透社）
HYP: Quiet / Ren Qen (German News Agency, Reuters)

SRC: 中伏首日：北京暂别高温酷暑开启降雨模式-新华网
HYP: Zhongfu First Day: Beijing takes a break from the high temperature and heat to open the rainfall pattern-Xinhuanet

SRC: 新华社北京7月26日电（记者倪元锦）7月26日是今年的“中伏”首日。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 26 (Reporter Ni Yuanjin) July 26 is the first day of this year's "Zhong Fu."

SRC: 26日凌晨的大风骤雨对流天气，驱散了连日来笼罩在北京地区的高温酷暑，新一轮降雨天气将持续数日。
HYP: The heavy wind, showers and convective weather in the early morning of the 26th dispersed the heat and heat that had been shrouded in Beijing for several days, and a new round of rain and weather will last for several days.

SRC: 北京市气象台26日11时发布称，26日北京有分散性阵雨（伴有弱雷电），日最高气温仅为27℃；夜间阴有小到中雨（伴有弱雷电），夜间最低气温为23℃。
HYP: The Beijing Meteorological Station announced at 11 o'clock on the 26th that there were scattered showers (accompanied by weak thunder and lightning) in Beijing on the 26th, and the daily maximum temperature was only 27 ℃; there was light to moderate rain at night (accompanied by weak thunder and lightning), and the minimum temperature at night was 23 ℃.

SRC: 而在此前的24日至25日，北京全市处在高温蓝色预警中，大部地区日最高气温在37℃左右，局地出现超过40℃的高温。
HYP: From the 24th to the 25th, the city of Beijing was in the high temperature blue warning. The daily maximum temperature in most areas was around 37 ℃, and the local high temperature exceeded 40 ℃.

SRC: 伏天是一年之中气温最高、潮湿、闷热的日子，一年有“三伏”，最热在中伏，中国百姓说的“苦夏”就在此时。
HYP: Futian is the hottest, humid, and sultry day of the year. There are "three volts" in a year, and the hottest is in the middle volt. It is at this time that the Chinese people say "bitter summer."

SRC: 入伏时，家家填满谷仓，民间有“一伏饺子二伏面”的说法。
HYP: When entering the cave, every family fills the barn, and there is a folk saying of "one-volt dumpling and two-volt noodles."

SRC: 根据目前预报，未来三天，北京多阴雨天气。
HYP: According to the current forecast, there will be more rainy weather in Beijing in the next three days.

SRC: 气象部门提示公众尽量减少山区游玩，谨防地质灾害。
HYP: The meteorological department advised the public to minimize travel in mountainous areas and guard against geological disasters.

SRC: 据了解，今年的“中伏”有20天，从7月26日开始，至8月14日结束。
HYP: It is understood that this year's "Zhong Fu" has 20 days, starting on July 26 and ending on August 14.

SRC: 进入“中伏”后，人会感到身体乏力、食欲不振。
HYP: After entering "Zhong Fu", people will feel weak and loss of appetite.

SRC: 饮食上可选择绿豆、薏仁等具有清热解暑、健脾开胃作用的食物，以及苦菜、苦瓜等苦味食物，可有助于增进食欲、祛除暑气。
HYP: On the diet, you can choose mung beans, coix, and other foods that have the effect of clearing heat and relieving heat, strengthening the spleen and appetizing, as well as bitter foods such as bitter vegetables and bitter gourd, which can help increase appetite and dispel heat.

SRC: 《叮咚上线!老师好》下周上线薛兆丰领衔“知识发起人-新华网
HYP: "Ding Dong is online! Good teacher" will be launched next week. Xue Zhaofeng leads the "Knowledge Initiator-Xinhuanet

SRC: 又有新综艺上线。
HYP: There is also a new variety show online.

SRC: 互动知识分享节目《叮咚上线!老师好》,将于7月20日起在湖南卫视播出。
HYP: The interactive knowledge sharing program "Ding Dong Online! Good Teacher" will be broadcast on Hunan Satellite TV from July 20.

SRC: 据了解,节目将打造全新的全年龄青春课堂,一批有颜有型又有才的老师将上阵,挑战趣味性知识输出。
HYP: It is understood that the program will create a brand-new all-age youth classroom, and a group of handsome and talented teachers will be on the scene to challenge interesting knowledge output.

SRC: 与以往老师群体在大众心中的严肃印象不同,《叮咚上线!老师好》集结的是一群颜值和才华兼具的知识代表。
HYP: Different from the serious impression of teacher groups in the public mind in the past, "Ding Dong Online! Good Teacher" gathers a group of intellectual representatives with both face and talent.

SRC: 他们既是来自各学科的青年知识榜样,还是一群会抖包袱、擅长寓教于乐的全能“段子手”。
HYP: They are not only young knowledge role models from various disciplines, but also a group of all-round "paragraph players" who can shake their burdens and are good at teaching and fun.

SRC: 节目中,这群优秀青年知识榜样作为“知识分享官”,将要挑战趣味性的知识课堂。
HYP: In the program, this group of outstanding young knowledge role models, as "knowledge sharing officers", will challenge the interesting knowledge classroom.

SRC: 他们需要通过有态度的知识输出,展现所在学科最有趣的一面,来打动在场的观众。
HYP: They need to show the most interesting aspect of their discipline through an attitude of knowledge output to impress the audience present.

SRC: 而全年龄观众组成的“<v>有道</v>问问团”现场会提出百变问题,给“知识分享官”的授课提高难度,也给节目增添些许刺激的氛围。
HYP: The "Question Group" composed of audiences of all ages will raise ever-changing questions on the spot, making the teaching of the "knowledge sharing officer" more difficult, and adding a little stimulating atmosphere to the program.

SRC: 而全年龄观众组成的“有道问问团”现场会提出百变问题,给“知识分享官”的授课提高难度,也给节目增添些许刺激的氛围。
HYP: The "Question Group" composed of audiences of all ages will raise ever-changing questions on the spot, making the teaching of the "knowledge sharing officer" more difficult, and adding a little stimulating atmosphere to the program.

SRC: 据透露,此次“知识分享官”中有中国人民大学附属中学物理教师李永乐、考研指导名师张雪峰以及拥有十年从业经验的历史教师王磊等优秀青年教师,他们将以意想不到的方式向现场观众展现各个学科的“硬核”知识。
HYP: It is revealed that among the "knowledge sharing officers" are outstanding young teachers such as Li Yongle, a physics teacher at the Middle School Affiliated to Renmin University of China, Zhang Xuefeng, a famous teacher for the examination of research, and Wang Lei, a history teacher with ten years of experience. They will show the "hard core" knowledge of various disciplines to the audience in unexpected ways.

SRC: 另外,节目还邀请经济学教授薛兆丰作为节目的“知识发起人”,联合“叮咚助教”杜海涛和靳梦佳,与观众畅谈青春,打造“全民青春公开课”。
HYP: In addition, the program also invited economics professor Xue Zhaofeng as the "knowledge initiator" of the program, and joined "Ding Dong Assistant" Du Haitao and Jin Mengjia to talk about youth with the audience and create a "public youth class for all."

SRC: 香港特区政府政务司司长：形势严峻全力抗疫-中新网
HYP: Chief Secretary for Administration of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region Government: The situation is severe and fully fight the epidemic-Chinanews.com

SRC: 新华社香港7月26日电香港特区政府政务司司长张建宗26日表示，香港新冠肺炎疫情形势持续严峻，若疫情转坏，特区政府将果断采取更严厉管控措施，进一步限制经营场所营业和减少市民外出空间。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 26. Zhang Jianzong, Chief Secretary for Administration of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region Government, said on the 26th that the situation of the new crown pneumonia epidemic in Hong Kong continues to be severe. If the epidemic turns worse, the SAR government will resolutely take stricter control measures to further restrict the operation of business premises and reduce the space for citizens to go out.

SRC: 但现阶段特区政府无意推出“居家令”或“禁足令”限制市民外出。
