HYP: Arlington County, Virginia, also joined the lawsuit Friday.

SRC: 阿灵顿县的管理董事会主席加维说，“美国宪法要求每10年准确地清点我们的人口。我们必须准确地清点居住在阿灵顿县的每一个人，不能让这种非法试图吓跑人和压缩我们的移民社区人数的做法得逞。”
HYP: Garvey, chairman of the Arlington County Management Board, said, "The US Constitution requires an accurate count of our population every 10 years. We must accurately count everyone living in Arlington County, and we must not let this illegal attempt to scare away people and reduce the number of our immigrant communities succeed."

SRC: 另一些组织和个人则赞扬特朗普总统的行政令。
HYP: Other organizations and individuals praised President Trump's executive order.

SRC: 阿拉巴马州司法部长马歇尔称，该行政令是该州的一个“胜利”。
HYP: Alabama Attorney General Marshall said that the executive order was a "victory" for the state.

SRC: 他说，“分配各州的国会众议院席位和选举团席位的时候，必须根据居住在各州的居民人数，而且是合法居住的居民的人数。”
HYP: He said that "the distribution of seats in the House of Representatives and electoral college seats in each state must be based on the number of residents living in each state, and the number of residents legally residing."

SRC: 美国最高法院去年阻止了特朗普行政当局将公民身份问题纳入2020年人口普查表中。
HYP: The US Supreme Court last year prevented the Trump administration from including citizenship issues in the 2020 census form.

SRC: 特朗普总统本星期早些时候签署一项行政令，指令监管美国人口普查局的商业部长罗斯提交人口普查所得的无证人口的数据，以便行政当局将这些无证人口排除在各州的人口普查数字之外，并以此确定每个州究竟是增加还是减少或保持众议院议员席位。
HYP: President Trump signed an executive order earlier this week instructing Secretary of Commerce Ross, who oversees the US Census Bureau, to submit data on the undocumented population obtained from the census so that the administration can exclude these undocumented populations from the census figures of the states, and use this to determine whether each state will increase, reduce, or maintain seats in the House of Representatives.

SRC: 美国每隔10年就要根据人口变化情况重新分配众议院席位。
HYP: The United States redistributes seats in the House of Representatives every 10 years according to demographic changes.

SRC: 新书爆料：哈利王子觉得哥哥“势利傲慢”
HYP: New book revelation: Prince Harry thinks his brother is "snobbish and arrogant"

SRC: 英国《泰晤士报》和《星期日泰晤士报》连载名为《寻找自由》（Finding Freedom）的新书，内容描绘哈利王子（Prince Harry）与妻子梅根（Meghan Markle）的王室生活心路历程。
HYP: The British "Times" and "Sunday Times" serialized a new book titled "å¯" Find Freedom, which depicts the royal life of Prince Harry and his wife Meghan Markle.

SRC: 但路透社报导，哈利和梅根已和这本书撇清关系，说他们未接受作者访问，也未提供任何内容。
HYP: But Reuters reported that Harry and Meghan have disassociated themselves from the book, saying that they did not accept the author's interview, nor did they provide any content.

SRC: 《星期日泰晤士报》报导，新书引述消息人士表示，哈利和梅根婚前约会时，威廉王子（Prince William）想确认原是好莱坞女星的梅根对哈利是否别有用心。
HYP: The Sunday Times reported that the new book quoted sources as saying that when Harry and Meghan were dating before marriage, Prince William wanted to confirm whether Meghan, who was originally a Hollywood actress, had ulterior motives for Harry.

SRC: 根据消息人士转述，威廉当时曾对哈利说：“你别感觉有必要仓促（娶梅根）。
HYP: According to the source, William said to Harry at the time, "You don't feel the need to rush (marry Meghan).

SRC: 你可以尽量花时间去了解这个女孩。”
HYP: You can spend as much time as you can to understand this girl. "

SRC: 报导说，当哈利听到威廉用“这个女孩”形容梅根，他从哥哥语气中感受到傲慢势利，他也认为自己不再需要他人照顾提醒。
HYP: The report said that when Harry heard William describe Meghan as "this girl", he felt arrogant and snobbish in his brother's tone, and he also thought he no longer needed someone else to take care of him.

SRC: 哈利和梅根今年1月宣布计划过更独立的生活，并将自食其力。
HYP: Harry and Meghan announced in January this year that they plan to live a more independent life and will support themselves.

SRC: 两人3月正式卸下王室高阶成员身分后，目前带著儿子亚契（Archie）住在美国洛杉矶追求新事业。
HYP: After the two officially removed their status as high-ranking members of the royal family in March, they currently live in Los Angeles with their son Archie to pursue a new career.

SRC: 哈利和梅根在2018年5月结婚。
HYP: Harry and Meghan got married in May 2018.

SRC: 当时这场婚姻被视为为英国王室注入好莱坞的光鲜亮丽和新时代气息，两人也因此成为当代全球最受瞩目的名人夫妻档之一。
HYP: At that time, this marriage was seen as injecting the glamour and new era of Hollywood into the British royal family, and the two became one of the most watched celebrity couples in the world.

SRC: 越南驻老挝大使馆公使衔参赞郑氏心、在老挝越南佛教协会、老挝越南人总会、万象省政府代表、老挝老兵协会等代表一同参加了祭奠仪式。
HYP: Zheng Shixin, Minister Counselor of the Vietnamese Embassy in Laos, representatives of the Lao Vietnamese Buddhist Association, the Lao Vietnamese Federation, the Vientiane Provincial Government, and the Lao Veterans Association attended the memorial ceremony.

SRC: 英烈祭奠仪式在庄严肃穆的气氛中举行，各位代表陆续向英烈们上香，缅怀英烈们的丰功伟绩及越老特殊团结关系。
HYP: The memorial ceremony for the heroes was held in a solemn and solemn atmosphere, and representatives successively offered incense to the heroes to remember their great achievements and the special solidarity between Vietnam and Vietnam.

SRC: 公使衔参赞郑氏心在讲话中表示，这是在老越南人和老挝人民共同缅怀两国革命英烈，一起对为两国独立自由牺牲的英烈表达感恩之心的机会，同时也是两国人民回顾两国并肩协作打击共同敌人，争取民族独立，国家统一，共同建设国家发展，巩固两国关系的良好机会。
HYP: Minister Counsellor Zheng Shixin said in his speech that this is an opportunity for the old Vietnamese and Lao people to jointly remember the revolutionary heroes of the two countries and express gratitude to the heroes who sacrificed for the independence and freedom of the two countries. At the same time, it is also a good opportunity for the people of the two countries to look back at the two countries working side by side to fight against common enemies, strive for national independence, national reunification, jointly build national development, and consolidate relations between the two countries.

SRC: 74年前的1946年1月23日， 老越战斗联盟的28名战士在进攻Phonehe据点时英勇牺牲。
HYP: On January 23, 1946, 74 years ago, 28 soldiers of the Lao-Vietnam Combat Alliance died heroically while attacking the Phonehe stronghold.

SRC: 此次进攻取得胜利，成为两国在争取民族解放革命斗争初期阶段的具有历史性意义的胜利。
HYP: The victory of this attack has become a historic victory for the two countries in the early stage of the revolutionary struggle for national liberation.

SRC: 郑氏心女士强调，两国人民永远铭记为两国民族解放斗争事业牺牲的各位英烈，同时强调两国年轻<v>一带</v>将继续发扬老前辈英勇、坚强的传统，为越老关系持续开花结果及两国的繁荣发展作出应有的贡献。
HYP: Ms. Zheng Shixin emphasized that the people of the two countries will always remember the heroes who sacrificed for the cause of the national liberation struggle of the two countries. At the same time, she emphasized that the young areas of the two countries will continue to carry forward the heroic and strong traditions of their predecessors and make due contributions to the continued flowering of Vietnam-Vietnam relations and the prosperity and development of the two countries.

SRC: 郑氏心女士强调，两国人民永远铭记为两国民族解放斗争事业牺牲的各位英烈，同时强调两国年轻一带将继续发扬老前辈英勇、坚强的传统，为越老关系持续开花结果及两国的繁荣发展作出应有的贡献。
HYP: Ms. Zheng Shixin emphasized that the people of the two countries will always remember the heroes who sacrificed for the cause of the national liberation struggle of the two countries. At the same time, she emphasized that the young areas of the two countries will continue to carry forward the heroic and strong traditions of their predecessors and make due contributions to the continued flowering of Vietnam-Vietnam relations and the prosperity and development of the two countries.

SRC: 里程碑式跨越！
HYP: Milestone-style crossing!

SRC: 国际米兰解锁第3000场意甲比赛-中新网
HYP: Inter Milan unlock the 3000th Serie A game-Chinanews.com

SRC: 中新网客户端7月26日电北京时间26日凌晨，意甲传统豪门国际米兰迎来了里程碑之战。
HYP: China News Service client, July 26. In the early morning of the 26th Beijing time, Serie A traditional giants Inter Milan ushered in a milestone battle.

SRC: 据意大利媒体统计，客场对阵热那亚一役是国际米兰队史第3000场意甲联赛，蓝黑军团也是首个解锁这项里程碑的球队。
HYP: According to Italian media statistics, the away game against Genoa is the 3000th Serie A game in the history of Inter Milan, and the Nerazzurri is also the first team to unlock this milestone.

SRC: 自1929年联赛改制以来，国际米兰是唯一一支从未缺席意甲的队伍，也是唯一一支从未降级的球队。
HYP: Since the reform of the league in 1929, Inter Milan is the only team that has never missed Serie A and the only team that has never been relegated.

SRC: 据意大利媒体报道，国际米兰与热那亚的比赛是蓝黑军团队史第3000场比赛。
HYP: According to Italian media reports, the match between Inter Milan and Genoa is the 3000th game in the history of the Blue and Black Corps.

SRC: 在这场里程碑之战中，国际米兰客场三球完胜热那亚。
HYP: In this milestone battle, Inter Milan beat Genoa with three goals away.

SRC: 此役卢卡库梅开二度，替补出场的桑切斯也贡献一球。
HYP: Lukaku scored twice in this game, and Sanchez, who appeared as a substitute, also contributed a goal.

SRC: 比赛从一开始就进入了国际米兰的节奏，强攻终于在第34分钟转化为进球。
HYP: The game entered the rhythm of Inter Milan from the beginning, and the strong attack finally turned into a goal in the 34th minute.

SRC: 比拉吉左路传中，卢卡库中路包抄头球破门。
HYP: Biraji passed from the left, Lukaku outflanked the header and scored the goal.

SRC: 第82分钟国际米兰如法炮制，摩西右路突破后传中，桑切斯中路包抄推射得手；终场前卢卡库完成梅开二度，反击中布罗佐维奇送出长距离直塞，卢卡库突入禁区晃过罗梅罗后推射空门得分，将比分定格在3：0。
HYP: Inter Milan did the same in the 82nd minute, Moses broke through the right and scored, Sanchez outflanked and scored successfully; Lukaku scored twice before the end, and Brozovic sent a long-distance straight stopper in the counterattack. Lukaku broke into the penalty area and swung Romero and scored an empty goal, setting the score at 3: 0.

SRC: 国际米兰客场3：0完胜热那亚，积分反超亚特兰大上升至第2，在多赛一场的情况下落后领头羊尤文图斯4分，仍保留着争冠希望。
HYP: Inter Milan won Genoa 3-0 away, and the points overtook Atlanta to second place, 4 points behind the leader Juventus in the case of one more game, still retaining the hope of winning the championship.

SRC: 至此，在这跨越近90载光阴的3000场意甲联赛中，国际米兰赢得了其中的1489场，打平834场，输掉677场，胜率为49.6%。
HYP: At this point, in this 3000 Serie A games spanning nearly 90 years, Inter Milan won 1489 of them, tied 834 games and lost 677 games, with a winning rate of 49.6%.

SRC: 其间，球队共打进5038球，丢3102球，场均打进1.68球。
HYP: In the meantime, the team scored 5038 goals, lost 3102 goals, and scored 1.68 goals per game.

SRC: 蓝黑军团18次获得联赛冠军，并且从未降级。
HYP: The Nerazzurri have won the league championship 18 times and have never been relegated.

SRC: 谍战剧老面孔柳云龙演一个结巴男主角-新华网
HYP: Liu Yunlong, the old face of the spy drama, plays a stuttering actor-Xinhuanet

SRC: 由柳云龙监制、殷飞执导,柳云龙、苏青、梁冠华、李立群等主演的大型谍战剧《胜算》, 于7月16日晚7:30登陆广东卫视“活力剧场” 。
HYP: Produced by Liu Yunlong and directed by Yin Fei, and starring Liu Yunlong, Su Qing, Liang Guanhua, Li Liqun and others, the large-scale spy war drama "Winning" landed on Guangdong Satellite TV's "Dynamic Theater" at 7: 30 pm on July 16.

SRC: 该剧讲述了潜伏在日伪警察局的中共地下党员唐飞(柳云龙饰)联合苏联特工,刺杀日本特工头目,粉碎了日军的惊天阴谋。
HYP: The play tells the story of Tang Fei (played by Liu Yunlong), an underground member of the Communist Party of China lurking in the Japanese-puppet police station, who teamed up with Soviet agents to assassinate the leader of the Japanese agent and smash the Japanese conspiracy.

SRC: 《胜算》根据史实改编,素材取自尘封多年的苏联军事档案。
HYP: "Winning Chance" is adapted from historical facts, and the material is taken from the dusty Soviet military archives for many years.

SRC: 莫斯科保卫战期间,苏联红军远东精锐西进驰援,此时日本关东军“北进派”认为有机可乘,意欲出兵。
HYP: During the defense of Moscow, the Soviet Red Army's Far East elite advanced westward to help. At this time, the "Northern Movement" of the Japanese Guandong Army thought it was an opportunity and intended to send troops.

SRC: 为解<v>腹背受敌</v>之危,中共与苏共情报人员联手实施了“穆丹乌拉”计划。
HYP: In order to relieve the danger of the enemy, the CCP and CPSU intelligence personnel jointly implemented the "Mudan Ula" plan.

SRC: 为解腹背受敌之危,中共与苏共情报人员联手实施了“穆丹乌拉”计划。
HYP: In order to relieve the danger of the enemy, the CCP and CPSU intelligence personnel jointly implemented the "Mudan Ula" plan.

SRC: 根据此历史背景,知名编剧邓原几经打磨,令剧情曲折烧脑。
HYP: According to this historical background, the well-known screenwriter Deng Yuan has been polished several times, making the plot twists and turns.

SRC: 柳云龙此次在《胜算》中同时担任监制和男主角。
HYP: Liu Yunlong is both the producer and the leading actor in "Winning Chance" this time.

SRC: 剧中,他饰演的唐飞是林河警察厅刑事科科长,是一位颇有喜感甚至有点痞气的结巴警察,真实的身份则是一名中共地下党员。
HYP: In the play, his role of Tang Fei is the chief of the Criminal Section of the Linhe Police Department. He is a stuttering policeman with a sense of joy and even a little ruffian. His real identity is an underground member of the Communist Party of China.

SRC: 与其上演对手戏的女主角蔡梦是林河保安局科长,深得日本上司福原的赏识,与唐飞之间存在着亦敌亦友、暧昧不清的微妙关系。
HYP: The heroine Cai Meng, who performed the opposite play, is the chief of the Linhe Security Bureau, and is appreciated by the Japanese boss Fukuhara. There is a subtle relationship with Tang Fei that is both enemy and friend, and ambiguous.

SRC: 苏青近年来尝试了很多不同类型的角色,从《那些年我们正年轻》中的陆若文到《延禧攻略》中的尔晴,都给观众留下深刻印象,演技受到认可。
HYP: Su Qing has tried many different types of characters in recent years, from Lu Ruowen in "Those Years We Are Young" to Er Qing in "Yanxi Strategy", which left a deep impression on the audience and his acting skills were recognized.

SRC: 此次苏青与柳云龙是首次搭档,结巴警长搭配妩媚女警的设置,颇有看点与新意。
HYP: This time Su Qing and Liu Yunlong are partners for the first time. The setting of stammering the sheriff with charming policewomen is quite interesting and innovative.

SRC: 除了两位主角外,《胜算》中还有梁冠华、李立群、钱波、雷汉、申军谊等众多实力派演员加盟,老戏骨飙戏也是该剧看点之一。
HYP: In addition to the two protagonists, there are many powerful actors such as Liang Guanhua, Li Liqun, Qian Bo, Lei Han, and Shen Junyi in "Winning Chance", and the old drama Bone Drama is also one of the highlights of the play.

SRC: 据了解,《胜算》制作上也十分精良,剧组跨越江苏、浙江、辽宁3省近2000公里拍摄取景。
HYP: It is understood that the production of "Winning Chance" is also very sophisticated, and the crew spans nearly 2000 kilometers across Jiangsu, Zhejiang, and Liaoning provinces.

SRC: 为了还原东北日据时期光怪陆离的城市风貌,剧组美工道具组日夜赶工,仔细打磨场景搭建及道具的每一个细节,令剧中场景画面精致,富有历史质感。
HYP: In order to restore the bizarre city style of the Northeast Japanese occupation period, the crew's art and art team worked day and night to carefully polish every detail of the scene construction and props, making the scene in the play exquisite and full of historical texture.

SRC: 绿地开启新一轮混改上海国资拟转让17.5%股份-经济观察网－专业财经新闻网站
HYP: Green space opens a new round of mixed reform of Shanghai state-owned assets to transfer 17.5% of shares-Economic Watch-Professional Finance News website

SRC: 经济观察网记者饶贤君7月26日，绿地控股（600606.SH）发布《关于国有股东拟通过公开征集受让方的方式协议转让公司部分股份暨复牌的提示性公告》。
HYP: Economic Observation Network reporter Rao Xianjun On July 26, Greenfield Holdings (600606.SH) issued the "suggestive notice that state-owned shareholders intend to transfer part of the company's shares and resume trading through public solicitation of transferees."

SRC: 公告内容显示，为进一步深化国资国企改革，优化国资布局结构调整，完善绿地股权结构，上海地产（集团）有限公司（以下简称“上海地产”）及上海城投（集团）有限公司（以下简称“上海城投” ）拟通过公开征集受让方的方式协议转让所持有的公司部分股份，拟转让的股份比例合计不超过绿地总股本的17.5% 。
HYP: The content of the announcement shows that in order to further deepen the reform of state-owned assets and state-owned enterprises, optimize the structural adjustment of state-owned assets, and improve the equity structure of Greenland, Shanghai Real Estate (Group) Co., Ltd. (Hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai Real Estate") and Shanghai Urban Investment (Group) Co., Ltd. (Hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai Urban Investment") intend to transfer some of the shares held by the company through public solicitation of transferees. The proportion of shares to be transferred shall not exceed 17.5% of the total equity of Greenland.

SRC: 本次拟转让股份的价格不低于下列两者之中的较高者：提示性公告日（2020 年7月27日）<v>前</v>30个交易日的每日加权平均价格的算术平均值；最近一个会计年度公司经审计的每股净资产值。
HYP: The price of the shares to be transferred this time shall not be lower than the higher of the following two: The arithmetic average of the daily weighted average price for the 30 trading days before the indicative announcement date (July 27, 2020); and the company's audited net asset value per share in the most recent fiscal year.

SRC: 目前，对绿地的新战略投资者仍无定论，按照公告公示信息估算，新战略投资者要拿下绿地此次混改中转让的17.5%股权需要支付约140亿元的资金。
HYP: At present, the new strategic investor in Greenland is still inconclusive. According to the announcement, it is estimated that the new strategic investor will need to pay about 14 billion yuan to win the 17.5% equity transferred in this mixed reform of Greenland.

SRC: 值得注意的是，本次股份转让完成后，预计绿地仍无控股股东及实际控制人，但控制权结构可能发生较大变化。
HYP: It is worth noting that after the completion of this share transfer, it is expected that Greenland will still have no controlling shareholders and actual controllers, but the control structure may undergo major changes.

SRC: 绿地控股自创立以来进行了多次体制机制改革：1992年-1997年，在纯国有体制下按照市场化规则运行；1997年-2013年，建立并不断完善国有控股、职工持股的股份制；2013年-2015年，引进战略投资者，形成国有及非公有资本交叉持股、相互融合的混合所有制；2015年至今，整体上市，成为公众公司。
HYP: Since its establishment, Greenfield Holdings has carried out many institutional and mechanism reforms: From 1992 to 1997, it operated in accordance with market-oriented rules under a purely state-owned system; from 1997 to 2013, it established and continuously improved the shareholding system of state-owned holding and employee shareholding; from 2013 to 2015, it introduced strategic investors to form a mixed ownership system of cross-shareholding and mutual integration of state-owned and non-public capital; since 2015, it has been listed as a whole and has become a public company.

SRC: 绿地目前的混改方案与格力相似，2019年12月，高瓴资本领衔珠海明骏以416.62亿元接手格力电器（000651.SZ）15%<v>股权</v>，格力集团退居小股东，完成混改后，格力电器实施了高管激励计划、无实控人结构等现代化的企业管理方式。
HYP: The current mixed reform plan of Greenland is similar to Gree. In December 2019, Hillhouse Capital led Zhuhai Mingjun to take over 15% of Gree Electric (000651.SZ) with 41.662 billion yuan. Gree Group retired as a minority shareholder. After completing the mixed reform, Gree Electric implemented modern corporate management methods such as an executive incentive plan and no actual control structure.

SRC: 绿地目前的混改方案与格力相似，2019年12月，高瓴资本领衔珠海明骏以416.62亿元接手格力电器（000651.SZ）15%股权，格力集团退居小股东，完成混改后，格力电器实施了高管激励计划、无实控人结构等现代化的企业管理方式。
HYP: The current mixed reform plan of Greenland is similar to Gree. In December 2019, Hillhouse Capital led Zhuhai Mingjun to take over 15% of Gree Electric (000651.SZ) with 41.662 billion yuan. Gree Group retired as a minority shareholder. After completing the mixed reform, Gree Electric implemented modern corporate management methods such as an executive incentive plan and no actual control structure.

SRC: 上海地产、上海城投均为上海市国资委全资持有的国资企业集团，绿地控股董事长、总裁张玉良表示，绿地此举是上海按照党中央要求，推进国资国企综合性改革、加速新一阶段国资国企改革的重要举措，充分显示了因地制宜、量体裁衣的改革新思路，通过给上市公司引入新的优秀战略股东，支持企业进一步提高市场化程度，提升经营管理自由度，加速改革活力全面释放。
HYP: Shanghai Real Estate and Shanghai Urban Investment are both state-owned enterprise groups wholly owned by the Shanghai SASAC. Zhang Yuliang, chairman and president of Greenfield Holdings, said that Greenland's move is an important measure taken by Shanghai to promote the comprehensive reform of state-owned state-owned enterprises and accelerate the new phase of state-owned state-owned enterprise reform in accordance with the requirements of the Party Central Committee. It fully demonstrates the new ideas of reform adapted to local conditions and tailored to local conditions. By introducing new outstanding strategic shareholders to listed companies, it supports enterprises to further improve the degree of marketization, enhance the freedom of operation and management, and accelerate the full release of reform vitality.

SRC: 上海地产、上海城投均为上海市国资委全资持有的国资企业集团，绿地控股董事长、总裁张玉良表示，绿地此举是上海按照党中央要求，推进国资国企综合性改革、加速新一阶段<v>国资</v>国企改革的重要举措，充分显示了因地制宜、量体裁衣的改革新思路，通过给上市公司引入新的优秀战略股东，支持企业进一步提高市场化程度，提升经营管理自由度，加速改革活力全面释放。
HYP: Shanghai Real Estate and Shanghai Urban Investment are both state-owned enterprise groups wholly owned by the Shanghai SASAC. Zhang Yuliang, chairman and president of Greenfield Holdings, said that Greenland's move is an important measure taken by Shanghai to promote the comprehensive reform of state-owned state-owned enterprises and accelerate the new phase of state-owned state-owned enterprise reform in accordance with the requirements of the Party Central Committee. It fully demonstrates the new ideas of reform adapted to local conditions and tailored to local conditions. By introducing new outstanding strategic shareholders to listed companies, it supports enterprises to further improve the degree of marketization, enhance the freedom of operation and management, and accelerate the full release of reform vitality.

SRC: 刘德华刘青云能否“拆”出新火花-新华网
HYP: Can Andy Lau Qingyun "tear down" new sparks-Xinhuanet

SRC: 《拆弹专家2》近日宣布将于12月24日上映,成为贺岁档首部定档的影片。
HYP: "Bomb Disposal Expert 2" recently announced that it will be released on December 24, becoming the first fixed movie for the New Year.

SRC: 第二部依然是邱礼涛导演,刘德华监制及主演,以全新的故事展开。
HYP: The second part is still directed by Qiu Litao, produced and starred by Andy Lau, and launched with a brand-new story.

SRC: 据悉,第二部中“核弹”元素的加入,也让此次拆弹专家面临的挑战更为艰难,预告里几个惊鸿一瞥的镜头,已令人心悬一线,大爆炸的蘑菇云,被火光吞没的机场,场面相当震撼。
HYP: It is reported that the addition of the "nuclear bomb" element in the second part also makes the challenge faced by the bomb disposal experts more difficult. The few startling shots in the forecast have made people hang on the line. The mushroom cloud of the big bang, the airport engulfed by the fire, the scene is quite shocking.

SRC: 三年前,由原班人马制作出品的《拆弹专家》,斩获了当年的五一档票房冠军,并在香港电影金像奖拿下了7项提名,邱礼涛×刘德华也成为观众心目中的金牌搭档。
HYP: Three years ago, "Bomb Disposal Expert", produced by the original team, won the 51 box office champion of that year, and won 7 nominations at the Hong Kong Film Awards. Qiu Litao × Andy Lau also became the audience's gold medal partner.

SRC: 此次的《拆弹专家2》,也令人再次期待这对王牌组合能否擦出新火花。
HYP: This time, "Bomb Disposal Expert 2" also makes people look forward to whether this pair of ace combinations can spark new sparks.

SRC: 《拆弹专家2》讲述了全新的故事:前拆弹专家潘乘风(刘德华饰)晕倒在爆炸案现场,被警方列为嫌疑犯。
HYP: "Bomb Disposal Expert 2" tells a whole new story: Pan Zhengfeng (Andy Lau), a former bomb disposal expert, fainted at the scene of the bombing and was listed as a suspect by the police.

SRC: 为了寻找真相,他不得不向同是拆弹专家的好友董卓文(刘青云饰)求助。
HYP: In order to find the truth, he had to ask his friend Dong Zhuowen (Liu Qingyun), who is also a bomb disposal expert, for help.

SRC: 急于破案的女督查,也同时是潘乘风前女友的庞玲(倪妮饰)也被卷入其中。
HYP: The female inspector eager to solve the case, Pang Ling (Ni Ni), who is also Pan's ex-girlfriend, was also involved.

SRC: 依然是拆弹专家,但从定档预告中能感受到刘德华新角色的复杂:断了一条腿,戴上了义肢,一边被同是拆弹专家的刘青云追捕,一边又被前女友倪妮指挥行动。
HYP: He is still a bomb disposal expert, but he can feel the complexity of Andy Lau's new role from the trailer: He broke a leg, put on a prosthetic limb, and was chased by Liu Qingyun, who is also a bomb disposal expert, while being directed by his ex-girlfriend Ni Ni.

SRC: 三人究竟是怎样的关系,刘德华到底在香岛酒店做了什么,被牵扯到怎样的案件中,他拆弹专家的职业生涯又经历了哪些波折,种种谜团让人好奇不已。
HYP: What kind of relationship is the three, what exactly did Andy Lau do at the Xiangdao Hotel, what kind of cases he was involved in, what twists and turns he has experienced in his career as a bomb disposal expert, and various mysteries make people curious.

SRC: 据了解,电影的重头戏都是实地取景香港的世界地标性建筑,加上顶尖的特效制作团队,带来震撼逼真的视觉冲击。
HYP: It is understood that the highlight of the film is the field viewing of Hong Kong's world landmark buildings, coupled with the top special effects production team, to bring a shocking and realistic visual impact.

SRC: （记者聂青）
HYP: (Reporter Nie Qing)

SRC: 中新网7月26日电综合俄罗斯卫星网报道，7月26日是俄罗斯海军日，庆祝海军日的主要阅兵式在圣彼得堡和喀琅施塔得举行。
HYP: China News Service, July 26, a comprehensive Russian satellite network reported that July 26 is the Russian Navy Day, and the main military parade to celebrate the Navy Day was held in St. Petersburg and Kronstadt.

SRC: 俄罗斯总统、俄联邦武装力量最高统帅普京抵达喀琅施塔得参加庆祝活动，该地15艘舰艇和潜艇接受了检阅。
HYP: Russian President and Supreme Commander of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation Putin arrived in Kronstadt to participate in the celebration, and 15 ships and submarines there were inspected.

SRC: 当地时间2019年7月28日，俄罗斯圣彼得堡举行盛大阅兵式庆祝海军节。
HYP: On July 28, 2019 local time, a grand military parade was held in St. Petersburg, Russia to celebrate the Navy Day.

SRC: 据报道，普京向海军官兵祝贺海军日，并乘小艇在芬兰湾上从将要参加海上阅兵的舰艇旁边驶过，随后在主观礼台检阅受阅部队。
HYP: According to reports, Putin congratulated the Navy officers and soldiers on the Navy Day and drove by the ships that were going to participate in the naval parade in a small boat on the Gulf of Finland, and then inspected the troops under review on the subjective platform.

SRC: 普京表示，俄海军舰队列装了最新式的舰艇和特殊装备，装备水平不断提高。
HYP: Putin said that the Russian naval fleet is equipped with the latest ships and special equipment, and the equipment level is constantly improving.

SRC: 普京在俄罗斯海军日的阅兵式上说：“俄罗斯海军舰队拥有配备了高精武器的军舰、战略潜水巡洋舰和多用途潜艇、最新式飞机等飞行器、独特的武器和特殊装备。”
HYP: Putin said at the military parade on the Russian Navy Day: "The Russian naval fleet has warships equipped with high-precision weapons, strategic diving cruisers and multi-purpose submarines, state-of-the-art aircraft and other aircraft, unique weapons and special equipment."

SRC: 当地时间6月24日，俄罗斯纪念卫国战争胜利75周年红场阅兵式举行。
HYP: On June 24, local time, Russia held a military parade at Red Square to commemorate the 75th anniversary of the victory in the Patriotic War.

SRC: 他还表示，俄海军舰队将靠数字化和有效防御手段来取得独特优势。
HYP: He also said that the Russian naval fleet will rely on digitization and effective defense methods to gain unique advantages.

SRC: 报道称，庆祝俄罗斯海军日的主要海军阅兵式在圣彼得堡和喀琅施塔得举行，共有46艘舰艇参加，包括“卡萨托诺夫上将”号护卫舰、“海军中将库拉科夫”号大型反潜舰，以及大型登陆舰、小型导弹舰、护卫舰、潜艇等。
HYP: According to reports, the main naval parade to celebrate the Russian Navy Day was held in St. Petersburg and Kronstadt, and a total of 46 ships participated, including the frigate "Admiral Kasatonov" and the "Vice Admiral Kulakov" large anti-submarine ship, as well as large landing ships, small missile ships, frigates, submarines, etc.

SRC: 其中，系列舰艇在圣彼得堡冬宫桥旁进行静态展示，其中最引人瞩目的是经过复制的18世纪初俄罗斯首艘战列舰“波尔塔瓦”号。
HYP: Among them, the series of ships are statically displayed next to the Winter Palace Bridge in St. Petersburg, the most notable of which is the replica of the first Russian battleship "Poltava" in the early 18th century.

SRC: 为避免新冠病毒传播，今年海军阅兵式期间只有当地居民和特邀来宾能够进入喀琅施塔得。
HYP: In order to avoid the spread of the new crown virus, only local residents and special guests can enter Kronstadt during this year's naval parade.

SRC: 每年7月最后一个星期日是俄罗斯海军日。
HYP: The last Sunday of July every year is Russian Navy Day.

SRC: 中新网重庆7月26日电(记者刘贤)重庆市发展和改革委员会26日发布消息称，该市截至目前已退捕渔民4404人，占全部涉及渔民的42.54% 。
HYP: China News Service, Chongqing, July 26 (Reporter Liu Xian) The Chongqing Development and Reform Commission announced on the 26th that the city has so far retired 4404 fishermen, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.

SRC: 今年53岁的李代国接受中新网记者采访时说，爷爷辈就在龙溪河打鱼，自己11岁起就跟着父亲打鱼，摇着小船，沿着龙溪河前行，上到重庆梁平，下到长寿，每次一离开家就是十天半个月，靠打鱼维持家人生活。
HYP: In an interview with a reporter from Chinanews.com, the 53-year-old Li Daiguo said that his grandfathers were fishing in the Longxi River. Since the age of 11, he has been fishing with his father, shaking his boat, moving along the Longxi River, up to Liangping, Chongqing, and down to longevity. Every time he leaves home, he is ten and a half months, relying on fishing to maintain his family life.

SRC: 但从1997年起，随着农村人口逐渐往场镇里涌，高安场镇里的居民越来越多，造成的环境污染也越来越严重。
HYP: However, since 1997, as the rural population has gradually poured into the town, there are more and more residents in Gaoanchang Town, causing more and more serious environmental pollution.

SRC: 龙溪河沿线修建了造纸厂、化工厂、养殖场，也污染河水。
HYP: Paper mills, chemical plants, and breeding farms have been built along the Longxi River, which also pollute the river.

SRC: 到2007年、2008年，龙溪河变成臭水沟。
HYP: By 2007 and 2008, the Longxi River has become a smelly ditch.

SRC: “捕上来的鱼鳞片都是黑的，剖开后里面也是黑的。”
HYP: "The scales of the fish caught are black, and the inside is also black after being cut open."

SRC: 李代国说，河水污染后打鱼越来越困难。
HYP: Li Daiguo said that fishing is becoming more and more difficult after the river is polluted.

SRC: 当地开始下大力气治理龙溪河污染，包括清漂、巡河、水生资源管护等。
HYP: The local area began to make great efforts to control the pollution of the Longxi River, including clearing the river, patrolling the river, and managing and protecting aquatic resources.

SRC: 李代国也从渔民退捕转产，成为巡河队的一员，管护水生资源。
HYP: Li Daiguo also retired from fishermen and converted to production, and became a member of the river patrol team to manage and protect aquatic resources.

SRC: 从2020年1月1日起，重庆市水生生物保护区以及主城区相关水域已实行全面禁捕。
HYP: From January 1, 2020, Chongqing Aquatic Life Reserve and related waters in the main urban area have implemented a comprehensive ban on fishing.

SRC: 据重庆市发展改革委数据，截至目前，重庆市已累计退捕渔船3403艘、已签订退捕协议渔船4643艘，分别占三年总任务的63.3% 、 86.3% 。
HYP: According to data from the Chongqing Development and Reform Commission, as of now, Chongqing has retired 3403 fishing vessels and 4643 fishing vessels that have signed retreat agreements, accounting for 63.3% and 86.3% of the total three-year mission, respectively.

SRC: 已退捕渔民4404人，占全部涉及渔民的42.54% 。
HYP: 4404 fishermen have been retired, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.

SRC: 已退捕4404人中，实现就业4267人，占已退捕渔民的96.89% 。
HYP: Of the 4404 people who have been retired, 4267 have been employed, accounting for 96.89% of the fishermen who have retired.

SRC: 养老保险保障覆盖2691人，占退捕渔民的61.10% 。
HYP: Pension insurance coverage covers 2691 people, accounting for 61.10% of fishermen who retire.

SRC: 下一步，重庆市将深入开展各专项整治行动，加快推进长江干流岸线利用项目清理整治，完成新一轮长江入河排污口普查并开展相应整治行动，基本完成“三磷” ( 指磷矿、磷化工和磷石膏库)整治任务、小水电清理整改工作，推进长江两岸造林绿化专项行动，强化绿色矿山建设，巩固长江干流非法码头、非法采砂专项整治成果，深入推进长江流域禁捕退捕工作。
HYP: In the next step, Chongqing will carry out in-depth special rectification actions, accelerate the clean-up and rectification of the Yangtze River's main stream shoreline utilization projects, complete a new round of Yangtze River drainage and drainage surveys and carry out corresponding rectification actions, basically complete the "Three Phosphorus" (referring to phosphate mines, phosphorous chemicals and phosphorous gypsum reservoirs) rectification tasks, small hydropower clean-up and rectification work, promote special actions for afforestation and greening on both sides of the Yangtze River, strengthen the construction of green mines, consolidate the achievements of the special rectification of illegal docks and illegal sand mining on the main stream of the Yangtze River, and further promote the ban on fishing and retreat in the Yangtze River basin.

SRC: 新华社香港7月25日电香港特区政府财经事务及库务局局长许正宇表示，香港的金融市场仍保持活跃、运作有序。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 25. Xu Zhengyu, Director of the Financial Affairs and Treasury Bureau of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region Government, said that Hong Kong's financial market remains active and orderly.

SRC: 他对香港金融稳定及经济表示乐观。
HYP: He expressed optimism about Hong Kong's financial stability and economy.

SRC: 许正宇在香港驻多伦多经济贸易办事处及港加商会（加拿大总会）24日（多伦多时间）合办的网上研讨会上表示，香港因为“修例风波”和新冠肺炎疫情，经历着艰难的状况。
HYP: Xu Zhengyu said at an online seminar co-organized by the Hong Kong Economic and Trade Office in Toronto and the Hong Kong-Canada Chamber of Commerce (Canada Association) on the 24th (Toronto time) that Hong Kong is experiencing a difficult situation due to the "regulation disturbance" and the new crown pneumonia epidemic.

SRC: 港元汇价稳定并偏向强方兑换保证水平。
HYP: The exchange rate of the Hong Kong dollar is stable and favors the exchange guarantee level of the strong party.

SRC: 银行体系没有明显的资金流出迹象，相反，自6月以来超过110亿美元资金流入。
HYP: The banking system has no obvious signs of capital outflows. On the contrary, more than US $11 billion in funds have flowed in since June.

SRC: 银行的存款总额在过去几个月也持续增加，股票市场有一连串公开招股集资活动，市场成交屡见上升。
HYP: The total amount of bank deposits has also continued to increase in the past few months. There has been a series of public offering fund-raising activities in the stock market, and market transactions have repeatedly risen.

SRC: 许正宇说，新冠肺炎疫情为全球经济及金融市场带来压力，但香港的基本优势仍然保持不变。
HYP: Xu Zhengyu said that the new crown pneumonia epidemic has put pressure on the global economy and financial markets, but Hong Kong's basic advantages remain unchanged.

SRC: 香港拥有的多项优势，包括地理、法治、高速通讯、资讯和资金自由流通以及简单低税制，使香港持续成为领先的国际金融中心。
HYP: Hong Kong has many advantages, including geography, the rule of law, high-speed communications, free flow of information and capital, and a simple and low tax system, making Hong Kong a leading international financial center.

SRC: 许正宇指出，特区政府在“防疫抗疫基金”预留60亿港元，未来两年在公营及私营界别创造约3万个有时限的职位，涵盖不同技能及学历人士。
HYP: Xu Zhengyu pointed out that the SAR government has set aside 6 billion Hong Kong dollars in the "epidemic prevention and anti-epidemic fund" to create about 30000 time-bound jobs in the public and private sectors in the next two years, covering people with different skills and academic qualifications.

SRC: 为支持金融科技的发展，特区政府也已推出“千人计划”，资助本地金融科技公司、初创及其他有金融科技相关业务的企业，以创造1000个新职位，聘用本地人才及丰富香港的金融科技人才库。
HYP: To support the development of financial technology, the SAR government has also launched the "Thousand People Plan" to subsidize local financial technology companies, start-ups and other companies with financial technology-related businesses to create 1000 new jobs, hire local talents and enrich Hong Kong's financial technology talent pool.

SRC: 展望未来，许正宇对香港的金融稳定及经济表示乐观。
HYP: Looking to the future, Xu Zhengyu expressed optimism about Hong Kong's financial stability and economy.

SRC: 他鼓励加拿大企业善用香港的优势及其作为国际金融中心、国际资产及财富管理中心以及全球离岸人民币业务枢纽的地位，在粤港澳大湾区及附近地区发展及投资。
HYP: He encouraged Canadian companies to make good use of Hong Kong's advantages and its status as an international financial center, an international asset and wealth management center, and a global offshore renminbi business hub to develop and invest in the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area and surrounding areas.

SRC: 《柳叶刀》刊文赞扬中国抗疫努力鼓励各国学习经验-中新网
HYP: "The Lancet" praised China's anti-epidemic efforts to encourage countries to learn from experience-Chinanews.com

SRC: 《柳叶刀》杂志25日刊文表示，中国作为一个拥有14亿人口，规模与欧洲或美国相似的国家，现阶段新冠疫情得到有效控制，而没有再出现大范围传播的情况，在很大程度上控制住了国内的疫情。
HYP: The Lancet magazine published an article on the 25th that China, as a country with a population of 1.4 billion and a size similar to that of Europe or the United States, has effectively controlled the new crown epidemic at this stage, and there has been no large-scale spread, which has largely controlled the domestic epidemic.

SRC: 文章表示，在近十多年时间里，中国对国内研究和公共卫生建设方面进行了大量的投资，这使得中国对新冠的准备比当年严重急性呼吸道综合征(SARS)的准备要充分得多。
HYP: The article stated that in the past ten years, China has made a lot of investment in domestic research and public health construction, which makes China's preparation for the new crown much better than that of severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS) that year.

SRC: 作者表示，2002年SARS暴发时，起初中国准备不足，尤其是病原体无法确定。
HYP: The author said that when the SARS outbreak broke out in 2002, China was initially ill-prepared, especially the pathogen could not be identified.

SRC: 当2019年12月发现新冠病毒时，中国科学家很快就能够鉴定出病毒种类，并于2020年1月11日与国际共享了基因组测序数据。
HYP: When the new crown virus was discovered in December 2019, Chinese scientists were soon able to identify the type of virus and shared genome sequencing data with the international community on January 11, 2020.

SRC: 到1月底，来自中国大陆和香港的医生阐明了该病毒的临床特征，通过在《柳叶刀》上发表的研究论文，向世界警告了新冠病毒的威胁。
HYP: By the end of January, doctors from mainland China and Hong Kong clarified the clinical characteristics of the virus and warned the world about the threat of the new crown virus through research papers published in The Lancet.

SRC: 中国也一直处于疫苗研究的最前沿，在国家宣布紧急状态下，通过国内的紧密合作，这样的研究非常迅速而严格地展开，5月和7月，分别在《柳叶刀》上公布了中国开发的新冠疫苗早期试验取得进展的结果。
HYP: China has also been at the forefront of vaccine research. When the country declared a state of emergency, through close domestic cooperation, such research was carried out very quickly and strictly. In May and July, respectively, the results of the early trials of the new crown vaccine developed in China were announced in "The Lancet."

SRC: 中国的经验表明，对国家卫生和研究体系进行投资，有效提高实验室能力是非常重要的。
HYP: China's experience shows that it is very important to invest in national health and research systems to effectively improve laboratory capabilities.

SRC: 这是国家对卫生紧急情况和全球卫生安全做出快速有效反应的基础。
HYP: This is the basis for the country to respond quickly and effectively to health emergencies and global health security.

SRC: 其他国家，特别是低收入和中等收入国家来说，非常值得借鉴和学习。
HYP: Other countries, especially low-income and middle-income countries, are very worthy of reference and learning.

SRC: 此外，中国的经验证明，在强大的研究基础上，必须有强有力的高层果断地凭借科学依据来作出正确决策，这才使得新冠疫情得到有效控制。
HYP: In addition, China's experience has proved that on the basis of strong research, there must be a strong high-level decisive reliance on scientific evidence to make correct decisions, so that the new crown epidemic can be effectively controlled.

SRC: 文章强调，政府及其领导人必须尊重科学，理解科学的价值，并以对社会最有利的方式对其采取行动。
HYP: The article emphasizes that the government and its leaders must respect science, understand the value of science, and take action on it in the most beneficial way for society.

SRC: 在暴发初期，中国国家卫建委派出三组传染病专家前往武汉，调查新冠病毒的风险和传播，他们的建议为1月23日武汉“封城”的决定提供了依据；当有专家提出建设方舱医院必要性和紧迫性时，政府很快做出了决定并快速实施；同时，社区和群众的广泛参与，也使得疫情快速有效地被控制。
HYP: At the beginning of the outbreak, the National Health and Construction Commission of China dispatched three groups of infectious disease experts to Wuhan to investigate the risk and spread of the new crown virus. Their suggestions provided the basis for the decision to "close the city" in Wuhan on January 23; when some experts proposed the necessity and urgency of building a square cabin hospital, the government quickly made a decision and implemented it quickly; at the same time, the extensive participation of the community and the masses also made the epidemic quickly and effectively controlled.

SRC: 文章最后强调，应对全球性的卫生紧急情况，各国需要加强全球合作，联合应对。
HYP: The article finally emphasizes that in response to global health emergencies, countries need to strengthen global cooperation and jointly respond.

SRC: 总台记者杨洪
HYP: Headquarters reporter Yang Hong

SRC: 当地时间25日下午，一架小型飞机在德国北威州韦瑟尔县撞上一座多层住宅楼的顶层，事故共造成三人死亡。
HYP: On the afternoon of the 25th local time, a small plane crashed into the top floor of a multi-storey residential building in Wesel County, North Wales, Germany. Three people were killed in the accident.

SRC: 杜伊斯堡检方、韦瑟尔县警察局和韦瑟尔市消防部门当天晚间联合发布声明称，当天14时40分左右，一架两座小型飞机撞上位于韦瑟尔县辉柏斯坎普街一栋多层住宅楼顶层阁楼的住宅，造成三人丧生。
HYP: The Duisburg prosecutor, the Wesel County Police Department, and the Wesel City Fire Department jointly issued a statement that evening, stating that at around 14: 40 that day, a two-seater small plane crashed into a house in the penthouse on the top floor of a multi-storey residential building on Camp Street, Wesel County, killing three people.

SRC: 其当天从北威州鲁尔区马尔市起飞，在韦瑟尔县的机场中途停靠后再度起飞，随后撞上住宅楼。
HYP: It took off from Mar City, Ruhr District, North Wales, on the same day, took off again after stopping at the airport in Wesel County, and then crashed into a residential building.

SRC: 死者身份或为遭撞击住宅内的一名女性住户和小型飞机上两名乘客。
HYP: The identity of the deceased may be a female resident in the hit house and two passengers on a small plane.

SRC: 房内一名两岁儿童仅受轻伤，被平安救出。
HYP: A two-year-old child in the room was only slightly injured and was rescued safely.

SRC: 房内其余住户未在事故中受伤，但情绪仍未平复。
HYP: The rest of the residents in the room were not injured in the accident, but their emotions have not yet recovered.

SRC: 德新社报道的现场画面显示，遭遇事故的住宅一度冒出滚滚浓烟，消防队员扑灭火情后可见房屋损毁严重。
HYP: The scene screen reported by the German news agency showed that the house affected by the accident once emitted thick smoke, and the firefighters extinguished the fire and saw that the house was seriously damaged.

SRC: 目前，飞机失事原因尚不明确。
HYP: At present, the cause of the plane crash is not clear.

SRC: 《莱茵邮报》援引警方说法报道称，有线索表明，飞机或在撞上住宅楼前就已解体。
HYP: The Rhine Post quoted the police as reporting that there were clues that the plane had disintegrated before it hit a residential building.

SRC: 警方表示，在事故现场一带发现了失事飞机的多块零部件。
HYP: The police said that multiple parts of the crashed plane were found near the scene of the accident.

SRC: 德国刑警正与杜伊斯堡检方、德国联邦航空事故调查局共同调查导致这一事故的原因。
HYP: The German criminal police is working with the Duisburg prosecutor and the German Federal Aviation Accident Investigation Agency to investigate the cause of the accident.

SRC: 记者当天从中国驻杜塞尔多夫总领事馆了解到，该馆与当地警局及消防部门取得联系，据现场判断，伤亡人员中无中国公民。
HYP: The reporter learned from the Chinese Consulate General in Düsseldorf that day that the museum contacted the local police and fire department. According to the judgment at the scene, there were no Chinese citizens among the casualties.

SRC: 大鹏导演《吉祥如意》入围金爵奖-新华网
HYP: Director Dapeng's "Good luck" was shortlisted for the Golden Goblet Award-Xinhuanet

SRC: 7月18日，第二十三届上海国际电影节公布了金爵奖官方入选影片名单。
HYP: On July 18, the 23rd Shanghai International Film Festival announced the official list of films selected for the Golden Goblet Award.

SRC: 大鹏导演的首部现实题材影片《吉祥如意》，成功入围本届上影节金爵奖，同时影片官方发布了首款海报。
HYP: Director Dapeng's first realistic film, "Good luck", was successfully shortlisted for the Golden Goblet Award of this Film Festival, and the film officially released its first poster.

SRC: 海报片方供图
HYP: Poster Pictures for Pictures

SRC: 影片《吉祥如意》是大鹏导演的第一部现实题材作品，也是他与金爵奖的二度结缘。
HYP: The film "Good luck" is Dapeng's first realistic work, and it is also his second bond with the Golden Goblet Award.

SRC: 该片讲述了这样一个故事：一位喜剧片导演突发奇想，回到东北农村老家，希望将一家人如何过年拍成一部文艺电影，结果遭遇一系列意外。
HYP: The film tells a story: A comedy director came back to his hometown in the northeastern countryside on a whim, hoping to make a literary and artistic film for the family during the New Year, but he encountered a series of accidents.

SRC: 因拍电影而聚齐的家庭成员们，完成了最后的聚会。
HYP: The family members gathered for making the movie completed the final party.

SRC: 在今日发布的电影海报中，这个家庭中的一员— — “三舅”王吉祥坐在画面中央抽着烟，背景是披上银装的东北黑土地，前景是中国人逢年过节必挂的红灯笼。
HYP: In the movie poster released today, a member of the family, "Three Uncle" Wang Jixiang, is sitting in the middle of the screen smoking a cigarette. The background is the black land of Northeast China with silver clothing, and the foreground is the red lantern that the Chinese must hang during the New Year.

SRC: 象征着喜庆、团圆的红灯笼与身影落寞的王吉祥形成了巨大反差，似乎也透露了这个大家庭关系中的复杂与纠结。
HYP: The red lanterns, which symbolize joy and reunion, form a huge contrast with the lonely Wang Jixiang, which seems to reveal the complexity and entanglement in this big family relationship.

SRC: 据悉，影片中，除了“三舅”王吉祥的女儿由演员刘陆扮演，其余戏份均由真实的导演家人完成，影片实验性的视听风格，打破了戏剧与真实的边界，带给观众全新的浸入式观影体验。
HYP: It is reported that in the film, except for the daughter of "Three Uncle" Wang Jixiang, who is played by actor Liu Lu, the rest of the roles are completed by the real director's family. The experimental audio-visual style of the film breaks the boundary between drama and reality, and brings the audience a brand-new immersive viewing experience.

SRC: 据导演大鹏介绍，《吉祥如意》的创作源自“一场天意” ， 拍摄期间家庭突如其来的一系列变故，让原本的拍摄计划不得不随之改变，没有剧本的生活最终被记录成电影，却释放出超越设计的张力。
HYP: According to director Dapeng, the creation of "auspicious Ruyi" originated from "a providence." A series of sudden changes in the family during filming made the original filming plan have to be changed accordingly, and the life without a script was eventually recorded as a movie, but released tension beyond design.

SRC: 导演大鹏究竟如何面对这场“天意” ， 又该如何继续迎接这场天意带来的种种改变呢？
HYP: How exactly does director Dapeng face this "providence", and how should he continue to welcome the changes brought about by this providence?

SRC: 毫无疑问《吉祥如意》是充满实验性的，几乎全素人的阵容和创新的视听风格将镜头前的生活变成了一部电影，在真实影像的包裹下，观众也会从影片所呈现的家庭中找到自己和家人的影子，随着影片中这场家庭聚会的落幕，唤起一系列思考。
HYP: There is no doubt that "good luck" is full of experimentation. The almost all-round lineup and innovative audio-visual style turn the life in front of the camera into a movie. Under the package of real images, the audience will also find the shadow of themselves and their families in the family presented in the film, and evoke a series of thoughts with the end of this family gathering in the film.

SRC: NEWS.GOV.MO: 新型冠状病毒感染应变协调中心查询热线统计数字(7月25日08H00-7月26日08H00)
HYP: NEWS.GOV.MO: New Coronavirus Infection Response Coordination Center Enquiry Hotline Statistics (July 25, 08H00-July 26, 08H00)

SRC: 由2020年07月25日08H00 至7月26日08H00，新型冠状病毒感染应变协调中心的查询热线共接获292宗电话查询。
HYP: From 08H00 on July 25 to 08H00 on July 26, 2020, the enquiry hotline of the New Coronavirus Infection Response Coordination Center received 292 phone enquiries.

SRC: 关于疫情的291宗查询，已即时转线至相关部门代表跟进，情况如下：
HYP: 291 enquiries about the epidemic have been immediately transferred to representatives of relevant departments for follow-up, as follows:

SRC: 卫生局271宗(涉及：查询关于隔离；查询核酸检测；查询两地牌；健康码；其他。）
HYP: 271 cases from the Health Bureau (involving: Inquiring about isolation; inquiring about nucleic acid testing; inquiring about two cards; health codes; other.)

SRC: 治安警察局17宗(涉及：查询出入境措施；查询粤澳两地牌车辆出入境措施；查询珠海政务热线；查询证件逗留问题。）
HYP: 17 cases from the Public Security Police (involving: Inquiring about immigration measures; inquiring about immigration measures for licensed vehicles from Guangdong and Macao; inquiring about the Zhuhai government hotline; inquiring about document stay issues.)

SRC: 旅游局1宗(涉及：查询隔离酒店问题。）
HYP: 1 case from the Tourism Bureau (involving: Inquiring about the problem of isolated hotels.)

SRC: 教育暨青年局1宗(涉及：查询澳门学生返回英国读书的方法。）
HYP: 1 case from the Education and Youth Affairs Bureau (involving: Inquiring about the method of Macao students returning to study in the United Kingdom.)

SRC: 海事及水务局1宗(涉及：询问香港渔船进港是否需要向海事及水务局申报及核酸检测相关事宜。）
HYP: 1 case from the Maritime and Water Affairs Bureau (involving: Asking whether Hong Kong fishing vessels entering Hong Kong need to report to the Maritime and Water Affairs Bureau and nucleic acid testing-related matters.)

SRC: 马里尼切夫说，价值的变化受卢布贬值和疫情等影响。
HYP: Marinichev said that the change in value is affected by the devaluation of the ruble and the epidemic.

SRC: 他说“服务成本正在增加。
HYP: He said, "The cost of services is increasing.

SRC: 由于疫情，人们开始在互联网上花费更多的时间。”
HYP: Due to the epidemic, people are beginning to spend more time on the Internet. "

SRC: 马里尼切夫不排除年互联网价格将严重上涨，认为运营商可以为客户提供更高的速度和更多服务抵消人们对价格上涨的不满。
HYP: Marinichev does not rule out that annual Internet prices will rise significantly, believing that operators can provide customers with higher speeds and more services to offset people's dissatisfaction with price increases.

SRC: 《中国医生》筹拍致敬抗疫英雄-新华网
HYP: "Chinese Doctor" plans to pay tribute to the anti-epidemic hero-Xinhuanet

SRC: 近日，带着中国电影人对抗疫英雄的敬意，博纳影业集团董事长于冬、导演刘伟强(图左）在广州与钟南山院士，就抗疫题材影片《中国医生》的拍摄制作工作进行了座谈交流。
HYP: Recently, with the respect of Chinese filmmakers' heroes in the fight against the epidemic, Yu Dong, chairman of Bona Pictures Group, and Liu Weiqiang, director (picture left), held talks and exchanges with academician Zhong Nanshan in Guangzhou on the filming and production of the anti-epidemic film "Chinese Doctor."

SRC: 博纳影业希望能借由《中国医生》，向所有战斗在疫情防控一线的医护、防疫工作者致敬！
HYP: Bona Pictures hopes to pay tribute to all medical and epidemic prevention workers who are fighting on the front line of epidemic prevention and control through "Chinese Doctor"!

SRC: 2021年，该片将作为庆祝中国共产党建党100周年献礼影片全国公映。
HYP: In 2021, the film will be released nationwide as a tribute film celebrating the 100th anniversary of the founding of the Communist Party of China.

SRC: 目前，博纳影业正在中宣部和国家电影局的安排部署下，广东省电影局及湖北省电影局的支持下，组织电影《中国机长》原班人马筹拍电影《中国医生》，这是一部反映在党中央的坚强领导下，全国人民团结一心抗击新冠肺炎疫情的影片。
HYP: At present, Bona Pictures is organizing the original crew of the film "Captain of China" to make the film "Chinese Doctor" under the arrangements and deployment of the Central Propaganda Department and the National Film Bureau, with the support of the Guangdong Film Bureau and the Hubei Film Bureau. This is a film that reflects the unity of the people of the country to fight the new crown pneumonia epidemic under the strong leadership of the Party Central Committee.

SRC: 影片聚焦武汉抗疫一线，将以武汉医护人员及各省市援鄂医疗队为人物背景，从人性的角度，运用独特的叙事，以及极具冲击力的镜头语言，全景展现抗疫一线充满奉献和牺牲精神的中国医护人员的感人故事。
HYP: The film focuses on the front line of Wuhan's anti-epidemic, and will take Wuhan medical staff and provincial and municipal aid medical teams as the background of the characters. From the perspective of human nature, using unique narratives and highly impactful lens language, the panorama shows the touching story of Chinese medical staff full of dedication and sacrifice on the anti-epidemic front line.

SRC: 据了解，武汉解封之日的第一时间，博纳公司便克服重重困难，派出采拍小组深入疫情一线，与数百位医护工作者面对面交流了解、搜集资料，目前已经采访到了包括钟南山院士本人、广州驰援武汉第一人、广东援鄂医疗队，以及武汉金银潭医院、武汉协和医院、武汉大学中南医院、武汉中心医院等抗疫战线最前沿的白衣天使们，拍下了大量珍贵的第一手视频资料。
HYP: It is understood that at the first time on the day when Wuhan was unblocked, Bona Company overcame many difficulties and dispatched a shooting team to go deep into the front line of the epidemic, face-to-face exchanges with hundreds of medical workers to understand and collect information. At present, it has interviewed academician Zhong Nanshan himself, the first person from Guangzhou to aid Wuhan, the Guangdong aid to Hubei medical team, and the white-clothed angels at the forefront of the anti-epidemic front such as Wuhan Jinyintan Hospital, Wuhan Union Hospital, Wuhan University Zhongnan Hospital, Wuhan Central Hospital, etc., have photographed a large number of precious first-hand video materials.

SRC: 钟南山院士在此次座谈会中亦对电影的拍摄提出了期待和希望：“ 我很期待，希望你们不仅要走访一些抛头露面比较多的专家，还要更多地采访在一线埋头苦干的医务人员，他们是大多数。”
HYP: Academician Zhong Nanshan also raised expectations and hopes for the filming of the film at this symposium: "I am looking forward to it, and I hope that you will not only visit some experts who have made more public appearances, but also interview more medical staff who are working hard on the front line, they are the majority."

SRC: 他表示，他之前看过《我和我的祖国》《中国机长》，认为以普通人视角讲述大格局故事的方法就很好。
HYP: He said that he had seen "I and My Motherland" and "Chinese Captain" before and thought that the way to tell the big pattern story from the perspective of ordinary people is very good.

SRC: “现在一些国外朋友对中国还是有一些误解。”
HYP: "Now some foreign friends still have some misunderstandings about China."

SRC: 在谈到影片的传播时，钟南山院士表示，目前国外有些人喜欢将病毒贴上政治化标签，他希望电影能从人性的角度打动观众：“ 这部电影除了在中国放映以外，最好也能在国外放映，要用国内外观众都能理解的方式，用真正的人文精神打动观众。”
HYP: When talking about the dissemination of the film, academician Zhong Nanshan said that at present some people in foreign countries like to label the virus as politicized, and he hopes that the film can impress the audience from the perspective of human nature: "In addition to being shown in China, it is best to show it abroad. It is necessary to impress the audience with a true humanistic spirit in a way that both domestic and foreign audiences can understand."

SRC: 钟南山院士还深情回忆了上世纪80年代的影片《人到中年》，“这么多年过去了，我对改革开放后电影印象最深的还是《人到中年》，当时我国外的医生朋友们都看哭了，如果《中国医生》能够起到这样的作用，那就很了不起了。”
HYP: Academician Zhong Nanshan also fondly recalled the film "Man to Middle Age" from the 1980s. "After so many years, what impressed me most about the film after the reform and opening up was" Man to Middle Age. "At that time, my doctors and friends abroad were crying. If" Chinese Doctor "could play such a role, it would be great."

SRC: 钟南山院士表示，如果《中国医生》能引起国外观众的共鸣，那就非常成功。
HYP: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that if "Chinese Doctor" can resonate with foreign audiences, it will be very successful.

SRC: 在座谈交流时，钟南山院士还分享了对当前国际疫情防控的意见和建议，“ 我相信人永远比病毒聪明。”
HYP: During the discussion and exchange, academician Zhong Nanshan also shared his opinions and suggestions on the current international epidemic prevention and control. "I believe that people are always smarter than viruses."

SRC: 钟南山院士表示，虽说病毒难以预测，但从原始社会至今，人类已渡过了千难万险，如今现代社会有发达的医疗科技和社会管理措施，再加上全世界的医务人员、甚至老百姓都对科学应对新冠肺炎疫情有了基本认识，人们不会再像以前那么被动，“接下来要注意两个方面的工作，一是要研究全世界怎么加强合作，二是注重对人们心灵的抚慰” 。
HYP: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that although the virus is difficult to predict, since the primitive society, mankind has weathered thousands of difficulties and dangers. Today, modern society has developed medical technology and social management measures, coupled with medical staff and even ordinary people all over the world have a basic understanding of the scientific response to the new crown pneumonia epidemic. People will no longer be as passive as before. "Next, we must pay attention to two aspects of work, one is to study how the world can strengthen cooperation, and the other is to pay attention to the comfort of people's hearts."

SRC: （记者王金跃）
HYP: (Reporter Wang Jinyue)

SRC: 文旅“红果”聚韶山—湘潭首届红博会见闻-今日要闻-湖南日报网-华声在线
HYP: Cultural Travel "Red Fruit" Gathers Shaoshan-Xiangtan First Red Fair - Today's Highlights-Hunan Daily News Network-Huaxing Online

SRC: 湖南日报·新湖南客户端记者蒋睿通讯员肖燕
HYP: Hunan Daily, New Hunan Client Reporter Jiang Rui, Correspondent Xiao Yan

SRC: 嘉兴红船模具、韶山毛泽东铜像、延安布堆花工艺品、湘西永顺腊肉…… 7月25日，2020湖南红色旅游文化节在韶山开幕。
HYP: Jiaxing Red Boat Mould, Shaoshan Mao Zedong Bronze Statue, Yanan Budui Flower Crafts, Xiangxi Yongshun bacon... On July 25, the 2020 Hunan Red Tourism Cultural Festival opened in Shaoshan.

SRC: 作为主体活动之一，湘潭首届红色文化产业博览会在韶山全域旅游咨询集散中心开展。
HYP: As one of the main activities, the first Xiangtan Red Cultural Industry Expo was launched in the Shaoshan Global Tourism Consulting and Distribution Center.

SRC: 展览区红色文创产品、革命老区土特产品等琳琅满目，引来各地游客争相购买。
HYP: The exhibition area is full of red cultural and creative products and native products of the old revolutionary areas, attracting tourists from all over the world to buy them.

SRC: “此次红博会，既是全国红色文化产业成果的一次展示，也是参展单位和企业交流经验、探讨发展路径的一个重要平台。”
HYP: "This Red Fair is not only a display of the achievements of the national red cultural industry, but also an important platform for exhibitors and enterprises to exchange experiences and explore development paths."

SRC: 湘潭首届红博会执委会相关负责人介绍，这届红博会以“弘扬红色文化助推文旅升温”为主题，展览总面积近3000平方米，设置了氛围营造区、景区展示展陈区和红色文旅网游网购体验区。
HYP: The relevant person in charge of the executive committee of the first Xiangtan Red Fair introduced that the theme of this Red Fair is "Promoting red culture to help push the warming of cultural tourism." The total exhibition area is nearly 3000 square meters, and an atmosphere construction area, a scenic spot exhibition area and a red cultural travel online shopping experience area have been set up.

SRC: 邀请浙江嘉兴、贵州遵义、陕西延安等8个外省<v>地</v>市以及我省长沙、株洲、岳阳、郴州等地137家企业、单位参展，共展出展品768种，包括红色文物、工艺品、食品特产、旅游线路、红色培训课程、红色文创产品等。
HYP: Invited 8 other provinces and cities including Jiaxing, Zhejiang, Zunyi, Guizhou, and Yan'an, Shaanxi, as well as 137 enterprises and units from Changsha, Zhuzhou, Yueyang, Chenzhou and other places in our province to participate in the exhibition. A total of 768 exhibits were exhibited, including red cultural relics, handicrafts, food specialties, tourism routes, red training courses, red cultural and creative products, etc.

SRC: 邀请浙江嘉兴、贵州遵义、陕西延安等8个外省地市以及我省长沙、株洲、岳阳、郴州等地137家企业、单位参展，共展出展品768种，包括红色文物、工艺品、食品特产、旅游线路、红色培训课程、红色文创产品等。
HYP: Invited 8 other provinces and cities including Jiaxing, Zhejiang, Zunyi, Guizhou, and Yan'an, Shaanxi, as well as 137 enterprises and units from Changsha, Zhuzhou, Yueyang, Chenzhou and other places in our province to participate in the exhibition. A total of 768 exhibits were exhibited, including red cultural relics, handicrafts, food specialties, tourism routes, red training courses, red cultural and creative products, etc.

SRC: 展销区将展至7月29日。
HYP: The exhibition area will be on until July 29.

SRC: 作为红博会东道主，湘潭展区亮点纷呈。
HYP: As the host of the Red Expo, the Xiangtan exhibition area is full of bright spots.

SRC: 展区负责人介绍，湘潭展区分为红色工业、红色文化产业发展两大部分。
HYP: The person in charge of the exhibition area introduced that the Xiangtan exhibition area is divided into two parts: Red industry and red cultural industry development.

SRC: 红色工业展区展出华菱湘钢、华菱线缆、湘电动力等6家企业的展品31件，红色文化产业发展展区展出红色系列图书、红色系列食品、红色系列文创产品等27家单位产品近200个。
HYP: The red industrial exhibition area exhibited 31 exhibits from 6 companies including Valin Xianggang, Valin Cable, and Xiang Electric Power. The red cultural industry development exhibition area exhibited nearly 200 products from 27 units including red series of books, red series of foods, and red series of cultural and creative products.

SRC: 在延安展区，不少游客被陈展的布堆花手工艺品和剪纸艺术品所吸引。
HYP: In the Yan'an exhibition area, many tourists are attracted by the displayed cloth pile flower crafts and paper-cut works of art.

SRC: 延安市文旅局局长马东坡介绍，此次参展精心选择了延安近两年来优秀的红色文创产品，其中16种产品是2019全国红色文创产品优秀作品。
HYP: Ma Dongpo, director of the Yan'an Cultural and Tourism Bureau, introduced that the exhibition carefully selected Yan'an's outstanding red cultural and creative products in the past two years, of which 16 products are outstanding works of national red cultural and creative products in 2019.

SRC: 同时，他们邀请了国家级非物质文化遗产保护项目“安塞剪纸”、“陕北民歌”与省级非遗项目延川布堆画传承人，重点推介延安民俗特色产品，并借此机会与其他展区单位企业沟通交流，推动跨区域合作。
HYP: At the same time, they invited the national intangible cultural heritage protection project "Anse Paper-cutting", "Northern Shaanxi Folk Song" and the provincial non-heritage project Yanchuan Budui painting inheritors, focusing on the promotion of Yanan folk custom products, and took this opportunity to communicate with other exhibition area units and enterprises to promote cross-regional cooperation.

SRC: 膜分离技术助力破解“温室效应” - 中新网
HYP: Membrane separation technology helps crack the "greenhouse effect "-Chinanews.com

SRC: 膜分离技术助力破解“温室效应”
HYP: Membrane separation technology helps crack the "greenhouse effect"

SRC: 新型混合基质膜制备技术示意图
HYP: Schematic diagram of new hybrid matrix membrane preparation technology

SRC: 本报讯记者商瑞报道：日前，天津大学大气环境与生物能源团队针对“膜分离法捕集二氧化碳”取得重大进展，成功研发出新型混合基质膜制备技术，大幅提升膜材料二氧化碳捕集性能。
HYP: Our reporter Shang Rui reported: Recently, the Tianjin University Atmospheric Environment and Bioenergy Team has made significant progress on the "membrane separation method to capture carbon dioxide" and has successfully developed a new hybrid matrix membrane preparation technology, which greatly improves the carbon dioxide capture performance of membrane materials.

SRC: 相关成果已作为国际期刊《温室气体：科学与技术》封面文章发表。
HYP: The relevant results have been published as the cover article of the international journal "Greenhouse Gas: Science and Technology."

SRC: “温室效应”是困扰人类发展的重大环境问题，二氧化碳排放则是造成“温室效应”的元凶。
HYP: The "greenhouse effect" is a major environmental problem that plagues human development, and carbon dioxide emissions are the culprit responsible for the "greenhouse effect."

SRC: 如何高效捕获并利用人类排放的二氧化碳是科学家关注的焦点。
HYP: How to efficiently capture and use carbon dioxide emitted by humans is the focus of attention of scientists.

SRC: “膜分离法”是一种新兴的二氧化碳捕集技术，它在膜材料帮助下分离二氧化碳气体，具有高效节能、操作简单的特点。
HYP: "Membrane separation method" is an emerging carbon dioxide capture technology. It separates carbon dioxide gas with the help of membrane materials, and has the characteristics of high efficiency, energy saving and simple operation.

SRC: 如何让膜材料“深呼吸”， 提高气体分离效率，是采用膜分离法捕集二氧化碳的瓶颈难点。
HYP: How to let the membrane material "breathe deeply" and improve the efficiency of gas separation is the bottleneck difficulty in capturing carbon dioxide by membrane separation method.

SRC: 天津大学科研团队创新思路，通过反复实验，探究不同溶剂对膜气体分离性能的影响。
HYP: The scientific research team of Tianjin University innovated ideas and explored the influence of different solvents on membrane gas separation performance through repeated experiments.

SRC: 实验结果表明，以N-甲基吡咯烷酮作为制备溶剂，生成的膜材料中碳纳米管分布更加均匀，“更透气”，有效提升了膜材料气体分离效能和速率。
HYP: The experimental results show that with N-methylpyrrolidone as the preparation solvent, the carbon nanotubes in the produced membrane material are more evenly distributed and "more breathable", which effectively improves the gas separation efficiency and rate of the membrane material.

SRC: 用这种新技术制备的混合基质膜，二氧化碳分离性能接近目前此类膜材料的理论分离上限。
HYP: The carbon dioxide separation performance of the mixed matrix membrane prepared with this new technology is close to the current theoretical separation upper limit of such membrane materials.

SRC: “新技术为膜分离法捕集二氧化碳提供了新思路。”
HYP: "New technology provides new ideas for membrane separation to capture carbon dioxide."

SRC: 天津大学大气环境与生物能源团队成员李润表示：“ 我们希望这种技术能够为未来燃煤电厂与化工企业处理烟气提供有力支持，在控制温室气体排放等领域发挥重大作用。”
HYP: Li Run, a member of the atmospheric environment and bioenergy team of Tianjin University, said: "We hope that this technology can provide strong support for coal-fired power plants and chemical companies to process flue gas in the future, and play a major role in controlling greenhouse gas emissions."

SRC: 首度成立专委会、集体签“长约” 第三届进博会参展商联盟构筑“进博纽带” - 新华网
HYP: For the first time, a special committee was set up to collectively sign the "long contract" of the 3rd CIIE Exhibitor Alliance to build a "blog link" -Xinhuanet

SRC: 7月26日在上海拍摄的第三届进博会参展商联盟第一次会议现场。
HYP: The scene of the first meeting of the 3rd CIIE Exhibitors Alliance filmed in Shanghai on July 26.

SRC: 新华社上海7月26日电（记者周蕊）26日，第三届进口博览会参展商联盟在此间首次成立专业委员会，首批成立的专委会包括公共卫生防疫专委会和乳业专委会，35家成员企业还签订了3年长期参展合作备忘录，进博会参展商联盟的纽带作用不断增强。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Shanghai, July 26 (Reporter Zhou Rui) On the 26th, the 3rd Import Expo Exhibitor Alliance established a professional committee for the first time here. The first batch of special committees established include the Public Health and Epidemic Prevention Committee and the Dairy Industry Special Committee. 35 member companies have also signed a 3-year long-term exhibition cooperation memorandum, and the link role of the CIIE Exhibitor Alliance has been continuously strengthened.

SRC: 26日在此间举行的第三届进博会参展商联盟第一次会议上，韩国现代、美国陶氏化学、日本资生堂、新西兰纽仕兰、德国西门子、法国米其林、英国阿斯利康等一批展盟成员企业签订了3年长期参展合作备忘录，修订和完善后的展盟章程也首次公布。
HYP: At the first meeting of the 3rd CIIE Exhibitor Alliance held here on the 26th, Hyundai Korea, Dow Chemical of the United States, Shiseido of Japan, New Zealand New Zealand, Siemens of Germany, Michelin of France, and AstraZeneca of the United Kingdom signed a 3-year long-term participation memorandum of cooperation, and the revised and improved articles of association were also announced for the first time.

SRC: 7月26日在上海拍摄的乳业专业委员会成立仪式现场。
HYP: The scene of the establishment ceremony of the Dairy Professional Committee, filmed in Shanghai on July 26.

SRC: 根据最新的章程，展盟将引入牵头单位轮值机制，加强专委会功能。
HYP: According to the latest constitution, the exhibition union will introduce the rotation mechanism of the lead unit to strengthen the function of the special committee.

SRC: 专委会将为行业发展趋势分析提出建议，推动行业可持续发展。
HYP: The special committee will put forward suggestions for the analysis of industry development trends and promote the sustainable development of the industry.

SRC: 同时，整合行业全产业链资源，以大带小，带动关联企业参展，将进博会打造成为行业企业聚集高地。
HYP: At the same time, integrate the resources of the entire industrial chain of the industry, drive associated companies to participate in the exhibition, and build the CIIE into a gathering place for industry enterprises.

SRC: 首次成立公共卫生防疫专委会，对于当前抗击新冠肺炎疫情来说显得尤为重要。
HYP: The establishment of a public health and epidemic prevention committee for the first time is particularly important for the current fight against the new crown pneumonia epidemic.

SRC: 作为第三届进博会公共卫生防疫专委会副会长单位，雅培快速诊断业务大中华区总经理仇建平说，下一步，雅培会携手更多行业伙伴，探索新的解决方案和合作模式，助力中国以及全世界抗击新冠肺炎疫情。
HYP: As the vice chairman unit of the Public Health and Epidemic Prevention Committee of the 3rd CIIE, Fu Jianping, general manager of Abbott's rapid diagnosis business in Greater China, said that in the next step, Abbott will work with more industry partners to explore new solutions and cooperation models to help China and the world fight the new crown pneumonia epidemic.

SRC: 7月26日在上海拍摄的公共卫生防疫专业委员会成立仪式现场。
HYP: The scene of the establishment ceremony of the Public Health and Epidemic Prevention Professional Committee filmed in Shanghai on July 26.

SRC: 据悉，第三届进博会首次设立公共卫生防疫专区，截至目前已有近50家全球企业报名参展，展览面积超过1万平方米。
HYP: It is reported that the 3rd CIIE established a special area for public health and epidemic prevention for the first time. As of now, nearly 50 global companies have signed up for the exhibition, with an exhibition area of more than 10000 square meters.

SRC: 在2018年首届进博会期间，进博会参展商联盟由展商自发倡议成立，旨在成为优质参展企业交流合作平台、连接参展各方信息与资源共享平台，以及为促进中国与世界各国（地区）之间经贸商务往来与发展建言献策的智囊平台。
HYP: During the first CIIE in 2018, the CIIE Exhibitor Alliance was established at the initiative of the exhibitors. It aims to become an exchange and cooperation platform for high-quality exhibitors, a platform for information and resource sharing among all exhibitors, and a think tank platform for promoting economic, trade and business exchanges and development between China and other countries (regions) around the world.

SRC: 截至目前，已有142家企业加入参展商联盟，覆盖全球23个国家和地区。
HYP: So far, 142 companies have joined the Exhibitor Alliance, covering 23 countries and regions around the world.

SRC: 比利时3岁女童死于新冠病毒感染-新华网
HYP: 3-year-old girl in Belgium died of new crown virus infection-Xinhuanet

SRC: 比利时卫生部门24日说，一名3岁女童死于新冠病毒感染，是该国最年幼的新冠病亡患者。
HYP: The Belgian health department said on the 24th that a 3-year-old girl died of a new crown virus infection and was the youngest person in the country to die of new crown disease.

SRC: 比利时卫生部门发言人布德温·卡特里说，这名女童感染新冠病毒前已经有其他严重疾病；除了这名女童，近期还有一名18岁青年死于新冠病毒感染。
HYP: Belgian health department spokesman Budwin Kateri said that the girl already had other serious diseases before contracting the new crown virus; in addition to this girl, an 18-year-old recently died of the new crown virus infection.

SRC: 卡特里说，上周比利时85%新增新冠确诊人员年龄在60岁以下。
HYP: Katri said that 85% of newly diagnosed new crowns in Belgium last week were under 60 years old.

SRC: 他提醒身体健康、年龄较轻的民众不要掉以轻心。
HYP: He reminded people who are healthy and younger not to take it lightly.

SRC: “虽然年轻人死于新冠病毒感染的情况较为罕见，但没有任何人现在具备免疫力。 ”
HYP: "Although it is rare for young people to die from new crown virus infection, no one is now immune."

SRC: 上周，比利时新增新冠确诊病例比前一周增长89 % ， 每日平均2.9人死于新冠病毒感染，高于前一周的日均1.7人。
HYP: Last week, the number of new confirmed cases of new crowns in Belgium increased by 89% over the previous week, and an average of 2.9 people died of the new crown virus infection every day, up from the daily average of 1.7 people in the previous week.

SRC: 欧洲疫情高峰期间，比利时人口中新冠病毒感染者占比在欧洲“名列前茅” 。
HYP: During the peak of the epidemic in Europe, the proportion of people infected with the new crown virus in the Belgian population was "among the best" in Europe.

SRC: 比利时有1100多万人口。
HYP: Belgium has a population of more than 11 million.

SRC: 最新数据显示，比利时累计64847人感染新冠病毒。
HYP: The latest data shows that a total of 64847 people in Belgium have been infected with the new crown virus.

SRC: 卡特里本周早些时候警告，在雪球越滚越大、最终造成“雪崩”前，人们必须采取行动。
HYP: Carter warned earlier this week that people must take action before the snowballs get bigger and bigger and eventually cause an "avalanche."

SRC: 为抑制疫情反弹，比利时首相索菲·维尔梅斯23日宣布，人们在公共场所佩戴口罩的有关规定将更加严格，8月进一步解除限制性措施的方案也将暂缓执行。
HYP: In order to curb the rebound of the epidemic, Belgian Prime Minister Sophie Vermes announced on the 23rd that the relevant regulations for people to wear masks in public places will be stricter, and the plan to further lift restrictive measures in August will also be suspended.

SRC: （郭倩） 【 新华社微特稿】
HYP: (Guo Qian) [Xinhua News Agency micro-feature]

SRC: 大型融媒体行动《走村直播看脱贫》出发- 今日要闻- 湖南日报网- 华声在线
HYP: Large-scale financial media action "Walking the Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation" Start-Today's Highlights-Hunan Daily News Network-Huaxing Online

SRC: 湖南日报·新湖南客户端7月25日讯(本报记者)7月25日，由中央广播电视总台财经节目中心主办的大型融媒体行动《走村直播看脱贫》从江苏徐州出发，两辆携带5G新媒体移动云制播系统的大篷车在现场嘉宾目送下，缓缓驶出现场。
HYP: Hunan Daily, New Hunan Client, July 25 (Reporter from this newspaper) On July 25, the large-scale financial media operation "Walking the Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation" hosted by the Financial Program Center of China Central Radio and Television set out from Xuzhou, Jiangsu. Two caravans carrying a 5G new media mobile cloud production and broadcasting system were seen by guests at the scene and drove slowly out of the scene.

SRC: 习近平总书记指出，“2020年是具有里程碑意义的一年，我们将全面建成小康社会，实现第一个百年奋斗目标，2020年也是脱贫攻坚决战决胜之年”。
HYP: General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out that "2020 is a landmark year. We will build a moderately prosperous society in an all-round way and achieve the first centenary goal. 2020 is also a year of decisive victory in the fight against poverty."

SRC: 大型融媒体行动《走村直播看脱贫》是中央广播电视总台财经节目中心为配合这一重大主题，做好脱贫攻坚宣传的重要举措。
HYP: The large-scale financial media operation "Walking the Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation" is an important measure taken by the Finance Program Center of China Central Radio and Television to cooperate with this major theme and do a good job in poverty alleviation.

SRC: 该行动将走进全国20多个省、自治区、直辖市的脱贫村，挖掘鲜活脱贫故事，直击村容村貌巨变，展现村民如何突破生存发展困境、走向致富之路的历程。
HYP: This action will go into poverty alleviation villages in more than 20 provinces, autonomous regions, and municipalities across the country, dig out living poverty alleviation stories, directly attack the dramatic changes in the appearance of the village, and show how villagers can break through the dilemma of survival and development and move towards the road to wealth.

SRC: 这次行动将持续3个多月。
HYP: This operation will last more than 3 months.

SRC: 记者从徐州出发，兵分两路，一路走西南线，途经安徽、湖北、江西、湖南、广西、贵州、四川、重庆、云南、西藏等地;另一路走西北线，途经河南、陕西、甘肃、青海、新疆、宁夏、内蒙古、山西、河北等地，行程超过1万公里。
HYP: The reporter set out from Xuzhou and took two routes, all the way to the southwest line, passing through Anhui, Hubei, Jiangxi, Hunan, Guangxi, Guizhou, Sichuan, Chongqing, Yunnan, Tibet and other places; the other way to the northwest line, passing through Henan, Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Xinjiang, Ningxia, Inner Mongolia, Shanxi, Hebei and other places, the journey exceeds 10000 kilometers.

SRC: 在报道形式上，《走村直播看脱贫》大胆融合。
HYP: In terms of reporting format, "Walking the Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation" is a bold fusion.

SRC: 大篷车所到村庄的经济发展情况，都将通过中央广播电视总台央视财经频道、央广经济之声、中国交通广播、央视财经新媒体进行播出。
HYP: The economic development of the villages visited by the caravan will be broadcast through CCTV Finance Channel, CCTV Economic Voice, China Communications Broadcasting, and CCTV Financial New Media.

SRC: 其中，电视直播将主要在央视财经频道的午间新闻节目《天下财经》完成(首播时间：周一至周日12：00-13:00 )，央视财经频道的黄金档新闻栏目《经济信息联播》将开设脱贫报道专栏(首播时间：周一至周日20：30-21:30 )。
HYP: Among them, the live TV broadcast will be completed mainly on the noon news program "World Finance" of CCTV Finance Channel (first broadcast time: Monday to Sunday 12: 00-13: 00), and the golden news section "Economic Information Network" of CCTV Finance Channel will open a column for poverty alleviation reports (first broadcast time: Monday to Sunday 20: 30-21: 30).

SRC: 同时，大篷车将对所到的每个村庄在央视财经客户端进行长达1小时的直播，观众通过下载央视财经APP，可以观看直播，参与抽奖活动。
HYP: At the same time, the caravan will conduct a 1-hour live broadcast on the CCTV Finance client for each village it visits. By downloading CCTV Finance APP, the audience can watch the live broadcast and participate in the raffle.

SRC: 在技术应用和演播室设计上，《 走村直播看脱贫》勇于突破，首创了“外场新媒体大篷车”。
HYP: In terms of technology application and studio design, "Walking the Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation" has the courage to make a breakthrough and pioneered the "Outfield New Media Caravan."

SRC: 该车搭载5G新媒体移动云制播系统，利用5G+4K/8K+AI技术，实现线上线下、大屏小屏，电视广播的有机结合。
HYP: The car is equipped with a 5G new media mobile cloud production and broadcasting system, and uses 5G + 4K / 8K + AI technology to achieve an organic combination of online and offline, large and small screens, and television broadcasting.

SRC: 配置三讯演播区，演播区由集装箱改装而成，长12米、宽2.55米、高3.98米，箱体采用液压自动展开结构，最大可以上翻120度。
HYP: Equipped with a Sanxun broadcast area, the broadcast area is converted from a container, with a length of 12 meters, a width of 2.55 meters, and a height of 3.98 meters. The box adopts a hydraulic automatic expansion structure, which can be turned up to 120 degrees.

SRC: 演播区也可以自动展开，并外接扩展平台，面积50多平方米，可以满足大部分节目的场景要求。
HYP: The broadcast area can also be expanded automatically, with an external expansion platform, with an area of more than 50 square meters, which can meet the scene requirements of most programs.

SRC: 张继科林小宅组队力挺有肌少年-新华网
HYP: Zhang Jike Lin Xiaozhai Team Supports Muscular Teenager - Xinhuanet

SRC: 运动少年热血竞技秀《运动吧少年》在7月11日正式登陆湖南卫视。
HYP: Sports Youth Hot-blooded Competition Show "Sports Bar Youth" officially landed on Hunan Satellite TV on July 11.

SRC: 运动领队张继科和运动助理林小宅跨界同台,林丹和傅园慧点评各有风格,而“庞然大物”般的力量拔杆装置的硬核上场,更让节目“燃”力十足。
HYP: Zhang Jike, the sports leader, and Lin Xiaozhai, the sports assistant, cross the border on the same stage. Lin Dan and Fu Yuanhui commented on each other with their own styles, and the hard core of the "monster" like power pulling device came on stage, which made the program "burning".

SRC: 首集中,11位运动少年亮相力量赛道,外形惊艳现场观众的同时,竞技台上的“强冲突”“强对抗”“强心脏”也受到关注。
HYP: In the first episode, 11 sports teenagers appeared on the power track, and their appearance amazed the audience. At the same time, the "strong conflict", "strong confrontation" and "strong heart" on the arena also attracted attention.

SRC: 其中,“ 强冲突”来自超A体育生乔文一,他在比赛前公然挑衅<v>同</v>赛道中有“花美男”之称的徐志滨,呛声徐志滨的外形条件应该去唱跳节目,甚至放出“输了别把妆哭花了”的狠话。
HYP: Among them, the "strong conflict" comes from Qiao Wenyi, a super A sports student. Before the competition, he openly challenged Xu Zhibin, who is known as "beautiful boy" on the track, choking that Xu Zhibin's appearance conditions should sing and dance programs, and even released the vicious words of "Don't cry your makeup if you lose".

SRC: 其中,“ 强冲突”来自超A体育生乔文一,他在比赛前公然挑衅同赛道中有“花美男”之称的徐志滨,呛声徐志滨的外形条件应该去唱跳节目,甚至放出“输了别把妆哭花了”的狠话。
HYP: Among them, the "strong conflict" comes from Qiao Wenyi, a super A sports student. Before the competition, he openly challenged Xu Zhibin, who is known as "beautiful boy" on the track, choking that Xu Zhibin's appearance conditions should sing and dance programs, and even released the vicious words of "Don't cry your makeup if you lose".

SRC: 一番言论让场上的少年和运动领队们都倒吸一口凉气。
HYP: Some remarks made the teenagers and sports leaders on the court gasp.

SRC: 而“强对抗”更像是神仙打架,被誉为“大魔王”的孙健淇碰上同样实力强劲的张鑫栋,上演强强对决。
HYP: The "strong confrontation" is more like a fairy fight. Sun Jianqi, known as the "Great Demon King", meets Zhang Xindong, who is also strong, and staged a strong confrontation.

SRC: 而他们的身份也让人始料未及,孙健淇是热爱健身的演员,张鑫栋则是退役特战队员、三次勇士勋章获得者。
HYP: Their identities are also unexpected. Sun Jianqi is an actor who loves fitness, while Zhang Xindong is a retired special operations member and a three-time winner of the Warrior Medal.

SRC: 比赛一开始,两位少年就拼尽全力快速拔出小杆,在大杆上的持久对抗让现场观众为他们捏了一把汗。
HYP: At the beginning of the competition, the two teenagers tried their best to pull out the small pole quickly, and the lasting confrontation on the big pole made the audience sweat for them.

SRC: 在紧张的赛况下,张继科作为《运动吧少年》运动领队之一,也在一旁认真观战。
HYP: Under the tense competition conditions, Zhang Jike, as one of the sports leaders of "Sports Bar Youth", also watched the game carefully.

SRC: 在点评环节,他也十分细心,对输了比赛的一方少年耐心鼓励,帮助复盘过程中的每一个失误点。
HYP: In the comment session, he was also very careful, patiently encouraging the teenager who lost the game and helping every mistake in the process of resuming the game.

SRC: 而运动助理林小宅则是花式助攻,她毫不掩饰对颜值实力在线的少年们的欣赏。
HYP: Lin Xiaozhai, a sports assistant, is a fancy assist, and she makes no secret of her appreciation for the teenagers who are online.

SRC: 在了解到运动少年们超负荷的日常训练时,更是心生敬佩。
HYP: When learning about the overloaded daily training of sports teenagers, they are even more admired.

SRC: 同样是运动领队的林丹和傅园慧则各有风格,一个是气定神闲派“预言家” , 一个则是用笑容驱散紧张氛围的“洪荒少女” 。
HYP: Lin Dan and Fu Yuanhui, who are also sports leaders, have their own styles. One is a calm "prophet", and the other is a "wild girl" who dispels tension with a smile.

SRC: 另外,吉克隽逸和刘烨作为运动助理,也围绕运动少年制造了不少爆笑话题。
HYP: In addition, Ji Ke Junyi and Liu Ye, as sports assistants, have also created many hilarious topics around sports teenagers.

SRC: 法国南特教堂大火：教区志愿者承认纵火平时和善寡言-中新网
HYP: Church fire in Nantes, France: parish volunteers admit arson is usually kind and taciturn

SRC: 法国南特教堂大火：教区志愿者承认纵火平时和善寡言-<v>中新网</v>
HYP: Church fire in Nantes, France: parish volunteers admit arson is usually kind and taciturn

SRC: 中新网7月26日电据外媒报道，7月18日，法国南特的宗教历史建筑瑰宝、著名的圣彼得与圣保罗大教堂，在一场火灾当中受到严重损毁，大管风琴完全毁坏。
HYP: BEIJING, July 26 According to foreign media reports, on July 18, the famous Cathedral of St. Peter and St. Paul, a treasure of religious and historical buildings in Nantes, France, was seriously damaged in a fire, and the grand organ was completely destroyed.

SRC: 当地时间26日，南特检察官宣布，一名在大教堂当中负责保卫工作的教区志愿者已经被起诉，罪名是“纵火毁坏” 。
HYP: On the 26th local time, Nantes prosecutors announced that a parish volunteer in charge of security work in the cathedral had been charged with "arson and destruction".

SRC: 他已承认，是自己在教堂里点火。
HYP: He has admitted that he started the fire in the church.

SRC: 报道称，当地检察官塞纳斯表示，这名39岁、来自卢旺达的教区志愿者承认，自己夜里在大教堂当中的三处点火。
HYP: According to the report, local prosecutor Senas said that the 39-year-old parish volunteer from Rwanda admitted that he set fire to three places in the cathedral at night.

SRC: 此人的律师则表示，纵火者现在很后悔做出这种事。
HYP: The person's lawyer said that the arsonist now regrets doing such a thing.

SRC: 此人几年前通过避难的途径，进入法国，在本次火灾事发地教区得到庇护，在教堂里得到收留。
HYP: This person entered France through asylum a few years ago, was sheltered in the parish where the fire occurred and taken in in the church.

SRC: 检方指出，最近，他尝试更新签证，正在和警察局对此进行对话沟通。
HYP: Prosecutors pointed out that recently, he tried to renew his visa and was in dialogue with the police station.

SRC: 但教堂方面表示仍然不敢相信，这名平时非常善良、面带笑容，但不怎么说话的信徒，会毁坏他如此热爱的教堂。
HYP: However, the church said it still couldn't believe that this usually very kind, smiling but quiet believer would destroy the church he loved so much.

SRC: 7月18日火灾发生的当天，这名志愿者就已经因为叙述当中出现逻辑不通的问题，而接受过警方问询调查，但他后来被释放。
HYP: On the day of the fire on July 18, the volunteer had already been questioned and investigated by the police because of illogical problems in the narrative, but he was later released.

SRC: 图为消防员在现场进行救援。
HYP: The picture shows firefighters rescuing at the scene.

SRC: 25日晚间，由于巴黎中央警察局实验室的专业工程师获取了新的证据，此人又再一次被传讯。
HYP: On the evening of the 25th, because professional engineers in the laboratory of the Paris Central Police Department obtained new evidence, this person was arraigned again.

SRC: 这一次，男子承认了自己纵火的行为。
HYP: This time, the man admitted his arson.

SRC: 据报道，如果蓄意纵火毁坏的罪名成立，嫌犯将可能面临10年监禁和15万欧元的罚款。
HYP: According to reports, if convicted of deliberate arson and destruction, the suspect may face 10 years in prison and a fine of 150000 euros.

SRC: 报道称，此次大火给圣皮埃尔与圣保罗大教堂造成了严重损失，教堂内的管风琴被完全烧毁，管风琴后面的彩色玻璃窗也受损严重。
HYP: According to the report, the fire caused serious losses to St. Pierre and St. Paul's Cathedral. The organ in the church was completely burned down, and the stained glass window behind the organ was also seriously damaged.

SRC: 法国历史保护建筑首席建筑师布鲁内认为，保守估计，南特大教堂复原工作至少要有3年。
HYP: Brunet, chief architect of French historic buildings, believes that it is conservatively estimated that the restoration of Nantes Cathedral will take at least three years.

SRC: 飓风“汉娜”登陆美得州或引发河水暴涨和山洪-中新网
HYP: Hurricane "Hannah" makes landfall in Texas or causes river surge and flash flood - Chinanews.com

SRC: 中新网7月26日电综合外媒报道，当地时间25日下午5时，飓风“汉娜”登陆美国得克萨斯州，将给得州带来强风暴雨、河水暴涨，还可能引发威胁生命的山洪。
HYP: BEIJING, July 26 (Xinhua) -According to comprehensive foreign media reports, Hurricane "Hannah" landed in Texas at 5:00 pm local time on the 25th, which will bring strong winds and torrential rain, soaring river water and possibly life-threatening flash floods to Texas.

SRC: 国家飓风中心说，预计飓风“汉娜”会挟带暴雨，扫过得州南部与东北部部分地区，雨势或引发部分溪水暴涨以及威胁生命的山洪爆发。
HYP: The National Hurricane Center said Hurricane Hannah is expected to carry heavy rain across parts of southern and northeastern Texas, which may cause some streams to surge and life-threatening flash floods.

SRC: 报道称，受飓风“汉娜”影响最严重的是科珀斯克里斯蒂市以南到格兰德河河口地区，而里奥格兰德山谷可能爆发大范围的山洪。
HYP: According to the report, the area most seriously affected by Hurricane Hannah is from the south of Corpus Christi to the mouth of the Rio Grande River, and large-scale flash floods may break out in the Rio Grande Valley.

SRC: 得州州长阿博特25日表示：“任何飓风都是一个巨大的挑战。”
HYP: Texas Governor Abbott said on the 25th: "Any hurricane is a huge challenge."

SRC: 该州有32个郡因为飓风进入灾难紧急状态。
HYP: Thirty-two counties in the state entered a disaster emergency because of the hurricane.

SRC: 科珀斯克里斯蒂市这座人口超32万的城市，已关闭图书馆与博物馆，居民严阵以待。
HYP: Corpus Christi, a city with a population of more than 320000, has closed libraries and museums, and residents are waiting.

SRC: 阿博特还说，在得州正在遭遇新冠疫情重创之际，不能再让这场飓风给得州带来更多伤亡。
HYP: Abbott also said that at a time when Texas is being hit hard by the COVID-19 epidemic, the hurricane cannot be allowed to bring more casualties to Texas.

SRC: 据报道，得州南部地区降水量预计将在26日夜间达到6至12英寸，得克萨斯州北部地区和路易斯安那州沿海地区也将出现3至5英寸的降雨。
