HYP: According to reports, rainfall in southern Texas is expected to reach 6 to 12 inches on the night of the 26th, and 3 to 5 inches of rainfall will also occur in northern Texas and coastal areas of Louisiana.

SRC: 由于全球变暖等因素影响，“汉娜”的形成早于以往的大西洋飓风季。
HYP: Due to global warming and other factors, "Hannah" formed earlier than the previous Atlantic hurricane season.

SRC: 一般情况下，大西洋的第一场飓风通常要到8月中旬才会形成。
HYP: Under normal circumstances, the first hurricane in the Atlantic usually does not form until mid-August.

SRC: 波兰将退出欧洲防止对女子施暴的条约
HYP: Poland to withdraw from European treaty to prevent violence against women

SRC: 波兰司法部星期六表示，波兰下个星期将采取步骤，退出欧洲防止对妇女施暴条约。
HYP: Poland will take steps next week to withdraw from the European Treaty on the Prevention of Violence against Women, the Polish Ministry of Justice said Saturday.

SRC: 波兰右翼的政府内阁表示，该条约要求学校教授学生有关性别问题的议题，践踏了学生父母的权利。
HYP: Poland's right-wing government cabinet said the treaty required schools to teach students about gender issues, trampling on the rights of students' parents.

SRC: 波兰司法部长焦布洛举行记者会说，他领导的司法部星期一将向劳工和家庭部提出开始退出条约的要求。
HYP: Polish Justice Minister Joblo held a press conference and said that his Ministry of Justice will ask the Ministry of Labor and Family to begin withdrawing from the treaty on Monday.

SRC: 那项条约又名伊斯坦布尔公约。
HYP: That treaty is also known as the Istanbul Convention.

SRC: 焦布洛说，“该条约包含一些我们认为是有害的<v>意思形态性质</v>的元素。”
HYP: Giobro said, "The treaty contains some elements that we think are harmful."

SRC: 波兰执政的法律与公正党及其及其执政联盟伙伴跟罗马天主教教会有密切的同盟关系，提倡保守的社会议程。
HYP: Poland's ruling Law and Justice Party and its ruling coalition partners have a close alliance with the Roman Catholic Church and advocate a conservative social agenda.

SRC: 波兰总统杜达在这个月成功的连任竞选期间将敌视同性恋权利作为主要议题之一。
HYP: Polish President Duda made hostility to gay rights one of the main issues during his successful re-election campaign this month.

SRC: 星期五，成千上万的波兰人(其中大部分是妇女)在华沙和其他一些城市举行反对退出公约的抗议。
HYP: On Friday, thousands of Poles, most of them women, protested against withdrawal from the convention in Warsaw and other cities.

SRC: 抗议的组织者之一莱姆帕特在华沙举行的抗议游行中说，“退出条约的目的就是将家暴合法化”。
HYP: "The purpose of withdrawing from the treaty is to legalize domestic violence," Lempat, one of the organizers of the protest, said in a protest march in Warsaw.

SRC: 一些抗议者举着横幅，上面写着“法律与公正党是妇女的地狱”。
HYP: Some protesters held banners that read "Law and Justice Party is a hell for women."

SRC: 法律与公正党长久以来抱怨伊斯坦布尔公约。
HYP: The Law and Justice Party has long complained about the Istanbul Convention.

SRC: 波兰先前的中间派执政的政府2015年批准了该公约。
HYP: Poland's previous centrist government ratified the convention in 2015.

SRC: 法律与公正党政府表示，该条约不尊重宗教，要求在学校里教授自由派的社会政策。
HYP: The Law and Justice Party government said the treaty does not respect religion and requires liberal social policies to be taught in schools.

SRC: 但截至目前该党一直没有决定退出该公约。
HYP: But so far the party has not decided to withdraw from the convention.

SRC: （根据路透社报道）
HYP: (According to Reuters)

SRC: 据越通社报道，格里沃里认为，越南25年来为东盟的发展作出巨大贡献。
HYP: According to the Vietnam News Agency, Grivory believes that Vietnam has made great contributions to the development of ASEAN in the past 25 years.

SRC: 越南不仅是东盟负责任的一员，更是东盟的火车头。
HYP: Vietnam is not only a responsible member of ASEAN, but also the locomotive of ASEAN.

SRC: 格里沃里表示，俄罗斯乃至亚欧经济联盟认为，越南为东盟提高其地位，对外推广其形象做出贡献。
HYP: Grivory said that Russia and even the Asia-Europe Economic Union believe that Vietnam has contributed to ASEAN's improvement of its status and promotion of its image to the outside world.

SRC: 他强调，“东盟因此应该感谢越南。”
HYP: He stressed that "ASEAN should therefore thank Vietnam."

SRC: 格里沃里表示，分析人士对越南所提出的和平倡议给予认可。
HYP: Grivory said analysts recognized Vietnam's peace initiative.

SRC: 越南愿意同东盟各国分享经验，对包括东海问题在内的亚太地区面临的问题提出建设性的和平措施。
HYP: Vietnam is willing to share its experience with ASEAN countries and put forward constructive peace measures on the problems facing the Asia-Pacific region, including the East China Sea issue.

SRC: 关于越南与俄罗斯在东盟框架下的合作，格里沃里认为，越南为俄罗斯与东盟的合作关系提供支持，帮助俄罗斯在这一合作框架下获得利益。
HYP: On the cooperation between Vietnam and Russia under the framework of ASEAN, Grivory believes that Vietnam provides support for the cooperative relationship between Russia and ASEAN and helps Russia gain benefits under this cooperation framework.

SRC: 包括俄罗斯在内的亚欧经济联盟与越南签署自贸协定后能够进军东盟市场。
HYP: The Asia-Europe Economic Union, including Russia, can enter the ASEAN market after signing a free trade agreement with Vietnam.

SRC: 格里沃里建议最大限度扩大亚欧经济联盟与东盟各国的自由贸易区，进而创造经济和安全稳定的平台。
HYP: Grivory suggested maximizing the free trade area between the Asia-Europe Economic Union and ASEAN countries, so as to create a platform for economy, security and stability.

SRC: 格里沃里同时相信，俄罗斯、越南与东盟正在步入正轨并将实现其目标。
HYP: Grivory also believes that Russia, Vietnam and ASEAN are on the right track and will achieve their goals.

SRC: 从现在到2020年底，北江省将具备必要条件，尤其是在基础设施，人力资源和土地等方面，以便主动迎来外资流入，特别是拥有价值链和转让先进技术的跨国集团。
HYP: From now until the end of 2020, Beijiang Province will have the necessary conditions, especially in infrastructure, human resources and land, so as to actively welcome foreign capital inflows, especially multinational groups with value chains and the transfer of advanced technologies.

SRC: 此外，北江省将办理好递交政府总理决定对越韩工业区基础设施建设与经营项目投资的主张和批准将本省安山-北陇和安闾两个工业-城市-服务业区补充列入至2020年越南工业区发展总体规划的文件。
HYP: In addition, Beijiang Province will handle the submission of the Prime Minister's decision to invest in infrastructure construction and operation projects in Vietnam-Korea Industrial Zone and approve the addition of the province's Anshan-Beilong and Anlu industrial-city-service zones to the overall plan for the development of Vietnam's industrial zone by 2020.

SRC: 与此同时，北江省着力加快各项目的进度，尤其是在和富、光州，双溪-内皇等工业园区集群的基础设施建设经营项目，为招商引资形成土地基金。
HYP: At the same time, Beijiang Province has made great efforts to speed up the progress of various projects, especially the infrastructure construction and operation projects in industrial park clusters such as Hefu, Gwangju and Shuangxi-Neihuang, so as to form a land fund for attracting investment.

SRC: 在2020年内，北江省工贸局参就定工业区、工业集群规划建言献策，以纳入省规划。
HYP: In 2020, Beijiang Provincial Bureau of Industry and Trade will participate in the planning of industrial zones and industrial clusters, so as to be included in the provincial planning.

SRC: 北江省确定将发展工业园区集群与保障国防安全，保护生态环境，保障粮食安全相结合，进而助推工业均衡发展；拥有全面的电力，供水，交通和电信等基础设施，并与城市建设，贸易服务，工人住房和医疗卫生、教育等其他社会基础设施等相结合。
HYP: Beijiang Province has decided to combine the development of industrial park clusters with ensuring national defense security, protecting the ecological environment and ensuring food security, thus boosting the balanced development of industry; It has comprehensive infrastructure such as electricity, water supply, transportation and telecommunications, and is combined with urban construction, trade services, workers' housing and other social infrastructure such as health care and education.

SRC: 在工业区，北江省着力呼吁对电力，电子，电信设备，精密机械，辅助工业等领域中的高科技，清洁技术的投资项目。
HYP: In the industrial zone, Beijiang Province has made great efforts to call for high-tech and clean technology investment projects in the fields of power, electronics, telecommunications equipment, precision machinery and auxiliary industries.

SRC: 在工业园区集群，该省呼吁对生产、利用就地劳动力、尤其是农产品、食品加工等领域的中小型规模投资项目。
HYP: In the industrial park cluster, the province calls for small and medium-sized investment projects in the production and utilization of local labor, especially in the fields of agricultural products and food processing.

SRC: 未来，北江省将着力加快对北江市后勤物流中心的基础设施的投资，与工业园区集群同步发展，以优化货物、货币流通和有助于降低生产成本，提高货物价值，优化供应链，发展多式联运，从而为投资者投资于本省创造吸引力。
HYP: In the future, Beijiang Province will focus on speeding up the investment in the infrastructure of the logistics center of Beijiang City and develop simultaneously with the industrial park cluster, so as to optimize the circulation of goods and currency and help reduce production costs, improve the value of goods, optimize the supply chain and develop multimodal transport, thus creating attraction for investors to invest in the province.

SRC: （德国之声中文网）过去两周内，西班牙的新冠确冠病例大幅回升，多日出现上千新增病例。
HYP: (Deutsche Welle Chinese Network) In the past two weeks, the number of confirmed cases of COVID-19 in Spain has risen sharply, with thousands of new cases in many days.

SRC: 英国政府周六（7月25日）晚间临时决定，从当地时间26日零点起，将西班牙从安全旅行名单中移除，从西班牙入境英国的人必须隔离14天。
HYP: The British government temporarily decided on Saturday night (July 25) to remove Spain from the safe travel list from 0:00 local time on the 26th, and people entering the UK from Spain must be quarantined for 14 days.

SRC: 正在西班牙度假的英国游客听闻此项决定纷纷表示惊讶、担心、甚至愤怒，因为消息突如其来，令人措手不及。
HYP: British tourists on vacation in Spain expressed surprise, worry and even anger when they heard of the decision, because the news came suddenly and caught people off guard.

SRC: 据报道，英国交通大臣沙普斯（Grant Shapps）目前也在西班牙度假。
HYP: According to reports, British Transport Secretary Grant Shapps is also on vacation in Spain.

SRC: 英国发布隔离措施前，挪威也已宣布从西班牙返回挪威的人要进行为期10天的隔离。
HYP: Before Britain issued the quarantine measures, Norway had also announced that people returning to Norway from Spain would be quarantined for 10 days.

SRC: 法国和比利时建议本国居民放弃前方巴塞罗那以及周边地区度假的计划。
HYP: France and Belgium have advised their residents to abandon their plans for a holiday in Barcelona and surrounding areas ahead.

SRC: 这些地区的海滩人满为患，人与人之间无法保持社交距离，警察一度需要采取措施，以减少海滩游客的数量。
HYP: The beaches in these areas are overcrowded and people cannot keep social distance. At one time, the police needed to take measures to reduce the number of beach tourists.

SRC: 旅游业是西班牙的重要支柱产业
HYP: Tourism is an important pillar industry in Spain

SRC: 西班牙：这里是安全的
HYP: Spain: It's safe here

SRC: 针对英国做出的决定，西班牙外交部周日表示，该国疫情得到控制。
HYP: In response to the British decision, the Spanish Foreign Ministry said on Sunday that the epidemic situation in the country was under control.

SRC: 西班牙外交部长冈萨雷斯（Arancha Gonzalez Laya）向媒体强调：" 西班牙是安全的，不仅对西班牙人而言，对游客来说也是安全的。"
HYP: Spanish Foreign Minister Arancha Gonzalez Laya stressed to the media: "Spain is safe, not only for Spaniards, but also for tourists."

SRC: 西班牙政府将试图说服英国政府将巴利阿里群岛（Balearic Islands）和加那利群岛（Canary Islands）排除在隔离措施之外。
HYP: The Spanish government will try to persuade the British government to exclude the Balearic Islands and Canary Islands from the quarantine measures.

SRC: 理由是，这两个旅游胜地的感染率远低于英国本土。
HYP: The reason is that the infection rate in these two tourist resorts is far lower than that in Britain.

SRC: 为防止疫情扩散，西班牙加泰罗尼亚地区也已重启"禁足令"。
HYP: In order to prevent the spread of the epidemic, Spain's Catalonia region has also restarted the "grounded order".

SRC: 旅游业是西班牙的重要支柱产业，而西班牙是最受英国游客青睐的度假地之一。
HYP: Tourism is an important pillar industry in Spain, and Spain is one of the most popular holiday destinations for British tourists.

SRC: 英国的这一决定预计将会使西班牙的旅游业大受影响。
HYP: The British decision is expected to greatly affect Spain's tourism industry.

SRC: 安静/任琛（德新社，路透社）
HYP: Quiet / Ren Chen (German News Agency, Reuters)

SRC: 中伏首日：北京暂别高温酷暑开启降雨模式-新华网
HYP: The first day of mid-volt: Beijing bid farewell to the high temperature and heat and start the rainfall mod - Xinhuanet

SRC: 新华社北京7月26日电（记者倪元锦）7月26日是今年的“中伏”首日。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 26 (Reporter Ni Yuanjin) July 26 is the first day of this year's "Zhongfu".

SRC: 26日凌晨的大风骤雨对流天气，驱散了连日来笼罩在北京地区的高温酷暑，新一轮降雨天气将持续数日。
HYP: The convective weather of strong winds and showers in the early morning of the 26th dispelled the high temperature and heat shrouded in Beijing in recent days, and a new round of rainfall will last for several days.

SRC: 北京市气象台26日11时发布称，26日北京有分散性阵雨（伴有弱雷电），日最高气温仅为27℃；夜间阴有小到中雨（伴有弱雷电），夜间最低气温为23℃。
HYP: The Beijing Meteorological Observatory announced at 11:00 on the 26th that there were scattered showers (accompanied by weak thunder and lightning) in Beijing on the 26th, and the daily maximum temperature was only 27 ℃; At night, there is light to moderate rain (accompanied by weak thunder and lightning), and the minimum temperature at night is 23 ℃.

SRC: 而在此前的24日至25日，北京全市处在高温蓝色预警中，大部地区日最高气温在37℃左右，局地出现超过40℃的高温。
HYP: From the 24th to the 25th, the whole city of Beijing was in the blue warning of high temperature. The daily maximum temperature in most areas was around 37 ℃, and the local high temperature exceeded 40 ℃.

SRC: 伏天是一年之中气温最高、潮湿、闷热的日子，一年有“三伏”，最热在中伏，中国百姓说的“苦夏”就在此时。
HYP: The summer day is the hottest, humid and sultry day of the year. There are "three volts" in a year, and the hottest is in the middle. The Chinese people say "bitter summer" at this time.

SRC: 入伏时，家家填满谷仓，民间有“一伏饺子二伏面”的说法。
HYP: When entering the valley, every family fills the barn, and there is a folk saying that "one volt of dumpling and two volts of noodles".

SRC: 根据目前预报，未来三天，北京多阴雨天气。
HYP: According to the current forecast, there will be rainy weather in Beijing in the next three days.

SRC: 气象部门提示公众尽量减少山区游玩，谨防地质灾害。
HYP: The meteorological department reminds the public to minimize mountain play and beware of geological disasters.

SRC: 据了解，今年的“中伏”有20天，从7月26日开始，至8月14日结束。
HYP: It is understood that this year's "mid-volt" has 20 days, starting on July 26 and ending on August 14.

SRC: 进入“中伏”后，人会感到身体乏力、食欲不振。
HYP: After entering the "mid-volt", people will feel weak and loss of appetite.

SRC: 饮食上可选择绿豆、薏仁等具有清热解暑、健脾开胃作用的食物，以及苦菜、苦瓜等苦味食物，可有助于增进食欲、祛除暑气。
HYP: Diet can choose mung beans, coix seed and other foods with the functions of clearing heat and relieving summer heat, invigorating the spleen and stimulating appetite, as well as bitter foods such as bitter vegetables and balsam pear, which can help to stimulate appetite and dispel summer heat.

SRC: 《叮咚上线!老师好》下周上线薛兆丰领衔“知识发起人-新华网
HYP: "Ding Dong Online! Good Teacher" will be launched next week, led by Xue Zhaofeng "Knowledge Sponso - Xinhuanet

SRC: 又有新综艺上线。
HYP: There are new variety shows on the line.

SRC: 互动知识分享节目《叮咚上线!老师好》,将于7月20日起在湖南卫视播出。
HYP: Interactive knowledge sharing program "Ding Dong Online! Hello Teacher" will be broadcast on Hunan Satellite TV from July 20.

SRC: 据了解,节目将打造全新的全年龄青春课堂,一批有颜有型又有才的老师将上阵,挑战趣味性知识输出。
HYP: It is understood that the program will create a brand-new all-age youth classroom, and a group of handsome and talented teachers will go into battle to challenge the output of interesting knowledge.

SRC: 与以往老师群体在大众心中的严肃印象不同,《叮咚上线!老师好》集结的是一群颜值和才华兼具的知识代表。
HYP: Different from the serious impression of teachers in the hearts of the public in the past, "Ding Dong Online! Good Teacher" gathers a group of knowledge representatives with both beauty and talent.

SRC: 他们既是来自各学科的青年知识榜样,还是一群会抖包袱、擅长寓教于乐的全能“段子手”。
HYP: They are not only young knowledge role models from various disciplines, but also a group of all-round "Duan Zishou" who can shake their burdens and are good at entertaining.

SRC: 节目中,这群优秀青年知识榜样作为“知识分享官”,将要挑战趣味性的知识课堂。
HYP: In the program, this group of outstanding young knowledge role models, as "knowledge sharing officers", will challenge interesting knowledge classes.

SRC: 他们需要通过有态度的知识输出,展现所在学科最有趣的一面,来打动在场的观众。
HYP: They need to show the most interesting side of their subject through attitude knowledge output to impress the audience present.

SRC: 而全年龄观众组成的“有道问问团”现场会提出百变问题,给“知识分享官”的授课提高难度,也给节目增添些许刺激的氛围。
HYP: The "Youdao Asking Group" composed of audiences of all ages will ask ever-changing questions on the spot, making it more difficult for the "knowledge sharing officer" to teach and adding a little exciting atmosphere to the program.

SRC: 据透露,此次“知识分享官”中有中国人民大学附属中学物理教师李永乐、考研指导名师张雪峰以及拥有十年从业经验的历史教师王磊等优秀青年教师,他们将以意想不到的方式向现场观众展现各个学科的“硬核”知识。
HYP: According to reports, among the "knowledge sharing officers", there are outstanding young teachers such as Li Yongle, a physics teacher from High School Affiliated to Renmin University of China, Zhang Xuefeng, a famous teacher for postgraduate entrance examination, and Wang Lei, a history teacher with ten years of experience. They will show the audience the "hard core" knowledge of various disciplines in unexpected ways.

SRC: 另外,节目还邀请经济学教授薛兆丰作为节目的“知识发起人”,联合“叮咚助教”杜海涛和靳梦佳,与观众畅谈青春,打造“全民青春公开课”。
HYP: In addition, the program also invited Xue Zhaofeng, a professor of economics, as the "knowledge initiator" of the program, and joined the "Ding Dong Assistant" Du Haitao and Jin Mengjia to talk about youth with the audience and create an "open class for youth for all".

SRC: 香港特区政府政务司司长：形势严峻全力抗疫-中新网
HYP: Chief Secretary for Administration of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region Government: The situation is grim and the fight against the epidemi - Chinanews.com

SRC: 香港特区政府政务司司长：形势严峻<v>全力</v>抗疫-中新网
HYP: Chief Secretary for Administration of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region Government: The situation is grim and the fight against the epidemi - Chinanews.com

SRC: 新华社香港7月26日电香港特区政府政务司司长张建宗26日表示，香港新冠肺炎疫情形势持续严峻，若疫情转坏，特区政府将果断采取更严厉管控措施，进一步限制经营场所营业和减少市民外出空间。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 26-The Chief Secretary for Administration of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region Government, Zhang Jianzong, said on the 26th that the COVID-19 epidemic situation in Hong Kong continues to be grim. If the epidemic deteriorates, the SAR Government will decisively take stricter control measures to further restrict business premises and reduce the space for citizens to go out.

SRC: 但现阶段特区政府无意推出“居家令”或“禁足令”限制市民外出。
HYP: However, at this stage, the SAR Government has no intention of introducing a "home order" or a "foot ban order" to restrict citizens from going out.

SRC: 张建宗当日发表题为《形势严峻全力抗疫》的网志。
HYP: On the same day, Zhang Jianzong published a blog entitled "The situation is grim and we are fully committed to fighting the epidemic".

SRC: 他表示，这一波疫情是半年以来最严峻的，未来两星期将会十分关键，要尽力防止病毒在社区进一步扩散。
HYP: He said that this wave of epidemic is the most severe in half a year, and the next two weeks will be crucial, so we should try our best to prevent the virus from spreading further in the community.

SRC: 除了特区政府采取必要措施之外，市民自律和配合也非常重要。
HYP: Apart from the necessary measures taken by the SAR Government, it is also very important for the public to exercise self-discipline and cooperation.

SRC: 他呼吁市民务必尽量留在家中，减少社交接触和外出用餐。
HYP: He called on citizens to stay at home as much as possible, reduce social contact and eat out.

SRC: 市民应配合佩戴口罩的强制措施保护自己及他人，并注重个人和环境卫生及勤洗手，更应暂停非必要的亲友聚会或聚餐及减少到街市。
HYP: Members of the public should cooperate with the compulsory measures of wearing masks to protect themselves and others, pay attention to personal and environmental hygiene and wash their hands frequently, suspend unnecessary gatherings or dinners of relatives and friends and reduce them to markets.

SRC: 他表示，中央一直十分关心香港疫情变化及支持特区政府防疫抗疫工作，并积极回应行政长官最新要求，在加大检测能力和改装亚洲国际博览馆为类似“方舱医院”的工作上提供协助。
HYP: He said that the central government has always been very concerned about the changes in the epidemic situation in Hong Kong and supported the SAR government's epidemic prevention and anti-epidemic work, and actively responded to the latest request of the Chief Executive to provide assistance in increasing the testing capacity and refitting the Asia International Expo to work like a "shelter hospital".

SRC: 张建宗表示，特区政府为特定高风险群组，即安老院舍、残疾院舍及护养院员工、餐厅员工、出租车司机和物业管理员工提供的免费病毒检测已全面展开，涉及人数多达40万。
HYP: Zhang Jianzong said that the free virus testing provided by the SAR Government for specific high-risk groups, namely, employees of residential care homes for the elderly, disabled homes and nursing homes, restaurant employees, taxi drivers and property management employees, has been fully launched, involving as many as 400000 people.

SRC: 他十分关注出现在安老院舍的感染个案，特区政府已为安老院舍院友安排特定的临时检疫中心。
HYP: He is very concerned about infection cases in residential care homes for the elderly, and the SAR Government has arranged specific temporary quarantine centers for residents of residential care homes for the elderly.

SRC: 他表示，特区政府正在位于新界大屿山的竹篙湾检疫中心附近兴建隔离检疫设施，预计可在9月底前提供额外700套隔离房。
HYP: He said that the SAR Government was building quarantine facilities near Penny's Bay Quarantine Center on Lantau Island in the New Territories and was expected to provide an additional 700 isolation rooms by the end of September.

SRC: 行政长官也在19日宣布，特区政府将在竹篙湾检疫中心多兴建2000间隔离房，并争取于今年年底前落成。
HYP: The Chief Executive also announced on the 19th that the SAR Government will build 2000 more isolation rooms at the Penny's Bay Quarantine Center and strive to complete them by the end of this year.

SRC: 加上该隔离检疫中心已经投入使用的800间，年底前竹篙湾检疫中心预计可提供共3500间隔离房。
HYP: Together with the 800 quarantine centers already in use, the Penny's Bay Quarantine Center is expected to provide a total of 3500 isolation rooms by the end of the year.

SRC: 香港目前共有四个正在运作的隔离检疫中心，共提供约2600间隔离房。
HYP: At present, there are four quarantine centers in operation in Hong Kong, providing about 2600 isolation rooms.

SRC: 此外，特区政府于24日重新启用位于香港岛的鲤鱼门公园度假村作为社区隔离设施，用于收治50岁以下有独立自理能力的患者。
HYP: In addition, the SAR Government reopened the Lei Yue Mun Park Resort on Hong Kong Island on the 24th as a community isolation facility for patients under the age of 50 who have independent self-care ability.

SRC: 美国首次以“人民币汇率低估”对中国展开反补贴调查
HYP: For the first time, the United States launched a countervailing investigation against China with "undervalued RMB exchange rate"

SRC: 针对美国商务部近日宣布，决定对原产于中国的扎带（束线带）产品发起反倾销反补贴调查，并就“人民币汇率低估“项目发起调查。
HYP: In response to the recent announcement by the US Department of Commerce that it has decided to launch an anti-dumping and countervailing investigation on cable ties (cable ties) products originating in China and an investigation on the "undervalued RMB exchange rate" project.

SRC: 中国商务部指出，这是美国首次在反补贴案件中立案调查所谓”人民币汇率低估“项目，中方对此坚决反对。
HYP: China's Ministry of Commerce pointed out that this is the first time the United States has filed an investigation into the so-called "undervalued RMB exchange rate" project in a countervailing case, which China firmly opposes.

SRC: 中国商务部23日晚间特别就此发布新闻稿表示，中国实行以市场供求为基础、参考一篮子货币进行调节、有管理的浮动汇率制度，市场在汇率形成中起决定性作用。
HYP: China's Ministry of Commerce issued a special press release on the evening of the 23rd, saying that China implements a managed floating exchange rate system based on market supply and demand, adjusted with reference to a basket of currencies, and the market plays a decisive role in the formation of the exchange rate.

SRC: 新闻稿强调，总体上，人民币汇率处于合理均衡水平，并没有被低估。
HYP: The press release stressed that on the whole, the RMB exchange rate is at a reasonable and balanced level and has not been underestimated.

SRC: 自2005年以来，人民币对美元已累计升值超过17% 。
HYP: Since 2005, the RMB has appreciated by more than 17% against the US dollar.

SRC: 根据国际清算银行公布的数据，2005年初至2020年5月，人民币名目有效汇率升值38%，实际有效汇率升值49%，是G20经济体中最强势的货币，在全球范围内也是升值幅度最大的货币之一。
HYP: According to data released by the Bank for International Settlements, from the beginning of 2005 to May 2020, the nominal effective exchange rate of the RMB appreciated by 38% and the real effective exchange rate appreciated by 49%, making it the strongest currency in the G20 economy and one of the currencies with the largest appreciation in the world.

SRC: 商务部指出，汇率问题超出了成员按照世界贸易组织规则进行反补贴调查的权限。
HYP: The Ministry of Commerce pointed out that the exchange rate issue is beyond the authority of members to conduct countervailing investigations in accordance with World Trade Organization rules.

SRC: 美国今年2月修改法规以对别国汇率进行反补贴调查，已涉嫌违反世贸组织WTO规则，受到多方面反对。
HYP: The United States amended its laws and regulations in February this year to conduct countervailing investigations on other countries' exchange rates, which has been suspected of violating WTO rules and has been opposed by many parties.

SRC: 新闻稿称，即使按照美国法规，申请人的申诉内容也存在大量错误，不具备财政资助、利益授予和专向性等反补贴必备要素。
HYP: According to the press release, even in accordance with US regulations, there are a large number of errors in the content of the applicant's complaint, which does not have the necessary countervailing elements such as financial assistance, benefit granting and specificity.

SRC: 中方敦促美方遵守现有国际规则，停止对所谓“人民币汇率低估”进行反补贴调查。
HYP: China urges the US to abide by existing international rules and stop conducting countervailing investigations into the so-called "undervalued RMB exchange rate".

SRC: 受中美关系紧张情势进一步升高影响，离岸、在岸人民币对美元汇率22日盘中一度大贬，双双跌破1美元兑人民币7.0元关口。
HYP: Affected by the further rising tension in Sino-US relations, the offshore and onshore RMB exchange rates against the US dollar fell sharply in intraday trading on the 22nd, both falling below the 7.0 yuan mark against the US dollar.

SRC: 美国商务部此举是否意在逼升人民币值得关注。
HYP: Whether the US Department of Commerce's move is intended to push up the RMB is worth paying attention to.

SRC: 人民币对美元即期汇价23日升破7.0大关，收在6.9961。
HYP: The spot exchange rate of RMB against the US dollar rose above the 7.0 mark on the 23rd to close at 6.9961.

SRC: 受官方调控的人民币对美元汇率中间价，24日下调17个基本点，报6.9938。
HYP: The official central parity of the RMB against the US dollar was lowered by 17 basis points to 6.9938 on the 24th.

SRC: 26日是菲律宾总统杜特尔特发表任内第五份国情咨文(SONA)前一日，当天菲律宾累计确诊新冠肺炎病例过8万，其中总统府新闻部(PCOO)及其直属机构职员确诊数增到25例。
HYP: The 26th is the day before Philippine President Duterte delivered his fifth State of the Union address (SONA) during his term of office. On that day, the Philippines has confirmed more than 80000 cases of COVID-19, of which the number of confirmed cases by the staff of the Presidential Information Department (PCOO) and its directly affiliated institutions has increased to 25.

SRC: 为此，PCOO已专门准备一个未接触过确诊职员的工作组，配合杜特尔特总统发表SONA的新闻发布工作。
HYP: To this end, PCOO has specially prepared a working group that has not contacted the confirmed staff to cooperate with President Duterte's press release of SONA.

SRC: PCOO部长马丁·安达纳尔26日接受DZBB电台采访表示，已为杜特尔特总统发表SONA方式预备两套方案。
HYP: PCOO Minister Martin Andanal said in an interview with DZBB Radio on the 26th that two plans have been prepared for President Duterte to publish SONA.

SRC: 按A计划，杜特尔特27日下午将在位于奎松市的菲律宾国会(Batasang Pambansa)大楼发表SONA。
HYP: According to Plan A, Duterte will deliver SONA at the Philippine Congress (Batasang Pambansa) building in Quezon City on the afternoon of 27th.

SRC: 因为疫情原因，现场只为部分政府内阁成员和立法者安排50个席位，另专设视频会议室供其他内阁成员、地方政府官员等观看。
HYP: Due to the epidemic, only 50 seats were arranged for some government cabinet members and legislators at the scene, and a special video conference room was set up for other cabinet members and local government officials to watch.

SRC: 所有参会人员当天通过快速检测才能进入国会大楼。
HYP: All participants can enter the parliament building only after passing the quick test on the same day.

SRC: 一旦参会者有一人检测呈阳性，即启动B计划，即杜特尔特总统在总统府马拉卡南宫发表SONA，现场则安排更少的听会席位。
HYP: Once one of the participants tested positive, Plan B was launched, that is, President Duterte delivered SONA at Maracanan Palace, the presidential palace, and fewer seats were arranged for the audience.

SRC: 按照惯例，SONA将实时向菲全国直播。
HYP: According to convention, SONA will broadcast live to the Philippines in real time.

SRC: 截至发稿时，菲总统府尚未确认杜特尔特的家人是否会出席SONA。
HYP: As of press time, the Philippine Presidential Palace has not confirmed whether Duterte's family will attend SONA.

SRC: 安达纳尔说，杜特尔特总统的SONA，将重点说明政府将如何带领菲律宾应对新冠肺炎疫情、恢复社会经济生活；还会提到他上任时的承诺，即反政府腐败、打击非法毒品和减贫。
HYP: Andanar said that President Duterte's SONA will focus on how the government will lead the Philippines to deal with the COVID-19 epidemic and restore social and economic life; He will also mention the promises he made when he took office, namely, fighting government corruption, fighting illegal drugs and reducing poverty.

SRC: 杜特尔特还将说明本届政府的其他计划，包括创造更多的就业机会、振兴经济、促进教育，以及帮助在疫情中受难的海外菲律宾劳工等。
HYP: Duterte will also explain other plans of the current government, including creating more employment opportunities, revitalizing the economy, promoting education, and helping overseas Filipino workers who suffered from the epidemic.

SRC: 深圳就出台健康条例公开征求意见-新华网
HYP: Shenzhen publicly solicits opinions on the introduction of health regulation - Xinhuanet

SRC: 新华社深圳7月26日电（记者毛思倩、白瑜）鼓励居民勤做体检，及早发现问题；禁止向未成年人销售酒精饮料；建立网络游戏健康审查制度；用人单位要配备专兼职健康管理人员…… 日前《深圳经济特区健康条例（征求意见稿）》正式发布，深圳居民将有自己的“健康法”。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Shenzhen, July 26 (Reporters Mao Siqian and Bai Yu) Encourage residents to do physical examinations frequently and find problems early; Prohibit the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors; Establish a health review system for online games; Employers should be equipped with full-time and part-time health management personnel... Recently, the Health Regulations of Shenzhen Special Economic Zone (Draft for Soliciting Opinions) was officially released, and Shenzhen residents will have their own "health law".

SRC: 为了鼓励居民勤做体检，及早发现问题，上述征求意见稿提出，卫生健康部门应当根据不同年龄、职业等因素制定健康体检项目基本目录。
HYP: In order to encourage residents to do physical examinations frequently and find problems as early as possible, the above-mentioned draft for comments proposes that health departments should formulate a basic catalogue of health examination items according to different ages, occupations and other factors.

SRC: 属于健康体检项目基本目录范围内的健康体检费用，按照每人每年一次的标准由社会医疗保险统筹基金支付。
HYP: Health examination expenses within the scope of the basic catalogue of health examination items shall be paid by the social medical insurance co-ordination fund according to the standard of once per person per year.

SRC: 征求意见稿明确，用人单位应当合理配置人力资源，安排员工作息时间，对脑力和体力劳动负荷较重的员工，实行轮休制度，避免对员工健康造成人体机能过度损耗或者身心健康伤害，同时严格执行员工带薪休假制度。
HYP: The draft for comments clearly states that employers should rationally allocate human resources, arrange employees' work and rest time, and implement a rotation system for employees with heavy mental and physical labor load, so as to avoid excessive loss of human functions or physical and mental health damage to employees' health, and strictly implement the paid leave system for employees.

SRC: 此外，用人单位要配备专兼职健康管理人员，并定期组织开展员工健康体检。
HYP: In addition, employers should be equipped with full-time and part-time health management personnel, and regularly organize and carry out employee health examinations.

SRC: 在未成年人身心健康方面，征求意见稿提出，禁止向未成年人销售酒精饮料，同时对酒精饮料的售卖位置进行了限制，对于违反规定的，将由市场监督管理部门责令改正，处3万元罚款。
HYP: With regard to the physical and mental health of minors, the draft for comments proposes that the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors is prohibited, and the sales location of alcoholic beverages is restricted. Those who violate the regulations will be ordered by the market supervision and management department to make corrections and be fined 30000 yuan.

SRC: 除了“禁酒” ，未成年人也要“多运动” 。
HYP: In addition to "prohibition of alcohol", minors should also "exercise more".

SRC: 根据征求意见稿要求，学校要每天安排学生体育活动时间一小时以上。
HYP: According to the requirements of the Exposure Draft, schools should arrange students' sports activities for more than one hour every day.

SRC: 对于网络游戏，公安、文化广电旅游体育、网络监管、卫生健康等部门应当完善互联网上网服务营业场所健康监管制度，建立网络游戏健康审查制度，为促进青少年健康成长营造良好的交往空间、交往文化。
HYP: For online games, public security, culture, radio, television, tourism, sports, network supervision, health and other departments should improve the health supervision system of Internet service business premises, establish a health review system for online games, and create a good communication space and culture for promoting the healthy growth of teenagers.

SRC: 此外，征求意见稿还提出流感病人出入公共场所必须戴口罩，医疗卫生机构未经同意泄露病人隐私罚款2万元等。
HYP: In addition, the draft also proposes that influenza patients must wear masks when entering and leaving public places, and medical and health institutions will be fined 20000 yuan for disclosing patients' privacy without consent.

SRC: 值得注意的是，除了居民的身心健康外，征求意见稿还要求，深圳各部门在制定涉及城市空间规划与建设、工业园区规划与建设、资源开发利用与生态环境保护、生物医药产业发展等规划、规范性文件以及批准重大建设工程和实施重大公共服务项目前，应当评估公共政策实施对人群健康的影响。
HYP: It is worth noting that in addition to the physical and mental health of residents, the Exposure Draft also requires that Shenzhen departments should assess the impact of public policy implementation on people's health before formulating plans and normative documents related to urban spatial planning and construction, industrial park planning and construction, resource development and utilization, ecological environment protection, and biomedical industry development, as well as approving major construction projects and implementing major public service projects.

SRC: 未经评估或者经评估将对城市公共卫生或者居民健康产生较严重不利影响的，不得制定出台或者批准实施。
HYP: Without assessment or assessment, it will have a serious adverse impact on urban public health or residents' health, and shall not be formulated, promulgated or approved for implementation.

SRC: 可可西里藏羚羊进入回迁季-新华网
HYP: Hoh Xil Tibetan antelope enters migration seaso - Xinhuanet

SRC: 新华社西宁7月25日电（记者王金金）记者从三江源国家公园管理局长江源园区可可西里管理处五道梁保护站获悉，监测显示，此前前往可可西里腹地卓乃湖区域迁徙产仔的藏羚羊正陆续结束产仔，开始携幼仔返回原栖息地。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Xining, July 25 (Reporter Wang Jinjin) The reporter learned from the Wudaoliang Protection Station of the Hoh Xil Management Office of the Yangtze River Source Park of the Sanjiangyuan National Park Administration that monitoring showed that Tibetan antelopes that had migrated to the Zhuonaihu area in the hinterland of Hoh Xil were gradually ending their litter and began to return to their original habitat with their cubs.

SRC: 五道梁保护站附近的监控画面显示，7月25日，大约40只雌性藏羚羊带领3只藏羚羊幼仔陆续通过青藏公路3002公里处、青藏铁路五道梁北大桥，藏羚羊已经开始回迁。
HYP: Monitoring images near Wudaoliang Protection Station show that on July 25, about 40 female Tibetan antelopes led three Tibetan antelope cubs through 3002 kilometers of Qinghai-Tibet Highway and Wudaoliang North Bridge on Qinghai-Tibet Railway, and Tibetan antelopes have begun to move back.

SRC: 专家分析，近年来，回迁羊群中藏羚羊幼仔数量占藏羚羊群总体数量的四分之一至五分之一。
HYP: According to expert analysis, in recent years, the number of Tibetan antelope cubs in the relocated sheep herd accounts for one quarter to one fifth of the total number of Tibetan antelope herds.

SRC: 中国科学院西北高原生物研究所副研究员连新明说：“回迁初期，藏羚羊面临较高的被捕食风险，因此羊群中的幼仔数量会比较少，甚至可能出现没有幼仔的情况。”
HYP: Lian Xinming, an associate researcher at the Northwest Plateau Institute of Biology, Chinese Academy of Sciences, said: "In the early stage of migration, Tibetan antelopes face a higher risk of being preyed, so the number of cubs in the flock will be relatively small, and there may even be no cubs."

SRC: 根据三江源国家公园管理局长江源园区可可西里管理处统计，藏羚羊回迁数量总体呈逐年上升态势，2019年藏羚羊回迁数量为4860只，比2018年增加338只。
HYP: According to the statistics of Hoh Xil Management Office of Yangtze River Source Park of Sanjiangyuan National Park Administration, the number of Tibetan antelopes has been increasing year by year. In 2019, the number of Tibetan antelopes was 4860, an increase of 338 over 2018.

SRC: 根据三江源国家公园管理局长江源园区可可西里管理处统计，藏羚羊<v>回迁</v>数量总体呈逐年上升态势，2019年藏羚羊回迁数量为4860只，比2018年增加338只。
HYP: According to the statistics of Hoh Xil Management Office of Yangtze River Source Park of Sanjiangyuan National Park Administration, the number of Tibetan antelopes has been increasing year by year. In 2019, the number of Tibetan antelopes was 4860, an increase of 338 over 2018.

SRC: 连新明说：“预计今年藏羚羊回迁将在9月初结束，回迁藏羚羊数量仍有望继续增加。”
HYP: Lian Xinming said: "It is expected that this year's migration of Tibetan antelopes will end in early September, and the number of Tibetan antelopes is expected to continue to increase."

SRC: 藏羚羊属国家一级保护动物。
HYP: Tibetan antelope is a national first-class protected animal.

SRC: 每年5月底，来自青海三江源、西藏羌塘、新疆阿尔金山等地的藏羚羊都要前往位于可可西里腹地的卓乃湖产羔。
HYP: At the end of May every year, Tibetan antelopes from Sanjiangyuan in Qinghai, Qiangtang in Tibet, Altun Mountain in Xinjiang and other places go to Zhuonaihu in the hinterland of Hoh Xil to give birth to lambs.

SRC: 我国藏羚羊保护专家、陕西省动物研究所（西北濒危动物研究所）研究员吴晓民说：“藏羚羊回迁是雌性藏羚羊结束产仔后，陆续带着幼仔回到栖息地的过程。起初离开产仔地的回迁群体较为庞大，但随后藏羚羊将根据不同的地理种群、沿不同路径回到它们各自的栖息地。”
HYP: Wu Xiaomin, an expert on Tibetan antelope protection in China and a researcher at Shaanxi Institute of Zoology (Northwest Institute of Endangered Animals), said: "The migration of Tibetan antelopes is a process in which female Tibetan antelopes return to their habitats one after another after giving birth. At first, the returning population leaving the litter site is relatively large, but then Tibetan antelopes will return to their respective habitats along different paths according to different geographical populations."

SRC: 为确保藏羚羊群安全回迁，记者了解到，日前三江源国家公园管理局长江源园区可可西里管理处已安排工作人员在主要回迁区域，持续开展视频监测和辖区巡逻。
HYP: In order to ensure the safe relocation of the Tibetan antelope herd, the reporter learned that the Hoh Xil Management Office of the Yangtze River Source Park of the Sanjiangyuan National Park Administration has arranged staff to continuously carry out video monitoring and patrol in the main relocation areas.

SRC: 如发现有藏羚羊群试图穿越公路，巡山队员会在第一时间进行临时交通管制，让羊群安全通过野生动物通道，保证其在回迁途中尽可能少受人类干扰。
HYP: If Tibetan antelopes are found trying to cross the highway, the mountain patrol team will carry out temporary traffic control as soon as possible to let the sheep pass through the wildlife passage safely and ensure that they are as little disturbed by human beings as possible on the way back.

SRC: 那么，日常生活中到底该如何解暑？
HYP: So, how to relieve the summer heat in daily life?

SRC: 专家建议，夏日外出尽量避开高温时段，最好不要在中午前后在烈日下行走或劳动，因为这个时间段的阳光最强烈，发生中暑的可能性较高。
HYP: Experts suggest that when going out in summer, try to avoid the high temperature period, and it is best not to walk or work in the hot sun around noon, because the sunshine is the strongest during this period, and the possibility of heatstroke is higher.

SRC: 如果此时段必须外出，一定要做好防护工作，如打遮阳伞、戴遮阳帽、戴太阳镜，有条件的最好涂抹防晒霜，以防晒伤。
HYP: If you must go out at this time, you must do a good job of protection, such as playing a sunshade, wearing a sunshade hat, and wearing sunglasses. If conditions permit, it is best to apply sunscreen to prevent sunburn.

SRC: 衣服尽量选用浅色、透气性好的棉、麻、丝类质地，少穿化纤品类服装，以免大量出汗时不能及时散热，引起中暑。
HYP: Clothes should be made of light-colored cotton, hemp and silk with good air permeability as far as possible, and chemical fiber clothing should be worn less, so as not to dissipate heat in time when sweating a lot and cause heatstroke.

SRC: 高温闷热天气时，要准备充足的水饮，及时饮用，不要等口渴了才喝水，因为一旦感觉口渴表示身体已经缺水了，每次喝水控制在150毫升至200毫升，喝温开水，不要喝冰水。
HYP: In hot and sultry weather, prepare enough water to drink in time, and don't wait for thirst to drink water, because once you feel thirsty, your body is already short of water, and each time you drink 150 ml to 200 ml of water, drink warm boiled water, and don't drink ice water.

SRC: 根据气温高低，一般人员每天喝1.5升至2升水，高温作业人员，每天喝3升至5升水。
HYP: According to the temperature, the average person drinks 1.5 liters to 2 liters of water every day, while high-temperature workers drink 3 liters to 5 liters of water every day.

SRC: 出汗较多时可适当补充一些盐水，弥补人体因出汗而失去的盐分。
HYP: When sweating more, some salt water can be added appropriately to make up for the salt lost by sweating.

SRC: 另外，夏季人体容易缺钾，使人感到倦怠疲乏，含钾茶水是极好的消暑饮品。
HYP: In addition, the human body is prone to potassium deficiency in summer, which makes people feel tired and tired. Potassium-containing tea is an excellent summer drink.

SRC: 夏天多食含水量高的蔬果，如生菜、黄瓜、西红柿等；新鲜水果，如桃子、杏、西瓜、甜瓜等水分含量为80％至90％，都可以用来补充水分；乳制品既能补水，又能满足身体的营养之需。
HYP: Eat more fruits and vegetables with high water content in summer, such as lettuce, cucumber, tomatoes, etc.; Fresh fruits, such as peaches, apricots, watermelons, melons and other water content is 80% to 90%, can be used to supplement water; Dairy products can not only replenish water, but also meet the nutritional needs of the body.

SRC: 此外，在高温环境中工作的人群，应适当补充含有钾、镁等元素的饮品。
HYP: In addition, people working in high temperature environment should appropriately supplement drinks containing potassium, magnesium and other elements.

SRC: 夏天日长夜短，气温高，人体新陈代谢旺盛，消耗也大，容易感到疲劳。
HYP: In summer, the days are long and the nights are short, the temperature is high, the metabolism of the human body is vigorous, the consumption is also large, and it is easy to feel tired.

SRC: 充足的睡眠，可使大脑和身体各系统都得到放松，既利于工作和学习，也是预防中暑的措施。
HYP: Adequate sleep can relax all systems of the brain and body, which is not only conducive to work and study, but also a measure to prevent heatstroke.

SRC: 专家称，最佳就寝时间是22时至23时，最佳起床时间是5时30分至6时30分。
HYP: Experts say the best time to go to bed is from 22:00 to 23:00, and the best time to get up is from 5:30 to 6:30.

SRC: 睡眠时注意不要躺在空调出风口和电风扇下，以免患上空调病和热伤风。
HYP: Be careful not to lie under the air conditioning outlet and electric fan during sleep, so as not to suffer from air conditioning diseases and hot colds.

SRC: 专家建议，在户外活动或进行高温作业的人群，可<v>随身</v>携带十滴水、人丹、藿香正气水或藿香正气丸等防暑药品，或放置在就近工作场所，随时使用，以防发生中暑。
HYP: Experts suggest that people who are engaged in outdoor activities or high-temperature operations can carry heatstroke prevention drugs such as ten drops of water, Rendan, Huoxiang Zhengqi Water or Huoxiang Zhengqi Pills, or place them in the nearest workplace and use them at any time to prevent heatstroke.

SRC: 专家建议，在户外活动或进行高温作业的人群，可随身携带十滴水、人丹、藿香正气水或藿香正气丸等防暑药品，或放置在就近工作场所，随时使用，以防发生中暑。
HYP: Experts suggest that people who are engaged in outdoor activities or high-temperature operations can carry heatstroke prevention drugs such as ten drops of water, Rendan, Huoxiang Zhengqi Water or Huoxiang Zhengqi Pills, or place them in the nearest workplace and use them at any time to prevent heatstroke.

SRC: 毕业生艺术展搬进商场公益展出-新华网
HYP: Graduate Art Exhibition Moved into Shopping Mall Public Welfare Exhibitio - Xinhuanet

SRC: 在各大院校“云毕业”的季节里，一场难得的线下毕业生艺术展上周末温暖启幕。
HYP: In the "cloud graduation" season of colleges and universities, a rare offline graduate art exhibition opened warmly last weekend.

SRC: 不过它既不在美术馆，也不在校园里，而是出现在了朝阳大悦城的公共空间，并对公众免费开放，将持续至8月23日。
HYP: However, it is neither in the art museum nor on campus, but in the public space of Chaoyang Joy City, which is open to the public free of charge and will last until August 23.

SRC: 记者了解到，这场2020毕业生艺术展，征集了来自中央美术学院、中国传媒大学及天津美术学院的57位青年艺术家的50件/组作品，展览空间从2层延伸至6层，并充分利用楼内灯箱进行平面作品展示，最大程度烘托出毕业季的艺术氛围。
HYP: The reporter learned that this 2020 Graduate Art Exhibition collected 50 pieces / groups of works by 57 young artists from the Central Academy of Fine Arts, Communication University of China and Tianjin Academy of Fine Arts. The exhibition space extended from the second floor to the sixth floor, and made full use of the light box in the building to display graphic works, maximizing the artistic atmosphere of the graduation season.

SRC: 在疫情之下，这场展览的意义显得尤为特殊。
HYP: Under the epidemic situation, the significance of this exhibition is particularly special.

SRC: 朝阳大悦城美陈负责人葛平坦言：“我们选择将走向'云端'的毕业展再度带回线下空间，也希望让更多人看到青年对自身的探索和对世界的理解，放大艺术对于社会和心灵的疗愈力量。”
HYP: Ge Ping, head of Meichen in Chaoyang Joy City, said frankly: "We have chosen to bring the graduation exhibition to the 'cloud' back to the offline space again. We also hope that more people can see young people's exploration of themselves and understanding of the world, and enlarge the healing power of art for society and the soul."

SRC: 她透露，此次参展的作品是向几大艺术院校的毕业生们征集而来，又从中挑选了适合商业空间展示的，作品形式从传统的架上绘画、雕塑，到新媒体装置、交互动画、VR全景，体量与丰富程度为历年之最。
HYP: She revealed that the works exhibited this time were collected from graduates of several major art colleges, and selected from them suitable for commercial space display. The forms of the works range from traditional easel painting and sculpture to new media installations, interactive animation and VR panorama, with the highest volume and richness in history.

SRC: 其中，李云肖在《2020的第一场战役》中通过机械和手工混合的创作语言，表达了自己在这场疫情中的感受；刘嘉颖通过以太坊区块链创作的作品《Sound Money》探讨了“加密货币” 、“信用创造” 、“交易”等主题；张家祺的《猫林》与邱达强的《羁》表现的都是经常与人类相伴的动物，从中可以看到青年艺术家对人与动物关系的理解；而朱仲鱼的作品《信仰的冬天—礼物》则是在提醒成长中的年轻人，“当有一天事业有成时，不忘初心，记得那份单纯与真诚。”
HYP: Among them, Li Yunxiao expressed his feelings in the epidemic through a mixture of mechanical and manual creative language in "The First Battle of 2020"; Liu Jiaying discussed the themes of "encrypted currency", "credit creation" and "transaction" through the work "Sound Money" created by the Ethereum blockchain; Zhang Jiaqi's "Cat Forest" and Qiu Daqiang's "Ji" show animals that are often accompanied by human beings, from which we can see young artists' understanding of the relationship between human beings and animals; Zhu Zhongyu's work "Winter of Faith-Gift" reminds growing young people, "When one day your career is successful, Do not forget your initiative mind, remember that simplicity and sincerity."

SRC: 在为数不多的亲自布展的毕业生中，就有来自天津美术学院雕塑系的李敬寅。
HYP: Among the few graduates who personally arranged the exhibition was Li Jingyin from the Sculpture Department of Tianjin Academy of Fine Arts.

SRC: “我是7月7日来北京的，当时其实有点担心疫情，还提前三天做了核酸检测，是带着酒精棉和检测报告来布展的。”
HYP: "I came to Beijing on July 7. At that time, I was actually a little worried about the epidemic. I also did a nucleic acid test three days in advance. I brought alcohol cotton and test reports to the exhibition."

SRC: 他的作品《昨日如谜》结构比较复杂，必须亲力亲为。
HYP: His work "Yesterday is a Mystery" has a complicated structure and must be done by himself.

SRC: 同时，他还承担着帮助同学修补破损作品的任务。
HYP: At the same time, he also undertakes the task of helping his classmates repair damaged works.

SRC: “布展到凌晨四点半，然后再做修补，时间很紧，都忘了和作品合个影，也有点遗憾。”
HYP: "The exhibition was arranged until 4:30 in the morning, and then it was repaired. The time was very tight. I forgot to take a picture with the work, which was also a bit regrettable."

SRC: 他希望，等疫情更稳定了，再和同学们来北京看看自己的作品展。
HYP: He hopes that when the epidemic situation is more stable, he and his classmates will come to Beijing to see his work exhibition.

SRC: （记者李俐）
HYP: (Reporter Li Li)

SRC: 奖励5万元湖北恩施表扬沙子坝滑坡“预警第一人” - 中新网
HYP: Reward 50000 yuan Hubei Enshi praised Shaziba landslide as "the first person to warn" - Chinanews.com

SRC: 湖北日报讯(记者林晶)7月26日，恩施市通报表扬为沙子坝滑坡预警作出重要贡献的地质灾害点监测员陈光明，并为他送去5万元奖金。
HYP: Hubei Daily News (Reporter Lin Jing) On July 26, Enshi City announced the praise of Chen Guangming, a geological disaster site monitor who made important contributions to the early warning of Shaziba landslide, and sent him a bonus of 50000 yuan.

SRC: 同时，号召全市党员干部学习他恪尽职守、敢于担当、主动作为、乐于奉献的精神。
HYP: At the same time, party members and cadres in the city are called on to learn from his spirit of conscientious duty, daring to take responsibility, taking the initiative and being willing to give.

SRC: 7月21日，恩施市屯堡乡马者村沙子坝发生滑坡，导致清江干流河道形成堰塞湖，58岁的陈光明是预警此次滑坡的第一人。
HYP: On July 21, a landslide occurred in Shaziba, Mazhe Village, Tunpu Township, Enshi City, which led to the formation of a barrier lake in the main stream of Qingjiang River. Chen Guangming, 58, was the first person to warn of the landslide.

SRC: 7月17日下午，陈光明得知村民家中墙壁开裂的消息，立即到现场查看。
HYP: On the afternoon of July 17, Chen Guangming learned that the walls of the villagers' homes were cracked and immediately went to the scene to check.

SRC: 他刚从家中走出五六百米，便看到村组公路裂开四五厘米，沿着公路一直延伸到玉米地，长度约50米。
HYP: As soon as he walked five or six hundred meters from his home, he saw the village road split four or five centimeters, extending along the road to the corn field, about 50 meters in length.

SRC: 陈光明顿生警觉，第一时间将公路开裂的照片发到乡“地质灾害监测员联系群”里。
HYP: Chen Guangming was suddenly alert and immediately sent photos of highway cracking to the township "geological disaster monitor contact group".

SRC: 经屯堡乡自然规划所相关负责人现场查看和判断，滑坡的可能性很大，随即作出撤离群众的决定。
HYP: After on-site inspection and judgment by the relevant person in charge of Tunpu Township Natural Planning Institute, the possibility of landslide was very high, and the decision to evacuate the masses was made immediately.

SRC: 陈光明的及时预警，为影响区内315户1339名群众的安全撤离贏得了36小时的宝贵时间。
HYP: Chen Guangming's timely warning won 36 hours of precious time for the safe evacuation of 1339 people from 315 households in the affected area.

SRC: 此次重大地质灾害，无一人伤亡。
HYP: No one was killed or injured in this major geological disaster.

SRC: 陈光明认真负责的敬业精神得到群众的称赞。
HYP: Chen Guangming's serious and responsible professionalism was praised by the masses.

SRC: 面对赞誉，他说：“不存在救了谁，这是我的责任。 ”
HYP: In the face of praise, he said: "There is no one to save, this is my responsibility."

SRC: 警方通报“女大学生赴青海旅游失联”细节搜救工作仍在继续-新华网
HYP: Police report details of "female college students lost contact when traveling to Qinghai", search and rescue work continue - Xinhuanet

SRC: 新华社西宁7月26日电（记者王金金周喆）近日，“一名女大学生前往青海格尔木旅游后失联”一事引发网民关注。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Xining, July 26 (Reporter Wang Jinjin, Zhou Zhe) Recently, "a female college student lost contact after traveling to Golmud, Qinghai" attracted netizens' attention.

SRC: 青海省海西蒙古族藏族自治州格尔木市公安局26日通报称，南京某大学学生黄某某目前仍处于失联状态，多地警方正深入黄某某失联地沿线，积极开展寻找工作。
HYP: The Public Security Bureau of Golmud City, Haixi Mongolian and Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, Qinghai Province reported on the 26th that Huang Moumou, a student from a university in Nanjing, is still in a state of losing contact, and police in many places are going deep along the route where Huang Moumou lost contact and actively carrying out search work.

SRC: 2020年7月10日，海西州格尔木市公安局治安支队接到上级通知，南京某大学学生黄某某于7月5日乘坐Z164列车由南京至格尔木，于7月9日在青海省玉树藏族自治州曲麻莱县索南达杰保护站清水河西南区域处手机关机并失联，要求协助查找。
HYP: On July 10, 2020, the Public Security Detachment of Golmud Public Security Bureau in Haixi Prefecture received a notice from its superior that Huang Moumou, a student from a university in Nanjing, took the Z164 train from Nanjing to Golmud on July 5 and turned off his mobile phone and lost contact at the southwest area of Qingshui River in Sonandajie Protection Station, Qumalai County, Yushu Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, Qinghai Province on July 9, asking for assistance in finding it.

SRC: 根据格尔木市公安局的调查情况，黄某某于7月6日19时54分进入青海省境内，7日4时抵达格尔木市。
HYP: According to the investigation of Golmud Public Security Bureau, Huang entered Qinghai Province at 19:54 on July 6 and arrived in Golmud at 4:00 on July 7.

SRC: 当日8时，失联人员黄某某乘坐出租车由格尔木市黄河大酒店朝G109国道出发，并于12时到达可可西里索南达杰保护站，出租车司机单独返回，黄某某7日15时到达索南达杰保护站附近清水河区域直至9日18时许在该区域关机。
HYP: At 8:00 on the same day, Huang Moumou, a missing person, took a taxi from the Yellow River Hotel in Golmud City to G109 National Highway, and arrived at Hoh Xil Sonandajie Protection Station at 12:00. The taxi driver returned alone. Huang Moumou arrived at Qingshui River area near Sonandajie Protection Station at 15:00 on the 7th and shut down in the area at 18:00 on the 9th.

SRC: 在进一步调查中，警方发现黄某某曾于7月13日17时07分通过乃吉沟检查站。
HYP: In further investigation, the police found that Huang had passed the Naijigou checkpoint at 17:07 on July 13.

SRC: 乃吉沟检查站是西藏自治区那曲市在格尔木市南山口设立的检查站，由于该检查站无视频监控，无法确定本人及所乘车辆信息，警方只能驾车在沿途进行查找，协调西藏沿途各检查站若发现黄某某，立即与格尔木市公安局取得联系。
HYP: Naijigou checkpoint is a checkpoint set up by Nagqu City, Tibet Autonomous Region at Nanshankou, Golmud City. Because there is no video surveillance at the checkpoint, it is impossible to determine the information of myself and the vehicle. The police can only drive along the way to find and coordinate with the checkpoints along Tibet. If Huang Moumou is found, immediately contact Golmud Public Security Bureau.

SRC: 根据最新情况，7月26日凌晨1时，格尔木市公安局组织救援力量携带救援装备，前往青藏公路沿线不冻泉保护站、索南达杰保护站进行查找，并积极与四川警方、西藏警方、南京警方取得联系，共同开展工作，目前查找搜救工作仍在继续。
HYP: According to the latest situation, at 1:00 am on July 26, Golmud Municipal Public Security Bureau organized rescue forces to carry rescue equipment to search for the unfrozen spring protection station and Sonandajie protection station along the Qinghai-Tibet Highway, and actively contacted Sichuan police, Tibet police and Nanjing police to jointly carry out the work. At present, the search and rescue work is still continuing.

SRC: 当地警方希望广大网友和社会各界如有相关线索，及时向格尔木警方和南京江宁警方提供，争取早日找到失联人员黄某某。
HYP: The local police hope that netizens and all sectors of society will provide relevant clues to Golmud police and Nanjing Jiangning police in time, so as to find the missing person Huang Moumou as soon as possible.

SRC: 同时，有关专家提示，游客在户外活动时要规范、理性、文明，随时留意路边警示标志，切勿冒险进入无人区，遇到突发情况，要及时报警。
HYP: At the same time, relevant experts suggest that tourists should be standardized, rational and civilized in outdoor activities, pay attention to roadside warning signs at any time, do not venture into no man's land, and call the police in time in case of emergencies.

SRC: 俄罗斯举办阅兵式庆祝海军节-新华网
HYP: Russia holds military parade to celebrate Navy Da - Xinhuanet

SRC: 7月26日，在俄罗斯圣彼得堡，舰艇列队参加海军节庆祝活动。
HYP: On July 26, in St. Petersburg, Russia, ships lined up to participate in the celebration of Navy Day.

SRC: 新华社发（莫京娜摄）
HYP: Xinhua News Agency (Photo by Mo Jingna)

SRC: 新华社莫斯科7月26日电（记者鲁金博）俄罗斯各舰队26日举行阅兵式庆祝海军节，纪念俄海军成立324周年。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Moscow, July 26 (Reporter Lu Jinbo) Russian fleets held a military parade on the 26th to celebrate Navy Day and commemorate the 324th anniversary of the founding of the Russian Navy.

SRC: 当天，俄罗斯北海、波罗的海、黑海、里海和太平洋舰队分别在各自基地所在海域举行了阅兵式，共有1.5万军人、219艘各类舰艇和71架军用飞机参加。
HYP: On the same day, the Russian North Sea, Baltic Sea, Black Sea, Caspian Sea and Pacific Fleet held military parades in the waters where their respective bases were located, with 15000 soldiers, 219 ships of various types and 71 military aircraft participating.

SRC: 俄总统、武装力量最高统帅<v>普京</v>出席了波罗的海舰队的阅兵式。
HYP: Russian President and Supreme Commander of the Armed Forces Putin attended the military parade of the Baltic Fleet.

SRC: 约4000名军人、46艘舰艇和40余架战机参加了当地的阅兵式。
HYP: About 4000 soldiers, 46 ships and more than 40 fighter planes participated in the local military parade.

SRC: 普京首先在位于波罗的海喀琅施塔得海军基地水域检阅了舰艇列队。
HYP: Putin first inspected the ship formation in the waters of the Kronstadt naval base in the Baltic Sea.

SRC: 之后，他乘坐快艇抵达圣彼得堡市中心的涅瓦河水域并上岸，观看了在涅瓦河上举行的阅兵式。
HYP: After that, he arrived in the waters of the Neva River in the center of St. Petersburg by speedboat and landed to watch the military parade held on the Neva River.

SRC: 普京在阅兵式上发表讲话说，俄海军装备的现代化技术水平近年来持续提升，俄海军2020年将总共接收约40艘配备独特高超音速打击系统的新型舰艇。
HYP: Putin said in a speech at the military parade that the modern technical level of Russian naval equipment has continued to improve in recent years, and the Russian navy will receive a total of about 40 new ships equipped with unique hypersonic strike systems in 2020.

SRC: 另外，俄海军总司令叶夫梅诺夫日前在接受俄国防部机关报《红星报》采访时说，俄建造舰艇的计划得到了有效落实，2020年俄海军计划接收的新舰艇数量是近年来规模较大的。
HYP: In addition, Russian Navy Commander-in-Chief Yevmenov said in an interview with Red Star, the official newspaper of the Russian Ministry of Defense, that Russia's plan to build ships has been effectively implemented, and the number of new ships that the Russian Navy plans to receive in 2020 is relatively large in recent years.

SRC: 1696年，沙皇彼得大帝着手组建海上舰队，开创了俄海军历史。
HYP: In 1696, Tsar Peter the Great set out to form a maritime fleet, creating the history of the Russian navy.

SRC: 每年7月最后一个星期日是俄罗斯海军节。
HYP: The last Sunday in July every year is the Russian Navy Day.

SRC: 针对疫情防控工作出现的新变化，自7月17日以来，新疆各级工会响应自治区总工会的号召，积极参与疫情防控工作。
HYP: In view of the new changes in epidemic prevention and control work, since July 17, trade unions at all levels in Xinjiang have responded to the call of the Autonomous Region Federation of Trade Unions and actively participated in epidemic prevention and control work.

SRC: 天山南北工会干部、职工、劳动模范走进街道社区、居民群众中，开展送菜送药、消毒灭菌、宣传防疫知识等活动，服务职工群众，用实际行动彰显工会“硬核力量”。
HYP: Trade union cadres, workers and model workers from the north and south of Tianshan Mountains walked into street communities and residents to carry out activities such as delivering vegetables and medicines, disinfecting and sterilizing, and publicizing epidemic prevention knowledge, so as to serve the workers and demonstrate the "hard core power" of trade unions with practical actions.

SRC: 近日，乌鲁木齐市天山区总工会慰问组一行，将一批急需的疫情防控生活物资送到了12个隔离点的工作人员手中。
HYP: Recently, the condolence group of Tianshan District Federation of Trade Unions in Urumqi sent a batch of urgently needed living materials for epidemic prevention and control to the staff of 12 isolation points.

SRC: 疫情发生后，天山区总第一时间投入经费105万余元，紧急下拨给23个直属基层工会。
HYP: After the outbreak of the epidemic, Tianshan District invested more than 1.05 million yuan at the first time, which was urgently allocated to 23 grass-roots trade unions directly under it.

SRC: 中建新疆建工一建党委副书记、工会主席赵相国接到公司关于疫情防控的通知后，主动请缨，选择留在单位值班，为职工保驾护航。
HYP: After receiving the company's notice on epidemic prevention and control, Zhao Xiangguo, deputy secretary of the Party Committee and chairman of the trade union of China Construction Xinjiang Construction Engineering First Construction, volunteered to stay on duty in the unit to escort the employees.

SRC: 他为居住在单位宿舍和新入职的职工送去做饭的炊具、食品及日用品，并组织人员每隔两天为他们送一次生活必备物资。
HYP: He sent cooking utensils, food and daily necessities to the dormitory and new employees, and organized personnel to send them daily necessities every two days.

SRC: “7月21日起，对坚守战'疫'一线的干部职工进行摸底，并采取线上下单、商家送货上门的方式，先行为乌鲁木齐地区704名一线职工群众补充购买防疫用品和生活物资。”
HYP: "Starting from July 21, cadres and workers who stick to the front line of the war 'epidemic' will be thoroughly investigated, and online orders will be placed and merchants will deliver goods to their homes. First, 704 front-line workers and masses in Urumqi will be supplemented with epidemic prevention supplies and daily necessities."

SRC: 新疆交通运输工会负责人告诉记者，面对突发疫情，他们全力做好疫情防控服务保障、稳步推进交通运输发展各项工作，营造齐心战“疫”的浓厚氛围。
HYP: The person in charge of the Xinjiang Transportation Trade Union told reporters that in the face of a sudden epidemic, they made every effort to ensure epidemic prevention and control services, steadily promoted various work in the development of transportation, and created a strong atmosphere for fighting the "epidemic" together.

SRC: 当前正值夏季高温，各级工会紧盯疫情防控重点地区的一线职工，把“送清凉”关心关爱落到实处。
HYP: At present, it is high in summer, and trade unions at all levels keep a close eye on front-line workers in key areas for epidemic prevention and control, and put the care of "sending coolness" into practice.

SRC: 当前正值夏季<v>高温</v>，各级工会紧盯疫情防控重点地区的一线职工，把“送清凉”关心关爱落到实处。
HYP: At present, it is high in summer, and trade unions at all levels keep a close eye on front-line workers in key areas for epidemic prevention and control, and put the care of "sending coolness" into practice.

SRC: 7月19日，乌鲁木齐县总工会启动向疫情防控一线职工“送清凉”慰问活动，全县警务站、卡点和卫生系统收到了饮料、水果等慰问品。
HYP: On July 19, the Urumqi County Federation of Trade Unions launched a condolence activity of "sending coolness" to front-line workers in epidemic prevention and control, and police stations, card points and health systems in the county received condolences such as drinks and fruits.

SRC: “工会干部要进一步提高政治站位、强化责任担当，用关怀温暖人心，用行动鼓舞斗志。
HYP: "Trade union cadres should further improve their political positions, strengthen their responsibilities, warm people's hearts with care, and inspire morale with actions.

SRC: 要充分发挥工会组织凝聚职工、团结职工的作用，做好疫情防控服务<v>保障</v>，积极维护广大职工的健康权益，把关爱送到一线职工身边。”
HYP: It is necessary to give full play to the role of trade union organizations in rallying and uniting workers, do a good job in epidemic prevention and control services, actively safeguard the health rights and interests of workers, and send care to front-line workers. "

SRC: 要充分发挥工会组织凝聚职工、团结职工的作用，做好疫情防控服务保障，积极维护广大职工的健康权益，把关爱送到一线职工身边。”
HYP: It is necessary to give full play to the role of trade union organizations in rallying and uniting workers, do a good job in epidemic prevention and control services, actively safeguard the health rights and interests of workers, and send care to front-line workers. "

SRC: 自治区总工会相关负责人表示。
HYP: The relevant person in charge of the Autonomous Region Federation of Trade Unions said.

SRC: 2020年直招士官工作全面展开-新华网
HYP: Direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers in full swing in 202 - Xinhuanet

SRC: 新华社北京7月26日电（记者贾启龙）军委政治工作部、军委国防动员部近日联合印发通知，部署展开2020年从普通高等学校毕业生中直接招收士官工作。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 26 (Reporter Jia Qilong) The Political Work Department of the Military Commission and the National Defense Mobilization Department of the Military Commission recently jointly issued a notice to deploy the direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers from graduates of ordinary colleges and universities in 2020.

SRC: 今年直招士官涵盖计算机、自动化、机械等64类270余个军地通用专业，重点加大无人机、航海、航空航天、电子信息、小语种等专业招收力度，招收规模相比去年增加近2000人。
HYP: This year's direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers covers more than 270 military and civilian general majors in 64 categories, such as computer, automation and machinery, with emphasis on increasing the recruitment of drones, navigation, aerospace, electronic information and minor languages, with the recruitment scale increasing by nearly 2000 compared with last year.

SRC: 今年直招士官工作与义务兵征集同步组织实施，8月1日开始，9月30日结束。
HYP: This year, the direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers and the recruitment of conscripts were organized and implemented simultaneously, starting on August 1 and ending on September 30.

SRC: 应征青年可以通过全国征兵网（网址：http://www.gfbzb.gov.cn）查询直招士官条件和各地招收专业分布情况，符合专业范围和招收条件的在线提交报名信息，并根据应征地兵役机关统一要求，参加体格检查、政治考核等后续招收工作。
HYP: Young candidates can inquire about the conditions for direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers and the distribution of recruitment majors in various places through the National Recruitment Network (website: http://www.gfbzb.gov.cn), submit registration information online that meets the professional scope and recruitment conditions, and participate in follow-up recruitment work such as physical examination and political assessment according to the unified requirements of the military service organs of the places to be recruited.

SRC: 因招收专业和计划限制未能被招收为士官的合格青年，可以参加义务兵征集，服义务兵役期满选取为士官时，在普通高等学校按规定学制就读的年数视同服役时间。
HYP: Qualified young people who cannot be recruited as non-commissioned officers due to professional recruitment and planning restrictions can participate in the recruitment of conscripts. When they are selected as non-commissioned officers at the end of their compulsory military service, the number of years they have studied in ordinary institutions of higher learning according to the prescribed academic system shall be regarded as service time.

SRC: 今年士官招收工作由省级或地市级人民政府征兵办公室统一组织，报名潜力丰富专业将在综合衡量报名对象学历层次、在校期间专业课成绩、取得职业资格证书等情况基础上择优遴选；稀缺专业将面向本地符合专业要求、具备招收优势的院校定向对口招收。
HYP: This year's recruitment of non-commissioned officers is organized by the conscription office of the provincial or prefecture-level people's government. Major with rich registration potential will be selected on the basis of comprehensive measurement of the educational level of the applicants, the results of professional courses during school, and the acquisition of professional qualification certificates; Scarce majors will be targeted for local colleges and universities that meet professional requirements and have recruitment advantages.

SRC: 根据疫情常态化防控要求，今年直招士官原则上不安排自行报到，将与义务兵同步组织运输入营。
HYP: According to the requirements of epidemic prevention and control, this year's direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers will not be arranged to report on their own in principle, and will be organized and transported into the camp simultaneously with conscripts.

SRC: 根据疫情<v>常态化</v>防控要求，今年直招士官原则上不安排自行报到，将与义务兵同步组织运输入营。
HYP: According to the requirements of epidemic prevention and control, this year's direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers will not be arranged to report on their own in principle, and will be organized and transported into the camp simultaneously with conscripts.

SRC: 直接招收士官入伍时间从2020年9月1日起算，部队下达士官任职命令的时间为2020年12月1日。
HYP: The time for direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers into the army will be calculated from September 1, 2020, and the time for the army to issue orders for non-commissioned officers to serve is December 1, 2020.

SRC: 部队接收单位将科学制定入伍和专业训练方案，认真组织施训；训练完成后按照专业对口、招用一致的原则，将招收士官统一精准分配到对口专业技术岗位。
HYP: The receiving unit of the army will scientifically formulate enlistment and professional training programs, and carefully organize training; After the completion of the training, in accordance with the principle of professional matching and consistent recruitment, the recruited non-commissioned officers will be uniformly and accurately assigned to corresponding professional and technical positions.

SRC: 驻英使馆发言人：中国政府是网络安全的坚定维护者-中新网
HYP: Spokesperson of the Embassy in the UK: The Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber securit - Chinanews.com

SRC: 中新网7月26日电据中国驻英国大使馆网站消息，25日，中国驻英国使馆发言人就有关网络攻击错误言论答记者问。
HYP: BEIJING, July 26 (Xinhua) According to the website of the Chinese Embassy in the UK, on the 25th, a spokesman of the Chinese Embassy in the UK answered a reporter's question on false remarks about cyber attacks.

SRC: 发言人强调，中国政府是网络安全的坚定维护者，一贯坚决反对并打击任何形式的网络攻击和网络犯罪。
HYP: The spokesman stressed that the Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security and has always resolutely opposed and cracked down on any form of cyber attacks and cyber crimes.

SRC: 有记者提问：据媒体称，与中国有关的黑客组织曾干扰一家英国公司网络系统、向存有专利数据的英美技术公司发动攻击、入侵欧盟国家政府网络。
HYP: A reporter asked: According to the media, hacker organizations related to China once interfered with the network system of a British company, launched attacks on British and American technology companies with patent data, and invaded the government networks of EU countries.

SRC: 发言人表示，中国政府是网络安全的坚定维护者，一贯坚决反对并打击任何形式的网络攻击和网络犯罪。
HYP: The spokesman said that the Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security and has always resolutely opposed and cracked down on any form of cyber attacks and cyber crimes.

SRC: 网络空间虚拟性强，溯源难，行为体多样，在调查和定性网络事件的时候应拿出充分的证据，不能无端猜测。
HYP: Cyberspace is virtual, difficult to trace, and diverse actors. When investigating and characterizing network events, sufficient evidence should be produced, and unprovoked speculation should not be allowed.

SRC: 发言人称，以往的“棱镜门”等一系列事件证明，美国一直都在进行全球最大范围的网络窃密行动。
HYP: The spokesman said that a series of incidents such as the "Prism Gate" in the past proved that the United States has been carrying out the world's largest cyber theft operation.

SRC: 维护网络空间的和平与稳定符合所有国家的共同利益。
HYP: Maintaining peace and stability in cyberspace is in the common interest of all countries.

SRC: 发言人指出，中国在科技创新方面的成就不是偷来的、不是抢来的，而是通过自力更生、艰苦奋斗得来的。
HYP: The spokesman pointed out that China's achievements in scientific and technological innovation were not stolen or robbed, but obtained through self-reliance and hard work.

SRC: 2019年中国通过《专利合作条约》(PCT)途径提交了约5.9万件专利申请，年增长率为10.6%，成为提交国际专利申请量最多的国家。
HYP: In 2019, China submitted about 59000 patent applications through the Patent Cooperation Treaty (PCT), with an annual growth rate of 10.6%, making it the country with the largest number of international patent applications.

SRC: 中国已经成为创新和知识产权大国。
HYP: China has become a big country in innovation and intellectual property rights.

SRC: 乌鲁木齐免费核酸检测多数区已基本完成高风险地区进行二次检测-中新网
HYP: Most areas of free nucleic acid testing in Urumqi have basically completed secondary testing in high-risk area - Chinanews.com

SRC: 中新网乌鲁木齐7月26日电(记者孙亭文赵雅敏)乌鲁木齐市卫健委主任张卫26日在通报乌鲁木齐市最新疫情和核酸检测情况时称，目前，乌鲁木齐全市免费核酸检测工作多数区已基本完成。
HYP: Chinanews.com, Urumqi, July 26 (Reporter Sun Tingwen, Zhao Yamin) Zhang Wei, director of the Urumqi Municipal Health Commission, reported the latest epidemic situation and nucleic acid testing in Urumqi on the 26th, saying that at present, free nucleic acid testing in Urumqi has been basically completed in most districts.

SRC: 国务院专家组和自治区、乌鲁木齐市专家正在根据核酸检测和流行病学调查结果，对疫情的发展做进一步评估。
HYP: The expert group of the State Council and experts from autonomous regions and Urumqi are making further assessments of the development of the epidemic based on the results of nucleic acid testing and epidemiological investigations.

SRC: 新疆维吾尔自治区新闻办公室26日召开新闻发布会通报新疆疫情和防控情况。
HYP: The Information Office of Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region held a press conference on the 26th to report the epidemic situation and prevention and control in Xinjiang.

SRC: 据他介绍，7月25日0时至24时，乌鲁木齐市新增新冠肺炎确诊病例22例(其中5例为无症状感染者转确诊病例) ，新增无症状感染者38例。
HYP: According to him, from 00:00 to 24:00 on July 25, there were 22 new confirmed cases of COVID-19 in Urumqi (including 5 cases of asymptomatic infection transferred to confirmed cases) and 38 new asymptomatic infection.

SRC: 截至7月25日24时，乌鲁木齐市现有确诊病例135例，无症状感染者147例。
HYP: As of 24:00 on July 25, Urumqi had 135 confirmed cases and 147 asymptomatic infections.

SRC: 25日新增的无症状感染者也基本上都是通过全市免费核酸检测、主动筛查出来的。
HYP: The new asymptomatic infected persons on the 25th were basically screened out through free nucleic acid testing and active screening in the city.

SRC: 乌鲁木齐市卫健委主任张卫26日称，乌鲁木齐全市免费核酸检测工作多数区已基本完成。
HYP: Zhang Wei, director of Urumqi Health and Health Commission, said on the 26th that free nucleic acid testing in Urumqi has been basically completed in most districts.

SRC: 他还说，从国内其他地区的经验看，影响核酸检测结果的因素很多，比如检测试剂灵敏度、受检测人员的感染时间和排毒时间、标本取材时受检测者配合情况(配合度差可能导致标本没有取到位)以及检测环境、检验人员的操作熟练程度等。
HYP: He also said that from the experience of other regions in China, there are many factors that affect the nucleic acid test results, such as the sensitivity of the test reagent, the infection time and detoxification time of the tested personnel, the cooperation of the tested personnel when taking samples (poor cooperation may lead to the samples not being taken in place), the testing environment, the operation proficiency of the inspectors, and so on.

SRC: 由于各种原因，核酸检测也会出现假阴性的结果。
HYP: For various reasons, false negative results will also appear in nucleic acid testing.

SRC: 所谓假阴性，就是指受检测者确实是感染者，但是核酸检测结果却为阴性。
HYP: The so-called false negative means that the tested person is indeed infected, but the nucleic acid test result is negative.

SRC: 另外，对于和确诊病例、疑似病例有过密切接触的人员，通常需要两次核酸检测才能排除。
HYP: In addition, people who have had close contact with confirmed cases and suspected cases usually need two nucleic acid tests to be excluded.

SRC: 对于去过疫情中高风险地区的人员，如果出现发热和呼吸道症状，一次核酸检测阴性存在假阴性可能，所以也需要两次核酸检测才能排除。
HYP: For people who have been to high-risk areas in the epidemic, if fever and respiratory symptoms occur, a negative nucleic acid test may have a false negative, so two nucleic acid tests are needed to rule out.

SRC: 他表示，鉴于以上情况，为了全市各族群众的身体健康，从今天开始，乌鲁木齐市将对天山区、沙依巴克区等重点地区进行二次免费核酸检测，同时开展“查遗补漏” 。
HYP: He said that in view of the above situation, for the health of the people of all ethnic groups in the city, starting today, Urumqi will conduct secondary free nucleic acid testing in key areas such as Tianshan District and Shayibak District, and at the same time carry out "checking and filling in leaks".

SRC: 据悉，天山区、沙依巴克区是疫情高风险地区。
HYP: It is reported that Tianshan District and Shayibak District are high-risk areas of the epidemic.

SRC: 白宫疫情专家福奇：对2021年初研制出疫苗持谨慎乐观
HYP: White House epidemic expert Fauci: cautiously optimistic about the development of a vaccine in early 2021

SRC: 福奇25日在国际领袖基金会主办的一场网络视频会议上作上述表示。
HYP: Fauci made the above remarks at an online video conference hosted by the International Leadership Foundation on the 25th.

SRC: 他提醒说，目前尚不清楚新冠疫情在秋冬季将如何发展，也不知道疫情的最终影响会如何，“而结束这一切的唯一办法就是我们每个人都选择成为解决问题的一部分”。
HYP: He reminded that it is not clear how the COVID-19 epidemic will develop in autumn and winter, or what the ultimate impact of the epidemic will be, "and the only way to end this is for each of us to choose to be part of the solution."

SRC: 据美国约翰斯·霍普金斯大学数据，截至25日21时，美国新冠确诊病例已达417.6万，死亡14.6万人。
HYP: According to data from Johns Hopkins University in the United States, as of 21:00 on the 25th, the number of confirmed cases of COVID-19 in the United States has reached 4.176 million, with 146000 deaths.

SRC: 福奇表示，美国一些地区目前正在艰难地同反弹的疫情作斗争。
HYP: Fauci said that some parts of the United States are struggling to fight the rebounding epidemic.

SRC: 尽管各地疫情有所不同，需要因地制宜的应对方案，但多样化的抗疫策略并不意味着地区之间没有紧密联系。
HYP: Although the epidemic situation varies from place to place and needs to be responded to according to local conditions, diversified anti-epidemic strategies do not mean that there is no close connection between regions.

SRC: 一个地区的疫情最终会影响到其他地区。
HYP: An epidemic in one area will eventually affect other areas.

SRC: “现在不是自满的时候”，福奇说，“我们的工作没有完成，必须加紧努力，也必须对未来的不确定性保持警惕。”
HYP: "Now is not the time for complacency," Fauci said. "Our work has not been completed. We must step up our efforts and be vigilant against the uncertainty in the future."

SRC: 美国华裔医学专家、治疗艾滋病“鸡尾酒疗法”创始人何大一在会上指出，美国新冠疫情尚未到达顶峰。
HYP: He Dayi, a Chinese American medical expert and founder of "cocktail therapy" for AIDS, pointed out at the meeting that the COVID-19 epidemic in the United States has not yet reached its peak.

SRC: “我们每个人都必须尽自己的一份力来减缓这一病毒的传播。”
HYP: "Each of us must do our part to slow down the spread of this virus."

SRC: 何大一呼吁，公众用自己的实际行动为科学家争取时间，以加紧研发新冠治疗药物和疫苗。
HYP: He Dayi called on the public to buy time for scientists with their own practical actions to step up the research and development of COVID-19 therapeutic drugs and vaccines.

SRC: 国际领袖基金会是一家以促进美国及亚太地区国际交流活动为宗旨的非营利性组织，致力于提升美国亚太裔地位，培育国际青年领袖。
HYP: The International Leadership Foundation is a non-profit organization with the purpose of promoting international exchange activities in the United States and the Asia-Pacific region. It is committed to promoting the status of Asian-Pacific Americans in the United States and cultivating international young leaders.

SRC: 当天，美国运输部长赵小兰、美联邦众议员孟昭文以及国际领袖基金会创会会长董继玲等分别在会上发言。
HYP: On the same day, US Secretary of Transportation Zhao Xiaolan, US Congressman Meng Zhaowen and Dong Jiling, founding president of the International Leadership Foundation, spoke at the meeting respectively.

SRC: 他们特别向在一线抗疫的亚太裔医务工作者和志愿者致敬，并呼吁美国公众继续坚持“社交距离”等防疫准则，遏制疫情扩散。
HYP: They paid special tribute to Asian-Pacific medical workers and volunteers who fought the epidemic on the front line, and called on the American public to continue to adhere to epidemic prevention guidelines such as "social distance" to curb the spread of the epidemic.

SRC: 美中贸谈代表传8月会面
HYP: Representatives of US-China Trade Talks met in August

SRC: 香港《南华早报》25日引述一名匿名知情人士报导，中国贸易谈判团队负责人、国务院副总理刘鹤与美方团队共同领导人、贸易代表赖海哲可望在8月举行正式会谈，评估双方履行中美第一阶段贸易协议的情况。
HYP: Hong Kong's South China Morning Post quoted an anonymous insider on the 25th as saying that Liu He, head of China's trade negotiation team and Vice Premier of the State Council, and Lai Haizhe, co-leader of the US team and trade representative, are expected to hold formal talks in August to assess the implementation of the first-stage trade agreement between China and the United States.

SRC: 报导说，虽然中国过去几个月已大幅提高采购美国农产品数量，但因新冠病毒疫情等因素，中方采购量距离贸易协议中承诺的数量仍有一段距离。
HYP: The report said that although China has greatly increased its purchases of US agricultural products in the past few months, due to factors such as the novel coronavirus epidemic, China's purchases are still some distance from the amount promised in the trade agreement.

SRC: 分析家说，近来美中相互关闭对方领事馆，加上其他争端，可能破坏双方在贸易方面的任何进展。
HYP: Analysts say the recent closure of each other's consulates by the United States and China, coupled with other disputes, may undermine any progress on trade between the two sides.

SRC: 中美第一阶段贸易协议在1月15日签署后一个月生效，协议中规定双方高层组成的贸易框架小组，每半年应举行一次会谈。
HYP: The first phase of the Sino-US trade agreement came into effect one month after it was signed on January 15. The agreement stipulates that the high-level trade framework group of the two sides should hold talks every six months.

SRC: 知情人士透露，此次会议将是“一个重要的转折点”，让双方得以评估协议进展。
HYP: According to informed sources, the meeting will be "an important turning point", allowing both sides to assess the progress of the agreement.

SRC: 但这名人士也说，若美中紧张关系导致此时会谈意愿不高，双方可能会同意，赖海哲与刘鹤5月8日的电话会议，即已满足贸易协议中每半年会谈一次的条款。
HYP: However, this person also said that if the tension between the United States and China leads to a low willingness to talk at this time, the two sides may agree that the conference call between Lai Haizhe and Liu He on May 8 has already met the terms of the semi-annual talks in the trade agreement.

SRC: 今年以来，中美关系急速恶化，双方争端包括新冠病毒起源、贸易、香港、新疆、南海与意识形态等一系列问题。
HYP: Since the beginning of this year, Sino-US relations have deteriorated rapidly, and disputes between the two sides include a series of issues such as the origin of Novel Coronavirus, trade, Hong Kong, Xinjiang, South China Sea and ideology.

SRC: 美国总统特朗普虽在年初吹嘘自己在首阶段协议中取得的成就，但近来态度改变。
HYP: Although US President Trump boasted about his achievements in the first phase of the agreement at the beginning of the year, his attitude has changed recently.

SRC: 他23日在白宫记者会上说，虽然中国近来单日采购美国玉米数量破纪录，也买了很多大豆，“但这份贸易协议现在对我的意义，已不如当初达成时” 。
HYP: He said at a White House press conference on the 23rd that although China has recently purchased a record amount of US corn in a single day and bought a lot of soybeans, "this trade agreement is not as meaningful to me as it was when it was reached."

SRC: 一位匿名北京政府顾问也认为，由于美中关系不佳，新一轮贸易谈判不太可能进行， “贸易议题在中美关系已失去分量”。
HYP: An anonymous Beijing government adviser also believes that due to poor US-China relations, a new round of trade negotiations is unlikely to take place, and "trade issues have lost weight in Sino-US relations".

SRC: 但他透露，中国经贸相关单位23日仍开会讨论了一系列问题，包括如何增加从美国的进口量， “我们已经尽力买了，所以任何追加采购会有困难” 。
HYP: However, he revealed that China's economic and trade related units still met on the 23rd to discuss a series of issues, including how to increase imports from the United States. "We have tried our best to buy, so any additional purchases will be difficult."

SRC: 美中贸易全国委员会副会长彭捷宁表示，保持首阶段协议动能“比以往任何时候都更重要”， 并指中国今年在进一步向美企开放金融市场上有所进展。
HYP: Peng Jiening, vice president of the US-China Business Council, said that it is "more important than ever" to maintain the momentum of the first phase of the agreement, and pointed out that China has made progress in further opening its financial markets to US enterprises this year.

SRC: 独立研究公司Plenum分析师说：“谈比不谈好，尽管可能只被当成例行公事。”
HYP: Analysts at Plenum, an independent research company, said: "It is better to talk than not to talk, although it may only be regarded as routine."

SRC: 余额宝收益下行“90后”反而“报复性”存钱？
HYP: Yu'e Bao's income declines, "post-90s" but "retaliatory" to save money?

SRC: 随着余额宝收益下行， “90后”不仅没有逃离余额宝，反而开始“报复性”存钱了？
HYP: With the decline of Yu'e Bao's income, the "post-90s" not only did not escape Yu'e Bao, but began to "retaliate" to save money?

SRC: 中国新经济研究院联合支付宝日前发布的《余额宝90后攒钱报告》（2020版）显示，上半年，“90后”更爱攒钱了：人均攒钱金额比2019年增长近四成。
HYP: The "Yu'e Bao Post-90s Saving Report" (2020 Edition) released by the China New Economic Research Institute and Alipay recently shows that in the first half of the year, the "post-90s" are more likely to save money: the amount of money saved per capita is nearly 40% higher than that in 2019.

SRC: 有意思的是，“90后”更倾向于从一笔笔“小钱”开始攒，有六成平均每笔攒钱金额在20元以下… …
HYP: Interestingly, the "post-90s" are more inclined to save from a small amount of money, with 60% of the average amount of money saved below 20 yuan...

SRC: 用余额宝攒钱，也成为“90后”的攒钱习惯。
HYP: Saving money with Yu'e Bao has also become the saving habit of the post-90s generation.

SRC: 数据显示，在7亿余额宝用户中，有1.34亿用户是“90后” 。
HYP: Data show that among the 700 million Yu'ebao users, 134 million are "post-90s".

SRC: 中国有1.74亿“90后” ，也就是说，全国每4个“90后”中约有3个在用余额宝攒钱。
HYP: There are 174 million "post-90s" in China, that is to say, about 3 out of every 4 "post-90s" in China are saving money with Yu'e Bao.

SRC: 目前，余额宝等货币基金的7日年化收益率从年初高于2%的水平，下滑到1.5%左右。
HYP: At present, the 7-day annualized rate of return of Yu'e Bao and other monetary funds has dropped to about 1.5% from a level higher than 2% at the beginning of the year.

SRC: 即使如此，也没有影响“90后”攒钱的步伐。
HYP: Even so, it did not affect the pace of saving money for the post-90s generation.

SRC: 而在余额宝“攒钱效应”提升背景下，不少习惯使用余额宝的年轻人还直接转化为“基民”。
HYP: Under the background of the promotion of Yu'e Bao's "saving effect", many young people who are used to using Yu'e Bao have directly transformed into "basic people".

SRC: 支付宝数据显示，截至7月13日，近一个月支付宝上的新“基民”同比增长1倍多，越来越多年轻人在支付宝上实现“进阶”理财。
HYP: According to Alipay data, as of July 13, the number of new "basic people" on Alipay has more than doubled year-on-year in the past month, and more and more young people have realized "advanced" financial management on Alipay.

SRC: 有分析师认为，资金从余额宝流入股市，也是6月货币基金份额明确下滑的重要原因。
HYP: Some analysts believe that the inflow of funds from Yu'e Bao into the stock market is also an important reason for the clear decline in the share of money funds in June.

SRC: 报告还显示，“90后”女生更倾向于多攒钱，平均比男生攒钱金额高两成；在支付宝平台上持有基金的用户中，6成是男性，女性与男性相比倾向于选择更为稳健的理财方式。
HYP: The report also shows that "post-90s" girls are more inclined to save more money, with an average amount of 20% higher than that of boys; 60% of the users who hold funds on Alipay platform are men, and women tend to choose more stable financial management methods than men.

SRC: 存钱之后，“90后”有何计划？
HYP: After saving money, what are the plans of the post-90s generation?

SRC: 支付宝数据显示，“90后”有为目标攒钱的习惯，将旅行作为攒钱目标的用户最多。
HYP: Alipay data show that the "post-90s" have the habit of saving money for their goals, with the largest number of users taking travel as their goal of saving money.

SRC: 受疫情影响，许多“90后”攒钱为疫情后的旅行做准备；电影院恢复营业，也为从攒钱转向消费提供了新途径。
