HYP: Affected by the epidemic, many "post-90s" saved money to prepare for travel after the epidemic; the reopening of cinemas also provides a new way to switch from saving money to consumption.

SRC: 让一面面鲜艳的党旗在抗洪大堤上高高飘扬
HYP: Let a bright party flag fly high on the flood-fighting levee

SRC: 近期我国南方受连续降雨影响，防汛抗洪形势十分严峻，造成贵州、四川、湖南、广西、广东、湖北等26省(区、市)受灾。
HYP: Recently, affected by continuous rainfall in southern China, the situation of flood control and flood fighting is very severe, causing disasters in 26 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities) such as Guizhou, Sichuan, Hunan, Guangxi, Guangdong and Hubei.

SRC: 灾情就是命令，灾区就是战场，灾害面前，党旗就是战旗，各级党组织、广大党员干部、人民子弟兵坚决落实习近平总书记关于防汛救灾工作重要指示精神，迅速投身防汛抗洪抢险救灾第一线，成为灾区群众的主心骨、抗洪战斗的生力军。
HYP: Disaster is an order, disaster area is a battlefield, and in front of disaster, the party flag is a battle flag. Party organizations at all levels, the majority of party members and cadres, and the people's army resolutely implement the spirit of General Secretary Xi Jinping's important instructions on flood control and disaster relief work, quickly join the front line of flood control and disaster relief, and become the backbone of the people in disaster areas and a new force in flood fighting.

SRC: 鲜艳的党旗在抗洪大堤上高高飘扬，是忠诚的体现，也是使命的召唤。
HYP: The bright party flag flutters high on the flood-fighting levee, which is the embodiment of loyalty and the call of mission.

SRC: 灾害面前，一个党组织就是一座战斗堡垒，一名党员干部就是一面旗帜。
HYP: In the face of disasters, a party organization is a fighting fortress, and a party member and cadre is a banner.

SRC: 在各地的抗洪一线，各级党组织、广大党员干部体现高度的对党忠诚，听从党中央号召，以“看我的”的行动、“跟我来”的步伐、“我先上”的勇气，筑起一座座冲不垮的钢铁堡垒，挺起一个个压不弯的中国脊梁。
HYP: On the front line of flood fighting in various places, party organizations at all levels and the majority of party members and cadres have demonstrated a high degree of loyalty to the party, listened to the call of the Party Central Committee, and with the actions of "looking at me", the pace of "coming with me", and the courage of "I go first", built steel fortresses that cannot be washed down, and erected the backbone of China that cannot be bent.

SRC: 鲜艳的党旗在抗洪大堤上高高飘扬，是阵地的坚守，也是冲锋的号角。
HYP: The bright party flag flutters high on the flood-fighting levee, which is the persistence of the position and the clarion call of charge.

SRC: 面对洪涝灾害，各级党组织迅速行动，吹响抗洪“冲锋号”，把鲜艳的党旗插在抗洪的大堤上，广大党员干部、人民子弟兵坚守在抗洪的阵地上，用“党旗在阵地就在”、“洪水不退永不收兵”的意志和行动，成为灾区群众最放心也最值得信赖的坚固屏障。
HYP: In the face of floods, party organizations at all levels acted quickly, sounded the flood fighting "charge", planted bright party flags on the flood fighting levees, and the majority of party members and cadres and people's soldiers stuck to the flood fighting positions, and became the most reassuring and trustworthy solid barrier for the people in the disaster areas with the will and actions of "the party flag is in the position" and "the flood will never retreat".

SRC: 鲜艳的党旗在抗洪大堤上高高飘扬，是无私的奉献，也是责任的担当。
HYP: The bright party flag flutters high on the flood-fighting levee, which is selfless dedication and responsibility.

SRC: 危难时刻，彰显党员本色，在人民群众生命财产受到严重威胁的时刻，党员干部、人民子弟兵舍小家、顾大家，无私奉献，敢于担当，把打赢防汛抗洪抢险救灾这场硬仗，作为全面检验能力、作风、素养的主战场、阅兵场，正是这种无私奉献和担当的精神，极大的鼓舞着灾区群众战胜灾情的信心和决心，凝聚起打赢防汛抗洪抢险救灾的强大精神力量。
HYP: In times of crisis, show the true colors of party members. At a time when the lives and property of the people are seriously threatened, party members and cadres and people's soldiers give up their families and take care of everyone, make selfless dedication and dare to take responsibility, and take winning the hard battle of flood control, flood fighting, emergency rescue and disaster relief as the main battlefield and parade ground for comprehensively testing ability, style and accomplishment. It is this spirit of selfless dedication and responsibility that greatly inspires the confidence and determination of the people in the disaster areas to overcome the disaster and condenses a strong spiritual force to win flood control, flood fighting, emergency rescue and disaster relief.

SRC: “人民至上、生命至上”， 既在平时接受检验，更在关键时刻接受考验。
HYP: "People first, life first" is tested not only at ordinary times, but also at critical moments.

SRC: 在抗洪大堤上，广大党员干部和人民子弟兵，要让人民群众随时随处都能看到鲜红的党旗、奋斗的身影、鼓励的声音，用洪水冲不垮的钢铁堤坝为党旗增辉添彩，让一面面鲜艳的党旗在抗洪大堤上高高飘扬！
HYP: On the flood-fighting levee, the majority of party members and cadres and the people's army should let the people see the bright red party flag, the figure of struggle and the voice of encouragement everywhere at any time, add luster to the party flag with the steel dam that cannot be washed down by the flood, and let the bright party flag fly high on the flood-fighting levee!

SRC: APEC成员贸易部长会议表示将加速推动区域经济复苏-新华网
HYP: APEC member trade ministers meeting says it will accelerate regional economic recover - Xinhuanet

SRC: 新华社吉隆坡7月25日电（记者林昊）亚太经合组织（APEC）成员贸易部长视频会议25日举行，会议承诺将致力于减少新冠疫情对本区域经济的影响，加速推动实现具有弹性、可持续性和包容性的区域经济复苏。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Kuala Lumpur, July 25 (Reporter Lin Hao) The video conference of trade ministers of APEC members was held on the 25th. The meeting promised to work to reduce the impact of COVID-19 Epidemic on the regional economy and accelerate the realization of flexible, sustainable and inclusive regional economic recovery.

SRC: 会议由今年APEC领导人非正式会议主办方马来西亚主持。
HYP: The meeting was hosted by Malaysia, the organizer of this year's APEC Leaders' Informal Meeting.

SRC: 会后发表的联合声明表示，APEC成员贸易部长认识到，在这一具有挑战性的时刻，一个自由、开放、公平、非歧视、透明和可预测的贸易和投资环境对于推动经济复苏的重要性。
HYP: The joint statement issued after the meeting said that the trade ministers of APEC members recognized the importance of a free, open, fair, non-discriminatory, transparent and predictable trade and investment environment to promote economic recovery at this challenging time.

SRC: 各方承诺，确保为应对疫情所采取的紧急措施是具有针对性、恰当、透明和临时的，不会制造不必要的贸易壁垒并扰乱全球供应链，同时遵守世界贸易组织规则。
HYP: All parties promise to ensure that the emergency measures taken in response to the epidemic are targeted, appropriate, transparent and temporary, will not create unnecessary trade barriers and disrupt the global supply chain, and comply with the rules of the World Trade Organization.

SRC: APEC成员贸易部长在声明中承诺，加强合作促进必要的商品和服务流动，通过加强供应链弹性促进互联互通，将医疗物资、食品和农业产品流动所受到的干扰最小化，以应对疫情。
HYP: In the statement, the trade ministers of APEC members promised to strengthen cooperation to promote the flow of necessary goods and services, promote interconnection by strengthening supply chain flexibility, and minimize interference to the flow of medical supplies, food and agricultural products in response to the epidemic.

SRC: APEC成员贸易部长一致认为，有必要讨论如何减少限制必要商品贸易的非关税壁垒，重申将致力于在不影响为阻止疫情蔓延所采取措施的情况下促进必要的跨境人员流动。
HYP: The trade ministers of APEC members agreed that it is necessary to discuss how to reduce non-tariff barriers that restrict the trade of necessary commodities, and reiterated their commitment to promote the necessary cross-border movement of people without affecting the measures taken to prevent the spread of the epidemic.

SRC: 会议还发布了有关促进必要商品流通的宣言。
HYP: The meeting also issued a declaration on promoting the circulation of necessary commodities.

SRC: 宣言表示，各经济体将确保其为应对疫情所采取的贸易措施符合世贸组织规定，并承诺在减少非关税贸易壁垒、贸易促进等方面采取行动，以促进疫情下必要的商品流动。
HYP: The declaration said that economies will ensure that the trade measures they take to deal with the epidemic comply with WTO regulations, and promise to take actions in reducing non-tariff trade barriers and trade promotion to promote the necessary commodity flow under the epidemic.

SRC: 主持会议的马来西亚国际贸易和工业部部长阿兹明·阿里表示，尽管受到疫情影响，马来西亚依然致力于推动今年APEC会议取得成功，制定APEC2020年后合作愿景的工作正有序推进。
HYP: Azmin Ali, Minister of International Trade and Industry of Malaysia, who presided over the meeting, said that despite the impact of the epidemic, Malaysia is still committed to promoting the success of this year's APEC meeting, and the work of formulating a vision for cooperation after APEC 2020 is progressing in an orderly manner.

SRC: 马来西亚同意以视频形式举行APEC相关会议，但不排除在年底APEC领导人非正式会议时安排实体会议的可能性。
HYP: Malaysia agrees to hold APEC-related meetings by video, but does not rule out the possibility of arranging physical meetings at the end of the year when APEC leaders meet informally.

SRC: 江西财政紧急下达2.8亿元资金支持各地灾后救助重建-中新网
HYP: Jiangxi Finance urgently issued 280 million yuan to support post-disaster relief and reconstruction in various place - Chinanews.com

SRC: 7月24日，江西省九江市湖口县，驰援当地抗洪的中国人民解放军第71集团军某部官兵利用备勤间隙，帮助湖口县一蔬菜种植专业合作社抢收辣椒。
HYP: On July 24, in Hukou County, Jiujiang City, Jiangxi Province, officers and men of a certain unit of the 71st Army of the Chinese People's Liberation Army who rushed to fight floods took advantage of the standby gap to help a vegetable planting professional cooperative in Hukou County snatch peppers.

SRC: 受此前强降雨影响，该合作社种植的上百亩红辣椒受灾严重，如不及时采摘损失会更加扩大。
HYP: Affected by the previous heavy rainfall, hundreds of mu of red peppers planted by the cooperative were seriously affected, and the losses would be even greater if they were not picked in time.

SRC: 中新社记者富田摄
HYP: Photo by China News Service reporter Futian

SRC: 中新网南昌7月26日电(袁汝晶)江西省财政厅26日消息，根据江西省防汛抗旱指挥部的工作部署和要求，该省财政紧急下达中央和省级救灾资金2.8亿元，为防汛抢险和受灾<v>群众</v>救助工作提供资金保障。
HYP: China News Service, Nanchang, July 26 (Yuan Rujing) Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance reported on the 26th that according to the work deployment and requirements of Jiangxi Provincial Flood Control and Drought Relief Headquarters, the provincial finance urgently issued 280 million yuan of central and provincial disaster relief funds to provide financial guarantee for flood control and emergency rescue and disaster relief work.

SRC: 中新网南昌7月26日电(袁汝晶)江西省财政厅26日消息，根据江西省防汛抗旱指挥部的工作部署和要求，该省财政紧急下达中央和省级救灾资金2.8亿元，为防汛抢险和受灾群众救助工作提供资金保障。
HYP: China News Service, Nanchang, July 26 (Yuan Rujing) Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance reported on the 26th that according to the work deployment and requirements of Jiangxi Provincial Flood Control and Drought Relief Headquarters, the provincial finance urgently issued 280 million yuan of central and provincial disaster relief funds to provide financial guarantee for flood control and emergency rescue and disaster relief work.

SRC: 7月份以来，江西汛期、灾情不断升级。
HYP: Since July, the flood season and disaster situation in Jiangxi have been escalating.

SRC: 洪涝灾害已导致该省农业农村直接经济损失100.7亿元、受灾面积1316.9万亩。
HYP: Flooding disasters have caused direct economic losses of 10.07 billion yuan in agriculture and rural areas in the province, with a disaster area of 13.169 million mu.

SRC: 7月17和7月22日，江西省财政先后下达中央救灾资金6000万元和2亿元。
HYP: On July 17 and July 22, Jiangxi Provincial Finance successively issued 60 million yuan and 200 million yuan of central disaster relief funds.

SRC: 同时根据灾情变化情况，从该省应急管理专项资金中连续分3批下达省级救灾资金2030万元，支持各地灾后救助和恢复重建。
HYP: At the same time, according to the changes in the disaster situation, 20.3 million yuan of provincial disaster relief funds were issued in three consecutive batches from the special funds for emergency management in the province to support post-disaster relief and recovery and reconstruction in various places.

SRC: 江西省财政厅相关负责人26日称，在汛期到来之前，已下达各类防灾减灾资金1.73亿元，确保风险防患早发现、早处置、早化解，为抗洪抢险工作提供经费支持。
HYP: The relevant person in charge of Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance said on the 26th that before the arrival of the flood season, 173 million yuan of various disaster prevention and mitigation funds had been issued to ensure early detection, early disposal and early resolution of risks and provide financial support for flood fighting and rescue work.

SRC: 目前，长江江西段和中国最大淡水湖鄱阳湖水位呈高位缓退状态。
HYP: At present, the water level in Jiangxi section of the Yangtze River and Poyang Lake, China's largest freshwater lake, is in a state of high level and slow decline.

SRC: 江西省防指于24日18时，将防汛应急响应下调至Ⅱ级；将省级救灾应急响应级别由II级调整为III级。
HYP: At 18:00 on the 24th, Jiangxi Provincial Defense Index lowered the flood control emergency response to Level II; The provincial disaster relief emergency response level was adjusted from Level II to Level III.

SRC: 灾情评估和灾后恢复重建等各项工作将持续进行。
HYP: Disaster assessment and post-disaster recovery and reconstruction will continue.

SRC: 国家卫健委：7月25日新增确诊病例46例，新疆22例辽宁13例- 经济观察网
HYP: National Health Commission:46 new confirmed cases on July 25, 22 cases in Xinjiang and 13 cases in Liaoning-Economic Observation Network

SRC: 据国家卫生健康委员会消息，7月25日0—24时，31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增确诊病例46例，其中境外输入病例11例（内蒙古5例，广东3例，天津1例，福建1例，山东1例），本土病例35例（新疆22例，辽宁13例）；无新增死亡病例；新增疑似病例2例，均为境外输入病例（内蒙古1例，上海1例） 。
HYP: According to the National Health Commission, from 0:00 to 24:00 on July 25, 31 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 46 new confirmed cases, including 11 imported cases (5 cases in Inner Mongolia, 3 cases in Guangdong, 1 case in Tianjin, 1 case in Fujian and 1 case in Shandong) and 35 local cases (22 cases in Xinjiang and 13 cases in Liaoning); There were no new deaths; There were 2 new suspected cases, all of which were imported from abroad (1 case in Inner Mongolia and 1 case in Shanghai).

SRC: 当日新增治愈出院病例19例，解除医学观察的密切接触者673人，重症病例较前一日增加7例。
HYP: On that day, 19 new cases were cured and discharged, 673 close contacts were released from medical observation, and 7 severe cases increased compared with the previous day.

SRC: 境外输入现有确诊病例82例（其中重症病例2例），现有疑似病例3例。
HYP: There are 82 confirmed cases (including 2 severe cases) and 3 suspected cases imported from abroad.

SRC: 累计确诊病例2045例，累计治愈出院病例1963例，无死亡病例。
HYP: A total of 2045 confirmed cases, 1963 cured and discharged cases, and no deaths.

SRC: 截至7月25日24时，据31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告，现有确诊病例288例（其中重症病例18例），累计治愈出院病例78908例，累计死亡病例4634例，累计报告确诊病例83830例，现有疑似病例3例。
HYP: As of 24:00 on July 25, according to reports from 31 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps, there are 288 confirmed cases (including 18 severe cases), 78908 cured and discharged cases, 4634 dead cases, 83830 confirmed cases and 3 suspected cases.

SRC: 累计追踪到密切接触者779000人，尚在医学观察的密切接触者11762人。
HYP: A total of 779000 close contacts were tracked, and 11762 close contacts were still under medical observation.

SRC: 31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增无症状感染者68例（境外输入8例）；当日转为确诊病例17例（无境外输入） ；当日解除医学观察10例（境外输入7例）；尚在医学观察无症状感染者292例（境外输入91例）。
HYP: Thirty-one provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 68 new asymptomatic infections (8 imported from abroad); On the same day, 17 cases were confirmed (no imported from abroad); On the same day, 10 cases were released from medical observation (7 imported from abroad); There are 292 asymptomatic infections under medical observation (91 imported from abroad).

SRC: 累计收到港澳台地区通报确诊病例3009例。
HYP: A total of 3009 confirmed cases were reported from Hong Kong, Macao and Taiwan.

SRC: 其中，香港特别行政区2505例（出院1455例，死亡18例），澳门特别行政区46例（出院46例），台湾地区458例（出院440例，死亡7例）。
HYP: Among them, there were 2505 cases in Hong Kong Special Administrative Region (1455 cases discharged and 18 deaths), 46 cases in Macao Special Administrative Region (46 cases discharged) and 458 cases in Taiwan (440 cases discharged and 7 deaths).

SRC: 专家说通过美国人口普查收集移民资料用于众院席位分配违宪
HYP: Experts say it is unconstitutional to collect immigration data through the US Census for the allocation of seats in the House of Representatives

SRC: 一些民权组织和好几个美国城市和县对美国联邦政府提出起诉，称特朗普总统府试图将无证移民排除在美国人口普查之外是行不通的，也是违宪的。
HYP: Some civil rights organizations and several US cities and counties sued the US federal government, saying that the Trump presidential palace's attempt to exclude undocumented immigrants from the US census was unworkable and unconstitutional.

SRC: 美国人口普查将决定美国国会众议院席位的分配。
HYP: The US Census will determine the allocation of seats in the House of Representatives of the US Congress.

SRC: 美国民权自由联盟执行律师萨拉·布兰农对美国之音说，“这么做是行不通的。”
HYP: Sarah Brannon, executive lawyer of the American Civil Liberties Union, told VOA, "This will not work."

SRC: 她接着说，特朗普要求在人口普查中确定接受普查的人的公民身份难以做到，而且“不是很可靠。”
HYP: She went on to say that Trump's request to determine the citizenship of the census takers in the census is difficult to do and "not very reliable."

SRC: 另一个公民自由组织共同事业组织星期四提出诉讼，对特朗普的行政令提出挑战。
HYP: Another civil liberties organization, Common Business, filed a lawsuit Thursday challenging Trump's executive order.

SRC: 新泽西州、乔治亚州的一些城市加入了诉讼。
HYP: Some cities in New Jersey and Georgia joined the lawsuit.

SRC: 维吉尼亚州的阿灵顿县星期五也加入了诉讼。
HYP: Arlington County, Virginia, joined the lawsuit Friday.

SRC: 阿灵顿县的管理董事会主席加维说，“美国宪法要求每10年准确地清点我们的人口。我们必须准确地清点居住在阿灵顿县的每一个人，不能让这种非法试图吓跑人和压缩我们的移民社区人数的做法得逞。”
HYP: Garvey, chairman of Arlington County's management board, said, "The US Constitution requires an accurate count of our population every 10 years. We must accurately count everyone living in Arlington County, and we must not let this illegal attempt to scare people away and reduce the number of our immigrant communities succeed."

SRC: 另一些组织和个人则赞扬特朗普总统的行政令。
HYP: Other organizations and individuals praised President Trump's executive order.

SRC: 阿拉巴马州司法部长马歇尔称，该行政令是该州的一个“胜利”。
HYP: Alabama Attorney General Marshall called the executive order a "victory" for the state.

SRC: 他说，“分配各州的国会众议院席位和选举团席位的时候，必须根据居住在各州的居民人数，而且是合法居住的居民的人数。”
HYP: He said, "When allocating seats in the House of Representatives and electoral college seats in each state, it must be based on the number of residents living in each state and the number of residents living legally."

SRC: 美国最高法院去年阻止了特朗普行政当局将公民身份问题纳入2020年人口普查表中。
HYP: The US Supreme Court last year blocked the Trump administration from including citizenship issues in the 2020 census.

SRC: 特朗普总统本星期早些时候签署一项行政令，指令监管美国人口普查局的商业部长罗斯提交人口普查所得的无证人口的数据，以便行政当局将这些无证人口排除在各州的人口普查数字之外，并以此确定每个州究竟是增加还是减少或保持众议院议员席位。
HYP: President Trump signed an executive order earlier this week instructing Secretary of Commerce Ross, who oversees the US Census Bureau, to submit data on undocumented people from the census so that the administration can exclude these undocumented people from the census figures of each state and determine whether each state will increase, decrease or maintain seats in the House of Representatives.

SRC: 美国每隔10年就要根据人口变化情况重新分配众议院席位。
HYP: The United States redistributes seats in the House of Representatives every 10 years according to demographic changes.

SRC: 新书爆料：哈利王子觉得哥哥“势利傲慢”
HYP: New book reveals: Prince Harry thinks his brother is "snobbish and arrogant"

SRC: 英国《泰晤士报》和《星期日泰晤士报》连载名为《寻找自由》（Finding Freedom）的新书，内容描绘哈利王子（Prince Harry）与妻子梅根（Meghan Markle）的王室生活心路历程。
HYP: The British Times and Sunday Times serialized a new book called Finding Freedom, which depicts the royal life of Prince Harry and his wife Meghan Markle.

SRC: 英国《泰晤士报》和《星期日泰晤士报》连载名为《寻找自由》（Finding Freedom）的新书，内容描绘哈利王子（Prince Harry）与妻子梅根（Meghan Markle）的王室生活<v>心路历程</v>。
HYP: The British Times and Sunday Times serialized a new book called Finding Freedom, which depicts the royal life of Prince Harry and his wife Meghan Markle.

SRC: 但路透社报导，哈利和梅根已和这本书撇清关系，说他们未接受作者访问，也未提供任何内容。
HYP: However, Reuters reported that Harry and Megan had distanced themselves from the book, saying that they had not been interviewed by the author or provided any content.

SRC: 《星期日泰晤士报》报导，新书引述消息人士表示，哈利和梅根婚前约会时，威廉王子（Prince William）想确认原是好莱坞女星的梅根对哈利是否别有用心。
HYP: The Sunday Times reported that the new book quoted sources as saying that when Harry and Megan were dating before marriage, Prince William wanted to confirm whether Megan, who was originally a Hollywood actress, had ulterior motives for Harry.

SRC: 根据消息人士转述，威廉当时曾对哈利说：“你别感觉有必要仓促（娶梅根）。
HYP: According to sources, William said to Harry at that time: "Don't feel the need to rush (marry Megan).

SRC: 你可以尽量花时间去了解这个女孩。”
HYP: You can spend as much time as possible getting to know this girl. "

SRC: 报导说，当哈利听到威廉用“这个女孩”形容梅根，他从哥哥语气中感受到傲慢势利，他也认为自己不再需要他人照顾提醒。
HYP: The report said that when Harry heard William describe Megan as "this girl", he felt arrogant and snobbish from his brother's tone, and he also thought that he no longer needed others to take care of him.

SRC: 报导说，当哈利听到威廉用“这个女孩”形容梅根，他从哥哥语气中感受到傲慢势利，他也认为自己不再需要他人照顾<v>提醒</v>。
HYP: The report said that when Harry heard William describe Megan as "this girl", he felt arrogant and snobbish from his brother's tone, and he also thought that he no longer needed others to take care of him.

SRC: 哈利和梅根今年1月宣布计划过更独立的生活，并将自食其力。
HYP: Harry and Megan announced in January this year that they plan to live a more independent life and will support themselves.

SRC: 两人3月正式卸下王室高阶成员身分后，目前带著儿子亚契（Archie）住在美国洛杉矶追求新事业。
HYP: After the two officially stepped down as senior members of the royal family in March, they now live in Los Angeles with their son Archie to pursue a new career.

SRC: 哈利和梅根在2018年5月结婚。
HYP: Harry and Megan got married in May 2018.

SRC: 当时这场婚姻被视为为英国王室注入好莱坞的光鲜亮丽和新时代气息，两人也因此成为当代全球最受瞩目的名人夫妻档之一。
HYP: At that time, the marriage was regarded as injecting Hollywood's glamour and new era atmosphere into the British royal family, and the two became one of the most eye-catching celebrity couples in the world.

SRC: 越南驻老挝大使馆公使衔参赞郑氏心、在老挝越南佛教协会、老挝越南人总会、万象省政府代表、老挝老兵协会等代表一同参加了祭奠仪式。
HYP: Zheng Shixin, Minister Counsellor of the Vietnamese Embassy in Laos, representatives of the Lao Vietnamese Buddhist Association, the Lao Vietnamese Association, the Vientiane Provincial Government, and the Lao Veterans Association attended the memorial ceremony.

SRC: 英烈祭奠仪式在庄严肃穆的气氛中举行，各位代表陆续向英烈们上香，缅怀英烈们的丰功伟绩及越老特殊团结关系。
HYP: The memorial ceremony for the heroes was held in a solemn atmosphere, and representatives offered incense to the heroes one after another, remembering their great achievements and the special solidarity between Vietnam and Laos.

SRC: 公使衔参赞郑氏心在讲话中表示，这是在老越南人和老挝人民共同缅怀两国革命英烈，一起对为两国独立自由牺牲的英烈表达感恩之心的机会，同时也是两国人民回顾两国并肩协作打击共同敌人，争取民族独立，国家统一，共同建设国家发展，巩固两国关系的良好机会。
HYP: Minister Counsellor Zheng Shixin said in his speech that this is an opportunity for the old Vietnamese and Lao people to cherish the memory of the revolutionary heroes and heroes of the two countries and express their gratitude to the heroes and heroes who sacrificed for the independence and freedom of the two countries. At the same time, it is also a good opportunity for the people of the two countries to recall that the two countries work side by side to fight against common enemies, strive for national independence and national unity, jointly build national development and consolidate bilateral relations.

SRC: 74年前的1946年1月23日， 老越战斗联盟的28名战士在进攻Phonehe据点时英勇牺牲。
HYP: Seventy-four years ago, on January 23, 1946, 28 soldiers of the Lao Vietnam Battle Alliance died heroically while attacking Phonehe stronghold.

SRC: 此次进攻取得胜利，成为两国在争取民族解放革命斗争初期阶段的具有历史性意义的胜利。
HYP: The victory of this attack became a historic victory for the two countries in the early stage of the revolutionary struggle for national liberation.

SRC: 郑氏心女士强调，两国人民永远铭记为两国民族解放斗争事业牺牲的各位英烈，同时强调两国年轻一带将继续发扬老前辈英勇、坚强的传统，为越老关系持续开花结果及两国的繁荣发展作出应有的贡献。
HYP: Ms. Zheng Shixin stressed that the people of the two countries will always remember the heroes and heroes who sacrificed for the national liberation struggle of the two countries, and stressed that the young areas of the two countries will continue to carry forward the heroic and strong tradition of their predecessors and make due contributions to the continuous flowering and fruiting of Vietnam-Laos relations and the prosperity and development of the two countries.

SRC: 里程碑式跨越！
HYP: Milestone leap!

SRC: 国际米兰解锁第3000场意甲比赛-中新网
HYP: Inter Milan unlocks the 3000th Serie A matc - Chinanews.com

SRC: 中新网客户端7月26日电北京时间26日凌晨，意甲传统豪门国际米兰迎来了里程碑之战。
HYP: BEIJING, July 26-In the early morning of the 26th Beijing time, Serie A traditional giants Inter Milan ushered in a milestone battle.

SRC: <v>中新网</v>客户端7月26日电北京时间26日凌晨，意甲传统豪门国际米兰迎来了里程碑之战。
HYP: BEIJING, July 26-In the early morning of the 26th Beijing time, Serie A traditional giants Inter Milan ushered in a milestone battle.

SRC: 据意大利媒体统计，客场对阵热那亚一役是国际米兰队史第3000场意甲联赛，蓝黑军团也是首个解锁这项里程碑的球队。
HYP: According to Italian media statistics, the away game against Genoa is the 3000 Serie A match in the history of Inter Milan, and the Nerazzurri are also the first team to unlock this milestone.

SRC: 自1929年联赛改制以来，国际米兰是唯一一支从未缺席意甲的队伍，也是唯一一支从未降级的球队。
HYP: Since the league was reformed in 1929, Inter Milan is the only team that has never missed Serie A and the only team that has never been relegated.

SRC: 据意大利媒体报道，国际米兰与热那亚的比赛是蓝黑军团队史第3000场比赛。
HYP: According to Italian media reports, the match between Inter Milan and Genoa is the 3000th match in the history of the Nerazzurri team.

SRC: 在这场里程碑之战中，国际米兰客场三球完胜热那亚。
HYP: In this milestone battle, Inter Milan defeated Genoa with three goals away.

SRC: 此役卢卡库梅开二度，替补出场的桑切斯也贡献一球。
HYP: Lukaku scored twice in this game and Sanchez, who came off the bench, also contributed a goal.

SRC: 比赛从一开始就进入了国际米兰的节奏，强攻终于在第34分钟转化为进球。
HYP: The game entered the rhythm of Inter Milan from the beginning, and the storm finally turned into a goal in the 34th minute.

SRC: 比拉吉左路传中，卢卡库中路包抄头球破门。
HYP: Bilaji crossed from the left and Lukaku headed the ball from the middle.

SRC: 比拉吉左路<v>传中</v>，卢卡库中路包抄头球破门。
HYP: Bilaji crossed from the left and Lukaku headed the ball from the middle.

SRC: 比拉吉左路传中，卢卡库中路<v>包抄</v>头球破门。
HYP: Bilaji crossed from the left and Lukaku headed the ball from the middle.

SRC: 第82分钟国际米兰如法炮制，摩西右路突破后传中，桑切斯中路包抄推射得手；终场前卢卡库完成梅开二度，反击中布罗佐维奇送出长距离直塞，卢卡库突入禁区晃过罗梅罗后推射空门得分，将比分定格在3：0。
HYP: In the 82nd minute, Inter Milan did the same thing. Moses made a breakthrough on the right and crossed. Sanchez's middle outflanked and pushed the shot successfully. Before the end, Lukaku scored twice. Brozovic sent a long-distance straight plug in the counterattack. Lukaku broke into the penalty area and swung past Romero to score an empty goal, fixing the score at 3:0.

SRC: 国际米兰客场3：0完胜热那亚，积分反超亚特兰大上升至第2，在多赛一场的情况下落后领头羊尤文图斯4分，仍保留着争冠希望。
HYP: Inter Milan beat Genoa 3-0 away, surpassing Atlanta to second place, trailing leaders Juventus by 4 points in one more game, and still retaining the hope of winning the championship.

SRC: 至此，在这跨越近90载光阴的3000场意甲联赛中，国际米兰赢得了其中的1489场，打平834场，输掉677场，胜率为49.6%。
HYP: So far, in the 3000 Serie A games spanning nearly 90 years, Inter Milan have won 1489 of them, drawn 834 games and lost 677 games, with a winning rate of 49.6%.

SRC: 其间，球队<v>共</v>打进5038球，丢3102球，场均打进1.68球。
HYP: In the meantime, the team scored 5038 goals and lost 3102 goals, averaging 1.68 goals per game.

SRC: 蓝黑军团18次获得联赛冠军，并且从未降级。
HYP: The Nerazzurri have won 18 league titles and have never been relegated.

SRC: 谍战剧老面孔柳云龙演一个结巴男主角-新华网
HYP: Liu Yunlong, the old face of spy war drama, plays a stuttering her - Xinhuanet

SRC: 由柳云龙监制、殷飞执导,柳云龙、苏青、梁冠华、李立群等主演的大型谍战剧《胜算》, 于7月16日晚7:30登陆广东卫视“活力剧场” 。
HYP: Produced by Liu Yunlong, directed by Yin Fei and starring Liu Yunlong, Su Qing, Liang Guanhua and Li Liqun, the large-scale spy war drama "Chance of Victory" landed on Guangdong Satellite TV's "Vitality Theater" at 7:30 pm on July 16.

SRC: 该剧讲述了潜伏在日伪警察局的中共地下党员唐飞(柳云龙饰)联合苏联特工,刺杀日本特工头目,粉碎了日军的惊天阴谋。
HYP: The play tells the story of Tang Fei (Liu Yunlong), an underground member of the Communist Party of China lurking in the Japanese and puppet police stations, and a Soviet agent, assassinating the leader of the Japanese agent and smashing the Japanese army's shocking plot.

SRC: 《胜算》根据史实改编,素材取自尘封多年的苏联军事档案。
HYP: "Winning" is based on historical facts, and the material is taken from the dusty Soviet military archives for many years.

SRC: 莫斯科保卫战期间,苏联红军远东精锐西进驰援,此时日本关东军“北进派”认为有机可乘,意欲出兵。
HYP: During the battle to defend Moscow, the elite of the Soviet Red Army in the Far East advanced westward to help. At this time, the "Northward Movement" of the Japanese Kwantung Army thought there was an opportunity and wanted to send troops.

SRC: 为解腹背受敌之危,中共与苏共情报人员联手实施了“穆丹乌拉”计划。
HYP: In order to solve the danger of being attacked from the inside and back, the intelligence personnel of the Communist Party of China and the Communist Party of the Soviet Union jointly implemented the "Mudanula" plan.

SRC: 根据此历史背景,知名编剧邓原几经打磨,令剧情曲折烧脑。
HYP: According to this historical background, Deng Yuan, a well-known screenwriter, has been polished several times, making the plot tortuous and brain-burning.

SRC: 柳云龙此次在《胜算》中同时担任监制和男主角。
HYP: Liu Yunlong served as both producer and actor in "odds" this time.

SRC: 剧中,他饰演的唐飞是林河警察厅刑事科科长,是一位颇有喜感甚至有点痞气的结巴警察,真实的身份则是一名中共地下党员。
HYP: In the play, Tang Fei, who he plays, is the chief of the Criminal Section of Linhe Police Department, a stuttering policeman who is quite happy and even a little ruffian, and his real identity is an underground member of the Communist Party of China.

SRC: 与其上演对手戏的女主角蔡梦是林河保安局科长,深得日本上司福原的赏识,与唐飞之间存在着亦敌亦友、暧昧不清的微妙关系。
HYP: Cai Meng, the heroine who staged the opposite play, is the section chief of Linhe Security Bureau, which is deeply appreciated by Japanese boss Fukuhara. There is a delicate and ambiguous relationship between Cai Meng and Tang Fei.

SRC: 苏青近年来尝试了很多不同类型的角色,从《那些年我们正年轻》中的陆若文到《延禧攻略》中的尔晴,都给观众留下深刻印象,演技受到认可。
HYP: Su Qing has tried many different types of roles in recent years, from Lu Ruowen in "Those Years We Are Young" to Er Qing in "Yanxi Story", all of which have impressed the audience and their acting skills have been recognized.

SRC: 此次苏青与柳云龙是首次搭档,结巴警长搭配妩媚女警的设置,颇有看点与新意。
HYP: This time Su Qing and Liu Yunlong are partners for the first time. The setting of stuttering sheriff and charming policewoman is quite interesting and innovative.

SRC: 除了两位主角外,《胜算》中还有梁冠华、李立群、钱波、雷汉、申军谊等众多实力派演员加盟,老戏骨飙戏也是该剧看点之一。
HYP: In addition to the two protagonists, there are many powerful actors such as Liang Guanhua, Li Liqun, Qian Bo, Lei Han and Shen Junyi in Winning, and the old drama Bone Biao Opera is also one of the highlights of the play.

SRC: 据了解,《胜算》制作上也十分精良,剧组跨越江苏、浙江、辽宁3省近2000公里拍摄取景。
HYP: It is understood that the production of "odds" is also very sophisticated, with the crew shooting nearly 2000 kilometers across Jiangsu, Zhejiang and Liaoning provinces.

SRC: 为了还原东北日据时期光怪陆离的城市风貌,剧组美工道具组日夜赶工,仔细打磨场景搭建及道具的每一个细节,令剧中场景画面精致,富有历史质感。
HYP: In order to restore the bizarre urban style during the Japanese occupation period in Northeast China, the crew art props team rushed to work day and night, carefully polishing every detail of the scene construction and props, making the scene in the play exquisite and rich in historical texture.

SRC: 绿地开启新一轮混改上海国资拟转让17.5%股份-经济观察网－专业财经新闻网站
HYP: Greenland Opens a New Round of Mixed Reform Shanghai State-owned Assets Plans to Transfer 17.5% Shares-Economic Observation Network-Professional Financial News Website

SRC: 经济观察网记者饶贤君7月26日，绿地控股（600606.SH）发布《关于国有股东拟通过公开征集受让方的方式协议转让公司部分股份暨复牌的提示性公告》。
HYP: On July 26, Rao Xianjun, a reporter from Economic Observation Network, Greenland Holdings (600606.SH) issued the "Prompt Announcement on State-owned Shareholders' Intention to Transfer Part of the Company's Shares and Resume Trading by Public Solicitation of Transferees".

SRC: 公告内容显示，为进一步深化国资国企改革，优化国资布局结构调整，完善绿地股权结构，上海地产（集团）有限公司（以下简称“上海地产”）及上海城投（集团）有限公司（以下简称“上海城投” ）拟通过公开征集受让方的方式协议转让所持有的公司部分股份，拟转让的股份比例合计不超过绿地总股本的17.5% 。
HYP: According to the announcement, in order to further deepen the reform of state-owned enterprises, optimize the adjustment of the layout structure of state-owned assets, and improve the equity structure of Greenland, Shanghai Real Estate (Group) Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai Real Estate") and Shanghai Chengtou (Group) Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai Chengtou") plan to transfer some of their shares through public solicitation of transferees, and the total proportion of shares to be transferred shall not exceed 17.5% of the total share capital of Greenland.

SRC: 本次拟转让股份的价格不低于下列两者之中的较高者：提示性公告日（2020 年7月27日）前30个交易日的每日加权平均价格的算术平均值；最近一个会计年度公司经审计的每股净资产值。
HYP: The price of the shares to be transferred this time shall not be lower than the higher of the following two: the arithmetic average of the daily weighted average price of the 30 trading days before the suggestive announcement date (July 27, 2020); The audited net asset value per share of the company in the latest fiscal year.

SRC: 目前，对绿地的新战略投资者仍无定论，按照公告公示信息估算，新战略投资者要拿下绿地此次混改中转让的17.5%股权需要支付约140亿元的资金。
HYP: At present, there is still no final conclusion on the new strategic investors of Greenland. According to the public announcement information, it is estimated that the new strategic investors need to pay about 14 billion yuan to win the 17.5% equity transferred in the mixed reform of Greenland.

SRC: 值得注意的是，本次股份转让完成后，预计绿地仍无控股股东及实际控制人，但控制权结构可能发生较大变化。
HYP: It is worth noting that after the completion of this share transfer, Greenland is expected to still have no controlling shareholders and actual controllers, but the control structure may change greatly.

SRC: 绿地控股自创立以来进行了多次体制机制改革：1992年-1997年，在纯国有体制下按照市场化规则运行；1997年-2013年，建立并不断完善国有控股、职工持股的股份制；2013年-2015年，引进战略投资者，形成国有及非公有资本交叉持股、相互融合的混合所有制；2015年至今，整体上市，成为公众公司。
HYP: Greenland Holdings has carried out many institutional reforms since its establishment: from 1992 to 1997, it operated in accordance with market-oriented rules under the pure state-owned system; From 1997 to 2013, the shareholding system of state-owned holding and employee stock ownership was established and continuously improved; From 2013 to 2015, strategic investors were introduced to form a mixed ownership system of cross-shareholding and mutual integration of state-owned and non-public capital; Since 2015, it has been listed as a public company.

SRC: 绿地控股自创立以来进行了多次体制机制改革：1992年-1997年，在纯国有体制下按照市场化规则运行；1997年-2013年，建立并不断完善国有控股、职工持股的股份制；2013年-2015年，引进战略投资者，形成国有及非公有资本交叉持股、相互融合的混合所有制；2015年至今，<v>整体</v>上市，成为公众公司。
HYP: Greenland Holdings has carried out many institutional reforms since its establishment: from 1992 to 1997, it operated in accordance with market-oriented rules under the pure state-owned system; From 1997 to 2013, the shareholding system of state-owned holding and employee stock ownership was established and continuously improved; From 2013 to 2015, strategic investors were introduced to form a mixed ownership system of cross-shareholding and mutual integration of state-owned and non-public capital; Since 2015, it has been listed as a public company.

SRC: 绿地目前的混改方案与格力相似，2019年12月，高瓴资本领衔珠海明骏以416.62亿元接手格力电器（000651.SZ）15%股权，格力集团退居小股东，完成混改后，格力电器实施了高管激励计划、无实控人结构等现代化的企业管理方式。
HYP: Greenland's current mixed reform plan is similar to Gree's. In December 2019, Hillhouse Capital led Zhuhai Mingjun to take over 15% of Gree Electric Appliances (000651.SZ) with 41.662 billion yuan, and Gree Group retreated to a minority shareholder. After completing the mixed reform, Gree Electric Appliances implemented modern enterprise management methods such as executive incentive plan and no actual controller structure.

SRC: 上海地产、上海城投均为上海市国资委全资持有的国资企业集团，绿地控股董事长、总裁张玉良表示，绿地此举是上海按照党中央要求，推进国资国企综合性改革、加速新一阶段国资国企改革的重要举措，充分显示了因地制宜、量体裁衣的改革新思路，通过给上市公司引入新的优秀战略股东，支持企业进一步提高市场化程度，提升经营管理自由度，加速改革活力全面释放。
HYP: Shanghai Real Estate and Shanghai Chengtou are state-owned enterprise groups wholly owned by Shanghai State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission. Zhang Yuliang, chairman and president of Greenland Holdings, said that Greenland's move is an important measure for Shanghai to promote the comprehensive reform of state-owned enterprises and accelerate the reform of state-owned enterprises in the new stage in accordance with the requirements of the CPC Central Committee. It fully demonstrates the new reform ideas of adjusting measures to local conditions and tailoring clothes. By introducing new outstanding strategic shareholders to listed companies, it supports enterprises to further improve the degree of marketization, enhance the freedom of operation and management, and accelerate the full release of reform vitality.

SRC: 刘德华刘青云能否“拆”出新火花-新华网
HYP: Can Andy Lau and Liu Qingyun "dismantle" a new spar - Xinhuanet

SRC: 《拆弹专家2》近日宣布将于12月24日上映,成为贺岁档首部定档的影片。
HYP: "Bomb Disposal Expert 2" recently announced that it will be released on December 24, becoming the first film to be finalized for the New Year.

SRC: 第二部依然是邱礼涛导演,刘德华监制及主演,以全新的故事展开。
HYP: The second part is still directed by Qiu Litao, supervised and starring Andy Lau, and unfolds with a brand-new story.

SRC: 据悉,第二部中“核弹”元素的加入,也让此次拆弹专家面临的挑战更为艰难,预告里几个惊鸿一瞥的镜头,已令人心悬一线,大爆炸的蘑菇云,被火光吞没的机场,场面相当震撼。
HYP: It is reported that the addition of the "nuclear bomb" element in the second part has also made the challenges faced by bomb disposal experts more difficult. Several glimpses in the trailer have already made people's hearts hang on a thread. The mushroom cloud of the Big Bang and the airport engulfed by flames are quite shocking.

SRC: 三年前,由原班人马制作出品的《拆弹专家》,斩获了当年的五一档票房冠军,并在香港电影金像奖拿下了7项提名,邱礼涛×刘德华也成为观众心目中的金牌搭档。
HYP: Three years ago, "Bomb Disposal Expert", produced by the original crew, won the May Day box office champion of that year and won seven nominations at the Hong Kong Film Awards. Qiu Litao × Andy Lau also became the audience's gold medal partner.

SRC: 此次的《拆弹专家2》,也令人再次期待这对王牌组合能否擦出新火花。
HYP: This time, "Bomb Disposal Expert 2" also makes people look forward to whether this pair of ace combination can spark new sparks.

SRC: 《拆弹专家2》讲述了全新的故事:前拆弹专家潘乘风(刘德华<v>饰</v>)晕倒在爆炸案现场,被警方列为嫌疑犯。
HYP: "Bomb Disposal Expert 2" tells a brand-new story: Former bomb disposal expert Pan Chengfeng (Andy Lau) fainted at the scene of the explosion and was listed as a suspect by the police.

SRC: 《拆弹专家2》讲述了全新的故事:前拆弹专家潘乘风(刘德华饰)晕倒在爆炸案现场,被警方列为嫌疑犯。
HYP: "Bomb Disposal Expert 2" tells a brand-new story: Former bomb disposal expert Pan Chengfeng (Andy Lau) fainted at the scene of the explosion and was listed as a suspect by the police.

SRC: 为了寻找真相,他不得不向同是拆弹专家的好友董卓文(刘青云<v>饰</v>)求助。
HYP: In order to find the truth, he had to ask his friend Dong Zhuowen (Liu Qingyun), who is also a bomb disposal expert, for help.

SRC: 为了寻找真相,他不得不向同是拆弹专家的好友董卓文(刘青云饰)求助。
HYP: In order to find the truth, he had to ask his friend Dong Zhuowen (Liu Qingyun), who is also a bomb disposal expert, for help.

SRC: 急于破案的女督查,也同时是潘乘风前女友的庞玲(倪妮饰)也被卷入其中。
HYP: Pang Ling (Ni Ni), a female inspector eager to solve the case and Pan Chengfeng's ex-girlfriend, was also involved.

SRC: 依然是拆弹专家,但从定档预告中能感受到刘德华新角色的复杂:断了一条腿,戴上了义肢,一边被同是拆弹专家的刘青云追捕,一边又被前女友倪妮指挥行动。
HYP: He is still a bomb disposal expert, but the complexity of Andy Lau's new role can be felt from the advance notice of the file: he broke a leg and put on a prosthetic limb, while being chased by Liu Qingyun, who is also a bomb disposal expert, and being directed by his ex-girlfriend Ni Ni.

SRC: 三人究竟是怎样的关系,刘德华到底在香岛酒店做了什么,被牵扯到怎样的案件中,他拆弹专家的职业生涯又经历了哪些波折,种种谜团让人好奇不已。
HYP: What exactly is the relationship between the three people, what exactly did Andy Lau do at the Island Hotel, what kind of cases were involved in, and what twists and turns his career as a bomb disposal expert has gone through, all kinds of mysteries make people curious.

SRC: 据了解,电影的重头戏都是实地取景香港的世界地标性建筑,加上顶尖的特效制作团队,带来震撼逼真的视觉冲击。
HYP: It is understood that the highlight of the film is to view the world landmark buildings in Hong Kong on the spot, and the top special effects production team brings shocking and realistic visual impact.

SRC: （记者聂青）
HYP: (Reporter Nie Qing)

SRC: 中新网7月26日电综合俄罗斯卫星网报道，7月26日是俄罗斯海军日，庆祝海军日的主要阅兵式在圣彼得堡和喀琅施塔得举行。
HYP: BEIJING, July 26-According to a comprehensive Russian satellite network report, July 26 is Russian Navy Day, and the main military parades to celebrate Navy Day were held in St. Petersburg and Kronstadt.

SRC: 俄罗斯总统、俄联邦武装力量最高统帅普京抵达喀琅施塔得参加庆祝活动，该地15艘舰艇和潜艇接受了检阅。
HYP: Russian President and Supreme Commander of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation Putin arrived in Kronstadt to participate in the celebration, where 15 ships and submarines were inspected.

SRC: 当地时间2019年7月28日，俄罗斯圣彼得堡举行盛大阅兵式庆祝海军节。
HYP: On July 28, 2019 local time, a grand military parade was held in St. Petersburg, Russia to celebrate Navy Day.

SRC: 据报道，普京向海军官兵祝贺海军日，并乘小艇在芬兰湾上从将要参加海上阅兵的舰艇旁边驶过，随后在主观礼台检阅受阅部队。
HYP: According to reports, Putin congratulated the navy officers and men on Navy Day, and sailed past the ships that were going to participate in the sea parade in a small boat on the Gulf of Finland, and then inspected the troops under review at the main viewing platform.

SRC: 普京表示，俄海军舰队列装了最新式的舰艇和特殊装备，装备水平不断提高。
HYP: Putin said that the Russian naval fleet is equipped with the latest ships and special equipment, and the equipment level is constantly improving.

SRC: 普京在俄罗斯海军日的阅兵式上说：“俄罗斯海军舰队拥有配备了高精武器的军舰、战略潜水巡洋舰和多用途潜艇、最新式飞机等飞行器、独特的武器和特殊装备。”
HYP: Putin said at the military parade on Russian Navy Day: "The Russian naval fleet has warships equipped with high-precision weapons, strategic diving cruisers and multi-purpose submarines, the latest aircraft and other aircraft, unique weapons and special equipment."

SRC: 当地时间6月24日，俄罗斯纪念卫国战争胜利75周年红场阅兵式举行。
HYP: On June 24, local time, Russia held a Red Square military parade to commemorate the 75th anniversary of the victory of the Patriotic War.

SRC: 他还表示，俄海军舰队将靠数字化和有效防御手段来取得独特优势。
HYP: He also said that the Russian naval fleet will rely on digital and effective defense means to obtain unique advantages.

SRC: 报道称，庆祝俄罗斯海军日的主要海军阅兵式在圣彼得堡和喀琅施塔得举行，共有46艘舰艇参加，包括“卡萨托诺夫上将”号护卫舰、“海军中将库拉科夫”号大型反潜舰，以及大型登陆舰、小型导弹舰、护卫舰、潜艇等。
HYP: According to the report, the main naval parade to celebrate Russian Navy Day was held in St. Petersburg and Kronstadt, with a total of 46 ships participating, including the frigate Admiral Kasatonov and the large anti-submarine ship Vice Admiral Kulakov, as well as large landing ships, small missile ships, frigates and submarines.

SRC: 其中，系列舰艇在圣彼得堡冬宫桥旁进行静态展示，其中最引人瞩目的是经过复制的18世纪初俄罗斯首艘战列舰“波尔塔瓦”号。
HYP: Among them, the series of ships were statically displayed next to the Winter Palace Bridge in St. Petersburg, the most eye-catching of which was the replicated Russian first battleship "Poltava" in the early 18th century.

SRC: 为避免新冠病毒传播，今年海军阅兵式期间只有当地居民和特邀来宾能够进入喀琅施塔得。
HYP: In order to avoid the spread of novel coronavirus, only local residents and specially invited guests can enter Kronstadt during this year's naval parade.

SRC: 每年7月最后一个星期日是俄罗斯海军日。
HYP: The last Sunday in July every year is Russian Navy Day.

SRC: 中新网重庆7月26日电(记者刘贤)重庆市发展和改革委员会26日发布消息称，该市截至目前已退捕渔民4404人，占全部涉及渔民的42.54% 。
HYP: China News Service, Chongqing, July 26 (Reporter Liu Xian) The Chongqing Municipal Development and Reform Commission announced on the 26th that the city has so far returned 4404 fishermen, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.

SRC: 今年53岁的李代国接受中新网记者采访时说，爷爷辈就在龙溪河打鱼，自己11岁起就跟着父亲打鱼，摇着小船，沿着龙溪河前行，上到重庆梁平，下到长寿，每次一离开家就是十天半个月，靠打鱼维持家人生活。
HYP: Li Daiguo, 53, said in an interview with Chinanews.com that his grandfathers were fishing in Longxi River. Since he was 11 years old, he has been fishing with his father, rocking a boat, walking along Longxi River, going up to Liangping, Chongqing, and going down to longevity. Every time he left home, he spent ten days and a half months relying on fishing to maintain his family's life.

SRC: 今年53岁的李代国接受中新网记者采访时说，爷爷<v>辈</v>就在龙溪河打鱼，自己11岁起就跟着父亲打鱼，摇着小船，沿着龙溪河前行，上到重庆梁平，下到长寿，每次一离开家就是十天半个月，靠打鱼维持家人生活。
HYP: Li Daiguo, 53, said in an interview with Chinanews.com that his grandfathers were fishing in Longxi River. Since he was 11 years old, he has been fishing with his father, rocking a boat, walking along Longxi River, going up to Liangping, Chongqing, and going down to longevity. Every time he left home, he spent ten days and a half months relying on fishing to maintain his family's life.

SRC: 但从1997年起，随着农村人口逐渐往场镇里涌，高安场镇里的居民越来越多，造成的环境污染也越来越严重。
HYP: However, since 1997, with the gradual influx of rural population into Chang Town, there are more and more residents in Gao'an Chang Town, resulting in more and more serious environmental pollution.

SRC: 龙溪河沿线修建了造纸厂、化工厂、养殖场，也污染河水。
HYP: Paper mills, chemical plants and farms have been built along the Longxi River, which also pollutes the river.

SRC: 到2007年、2008年，龙溪河变成臭水沟。
HYP: By 2007 and 2008, Longxi River had become a stinking ditch.

SRC: “捕上来的鱼鳞片都是黑的，剖开后里面也是黑的。”
HYP: "The scales of the fish caught are all black, and the inside is also black after being cut open."

SRC: 李代国说，河水污染后打鱼越来越困难。
HYP: Li Daiguo said that fishing is becoming more and more difficult after river pollution.

SRC: 当地开始下大力气治理龙溪河污染，包括清漂、巡河、水生资源管护等。
HYP: The local government began to make great efforts to control the pollution of Longxi River, including cleaning and drifting, patrolling the river, and managing and protecting aquatic resources.

SRC: 李代国也从渔民退捕转产，成为巡河队的一员，管护水生资源。
HYP: Li Daiguo also returned from fishing to production and became a member of the river patrol team to manage and protect aquatic resources.

SRC: 从2020年1月1日起，重庆市水生生物保护区以及主城区相关水域已实行全面禁捕。
HYP: From January 1, 2020, Chongqing Aquatic Life Reserve and related waters in the main urban area have been completely banned from fishing.

SRC: 据重庆市发展改革委数据，截至目前，重庆市已累计退捕渔船3403艘、已签订退捕协议渔船4643艘，分别占三年总任务的63.3% 、 86.3% 。
HYP: According to the data of Chongqing Development and Reform Commission, so far, Chongqing has accumulated 3403 fishing boats and signed 4643 fishing boats with withdrawal agreements, accounting for 63.3% and 86.3% of the total three-year tasks respectively.

SRC: 已退捕渔民4404人，占全部涉及渔民的42.54% 。
HYP: 4404 fishermen have been withdrawn, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.

SRC: 已退捕4404人中，实现就业4267人，占已退捕渔民的96.89% 。
HYP: Among the 4404 people who have retired, 4267 have achieved employment, accounting for 96.89% of the fishermen who have retired.

SRC: 养老保险保障覆盖2691人，占退捕渔民的61.10% 。
HYP: Old-age insurance covers 2691 people, accounting for 61.10% of the fishermen who have retired.

SRC: 下一步，重庆市将深入开展各专项整治行动，加快推进长江干流岸线利用项目清理整治，完成新一轮长江入河排污口普查并开展相应整治行动，基本完成“三磷” ( 指磷矿、磷化工和磷石膏库)整治任务、小水电清理整改工作，推进长江两岸造林绿化专项行动，强化绿色矿山建设，巩固长江干流非法码头、非法采砂专项整治成果，深入推进长江流域禁捕退捕工作。
HYP: In the next step, Chongqing will carry out various special rectification actions in depth, accelerate the clean-up and rectification of shoreline utilization projects in the main stream of the Yangtze River, complete a new round of census of sewage outlets entering the Yangtze River and carry out corresponding rectification actions, basically complete the rectification task of "three phosphates" (referring to phosphate rock, phosphate chemical industry and phosphogypsum reservoir), clean up and rectify small hydropower, promote the special action of afforestation and greening on both sides of the Yangtze River, strengthen the construction of green mines, consolidate the special rectification results of illegal docks and illegal sand mining in the main stream of the Yangtze River, and

SRC: 下一步，重庆市将深入开展各专项整治行动，加快推进长江干流岸线利用项目清理整治，完成新一轮长江入河排污口普查并开展相应整治行动，基本完成“三磷” ( 指磷矿、磷化工和磷石膏库)整治任务、小水电清理整改工作，推进长江两岸造林绿化专项行动，强化绿色矿山建设，巩固长江干流非法码头、非法采砂专项整治成果，<v>深入推进长江流域禁捕退捕工作。</v>
HYP: In the next step, Chongqing will carry out various special rectification actions in depth, accelerate the clean-up and rectification of shoreline utilization projects in the main stream of the Yangtze River, complete a new round of census of sewage outlets entering the Yangtze River and carry out corresponding rectification actions, basically complete the rectification task of "three phosphates" (referring to phosphate rock, phosphate chemical industry and phosphogypsum reservoir), clean up and rectify small hydropower, promote the special action of afforestation and greening on both sides of the Yangtze River, strengthen the construction of green mines, consolidate the special rectification results of illegal docks and illegal sand mining in the main stream of the Yangtze River, and

SRC: 新华社香港7月25日电香港特区政府财经事务及库务局局长许正宇表示，香港的金融市场仍保持活跃、运作有序。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 25-Xu Zhengyu, Secretary for Financial Services and the Treasury of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region Government, said that Hong Kong's financial market remained active and operated in an orderly manner.

SRC: 他对香港金融稳定及经济表示乐观。
HYP: He expressed optimism about Hong Kong's financial stability and economy.

SRC: 许正宇在香港驻多伦多经济贸易办事处及港加商会（加拿大总会）24日（多伦多时间）合办的网上研讨会上表示，香港因为“修例风波”和新冠肺炎疫情，经历着艰难的状况。
HYP: Xu Zhengyu said at an online seminar jointly organized by the Hong Kong Economic and Trade Office in Toronto and the Hong Kong-Canada Chamber of Commerce (Canada Federation) on the 24th (Toronto time) that Hong Kong is experiencing a difficult situation because of the "storm of legislative amendments" and the COVID-19 epidemic.

SRC: 港元汇价稳定并偏向强方兑换保证水平。
HYP: The exchange rate of the Hong Kong dollar is stable and biased towards the strong exchange guarantee level.

SRC: 银行体系没有明显的资金流出迹象，相反，自6月以来超过110亿美元资金流入。
HYP: There is no obvious sign of capital outflow from the banking system. On the contrary, more than 11 billion US dollars have flowed in since June.

SRC: 银行的存款总额在过去几个月也持续增加，股票市场有一连串公开招股集资活动，市场成交屡见上升。
HYP: The total amount of bank deposits has also continued to increase in the past few months. There has been a series of public offering fund-raising activities in the stock market, and market transactions have repeatedly increased.

SRC: 许正宇说，新冠肺炎疫情为全球经济及金融市场带来压力，但香港的基本优势仍然保持不变。
HYP: Xu Zhengyu said that the COVID-19 epidemic has put pressure on the global economy and financial markets, but Hong Kong's basic advantages remain unchanged.

SRC: 香港拥有的多项优势，包括地理、法治、高速通讯、资讯和资金自由流通以及简单低税制，使香港持续成为领先的国际金融中心。
HYP: Hong Kong has many advantages, including geography, rule of law, high-speed communication, free flow of information and capital, and a simple and low tax system, which make Hong Kong a leading international financial center.

SRC: 许正宇指出，特区政府在“防疫抗疫基金”预留60亿港元，未来两年在公营及私营界别创造约3万个有时限的职位，涵盖不同技能及学历人士。
HYP: Xu Zhengyu pointed out that the SAR Government has set aside HK $6 billion in the "Epidemic Prevention and Anti-epidemic Fund" to create about 30000 time-limited jobs in the public and private sectors in the next two years, covering people with different skills and academic qualifications.

SRC: 为支持金融科技的发展，特区政府也已推出“千人计划”，资助本地金融科技公司、初创及其他有金融科技相关业务的企业，以创造1000个新职位，聘用本地人才及丰富香港的金融科技人才库。
HYP: To support the development of financial technology, the SAR Government has also launched the "Thousand Talents Scheme" to subsidize local financial technology companies, start-ups and other enterprises with financial technology-related businesses, so as to create 1000 new jobs, hire local talents and enrich Hong Kong's financial technology talent pool.

SRC: 展望未来，许正宇对香港的金融稳定及经济表示乐观。
HYP: Looking ahead, Xu Zhengyu expressed optimism about Hong Kong's financial stability and economy.

SRC: 他鼓励加拿大企业善用香港的优势及其作为国际金融中心、国际资产及财富管理中心以及全球离岸人民币业务枢纽的地位，在粤港澳大湾区及附近地区发展及投资。
HYP: He encouraged Canadian enterprises to make good use of Hong Kong's advantages and its position as an international financial center, an international asset and wealth management center and a global offshore RMB business hub to develop and invest in Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macau Greater Bay Area and its surrounding areas.

SRC: 《柳叶刀》刊文赞扬中国抗疫努力鼓励各国学习经验-中新网
HYP: The Lancet published an article praising China's anti-epidemic efforts and encouraging countries to learn from experienc - Chinanews.com

SRC: 《柳叶刀》杂志25日刊文表示，中国作为一个拥有14亿人口，规模与欧洲或美国相似的国家，现阶段新冠疫情得到有效控制，而没有再出现大范围传播的情况，在很大程度上控制住了国内的疫情。
HYP: The Lancet magazine published an article on the 25th, saying that China, as a country with a population of 1.4 billion and a scale similar to that of Europe or the United States, has effectively controlled the COVID-19 epidemic at this stage, and there has been no large-scale spread, which has largely controlled the domestic epidemic.

SRC: 文章表示，在近十多年时间里，中国对国内研究和公共卫生建设方面进行了大量的投资，这使得中国对新冠的准备比当年严重急性呼吸道综合征(SARS)的准备要充分得多。
HYP: The article said that in the past ten years or so, China has made a lot of investment in domestic research and public health construction, which makes China's preparation for COVID-19 much better than that for severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS).

SRC: 作者表示，2002年SARS暴发时，起初中国准备不足，尤其是病原体无法确定。
HYP: The author said that when SARS broke out in 2002, China was not prepared enough at first, especially the pathogen could not be determined.

SRC: 当2019年12月发现新冠病毒时，中国科学家很快就能够鉴定出病毒种类，并于2020年1月11日与国际共享了基因组测序数据。
HYP: When novel coronavirus was discovered in December 2019, Chinese scientists were soon able to identify the type of virus and shared genome sequencing data with the international community on January 11, 2020.

SRC: 到1月底，来自中国大陆和香港的医生阐明了该病毒的临床特征，通过在《柳叶刀》上发表的研究论文，向世界警告了新冠病毒的威胁。
HYP: By the end of January, doctors from Chinese mainland and Hong Kong had clarified the clinical characteristics of the virus and warned the world about the threat of novel coronavirus through research papers published in the Lancet.

SRC: 中国也一直处于疫苗研究的最前沿，在国家宣布紧急状态下，通过国内的紧密合作，这样的研究非常迅速而严格地展开，5月和7月，分别在《柳叶刀》上公布了中国开发的新冠疫苗早期试验取得进展的结果。
HYP: China has also been at the forefront of vaccine research. Under the state of emergency declared by the country, such research has been carried out very quickly and strictly through close domestic cooperation. In May and July, the results of the progress made in the early trials of COVID-19 vaccine developed by China were published in the Lancet respectively.

SRC: 中国的经验表明，对国家卫生和研究体系进行投资，有效提高实验室能力是非常重要的。
HYP: China's experience shows that it is very important to invest in national health and research systems and effectively improve laboratory capabilities.

SRC: 这是国家对卫生紧急情况和全球卫生安全做出快速有效反应的基础。
HYP: This is the basis for the country to respond quickly and effectively to health emergencies and global health security.

SRC: 其他国家，特别是低收入和中等收入国家来说，非常值得借鉴和学习。
HYP: Other countries, especially low-income and middle-income countries, are worth learning from.

SRC: 此外，中国的经验证明，在强大的研究基础上，必须有强有力的高层果断地凭借科学依据来作出正确决策，这才使得新冠疫情得到有效控制。
HYP: In addition, China's experience proves that on the basis of strong research, there must be a strong high-level decisively relying on scientific basis to make correct decisions, so that the COVID-19 epidemic can be effectively controlled.

SRC: 文章强调，政府及其领导人必须尊重科学，理解科学的价值，并以对社会最有利的方式对其采取行动。
HYP: The article emphasizes that the government and its leaders must respect science, understand the value of science, and take action against it in the most beneficial way to society.

SRC: 在暴发初期，中国国家卫建委派出三组传染病专家前往武汉，调查新冠病毒的风险和传播，他们的建议为1月23日武汉“封城”的决定提供了依据；当有专家提出建设方舱医院必要性和紧迫性时，政府很快做出了决定并快速实施；同时，社区和群众的广泛参与，也使得疫情快速有效地被控制。
HYP: At the beginning of the outbreak, China's National Health and Construction Commission sent three groups of infectious disease experts to Wuhan to investigate the risk and spread of novel coronavirus. Their suggestions provided the basis for Wuhan's decision to "close the city" on January 23; When some experts put forward the necessity and urgency of building a shelter hospital, the government quickly made a decision and implemented it quickly; At the same time, the extensive participation of the community and the masses also made the epidemic quickly and effectively controlled.

SRC: 文章最后强调，应对全球性的卫生紧急情况，各国需要加强全球合作，联合应对。
HYP: Finally, the article emphasizes that in response to global health emergencies, countries need to strengthen global cooperation and joint response.

SRC: 总台记者杨洪
HYP: Front desk reporter Yang Hong

SRC: 当地时间25日下午，一架小型飞机在德国北威州韦瑟尔县撞上一座多层住宅楼的顶层，事故共造成三人死亡。
HYP: On the afternoon of the 25th local time, a small plane crashed into the top floor of a multi-storey residential building in Weiser County, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany, killing three people in the accident.

SRC: 杜伊斯堡检方、韦瑟尔县警察局和韦瑟尔市消防部门当天晚间联合发布声明称，当天14时40分左右，一架两座小型飞机撞上位于韦瑟尔县辉柏斯坎普街一栋多层住宅楼顶层阁楼的住宅，造成三人丧生。
HYP: Duisburg prosecutors, Weiser County Police Department and Weiser City Fire Department jointly issued a statement that evening, saying that at about 14:40 that day, a two-seater small plane crashed into a house in the attic on the top floor of a multi-storey residential building on Huiberskamp Street in Weiser County, killing three people.

SRC: 其当天从北威州鲁尔区马尔市起飞，在韦瑟尔县的机场中途停靠后再度起飞，随后撞上住宅楼。
HYP: On the same day, it took off from Mal City, Ruhr District, North Rhine-Westphalia, took off again after stopping at the airport in Weisel County, and then crashed into a residential building.

SRC: 死者身份或为遭撞击住宅内的一名女性住户和小型飞机上两名乘客。
HYP: The identity of the deceased may be a female resident in the impacted house and two passengers on the small plane.

SRC: 房内一名两岁儿童仅受轻伤，被平安救出。
HYP: A two-year-old child in the room was only slightly injured and was rescued safely.

SRC: 房内其余住户未在事故中受伤，但情绪仍未平复。
HYP: The rest of the residents in the room were not injured in the accident, but their emotions have not calmed down.

SRC: 德新社报道的现场画面显示，遭遇事故的住宅一度冒出滚滚浓烟，消防队员扑灭火情后可见房屋损毁严重。
HYP: The scene pictures reported by DPA showed that thick smoke billowed from the house that was involved in the accident, and firefighters could see that the house was seriously damaged after putting out the fire.

SRC: 目前，飞机失事原因尚不明确。
HYP: At present, the cause of the plane crash is not clear.

SRC: 《莱茵邮报》援引警方说法报道称，有线索表明，飞机或在撞上住宅楼前就已解体。
HYP: The Rhine Post quoted the police as saying that there were clues that the plane had disintegrated before it hit a residential building.

SRC: 警方表示，在事故现场一带发现了失事飞机的多块零部件。
HYP: Police said that several parts of the crashed plane were found near the scene of the accident.

SRC: 德国刑警正与杜伊斯堡检方、德国联邦航空事故调查局共同调查导致这一事故的原因。
HYP: German Interpol is working with Duisburg prosecutors and the German Federal Aviation Accident Investigation Bureau to investigate the cause of the accident.

SRC: 记者当天从中国驻杜塞尔多夫总领事馆了解到，该馆与当地警局及消防部门取得联系，据现场判断，伤亡人员中无中国公民。
HYP: On the same day, the reporter learned from the Chinese Consulate General in Dusseldorf that the museum had contacted the local police station and fire department. According to the judgment on the spot, there were no Chinese citizens among the casualties.

SRC: 大鹏导演《吉祥如意》入围金爵奖-新华网
HYP: Director Dapeng's "Good Luck" was shortlisted for the Golden Goblet Awar - Xinhuanet

SRC: 7月18日，第二十三届上海国际电影节公布了金爵奖官方入选影片名单。
HYP: On July 18, the 23rd Shanghai International Film Festival announced the official list of films selected for the Golden Goblet Award.

SRC: 大鹏导演的首部现实题材影片《吉祥如意》，成功入围本届上影节金爵奖，同时影片官方发布了首款海报。
HYP: Director Dapeng's first realistic film "Good Luck" was successfully shortlisted for the Golden Goblet Award of this film festival, and the film officially released its first poster.

SRC: 海报片方供图
HYP: Photo courtesy of poster film party

SRC: 影片《吉祥如意》是大鹏导演的第一部现实题材作品，也是他与金爵奖的二度结缘。
HYP: The film "Good Luck" is Dapeng's first realistic work, and it is also his second bond with the Golden Goblet Award.

SRC: 该片讲述了这样一个故事：一位喜剧片导演突发奇想，回到东北农村老家，希望将<v>一家人如何过年</v>拍成一部文艺电影，结果遭遇一系列意外。
HYP: The film tells the story of a comedy director who returned to his hometown in the northeast countryside on a whim, hoping to make a literary and artistic film for the New Year. As a result, he encountered a series of accidents.

SRC: 因拍电影而聚齐的家庭成员们，完成了最后的聚会。
HYP: The family members gathered for filming finished the final party.

SRC: 在今日发布的电影海报中，这个家庭中的一员— — “三舅”王吉祥坐在画面中央抽着烟，背景是披上银装的东北黑土地，前景是中国人逢年过节必挂的红灯笼。
HYP: In the movie poster released today, Wang Jixiang, a member of the family, sits in the middle of the picture smoking a cigarette. The background is the black land of Northeast China dressed in silver, and the prospect is the red lanterns that Chinese people must hang on holidays.

SRC: 象征着喜庆、团圆的红灯笼与身影落寞的王吉祥形成了巨大反差，似乎也透露了这个大家庭关系中的复杂与纠结。
HYP: The red lantern, which symbolizes joy and reunion, is in great contrast to the lonely Wang Jixiang, which seems to reveal the complexity and entanglement in this big family relationship.

SRC: 据悉，影片中，除了“三舅”王吉祥的女儿由演员刘陆扮演，其余戏份均由真实的导演家人完成，影片实验性的视听风格，打破了戏剧与真实的边界，带给观众全新的浸入式观影体验。
HYP: It is reported that in the film, except for the daughter of "Third Uncle" Wang Jixiang, who is played by actor Liu Lu, the rest of the scenes are completed by the real director's family. The experimental audio-visual style of the film breaks the boundary between drama and reality and brings the audience a brand-new immersive viewing experience.

SRC: 据导演大鹏介绍，《吉祥如意》的创作源自“一场天意” ， 拍摄期间家庭突如其来的一系列变故，让原本的拍摄计划不得不随之改变，没有剧本的生活最终被记录成电影，却释放出超越设计的张力。
HYP: According to director Dapeng, the creation of "Good Luck" originated from "an act of God". A series of sudden changes in the family during the shooting forced the original shooting plan to change accordingly. Life without a script was finally recorded as a movie, but it released tension beyond design.

SRC: 导演大鹏究竟如何面对这场“天意” ， 又该如何继续迎接这场天意带来的种种改变呢？
HYP: How does director Dapeng face this "providence" and how can he continue to meet the changes brought about by this providence?

SRC: 毫无疑问《吉祥如意》是充满实验性的，几乎全素人的阵容和创新的视听风格将镜头前的生活变成了一部电影，在真实影像的包裹下，观众也会从影片所呈现的家庭中找到自己和家人的影子，随着影片中这场家庭聚会的落幕，唤起一系列思考。
HYP: There is no doubt that "Good Luck" is full of experiments. The almost full lineup and innovative audio-visual style have turned life in front of the camera into a movie. Under the package of real images, the audience will also find the shadow of themselves and their families from the family presented in the film. With the end of the family gathering in the film, a series of thoughts are aroused.

SRC: NEWS.GOV.MO: 新型冠状病毒感染应变协调中心查询热线统计数字(7月25日08H00-7月26日<v>08H00</v>)
HYP: NEWS.GOV.MO: Novel Coronavirus Infection Response Coordination Center Enquiry Hotline Statistics (July 25 08:00 - July 26 08:00)

SRC: NEWS.GOV.MO: 新型冠状病毒感染应变协调中心查询热线统计数字(7月25日08H00-7月26日08H00)
HYP: NEWS.GOV.MO: Novel Coronavirus Infection Response Coordination Center Enquiry Hotline Statistics (July 25 08:00 - July 26 08:00)

SRC: NEWS.GOV.MO: 新型冠状病毒感染应变协调中心查询热线统计数字(7月25日<v>08H00</v>-7月26日08H00)
HYP: NEWS.GOV.MO: Novel Coronavirus Infection Response Coordination Center Enquiry Hotline Statistics (July 25 08:00 - July 26 08:00)

SRC: 由2020年07月25日08H00 至7月26日08H00，新型冠状病毒感染应变协调中心的查询热线共接获292宗电话查询。
HYP: From 08H00 on July 25 to 08H00 on July 26, 2020, the enquiry hotline of Novel Coronavirus Infection Response Coordination Center received 292 telephone enquiries.

SRC: 关于疫情的291宗查询，已即时转线至相关部门代表跟进，情况如下：
HYP: 291 enquiries about the epidemic situation have been immediately transferred to representatives of relevant departments for follow-up. The situation is as follows:

SRC: 卫生局271宗(涉及：查询关于隔离；查询核酸检测；查询两地牌；健康码；其他。）
HYP: 271 cases from the Health Bureau (involving: inquiring about isolation; inquiring about nucleic acid testing; inquiring about the cards of the two places; health codes; others.)

SRC: 治安警察局17宗(涉及：查询出入境措施；查询粤澳两地牌车辆出入境措施；查询珠海政务热线；查询证件逗留问题。）
HYP: 17 cases from the Public Security Police Department (involving: inquiring about immigration measures; inquiring about the entry and exit measures of licensed vehicles in Guangdong and Macao; inquiring about Zhuhai government affairs hotline; inquiring about the stay of documents.)

SRC: 旅游局1宗(涉及：查询隔离酒店问题。）
HYP: 1 case from Tourism Bureau (involving: inquiring about isolated hotels.)

SRC: 教育暨青年局1宗(涉及：查询澳门学生返回英国读书的方法。）
HYP: Education and Youth Bureau 1 case (involving: inquiring about the method of Macao students returning to study in the UK.)

SRC: 海事及水务局1宗(涉及：询问香港渔船进港是否需要向海事及水务局申报及核酸检测相关事宜。）
HYP: Maritime and Water Affairs Bureau 1 case (involving: asking whether Hong Kong fishing boats need to report to the Maritime and Water Affairs Bureau and nucleic acid testing when entering Hong Kong.)

SRC: 马里尼切夫说，价值的变化受卢布贬值和疫情等影响。
HYP: Marinichev said that the change in value is affected by the devaluation of the ruble and the epidemic.

SRC: 他说“服务成本正在增加。
HYP: "The cost of services is increasing," he said.

SRC: 由于疫情，人们开始在互联网上花费更多的时间。”
HYP: Because of the epidemic, people began to spend more time on the Internet. "

SRC: 马里尼切夫不排除年互联网价格将严重上涨，认为运营商可以为客户提供更高的速度和更多服务抵消人们对价格上涨的不满。
HYP: Marinichev does not rule out that the Internet price will rise seriously every year, and believes that operators can provide customers with higher speed and more services to offset people's dissatisfaction with the price increase.

SRC: 《中国医生》筹拍致敬抗疫英雄-新华网
HYP: "Chinese Doctor" plans to shoot to pay tribute to anti-epidemic her - Xinhuanet

SRC: 近日，带着中国电影人对抗疫英雄的敬意，博纳影业集团董事长于冬、导演刘伟强(图左）在广州与钟南山院士，就抗疫题材影片《中国医生》的拍摄制作工作进行了座谈交流。
HYP: Recently, with the respect of Chinese filmmakers for fighting epidemic heroes, Yu Dong, chairman of Bona Film Group, and Liu Weiqiang (left), director of Bona Film Group, had a discussion and exchange with Academician Zhong Nanshan in Guangzhou on the filming and production of the anti-epidemic film "Chinese Doctor".

SRC: 博纳影业希望能借由《中国医生》，向所有战斗在疫情防控一线的医护、防疫工作者致敬！
HYP: Bona Pictures hopes to pay tribute to all medical and epidemic prevention workers fighting in the front line of epidemic prevention and control through "Chinese Doctor"!

SRC: 2021年，该片将作为庆祝中国共产党建党100周年献礼影片全国公映。
HYP: In 2021, the film will be released nationwide as a tribute film to celebrate the 100th anniversary of the founding of the Communist Party of China.

SRC: 目前，博纳影业正在中宣部和国家电影局的安排部署下，广东省电影局及湖北省电影局的支持下，组织电影《中国机长》原班人马筹拍电影《中国医生》，这是一部反映在党中央的坚强领导下，全国人民团结一心抗击新冠肺炎疫情的影片。
HYP: At present, under the arrangement and deployment of the Central Propaganda Department and the National Film Bureau, and with the support of the Guangdong Film Bureau and the Hubei Film Bureau, Bona Pictures is organizing the original crew of the film "Chinese Captain" to prepare for the film "Chinese Doctor". This is a film that reflects the unity of the people of the whole country to fight the COVID-19 epidemic under the strong leadership of the CPC Central Committee.

SRC: 影片聚焦武汉抗疫一线，将以武汉医护人员及各省市援鄂医疗队为人物背景，从人性的角度，运用独特的叙事，以及极具冲击力的镜头语言，全景展现抗疫一线充满奉献和牺牲精神的中国医护人员的感人故事。
HYP: Focusing on the front line of anti-epidemic in Wuhan, the film will take Wuhan medical staff and medical teams from various provinces and cities to help Hubei as the background, and show the touching stories of Chinese medical staff full of dedication and sacrifice in the front line of anti-epidemic from the perspective of human nature, using unique narration and highly impactful lens language.

SRC: 据了解，武汉解封之日的第一时间，博纳公司便克服重重困难，派出采拍小组深入疫情一线，与数百位医护工作者面对面交流了解、搜集资料，目前已经采访到了包括钟南山院士本人、广州驰援武汉第一人、广东援鄂医疗队，以及武汉金银潭医院、武汉协和医院、武汉大学中南医院、武汉中心医院等抗疫战线最前沿的白衣天使们，拍下了大量珍贵的第一手视频资料。
HYP: It is understood that at the first time on the day when Wuhan was unsealed, Bona Company overcame many difficulties, sent a shooting team to go deep into the front line of the epidemic, and exchanged face-to-face understanding and collected information with hundreds of medical workers. At present, it has interviewed Academician Zhong Nanshan himself, Guangzhou's first aid to Wuhan, Guangdong's aid to Hubei medical team, and angels in white at the forefront of the anti-epidemic front, such as Wuhan Jinyintan Hospital, Wuhan Union Hospital, Zhongnan Hospital of Wuhan University and Wuhan Central Hospital, and has taken a large number of precious first-hand video materials.

SRC: 钟南山院士在此次座谈会中亦对电影的拍摄提出了期待和希望：“ 我很期待，希望你们不仅要走访一些抛头露面比较多的专家，还要更多地采访在一线埋头苦干的医务人员，他们是大多数。”
HYP: Academician Zhong Nanshan also raised expectations and hopes for the filming of the film in this symposium: "I am looking forward to it. I hope you will not only visit some experts who have made more appearances, but also interview more medical staff who are working hard in the front line. They are the majority."

SRC: 他表示，他之前看过《我和我的祖国》《中国机长》，认为以普通人视角讲述大格局故事的方法就很好。
HYP: He said that he had seen "Me and My Motherland" and "Captain of China" before and thought it was a good way to tell the story of the big pattern from the perspective of ordinary people.

SRC: “现在一些国外朋友对中国还是有一些误解。”
HYP: "Now some foreign friends still have some misunderstandings about China."

SRC: 在谈到影片的传播时，钟南山院士表示，目前国外有些人喜欢将病毒贴上政治化标签，他希望电影能从人性的角度打动观众：“ 这部电影除了在中国放映以外，最好也能在国外放映，要用国内外观众都能理解的方式，用真正的人文精神打动观众。”
HYP: When talking about the spread of the film, Academician Zhong Nanshan said that at present, some people abroad like to label the virus politicized, and he hopes that the film can impress the audience from the perspective of human nature: "In addition to being shown in China, it is best for this film to be shown abroad, and to impress the audience with a real humanistic spirit in a way that both domestic and foreign audiences can understand."

SRC: 钟南山院士还深情回忆了上世纪80年代的影片《人到中年》，“这么多年过去了，我对改革开放后电影印象最深的还是《人到中年》，当时我国外的医生朋友们都看哭了，如果《中国医生》能够起到这样的作用，那就很了不起了。”
HYP: Academician Zhong Nanshan also fondly recalled the film "People to Middle Age" in the 1980s. "After so many years, what impressed me most about the film after the reform and opening up was" People to Middle Age ". At that time, my foreign doctor friends all cried. If" Chinese Doctor "can play such a role, it would be great."

SRC: 钟南山院士表示，如果《中国医生》能引起国外观众的共鸣，那就非常成功。
HYP: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that if "Chinese Doctor" can resonate with foreign audiences, it will be very successful.

SRC: 在座谈交流时，钟南山院士还分享了对当前国际疫情防控的意见和建议，“ 我相信人永远比病毒聪明。”
HYP: During the discussion and exchange, Academician Zhong Nanshan also shared his opinions and suggestions on the current international epidemic prevention and control, "I believe that people are always smarter than viruses."

SRC: 钟南山院士表示，虽说病毒难以预测，但从原始社会至今，人类已渡过了千难万险，如今现代社会有发达的医疗科技和社会管理措施，再加上全世界的医务人员、甚至老百姓都对科学应对新冠肺炎疫情有了基本认识，人们不会再像以前那么被动，“接下来要注意两个方面的工作，一是要研究全世界怎么加强合作，二是注重对人们心灵的抚慰” 。
HYP: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that although the virus is difficult to predict, from the primitive society to the present, human beings have survived thousands of difficulties and risks. Nowadays, modern society has developed medical science and technology and social management measures. In addition, medical staff and even ordinary people all over the world have a basic understanding of scientific response to the COVID-19 epidemic. People will no longer be as passive as before. "Next, we should pay attention to two aspects of work, one is to study how the world can strengthen cooperation, and the other is to pay attention to soothing people's hearts."

SRC: （记者王金跃）
HYP: (Reporter Wang Jinyue)

SRC: 文旅“红果”聚韶山—湘潭首届红博会见闻-今日要闻-湖南日报网-华声在线
HYP: Cultural Tourism "Red Fruit" Gathers in Shaoshan-Xiangtan First Red Expo-Today's Highlights-Hunan Daily Network-Huasheng Online

SRC: 湖南日报·新湖南客户端记者蒋睿通讯员肖燕
HYP: Hunan Daily New Hunan Client Correspondent Jiang Rui Correspondent Xiao Yan

SRC: 嘉兴红船模具、韶山毛泽东铜像、延安布堆花工艺品、湘西永顺腊肉…… 7月25日，2020湖南红色旅游文化节在韶山开幕。
HYP: Jiaxing Red Boat Mould, Shaoshan Mao Zedong Bronze Statue, Yan'an Cloth Flower Crafts, Xiangxi Yongshun Bacon... On July 25, 2020 Hunan Red Tourism Culture Festival opened in Shaoshan.

SRC: 作为主体活动之一，湘潭首届红色文化产业博览会在韶山全域旅游咨询集散中心开展。
HYP: As one of the main activities, the first Xiangtan Red Cultural Industry Expo was held in Shaoshan Global Tourism Consulting and Distribution Center.

SRC: 展览区红色文创产品、革命老区土特产品等琳琅满目，引来各地游客争相购买。
HYP: Red cultural and creative products in the exhibition area and native products in the old revolutionary base areas are dazzling, attracting tourists from all over the world to buy them.

SRC: “此次红博会，既是全国红色文化产业成果的一次展示，也是参展单位和企业交流经验、探讨发展路径的一个重要平台。”
HYP: "This Red Expo is not only a demonstration of the achievements of the national red cultural industry, but also an important platform for exhibitors and enterprises to exchange experiences and explore development paths."

SRC: 湘潭首届红博会执委会相关负责人介绍，这届红博会以“弘扬红色文化助推文旅升温”为主题，展览总面积近3000平方米，设置了氛围营造区、景区展示展陈区和红色文旅网游网购体验区。
HYP: According to the relevant person in charge of the executive committee of the first Xiangtan Red Expo, the theme of this Red Expo is "Promoting Red Culture and Boosting Cultural Tourism", with a total exhibition area of nearly 3000 square meters, and an atmosphere creation area, a scenic spot exhibition area and an online shopping experience area for red cultural tourism online games have been set up.

SRC: 邀请浙江嘉兴、贵州遵义、陕西延安等8个外省地市以及我省长沙、株洲、岳阳、郴州等地137家企业、单位参展，共展出展品768种，包括红色文物、工艺品、食品特产、旅游线路、红色培训课程、红色文创产品等。
HYP: 137 enterprises and units from 8 provinces and cities including Jiaxing, Zhejiang, Zunyi, Guizhou and Yan'an, Shaanxi, as well as Changsha, Zhuzhou, Yueyang and Chenzhou in our province were invited to participate in the exhibition, with 768 kinds of exhibits on display, including red cultural relics, handicrafts, food specialties, tourist routes, red training courses and red cultural and creative products.

SRC: 展销区将展至7月29日。
HYP: The exhibition area will last until July 29th.

SRC: 作为红博会东道主，湘潭展区亮点纷呈。
HYP: As the host of the Red Expo, Xiangtan exhibition area has many bright spots.

SRC: 展区负责人介绍，湘潭展区分为红色工业、红色文化产业发展两大部分。
HYP: According to the person in charge of the exhibition area, Xiangtan exhibition area is divided into two parts: the development of red industry and red cultural industry.

SRC: 红色工业展区展出华菱湘钢、华菱线缆、湘电动力等6家企业的展品31件，红色文化产业发展展区展出红色系列图书、红色系列食品、红色系列文创产品等27家单位产品近200个。
HYP: The red industry exhibition area displays 31 exhibits from 6 enterprises such as Valin Xianggang, Valin Cable and Xiangdian Power, and the red cultural industry development exhibition area displays nearly 200 products from 27 units such as red series books, red series foods and red series cultural and creative products.

SRC: 在延安展区，不少游客被陈展的布堆花手工艺品和剪纸艺术品所吸引。
HYP: In Yan'an exhibition area, many tourists are attracted by Chen Zhan's cloth pile flower handicrafts and paper-cut artworks.

SRC: 延安市文旅局局长马东坡介绍，此次参展精心选择了延安近两年来优秀的红色文创产品，其中16种产品是2019全国红色文创产品优秀作品。
HYP: Ma Dongpo, director of Yan'an Municipal Bureau of Culture and Tourism, said that the exhibition carefully selected Yan'an's excellent red cultural and creative products in the past two years, of which 16 products were excellent works of 2019 national red cultural and creative products.

SRC: 同时，他们邀请了国家级非物质文化遗产保护项目“安塞剪纸”、“陕北民歌”与省级非遗项目延川布堆画传承人，重点推介延安民俗特色产品，并借此机会与其他展区单位企业沟通交流，推动跨区域合作。
HYP: At the same time, they invited the inheritors of the national intangible cultural heritage protection projects "Ansai Paper-cut" and "Northern Shaanxi Folk Songs" and the provincial intangible cultural heritage project Yanchuan Budui Painting, focusing on promoting Yan'an folk custom products, and taking this opportunity to communicate with enterprises in other exhibition areas to promote cross-regional cooperation.

SRC: 膜分离技术助力破解“温室效应” - 中新网
HYP: Membrane separation technology helps crack the "greenhouse effect" - Chinanews.com

SRC: 膜分离技术助力破解“温室效应”
HYP: Membrane separation technology helps crack the "greenhouse effect"

SRC: 新型混合基质膜制备技术示意图
HYP: Schematic diagram of preparation technology of new mixed matrix membrane

SRC: 本报讯记者商瑞报道：日前，天津大学大气环境与生物能源团队针对“膜分离法捕集二氧化碳”取得重大进展，成功研发出新型混合基质膜制备技术，大幅提升膜材料二氧化碳捕集性能。
HYP: News from our newspaper reporter Shang Rui reported: A few days ago, the atmospheric environment and bioenergy team of Tianjin University made great progress on "carbon dioxide capture by membrane separation" and successfully developed a new hybrid matrix membrane preparation technology to greatly improve the carbon dioxide capture performance of membrane materials.

SRC: 相关成果已作为国际期刊《温室气体：科学与技术》封面文章发表。
HYP: Relevant achievements have been published as cover articles of the international journal Greenhouse Gases: Science and Technology.

SRC: “温室效应”是困扰人类发展的重大环境问题，二氧化碳排放则是造成“温室效应”的元凶。
HYP: "Greenhouse effect" is a major environmental problem that puzzles human development, and carbon dioxide emission is the culprit causing "greenhouse effect".

SRC: 如何高效捕获并利用人类排放的二氧化碳是科学家关注的焦点。
HYP: How to efficiently capture and utilize carbon dioxide emitted by human beings is the focus of scientists' attention.

SRC: “膜分离法”是一种新兴的二氧化碳捕集技术，它在膜材料帮助下分离二氧化碳气体，具有高效节能、操作简单的特点。
HYP: "Membrane separation method" is a new carbon dioxide capture technology, which separates carbon dioxide gas with the help of membrane materials, and has the characteristics of high efficiency, energy saving and simple operation.

SRC: 如何让膜材料“深呼吸”， 提高气体分离效率，是采用膜分离法捕集二氧化碳的瓶颈难点。
HYP: How to make the membrane material "breathe deeply" and improve the efficiency of gas separation is the bottleneck and difficulty of capturing carbon dioxide by membrane separation.

SRC: 天津大学科研团队创新思路，通过反复实验，探究不同溶剂对膜气体分离性能的影响。
HYP: The scientific research team of Tianjin University innovated ideas and explored the influence of different solvents on membrane gas separation performance through repeated experiments.

SRC: 实验结果表明，以N-甲基吡咯烷酮作为制备溶剂，生成的膜材料中碳纳米管分布更加均匀，“更透气”，有效提升了膜材料气体分离效能和速率。
HYP: The experimental results show that with N-methylpyrrolidone as the preparation solvent, the distribution of carbon nanotubes in the membrane material is more uniform and "more breathable", which effectively improves the gas separation efficiency and rate of the membrane material.

SRC: 用这种新技术制备的混合基质膜，二氧化碳分离性能接近目前此类膜材料的理论分离上限。
HYP: The carbon dioxide separation performance of the mixed matrix membrane prepared by this new technology is close to the theoretical separation upper limit of this kind of membrane material at present.

SRC: “新技术为膜分离法捕集二氧化碳提供了新思路。”
HYP: "The new technology provides a new idea for capturing carbon dioxide by membrane separation."

SRC: 天津大学大气环境与生物能源团队成员李润表示：“ 我们希望这种技术能够为未来燃煤电厂与化工企业处理烟气提供有力支持，在控制温室气体排放等领域发挥重大作用。”
HYP: Li Run, a member of Tianjin University's Atmospheric Environment and Bioenergy Team, said: "We hope that this technology can provide strong support for future coal-fired power plants and chemical enterprises to deal with flue gas and play a major role in controlling greenhouse gas emissions and other fields."

SRC: 首度成立专委会、集体签“长约” 第三届进博会参展商联盟构筑“进博纽带” - 新华网
HYP: Set up a special committee for the first time and collectively sign a "long contract" The 3rd China International Import Expo Exhibitors Alliance to build a "link to enter the Expo" - Xinhuanet

SRC: 7月26日在上海拍摄的第三届进博会参展商联盟第一次会议现场。
HYP: The scene of the first meeting of the 3rd China International Import Expo Exhibitors Alliance filmed in Shanghai on July 26.

SRC: 新华社上海7月26日电（记者周蕊）26日，第三届进口博览会参展商联盟在此间首次成立专业委员会，首批成立的专委会包括公共卫生防疫专委会和乳业专委会，35家成员企业还签订了3年长期参展合作备忘录，进博会参展商联盟的纽带作用不断增强。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Shanghai, July 26 (Reporter Zhou Rui) On the 26th, the Exhibitors Alliance of the Third Import Expo set up a professional committee for the first time here. The first batch of special committees set up included the Special Committee on Public Health and Epidemic Prevention and the Special Committee on Dairy Industry. 35 member enterprises also signed a three-year long-term exhibition cooperation memorandum, and the link role of the Exhibitors Alliance of the Expo has been continuously strengthened.

SRC: 26日在此间举行的第三届进博会参展商联盟第一次会议上，韩国现代、美国陶氏化学、日本资生堂、新西兰纽仕兰、德国西门子、法国米其林、英国阿斯利康等一批展盟成员企业签订了3年长期参展合作备忘录，修订和完善后的展盟章程也首次公布。
HYP: At the first meeting of the 3rd CIIE Exhibitors Alliance held here on the 26th, Hyundai Korea, Dow Chemical of the United States, Shiseido of Japan, New Zealand New Zealand, Siemens of Germany, Michelin of France, AstraZeneca of the United Kingdom and other member enterprises of the exhibition alliance signed a three-year long-term participation memorandum, and the revised and improved articles of association of the exhibition alliance were also announced for the first time.

SRC: 26日在此间举行的第三届进博会参展商联盟第一次会议上，韩国现代、美国陶氏化学、日本资生堂、新西兰<v>纽仕兰</v>、德国西门子、法国米其林、英国阿斯利康等一批展盟成员企业签订了3年长期参展合作备忘录，修订和完善后的展盟章程也首次公布。
HYP: At the first meeting of the 3rd CIIE Exhibitors Alliance held here on the 26th, Hyundai Korea, Dow Chemical of the United States, Shiseido of Japan, New Zealand New Zealand, Siemens of Germany, Michelin of France, AstraZeneca of the United Kingdom and other member enterprises of the exhibition alliance signed a three-year long-term participation memorandum, and the revised and improved articles of association of the exhibition alliance were also announced for the first time.

SRC: 7月26日在上海拍摄的乳业专业委员会成立仪式现场。
HYP: The establishment ceremony of the Dairy Professional Committee was filmed in Shanghai on July 26.

SRC: 根据最新的章程，展盟将引入牵头单位轮值机制，加强专委会功能。
HYP: According to the latest articles of association, the exhibition alliance will introduce the rotation mechanism of the lead unit to strengthen the function of the special committee.

SRC: 专委会将为行业发展趋势分析提出建议，推动行业可持续发展。
HYP: The special committee will put forward suggestions for the analysis of the development trend of the industry and promote the sustainable development of the industry.

SRC: 同时，整合行业全产业链资源，以大带小，带动关联企业参展，将进博会打造成为行业企业聚集高地。
