HYP: At the same time, integrate the resources of the whole industrial chain of the industry, drive affiliated enterprises to participate in the exhibition, and build CIIE into a gathering highland for industrial enterprises.

SRC: 首次成立公共卫生防疫专委会，对于当前抗击新冠肺炎疫情来说显得尤为重要。
HYP: The establishment of a special committee on public health and epidemic prevention for the first time is particularly important for the current fight against the COVID-19 epidemic.

SRC: 作为第三届进博会公共卫生防疫专委会副会长单位，雅培快速诊断业务大中华区总经理仇建平说，下一步，雅培会携手更多行业伙伴，探索新的解决方案和合作模式，助力中国以及全世界抗击新冠肺炎疫情。
HYP: Qiu Jianping, general manager of Abbott's rapid diagnosis business in Greater China, said that in the next step, Abbott will join hands with more industry partners to explore new solutions and cooperation models to help China and the world fight the COVID-19 epidemic.

SRC: <v>作为第三届进博会公共卫生防疫专委会副会长单位</v>，雅培快速诊断业务大中华区总经理仇建平说，下一步，雅培会携手更多行业伙伴，探索新的解决方案和合作模式，助力中国以及全世界抗击新冠肺炎疫情。
HYP: Qiu Jianping, general manager of Abbott's rapid diagnosis business in Greater China, said that in the next step, Abbott will join hands with more industry partners to explore new solutions and cooperation models to help China and the world fight the COVID-19 epidemic.

SRC: 7月26日在上海拍摄的公共卫生防疫专业委员会成立仪式现场。
HYP: The inauguration ceremony of the Public Health and Epidemic Prevention Professional Committee was filmed in Shanghai on July 26.

SRC: 据悉，第三届进博会首次设立公共卫生防疫专区，截至目前已有近50家全球企业报名参展，展览面积超过1万平方米。
HYP: It is reported that the third Expo has set up a special area for public health and epidemic prevention for the first time. Up to now, nearly 50 global enterprises have signed up for the exhibition, with an exhibition area of more than 10000 square meters.

SRC: 在2018年首届进博会期间，进博会参展商联盟由展商自发倡议成立，旨在成为优质参展企业交流合作平台、连接参展各方信息与资源共享平台，以及为促进中国与世界各国（地区）之间经贸商务往来与发展建言献策的智囊平台。
HYP: During the first CIIE in 2018, the CIIE Exhibitors Alliance was established by exhibitors on their own initiative, aiming to become a platform for high-quality exhibitors to exchange and cooperate, a platform for information and resource sharing between exhibitors, and a think tank platform for promoting economic, trade and business exchanges and development between China and other countries (regions) in the world.

SRC: 截至目前，已有142家企业加入参展商联盟，覆盖全球23个国家和地区。
HYP: Up to now, 142 enterprises have joined the exhibitor alliance, covering 23 countries and regions around the world.

SRC: 比利时3岁女童死于新冠病毒感染-新华网
HYP: Belgian 3-year-old girl dies of novel coronavirus infectio - Xinhuanet

SRC: 比利时卫生部门24日说，一名3岁女童死于新冠病毒感染，是该国最年幼的新冠病亡患者。
HYP: Belgian health authorities said on the 24th that a 3-year-old girl died of COVID-19 infection and was the youngest patient in the country to die of COVID-19.

SRC: 比利时卫生部门发言人布德温·卡特里说，这名女童感染新冠病毒前已经有其他严重疾病；除了这名女童，近期还有一名18岁青年死于新冠病毒感染。
HYP: Belgian health department spokesman Budwin Khatri said that the girl had other serious diseases before she was infected with COVID-19; in addition to this girl, an 18-year-old youth recently died of COVID-19 infection.

SRC: 卡特里说，上周比利时85%新增新冠确诊人员年龄在60岁以下。
HYP: Catry said that 85% of the newly diagnosed COVID-19 patients in Belgium last week were under 60 years old.

SRC: 他提醒身体健康、年龄较轻的民众不要掉以轻心。
HYP: He reminded healthy and younger people not to take it lightly.

SRC: “虽然年轻人死于新冠病毒感染的情况较为罕见，但没有任何人现在具备免疫力。 ”
HYP: "Although it is rare for young people to die of Novel Coronavirus infection, no one now has immunity."

SRC: 上周，比利时新增新冠确诊病例比前一周增长89 % ， 每日平均2.9人死于新冠病毒感染，高于前一周的日均1.7人。
HYP: Last week, the number of newly confirmed cases of COVID-19 in Belgium increased by 89% compared with the previous week, with an average of 2.9 deaths per day from COVID-19 infection, higher than the daily average of 1.7 in the previous week.

SRC: 欧洲疫情高峰期间，比利时人口中新冠病毒感染者占比在欧洲“名列前茅” 。
HYP: During the peak of the epidemic in Europe, the proportion of people infected with novel coronavirus in the Belgian population was "among the best" in Europe.

SRC: 比利时有1100多万人口。
HYP: Belgium has a population of more than 11 million.

SRC: 最新数据显示，比利时累计64847人感染新冠病毒。
HYP: The latest data show that a total of 64847 people in Belgium are infected with novel coronavirus.

SRC: 卡特里本周早些时候警告，在雪球越滚越大、最终造成“雪崩”前，人们必须采取行动。
HYP: Carter warned earlier this week that people must take action before the snowball gets bigger and bigger and eventually causes an "avalanche."

SRC: 为抑制疫情反弹，比利时首相索菲·维尔梅斯23日宣布，人们在公共场所佩戴口罩的有关规定将更加严格，8月进一步解除限制性措施的方案也将暂缓执行。
HYP: In order to curb the rebound of the epidemic, Belgian Prime Minister Sophie Wilmes announced on the 23rd that the relevant regulations on people wearing masks in public places will be stricter, and the plan to further lift restrictive measures in August will also be suspended.

SRC: （郭倩） 【 新华社微特稿】
HYP: (Guo Qian) [Xinhua News Agency micro-feature]

SRC: 大型融媒体行动《走村直播看脱贫》出发- 今日要闻- 湖南日报网- 华声在线
HYP: Large-scale financial media action "Walking to the Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation" starts-Today's Highlights-Hunan Daily Network-Huasheng Online

SRC: 湖南日报·新湖南客户端7月25日讯(本报记者)7月25日，由中央广播电视总台财经节目中心主办的大型融媒体行动《走村直播看脱贫》从江苏徐州出发，两辆携带5G新媒体移动云制播系统的大篷车在现场嘉宾目送下，缓缓驶出现场。
HYP: Hunan Daily, New Hunan Client, July 25 (Reporter) On July 25, the large-scale financial media action "Going to the Village Live to See Poverty Alleviation" sponsored by the Financial Program Center of the Central Radio and Television General Station started from Xuzhou, Jiangsu Province. Two caravans carrying 5G new media mobile cloud production and broadcasting system slowly drove out of the scene under the eyes of the guests at the scene.

SRC: 习近平总书记指出，“2020年是具有里程碑意义的一年，我们将全面建成小康社会，实现第一个百年奋斗目标，2020年也是脱贫攻坚决战决胜之年”。
HYP: General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out that "2020 is a milestone year. We will build a well-off society in an all-round way and achieve the goal of the first century. 2020 is also the year of decisive battle against poverty".

SRC: 大型融媒体行动《走村直播看脱贫》是中央广播电视总台财经节目中心为配合这一重大主题，做好脱贫攻坚宣传的重要举措。
HYP: The large-scale financial media action "Going to the Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation" is an important measure taken by the Financial Program Center of the Central Radio and Television General Station to cooperate with this major theme and do a good job in poverty alleviation propaganda.

SRC: 该行动将走进全国20多个省、自治区、直辖市的脱贫村，挖掘鲜活脱贫故事，直击村容村貌巨变，展现村民如何突破生存发展困境、走向致富之路的历程。
HYP: The action will go into poverty alleviation villages in more than 20 provinces, autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government across the country, dig out fresh poverty alleviation stories, directly attack the great changes in the appearance of villages and villages, and show how villagers break through the predicament of survival and development and move towards the road of becoming rich.

SRC: 这次行动将持续3个多月。
HYP: The operation will last for more than three months.

SRC: 记者从徐州出发，兵分两路，一路走西南线，途经安徽、湖北、江西、湖南、广西、贵州、四川、重庆、云南、西藏等地;另一路走西北线，途经河南、陕西、甘肃、青海、新疆、宁夏、内蒙古、山西、河北等地，行程超过1万公里。
HYP: The reporter started from Xuzhou and divided into two roads, all the way to the southwest line, passing through Anhui, Hubei, Jiangxi, Hunan, Guangxi, Guizhou, Sichuan, Chongqing, Yunnan, Tibet and other places; The other road takes the northwest line, passing through Henan, Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Xinjiang, Ningxia, Inner Mongolia, Shanxi, Hebei and other places, with a journey of more than 10000 kilometers.

SRC: 在报道形式上，《走村直播看脱贫》大胆融合。
HYP: In the form of reporting, "Walking to the Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation" boldly integrates.

SRC: 大篷车所到村庄的经济发展情况，都将通过中央广播电视总台央视财经频道、央广经济之声、中国交通广播、央视财经新媒体进行播出。
HYP: The economic development of the villages visited by the caravan will be broadcast through CCTV Financial Channel, CCTV Economic Voice, China Traffic Radio and CCTV Financial New Media.

SRC: 其中，电视直播将主要在央视财经频道的午间新闻节目《天下财经》完成(首播时间：周一至周日12：00-13:00 )，央视财经频道的黄金档新闻栏目《经济信息联播》将开设脱贫报道专栏(首播时间：周一至周日20：30-21:30 )。
HYP: Among them, the live TV broadcast will be mainly completed in the noon news program "Tianxia Finance" of CCTV Financial Channel (premiere time:12:00-13:00 from Monday to Sunday), and the prime-time news column "Economic Information Network" of CCTV Financial Channel will set up a poverty alleviation report column (premiere time:20:30-21:30 from Monday to Sunday).

SRC: 同时，大篷车将对所到的每个村庄在央视财经客户端进行长达1小时的直播，观众通过下载央视财经APP，可以观看直播，参与抽奖活动。
HYP: At the same time, the caravan will broadcast live for up to one hour to each village on the CCTV financial client. The audience can watch the live broadcast and participate in the lottery by downloading the CCTV financial APP.

SRC: 在技术应用和演播室设计上，《 走村直播看脱贫》勇于突破，首创了“外场新媒体大篷车”。
HYP: In terms of technology application and studio design, "Walking to the Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation" has the courage to make a breakthrough and pioneered the "Outfield New Media Caravan".

SRC: 该车搭载5G新媒体移动云制播系统，利用5G+4K/8K+AI技术，实现线上线下、大屏小屏，电视广播的有机结合。
HYP: The car is equipped with 5G new media mobile cloud production and broadcasting system, and uses 5G + 4K / 8K + AI technology to realize the organic combination of online and offline, large screen and small screen, and TV broadcasting.

SRC: 配置三讯演播区，演播区由集装箱改装而成，长12米、宽2.55米、高3.98米，箱体采用液压自动展开结构，最大可以上翻120度。
HYP: Equipped with Sanxun broadcasting area, the broadcasting area is converted from a container, with a length of 12 meters, a width of 2.55 meters and a height of 3.98 meters. The box adopts a hydraulic automatic deployment structure, which can turn up to 120 degrees.

SRC: 演播区也可以自动展开，并外接扩展平台，面积50多平方米，可以满足大部分节目的场景要求。
HYP: The studio area can also be automatically expanded and an external expansion platform, covering an area of more than 50 square meters, can meet the scene requirements of most programs.

SRC: 张继科林小宅组队力挺有肌少年-新华网
HYP: Zhang Ji Colin Small House Team Up to Support Muscular Teenagers - Xinhuanet

SRC: 运动少年热血竞技秀《运动吧少年》在7月11日正式登陆湖南卫视。
HYP: The sports youth hot - blooded competitive show "Sports Bar Youth" officially landed on Hunan Satellite TV on July 11.

SRC: 运动领队张继科和运动助理林小宅跨界同台,林丹和傅园慧点评各有风格,而“庞然大物”般的力量拔杆装置的硬核上场,更让节目“燃”力十足。
HYP: Zhang Jike, the sports leader, and Lin Xiaozhu, the sports assistant, shared the stage across the border, and Lin Dan and Fu Yuanhui commented on their respective styles, while the hardcore of the "behemoth" - like power pulling device made the program "burn".

SRC: 首集中,11位运动少年亮相力量赛道,外形惊艳现场观众的同时,竞技台上的“强冲突”“强对抗”“强心脏”也受到关注。
HYP: In the first episode, 11 sports teenagers appeared on the power track, and while their appearance stunned the audience, the "strong conflict", "strong confrontation", and "strong heart" on the competitive stage also attracted attention.

SRC: 其中,“ 强冲突”来自超A体育生乔文一,他在比赛前公然挑衅同赛道中有“花美男”之称的徐志滨,呛声徐志滨的外形条件应该去唱跳节目,甚至放出“输了别把妆哭花了”的狠话。
HYP: Among them, the "strong conflict" came from Super A sports student Qiao Wenyi, who openly provoked Xu Zhibin, known as the "flower beauty man" on the same track, before the race, choking that Xu Zhibin's appearance condition should go to the singing and dancing program, and even released the harsh words, "Don't cry if you lose".

SRC: 一番言论让场上的少年和运动领队们都倒吸一口凉气。
HYP: The remarks made the teenagers and the sports leaders on the field take a breath of cool air.

SRC: 而“强对抗”更像是神仙打架,被誉为“大魔王”的孙健淇碰上同样实力强劲的张鑫栋,上演强强对决。
HYP: The "strong confrontation" was more like a fight between immortals, and Sun Jianqi, known as the "Great Demon King", met Zhang Xindong, who was also strong, and staged a strong showdown.

SRC: 而他们的身份也让人始料未及,孙健淇是热爱健身的演员,张鑫栋则是退役特战队员、三次勇士勋章获得者。
HYP: Their identities are also unexpected: Sun Jianqi is an actor who loves fitness, while Zhang Xindong is a retired special warfare team member and three - time Warrior Medal recipient.

SRC: 比赛一开始,两位少年就拼尽全力快速拔出小杆,在大杆上的持久对抗让现场观众为他们捏了一把汗。
HYP: At the beginning of the competition, the two teenagers made every effort to quickly pull out the small pole, and the long - lasting confrontation on the big pole made the audience sweat for them.

SRC: 在紧张的赛况下,张继科作为《运动吧少年》运动领队之一,也在一旁认真观战。
HYP: Under the tense conditions, Zhang Jike, as one of the leaders of the "Sports Bar Youth" campaign, was also watching the game carefully.

SRC: 在点评环节,他也十分细心,对输了比赛的一方少年耐心鼓励,帮助复盘过程中的每一个失误点。
HYP: During the commentary session, he was also very careful, patiently encouraging the teenager who lost the match, and helping to make every mistake in the replay process.

SRC: 而运动助理林小宅则是花式助攻,她毫不掩饰对颜值实力在线的少年们的欣赏。
HYP: The sports assistant Lin Xiaozhu, on the other hand, is a fancy assist, and she makes no secret of her appreciation for the teenagers whose face value is online.

SRC: 在了解到运动少年们超负荷的日常训练时,更是心生敬佩。
HYP: When I learned about the overloaded daily training of sports teenagers, I admired them even more.

SRC: 同样是运动领队的林丹和傅园慧则各有风格,一个是气定神闲派“预言家” , 一个则是用笑容驱散紧张氛围的“洪荒少女” 。
HYP: Lin Dan and Fu Yuanhui, who are also leaders of the movement, have their own styles, one is a "prophet" who is calm and idle, and the other is a "flood girl" who dispels tension with a smile.

SRC: 另外,吉克隽逸和刘烨作为运动助理,也围绕运动少年制造了不少爆笑话题。
HYP: In addition, Jike Junyi and Liu Ye, as sports assistants, have also created a lot of hilarious topics around sports teenagers.

SRC: 法国南特教堂大火：教区志愿者承认纵火平时和善寡言-中新网
HYP: Church fire in Nantes, France: Parish volunteers admit arson is usually kind and quiet - chinanews.com

SRC: 中新网7月26日电据外媒报道，7月18日，法国南特的宗教历史建筑瑰宝、著名的圣彼得与圣保罗大教堂，在一场火灾当中受到严重损毁，大管风琴完全毁坏。
HYP: chinanews.com, July 26 - According to foreign media reports, on July 18, the famous Cathedral of St. Peter and St. Paul, a religious and historical architectural treasure in Nantes, France, was severely damaged in a fire, and the organ was completely destroyed.

SRC: 当地时间26日，南特检察官宣布，一名在大教堂当中负责保卫工作的教区志愿者已经被起诉，罪名是“纵火毁坏” 。
HYP: On the 26th local time, the Nantes prosecutor announced that a parish volunteer responsible for guarding the cathedral had been charged with "arson and destruction".

SRC: 他已承认，是自己在教堂里点火。
HYP: He has admitted that he started the fire in the church.

SRC: 报道称，当地检察官塞纳斯表示，这名39岁、来自卢旺达的教区志愿者承认，自己夜里在大教堂当中的三处点火。
HYP: According to the report, local prosecutor Senas said that the 39 - year - old parish volunteer from Rwanda admitted that he had set fire to three places in the cathedral at night.

SRC: 此人的律师则表示，纵火者现在很后悔做出这种事。
HYP: The man's lawyer said that the arsonist now regretted doing this.

SRC: 此人几年前通过避难的途径，进入法国，在本次火灾事发地教区得到庇护，在教堂里得到收留。
HYP: This person entered France through asylum a few years ago, and was sheltered in the diocese where the fire occurred, and was taken in in the church.

SRC: 检方指出，最近，他尝试更新签证，正在和警察局对此进行对话沟通。
HYP: The prosecution pointed out that he had recently tried to renew his visa and was in dialogue with the police.

SRC: 但教堂方面表示仍然不敢相信，这名平时非常善良、面带笑容，但不怎么说话的信徒，会毁坏他如此热爱的教堂。
HYP: However, the church said it still could not believe that the faithful, who were usually very kind and smiling, but did not speak much, would destroy the church he loved so much.

SRC: 7月18日火灾发生的当天，这名志愿者就已经因为叙述当中出现逻辑不通的问题，而接受过警方问询调查，但他后来被释放。
HYP: On the day of the fire on July 18, the volunteer had already been questioned and investigated by the police because of illogical problems in his account, but he was later released.

SRC: 图为消防员在现场进行救援。
HYP: The picture shows firefighters carrying out rescue operations at the scene.

SRC: 25日晚间，由于巴黎中央警察局实验室的专业工程师获取了新的证据，此人又再一次被传讯。
HYP: On the evening of the 25th, the man was arraigned again after the professional engineers of the Paris Central Police Laboratory obtained new evidence.

SRC: 这一次，男子承认了自己纵火的行为。
HYP: This time, the man admitted to the act of arson.

SRC: 据报道，如果蓄意纵火毁坏的罪名成立，嫌犯将可能面临10年监禁和15万欧元的罚款。
HYP: According to reports, if found guilty of intentional arson and destruction, the suspect could face 10 years in prison and a fine of 150000 euros.

SRC: 报道称，此次大火给圣皮埃尔与圣保罗大教堂造成了严重损失，教堂内的管风琴被完全烧毁，管风琴后面的彩色玻璃窗也受损严重。
HYP: According to the report, the fire caused serious damage to the Cathedral of St. Pierre and St. Paul, the organ in the church was completely burned, and the stained glass window behind the organ was also severely damaged.

SRC: 法国历史保护建筑首席建筑师布鲁内认为，保守估计，南特大教堂复原工作至少要有3年。
HYP: Brunet, the chief architect of the French Historic Preservation Building, believes that it is conservatively estimated that the restoration of the South Cathedral will take at least three years.

SRC: 飓风“汉娜”登陆美得州或引发河水暴涨和山洪-中新网
HYP: Hurricane Hannah may cause swollen rivers and flash floods as it makes landfall in Texas - chinanews.com

SRC: 中新网7月26日电综合外媒报道，当地时间25日下午5时，飓风“汉娜”登陆美国得克萨斯州，将给得州带来强风暴雨、河水暴涨，还可能引发威胁生命的山洪。
HYP: chinanews.com, July 26 China News Service reported that Hurricane Hannah made landfall in Texas at 5 pm local time on July 25, which will bring strong winds, torrential rain, swollen rivers, and life - threatening flash floods to Texas.

SRC: 国家飓风中心说，预计飓风“汉娜”会挟带暴雨，扫过得州南部与东北部部分地区，雨势或引发部分溪水暴涨以及威胁生命的山洪爆发。
HYP: The National Hurricane Center said Hurricane Hannah is expected to sweep through parts of southern and northeastern Texas with torrential rain, which may cause some streams to swell and life - threatening flash floods.

SRC: 报道称，受飓风“汉娜”影响最严重的是科珀斯克里斯蒂市以南到格兰德河河口地区，而里奥格兰德山谷可能爆发大范围的山洪。
HYP: According to the report, the area most affected by Hurricane Hannah is south of Corpus Christi to the mouth of the Rio Grande River, while widespread flash floods are possible in the Rio Grande Valley.

SRC: 得州州长阿博特25日表示：“任何飓风都是一个巨大的挑战。”
HYP: Texas Governor Abbott said on the 25th, "Any hurricane is a huge challenge."

SRC: 该州有32个郡因为飓风进入灾难紧急状态。
HYP: Thirty-two counties in the state declared disaster emergencies because of the hurricane.

SRC: 科珀斯克里斯蒂市这座人口超32万的城市，已关闭图书馆与博物馆，居民严阵以待。
HYP: Corpus Christi, a city with a population of more than 320000, has closed its libraries and museums, and residents are on standby.

SRC: 阿博特还说，在得州正在遭遇新冠疫情重创之际，不能再让这场飓风给得州带来更多伤亡。
HYP: Abbott also said that at a time when Texas is being hit hard by the new coronavirus pandemic, the hurricane cannot be allowed to bring more casualties to Texas.

SRC: 据报道，得州南部地区降水量预计将在26日夜间达到6至12英寸，得克萨斯州北部地区和路易斯安那州沿海地区也将出现3至5英寸的降雨。
HYP: According to reports, precipitation in southern Texas is expected to reach 6 to 12 inches on the night of the 26th, while northern Texas and coastal Louisiana will also receive 3 to 5 inches of rain.

SRC: 由于全球变暖等因素影响，“汉娜”的形成早于以往的大西洋飓风季。
HYP: Due to global warming and other factors, Hannah formed earlier than previous Atlantic hurricane seasons.

SRC: 一般情况下，大西洋的第一场飓风通常要到8月中旬才会形成。
HYP: Typically, the first hurricane in the Atlantic Ocean does not form until mid - August.

SRC: 波兰将退出欧洲防止对女子施暴的条约
HYP: Poland to withdraw from European treaty to prevent violence against women

SRC: 波兰司法部星期六表示，波兰下个星期将采取步骤，退出欧洲防止对妇女施暴条约。
HYP: The Polish Ministry of Justice said Saturday that Poland will take steps next week to withdraw from the European Treaty on the Prevention of Violence against Women.

SRC: 波兰右翼的政府内阁表示，该条约要求学校教授学生有关性别问题的议题，践踏了学生父母的权利。
HYP: Poland's right - wing government cabinet said the treaty required schools to teach students about gender issues, trampling on the rights of students' parents.

SRC: 波兰司法部长焦布洛举行记者会说，他领导的司法部星期一将向劳工和家庭部提出开始退出条约的要求。
HYP: Polish Justice Minister Jobro held a press conference and said that his Ministry of Justice would make a request to the Ministry of Labor and Family to begin withdrawing from the treaty on Monday.

SRC: 那项条约又名伊斯坦布尔公约。
HYP: That treaty is also known as the Istanbul Convention.

SRC: 焦布洛说，“该条约包含一些我们认为是有害的意思形态性质的元素。”
HYP: "The treaty contains elements that we think are harmful in the form of meaning," Gioblo said.

SRC: 波兰执政的法律与公正党及其及其执政联盟伙伴跟罗马天主教教会有密切的同盟关系，提倡保守的社会议程。
HYP: Poland's ruling Law and Justice Party and its coalition partners have a close alliance with the Roman Catholic Church and promote a conservative social agenda.

SRC: 波兰总统杜达在这个月成功的连任竞选期间将敌视同性恋权利作为主要议题之一。
HYP: Polish President Andrzej Duda made hostility to gay rights one of the main issues during his successful re - election campaign this month.

SRC: 星期五，成千上万的波兰人(其中大部分是妇女)在华沙和其他一些城市举行反对退出公约的抗议。
HYP: On Friday, thousands of Poles, most of them women, protested against the withdrawal from the convention in Warsaw and other cities.

SRC: 抗议的组织者之一莱姆帕特在华沙举行的抗议游行中说，“退出条约的目的就是将家暴合法化”。
HYP: Lempat, one of the organizers of the protest, said at a protest march in Warsaw, "The purpose of withdrawing from the treaty is to legalize domestic violence."

SRC: 一些抗议者举着横幅，上面写着“法律与公正党是妇女的地狱”。
HYP: Some protesters held banners that said, "PiS is a hell for women."

SRC: 法律与公正党长久以来抱怨伊斯坦布尔公约。
HYP: PiS has long complained about the Istanbul Convention.

SRC: 波兰先前的中间派执政的政府2015年批准了该公约。
HYP: Poland's previous centrist government ratified the convention in 2015.

SRC: 法律与公正党政府表示，该条约不尊重宗教，要求在学校里教授自由派的社会政策。
HYP: The PiS government said the treaty did not respect religion and required liberal social policies to be taught in schools.

SRC: 但截至目前该党一直没有决定退出该公约。
HYP: So far, however, the party has not decided to withdraw from the convention.

SRC: （根据路透社报道）
HYP: (According to Reuters)

SRC: 据越通社报道，格里沃里认为，越南25年来为东盟的发展作出巨大贡献。
HYP: According to VNA, Grivori believes that Vietnam has made great contributions to the development of ASEAN over the past 25 years.

SRC: 越南不仅是东盟负责任的一员，更是东盟的火车头。
HYP: Vietnam is not only a responsible member of ASEAN, but also the locomotive of ASEAN.

SRC: 格里沃里表示，俄罗斯乃至亚欧经济联盟认为，越南为东盟提高其地位，对外推广其形象做出贡献。
HYP: Grivori said that Russia and even the Asia - Europe Economic Union believe that Vietnam has contributed to enhancing ASEAN's status and promoting its image to the outside world.

SRC: 他强调，“东盟因此应该感谢越南。”
HYP: He stressed, "ASEAN should thank Vietnam for this."

SRC: 格里沃里表示，分析人士对越南所提出的和平倡议给予认可。
HYP: Grivori said that analysts recognized Vietnam's peace initiative.

SRC: 越南愿意同东盟各国分享经验，对包括东海问题在内的亚太地区面临的问题提出建设性的和平措施。
HYP: Vietnam is willing to share its experience with ASEAN countries and propose constructive peaceful measures for issues facing the Asia - Pacific region, including the East China Sea issue.

SRC: 关于越南与俄罗斯在东盟框架下的合作，格里沃里认为，越南为俄罗斯与东盟的合作关系提供支持，帮助俄罗斯在这一合作框架下获得利益。
HYP: As for the cooperation between Vietnam and Russia under the ASEAN framework, Grivori believes that Vietnam supports the cooperative relationship between Russia and ASEAN and helps Russia gain benefits under this cooperation framework.

SRC: 包括俄罗斯在内的亚欧经济联盟与越南签署自贸协定后能够进军东盟市场。
HYP: After signing a free trade agreement with Vietnam, the Asia - Europe Economic Union, including Russia, will be able to enter the ASEAN market.

SRC: 格里沃里建议最大限度扩大亚欧经济联盟与东盟各国的自由贸易区，进而创造经济和安全稳定的平台。
HYP: Grivori proposed to maximize the expansion of the free trade area between the Asia - Europe Economic Union and ASEAN countries, thereby creating a platform for economic, security, and stability.

SRC: 格里沃里同时相信，俄罗斯、越南与东盟正在步入正轨并将实现其目标。
HYP: Grivori also believes that Russia, Vietnam, and ASEAN are on the right track and will achieve their goals.

SRC: 从现在到2020年底，北江省将具备必要条件，尤其是在基础设施，人力资源和土地等方面，以便主动迎来外资流入，特别是拥有价值链和转让先进技术的跨国集团。
HYP: From now until the end of 2020, Beijiang Province will have the necessary conditions, especially in terms of infrastructure, human resources, and land, to actively welcome the inflow of foreign capital, especially multinational groups with value chains and the transfer of advanced technology.

SRC: 此外，北江省将办理好递交政府总理决定对越韩工业区基础设施建设与经营项目投资的主张和批准将本省安山-北陇和安闾两个工业-城市-服务业区补充列入至2020年越南工业区发展总体规划的文件。
HYP: In addition, Bac Giang Province will handle the submission of the Prime Minister's proposal to invest in infrastructure construction and operation projects in the Vietnam - South Korea industrial zone and approve the addition of the province's two industrial - urban - service areas, Anshan - Beilong and Anlu, to the master plan for the development of Vietnam's industrial zone by 2020.

SRC: 与此同时，北江省着力加快各项目的进度，尤其是在和富、光州，双溪-内皇等工业园区集群的基础设施建设经营项目，为招商引资形成土地基金。
HYP: At the same time, Beijiang Province has made great efforts to speed up the progress of various projects, especially infrastructure construction and operation projects in industrial park clusters such as Hefu, Gwangju, and Shuangxi - Neihuang, and has formed a land fund to attract investment.

SRC: 在2020年内，北江省工贸局参就定工业区、工业集群规划建言献策，以纳入省规划。
HYP: In 2020, the Beijiang Provincial Bureau of Industry and Trade will make suggestions and suggestions on the planning of industrial zones and industrial clusters to be included in the provincial planning.

SRC: 北江省确定将发展工业园区集群与保障国防安全，保护生态环境，保障粮食安全相结合，进而助推工业均衡发展；拥有全面的电力，供水，交通和电信等基础设施，并与城市建设，贸易服务，工人住房和医疗卫生、教育等其他社会基础设施等<v>相结合</v>。
HYP: Beijiang Province has decided to combine the development of industrial park clusters with ensuring national defense and security, protecting the ecological environment, and ensuring food security, thereby boosting balanced industrial development; it has comprehensive infrastructure such as electricity, water supply, transportation, and telecommunications, as well as urban construction, trade services, workers' housing, and other social infrastructure such as medical, health, and education.

SRC: 北江省确定将发展工业园区集群与保障国防安全，保护生态环境，保障粮食安全相结合，进而助推工业均衡发展；拥有全面的电力，供水，交通和电信等基础设施，并与城市建设，贸易服务，工人住房和医疗卫生、教育等其他社会基础设施等相结合。
HYP: Beijiang Province has decided to combine the development of industrial park clusters with ensuring national defense and security, protecting the ecological environment, and ensuring food security, thereby boosting balanced industrial development; it has comprehensive infrastructure such as electricity, water supply, transportation, and telecommunications, as well as urban construction, trade services, workers' housing, and other social infrastructure such as medical, health, and education.

SRC: 在工业区，北江省着力呼吁对电力，电子，电信设备，精密机械，辅助工业等领域中的高科技，清洁技术的投资项目。
HYP: In industrial areas, Beijiang Province calls for high - tech and clean - tech investment projects in power, electronics, telecommunications equipment, precision machinery, auxiliary industries, and other fields.

SRC: 在工业园区集群，该省呼吁对生产、利用就地劳动力、尤其是农产品、食品加工等领域的中小型规模投资项目。
HYP: In industrial park clusters, the province calls for small and medium - sized investment projects in the production and utilization of local labor, especially in agricultural products, food processing, and other fields.

SRC: 未来，北江省将着力加快对北江市后勤物流中心的基础设施的投资，与工业园区集群同步发展，以优化货物、货币流通和有助于降低生产成本，提高货物价值，优化供应链，发展多式联运，从而为投资者投资于本省创造吸引力。
HYP: In the future, Beijiang Province will focus on accelerating investment in the infrastructure of the logistics center in Beijiang City and develop in tandem with industrial park clusters to optimize the circulation of goods and money, help reduce production costs, increase the value of goods, optimize the supply chain, and develop multimodal transport, thus creating an attraction for investors to invest in the province.

SRC: （德国之声中文网）过去两周内，西班牙的新冠确冠病例大幅回升，多日出现上千新增病例。
HYP: DETROIT (AP) - In the past two weeks, the number of new coronavirus cases in Spain has risen sharply, with thousands of new cases on several days.

SRC: 英国政府周六（7月25日）晚间临时决定，从当地时间26日零点起，将西班牙从安全旅行名单中移除，从西班牙入境英国的人必须隔离14天。
HYP: The UK government temporarily decided on the evening of Saturday (July 25) to remove Spain from the safe travel list from midnight local time on the 26th, and those entering the UK from Spain must isolate for 14 days.

SRC: 正在西班牙度假的英国游客听闻此项决定纷纷表示惊讶、担心、甚至愤怒，因为消息突如其来，令人措手不及。
HYP: British tourists who were holidaying in Spain expressed surprise, concern, and even anger at the decision, as the news was so sudden that it caught them by surprise.

SRC: 据报道，英国交通大臣沙普斯（Grant Shapps）目前也在西班牙度假。
HYP: According to reports, British Transport Secretary Grant Shapps is also currently holidaying in Spain.

SRC: 英国发布隔离措施前，挪威也已宣布从西班牙返回挪威的人要进行为期10天的隔离。
HYP: Before the UK issued the quarantine measures, Norway had also announced that people returning to Norway from Spain would be quarantined for 10 days.

SRC: 法国和比利时建议本国居民放弃前方巴塞罗那以及周边地区度假的计划。
HYP: France and Belgium have advised their residents to abandon their plans to holiday in and around Barcelona.

SRC: 这些地区的海滩人满为患，人与人之间无法保持社交距离，警察一度需要采取措施，以减少海滩游客的数量。
HYP: The beaches in these areas were so overcrowded that social distancing could not be maintained, and the police needed to take measures to reduce the number of beachgoers.

SRC: 旅游业是西班牙的重要支柱产业
HYP: Tourism is an important pillar industry in Spain

SRC: 西班牙：这里是安全的
HYP: Spain: It's Safe Here

SRC: 针对英国做出的决定，西班牙外交部周日表示，该国疫情得到控制。
HYP: In response to the decision made by the UK, the Spanish Foreign Ministry said on Sunday that the outbreak in the country was under control.

SRC: 西班牙外交部长冈萨雷斯（Arancha Gonzalez Laya）向媒体强调：" 西班牙是安全的，不仅对西班牙人而言，对游客来说也是安全的。"
HYP: Spanish Foreign Minister Arancha Gonzalez Laya stressed to the media, "Spain is safe, not only for Spaniards, but also for tourists."

SRC: 西班牙政府将试图说服英国政府将巴利阿里群岛（Balearic Islands）和加那利群岛（Canary Islands）排除在隔离措施之外。
HYP: The Spanish government will try to persuade the British government to exclude the Balearic and Canary Islands from the quarantine measures.

SRC: 理由是，这两个旅游胜地的感染率远低于英国本土。
HYP: The reason is that the infection rate in these two tourist destinations is far lower than in the UK mainland.

SRC: 为防止疫情扩散，西班牙加泰罗尼亚地区也已重启"禁足令"。
HYP: In order to prevent the spread of the epidemic, the Spanish region of Catalonia has also reimposed the "foot ban".

SRC: 旅游业是西班牙的重要支柱产业，而西班牙是最受英国游客青睐的度假地之一。
HYP: Tourism is an important pillar industry in Spain, and Spain is one of the most popular holiday destinations for British tourists.

SRC: 英国的这一决定预计将会使西班牙的旅游业大受影响。
HYP: This decision by the UK is expected to greatly affect Spain's tourism industry.

SRC: 安静/任琛（德新社，路透社）
HYP: Quiet / Ren Chen (DPA, Reuters)

SRC: 中伏首日：北京暂别高温酷暑开启降雨模式-新华网
HYP: The first day of Zhongfu: Beijing takes a break from the heat and starts the rainfall pattern - Xinhuanet

SRC: 新华社北京7月26日电（记者倪元锦）7月26日是今年的“中伏”首日。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 26 (Reporter Ni Yuanjin) July 26 is the first day of this year's "Zhongfu".

SRC: 26日凌晨的大风骤雨对流天气，驱散了连日来笼罩在北京地区的高温酷暑，新一轮降雨天气将持续数日。
HYP: The wind, showers, and convective weather in the early morning of the 26th dispelled the heat and heat that had enveloped Beijing for days, and a new round of rainfall will continue for several days.

SRC: 北京市气象台26日11时发布称，26日北京有分散性阵雨（伴有弱雷电），日最高气温仅为27℃；夜间阴有小到中雨（伴有弱雷电），夜间最低气温为23℃。
HYP: The Beijing Meteorological Observatory announced at 11:00 on the 26th that there were scattered showers (accompanied by weak thunder and lightning) in Beijing on the 26th, and the daily maximum temperature was only 27C; at night, it was overcast with light to moderate rain (accompanied by weak thunder and lightning), and the minimum temperature at night was 23C.

SRC: 而在此前的24日至25日，北京全市处在高温蓝色预警中，大部地区日最高气温在37℃左右，<v>局地</v>出现超过40℃的高温。
HYP: Previously, from the 24th to the 25th, the whole city of Beijing was under a high temperature blue warning, and the daily maximum temperature in most areas was around 37C, with a high temperature of more than 40C locally.

SRC: 而在此前的24日至25日，北京全市处在高温蓝色预警中，大部地区日最高气温在37℃左右，局地出现超过40℃的高温。
HYP: Previously, from the 24th to the 25th, the whole city of Beijing was under a high temperature blue warning, and the daily maximum temperature in most areas was around 37C, with a high temperature of more than 40C locally.

SRC: 伏天是一年之中气温最高、潮湿、闷热的日子，一年有“三伏”，最热在中伏，中国百姓说的“苦夏”就在此时。
HYP: Futian is the hottest, humid, and sultry day of the year, and there are "three volts" in a year, and the hottest is in the middle volt, which is what the Chinese people call "bitter summer".

SRC: 入伏时，家家填满谷仓，民间有“一伏饺子二伏面”的说法。
HYP: When they entered, every family filled the barn, and there was a folk saying that "one volt dumpling and two volt noodles".

SRC: 根据目前预报，未来三天，北京多阴雨天气。
HYP: According to the current forecast, it will be rainy in Beijing in the next three days.

SRC: 气象部门提示公众尽量减少山区游玩，谨防地质灾害。
HYP: The meteorological department advised the public to minimize visits to mountainous areas and beware of geological disasters.

SRC: 据了解，今年的“中伏”有20天，从7月26日开始，至8月14日结束。
HYP: It is understood that this year's "mid - volt" will last for 20 days, starting on July 26 and ending on August 14.

SRC: 进入“中伏”后，人会感到身体乏力、食欲不振。
HYP: After entering the "middle volt", people will feel weak and loss of appetite.

SRC: 饮食上可选择绿豆、薏仁等具有清热解暑、健脾开胃作用的食物，以及苦菜、苦瓜等苦味食物，可有助于增进食欲、祛除暑气。
HYP: In the diet, you can choose foods such as mung beans and riesling, which have the effect of clearing heat and relieving heat, invigorating spleen and appetizing, as well as bitter foods such as bitter vegetables and bitter gourd, which can help increase appetite and eliminate heat.

SRC: 《叮咚上线!老师好》下周上线薛兆丰领衔“知识发起人-新华网
HYP: "Ding Dong Online! Good Teacher" goes online next week Xue Zhaofeng leads the "Knowledge Sponsor - Xinhuanet

SRC: 又有新综艺上线。
HYP: A new variety show is on the line.

SRC: 互动知识分享节目《叮咚上线!老师好》,将于7月20日起在湖南卫视播出。
HYP: The interactive knowledge sharing program "Ding Dong Online! Good Teacher" will be broadcast on Hunan Satellite TV from July 20.

SRC: 据了解,节目将打造全新的全年龄青春课堂,一批有颜有型又有才的老师将上阵,挑战趣味性知识输出。
HYP: It is understood that the program will create a new all - age youth classroom, and a group of talented and talented teachers will take part to challenge the output of interesting knowledge.

SRC: 据了解,节目将打造全新的全年龄青春课堂,一批<v>有颜有型</v>又有才的老师将上阵,挑战趣味性知识输出。
HYP: It is understood that the program will create a new all - age youth classroom, and a group of talented and talented teachers will take part to challenge the output of interesting knowledge.

SRC: 与以往老师群体在大众心中的严肃印象不同,《叮咚上线!老师好》集结的是一群颜值和才华兼具的知识代表。
HYP: Unlike the serious impression of teachers in the hearts of the public in the past, "Ding Dong Online! Good Teacher" gathers a group of knowledge representatives with both face value and talent.

SRC: 他们既是来自各学科的青年知识榜样,还是一群会抖包袱、擅长寓教于乐的全能“段子手”。
HYP: They are not only young intellectual role models from various disciplines, but also a group of all - round "Duanzi" who can shake their baggage and are good at education and fun.

SRC: 节目中,这群优秀青年知识榜样作为“知识分享官”,将要挑战趣味性的知识课堂。
HYP: In the program, these outstanding young knowledge role models, as "knowledge sharing officers", will challenge interesting knowledge classes.

SRC: 他们需要通过有态度的知识输出,展现所在学科最有趣的一面,来打动在场的观众。
HYP: They need to impress the audience by displaying the most interesting aspects of their subject through attitude - oriented knowledge output.

SRC: 而全年龄观众组成的“有道问问团”现场会提出百变问题,给“知识分享官”的授课提高难度,也给节目增添些许刺激的氛围。
HYP: The "Youdao Ask Group", composed of all - age viewers, will ask a hundred questions on the spot, which will make the teaching of the "Knowledge Sharing Officer" more difficult, and will also add a little excitement to the program.

SRC: 据透露,此次“知识分享官”中有中国人民大学附属中学物理教师李永乐、考研指导名师张雪峰以及拥有十年从业经验的历史教师王磊等优秀青年教师,他们将以意想不到的方式向现场观众展现各个学科的“硬核”知识。
HYP: It is revealed that among the "knowledge sharing officers" are outstanding young teachers such as Li Yongle, a physics teacher at a middle school attached to Renmin University of China, Zhang Xuefeng, a famous teacher of examination and research, and Wang Lei, a history teacher with ten years of experience, who will show the "hard core" knowledge of various disciplines to the audience in unexpected ways.

SRC: 另外,节目还邀请经济学教授薛兆丰作为节目的“知识发起人”,联合“叮咚助教”杜海涛和靳梦佳,与观众畅谈青春,打造“全民青春公开课”。
HYP: In addition, the program also invited Xue Zhaofeng, an economics professor, as the "knowledge promoter" of the program, to join forces with Du Haitao and Jin Mengjia, "Ding Dong Assistant Teachers", to talk about youth with the audience and create a "National Youth Open Class".

SRC: 香港特区政府政务司司长：形势严峻全力抗疫-中新网
HYP: Chief Secretary for Administration of the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region: The Situation Is Severe and All - out Efforts to Fight the Epidemic - chinanews.com

SRC: 新华社香港7月26日电香港特区政府政务司司长张建宗26日表示，香港新冠肺炎疫情形势持续严峻，若疫情转坏，特区政府将果断采取更严厉管控措施，进一步限制经营场所营业和减少市民外出空间。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 26 - The Chief Secretary for Administration of the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, Zhang Jianzong, said on July 26 that the new coronavirus outbreak situation in Hong Kong continues to be severe, and that if the epidemic turns bad, the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region will decisively take tougher control measures to further restrict business premises and reduce the space for citizens to go out.

SRC: 但现阶段特区政府无意推出“居家令”或“禁足令”限制市民外出。
HYP: However, at this stage, the SAR Government has no intention of introducing a "stay - at - home order" or a "foot ban order" to restrict citizens from going out.

SRC: 张建宗当日发表题为《形势严峻全力抗疫》的网志。
HYP: On the same day, Zhang Jianzong published a blog entitled "The Situation Is Severe and All - out Efforts to Fight the Epidemic".

SRC: 他表示，这一波疫情是半年以来最严峻的，未来两星期将会十分关键，要尽力防止病毒在社区进一步扩散。
HYP: He said that this outbreak is the most severe in half a year, and that the next two weeks will be critical to prevent further spread of the virus in the community.

SRC: 除了特区政府采取必要措施之外，市民自律和配合也非常重要。
HYP: In addition to the necessary measures taken by the SAR Government, self - discipline and cooperation of citizens are also very important.

SRC: 他呼吁市民务必尽量留在家中，减少社交接触和外出用餐。
HYP: He urged citizens to stay at home as much as possible, reduce social contact, and eat out.

SRC: 市民应配合佩戴口罩的强制措施保护自己及他人，并注重个人和环境卫生及勤洗手，更应暂停非必要的亲友聚会或聚餐及减少到街市。
HYP: Citizens should cooperate with the mandatory measures of wearing masks to protect themselves and others, pay attention to personal and environmental hygiene, and wash hands frequently. They should also suspend non - essential gatherings of relatives and friends or dinners, and reduce visits to markets.

SRC: 他表示，中央一直十分关心香港疫情变化及支持特区政府防疫抗疫工作，并积极回应行政长官最新要求，在加大检测能力和改装亚洲国际博览馆为类似“方舱医院”的工作上提供协助。
HYP: He said that the central government has always been very concerned about the changes in the epidemic situation in Hong Kong and supported the anti - epidemic work of the SAR Government, and has actively responded to the Chief Executive's latest request to provide assistance in increasing testing capacity and converting AsiaWorld - Expo into a similar "cabin hospital".

SRC: 张建宗表示，特区政府为特定高风险群组，即安老院舍、残疾院舍及护养院员工、餐厅员工、出租车司机和物业管理员工提供的免费病毒检测已全面展开，涉及人数多达40万。
HYP: Zhang Jianzong said that the free virus testing provided by the SAR Government for specific high - risk groups, namely, employees of homes for the elderly, homes for the disabled, and nursing homes, restaurant employees, taxi drivers, and property management employees, has been fully launched, involving up to 400000 people.

SRC: 他十分关注出现在安老院舍的感染个案，特区政府已为安老院舍院友安排特定的临时检疫中心。
HYP: He is very concerned about cases of infection in residential care homes for the elderly, and the SAR Government has arranged specific temporary quarantine centres for residents of residential care homes for the elderly.

SRC: 他表示，特区政府正在位于新界大屿山的竹篙湾检疫中心附近兴建隔离检疫设施，预计可在9月底前提供额外700套隔离房。
HYP: He said that the SAR Government is building quarantine facilities near the Penny's Bay Quarantine Centre on Lantau Island in the New Territories, and expects to provide an additional 700 quarantine units by the end of September.

SRC: 行政长官也在19日宣布，特区政府将在竹篙湾检疫中心多兴建2000间隔离房，并争取于今年年底前落成。
HYP: The Chief Executive also announced on the 19th that the SAR Government will build an additional 2000 quarantine rooms at the Penny's Bay Quarantine Center, which will be completed by the end of this year.

SRC: 行政长官也在19日宣布，特区政府将在竹篙湾检疫中心多兴建2000间隔离房，并<v>争取</v>于今年年底前落成。
HYP: The Chief Executive also announced on the 19th that the SAR Government will build an additional 2000 quarantine rooms at the Penny's Bay Quarantine Center, which will be completed by the end of this year.

SRC: 加上该隔离检疫中心已经投入使用的800间，年底前竹篙湾检疫中心预计可提供共3500间隔离房。
HYP: Together with the 800 quarantine centers already in use, the Penny's Bay Quarantine Center is expected to provide a total of 3500 quarantine rooms by the end of the year.

SRC: 香港目前共有四个正在运作的隔离检疫中心，共提供约2600间隔离房。
HYP: There are currently four quarantine centres in operation in Hong Kong, providing a total of about 2600 quarantine rooms.

SRC: 此外，特区政府于24日重新启用位于香港岛的鲤鱼门公园度假村作为社区隔离设施，用于收治50岁以下有独立自理能力的患者。
HYP: In addition, on the 24th, the SAR Government re - opened the Lei Yue Mun Park Resort on Hong Kong Island as a community isolation facility for patients under the age of 50 who have the ability to take care of themselves.

SRC: 美国首次以“人民币汇率低估”对中国展开反补贴调查
HYP: For the first time, the United States launched a countervailing investigation against China for "undervaluation of the RMB exchange rate"

SRC: 针对美国商务部近日宣布，决定对原产于中国的扎带（束线带）产品发起反倾销反补贴调查，并就“人民币汇率低估“项目发起调查。
HYP: In response to the recent announcement by the US Department of Commerce, the US Department of Commerce has decided to launch an anti - dumping and countervailing investigation into tie - belt products originating in China, as well as an investigation into the "undervaluation of the RMB exchange rate" project.

SRC: 中国商务部指出，这是美国首次在反补贴案件中立案调查所谓”人民币汇率低估“项目，中方对此坚决反对。
HYP: China's Ministry of Commerce pointed out that this is the first time that the United States has filed a case to investigate the so - called "undervaluation of the RMB exchange rate" in a countervailing case, and China firmly opposes this.

SRC: 中国商务部23日晚间特别就此发布新闻稿表示，中国实行以市场供求为基础、参考一篮子货币进行调节、有管理的浮动汇率制度，市场在汇率形成中起决定性作用。
HYP: China's Ministry of Commerce issued a special press release on this issue on the evening of the 23rd, stating that China implements a managed floating exchange rate system based on market supply and demand and adjusted with reference to a basket of currencies, and that the market plays a decisive role in the formation of the exchange rate.

SRC: 新闻稿强调，总体上，人民币汇率处于合理均衡水平，并没有被低估。
HYP: The press release emphasized that on the whole, the RMB exchange rate is at a reasonable and balanced level and is not undervalued.

SRC: 自2005年以来，人民币对美元已累计升值超过17% 。
HYP: Since 2005, the RMB has appreciated by more than 17% against the US dollar.

SRC: 根据国际清算银行公布的数据，2005年初至2020年5月，人民币名目有效汇率升值38%，实际有效汇率升值49%，是G20经济体中最强势的货币，在全球范围内也是升值幅度最大的货币之一。
HYP: According to the data released by the Bank for International Settlements, from the beginning of 2005 to May 2020, the nominal effective exchange rate of the RMB appreciated by 38% and the real effective exchange rate by 49%, making it the strongest currency among the G20 economies and one of the currencies with the largest appreciation in the world.

SRC: 商务部指出，汇率问题超出了成员按照世界贸易组织规则进行反补贴调查的权限。
HYP: The Ministry of Commerce pointed out that the exchange rate issue exceeded the authority of members to conduct countervailing investigations in accordance with the rules of the World Trade Organization.

SRC: 美国今年2月修改法规以对别国汇率进行反补贴调查，已涉嫌违反世贸组织WTO规则，受到多方面反对。
HYP: In February this year, the United States amended its regulations to conduct countervailing investigations against other countries' exchange rates, which has been suspected of violating WTO rules and has been opposed by many parties.

SRC: 新闻稿称，即使按照美国法规，申请人的申诉内容也存在大量错误，不具备财政资助、利益授予和专向性等反补贴必备要素。
HYP: According to the press release, even in accordance with US regulations, the content of the applicant's complaint contains a large number of errors and does not meet the necessary countervailing elements such as financial support, grant of benefits, and specificity.

SRC: 中方敦促美方遵守现有国际规则，停止对所谓“人民币汇率低估”进行反补贴调查。
HYP: China urges the US to abide by existing international rules and stop conducting countervailing investigations against the so - called "undervaluation of the RMB exchange rate".

SRC: 受中美关系紧张情势进一步升高影响，离岸、在岸人民币对美元汇率22日盘中一度大贬，双双跌破1美元兑人民币7.0元关口。
HYP: Affected by the further rise in tensions between China and the United States, the offshore and onshore RMB exchange rates against the US dollar fell sharply during the day on the 22nd, and both fell below the 7.0 yuan per US dollar mark.

SRC: 美国商务部此举是否意在逼升人民币值得关注。
HYP: Whether this move by the US Department of Commerce is intended to force the yuan to rise is noteworthy.

SRC: 人民币对美元即期汇价23日升破7.0大关，收在6.9961。
HYP: The spot exchange rate of the RMB against the US dollar rose above the 7.0 mark on the 23rd, closing at 6.9961.

SRC: 受官方调控的人民币对美元汇率中间价，24日下调17个基本点，报6.9938。
HYP: The midpoint rate of the officially regulated RMB exchange rate against the US dollar was lowered by 17 basis points to 6.9938 on the 24th.

SRC: 26日是菲律宾总统杜特尔特发表任内第五份国情咨文(SONA)前一日，当天菲律宾累计确诊新冠肺炎病例过8万，其中总统府新闻部(PCOO)及其直属机构职员确诊数增到25例。
HYP: On the 26th, the day before Philippine President Rodrigo Duterte delivered his fifth State of the Nation Address (SONA), the number of confirmed cases of new coronavirus pneumonia in the Philippines exceeded 80000, of which the number of confirmed cases among the staff of the Department of Information of the Presidential Office (PCOO) and its directly affiliated agencies increased to 25.

SRC: 为此，PCOO已专门准备一个未接触过确诊职员的工作组，配合杜特尔特总统发表SONA的新闻发布工作。
HYP: To this end, the PCOO has specially prepared a working group that has not been in contact with confirmed staff to cooperate with President Duterte's press release on SONA.

SRC: PCOO部长马丁·安达纳尔26日接受DZBB电台采访表示，已为杜特尔特总统发表SONA方式预备两套方案。
HYP: Martin Andanar, Minister of PCOO, said in an interview with DZBB radio on the 26th that he had prepared two sets of plans for President Duterte to issue SONA.

SRC: 按A计划，杜特尔特27日下午将在位于奎松市的菲律宾国会(Batasang Pambansa)大楼发表SONA。
HYP: According to Plan A, Duterte will deliver SONA at the Batasang Pambansa Building in Quezon City on the afternoon of the 27th.

SRC: 因为疫情原因，现场只为部分政府内阁成员和立法者安排50个席位，另专设视频会议室供其他内阁成员、地方政府官员等观看。
HYP: Due to the epidemic, only 50 seats were arranged for some government cabinet members and legislators, and a special video conference room was set up for other cabinet members, local government officials, and others to watch.

SRC: 所有参会人员当天通过快速检测才能进入国会大楼。
HYP: All participants passed a rapid test to enter the National Assembly building on the same day.

SRC: 一旦参会者有一人检测呈阳性，即启动B计划，即杜特尔特总统在总统府马拉卡南宫发表SONA，现场则安排更少的听会席位。
HYP: Once one of the participants tests positive, Plan B will be activated, that is, President Duterte will deliver SONA at the Malacanang Palace, the presidential palace, and fewer seats will be arranged on site.

SRC: 按照惯例，SONA将实时向菲全国直播。
HYP: As is customary, SONA will broadcast live to the whole Philippines in real time.

SRC: 截至发稿时，菲总统府尚未确认杜特尔特的家人是否会出席SONA。
HYP: At the time of writing, the Philippine Presidency has not yet confirmed whether Duterte's family will attend SONA.

SRC: 安达纳尔说，杜特尔特总统的SONA，将重点说明政府将如何带领菲律宾应对新冠肺炎疫情、恢复社会经济生活；还会提到他上任时的承诺，即反政府腐败、打击非法毒品和减贫。
HYP: Andanar said that President Duterte's SONA will focus on how the government will lead the Philippines to deal with the new coronavirus outbreak and restore social and economic life, and will also mention his commitment when he took office to fight government corruption, crack down on illegal drugs, and reduce poverty.

SRC: 杜特尔特还将说明本届政府的其他计划，包括创造更多的就业机会、振兴经济、促进教育，以及帮助在疫情中受难的海外菲律宾劳工等。
HYP: Duterte will also explain other plans of the current administration, including creating more jobs, revitalizing the economy, promoting education, and helping overseas Filipino workers suffering from the pandemic.

SRC: 深圳就出台健康条例公开征求意见-新华网
HYP: Shenzhen publicly solicited opinions on the introduction of health regulations - Xinhuanet

SRC: 新华社深圳7月26日电（记者毛思倩、白瑜）鼓励居民勤做体检，及早发现问题；禁止向未成年人销售酒精饮料；建立网络游戏健康审查制度；用人单位要配备专兼职健康管理人员…… 日前《深圳经济特区健康条例（征求意见稿）》正式发布，深圳居民将有自己的“健康法”。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Shenzhen, July 26 (Reporters Mao Siqian, Bai Yu) Residents are encouraged to do frequent medical examinations and find problems early; the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors is prohibited; an online game health review system is established; and employers should be equipped with full - time and part - time health management personnel.

SRC: 为了鼓励居民勤做体检，及早发现问题，上述征求意见稿提出，卫生健康部门应当根据不同年龄、职业等因素制定健康体检项目基本目录。
HYP: In order to encourage residents to do medical check - ups frequently and find problems early, the draft proposed that the health department should draw up a basic catalogue of health check - up items according to different age, occupation, and other factors.

SRC: 属于健康体检项目基本目录范围内的健康体检费用，按照每人每年一次的标准由社会医疗保险统筹基金支付。
HYP: The cost of the health check - up, which falls within the scope of the basic catalogue of health check - up items, shall be paid by the social medical insurance co - ordinated fund according to the standard of once a year per person.

SRC: 征求意见稿明确，用人单位应当合理配置人力资源，安排员工作息时间，对脑力和体力劳动负荷较重的员工，实行轮休制度，避免对员工健康造成人体机能过度损耗或者身心健康伤害，同时严格执行员工带薪休假制度。
HYP: The draft clearly states that employers should rationally allocate human resources, arrange employees' schedules, implement a rotation system for employees with heavy mental and physical labor loads, avoid excessive loss of human function or physical and mental health damage to employees' health, and strictly implement the paid leave system for employees.

SRC: 此外，用人单位要配备专兼职健康管理人员，并定期组织开展员工健康体检。
HYP: In addition, employers should provide full - time and part - time health management personnel, and organize and carry out health check - ups for employees on a regular basis.

SRC: 在未成年人身心健康方面，征求意见稿提出，禁止向未成年人销售酒精饮料，同时对酒精饮料的售卖位置进行了限制，对于违反规定的，将由市场监督管理部门责令改正，处3万元罚款。
HYP: With regard to the physical and mental health of minors, the draft proposed that the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors should be prohibited, and that the location of the sale of alcoholic beverages should be restricted, and that those who violate the regulations should be ordered to make corrections by the market supervision and administration department, and a fine of 30000 yuan should be imposed.

SRC: 除了“禁酒” ，未成年人也要“多运动” 。
HYP: In addition to "banning alcohol", minors should also "exercise more".

SRC: 根据征求意见稿要求，学校要每天安排学生体育活动时间一小时以上。
HYP: According to the requirements of the draft, schools should arrange more than one hour of sports activities for students every day.

SRC: 对于网络游戏，公安、文化广电旅游体育、网络监管、卫生健康等部门应当完善互联网上网服务营业场所健康监管制度，建立网络游戏健康审查制度，为促进青少年健康成长营造良好的交往空间、交往文化。
HYP: For online games, public security, culture, radio, television, tourism and sports, network supervision, health and other departments should improve the health supervision system of Internet service business premises, establish a health review system for online games, and create a good communication space and culture for promoting the healthy growth of young people.

SRC: 此外，征求意见稿还提出流感病人出入公共场所必须戴口罩，医疗卫生机构未经同意泄露病人隐私罚款2万元等。
HYP: In addition, the draft also proposed that influenza patients must wear masks when entering and leaving public places, and that medical and health institutions should be fined 20000 yuan for divulging patients' privacy without consent.

SRC: 值得注意的是，除了居民的身心健康外，征求意见稿还要求，深圳各部门在制定涉及城市空间规划与建设、工业园区规划与建设、资源开发利用与生态环境保护、生物医药产业发展等规划、规范性文件以及批准重大建设工程和实施重大公共服务项目前，应当评估公共政策实施对人群健康的影响。
HYP: It is worth noting that in addition to the physical and mental health of residents, the draft also requires that all departments in Shenzhen should assess the impact of public policy implementation on the health of the population before formulating planning and normative documents related to urban spatial planning and construction, industrial park planning and construction, resource development and utilization, ecological and environmental protection, and biomedical industry development, as well as approving major construction projects and implementing major public service projects.

SRC: 未经评估或者经评估将对城市公共卫生或者居民健康产生较严重不利影响的，不得制定出台或者批准实施。
HYP: If it has not been evaluated, or if it will have a serious adverse impact on urban public health or residents' health, it shall not be formulated, introduced, or approved for implementation.

SRC: 可可西里藏羚羊进入回迁季-新华网
HYP: Hoh Xili Tibetan Antelope Enters Remigration Season - Xinhuanet

SRC: 新华社西宁7月25日电（记者王金金）记者从三江源国家公园管理局<v>长江源园区</v>可可西里管理处五道梁保护站获悉，监测显示，此前前往可可西里腹地卓乃湖区域迁徙产仔的藏羚羊正陆续结束产仔，开始携幼仔返回原栖息地。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Xining, July 25 (Reporter Wang Jinjin) The reporter learned from the Wudaoliang Protection Station of the Hoh Xili Management Office of the Sanjiangyuan National Park Management Director that monitoring showed that the Tibetan antelopes that had previously migrated to the Zhuonai Lake area in the hinterland of Hoh Xili to give birth were ending their calves and beginning to return to their original habitat with their calves.

SRC: 新华社西宁7月25日电（记者王金金）记者从三江源国家公园管理局长江源园区可可西里管理处五道梁保护站获悉，监测显示，此前前往可可西里腹地卓乃湖区域迁徙产仔的藏羚羊正陆续结束产仔，开始携幼仔返回原栖息地。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Xining, July 25 (Reporter Wang Jinjin) The reporter learned from the Wudaoliang Protection Station of the Hoh Xili Management Office of the Sanjiangyuan National Park Management Director that monitoring showed that the Tibetan antelopes that had previously migrated to the Zhuonai Lake area in the hinterland of Hoh Xili to give birth were ending their calves and beginning to return to their original habitat with their calves.

SRC: 五道梁保护站附近的监控画面显示，7月25日，大约40只雌性藏羚羊带领3只藏羚羊幼仔陆续通过青藏公路3002公里处、青藏铁路五道梁北大桥，藏羚羊已经开始回迁。
HYP: Surveillance footage near the Wudaoliang Protection Station shows that on July 25, about 40 female Tibetan antelopes led three young Tibetan antelopes through the 3002 km of the Qinghai - Tibet Highway and the Wudaoliang North Bridge of the Qinghai - Tibet Railway, and the Tibetan antelopes have begun to move back.

SRC: 专家分析，近年来，回迁羊群中藏羚羊幼仔数量占藏羚羊群总体数量的四分之一至五分之一。
HYP: Experts have analyzed that in recent years, the number of Tibetan antelope calves in relocating sheep has accounted for one - quarter to one - fifth of the total number of Tibetan antelope sheep.

SRC: 中国科学院西北高原生物研究所副研究员连新明说：“回迁初期，藏羚羊面临较高的被捕食风险，因此羊群中的幼仔数量会比较少，甚至可能出现没有幼仔的情况。”
HYP: Lian Xinming, an associate researcher at the Northwest Plateau Institute of Biology of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, said, "At the beginning of the migration, Tibetan antelopes face a high risk of predation, so the number of calves in the herd will be relatively small, and there may even be no calves."

SRC: 根据三江源国家公园管理局长江源园区可可西里管理处统计，藏羚羊回迁数量总体呈逐年上升态势，2019年藏羚羊回迁数量为4860只，比2018年增加338只。
HYP: According to statistics from the Hoh Xili Management Office of Jiangyuan Park, Director of Management of Sanjiangyuan National Park, the overall number of Tibetan antelopes returning has been increasing year by year, and the number of Tibetan antelopes returning in 2019 was 4860, an increase of 338 over 2018.

SRC: 连新明说：“预计今年藏羚羊回迁将在9月初结束，回迁藏羚羊数量仍有望继续增加。”
HYP: Lian Xinming said, "It is expected that the return migration of Tibetan antelopes will end in early September this year, and the number of returning Tibetan antelopes is expected to continue to increase."

SRC: 藏羚羊属国家一级保护动物。
HYP: The Tibetan antelope is a national first - class protected animal.

SRC: 每年5月底，来自青海三江源、西藏羌塘、新疆阿尔金山等地的藏羚羊都要前往位于可可西里腹地的卓乃湖产羔。
HYP: At the end of May every year, Tibetan antelopes from Sanjiangyuan in Qinghai, Qiangtang in Tibet, Aljinshan in Xinjiang, and other places go to Zhuonai Lake, located in the hinterland of Hoh Xili, to lamb.

SRC: 我国藏羚羊保护专家、陕西省动物研究所（西北濒危动物研究所）研究员吴晓民说：“藏羚羊回迁是雌性藏羚羊结束产仔后，陆续带着幼仔回到栖息地的过程。起初离开产仔地的回迁群体较为庞大，但随后藏羚羊将根据不同的地理种群、沿不同路径回到它们各自的栖息地。”
HYP: Wu Xiaomin, an expert on the protection of Tibetan antelopes in China and a researcher at the Shaanxi Provincial Institute of Zoology (Northwest Institute of Endangered Animals), said, "The return migration of Tibetan antelopes is the process of female Tibetan antelopes returning to their habitat with their calves after they have given birth. At first, the return migration group that left the calving site is relatively large, but then the Tibetan antelopes will return to their respective habitats according to different geographical populations and along different paths."

SRC: 我国藏羚羊保护专家、陕西省动物研究所（西北濒危动物研究所）研究员吴晓民说：“藏羚羊回迁是雌性藏羚羊结束产仔后，<v>陆续</v>带着幼仔回到栖息地的过程。起初离开产仔地的回迁群体较为庞大，但随后藏羚羊将根据不同的地理种群、沿不同路径回到它们各自的栖息地。”
HYP: Wu Xiaomin, an expert on the protection of Tibetan antelopes in China and a researcher at the Shaanxi Provincial Institute of Zoology (Northwest Institute of Endangered Animals), said, "The return migration of Tibetan antelopes is the process of female Tibetan antelopes returning to their habitat with their calves after they have given birth. At first, the return migration group that left the calving site is relatively large, but then the Tibetan antelopes will return to their respective habitats according to different geographical populations and along different paths."

SRC: 为确保藏羚羊群安全回迁，记者了解到，日前三江源国家公园管理局长江源园区可可西里管理处已安排工作人员在主要回迁区域，持续开展视频监测和辖区巡逻。
HYP: To ensure the safe return of Tibetan antelope sheep, the reporter learned that the Hoh Xili Management Office of Jiangyuan Park, the director of management of Sanjiangyuan National Park, has arranged staff to continuously carry out video monitoring and district patrols in the main return areas.

SRC: 如发现有藏羚羊群试图穿越公路，巡山队员会在第一时间进行临时交通管制，让羊群安全通过野生动物通道，保证其在回迁途中尽可能少受人类干扰。
HYP: If a Tibetan antelope sheep is found trying to cross the highway, the mountain patrol team will carry out temporary traffic control at the first time to allow the sheep to pass safely through the wildlife passage and ensure that they are as little disturbed by humans as possible on their way back.

SRC: 那么，日常生活中到底该如何解暑？
HYP: So, how should we relieve the heat in our daily life?

SRC: 专家建议，夏日外出尽量避开高温时段，最好不要在中午前后在烈日下行走或劳动，因为这个时间段的阳光最强烈，发生中暑的可能性较高。
HYP: Experts suggest that when going out in summer, try to avoid hot periods, and it is best not to walk or work in the blazing sun around noon, because the sun is strongest in this time period, and the possibility of heatstroke is higher.

SRC: 如果此时段必须外出，一定要做好防护工作，如打遮阳伞、<v>戴遮阳帽</v>、戴太阳镜，有条件的最好涂抹防晒霜，以防晒伤。
HYP: If you must go out at this time, you must do a good job of protection, such as wearing a parasol, a visor, and sunglasses, and if you have conditions, it is best to apply sunscreen to prevent sunburn.

SRC: 如果此时段必须外出，一定要做好防护工作，如打遮阳伞、戴遮阳帽、戴太阳镜，有条件的最好涂抹防晒霜，以防晒伤。
HYP: If you must go out at this time, you must do a good job of protection, such as wearing a parasol, a visor, and sunglasses, and if you have conditions, it is best to apply sunscreen to prevent sunburn.

SRC: <v>衣服</v>尽量选用浅色、透气性好的棉、麻、丝类质地，少穿化纤品类服装，以免大量出汗时不能及时散热，引起中暑。
HYP: Try to choose cotton, hemp, and silk textures with light colors and good breathability, and wear less chemical fiber clothing, so as not to dissipate heat in time when sweating a lot, which can cause heatstroke.

SRC: 衣服尽量选用浅色、透气性好的棉、麻、丝类质地，少穿化纤品类服装，以免大量出汗时不能及时散热，引起中暑。
HYP: Try to choose cotton, hemp, and silk textures with light colors and good breathability, and wear less chemical fiber clothing, so as not to dissipate heat in time when sweating a lot, which can cause heatstroke.

SRC: 高温闷热天气时，要准备充足的水饮，及时饮用，不要等口渴了才喝水，因为一旦感觉口渴表示身体已经缺水了，每次喝水控制在150毫升至200毫升，喝温开水，不要喝冰水。
HYP: In hot and sultry weather, prepare enough water to drink, drink it in time, and do not wait for thirst to drink water, because once you feel thirsty, your body is already short of water, so limit your water consumption to 150 ml to 200 ml at a time, and drink warm water, not ice water.

SRC: 根据气温高低，一般人员每天喝1.5升至2升水，高温作业人员，每天喝3升至5升水。
HYP: Depending on the temperature, the average person drinks 1.5 liters to 2 liters of water per day, and the high - temperature worker drinks 3 liters to 5 liters of water per day.

SRC: 出汗较多时可适当补充一些盐水，弥补人体因出汗而失去的盐分。
HYP: When sweating more, some salt water can be properly replenished to make up for the salt lost by sweating.

SRC: 另外，夏季人体容易缺钾，使人感到倦怠疲乏，含钾茶水是极好的消暑饮品。
HYP: In addition, the human body is prone to potassium deficiency in summer, which makes people feel tired and tired, and potassium - containing tea is an excellent summer drink.

SRC: 夏天多食含水量高的蔬果，如生菜、黄瓜、西红柿等；新鲜水果，如桃子、杏、西瓜、甜瓜等水分含量为80％至90％，都可以用来补充水分；乳制品既能补水，又能满足身体的营养之需。
HYP: In summer, eat fruits and vegetables with high water content, such as lettuce, cucumbers, tomatoes, etc.; fresh fruits, such as peaches, apricots, watermelons, melons, etc., with a water content of 80% to 90%, can be used to replenish water; dairy products can not only replenish water, but also meet the nutritional needs of the body.

SRC: 此外，在高温环境中工作的人群，应适当补充含有钾、镁等元素的饮品。
HYP: In addition, people working in high - temperature environments should properly supplement drinks containing potassium, magnesium, and other elements.

SRC: 夏天日长夜短，气温高，人体新陈代谢旺盛，消耗也大，容易感到疲劳。
HYP: In summer, the days are long and the nights are short, the temperature is high, the metabolism of the human body is strong, the consumption is also large, and it is easy to feel tired.

SRC: 充足的睡眠，可使大脑和身体各系统都得到放松，既利于工作和学习，也是预防中暑的措施。
HYP: Adequate sleep can relax all systems of the brain and body, which is not only beneficial to work and study, but also a measure to prevent heatstroke.

SRC: 专家称，最佳就寝时间是22时至23时，最佳起床时间是5时30分至6时30分。
HYP: Experts say the best bedtime is from 22:00 to 23:00, and the best time to get up is from 5:30 to 6:30.

SRC: 睡眠时注意不要躺在空调出风口和电风扇下，以免患上空调病和热伤风。
HYP: When sleeping, be careful not to lie under air conditioning vents and electric fans, so as not to suffer from air conditioning diseases and hot colds.

SRC: 专家建议，在户外活动或进行高温作业的人群，可随身携带十滴水、人丹、藿香正气水或藿香正气丸等防暑药品，或放置在就近工作场所，随时使用，以防发生中暑。
HYP: Experts suggest that people who are engaged in outdoor activities or high - temperature work should carry heat prevention drugs such as 10 drops of water, Rendan, patchouli water, or patchouli pills with them, or place them in the nearest workplace and use them at any time to prevent heatstroke.

SRC: 毕业生艺术展搬进商场公益展出-新华网
HYP: Graduate Art Exhibition Moves into Mall for Public Interest Exhibition - Xinhuanet

SRC: 在各大院校“云毕业”的季节里，一场难得的线下毕业生艺术展上周末温暖启幕。
HYP: During the "cloud graduation" season of major colleges and universities, a rare offline graduate art exhibition opened warm last weekend.

SRC: 不过它既不在美术馆，也不在校园里，而是出现在了朝阳大悦城的公共空间，并对公众免费开放，将持续至8月23日。
HYP: However, it is neither in the museum nor on campus, but in the public space of Chaoyang Grand Hyatt City, and will be open to the public free of charge until August 23.

SRC: 记者了解到，这场2020毕业生艺术展，征集了来自中央美术学院、中国传媒大学及天津美术学院的57位青年艺术家的50件/组作品，展览空间从2层延伸至6层，并充分利用楼内灯箱进行平面作品展示，最大程度烘托出毕业季的艺术氛围。
HYP: The reporter learned that the 2020 Graduate Art Exhibition collected 50 pieces / groups of works from 57 young artists from the Central Academy of Fine Arts, the Communication University of China, and the Tianjin Academy of Fine Arts, and the exhibition space was extended from the 2nd floor to the 6th floor, and the light boxes in the building were used to display graphic works to maximize the artistic atmosphere of the graduation season.

SRC: 在疫情之下，这场展览的意义显得尤为特殊。
HYP: In the midst of the pandemic, the significance of this exhibition is particularly special.

SRC: 朝阳大悦城美陈负责人葛平坦言：“我们选择将走向'云端'的毕业展再度带回线下空间，也希望让更多人看到青年对自身的探索和对世界的理解，放大艺术对于社会和心灵的疗愈力量。”
HYP: Ge Ping, head of Chaoyang Grand Hyatt City Mei Chen, said, "We chose to bring the graduation exhibition to the'cloud 'back to the offline space, and we also hope that more people will see young people's exploration of themselves and understanding of the world, so as to amplify the healing power of art to society and the soul."

SRC: 她透露，此次参展的作品是向几大艺术院校的毕业生们征集而来，又从中挑选了适合商业空间展示的，作品形式从传统的架上绘画、雕塑，到新媒体装置、交互动画、VR全景，体量与丰富程度为历年之最。
HYP: She revealed that the works in this exhibition were collected from graduates of several major art colleges, from which they were selected for display in commercial spaces, and that the forms of the works range from traditional on - shelf paintings and sculptures to new media installations, interactive animations, and VR panoramas, and that the volume and richness of the works are the highest ever.

SRC: 其中，李云肖在《2020的第一场战役》中通过机械和手工混合的创作语言，表达了自己在这场疫情中的感受；刘嘉颖通过以太坊区块链创作的作品《Sound Money》探讨了“加密货币” 、“信用创造” 、“交易”等主题；张家祺的《猫林》与邱达强的《羁》表现的都是经常与人类相伴的动物，从中可以看到青年艺术家对人与动物关系的理解；而朱仲鱼的作品《信仰的冬天—礼物》则是在提醒成长中的年轻人，“当有一天事业有成时，不忘初心，记得那份单纯与真诚。”
HYP: Among them, Li Yunxiao expressed his feelings during the epidemic through a mixture of mechanical and manual creative language in "The First Battle of 2020 "; Liu Jiaying's work" Sound Money ", created through the Ethereum blockchain, explored themes such as" cryptocurrency "," credit creation ", and" trading "; Zhang Jiaqi's "Cat Forest" and Qiu Daqiang's "Bohemian" both show animals that often accompany humans, from which young artists can see their understanding of the relationship between humans and animals; and Zhu Zhongyu's work "Winter of Faith - Gift" reminds young people growing up, "When they succeed in their careers one day, they will never forget their original intention and remember their simplicity and sincerity."

SRC: 在为数不多的亲自布展的毕业生中，就有来自天津美术学院雕塑系的李敬寅。
HYP: Among the few graduates who exhibited in person was Li Jingyin from the Sculpture Department of Tianjin Academy of Fine Arts.

SRC: “我是7月7日来北京的，当时其实有点担心疫情，还提前三天做了核酸检测，是带着酒精棉和检测报告来布展的。”
HYP: "I came to Beijing on July 7, when I was actually a little worried about the epidemic, and I did a nucleic acid test three days in advance, and I came to the exhibition with the alcohol cotton and the test report."

SRC: 他的作品《昨日如谜》结构比较复杂，必须亲力亲为。
HYP: His work "Yesterday as a Mystery" has a complex structure and must be done by hand.

SRC: 同时，他还承担着帮助同学修补破损作品的任务。
HYP: At the same time, he also took on the task of helping his classmates repair damaged works.

SRC: “布展到凌晨四点半，然后再做修补，时间很紧，都忘了和作品合个影，也有点遗憾。”
HYP: "The exhibition will be held until 4:30 in the morning, and then the repair will be done, and the time is very tight, so I forgot to take a photo with the work, which is a bit of a pity."

SRC: 他希望，等疫情更稳定了，再和同学们来北京看看自己的作品展。
HYP: He hoped that when the epidemic became more stable, he and his classmates would come to Beijing to see the exhibition of his work.

SRC: （记者李俐）
HYP: (Reporter Li Li)

SRC: 奖励5万元湖北恩施表扬沙子坝滑坡“预警第一人” - 中新网
HYP: Hubei Enshi Praises "First Early Warning Person" for Sand Dam Landslide - chinanews.com

SRC: 湖北日报讯(记者林晶)7月26日，恩施市通报表扬为沙子坝滑坡预警作出重要贡献的地质灾害点监测员陈光明，并为他送去5万元奖金。
HYP: Hubei Daily News (Reporter Lin Jing) On July 26, Enshi City announced that it had praised Chen Guangming, a geological disaster site monitor who had made important contributions to the early warning of the sand dam landslide, and sent him a prize of 50000 yuan.

SRC: 同时，号召全市党员干部学习他恪尽职守、敢于担当、主动作为、乐于奉献的精神。
HYP: At the same time, Party members and cadres throughout the city are called upon to learn from his spirit of fulfilling their duties, daring to take responsibility, taking the initiative, and being willing to contribute.

SRC: 7月21日，恩施市屯堡乡马者村沙子坝发生滑坡，导致清江干流河道形成堰塞湖，58岁的陈光明是预警此次滑坡的第一人。
HYP: On July 21, a landslide occurred at the sand dam in Mahe Village, Tunbao Township, Enshi City, causing a quake lake to form in the main stream of the Qingjiang River, and 58 - year - old Chen Guangming was the first person to warn of the landslide.

SRC: 7月17日下午，陈光明得知村民家中墙壁开裂的消息，立即到现场查看。
HYP: On the afternoon of July 17, Chen Guangming learned that the walls of the villagers' homes were cracked, and immediately went to the scene to check.

SRC: 他刚从家中走出五六百米，便看到村组公路裂开四五厘米，沿着公路一直延伸到玉米地，长度约50米。
HYP: As soon as he walked five or six hundred meters from his home, he saw the village road split by four or five centimeters, extending along the road to the cornfields, a length of about 50 meters.

SRC: 陈光明顿生警觉，第一时间将公路开裂的照片发到乡“地质灾害监测员联系群”里。
HYP: Chen Guangming was alert and immediately sent the photos of the cracked highway to the township's "Geological Disaster Monitor Contact Group".

SRC: 经屯堡乡自然规划所相关负责人现场查看和判断，滑坡的可能性很大，随即作出撤离群众的决定。
HYP: After on - site inspection and judgment by the relevant person in charge of the Tunbao Township Natural Planning Institute, the possibility of a landslide was very high, and the decision to evacuate the masses was made immediately.

SRC: 陈光明的及时预警，为影响区内315户1339名群众的安全撤离贏得了36小时的宝贵时间。
HYP: Chen Guangming's timely warning won 36 hours of valuable time for the safe evacuation of 1339 people from 315 households in the affected area.

SRC: 此次重大地质灾害，无一人伤亡。
HYP: No one was killed or injured in this major geological disaster.

SRC: 陈光明认真负责的敬业精神得到群众的称赞。
HYP: Chen Guangming's conscientious and responsible dedication was praised by the masses.

SRC: 面对赞誉，他说：“不存在救了谁，这是我的责任。 ”
HYP: In the face of praise, he said, "There is no one to save, it is my responsibility."

SRC: 警方通报“女大学生赴青海旅游失联”细节搜救工作仍在继续-新华网
HYP: Police report details of "female college student lost contact while traveling to Qinghai" Search and rescue work continues - Xinhuanet

SRC: 新华社西宁7月26日电（记者王金金周喆）近日，“一名女大学生前往青海格尔木旅游后失联”一事引发网民关注。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Xining, July 26 (Reporters Wang Jinjin Zhou Zhe) Recently, "a female college student lost contact after traveling to Golmud, Qinghai" attracted the attention of netizens.

SRC: 青海省海西蒙古族藏族自治州格尔木市公安局26日通报称，南京某大学学生黄某某目前仍处于失联状态，多地警方正深入黄某某失联地沿线，积极开展寻找工作。
HYP: The Public Security Bureau of Golmud City, Haixi Mongolian and Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, Qinghai Province, reported on the 26th that Huang, a student of a university in Nanjing, is still in a state of loss of contact, and that the police in many places are going deep along the route of Huang's loss of contact and actively carrying out search work.

SRC: 2020年7月10日，海西州格尔木市公安局治安支队接到上级通知，南京某大学学生黄某某于7月5日乘坐Z164列车由南京至格尔木，于7月9日在青海省玉树藏族自治州曲麻莱县索南达杰保护站清水河西南区域处手机关机并失联，要求协助查找。
HYP: On July 10, 2020, the Public Security Detachment of Golmud City Public Security Bureau in Haixi received a notice from its superiors that Huang, a student of a university in Nanjing, took the Z164 train from Nanjing to Golmud on July 5, and on July 9, his mobile phone was turned off and lost contact in the southwest area of Qingshuihe at Sonandajie Protection Station in Qumalai County, Yushu Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, Qinghai Province, and asked for assistance in finding it.

SRC: 根据格尔木市公安局的调查情况，黄某某于7月6日19时54分进入青海省境内，7日4时抵达格尔木市。
HYP: According to the investigation by the Golmud Public Security Bureau, Huang entered Qinghai Province at 19:54 on July 6 and arrived in Golmud City at 4:00 on July 7.

SRC: 当日8时，失联人员黄某某乘坐出租车由格尔木市黄河大酒店朝G109国道出发，并于12时到达可可西里索南达杰保护站，出租车司机单独返回，黄某某7日15时到达索南达杰保护站附近清水河区域直至9日18时许在该区域关机。
HYP: At 8:00 on the same day, the missing person, Huang, took a taxi from the Yellow River Hotel in Golmud City towards National Highway G109, and arrived at Sonandajie Protection Station in Hoh Xili at 12:00, and the taxi driver returned alone, and Huang arrived in the Qingshuihe area near Sonandajie Protection Station at 15:00 on the 7th and shut down in the area at about 18:00 on the 9th.

SRC: 在进一步调查中，警方发现黄某某曾于7月13日17时07分通过乃吉沟检查站。
HYP: During further investigation, the police found that Huang had passed through the Naijigou checkpoint at 17:07 on July 13.

SRC: 乃吉沟检查站是西藏自治区那曲市在格尔木市南山口设立的检查站，由于该检查站无视频监控，无法确定本人及所乘车辆信息，警方只能驾车在沿途进行查找，协调西藏沿途各检查站若发现黄某某，立即与格尔木市公安局取得联系。
HYP: The Naijigou Checkpoint is a checkpoint set up by Nagqu City, Tibet Autonomous Region, at Nanshankou, Golmud City, and since there is no video surveillance at the checkpoint, it is impossible to determine the information of the person and the vehicle, so the police can only search along the route by car, and coordinate with the various checkpoints along the route in Tibet to immediately contact the Golmud Public Security Bureau if they find Huang.

SRC: 根据最新情况，7月26日凌晨1时，格尔木市公安局组织救援力量携带救援装备，前往青藏公路沿线不冻泉保护站、索南达杰保护站进行查找，并积极与四川警方、西藏警方、南京警方取得联系，共同开展工作，目前查找搜救工作仍在继续。
HYP: According to the latest information, at 1 am on July 26, the Golmud Public Security Bureau organized rescue forces to carry rescue equipment to search the Freezing Spring Protection Station and Sonandajie Protection Station along the Qinghai - Tibet Highway, and actively contacted the Sichuan police, the Tibet police, and the Nanjing police to carry out joint work, and the search and rescue work is still continuing.

SRC: 当地警方希望广大网友和社会各界如有相关线索，及时向格尔木警方和南京江宁警方提供，争取早日找到失联人员黄某某。
HYP: The local police hope that if the vast number of netizens and all sectors of society have relevant clues, they will provide them to Golmud police and Nanjing Jiangning police in a timely manner, and strive to find the missing person, Huang, as soon as possible.

SRC: 同时，有关专家提示，游客在户外活动时要规范、理性、文明，随时留意路边警示标志，切勿冒险进入无人区，遇到突发情况，要及时报警。
HYP: At the same time, relevant experts suggested that tourists should be standardized, rational, and civilized in their outdoor activities, pay attention to roadside warning signs at all times, do not venture into no man's land, and call the police in a timely manner in case of emergency.

SRC: 俄罗斯举办阅兵式庆祝海军节-新华网
HYP: Russia Holds Military Parade to Celebrate Navy Day - Xinhuanet

SRC: 7月26日，在俄罗斯圣彼得堡，舰艇列队参加海军节庆祝活动。
HYP: On July 26, in St. Petersburg, Russia, ships lined up to participate in the Navy Day celebration.

SRC: 新华社发（莫京娜摄）
HYP: Xinhua News Agency (Photo by Mo Jingna)

SRC: 新华社莫斯科7月26日电（记者鲁金博）俄罗斯各舰队26日举行阅兵式庆祝海军节，纪念俄海军成立324周年。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Moscow, July 26 (Reporter Lu Jinbo) Russian fleets held a military parade to celebrate Navy Day on July 26 to commemorate the 324th anniversary of the founding of the Russian Navy.

SRC: 当天，俄罗斯北海、波罗的海、黑海、里海和太平洋舰队分别在各自基地所在海域举行了阅兵式，共有1.5万军人、219艘各类舰艇和71架军用飞机参加。
HYP: On the same day, Russia's North Sea, Baltic Sea, Black Sea, Caspian Sea, and Pacific Fleet held military parades in the waters where their respective bases are located, with a total of 15000 soldiers, 219 ships of various types, and 71 military aircraft participating.

SRC: 俄总统、武装力量最高统帅普京出席了波罗的海舰队的阅兵式。
HYP: Russian President and Commander - in - Chief of the Armed Forces Vladimir Putin attended the parade of the Baltic Fleet.

SRC: 约4000名军人、46艘舰艇和40余架战机参加了当地的阅兵式。
HYP: About 4000 soldiers, 46 ships, and more than 40 warplanes took part in the local military parade.

SRC: 普京首先在位于波罗的海喀琅施塔得海军基地水域检阅了舰艇列队。
HYP: Putin first reviewed the ship parade in the waters of the Kronstadt naval base in the Baltic Sea.

SRC: 之后，他乘坐快艇抵达圣彼得堡市中心的涅瓦河水域并上岸，观看了在涅瓦河上举行的阅兵式。
HYP: After that, he took a speedboat to the waters of the Neva River in the center of St. Petersburg and went ashore to watch the military parade on the Neva River.

SRC: 普京在阅兵式上发表讲话说，俄海军装备的现代化技术水平近年来持续提升，俄海军2020年将总共接收约40艘配备独特高超音速打击系统的新型舰艇。
HYP: Speaking at the military parade, Putin said that the modern technical level of the Russian Navy's equipment has continued to improve in recent years, and that the Russian Navy will receive a total of about 40 new ships equipped with unique hypersonic strike systems in 2020.

SRC: 另外，俄海军总司令叶夫梅诺夫日前在接受俄国防部机关报《红星报》采访时说，俄建造舰艇的计划得到了有效落实，2020年俄海军计划接收的新舰艇数量是近年来规模较大的。
HYP: In addition, Yevmenov, the commander - in - chief of the Russian Navy, said in an interview with Red Star, the official newspaper of the Russian Defense Ministry, that Russia's plans to build ships have been effectively implemented, and that the number of new ships the Russian Navy plans to receive in 2020 is the largest in recent years.

SRC: 1696年，沙皇彼得大帝着手组建海上舰队，开创了俄海军历史。
HYP: In 1696, Tsar Peter the Great set out to form a maritime fleet, which started the history of the Russian Navy.

SRC: 每年7月最后一个星期日是俄罗斯海军节。
HYP: The Russian Navy Day is celebrated on the last Sunday of July every year.

SRC: 针对疫情防控工作出现的新变化，自7月17日以来，新疆各级工会响应自治区总工会的号召，积极参与疫情防控工作。
HYP: In view of the new changes in epidemic prevention and control, since July 17, trade unions at all levels in Xinjiang have responded to the call of the Federation of Trade Unions of the Autonomous Region and actively participated in epidemic prevention and control work.

SRC: 天山南北工会干部、职工、劳动模范走进街道社区、居民群众中，开展送菜送药、消毒灭菌、宣传防疫知识等活动，服务职工群众，用实际行动彰显工会“硬核力量”。
HYP: Trade union cadres, workers, and model workers in the north and south of Tianshan entered the streets, communities, and residents to carry out activities such as delivering food and medicine, disinfection and sterilization, and propagating knowledge about epidemic prevention, so as to serve the workers and the masses, and to demonstrate the "hard nuclear force" of trade unions with practical actions.

SRC: 近日，乌鲁木齐市天山区总工会慰问组一行，将一批急需的疫情防控生活物资送到了12个隔离点的工作人员手中。
HYP: Recently, the condolence group of the Tianshan District Federation of Trade Unions in Urumqi delivered a batch of urgently needed epidemic prevention and control living materials to the staff at 12 quarantine points.

SRC: 疫情发生后，天山区总第一时间投入经费105万余元，紧急下拨给23个直属基层工会。
HYP: After the outbreak of the epidemic, Tianshan District immediately invested more than 1.05 million yuan, which was urgently allocated to 23 directly affiliated grass - roots trade unions.

SRC: 中建新疆建工<v>一建</v>党委副书记、工会主席赵相国接到公司关于疫情防控的通知后，主动请缨，选择留在单位值班，为职工保驾护航。
HYP: After receiving the company's notice on epidemic prevention and control, Zhao Xiangguo, deputy secretary of the Party Committee and chairman of the trade union, volunteered to stay on duty in the unit to protect the workers.

SRC: 他为居住在单位宿舍和新入职的职工送去做饭的炊具、食品及日用品，并组织人员每隔两天为他们送一次生活必备物资。
HYP: He delivered cooking utensils, food, and daily necessities to the newly employed workers living in the dormitory of the unit, and organized the personnel to deliver essential supplies to them every two days.

SRC: “7月21日起，对坚守战'疫'一线的干部职工进行摸底，并采取线上下单、商家送货上门的方式，先行为乌鲁木齐地区704名一线职工群众补充购买防疫用品和生活物资。”
HYP: "From July 21, the cadres and workers who adhere to the front line of the fight against the'epidemic 'will be surveyed, and 704 front - line workers in Urumqi will be provided with supplementary anti - epidemic supplies and living materials through online orders and door - to - door delivery by businesses."

SRC: 新疆交通运输工会负责人告诉记者，面对突发疫情，他们全力做好疫情防控服务保障、稳步推进交通运输发展各项工作，营造齐心战“疫”的浓厚氛围。
HYP: The head of the Xinjiang Transportation Trade Union told reporters that in the face of the sudden epidemic, they made every effort to ensure epidemic prevention and control services, steadily promote the development of transportation, and create a strong atmosphere to fight the "epidemic" together.

SRC: 当前正值夏季高温，各级工会紧盯疫情防控重点地区的一线职工，把“送清凉”关心关爱落到实处。
HYP: At present, when the summer heat is high, trade unions at all levels keep an eye on front - line workers in key areas for epidemic prevention and control, and put "cool" care into practice.

SRC: 7月19日，乌鲁木齐县总工会启动向疫情防控一线职工“送清凉”慰问活动，全县警务站、卡点和卫生系统收到了饮料、水果等慰问品。
HYP: On July 19, the Urumqi County Federation of Trade Unions launched a condolence campaign to "send cool" to front - line workers in epidemic prevention and control, and the county's police stations, card points, and health systems received drinks, fruits, and other condolence items.

SRC: “工会干部要进一步提高政治站位、强化责任担当，用关怀温暖人心，用行动鼓舞斗志。
HYP: "Trade union cadres should further improve their political standing, strengthen their responsibility, warm people's hearts with care, and inspire their fighting spirit with action.

SRC: 要充分发挥工会组织凝聚职工、团结职工的作用，做好疫情防控服务保障，积极维护广大职工的健康权益，把关爱送到一线职工身边。”
HYP: We should give full play to the role of trade unions in rallying and uniting workers, do a good job in ensuring epidemic prevention and control services, actively safeguard the health rights and interests of workers, and send care to front - line workers. "

SRC: 自治区总工会相关负责人表示。
HYP: Relevant person in charge of the Federation of Trade Unions of the Autonomous Region said.

SRC: 2020年直招士官工作全面展开-新华网
HYP: Direct recruitment of non - commissioned officers in full swing in 2020 - Xinhuanet

SRC: 新华社北京7月26日电（记者贾启龙）军委政治工作部、军委国防动员部近日联合印发通知，部署展开2020年从普通高等学校毕业生中直接招收士官工作。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 26 (Reporter Jia Qilong) - The Political Work Department of the Military Commission and the National Defense Mobilization Department of the Military Commission recently jointly issued a notice to deploy and launch the direct recruitment of non - commissioned officers from graduates of ordinary institutions of higher learning in 2020.

SRC: 今年直招士官涵盖计算机、自动化、机械等64类270余个军地通用专业，重点加大无人机、航海、航空航天、电子信息、小语种等专业招收力度，招收规模相比去年增加近2000人。
HYP: This year's direct recruitment of non - commissioned officers covers more than 270 general military and local majors in 64 categories, including computers, automation, and machinery, with emphasis on increasing the recruitment of unmanned aerial vehicles, navigation, aerospace, electronic information, minor languages, and other majors, and the recruitment scale has increased by nearly 2000 compared to last year.

SRC: 今年直招士官工作与义务兵征集同步组织实施，8月1日开始，9月30日结束。
HYP: This year, the direct recruitment of non - commissioned officers was organized and implemented simultaneously with the recruitment of conscripts, which began on August 1 and ended on September 30.

SRC: 应征青年可以通过全国征兵网（网址：http://www.gfbzb.gov.cn）查询直招士官条件和各地招收专业分布情况，符合专业范围和招收条件的在线提交报名信息，并根据应征地兵役机关统一要求，参加体格检查、政治考核等后续招收工作。
