HYP: Through the National Conscription Network (website: http://www.gfbzb.gov.cn), young conscripts can inquire about the conditions for direct recruitment of non - commissioned officers and the distribution of recruitment specialties in various regions, submit registration information online if they meet the scope of specialties and recruitment conditions, and participate in the follow - up recruitment work such as medical examination and political assessment in accordance with the unified requirements of the land - requisitioned military service organs.

SRC: 因招收专业和计划限制未能被招收为士官的合格青年，可以参加义务兵征集，服义务兵役期满选取为士官时，在普通高等学校按规定学制就读的年数视同服役时间。
HYP: Qualified young people who are unable to be recruited as non - commissioned officers due to enrollment majors and program restrictions may participate in the recruitment of conscripts, and when they are selected as non - commissioned officers at the end of their compulsory military service, the number of years of study in ordinary institutions of higher learning according to the prescribed academic system shall be regarded as the length of service.

SRC: 今年士官招收工作由省级或地市级人民政府征兵办公室统一组织，报名潜力丰富专业将在综合衡量报名对象学历层次、在校期间专业课成绩、取得职业资格证书等情况基础上择优遴选；稀缺专业将面向本地符合专业要求、具备招收优势的院校定向对口招收。
HYP: This year, the recruitment of non - commissioned officers will be uniformly organized by the conscription offices of provincial or prefectural and municipal people's governments, and majors with rich registration potential will be selected on the basis of merit on the basis of comprehensive measurement of the academic level of the applicants, the achievements of professional courses while in school, and the obtaining of professional qualification certificates; scarce majors will be targeted for local colleges and universities that meet professional requirements and have recruitment advantages.

SRC: 根据疫情常态化防控要求，今年直招士官原则上不安排自行报到，将与义务兵同步组织运输入营。
HYP: According to the requirements of normalized epidemic prevention and control, this year's direct recruitment of non - commissioned officers will not arrange to report on their own in principle, and will organize transportation into the camp in tandem with conscripts.

SRC: 直接招收士官入伍时间从2020年9月1日起算，部队下达士官任职命令的时间为2020年12月1日。
HYP: The time for direct enlistment of non - commissioned officers will be calculated from September 1, 2020, and the time for the army to issue the order for non - commissioned officers to serve will be December 1, 2020.

SRC: 部队接收单位将科学制定入伍和专业训练方案，认真组织施训；训练完成后按照专业对口、招用一致的原则，将招收士官统一精准分配到对口专业技术岗位。
HYP: The receiving units of the army will scientifically formulate enlistment and professional training programs, and conscientiously organize training; after the training is completed, the recruited non - commissioned officers will be uniformly and accurately assigned to the corresponding professional and technical positions in accordance with the principle of professional counterparts and consistent recruitment.

SRC: 驻英使馆发言人：中国政府是网络安全的坚定维护者-中新网
HYP: Spokesperson of the Embassy in the UK: The Chinese Government is a staunch defender of cyber security - chinanews.com

SRC: 中新网7月26日电据中国驻英国大使馆网站消息，25日，中国驻英国使馆发言人就有关网络攻击错误言论答记者问。
HYP: chinanews.com, July 26 according to the website of the Chinese Embassy in the UK, the spokesperson of the Chinese Embassy in the UK answered a reporter's question on the wrong remarks about the cyber attack on July 25.

SRC: 发言人强调，中国政府是网络安全的坚定维护者，一贯坚决反对并打击任何形式的网络攻击和网络犯罪。
HYP: The spokesman stressed that the Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security and has always resolutely opposed and cracked down on any form of cyber attacks and cyber crimes.

SRC: 有记者提问：据媒体称，与中国有关的黑客组织曾干扰一家英国公司网络系统、向存有专利数据的英美技术公司发动攻击、入侵欧盟国家政府网络。
HYP: A reporter asked: According to the media, China - related hacking groups have interfered with the network system of a British company, attacked British and American technology companies with patent data, and hacked into the government networks of EU countries.

SRC: 发言人表示，中国政府是网络安全的坚定维护者，一贯坚决反对并打击任何形式的网络攻击和网络犯罪。
HYP: The spokesman said that the Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security and has always resolutely opposed and cracked down on any form of cyber attacks and cyber crimes.

SRC: 网络空间虚拟性强，溯源难，行为体多样，在调查和定性网络事件的时候应拿出充分的证据，不能无端猜测。
HYP: Cyberspace is highly virtual, difficult to trace its origins, and diverse actors, so when investigating and characterizing cyber events, sufficient evidence should be produced, and no groundless speculation should be allowed.

SRC: 发言人称，以往的“棱镜门”等一系列事件证明，美国一直都在进行全球最大范围的网络窃密行动。
HYP: The spokesman said that a series of events such as "Prism Gate" in the past proved that the United States has been carrying out the world's largest cyber espionage operation.

SRC: 维护网络空间的和平与稳定符合所有国家的共同利益。
HYP: Maintaining peace and stability in cyberspace serves the common interests of all countries.

SRC: 发言人指出，中国在科技创新方面的成就不是偷来的、不是抢来的，而是通过自力更生、艰苦奋斗得来的。
HYP: The spokesman pointed out that China's achievements in scientific and technological innovation were not stolen or stolen, but achieved through self - reliance and hard work.

SRC: 2019年中国通过《专利合作条约》(PCT)途径提交了约5.9万件专利申请，年增长率为10.6%，成为提交国际专利申请量最多的国家。
HYP: In 2019, China filed about 59000 patent applications through the Patent Cooperation Treaty (PCT), with an annual growth rate of 10.6%, making it the country with the largest number of international patent applications.

SRC: 中国已经成为创新和知识产权大国。
HYP: China has become a major country in innovation and intellectual property rights.

SRC: 乌鲁木齐免费核酸检测多数区已基本完成高风险地区进行二次检测-中新网
HYP: Most districts in Urumqi have basically completed secondary testing in high - risk areas - chinanews.com

SRC: 中新网乌鲁木齐7月26日电(记者孙亭文赵雅敏)乌鲁木齐市卫健委主任张卫26日在通报乌鲁木齐市最新疫情和核酸检测情况时称，目前，乌鲁木齐全市免费核酸检测工作多数区已基本完成。
HYP: chinanews.com, Urumqi, July 26 (Reporters Sun Tingwen Zhao Yamin) Zhang Wei, director of the Urumqi Health Commission, reported on the latest epidemic situation and nucleic acid testing in Urumqi on July 26, saying that at present, most districts in Urumqi have basically completed free nucleic acid testing.

SRC: 国务院专家组和自治区、乌鲁木齐市专家正在根据核酸检测和流行病学调查结果，对疫情的发展做进一步评估。
HYP: The expert group of the State Council and experts from the autonomous region and Urumqi are making further assessments of the development of the epidemic based on the results of nucleic acid testing and epidemiological investigation.

SRC: 新疆维吾尔自治区新闻办公室26日召开新闻发布会通报新疆疫情和防控情况。
HYP: The Information Office of the Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region held a press conference on the 26th to inform about the epidemic situation and prevention and control in Xinjiang.

SRC: 据他介绍，7月25日0时至24时，乌鲁木齐市新增新冠肺炎确诊病例22例(其中5例为无症状感染者转确诊病例) ，新增无症状感染者38例。
HYP: According to him, from 0:00 to 24:00 on July 25, there were 22 new confirmed cases of new coronavirus pneumonia in Urumqi (of which 5 were confirmed cases of asymptomatic infections) and 38 new asymptomatic infections.

SRC: 截至7月25日24时，乌鲁木齐市现有确诊病例135例，无症状感染者147例。
HYP: As of 24:00 on July 25, there were 135 confirmed cases and 147 asymptomatic infections in Urumqi.

SRC: 25日新增的无症状感染者也基本上都是通过全市免费核酸检测、主动筛查出来的。
HYP: The new asymptomatic infections on the 25th were also basically detected through free nucleic acid testing and active screening in the city.

SRC: 乌鲁木齐市卫健委主任张卫26日称，乌鲁木齐全市免费核酸检测工作多数区已基本完成。
HYP: Zhang Wei, director of the Urumqi Municipal Health Commission, said on the 26th that most districts in Urumqi have basically completed free nucleic acid testing.

SRC: 他还说，从国内其他地区的经验看，影响核酸检测结果的因素很多，比如检测试剂灵敏度、受检测人员的感染时间和排毒时间、标本取材时受检测者配合情况(配合度差可能导致标本没有取到位)以及检测环境、检验人员的操作熟练程度等。
HYP: He also said that from the experience of other regions in China, there are many factors that affect the results of nucleic acid testing, such as the sensitivity of the testing reagent, the time of infection and detoxification of the tested person, the cooperation of the tested person when the specimen is taken (poor cooperation may lead to the specimen not being taken in place), the testing environment, and the proficiency of the testing personnel.

SRC: 由于各种原因，核酸检测也会出现假阴性的结果。
HYP: Due to various reasons, nucleic acid tests can also produce false negative results.

SRC: 所谓假阴性，就是指受检测者确实是感染者，但是核酸检测结果却为阴性。
HYP: The so - called false negative means that the person tested is indeed infected, but the nucleic acid test results are negative.

SRC: 另外，对于和确诊病例、疑似病例有过密切接触的人员，通常需要两次核酸检测才能排除。
HYP: In addition, people who have been in close contact with confirmed and suspected cases usually need two nucleic acid tests to exclude them.

SRC: 对于去过疫情中高风险地区的人员，如果出现发热和呼吸道症状，一次核酸检测阴性存在假阴性可能，所以也需要两次核酸检测才能排除。
HYP: For people who have been to high - risk areas of the epidemic, if fever and respiratory symptoms occur, a negative nucleic acid test may lead to false negatives, so two nucleic acid tests are also needed to eliminate them.

SRC: 他表示，鉴于以上情况，为了全市各族群众的身体健康，从今天开始，乌鲁木齐市将对天山区、沙依巴克区等重点地区进行二次免费核酸检测，同时开展“查遗补漏” 。
HYP: He said that in view of the above situation, and for the sake of the health of the people of all ethnic groups in the city, Urumqi will conduct a second free nucleic acid test in key areas such as Tianshan District and Shaybak District from today, and at the same time carry out "checking heritage and filling gaps".

SRC: 据悉，天山区、沙依巴克区是疫情高风险地区。
HYP: It is reported that Tianshan District and Shaybak District are high - risk areas for the epidemic.

SRC: 白宫疫情专家福奇：对2021年初研制出疫苗持谨慎乐观
HYP: White House outbreak expert Fauci: Cautiously optimistic about vaccine development in early 2021

SRC: 福奇25日在国际领袖基金会主办的一场网络视频会议上作<v>上述</v>表示。
HYP: Fauci made the remarks at an online video conference hosted by the International Leadership Foundation on the 25th.

SRC: 他提醒说，目前尚不清楚新冠疫情在秋冬季将如何发展，也不知道疫情的最终影响会如何，“而结束这一切的唯一办法就是我们每个人都选择成为解决问题的一部分”。
HYP: He cautioned that it is not clear how the new coronavirus outbreak will develop in autumn and winter, nor what the ultimate impact of the epidemic will be, "and the only way to end all this is for each of us to choose to be part of the solution."

SRC: 据美国约翰斯·霍普金斯大学数据，截至25日21时，美国新冠确诊病例已达417.6万，死亡14.6万人。
HYP: According to Johns Hopkins University, as of 21:00 on the 25th, the number of confirmed new coronavirus cases in the United States has reached 4.176,000, with 146000 deaths.

SRC: 福奇表示，美国一些地区目前正在艰难地同反弹的疫情作斗争。
HYP: Fauci said that some parts of the United States are currently struggling with the rebound of the pandemic.

SRC: 尽管各地疫情有所不同，需要因地制宜的应对方案，但多样化的抗疫策略并不意味着地区之间没有紧密联系。
HYP: Although the epidemic situation varies from region to region and needs to be adapted to local conditions, diverse anti - epidemic strategies do not mean that there is no close connection between regions.

SRC: 一个地区的疫情最终会影响到其他地区。
HYP: Outbreaks in one region will eventually affect other regions.

SRC: “现在不是自满的时候”，福奇说，“我们的工作没有完成，必须加紧努力，也必须对未来的不确定性保持警惕。”
HYP: "Now is not the time for complacency," Fauci said. "Our work has not been completed, we must step up our efforts, and we must be vigilant about the uncertainty of the future."

SRC: 美国华裔医学专家、治疗艾滋病“鸡尾酒疗法”创始人何大一在会上指出，美国新冠疫情尚未到达顶峰。
HYP: He Dayi, a Chinese - American medical expert and founder of "cocktail therapy" for the treatment of AIDS, pointed out at the meeting that the new coronavirus outbreak in the United States has not yet reached its peak.

SRC: “我们每个人都必须尽自己的一份力来减缓这一病毒的传播。”
HYP: "Each of us must do our part to slow down the spread of this virus."

SRC: 何大一呼吁，公众用自己的实际行动为科学家争取时间，以加紧研发新冠治疗药物和疫苗。
HYP: He called on the public to use their practical actions to buy time for scientists to step up research and development of new coronavirus therapeutics and vaccines.

SRC: 国际领袖基金会是一家以促进美国及亚太地区国际交流活动为宗旨的非营利性组织，致力于提升美国亚太裔地位，培育国际青年领袖。
HYP: The International Leadership Foundation is a non - profit organization dedicated to promoting international exchange activities in the United States and the Asia - Pacific region, and is committed to elevating the status of Asian - Pacific Americans and cultivating young international leaders.

SRC: 当天，美国运输部长赵小兰、美联邦众议员孟昭文以及国际领袖基金会创会会长董继玲等分别在会上发言。
HYP: On the same day, US Secretary of Transportation Elaine Chao, US Representative Meng Zhaowen, and founding president of the International Leadership Foundation Dong Jiling spoke at the meeting.

SRC: 他们特别向在一线抗疫的亚太裔医务工作者和志愿者致敬，并呼吁美国公众继续坚持“社交距离”等防疫准则，遏制疫情扩散。
HYP: They paid special tribute to the Asian - Pacific medical workers and volunteers fighting the epidemic on the front line, and called on the American public to continue to adhere to epidemic prevention guidelines such as "social distancing" to contain the spread of the epidemic.

SRC: 美中贸谈代表传8月会面
HYP: US - China Trade Talks Representatives Transcript for Meeting in August

SRC: 香港《南华早报》25日引述一名匿名知情人士报导，中国贸易谈判团队负责人、国务院副总理刘鹤与美方团队共同领导人、贸易代表赖海哲可望在8月举行正式会谈，评估双方履行中美第一阶段贸易协议的情况。
HYP: Hong Kong's South China Morning Post quoted an anonymous person familiar with the matter as saying that Liu He, the head of the Chinese trade negotiation team and Vice Premier of the State Council, and Lai Haizhe, the co - leader of the US team and trade representative, are expected to hold formal talks in August to assess the implementation of the first phase of the China - US trade agreement.

SRC: 报导说，虽然中国过去几个月已大幅提高采购美国农产品数量，但因新冠病毒疫情等因素，中方采购量距离贸易协议中承诺的数量仍有一段距离。
HYP: The report said that although China has significantly increased its purchases of US agricultural products in the past few months, due to the new coronavirus outbreak and other factors, China's purchases are still some way from the amount promised in the trade agreement.

SRC: 分析家说，近来美中相互关闭对方领事馆，加上其他争端，可能破坏双方在贸易方面的任何进展。
HYP: Analysts say the recent closure of each other's consulates by the United States and China, together with other disputes, could derail any progress on trade between the two sides.

SRC: 中美第一阶段贸易协议在1月15日签署后一个月生效，协议中规定双方高层组成的贸易框架小组，每半年应举行一次会谈。
HYP: The first phase of the trade agreement between China and the United States came into force one month after its signing on January 15, and the agreement stipulates that the high - level trade framework group of the two sides should hold talks every six months.

SRC: 知情人士透露，此次会议将是“一个重要的转折点”，让双方得以评估协议进展。
HYP: Informed sources said the meeting would be "an important turning point", allowing both sides to assess the progress of the agreement.

SRC: 但这名人士也说，若美中紧张关系导致此时会谈意愿不高，双方可能会同意，赖海哲与刘鹤5月8日的电话会议，即已满足贸易协议中每半年会谈一次的条款。
HYP: However, this person also said that if tensions between the United States and China lead to a low willingness to talk at this time, the two sides may agree that the conference call between Lai Haizhe and Liu He on May 8 has met the semi - annual terms of the trade agreement.

SRC: 今年以来，中美关系急速恶化，双方争端包括新冠病毒起源、贸易、香港、新疆、南海与意识形态等一系列问题。
HYP: Since the beginning of this year, China - US relations have deteriorated rapidly, with disputes between the two sides including the origin of the new coronavirus, trade, Hong Kong, Xinjiang, the South China Sea, and ideology.

SRC: 美国总统特朗普虽在年初吹嘘自己在首阶段协议中取得的成就，但近来态度改变。
HYP: Although US President Donald Trump bragged about his achievements in the first phase of the agreement at the beginning of the year, his attitude has recently changed.

SRC: 他23日在白宫记者会上说，虽然中国近来单日采购美国玉米数量破纪录，也买了很多大豆，“但这份贸易协议现在对我的意义，已不如当初达成时” 。
HYP: He said at the White House press conference on the 23rd that although China has recently purchased a record amount of US corn and bought a lot of soybeans in a single day, "this trade agreement is no longer as meaningful to me as it was when it was reached".

SRC: 一位匿名北京政府顾问也认为，由于美中关系不佳，新一轮贸易谈判不太可能进行， “贸易议题在中美关系已失去分量”。
HYP: An anonymous Beijing government adviser also said that due to the poor relationship between the United States and China, a new round of trade negotiations is unlikely, and that "trade issues have lost weight in China - US relations".

SRC: 但他透露，中国经贸相关单位23日仍开会讨论了一系列问题，包括如何增加从美国的进口量， “我们已经尽力买了，所以任何追加采购会有困难” 。
HYP: However, he revealed that the relevant Chinese economic and trade units still met on the 23rd to discuss a series of issues, including how to increase imports from the United States, "We have tried our best to buy, so any additional purchases will be difficult".

SRC: 美中贸易全国委员会副会长彭捷宁表示，保持首阶段协议动能“比以往任何时候都更重要”， 并指中国今年在进一步向美企开放金融市场上有所进展。
HYP: Peng Jining, vice president of the US - China Trade National Committee, said that it is "more important than ever" to maintain the momentum of the first phase of the agreement, and pointed out that China has made progress in further opening its financial markets to US companies this year.

SRC: 独立研究公司Plenum分析师说：“谈比不谈好，尽管可能只被当成例行公事。”
HYP: Analysts at Plenum, an independent research firm, said, "It is better to talk than not talk, although it may only be regarded as routine."

SRC: 余额宝收益下行“90后”反而“报复性”存钱？
HYP: Yuanbao's income declined after the "90s, but instead" retaliated "to save money?

SRC: 随着余额宝收益下行， “90后”不仅没有逃离余额宝，反而开始“报复性”存钱了？
HYP: As the income of Yuanbao declined, the "post-90s" not only did not flee Yuanbao, but began to save money "vindictively"?

SRC: 中国新经济研究院联合支付宝日前发布的《余额宝90后攒钱报告》（2020版）显示，上半年，“90后”更爱攒钱了：人均攒钱金额比2019年增长近四成。
HYP: In the first half of the year, the "post-90s" were more likely to save money: the amount of money saved per capita increased by nearly 40% compared to 2019, according to the 2020 edition of the Balance Bao Savings Report released by the China New Economy Research Institute and Alipay.

SRC: 有意思的是，“90后”更倾向于从一笔笔“小钱”开始攒，有六成平均每笔攒钱金额在20元以下… …
HYP: Interestingly, the "post-90s" are more inclined to save from a single stroke of "small money", with 60% saving less than 20 yuan per stroke on average...

SRC: 用余额宝攒钱，也成为“90后”的攒钱习惯。
HYP: Saving money with balance treasure has also become the saving habit of the "post-90s".

SRC: 数据显示，在7亿余额宝用户中，有1.34亿用户是“90后” 。
HYP: Data shows that of the 700 million Yuanbao users, 134 million are "post-90s".

SRC: 中国有1.74亿“90后” ，也就是说，全国每4个“90后”中约有3个在用余额宝攒钱。
HYP: There are 174 million "post-90s" in China, which means that about 3 out of every 4 "post-90s" in China are saving money with their balance treasure.

SRC: 目前，余额宝等货币基金的7日年化收益率从年初高于2%的水平，下滑到1.5%左右。
HYP: At present, the 7 - day annualized return of money funds such as Yuanbao has slipped from above 2% at the beginning of the year to around 1.5%.

SRC: 即使如此，也没有影响“90后”攒钱的步伐。
HYP: Even so, it did not affect the pace of saving money for the "post-90s".

SRC: 而在余额宝“攒钱效应”提升背景下，不少习惯使用余额宝的年轻人还直接转化为“基民”。
HYP: Against the backdrop of the increase in the "saving effect" of Yuanbao, many young people who are used to using Yuanbao have also been directly transformed into "base people".

SRC: 支付宝数据显示，截至7月13日，近一个月支付宝上的新“基民”同比增长1倍多，越来越多年轻人在支付宝上实现“进阶”理财。
HYP: Alipay data shows that as of July 13, the number of new "base people" on Alipay has more than doubled year - on - year in the past month, and more and more young people are achieving "advanced" financial management on Alipay.

SRC: 有分析师认为，资金从余额宝流入股市，也是6月货币基金份额明确下滑的重要原因。
HYP: Some analysts believe that the inflow of funds from Yuanbao into the stock market is also an important reason for the clear decline in the share of money funds in June.

SRC: 报告还显示，“90后”女生更倾向于多攒钱，平均比男生攒钱金额高两成；在支付宝平台上持有基金的用户中，6成是男性，女性与男性相比倾向于选择更为稳健的理财方式。
HYP: The report also shows that "post-90s" girls are more likely to save more money, saving an average of 20% more than boys; 60% of users who hold funds on the Alipay platform are men, and women tend to choose more robust financial management methods than men.

SRC: 存钱之后，“90后”有何计划？
HYP: What are the plans of the "post-90s" after saving money?

SRC: 支付宝数据显示，“90后”有为目标攒钱的习惯，将旅行作为攒钱目标的用户最多。
HYP: Alipay data shows that the "post-90s" have the habit of saving money for their goals, and the largest number of users take travel as their goal.

SRC: 受疫情影响，许多“90后”攒钱为疫情后的旅行做准备；电影院恢复营业，也为从攒钱转向消费提供了新途径。
HYP: Affected by the epidemic, many "post-90s" have saved money to prepare for travel after the epidemic; the reopening of cinemas has also provided a new way to shift from saving money to consumption.

SRC: 让一面面鲜艳的党旗在抗洪大堤上高高飘扬
HYP: Let a bright party flag fly high on the flood - resistant embankment

SRC: 近期我国南方受连续降雨影响，防汛抗洪形势十分严峻，造成贵州、四川、湖南、广西、广东、湖北等26省(区、市)受灾。
HYP: Recently, the south of China has been affected by continuous rainfall, and the flood prevention and control situation is very severe, resulting in the disaster in 26 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities), including Guizhou, Sichuan, Hunan, Guangxi, Guangdong, and Hubei.

SRC: 灾情就是命令，灾区就是战场，灾害面前，党旗就是战旗，各级党组织、广大党员干部、人民子弟兵坚决落实习近平总书记关于防汛救灾工作重要指示精神，迅速投身防汛抗洪抢险救灾第一线，成为灾区群众的主心骨、抗洪战斗的生力军。
HYP: Disaster situations are orders, disaster areas are battlefields, and in the face of disasters, the Party flag is the battle flag, and Party organizations at all levels, the vast number of Party members and cadres, and the people's army resolutely implement the spirit of General Secretary Xi Jinping's important instructions on flood prevention and relief work, quickly join the front line of flood prevention, flood prevention, rescue, and disaster relief, and become the backbone of the people in the disaster areas and a new force in the fight against floods.

SRC: 鲜艳的党旗在抗洪大堤上高高飘扬，是忠诚的体现，也是使命的召唤。
HYP: The bright party flag flutters high on the flood - resistant embankment, which is the embodiment of loyalty and the call of mission.

SRC: 灾害面前，一个党组织就是一座战斗堡垒，一名党员干部就是一面旗帜。
HYP: In the face of disasters, a Party organization is a battle fortress, and a Party member and cadre is a flag.

SRC: 在各地的抗洪一线，各级党组织、广大党员干部体现高度的对党忠诚，听从党中央号召，以“看我的”的行动、“跟我来”的步伐、“我先上”的勇气，筑起一座座冲不垮的钢铁堡垒，挺起一个个压不弯的中国脊梁。
HYP: In the flood prevention front lines everywhere, Party organizations at all levels, as well as the vast number of Party members and cadres, have demonstrated a high degree of loyalty to the Party, heeded the call of the Party Central Committee, and, with the action of "look at me", the pace of "follow me", and the courage of "I go first", have built iron fortresses that cannot be crushed, and have raised the backbone of China that cannot be bent.

SRC: 鲜艳的党旗在抗洪大堤上高高飘扬，是阵地的坚守，也是冲锋的号角。
HYP: The bright party flag flutters high on the flood - resistant embankment, which is the holding of the position and the clarion call for the charge.

SRC: 面对洪涝灾害，各级党组织迅速行动，吹响抗洪“冲锋号”，把鲜艳的党旗插在抗洪的大堤上，广大党员干部、人民子弟兵坚守在抗洪的阵地上，用“党旗在阵地就在”、“洪水不退永不收兵”的意志和行动，成为灾区群众最放心也最值得信赖的坚固屏障。
HYP: In the face of the flood disaster, Party organizations at all levels acted quickly, sounded the "battle cry" against the flood, and planted the bright Party flag on the flood - resistant embankment, and the vast number of Party members, cadres, and the people's army held fast to the flood - resistant position, and became the most reassuring and trustworthy solid barrier for the people in the disaster areas with the will and actions of "the Party flag is in the position" and "the flood will never recede".

SRC: 鲜艳的党旗在抗洪大堤上高高飘扬，是无私的奉献，也是责任的担当。
HYP: The bright Party flag flying high on the flood - resistant embankment is selfless dedication and responsibility.

SRC: 鲜艳的党旗在抗洪大堤上高高飘扬，是无私的奉献，也是责任的<v>担当</v>。
HYP: The bright Party flag flying high on the flood - resistant embankment is selfless dedication and responsibility.

SRC: 危难时刻，彰显党员本色，在人民群众生命财产受到严重威胁的时刻，党员干部、人民子弟兵舍小家、顾大家，无私奉献，敢于担当，把打赢防汛抗洪抢险救灾这场硬仗，作为全面检验能力、作风、素养的主战场、阅兵场，正是这种无私奉献和担当的精神，极大的鼓舞着灾区群众战胜灾情的信心和决心，凝聚起打赢防汛抗洪抢险救灾的强大精神力量。
HYP: In times of crisis, the true character of Party members is demonstrated, and when people's lives and property are seriously threatened, Party members, cadres, and the people's army take care of their families, take care of everyone, selfless dedication, and dare to take responsibility, and take the tough battle of flood prevention, flood prevention, rescue, and disaster relief as the main battlefield and military parade ground to comprehensively test their ability, style, and literacy, and it is this spirit of selfless dedication and responsibility that greatly inspires the confidence and determination of the people in the disaster areas to overcome the disaster situation, and builds up a powerful spiritual force to win flood prevention, flood prevention, rescue, and disaster relief.

SRC: “人民至上、生命至上”， 既在平时接受检验，更在关键时刻接受考验。
HYP: "People first, life first" is tested not only in ordinary times, but also at critical moments.

SRC: 在抗洪大堤上，广大党员干部和人民子弟兵，要让人民群众随时随处都能看到鲜红的党旗、奋斗的身影、鼓励的声音，用洪水冲不垮的钢铁堤坝为党旗增辉添彩，让一面面鲜艳的党旗在抗洪大堤上高高飘扬！
HYP: On the flood - resistant embankment, the vast number of Party members, cadres, and the people's army should let the people see the bright red Party flag, the figure of struggle, and the voice of encouragement everywhere at any time, brighten the Party flag with the steel embankment that cannot be washed away by the flood, and let a bright Party flag fly high on the flood - resistant embankment!

SRC: APEC成员贸易部长<v>会议</v>表示将加速推动区域经济复苏-新华网
HYP: APEC Trade Ministers Say They Will Accelerate Regional Economic Recovery - Xinhuanet

SRC: 新华社吉隆坡7月25日电（记者林昊）亚太经合组织（APEC）成员贸易部长视频会议25日举行，会议承诺将致力于减少新冠疫情对本区域经济的影响，加速推动实现具有弹性、可持续性和包容性的区域经济复苏。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Kuala Lumpur, July 25 (Reporter Lin Hao) - A video conference of trade ministers of Asia - Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) members was held on July 25, and the meeting pledged to work to reduce the impact of the new coronavirus outbreak on the regional economy and accelerate the realization of a resilient, sustainable, and inclusive regional economic recovery.

SRC: 会议由今年APEC领导人<v>非正式</v>会议主办方马来西亚主持。
HYP: The meeting was chaired by Malaysia, the host of this year's APEC Economic Leaders' Meeting.

SRC: 会后发表的联合声明表示，APEC成员贸易部长认识到，在这一具有挑战性的时刻，一个自由、开放、公平、非歧视、透明和可预测的贸易和投资环境对于推动经济复苏的重要性。
HYP: The joint statement issued after the meeting said that the trade ministers of APEC members recognized the importance of a free, open, fair, non - discriminatory, transparent, and predictable trade and investment environment to promote economic recovery at this challenging time.

SRC: 各方承诺，确保为应对疫情所采取的紧急措施是具有针对性、恰当、透明和临时的，不会制造不必要的贸易壁垒并扰乱全球供应链，同时遵守世界贸易组织规则。
HYP: All parties pledged to ensure that the emergency measures taken to deal with the epidemic are targeted, appropriate, transparent, and temporary, that they do not create unnecessary trade barriers and disrupt global supply chains, and that they abide by the rules of the World Trade Organization.

SRC: APEC成员贸易部长在声明中承诺，加强合作促进必要的商品和服务流动，通过加强供应链弹性促进互联互通，将医疗物资、食品和农业产品流动所受到的干扰最小化，以应对疫情。
HYP: In the statement, the trade ministers of APEC members pledged to strengthen cooperation to promote the flow of necessary goods and services, promote connectivity by strengthening supply chain flexibility, and minimize disruptions to the flow of medical supplies, food, and agricultural products in order to cope with the epidemic.

SRC: APEC成员贸易部长一致认为，有必要讨论如何减少限制必要商品贸易的非关税壁垒，重申将致力于在不影响为阻止疫情蔓延所采取措施的情况下促进必要的跨境人员流动。
HYP: The trade ministers of APEC members agreed on the need to discuss ways to reduce non - tariff barriers that restrict trade in essential goods, and reiterated their commitment to promote the necessary cross - border movement of people without affecting the measures taken to stop the spread of the epidemic.

SRC: 会议还发布了有关促进必要商品流通的宣言。
HYP: The meeting also issued a declaration on promoting the circulation of necessary commodities.

SRC: 宣言表示，各经济体将确保其为应对疫情所采取的贸易措施符合世贸组织规定，并承诺在减少非关税贸易壁垒、贸易促进等方面采取行动，以促进疫情下必要的商品流动。
HYP: The declaration states that all economies will ensure that their trade measures in response to the epidemic comply with WTO regulations, and commit to take action to reduce non - tariff trade barriers and promote trade in order to promote the flow of goods necessary under the epidemic.

SRC: 主持会议的马来西亚国际贸易和工业部部长阿兹明·阿里表示，尽管受到疫情影响，马来西亚依然致力于推动今年APEC会议取得成功，制定APEC2020年后合作愿景的工作正有序推进。
HYP: Azmin Ali, Minister of International Trade and Industry of Malaysia, who presided over the meeting, said that despite the impact of the epidemic, Malaysia is still committed to promoting the success of this year's APEC meeting, and that the work of formulating the APEC post-2020 cooperation vision is progressing in an orderly manner.

SRC: 马来西亚同意以视频形式举行APEC相关会议，但不排除在年底APEC领导人非正式会议时安排实体会议的可能性。
HYP: Malaysia agreed to hold APEC - related meetings by video, but did not rule out the possibility of arranging a physical meeting at the APEC Economic Leaders' Meeting at the end of the year.

SRC: 江西财政紧急下达2.8亿元资金支持各地灾后救助重建-中新网
HYP: Jiangxi Finance issued 280 million yuan of emergency funds to support post - disaster relief and reconstruction in various regions - chinanews.com

SRC: 7月24日，江西省九江市湖口县，驰援当地抗洪的中国人民解放军第71集团军某部官兵利用备勤间隙，帮助湖口县一蔬菜种植专业合作社抢收辣椒。
HYP: On July 24, in Hukou County, Jiujiang City, Jiangxi Province, officers and soldiers of the 71st Army Group of the People's Liberation Army took advantage of the gap in preparation to help a vegetable growing cooperative in Hukou County to harvest chili peppers.

SRC: 受此前强降雨影响，该合作社种植的上百亩红辣椒受灾严重，如不及时采摘损失会更加扩大。
HYP: Affected by the previous heavy rainfall, hundreds of acres of red peppers planted by the cooperative were severely affected, and if they were not picked in time, the losses would be even greater.

SRC: 中新社记者富田摄
HYP: Photo by Tomita, China News Service

SRC: 中新网南昌7月26日电(袁汝晶)江西省财政厅26日消息，根据江西省防汛抗旱指挥部的工作部署和要求，该省财政紧急下达中央和省级救灾资金2.8亿元，为防汛抢险和受灾群众救助工作提供资金保障。
HYP: chinanews.com, Nanchang, July 26 (Yuan Rujing) The Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance announced on July 26 that according to the work deployment and requirements of the Jiangxi Provincial Flood Control and Drought Relief Command, the provincial finance department issued 280 million yuan of central and provincial disaster relief funds to provide financial guarantee for flood prevention and rescue and relief work for the affected people.

SRC: 7月份以来，江西汛期、灾情不断升级。
HYP: Since July, the flood season and disaster situation in Jiangxi have been escalating.

SRC: 洪涝灾害已导致该省农业农村直接经济损失100.7亿元、受灾面积1316.9万亩。
HYP: The flood disaster has caused direct economic losses of 10.07 billion yuan in agriculture and rural areas in the province, and affected an area of 13.169 million mu.

SRC: 7月17和7月22日，江西省财政先后下达中央救灾资金6000万元和2亿元。
HYP: On July 17 and July 22, Jiangxi Provincial Finance issued central disaster relief funds of 60 million yuan and 200 million yuan respectively.

SRC: 同时根据灾情变化情况，从该省应急管理专项资金中连续分3批下达省级救灾资金2030万元，支持各地灾后救助和恢复重建。
HYP: At the same time, according to the changes in the disaster situation, 20.3 million yuan of provincial disaster relief funds were issued in three consecutive batches from the province's special emergency management funds to support post - disaster relief, recovery, and reconstruction in various regions.

SRC: 江西省财政厅相关负责人26日称，在汛期到来之前，已下达各类防灾减灾资金1.73亿元，确保风险防患早发现、早处置、早化解，为抗洪抢险工作提供经费支持。
HYP: The relevant person in charge of the Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance said on the 26th that before the flood season, 173 million yuan of various types of disaster prevention and mitigation funds had been issued to ensure early detection, early disposal, and early resolution of risks, and to provide financial support for flood prevention and rescue work.

SRC: 目前，长江江西段和中国最大淡水湖鄱阳湖水位呈高位缓退状态。
HYP: At present, the water level of the Jiangxi section of the Yangtze River and Poyang Lake, the largest freshwater lake in China, is at a high level and receding slowly.

SRC: 江西省防指于24日18时，将防汛应急响应下调至Ⅱ级；将省级救灾应急响应级别由II级调整为III级。
HYP: At 18:00 on the 24th, the Jiangxi Provincial Defense Bureau downgraded the flood prevention emergency response to level 1, and adjusted the provincial disaster relief emergency response level from level 2 to level III.

SRC: 灾情评估和灾后恢复重建等各项工作将持续进行。
HYP: Disaster assessment, post - disaster recovery and reconstruction work will continue.

SRC: 国家卫健委：7月25日新增确诊病例46例，新疆22例辽宁13例- 经济观察网
HYP: National Health Commission: 46 new confirmed cases on July 25, 22 in Xinjiang, 13 in Liaoning - Economic Observer

SRC: 据国家卫生健康委员会消息，7月25日0—24时，31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增确诊病例46例，其中境外输入病例11例（内蒙古5例，广东3例，天津1例，福建1例，山东1例），本土病例35例（新疆22例，辽宁13例）；无新增死亡病例；新增疑似病例2例，均为境外输入病例（内蒙古1例，上海1例） 。
HYP: According to the National Health Commission, from 0 - 24:00 on July 25, 31 provinces (autonomous regions, municipalities directly under the Central Government) and the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 46 new confirmed cases, including 11 imported cases (5 in Inner Mongolia, 3 in Guangdong, 1 in Tianjin, 1 in Fujian, and 1 in Shandong) and 35 local cases (22 in Xinjiang, 13 in Liaoning); no new deaths; and 2 new suspected cases, all imported cases (1 in Inner Mongolia, 1 in Shanghai).

SRC: 当日新增治愈出院病例19例，解除医学观察的密切接触者673人，重症病例较前一日增加7例。
HYP: On the same day, 19 new cases were cured and discharged, 673 close contacts were released from medical observation, and the number of severe cases increased by 7 from the previous day.

SRC: 境外输入现有确诊病例82例（其中重症病例2例），现有疑似病例3例。
HYP: There are 82 confirmed cases imported from overseas (including 2 severe cases) and 3 suspected cases.

SRC: 累计确诊病例2045例，累计治愈出院病例1963例，无死亡病例。
HYP: A total of 2045 cases were confirmed, 1963 cases were cured and discharged, and there were no deaths.

SRC: 截至7月25日24时，据31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告，现有确诊病例288例（其中重症病例18例），累计治愈出院病例78908例，累计死亡病例4634例，累计报告确诊病例83830例，现有疑似病例3例。
HYP: As of 24:00 on July 25, 31 provinces (autonomous regions, municipalities directly under the Central Government) and the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 288 confirmed cases (including 18 severe cases), 78908 cured and discharged cases, 4634 deaths, 83830 confirmed cases, and 3 suspected cases.

SRC: 累计追踪到密切接触者779000人，尚在医学观察的密切接触者11762人。
HYP: A total of 779000 close contacts have been traced, and 11762 close contacts are still under medical observation.

SRC: 31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增无症状感染者68例（境外输入8例）；当日转为确诊病例17例（无境外输入） ；当日解除医学观察10例（境外输入7例）；尚在医学观察无症状感染者292例（境外输入91例）。
HYP: Thirty-one provinces (autonomous regions, municipalities directly under the Central Government) and the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 68 new asymptomatic infections (8 imported from abroad); 17 confirmed cases were confirmed on the same day (no imported from abroad); 10 cases were released from medical observation on the same day (7 imported from abroad); and 292 asymptomatic infections were still under medical observation (91 imported from abroad).

SRC: 累计收到港澳台地区通报确诊病例3009例。
HYP: A total of 3009 confirmed cases have been reported from Hong Kong, Macao, and Taiwan.

SRC: 其中，香港特别行政区2505例（出院1455例，死亡18例），澳门特别行政区46例（出院46例），台湾地区458例（出院440例，死亡7例）。
HYP: Among them, there were 2505 cases in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region (1455 discharged and 18 deaths), 46 cases in the Macao Special Administrative Region (46 discharged), and 458 cases in Taiwan (440 discharged and 7 deaths).

SRC: 专家说通过美国人口普查收集移民资料用于众院席位分配违宪
HYP: Experts say collecting immigration data through the US Census for the allocation of seats in the House of Representatives is unconstitutional

SRC: 一些民权组织和好几个美国城市和县对美国联邦政府提出起诉，称特朗普总统府试图将无证移民排除在美国人口普查之外是行不通的，也是违宪的。
HYP: A number of civil rights organizations and several US cities and counties have sued the US federal government, saying that the Trump administration's attempt to exclude undocumented immigrants from the US census is unworkable and unconstitutional.

SRC: 美国人口普查将决定美国国会众议院席位的分配。
HYP: The United States Census will determine the distribution of seats in the House of Representatives of the United States Congress.

SRC: 美国民权自由联盟执行律师萨拉·布兰农对美国之音说，“这么做是行不通的。”
HYP: Sarah Brannon, executive attorney of the American Civil Liberties Union, told VOA, "This will not work."

SRC: 她接着说，特朗普要求在人口普查中确定接受普查的人的公民身份难以做到，而且“不是很可靠。”
HYP: She went on to say that Trump's request to determine the citizenship status of people on the census was difficult to do and "not very reliable."

SRC: 另一个公民自由组织共同事业组织星期四提出诉讼，对特朗普的行政令提出挑战。
HYP: Another civil liberties organization, Common Cause, filed a lawsuit Thursday challenging Trump's executive order.

SRC: 新泽西州、乔治亚州的一些城市加入了诉讼。
HYP: Some cities in New Jersey and Georgia joined the lawsuit.

SRC: 维吉尼亚州的阿灵顿县星期五也加入了诉讼。
HYP: Arlington County, Virginia, also joined the lawsuit Friday.

SRC: 阿灵顿县的管理董事会主席加维说，“美国宪法要求每10年准确地清点我们的人口。我们必须准确地清点居住在阿灵顿县的每一个人，不能让这种非法试图吓跑人和压缩我们的移民社区人数的做法得逞。”
HYP: Garvey, chairman of the Arlington County Board of Management, said, "The US Constitution requires an accurate count of our population every 10 years. We must accurately count everyone living in Arlington County, and this illegal attempt to scare people away and reduce the size of our immigrant community cannot be allowed to succeed."

SRC: 另一些组织和个人则赞扬特朗普总统的行政令。
HYP: Other organizations and individuals praised President Trump's executive order.

SRC: 阿拉巴马州司法部长马歇尔称，该行政令是该州的一个“胜利”。
HYP: Marshall, the Alabama attorney general, called the decree a "victory" for the state.

SRC: 他说，“分配各州的国会众议院席位和选举团席位的时候，必须根据居住在各州的居民人数，而且是合法居住的居民的人数。”
HYP: He said, "The allocation of seats in the House of Representatives and the Electoral College in each state must be based on the number of residents living in each state, and the number of residents who are legally resident."

SRC: 美国最高法院去年阻止了特朗普行政当局将公民身份问题纳入2020年人口普查表中。
HYP: The US Supreme Court last year blocked the Trump administration from including the citizenship question on the 2020 census form.

SRC: 特朗普总统本星期早些时候签署一项行政令，指令监管美国人口普查局的商业部长罗斯提交人口普查所得的无证人口的数据，以便行政当局将这些无证人口排除在各州的人口普查数字之外，并以此确定每个州究竟是增加还是减少或保持众议院议员席位。
HYP: President Trump signed an executive order earlier this week directing Commerce Secretary Ross, who oversees the US Census Bureau, to submit data on the undocumented population from the census so that the administration can exclude these undocumented people from the census figures of each state, and thus determine whether each state will increase, decrease, or maintain seats in the House of Representatives.

SRC: 美国每隔10年就要根据人口变化情况重新分配众议院席位。
HYP: The United States redistributes seats in the House of Representatives every 10 years according to demographic changes.

SRC: 新书爆料：哈利王子觉得哥哥“势利傲慢”
HYP: New book reveals that Prince Harry feels his brother is "snobby and arrogant"

SRC: 英国《泰晤士报》和《星期日泰晤士报》连载名为《寻找自由》（Finding Freedom）的新书，内容描绘哈利王子（Prince Harry）与妻子梅根（Meghan Markle）的王室生活心路历程。
HYP: The British "Times" and "Sunday Times" serialized a new book called "Finding Freedom", which depicts the royal life of Prince Harry and his wife Meghan Markle.

SRC: 但路透社报导，哈利和梅根已和这本书撇清关系，说他们未接受作者访问，也未提供任何内容。
HYP: However, Reuters reported that Harry and Meghan had disassociated themselves from the book, saying that they had not been interviewed by the author or provided any content.

SRC: 《星期日泰晤士报》报导，新书引述消息人士表示，哈利和梅根婚前约会时，威廉王子（Prince William）想确认原是好莱坞女星的梅根对哈利是否别有用心。
HYP: The Sunday Times reported that the new book quoted sources as saying that when Harry and Meghan dated before marriage, Prince William wanted to confirm whether Meghan, a former Hollywood actress, had ulterior motives for Harry.

SRC: 根据消息人士转述，威廉当时曾对哈利说：“你别感觉有必要仓促（娶梅根）。
HYP: According to the source, William said to Harry at the time, "Don't feel the need to rush (to marry Meghan).

SRC: 你可以尽量花时间去了解这个女孩。”
HYP: You can spend as much time as you can to get to know this girl. "

SRC: 报导说，当哈利听到威廉用“这个女孩”形容梅根，他从哥哥语气中感受到傲慢势利，他也认为自己不再需要他人照顾提醒。
HYP: The report said that when Harry heard William use "this girl" to describe Meghan, he felt arrogant and snobbish in his brother's tone, and he thought he no longer needed to be taken care of.

SRC: 哈利和梅根今年1月宣布计划过更独立的生活，并将自食其力。
HYP: Harry and Meghan announced in January that they planned to live a more independent life and would support themselves.

SRC: 两人3月正式卸下王室高阶成员身分后，目前带著儿子亚契（Archie）住在美国洛杉矶追求新事业。
HYP: After officially stepping down as high - ranking members of the royal family in March, they are now living in Los Angeles with their son Archie to pursue a new career.

SRC: 哈利和梅根在2018年5月结婚。
HYP: Harry and Meghan married in May 2018.

SRC: 当时这场婚姻被视为为英国王室注入好莱坞的光鲜亮丽和新时代气息，两人也因此成为当代全球最受瞩目的名人夫妻档之一。
HYP: At the time, the marriage was seen as injecting Hollywood glamour and a new - age vibe into the British royal family, and the two became one of the most high - profile celebrity couples in the world today.

SRC: 越南驻老挝大使馆公使衔参赞郑氏心、在老挝越南佛教协会、老挝越南人总会、万象省政府代表、老挝老兵协会等代表一同参加了祭奠仪式。
HYP: Zheng Thi Xin, Minister Counselor of the Vietnamese Embassy in Laos, representatives of the Vietnamese Buddhist Association in Laos, the Lao Vietnamese Association, the provincial government of Vientiane, the Lao Veterans Association, and other representatives attended the ceremony.

SRC: 英烈祭奠仪式在庄严肃穆的气氛中举行，各位代表陆续向英烈们上香，缅怀英烈们的丰功伟绩及越老特殊团结关系。
HYP: The memorial ceremony for the heroes and martyrs was held in a solemn atmosphere, and the delegates offered incense to the heroes and martyrs one after another to remember their great achievements and the special solidarity between Vietnam and Laos.

SRC: 公使衔参赞郑氏心在讲话中表示，这是在老越南人和老挝人民共同缅怀两国革命英烈，一起对为两国独立自由牺牲的英烈表达感恩之心的机会，同时也是两国人民回顾两国并肩协作打击共同敌人，争取民族独立，国家统一，共同建设国家发展，巩固两国关系的良好机会。
HYP: Minister Counselor Zheng Thi Xin said in his speech that this is an opportunity for the Vietnamese and Lao people to jointly remember the revolutionary heroes and martyrs of the two countries and express their gratitude to the heroes and martyrs who died for the independence and freedom of the two countries, and it is also a good opportunity for the two peoples to recall that the two countries worked side by side to fight the common enemy, strive for national independence, national reunification, jointly build national development, and consolidate bilateral relations.

SRC: 74年前的1946年1月23日， 老越战斗联盟的28名战士在进攻Phonehe据点时英勇牺牲。
HYP: Seventy-four years ago, on January 23, 1946, 28 soldiers of the Lao - Vietnam Combat Alliance died heroically while attacking the Phonehe stronghold.

SRC: 此次进攻取得胜利，成为两国在争取民族解放革命斗争初期阶段的具有历史性意义的胜利。
HYP: The victory of the attack was a historic victory for the two countries in the early stages of the revolutionary struggle for national liberation.

SRC: 郑氏心女士强调，两国人民永远铭记为两国民族解放斗争事业牺牲的各位英烈，同时强调两国年轻一带将继续发扬老前辈英勇、坚强的传统，为越老关系持续开花结果及两国的繁荣发展作出应有的贡献。
HYP: Ms. Zheng Thi Xin stressed that the people of the two countries will always remember the heroes and martyrs who died for the cause of the national liberation struggle of the two countries, and stressed that the young areas of the two countries will continue to carry forward the heroic and strong traditions of the old - timers and make due contributions to the continued blossoming of Vietnam - Laos relations and the prosperity and development of the two countries.

SRC: 里程碑式跨越！
HYP: A milestone!

SRC: 国际米兰解锁第3000场意甲比赛-中新网
HYP: Inter unlocks 3000 th Serie A match - chinanews.com

SRC: 中新网客户端7月26日电北京时间26日凌晨，意甲传统豪门国际米兰迎来了里程碑之战。
HYP: chinanews.com, July 26 - In the early morning of July 26 Beijing time, Serie A's traditional giants, Inter Milan, ushered in a milestone battle.

SRC: 据意大利媒体统计，客场对阵热那亚一役是国际米兰队史第3000场意甲联赛，蓝黑军团也是首个解锁这项里程碑的球队。
HYP: According to Italian media, the away match against Genoa was Inter Milan's 3000 th Serie A match, and the Nerazzurri were the first team to unlock this milestone.

SRC: 自1929年联赛改制以来，国际米兰是唯一一支从未缺席意甲的队伍，也是唯一一支从未降级的球队。
HYP: Since the restructuring of the league in 1929, Inter are the only team that has never been absent from Serie A, and the only team that has never been relegated.

SRC: 据意大利媒体报道，国际米兰与热那亚的比赛是蓝黑军团队史第3000场比赛。
HYP: According to Italian media, the match between Inter and Genoa was the 3000 th match in the history of the Nerazzurri team.

SRC: 在这场里程碑之战中，国际米兰客场三球完胜热那亚。
HYP: In this milestone match, Inter beat Genoa by three goals away from home.

SRC: 此役卢卡库梅开二度，替补出场的桑切斯也贡献一球。
HYP: Lukaku scored twice in the match, and Sanchez, who came on as a substitute, also contributed a goal.

SRC: 比赛从一开始就进入了国际米兰的节奏，强攻终于在第34分钟转化为进球。
HYP: The match entered the rhythm of Inter from the beginning, and the attack finally turned into a goal in the 34th minute.

SRC: 比拉吉左路传中，卢卡库中路包抄头球破门。
HYP: Bilagi crossed on the left flank, and Lukaku wrapped up the header in the middle.

SRC: 第82分钟国际米兰如法炮制，摩西右路突破后传中，桑切斯中路包抄推射得手；终场前卢卡库完成梅开二度，反击中布罗佐维奇送出长距离直塞，卢卡库突入禁区晃过罗梅罗后推射空门得分，将比分定格在3：0。
HYP: At the 82nd minute, Inter did the same, Moses broke through on the right flank and crossed, and Sanchez covered and pushed in the middle; before the end of the game, Lukaku scored twice, and Brozovic sent a long - distance shot on the counter - attack, and Lukaku burst into the penalty area, swung past Romero, and then pushed an open goal to score, setting the score at 3 - 0.

SRC: 国际米兰客场3：0完胜热那亚，积分反超亚特兰大上升至第2，在多赛一场的情况下落后领头羊尤文图斯4分，仍保留着争冠希望。
HYP: Inter beat Genoa 3 - 0 away from home, surpassing Atalanta to move up to second place, and 4 points behind leaders Juventus with one more match to play, and still retain the hope of competing for the title.

SRC: 至此，在这跨越近90载光阴的3000场意甲联赛中，国际米兰赢得了其中的1489场，打平834场，输掉677场，胜率为49.6%。
HYP: So far, out of 3000 Serie A matches spanning nearly 90 years, Inter have won 1489 of them, drawn 834, and lost 677, a win rate of 49.6%.

SRC: 其间，球队共打进5038球，丢3102球，<v>场</v>均打进1.68球。
HYP: During that time, the team scored 5038 goals and conceded 3102, with an average of 1.68 goals.

SRC: 其间，球队共打进5038球，丢3102球，场均打进1.68球。
HYP: During that time, the team scored 5038 goals and conceded 3102, with an average of 1.68 goals.

SRC: 蓝黑军团18次获得联赛冠军，并且从未降级。
HYP: The Nerazzurri have won the league 18 times and have never been relegated.

SRC: 谍战剧老面孔柳云龙演一个结巴男主角-新华网
HYP: Liu Yunlong, an Old Face of Spy Drama, Plays a Stumbling Actor - Xinhuanet

SRC: 由柳云龙监制、殷飞执导,柳云龙、苏青、梁冠华、李立群等主演的大型谍战剧《胜算》, 于7月16日晚7:30登陆广东卫视“活力剧场” 。
HYP: Produced by Liu Yunlong, directed by Yin Fei, and starring Liu Yunlong, Su Qing, Liang Guanhua, and Li Liqun, the large - scale spy drama "The Chance of Winning" landed at Guangdong Satellite TV's "Vibrant Theatre" at 7:30 pm on July 16.

SRC: 该剧讲述了潜伏在日伪警察局的中共地下党员唐飞(柳云龙饰)联合苏联特工,刺杀日本特工头目,粉碎了日军的惊天阴谋。
HYP: The play tells the story of Tang Fei (Liu Yunlong), an underground member of the Communist Party of China who lurks in a Japanese pseudo - police station, who, together with Soviet agents, assassinated the leader of the Japanese agents and crushed the Japanese army's startling plot.

SRC: 《胜算》根据史实改编,素材取自尘封多年的苏联军事档案。
HYP: The Chance of Winning is based on historical facts, and the material is taken from the dusty Soviet military archives.

SRC: 莫斯科保卫战期间,苏联红军远东精锐西进驰援,此时日本关东军“北进派”认为有机可乘,意欲出兵。
HYP: During the defense of Moscow, the Soviet Red Army's Far East elite advanced westward to help, and at this time, the "northward advance faction" of the Japanese Kwantung Army thought it was an opportunity to take advantage of the situation and intended to send troops.

SRC: 为解腹背受敌之危,中共与苏共情报人员联手实施了“穆丹乌拉”计划。
HYP: The Chinese Communist Party and the intelligence agents of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union jointly implemented the "Mudanullah" plan to solve the danger of being defeated by the enemy.

SRC: 根据此历史背景,知名编剧邓原几经打磨,令剧情曲折烧脑。
HYP: According to this historical background, Deng Yuan, a well - known screenwriter, has been polished several times, which makes the plot twists and turns burn the brain.

SRC: 柳云龙此次在《胜算》中同时担任监制和男主角。
HYP: Liu Yunlong served as both producer and leading actor in "The Chance of Winning".

SRC: 剧中,他饰演的唐飞是林河警察厅刑事科科长,是一位颇有喜感甚至有点痞气的结巴警察,真实的身份则是一名中共地下党员。
HYP: In the play, he plays Tang Fei, the head of the criminal section of the Linhe Police Department, a stuttering policeman who feels happy and even a little ruffian, while his real identity is that of an underground member of the Communist Party of China.

SRC: 与其上演对手戏的女主角蔡梦是林河保安局科长,深得日本上司福原的赏识,与唐飞之间存在着亦敌亦友、暧昧不清的微妙关系。
HYP: Cai Meng, the heroine who plays opposite her, is the head of the Linhe Security Bureau, and is appreciated by her Japanese boss, Fukuhara, and has a delicate relationship with Tang Fei that is both enemy and friend, and ambiguous.

SRC: 苏青近年来尝试了很多不同类型的角色,从《那些年我们正年轻》中的陆若文到《延禧攻略》中的尔晴,都给观众留下深刻印象,演技受到认可。
HYP: Su Qing has tried many different types of roles in recent years, from Lu Ruowen in "We Are Young in Those Years" to Erqing in "Yanxi Raiders", all of which impressed the audience and were recognized for their acting skills.

SRC: 此次苏青与柳云龙是首次搭档,结巴警长搭配妩媚女警的设置,颇有看点与新意。
HYP: This time, Su Qing and Liu Yunlong were paired for the first time, and the setting of a stuttering sheriff paired with a charming policewoman was interesting and innovative.

SRC: 除了两位主角外,《胜算》中还有梁冠华、李立群、钱波、雷汉、申军谊等众多实力派演员加盟,老戏骨飙戏也是该剧看点之一。
HYP: In addition to the two main characters, Liang Guanhua, Li Liqun, Qian Bo, Lei Han, Shen Junyi, and many other powerful actors joined in "The Chance of Winning", and the old play "Bone Racing" is also one of the highlights of the play.

SRC: 据了解,《胜算》制作上也十分精良,剧组跨越江苏、浙江、辽宁3省近2000公里拍摄取景。
HYP: It is understood that "The Chance of Winning" is also very well produced, with the cast and crew shooting nearly 2000 kilometers across Jiangsu, Zhejiang, and Liaoning provinces.

SRC: 为了还原东北日据时期光怪陆离的城市风貌,剧组美工道具组日夜赶工,仔细打磨场景搭建及道具的每一个细节,令剧中场景画面精致,富有历史质感。
HYP: In order to restore the strange urban features of the Northeast during the Japanese period, the production team worked day and night to carefully polish every detail of the scene construction and props, so that the scenes in the play were exquisite and rich in historical texture.

SRC: 绿地开启新一轮混改上海国资拟转让17.5%股份-经济观察网－专业财经新闻网站
HYP: Greenfield Launches a New Round of Mixed Reform Shanghai State - owned Assets to Transfer 17.5% of Shares - Economic Observer - Professional Financial News Website

SRC: 经济观察网记者饶贤君7月26日，绿地控股（600606.SH）发布《关于国有股东拟通过公开征集受让方的方式协议转让公司部分股份暨复牌的提示性公告》。
HYP: On July 26, Greenfield Holdings (600606. SH) issued the Prompt Announcement on the Proposed Transfer of Part of the Company's Shares and Resumption of Trading by State - owned Shareholders through Public Call for Transferees.

SRC: 公告内容显示，为进一步深化国资国企改革，优化国资布局结构调整，完善绿地股权结构，上海地产（集团）有限公司（以下简称“上海地产”）及上海城投（集团）有限公司（以下简称“上海城投” ）拟通过公开征集受让方的方式协议转让所持有的公司部分股份，拟转让的股份比例合计不超过绿地总股本的17.5% 。
HYP: The announcement shows that in order to further deepen the reform of state - owned assets and state - owned enterprises, optimize the structural adjustment of the layout of state - owned assets, and improve the equity structure of Greenfield, Shanghai Real Estate (Group) Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai Real Estate ") and Shanghai City Investment (Group) Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as" Shanghai City Investment ") intend to transfer part of the company's shares by agreement through open solicitation of transferees, and the total proportion of shares to be transferred does not exceed 17.5% of the total share capital of Greenfield.

SRC: 本次拟转让股份的价格不低于下列两者之中的较高者：提示性公告日（2020 年7月27日）前30个交易日的每日加权平均价格的算术平均值；最近一个会计年度公司经审计的每股净资产值。
HYP: The price of the shares to be transferred shall not be lower than the higher of the following: the arithmetic average of the daily weighted average price for the 30 trading days preceding the indicative announcement date (July 27, 2020); and the audited net asset value per share of the company for the most recent fiscal year.

SRC: 目前，对绿地的新战略投资者仍无定论，按照公告公示信息估算，新战略投资者要拿下绿地此次混改中转让的17.5%股权需要支付约140亿元的资金。
HYP: At present, the new strategic investors in Greenfield are still inconclusive, and according to the information published in the announcement, the new strategic investors need to pay about 14 billion yuan to take the 17.5% equity transferred in the mixed reform of Greenfield.

SRC: 值得注意的是，本次股份转让完成后，预计绿地仍无控股股东及实际控制人，但控制权结构可能发生较大变化。
HYP: It is worth noting that after the completion of the share transfer, it is expected that Greenfield will still have no controlling shareholder or actual controller, but the control structure may change significantly.

SRC: 绿地控股自创立以来进行了多次体制机制改革：1992年-1997年，在纯国有体制下按照市场化规则运行；1997年-2013年，建立并不断完善国有控股、职工持股的股份制；2013年-2015年，引进战略投资者，形成国有及非公有资本交叉持股、相互融合的混合所有制；2015年至今，整体上市，成为公众公司。
HYP: Since its establishment, Greenfield Holdings has carried out many institutional reforms: from 1992 to 1997, it operated in accordance with market - oriented rules under a purely state - owned system; from 1997 to 2013, it established and continuously improved the shareholding system of state - owned holding and employee - owned shares; from 2013 to 2015, it introduced strategic investors to form a mixed ownership system of cross - shareholding and mutual integration of state - owned and non - public capital; and from 2015 to the present, it has been listed as a public company.

SRC: 绿地目前的混改方案与格力相似，2019年12月，高瓴资本领衔珠海明骏以416.62亿元接手格力电器（000651.SZ）15%股权，格力集团退居小股东，完成混改后，格力电器实施了高管激励计划、无实控人结构等现代化的企业管理方式。
HYP: Greenfield's current mixed reform plan is similar to that of Gree, and in December 2019, Zhuhai Mingjun, led by Gaolin Capital, took over 15% equity of Gree Electric Appliance (000651. SZ) for 41.662 billion yuan, and Gree Group retired as a minority shareholder, and after completing the mixed reform, Gree Electric Appliance implemented modern enterprise management methods such as executive incentive plan and no real controller structure.

SRC: 上海地产、上海城投均为上海市国资委全资持有的国资企业集团，绿地控股董事长、总裁张玉良表示，绿地此举是上海按照党中央要求，推进国资国企综合性改革、加速新一阶段国资国企改革的重要举措，充分显示了因地制宜、量体裁衣的改革新思路，通过给上市公司引入新的优秀战略股东，支持企业进一步提高市场化程度，提升经营管理自由度，加速改革活力全面释放。
HYP: Both Shanghai Real Estate and Shanghai City Investment are state - owned enterprise groups wholly owned by the State - owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission (SASAC) of Shanghai, and Zhang Yuliang, chairman and president of Greenfield Holdings, said that Greenfield's move is an important measure for Shanghai to promote the comprehensive reform of state - owned assets and state - owned enterprises and accelerate the reform of state - owned assets and state - owned enterprises in the new stage in accordance with the requirements of the CPC Central Committee, which fully demonstrates the new idea of reform tailored to local conditions, and by introducing new outstanding strategic shareholders to listed companies, it supports enterprises to further improve the degree of marketization, enhance the freedom of management, and accelerate the full release of reform vitality.

SRC: 刘德华刘青云能否“拆”出新火花-新华网
HYP: Can Andy Lau and Liu Qingyun "dismantle" a new spark - Xinhuanet

SRC: 《拆弹专家2》近日宣布将于12月24日上映,成为贺岁档首部定档的影片。
HYP: Bomb Disposal Expert 2 was recently announced to be released on December 24, making it the first film scheduled for the New Year's Eve season.

SRC: 第二部依然是邱礼涛导演,刘德华监制及主演,以全新的故事展开。
HYP: The second film is still directed by Qiu Litao, produced and starring Andy Lau, and opens with a brand new story.

SRC: 据悉,第二部中“核弹”元素的加入,也让此次拆弹专家面临的挑战更为艰难,预告里几个惊鸿一瞥的镜头,已令人心悬一线,大爆炸的蘑菇云,被火光吞没的机场,场面相当震撼。
HYP: It is reported that the addition of the "nuclear bomb" element in the second film has also made the challenge faced by bomb disposal experts even more difficult, and several glimpses in the preview have made the scene quite shocking, such as the mushroom cloud of the big explosion and the airport engulfed by fire.

SRC: 三年前,由原班人马制作出品的《拆弹专家》,斩获了当年的五一档票房冠军,并在香港电影金像奖拿下了7项提名,邱礼涛×刘德华也成为观众心目中的金牌搭档。
HYP: Three years ago, "The Bomb Disposal Expert", produced by the original cast, won the top five box office awards that year, and won seven nominations at the Hong Kong Film Awards, and Yau Lai Tao and Andy Lau also became the gold medal partner in the eyes of the audience.

SRC: 此次的《拆弹专家2》,也令人再次期待这对王牌组合能否擦出新火花。
HYP: This time, "Bomb Disposal Expert 2" also raises the prospect of a new spark between the ace duo.

SRC: 《拆弹专家2》讲述了全新的故事:前拆弹专家潘乘风(刘德华饰)晕倒在爆炸案现场,被警方列为嫌疑犯。
HYP: Bomb Disposal Expert 2 tells a new story: Pan Zhifeng (Andy Lau), a former bomb disposal expert, fainted at the scene of the bombing and was listed as a suspect by the police.

SRC: 《拆弹专家2》讲述了全新的故事:前拆弹专家潘乘风(刘德华<v>饰</v>)晕倒在爆炸案现场,被警方列为嫌疑犯。
HYP: Bomb Disposal Expert 2 tells a new story: Pan Zhifeng (Andy Lau), a former bomb disposal expert, fainted at the scene of the bombing and was listed as a suspect by the police.

SRC: 为了寻找真相,他不得不向同是拆弹专家的好友董卓文(刘青云<v>饰</v>)求助。
HYP: In order to find the truth, he has to ask his friend Dong Zhuowen (Liu Qingyun), who is also a bomb disposal expert, for help.

SRC: 急于破案的女督查,也同时是潘乘风前女友的庞玲(倪妮饰)也被卷入其中。
HYP: Pang Ling (Ni Ni), a female inspector who is eager to solve the case and is also Pan's ex - girlfriend, is also involved.

SRC: 急于破案的女督查,也同时是潘乘风前女友的庞玲(倪妮<v>饰</v>)也被卷入其中。
HYP: Pang Ling (Ni Ni), a female inspector who is eager to solve the case and is also Pan's ex - girlfriend, is also involved.

SRC: 依然是拆弹专家,但从定档预告中能感受到刘德华新角色的复杂:断了一条腿,戴上了义肢,一边被同是拆弹专家的刘青云追捕,一边又被前女友倪妮指挥行动。
HYP: He is still a bomb disposal expert, but the complexity of Andy Lau's new role can be felt in the preview: he broke a leg, put on a prosthetic limb, and was pursued by Liu Qingyun, who is also a bomb disposal expert, while being directed by his ex - girlfriend Ni Ni.

SRC: 三人究竟是怎样的关系,刘德华到底在香岛酒店做了什么,被牵扯到怎样的案件中,他拆弹专家的职业生涯又经历了哪些波折,种种谜团让人好奇不已。
HYP: What is the relationship between the three, what Andy Lau did at the Xiangdao Hotel, what kind of cases he was involved in, and what ups and downs his career as a bomb disposal expert has gone through, all kinds of mysteries make people curious.

SRC: 据了解,电影的重头戏都是实地取景香港的世界地标性建筑,加上顶尖的特效制作团队,带来震撼逼真的视觉冲击。
HYP: It is understood that the highlight of the film is the world landmark buildings in Hong Kong, which, together with the top - notch special effects production team, bring a shocking and realistic visual impact.

SRC: （记者聂青）
HYP: (Reporter Nie Qing)

SRC: 中新网7月26日电综合俄罗斯卫星网报道，7月26日是俄罗斯海军日，庆祝海军日的主要阅兵式在圣彼得堡和喀琅施塔得举行。
HYP: chinanews.com, July 26 Sputnik reported that July 26 was the Russian Navy Day, and the main military parades to celebrate Navy Day were held in St. Petersburg and Kronstadt.

SRC: 俄罗斯总统、俄联邦武装力量最高统帅普京抵达喀琅施塔得参加庆祝活动，该地15艘舰艇和潜艇接受了检阅。
HYP: Russian President and Commander - in - Chief of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation Vladimir Putin arrived in Kronstadt to participate in the celebration, where 15 ships and submarines were reviewed.

SRC: 当地时间2019年7月28日，俄罗斯圣彼得堡举行盛大阅兵式庆祝海军节。
HYP: On July 28, 2019, local time, a grand military parade was held in St. Petersburg, Russia, to celebrate Navy Day.

SRC: 据报道，普京向海军官兵祝贺海军日，并乘小艇在芬兰湾上从将要参加海上阅兵的舰艇旁边驶过，随后在主观礼台检阅受阅部队。
HYP: According to reports, Putin congratulated the naval officers and soldiers on Navy Day, and sailed by a dinghy in the Gulf of Finland next to the ships that will participate in the military parade at sea, and then reviewed the troops at the main viewing platform.

SRC: 普京表示，俄海军舰队列装了最新式的舰艇和特殊装备，装备水平不断提高。
HYP: Putin said that the Russian Navy fleet is equipped with the latest ships and special equipment, and that the level of equipment is constantly improving.

SRC: 普京在俄罗斯海军日的阅兵式上说：“俄罗斯海军舰队拥有配备了高精武器的军舰、战略潜水巡洋舰和多用途潜艇、最新式飞机等飞行器、独特的武器和特殊装备。”
HYP: "The Russian Navy fleet has warships equipped with high - precision weapons, strategic diving cruisers and multi - purpose submarines, the latest aircraft and other aircraft, unique weapons, and special equipment," Putin said at the military parade of the Russian Navy Day.

SRC: 当地时间6月24日，俄罗斯纪念卫国战争胜利75周年红场阅兵式举行。
HYP: On June 24 local time, Russia held a military parade in Red Square to commemorate the 75th anniversary of the victory in the Great Patriotic War.

SRC: 他还表示，俄海军舰队将靠数字化和有效防御手段来取得独特优势。
HYP: He also said that the Russian naval fleet will rely on digitization and effective defense means to achieve unique advantages.

SRC: 报道称，庆祝俄罗斯海军日的主要海军阅兵式在圣彼得堡和喀琅施塔得举行，共有46艘舰艇参加，包括“卡萨托诺夫上将”号护卫舰、“海军中将库拉科夫”号大型反潜舰，以及大型登陆舰、小型导弹舰、护卫舰、潜艇等。
HYP: According to the report, the main naval parade to celebrate the Russian Navy Day was held in St. Petersburg and Kronstadt, and a total of 46 ships participated, including the frigate Admiral Kasatonov and the large anti - submarine ship Vice Admiral Kulakov, as well as large landing ships, small missile ships, frigates, and submarines.

SRC: 其中，系列舰艇在圣彼得堡冬宫桥旁进行静态展示，其中最引人瞩目的是经过复制的18世纪初俄罗斯首艘战列舰“波尔塔瓦”号。
HYP: Among them, a series of ships were on static display next to the Hermitage Bridge in St. Petersburg, the most notable of which was the replica of the first Russian battleship "Poltava" in the early 18th century.

SRC: 为避免新冠病毒传播，今年海军阅兵式期间只有当地居民和特邀来宾能够进入喀琅施塔得。
HYP: To avoid the spread of the new coronavirus, only local residents and specially invited guests will be able to enter Kronstadt during this year's naval parade.

SRC: 每年7月最后一个星期日是俄罗斯海军日。
HYP: The Russian Navy Day is celebrated on the last Sunday of July every year.

SRC: 中新网重庆7月26日电(记者刘贤)重庆市发展和改革委员会26日发布消息称，该市截至目前已退捕渔民4404人，占全部涉及渔民的42.54% 。
HYP: chinanews.com, Chongqing, July 26 (Reporter Liu Xian) The Chongqing Development and Reform Commission announced on July 26 that the city has so far withdrawn 4404 fishermen, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.

SRC: 今年53岁的李代国接受中新网记者采访时说，爷爷辈就在龙溪河打鱼，自己11岁起就跟着父亲打鱼，摇着小船，沿着龙溪河前行，上到重庆梁平，下到长寿，每次一离开家就是十天半个月，靠打鱼维持家人生活。
HYP: This year, 53 - year - old Li Daiguo said in an interview with a reporter from China News Service that his grandfather had been fishing in the Longxi River, and that he had been fishing with his father since he was 11 years old, rocking a small boat, along the Longxi River, up to Liangping, Chongqing, and down to Longevity, and that every time he left his home for 10 days and a half months, he relied on fishing to support his family.

SRC: 但从1997年起，随着农村人口逐渐往场镇里涌，<v>高安场镇</v>里的居民越来越多，造成的环境污染也越来越严重。
HYP: However, since 1997, as the rural population has gradually poured into the town, there have been more and more residents in the town, resulting in more and more serious environmental pollution.

SRC: 龙溪河沿线修建了造纸厂、化工厂、养殖场，也污染河水。
HYP: Paper mills, chemical plants, and farms have been built along the Longxi River, which also pollutes the river.

SRC: 到2007年、2008年，龙溪河变成臭水沟。
HYP: By 2007 and 2008, the Longxi River had become a stinking ditch.

SRC: “捕上来的鱼鳞片都是黑的，剖开后里面也是黑的。”
HYP: "The fish scales caught are all black, and when cut open, they are also black inside."

SRC: 李代国说，河水污染后打鱼越来越困难。
HYP: Li Daiguo said that fishing is becoming more and more difficult after the river is polluted.

SRC: 当地开始下大力气治理龙溪河污染，包括清漂、巡河、水生资源管护等。
HYP: The local government has begun to make great efforts to control the pollution of the Longxi River, including clearing the river, patrolling the river, and managing aquatic resources.

SRC: 李代国也从渔民退捕转产，成为巡河队的一员，管<v>护</v>水生资源。
HYP: Li Daiguo also retired from fishing and converted to production, and became a member of the river patrol team to manage aquatic resources.

SRC: 李代国也从渔民退捕转产，成为巡河队的一员，管护水生资源。
HYP: Li Daiguo also retired from fishing and converted to production, and became a member of the river patrol team to manage aquatic resources.

SRC: 从2020年1月1日起，重庆市水生生物保护区以及主城区相关水域已实行全面禁捕。
HYP: From January 1, 2020, Chongqing Aquatic Biological Reserve and the relevant waters of the main urban areas have implemented a total ban on fishing.

SRC: 据重庆市发展改革委数据，截至目前，重庆市已累计退捕渔船3403艘、已签订退捕协议渔船4643艘，分别占三年总任务的63.3% 、 86.3% 。
HYP: According to the Chongqing Development and Reform Commission, up to now, Chongqing has withdrawn a total of 3403 fishing boats and signed a withdrawal agreement for 4643 fishing boats, accounting for 63.3% and 86.3% of the total three - year task, respectively.

SRC: 已退捕渔民4404人，占全部涉及渔民的42.54% 。
HYP: 4404 fishermen have been withdrawn, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.

SRC: 已退捕4404人中，实现就业4267人，占已退捕渔民的96.89% 。
HYP: Of the 4404 people who have retired, 4267 have achieved employment, accounting for 96.89% of the fishermen who have retired.

SRC: 养老保险保障覆盖2691人，占退捕渔民的61.10% 。
HYP: Pension insurance covers 2691 people, accounting for 61.10% of retired fishermen.

SRC: 下一步，重庆市将深入开展各专项整治行动，加快推进长江干流岸线利用项目清理整治，完成新一轮长江入河排污口普查并开展相应整治行动，基本完成“三磷” ( 指磷矿、磷化工和磷石膏库)整治任务、小水电清理整改工作，推进长江两岸造林绿化专项行动，强化绿色矿山建设，巩固长江干流非法码头、非法采砂专项整治成果，深入推进长江流域禁捕退捕工作。
HYP: In the next step, Chongqing will carry out in - depth special rectification actions, accelerate the clean - up and rectification of the shoreline utilization projects of the main stream of the Yangtze River, complete a new round of survey of sewage outlets entering the Yangtze River and carry out corresponding rectification actions, basically complete the rectification task of "three phosphorus" (referring to phosphate rock, phosphorus chemical industry, and phosphogypsum reservoirs), clean - up and rectification of small hydropower, promote the special action of afforestation and greening on both sides of the Yangtze River, strengthen the construction of green mines, consolidate the achievements of the special rectification of illegal wharves and illegal sand mining on the main stream of the Yangtze River, and further promote the prohibition and withdrawal of fishing in the Yangtze River basin.

SRC: 新华社香港7月25日电香港特区政府财经事务及库务局局长许正宇表示，香港的金融市场仍保持活跃、运作有序。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 25 - Xu Zhengyu, Secretary for Financial Services and the Treasury of the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, said that Hong Kong's financial market remains active and orderly.

SRC: 他对香港金融稳定及经济表示乐观。
HYP: He expressed optimism about Hong Kong's financial stability and economy.

SRC: 许正宇在香港驻多伦多经济贸易办事处及港加商会（加拿大总会）24日（多伦多时间）合办的网上研讨会上表示，香港因为“修例风波”和新冠肺炎疫情，经历着艰难的状况。
HYP: Xu Zhengyu said at a webinar jointly organized by the Hong Kong Economic and Trade Office in Toronto and the Hong Kong - Canada Chamber of Commerce (Canadian Federation) on the 24th (Toronto time) that Hong Kong is experiencing a difficult situation because of the "law storm" and the new coronavirus outbreak.

SRC: 港元汇价稳定并偏向强方兑换保证水平。
HYP: The exchange rate of the Hong Kong dollar is stable and favors the strong exchange guarantee level.

SRC: 银行体系没有明显的资金流出迹象，相反，自6月以来超过110亿<v>美元</v>资金流入。
HYP: There are no obvious signs of capital outflow from the banking system; on the contrary, more than $11 billion has flowed in since June.

SRC: 银行体系没有明显的资金流出迹象，相反，自6月以来超过110亿美元<v>资金</v>流入。
HYP: There are no obvious signs of capital outflow from the banking system; on the contrary, more than $11 billion has flowed in since June.

SRC: 银行的存款总额在过去几个月也持续增加，股票市场有一连串公开招股集资活动，市场成交屡见上升。
HYP: The total amount of bank deposits has also continued to increase in the past few months, and there have been a series of public offering fund - raising activities in the stock market, and market transactions have repeatedly increased.

SRC: 许正宇说，新冠肺炎疫情为全球经济及金融市场带来压力，但香港的基本优势仍然保持不变。
HYP: Xu Zhengyu said that the new coronavirus outbreak has put pressure on the global economy and financial markets, but Hong Kong's basic advantages remain unchanged.

SRC: 香港拥有的多项优势，包括地理、法治、高速通讯、资讯和资金自由流通以及简单低税制，使香港<v>持续</v>成为领先的国际金融中心。
HYP: Hong Kong's many advantages, including geography, the rule of law, high - speed communication, free circulation of information and capital, and a simple and low tax system, have made Hong Kong a leading international financial center.

SRC: 香港拥有的多项优势，包括地理、法治、高速通讯、资讯和资金自由流通以及简单低税制，使香港持续成为领先的国际金融中心。
HYP: Hong Kong's many advantages, including geography, the rule of law, high - speed communication, free circulation of information and capital, and a simple and low tax system, have made Hong Kong a leading international financial center.

SRC: 许正宇指出，特区政府在“防疫抗疫基金”预留60亿港元，未来两年在公营及私营界别创造约3万个有时限的职位，涵盖不同技能及学历人士。
HYP: Xu Zhengyu pointed out that the SAR Government has set aside HK $6 billion in the "Epidemic Prevention and Anti - Epidemic Fund" to create about 30000 time - bound jobs in the public and private sectors in the next two years, covering people with different skills and academic qualifications.

SRC: 为支持金融科技的发展，特区政府也已推出“千人计划”，资助本地金融科技公司、初创及其他有金融科技相关业务的企业，以创造1000个新职位，聘用本地人才及丰富香港的金融科技人才库。
HYP: To support the development of fintech, the SAR Government has also launched the "Thousand Talents Program" to support local fintech companies, start - ups, and other enterprises with fintech - related businesses to create 1000 new jobs, hire local talents, and enrich Hong Kong's fintech talent pool.

SRC: 展望未来，许正宇对香港的金融稳定及经济表示乐观。
HYP: Looking ahead, Xu Zhengyu expressed optimism about Hong Kong's financial stability and economy.

SRC: 他鼓励加拿大企业善用香港的优势及其作为国际金融中心、国际资产及财富管理中心以及全球离岸人民币业务枢纽的地位，在粤港澳大湾区及附近地区发展及投资。
HYP: He encouraged Canadian enterprises to make good use of Hong Kong's advantages and its position as an international financial center, an international asset and wealth management center, and a global offshore RMB business hub to develop and invest in the Guangdong - Hong Kong - Macao Greater Bay Area and nearby areas.

SRC: 《柳叶刀》刊文赞扬中国抗疫努力鼓励各国学习经验-中新网
HYP: The Lancet article praises China's anti - epidemic efforts and encourages countries to learn from their experiences - chinanews.com

SRC: 《柳叶刀》杂志25日刊文表示，中国作为一个拥有14亿人口，规模与欧洲或美国相似的国家，现阶段新冠疫情得到有效控制，而没有再出现大范围传播的情况，在很大程度上控制住了国内的疫情。
HYP: The Lancet magazine published an article on the 25th stating that China, as a country with a population of 1.4 billion and a size similar to that of Europe or the United States, has effectively controlled the new coronavirus outbreak at this stage, without widespread transmission, and has largely controlled the domestic epidemic.

SRC: 文章表示，在近十多年时间里，中国对国内研究和公共卫生建设方面进行了大量的投资，这使得中国对新冠的准备比当年严重急性呼吸道综合征(SARS)的准备要充分得多。
HYP: According to the article, over the past decade or so, China has invested heavily in domestic research and public health construction, which has made China much more prepared for the new coronavirus than it was for Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome (SARS).

SRC: 作者表示，2002年SARS暴发时，起初中国准备不足，尤其是病原体无法确定。
HYP: The authors say that when SARS broke out in 2002, China was initially ill - prepared, especially because the pathogen could not be determined.

SRC: 当2019年12月发现新冠病毒时，中国科学家很快就能够鉴定出病毒种类，并于2020年1月11日与国际共享了基因组测序数据。
HYP: When the new coronavirus was discovered in December 2019, Chinese scientists were quickly able to identify the virus species and shared the genome sequencing data with the international community on January 11, 2020.

SRC: 到1月底，来自中国大陆和香港的医生阐明了该病毒的临床特征，通过在《柳叶刀》上发表的研究论文，向世界警告了新冠病毒的威胁。
HYP: By the end of January, doctors from mainland China and Hong Kong had clarified the clinical characteristics of the virus and warned the world about the threat of the new coronavirus through research papers published in The Lancet.

SRC: 中国也一直处于疫苗研究的最前沿，在国家宣布紧急状态下，通过国内的紧密合作，这样的研究非常迅速而严格地展开，5月和7月，分别在《柳叶刀》上公布了中国开发的新冠疫苗早期试验取得进展的结果。
HYP: China has also been at the forefront of vaccine research, and under the state of emergency declared, such research was carried out very quickly and rigorously through close domestic cooperation, and the results of the early trials of the new coronavirus vaccine developed by China were published in The Lancet in May and July respectively.

SRC: 中国的经验表明，对国家卫生和研究体系进行投资，有效提高实验室能力是非常重要的。
HYP: China's experience shows that it is very important to invest in national health and research systems to effectively improve laboratory capacity.

SRC: 这是国家对卫生紧急情况和全球卫生安全做出快速有效反应的基础。
HYP: This is the basis for rapid and effective national responses to health emergencies and global health security.

SRC: 其他国家，特别是低收入和中等收入国家来说，非常值得借鉴和学习。
HYP: Other countries, especially low - and middle - income countries, are worth learning from.

SRC: 此外，中国的经验证明，在强大的研究基础上，必须有强有力的高层果断地凭借科学依据来作出正确决策，这才使得新冠疫情得到有效控制。
HYP: In addition, China's experience has proved that on the basis of strong research, it is necessary for powerful high - level officials to decisively make correct decisions based on scientific basis, so that the new coronavirus outbreak can be effectively controlled.

SRC: 文章强调，政府及其领导人必须尊重科学，理解科学的价值，并以对社会最有利的方式对其采取行动。
HYP: The article emphasizes that governments and their leaders must respect science, understand its value, and take action against it in a way that is most beneficial to society.

SRC: 在暴发初期，中国国家卫建委派出三组传染病专家前往武汉，调查新冠病毒的风险和传播，他们的建议为1月23日武汉“封城”的决定提供了依据；当有专家提出建设方舱医院必要性和紧迫性时，政府很快做出了决定并快速实施；同时，社区和群众的广泛参与，也使得疫情快速有效地被控制。
HYP: At the beginning of the outbreak, China's National Health and Construction Commission sent three groups of infectious disease experts to Wuhan to investigate the risk and spread of the new coronavirus, and their suggestions provided the basis for the decision to "seal the city" in Wuhan on January 23; when some experts suggested the necessity and urgency of building a cabin hospital, the government quickly made the decision and quickly implemented it; at the same time, the extensive participation of the community and the masses also enabled the epidemic to be controlled quickly and effectively.

SRC: 文章最后强调，应对全球性的卫生紧急情况，各国需要加强全球合作，联合应对。
HYP: Finally, the article emphasizes that to deal with global health emergencies, countries need to strengthen global cooperation and jointly respond to them.

SRC: 总台记者杨洪
HYP: Yang Hong, Chief Taiwan Reporter

SRC: 当地时间25日下午，一架小型飞机在德国北威州韦瑟尔县撞上一座多层住宅楼的顶层，事故共造成三人死亡。
HYP: On the afternoon of the 25th local time, a small plane crashed into the top floor of a multi - story residential building in Wethel County, North Rhine - Westphalia, Germany, killing a total of three people.

SRC: 杜伊斯堡检方、韦瑟尔县警察局和韦瑟尔市消防部门当天晚间联合发布声明称，当天14时40分左右，一架两座小型飞机撞上位于韦瑟尔县辉柏斯坎普街一栋多层住宅楼顶层阁楼的住宅，造成三人丧生。
HYP: The Duisburg prosecution, the Weatherall County Police Department, and the Weatherall City Fire Department jointly issued a statement in the evening of the same day, saying that at around 14:40 that day, a small two - seater plane crashed into a home in the attic of a multi - story residential building on Weatherall Street, killing three people.

SRC: 其当天从北威州鲁尔区马尔市起飞，在韦瑟尔县的机场中途停靠后再度起飞，随后撞上住宅楼。
HYP: It took off from the city of Marr in the Ruhr region of North Rhine - Westphalia on the same day, stopped at the airport in Wethel County, and then took off again, before crashing into a residential building.

SRC: 死者身份或为遭撞击住宅内的一名女性住户和小型飞机上两名乘客。
HYP: The deceased may be a female occupant of the house that was hit and two passengers on the small plane.

SRC: 房内一名两岁儿童仅受轻伤，被平安救出。
HYP: A two - year - old child in the room was only slightly injured and was safely rescued.

SRC: 房内其余住户未在事故中受伤，但情绪仍未平复。
HYP: The rest of the occupants of the house were not injured in the accident, but their mood remained calm.

SRC: 德新社报道的现场画面显示，遭遇事故的住宅一度冒出滚滚浓烟，消防队员扑灭火情后可见房屋损毁严重。
HYP: Footage from the scene reported by the German news agency DPA showed smoke billowing from the house where the accident occurred, and after firefighters put out the fire, the house was severely damaged.

SRC: 目前，飞机失事原因尚不明确。
HYP: At present, the cause of the crash is not clear.

SRC: 《莱茵邮报》援引警方说法报道称，有线索表明，飞机或在撞上住宅楼前就已解体。
HYP: Citing the police, the Rheinische Post reported that there were clues that the plane may have disintegrated before it hit a residential building.

SRC: 警方表示，在事故现场一带发现了失事飞机的多块零部件。
HYP: The police said that several parts of the crashed plane were found in the area around the scene of the accident.

SRC: 德国刑警正与杜伊斯堡检方、德国联邦航空事故调查局共同调查导致这一事故的原因。
HYP: The German criminal police, together with the Duisburg prosecution and the German Federal Aviation Accident Investigation Bureau, are investigating the cause of the accident.

SRC: 记者当天从中国驻杜塞尔多夫总领事馆了解到，该馆与当地警局及消防部门取得联系，据现场判断，伤亡人员中无中国公民。
HYP: The reporter learned from the Chinese Consulate General in Dusseldorf on the same day that the museum contacted the local police station and fire department, and judging from the scene, there were no Chinese citizens among the casualties.

SRC: 大鹏导演《吉祥如意》入围金爵奖-新华网
HYP: Director Dapeng's "Good luck" shortlisted for Golden Goblet Award - Xinhuanet

SRC: 7月18日，第二十三届上海国际电影节公布了金爵奖官方入选影片名单。
HYP: On July 18, the 23rd Shanghai International Film Festival announced the official list of films selected for the Golden Goblet Award.

SRC: 大鹏导演的首部现实题材影片《吉祥如意》，成功入围本届上影节金爵奖，同时影片官方发布了首款海报。
HYP: The first realistic film directed by Dapeng, "Good luck", was shortlisted for the Golden Goblet Award at the Shanghai Film Festival, and the film officially released its first poster.

SRC: 海报片方供图
HYP: Photo of the poster

SRC: 影片《吉祥如意》是大鹏导演的第一部现实题材作品，也是他与金爵奖的二度结缘。
HYP: The film "Good luck" is director Dapeng's first realistic - themed work, and it is also his second bond with the Golden Goblet Award.

SRC: 该片讲述了这样一个故事：一位喜剧片导演突发奇想，回到东北农村老家，希望将一家人如何过年拍成一部文艺电影，结果遭遇一系列意外。
HYP: The film tells the story of a comedy film director who, on a whim, returned to his hometown in rural Northeast China, hoping to make a literary film about his family's New Year, only to encounter a series of accidents.

SRC: 因拍电影而聚齐的家庭成员们，完成了最后的聚会。
HYP: The family members, who had gathered for the film, completed the final party.

SRC: 在今日发布的电影海报中，这个家庭中的一员— — “三舅”王吉祥坐在画面中央抽着烟，背景是披上银装的东北黑土地，前景是中国人逢年过节必挂的红灯笼。
HYP: In the movie poster released today, one of the family members, "Uncle Three" Wang Jiang, sits in the center of the picture smoking a cigarette, with the black land of Northeast China covered in silver in the background, and the red lantern that Chinese people must hang during the Chinese New Year holidays in the foreground.

SRC: 象征着喜庆、团圆的红灯笼与身影落寞的王吉祥形成了巨大反差，似乎也透露了这个大家庭关系中的复杂与纠结。
HYP: The red lantern, which symbolizes festive and reunion, is in great contrast to the lonely figure of Wang Jiang, and seems to reveal the complexity and tangle of this big family relationship.

SRC: 据悉，影片中，除了“三舅”王吉祥的女儿由演员刘陆扮演，其余戏份均由真实的导演家人完成，影片实验性的视听风格，打破了戏剧与真实的边界，带给观众全新的浸入式观影体验。
HYP: It is reported that in the film, except for the daughter of "Uncle Three" Wang Jiang, who is played by actor Liu Lu, the rest of the scenes are done by the real director's family, and the film's experimental audio - visual style breaks the boundary between drama and reality, bringing the audience a new immersive viewing experience.

SRC: 据导演大鹏介绍，《吉祥如意》的创作源自“一场天意” ， 拍摄期间家庭突如其来的一系列变故，让原本的拍摄计划不得不随之改变，没有剧本的生活最终被记录成电影，却释放出超越设计的张力。
HYP: According to director Dapeng, the creation of "Good luck" originated from "a providence", and a series of sudden family changes during filming forced the original shooting plan to be changed, and life without a script was eventually recorded as a film, but it released tension beyond the design.

SRC: 导演大鹏究竟如何面对这场“天意” ， 又该如何继续迎接这场天意带来的种种改变呢？
HYP: How does director Dapeng face this "providence", and how should he continue to meet the changes brought about by this providence?

SRC: 毫无疑问《吉祥如意》是充满实验性的，几乎全素人的阵容和创新的视听风格将镜头前的生活变成了一部电影，在真实影像的包裹下，观众也会从影片所呈现的家庭中找到自己和家人的影子，随着影片中这场家庭聚会的落幕，唤起一系列思考。
HYP: There is no doubt that "Good luck" is experimental, and the almost all - vegetarian lineup and innovative audio - visual style turn the life in front of the camera into a film, and wrapped in real images, the audience will also find the shadow of themselves and their families in the family presented in the film, and as the family party in the film comes to an end, it evokes a series of thoughts.

SRC: NEWS.GOV.MO: 新型冠状病毒感染应变协调中心查询热线统计数字(7月25日08H00-7月26日08H00)
HYP: NEWS.GOV.MO: Novel Coronavirus Infection Response Coordination Center Enquiry Hotline Statistics (July 25 08H00 - July 26 08H00)

SRC: 由2020年07月25日08H00 至7月26日08H00，新型冠状病毒感染应变协调中心的查询热线共接获292宗电话查询。
HYP: From 08H00 on 25 July to 08H00 on 26 July 2020, 292 telephone inquiries were received by the inquiry hotline of the Novel Coronavirus Infection Response Coordination Center.

SRC: 关于疫情的291宗查询，已即时转线至相关部门代表跟进，情况如下：
HYP: 291 inquiries about the epidemic have been immediately forwarded to representatives of relevant departments for follow - up, as follows:

SRC: 卫生局271宗(涉及：查询关于隔离；查询核酸检测；查询两地牌；健康码；其他。）
HYP: 271 cases from the Health Bureau (related to: Enquire about isolation; Enquire about nucleic acid testing; Enquire about two - place cards; Health codes; Others).

SRC: 治安警察局17宗(涉及：查询出入境措施；查询粤澳两地牌车辆出入境措施；查询珠海政务热线；查询证件逗留问题。）
HYP: 17 cases from the Public Security Police (related to: Enquire about entry and exit measures; Enquire about entry and exit measures for vehicles licensed in Guangdong and Macao; Enquire about the Zhuhai Government Hotline; Enquire about the stay of documents).

SRC: 旅游局1宗(涉及：查询隔离酒店问题。）
HYP: 1 case from MGTO (related to inquiries about quarantine hotels).

SRC: 教育暨青年局1宗(涉及：查询澳门学生返回英国读书的方法。）
HYP: 1 case from the Education and Youth Bureau (related to: Enquire about ways for Macao students to return to study in the UK).

SRC: 海事及水务局1宗(涉及：询问香港渔船进港是否需要向海事及水务局申报及核酸检测相关事宜。）
HYP: 1 case from the Maritime and Water Bureau (related to asking whether Hong Kong fishing boats need to declare to the Maritime and Water Bureau and nucleic acid testing related matters when entering Hong Kong).

SRC: 马里尼切夫说，价值的变化受卢布贬值和疫情等影响。
HYP: Marinichev said that the change in value was affected by the devaluation of the ruble and the epidemic.

SRC: 他说“服务成本正在增加。
HYP: He said, "The cost of services is increasing.
