SRC: 由于疫情，人们开始在互联网上花费更多的时间。”
HYP: Due to the pandemic, people are beginning to spend more time on the Internet. "

SRC: 马里尼切夫不排除年互联网价格将严重上涨，认为运营商可以为客户提供更高的速度和更多服务抵消人们对价格上涨的不满。
HYP: Marinichev does not rule out a serious increase in annual Internet prices, and believes that operators can provide customers with higher speeds and more services to offset people's dissatisfaction with price increases.

SRC: 《中国医生》筹拍致敬抗疫英雄-新华网
HYP: "Chinese Doctor" Pays Tribute to Anti - Epidemic Heroes - Xinhuanet

SRC: 近日，带着中国电影人对抗疫英雄的敬意，博纳影业集团董事长于冬、导演刘伟强(图左）在广州与钟南山院士，就抗疫题材影片《中国医生》的拍摄制作工作进行了座谈交流。
HYP: Recently, with the respect of Chinese filmmakers fighting the epidemic, Yu Dong, the chairman of Bona Film Group, and Liu Weiqiang, the director (pictured left), had a discussion and exchange with academician Zhong Nanshan in Guangzhou on the filming and production of the anti - epidemic film "The Chinese Doctor".

SRC: 博纳影业希望能借由《中国医生》，向所有战斗在疫情防控一线的医护、防疫工作者致敬！
HYP: Through "The Chinese Doctor", Bona Pictures hopes to pay tribute to all medical and epidemic prevention workers who are fighting in the front line of epidemic prevention and control!

SRC: 2021年，该片将作为庆祝中国共产党建党100周年献礼影片全国公映。
HYP: In 2021, the film will be released nationwide as a tribute film to celebrate the 100th anniversary of the founding of the Communist Party of China.

SRC: 目前，博纳影业正在中宣部和国家电影局的安排部署下，广东省电影局及湖北省电影局的支持下，组织电影《中国机长》原班人马筹拍电影《中国医生》，这是一部反映在党中央的坚强领导下，全国人民团结一心抗击新冠肺炎疫情的影片。
HYP: At present, under the arrangement and deployment of the Propaganda Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and the State Film Administration, and with the support of the Guangdong Provincial Film Bureau and the Hubei Provincial Film Bureau, Bona Pictures has organized the original cast of the film "Captain China" to prepare the film "The Chinese Doctor", which reflects the strong leadership of the CPC Central Committee and the unity of the people of the whole country to fight the new coronavirus outbreak.

SRC: 影片聚焦武汉抗疫一线，将以武汉医护人员及各省市援鄂医疗队为人物背景，从人性的角度，运用独特的叙事，以及极具冲击力的镜头语言，全景展现抗疫一线充满奉献和牺牲精神的中国医护人员的感人故事。
HYP: Focusing on the front line of the fight against the epidemic in Wuhan, the film will take the medical staff of Wuhan and the medical teams of provinces and cities in Hubei as the background, and from the perspective of human nature, the film will use a unique narrative, as well as an impactful lens language, to show the moving stories of the Chinese medical staff who are full of dedication and sacrifice in the front line of the fight against the epidemic.

SRC: 据了解，武汉解封之日的第一时间，博纳公司便克服重重困难，派出采拍小组深入疫情一线，与数百位医护工作者面对面交流了解、搜集资料，目前已经采访到了包括钟南山院士本人、广州驰援武汉第一人、广东援鄂医疗队，以及武汉金银潭医院、武汉协和医院、武汉大学中南医院、武汉中心医院等抗疫战线最前沿的白衣天使们，拍下了大量珍贵的第一手视频资料。
HYP: It is understood that as soon as Wuhan was unsealed, Bona overcame many difficulties and sent a team of photographers to go deep into the front line of the epidemic to meet hundreds of medical workers face - to - face to understand and collect information, and so far has interviewed academician Zhong Nanshan himself, the first person from Guangzhou to help Wuhan, the Guangdong medical team to help Hubei, as well as white - clad angels at the forefront of the anti - epidemic front, such as Wuhan Jintan Hospital, Wuhan Union Hospital, Wuhan University Zhongnan Hospital, and Wuhan Central Hospital, and captured a large number of precious first - hand video materials.

SRC: 钟南山院士在此次座谈会中亦对电影的拍摄提出了期待和希望：“ 我很期待，希望你们不仅要走访一些抛头露面比较多的专家，还要更多地采访在一线埋头苦干的医务人员，他们是大多数。”
HYP: Academician Zhong Nanshan also raised expectations and hopes for the filming of the film during the symposium: "I look forward to it, and I hope that you will not only visit some experts who have made a lot of appearances, but also interview more medical staff who are working hard on the front line, and they are the majority."

SRC: 他表示，他之前看过《我和我的祖国》《中国机长》，认为以普通人视角讲述大格局故事的方法就很好。
HYP: He said that he had seen "Me and My Motherland" and "Captain China" before, and thought it was a good way to tell the story of the big pattern from the perspective of ordinary people.

SRC: “现在一些国外朋友对中国还是有一些误解。”
HYP: "Now some foreign friends still have some misunderstandings about China," he said.

SRC: 在谈到影片的传播时，钟南山院士表示，目前国外有些人喜欢将病毒贴上政治化标签，他希望电影能从人性的角度打动观众：“ 这部电影除了在中国放映以外，最好也能在国外放映，要用国内外观众都能理解的方式，用真正的人文精神打动观众。”
HYP: When talking about the spread of the film, academician Zhong Nanshan said that at present, some people in foreign countries like to label the virus as politicized, and he hoped that the film would impress the audience from the perspective of human nature: "In addition to being shown in China, this film should also be shown abroad, and should impress the audience with true humanistic spirit in a way that both domestic and foreign audiences can understand."

SRC: 钟南山院士还深情回忆了上世纪80年代的影片《人到中年》，“这么多年过去了，我对改革开放后电影印象最深的还是《人到中年》，当时我国外的医生朋友们都看哭了，如果《中国医生》能够起到这样的作用，那就很了不起了。”
HYP: Academician Zhong Nanshan also fondly recalled the film "Man to Middle Age" from the 1980s, "After so many years, I was most impressed by the film" Man to Middle Age "after the reform and opening up, and at that time, my foreign doctor friends all watched and cried, and if" The Chinese Doctor "could play such a role, it would be great."

SRC: 钟南山院士表示，如果《中国医生》能引起国外观众的共鸣，那就非常成功。
HYP: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that if "The Chinese Doctor" can resonate with foreign audiences, it will be very successful.

SRC: 在座谈交流时，钟南山院士还分享了对当前国际疫情防控的意见和建议，“ 我相信人永远比病毒聪明。”
HYP: During the discussion and exchange, academician Zhong Nanshan also shared his opinions and suggestions on the current international epidemic prevention and control, "I believe that people will always be smarter than viruses."

SRC: 钟南山院士表示，虽说病毒难以预测，但从原始社会至今，人类已渡过了千难万险，如今现代社会有发达的医疗科技和社会管理措施，再加上全世界的医务人员、甚至老百姓都对科学应对新冠肺炎疫情有了基本认识，人们不会再像以前那么被动，“接下来要注意两个方面的工作，一是要研究全世界怎么加强合作，二是注重对人们心灵的抚慰” 。
HYP: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that although the virus is difficult to predict, human beings have weathered thousands of difficulties and dangers since primitive society, and that today's modern society has developed medical technology and social management measures, coupled with the fact that medical staff and even ordinary people all over the world have a basic understanding of the scientific response to the new coronavirus outbreak, people will no longer be as passive as before, "Next, we should pay attention to two aspects of work, one is to study how the world can strengthen cooperation, and the other is to pay attention to soothing people's hearts".

SRC: （记者王金跃）
HYP: (Reporter Wang Jinyue)

SRC: 文旅“红果”聚韶山—湘潭首届红博会见闻-今日要闻-湖南日报网-华声在线
HYP: Cultural Tourism "Red Fruit" Gathers in Shaoshan - The First Red Fair in Xiangtan - Today's News - Hunan Daily Online - Huasheng Online

SRC: 湖南日报·新湖南客户端记者蒋睿通讯员肖燕
HYP: Hunan Daily New Hunan Client Reporter Jiang Rui Correspondent Xiao Yan

SRC: 嘉兴红船模具、韶山毛泽东铜像、延安布堆花工艺品、湘西永顺腊肉…… 7月25日，2020湖南红色旅游文化节在韶山开幕。
HYP: Jiaxing Red Boat Mold, Shaoshan Bronze Statue of Mao Zedong, Yan'an Fabric Flower Crafts, Yongshun Bacon in Western Hunan... On July 25, the 2020 Hunan Red Tourism and Culture Festival opened in Shaoshan.

SRC: 作为主体活动之一，湘潭首届红色文化产业博览会在韶山全域旅游咨询集散中心开展。
HYP: As one of the main activities, the first Red Cultural Industry Expo in Xiangtan was held at the Shaoshan Tourism Consulting and Distribution Center.

SRC: 展览区红色文创产品、革命老区土特产品等琳琅满目，引来各地游客争相购买。
HYP: The exhibition area is full of red cultural and creative products, as well as local products from the old revolutionary areas, attracting tourists from all over the world to buy them.

SRC: “此次红博会，既是全国红色文化产业成果的一次展示，也是参展单位和企业交流经验、探讨发展路径的一个重要平台。”
HYP: "This Red Expo is not only a display of the achievements of the national red culture industry, but also an important platform for exhibitors and enterprises to exchange experiences and discuss development paths."

SRC: 湘潭首届红博会执委会相关负责人介绍，这届红博会以“弘扬红色文化助推文旅升温”为主题，展览总面积近3000平方米，设置了氛围营造区、景区展示展陈区和红色文旅网游网购体验区。
HYP: According to the relevant person in charge of the Executive Committee of the First Red Fair in Xiangtan, with the theme of "Promoting Red Culture and Boosting the Rise of Cultural Tourism", the total exhibition area of the fair is nearly 3000 square meters, and an atmosphere - building area, an exhibition area for scenic spots, and an online shopping experience area for Red Cultural Tourism were set up.

SRC: 邀请浙江嘉兴、贵州遵义、陕西延安等8个外省地市以及我省长沙、株洲、岳阳、郴州等地137家企业、单位参展，共展出展品768种，包括红色文物、工艺品、食品特产、旅游线路、红色培训课程、红色文创产品等。
HYP: 137 enterprises and units from eight other provinces, including Jiaxing in Zhejiang Province, Zunyi in Guizhou Province, and Yan'an in Shaanxi Province, as well as Changsha, Zhuzhou, Yueyang, Chenzhou and other places in our province, were invited to participate in the exhibition, exhibiting a total of 768 kinds of exhibits, including red cultural relics, handicrafts, food specialties, tourist routes, red training courses, and red cultural and creative products.

SRC: 展销区将展至7月29日。
HYP: The exhibition and sales area will be on display until July 29.

SRC: 作为红博会东道主，湘潭展区亮点纷呈。
HYP: As the host of the Red Expo, the Xiangtan exhibition area is full of highlights.

SRC: 展区负责人介绍，湘潭展区分为红色工业、红色文化产业发展两大部分。
HYP: According to the person in charge of the exhibition area, the Xiangtan exhibition area is divided into two parts: the red industry and the development of the red cultural industry.

SRC: 红色工业展区展出华菱湘钢、华菱线缆、湘电动力等6家企业的展品31件，红色文化产业发展展区展出红色系列图书、红色系列食品、红色系列文创产品等27家单位产品近200个。
HYP: The Red Industry Exhibition Area displays 31 exhibits from 6 enterprises, including Valin Xianggang, Valin Cable, and Xiangdian Power, and the Red Cultural Industry Development Exhibition Area displays nearly 200 products from 27 units, including the Red Series of Books, the Red Series of Food, and the Red Series of Cultural and Creative Products.

SRC: 在延安展区，不少游客被陈展的布堆花手工艺品和剪纸艺术品所吸引。
HYP: In the Yan'an exhibition area, many tourists were attracted by the cloth and flower handicrafts and paper - cutting works of art exhibited by Chen.

SRC: 延安市文旅局局长马东坡介绍，此次参展精心选择了延安近两年来优秀的红色文创产品，其中16种产品是2019全国红色文创产品优秀作品。
HYP: Ma Dongpo, Director of the Yan'an Cultural and Tourism Bureau, said that the exhibition carefully selected the outstanding red cultural and creative products of Yan'an in the past two years, of which 16 products are the outstanding works of the 2019 national red cultural and creative products.

SRC: 同时，他们邀请了国家级非物质文化遗产保护项目“安塞剪纸”、“陕北民歌”与省级非遗项目延川布堆画传承人，重点推介延安民俗特色产品，并借此机会与其他展区单位企业沟通交流，推动跨区域合作。
HYP: At the same time, they invited the inheritors of the national intangible cultural heritage protection projects "Anse Paper - cutting" and "Northern Shaanxi Folk Song", as well as the provincial intangible cultural heritage project Yanchuan cloth pile painting, to focus on promoting the special products of Yan'an folk customs, and to take this opportunity to communicate with other units and enterprises in the exhibition area to promote cross - regional cooperation.

SRC: 膜分离技术助力破解“温室效应” - 中新网
HYP: Membrane Separation Technology Helps Solve the "Greenhouse Effect" - chinanews.com

SRC: 膜分离技术助力破解“温室效应”
HYP: Membrane Separation Technology Helps Solve the "Greenhouse Effect"

SRC: 新型混合基质膜制备技术示意图
HYP: Schematic diagram of a new hybrid matrix membrane preparation technology

SRC: 本报讯记者商瑞报道：日前，天津大学大气环境与生物能源团队针对“膜分离法捕集二氧化碳”取得重大进展，成功研发出新型混合基质膜制备技术，大幅提升膜材料二氧化碳捕集性能。
HYP: Our reporter Shang Rui reported: Recently, the atmospheric environment and bioenergy team of Tianjin University has made significant progress in "membrane separation to capture carbon dioxide", and has successfully developed a new hybrid matrix membrane preparation technology to greatly improve the carbon dioxide capture performance of membrane materials.

SRC: 相关成果已作为国际期刊《温室气体：科学与技术》封面文章发表。
HYP: The results have been published as the cover article of the international journal Greenhouse Gases: Science and Technology.

SRC: “温室效应”是困扰人类发展的重大环境问题，二氧化碳排放则是造成“温室效应”的<v>元凶</v>。
HYP: The "greenhouse effect" is a major environmental problem plaguing human development, and carbon dioxide emissions are responsible for the "greenhouse effect".

SRC: 如何高效捕获并利用人类排放的二氧化碳是科学家关注的焦点。
HYP: How to efficiently capture and utilize the carbon dioxide emitted by humans is the focus of scientists' attention.

SRC: “膜分离法”是一种新兴的二氧化碳捕集技术，它在膜材料帮助下分离二氧化碳气体，具有高效节能、操作简单的特点。
HYP: "Membrane Separation" is an emerging carbon dioxide capture technology, which separates carbon dioxide gas with the help of membrane materials, and has the characteristics of high efficiency, energy saving, and simple operation.

SRC: 如何让膜材料“深呼吸”， 提高气体分离效率，是采用膜分离法捕集二氧化碳的瓶颈难点。
HYP: How to make the membrane material "breathe deeply" and improve the efficiency of gas separation is the bottleneck and difficulty in capturing carbon dioxide by membrane separation.

SRC: 天津大学科研团队创新思路，通过反复实验，探究不同溶剂对膜气体分离性能的影响。
HYP: The research team of Tianjin University innovated and explored the influence of different solvents on membrane gas separation performance through repeated experiments.

SRC: 实验结果表明，以N-甲基吡咯烷酮作为制备溶剂，<v>生成</v>的膜材料中碳纳米管分布更加均匀，“更透气”，有效提升了膜材料气体分离效能和速率。
HYP: The experimental results show that with N - methylpyrrolidone as the preparation solvent, the carbon nanotubes in the membrane material are more evenly distributed and "more breathable", which effectively improves the gas separation efficiency and rate of the membrane material.

SRC: 实验结果表明，以N-甲基吡咯烷酮作为制备溶剂，生成的膜材料中碳纳米管分布更加均匀，“更透气”，有效提升了膜材料气体分离效能和速率。
HYP: The experimental results show that with N - methylpyrrolidone as the preparation solvent, the carbon nanotubes in the membrane material are more evenly distributed and "more breathable", which effectively improves the gas separation efficiency and rate of the membrane material.

SRC: 用这种新技术制备的混合基质膜，二氧化碳分离性能接近目前此类膜材料的理论分离上限。
HYP: The carbon dioxide separation performance of mixed matrix membranes prepared with this new technology is close to the theoretical upper limit of such membrane materials at present.

SRC: “新技术为膜分离法捕集二氧化碳提供了新思路。”
HYP: "The new technology provides a new idea for the capture of carbon dioxide by membrane separation."

SRC: 天津大学大气环境与生物能源团队成员李润表示：“ 我们希望这种技术能够为未来燃煤电厂与化工企业处理烟气提供有力支持，在控制温室气体排放等领域发挥重大作用。”
HYP: Li Run, a member of the atmospheric environment and bioenergy team at Tianjin University, said, "We hope that this technology will provide strong support for coal - fired power plants and chemical enterprises to treat flue gas in the future, and will play a significant role in controlling greenhouse gas emissions and other fields."

SRC: 首度成立专委会、集体签“长约” 第三届进博会参展商联盟构筑“进博纽带” - 新华网
HYP: For the first time, a special committee was set up to collectively sign a "long contract" for the third CIIE exhibitor alliance to build a "CIIE bond" - Xinhuanet

SRC: 7月26日在上海拍摄的第三届进博会参展商联盟第一次会议现场。
HYP: The first meeting of the 3rd CIIE Exhibitor Alliance was filmed in Shanghai on July 26.

SRC: 新华社上海7月26日电（记者周蕊）26日，第三届进口博览会参展商联盟在此间首次成立专业委员会，首批成立的专委会包括公共卫生防疫专委会和乳业专委会，35家成员企业还签订了3年长期参展合作备忘录，进博会参展商联盟的纽带作用不断增强。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Shanghai, July 26 (Reporter Zhou Rui) - On July 26, the Exhibitor Alliance of the 3rd Import Expo set up a professional committee here for the first time, and the first batch of special committees were established, including the Public Health and Epidemic Prevention Committee and the Dairy Industry Committee, and 35 member enterprises also signed a three - year long - term cooperation memorandum, and the CIIE Exhibitor Alliance continues to strengthen its role as a link.

SRC: 26日在此间举行的第三届进博会参展商联盟第一次会议上，韩国现代、美国陶氏化学、日本资生堂、新西兰纽仕兰、德国西门子、法国米其林、英国阿斯利康等一批展盟成员企业签订了3年长期参展合作备忘录，修订和完善后的展盟章程也首次公布。
HYP: At the first meeting of the 3rd CIIE Exhibitor Alliance held here on the 26th, a number of CIIE member enterprises, including Hyundai of South Korea, Dow Chemical of the United States, Shiseido of Japan, Newshland of New Zealand, Siemens of Germany, Michelin of France, and AstraZeneca of the United Kingdom, signed a three - year long - term cooperation memorandum, and the revised and improved constitution of the CIIE was also published for the first time.

SRC: 7月26日在上海拍摄的乳业专业委员会成立仪式现场。
HYP: The establishment ceremony of the Dairy Industry Professional Committee was filmed in Shanghai on July 26.

SRC: 7月26日在上海拍摄的乳业专业委员会成立仪式<v>现场</v>。
HYP: The establishment ceremony of the Dairy Industry Professional Committee was filmed in Shanghai on July 26.

SRC: 根据最新的章程，展盟将引入牵头单位轮值机制，加强专委会功能。
HYP: According to the latest constitution, the Alliance will introduce the rotating mechanism of the lead unit to strengthen the function of the special committee.

SRC: 专委会将为行业发展趋势分析提出建议，推动行业可持续发展。
HYP: The special committee will make suggestions for the analysis of industry development trends and promote the sustainable development of the industry.

SRC: 同时，整合行业全产业链资源，<v>以大带小</v>，带动关联企业参展，将进博会打造成为行业企业聚集高地。
HYP: At the same time, the CIIE will integrate the resources of the entire industrial chain of the industry, drive related enterprises to participate in the exhibition, and build the CIIE into a gathering place for industry enterprises.

SRC: 同时，整合行业全产业链资源，以大带小，带动关联企业参展，将进博会打造成为行业企业聚集高地。
HYP: At the same time, the CIIE will integrate the resources of the entire industrial chain of the industry, drive related enterprises to participate in the exhibition, and build the CIIE into a gathering place for industry enterprises.

SRC: 首次成立公共卫生防疫专委会，对于当前抗击新冠肺炎疫情来说显得尤为重要。
HYP: The establishment of a special committee on public health and epidemic prevention for the first time is particularly important for the current fight against the new coronavirus outbreak.

SRC: 作为第三届进博会公共卫生防疫专委会副会长<v>单位</v>，雅培快速诊断业务大中华区总经理仇建平说，下一步，雅培会携手更多行业伙伴，探索新的解决方案和合作模式，助力中国以及全世界抗击新冠肺炎疫情。
HYP: Qiu Jianping, General Manager of Abbott Rapid Diagnostics Greater China, as the Vice President of the Public Health and Epidemic Prevention Committee of the 3rd CIIE, said that in the next step, Abbott will work with more industry partners to explore new solutions and cooperation models to help China and the world fight the new coronavirus outbreak.

SRC: 作为第三届进博会公共卫生防疫专委会副会长单位，雅培快速诊断业务大中华区总经理仇建平说，下一步，雅培会携手更多行业伙伴，探索新的解决方案和合作模式，助力中国以及全世界抗击新冠肺炎疫情。
HYP: Qiu Jianping, General Manager of Abbott Rapid Diagnostics Greater China, as the Vice President of the Public Health and Epidemic Prevention Committee of the 3rd CIIE, said that in the next step, Abbott will work with more industry partners to explore new solutions and cooperation models to help China and the world fight the new coronavirus outbreak.

SRC: 7月26日在上海拍摄的公共卫生防疫专业委员会成立仪式现场。
HYP: The establishment ceremony of the Public Health and Epidemic Prevention Professional Committee was filmed in Shanghai on July 26.

SRC: 7月26日在上海拍摄的公共卫生防疫专业委员会成立仪式<v>现场</v>。
HYP: The establishment ceremony of the Public Health and Epidemic Prevention Professional Committee was filmed in Shanghai on July 26.

SRC: 据悉，第三届进博会首次设立公共卫生防疫专区，截至目前已有近50家全球企业报名参展，展览面积超过1万平方米。
HYP: It is reported that the third CIIE set up a public health and epidemic prevention zone for the first time, and so far nearly 50 global enterprises have registered for the exhibition, covering an exhibition area of more than 10000 square meters.

SRC: 在2018年首届进博会期间，进博会参展商联盟由展商自发倡议成立，旨在成为优质参展企业交流合作平台、连接参展各方信息与资源共享平台，以及为促进中国与世界各国（地区）之间经贸商务往来与发展建言献策的智囊平台。
HYP: During the first CIIE in 2018, the CIIE Exhibitor Alliance was established at the initiative of exhibitors, aiming to become a platform for exchanges and cooperation between high - quality exhibitors, a platform for information and resource sharing between exhibitors, and a think tank platform for promoting economic, trade, and business exchanges and development between China and other countries (regions) in the world.

SRC: 截至目前，已有142家企业加入参展商联盟，覆盖全球23个国家和地区。
HYP: So far, 142 enterprises have joined the exhibitor alliance, covering 23 countries and regions around the world.

SRC: 比利时3岁女童死于新冠病毒感染-新华网
HYP: 3 - year - old girl dies of new coronavirus infection in Belgium - Xinhuanet

SRC: 比利时卫生部门24日说，一名3岁女童死于新冠病毒感染，是该国最年幼的新冠病亡患者。
HYP: Belgian health authorities said on Thursday that a 3 - year - old girl died of the new coronavirus infection, making her the youngest person to die of the new coronavirus in the country.

SRC: 比利时卫生部门发言人布德温·卡特里说，这名女童感染新冠病毒前已经有其他严重疾病；除了这名女童，近期还有一名18岁青年死于新冠病毒感染。
HYP: Boudwin Katri, a spokesman for the Belgian health department, said that the girl had other serious diseases before contracting the new coronavirus; in addition to the girl, an 18 - year - old recently died of the new coronavirus infection.

SRC: 比利时卫生部门发言人布德温·卡特里说，这名女童感染新冠病毒前已经有其他严重疾病；除了这名女童，近期还有一名18岁<v>青年</v>死于新冠病毒感染。
HYP: Boudwin Katri, a spokesman for the Belgian health department, said that the girl had other serious diseases before contracting the new coronavirus; in addition to the girl, an 18 - year - old recently died of the new coronavirus infection.

SRC: 卡特里说，上周比利时85%新增新冠确诊人员年龄在60岁以下。
HYP: Katri said that 85% of the new coronavirus diagnoses in Belgium last week were under the age of 60.

SRC: 他提醒身体健康、年龄较轻的民众不要掉以轻心。
HYP: He reminded healthy, younger people not to take it lightly.

SRC: “虽然年轻人死于新冠病毒感染的情况较为罕见，但没有任何人现在具备免疫力。 ”
HYP: "Although it is rare for young people to die of the new coronavirus infection, no one is now immune."

SRC: 上周，比利时新增新冠确诊病例比前一周增长89 % ， 每日平均2.9人死于新冠病毒感染，高于前一周的日均1.7人。
HYP: Last week, the number of new confirmed coronavirus cases in Belgium increased by 89% compared to the previous week, with an average of 2.9 deaths per day from the new coronavirus infection, up from 1.7 per day in the previous week.

SRC: 欧洲疫情高峰期间，比利时人口中新冠病毒感染者占比在欧洲“名列前茅” 。
HYP: During the peak of the epidemic in Europe, the proportion of people infected with the new coronavirus in Belgium's population was "among the highest" in Europe.

SRC: 比利时有1100多万人口。
HYP: Belgium has a population of more than 11 million.

SRC: 最新数据显示，比利时累计64847人感染新冠病毒。
HYP: According to the latest data, a total of 64847 people have been infected with the new coronavirus in Belgium.

SRC: 卡特里本周早些时候警告，在雪球越滚越大、最终造成“雪崩”前，人们必须采取行动。
HYP: Katri warned earlier this week that people must take action before the snowball gets bigger and eventually causes an "avalanche".

SRC: 为抑制疫情反弹，比利时首相索菲·维尔梅斯23日宣布，人们在公共场所佩戴口罩的有关规定将更加严格，8月进一步解除限制性措施的方案也将暂缓执行。
HYP: In order to curb the rebound of the epidemic, Belgian Prime Minister Sophie Vermes announced on Wednesday that the rules on people wearing masks in public places will be stricter, and that the plan to further lift restrictive measures in August will also be suspended.

SRC: （郭倩） 【 新华社微特稿】
HYP: (Guo Qian) "Xinhua News Agency Micro - Feature"

SRC: 大型融媒体行动《走村直播看脱贫》出发- 今日要闻- 湖南日报网- 华声在线
HYP: Large - scale financial media action "Walking the Village Live and Watching Poverty Alleviation" - Today's News - Hunan Daily Online - Huasheng Online

SRC: 湖南日报·新湖南客户端7月25日讯(本报记者)7月25日，由中央广播电视总台财经节目中心主办的大型融媒体行动《走村直播看脱贫》从江苏徐州出发，两辆携带5G新媒体移动云制播系统的大篷车在现场嘉宾目送下，缓缓驶出现场。
HYP: Hunan Daily, New Hunan Client, July 25 (our reporter) On July 25, the large - scale financial media action "Walking the Village Live and Watching Poverty Alleviation", hosted by the Financial Program Center of the Central Radio and Television Station, set off from Xuzhou, Jiangsu Province, and two caravans carrying the 5G new media mobile cloud production and broadcasting system slowly drove out of the scene under the watchful eye of the guests.

SRC: 习近平总书记指出，“2020年是具有里程碑意义的一年，我们将全面建成小康社会，实现第一个百年奋斗目标，2020年也是脱贫攻坚决战决胜之年”。
HYP: General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out that "2020 is a milestone year, and we will build a moderately prosperous society in all respects and achieve the first centenary goal, and 2020 will also be a decisive year in the fight against poverty".

SRC: 大型融媒体行动《走村直播看脱贫》是中央广播电视总台财经节目中心为配合这一重大主题，做好脱贫攻坚宣传的重要举措。
HYP: The large - scale financial media action "Walking the Village Live and Watching Poverty Alleviation" is an important measure of the Financial Program Center of the Central Radio and Television Station to promote the fight against poverty in line with this major theme.

SRC: 该行动将走进全国20多个省、自治区、直辖市的脱贫村，挖掘鲜活脱贫故事，直击村容村貌巨变，展现村民如何突破生存发展困境、走向致富之路的历程。
HYP: The campaign will go into poverty - stricken villages in more than 20 provinces, autonomous regions, and municipalities directly under the Central Government, excavate vivid poverty - stricken stories, directly attack the great changes in the appearance of villages, and show how villagers can break through the predicament of survival and development and become rich.

SRC: 这次行动将持续3个多月。
HYP: The operation will last for more than three months.

SRC: 记者从徐州出发，兵分两路，一路走西南线，途经安徽、湖北、江西、湖南、广西、贵州、四川、重庆、云南、西藏等地;另一路走西北线，途经河南、陕西、甘肃、青海、新疆、宁夏、内蒙古、山西、河北等地，行程超过1万公里。
HYP: From Xuzhou, the reporter took the southwest route through Anhui, Hubei, Jiangxi, Hunan, Guangxi, Guizhou, Sichuan, Chongqing, Yunnan, Tibet, and other places, and the northwest route through Henan, Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Xinjiang, Ningxia, Inner Mongolia, Shanxi, Hebei, and other places, covering more than 10000 kilometers.

SRC: 在报道形式上，《走村直播看脱贫》大胆融合。
HYP: In terms of reporting form, "Walking the Village Live and Watching Poverty Alleviation" is boldly integrated.

SRC: 大篷车所到村庄的经济发展情况，都将通过中央广播电视总台央视财经频道、央广经济之声、中国交通广播、央视财经新媒体进行播出。
HYP: The economic development of the villages visited by the caravan will be broadcast through the Central Radio and Television Station's CCTV Financial Channel, the Central Radio and Television Station's Economic Voice, China Traffic Radio, and CCTV Financial New Media.

SRC: 其中，电视直播将主要在央视财经频道的午间新闻节目《天下财经》完成(首播时间：周一至周日12：00-13:00 )，央视财经频道的黄金档新闻栏目《经济信息联播》将开设脱贫报道专栏(首播时间：周一至周日20：30-21:30 )。
HYP: Among them, the live TV broadcast will be mainly completed in the midday news program "World Finance" of CCTV Financial Channel (premiere time: Monday to Sunday 12:00 - 13:00), and the prime - time news program "Economic Information Network" of CCTV Financial Channel will open a poverty alleviation report column (premiere time: Monday to Sunday 20:30 - 21:30).

SRC: 同时，大篷车将对所到的每个村庄在央视财经客户端进行长达1小时的直播，观众通过下载央视财经APP，可以观看直播，参与抽奖活动。
HYP: At the same time, each village visited by the caravan will be broadcast live on the CCTV financial client for up to one hour, and viewers can watch the live broadcast and participate in the raffle by downloading the CCTV financial APP.

SRC: 在技术应用和演播室设计上，《 走村直播看脱贫》勇于突破，首创了“外场新媒体大篷车”。
HYP: In terms of technology application and studio design, "Walking the Village Live and Watching Poverty Alleviation" has the courage to break through and pioneered the "Outfield New Media Caravan".

SRC: 该车搭载5G新媒体移动云制播系统，利用5G+4K/8K+AI技术，实现线上线下、大屏小屏，电视广播的有机结合。
HYP: The vehicle is equipped with a 5G new media mobile cloud production and broadcasting system, and uses 5G + 4K / 8K + AI technology to realize the organic combination of online and offline, large and small screens, and TV broadcasting.

SRC: <v>配置三讯演播区</v>，演播区由集装箱改装而成，长12米、宽2.55米、高3.98米，箱体采用液压自动展开结构，最大可以上翻120度。
HYP: The broadcast area is converted from a container, with a length of 12 meters, a width of 2.55 meters, and a height of 3.98 meters, and the box body adopts a hydraulic automatic expansion structure, which can be turned up to 120 degrees.

SRC: 配置三讯演播区，演播区由集装箱改装而成，长12米、宽2.55米、高3.98米，箱体采用液压自动展开结构，最大可以上翻120度。
HYP: The broadcast area is converted from a container, with a length of 12 meters, a width of 2.55 meters, and a height of 3.98 meters, and the box body adopts a hydraulic automatic expansion structure, which can be turned up to 120 degrees.

SRC: 配置三讯演播区，演播区由集装箱改装而成，长12米、宽2.55米、高3.98米，箱体采用液压自动展开结构，<v>最大</v>可以上翻120度。
HYP: The broadcast area is converted from a container, with a length of 12 meters, a width of 2.55 meters, and a height of 3.98 meters, and the box body adopts a hydraulic automatic expansion structure, which can be turned up to 120 degrees.

SRC: 演播区也可以自动展开，并外接扩展平台，面积50多平方米，可以满足大部分节目的场景要求。
HYP: The broadcast area can also be expanded automatically and is connected to an external expansion platform, covering an area of more than 50 square meters, which can meet the scene requirements of most programs.

SRC: 张继科林小宅组队力挺有肌少年-新华网
HYP: Zhang Jike Lin Xiaozai team to support the muscle teenagers - Xinhua

SRC: 运动少年热血竞技秀《运动吧少年》在7月11日正式登陆湖南卫视。
HYP: Sports teenagers hot blood competition show "sports bar teenagers" in July 11 officially landed in Hunan TV.

SRC: 运动领队张继科和运动助理林小宅跨界同台,林丹和傅园慧点评各有风格,而“庞然大物”般的力量拔杆装置的硬核上场,更让节目“燃”力十足。
HYP: The sports leader Zhang Jike and sports assistant Lin Xiaozake crossed the stage together, Lin Dan and Fu Yuanhui reviews have their own style, and the "behemoth" like power pulling rod device hardcore on the field, more let the program "burning" force.

SRC: 首集中,11位运动少年亮相力量赛道,外形惊艳现场观众的同时,竞技台上的“强冲突”“强对抗”“强心脏”也受到关注。
HYP: In the first episode, 11 sports teenagers appeared on the power track, the appearance of the stunning audience at the same time, the "strong conflict" "strong confrontation" "strong heart" on the competition stage also received attention.

SRC: 其中,“ 强冲突”来自超A体育生乔文一,他在比赛前公然挑衅同赛道中有“花美男”之称的徐志滨,呛声徐志滨的外形条件应该去唱跳节目,甚至放出“输了别把妆哭花了”的狠话。
HYP: Among them, " strong conflict" from super A sports student Qiao Wenyi, he openly provoked the same track in the "beautiful boy" called Xu Zhi Bin, choked Xu Zhi Bin appearance conditions should go to singing and dancing show, and even put "lost Don't cry your makeup off".

SRC: 一番言论让场上的少年和运动领队们都倒吸一口凉气。
HYP: A speech to the field of teenagers and sports leaders are sucked back a breath of cold air.

SRC: 而“强对抗”更像是神仙打架,被誉为“大魔王”的孙健淇碰上同样实力强劲的张鑫栋,上演强强对决。
HYP: The "strong confrontation" was more like a fight of the gods, as Sun Jianqi, known as the "King of Magic", ran into Zhang Xindong, who was also strong, and staged a strong showdown.

SRC: 而他们的身份也让人始料未及,孙健淇是热爱健身的演员,张鑫栋则是退役特战队员、三次勇士勋章获得者。
HYP: Their identities are also unexpected: Sun Jianqi is an actor who loves fitness, while Zhang Xindong is a retired special operations officer and a three-time Warrior Medal winner.

SRC: 比赛一开始,两位少年就拼尽全力快速拔出小杆,在大杆上的持久对抗让现场观众为他们捏了一把汗。
HYP: At the beginning of the game, the two teenagers tried their best to pull out the small pole quickly, and the lasting confrontation on the big pole made the audience sweat for them.

SRC: 在紧张的赛况下,张继科作为《运动吧少年》运动领队之一,也在一旁认真观战。
HYP: Under the tense situation, Zhang Jike, as one of the sports leaders of "Sports Bar Junior", was also watching the game carefully.

SRC: 在点评环节,他也十分细心,对输了比赛的一方少年耐心鼓励,帮助复盘过程中的每一个失误点。
HYP: In the commentary session, he was also very attentive, patient and encouraging to the losing side of the teenager, helping to review each mistake point in the process.

SRC: 而运动助理林小宅则是花式助攻,她毫不掩饰对颜值实力在线的少年们的欣赏。
HYP: The sports assistant Lin Xiaozai is a fancy assistant, she did not hide her appreciation for the teenagers with online strength.

SRC: 在了解到运动少年们超负荷的日常训练时,更是心生敬佩。
HYP: When she learned about the overloaded daily training of the sports boys, she was even more impressed.

SRC: 同样是运动领队的林丹和傅园慧则各有风格,一个是气定神闲派“预言家” , 一个则是用笑容驱散紧张氛围的“洪荒少女” 。
HYP: Also sports leaders Lin Dan and Fu Yuanhui have their own style, one is a calm and relaxed faction "prophet", a smile to disperse the nervous atmosphere of the "flooded girl".

SRC: 另外,吉克隽逸和刘烨作为运动助理,也围绕运动少年制造了不少爆笑话题。
HYP: In addition, Jixie and Liu Ye as sports assistants, but also around the sports teenagers to create a lot of laughs.

SRC: 法国南特教堂大火：教区志愿者承认纵火平时和善寡言-中新网
HYP: France Nantes church fire: parish volunteer admits to arson, usually kind and reticent - CNN

SRC: 中新网7月26日电据外媒报道，7月18日，法国南特的宗教历史建筑瑰宝、著名的圣彼得与圣保罗大教堂，在一场火灾当中受到严重损毁，大管风琴完全毁坏。
HYP: July 26 (Xinhua) -- According to foreign media reports, on July 18, Nantes, France's religious and historical architectural treasures, the famous Cathedral of St. Peter and St. Paul, was severely damaged in a fire, the large organ was completely destroyed.

SRC: 当地时间26日，南特检察官宣布，一名在大教堂当中负责保卫工作的教区志愿者已经被起诉，罪名是“纵火<v>毁坏</v>” 。
HYP: On July 26, Nantes prosecutors announced that a parish volunteer responsible for guarding the cathedral had been charged with "arson".

SRC: 他已承认，是自己在教堂里点火。
HYP: He has admitted that he set the fire in the church.

SRC: 报道称，当地检察官塞纳斯表示，这名39岁、来自卢旺达的教区志愿者承认，自己夜里在大教堂当中的三处点火。
HYP: Local prosecutor Senas said the 39-year-old parish volunteer from Rwanda admitted to lighting three fires in the cathedral during the night, according to reports.

SRC: 此人的律师则表示，纵火者现在很后悔做出这种事。
HYP: The man's lawyer said the arsonist now regrets having done such a thing.

SRC: 此人几年前通过避难的途径，进入法国，在本次火灾事发地教区得到庇护，在教堂里得到收留。
HYP: The man entered France several years ago through the asylum route and was given asylum in the parish where the fire took place, where he was taken in at the church.

SRC: 检方指出，最近，他尝试更新签证，正在和警察局对此进行对话沟通。
HYP: The prosecution noted that recently, he tried to renew his visa and is in dialogue and communication with the police department about it.

SRC: 但教堂方面表示仍然不敢相信，这名平时非常善良、面带笑容，但不怎么说话的信徒，会毁坏他如此热爱的教堂。
HYP: But the church says it still can't believe that this usually very kind, smiling, but not very talkative believer would destroy the church he loves so much.

SRC: 7月18日火灾发生的当天，这名志愿者就已经因为叙述当中出现逻辑不通的问题，而接受过警方问询调查，但他后来被释放。
HYP: On the day of the July 18 fire, the volunteer had already been questioned by police for illogical problems in his account, but he was later released.

SRC: 图为消防员在现场进行救援。
HYP: The picture shows firefighters at the scene of the rescue.

SRC: 25日晚间，由于巴黎中央警察局实验室的专业工程师获取了新的证据，此人又再一次被传讯。
HYP: In the evening of the 25th, the man was summoned again because of new evidence obtained by professional engineers from the laboratory of the Paris Central Police.

SRC: 这一次，男子承认了自己纵火的行为。
HYP: This time, the man confessed to the act of arson.

SRC: 据报道，如果蓄意纵火毁坏的罪名成立，嫌犯将可能面临10年监禁和15万欧元的罚款。
HYP: According to reports, the suspect could face 10 years in prison and a fine of 150000 euros if convicted of intentional arson and destruction.

SRC: 报道称，此次大火给圣皮埃尔与圣保罗大教堂造成了严重损失，教堂内的管风琴被完全烧毁，管风琴后面的彩色玻璃窗也受损严重。
HYP: The fire caused serious damage to the Cathedral of St. Pierre and St. Paul, with the organ inside the church completely destroyed and the stained glass windows behind the organ severely damaged, according to reports.

SRC: 法国历史保护建筑首席建筑师布鲁内认为，保守估计，南特大教堂复原工作至少要有3年。
HYP: The chief architect of the French historic preservation building, Brunet, believes that a conservative estimate of the Nantes Cathedral restoration work will take at least three years.

SRC: 飓风“汉娜”登陆美得州或引发河水暴涨和山洪-中新网
HYP: Hurricane "Hanna" landfall in Texas may cause river flooding and flash floods - CNN

SRC: 中新网7月26日电综合外媒报道，当地时间25日下午5时，飓风“汉娜”登陆美国得克萨斯州，将给得州带来强风暴雨、河水暴涨，还可能引发威胁生命的山洪。
HYP: July 26 (Xinhua) -- Comprehensive foreign media reports, at 5 pm local time on the 25th, Hurricane "Hanna" landed in Texas, will bring strong winds and rain to Texas, river flooding, may also trigger life-threatening flash floods.

SRC: 国家飓风中心说，预计飓风“汉娜”会挟带暴雨，扫过得州南部与东北部部分地区，雨势或引发部分溪水暴涨以及威胁生命的山洪爆发。
HYP: The National Hurricane Center said Hurricane "Hanna" is expected to carry heavy rainfall, sweeping through parts of southern and northeastern Texas, the rain may cause some of the streams to rise and life-threatening flash floods.

SRC: 报道称，受飓风“汉娜”影响最严重的是科珀斯克里斯蒂市以南到格兰德河河口地区，而里奥格兰德山谷可能爆发大范围的山洪。
HYP: The report said that the most serious impact of Hurricane "Hanna" is south of Corpus Christi to the mouth of the Rio Grande River, while the Rio Grande Valley may erupt into widespread flash flooding.

SRC: 得州州长阿博特25日表示：“任何飓风都是一个巨大的挑战。”
HYP: Texas Governor Abbott said on the 25th: "Any hurricane is a huge challenge."

SRC: 该州有32个郡因为飓风进入灾难紧急状态。
HYP: The state has 32 counties under a state of disaster emergency because of the hurricane.

SRC: 科珀斯克里斯蒂市这座人口超32万的城市，已关闭图书馆与博物馆，居民严阵以待。
HYP: Corpus Christi, a city of more than 320000 people, has closed libraries and museums, and residents are standing by.

SRC: 阿博特还说，在得州正在遭遇新冠疫情重创之际，不能再让这场飓风给得州带来更多伤亡。
HYP: Abbott added that the hurricane cannot be allowed to bring more casualties to Texas at a time when the state is being hit hard by the new crown epidemic.

SRC: 据报道，得州南部地区降水量预计将在26日夜间达到6至12英寸，得克萨斯州北部地区和路易斯安那州沿海地区也将出现3至5英寸的降雨。
HYP: According to reports, precipitation in southern Texas is expected to reach 6 to 12 inches overnight on the 26th, with 3 to 5 inches of rain also expected in northern Texas and coastal Louisiana.

SRC: 由于全球变暖等因素影响，“汉娜”的形成早于以往的大西洋飓风季。
HYP: Due to global warming and other factors, the formation of "Hanna" earlier than the previous Atlantic hurricane season.

SRC: 一般情况下，大西洋的第一场飓风通常要到8月中旬才会形成。
HYP: In general, the first hurricane in the Atlantic Ocean usually does not form until mid-August.

SRC: 波兰将退出欧洲防止对女子施暴的条约
HYP: Poland to withdraw from European treaty to prevent violence against women

SRC: 波兰司法部星期六表示，波兰下个星期将采取步骤，退出欧洲防止对妇女施暴条约。
HYP: Poland will take steps next week to withdraw from the European treaty on the prevention of violence against women, the Justice Ministry said Saturday.

SRC: <v>波兰</v>司法部星期六表示，波兰下个星期将采取步骤，退出欧洲防止对妇女施暴条约。
HYP: Poland will take steps next week to withdraw from the European treaty on the prevention of violence against women, the Justice Ministry said Saturday.

SRC: 波兰右翼的政府内阁表示，该条约要求学校教授学生有关性别问题的议题，践踏了学生父母的权利。
HYP: Poland's right-wing government cabinet says the treaty tramples on the rights of students' parents by requiring schools to teach them topics about gender issues.

SRC: 波兰司法部长焦布洛举行记者会说，他领导的司法部星期一将向劳工和家庭部提出开始退出条约的要求。
HYP: Polish Justice Minister Joe Blow held a press conference and said his Justice Ministry on Monday will ask the Ministry of Labor and Family to begin withdrawing from the treaty.

SRC: 那项条约又名伊斯坦布尔公约。
HYP: That treaty is also known as the Istanbul Convention.

SRC: 焦布洛说，“该条约包含一些我们认为是有害的意思形态性质的元素。”
HYP: Iobulo said, "The treaty contains some elements of what we consider to be a harmful ideological nature."

SRC: 波兰执政的法律与公正党及其及其执政联盟伙伴跟罗马天主教教会有密切的同盟关系，提倡保守的社会议程。
HYP: Poland's ruling Law and Justice Party and its and its ruling coalition partners have a close alliance with the Roman Catholic Church and promote a conservative social agenda.

SRC: 波兰总统杜达在这个月成功的连任竞选期间将敌视同性恋权利作为主要议题之一。
HYP: Polish President Duda made hostility to gay rights one of his main issues during his successful re-election campaign this month.

SRC: 星期五，成千上万的波兰人(其中大部分是妇女)在华沙和其他一些城市举行反对退出公约的抗议。
HYP: On Friday, thousands of Poles, most of them women, protested against the withdrawal from the convention in Warsaw and several other cities.

SRC: 抗议的组织者之一莱姆帕特在华沙举行的抗议游行中说，“退出条约的目的就是将家暴合法化”。
HYP: "The purpose of withdrawing from the treaty is to legalize domestic violence," Lempert, one of the organizers of the protest, said at a protest march in Warsaw.

SRC: 一些抗议者举着横幅，上面写着“法律与公正党是妇女的地狱”。
HYP: Some protesters carried banners that read, "The Law and Justice Party is a hell for women.

SRC: 法律与公正党长久以来抱怨伊斯坦布尔公约。
HYP: The Law and Justice Party has long complained about the Istanbul Convention.

SRC: 波兰先前的中间派执政的政府2015年批准了该公约。
HYP: Poland's previous centrist-run government ratified the convention in 2015.

SRC: 法律与公正党政府表示，该条约不尊重宗教，要求在学校里教授自由派的社会政策。
HYP: The Law and Justice government said the pact was not respectful of religion and required liberal social policies to be taught in schools.

SRC: 但截至目前该党一直没有决定退出该公约。
HYP: But as of now the party has not decided to withdraw from the pact.

SRC: （根据路透社报道）
HYP: (According to Reuters)

SRC: 据越通社报道，格里沃里认为，越南25年来为东盟的发展作出巨大贡献。
HYP: According to Vietnam News Agency, Grivory believes that Vietnam has made great contributions to the development of ASEAN for 25 years.

SRC: 越南不仅是东盟负责任的一员，更是东盟的火车头。
HYP: Vietnam is not only a responsible member of ASEAN, but also the locomotive of ASEAN.

SRC: 格里沃里表示，俄罗斯乃至亚欧经济联盟认为，越南为东盟提高其地位，对外推广其形象做出贡献。
HYP: Grivory said that Russia and even the Asia-Europe Economic Union believe that Vietnam has contributed to ASEAN's improvement of its status and promotion of its image abroad.

SRC: 他强调，“东盟因此应该感谢越南。”
HYP: He stressed that "ASEAN should therefore be grateful to Vietnam."

SRC: 格里沃里表示，分析人士对越南所提出的和平倡议给予认可。
HYP: Grivory said analysts recognized the peace initiative proposed by Vietnam.

SRC: 越南愿意同东盟各国分享经验，对包括东海问题在内的亚太地区面临的问题提出建设性的和平措施。
HYP: Vietnam is willing to share its experience with ASEAN countries and propose constructive peace measures for problems facing the Asia-Pacific region, including the East Sea issue.

SRC: 关于越南与俄罗斯在东盟框架下的合作，格里沃里认为，越南为俄罗斯与东盟的合作关系提供支持，帮助俄罗斯在这一合作框架下获得利益。
HYP: Regarding Vietnam's cooperation with Russia in the framework of ASEAN, Grivory believes that Vietnam provides support to Russia's cooperative relations with ASEAN and helps Russia gain benefits in the framework of this cooperation.

SRC: 包括俄罗斯在内的亚欧经济联盟与越南签署自贸协定后能够进军东盟市场。
HYP: The Asia-Europe Economic Union, including Russia, was able to enter the ASEAN market after signing a free trade agreement with Vietnam.

SRC: 格里沃里建议最大限度扩大亚欧经济联盟与东盟各国的自由贸易区，进而创造经济和安全稳定的平台。
HYP: Grivory proposed to maximize the expansion of the free trade area between the ASEM and ASEAN countries, thus creating a platform for economic and security stability.

SRC: 格里沃里同时相信，俄罗斯、越南与东盟正在步入正轨并将实现其目标。
HYP: Grivory also believes that Russia, Vietnam and ASEAN are on the right track and will achieve their goals.

SRC: 从现在到2020年底，北江省将具备必要条件，尤其是在基础设施，人力资源和土地等方面，以便主动迎来外资流入，特别是拥有价值链和转让先进技术的跨国集团。
HYP: By the end of 2020, Beijng will have the necessary conditions, especially in terms of infrastructure, human resources and land, to proactively welcome the inflow of foreign investments, especially from multinational groups with value chains and transfer of advanced technologies.

SRC: 此外，北江省将办理好递交政府总理决定对越韩工业区基础设施建设与经营项目投资的主张和批准将本省安山-北陇和安闾两个工业-城市-服务业区补充列入至2020年越南工业区发展总体规划的文件。
HYP: In addition, the province will submit to the Prime Minister's decision to invest in infrastructure and business projects in the Vietnam-Korea Industrial Zone and approve the document that adds the province's two industrial-urban-services zones of An Son - North Long and An Luc to the master plan for the development of Vietnam's industrial zones until 2020.

SRC: 与此同时，北江省着力加快各项目的进度，尤其是在和富、光州，双溪-内皇等工业园区集群的基础设施建设经营项目，为招商引资形成土地基金。
HYP: At the same time, Bei Giang province is making efforts to accelerate the progress of projects, especially infrastructure construction and operation projects in Hoa Phu, Quang Chau, and Sungei-Nai Huan clusters of industrial zones to form a land fund for investment promotion.

SRC: 在2020年内，北江省工贸局参就定工业区、工业集群规划建言献策，以纳入省规划。
HYP: Within 2020, the Department of Industry and Trade of the Province of Beuk Giang is involved in making proposals on the planning of industrial zones and industrial clusters to be included in the provincial planning.

SRC: 北江省确定将发展工业园区集群与保障国防安全，保护生态环境，保障粮食安全相结合，进而助推工业均衡发展；拥有全面的电力，供水，交通和电信等基础设施，并与城市建设，贸易服务，工人住房和医疗卫生、教育等其他社会基础设施等<v>相结合</v>。
HYP: The province has determined that the development of industrial clusters will be combined with the security of national defense, protection of ecological environment and food security, which in turn will contribute to the balanced development of industry; comprehensive infrastructure of electricity, water supply, transportation and telecommunication, and other social infrastructure such as urban construction, trade services, workers' housing and health care, education, etc.

SRC: 在工业区，北江省着力呼吁对电力，电子，电信设备，精密机械，辅助工业等领域中的高科技，清洁技术的投资项目。
HYP: In industrial zones, the province is calling for high-tech, clean-tech investment projects in the fields of electricity, electronics, telecommunication equipment, precision machinery, and auxiliary industries.

SRC: 在工业园区集群，该省呼吁对生产、利用就地劳动力、尤其是农产品、食品加工等领域的中小型规模投资项目。
HYP: In the cluster of industrial parks, the province calls for small and medium scale investment projects in the fields of production, utilization of local labor, especially in agricultural products and food processing.

SRC: 未来，北江省将着力加快对北江市后勤物流中心的基础设施的投资，与工业园区集群同步发展，以优化货物、货币流通和有助于降低生产成本，提高货物价值，优化供应链，发展多式联运，从而为投资者投资于本省创造吸引力。
HYP: In the future, the province will focus on accelerating investments in the infrastructure of logistics centers in the city of Beijng to develop in parallel with the industrial park cluster in order to optimize the flow of goods, money and contribute to reducing production costs, increasing the value of goods, optimizing the supply chain, developing multimodal transport, thus creating attractiveness for investors to invest in the province.

SRC: （德国之声中文网）过去两周内，西班牙的新冠确冠病例大幅回升，多日出现上千新增病例。
HYP: (Deutsche Welle) - The number of new coronary cases in Spain has risen sharply in the past two weeks, with thousands of new cases on multiple days.

SRC: 英国政府周六（7月25日）晚间临时决定，从当地时间26日零点起，将西班牙从安全旅行名单中移除，从西班牙入境英国的人必须隔离14天。
HYP: The British government decided on Saturday night (July 25) to remove Spain from the safe travel list as of 00:00 local time on the 26th, and people entering the UK from Spain must be quarantined for 14 days.

SRC: 正在西班牙度假的英国游客听闻此项决定纷纷表示惊讶、担心、甚至愤怒，因为消息突如其来，令人措手不及。
HYP: British tourists on vacation in Spain have expressed surprise, concern and even anger at the decision, as the news came out of nowhere and caught them off guard.

SRC: 据报道，英国交通大臣沙普斯（Grant Shapps）目前也在西班牙度假。
HYP: According to reports, British Transport Secretary Grant Shapps is also on vacation in Spain.

SRC: 英国发布隔离措施前，挪威也已宣布从西班牙返回挪威的人要进行为期10天的隔离。
HYP: Before the UK issued the quarantine measures, Norway had also announced a 10-day quarantine for those returning to Norway from Spain.

SRC: 法国和比利时建议本国居民放弃前方巴塞罗那以及周边地区度假的计划。
HYP: France and Belgium are advising their residents to abandon their plans to vacation in Barcelona and the surrounding areas ahead.

SRC: 这些地区的海滩人满为患，人与人之间无法保持社交距离，警察一度需要采取措施，以减少海滩游客的数量。
HYP: The beaches in these areas are so overcrowded that people cannot maintain social distance from each other, and police once needed to take measures to reduce the number of beachgoers.

SRC: 旅游业是西班牙的重要支柱产业
HYP: Tourism is an important pillar of Spain's industry

SRC: 西班牙：这里是安全的
HYP: Spain: It's safe here

SRC: 针对英国做出的决定，西班牙外交部周日表示，该国疫情得到控制。
HYP: In response to the decision made by Britain, Spain's Foreign Ministry said Sunday that the country's outbreak was under control.

SRC: 西班牙外交部长冈萨雷斯（Arancha Gonzalez Laya）向媒体强调：" 西班牙是安全的，不仅对西班牙人而言，对游客来说也是安全的。"
HYP: Spanish Foreign Minister Arancha Gonzalez Laya stressed to the media, " Spain is safe, not only for Spaniards, but also for tourists."

SRC: 西班牙政府将试图说服英国政府将巴利阿里群岛（Balearic Islands）和加那利群岛（Canary Islands）排除在隔离措施之外。
HYP: The Spanish government will try to convince the British government to exclude the Balearic Islands and the Canary Islands from the quarantine measures.

SRC: 理由是，这两个旅游胜地的感染率远低于英国本土。
HYP: The reason is that the infection rate in these two tourist destinations is much lower than in the UK mainland.

SRC: 为防止疫情扩散，西班牙加泰罗尼亚地区也已重启"禁足令"。
HYP: To prevent the spread of the epidemic, the Spanish region of Catalonia has also restarted the "no-footing order".

SRC: 旅游业是西班牙的重要支柱产业，而西班牙是最受英国游客青睐的度假地之一。
HYP: Tourism is an important pillar of the Spanish industry, and Spain is one of the most popular vacation destinations for British tourists.

SRC: 英国的这一决定预计将会使西班牙的旅游业大受影响。
HYP: The British decision is expected to have a major impact on Spain's tourism industry.

SRC: 安静/任琛（德新社，路透社）
HYP: Quiet/Renchen (DPA, Reuters)

SRC: 中伏首日：北京暂别高温酷暑开启降雨模式-新华网
HYP: First day of mid-volley: Beijing bids farewell to high temperature and heat, starts rainfall mode - Xinhua

SRC: 新华社北京7月26日电（记者倪元锦）7月26日是今年的“中伏”首日。
HYP: BEIJING, July 26 (Xinhua) -- July 26 was the first day of this year's "mid-volley".

SRC: 26日凌晨的大风骤雨对流天气，驱散了连日来笼罩在北京地区的高温酷暑，新一轮降雨天气将持续数日。
HYP: The windy and convective weather in the early morning of the 26th dispersed the heat that had been gripping the Beijing area for days, and a new round of rainy weather will last for several days.

SRC: 北京市气象台26日11时发布称，26日北京有分散性阵雨（伴有弱雷电），日最高气温仅为27℃；夜间阴有小到中雨（伴有弱雷电），夜间最低气温为23℃。
HYP: The Beijing Meteorological Station released at 11:00 on the 26th that there will be scattered showers (accompanied by weak thunder and lightning) in Beijing on the 26th, with a daily high temperature of only 27°C. The night will be cloudy with light to moderate rain (accompanied by weak thunder and lightning), and the night's low temperature will be 23°C.

SRC: 而在此前的24日至25日，北京全市处在高温蓝色预警中，大部地区日最高气温在37℃左右，局地出现超过40℃的高温。
HYP: The previous 24 to 25 days, the city of Beijing in the high temperature blue warning, most areas of the daily maximum temperature in about 37 ℃, local high temperature of more than 40 ℃.

SRC: 伏天是一年之中气温最高、潮湿、闷热的日子，一年有“三伏”，最热在中伏，中国百姓说的“苦夏”就在此时。
HYP: The volcano is the highest temperature of the year, humid, hot and muggy days, there are "three volcanoes" a year, the hottest in the middle of the volcano, the Chinese people say "bitter summer" at this time.

SRC: 入伏时，家家填满谷仓，民间有“一伏饺子二伏面”的说法。
HYP: At the beginning of the volcano, families fill their barns, and folklore has the saying "a volcano of dumplings and two volcanoes of noodles".

SRC: 根据目前预报，未来三天，北京多阴雨天气。
HYP: According to the current forecast, the next three days, Beijing more cloudy and rainy weather.

SRC: 气象部门提示公众尽量减少山区游玩，谨防地质灾害。
HYP: The meteorological department prompted the public to minimize the mountainous areas to play, beware of geological disasters.

SRC: 据了解，今年的“中伏”有20天，从7月26日开始，至8月14日结束。
HYP: It is understood that this year's "mid-volley" has 20 days, starting on July 26 and ending on August 14.

SRC: 进入“中伏”后，人会感到身体乏力、食欲不振。
HYP: After entering the "ambush", people will feel weak, loss of appetite.

SRC: 饮食上可选择绿豆、薏仁等具有清热解暑、健脾开胃作用的食物，以及苦菜、苦瓜等苦味食物，可有助于增进食欲、祛除暑气。
HYP: You can choose to eat mung beans, barley and other foods with heat, spleen and appetite, as well as bitter vegetables, bitter melon and other bitter foods, which can help increase appetite and get rid of the summer heat.

SRC: 《叮咚上线!老师好》下周上线薛兆丰领衔“知识发起人-新华网
HYP: Dingdong on line! The teacher is good" next week on line Xue Zhaofeng lead "knowledge initiator - Xinhua

SRC: 又有新综艺上线。
HYP: Another new variety show is coming online.

SRC: 互动知识分享节目《叮咚上线!老师好》,将于7月20日起在湖南卫视播出。
HYP: The interactive knowledge sharing program "Dingdong! Teacher is good", will be broadcast on Hunan TV from July 20.

SRC: 据了解,节目将打造全新的全年龄青春课堂,一批有颜有型又有才的老师将上阵,挑战趣味性知识输出。
HYP: It is understood that the program will create a new all-age youth classroom, a group of faceless and talented teachers will take the field, the challenge of interesting knowledge output.

SRC: 与以往老师群体在大众心中的严肃印象不同,《叮咚上线!老师好》集结的是一群颜值和才华兼具的知识代表。
HYP: Unlike the serious image of teachers in the public mind, "Dingdong Online! Teacher is good" is a group of knowledge representatives with both face and talent.

SRC: 他们既是来自各学科的青年知识榜样,还是一群会抖包袱、擅长寓教于乐的全能“段子手”。
HYP: They are not only young knowledgeable role models from various disciplines, but also a group of all-rounded "doujinshi" who can shake the baggage and are good at teaching and entertaining.

SRC: 节目中,这群优秀青年知识榜样作为“知识分享官”,将要挑战趣味性的知识课堂。
HYP: In the program, this group of outstanding young knowledge role models, as "knowledge sharing officers", will be challenged to a fun knowledge class.

SRC: 他们需要通过有态度的知识输出,展现所在学科最有趣的一面,来打动在场的观众。
HYP: They need to show the most interesting side of their subjects through knowledge output with attitude to impress the audience.

SRC: 而全年龄观众组成的“有道问问团”现场会提出百变问题,给“知识分享官”的授课提高难度,也给节目增添些许刺激的氛围。
HYP: The all-ages audience will ask a variety of questions on the spot to make the lessons of the "knowledge sharing officers" more difficult and add some excitement to the program.

SRC: 而全年龄观众组成的<v>“有道问问团”</v>现场会提出百变问题,给“知识分享官”的授课提高难度,也给节目增添些许刺激的氛围。
HYP: The all-ages audience will ask a variety of questions on the spot to make the lessons of the "knowledge sharing officers" more difficult and add some excitement to the program.

SRC: 据透露,此次“知识分享官”中有中国人民大学附属中学物理教师李永乐、考研指导名师张雪峰以及拥有十年从业经验的历史教师王磊等优秀青年教师,他们将以意想不到的方式向现场观众展现各个学科的“硬核”知识。
HYP: It is revealed that the "knowledge sharing officers" include Li Yongle, a physics teacher from the affiliated high school of Renmin University of China, Zhang Xuefeng, a famous teacher of examinations and research, and Wang Lei, a history teacher with ten years of experience, and other outstanding young teachers, who will show the audience the "hard core" knowledge of various disciplines in unexpected ways. They will show the audience the "hard core" knowledge of various subjects in unexpected ways.

SRC: 另外,节目还邀请经济学教授薛兆丰作为节目的“知识发起人”,联合“叮咚助教”杜海涛和靳梦佳,与观众畅谈青春,打造“全民青春公开课”。
HYP: In addition, the program also invited economics professor Xue Zhaofeng as the program's "knowledge initiator", together with "Dingdong assistant teacher" Du Haitao and Jin Mengjia, and the audience to talk about youth, to create a "national youth open class The "Youth Open Class".

SRC: 香港特区政府政务司司长：形势严峻全力抗疫-中新网
HYP: Hong Kong SAR Government Chief Secretary for Administration: the situation is serious, all efforts to fight the epidemic - CNN

SRC: 新华社香港7月26日电香港特区政府政务司司长张建宗26日表示，香港新冠肺炎疫情形势持续严峻，若疫情转坏，特区政府将果断采取更严厉管控措施，进一步限制经营场所营业和减少市民外出空间。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 26 (Xinhua) -- The Secretary for Constitutional Affairs of the HKSAR Government, Mr. Matthew Cheung, said on the 26th that the situation of the new pneumonia epidemic in Hong Kong continues to be serious, and if the epidemic turns bad, the SAR Government will decisively take more severe control measures to further restrict the business premises and reduce the space for people to go out.

SRC: 但现阶段特区政府无意推出“居家令”或“禁足令”限制市民外出。
HYP: But at this stage the SAR government has no intention of introducing "home order" or "no-footing order" to restrict the public to go out.

SRC: 张建宗当日发表题为《形势严峻全力抗疫》的网志。
HYP: Zhang Jianzong published a weblog entitled "the situation is serious, all efforts to fight the epidemic".

SRC: 他表示，这一波疫情是半年以来最严峻的，未来两星期将会十分关键，要尽力防止病毒在社区进一步扩散。
HYP: He said that this wave of the epidemic is the most serious in six months, the next two weeks will be very critical, to try to prevent the virus in the community to spread further.

SRC: 除了特区政府采取必要措施之外，市民自律和配合也非常重要。
HYP: In addition to the necessary measures taken by the SAR government, self-discipline and cooperation of the public is also very important.

SRC: 他呼吁市民务必尽量留在家中，减少社交接触和外出用餐。
HYP: He urged the public to stay at home as much as possible and to reduce social contacts and eating out.

SRC: 市民应配合佩戴口罩的强制措施保护自己及他人，并注重个人和环境卫生及勤洗手，更应暂停非必要的亲友聚会或聚餐及减少到街市。
HYP: The public should cooperate with the mandatory measures of wearing masks to protect themselves and others, and pay attention to personal and environmental hygiene and wash their hands regularly, and suspend non-essential gatherings or dinners with friends and relatives and reduce visits to markets.

SRC: 他表示，中央一直十分关心香港疫情变化及支持特区政府防疫抗疫工作，并积极回应行政长官最新要求，在加大检测能力和改装亚洲国际博览馆为类似“方舱医院”的工作上提供协助。
HYP: He said that the Central Government has been very concerned about the changes in the epidemic situation in Hong Kong and support the SAR Government's work to prevent and combat the epidemic, and actively respond to the latest request of the Chief Executive to provide assistance in increasing the detection capacity and the conversion of AsiaWorld-Expo into a similar "square hospital" work.

SRC: 张建宗表示，特区政府为特定高风险群组，即安老院舍、残疾院舍及护养院员工、餐厅员工、出租车司机和物业管理员工提供的免费病毒检测已全面展开，涉及人数多达40万。
HYP: Mr. Cheung said that the SAR Government's free virus testing for specific high-risk groups, namely staff of residential care homes for the elderly, residential and nursing homes for the disabled, restaurant staff, cab drivers and property management staff, involving up to 400000 people, is in full swing.

SRC: 他十分关注出现在安老院舍的感染个案，特区政府已为安老院舍院友安排特定的临时检疫中心。
HYP: He was very concerned about the cases of infection in RCHEs and the SAR Government has arranged specific temporary quarantine centers for RCHE residents.

SRC: 他表示，特区政府正在位于新界大屿山的竹篙湾检疫中心附近兴建隔离检疫设施，预计可在9月底前提供额外700套隔离房。
HYP: He said the SAR government is building an isolation and quarantine facility near the Penny's Bay Quarantine Centre on Lantau Island in the New Territories, which is expected to provide an additional 700 isolation rooms by the end of September.

SRC: 行政长官也在19日宣布，特区政府将在竹篙湾检疫中心多兴建2000间隔离房，并争取于今年年底前落成。
HYP: The Chief Executive also announced on the 19th that the SAR government will build 2000 more isolation rooms at the Penny's Bay Quarantine Centre and aim to complete them by the end of this year.

SRC: 加上该隔离检疫中心已经投入使用的800间，年底前竹篙湾检疫中心预计可提供共3500间隔离房。
HYP: Together with the isolation and quarantine center has been put into use 800 rooms, the Penny's Bay Quarantine Center is expected to provide a total of 3500 isolation rooms by the end of the year.

SRC: 香港目前共有四个正在运作的隔离检疫中心，共提供约2600间隔离房。
HYP: Hong Kong currently has four operating quarantine centers, providing a total of about 2600 isolation rooms.

SRC: 此外，特区政府于24日重新启用位于香港岛的鲤鱼门公园度假村作为社区隔离设施，用于收治50岁以下有独立自理能力的患者。
HYP: In addition, the SAR government reopened the Lei Yue Mun Park Resort on Hong Kong Island on the 24th as a community isolation facility for patients under the age of 50 who are capable of independent self-care.

SRC: 美国首次以“人民币汇率低估”对中国展开反补贴调查
HYP: US launches countervailing investigation on China for the first time on the basis of "undervaluation of RMB exchange rate

SRC: 美国首次以“人民币汇率低估<v>”</v>对中国展开反补贴调查
HYP: US launches countervailing investigation on China for the first time on the basis of "undervaluation of RMB exchange rate

SRC: 针对美国商务部近日宣布，决定对原产于中国的扎带（束线带）产品发起反倾销反补贴调查，并就“人民币汇率低估“项目发起调查。
HYP: The US Department of Commerce recently announced its decision to initiate an anti-dumping and countervailing investigation into ties (cable ties) originating in China and to launch an investigation into the "undervaluation of the RMB exchange rate" program.

SRC: 中国商务部指出，这是美国首次在反补贴案件中立案调查所谓”人民币汇率低估“项目，中方对此坚决反对。
HYP: China's Ministry of Commerce pointed out that this is the first time that the US has opened an investigation into the so-called "RMB exchange rate undervaluation" item in a countervailing case, which China firmly opposes.

SRC: 中国商务部23日晚间特别就此发布新闻稿表示，中国实行以市场供求为基础、参考一篮子货币进行调节、有管理的浮动汇率制度，市场在汇率形成中起决定性作用。
HYP: China's Ministry of Commerce issued a press release on the 23rd evening, saying that China implements a managed floating exchange rate system based on market supply and demand, adjusted with reference to a basket of currencies, and that the market plays a decisive role in the formation of the exchange rate.

SRC: 新闻稿强调，总体上，人民币汇率处于合理均衡水平，并没有被低估。
HYP: The press release emphasized that, in general, the RMB exchange rate is at a reasonable equilibrium level and is not undervalued.

SRC: 自2005年以来，人民币对美元已累计升值超过17% 。
HYP: Since 2005, the RMB has appreciated by more than 17% against the US dollar.

SRC: 根据国际清算银行公布的数据，2005年初至2020年5月，人民币名目有效汇率升值38%，实际有效汇率升值49%，是G20经济体中最强势的货币，在全球范围内也是升值幅度最大的货币之一。
HYP: According to data published by the Bank for International Settlements, between early 2005 and May 2020, the nominal effective exchange rate of the RMB appreciated by 38% and the real effective exchange rate by 49%, making it the strongest currency among the G20 economies and one of the most appreciated currencies globally.

SRC: 商务部指出，汇率问题超出了成员按照世界贸易组织规则进行反补贴调查的权限。
HYP: The Commerce Department noted that the exchange rate issue is beyond the authority of members to conduct countervailing investigations under World Trade Organization rules.

SRC: 美国今年2月修改法规以对别国汇率进行反补贴调查，已涉嫌违反世贸组织WTO规则，受到多方面反对。
HYP: The US regulation change in February this year to conduct countervailing investigations on other countries' exchange rates has been suspected of violating WTO rules and is opposed by many parties.

SRC: 新闻稿称，即使按照美国法规，申请人的申诉内容也存在大量错误，不具备财政资助、利益授予和专向性等反补贴必备要素。
HYP: Even according to the US regulations, the applicant's complaint contains a large number of errors and does not have the necessary elements of countervailing such as financial support, benefit award and exclusivity, the press release said.

SRC: 中方敦促美方遵守现有国际规则，停止对所谓“人民币汇率低估”进行反补贴调查。
HYP: China urged the US side to abide by existing international rules and stop conducting countervailing investigations into the so-called "undervaluation of the RMB exchange rate".

SRC: 受中美关系紧张情势进一步升高影响，离岸、在岸人民币对美元汇率22日盘中一度大贬，双双跌破1美元兑人民币7.0元关口。
HYP: Influenced by the further rise in tensions between the US and China, the offshore and onshore RMB depreciated significantly against the US dollar during the 22nd session, both falling below the RMB7.0 per dollar mark.

SRC: 美国商务部此举是否意在逼升人民币值得关注。
HYP: Whether the US Department of Commerce's move is intended to force up the yuan deserves attention.

SRC: 人民币对美元即期汇价23日升破7.0大关，收在6.9961。
HYP: The spot exchange rate of the yuan against the US dollar rose above the 7.0 mark on the 23rd, closing at 6.9961.

SRC: 受官方调控的人民币对美元汇率中间价，24日下调17个基本点，报6.9938。
HYP: The median exchange rate of the yuan against the dollar, which is officially regulated, was lowered by 17 basic points to 6.9938 on the 24th.

SRC: 受官方调控的人民币对<v>美元</v>汇率中间价，24日下调17个基本点，报6.9938。
HYP: The median exchange rate of the yuan against the dollar, which is officially regulated, was lowered by 17 basic points to 6.9938 on the 24th.

SRC: 26日是菲律宾总统杜特尔特发表任内第五份国情咨文(SONA)前一日，当天菲律宾累计确诊新冠肺炎病例过8万，其中总统府新闻部(PCOO)及其直属机构职员确诊数增到25例。
HYP: The 26th was the day before President Rodrigo Duterte delivered his fifth State of the Nation Address (SONA) in his term of office, the day the Philippines accumulated more than 80000 confirmed cases of new coronary pneumonia, with the number of confirmed cases among the employees of the Presidential Information Office (PCOO) and its direct agencies increasing to 25.

SRC: 为此，PCOO已专门准备一个未接触过确诊职员的工作组，配合杜特尔特总统发表SONA的新闻发布工作。
HYP: In response, the PCOO has prepared a task force of staff who have not been in contact with the confirmed cases to work with President Duterte in issuing the SONA press release.

SRC: PCOO部长马丁·安达纳尔26日接受DZBB电台采访表示，已为杜特尔特总统发表SONA方式预备两套方案。
HYP: PCOO Minister Martin Andanar said in an interview with DZBB radio on 26th that two plans have been prepared for President Duterte to deliver the SONA.

SRC: 按A计划，杜特尔特27日下午将在位于奎松市的菲律宾国会(Batasang Pambansa)大楼发表SONA。
HYP: According to the A plan, Duterte will deliver the SONA in the afternoon of 27th at the Philippine Congress (Batasang Pambansa) building in Quezon City.

SRC: 因为疫情原因，现场只为部分政府内阁成员和立法者安排50个席位，另专设视频会议室供其他内阁成员、地方政府官员等观看。
HYP: Because of the epidemic, only 50 seats were arranged for some government cabinet members and lawmakers, and another video conference room was set aside for other cabinet members, local government officials and others to watch.

SRC: 所有参会人员当天通过快速检测才能进入国会大楼。
HYP: All attendees passed a rapid test to enter the Capitol building that day.

SRC: 一旦参会者有一人检测呈阳性，即启动B计划，即杜特尔特总统在总统府马拉卡南宫发表SONA，现场则安排更少的听会席位。
HYP: Once one of the attendees tests positive, Plan B is activated, ie President Duterte delivers the SONA at the Malacañang Palace, the presidential palace, and fewer seats are arranged to hear the meeting.

SRC: 按照惯例，SONA将实时向菲全国直播。
HYP: As is customary, the SONA will be broadcast live to the entire country in real time.

SRC: 截至发稿时，菲总统府尚未确认杜特尔特的家人是否会出席SONA。
HYP: As of press time, the Philippine presidency has not yet confirmed whether Duterte's family will attend the SONA.

SRC: 安达纳尔说，杜特尔特总统的SONA，将重点说明政府将如何带领菲律宾应对新冠肺炎疫情、恢复社会经济生活；还会提到他上任时的承诺，即反政府腐败、打击非法毒品和减贫。
HYP: Andanar said that President Duterte's SONA will focus on how the government will lead the Philippines to deal with the New Coronary Pneumonia epidemic and restore socio-economic life; it will also mention his promises when he took office, namely to fight government corruption, illegal drugs and poverty reduction.

SRC: 杜特尔特还将说明本届政府的其他计划，包括创造更多的就业机会、振兴经济、促进教育，以及帮助在疫情中受难的海外菲律宾劳工等。
HYP: Duterte will also explain other plans of the current administration, including creating more jobs, reviving the economy, promoting education, and helping overseas Filipino workers who have suffered in the epidemic.

SRC: 深圳就出台健康条例公开征求意见-新华网
HYP: Shenzhen open for comments on the introduction of health regulations - Xinhua

SRC: 新华社深圳7月26日电（<v>记者</v>毛思倩、白瑜）鼓励居民勤做体检，及早发现问题；禁止向未成年人销售酒精饮料；建立网络游戏健康审查制度；用人单位要配备专兼职健康管理人员…… 日前《深圳经济特区健康条例（征求意见稿）》正式发布，深圳居民将有自己的“健康法”。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Shenzhen, July 26 (Xinhua Mao Siqian, Bai Yu) to encourage residents to do physical examinations diligently, early detection of problems; prohibit the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors; establish a health review system for online games; employers to be equipped with full-time and part-time health management personnel ...... A few days ago, "Shenzhen Special Economic Zone Health Regulations (draft for comments)" officially Shenzhen residents will have their own "health law".

SRC: 新华社深圳7月26日电（记者毛思倩、白瑜）鼓励居民勤做体检，及早发现问题；禁止向未成年人销售酒精饮料；建立网络游戏健康审查制度；用人单位要配备专兼职健康管理人员…… 日前《深圳经济特区健康条例（征求意见稿）》正式发布，深圳居民将有自己的“健康法”。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Shenzhen, July 26 (Xinhua Mao Siqian, Bai Yu) to encourage residents to do physical examinations diligently, early detection of problems; prohibit the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors; establish a health review system for online games; employers to be equipped with full-time and part-time health management personnel ...... A few days ago, "Shenzhen Special Economic Zone Health Regulations (draft for comments)" officially Shenzhen residents will have their own "health law".

SRC: 为了鼓励居民勤做体检，及早发现问题，上述征求意见稿提出，卫生健康部门应当根据不同年龄、职业等因素制定健康体检项目基本目录。
HYP: In order to encourage residents to do medical check-ups, early detection of problems, the above-mentioned draft for public comments, health departments should be based on different age, occupation and other factors to develop a basic catalog of health check-ups.

SRC: 属于健康体检项目基本目录范围内的健康体检费用，按照每人每年一次的标准由社会医疗保险统筹基金支付。
HYP: The cost of health check-ups within the basic catalog of health check-ups will be paid by the social health insurance fund at the rate of once a year per person.

SRC: 征求意见稿明确，用人单位应当合理配置人力资源，安排员工作息时间，对脑力和体力劳动负荷较重的员工，实行轮休制度，避免对员工健康造成人体机能过度损耗或者身心健康伤害，同时严格执行员工带薪休假制度。
HYP: The draft for comments clearly, the employer shall reasonably allocate human resources, arrange the rest time of employees, the heavy load of mental and physical work of employees, the implementation of the rotation system, to avoid excessive loss of human body functions or physical and mental health injury to employees' health, while strictly enforcing the system of paid leave for employees.

SRC: 此外，用人单位要配备专兼职健康管理人员，并定期组织开展员工健康体检。
HYP: In addition, the employer should be equipped with full-time and part-time health management personnel, and regularly organize health checks for employees.

SRC: 在未成年人身心健康方面，征求意见稿提出，禁止向未成年人销售酒精饮料，同时对酒精饮料的售卖位置进行了限制，对于违反规定的，将由市场监督管理部门责令改正，处3万元罚款。
HYP: In the physical and mental health of minors, the draft proposed to prohibit the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors, while the sale of alcoholic beverages location restrictions, for violations of the provisions, will be ordered by the market supervision and management departments to correct, a fine of 30000 yuan.

SRC: 除了“禁酒” ，未成年人也要“多运动” 。
HYP: In addition to the "ban on alcohol", minors should also "more sports".

SRC: 根据征求意见稿要求，学校要每天安排学生体育活动时间一小时以上。
HYP: According to the draft requirements, schools should arrange for students to spend more than one hour on physical activity every day.

SRC: 对于网络游戏，公安、文化广电旅游体育、网络监管、卫生健康等部门应当完善互联网上网服务营业场所健康监管制度，建立网络游戏健康审查制度，为促进青少年健康成长营造良好的交往空间、交往文化。
HYP: For online games, public security, culture, radio, television, tourism and sports, network supervision, health and other departments should improve the Internet Internet service business premises health supervision system, the establishment of online game health review system, to promote the healthy growth of young people to create a good interaction space, interaction culture.

SRC: 此外，征求意见稿还提出流感病人出入公共场所必须戴口罩，医疗卫生机构未经同意泄露病人隐私罚款2万元等。
HYP: In addition, the consultation draft also proposes that influenza patients must wear masks when entering and leaving public places, and medical and health institutions are fined 20000 yuan for leaking patient privacy without consent, etc.

SRC: 值得注意的是，除了居民的身心健康外，征求意见稿还要求，深圳各部门在制定涉及城市空间规划与建设、工业园区规划与建设、资源开发利用与生态环境保护、生物医药产业发展等规划、规范性文件以及批准重大建设工程和实施重大公共服务项目前，应当评估公共政策实施对人群健康的影响。
HYP: It is worth noting that, in addition to the physical and mental health of residents, the draft also requires that all departments in Shenzhen in the development of urban space planning and construction, industrial park planning and construction, resource development and utilization and ecological environmental protection, biomedical industry development and other planning, regulatory documents and approval of major construction projects and the implementation of major public service projects before, should assess the impact of public policy implementation on the health of the population.

SRC: 未经评估或者经评估将对城市公共卫生或者居民健康产生较严重不利影响的，不得制定出台或者批准实施。
HYP: Without assessment or assessed will have a more serious adverse impact on urban public health or the health of the residents, shall not be developed and introduced or approved for implementation.

SRC: 可可西里藏羚羊进入回迁季-新华网
HYP: Tibetan antelopes in Cocosili enter return season - Xinhua

SRC: 新华社西宁7月25日电（记者王金金）记者从三江源国家公园管理局长江源园区可可西里管理处五道梁保护站获悉，监测显示，此前前往可可西里腹地卓乃湖区域迁徙产仔的藏羚羊正陆续结束产仔，开始携幼仔返回原栖息地。
HYP: EMPTY

SRC: <v>新华社西宁7月25日电（记者王金金）记者从三江源国家公园管理局长江源园区可可西里管理处五道梁保护站获悉，监测显示，此前前往可可西里腹地卓乃湖区域迁徙产仔的藏羚羊正陆续结束产仔，开始携幼仔返回原栖息地。</v>
HYP: EMPTY

SRC: 五道梁保护站附近的监控画面显示，7月25日，大约40只雌性藏羚羊带领3只藏羚羊幼仔陆续通过青藏公路3002公里处、青藏铁路五道梁北大桥，藏羚羊已经开始回迁。
HYP: Monitoring images near the Wudaoliang Protection Station show that on July 25, about 40 female Tibetan antelopes led three Tibetan antelope cubs through the Qinghai-Tibet Highway 3002 kilometers and the Qinghai-Tibet Railway Wudaoliang North Bridge one after another, the Tibetan antelopes have begun to return.

SRC: 专家分析，近年来，回迁羊群中藏羚羊幼仔数量占藏羚羊群总体数量的四分之一至五分之一。
HYP: According to expert analysis, in recent years, the number of Tibetan antelope cubs in the returning herd accounts for one-fourth to one-fifth of the overall number of Tibetan antelope herd.

SRC: 中国科学院西北高原生物研究所副研究员连新明说：“回迁初期，藏羚羊面临较高的被捕食风险，因此羊群中的幼仔数量会比较少，甚至可能出现没有幼仔的情况。”
HYP: Lian Xinming, an associate researcher at the Northwest Plateau Institute of Biology of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, said, "At the beginning of the return migration, Tibetan antelope face a higher risk of predation, so the number of young in the herd will be relatively small, and there may even be no young."

SRC: 根据三江源国家公园管理局长江源园区可可西里管理处统计，藏羚羊回迁数量总体呈逐年上升态势，2019年藏羚羊回迁数量为4860只，比2018年增加338只。
HYP: According to the statistics of the Yangtze River Source Park of the Three Rivers National Park Administration, the overall number of Tibetan antelopes returning to the park is rising year by year, with 4860 Tibetan antelopes returning in 2019, 338 more than in 2018.

SRC: 连新明说：“预计今年藏羚羊回迁将在9月初结束，回迁藏羚羊数量仍有望继续增加。”
HYP: Lian Xinming said, "The return migration of Tibetan antelope this year is expected to end in early September, and the number of returning Tibetan antelopes is still expected to continue to increase."

SRC: 藏羚羊属国家一级保护动物。
HYP: The Tibetan antelope is a national-level protected animal.

SRC: 每年5月底，来自青海三江源、西藏羌塘、新疆阿尔金山等地的藏羚羊都要前往位于可可西里腹地的卓乃湖产羔。
HYP: At the end of May every year, Tibetan antelopes from the Three Rivers Source in Qinghai, Qiangtang in Tibet, and Arjinshan in Xinjiang are going to lamb at the Zhuo Nai Lake located in the hinterland of Cocosiri.

SRC: 我国藏羚羊保护专家、陕西省动物研究所（西北濒危动物研究所）研究员吴晓民说：“藏羚羊回迁是雌性藏羚羊结束产仔后，陆续带着幼仔回到栖息地的过程。起初离开产仔地的回迁群体较为庞大，但随后藏羚羊将根据不同的地理种群、沿不同路径回到它们各自的栖息地。”
HYP: Wu Xiaomin, an expert in Tibetan antelope conservation in China and a researcher at the Shaanxi Zoological Research Institute (Northwest Institute of Endangered Animals), said, "The return migration of Tibetan antelopes is a process in which female Tibetan antelopes return to their habitat one after another with their young after they have finished giving birth. Initially, the herds that leave their litters are relatively large, but then the Tibetan antelope will return to their respective habitats along different paths, depending on the geographic population."

SRC: 为确保藏羚羊群安全回迁，记者了解到，日前三江源国家公园管理局长江源园区可可西里管理处已安排工作人员在主要回迁区域，持续开展视频监测和辖区巡逻。
HYP: In order to ensure the safe return of the Tibetan antelope herd, the reporter learned that recently, the Yangtze River Source Park of the Three Rivers National Park Administration has arranged staff in the main return migration area, continuous video monitoring and precinct patrols.

SRC: 如发现有藏羚羊群试图穿越公路，巡山队员会在第一时间进行临时交通管制，让羊群安全通过野生动物通道，保证其在回迁途中尽可能少受人类干扰。
HYP: If a Tibetan antelope herd is found trying to cross the highway, patrol members will be the first time to carry out temporary traffic control, so that the flock safely through the wildlife channel to ensure that it is on the way back to the migration as little as possible by human interference.

SRC: 那么，日常生活中到底该如何解暑？
HYP: So, how exactly do you beat the heat in your daily life?

SRC: 专家建议，夏日外出尽量避开高温时段，最好不要在中午前后在烈日下行走或劳动，因为这个时间段的阳光最强烈，发生中暑的可能性较高。
HYP: Experts recommend that you try to avoid high temperature periods when you go out in summer. It is best not to walk or work in the hot sun around noon because the sun is strongest during this time and the possibility of heat stroke is higher.

SRC: 如果此时段必须外出，一定要做好防护工作，如打遮阳伞、戴遮阳帽、戴太阳镜，有条件的最好涂抹防晒霜，以防晒伤。
HYP: If you must go out at this time, be sure to do a good job of protection, such as playing umbrellas, wearing sun hats, wearing sunglasses, the best conditions to apply sunscreen to prevent sunburn.

SRC: 衣服尽量选用浅色、透气性好的棉、麻、丝类质地，少穿化纤品类服装，以免大量出汗时不能及时散热，引起中暑。
HYP: Clothes try to use light-colored, breathable cotton, linen, silk texture, less wear chemical fiber clothing, so as not to sweat a lot when the heat can not be timely, causing heatstroke.

SRC: 高温闷热天气时，要准备充足的水饮，及时饮用，不要等口渴了才喝水，因为一旦感觉口渴表示身体已经缺水了，每次喝水控制在150毫升至200毫升，喝温开水，不要喝冰水。
HYP: High temperature hot weather, to prepare sufficient water to drink in a timely manner, do not wait until thirsty to drink water, because once you feel thirsty that the body has been dehydrated, each drink of water control at 150 ml to 200 ml, drink warm water, do not drink ice water.

SRC: 根据气温高低，一般人员每天喝1.5升至2升水，高温作业人员，每天喝3升至5升水。
HYP: According to the temperature, the general staff drink 1.5 liters to 2 liters of water per day, high-temperature workers, drink 3 liters to 5 liters of water per day.

SRC: 出汗较多时可适当补充一些盐水，弥补人体因出汗而失去的盐分。
HYP: When sweating more can be properly supplemented with some salt water to make up for the salt lost by the body due to sweating.

SRC: 另外，夏季人体容易缺钾，使人感到倦怠疲乏，含钾茶水是极好的消暑饮品。
HYP: In addition, the body is prone to potassium deficiency in summer, making people feel tired and weary, potassium tea is an excellent summer drink.

SRC: 夏天多食含水量高的蔬果，如生菜、黄瓜、西红柿等；新鲜水果，如桃子、杏、西瓜、甜瓜等水分含量为80％至90％，都可以用来补充水分；乳制品既能补水，又能满足身体的营养之需。
HYP: In summer, eat more fruits and vegetables with high water content, such as lettuce, cucumbers, tomatoes, etc.; fresh fruits, such as peaches, apricots, watermelons, melons and other water content of 80% to 90%, can be used to replenish water; dairy products can be hydrated, but also to meet the body's nutritional needs.

SRC: 夏天多食含水量高的蔬果，如生菜、黄瓜、西红柿等；新鲜水果，如桃子、杏、西瓜、甜瓜<v>等</v>水分含量为80％至90％，都可以用来补充水分；乳制品既能补水，又能满足身体的营养之需。
HYP: In summer, eat more fruits and vegetables with high water content, such as lettuce, cucumbers, tomatoes, etc.; fresh fruits, such as peaches, apricots, watermelons, melons and other water content of 80% to 90%, can be used to replenish water; dairy products can be hydrated, but also to meet the body's nutritional needs.

SRC: 此外，在高温环境中工作的人群，应适当补充含有钾、镁等元素的饮品。
HYP: In addition, people working in a hot environment should be properly supplemented with drinks containing potassium, magnesium and other elements.

SRC: 夏天日长夜短，气温高，人体新陈代谢旺盛，消耗也大，容易感到疲劳。
HYP: Long days and short nights in summer, high temperatures, the body's metabolism is strong, consumption is also large, easy to feel fatigue.

SRC: 充足的睡眠，可使大脑和身体各系统都得到放松，既利于工作和学习，也是预防中暑的措施。
HYP: Adequate sleep can make the brain and body systems are relaxed, both for work and study, is also a measure to prevent heat stroke.

SRC: 专家称，最佳就寝时间是22时至23时，最佳起床时间是5时30分至6时30分。
HYP: Experts say that the best time to go to bed is 22:00 to 23:00, the best time to get up is 5:30 to 6:30.

SRC: 睡眠时注意不要躺在空调出风口和电风扇下，以免患上空调病和热伤风。
HYP: Take care not to lie under air conditioning vents and electric fans while sleeping to avoid air conditioning disease and heat stroke.

SRC: 专家建议，在户外活动或进行高温作业的人群，可随身携带十滴水、人丹、藿香正气水或藿香正气丸等防暑药品，或放置在就近工作场所，随时使用，以防发生中暑。
HYP: Experts suggest that people who are active outdoors or working in high temperatures can carry with them heatstroke prevention medicines such as ten drops of water, Ren Dan, patchouli or patchouli pills, or place them in the nearest workplace and use them at any time to prevent heatstroke.

SRC: 毕业生艺术展搬进商场公益展出-新华网
HYP: Graduate art exhibition moved into shopping mall for public interest - Xinhua

SRC: 在各大院校“云毕业”的季节里，一场难得的线下毕业生艺术展上周末温暖启幕。
HYP: In the season of "cloud graduation" at major universities, a rare offline art exhibition of graduates opened last weekend.

SRC: 不过它既不在美术馆，也不在校园里，而是出现在了朝阳大悦城的公共空间，并对公众免费开放，将持续至8月23日。
HYP: But it was neither in an art museum nor on campus, but in the public space of Chaoyang Joy City, and was open to the public for free until August 23.

SRC: 记者了解到，这场2020毕业生艺术展，征集了来自中央美术学院、中国传媒大学及天津美术学院的57位青年艺术家的50件/组作品，展览空间从2层延伸至6层，并充分利用楼内灯箱进行平面作品展示，最大程度烘托出毕业季的艺术氛围。
HYP: The exhibition space extends from the 2nd floor to the 6th floor, and makes full use of the light boxes in the building to display flat works, so as to maximize the artistic atmosphere of the graduation season.

SRC: 在疫情之下，这场展览的意义显得尤为特殊。
HYP: Under the epidemic, the significance of this exhibition is particularly special.

SRC: 朝阳大悦城美陈负责人葛平坦言：“我们选择将走向'云端'的毕业展再度带回线下空间，也希望让更多人看到青年对自身的探索和对世界的理解，放大艺术对于社会和心灵的疗愈力量。”
HYP: Ge Ping, the person in charge of the aesthetics of Chaoyang Joy City, said frankly: "We chose to bring the graduation exhibition towards the 'cloud' back to the offline space again, also hoping to let more people see the youth's exploration of themselves and their understanding of the world, and amplify the healing power of art for society and the soul. "

SRC: 她透露，此次参展的作品是向几大艺术院校的毕业生们征集而来，又从中挑选了适合商业空间展示的，作品形式从传统的架上绘画、雕塑，到新媒体装置、交互动画、VR全景，体量与丰富程度为历年之最。
HYP: She revealed that the works exhibited in this exhibition were collected from graduates of several art colleges and universities, from which those suitable for commercial space were selected. The works range from traditional easel painting and sculpture to new media installation, interactive animation and VR panorama, with the largest volume and richness ever.

SRC: 其中，李云肖在《2020的第一场战役》中通过机械和手工混合的创作语言，表达了自己在这场疫情中的感受；刘嘉颖通过以太坊区块链创作的作品《Sound Money》探讨了“加密货币” 、“信用创造” 、“交易”等主题；张家祺的《猫林》与邱达强的《羁》表现的都是经常与人类相伴的动物，从中可以看到青年艺术家对人与动物关系的理解；而朱仲鱼的作品《信仰的冬天—礼物》则是在提醒成长中的年轻人，“当有一天事业有成时，不忘初心，记得那份单纯与真诚。”
HYP: Among them, Li Yunxiao's "The First Battle of 2020" expresses his feelings in the epidemic through a mixture of mechanical and manual creation language; Liu Jiaying's "Sound Money" explores "cryptocurrency", "credit creation", "transaction" and other issues through the ethereum blockchain. Zhang Jiaqi's "Cat Forest" and Qiu Daqiang's "Custody" both show animals that are often accompanied by humans, from which we can see the young artists' understanding of the relationship between humans and animals. Zhu Zhongyou's work "Winter of Faith - Gift" is a reminder to the growing young people, "When one day your career is successful, don't forget the original heart and remember the simplicity and sincerity."

SRC: 在为数不多的亲自布展的毕业生中，就有来自天津美术学院雕塑系的李敬寅。
HYP: Among the few graduates who set up the exhibition in person was Li Jingyin from the sculpture department of Tianjin Academy of Fine Arts.

SRC: “我是7月7日来北京的，当时其实有点担心疫情，还提前三天做了核酸检测，是带着酒精棉和检测报告来布展的。”
HYP: "I came to Beijing on July 7, when I was actually a little worried about the epidemic, and also had a nucleic acid test three days in advance, and came to set up the exhibition with alcohol sponges and test reports."

SRC: 他的作品《昨日如谜》结构比较复杂，必须亲力亲为。
HYP: His work "Yesterday is like a mystery" has a complex structure and he had to do it himself.

SRC: 同时，他还承担着帮助同学修补破损作品的任务。
HYP: At the same time, he also took on the task of helping his classmates repair their broken works.

SRC: “布展到凌晨四点半，然后再做修补，时间很紧，都忘了和作品合个影，也有点遗憾。”
