HYP: "Setting up the exhibition until 4:30 am and then doing the repair, the time was so tight that I forgot to take a picture with the work, which was also a bit regrettable."

SRC: 他希望，等疫情更稳定了，再和同学们来北京看看自己的作品展。
HYP: He hopes that when the epidemic is more stable, he and his classmates will come back to Beijing to see the exhibition of his works.

SRC: （记者李俐）
HYP: (Reporter Li Li)

SRC: 奖励5万元湖北恩施表扬沙子坝滑坡“预警第一人” - 中新网
HYP: Rewarded 50000 yuan Hubei Enshi praise sand dam landslide "warning the first person" - CNN

SRC: 湖北日报讯(记者林晶)7月26日，恩施市通报<v>表扬</v>为沙子坝滑坡预警作出重要贡献的地质灾害点监测员陈光明，并为他送去5万元奖金。
HYP: Hubei Daily (Reporter Lin Jing) July 26, Enshi City, informed the important contribution of geological disaster site monitor Chen Guangming for the Shaziba landslide early warning, and sent him a bonus of 50000 yuan.

SRC: 湖北日报讯(记者林晶)7月26日，恩施市通报表扬为沙子坝滑坡预警作出重要贡献的地质灾害点监测员陈光明，并为他送去5万元奖金。
HYP: Hubei Daily (Reporter Lin Jing) July 26, Enshi City, informed the important contribution of geological disaster site monitor Chen Guangming for the Shaziba landslide early warning, and sent him a bonus of 50000 yuan.

SRC: 同时，号召全市党员干部学习他恪尽职守、敢于担当、主动作为、乐于奉献的精神。
HYP: At the same time, the city's party members and cadres were called upon to learn his spirit of dedication, courage, initiative and devotion.

SRC: 7月21日，恩施市屯堡乡马者村沙子坝发生滑坡，导致清江干流河道形成堰塞湖，58岁的陈光明是预警此次滑坡的第一人。
HYP: On July 21, a landslide occurred in Shazi Dam, Ma Shi Village, Tunbao Township, Enshi City, resulting in the formation of a weir in the main channel of the Qingjiang River. 58-year-old Chen Guangming was the first person to warn of the landslide.

SRC: 7月17日下午，陈光明得知村民家中墙壁开裂的消息，立即到现场查看。
HYP: On the afternoon of July 17, Chen Guangming learned of the cracked walls of the villagers' homes and immediately went to the scene to check.

SRC: 他刚从家中走出五六百米，便看到村组公路裂开四五厘米，沿着公路一直延伸到玉米地，长度约50米。
HYP: He just walked out of his home five or six hundred meters, he saw the village group road cracked four or five centimeters, along the road has been extended to the corn field, the length of about 50 meters.

SRC: 陈光明顿生警觉，第一时间将公路开裂的照片发到乡“地质灾害监测员联系群”里。
HYP: Chen Guangming was alerted and sent the photos of the cracked road to the township's "geohazard monitor contact group" at the first opportunity.

SRC: 经屯堡乡自然规划所相关负责人现场查看和判断，滑坡的可能性很大，随即作出撤离群众的决定。
HYP: The person in charge of natural planning in Tumbao Township looked at the site and judged that the possibility of landslides was high, and then made the decision to evacuate the people.

SRC: 陈光明的及时预警，为影响区内315户1339名群众的安全撤离贏得了36小时的宝贵时间。
HYP: Chen Guangming's timely warning won 36 hours of precious time for the safe evacuation of 1339 people in 315 households in the affected area.

SRC: 此次重大地质灾害，无一人伤亡。
HYP: No one was killed or injured in this major geological disaster.

SRC: 陈光明认真负责的敬业精神得到群众的称赞。
HYP: Chen Guangming's serious and responsible dedication was praised by the public.

SRC: 面对赞誉，他说：“不存在救了谁，这是我的责任。 ”
HYP: In the face of praise, he said, "There is no such thing as saving anyone, it's my responsibility. "

SRC: 警方通报“女大学生赴青海旅游失联”细节搜救工作仍在继续-新华网
HYP: Police informed the "female college students to Qinghai tourism lost" details search and rescue work is continuing - Xinhua

SRC: 新华社西宁7月26日电（记者王金金周喆）近日，“一名女大学生前往青海格尔木旅游后失联”一事引发网民关注。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Xining, July 26 (Xinhua Wang Jinjin Zhou Zhe) recently, "a female college students to travel to Qinghai Golmud after the loss of" the matter triggered netizens concern.

SRC: 青海省海西蒙古族藏族自治州格尔木市公安局26日通报称，南京某大学学生黄某某目前仍处于失联状态，多地警方正深入黄某某失联地沿线，积极开展寻找工作。
HYP: The public security bureau of Golmud City, Haixi Mongolian and Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, Qinghai Province, informed on the 26th that a university student in Nanjing, Huang Moumou is still in a lost state, the police are deep along the lost place of Huang Moumou, actively carry out the search work.

SRC: 2020年7月10日，海西州格尔木市公安局治安支队接到上级通知，南京某大学学生黄某某于7月5日乘坐Z164列车由南京至格尔木，于7月9日在青海省玉树藏族自治州曲麻莱县索南达杰保护站清水河西南区域处手机关机并失联，要求协助查找。
HYP: On July 10, 2020, the public security detachment of Golmud City, Haixi Prefecture, received a notice from the higher level, Nanjing University student Huang Moumou on July 5 by Z164 train from Nanjing to Golmud, on July 9 in Qinghai Province, Yushu Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, Qumalai County, Sonam Dajie protection station southwest of the Clearwater River area at the cell phone off and lost, requesting assistance to find.

SRC: 根据格尔木市公安局的调查情况，黄某某于7月6日19时54分进入青海省境内，7日4时抵达格尔木市。
HYP: According to the investigation of the Public Security Bureau of Golmud City, Huang entered the territory of Qinghai Province at 19:54 on July 6 and arrived in Golmud City at 4:00 on the 7th.

SRC: 当日8时，失联人员黄某某乘坐出租车由格尔木市黄河大酒店朝G109国道出发，并于12时到达可可西里索南达杰保护站，出租车司机单独返回，黄某某7日15时到达索南达杰保护站附近清水河区域直至9日18时许在该区域关机。
HYP: At 8:00 that day, the lost person Huangmoumou took a cab from Golmud City Yellow River Hotel towards the G109 national highway, and 12:00 arrived in Cocosili Sonam Dajie protection station, the cab driver returned alone, Huangmoumoumoumoumoumoumou arrived at 15:00 on the 7th Sonam Dajie protection station near the Clearwater River area until 18:00 on the 9th in the area shut down.

SRC: 在进一步调查中，警方发现黄某某曾于7月13日17时07分通过乃吉沟检查站。
HYP: In further investigation, the police found that Huang Moumou had passed through the Naiji Gou checkpoint at 17:07 on July 13.

SRC: 乃吉沟检查站是西藏自治区那曲市在格尔木市南山口设立的检查站，由于该检查站无视频监控，无法确定本人及所乘车辆信息，警方只能驾车在沿途进行查找，协调西藏沿途各检查站若发现黄某某，立即与格尔木市公安局取得联系。
HYP: Naiji Gou checkpoint is the Tibet Autonomous Region Naqu City in Golmud City, the southern mountain pass set up checkpoints, due to the checkpoint no video surveillance, can not determine my own and the vehicle information, the police can only drive along the way to find, coordinate the Tibetan checkpoints along the way if found Huang Moumou, immediately contact with the Golmud City Public Security Bureau.

SRC: 根据最新情况，7月26日凌晨1时，格尔木市公安局组织救援力量携带救援装备，前往青藏公路沿线不冻泉保护站、索南达杰保护站进行查找，并积极与四川警方、西藏警方、南京警方取得联系，共同开展工作，目前查找搜救工作仍在继续。
HYP: According to the latest situation, July 26 at 1:00 am, Golmud City Public Security Bureau organized rescue forces with rescue equipment, to the Qinghai-Tibet Highway along the Frozen Spring Protection Station, Sonam Dajie Protection Station to find, and actively contact with the Sichuan police, Tibetan police, Nanjing police to work together, the search and rescue work is still continuing.

SRC: 当地警方希望广大网友和社会各界如有相关线索，及时向格尔木警方和南京江宁警方提供，争取早日找到失联人员黄某某。
HYP: The local police hope that the majority of netizens and the community if there are relevant clues, timely to the police in Golmud and Nanjing Jiangning police to provide, and strive to find the lost person Huang Moumou early.

SRC: 同时，有关专家提示，游客在户外活动时要规范、理性、文明，随时留意路边警示标志，切勿冒险进入无人区，遇到突发情况，要及时报警。
HYP: At the same time, the relevant experts suggest that tourists in the outdoor activities should be standardized, rational, civilized, always pay attention to the roadside warning signs, do not risk entering the uninhabited areas, encounter unexpected situations, to promptly report to the police.

SRC: 俄罗斯举办阅兵式庆祝海军节-新华网
HYP: Russia celebrates Navy Day with military parade - Xinhua

SRC: 7月26日，在俄罗斯圣彼得堡，舰艇列队参加海军节庆祝活动。
HYP: Ships parade for the Navy Day celebration in St. Petersburg, Russia, July 26.

SRC: 新华社发（莫京娜摄）
HYP: Xinhua News Agency (Photo by Mogina)

SRC: 新华社莫斯科7月26日电<v>（记者鲁金博）</v>俄罗斯各舰队26日举行阅兵式庆祝海军节，纪念俄海军成立324周年。
HYP: MOSCOW, July 26 (Xinhua) -- Russian fleets held a parade to celebrate Navy Day on July 26 to commemorate the 324th anniversary of the founding of the Russian Navy.

SRC: 当天，俄罗斯北海、波罗的海、黑海、里海和太平洋舰队分别在各自基地所在海域举行了阅兵式，共有1.5万军人、219艘各类舰艇和71架军用飞机参加。
HYP: On that day, Russia's North Sea, Baltic Sea, Black Sea, Caspian Sea and Pacific Fleet held parades in the sea where their respective bases are located, with 15000 soldiers, 219 various types of ships and 71 military aircraft participating.

SRC: 俄总统、武装力量最高统帅普京出席了波罗的海舰队的阅兵式。
HYP: Russian President and Supreme Commander of the Armed Forces Vladimir Putin attended the parade of the Baltic Fleet.

SRC: 约4000名军人、46艘舰艇和40余架战机参加了当地的阅兵式。
HYP: About 4000 servicemen, 46 ships and more than 40 warplanes took part in the local parade.

SRC: 普京首先在位于波罗的海喀琅施塔得海军基地水域检阅了舰艇列队。
HYP: Putin first reviewed the fleet in the waters of the Kronstadt naval base in the Baltic Sea.

SRC: 之后，他乘坐快艇抵达圣彼得堡市中心的涅瓦河水域并上岸，观看了在涅瓦河上举行的阅兵式。
HYP: After that, he arrived at the waters of the Neva River in the center of St. Petersburg by speedboat and went ashore to watch the parade held on the Neva River.

SRC: 普京在阅兵式上发表讲话说，俄海军装备的现代化技术水平近年来持续提升，俄海军2020年将总共接收约40艘配备独特高超音速打击系统的新型舰艇。
HYP: In his speech at the parade, Putin said that the modernization of Russian naval equipment has continued to improve in recent years and that the Russian Navy will receive a total of about 40 new ships equipped with unique hypersonic strike systems in 2020.

SRC: 另外，俄海军总司令叶夫梅诺夫日前在接受俄国防部机关报《红星报》采访时说，俄建造舰艇的计划得到了有效落实，2020年俄海军计划接收的新舰艇数量是近年来规模较大的。
HYP: In addition, Russian Navy Commander-in-Chief Yevmenov said in an interview with the Russian Defense Ministry's organ "Red Star" that Russia's plan to build ships is being effectively implemented and the number of new ships the Russian Navy plans to receive in 2020 is the largest in recent years.

SRC: 1696年，沙皇彼得大帝着手组建海上舰队，开创了俄海军历史。
HYP: The history of the Russian Navy began in 1696, when Tsar Peter the Great set out to build a naval fleet.

SRC: 每年7月最后一个星期日是俄罗斯海军节。
HYP: Russian Navy Day is celebrated every year on the last Sunday of July.

SRC: 针对疫情防控工作出现的新变化，自7月17日以来，新疆各级工会响应自治区总工会的号召，积极参与疫情防控工作。
HYP: In response to the new changes in the prevention and control of the epidemic, since July 17, trade unions at all levels in Xinjiang have responded to the call of the autonomous regional federation of trade unions and actively participated in the prevention and control of the epidemic.

SRC: 天山南北工会干部、职工、劳动模范走进街道社区、居民群众中，开展送菜送药、消毒灭菌、宣传防疫知识等活动，服务职工群众，用实际行动彰显工会“硬核力量”。
HYP: Tianshan North and South trade union cadres, workers, model workers into the streets and communities, the masses, to carry out food and medicine, disinfection and sterilization, publicity epidemic prevention knowledge and other activities to serve the masses, with practical action to highlight the union "hardcore power".

SRC: 近日，乌鲁木齐市天山区总工会慰问组一行，将一批急需的疫情防控生活物资送到了12个隔离点的工作人员手中。
HYP: Recently, the sympathy group of the Urumqi Tianshan District Federation of Trade Unions sent a group of much-needed living supplies for epidemic prevention and control to the staff of 12 isolation sites.

SRC: 疫情发生后，天山区总第一时间投入经费105万余元，紧急下拨给23个直属基层工会。
HYP: After the outbreak of the epidemic, the Tianshan District General first time to invest funds of more than 1.05 million yuan, urgently allocated to the 23 directly under the grass-roots trade unions.

SRC: 中建新疆建工一建党委副书记、工会主席赵相国接到公司关于疫情防控的通知后，主动请缨，选择留在单位值班，为职工保驾护航。
HYP: After receiving the notice from the company about the epidemic prevention and control, Zhao Xiangguo, deputy secretary of the party committee and chairman of the labor union of CCBC Xinjiang I, took the initiative and chose to stay on duty in the unit to protect the workers.

SRC: 他为居住在单位宿舍和新入职的职工送去做饭的炊具、食品及日用品，并组织人员每隔两天为他们送一次生活必备物资。
HYP: He sent cooking utensils, food and daily necessities for cooking to employees living in unit dormitories and new recruits, and organized personnel to send them essential supplies for life every two days.

SRC: “7月21日起，对坚守战'疫'一线的干部职工进行摸底，并采取线上下单、商家送货上门的方式，先行为乌鲁木齐地区704名一线职工群众补充购买防疫用品和生活物资。”
HYP: "From July 21, the cadres and workers who hold fast to the front line of the battle 'epidemic' were mapped, and the way of online order and door-to-door delivery by merchants was adopted to purchase additional epidemic prevention supplies and living materials for 704 front-line workers and people in Urumqi area first."

SRC: 新疆交通运输工会负责人告诉记者，面对突发疫情，他们全力做好疫情防控服务保障、稳步推进交通运输发展各项工作，营造齐心战“疫”的浓厚氛围。
HYP: The person in charge of the Xinjiang Transport Union told reporters that in the face of the sudden epidemic, they are doing their best to provide services to prevent and control the epidemic and steadily promote the development of transportation, creating a strong atmosphere of unity to fight the "epidemic".

SRC: 当前正值夏季高温，各级工会紧盯疫情防控重点地区的一线职工，把“送清凉”关心关爱落到实处。
HYP: The current summer heat, trade unions at all levels focus on the key areas of the epidemic prevention and control of front-line workers, the "cool" care and concern to the implementation.

SRC: 7月19日，乌鲁木齐县总工会启动向疫情防控一线职工“送清凉”慰问活动，全县警务站、卡点和卫生系统收到了饮料、水果等慰问品。
HYP: July 19, Urumqi County Federation of Trade Unions launched to the epidemic prevention and control of front-line workers "to send cool" condolence activities, the county police stations, card stations and health systems received drinks, fruit and other condolences.

SRC: “工会干部要进一步提高政治站位、强化责任担当，用关怀温暖人心，用行动鼓舞斗志。
HYP: "Trade union cadres should further improve the political stance, strengthen responsibility, warm the hearts of people with care, with action to inspire morale.

SRC: 要充分发挥工会组织凝聚职工、团结职工的作用，做好疫情防控服务保障，积极维护广大职工的健康权益，把关爱送到一线职工身边。”
HYP: We should give full play to the role of trade union organizations to coalesce workers and unite them, do a good job of epidemic prevention and control services, actively safeguard the health rights and interests of the majority of workers, and send care to front-line workers."

SRC: 自治区总工会相关负责人表示。
HYP: The relevant person in charge of the Autonomous Region Federation of Trade Unions said.

SRC: 2020年直招士官工作全面展开-新华网
HYP: 2020 direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers work in full swing - Xinhua

SRC: 新华社北京7月26日电（记者贾启龙）军委政治工作部、军委国防动员部近日联合印发通知，部署展开2020年从普通高等学校毕业生中直接招收士官工作。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 26 (Xinhua Jia Qilong), the Political Work Department of the Military Commission, the Defense Mobilization Department of the Military Commission recently jointly issued a notice, the deployment of the 2020 direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers from ordinary higher education graduates work.

SRC: 今年直招士官涵盖计算机、自动化、机械等64类270余个军地通用专业，重点加大无人机、航海、航空航天、电子信息、小语种等专业招收力度，招收规模相比去年增加近2000人。
HYP: This year's direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers covering computers, automation, machinery and other 64 categories of more than 270 military general professional, focusing on increasing the recruitment of drones, navigation, aerospace, electronic information, small languages and other professional recruitment efforts, the scale of recruitment compared to last year increased by nearly 2000 people.

SRC: 今年直招士官工作与义务兵征集同步组织实施，8月1日开始，9月30日结束。
HYP: This year, the work of direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers and compulsory recruitment of simultaneous organization and implementation, August 1, the end of September 30.

SRC: 应征青年可以通过全国征兵网（网址：http://www.gfbzb.gov.cn）查询直招士官条件和各地招收专业分布情况，符合专业范围和招收条件的在线提交报名信息，并根据应征地兵役机关统一要求，参加体格检查、政治考核等后续招收工作。
HYP: You can check the conditions of direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers and the distribution of recruitment around the country through the national conscription website (website: http://www.gfbzb.gov.cn), submit the registration information online if you meet the professional scope and recruitment conditions, and participate in the physical examination, political examination and other follow-up recruitment work according to the unified requirements of the conscription place military service organs.

SRC: 因招收专业和计划限制未能被招收为士官的合格青年，可以参加义务兵征集，服义务兵役期满选取为士官时，在普通高等学校按规定学制就读的年数视同服役时间。
HYP: The qualified young people who cannot be recruited as non-commissioned officers due to the limitation of recruitment and plan can participate in compulsory recruitment, and when they are selected as non-commissioned officers at the end of their compulsory military service, the number of years of study in general higher education according to the prescribed academic system is considered as service time.

SRC: 因招收专业和计划限制未能被招收为士官的合格青年，可以参加义务兵征集，服义务兵役期满选取为士官时，在普通高等<v>学校</v>按规定学制就读的年数视同服役时间。
HYP: The qualified young people who cannot be recruited as non-commissioned officers due to the limitation of recruitment and plan can participate in compulsory recruitment, and when they are selected as non-commissioned officers at the end of their compulsory military service, the number of years of study in general higher education according to the prescribed academic system is considered as service time.

SRC: 今年士官招收工作由省级或地市级人民政府征兵办公室统一组织，报名潜力丰富专业将在综合衡量报名对象学历层次、在校期间专业课成绩、取得职业资格证书等情况基础上择优遴选；稀缺专业将面向本地符合专业要求、具备招收优势的院校定向对口招收。
HYP: This year, the recruitment of non-commissioned officers by the provincial or municipal people's government conscription office unified organization, registration potential rich professional will be a comprehensive measure of the level of education, professional course performance during school, to obtain vocational qualifications based on merit selection; scarce professional will be oriented to the local professional requirements, with the advantages of recruiting colleges and universities to recruit counterparts.

SRC: 根据疫情常态化防控要求，今年直招士官原则上不安排自行报到，将与义务兵同步组织运输入营。
HYP: According to the normal epidemic prevention and control requirements, this year's direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers in principle, do not arrange their own reporting, will be synchronized with the organization of conscripts transported into the camp.

SRC: 直接招收士官入伍时间从2020年9月1日起算，部队下达士官任职命令的时间为2020年12月1日。
HYP: Direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers into the military time from September 1, 2020, the troops issued a non-commissioned officer posting orders for December 1, 2020.

SRC: 部队接收单位将科学制定入伍和专业训练方案，认真组织施训；训练完成后按照专业对口、招用一致的原则，将招收士官统一精准分配到对口专业技术岗位。
HYP: The unit will scientifically develop the enlistment and professional training program, and carefully organize the training; after the completion of training in accordance with the principle of professional counterparts, recruitment and use of the same, the recruitment of non-commissioned officers will be unified and precisely assigned to the corresponding professional and technical positions.

SRC: 驻英使馆发言人：中国政府是网络安全的坚定维护者-中新网
HYP: Embassy spokesman: Chinese government is a firm defender of cyber security - CNN

SRC: 中新网7月26日电据中国驻英国大使馆网站消息，25日，中国驻英国使馆发言人就有关网络攻击错误言论答记者问。
HYP: July 26 (Xinhua) -- According to the website of the Chinese Embassy in the United Kingdom, a spokesman of the Chinese Embassy in the United Kingdom answered reporters' questions on the wrong remarks about cyber attacks on July 25.

SRC: 发言人强调，中国政府是网络安全的坚定维护者，一贯坚决反对并打击任何形式的网络攻击和网络犯罪。
HYP: The spokesman stressed that the Chinese government is a firm defender of cyber security and has always resolutely opposed and combated any form of cyber attacks and cyber crimes.

SRC: 有记者提问：据媒体称，与中国有关的黑客组织曾干扰一家英国公司网络系统、向存有专利数据的英美技术公司发动攻击、入侵欧盟国家政府网络。
HYP: A reporter asked a question: According to the media, China-related hacking groups have interfered with the network systems of a British company, launched attacks on British and American technology companies with proprietary data, and hacked into the networks of European Union governments.

SRC: 发言人表示，中国政府是网络安全的坚定维护者，一贯坚决反对并打击任何形式的网络攻击和网络犯罪。
HYP: The spokesman said that the Chinese government is a firm defender of cyber security and has always firmly opposed and combated any form of cyber attacks and cyber crimes.

SRC: 网络空间虚拟性强，溯源难，行为体多样，在调查和定性网络事件的时候应拿出充分的证据，不能无端猜测。
HYP: The cyberspace is highly virtual, difficult to trace and has a variety of actors, so sufficient evidence should be produced when investigating and characterizing cyber incidents, and there should be no unfounded speculation.

SRC: 发言人称，以往的“棱镜门”等一系列事件证明，美国一直都在进行全球最大范围的网络窃密行动。
HYP: The spokesman said that the past series of incidents, such as Prism Gate, proved that the United States has been conducting the world's largest cyber-secrecy operation.

SRC: 维护网络空间的和平与稳定符合所有国家的共同利益。
HYP: Maintaining peace and stability in cyberspace is in the common interest of all countries.

SRC: 发言人指出，中国在科技创新方面的成就不是偷来的、不是抢来的，而是通过自力更生、艰苦奋斗得来的。
HYP: The speaker noted that China's achievements in science and technology innovation are not stolen or robbed, but have been achieved through self-reliance and hard work.

SRC: 2019年中国通过《专利合作条约》(PCT)途径提交了约5.9万件专利申请，年增长率为10.6%，成为提交国际专利申请量最多的国家。
HYP: China submitted about 59000 patent applications through the Patent Cooperation Treaty (PCT) route in 2019, with an annual growth rate of 10.6 percent, making it the country with the largest number of international patent applications submitted.

SRC: 中国已经成为创新和知识产权大国。
HYP: China has become a major innovation and IPR country.

SRC: 乌鲁木齐免费核酸检测多数区已基本完成高风险地区进行二次检测-中新网
HYP: Free nucleic acid testing in Urumqi has been basically completed in most districts, secondary testing in high-risk areas - CNN

SRC: 中新网乌鲁木齐7月26日电(记者孙亭文赵雅敏)乌鲁木齐市卫健委主任张卫26日在通报乌鲁木齐市最新疫情和核酸检测情况时称，目前，乌鲁木齐全市免费核酸检测工作多数区已基本完成。
HYP: Urumqi, July 26 (Xinhua Sun Tingwen Zhao Yamin) - Urumqi Health Commission Director Zhang Wei said on July 26, while briefing the latest epidemic situation and nucleic acid testing in Urumqi, that at present, free nucleic acid testing in most districts of Urumqi city has been basically completed.

SRC: 国务院专家组和自治区、乌鲁木齐市专家正在根据核酸检测和流行病学调查结果，对疫情的发展做进一步评估。
HYP: A group of experts from the State Council and experts from the autonomous region and Urumqi are making further assessments of the development of the epidemic based on nucleic acid testing and epidemiological findings.

SRC: 新疆维吾尔自治区新闻办公室26日召开新闻发布会通报新疆疫情和防控情况。
HYP: The Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region Information Office held a press conference on the 26th to inform about the epidemic situation and prevention and control in Xinjiang.

SRC: 据他介绍，7月25日0时至24时，乌鲁木齐市新增新冠肺炎确诊病例22例(其中5例为无症状感染者转确诊病例) ，新增无症状感染者38例。
HYP: According to him, from 0:00 to 24:00 on July 25, there were 22 new confirmed cases of new crown pneumonia in Urumqi (including 5 cases of asymptomatic infected to confirmed cases) and 38 new asymptomatic infected cases.

SRC: 截至7月25日24时，乌鲁木齐市现有确诊病例135例，无症状感染者147例。
HYP: As of 24:00 on July 25, there were 135 confirmed cases and 147 asymptomatic cases in Urumqi.

SRC: 25日新增的无症状感染者也基本上都是通过全市免费核酸检测、主动筛查出来的。
HYP: The new asymptomatic infections on the 25th were also basically detected through free nucleic acid testing and active screening in the city.

SRC: 乌鲁木齐市卫健委主任张卫26日称，乌鲁木齐全市免费核酸检测工作多数区已基本完成。
HYP: Zhang Wei, director of the Urumqi Health Care Commission, said on the 26th that free nucleic acid testing in Urumqi has been largely completed in most districts.

SRC: 他还说，从国内其他地区的经验看，影响核酸检测结果的因素很多，比如检测试剂灵敏度、受检测人员的感染时间和排毒时间、标本取材时受检测者配合情况(配合度差可能导致标本没有取到位)以及检测环境、检验人员的操作熟练程度等。
HYP: He also said that from the experience of other regions in China, there are many factors that affect the results of nucleic acid testing, such as the sensitivity of the testing reagents, the time of infection and detoxification of the person being tested, the cooperation of the person being tested when the specimen is taken (poor cooperation may result in the specimen not being taken in place), as well as the testing environment and the operational proficiency of the testing personnel.

SRC: 由于各种原因，核酸检测也会出现假阴性的结果。
HYP: For various reasons, nucleic acid testing can also result in false negative results.

SRC: 所谓假阴性，就是指受检测者确实是感染者，但是核酸检测结果却为阴性。
HYP: A false negative means that the person tested is indeed infected, but the nucleic acid test results are negative.

SRC: 另外，对于和确诊病例、疑似病例有过密切接触的人员，通常需要两次核酸检测才能排除。
HYP: In addition, for people who have had close contact with confirmed or suspected cases, it usually takes two nucleic acid tests to rule them out.

SRC: 对于去过疫情中高风险地区的人员，如果出现发热和呼吸道症状，一次核酸检测阴性存在假阴性可能，所以也需要两次核酸检测才能排除。
HYP: For people who have been to high-risk areas in the outbreak, if they have fever and respiratory symptoms, a single negative nucleic acid test has the potential to be a false negative, so two nucleic acid tests are also needed to rule it out.

SRC: 他表示，鉴于以上情况，为了全市各族群众的身体健康，从今天开始，乌鲁木齐市将对天山区、沙依巴克区等重点地区进行二次免费核酸检测，同时开展“查遗补漏” 。
HYP: He said, in view of the above, for the sake of the health of the city's ethnic groups, starting today, Urumqi will carry out the second free nucleic acid testing in key areas such as Tianshan District and Shaibak District, and also carry out the "check and fill in the gaps".

SRC: 据悉，天山区、沙依巴克区是疫情高风险地区。
HYP: It is reported that Tianshan District and Shaybak District are high-risk areas for the outbreak.

SRC: 白宫疫情专家福奇：对2021年初研制出疫苗持谨慎乐观
HYP: White House epidemic expert Fauci: cautiously optimistic about developing a vaccine by early 2021

SRC: 福奇25日在国际领袖基金会主办的一场网络视频会议上作上述表示。
HYP: Fauci made the remarks at a web-based video conference hosted by the International Leadership Foundation on 25.

SRC: 他提醒说，目前尚不清楚新冠疫情在秋冬季将如何发展，也不知道疫情的最终影响会如何，“而结束这一切的唯一办法就是我们每个人都选择成为解决问题的一部分”。
HYP: He cautioned that it is unclear how the new crown epidemic will develop in the fall and winter, or what the ultimate impact of the epidemic will be, "and the only way to end this is for each of us to choose to be part of the solution."

SRC: 据美国约翰斯·霍普金斯大学数据，截至25日21时，美国新冠确诊病例已达417.6万，死亡14.6万人。
HYP: According to Johns Hopkins University data, as of 21:00 on the 25th, the number of confirmed cases of the new crown in the United States has reached 4176000 and 146000 deaths.

SRC: 福奇表示，美国一些地区目前正在艰难地同反弹的疫情作斗争。
HYP: Fauci said some areas of the United States are currently struggling with the rebounding epidemic.

SRC: 尽管各地疫情有所不同，需要因地制宜的应对方案，但多样化的抗疫策略并不意味着地区之间没有紧密联系。
HYP: Although the epidemic varies from region to region and requires locally tailored response plans, diverse strategies to combat the epidemic do not mean that regions are not closely linked.

SRC: 一个地区的疫情最终会影响到其他地区。
HYP: An outbreak in one region will eventually affect other regions.

SRC: “现在不是自满的时候”，福奇说，“我们的工作没有完成，必须加紧努力，也必须对未来的不确定性保持警惕。”
HYP: "This is not a time for complacency," Fauci said, "Our work is not done, and we must step up our efforts and be vigilant about the uncertainty of the future."

SRC: 美国华裔医学专家、治疗艾滋病“鸡尾酒疗法”创始人何大一在会上指出，美国新冠疫情尚未到达顶峰。
HYP: DY Ho, a Chinese-American medical expert and founder of "cocktail therapy" for AIDS, noted at the conference that the new US epidemic has not yet reached its peak.

SRC: “我们每个人都必须尽自己的一份力来减缓这一病毒的传播。”
HYP: "Each of us must do our part to slow the spread of this virus."

SRC: 何大一呼吁，公众用自己的实际行动为科学家争取时间，以加紧研发新冠治疗药物和疫苗。
HYP: He called on the public to buy time for scientists to step up the development of a cure and vaccine for New Crown by taking practical action.

SRC: 国际领袖基金会是一家以促进美国及亚太地区国际交流活动为宗旨的非营利性组织，致力于提升美国亚太裔地位，培育国际青年领袖。
HYP: The International Leadership Foundation is a non-profit organization whose mission is to promote international exchange activities in the US and the Asia-Pacific region, and is dedicated to elevating the status of Asian Pacific Americans and nurturing young international leaders.

SRC: 当天，美国运输部长赵小兰、美联邦众议员孟昭文以及国际领袖基金会创会会长董继玲等分别在会上发言。
HYP: On the same day, US Secretary of Transportation Xiaolan Zhao, US Congressman Zhaowen Meng and International Leadership Foundation Founding President Jiling Dong spoke at the conference.

SRC: 当天，美国运输部长赵小兰、美联邦众议员孟昭文以及国际领袖基金会创会会长董继玲等<v>分别</v>在会上发言。
HYP: On the same day, US Secretary of Transportation Xiaolan Zhao, US Congressman Zhaowen Meng and International Leadership Foundation Founding President Jiling Dong spoke at the conference.

SRC: 他们特别向在一线抗疫的亚太裔医务工作者和志愿者致敬，并呼吁美国公众继续坚持“社交距离”等防疫准则，遏制疫情扩散。
HYP: They paid special tribute to the Asian Pacific Islander medical workers and volunteers on the front lines of the epidemic, and called on the American public to continue to adhere to the "social distance" and other epidemic prevention guidelines to contain the spread of the epidemic.

SRC: 美中贸谈代表传8月会面
HYP: US and China trade talks representatives rumored to meet in August

SRC: 香港《南华早报》25日引述一名匿名知情人士报导，中国贸易谈判团队负责人、国务院副总理刘鹤与美方团队共同领导人、贸易代表赖海哲可望在8月举行正式会谈，评估双方履行中美第一阶段贸易协议的情况。
HYP: Hong Kong's South China Morning Post reported on 25 August, citing an anonymous source familiar with the matter, that the head of China's trade negotiation team, Vice Premier Liu He, and the co-leader of the US team, Trade Representative Lai Hoi-chul, are expected to hold formal talks in August to assess the two sides' implementation of the first phase of the US-China trade agreement.

SRC: 香港《南华早报》25日引述一名匿名知情人士报导，中国贸易谈判团队负责人、<v>国务院</v>副总理刘鹤与美方团队共同领导人、贸易代表赖海哲可望在8月举行正式会谈，评估双方履行中美第一阶段贸易协议的情况。
HYP: Hong Kong's South China Morning Post reported on 25 August, citing an anonymous source familiar with the matter, that the head of China's trade negotiation team, Vice Premier Liu He, and the co-leader of the US team, Trade Representative Lai Hoi-chul, are expected to hold formal talks in August to assess the two sides' implementation of the first phase of the US-China trade agreement.

SRC: 报导说，虽然中国过去几个月已大幅提高采购美国农产品数量，但因新冠病毒疫情等因素，中方采购量距离贸易协议中承诺的数量仍有一段距离。
HYP: The report said that although China has significantly increased its purchases of US agricultural products in the past few months, the Chinese purchases are still some distance away from the quantities promised in the trade agreement because of the new coronavirus outbreak and other factors.

SRC: 分析家说，近来美中相互关闭对方领事馆，加上其他争端，可能破坏双方在贸易方面的任何进展。
HYP: Analysts say recent US-China closures of each other's consulates, along with other disputes, could derail any progress on trade between the two sides.

SRC: 中美第一阶段贸易协议在1月15日签署后一个月生效，协议中规定双方高层组成的贸易框架小组，每半年应举行一次会谈。
HYP: The first phase of the US-China trade deal, which took effect a month after it was signed on Jan. 15, stipulates that a trade framework group of top officials from both sides should meet every six months.

SRC: 中美第一阶段贸易协议在1月15日签署后一个月生效，协议中规定双方高层<v>组成</v>的贸易框架小组，每半年应举行一次会谈。
HYP: The first phase of the US-China trade deal, which took effect a month after it was signed on Jan. 15, stipulates that a trade framework group of top officials from both sides should meet every six months.

SRC: 知情人士透露，此次会议将是“一个重要的转折点”，让双方得以评估协议进展。
HYP: The source said the meeting would be "an important turning point" that would allow the two sides to assess progress on the agreement.

SRC: 但这名人士也说，若美中紧张关系导致此时会谈意愿不高，双方可能会同意，赖海哲与刘鹤5月8日的电话会议，即已满足贸易协议中每半年会谈一次的条款。
HYP: But the source also said that if US-China tensions lead to a lack of willingness to talk at this time, the two sides may agree that the May 8 conference call between Lai Haider and Liu He has met the semi-annual meeting clause of the trade agreement.

SRC: 今年以来，中美关系急速恶化，双方争端包括新冠病毒起源、贸易、香港、新疆、南海与意识形态等一系列问题。
HYP: Since this year, Sino-US relations have deteriorated rapidly, with disputes between the two sides including a series of issues such as the origin of the new crown virus, trade, Hong Kong, Xinjiang, the South China Sea and ideology.

SRC: 今年以来，中美关系急速恶化，双方争端包括新冠病毒起源、贸易、香港、新疆、南海与意识形态<v>等</v>一系列问题。
HYP: Since this year, Sino-US relations have deteriorated rapidly, with disputes between the two sides including a series of issues such as the origin of the new crown virus, trade, Hong Kong, Xinjiang, the South China Sea and ideology.

SRC: 美国总统特朗普虽在年初吹嘘自己在首阶段协议中取得的成就，但近来态度改变。
HYP: Although US President Donald Trump bragged about his achievements in the first phase of the agreement at the beginning of the year, his attitude has changed recently.

SRC: 他23日在白宫记者会上说，虽然中国近来单日采购美国玉米数量破纪录，也买了很多大豆，“但这份贸易协议现在对我的意义，已不如当初达成时” 。
HYP: He said at a White House press conference on the 23rd that although China has recently made record-breaking single-day purchases of US corn and bought a lot of soybeans, "this trade deal is not as meaningful to me now as it was when it was reached."

SRC: 一位匿名北京政府顾问也认为，由于美中关系不佳，新一轮贸易谈判不太可能进行， “贸易议题在中美关系已失去分量”。
HYP: An anonymous Beijing government adviser also believes that a new round of trade talks is unlikely due to poor US-China relations, and that "trade issues have lost weight in US-China relations.

SRC: 但他透露，中国经贸相关单位23日仍开会讨论了一系列问题，包括如何增加从美国的进口量， “我们已经尽力买了，所以任何追加采购会有困难” 。
HYP: But he revealed that Chinese economic and trade related units still met on the 23rd to discuss a range of issues, including how to increase imports from the US "We've done our best to buy, so any additional purchases would be difficult."

SRC: 美中贸易全国委员会副会长彭捷宁表示，保持首阶段协议动能“比以往任何时候都更重要”， 并指中国今年在进一步向美企开放金融市场上有所进展。
HYP: US-China National Trade Council Vice President Peng Jie-ning said it was "more important than ever" to maintain the momentum of the first phase of the agreement, and said China has made progress this year in further opening its financial markets to US companies.

SRC: 独立研究公司Plenum分析师说：“谈比不谈好，尽管可能只被当成例行公事。”
HYP: Analysts at Plenum, an independent research firm, said "talk is better than no talk, even though it may only be treated as routine."

SRC: 余额宝收益下行“90后”反而“报复性”存钱？
HYP: The balance of the earnings down "after 90" but "revenge" to save money?

SRC: 随着余额宝收益下行， “90后”不仅没有逃离余额宝，反而开始“报复性”存钱了？
HYP: With the balance of the treasure earnings down, "after 90" not only did not flee the balance of treasure, but began to "revenge" to save money?

SRC: 中国新经济研究院联合支付宝日前发布的《余额宝90后攒钱报告》（2020版）显示，上半年，“90后”更爱攒钱了：人均攒钱金额比2019年增长近四成。
HYP: China New Economy Research Institute and Alipay recently released the "BalancePay Post-90s Money Saving Report" (2020 Edition), which shows that in the first half of the year, the "post-90s" love to save money: the per capita amount of money saved increased by nearly 40% compared to 2019.

SRC: 有意思的是，“90后”更倾向于从一笔笔“小钱”开始攒，有六成平均每笔攒钱金额在20元以下… …
HYP: Interestingly, the "post-90s" tend to start saving with a "small amount of money", with 60% of them saving less than 20 yuan per pen on average....

SRC: 用余额宝攒钱，也成为“90后”的攒钱习惯。
HYP: Saving money with BalanceBao has also become a saving habit for the post-90s.

SRC: 数据显示，在7亿余额宝用户中，有1.34亿用户是“90后” 。
HYP: The data shows that 134 million of the 700 million users of BalanceBao are "post-90s".

SRC: 中国有1.74亿“90后” ，也就是说，全国每4个“90后”中约有3个在用余额宝攒钱。
HYP: There are 174 million "post-90s" in China, which means that about 3 out of every 4 "post-90s" in the country are using BalanceBao to save money.

SRC: 目前，余额宝等货币基金的7日年化收益率从年初高于2%的水平，下滑到1.5%左右。
HYP: At present, the 7-day annualized return of money funds such as BalanceBao has slipped from above 2% at the beginning of the year to about 1.5%.

SRC: 即使如此，也没有影响“90后”攒钱的步伐。
HYP: Even so, it did not affect the pace of the "post-90s" saving money.

SRC: 而在余额宝“攒钱效应”提升背景下，不少习惯使用余额宝的年轻人还直接转化为“基民”。
HYP: And in the context of the "saving effect" of BalanceBao, many young people who are used to using BalanceBao are also directly transformed into "fundies".

SRC: 支付宝数据显示，截至7月13日，近一个月支付宝上的新“基民”同比增长1倍多，越来越多年轻人在支付宝上实现“进阶”理财。
HYP: Alipay data shows that as of July 13, nearly a month on Alipay new "fundies" year-on-year growth of more than 1 times, more and more young people in Alipay to achieve "advanced" financial management.

SRC: 有分析师认为，资金从余额宝流入股市，也是6月货币基金份额明确下滑的重要原因。
HYP: Some analysts believe that the flow of funds from Alipay into the stock market is also an important reason for the clear decline in the share of money funds in June.

SRC: 报告还显示，“90后”女生更倾向于多攒钱，平均比男生攒钱金额高两成；在支付宝平台上持有基金的用户中，6成是男性，女性与男性相比倾向于选择更为稳健的理财方式。
HYP: The report also shows that "post-90s" girls are more inclined to save more money, on average 20% higher than the amount of money saved by boys; 60% of the users who hold funds on the Alipay platform are men, and women tend to choose more stable financial management methods compared to men.

SRC: 存钱之后，“90后”有何计划？
HYP: After saving money, what are the plans of the "post-90s"?

SRC: 支付宝数据显示，“90后”有为目标攒钱的习惯，将旅行作为攒钱目标的用户最多。
HYP: Alipay data shows that "post-90s" have the habit of saving money for their goals, and the most users have travel as their saving goal.

SRC: 受疫情影响，许多“90后”攒钱为疫情后的旅行做准备；电影院恢复营业，也为从攒钱转向消费提供了新途径。
HYP: Due to the epidemic, many post-90s are saving money to prepare for their travels after the epidemic; the resumption of cinema business also provides a new way to shift from saving money to spending.

SRC: 让一面面鲜艳的党旗在抗洪大堤上高高飘扬
HYP: The newest and brightest party flag is flying high on the flood control dike

SRC: 近期我国南方受连续降雨影响，防汛抗洪形势十分严峻，造成贵州、四川、湖南、广西、广东、湖北等26省(区、市)受灾。
HYP: Recently, the south of China is affected by continuous rainfall, flood control and anti-flood situation is very serious, resulting in Guizhou, Sichuan, Hunan, Guangxi, Guangdong, Hubei and other 26 provinces (regions and cities) affected.

SRC: 灾情就是命令，灾区就是战场，灾害面前，党旗就是战旗，各级党组织、广大党员干部、人民子弟兵坚决落实习近平总书记关于防汛救灾工作重要指示精神，迅速投身防汛抗洪抢险救灾第一线，成为灾区群众的主心骨、抗洪战斗的生力军。
HYP: The disaster is an order, the disaster area is the battlefield, before the disaster, the party flag is the battle flag, party organizations at all levels, the majority of party members and cadres, the people's sons and daughters resolutely implement the spirit of General Secretary Xi Jinping's important instructions on flood control and disaster relief work, quickly join the flood control and rescue relief front line, become the backbone of the masses in the disaster area, flood fighting force.

SRC: 鲜艳的党旗在抗洪大堤上高高飘扬，是忠诚的体现，也是使命的召唤。
HYP: The bright party flag fluttering high on the dike is the embodiment of loyalty, but also the call of duty.

SRC: 灾害面前，一个党组织就是一座战斗堡垒，一名党员干部就是一面旗帜。
HYP: Before the disaster, a party organization is a fighting fortress, a party member cadres is a banner.

SRC: 在各地的抗洪一线，各级党组织、广大党员干部体现高度的对党忠诚，听从党中央号召，以“看我的”的行动、“跟我来”的步伐、“我先上”的勇气，筑起一座座冲不垮的钢铁堡垒，挺起一个个压不弯的中国脊梁。
HYP: Around the front line of the flood, party organizations at all levels, the majority of party members and cadres reflect a high degree of loyalty to the party, listen to the call of the central party to "look at my" action, "follow me" pace, "I first on The courage of "look at me" action, "follow me" pace, "I go first", build a steel fortress that can not be broken, and a Chinese backbone that can not be bent.

SRC: 鲜艳的党旗在抗洪大堤上高高飘扬，是阵地的坚守，也是冲锋的号角。
HYP: The brightly colored party flag fluttering high on the anti-flood dike, is the position of holding fast, but also the call to charge.

SRC: 面对洪涝灾害，各级党组织迅速行动，吹响抗洪“冲锋号”，把鲜艳的党旗插在抗洪的大堤上，广大党员干部、人民子弟兵坚守在抗洪的阵地上，用“党旗在阵地就在”、“洪水不退永不收兵”的意志和行动，成为灾区群众最放心也最值得信赖的坚固屏障。
HYP: In the face of flooding, party organizations at all levels acted quickly to sound the "charge" to fight the floods, the bright party flag on the dike to fight the floods, the majority of party members and cadres, the people's sons and daughters in the position to fight the floods, with the "party flag in the position on", "the floods never retreat until the floods retreat. The will and action of "never retreat until the flood" has become the most assured and trustworthy solid barrier for the people in the disaster area.

SRC: 面对洪涝灾害，各级党组织迅速行动，吹响抗洪“冲锋号”，把鲜艳的党旗插在抗洪的大堤上，广大党员干部、人民子弟兵<v>坚守</v>在抗洪的阵地上，用“党旗在阵地就在”、“洪水不退永不收兵”的意志和行动，成为灾区群众最放心也最值得信赖的坚固屏障。
HYP: In the face of flooding, party organizations at all levels acted quickly to sound the "charge" to fight the floods, the bright party flag on the dike to fight the floods, the majority of party members and cadres, the people's sons and daughters in the position to fight the floods, with the "party flag in the position on", "the floods never retreat until the floods retreat. The will and action of "never retreat until the flood" has become the most assured and trustworthy solid barrier for the people in the disaster area.

SRC: 面对洪涝灾害，各级党组织迅速行动，吹响抗洪“冲锋号”，把鲜艳的党旗<v>插在</v>抗洪的大堤上，广大党员干部、人民子弟兵坚守在抗洪的阵地上，用“党旗在阵地就在”、“洪水不退永不收兵”的意志和行动，成为灾区群众最放心也最值得信赖的坚固屏障。
HYP: In the face of flooding, party organizations at all levels acted quickly to sound the "charge" to fight the floods, the bright party flag on the dike to fight the floods, the majority of party members and cadres, the people's sons and daughters in the position to fight the floods, with the "party flag in the position on", "the floods never retreat until the floods retreat. The will and action of "never retreat until the flood" has become the most assured and trustworthy solid barrier for the people in the disaster area.

SRC: 鲜艳的党旗在抗洪大堤上高高飘扬，是无私的奉献，也是责任的担当。
HYP: The bright party flag fluttering high on the flood control dike is selfless dedication and responsibility.

SRC: 危难时刻，彰显党员本色，在人民群众生命财产受到严重威胁的时刻，党员干部、人民子弟兵舍小家、顾大家，无私奉献，敢于担当，把打赢防汛抗洪抢险救灾这场硬仗，作为全面检验能力、作风、素养的主战场、阅兵场，正是这种无私奉献和担当的精神，极大的鼓舞着灾区群众战胜灾情的信心和决心，凝聚起打赢防汛抗洪抢险救灾的强大精神力量。
HYP: In times of crisis, showing the true colors of party members, in the people's lives and property under serious threat, party members and cadres, the people's sons and daughters of the family, care for everyone, selfless dedication, dare to take charge, to win the hard battle of flood control, flood rescue and relief, as a comprehensive test of ability, style, quality of the main battlefield, the parade ground, it is this selfless dedication and the spirit of bearing, greatly encouraged the people in the disaster area to overcome the disaster confidence and determination, and cohesion to win the flood control and rescue and relief of a strong spiritual force.

SRC: “人民至上、生命至上”， 既在平时接受检验，更在关键时刻接受考验。
HYP: "People first, life first", both in the usual test, more in the critical moment to accept the test.

SRC: 在抗洪大堤上，广大党员干部和人民子弟兵，要让人民群众随时随处都能看到鲜红的党旗、奋斗的身影、鼓励的声音，用洪水冲不垮的钢铁堤坝为党旗增辉添彩，让一面面鲜艳的党旗在抗洪大堤上高高飘扬！
HYP: In the flood control levee, the majority of party members and cadres and the people's sons and daughters, to let the people everywhere at any time can see the bright red party flag, the struggle of the figure, the voice of encouragement, with the flood can not collapse the steel levee for the party flag to add color, so that a bright party flag in the flood control levee fluttering high!

SRC: APEC成员贸易部长会议表示将加速推动区域经济复苏-新华网
HYP: APEC members' trade ministers' meeting says to accelerate regional economic recovery-Xinhua

SRC: 新华社吉隆坡7月25日电（记者林昊）亚太经合组织（APEC）成员贸易部长视频会议25日举行，会议承诺将致力于减少新冠疫情对本区域经济的影响，加速推动实现具有弹性、可持续性和包容性的区域经济复苏。
HYP: KUALA LUMPUR, July 25 (Xinhua) -- The Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) members' trade ministers' video conference held on July 25 pledged to work to reduce the impact of the new crown epidemic on the region's economy and accelerate efforts to achieve a resilient, sustainable and inclusive regional economic recovery.

SRC: 新华社吉隆坡7月25日电（<v>记者林昊</v>）亚太经合组织（APEC）成员贸易部长视频会议25日举行，会议承诺将致力于减少新冠疫情对本区域经济的影响，加速推动实现具有弹性、可持续性和包容性的区域经济复苏。
HYP: KUALA LUMPUR, July 25 (Xinhua) -- The Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) members' trade ministers' video conference held on July 25 pledged to work to reduce the impact of the new crown epidemic on the region's economy and accelerate efforts to achieve a resilient, sustainable and inclusive regional economic recovery.

SRC: 会议由今年APEC领导人非正式会议主办方马来西亚主持。
HYP: The meeting was hosted by Malaysia, the host of this year's informal APEC Leaders' Meeting.

SRC: 会后发表的联合声明表示，APEC成员贸易部长认识到，在这一具有挑战性的时刻，一个自由、开放、公平、非歧视、透明和可预测的贸易和投资环境对于推动经济复苏的重要性。
HYP: A joint statement issued after the meeting said APEC member trade ministers recognized the importance of a free, open, fair, non-discriminatory, transparent and predictable trade and investment environment to drive economic recovery at this challenging time.

SRC: 各方承诺，确保为应对疫情所采取的紧急措施是具有针对性、恰当、透明和临时的，不会制造不必要的贸易壁垒并扰乱全球供应链，同时遵守世界贸易组织规则。
HYP: The parties committed to ensure that emergency measures taken in response to the outbreak are targeted, appropriate, transparent and temporary, do not create unnecessary barriers to trade and disrupt global supply chains, and comply with World Trade Organization rules.

SRC: APEC成员贸易部长在声明中承诺，加强合作促进必要的商品和服务流动，通过加强供应链弹性促进互联互通，将医疗物资、食品和农业产品流动所受到的干扰最小化，以应对疫情。
HYP: In their statement, APEC member trade ministers pledged to strengthen cooperation to facilitate the flow of goods and services necessary to minimize disruptions to the flow of medical supplies, food and agricultural products in response to the outbreak by enhancing supply chain resilience and promoting connectivity.

SRC: APEC成员贸易部长一致认为，有必要讨论如何减少限制必要商品贸易的非关税壁垒，重申将致力于在不影响为阻止疫情蔓延所采取措施的情况下促进必要的跨境人员流动。
HYP: APEC member trade ministers agreed on the need to discuss ways to reduce non-tariff barriers that restrict trade in essential goods and reaffirmed their commitment to facilitate the necessary cross-border movement of people without compromising the measures taken to stop the spread of the epidemic.

SRC: 会议还发布了有关促进必要商品流通的宣言。
HYP: The meeting also issued a declaration on facilitating the flow of essential commodities.

SRC: 宣言表示，各经济体将确保其为应对疫情所采取的贸易措施符合世贸组织规定，并承诺在减少非关税贸易壁垒、贸易促进等方面采取行动，以促进疫情下必要的商品流动。
HYP: The declaration said that economies will ensure that trade measures they take in response to the outbreak are WTO-compliant and commit to take action in reducing non-tariff barriers to trade, trade facilitation, etc. to facilitate the necessary movement of goods under the outbreak.

SRC: 主持会议的马来西亚国际贸易和工业部部长阿兹明·阿里表示，尽管受到疫情影响，马来西亚依然致力于推动今年APEC会议取得成功，制定APEC2020年后合作愿景的工作正有序推进。
HYP: Presiding over the meeting, Malaysian Minister of International Trade and Industry Azmin Ali said that despite the impact of the epidemic, Malaysia remains committed to the success of this year's APEC meeting, and work to develop a vision for APEC cooperation beyond 2020 is progressing in an orderly manner.

SRC: 马来西亚同意以视频形式举行APEC相关会议，但不排除在年底APEC领导人非正式会议时安排实体会议的可能性。
HYP: Malaysia agreed to hold APEC-related meetings in video format, but did not rule out the possibility of arranging a physical meeting at the end of the year when the APEC leaders meet informally.

SRC: 江西财政紧急下达2.8亿元资金支持各地灾后救助重建-中新网
HYP: Jiangxi financial emergency issued 280 million yuan of funds to support the post-disaster relief and reconstruction around - CNN

SRC: 7月24日，江西省九江市湖口县，驰援当地抗洪的中国人民解放军第71集团军某部官兵利用备勤间隙，帮助湖口县一蔬菜种植专业合作社抢收辣椒。
HYP: On July 24, Hukou County, Jiujiang City, Jiangxi Province, the officers and soldiers of a department of the 71st Group Army of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, who had come to the aid of the local flood fight, used the break in preparation to help a vegetable planting cooperative in Hukou County to harvest peppers.

SRC: 受此前强降雨影响，该合作社种植的上百亩红辣椒受灾严重，如不及时采摘损失会更加扩大。
HYP: By the previous heavy rainfall, the cooperative planted hundreds of acres of red pepper seriously affected, if not timely picking losses will expand.

SRC: 中新社记者富田摄
HYP: China News Agency reporter Futian photo

SRC: 中新网南昌7月26日电(袁汝晶)江西省财政厅26日消息，根据江西省防汛抗旱指挥部的工作部署和要求，该省财政紧急下达中央和省级救灾资金2.8亿元，为防汛抢险和受灾群众救助工作提供资金保障。
HYP: Nanchang, July 26 (Yuan Rujing) Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance 26 news, according to the work of the Jiangxi Provincial Flood Control and Drought Relief Command deployment and requirements, the province's financial emergency issued 280 million yuan of central and provincial disaster relief funds, for flood control and rescue and relief work to provide financial security for the affected people.

SRC: <v>中新网</v>南昌7月26日电(袁汝晶)江西省财政厅26日消息，根据江西省防汛抗旱指挥部的工作部署和要求，该省财政紧急下达中央和省级救灾资金2.8亿元，为防汛抢险和受灾群众救助工作提供资金保障。
HYP: Nanchang, July 26 (Yuan Rujing) Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance 26 news, according to the work of the Jiangxi Provincial Flood Control and Drought Relief Command deployment and requirements, the province's financial emergency issued 280 million yuan of central and provincial disaster relief funds, for flood control and rescue and relief work to provide financial security for the affected people.

SRC: 7月份以来，江西汛期、灾情不断升级。
HYP: Since July, Jiangxi floods and disasters have been escalating.

SRC: 洪涝灾害已导致该省农业农村直接经济损失100.7亿元、受灾面积1316.9万亩。
HYP: Floods have led to direct economic losses of 10.07 billion yuan in agriculture and rural areas of the province, the affected area of 13.169 million mu.

SRC: 7月17和7月22日，江西省财政先后下达中央救灾资金6000万元和2亿元。
HYP: July 17 and July 22, Jiangxi provincial finance has issued a central disaster relief funds of 60 million yuan and 200 million yuan.

SRC: 同时根据灾情变化情况，从该省应急管理专项资金中连续分3批下达省级救灾资金2030万元，支持各地灾后救助和恢复重建。
HYP: At the same time, according to the changes in the disaster situation, from the province's emergency management special funds in three consecutive batches of 20.3 million yuan of provincial disaster relief funds to support post-disaster relief and recovery and reconstruction around.

SRC: 江西省财政厅相关负责人26日称，在汛期到来之前，已下达各类防灾减灾资金1.73亿元，确保风险防患早发现、早处置、早化解，为抗洪抢险工作提供经费支持。
HYP: Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance said on the 26th, before the arrival of the flood season, has issued all kinds of disaster prevention and mitigation funds 173 million yuan, to ensure the early detection of risk prevention, early disposal, early resolution, to provide financial support for the flood rescue work.

SRC: 目前，长江江西段和中国最大淡水湖鄱阳湖水位呈高位缓退状态。
HYP: At present, the water level of Jiangxi section of Yangtze River and Poyang Lake, the largest freshwater lake in China, is in high and slow retreat.

SRC: 江西省防指于24日18时，将防汛应急响应下调至Ⅱ级；将省级救灾应急响应级别由II级调整为III级。
HYP: Jiangxi Provincial Defense Committee adjusted the emergency response of flood control down to level II at 18:00 on 24th; the level of provincial disaster relief emergency response was adjusted from level II to level III.

SRC: 灾情评估和灾后恢复重建等各项工作将持续进行。
HYP: Disaster assessment and post-disaster recovery and reconstruction will continue.

SRC: 国家卫健委：7月25日新增确诊病例46例，新疆22例辽宁13例- 经济观察网
HYP: National Health and Wellness Commission: 46 new confirmed cases on July 25, 22 cases in Xinjiang and 13 cases in Liaoning - Economic Observation Network

SRC: 据国家卫生健康委员会消息，7月25日0—24时，31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增确诊病例46例，其中境外输入病例11例（内蒙古5例，广东3例，天津1例，福建1例，山东1例），本土病例35例（新疆22例，辽宁13例）；无新增死亡病例；新增疑似病例2例，均为境外输入病例（内蒙古1例，上海1例） 。
HYP: According to the National Health Commission news, July 25 0-24 hours, 31 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government) and the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 46 new confirmed cases, of which 11 cases were imported from abroad (5 cases in Inner Mongolia, 3 cases in Guangdong, 1 case in Tianjin, 1 case in Fujian and 1 case in Shandong) and 35 local cases (22 cases in Xinjiang and 13 cases in Liaoning). No new deaths; 2 new suspected cases, both imported from abroad (1 case from Inner Mongolia and 1 case from Shanghai).

SRC: 当日新增治愈出院病例19例，解除医学观察的密切接触者673人，重症病例较前一日增加7例。
HYP: There were 19 new cases discharged from hospital, 673 close contacts released from medical observation, and 7 more serious cases than the previous day.

SRC: 境外输入现有确诊病例82例（其中重症病例2例），现有疑似病例3例。
HYP: There were 82 confirmed cases (including 2 serious cases) and 3 suspected cases imported from abroad.

SRC: 累计确诊病例2045例，累计治愈出院病例1963例，无死亡病例。
HYP: The total number of confirmed cases is 2045, the total number of cured cases is 1963, and there are no fatal cases.

SRC: 截至7月25日24时，据31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告，现有确诊病例288例（其中重症病例18例），累计治愈出院病例78908例，累计死亡病例4634例，累计报告确诊病例83830例，现有疑似病例3例。
HYP: As of 24:00 on July 25, 31 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 288 confirmed cases (including 18 severe cases), 78908 cumulative cured and discharged cases, 4634 cumulative fatal cases, 83830 cumulative reported confirmed cases, and 3 existing suspected cases.

SRC: 累计追踪到密切接触者779000人，尚在医学观察的密切接触者11762人。
HYP: A total of 779000 close contacts have been traced, and 11762 close contacts are still under medical observation.

SRC: 31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增无症状感染者68例（境外输入8例）；当日转为确诊病例17例（无境外输入） ；当日解除医学观察10例（境外输入7例）；尚在医学观察无症状感染者292例（境外输入91例）。
HYP: 31 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 68 new cases of asymptomatic infections (8 cases imported from abroad); 17 cases were turned into confirmed cases on the same day (no cases imported from abroad); 10 cases were released from medical observation on the same day (7 cases imported from abroad); 292 cases of asymptomatic infections were still under medical observation (91 cases imported from abroad).

SRC: 累计收到港澳台地区通报确诊病例3009例。
HYP: The total number of confirmed cases received from Hong Kong, Macao and Taiwan is 3009.

SRC: 其中，香港特别行政区2505例（出院1455例，死亡18例），澳门特别行政区46例（出院46例），台湾地区458例（出院440例，死亡7例）。
HYP: Among them, 2505 cases in Hong Kong SAR (1455 cases discharged, 18 deaths), 46 cases in Macau SAR (46 cases discharged) and 458 cases in Taiwan (440 cases discharged, 7 deaths).

SRC: 专家说通过美国人口普查收集移民资料用于众院席位分配违宪
HYP: Experts say collecting immigration data through the US Census for House seat allocation is unconstitutional

SRC: 一些民权组织和好几个美国城市和县对美国联邦政府提出起诉，称特朗普总统府试图将无证移民排除在美国人口普查之外是行不通的，也是违宪的。
HYP: Several civil rights groups and several US cities and counties have filed a lawsuit against the US federal government, saying the Trump presidency's attempt to exclude undocumented immigrants from the US Census is unworkable and unconstitutional.

SRC: 美国人口普查将决定美国国会众议院席位的分配。
HYP: The US Census will determine the allocation of seats in the US House of Representatives.

SRC: 美国民权自由联盟执行律师萨拉·布兰农对美国之音说，“这么做是行不通的。”
HYP: Sarah Brannon, executive attorney for the American Civil Liberties Union, told Voice of America, "It's not going to work to do that."

SRC: 她接着说，特朗普要求在人口普查中确定接受普查的人的公民身份难以做到，而且“不是很可靠。”
HYP: She went on to say that Trump's demand to determine the citizenship status of people who take the census in the census is difficult to do and "not very reliable."

SRC: 另一个公民自由组织共同事业组织星期四提出诉讼，对特朗普的行政令提出挑战。
HYP: Another civil liberties group, Common Cause, filed a lawsuit Thursday challenging Trump's executive order.

SRC: 新泽西州、乔治亚州的一些城市加入了诉讼。
HYP: Several cities in New Jersey and Georgia joined the lawsuit.

SRC: 维吉尼亚州的阿灵顿县星期五也加入了诉讼。
HYP: Arlington County, Virginia, also joined the lawsuit Friday.

SRC: 阿灵顿县的管理董事会主席加维说，“美国宪法要求每10年准确地清点我们的人口。我们必须准确地清点居住在阿灵顿县的每一个人，不能让这种非法试图吓跑人和压缩我们的移民社区人数的做法得逞。”
HYP: Garvey, chairman of Arlington County's governing board, said, "The US Constitution requires an accurate count of our population every 10 years. We must accurately count every person living in Arlington County and not allow this illegal attempt to scare people away and compress the numbers of our immigrant community to succeed."

SRC: 另一些组织和个人则赞扬特朗普总统的行政令。
HYP: Other organizations and individuals praised President Trump's executive order.

SRC: 阿拉巴马州司法部长马歇尔称，该行政令是该州的一个“胜利”。
HYP: Alabama Attorney General Marshall called the executive order a "victory" for the state.

SRC: 他说，“分配各州的国会众议院席位和选举团席位的时候，必须根据居住在各州的居民人数，而且是合法居住的居民的人数。”
HYP: He said, "The allocation of congressional House seats and Electoral College seats for each state must be based on the number of residents who live in each state and who are legally resident."

SRC: 美国最高法院去年阻止了特朗普行政当局将公民身份问题纳入2020年人口普查表中。
HYP: The US Supreme Court last year blocked the Trump administration from including citizenship questions in the 2020 census form.

SRC: 特朗普总统本星期早些时候签署一项行政令，指令监管美国人口普查局的商业部长罗斯提交人口普查所得的无证人口的数据，以便行政当局将这些无证人口排除在各州的人口普查数字之外，并以此确定每个州究竟是增加还是减少或保持众议院议员席位。
HYP: President Trump signed an executive order earlier this week directing Commerce Secretary Ross, who oversees the US Census Bureau, to submit data on the undocumented population from the census so the administration can exclude those undocumented people from each state's census numbers and use it to determine whether each state will add or subtract or keep House seats.

SRC: 美国每隔10年就要根据人口变化情况重新分配众议院席位。
HYP: Every 10 years, the US has to reallocate House seats based on population changes.

SRC: 新书爆料：哈利王子觉得哥哥“势利傲慢”
HYP: New book reveals Prince Harry felt his brother was "snobbish and arrogant"

SRC: 英国《泰晤士报》和《星期日泰晤士报》连载名为《寻找自由》（Finding Freedom）的新书，内容描绘哈利王子（Prince Harry）与妻子梅根（Meghan Markle）的王室生活心路历程。
HYP: The British newspaper The Times and The Sunday Times serialized a new book called "Finding Freedom", which depicts Prince Harry's (Prince Harry) and his wife Meghan (Meghan Markle)'s journey through the royal life.

SRC: 但路透社报导，哈利和梅根已和这本书撇清关系，说他们未接受作者访问，也未提供任何内容。
HYP: But Reuters reports that Harry and Meghan have disassociated themselves from the book, saying they were not interviewed by the author and did not provide any content.

SRC: 《星期日泰晤士报》报导，新书引述消息人士表示，哈利和梅根婚前约会时，威廉王子（Prince William）想确认原是好莱坞女星的梅根对哈利是否别有用心。
HYP: The Sunday Times reports that the new book cites sources as saying that when Harry and Meghan were dating before their wedding, Prince William wanted to make sure Meghan, a former Hollywood actress, had no ulterior motives for Harry.

SRC: 根据消息人士转述，威廉当时曾对哈利说：“你别感觉有必要仓促（娶梅根）。
HYP: According to the source, William said to Harry at the time: "You don't feel the need to rush (to marry Meghan).

SRC: 你可以尽量花时间去了解这个女孩。”
HYP: You can try to take time to get to know the girl."

SRC: 报导说，当哈利听到威廉用“这个女孩”形容梅根，他从哥哥语气中感受到傲慢势利，他也认为自己不再需要他人照顾提醒。
HYP: The newspaper said that when Harry heard William use "this girl" to describe Meghan, he felt arrogant snobbery from his brother's tone, and he also thought he no longer needed to be reminded to take care of others.

SRC: 哈利和梅根今年1月宣布计划过更独立的生活，并将自食其力。
HYP: Harry and Meghan announced in January this year that they plan to live a more independent life and will be self-reliant.

SRC: 两人3月正式卸下王室高阶成员身分后，目前带著儿子亚契（Archie）住在美国洛杉矶追求新事业。
HYP: The two officially stepped down from their roles as senior members of the royal family in March and are now living in Los Angeles, California, with their son Archie to pursue new careers.

SRC: 哈利和梅根在2018年5月结婚。
HYP: Harry and Meghan got married in May 2018.

SRC: 当时这场婚姻被视为为英国王室注入好莱坞的光鲜亮丽和新时代气息，两人也因此成为当代全球最受瞩目的名人夫妻档之一。
HYP: The marriage was seen at the time as injecting Hollywood glitz and new age flair into the British royal family, making the pair one of the most talked about celebrity couples in the world today.

SRC: 越南驻老挝大使馆公使衔参赞郑氏心、在老挝越南佛教协会、老挝越南人总会、万象省政府代表、老挝老兵协会等代表一同参加了祭奠仪式。
HYP: The ceremony was attended by Minister Counsellor of the Embassy of Vietnam in Laos, Mr. Zheng Thixin, representatives of the Vietnamese Buddhist Association in Laos, the General Association of Vietnamese in Laos, representatives of the Vientiane Provincial Government, the Lao Veterans Association and other representatives.

SRC: 英烈祭奠仪式在庄严肃穆的气氛中举行，各位代表陆续向英烈们上香，缅怀英烈们的丰功伟绩及越老特殊团结关系。
HYP: The ceremony was held in a solemn atmosphere, where the representatives offered incense to the martyrs one after another, remembering their great achievements and the special solidarity between Vietnam and Laos.

SRC: 公使衔参赞郑氏心<v>在讲话</v>中表示，这是在老越南人和老挝人民共同缅怀两国革命英烈，一起对为两国独立自由牺牲的英烈表达感恩之心的机会，同时也是两国人民回顾两国并肩协作打击共同敌人，争取民族独立，国家统一，共同建设国家发展，巩固两国关系的良好机会。
HYP: In his speech, Minister Counsellor Tay Thi Son said that this is an opportunity for the Vietnamese and Lao people in Lao to jointly remember the revolutionary martyrs of both countries, to express their gratitude together for the martyrs who sacrificed their lives for the independence and freedom of both countries, as well as a good opportunity for the two peoples to recall that the two countries worked side by side to fight against the common enemy, fight for national independence, national unity, build national development together and consolidate the relationship between the two countries.

SRC: 公使衔参赞郑氏心在讲话中表示，这是在老越南人和老挝人民共同缅怀两国革命英烈，一起对为两国独立自由牺牲的英烈表达感恩之心的机会，同时也是两国人民回顾两国并肩协作打击共同敌人，争取民族独立，国家统一，共同建设国家发展，巩固两国关系的良好机会。
HYP: In his speech, Minister Counsellor Tay Thi Son said that this is an opportunity for the Vietnamese and Lao people in Lao to jointly remember the revolutionary martyrs of both countries, to express their gratitude together for the martyrs who sacrificed their lives for the independence and freedom of both countries, as well as a good opportunity for the two peoples to recall that the two countries worked side by side to fight against the common enemy, fight for national independence, national unity, build national development together and consolidate the relationship between the two countries.

SRC: 74年前的1946年1月23日， 老越战斗联盟的28名战士在进攻Phonehe据点时英勇牺牲。
HYP: Seventy-four years ago, on January 23, 1946, 28 soldiers of the Lao-Vietnamese Combat Union died bravely during the attack on Phonehe stronghold.

SRC: 此次进攻取得胜利，成为两国在争取民族解放革命斗争初期阶段的具有历史性意义的胜利。
HYP: The victory of this attack became a historic victory for both countries in the early stage of the revolutionary struggle for national liberation.

SRC: 郑氏心女士强调，两国人民永远铭记为两国民族解放斗争事业牺牲的各位英烈，同时强调两国年轻一带将继续发扬老前辈英勇、坚强的传统，为越老关系持续开花结果及两国的繁荣发展作出应有的贡献。
HYP: Ms. Tay Thi Son emphasized that the people of both countries will always remember the martyrs who died for the cause of national liberation struggle of both countries, and also stressed that the young generation of both countries will continue to carry forward the tradition of bravery and strength of the old generation and make their due contribution to the continued blossoming of Vietnam-Lao relations and the prosperity of both countries.

SRC: 里程碑式跨越！
HYP: A milestone leap!

SRC: 国际米兰解锁第3000场意甲比赛-中新网
HYP: Inter Milan unlocks 3000th Serie A match - CNN

SRC: 中新网客户端7月26日电北京时间26日凌晨，意甲传统豪门国际米兰迎来了里程碑之战。
HYP: (CNN) - Inter Milan, the traditional giants of Serie A, celebrated a milestone match in the early morning of July 26, Beijing time.

SRC: 据意大利媒体统计，客场对阵热那亚一役是国际米兰队史第3000场意甲联赛，蓝黑军团也是首个解锁这项里程碑的球队。
HYP: According to the Italian media, the away game against Genoa was the 3000th Serie A game in Inter Milan's history, and the Blue Blacks were the first team to unlock this milestone.

SRC: 自1929年联赛改制以来，国际米兰是唯一一支从未缺席意甲的队伍，也是唯一一支从未降级的球队。
HYP: Since the league was reorganized in 1929, Inter Milan is the only team that has never missed Serie A and the only team that has never been relegated.

SRC: 据意大利媒体报道，国际米兰与热那亚的比赛是蓝黑军团队史第3000场比赛。
HYP: According to the Italian media, the match between Inter Milan and Genoa was the 3000th match in the history of the Blue Blacks.

SRC: 在这场里程碑之战中，国际米兰客场三球完胜热那亚。
HYP: In this milestone match, Inter Milan beat Genoa by three goals on the road.

SRC: 此役卢卡库梅开二度，替补出场的桑切斯也贡献一球。
HYP: Lukaku scored twice and substitute Alexis Sanchez also contributed a goal.

SRC: 比赛从一开始就进入了国际米兰的节奏，强攻终于在第34分钟转化为进球。
HYP: The game was in Inter's rhythm from the beginning, and the strong attack was finally converted into a goal in the 34th minute.

SRC: 比拉吉左路传中，卢卡库中路包抄头球破门。
HYP: Bilagui crossed the ball from the left and Lukaku scored with a header from the middle.

SRC: 第82分钟国际米兰如法炮制，摩西右路突破后传中，桑切斯中路包抄推射得手；终场前卢卡库完成梅开二度，反击中布罗佐维奇送出长距离直塞，卢卡库突入禁区晃过罗梅罗后推射空门得分，将比分定格在3：0。
HYP: In the 82nd minute, Inter Milan made the same move, Moses broke through the right side and passed to Sanchez, who scored from the middle.

SRC: 第82分钟国际米兰如法炮制，摩西右路突破后传中，桑切斯中路包抄推射得手；<v>终场前卢卡库完成梅开二度，反击中布罗佐维奇送出长距离直塞，卢卡库突入禁区晃过罗梅罗后推射空门得分，将比分定格在3：0</v>。
HYP: In the 82nd minute, Inter Milan made the same move, Moses broke through the right side and passed to Sanchez, who scored from the middle.

SRC: 国际米兰客场3：0完胜热那亚，积分反超亚特兰大上升至第2，在多赛一场的情况下落后领头羊尤文图斯4分，仍保留着争冠希望。
HYP: Inter Milan defeated Genoa 3:0 away from home, overtaking Atalanta to move up to 2nd place, 4 points behind leader Juventus with one more game to play, and still retaining their title hopes.

SRC: 至此，在这跨越近90载光阴的3000场意甲联赛中，国际米兰赢得了其中的1489场，打平834场，输掉677场，胜率为49.6%。
HYP: So far, in the 3000 Serie A matches spanning nearly 90 years, Inter Milan has won 1489, drawn 834 and lost 677, with a winning rate of 49.6%.

SRC: 其间，球队共打进5038球，丢3102球，场均打进1.68球。
HYP: During this period, the team scored 5038 goals and conceded 3102 goals, with an average of 1.68 goals scored per game.

SRC: 蓝黑军团18次获得联赛冠军，并且从未降级。
HYP: The Blue and Blacks have won the league 18 times and have never been relegated.

SRC: 谍战剧老面孔柳云龙演一个结巴男主角-新华网
HYP: The old face of spy drama Liu Yunlong plays a stuttering male lead - Xinhua

SRC: 由柳云龙监制、殷飞执导,柳云龙、苏青、梁冠华、李立群等主演的大型谍战剧《胜算》, 于7月16日晚7:30登陆广东卫视“活力剧场” 。
HYP: By Liu Yunlong executive producer, Yin Fei directed, Liu Yunlong, Su Qing, Liang Guanhua, Li Liqun and other starring in a large spy war drama, "the victory", on July 16 at 7:30 pm landed in Guangdong TV "dynamic theater".

SRC: 该剧讲述了潜伏在日伪警察局的中共地下党员唐飞(柳云龙饰)联合苏联特工,刺杀日本特工头目,粉碎了日军的惊天阴谋。
HYP: The drama tells the story of Tang Fei (Liu Yunlong), an underground member of the Communist Party of China (CPC), who lurks in a Japanese police station and works with Soviet agents to assassinate the head of a Japanese agent, shattering the Japanese army's amazing plot.

SRC: 《胜算》根据史实<v>改编</v>,素材取自尘封多年的苏联军事档案。
HYP: The film is based on historical facts and is drawn from the dusty Soviet military archives.

SRC: 《胜算》根据史实改编,素材取自尘封多年的苏联军事档案。
HYP: The film is based on historical facts and is drawn from the dusty Soviet military archives.

SRC: 莫斯科保卫战期间,苏联红军远东精锐西进驰援,此时日本关东军“北进派”认为有机可乘,意欲出兵。
HYP: During the Battle of Moscow, the elite of the Soviet Red Army in the Far East marched westward to reinforce the Japanese Kwantung Army's "Northward Faction", which saw an opportunity to take advantage of the situation and wanted to send troops.

SRC: 为解腹背受敌之危,中共与苏共情报人员联手实施了“穆丹乌拉”计划。
HYP: In order to solve the danger of the enemy's back, the Chinese Communist Party and the Soviet intelligence officers jointly implemented the "Mudan-Ula" plan.

SRC: 根据此历史背景,知名编剧邓原几经打磨,令剧情曲折烧脑。
HYP: According to this historical background, the famous screenwriter Deng Yuan polished the plot after several times, making the plot twists and turns to burn the brain.

SRC: 柳云龙此次在《胜算》中同时担任监制和男主角。
HYP: Liu Yunlong is both the executive producer and the lead actor in "The Odds".

SRC: 剧中,他饰演的唐飞是林河警察厅刑事科科长,是一位颇有喜感甚至有点痞气的结巴警察,真实的身份则是一名中共地下党员。
HYP: In the drama, he plays Tang Fei, the head of the criminal section of the Linhe Police Department, a stuttering police officer who is quite comical and even a bit gangly, but whose real identity is a member of the Chinese Communist Party underground.

SRC: 与其上演对手戏的女主角蔡梦是林河保安局科长,深得日本上司福原的赏识,与唐飞之间存在着亦敌亦友、暧昧不清的微妙关系。
HYP: The female lead, Cai Meng, is the head of the Security Bureau in Linhe and is highly appreciated by her Japanese boss, Fukuhara, with whom Tang Fei has an ambiguous and delicate relationship as both enemy and friend.

SRC: 苏青近年来尝试了很多不同类型的角色,从《那些年我们正年轻》中的陆若文到《延禧攻略》中的尔晴,都给观众留下深刻印象,演技受到认可。
HYP: The company's main focus is on the development of a new product, which will be the first of its kind in the world.

SRC: 此次苏青与柳云龙是首次搭档,结巴警长搭配妩媚女警的设置,颇有看点与新意。
HYP: This is the first time Su Qing and Liu Yunlong are paired together, the stuttering sheriff with the charming female police officer set, quite interesting and new.

SRC: 除了两位主角外,《胜算》中还有梁冠华、李立群、钱波、雷汉、申军谊等众多实力派演员加盟,老戏骨飙戏也是该剧看点之一。
HYP: In addition to the two protagonists, the "winning" there are Liang Guanhua, Li Liqun, Qian Bo, Lei Han, Shen Junyi and many other strong actors to join, the veteran actor drama is also one of the attractions of the drama.

SRC: 据了解,《胜算》制作上也十分精良,剧组跨越江苏、浙江、辽宁3省近2000公里拍摄取景。
HYP: It is understood that the production of the "Calculation" is also very good, the team across Jiangsu, Zhejiang, Liaoning 3 provinces nearly 2000 kilometers shooting location.

SRC: 为了还原东北日据时期光怪陆离的城市风貌,剧组美工道具组日夜赶工,仔细打磨场景搭建及道具的每一个细节,令剧中场景画面精致,富有历史质感。
HYP: In order to restore the northeast of the Japanese period of the city of light and strange, the team of art and props work day and night, carefully polished every detail of the scene construction and props, so that the drama scene picture exquisite, rich in historical texture.

SRC: 绿地开启新一轮混改上海国资拟转让17.5%股份-经济观察网－专业财经新闻网站
HYP: Greenland opens a new round of mixed reform Shanghai state capital to transfer 17.5% of shares -Economic Observation Network-Professional financial news website

SRC: 经济观察<v>网</v>记者饶贤君7月26日，绿地控股（600606.SH）发布《关于国有股东拟通过公开征集受让方的方式协议转让公司部分股份暨复牌的提示性公告》。
HYP: Economic Observation Reporter Rao Xianjun On July 26, Greenland Holdings (600606.SH) released the "Prompt Announcement on the State-owned shareholders' intention to transfer some shares of the company by way of public solicitation of transferee agreement and resumption of trading".

SRC: 经济观察网记者饶贤君7月26日，绿地控股（600606.SH）发布《关于国有股东拟通过公开征集受让方的方式协议转让公司部分股份暨复牌的提示性公告》。
HYP: Economic Observation Reporter Rao Xianjun On July 26, Greenland Holdings (600606.SH) released the "Prompt Announcement on the State-owned shareholders' intention to transfer some shares of the company by way of public solicitation of transferee agreement and resumption of trading".

SRC: 公告内容显示，为进一步深化国资国企改革，优化国资布局结构调整，完善绿地股权结构，上海地产（集团）有限公司（以下简称“上海地产”）及上海城投（集团）有限公司（以下简称“上海城投” ）<v>拟通过公开征集受让方的方式协议转让所持有的公司部分股份，拟转让的股份比例合计不超过绿地总股本的17.5% 。</v>
HYP: The content of the announcement shows that, in order to further deepen the reform of state-owned capital and state-owned enterprises, optimize the restructuring of the layout of state-owned capital and improve the equity structure of Greenland, Shanghai Real Estate (Group) Co. (hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai Real Estate") and Shanghai Urban Investment (Group) Co.

SRC: 本次拟转让股份的价格不低于下列两者之中的较高者：提示性公告日（2020 年7月27日）前30个交易日的每日加权平均价格的算术平均值；最近一个会计年度公司经审计的每股净资产值。
HYP: The price of the shares to be transferred will not be lower than the higher of: the arithmetic average of the daily weighted average price for the 30 trading days prior to the prompt announcement date (July 27, 2020); and the audited net asset value per share of the company for the most recent fiscal year.

SRC: 目前，对绿地的新战略投资者仍无定论，按照公告公示信息估算，新战略投资者要拿下绿地此次混改中转让的17.5%股权需要支付约140亿元的资金。
HYP: At present, the new strategic investor for Greenland is still inconclusive, according to the announcement of public information estimates, the new strategic investor to take the 17.5% stake transferred in this hybrid reform of Greenland need to pay about 14 billion yuan of funds.

SRC: 值得注意的是，本次股份转让完成后，预计绿地仍无控股股东及实际控制人，但控制权结构可能发生较大变化。
HYP: It is worth noting that after the completion of this share transfer, it is expected that Greenland will still have no controlling shareholder and actual controller, but the control structure may change significantly.

SRC: 绿地控股自创立以来进行了多次体制机制改革：1992年-1997年，在纯国有体制下按照市场化规则运行；1997年-2013年，建立并不断完善国有控股、职工持股的股份制；2013年-2015年，引进战略投资者，形成国有及非公有资本交叉持股、相互融合的混合所有制；2015年至今，整体上市，成为公众公司。
HYP: Greenland Holdings has carried out several institutional reforms since its founding: from 1992 to 1997, it operated under a purely state-owned system in accordance with market-oriented rules; from 1997 to 2013, it established and continuously improved a state-controlled, employee-owned shareholding system; from 2013 to 2015, it introduced strategic investors to form a mixed ownership system with cross-ownership and mutual integration of state-owned and non-public capital; and from 2015 to the present, it is listed on the stock exchange, becoming a wholly-owned company. From 2015 to the present, the overall listing and becoming a public company.

SRC: 绿地目前的混改方案与格力相似，2019年12月，高瓴资本领衔珠海明骏以416.62亿元接手格力电器（000651.SZ）15%股权，格力集团退居小股东，完成混改后，格力电器实施了高管激励计划、无实控人结构等现代化的企业管理方式。
HYP: Greenland's current mixed reform program is similar to Gree, in December 2019, High Tide Capital led Zhuhai Mingjun to take over 15% of Gree Electric (000651.SZ) for 41.662 billion yuan, Gree Group retired as a minority shareholder, and after completing the mixed reform, Gree implemented a modern corporate management approach such as executive incentive plan and no actual controller structure.

SRC: 上海地产、上海城投均为上海市国资委全资持有的国资企业集团，绿地控股董事长、总裁张玉良表示，绿地此举是上海按照党中央要求，推进国资国企综合性改革、加速新一阶段国资国企改革的重要举措，充分显示了因地制宜、量体裁衣的改革新思路，通过给上市公司引入新的优秀战略股东，支持企业进一步提高市场化程度，提升经营管理自由度，加速改革活力全面释放。
HYP: Shanghai Real Estate and Shanghai City Investment are both state-owned enterprise groups wholly owned by the Shanghai Municipal State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission. Zhang Yuliang, chairman and president of Greenland Holdings, said that Greenland's move is an important step for Shanghai to promote comprehensive reform of state-owned enterprises and accelerate a new phase of state-owned enterprise reform in accordance with the requirements of the Party Central Committee, fully demonstrating the new idea of reform tailored to local conditions and the body, by introducing new outstanding strategic shareholders to listed companies. Support enterprises to further improve marketization, enhance freedom of operation and management, and accelerate the full release of reform vitality.

SRC: <v>刘德华刘青云能否“拆”出新火花-新华网</v>
HYP: EMPTY

SRC: 《拆弹专家2》近日宣布将于12月24日上映,成为贺岁档首部定档的影片。
HYP: The "bomb disposal expert 2" recently announced that it will be released on December 24, becoming the first film scheduled for the New Year's Eve.

SRC: 第二部依然是邱礼涛导演,刘德华监制及主演,以全新的故事展开。
HYP: The second part is still directed by Qiu Litao, produced by and starring Andy Lau, with a brand new story to unfold.

SRC: 据悉,第二部中“核弹”元素的加入,也让此次拆弹专家面临的挑战更为艰难,预告里几个惊鸿一瞥的镜头,已令人心悬一线,大爆炸的蘑菇云,被火光吞没的机场,场面相当震撼。
HYP: It is reported that the second part of the "nuclear bomb" elements added to the challenge faced by the bomb disposal experts more difficult, the trailer in a few glimpses of the footage, has been the heart hanging on a line, the mushroom cloud of the explosion, the airport engulfed in flames, the scene is quite shocking.

SRC: 三年前,由原班人马制作出品的《拆弹专家》,斩获了当年的五一档票房冠军,并在香港电影金像奖拿下了7项提名,邱礼涛×刘德华也成为观众心目中的金牌搭档。
HYP: Three years ago, the original cast produced the "bomb disposal expert", won the year's May Day box office championship, and in the Hong Kong Film Awards took seven nominations, Qiu Litao x Andy Lau has become the audience's heart of the gold medal partner.

SRC: 此次的《拆弹专家2》,也令人再次期待这对王牌组合<v>能否</v>擦出新火花。
HYP: This time the "bomb disposal expert 2", also makes people once again look forward to this pair of ace combination can rub new sparks.

SRC: 此次的《拆弹专家2》,也令人再次期待这对王牌组合能否擦出新火花。
HYP: This time the "bomb disposal expert 2", also makes people once again look forward to this pair of ace combination can rub new sparks.

SRC: 《拆弹专家2》讲述了全新的故事:前拆弹专家潘乘风(刘德华饰)晕倒在爆炸案现场,被警方列为嫌疑犯。
HYP: The bomb disposal expert 2" tells a brand new story: former bomb disposal expert Pan Chengfeng (Andy Lau) faints at the scene of an explosion and is listed as a suspect by the police.

SRC: 为了寻找真相,他不得不向同是拆弹专家的好友董卓文(刘青云饰)求助。
HYP: In order to find the truth, he has to ask his friend Dong Zhuo Wen (played by Lau Ching Wan), who is also a bomb disposal expert, for help.

SRC: 急于破案的女督查,也同时是潘乘风前女友的庞玲(倪妮饰)也被卷入其中。
HYP: Pang Ling (Ni Ni), a female inspector who is anxious to solve the case and also Pan Chengfeng's ex-girlfriend, is also involved in the case.

SRC: 依然是拆弹专家,但从定档预告中能感受到刘德华新角色的复杂:断了一条腿,戴上了义肢,一边被同是拆弹专家的刘青云追捕,一边又被前女友倪妮指挥行动。
HYP: Still a bomb disposal expert, but from the trailer can feel the complexity of Andy Lau's new role: a broken leg, wearing a prosthetic leg, while being chased by the same bomb disposal expert Liu Qingyun, while being directed by his ex-girlfriend Ni Ni action.

SRC: 三人究竟是怎样的关系,刘德华到底在香岛酒店做了什么,被牵扯到怎样的案件中,他拆弹专家的职业生涯又经历了哪些波折,种种谜团让人好奇不已。
HYP: What is the relationship between the three, in the end, what Andy Lau did in the hotel on the island, was involved in what kind of case, his career as a bomb disposal expert and experienced what twists and turns, all kinds of mysteries make people curious.

SRC: 据了解,电影的重头戏都是实地取景香港的世界地标性建筑,加上顶尖的特效制作团队,带来震撼逼真的视觉冲击。
HYP: It is understood that the film's most important scenes are on location in Hong Kong's world landmarks, coupled with the top special effects production team, to bring a stunning and realistic visual impact.

SRC: （记者聂青）
HYP: (Reporter Nie Qing)

SRC: 中新网7月26日电综合俄罗斯卫星网报道，7月26日是俄罗斯海军日，庆祝海军日的主要阅兵式在圣彼得堡和喀琅施塔得举行。
HYP: July 26 (Xinhua) -- The main parade to celebrate the Russian Navy Day was held in St. Petersburg and Kronstadt on July 26, reports RIA Novosti.

SRC: 俄罗斯总统、俄联邦武装力量最高统帅普京抵达喀琅施塔得参加庆祝活动，该地15艘舰艇和潜艇接受了检阅。
HYP: Russian President and Supreme Commander of the Russian Armed Forces Vladimir Putin arrived in Kronstadt for the celebrations, where 15 ships and submarines were paraded.

SRC: 当地时间2019年7月28日，俄罗斯圣彼得堡举行盛大阅兵式庆祝海军节。
HYP: A grand military parade was held to celebrate Navy Day in St. Petersburg, Russia, July 28, 2019 local time.

SRC: 据报道，普京向海军官兵祝贺海军日，并乘小艇在芬兰湾上从将要参加海上阅兵的舰艇旁边驶过，随后在主观礼台检阅受阅部队。
HYP: Putin reportedly congratulated naval officers and soldiers on Navy Day and sailed in a dinghy on the Gulf of Finland past the ships that will take part in the naval parade, and then reviewed the paraded troops on the main observation deck.

SRC: 普京表示，俄海军舰队列装了最新式的舰艇和特殊装备，装备水平不断提高。
HYP: Putin said that the Russian naval fleet is equipped with the latest ships and special equipment, and the level of equipment is constantly improving.

SRC: 普京在俄罗斯海军日的阅兵式上说：“俄罗斯海军舰队拥有配备了高精武器的军舰、战略潜水巡洋舰和多用途潜艇、最新式飞机等飞行器、独特的武器和特殊装备。”
HYP: "The Russian naval fleet has warships equipped with highly sophisticated weapons, strategic submarine cruisers and multipurpose submarines, the latest aircraft and other flying machines, unique weapons and special equipment," Putin said at the parade on Russian Navy Day.

SRC: 当地时间6月24日，俄罗斯纪念卫国战争胜利75周年红场阅兵式举行。
HYP: On June 24, local time, Russia commemorated the 75th anniversary of the victory in the Patriotic War with a military parade in Red Square.

SRC: 他还表示，俄海军舰队将靠数字化和有效防御手段来取得独特优势。
HYP: He also said that the Russian naval fleet will rely on digitalization and effective defense means to achieve unique advantages.

SRC: 报道称，庆祝俄罗斯海军日的主要海军阅兵式在圣彼得堡和喀琅施塔得举行，共有46艘舰艇参加，包括“卡萨托诺夫上将”号护卫舰、“海军中将库拉科夫”号大型反潜舰，以及大型登陆舰、小型导弹舰、护卫舰、潜艇等。
HYP: According to the report, the main naval parade to celebrate the Russian Navy Day was held in St. Petersburg and Kronstadt with the participation of 46 ships, including the frigate Admiral Kasatonov, the large anti-submarine ship Admiral Kulakov, as well as large landing ships, small missile ships, frigates, submarines, etc.

SRC: 其中，系列舰艇在圣彼得堡冬宫桥旁进行静态展示，其中最引人瞩目的是经过复制的18世纪初俄罗斯首艘战列舰“波尔塔瓦”号。
HYP: Among them, a series of ships were on static display next to the Hermitage Bridge in St. Petersburg, the most notable of which was the replica of the Poltava, the first Russian battleship of the early 18th century.

SRC: 为避免新冠病毒传播，今年海军阅兵式期间只有当地居民和特邀来宾能够进入喀琅施塔得。
HYP: To avoid the spread of the new crown virus, only local residents and special guests were allowed to enter Kronstadt during this year's naval parade.

SRC: 每年7月最后一个星期日是俄罗斯海军日。
HYP: Russian Navy Day is celebrated every year on the last Sunday of July.

SRC: 中新网重庆7月26日电(<v>记者刘贤</v>)重庆市发展和改革委员会26日发布消息称，该市截至目前已退捕渔民4404人，占全部涉及渔民的42.54% 。
HYP: CHONGQING, July 26 (Xinhua) -- Chongqing Development and Reform Commission released a news release on July 26, saying that the city has so far retired 4404 fishermen, accounting for 42.54 percent of all fishermen involved .

SRC: 中新网重庆7月26日电(记者刘贤)重庆市发展和改革委员会26日发布消息称，该市截至目前已退捕渔民4404人，占全部涉及渔民的42.54% 。
HYP: CHONGQING, July 26 (Xinhua) -- Chongqing Development and Reform Commission released a news release on July 26, saying that the city has so far retired 4404 fishermen, accounting for 42.54 percent of all fishermen involved .

SRC: 今年53岁的李代国接受中新网记者采访时说，爷爷辈就在龙溪河打鱼，自己11岁起就跟着父亲打鱼，摇着小船，沿着龙溪河前行，上到重庆梁平，下到长寿，每次一离开家就是十天半个月，靠打鱼维持家人生活。
HYP: Li Daiguo, 53, said in an interview with CNN that his grandfather's generation fished in Longxi River, and he followed his father's fishing since he was 11 years old, rocking a small boat and traveling along Longxi River, up to Chongqing Liangping and down to Changshou, each time he left home for 10 days and half a month, relying on fishing to sustain his family's life.

SRC: 但从1997年起，随着农村人口逐渐往场镇里涌，高安场镇里的居民越来越多，造成的环境污染也越来越严重。
HYP: But from 1997, as the rural population gradually to the field town, Gaoan field town in more and more residents, resulting in more and more serious environmental pollution.

SRC: 龙溪河沿线修建了造纸厂、化工厂、养殖场，也污染河水。
HYP: Along the Longxi River, paper mills, chemical plants and farms were built, which also polluted the river.

SRC: 到2007年、2008年，龙溪河变成臭水沟。
HYP: By 2007 and 2008, Longxi River turned into a foul ditch.

SRC: “捕上来的鱼鳞片都是黑的，剖开后里面也是黑的。”
HYP: "The scales of the fish caught were black, and the inside was also black when cut open."

SRC: 李代国说，河水污染后打鱼越来越困难。
HYP: Li Daiguo said that it was getting more and more difficult to fish after the river was polluted.

SRC: 当地开始下大力气治理龙溪河污染，包括清漂、巡河、水生资源管护等。
HYP: The local area began to make great efforts to control the pollution of Longxi River, including drift cleaning, river patrol, aquatic resources management and protection.

SRC: 李代国也从渔民退捕转产，成为巡河队的一员，管护水生资源。
HYP: Li Daiguo also retired from fishing and became a member of the river patrol team to take care of aquatic resources.

SRC: 从2020年1月1日起，重庆市水生生物保护区以及主城区相关水域已实行全面禁捕。
