HYP: From January 1, 2020, Chongqing Aquatic Life Protection Zone and related waters in the main city have been implemented a total ban on fishing.

SRC: 据重庆市发展改革委数据，截至目前，重庆市已累计退捕渔船3403艘、已签订退捕协议渔船4643艘，分别占三年总任务的63.3% 、 86.3% 。
HYP: According to the data of Chongqing Development and Reform Commission, up to now, Chongqing has retired 3403 fishing boats and 4643 fishing boats have signed retired fishing agreements, accounting for 63.3% and 86.3% of the total three-year task respectively.

SRC: 已退捕渔民4404人，占全部涉及渔民的42.54% 。
HYP: The number of fishermen who have retired from fishing is 4404, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.

SRC: 已退捕4404人中，实现就业4267人，占已退捕渔民的96.89% 。
HYP: Of the 4404 people who have retired from fishing, 4267 have been employed, accounting for 96.89% of the fishermen who have retired.

SRC: 养老保险保障覆盖2691人，占退捕渔民的61.10% 。
HYP: Pension insurance coverage of 2691 people, accounting for 61.10% of the fishermen who have retired from fishing.

SRC: 下一步，重庆市将深入开展各专项整治行动，加快推进长江干流岸线利用项目清理整治，完成新一轮长江入河排污口普查并开展相应整治行动，基本完成“三磷” ( 指磷矿、磷化工和磷石膏库)整治任务、小水电清理整改工作，推进长江两岸造林绿化专项行动，强化绿色矿山建设，巩固长江干流非法码头、非法采砂专项整治成果，深入推进长江流域禁捕退捕工作。
HYP: Next, Chongqing City will carry out in-depth special rectification actions, accelerate the use of the Yangtze River main stream shoreline project cleaning and rectification, complete a new round of Yangtze River outfall census and carry out the corresponding rectification actions, basically complete the "three phosphorus" (phosphorus mine, phosphorus chemical and phosphogypsum reservoir) rectification tasks, small hydropower cleaning and rectification work, promote the Yangtze River on both sides of the The government has also taken special actions to reforest both sides of the Yangtze River, strengthen the construction of green mines, consolidate the results of the special rectification of illegal docks and illegal sand mining on the main stream of the Yangtze River, and further promote the ban on fishing and retrieval in the Yangtze River basin.

SRC: 新华社香港7月25日电香港特区政府财经事务及库务局局长许正宇表示，香港的金融市场仍保持活跃、运作有序。
HYP: HONG KONG, July 25 (Xinhua) -- The Secretary for Financial Services and the Treasury of the Hong Kong SAR Government, Mr. Hui Ching-yu, said that Hong Kong's financial markets remain active and operate in an orderly manner.

SRC: 他对香港金融稳定及经济表示乐观。
HYP: He expressed optimism about Hong Kong's financial stability and economy.

SRC: 许正宇在香港驻多伦多经济贸易办事处及港加商会（加拿大总会）24日（多伦多时间）合办的网上研讨会上表示，香港因为“修例风波”和新冠肺炎疫情，经历着艰难的状况。
HYP: Speaking at a webinar co-organized by the Hong Kong Economic and Trade Office in Toronto and the Hong Kong-Canada Business Council (Canadian Chamber of Commerce) on July 24 (Toronto time), Mr. Hui said Hong Kong is going through a difficult situation because of the "amendment controversy" and the new pneumonia epidemic.

SRC: 港元汇价稳定并偏向强方兑换保证水平。
HYP: The Hong Kong dollar exchange rate is stable and tilted towards the strong-side guaranteed exchange rate level.

SRC: 银行体系没有明显的资金流出迹象，相反，自6月以来超过110亿<v>美元</v>资金流入。
HYP: The banking system shows no clear signs of outflows, but on the contrary, more than $11 billion has flowed in since June.

SRC: 银行体系没有明显的<v>资金</v>流出迹象，相反，自6月以来超过110亿美元资金流入。
HYP: The banking system shows no clear signs of outflows, but on the contrary, more than $11 billion has flowed in since June.

SRC: 银行的存款总额在过去几个月也持续增加，股票市场有一连串公开招股集资活动，市场成交屡见上升。
HYP: Total bank deposits have also continued to increase over the past few months, and the stock market has seen a spate of public offering capital raisings and repeated increases in market transactions.

SRC: 许正宇说，新冠肺炎疫情为全球经济及金融市场带来压力，但香港的基本优势仍然保持不变。
HYP: Xu Zhengyu said the new pneumonia outbreak has brought pressure to the global economy and financial markets, but Hong Kong's fundamental strengths remain intact.

SRC: 香港拥有的多项优势，包括地理、法治、高速通讯、资讯和资金自由流通以及简单低税制，使香港持续成为领先的国际金融中心。
HYP: Hong Kong's many advantages, including geography, the rule of law, high-speed communications, free flow of information and capital, and a simple, low-tax regime, continue to make Hong Kong a leading international financial center.

SRC: 许正宇指出，特区政府在“防疫抗疫基金”预留60亿港元，未来两年在公营及私营界别创造约3万个有时限的职位，涵盖不同技能及学历人士。
HYP: Mr. Hui pointed out that the SAR Government has set aside HK$6 billion in the "Prevention and Control Fund" to create about 30000 time-limited jobs in the public and private sectors over the next two years, covering people with different skills and qualifications.

SRC: 为支持金融科技的发展，特区政府也已推出“千人计划”，资助本地金融科技公司、初创及其他有金融科技相关业务的企业，以创造1000个新职位，聘用本地人才及丰富香港的金融科技人才库。
HYP: To support the development of financial technology, the SAR Government has also launched the "1000 Talents Scheme" to subsidize local financial technology companies, start-ups and other enterprises with financial technology-related businesses to create 1000 new jobs, hire local talents and enrich the financial technology talent pool in Hong Kong.

SRC: 展望未来，许正宇对香港的金融稳定及经济表示乐观。
HYP: Looking ahead, Mr. Hui expressed optimism for the financial stability and economy of Hong Kong.

SRC: 他鼓励加拿大企业善用香港的优势及其作为国际金融中心、国际资产及财富管理中心以及全球离岸人民币业务枢纽的地位，在粤港澳大湾区及附近地区发展及投资。
HYP: He encouraged Canadian companies to leverage Hong Kong's strengths and its position as an international financial center, an international asset and wealth management center and a global hub for offshore RMB business to develop and invest in the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area and nearby regions.

SRC: 《柳叶刀》刊文赞扬中国抗疫努力鼓励各国学习经验-中新网
HYP: Lancet article praises China's efforts to fight epidemic, encourages countries to learn from experience - CNN

SRC: 《柳叶刀》杂志<v>25日刊</v>文表示，中国作为一个拥有14亿人口，规模与欧洲或美国相似的国家，现阶段新冠疫情得到有效控制，而没有再出现大范围传播的情况，在很大程度上控制住了国内的疫情。
HYP: China, a country with a population of 1.4 billion and a scale similar to that of Europe or the United States, has largely contained the domestic epidemic at this stage by effectively controlling the new crown epidemic without any further widespread spread, said an article in The Lancet 25.

SRC: 《柳叶刀》杂志25日刊文表示，中国作为一个拥有14亿人口，规模与欧洲或美国相似的国家，现阶段新冠疫情得到有效控制，而没有再出现大范围传播的情况，在很大程度上控制住了国内的疫情。
HYP: China, a country with a population of 1.4 billion and a scale similar to that of Europe or the United States, has largely contained the domestic epidemic at this stage by effectively controlling the new crown epidemic without any further widespread spread, said an article in The Lancet 25.

SRC: 文章表示，在近十多年时间里，中国对国内研究和公共卫生建设方面进行了大量的投资，这使得中国对新冠的准备比当年严重急性呼吸道综合征(SARS)的准备要充分得多。
HYP: The article says that China has invested heavily in domestic research and public health construction over the last decade or so, which has made it much more prepared for the new crown than it was for severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS) that year.

SRC: 作者表示，2002年SARS暴发时，起初中国准备不足，尤其是病原体无法确定。
HYP: When the SARS outbreak occurred in 2002, the authors say, China was initially ill-prepared, especially because the pathogen could not be identified.

SRC: 当2019年12月发现新冠病毒时，中国科学家很快就能够鉴定出病毒种类，并于2020年1月11日与国际共享了基因组测序数据。
HYP: When the new coronavirus was discovered in December 2019, Chinese scientists were quickly able to identify the virus species and shared the genome sequencing data internationally on Jan. 11, 2020.

SRC: 到1月底，来自中国大陆和香港的医生阐明了该病毒的临床特征，通过在《柳叶刀》上发表的研究论文，向世界警告了新冠病毒的威胁。
HYP: By the end of January, doctors from mainland China and Hong Kong elucidated the clinical features of the virus, warning the world of the threat of the new coronavirus through a research paper published in The Lancet.

SRC: 中国也一直处于疫苗研究的最前沿，在国家宣布紧急状态下，通过国内的紧密合作，这样的研究非常迅速而严格地展开，5月和7月，分别在《柳叶刀》上公布了中国开发的新冠疫苗早期试验取得进展的结果。
HYP: China has also been at the forefront of vaccine research, and such research has been conducted very quickly and rigorously through close collaboration within the country in the face of a declared national emergency, with results of progress in early trials of a new coronavirus vaccine developed in China published in The Lancet in May and July, respectively.

SRC: 中国的经验表明，对国家卫生和研究体系进行投资，有效提高实验室能力是非常重要的。
HYP: The Chinese experience demonstrates the importance of investing in the national health and research system to effectively improve laboratory capacity.

SRC: 这是国家对卫生紧急情况和全球卫生安全做出快速有效反应的基础。
HYP: This is the basis for a rapid and effective national response to health emergencies and global health security.

SRC: 其他国家，特别是低收入和中等收入国家来说，非常值得借鉴和学习。
HYP: It is well worthwhile for other countries, especially low- and middle-income countries, to learn from and emulate this.

SRC: 此外，中国的经验证明，在强大的研究基础上，必须有强有力的高层果断地凭借科学依据来作出正确决策，这才使得新冠疫情得到有效控制。
HYP: In addition, China's experience proves that a strong research base must be followed by strong top-level decisiveness to make the right decisions based on scientific evidence, which has led to effective control of the new crown outbreak.

SRC: 文章强调，政府及其领导人必须尊重科学，理解科学的价值，并以对社会最有利的方式对其采取行动。
HYP: The article emphasizes that the government and its leaders must respect science, understand its value, and act on it in the way that is best for society.

SRC: 在暴发初期，中国国家卫建委派出三组传染病专家前往武汉，调查新冠病毒的风险和传播，他们的建议为1月23日武汉“封城”的决定提供了依据；当有专家提出建设方舱医院必要性和紧迫性时，政府很快做出了决定并快速实施；同时，社区和群众的广泛参与，也使得疫情快速有效地被控制。
HYP: In the early stages of the outbreak, China's National Health Construction Commission sent three teams of infectious disease experts to Wuhan to investigate the risk and spread of the New Guinea virus, and their recommendations informed the decision to "seal off" the city on January 23; when experts raised the need and urgency of building the Fangzhai Hospital, the government made a quick decision and implemented it quickly; and At the same time, widespread community and public participation enabled the outbreak to be contained quickly and effectively.

SRC: 文章最后强调，应对全球性的卫生紧急情况，各国需要加强全球合作，联合应对。
HYP: The article concludes by emphasizing that countries need to strengthen global cooperation and joint response to global health emergencies.

SRC: 总台记者杨洪
HYP: By Yang Hong, General Affairs Bureau

SRC: 当地时间25日下午，一架小型飞机在德国北威州韦瑟尔县撞上一座多层住宅楼的顶层，事故共造成三人死亡。
HYP: In the afternoon of 25 local time, a small plane crashed into the top floor of a multi-storey residential building in Wesel County, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany, killing a total of three people in the accident.

SRC: 杜伊斯堡检方、韦瑟尔县警察局和韦瑟尔市消防部门当天晚间联合发布声明称，当天14时40分左右，一架两座小型飞机撞上位于韦瑟尔县辉柏斯坎普街一栋多层住宅楼顶层阁楼的住宅，造成三人丧生。
HYP: Duisburg prosecutors, Wessel County Police Department and Wessel City Fire Department issued a joint statement later that day, at about 14:40, a two-seater small aircraft crashed into a multi-storey residential building located in Wessel County Pfeißkamp Street, the top floor of the attic residence, resulting in the death of three people.

SRC: 其当天从北威州鲁尔区马尔市起飞，在韦瑟尔县的机场中途停靠后再度起飞，随后撞上住宅楼。
HYP: The plane took off from the Ruhr region of North Rhine-Westphalia, stopped at the airport in Weser County and then took off again before crashing into the residential building.

SRC: 死者身份或为遭撞击住宅内的一名女性住户和小型飞机上两名乘客。
HYP: The victims may be a female occupant of the home that was hit and two passengers from the small plane.

SRC: 房内一名两岁儿童仅受轻伤，被平安救出。
HYP: A two-year-old child inside the home suffered only minor injuries and was rescued safely.

SRC: 房内其余住户未在事故中受伤，但情绪仍未平复。
HYP: The rest of the occupants of the house were not injured in the accident, but their emotions are still unsettled.

SRC: 德新社报道的现场画面显示，遭遇事故的住宅一度冒出滚滚浓烟，消防队员扑灭火情后可见房屋损毁严重。
HYP: The scene, reported by the German news agency, showed that the home that was hit by the accident was once a rolling smoke, firefighters put out the fire after the house was seen to be badly damaged.

SRC: 目前，飞机失事原因尚不明确。
HYP: The cause of the plane crash is still unclear.

SRC: 《莱茵邮报》援引警方说法报道称，有线索表明，飞机或在撞上住宅楼前就已解体。
HYP: The Rheinische Post, citing police, reported that there are clues that the plane may have disintegrated before hitting the residential building.

SRC: 警方表示，在事故现场一带发现了失事飞机的多块零部件。
HYP: Police said several parts of the crashed plane were found in the area of the accident site.

SRC: 德国刑警正与杜伊斯堡检方、德国联邦航空事故调查局共同调查导致这一事故的原因。
HYP: German criminal police are working with Duisburg prosecutors and the German Federal Aviation Accident Investigation Agency to investigate what led to the accident.

SRC: 记者当天从中国驻杜塞尔多夫总领事馆了解到，该馆与当地警局及消防部门取得联系，据现场判断，伤亡人员中无中国公民。
HYP: The reporter learned from the Chinese Consulate General in Dusseldorf on the same day, the museum and the local police and fire departments to get in touch, according to the scene judge, casualties among the Chinese citizens.

SRC: 大鹏导演《吉祥如意》入围金爵奖-新华网
HYP: Dapeng's "Auspicious As You Like It" shortlisted for Golden Goblet Award - Xinhua

SRC: 大鹏<v>导演</v>《吉祥如意》入围金爵奖-新华网
HYP: Dapeng's "Auspicious As You Like It" shortlisted for Golden Goblet Award - Xinhua

SRC: 7月18日，第二十三届上海国际电影节公布了金爵奖官方入选影片名单。
HYP: On July 18, the 23rd Shanghai International Film Festival announced the official list of films selected for the Golden Goblet Award.

SRC: 大鹏导演的首部现实题材影片《吉祥如意》，成功入围本届上影节金爵奖，同时影片官方发布了首款海报。
HYP: Dapeng director's first realistic film "auspicious as you wish", successfully shortlisted for the Golden Goblet Award at this year's Shanghai Film Festival, while the film officially released the first poster.

SRC: 海报片方供图
HYP: Poster Photo by the film maker

SRC: 影片《吉祥如意》是大鹏导演的第一部现实题材作品，也是他与金爵奖的二度结缘。
HYP: The film "Auspicious As You Like It" is Dapeng's first realistic work, and also his second connection with the Golden Goblet Award.

SRC: 影片《吉祥如意》是大鹏<v>导演</v>的第一部现实题材作品，也是他与金爵奖的二度结缘。
HYP: The film "Auspicious As You Like It" is Dapeng's first realistic work, and also his second connection with the Golden Goblet Award.

SRC: 该片讲述了这样一个故事：一位喜剧片导演突发奇想，回到东北农村老家，希望将一家人如何过年拍成一部文艺电影，结果遭遇一系列意外。
HYP: The film tells the story of a comedy director who returns to his rural home in the northeast on a whim, hoping to make a literary film about how a family spends New Year's Eve, only to encounter a series of accidents.

SRC: 因拍电影而聚齐的家庭成员们，完成了最后的聚会。
HYP: The family members, who were brought together for the film, complete the final reunion.

SRC: 在今日发布的电影海报中，这个家庭中的一员— — “三舅”王吉祥坐在画面中央抽着烟，背景是披上银装的东北黑土地，前景是中国人逢年过节必挂的红灯笼。
HYP: In the movie poster released today, a member of the family - "Third Uncle" Wang auspicious sitting in the center of the picture smoking a cigarette, the background is the silver-clad black land of the Northeast, the foreground is the Chinese New Year's Day must hang red lanterns.

SRC: 象征着喜庆、团圆的红灯笼与身影落寞的王吉祥形成了巨大反差，似乎也透露了这个大家庭关系中的复杂与纠结。
HYP: The red lanterns, symbolizing celebration and reunion, form a huge contrast with the forlorn figure of Wang Jixiang, which seems to reveal the complexity and tangles in the relationship of this large family.

SRC: 据悉，影片中，除了“三舅”王吉祥的女儿由演员刘陆扮演，其余戏份均由真实的导演家人完成，影片实验性的视听风格，打破了戏剧与真实的边界，带给观众全新的浸入式观影体验。
HYP: It is reported that the film, except for the "third uncle" Wang auspicious daughter played by the actor Liu Lu, the rest of the scenes are completed by the real director's family, the film's experimental audio-visual style, breaking the border between drama and real, bringing the audience a new immersive viewing experience.

SRC: 据导演大鹏介绍，《吉祥如意》的创作源自“一场天意” ， 拍摄期间家庭突如其来的一系列变故，让原本的拍摄计划不得不随之改变，没有剧本的生活最终被记录成电影，却释放出超越设计的张力。
HYP: According to director Dapeng, the creation of "Auspicious As You Like It" originated from "a providence", a series of sudden changes in the family during the shooting, so the original shooting plan had to be changed, no scripted life was finally recorded into a film, but released beyond the design of the tension.

SRC: 导演大鹏究竟如何面对这场“天意” ， 又该如何继续迎接这场天意带来的种种改变呢？
HYP: How does director Dapeng face this "providence" and how should he continue to meet the changes brought about by this providence?

SRC: 毫无疑问《吉祥如意》是充满实验性的，几乎全素人的阵容和创新的视听风格将镜头前的生活变成了一部电影，在真实影像的包裹下，观众也会从影片所呈现的家庭中找到自己和家人的影子，随着影片中这场家庭聚会的落幕，唤起一系列思考。
HYP: With an almost all-vegetarian cast and an innovative audio-visual style, the film turns life in front of the camera into a movie, and under the wrapping of real images, the audience will find themselves and their families in the film.

SRC: NEWS.GOV.MO: 新型冠状病毒感染应变协调中心查询热线统计数字(7月25日08H00-7月26日08H00)
HYP: NEWS.GOV.MO: Novel Coronavirus Infection Response Coordination Center Enquiry Hotline Statistics (July 25, 08H00 - July 26, 08H00)

SRC: 由2020年07月25日08H00 至7月26日08H00，新型冠状病毒感染应变协调中心的查询热线共接获292宗电话查询。
HYP: From 08H00, July 25, 2020 to 08H00, July 26, 2020, 292 telephone inquiries were received by the Novel Coronavirus Response Coordination Center's hotline.

SRC: 关于疫情的291宗查询，已即时转线至相关部门代表跟进，情况如下：
HYP: The 291 inquiries regarding the outbreak were immediately transferred to representatives of relevant departments for follow-up as follows.

SRC: 卫生局271宗(涉及：查询关于隔离；查询核酸检测；查询两地牌；健康码；其他。）
HYP: Department of Health 271 cases (Involving: inquiries about isolation; inquiries about nucleic acid testing; inquiries about two-site license; health code; others.)

SRC: 治安警察局17宗(涉及：查询出入境措施；查询粤澳两地牌车辆出入境措施；查询珠海政务热线；查询证件逗留问题。）
HYP: Law and Order Police Department 17 cases (Involved: enquiries about immigration measures; enquiries about immigration measures for vehicles with Guangdong and Macao license plates; inquiries about Zhuhai government hotline; inquiries about document stay.

SRC: 旅游局1宗(涉及：查询隔离酒店问题。）
HYP: Tourism Bureau 1 case (Related to: inquiries on segregated hotels.)

SRC: 教育暨青年局1宗(涉及：查询澳门学生返回英国读书的方法。）
HYP: Education and Youth Affairs Bureau 1 case (Involved: Enquiry on the method for Macau students to return to study in the UK.

SRC: 海事及水务局1宗(涉及：询问香港渔船进港是否需要向海事及水务局申报及核酸检测相关事宜。）
HYP: Maritime and Water Affairs Bureau 1 case (Involved: Enquiries on whether Hong Kong fishing vessels entering Hong Kong need to declare to the Maritime and Water Affairs Bureau and matters related to nucleic acid testing.

SRC: 马里尼切夫说，价值的变化受卢布贬值和疫情等影响。
HYP: Marinichev said the change in value was affected by the devaluation of the ruble and the epidemic, among other things.

SRC: 他说“服务成本正在增加。
HYP: The cost of services is increasing," he said.

SRC: 由于疫情，人们开始在互联网上花费更多的时间。”
HYP: Due to the epidemic, people are spending more time on the Internet."

SRC: 马里尼切夫不排除年互联网价格将严重上涨，认为运营商可以为客户提供更高的速度和更多服务抵消人们对价格上涨的不满。
HYP: Marinichev does not rule out a serious increase in Internet prices in the coming year, arguing that operators can offer customers higher speeds and more services to offset people's dissatisfaction with higher prices.

SRC: 《中国医生》筹拍致敬抗疫英雄-新华网
HYP: 'Chinese Doctor' prepares for filming to pay tribute to epidemic heroes - Xinhua

SRC: 近日，带着中国电影人对抗疫英雄的敬意，博纳影业集团董事长于冬、导演刘伟强(图左）在广州与钟南山院士，就抗疫题材影片《中国医生》的拍摄制作工作进行了座谈交流。
HYP: Recently, with Chinese filmmakers' respect for the heroes fighting against epidemics, Bona Film Group Chairman Yu Dong and director Liu Weiqiang (pictured left) had a discussion and exchange with academician Zhong Nanshan in Guangzhou on the shooting and production of the film "Chinese Doctor" on the theme of fighting against epidemics.

SRC: 博纳影业希望能借由《中国医生》，向所有战斗在疫情防控一线的医护、防疫工作者致敬！
HYP: Bona Film hopes to use "Chinese Doctor" to pay tribute to all medical and epidemic prevention workers who are fighting on the front line of epidemic prevention and control!

SRC: 2021年，该片将作为庆祝中国共产党建党100周年献礼影片全国公映。
HYP: In 2021, the film will be released nationwide as a tribute film to celebrate the 100th anniversary of the founding of the Communist Party of China.

SRC: 目前，博纳影业正在中宣部和国家电影局的安排部署下，广东省电影局及湖北省电影局的支持下，组织电影《中国机长》原班人马筹拍电影《中国医生》，这是一部反映在党中央的坚强领导下，全国人民团结一心抗击新冠肺炎疫情的影片。
HYP: Currently, under the arrangement and deployment of the Ministry of Propaganda and the National Film Bureau, and with the support of the Film Bureau of Guangdong Province and the Film Bureau of Hubei Province, Bona Film is organizing the original cast of the film "Chinese Captain" to prepare the film "Chinese Doctor", which is a film reflecting the unity of the people of China in the fight against the new pneumonia epidemic under the strong leadership of the Party Central Committee.

SRC: 影片聚焦武汉抗疫一线，将以武汉医护人员及各省市援鄂医疗队为人物背景，从人性的角度，运用独特的叙事，以及极具冲击力的镜头语言，全景展现抗疫一线充满奉献和牺牲精神的中国医护人员的感人故事。
HYP: The film focuses on the front line of Wuhan's fight against the epidemic, and will take Wuhan's medical staff and medical teams from various provinces and cities to aid E. China's medical team as the background of the characters, from the perspective of human nature, using a unique narrative, as well as a very impactful camera language, a panoramic view of the front line of the fight against the epidemic is full of dedication and sacrifice of Chinese medical staff's touching story.

SRC: 据了解，武汉解封之日的第一时间，博纳公司便克服重重困难，派出采拍小组深入疫情一线，与数百位医护工作者面对面交流了解、搜集资料，目前已经采访到了包括钟南山院士本人、广州驰援武汉第一人、广东援鄂医疗队，以及武汉金银潭医院、武汉协和医院、武汉大学中南医院、武汉中心医院等抗疫战线最前沿的白衣天使们，拍下了大量珍贵的第一手视频资料。
HYP: It is understood that the first time when Wuhan was unsealed, Bona overcame many difficulties and sent a film crew to go deep into the front line of the epidemic, communicating with hundreds of medical workers face to face and collecting information, and has already interviewed some of the most important medical professionals on the epidemic front, including academician Zhong Nanshan himself, the first person who rushed to Wuhan from Guangzhou, the medical team from Guangdong who helped E, as well as Wuhan Jinyintan Hospital, Wuhan Union Hospital, Wuhan University Central and South Hospital, Wuhan Central Hospital, etc. A lot of valuable first-hand video information was captured by the angels in white at the forefront of the anti-epidemic front, including Zhong Nan Hospital of Wuhan University and Wuhan Central Hospital.

SRC: 钟南山院士在此次座谈会中亦对电影的拍摄提出了期待和希望：“ 我很期待，希望你们不仅要走访一些抛头露面比较多的专家，还要更多地采访在一线埋头苦干的医务人员，他们是大多数。”
HYP: Academician Zhong Nanshan also raised expectations and hopes for the film shooting in the symposium: "I am looking forward to it, I hope you will not only visit some experts who show their faces more, but also interview more medical personnel who work hard at the front line, they are the majority."

SRC: 他表示，他之前看过《我和我的祖国》《中国机长》，认为以普通人视角讲述大格局故事的方法就很好。
HYP: He said he had previously seen "My Country and I" and "The Chinese Captain" and thought the approach of telling big-picture stories from the perspective of ordinary people would be good.

SRC: “现在一些国外朋友对中国还是有一些误解。”
HYP: "Now some foreign friends still have some misconceptions about China."

SRC: 在谈到影片的传播时，钟南山院士表示，目前国外有些人喜欢将病毒贴上政治化标签，他希望电影能从人性的角度打动观众：“ 这部电影除了在中国放映以外，最好也能在国外放映，要用国内外观众都能理解的方式，用真正的人文精神打动观众。”
HYP: When it comes to the dissemination of the film, Academician Zhong Nanshan said that some people abroad currently like to label the virus as politicized, and he hopes that the film will impress the audience from a human perspective: " It is better for this film to be shown abroad in addition to China, and to impress the audience with a true humanistic spirit in a way that both domestic and foreign audiences can understand. "

SRC: 钟南山院士还深情回忆了上世纪80年代的影片《人到中年》，“这么多年过去了，我对改革开放后电影印象最深的还是《人到中年》，当时我国外的医生朋友们都看哭了，如果《中国医生》能够起到这样的作用，那就很了不起了。”
HYP: Academician Zhong Nanshan also fondly recalled the film "Man to Middle Age" in the 1980s, "After so many years, my deepest impression of the post-reform and opening-up film is still "Man to Middle Age", when my doctor friends abroad wept, and it would be remarkable if "Doctor China" could play such a role."

SRC: 钟南山院士表示，如果《中国医生》能引起国外观众的共鸣，那就非常成功。
HYP: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that if "Chinese Doctor" can resonate with foreign audiences, it will be very successful.

SRC: 在座谈交流时，钟南山院士还分享了对当前国际疫情防控的意见和建议，“ 我相信人永远比病毒聪明。”
HYP: During the discussion and exchange, Academician Zhong Nanshan also shared his opinions and suggestions on the current international epidemic prevention and control, " I believe that people are always smarter than viruses."

SRC: 钟南山院士表示，虽说病毒难以预测，但从原始社会至今，人类已渡过了千难万险，如今现代社会有发达的医疗科技和社会管理措施，再加上全世界的医务人员、甚至老百姓都对科学应对新冠肺炎疫情有了基本认识，人们不会再像以前那么被动，“接下来要注意两个方面的工作，一是要研究全世界怎么加强合作，二是注重对人们心灵的抚慰” 。
HYP: Academician Zhong Nanshan said, although the virus is unpredictable, but from primitive society to the present, humans have survived thousands of difficulties and dangers, and now modern society has developed medical technology and social management measures, plus medical personnel around the world, and even the people have a basic understanding of scientific response to the new crown pneumonia epidemic, people will no longer be as passive as before, "the next two aspects to pay attention to One is to study how the world can strengthen cooperation, and the other is to focus on soothing people's hearts.

SRC: （记者王金跃）
HYP: (Reporter Wang Jinyue)

SRC: 文旅“红果”聚韶山—湘潭首届红博会见闻-今日要闻-湖南日报网-华声在线
HYP: Culture and tourism "red fruit" gathered Shaoshan - Xiangtan the first red fair to see - Today's news - Hunan Daily.com - Huasheng Online

SRC: 湖南日报·新湖南客户端记者蒋睿通讯员肖燕
HYP: Hunan Daily - new Hunan client reporter Jiang Rui correspondent Xiao Yan

SRC: 嘉兴红船模具、韶山毛泽东铜像、延安布堆花工艺品、湘西永顺腊肉…… 7月25日，2020湖南红色旅游文化节在韶山开幕。
HYP: Jiaxing red boat mold, Shaoshan Mao Zedong bronze statue, Yan'an cloth pile flower crafts, Xiangshi Yongshun bacon ...... July 25, 2020 Hunan Red Tourism and Culture Festival opened in Shaoshan.

SRC: 作为主体活动之一，湘潭首届红色文化产业博览会在韶山全域旅游咨询集散中心开展。
HYP: As one of the main activities, Xiangtan's first red culture industry expo was carried out in Shaoshan all-area tourism consultation and distribution center.

SRC: 展览区红色文创产品、革命老区土特产品等琳琅满目，引来各地游客争相购买。
HYP: Exhibition area red cultural and creative products, the old revolutionary areas of local products and other dazzling, attracting tourists from all over the world to buy.

SRC: “此次红博会，既是全国红色文化产业成果的一次展示，也是参展单位和企业交流经验、探讨发展路径的一个重要平台。”
HYP: "The red fair, both the results of the national red culture industry is a showcase, but also exhibitors and enterprises to exchange experience and explore the development path of an important platform."

SRC: 湘潭首届红博会执委会相关负责人介绍，这届红博会以“弘扬红色文化助推文旅升温”为主题，展览总面积近3000平方米，设置了氛围营造区、景区展示展陈区和红色文旅网游网购体验区。
HYP: Xiangtan the first red fair executive committee of the relevant person in charge of the red fair to "promote red culture to boost the cultural tourism heating" as the theme, the total exhibition area of nearly 3000 square meters, set up an atmosphere to create an area, scenic display exhibition area and the red cultural tourism online shopping experience area.

SRC: <v>邀请浙江嘉兴、贵州遵义、陕西延安等8个外省地市以及我省长沙、株洲、岳阳、郴州等地137家企业、单位参展</v>，共展出展品768种，包括红色文物、工艺品、食品特产、旅游线路、红色培训课程、红色文创产品等。
HYP: A total of 768 exhibits, including red cultural relics, handicrafts, food specialties, tourism lines, red training courses and red cultural and creative products, were exhibited.

SRC: 展销区将展至7月29日。
HYP: The exhibition and sales area will be on display until July 29.

SRC: 作为红博会东道主，湘潭展区亮点纷呈。
HYP: As the host of the Red Fair, Xiangtan exhibition area highlights.

SRC: 展区负责人<v>介绍</v>，湘潭展区分为红色工业、红色文化产业发展两大部分。
HYP: The person in charge of the exhibition area, Xiangtan exhibition area is divided into two major parts of the red industry, red cultural industry development.

SRC: 红色工业展区展出华菱湘钢、华菱线缆、湘电动力等6家企业的展品31件，红色文化产业发展展区展出红色系列图书、红色系列食品、红色系列文创产品等27家单位产品近200个。
HYP: The red industry exhibition area exhibits 31 pieces of six enterprises such as Valin Xiang steel, Valin cable, Xiang power, red cultural industry development exhibition area exhibits red series of books, red series of food, red series of cultural and creative products, such as 27 units of products nearly 200.

SRC: 在延安展区，不少游客被陈展的布堆花手工艺品和剪纸艺术品所吸引。
HYP: In the Yan'an exhibition area, many visitors were attracted by the cloth pile flower handicrafts and paper-cutting artworks on display.

SRC: 延安市文旅局局长马东坡介绍，此次参展精心选择了延安近两年来优秀的红色文创产品，其中16种产品是2019全国红色文创产品优秀作品。
HYP: Ma Dongpo, director of Yan'an City Culture and Tourism Bureau, introduced that the exhibition carefully selected the outstanding red cultural and creative products of Yan'an in the past two years, of which 16 products are the outstanding works of 2019 national red cultural and creative products.

SRC: 同时，他们邀请了国家级非物质文化遗产保护项目“安塞剪纸”、“陕北民歌”与省级非遗项目延川布堆画传承人，重点推介延安民俗特色产品，并借此机会与其他展区单位企业沟通交流，推动跨区域合作。
HYP: At the same time, they invited the national intangible cultural heritage protection project "Ansai paper-cutting", "Shaanbei folk songs" and the provincial intangible heritage project Yanchuan cloth pile painting inheritors, focusing on the promotion of Yan'an folklore products, and take this opportunity to communicate with other exhibition units enterprises to promote cross-regional cooperation. The exhibition will promote cross-regional cooperation.

SRC: 膜分离技术助力破解“温室效应” - 中新网
HYP: Membrane separation technology helps crack the "greenhouse effect" - China News Network

SRC: 膜分离技术助力破解“温室效应”
HYP: Membrane Separation Technology Helps Crack the "Greenhouse Effect"

SRC: 新型混合基质膜制备技术示意图
HYP: Schematic diagram of the new hybrid substrate membrane preparation technology

SRC: 本报讯记者商瑞报道：日前，天津大学大气环境与生物能源团队针对“膜分离法捕集二氧化碳”取得重大进展，成功研发出新型混合基质膜制备技术，大幅提升膜材料二氧化碳捕集性能。
HYP: By Shang Rui, reporter: Recently, Tianjin University's atmospheric environment and bioenergy team has made significant progress in "carbon dioxide capture by membrane separation" and successfully developed a new hybrid matrix membrane preparation technology, which significantly improves the carbon dioxide capture performance of membrane materials.

SRC: 相关成果已作为国际期刊《温室气体：科学与技术》封面文章发表。
HYP: The results were published as the cover article of the international journal "Greenhouse Gases: Science and Technology".

SRC: “温室效应”是困扰人类发展的重大环境问题，二氧化碳排放则是造成“温室效应”的元凶。
HYP: The "greenhouse effect" is a major environmental problem plaguing human development, and CO2 emissions are the culprit of the "greenhouse effect".

SRC: 如何高效捕获并利用人类排放的二氧化碳是科学家关注的焦点。
HYP: How to efficiently capture and utilize human carbon dioxide emissions is the focus of scientists' attention.

SRC: “膜分离法”是一种新兴的二氧化碳捕集技术，它在膜材料帮助下分离二氧化碳气体，具有高效节能、操作简单的特点。
HYP: "Membrane separation" is a new technology of carbon dioxide capture, which is energy efficient and simple to operate with the help of membrane materials.

SRC: 如何让膜材料“深呼吸”， 提高气体分离效率，是采用膜分离法捕集二氧化碳的瓶颈难点。
HYP: How to let the membrane material "breathe" and improve the gas separation efficiency is the bottleneck of carbon dioxide capture by membrane separation method.

SRC: 天津大学科研团队创新思路，通过反复实验，探究不同溶剂对膜气体分离性能的影响。
HYP: The research team of Tianjin University innovated and explored the effect of different solvents on the performance of membrane gas separation through repeated experiments.

SRC: 实验结果表明，以N-甲基吡咯烷酮作为制备溶剂，生成的膜材料中碳纳米管分布更加均匀，“更透气”，有效提升了膜材料气体分离效能和速率。
HYP: The experimental results show that using N-methylpyrrolidone as the preparation solvent, the carbon nanotubes in the generated membrane material are more uniformly distributed and "more breathable", which effectively improves the gas separation efficiency and rate of the membrane material.

SRC: 用这种新技术制备的混合基质膜，二氧化碳分离性能接近目前此类膜材料的理论分离上限。
HYP: The hybrid matrix membranes prepared with this new technology have carbon dioxide separation performance close to the theoretical separation limit of such membrane materials currently available.

SRC: “新技术为膜分离法捕集二氧化碳提供了新思路。”
HYP: "The new technology provides a new idea for carbon dioxide capture by membrane separation."

SRC: 天津大学大气环境与生物能源团队成员李润表示：“ 我们希望这种技术能够为未来燃煤电厂与化工企业处理烟气提供有力支持，在控制温室气体排放等领域发挥重大作用。”
HYP: Li Run, a member of the Atmospheric Environment and Bioenergy team at Tianjin University, said, " We hope this technology will provide strong support for the treatment of flue gas in coal-fired power plants and chemical companies in the future, and play a significant role in areas such as controlling greenhouse gas emissions."

SRC: 首度成立专委会、集体签“长约” 第三届进博会参展商联盟构筑“进博纽带” - 新华网
HYP: The first special committee and collective signing of "long-term contract" of the third Fair exhibitors' alliance to build a "bond to the Expo" - Xinhua

SRC: 7月26日在上海拍摄的第三届进博会参展商联盟第一次会议现场。
HYP: The scene of the first meeting of the 3rd Fair Exhibitor Alliance taken in Shanghai on July 26.

SRC: 新华社上海7月26日电（记者周蕊）26日，第三届进口博览会参展商联盟在此间首次成立专业委员会，首批成立的专委会包括公共卫生防疫专委会和乳业专委会，35家成员企业还签订了3年长期参展合作备忘录，进博会参展商联盟的纽带作用不断增强。
HYP: Shanghai, July 26 (Xinhua) (Reporter Zhou Rui) 26, the third import expo exhibitors alliance here for the first time to establish professional committees, the first set up special committees include public health epidemic prevention and dairy industry special committee, 35 member companies also signed a three-year long-term exhibition cooperation memorandum, the exhibition exhibitors alliance of the growing role of ties.

SRC: 26日在此间举行的第三届进博会参展商联盟第一次会议上，韩国现代、美国陶氏化学、日本资生堂、新西兰纽仕兰、德国西门子、法国米其林、英国阿斯利康等一批展盟成员企业签订了3年长期参展合作备忘录，修订和完善后的展盟章程也首次公布。
HYP: At the first meeting of the 3rd Fair Exhibitor Alliance held here on the 26th, a number of member companies of the Fair Alliance, including Hyundai of Korea, Dow Chemical of the United States, Shiseido of Japan, New Zealand Newsland, Siemens of Germany, Michelin of France and AstraZeneca of the United Kingdom, signed a three-year long-term exhibition cooperation memorandum, and the revised and improved constitution of the Fair Alliance was also announced for the first time.

SRC: 7月26日在上海拍摄的乳业专业委员会成立仪式现场。
HYP: The scene of the inauguration ceremony of the Dairy Industry Professional Committee taken in Shanghai on July 26.

SRC: 根据最新的章程，展盟将引入牵头单位轮值机制，加强专委会功能。
HYP: According to the latest constitution, the exhibition alliance will introduce the lead unit rotation mechanism and strengthen the function of the special committee.

SRC: 专委会将为行业发展趋势分析提出建议，推动行业可持续发展。
HYP: The special committee will make recommendations for the analysis of industry development trends and promote the sustainable development of the industry.

SRC: 同时，整合行业全产业链资源，以大带小，带动关联企业参展，将进博会打造成为行业企业聚集高地。
HYP: At the same time, it will integrate the resources of the whole industry chain of the industry, bring small enterprises with big ones, drive the related enterprises to exhibit, and make the Fair a highland for industry enterprises to gather.

SRC: 首次成立公共卫生防疫专委会，对于当前抗击新冠肺炎疫情来说显得尤为重要。
HYP: The establishment of the Public Health Epidemic Prevention Committee for the first time is particularly important for the current fight against the new crown pneumonia epidemic.

SRC: 作为第三届进博会公共卫生防疫专委会副会长单位，雅培快速诊断业务大中华区总经理仇建平说，下一步，雅培会携手更多行业伙伴，探索新的解决方案和合作模式，助力中国以及全世界抗击新冠肺炎疫情。
HYP: As the vice president of the Public Health Epidemic Prevention Committee of the third session of the Fair, Qiu Jianping, general manager of Abbott's rapid diagnostics business in Greater China, said that Abbott will work with more industry partners to explore new solutions and cooperation models to help fight the NCCP epidemic in China and around the world.

SRC: 7月26日在上海拍摄的公共卫生防疫专业委员会成立仪式现场。
HYP: The scene of the inauguration ceremony of the Public Health Epidemic Prevention Professional Committee taken in Shanghai on July 26.

SRC: 据悉，第三届进博会首次设立公共卫生防疫专区，截至目前已有近50家全球企业报名参展，展览面积超过1万平方米。
HYP: It is reported that the Public Health Epidemic Prevention Zone was set up for the first time at the 3rd Fair, and so far nearly 50 global companies have registered to exhibit, with an exhibition area of more than 10000 square meters.

SRC: 在2018年首届进博会期间，进博会参展商联盟由展商自发倡议成立，旨在成为优质参展企业交流合作平台、连接参展各方信息与资源共享平台，以及为促进中国与世界各国（地区）之间经贸商务往来与发展建言献策的智囊平台。
HYP: During the first Fair in 2018, the Fair Exhibitor Alliance was established by exhibitors on their own initiative, aiming to become a platform for exchange and cooperation among high-quality exhibitors, a platform for sharing information and resources connecting exhibitors, and a think-tank platform for promoting economic and trade business exchanges and development between China and other countries (regions) in the world.

SRC: 截至目前，已有142家企业加入参展商联盟，覆盖全球23个国家和地区。
HYP: So far, 142 enterprises have joined the Exhibitor Alliance, covering 23 countries and regions around the world.

SRC: 比利时3岁女童死于新冠病毒感染-新华网
HYP: Belgium 3-year-old girl died of new coronavirus infection - Xinhua

SRC: 比利时卫生部门24日说，一名3岁女童死于新冠病毒感染，是该国最年幼的新冠病亡患者。
HYP: Belgian health authorities said on the 24th, a 3-year-old girl died from the new coronavirus infection, is the country's youngest new coronavirus patients died.

SRC: 比利时卫生部门发言人布德温·卡特里说，这名女童感染新冠病毒前已经有其他严重疾病；除了这名女童，近期还有一名18岁青年死于新冠病毒感染。
HYP: Belgian health department spokesman Boudwin Catri said the girl had other serious illnesses before contracting the new coronavirus; in addition to the girl, an 18-year-old youth recently died of the new coronavirus infection.

SRC: 卡特里说，上周比利时85%新增新冠确诊人员年龄在60岁以下。
HYP: Catri said 85 percent of the new confirmed cases of New Coronavirus in Belgium last week were under the age of 60.

SRC: 他提醒身体健康、年龄较轻的民众不要掉以轻心。
HYP: He cautioned the healthy, younger population not to take it lightly.

SRC: “虽然年轻人死于新冠病毒感染的情况较为罕见，但没有任何人现在具备免疫力。 ”
HYP: "Although it is relatively rare for young people to die from a new coronavirus infection, no one is now immune . "

SRC: 上周，比利时新增新冠确诊病例比前一周增长89 % ， 每日平均2.9人死于新冠病毒感染，高于前一周的日均1.7人。
HYP: Last week, Belgium saw an 89 % increase in new confirmed cases of neonatal coronavirus compared to the previous week, with a daily average of 2.9 deaths from neonatal coronavirus infection, up from a daily average of 1.7 in the previous week.

SRC: 欧洲疫情高峰期间，比利时人口中新冠病毒感染者占比在欧洲“名列前茅” 。
HYP: At the peak of the epidemic in Europe, Belgium had the "highest" proportion of people living with NCCV in Europe.

SRC: 比利时有1100多万人口。
HYP: Belgium has a population of more than 11 million.

SRC: 最新数据显示，比利时累计64847人感染新冠病毒。
HYP: The latest figures show that a total of 64847 people in Belgium have been infected with the new coronavirus.

SRC: 卡特里本周早些时候警告，在雪球越滚越大、最终造成“雪崩”前，人们必须采取行动。
HYP: Earlier this week, Cartelli warned that people must act before the snowball grows bigger and eventually causes an "avalanche".

SRC: 为抑制疫情反弹，比利时首相索菲·维尔梅斯23日宣布，人们在公共场所佩戴口罩的有关规定将更加严格，8月进一步解除限制性措施的方案也将暂缓执行。
HYP: To curb the rebound of the epidemic, Belgian Prime Minister Sophie Vermeers announced on the 23rd that the rules regarding people wearing masks in public places will be stricter, and the program to further lift restrictive measures in August will also be suspended.

SRC: （郭倩） 【 新华社微特稿】
HYP: (Guo Qian) 【Xinhua News Agency micro special article

SRC: （郭倩） 【 新华社微特稿<v>】</v>

SRC: 大型融媒体行动《走村直播看脱贫》出发- 今日要闻- 湖南日报网- 华声在线
HYP: Large-scale integrated media action "go village live to see the poverty" set off - Today's News - Hunan Daily Online - 华声在线

SRC: 湖南日报·新湖南客户端7月25日讯(本报记者)7月25日，由中央广播电视总台财经节目中心主办的大型融媒体行动《走村直播看脱贫》从江苏徐州出发，两辆携带5G新媒体移动云制播系统的大篷车在现场嘉宾目送下，缓缓驶出现场。
HYP: Hunan Daily - New Hunan Client, July 25 (Our reporter) On July 25, the large-scale integrated media action "Walk the village live to see the poverty" sponsored by the Central Radio and Television Administration's Financial Program Center set off from Xuzhou, Jiangsu Province, and two caravans carrying 5G new media mobile cloud production and broadcasting system slowly drove out of the scene under the eyes of the guests at the scene.

SRC: 习近平总书记指出，“2020年是具有里程碑意义的一年，我们将全面建成小康社会，实现第一个百年奋斗目标，2020年也是脱贫攻坚决战决胜之年”。
HYP: General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out that "2020 is a milestone year, we will build a moderately prosperous society and achieve the first hundred-year goal, 2020 is also the year of decisive victory in the fight against poverty".

SRC: 习近平总书记指出，“2020年是具有里程碑意义的一年，我们将全面建成小康社会，实现第一个百年奋斗目标，2020年也是脱贫攻坚<v>决战决胜</v>之年”。
HYP: General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out that "2020 is a milestone year, we will build a moderately prosperous society and achieve the first hundred-year goal, 2020 is also the year of decisive victory in the fight against poverty".

SRC: 习近平总书记指出，“2020年是具有里程碑意义的一年，我们将全面建成小康社会，实现第一个百年<v>奋斗</v>目标，2020年也是脱贫攻坚决战决胜之年”。
HYP: General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out that "2020 is a milestone year, we will build a moderately prosperous society and achieve the first hundred-year goal, 2020 is also the year of decisive victory in the fight against poverty".

SRC: 习近平总书记指出，“2020年是具有里程碑意义的一年，我们将<v>全面</v>建成小康社会，实现第一个百年奋斗目标，2020年也是脱贫攻坚决战决胜之年”。
HYP: General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out that "2020 is a milestone year, we will build a moderately prosperous society and achieve the first hundred-year goal, 2020 is also the year of decisive victory in the fight against poverty".

SRC: 大型融媒体行动《走村直播看脱贫》是中央广播电视总台财经节目中心为配合这一重大主题，做好脱贫<v>攻坚</v>宣传的重要举措。
HYP: The large-scale integrated media action "Go to the Village Live to See Poverty Eradication" is an important initiative of the Financial Program Center of China Central Radio and Television to match this major theme and do a good job in promoting poverty eradication.

SRC: 大型融媒体行动《走村直播看脱贫》是中央广播电视总台财经节目中心为配合这一重大主题，做好脱贫攻坚宣传的重要举措。
HYP: The large-scale integrated media action "Go to the Village Live to See Poverty Eradication" is an important initiative of the Financial Program Center of China Central Radio and Television to match this major theme and do a good job in promoting poverty eradication.

SRC: 该行动将走进全国20多个省、自治区、直辖市的脱贫村，挖掘鲜活脱贫故事，直击村容村貌巨变，展现村民如何突破生存发展困境、走向致富之路的历程。
HYP: The action will go to the villages in more than 20 provinces, autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the central government to dig out the vivid stories of poverty eradication, to hit the dramatic changes of village appearance, and to show how the villagers break through the difficulties of survival and development and go to the road of prosperity.

SRC: 该行动将走进全国20多个省、自治区、直辖市的<v>脱贫</v>村，挖掘鲜活脱贫故事，直击村容村貌巨变，展现村民如何突破生存发展困境、走向致富之路的历程。
HYP: The action will go to the villages in more than 20 provinces, autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the central government to dig out the vivid stories of poverty eradication, to hit the dramatic changes of village appearance, and to show how the villagers break through the difficulties of survival and development and go to the road of prosperity.

SRC: 这次行动将持续3个多月。
HYP: This operation will last for more than 3 months.

SRC: 记者从徐州出发，兵分两路，一路走西南线，途经安徽、湖北、江西、湖南、广西、贵州、四川、重庆、云南、西藏等地;另一路走西北线，途经河南、陕西、甘肃、青海、新疆、宁夏、内蒙古、山西、河北等地，行程超过1万公里。
HYP: Reporters from Xuzhou, divided into two ways, all the way to the southwest line, through Anhui, Hubei, Jiangxi, Hunan, Guangxi, Guizhou, Sichuan, Chongqing, Yunnan, Tibet and other places; the other way to the northwest line, through Henan, Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Xinjiang, Ningxia, Inner Mongolia, Shanxi, Hebei and other places, the journey of more than 10000 kilometers.

SRC: 记者从徐州<v>出发</v>，兵分两路，一路走西南线，途经安徽、湖北、江西、湖南、广西、贵州、四川、重庆、云南、西藏等地;另一路走西北线，途经河南、陕西、甘肃、青海、新疆、宁夏、内蒙古、山西、河北等地，行程超过1万公里。
HYP: Reporters from Xuzhou, divided into two ways, all the way to the southwest line, through Anhui, Hubei, Jiangxi, Hunan, Guangxi, Guizhou, Sichuan, Chongqing, Yunnan, Tibet and other places; the other way to the northwest line, through Henan, Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Xinjiang, Ningxia, Inner Mongolia, Shanxi, Hebei and other places, the journey of more than 10000 kilometers.

SRC: 在报道形式上，《走村直播看脱贫》大胆融合。
HYP: In the form of reporting, "go live to see the village out of poverty" bold integration.

SRC: 大篷车所到村庄的经济发展情况，都将通过中央广播电视总台央视财经频道、央广经济之声、中国交通广播、央视财经新媒体进行播出。
HYP: The economic development of the villages visited by the caravan will be broadcasted through CCTV financial channel, CCTV Economic Voice, China Traffic Radio and CCTV Financial New Media.

SRC: 其中，电视直播将主要在央视财经频道的午间新闻节目《天下财经》完成(首播时间：周一至周日12：00-13:00 )，央视财经频道的黄金档新闻栏目《经济信息联播》将开设脱贫报道专栏(首播时间：周一至周日20：30-21:30 )。
HYP: Among them, the live TV broadcast will be done mainly on CCTV Finance Channel's midday news program "World Finance" (first broadcast time: 12:00-13:00 from Monday to Sunday), and CCTV Finance Channel's prime-time news column "Economic Information" will open a column on poverty eradication (first broadcast time: 20:30-21:30 from Monday to Sunday).

SRC: 同时，大篷车将对所到的每个村庄在央视财经客户端进行长达1小时的直播，观众通过下载央视财经APP，可以观看直播，参与抽奖活动。
HYP: At the same time, the caravan will broadcast live for up to one hour in the CCTV Finance client for each village it visits, and viewers can watch the live broadcast and participate in the lottery by downloading the CCTV Finance APP.

SRC: 在技术应用和演播室设计上，《 走村直播看脱贫》勇于突破，首创了“外场新媒体大篷车”。
HYP: In terms of technology application and studio design, "Live Village Watching Poverty Alleviation" has made a breakthrough and created the first "Outfield New Media Caravan".

SRC: 该车搭载5G新媒体移动云制播系统，利用5G+4K/8K+AI技术，实现线上线下、大屏小屏，电视广播的有机结合。
HYP: The car is equipped with 5G new media mobile cloud production and broadcasting system, using 5G+4K/8K+AI technology to realize the organic combination of online and offline, large and small screens, and TV broadcasting.

SRC: 配置三讯演播区，演播区由集装箱改装而成，长12米、宽2.55米、高3.98米，箱体采用液压自动展开结构，最大可以上翻120度。
HYP: Configured with three news broadcast area, the broadcast area is converted from a container, 12 meters long, 2.55 meters wide, 3.98 meters high, the box adopts hydraulic automatic unfolding structure, the maximum can be turned up 120 degrees.

SRC: 演播区也可以自动展开，并外接扩展平台，面积50多平方米，可以满足大部分节目的场景要求。
HYP: The broadcast area can also be automatically unfolded, and external expansion platform, an area of more than 50 square meters, can meet the requirements of most of the program scenes.

SRC: 张继科林小宅组队力挺有肌少年-新华网
HYP: Zhang Jilin small house formed a team to support muscular teenagers-Xinhuanet

SRC: 运动少年热血竞技秀《运动吧少年》在7月11日正式登陆湖南卫视。
HYP: Sports Youth Hot-blooded Sports Show " Sports Bar Youth " officially landed on Hunan Satellite TV on July 11.

SRC: 运动领队张继科和运动助理林小宅跨界同台,林丹和傅园慧点评各有风格,而“庞然大物”般的力量拔杆装置的硬核上场,更让节目“燃”力十足。
HYP: Sports leader Zhang Jike and sports assistant Lin Xiaozhai cross the border on the same stage. Lindane and Fu Yuanhui commented on their own styles, and the hard core of the " giant " power pulling device made the program " burning " full.

SRC: 首集中,11位运动少年亮相力量赛道,外形惊艳现场观众的同时,竞技台上的“强冲突”“强对抗”“强心脏”也受到关注。
HYP: In the first episode, 11 sports teenagers appeared on the power track, stunning the audience at the scene. At the same time, the " strong conflict, " " strong confrontation " and " strong heart " on the competition stage also received attention.

SRC: 其中,“ 强冲突”来自超A体育生乔文一,他在比赛前公然挑衅同赛道中有“花美男”之称的徐志滨,呛声徐志滨的外形条件应该去唱跳节目,甚至放出“输了别把妆哭花了”的狠话。
HYP: Among them, the " strong conflict " came from Super A sports student Qiao Wenyi, who openly provoked Xu Zhibin, who was known as a " beautiful man " on the same track before the race, choked that Xu Zhibin's appearance condition should go to sing and dance programs, and even released the cruel words " Don't cry if you lose. "

SRC: 一番言论让场上的少年和运动领队们都倒吸一口凉气。
HYP: A remark made the teenagers and sports leaders on the field take a breath of coolness.

SRC: 而“强对抗”更像是神仙打架,被誉为“大魔王”的孙健淇碰上同样实力强劲的张鑫栋,上演强强对决。
HYP: The " strong confrontation " is more like an immortal fight. Sun Jianqi, known as the " Great Demon King, " met the equally powerful Zhang Xindong and staged a strong confrontation.

SRC: 而他们的身份也让人始料未及,孙健淇是热爱健身的演员,张鑫栋则是退役特战队员、三次勇士勋章获得者。
HYP: Their identities are also unexpected. Sun Jianqi is an actor who loves fitness, and Zhang Xindong is a retired special forces player and three-time winner of the Warriors Medal.

SRC: 比赛一开始,两位少年就拼尽全力快速拔出小杆,在大杆上的持久对抗让现场观众为他们捏了一把汗。
HYP: At the beginning of the game, the two teenagers tried their best to pull out the small pole quickly, and the lasting confrontation on the big pole made the audience sweat for them.

SRC: 在紧张的赛况下,张继科作为《运动吧少年》运动领队之一,也在一旁认真观战。
HYP: In the tense competition situation, Zhang Jike, as one of the sports leaders of " Sports Bar Youth, " was also watching the game carefully.

SRC: 在点评环节,他也十分细心,对输了比赛的一方少年耐心鼓励,帮助复盘过程中的每一个失误点。
HYP: In the comment section, he was also very careful, patiently encouraging the teenager who lost the game, and helping every mistake in the recovery process.

SRC: 而运动助理林小宅则是花式助攻,她毫不掩饰对颜值实力在线的少年们的欣赏。
HYP: Sports assistant Lin Xiaozhai is a fancy assist, and she makes no secret of her appreciation for the teenagers who are online.

SRC: 而运动助理林小宅则是花式助攻,她毫不掩饰对颜值<v>实力</v>在线的少年们的欣赏。
HYP: Sports assistant Lin Xiaozhai is a fancy assist, and she makes no secret of her appreciation for the teenagers who are online.

SRC: 在了解到运动少年们超负荷的日常训练时,更是心生敬佩。
HYP: When learning about the overloaded daily training of sports teenagers, they are even more admired.

SRC: 同样是运动领队的林丹和傅园慧则各有风格,一个是气定神闲派“预言家” , 一个则是用笑容驱散紧张氛围的“洪荒少女” 。
HYP: Lindane and Fu Yuanhui, who are also sports leaders, have their own styles. One is a calm " prophet " and the other is a " flood girl " who dispels tension with a smile.

SRC: 另外,吉克隽逸和刘烨作为运动助理,也围绕运动少年制造了不少爆笑话题。
HYP: In addition, Jike Yuanyi and Liu Ye, as sports assistants, have also created a lot of funny topics around sports teenagers.

SRC: 法国南特教堂大火：教区志愿者承认纵火平时和善寡言-中新网
HYP: Church fire in Nantes, France: Parish volunteers admit arson is usually kind and reticent-Chinanews.com

SRC: 中新网7月26日电据外媒报道，7月18日，法国南特的宗教历史建筑瑰宝、著名的圣彼得与圣保罗大教堂，在一场火灾当中受到严重损毁，大管风琴完全毁坏。
HYP: China News Service, July 26 (Xinhua) According to foreign media reports, on July 18, the famous Cathedral of St. Peter and St. Paul, a treasure of religious and historical buildings in Nantes, France, was severely damaged in a fire, and the large organ was completely destroyed.

SRC: 当地时间26日，南特检察官宣布，一名在大教堂当中负责保卫工作的教区志愿者已经被起诉，罪名是“纵火毁坏” 。
HYP: On the 26th local time, the Nantes prosecutor announced that a parish volunteer responsible for protecting the cathedral had been charged with " arson and destruction. "

SRC: 他已承认，是自己在教堂里点火。
HYP: He has admitted that he lit the fire in the church.

SRC: 报道称，当地检察官塞纳斯表示，这名39岁、来自卢旺达的教区志愿者承认，自己夜里在大教堂当中的三处点火。
HYP: According to the report, local prosecutor Senas said that the 39-year-old parish volunteer from Rwanda admitted that he set fire to three places in the cathedral at night.

SRC: 此人的律师则表示，纵火者现在很后悔做出这种事。
HYP: The man's lawyer said the arsonist now regretted doing such a thing.

SRC: 此人几年前通过避难的途径，进入法国，在本次火灾事发地教区得到庇护，在教堂里得到收留。
HYP: This person entered France through the way of asylum a few years ago, was sheltered in the parish where the fire occurred, and was taken in in the church.

SRC: 检方指出，最近，他尝试更新签证，正在和警察局对此进行对话沟通。
HYP: The prosecution pointed out that recently, he tried to renew his visa and was talking to the police about it.

SRC: 但教堂方面表示仍然不敢相信，这名平时非常善良、面带笑容，但不怎么说话的信徒，会毁坏他如此热爱的教堂。
HYP: But the church said it still couldn't believe that the believer, who was usually very kind, smiling, but not very talkative, would destroy the church he loved so much.

SRC: 7月18日火灾发生的当天，这名志愿者就已经因为叙述当中出现逻辑不通的问题，而接受过警方问询调查，但他后来被释放。
HYP: On the day of the fire on July 18, the volunteer had been questioned and investigated by the police because of illogical problems in the narrative, but he was later released.

SRC: 图为消防员在现场进行救援。
HYP: The picture shows firefighters carrying out rescue at the scene.

SRC: 25日晚间，由于巴黎中央警察局实验室的专业工程师获取了新的证据，此人又再一次被传讯。
HYP: On the evening of the 25th, this person was summoned again because professional engineers from the laboratory of the Paris Central Police Department obtained new evidence.

SRC: 这一次，男子承认了自己纵火的行为。
HYP: This time, the man admitted to arson.

SRC: 据报道，如果蓄意纵火毁坏的罪名成立，嫌犯将可能面临10年监禁和15万欧元的罚款。
HYP: According to reports, if convicted of intentional arson and destruction, the suspect could face 10 years in prison and a fine of 150000 euros.

SRC: 报道称，此次大火给圣皮埃尔与圣保罗大教堂造成了严重损失，教堂内的管风琴被完全烧毁，管风琴后面的彩色玻璃窗也受损严重。
HYP: According to the report, the fire caused serious damage to St. Pierre and St. Paul's Cathedral. The organ in the church was completely burned down and the stained glass window behind the organ was also seriously damaged.

SRC: 法国历史保护建筑首席建筑师布鲁内认为，保守估计，南特大教堂复原工作至少要有3年。
HYP: Brunet, the chief architect of French historic preservation buildings, believes that it is conservatively estimated that the restoration of Nantes Cathedral will take at least three years.

SRC: 飓风“汉娜”登陆美得州或引发河水暴涨和山洪-中新网
HYP: Hurricane " Hannah " makes landfall in the United States or causes river surges and flash floods-Chinanews.com

SRC: 中新网7月26日电综合外媒报道，当地时间25日下午5时，飓风“汉娜”登陆美国得克萨斯州，将给得州带来强风暴雨、河水暴涨，还可能引发威胁生命的山洪。
HYP: According to a comprehensive foreign media report on July 26, Hurricane " Hannah " landed in Texas at 5 pm local time on the 25th, which will bring strong winds and heavy rains to Texas, river surges, and may also cause life-threatening flash floods.

SRC: 国家飓风中心说，预计飓风“汉娜”会挟带暴雨，扫过得州南部与东北部部分地区，雨势或引发部分溪水暴涨以及威胁生命的山洪爆发。
HYP: The National Hurricane Center said that Hurricane Hannah is expected to carry heavy rain across parts of southern and northeastern Texas, which may cause some streams to soar and life-threatening flash floods.

SRC: 报道称，受飓风“汉娜”影响最严重的是科珀斯克里斯蒂市以南到格兰德河河口地区，而里奥格兰德山谷可能爆发大范围的山洪。
HYP: According to the report, the area most affected by Hurricane Hannah is south of Corpus Christi to the mouth of the Rio Grande River, and large-scale flash floods may erupt in the Rio Grande Valley.

SRC: 得州州长阿博特25日表示：“任何飓风都是一个巨大的挑战。”
HYP: Texas Governor Abbott said on the 25th: " Any hurricane is a huge challenge. "

SRC: 该州有32个郡因为飓风进入灾难紧急状态。
HYP: Thirty-two counties in the state entered a disaster emergency due to the hurricane.

SRC: 科珀斯克里斯蒂市这座人口超32万的城市，已关闭图书馆与博物馆，居民严阵以待。
HYP: Corpus Christi, a city with a population of more than 320000, has closed libraries and museums, and residents are waiting.

SRC: 阿博特还说，在得州正在遭遇新冠疫情重创之际，不能再让这场飓风给得州带来更多伤亡。
HYP: Abbott also said that while Texas is being hit hard by the COVID-19 epidemic, the hurricane cannot be allowed to bring more casualties to Texas.

SRC: 据报道，得州南部地区降水量预计将在26日夜间达到6至12英寸，得克萨斯州北部地区和路易斯安那州沿海地区也将出现3至5英寸的降雨。
HYP: According to reports, precipitation in southern Texas is expected to reach 6 to 12 inches on the night of the 26th, and 3 to 5 inches of rain will also occur in northern Texas and coastal areas of Louisiana.

SRC: 由于全球变暖等因素影响，“汉娜”的形成早于以往的大西洋飓风季。
HYP: Due to global warming and other factors, " Hannah " formed earlier than the previous Atlantic hurricane season.

SRC: 一般情况下，大西洋的第一场飓风通常要到8月中旬才会形成。
HYP: In general, the first hurricane in the Atlantic usually does not form until mid-August.

SRC: 波兰将退出欧洲防止对女子施暴的条约
HYP: Poland to withdraw from the European treaty to prevent violence against women

SRC: 波兰司法部星期六表示，波兰下个星期将采取步骤，退出欧洲防止对妇女施暴条约。
HYP: Poland's Ministry of Justice said Saturday that Poland will take steps next week to withdraw from the European Treaty on the Prevention of Violence against Women.

SRC: 波兰右翼的政府内阁表示，该条约要求学校教授学生有关性别问题的议题，践踏了学生父母的权利。
HYP: Poland's right-wing government cabinet said the treaty trampled on the rights of students' parents by requiring schools to teach students about gender issues.

SRC: 波兰司法部长焦布洛举行记者会说，他领导的司法部星期一将向劳工和家庭部提出开始退出条约的要求。
HYP: Polish Justice Minister Gioblo said at a press conference that his Ministry of Justice will submit a request to the Ministry of Labour and Family on Monday to begin withdrawing from the treaty.

SRC: 那项条约又名伊斯坦布尔公约。
HYP: That treaty is also known as the Istanbul Convention.

SRC: 焦布洛说，“该条约包含一些我们认为是有害的意思形态性质的元素。”
HYP: " The treaty contains some elements of meaning-form nature that we consider to be harmful, " Gioblo said.

SRC: 波兰执政的法律与公正党及其及其执政联盟伙伴跟罗马天主教教会有密切的同盟关系，提倡保守的社会议程。
HYP: Poland's ruling Law and Justice Party and its ruling coalition partners have a close alliance with the Roman Catholic Church and advocate a conservative social agenda.

SRC: 波兰总统杜达在这个月成功的连任竞选期间将敌视同性恋权利作为主要议题之一。
HYP: Polish President Duda made hostility to gay rights one of the main issues during his successful re-election campaign this month.

SRC: 星期五，成千上万的波兰人(其中大部分是妇女)在华沙和其他一些城市举行反对退出公约的抗议。
HYP: On Friday, thousands of Poles, most of them women, protested in Warsaw and other cities against withdrawal from the convention.

SRC: 抗议的组织者之一莱姆帕特在华沙举行的抗议游行中说，“退出条约的目的就是将家暴合法化”。
HYP: " The purpose of withdrawing from the treaty is to legalize domestic violence, " Lempat, one of the organizers of the protest, said at a protest march in Warsaw.

SRC: 一些抗议者举着横幅，上面写着“法律与公正党是妇女的地狱”。
HYP: Some protesters held banners that read " Law and Justice is a hell for women. "

SRC: 法律与公正党长久以来抱怨伊斯坦布尔公约。
HYP: The Law and Justice Party has long complained about the Istanbul Convention.

SRC: 波兰先前的中间派执政的政府2015年批准了该公约。
HYP: Poland's previous centrist government ratified the convention in 2015.

SRC: 法律与公正党政府表示，该条约不尊重宗教，要求在学校里教授自由派的社会政策。
HYP: The Law and Justice Party government said the treaty did not respect religion and required liberal social policies to be taught in schools.

SRC: 但截至目前该党一直没有决定退出该公约。
HYP: But so far, the party has not decided to withdraw from the convention.

SRC: （根据路透社报道）
HYP: (According to Reuters)

SRC: 据越通社报道，格里沃里认为，越南25年来为东盟的发展作出巨大贡献。
HYP: According to the VNA, Grivoli believes that Vietnam has made a great contribution to the development of ASEAN over the past 25 years.

SRC: 越南不仅是东盟负责任的一员，更是东盟的火车头。
HYP: Vietnam is not only a responsible member of ASEAN, but also the locomotive of ASEAN.

SRC: 格里沃里表示，俄罗斯乃至亚欧经济联盟认为，越南为东盟提高其地位，对外推广其形象做出贡献。
HYP: Grivoli said that Russia and even the Asia-Europe Economic Union believe that Vietnam has contributed to ASEAN to improve its status and promote its image abroad.

SRC: 他强调，“东盟因此应该感谢越南。”
HYP: " ASEAN should therefore thank Vietnam, " he stressed.

SRC: 格里沃里表示，分析人士对越南所提出的和平倡议给予认可。
HYP: Grivoli said that analysts recognized the peace initiative put forward by Vietnam.

SRC: 越南愿意同东盟各国分享经验，对包括东海问题在内的亚太地区面临的问题提出建设性的和平措施。
HYP: Vietnam is willing to share its experience with ASEAN countries and propose constructive peaceful measures on the problems facing the Asia-Pacific region, including the East China Sea issue.

SRC: 关于越南与俄罗斯在东盟框架下的合作，格里沃里认为，越南为俄罗斯与东盟的合作关系提供支持，帮助俄罗斯在这一合作框架下获得利益。
HYP: Regarding the cooperation between Vietnam and Russia under the ASEAN framework, Grivoli believes that Vietnam provides support for the cooperative relationship between Russia and ASEAN and helps Russia gain benefits under this cooperation framework.

SRC: 包括俄罗斯在内的亚欧经济联盟与越南签署自贸协定后能够进军东盟市场。
HYP: The Asia-Europe Economic Union, including Russia, will be able to enter the ASEAN market after signing a free trade agreement with Vietnam.

SRC: 格里沃里建议最大限度扩大亚欧经济联盟与东盟各国的自由贸易区，进而创造经济和安全稳定的平台。
HYP: Grivoli proposed to maximize the free trade area between the Asia-Europe Economic Union and ASEAN countries, so as to create a platform for economic and security stability.

SRC: 格里沃里同时相信，俄罗斯、越南与东盟正在步入正轨并将实现其目标。
HYP: Grivoli also believes that Russia, Vietnam and ASEAN are on the right track and will achieve their goals.

SRC: 从现在到2020年底，北江省将具备必要条件，尤其是在基础设施，人力资源和土地等方面，以便主动迎来外资流入，特别是拥有价值链和转让先进技术的跨国集团。
HYP: From now until the end of 2020, Beijiang Province will have the necessary conditions, especially in infrastructure, human resources and land, in order to proactively welcome the inflow of foreign capital, especially multinational groups with value chains and the transfer of advanced technologies.

SRC: 此外，北江省将办理好递交政府总理决定对越韩工业区基础设施建设与经营项目投资的主张和批准将本省安山-北陇和安闾两个工业-城市-服务业区补充列入至2020年越南工业区发展总体规划的文件。
HYP: In addition, Beijiang Province will handle the proposal to submit the Prime Minister's decision to invest in infrastructure construction and operation projects in the Vietnam-South Korea industrial zone and approve the addition of the two industrial-city-service districts of Anshan-Beilong and Anlu in the overall plan for the development of Vietnam's industrial zone by 2020.

SRC: 与此同时，北江省着力加快各项目的进度，尤其是在和富、光州，双溪-内皇等工业园区集群的基础设施建设经营项目，为招商引资形成土地基金。
HYP: At the same time, Beijiang Province has made great efforts to speed up the progress of various projects, especially the infrastructure construction and operation projects in industrial park clusters such as Hefu, Gwangju and Shuangxi-Neihuang, so as to form a land fund for attracting investment.

SRC: 在2020年内，北江省工贸局参就定工业区、工业集群规划建言献策，以纳入省规划。
HYP: In 2020, the Bureau of Industry and Trade of Beijiang Province will participate in the planning of industrial zones and industrial clusters to be incorporated into the provincial plan.

SRC: 北江省确定将发展工业园区集群与保障国防安全，保护生态环境，保障粮食安全相结合，进而助推工业均衡发展；拥有全面的电力，供水，交通和电信等基础设施，并与城市建设，贸易服务，工人住房和医疗卫生、教育等其他社会基础设施等相结合。
HYP: Beijiang Province has decided to combine the development of industrial park clusters with ensuring national defense security, protecting the ecological environment and ensuring food security, thus promoting the balanced development of industry; it has comprehensive infrastructure such as electricity, water supply, transportation and telecommunications, and is combined with urban construction, trade services, workers' housing and other social infrastructure such as health care and education.

SRC: 在工业区，北江省着力呼吁对电力，电子，电信设备，精密机械，辅助工业等领域中的高科技，清洁技术的投资项目。
HYP: In the industrial zone, Beijiang Province has made great efforts to call for high-tech and clean technology investment projects in electric power, electronics, telecommunications equipment, precision machinery, auxiliary industries, etc.

SRC: 在工业园区集群，该省呼吁对生产、利用就地劳动力、尤其是农产品、食品加工等领域的中小型规模投资项目。
HYP: In the industrial park cluster, the province calls for small and medium-sized investment projects in the fields of production and utilization of local labor, especially agricultural products and food processing.

SRC: 未来，北江省将着力加快对北江市后勤物流中心的基础设施的投资，与工业园区集群同步发展，以优化货物、货币流通和有助于降低生产成本，提高货物价值，优化供应链，发展多式联运，从而为投资者投资于本省创造吸引力。
HYP: In the future, Beijiang Province will focus on accelerating the investment in the infrastructure of Beijiang Logistics Center and develop simultaneously with the industrial park cluster in order to optimize the circulation of goods and money and help reduce production costs, increase the value of goods, optimize the supply chain, and develop multimodal transport, so as to create attractiveness for investors to invest in the province.

SRC: <v>（德国之声中文网）</v>过去两周内，西班牙的新冠确冠病例大幅回升，多日出现上千新增病例。
HYP: In the past two weeks, the number of cases in Spain has risen sharply, with thousands of new cases appearing in several days.

SRC: 英国政府周六（7月25日）晚间临时决定，从当地时间26日零点起，将西班牙从安全旅行名单中移除，从西班牙入境英国的人必须隔离14天。
HYP: The British government temporarily decided on the evening of Saturday (July 25) to remove Spain from the safe travel list from 0: 00 local time on the 26th, and people entering the UK from Spain must be isolated for 14 days.

SRC: 正在西班牙度假的英国游客听闻此项决定纷纷表示惊讶、担心、甚至愤怒，因为消息突如其来，令人措手不及。
HYP: British tourists on holiday in Spain expressed surprise, worry and even anger when they heard of the decision, because the news was sudden and caught by surprise.

SRC: 据报道，英国交通大臣沙普斯（Grant Shapps）目前也在西班牙度假。
HYP: According to reports, British Transport Secretary Grant Shapps is also on holiday in Spain.

SRC: 英国发布隔离措施前，挪威也已宣布从西班牙返回挪威的人要进行为期10天的隔离。
HYP: Before the UK issued the quarantine measures, Norway had also announced that people returning to Norway from Spain would be isolated for a period of 10 days.

SRC: 法国和比利时建议本国居民放弃前方巴塞罗那以及周边地区度假的计划。
HYP: France and Belgium have advised their residents to abandon plans for a holiday in Barcelona and the surrounding area ahead.

SRC: 这些地区的海滩人满为患，人与人之间无法保持社交距离，警察一度需要采取措施，以减少海滩游客的数量。
HYP: Beaches in these areas are overcrowded and people cannot maintain social distance, and police once needed to take measures to reduce the number of beach tourists.

SRC: 旅游业是西班牙的重要支柱产业
HYP: Tourism is an important pillar industry in Spain

SRC: 西班牙：这里是安全的
HYP: Spain: It's safe here

SRC: 针对英国做出的决定，西班牙外交部周日表示，该国疫情得到控制。
HYP: In response to the decision made by the United Kingdom, the Spanish Foreign Ministry said Sunday that the epidemic in the country was under control.

SRC: 西班牙外交部长冈萨雷斯（Arancha Gonzalez Laya）向媒体强调：" 西班牙是安全的，不仅对西班牙人而言，对游客来说也是安全的。"
HYP: Spanish Foreign Minister Arancha Gonzalez Laya stressed to the media: " Spain is safe, not only for Spaniards, but also for tourists. "

SRC: 西班牙政府将试图说服英国政府将巴利阿里群岛（Balearic Islands）和加那利群岛（Canary Islands）排除在隔离措施之外。
HYP: The Spanish government will try to persuade the British government to exclude the Balearic Islands and Canary Islands from the quarantine measures.

SRC: 理由是，这两个旅游胜地的感染率远低于英国本土。
HYP: The reason is that the infection rate in these two tourist resorts is much lower than in the UK.

SRC: 为防止疫情扩散，西班牙加泰罗尼亚地区也已重启"禁足令"。
HYP: In order to prevent the spread of the epidemic, the Catalan region of Spain has also resumed the " foot ban. "

SRC: 旅游业是西班牙的重要支柱产业，而西班牙是最受英国游客青睐的度假地之一。
HYP: Tourism is an important pillar industry in Spain, and Spain is one of the most popular resorts for British tourists.

SRC: 英国的这一决定预计将会使西班牙的旅游业大受影响。
HYP: The British decision is expected to greatly affect Spain's tourism industry.

SRC: 安静/任琛（德新社，路透社）
HYP: Quiet / Ren Chen (German News Agency, Reuters)

SRC: 中伏首日：北京暂别高温酷暑开启降雨模式-新华网
HYP: The first day of Zhongfu: Beijing leaves high temperature and heat to start rainfall mode-Xinhuanet

SRC: 新华社北京7月26日电（记者倪元锦）7月26日是今年的“中伏”首日。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 26 (Reporter Ni Yuanjin) July 26 is the first day of this year's " Zhongfu. "

SRC: 26日凌晨的大风骤雨对流天气，驱散了连日来笼罩在北京地区的高温酷暑，新一轮降雨天气将持续数日。
HYP: The gale and rain convective weather in the early morning of the 26th dispelled the high temperature and heat that had enveloped Beijing for several days, and a new round of rainfall will last for several days.

SRC: 北京市气象台26日11时发布称，26日北京有分散性阵雨（伴有弱雷电），日最高气温仅为27℃；夜间阴有小到中雨（伴有弱雷电），夜间最低气温为23℃。
HYP: The Beijing Meteorological Observatory announced at 11: 00 on the 26th that there were scattered showers (accompanied by weak thunder and lightning) in Beijing on the 26th, and the daily maximum temperature was only 27 ℃; there was light to moderate rain (accompanied by weak thunder and lightning) at night, and the minimum temperature at night was 23 ℃.

SRC: 而在此前的24日至25日，北京全市处在高温蓝色预警中，大部地区日最高气温在37℃左右，局地出现超过40℃的高温。
HYP: In the previous 24 to 25 days, the whole city of Beijing was in the blue warning of high temperature. The daily maximum temperature in most areas was around 37 ℃, and local high temperatures exceeded 40 ℃.

SRC: 伏天是一年之中气温最高、潮湿、闷热的日子，一年有“三伏”，最热在中伏，中国百姓说的“苦夏”就在此时。
HYP: Fu Tian is the highest temperature, humid and sultry day of the year. There are " three volts " in a year, and the hottest is in the middle. This is when the Chinese people say " bitter summer. "

SRC: 入伏时，家家填满谷仓，民间有“一伏饺子二伏面”的说法。
HYP: When entering the barn, families fill the barn, and there is a folk saying of " one-volt dumplings and two-volt noodles. "

SRC: 根据目前预报，未来三天，北京多阴雨天气。
HYP: According to the current forecast, the weather in Beijing will be cloudy and rainy in the next three days.

SRC: 气象部门提示公众尽量减少山区游玩，谨防地质灾害。
HYP: The meteorological department reminded the public to minimize mountain play and beware of geological disasters.

SRC: 据了解，今年的“中伏”有20天，从7月26日开始，至8月14日结束。
HYP: It is understood that this year's " Zhongfu " has 20 days, starting on July 26 and ending on August 14.

SRC: 进入“中伏”后，人会感到身体乏力、食欲不振。
HYP: After entering the " middle volt, " people will feel physical weakness and loss of appetite.

SRC: 饮食上可选择绿豆、薏仁等具有清热解暑、健脾开胃作用的食物，以及苦菜、苦瓜等苦味食物，可有助于增进食欲、祛除暑气。
HYP: On the diet, you can choose mung beans, coy nuts and other foods that have the effect of clearing heat and relieving heat, strengthening spleen and appetizing, as well as bitter foods such as bitter cabbage and bitter gourd, which can help to increase appetite and dispel heat.

SRC: 《叮咚上线!老师好》下周上线薛兆丰领衔“知识发起人-新华网
HYP: " Ding Dong Online! Good Teacher " will go online next week Xue Zhaofeng leads the " Knowledge Initiator-Xinhuanet

SRC: 又有新综艺上线。
HYP: There are new variety shows online.

SRC: 互动知识分享节目《叮咚上线!老师好》,将于7月20日起在湖南卫视播出。
HYP: The interactive knowledge sharing program " Ding Dong Online! Good Teacher " will be broadcast on Hunan Satellite TV from July 20.

SRC: 据了解,节目将打造全新的全年龄青春课堂,一批有颜有型又有才的老师将上阵,挑战趣味性知识输出。
HYP: It is understood that the program will create a brand-new all-age youth classroom, and a group of attractive and talented teachers will play to challenge the output of interesting knowledge.

SRC: 与以往老师群体在大众心中的严肃印象不同,《叮咚上线!老师好》集结的是一群颜值和才华兼具的知识代表。
HYP: Unlike the serious impression of teachers in the public mind in the past, " Ding Dong Online! Good Teacher " gathers a group of knowledge representatives with both face value and talent.

SRC: 他们既是来自各学科的青年知识榜样,还是一群会抖包袱、擅长寓教于乐的全能“段子手”。
HYP: They are not only young knowledge role models from various disciplines, but also a group of all-round " paragraph players " who can shake burdens and are good at teaching and fun.

SRC: 节目中,这群优秀青年知识榜样作为“知识分享官”,将要挑战趣味性的知识课堂。
HYP: In the program, this group of outstanding young knowledge role models, as " knowledge sharing officers, " will challenge interesting knowledge classes.

SRC: 他们需要通过有态度的知识输出,展现所在学科最有趣的一面,来打动在场的观众。
HYP: They need to show the most interesting side of their subject through the output of knowledge with an attitude to impress the audience.

SRC: 而全年龄观众组成的“有道问问团”现场会提出百变问题,给“知识分享官”的授课提高难度,也给节目增添些许刺激的氛围。
HYP: The " Tao Ask Group " composed of all-age audiences will ask changing questions on the spot, making it more difficult for the " knowledge sharing officer " to teach and adding a bit of excitement to the program.

SRC: 据透露,此次“知识分享官”中有中国人民大学附属中学物理教师李永乐、考研指导名师张雪峰以及拥有十年从业经验的历史教师王磊等优秀青年教师,他们将以意想不到的方式向现场观众展现各个学科的“硬核”知识。
HYP: It is revealed that the " knowledge sharing officers " include outstanding young teachers such as Li Yongle, a physics teacher at the middle school attached to Renmin University of China, Zhang Xuefeng, a famous teacher for postgraduate examination, and Wang Lei, a history teacher with ten years of experience. They will show the " hard core " knowledge of various disciplines to the on-site audience in unexpected ways.

SRC: 另外,节目还邀请经济学教授薛兆丰作为节目的“知识发起人”,联合“叮咚助教”杜海涛和靳梦佳,与观众畅谈青春,打造“全民青春公开课”。
HYP: In addition, the program also invited economics professor Xue Zhaofeng as the " knowledge initiator " of the program, together with " Ding Dong teaching assistants " Du Haitao and Jin Mengjia, to talk about youth with the audience and create a " public youth class for all. "

SRC: 香港特区政府政务司司长：形势严峻全力抗疫-中新网
HYP: Chief Secretary for Administration of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region Government: The situation is serious and make every effort to fight the epidemic-Chinanews.com

SRC: 新华社香港7月26日电香港特区政府政务司司长张建宗26日表示，香港新冠肺炎疫情形势持续严峻，若疫情转坏，特区政府将果断采取更严厉管控措施，进一步限制经营场所营业和减少市民外出空间。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 26 (Zhang Jianzong, Chief Secretary for Administration of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region Government), said on the 26th that the situation of the COVID-19 pneumonia epidemic in Hong Kong continues to be severe. If the epidemic situation deteriorates, the SAR Government will decisively take stricter control measures to further restrict the operation of business premises and reduce the space for citizens to go out.

SRC: 但现阶段特区政府无意推出“居家令”或“禁足令”限制市民外出。
HYP: However, at this stage, the SAR government has no intention of introducing a " home order " or " foot ban order " to restrict citizens from going out.

SRC: 张建宗当日发表题为《形势严峻全力抗疫》的网志。
HYP: Zhang Jianzong published a blog entitled " The situation is severe and make every effort to fight the epidemic " on the same day.

SRC: 他表示，这一波疫情是半年以来最严峻的，未来两星期将会十分关键，要尽力防止病毒在社区进一步扩散。
HYP: He said that this wave of epidemic is the most severe in half a year, and the next two weeks will be very critical. We should try our best to prevent the further spread of the virus in the community.

SRC: 除了特区政府采取必要措施之外，市民自律和配合也非常重要。
HYP: In addition to the necessary measures taken by the SAR Government, citizens' self-discipline and cooperation are also very important.

SRC: 他呼吁市民务必尽量留在家中，减少社交接触和外出用餐。
HYP: He called on citizens to stay at home as much as possible, reduce social contact and eat out.

SRC: 市民应配合佩戴口罩的强制措施保护自己及他人，并注重个人和环境卫生及勤洗手，更应暂停非必要的亲友聚会或聚餐及减少到街市。
HYP: Members of the public should cooperate with the compulsory measures of wearing masks to protect themselves and others, pay attention to personal and environmental hygiene and wash hands frequently. They should also suspend unnecessary gatherings or dinners of relatives and friends and reduce them to markets.

SRC: 他表示，中央一直十分关心香港疫情变化及支持特区政府防疫抗疫工作，并积极回应行政长官最新要求，在加大检测能力和改装亚洲国际博览馆为类似“方舱医院”的工作上提供协助。
HYP: He said that the Central Government has always been very concerned about the changes in the epidemic situation in Hong Kong and supported the epidemic prevention and anti-epidemic work of the SAR Government, and actively responded to the latest request of the Chief Executive to provide assistance in increasing the detection capacity and retrofitting AsiaWorld-Expo for work similar to a " shelter hospital. "

SRC: 张建宗表示，特区政府为特定高风险群组，即安老院舍、残疾院舍及护养院员工、餐厅员工、出租车司机和物业管理员工提供的免费病毒检测已全面展开，涉及人数多达40万。
HYP: Zhang Jianzong said that the free virus testing provided by the SAR Government for specific high-risk groups, namely staff of residential care homes for the elderly, homes for the disabled and nursing homes, restaurant staff, taxi drivers and property management staff, has been fully launched, involving up to 400000 people.

SRC: 他十分关注出现在安老院舍的感染个案，特区政府已为安老院舍院友安排特定的临时检疫中心。
HYP: He is very concerned about the infection cases in residential care homes for the elderly. The SAR Government has arranged specific temporary quarantine centres for residents of residential care homes for the elderly.

SRC: 他表示，特区政府正在位于新界大屿山的竹篙湾检疫中心附近兴建隔离检疫设施，预计可在9月底前提供额外700套隔离房。
HYP: He said that the SAR Government is building quarantine facilities near Penny's Bay Quarantine Centre on Lantau Island, New Territories, and is expected to provide an additional 700 isolation rooms by the end of September.

SRC: 行政长官也在19日宣布，特区政府将在竹篙湾检疫中心多兴建2000间隔离房，并争取于今年年底前落成。
HYP: The Chief Executive also announced on the 19th that the SAR Government will build an additional 2000 isolation rooms at the Penny's Bay Quarantine Centre, which will be completed by the end of this year.

SRC: 加上该隔离检疫中心已经投入使用的800间，年底前竹篙湾检疫中心预计可提供共3500间隔离房。
HYP: In addition to the 800 isolation and quarantine centers that have been put into use, the Penny's Bay Quarantine Center is expected to provide a total of 3500 isolation rooms by the end of the year.

SRC: 香港目前共有四个正在运作的隔离检疫中心，共提供约2600间隔离房。
HYP: There are currently four isolation and quarantine centres in operation in Hong Kong, providing about 2600 isolation rooms.

SRC: 此外，特区政府于24日重新启用位于香港岛的鲤鱼门公园度假村作为社区隔离设施，用于收治50岁以下有独立自理能力的患者。
HYP: In addition, on the 24th, the SAR Government reopened the Lei Yue Mun Park Resort on Hong Kong Island as a community isolation facility for patients under the age of 50 with independent self-care.

SRC: 美国首次以“人民币汇率低估”对中国展开反补贴调查
HYP: The United States launched a countervailing investigation against China for the first time with " undervalued RMB exchange rate "

SRC: 针对美国商务部近日宣布，决定对原产于中国的扎带（束线带）产品发起反倾销反补贴调查，并就“人民币汇率低估“项目发起调查。
HYP: In response to the recent announcement by the US Department of Commerce, it decided to launch an anti-dumping and countervailing investigation on strap (strap) products originating in China, and launched an investigation on the " undervalued RMB exchange rate " project.

SRC: 中国商务部指出，这是美国首次在反补贴案件中立案调查所谓”人民币汇率低估“项目，中方对此坚决反对。
HYP: China's Ministry of Commerce pointed out that this is the first time that the United States has filed a case in a countervailing case to investigate the so-called " undervalued RMB exchange rate " project, which China firmly opposes.

SRC: 中国商务部23日晚间特别就此发布新闻稿表示，中国实行以市场供求为基础、参考一篮子货币进行调节、有管理的浮动汇率制度，市场在汇率形成中起决定性作用。
HYP: China's Ministry of Commerce issued a special press release on the evening of the 23rd, saying that China implements a managed floating exchange rate system based on market supply and demand and adjusted with reference to a basket of currencies, and the market plays a decisive role in the formation of the exchange rate.

SRC: 新闻稿强调，总体上，人民币汇率处于合理均衡水平，并没有被低估。
HYP: The press release stressed that, on the whole, the RMB exchange rate is at a reasonable equilibrium level and has not been underestimated.

SRC: 自2005年以来，人民币对美元已累计升值超过17% 。
HYP: Since 2005, the RMB has appreciated more than 17% against the US dollar.

SRC: 根据国际清算银行公布的数据，2005年初至2020年5月，人民币名目有效汇率升值38%，实际有效汇率升值49%，是G20经济体中最强势的货币，在全球范围内也是升值幅度最大的货币之一。
HYP: According to the data released by the Bank for International Settlements, from the beginning of 2005 to May 2020, the nominal effective exchange rate of the RMB appreciated by 38% and the real effective exchange rate by 49%, making it the strongest currency among the G20 economies and one of the currencies with the largest appreciation in the world.

SRC: 商务部指出，汇率问题超出了成员按照世界贸易组织规则进行反补贴调查的权限。
HYP: The Ministry of Commerce pointed out that the exchange rate issue is beyond the competence of members to conduct countervailing investigations in accordance with the rules of the World Trade Organization.

SRC: 美国今年2月修改法规以对别国汇率进行反补贴调查，已涉嫌违反世贸组织WTO规则，受到多方面反对。
HYP: The United States amended its regulations in February this year to conduct countervailing investigations on other countries' exchange rates, which has been suspected of violating WTO rules and has been opposed by many parties.

SRC: 新闻稿称，即使按照美国法规，申请人的申诉内容也存在大量错误，不具备财政资助、利益授予和专向性等反补贴必备要素。
HYP: The press release said that even according to US regulations, the applicant's complaint contained a large number of errors and did not have the necessary countervailing elements such as financial support, benefit granting and exclusivity.

SRC: 中方敦促美方遵守现有国际规则，停止对所谓“人民币汇率低估”进行反补贴调查。
HYP: China urges the US to abide by existing international rules and stop conducting countervailing investigations into the so-called " undervalued RMB exchange rate. "

SRC: 受中美关系紧张情势进一步升高影响，离岸、在岸人民币对美元汇率22日盘中一度大贬，双双跌破1美元兑人民币7.0元关口。
HYP: Affected by the further rise in tensions between China and the United States, the offshore and onshore RMB exchange rates against the US dollar fell sharply on the 22nd, both falling below the threshold of RMB 7.0 against the US dollar.

SRC: 美国商务部此举是否意在逼升人民币值得关注。
HYP: Whether the US Department of Commerce's move is intended to force up the RMB is worthy of attention.

SRC: 人民币对美元即期汇价23日升破7.0大关，收在6.9961。
HYP: The spot exchange rate of RMB against the US dollar rose above the 7.0 mark on the 23rd and closed at 6.9961.

SRC: 受官方调控的人民币对美元汇率中间价，24日下调17个基本点，报6.9938。
HYP: The midpoint rate of the officially regulated RMB against the US dollar was lowered by 17 basic points to 6.9938 on the 24th.

SRC: 26日是菲律宾总统杜特尔特发表任内第五份国情咨文(SONA)前一日，当天菲律宾累计确诊新冠肺炎病例过8万，其中总统府新闻部(PCOO)及其直属机构职员确诊数增到25例。
HYP: On the 26th, the day before Philippine President Duterte delivered his fifth State of the Union Address (SONA) during his term of office, more than 80000 cases of COVID-19 pneumonia were confirmed in the Philippines, of which the number of confirmed cases by the staff of the Presidential Information Department (PCOO) and its directly affiliated agencies increased to 25.

SRC: 为此，PCOO已专门准备一个未接触过确诊职员的工作组，配合杜特尔特总统发表SONA的新闻发布工作。
HYP: To this end, PCOO has specially prepared a working group that has not contacted the confirmed staff to cooperate with President Duterte's press release of SONA.

SRC: PCOO部长马丁·安达纳尔26日接受DZBB电台采访表示，已为杜特尔特总统发表SONA方式预备两套方案。
HYP: PCOO Minister Martin Andanal said in an interview with DZBB Radio on the 26th that two sets of plans have been prepared for President Duterte to publish SONA.

SRC: 按A计划，杜特尔特27日下午将在位于奎松市的菲律宾国会(Batasang Pambansa)大楼发表SONA。
HYP: According to Plan A, Duterte will deliver SONA at the Philippine Congress (Batasang Pambansa) building in Quezon City on the afternoon of the 27th.

SRC: 因为疫情原因，现场只为部分政府内阁成员和立法者安排50个席位，另专设视频会议室供其他内阁成员、地方政府官员等观看。
HYP: Due to the epidemic, only 50 seats were arranged for some government cabinet members and legislators, and a special video conference room was set up for other cabinet members and local government officials to watch.

SRC: 所有参会人员当天通过快速检测才能进入国会大楼。
HYP: All participants passed a rapid test to enter the Capitol building on the same day.

SRC: 一旦参会者有一人检测呈阳性，即启动B计划，即杜特尔特总统在总统府马拉卡南宫发表SONA，现场则安排更少的听会席位。
HYP: Once one of the participants tested positive, Plan B was launched, that is, President Duterte delivered SONA at the Malacanan Palace of the presidential palace, and fewer seats were arranged for the hearing.

SRC: 按照惯例，SONA将实时向菲全国直播。
HYP: According to the convention, SONA will broadcast live to the Philippines in real time.

SRC: 截至发稿时，菲总统府尚未确认杜特尔特的家人是否会出席SONA。
HYP: As of press time, the Philippine presidential palace has not confirmed whether Duterte's family will attend SONA.

SRC: 安达纳尔说，杜特尔特总统的SONA，将重点说明政府将如何带领菲律宾应对新冠肺炎疫情、恢复社会经济生活；还会提到他上任时的承诺，即反政府腐败、打击非法毒品和减贫。
