HYP: Andanal said that President Duterte's SONA will focus on how the government will lead the Philippines to deal with the COVID-19 pneumonia epidemic and restore social and economic life; it will also mention his commitments when he took office, namely anti-government corruption, fight against illegal drugs and reduce poverty.

SRC: 杜特尔特还将说明本届政府的其他计划，包括创造更多的就业机会、振兴经济、促进教育，以及帮助在疫情中受难的海外菲律宾劳工等。
HYP: Duterte will also explain other plans of the current administration, including creating more jobs, revitalizing the economy, promoting education, and helping overseas Filipino workers suffering from the epidemic.

SRC: 深圳就出台健康条例公开征求意见-新华网
HYP: Shenzhen publicly solicit opinions on the introduction of health regulations-Xinhuanet

SRC: 新华社深圳7月26日电（记者毛思倩、白瑜）鼓励居民勤做体检，及早发现问题；禁止向未成年人销售酒精饮料；建立网络游戏健康审查制度；用人单位要配备专兼职健康管理人员…… 日前《深圳经济特区健康条例（征求意见稿）》正式发布，深圳居民将有自己的“健康法”。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Shenzhen, July 26 (Reporters Mao Siqian and Bai Yu) encourages residents to do medical check-ups frequently and find problems early; prohibits the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors; establishes an online game health review system; Employers should be equipped with full-time and part-time health managers... Recently, the Health Regulations of Shenzhen Special Economic Zone (Draft for Consultation) was officially released, and Shenzhen residents will have their own " health law. "

SRC: 为了鼓励居民勤做体检，及早发现问题，上述征求意见稿提出，卫生健康部门应当根据不同年龄、职业等因素制定健康体检项目基本目录。
HYP: In order to encourage residents to do physical examinations frequently and find problems early, the above-mentioned consultation draft proposes that the health department should formulate a basic catalogue of health examination items according to different ages, occupations and other factors.

SRC: 属于健康体检项目基本目录范围内的健康体检费用，按照每人每年一次的标准由社会医疗保险统筹基金支付。
HYP: The health examination expenses that fall within the scope of the basic catalogue of health examination items shall be paid by the social medical insurance coordination fund according to the standard of once per person per year.

SRC: 征求意见稿明确，用人单位应当合理配置人力资源，安排员工作息时间，对脑力和体力劳动负荷较重的员工，实行轮休制度，避免对员工健康造成人体机能过度损耗或者身心健康伤害，同时严格执行员工带薪休假制度。
HYP: The consultation draft makes it clear that the employing unit should rationally allocate human resources, arrange employees' working hours, implement a rotation system for employees with heavy mental and physical labor loads, avoid excessive loss of human function or physical and mental health injury to employees' health, and strictly implement the paid leave system for employees.

SRC: 此外，用人单位要配备专兼职健康管理人员，并定期组织开展员工健康体检。
HYP: In addition, the employing unit should be equipped with full-time and part-time health management personnel, and regularly organize and carry out employee health check-ups.

SRC: 在未成年人身心健康方面，征求意见稿提出，禁止向未成年人销售酒精饮料，同时对酒精饮料的售卖位置进行了限制，对于违反规定的，将由市场监督管理部门责令改正，处3万元罚款。
HYP: With regard to the physical and mental health of minors, the draft for comments proposes that the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors is prohibited, and the location of the sale of alcoholic beverages is restricted. For those who violate the regulations, the market supervision and administration department will order them to make corrections and impose a fine of 30000 yuan.

SRC: 除了“禁酒” ，未成年人也要“多运动” 。
HYP: In addition to " prohibition of alcohol, " minors should also " exercise more. "

SRC: 根据征求意见稿要求，学校要每天安排学生体育活动时间一小时以上。
HYP: According to the requirements of the draft, the school should arrange students' sports activities for more than one hour every day.

SRC: 对于网络游戏，公安、文化广电旅游体育、网络监管、卫生健康等部门应当完善互联网上网服务营业场所健康监管制度，建立网络游戏健康审查制度，为促进青少年健康成长营造良好的交往空间、交往文化。
HYP: For online games, the departments of public security, culture, radio, television, tourism and sports, network supervision, health and health should improve the health supervision system of Internet service business premises, establish a health review system for online games, and create a good communication space and culture for promoting the healthy growth of young people.

SRC: 此外，征求意见稿还提出流感病人出入公共场所必须戴口罩，医疗卫生机构未经同意泄露病人隐私罚款2万元等。
HYP: In addition, the draft also proposed that influenza patients must wear masks when entering and leaving public places, and that medical and health institutions should be fined 20000 yuan for disclosing patients' privacy without consent.

SRC: 值得注意的是，除了居民的身心健康外，征求意见稿还要求，深圳各部门在制定涉及城市空间规划与建设、工业园区规划与建设、资源开发利用与生态环境保护、生物医药产业发展等规划、规范性文件以及批准重大建设工程和实施重大公共服务项目前，应当评估公共政策实施对人群健康的影响。
HYP: It is worth noting that in addition to the physical and mental health of residents, the draft also requires that all departments in Shenzhen should assess the impact of public policy implementation on the health of the population before formulating plans and normative documents involving urban spatial planning and construction, industrial park planning and construction, resource development and utilization and ecological environmental protection, and biomedical industry development, as well as approving major construction projects and implementing major public service projects.

SRC: 未经评估或者经评估将对城市公共卫生或者居民健康产生较严重不利影响的，不得制定出台或者批准实施。
HYP: Those that have not been evaluated or will have a serious adverse impact on urban public health or residents' health shall not be formulated, promulgated or approved for implementation.

SRC: 可可西里藏羚羊进入回迁季-新华网
HYP: Kao Xili Tibetan antelope enters the migration season-Xinhuanet

SRC: 新华社西宁7月25日电（记者王金金）记者从三江源国家公园管理局长江源园区可可西里管理处五道梁保护站获悉，监测显示，此前前往可可西里腹地卓乃湖区域迁徙产仔的藏羚羊正陆续结束产仔，开始携幼仔返回原栖息地。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Xining, July 25 (Reporter Wang Jinjin) The reporter learned from the Wudaoliang Protection Station of the Kaoxili Management Office of the Yangtze River Source Park of the Sanjiangyuan National Park Administration that the monitoring showed that the Tibetan antelopes who had previously migrated to the Zhuonai Lake area in the hinterland of Kaoxili were ending giving birth and began to return to their original habitat with their young.

SRC: 五道梁保护站附近的监控画面显示，7月25日，大约40只雌性藏羚羊带领3只藏羚羊幼仔陆续通过青藏公路3002公里处、青藏铁路五道梁北大桥，藏羚羊已经开始回迁。
HYP: Surveillance footage near Wudaoliang Protection Station shows that on July 25, about 40 female Tibetan antelopes led three Tibetan antelope cubs through 3002 kilometers of Qinghai-Tibet Highway and Wudaoliang North Bridge of Qinghai-Tibet Railway. Tibetan antelopes have begun to move back.

SRC: 专家分析，近年来，回迁羊群中藏羚羊幼仔数量占藏羚羊群总体数量的四分之一至五分之一。
HYP: According to expert analysis, in recent years, the number of Tibetan antelope cubs in the returning sheep accounted for one-quarter to one-fifth of the total number of Tibetan antelopes.

SRC: 中国科学院西北高原生物研究所副研究员连新明说：“回迁初期，藏羚羊面临较高的被捕食风险，因此羊群中的幼仔数量会比较少，甚至可能出现没有幼仔的情况。”
HYP: Lian Xinming, an associate researcher at the Northwest Plateau Institute of Biology of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, said: " In the early stage of migration, the Tibetan antelope faces a higher risk of predation, so the number of cubs in the sheep will be relatively small, and there may even be no cubs. "

SRC: 根据三江源国家公园管理局长江源园区可可西里管理处统计，藏羚羊回迁数量总体呈逐年上升态势，2019年藏羚羊回迁数量为4860只，比2018年增加338只。
HYP: According to the statistics of the Kao Xili Management Office of the Yangtze River Source Park of the Sanjiangyuan National Park Administration, the number of Tibetan antelopes returning is generally increasing year by year. In 2019, the number of Tibetan antelopes returning was 4860, an increase of 338 over 2018.

SRC: 连新明说：“预计今年藏羚羊回迁将在9月初结束，回迁藏羚羊数量仍有望继续增加。”
HYP: Lian Xinming said: " It is expected that the migration of Tibetan antelopes this year will end in early September, and the number of Tibetan antelopes is still expected to continue to increase. "

SRC: 藏羚羊属国家一级保护动物。
HYP: The Tibetan antelope is a national-level protected animal.

SRC: 每年5月底，来自青海三江源、西藏羌塘、新疆阿尔金山等地的藏羚羊都要前往位于可可西里腹地的卓乃湖产羔。
HYP: At the end of May every year, Tibetan antelopes from Sanjiangyuan in Qinghai, Qiangtang in Tibet, Aljinshan in Xinjiang and other places go to Zhuonai Lake in the hinterland of Koxili to give birth.

SRC: 我国藏羚羊保护专家、陕西省动物研究所（西北濒危动物研究所）研究员吴晓民说：“藏羚羊回迁是雌性藏羚羊结束产仔后，陆续带着幼仔回到栖息地的过程。起初离开产仔地的回迁群体较为庞大，但随后藏羚羊将根据不同的地理种群、沿不同路径回到它们各自的栖息地。”
HYP: Wu Xiaomin, a Tibetan antelope protection expert in China and a researcher at the Shaanxi Provincial Institute of Zoology (Northwest Institute of Endangered Animals), said: " The migration of Tibetan antelopes is a process in which female Tibetan antelopes return to their habitat with their cubs after giving birth. At first, the migration group leaving the breeding site is relatively large, but then Tibetan antelopes will return to their respective habitats according to different geographical populations and along different paths. "

SRC: 为确保藏羚羊群安全回迁，记者了解到，日前三江源国家公园管理局长江源园区可可西里管理处已安排工作人员在主要回迁区域，持续开展视频监测和辖区巡逻。
HYP: In order to ensure the safe relocation of Tibetan antelopes, the reporter learned that the Kaoxili Management Office of the Yangtze River Source Park of the Sanjiangyuan National Park Administration has arranged staff to continuously carry out video monitoring and district patrols in the main relocation areas.

SRC: 如发现有藏羚羊群试图穿越公路，巡山队员会在第一时间进行临时交通管制，让羊群安全通过野生动物通道，保证其在回迁途中尽可能少受人类干扰。
HYP: If a herd of Tibetan antelopes is found trying to cross the road, the mountain patrol team will carry out temporary traffic control at the first time to let the sheep safely pass through the wildlife passage to ensure that they are as little disturbed by human beings as possible on the way back.

SRC: 那么，日常生活中到底该如何解暑？
HYP: So, how to relieve heat in daily life?

SRC: 专家建议，夏日外出尽量避开高温时段，最好不要在中午前后在烈日下行走或劳动，因为这个时间段的阳光最强烈，发生中暑的可能性较高。
HYP: Experts suggest that when going out in summer, it is best not to walk or work in the hot sun around noon, because the sun is strongest during this period, and the possibility of heatstroke is higher.

SRC: 如果此时段必须外出，一定要做好防护工作，如打遮阳伞、戴遮阳帽、戴太阳镜，有条件的最好涂抹防晒霜，以防晒伤。
HYP: If you have to go out at this time, you must do a good job of protection, such as sunshade, sun cap and sunglasses. If there are conditions, it is best to apply sunscreen to sunscreen.

SRC: 衣服尽量选用浅色、透气性好的棉、麻、丝类质地，少穿化纤品类服装，以免大量出汗时不能及时散热，引起中暑。
HYP: Clothes try to choose light-colored, breathable cotton, hemp and silk textures, and wear less chemical fiber clothing, so as not to lose heat in time when sweating a lot, causing heatstroke.

SRC: 高温闷热天气时，要准备充足的水饮，及时饮用，不要等口渴了才喝水，因为一旦感觉口渴表示身体已经缺水了，每次喝水控制在150毫升至200毫升，喝温开水，不要喝冰水。
HYP: In hot and sultry weather, you should prepare enough water to drink in time. Don't wait for thirst to drink water, because once you feel thirsty, the body is already short of water. Drink water from 150 ml to 200 ml at a time. Drink warm water, don't drink ice water.

SRC: 根据气温高低，一般人员每天喝1.5升至2升水，高温作业人员，每天喝3升至5升水。
HYP: According to the temperature, ordinary people drink 1.5 to 2 liters of water a day, while high-temperature workers drink 3 to 5 liters of water a day.

SRC: 出汗较多时可适当补充一些盐水，弥补人体因出汗而失去的盐分。
HYP: Sweat more can be appropriately supplemented with some salt water to make up for the salt lost by sweating.

SRC: 另外，夏季人体容易缺钾，使人感到倦怠疲乏，含钾茶水是极好的消暑饮品。
HYP: In addition, the human body is prone to lack of potassium in summer, which makes people feel tired and tired. Potassium-containing tea is an excellent summer drink.

SRC: 夏天多食含水量高的蔬果，如生菜、黄瓜、西红柿等；新鲜水果，如桃子、杏、西瓜、甜瓜等水分含量为80％至90％，都可以用来补充水分；乳制品既能补水，又能满足身体的营养之需。
HYP: In summer, eat more fruits and vegetables with high water content, such as lettuce, cucumbers, tomatoes, etc.; Fresh fruits, such as peaches, apricots, watermelons, melons and other water content of 80% to 90%, can be used to supplement water; Dairy products cannot only replenish water, but also meet the nutritional needs of the body.

SRC: 此外，在高温环境中工作的人群，应适当补充含有钾、镁等元素的饮品。
HYP: In addition, people working in high temperature environment should appropriately supplement drinks containing potassium, magnesium and other elements.

SRC: 夏天日长夜短，气温高，人体新陈代谢旺盛，消耗也大，容易感到疲劳。
HYP: Summer days and nights are long and short, the temperature is high, the human body metabolism is exuberant, consumption is also large, easy to feel tired.

SRC: 充足的睡眠，可使大脑和身体各系统都得到放松，既利于工作和学习，也是预防中暑的措施。
HYP: Adequate sleep can relax the brain and body systems, which is not only conducive to work and study, but also a measure to prevent heatstroke.

SRC: 专家称，最佳就寝时间是22时至23时，最佳起床时间是5时30分至6时30分。
HYP: Experts say that the best bedtime is from 22: 00 to 23: 00, and the best time to get up is from 5: 30 to 6: 30.

SRC: 睡眠时注意不要躺在空调出风口和电风扇下，以免患上空调病和热伤风。
HYP: When sleeping, pay attention not to lie under the air-conditioning outlet and electric fan, so as not to suffer from air-conditioning disease and hot cold.

SRC: 专家建议，在户外活动或进行高温作业的人群，可随身携带十滴水、人丹、藿香正气水或藿香正气丸等防暑药品，或放置在就近工作场所，随时使用，以防发生中暑。
HYP: Experts suggest that people who are engaged in outdoor activities or high-temperature work can carry ten drops of water, Rendan, Patchouli Zhengqi Water or Patchouli Zhengqi Pills and other heat prevention drugs with them, or place them in the nearest workplace and use them at any time to prevent heatstroke.

SRC: 毕业生艺术展搬进商场公益展出-新华网
HYP: Graduate art exhibition moved into shopping mall public welfare exhibition-Xinhuanet

SRC: 在各大院校“云毕业”的季节里，一场难得的线下毕业生艺术展上周末温暖启幕。
HYP: In the " cloud graduation " season of major colleges and universities, a rare offline graduate art exhibition opened warmly last weekend.

SRC: 不过它既不在美术馆，也不在校园里，而是出现在了朝阳大悦城的公共空间，并对公众免费开放，将持续至8月23日。
HYP: However, it is neither in the art gallery nor on campus, but in the public space of Chaoyang Grand Hyatt City, and is open to the public free of charge until August 23.

SRC: 记者了解到，这场2020毕业生艺术展，征集了来自中央美术学院、中国传媒大学及天津美术学院的57位青年艺术家的50件/组作品，展览空间从2层延伸至6层，并充分利用楼内灯箱进行平面作品展示，最大程度烘托出毕业季的艺术氛围。
HYP: The reporter learned that this 2020 graduate art exhibition collected 50 works / groups of 57 young artists from the Central Academy of Fine Arts, Communication University of China and Tianjin Academy of Fine Arts. The exhibition space was extended from the second floor to the sixth floor, and made full use of the light box in the building to display graphic works, maximizing the artistic atmosphere of the graduation season.

SRC: 在疫情之下，这场展览的意义显得尤为特殊。
HYP: Under the epidemic situation, the significance of this exhibition is particularly special.

SRC: 朝阳大悦城美陈负责人葛平坦言：“我们选择将走向'云端'的毕业展再度带回线下空间，也希望让更多人看到青年对自身的探索和对世界的理解，放大艺术对于社会和心灵的疗愈力量。”
HYP: Ge Ping, head of Chaoyang Dayue City Mei Chen, said: " We choose to bring the graduation exhibition to the' cloud' back to the offline space again. We also hope to let more people see young people's exploration of themselves and understanding of the world, and amplify the healing power of art to society and soul. "

SRC: 她透露，此次参展的作品是向几大艺术院校的毕业生们征集而来，又从中挑选了适合商业空间展示的，作品形式从传统的架上绘画、雕塑，到新媒体装置、交互动画、VR全景，体量与丰富程度为历年之最。
HYP: She revealed that the works in this exhibition were collected from graduates of several major art colleges, and those suitable for commercial space display were selected. The works range from traditional shelf painting and sculpture to new media installations, interactive animation and VR panorama. The volume and richness of the works are the highest in all years.

SRC: 其中，李云肖在《2020的第一场战役》中通过机械和手工混合的创作语言，表达了自己在这场疫情中的感受；刘嘉颖通过以太坊区块链创作的作品《Sound Money》探讨了“加密货币” 、“信用创造” 、“交易”等主题；张家祺的《猫林》与邱达强的《羁》表现的都是经常与人类相伴的动物，从中可以看到青年艺术家对人与动物关系的理解；而朱仲鱼的作品《信仰的冬天—礼物》则是在提醒成长中的年轻人，“当有一天事业有成时，不忘初心，记得那份单纯与真诚。”
HYP: Among them, Li Yunxiao expressed his feelings in the epidemic through a mixture of mechanical and manual creative language in " The First Battle of 2020 "; Liu Xiaoying's work " Sound Money " created through the Ethereum blockchain discusses the themes of " cryptocurrency, " " credit creation " and " transaction "; Zhang Jiaqi's " Cat Forest " and Qiu Daqiang's " Bohemian " show animals that are often accompanied by human beings, from which you can see the young artist's understanding of the relationship between human beings and animals; and Zhu Zhongyu's work " Winter of Faith - Gift " reminds growing young people, " When one day you have a successful career, remember that simplicity and sincerity. "

SRC: 在为数不多的亲自布展的毕业生中，就有来自天津美术学院雕塑系的李敬寅。
HYP: Among the few graduates who have personally arranged the exhibition is Li Jingyin from the Sculpture Department of Tianjin Academy of Fine Arts.

SRC: “我是7月7日来北京的，当时其实有点担心疫情，还提前三天做了核酸检测，是带着酒精棉和检测报告来布展的。”
HYP: " I came to Beijing on July 7. I was actually a little worried about the epidemic. I also did a nucleic acid test three days in advance. I came to the exhibition with alcohol cotton and test report. "

SRC: 他的作品《昨日如谜》结构比较复杂，必须亲力亲为。
HYP: His work " Yesterday Like a Mystery " has a complex structure and must be done by himself.

SRC: 同时，他还承担着帮助同学修补破损作品的任务。
HYP: At the same time, he also undertakes the task of helping his classmates repair damaged works.

SRC: “布展到凌晨四点半，然后再做修补，时间很紧，都忘了和作品合个影，也有点遗憾。”
HYP: " The exhibition will be held until 4: 30 in the morning, and then it will be repaired. The time is very tight. I forgot to take a picture with the work. It is also a bit regrettable. "

SRC: 他希望，等疫情更稳定了，再和同学们来北京看看自己的作品展。
HYP: He hoped that when the epidemic became more stable, he would come to Beijing with his classmates to see his work exhibition.

SRC: （记者李俐）
HYP: (Reporter Li Li)

SRC: 奖励5万元湖北恩施表扬沙子坝滑坡“预警第一人” - 中新网
HYP: Reward 50000 yuan Hubei Enshi praised the " first person in early warning " of Shaba landslide-Chinanews.com

SRC: 湖北日报讯(记者林晶)7月26日，恩施市通报表扬为沙子坝滑坡预警作出重要贡献的地质灾害点监测员陈光明，并为他送去5万元奖金。
HYP: Hubei Daily News (Reporter Lin Jing) On July 26, Enshi City announced that it praised Chen Guangming, a geological disaster site monitor who had made important contributions to the early warning of Shaba landslide, and sent him a prize of 50000 yuan.

SRC: 同时，号召全市党员干部学习他恪尽职守、敢于担当、主动作为、乐于奉献的精神。
HYP: At the same time, party members and cadres in the city are called upon to learn from his spirit of dedication, courage, initiative and dedication.

SRC: 7月21日，恩施市屯堡乡马者村沙子坝发生滑坡，导致清江干流河道形成堰塞湖，58岁的陈光明是预警此次滑坡的第一人。
HYP: On July 21, a landslide occurred in the sand dam of Mari Village, Tunbao Township, Enshi City, resulting in the formation of a barrier lake in the main stream of the Qingjiang River. Chen Guangming, 58, was the first person to warn of the landslide.

SRC: 7月17日下午，陈光明得知村民家中墙壁开裂的消息，立即到现场查看。
HYP: On the afternoon of July 17, Chen Guangming learned that the walls of the villagers' homes were cracked and immediately went to the scene to check.

SRC: 他刚从家中走出五六百米，便看到村组公路裂开四五厘米，沿着公路一直延伸到玉米地，长度约50米。
HYP: As soon as he walked five or six hundred meters from his home, he saw the village road split four or five centimeters, extending along the road to the cornfield, with a length of about 50 meters.

SRC: 陈光明顿生警觉，第一时间将公路开裂的照片发到乡“地质灾害监测员联系群”里。
HYP: Chen Guangming Dunsheng was alert and sent the photos of highway cracking to the township " geological disaster monitors contact group " for the first time.

SRC: 经屯堡乡自然规划所相关负责人现场查看和判断，滑坡的可能性很大，随即作出撤离群众的决定。
HYP: After on-site inspection and judgment by the relevant person in charge of Tunpu Township Nature Planning Institute, the possibility of landslide was very high, and the decision to evacuate the masses was made immediately.

SRC: 陈光明的及时预警，为影响区内315户1339名群众的安全撤离贏得了36小时的宝贵时间。
HYP: Chen Guangming's timely early warning won 36 hours of valuable time for the safe evacuation of 1339 people from 315 households in the affected area.

SRC: 此次重大地质灾害，无一人伤亡。
HYP: No one was killed or injured in this major geological disaster.

SRC: 陈光明认真负责的敬业精神得到群众的称赞。
HYP: Chen Guangming's conscientious and responsible professionalism was praised by the masses.

SRC: 面对赞誉，他说：“不存在救了谁，这是我的责任。 ”
HYP: In the face of praise, he said: " There is no one to save, this is my responsibility. "

SRC: 警方通报“女大学生赴青海旅游失联”细节搜救工作仍在继续-新华网
HYP: Police report details of " female college students missing from traveling to Qinghai " Search and rescue work is still continuing-Xinhuanet

SRC: 新华社西宁7月26日电（记者<v>王金金周喆</v>）近日，“一名女大学生前往青海格尔木旅游后失联”一事引发网民关注。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Xining, July 26 (Reporter Wang Jin Zhou Zhe) Recently, " a female college student lost contact after traveling to Golmud, Qinghai " attracted the attention of netizens.

SRC: 新华社西宁7月26日电（记者王金金周喆）近日，“一名女大学生前往青海格尔木旅游后失联”一事引发网民关注。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Xining, July 26 (Reporter Wang Jin Zhou Zhe) Recently, " a female college student lost contact after traveling to Golmud, Qinghai " attracted the attention of netizens.

SRC: 青海省海西蒙古族藏族自治州格尔木市公安局26日通报称，南京某大学学生黄某某目前仍处于失联状态，多地警方正深入黄某某失联地沿线，积极开展寻找工作。
HYP: The Public Security Bureau of Golmud City, Haixi Mongolian and Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, Qinghai Province, reported on the 26th that Huang Yue, a student of a university in Nanjing, is still out of contact, and many police are going deep along the lost area of Huang Yue and actively looking for work.

SRC: 2020年7月10日，海西州格尔木市公安局治安支队接到上级通知，南京某大学学生黄某某于7月5日乘坐Z164列车由南京至格尔木，于7月9日在青海省玉树藏族自治州曲麻莱县索南达杰保护站清水河西南区域处手机关机并失联，要求协助查找。
HYP: On July 10, 2020, the Public Security Detachment of the Public Security Bureau of Golmud City, Haixi Province, received notification from his superiors that Huang Yue, a student of a university in Nanjing, took the Z164 train from Nanjing to Golmud on July 5. On July 9, his mobile phone was turned off and lost contact in the southwest area of Qingshui River, Sonandajie Protection Station, Qumalai County, Yushu Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, Qinghai Province, and asked for assistance in finding it.

SRC: 根据格尔木市公安局的调查情况，黄某某于7月6日19时54分进入青海省境内，7日4时抵达格尔木市。
HYP: According to the investigation by the Public Security Bureau of Golmud City, Huang entered Qinghai Province at 19: 54 on July 6 and arrived in Golmud City at 4: 00 on July 7.

SRC: 当日8时，失联人员黄某某乘坐出租车由格尔木市黄河大酒店朝G109国道出发，并于12时到达可可西里索南达杰保护站，出租车司机单独返回，黄某某7日15时到达索南达杰保护站附近清水河区域直至9日18时许在该区域关机。
HYP: At 8: 00 on the same day, Huang, the missing person, took a taxi from the Yellow River Hotel in Golmud City to the G109 National Road, and arrived at the Sonandajie Protection Station in Koxili at 12: 00. The taxi driver returned alone. Huang went to the Qingshui River area near the Sonandajie Protection Station at 15: 00 on the 7th until 18: 00 on the 9th. He shut down in the area.

SRC: 在进一步调查中，警方发现黄某某曾于7月13日17时07分通过乃吉沟检查站。
HYP: In further investigation, the police found that Huang had passed the Naijigou checkpoint at 17: 07 on July 13.

SRC: 乃吉沟检查站是西藏自治区那曲市在格尔木市南山口设立的检查站，由于该检查站无视频监控，无法确定本人及所乘车辆信息，警方只能驾车在沿途进行查找，协调西藏沿途各检查站若发现黄某某，立即与格尔木市公安局取得联系。
HYP: Naijigou checkpoint is a checkpoint set up in Nanshan Pass, Golmud City, Nagqu City, Tibet Autonomous Region. Because there is no video surveillance at the checkpoint, it is impossible to determine the information of myself and the vehicle I am travelling in. The police can only drive along the way to search, and coordinate with the checkpoints along the way in Tibet if Huang is found, immediately contact the Golmud Public Security Bureau.

SRC: 根据最新情况，7月26日凌晨1时，格尔木市公安局组织救援力量携带救援装备，前往青藏公路沿线不冻泉保护站、索南达杰保护站进行查找，并积极与四川警方、西藏警方、南京警方取得联系，共同开展工作，目前查找搜救工作仍在继续。
HYP: According to the latest situation, at 1: 00 am on July 26, the Golmud Public Security Bureau organized rescue forces to carry rescue equipment to search for the unfrozen spring protection station and Sonandajie protection station along the Qinghai-Tibet Highway, and actively contacted the Sichuan police, the Tibet police and the Nanjing police to carry out joint work. At present, the search and rescue work is still continuing.

SRC: 当地警方希望广大网友和社会各界如有相关线索，及时向格尔木警方和南京江宁警方提供，争取早日找到失联人员黄某某。
HYP: The local police hope that if the vast number of netizens and all sectors of society have relevant clues, they will provide them to the Golmud police and Nanjing Jiangning police in a timely manner, and strive to find the missing person Huang Yue as soon as possible.

SRC: 同时，有关专家提示，游客在户外活动时要规范、理性、文明，随时留意路边警示标志，切勿冒险进入无人区，遇到突发情况，要及时报警。
HYP: At the same time, relevant experts suggest that tourists should be standardized, rational and civilized in outdoor activities, pay attention to roadside warning signs at any time, do not risk entering no man's land, and call the police in time when they encounter unexpected situations.

SRC: 俄罗斯举办阅兵式庆祝海军节-新华网
HYP: Russia holds a military parade to celebrate Navy Day-Xinhuanet

SRC: 7月26日，在俄罗斯圣彼得堡，舰艇列队参加海军节庆祝活动。
HYP: On July 26, in St. Petersburg, Russia, ships lined up to participate in the celebration of Navy Day.

SRC: 新华社发（莫京娜摄）
HYP: Xinhua News Agency (Photo by Mo Jingna)

SRC: 新华社莫斯科7月26日电（记者鲁金博）俄罗斯各舰队26日举行阅兵式庆祝海军节，纪念俄海军成立324周年。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Moscow, July 26 (Reporter Lu Jinbo) Russian fleets held a military parade on the 26th to celebrate the Navy Day, commemorating the 324th anniversary of the establishment of the Russian Navy.

SRC: 当天，俄罗斯北海、波罗的海、黑海、里海和太平洋舰队分别在各自基地所在海域举行了阅兵式，共有1.5万军人、219艘各类舰艇和71架军用飞机参加。
HYP: On the same day, the Russian North Sea, Baltic Sea, Black Sea, Caspian Sea and Pacific Fleet held military parades in the waters where their respective bases are located, with a total of 15000 soldiers, 219 ships of various types and 71 military aircraft participating.

SRC: 俄总统、武装力量最高统帅普京出席了波罗的海舰队的阅兵式。
HYP: Russian President and Supreme Commander of the Armed Forces Vladimir Putin attended the military parade of the Baltic Fleet.

SRC: 约4000名军人、46艘舰艇和40余架战机参加了当地的阅兵式。
HYP: About 4000 soldiers, 46 ships and more than 40 fighters took part in the local military parade.

SRC: 普京首先在位于波罗的海喀琅施塔得海军基地水域检阅了舰艇列队。
HYP: Putin first inspected the ship parade in the waters of the Kronstadt naval base in the Baltic Sea.

SRC: 之后，他乘坐快艇抵达圣彼得堡市中心的涅瓦河水域并上岸，观看了在涅瓦河上举行的阅兵式。
HYP: After that, he took a speedboat to the waters of the Neva River in central St. Petersburg and went ashore to watch the military parade on the Neva River.

SRC: 普京在阅兵式上发表讲话说，俄海军装备的现代化技术水平近年来持续提升，俄海军2020年将总共接收约40艘配备独特高超音速打击系统的新型舰艇。
HYP: Putin said in a speech at the military parade that the modern technical level of Russian naval equipment has continued to improve in recent years, and the Russian Navy will receive a total of about 40 new ships equipped with unique hypersonic strike systems in 2020.

SRC: 另外，俄海军总司令叶夫梅诺夫日前在接受俄国防部机关报《红星报》采访时说，俄建造舰艇的计划得到了有效落实，2020年俄海军计划接收的新舰艇数量是近年来规模较大的。
HYP: In addition, the commander-in-chief of the Russian Navy, Yevmenov, said in an interview with Red Star, an organ of the Russian Ministry of Defense, that Russia's plan to build ships has been effectively implemented, and the number of new ships that the Russian Navy plans to receive in 2020 is the largest in recent years.

SRC: 1696年，沙皇彼得大帝着手组建海上舰队，开创了俄海军历史。
HYP: In 1696, Tsar Peter the Great set out to form a maritime fleet, creating the history of the Russian navy.

SRC: 每年7月最后一个星期日是俄罗斯海军节。
HYP: The last Sunday in July every year is the Russian Navy Day.

SRC: 针对疫情防控工作出现的新变化，自7月17日以来，新疆各级工会响应自治区总工会的号召，积极参与疫情防控工作。
HYP: In response to the new changes in the epidemic prevention and control work, since July 17, trade unions at all levels in Xinjiang have responded to the call of the Autonomous Region Federation of Trade Unions and actively participated in the epidemic prevention and control work.

SRC: 天山南北工会干部、职工、劳动模范走进街道社区、居民群众中，开展送菜送药、消毒灭菌、宣传防疫知识等活动，服务职工群众，用实际行动彰显工会“硬核力量”。
HYP: Trade union cadres, workers and labor models in the north and south of Tianshan walked into street communities and residents to carry out activities such as delivering vegetables and medicine, disinfection and sterilization, and publicizing epidemic prevention knowledge, to serve the workers and the masses, and to demonstrate the " hard nuclear power " of trade unions with practical actions.

SRC: 天山南北工会干部、职工、劳动模范走进街道社区、居民群众<v>中</v>，开展送菜送药、消毒灭菌、宣传防疫知识等活动，服务职工群众，用实际行动彰显工会“硬核力量”。
HYP: Trade union cadres, workers and labor models in the north and south of Tianshan walked into street communities and residents to carry out activities such as delivering vegetables and medicine, disinfection and sterilization, and publicizing epidemic prevention knowledge, to serve the workers and the masses, and to demonstrate the " hard nuclear power " of trade unions with practical actions.

SRC: 近日，乌鲁木齐市天山区总工会慰问组一行，将一批急需的疫情防控生活物资送到了12个隔离点的工作人员手中。
HYP: Recently, the condolence group of the Tianshan District Federation of Trade Unions of Urumqi City sent a batch of urgently needed epidemic prevention and control living materials to the staff of 12 isolation points.

SRC: 疫情发生后，天山区总第一时间投入经费105万余元，紧急下拨给23个直属基层工会。
HYP: After the outbreak of the epidemic, Tianshan District invested more than 1.05 million yuan in the first time, which was urgently allocated to 23 directly affiliated grass-roots trade unions.

SRC: 疫情发生后，天山区<v>总</v>第一时间投入经费105万余元，紧急下拨给23个直属基层工会。
HYP: After the outbreak of the epidemic, Tianshan District invested more than 1.05 million yuan in the first time, which was urgently allocated to 23 directly affiliated grass-roots trade unions.

SRC: <v>中建新疆建工一建</v>党委副书记、工会主席赵相国接到公司关于疫情防控的通知后，主动请缨，选择留在单位值班，为职工保驾护航。
HYP: After receiving the company's notice on epidemic prevention and control, Zhao Xiangguo, deputy secretary of the Party committee and chairman of the trade union, chose to stay on duty in the unit to escort the employees.

SRC: 中建新疆建工一建党委副书记、工会主席赵相国接到公司关于疫情防控的通知后，<v>主动请缨</v>，选择留在单位值班，为职工保驾护航。
HYP: After receiving the company's notice on epidemic prevention and control, Zhao Xiangguo, deputy secretary of the Party committee and chairman of the trade union, chose to stay on duty in the unit to escort the employees.

SRC: 中建新疆建工一建党委副书记、工会主席赵相国接到公司关于疫情防控的通知后，主动请缨，选择留在单位值班，为职工保驾护航。
HYP: After receiving the company's notice on epidemic prevention and control, Zhao Xiangguo, deputy secretary of the Party committee and chairman of the trade union, chose to stay on duty in the unit to escort the employees.

SRC: 他为居住在单位宿舍<v>和</v>新入职的职工送去做饭的炊具、食品及日用品，并组织人员每隔两天为他们送一次生活必备物资。
HYP: He sent cooking utensils, food and daily necessities to the new employees living in the unit dormitory, and organized personnel to send them daily necessities every two days.

SRC: 他为居住在单位宿舍和新入职的职工送去做饭的炊具、食品及日用品，并组织人员每隔两天为他们送一次生活必备物资。
HYP: He sent cooking utensils, food and daily necessities to the new employees living in the unit dormitory, and organized personnel to send them daily necessities every two days.

SRC: “7月21日起，对坚守战'疫'一线的干部职工进行摸底，并采取线上下单、<v>商家</v>送货上门的方式，先行为乌鲁木齐地区704名一线职工群众补充购买防疫用品和生活物资。”
HYP: " From July 21, the cadres and workers who adhere to the front line of the war' epidemic' will be surveyed, and online orders and door-to-door delivery will be adopted to supplement the purchase of epidemic prevention supplies and living materials for 704 front-line workers in Urumqi. "

SRC: “7月21日起，对坚守战'疫'一线的干部职工进行摸底，并采取线上下单、商家送货上门的方式，<v>先行为</v>乌鲁木齐地区704名一线职工群众补充购买防疫用品和生活物资。”
HYP: " From July 21, the cadres and workers who adhere to the front line of the war' epidemic' will be surveyed, and online orders and door-to-door delivery will be adopted to supplement the purchase of epidemic prevention supplies and living materials for 704 front-line workers in Urumqi. "

SRC: “7月21日起，对坚守战'疫'一线的干部职工进行摸底，并采取线上下单、商家送货上门的方式，先行为乌鲁木齐地区704名一线职工群众补充购买防疫用品和生活物资。”
HYP: " From July 21, the cadres and workers who adhere to the front line of the war' epidemic' will be surveyed, and online orders and door-to-door delivery will be adopted to supplement the purchase of epidemic prevention supplies and living materials for 704 front-line workers in Urumqi. "

SRC: 新疆交通运输工会负责人告诉记者，面对突发疫情，他们全力做好疫情防控服务保障、稳步推进交通运输发展各项工作，营造齐心战“疫”的浓厚氛围。
HYP: The person in charge of the Xinjiang Transport Trade Union told reporters that in the face of the sudden epidemic, they made every effort to ensure epidemic prevention and control services, steadily promote transportation development, and create a strong atmosphere of fighting the " epidemic. "

SRC: 当前正值夏季高温，各级工会紧盯疫情防控重点地区的一线职工，把“送清凉”关心关爱落到实处。
HYP: At present, it is hot in summer. Trade unions at all levels pay close attention to front-line workers in key areas of epidemic prevention and control, and implement the " send cool " care and care.

SRC: 7月19日，乌鲁木齐县总工会启动向疫情防控一线职工“送清凉”慰问活动，全县警务站、卡点和卫生系统收到了饮料、水果等慰问品。
HYP: On July 19, the Urumqi County Federation of Trade Unions launched a " send cool " condolence campaign to front-line workers in epidemic prevention and control. Police stations, sticking points and health systems across the county received drinks, fruits and other consolation items.

SRC: “工会干部要进一步提高政治站位、强化责任担当，用关怀温暖人心，用行动鼓舞斗志。
HYP: " Trade union cadres should further improve their political position, strengthen their responsibility, warm their hearts with care and encourage their fighting spirit with actions.

SRC: 要充分发挥工会组织凝聚职工、团结职工的作用，做好疫情防控服务保障，积极维护广大职工的健康权益，把关爱送到一线职工身边。”
HYP: We should give full play to the role of trade union organizations in uniting and uniting workers, do a good job in epidemic prevention and control services, actively safeguard the health rights and interests of workers, and send care to front-line workers. "

SRC: 自治区总工会相关负责人表示。
HYP: The relevant person in charge of the Autonomous Region Federation of Trade Unions said.

SRC: 2020年直招士官工作全面展开-新华网
HYP: Direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers will be fully launched in 2020-Xinhuanet

SRC: 新华社北京7月26日电（记者贾启龙）军委政治工作部、军委国防动员部近日联合印发通知，部署展开2020年从普通高等学校毕业生中直接招收士官工作。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 26 (Reporter Jia Qilong) The Political Work Department of the Military Commission and the National Defense Mobilization Department of the Military Commission recently jointly issued a notice to deploy and start the direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers from graduates of ordinary colleges and universities in 2020.

SRC: 今年直招士官涵盖计算机、自动化、机械等64类270余个军地通用专业，重点加大无人机、航海、航空航天、电子信息、小语种等专业招收力度，招收规模相比去年增加近2000人。
HYP: This year, the direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers covers more than 270 military and local general majors in 64 categories such as computer, automation and machinery, with emphasis on increasing the recruitment of UAV, navigation, aerospace, electronic information, small languages and other majors, with an increase of nearly 2000 compared with last year.

SRC: 今年直招士官工作与义务兵征集同步组织实施，8月1日开始，9月30日结束。
HYP: This year, the direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers and the recruitment of conscripts are organized and implemented simultaneously, starting on August 1 and ending on September 30.

SRC: 应征青年可以通过全国征兵网（网址：http://www.gfbzb.gov.cn）查询直招士官条件和各地招收专业分布情况，符合专业范围和招收条件的在线提交报名信息，并根据应征地兵役机关统一要求，参加体格检查、政治考核等后续招收工作。
HYP: Young recruits can inquire about the conditions for direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers and the distribution of local recruitment specialties through the National Recruitment Network (website: http: / / www.gfbzb.gov.cn), submit online registration information that meets the professional scope and recruitment conditions, and participate in follow-up recruitment work such as medical examination and political examination according to the unified requirements of the military service organs of the places where they are recruited.

SRC: 因招收专业和计划限制未能被招收为士官的合格青年，可以参加义务兵征集，服义务兵役期满选取为士官时，在普通高等学校按规定学制就读的年数视同服役时间。
HYP: Qualified young people who cannot be recruited as non-commissioned officers due to professional recruitment and planning restrictions may participate in the recruitment of conscripts. When they are selected as non-commissioned officers at the end of their compulsory military service, the number of years of study in ordinary institutions of higher learning according to the prescribed academic system shall be regarded as service time.

SRC: 今年士官招收工作由省级或地市级人民政府征兵办公室统一组织，报名潜力丰富专业将在综合衡量报名对象学历层次、在校期间专业课成绩、取得职业资格证书等情况基础上择优遴选；稀缺专业将面向本地符合专业要求、具备招收优势的院校定向对口招收。
HYP: This year, the recruitment of non-commissioned officers will be uniformly organized by the recruitment offices of the provincial or municipal people's governments. The majors with rich registration potential will be selected on the basis of comprehensively measuring the educational level of the applicants, the achievements of professional courses during the school period, and obtaining vocational qualification certificates; the scarce majors will be targeted for local colleges and universities that meet professional requirements and have recruitment advantages.

SRC: 根据疫情常态化防控要求，今年直招士官原则上不安排自行报到，将与义务兵同步组织运输入营。
HYP: According to the requirements of epidemic prevention and control, this year's direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers will not arrange to report themselves in principle, and will organize transportation into the camp simultaneously with conscripts.

SRC: 直接招收士官入伍时间从2020年9月1日起算，部队下达士官任职命令的时间为2020年12月1日。
HYP: The time for direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers will start from September 1, 2020, and the time for the army to issue the order for non-commissioned officers to serve will be December 1, 2020.

SRC: 部队接收单位将科学制定入伍和专业训练方案，认真组织施训；训练完成后按照专业对口、招用一致的原则，将招收士官统一精准分配到对口专业技术岗位。
HYP: The receiving unit of the army will scientifically formulate the enlistment and professional training plan, and carefully organize the training; after the training is completed, the recruited non-commissioned officers will be uniformly and accurately assigned to the corresponding professional and technical posts in accordance with the principle of professional counterpart and consistent recruitment.

SRC: 驻英使馆发言人：中国政府是网络安全的坚定维护者-中新网
HYP: Spokesperson of the Embassy in the UK: The Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security-Chinanews.com

SRC: 中新网7月26日电据中国驻英国大使馆网站消息，25日，中国驻英国使馆发言人就有关网络攻击错误言论答记者问。
HYP: China News Service, July 26 According to the website of the Chinese Embassy in the United Kingdom, on the 25th, the spokesperson of the Chinese Embassy in the United Kingdom answered questions on the wrong remarks about cyber attacks.

SRC: 发言人强调，中国政府是网络安全的坚定维护者，一贯坚决反对并打击任何形式的网络攻击和网络犯罪。
HYP: The spokesman stressed that the Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security and has always resolutely opposed and combated any form of cyber attacks and cyber crimes.

SRC: 有记者提问：据媒体称，与中国有关的黑客组织曾干扰一家英国公司网络系统、向存有专利数据的英美技术公司发动攻击、入侵欧盟国家政府网络。
HYP: A reporter asked: According to the media, hacker organizations related to China have interfered with the network system of a British company, attacked British and American technology companies with patent data, and invaded the government networks of EU countries.

SRC: 发言人表示，中国政府是网络安全的坚定维护者，一贯坚决反对并打击任何形式的网络攻击和网络犯罪。
HYP: The spokesman said that the Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security and has always resolutely opposed and combated any form of cyber attacks and cyber crimes.

SRC: 网络空间虚拟性强，溯源难，行为体多样，在调查和定性网络事件的时候应拿出充分的证据，不能无端猜测。
HYP: Cyberspace is highly virtual, difficult to trace, and diverse actors. When investigating and characterizing network events, sufficient evidence should be produced, and there should be no groundless speculation.

SRC: 发言人称，以往的“棱镜门”等一系列事件证明，美国一直都在进行全球最大范围的网络窃密行动。
HYP: The spokesman said that a series of events such as the " Prism Gate " in the past proved that the United States has been carrying out the largest cyber theft operation in the world.

SRC: 维护网络空间的和平与稳定符合所有国家的共同利益。
HYP: Maintaining peace and stability in cyberspace serves the common interests of all countries.

SRC: 发言人指出，中国在科技创新方面的成就不是偷来的、不是抢来的，而是通过自力更生、艰苦奋斗得来的。
HYP: The spokesman pointed out that China's achievements in scientific and technological innovation were not stolen or stolen, but achieved through self-reliance and hard work.

SRC: 2019年中国通过《专利合作条约》(PCT)途径提交了约5.9万件专利申请，年增长率为10.6%，成为提交国际专利申请量最多的国家。
HYP: In 2019, China submitted about 59000 patent applications through the Patent Cooperation Treaty (PCT), with an annual growth rate of 10.6%, making it the country with the largest number of international patent applications.

SRC: 中国已经成为创新和知识产权大国。
HYP: China has become a big country in innovation and intellectual property rights.

SRC: 乌鲁木齐免费核酸检测多数区已基本完成高风险地区进行二次检测-中新网
HYP: Free nucleic acid testing in Urumqi Most districts have basically completed secondary testing in high-risk areas-Chinanews.com

SRC: 中新网乌鲁木齐7月26日电(记者孙亭文赵雅敏)乌鲁木齐市卫健委主任张卫26日在通报乌鲁木齐市最新疫情和核酸检测情况时称，目前，乌鲁木齐全市免费核酸检测工作多数区已基本完成。
HYP: China News Service, Urumqi, July 26 (Reporter Sun Tingwen Zhao Yamin) Zhang Wei, director of the Urumqi Municipal Health Commission, said on the 26th that at present, free nucleic acid testing in Urumqi has been basically completed in most districts.

SRC: 国务院专家组和自治区、乌鲁木齐市专家正在根据核酸检测和流行病学调查结果，对疫情的发展做进一步评估。
HYP: The expert group of the State Council and experts from the autonomous region and Urumqi are further evaluating the development of the epidemic based on the results of nucleic acid testing and epidemiological investigations.

SRC: 新疆维吾尔自治区新闻办公室26日召开新闻发布会通报新疆疫情和防控情况。
HYP: The Press Office of Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region held a press conference on the 26th to report on the epidemic situation and prevention and control in Xinjiang.

SRC: 据他介绍，7月25日0时至24时，乌鲁木齐市新增新冠肺炎确诊病例22例(其中5例为无症状感染者转确诊病例) ，新增无症状感染者38例。
HYP: According to him, from 0: 00 to 24: 00 on July 25, there were 22 new confirmed cases of COVID-19 pneumonia in Urumqi (including 5 cases of asymptomatic infection) and 38 new asymptomatic infections.

SRC: 截至7月25日24时，乌鲁木齐市现有确诊病例135例，无症状感染者147例。
HYP: As of 24: 00 on July 25, there were 135 confirmed cases and 147 asymptomatic infections in Urumqi.

SRC: 25日新增的无症状感染者也基本上都是通过全市免费核酸检测、主动筛查出来的。
HYP: The new asymptomatic infections on the 25th also basically passed the city's free nucleic acid testing and active screening.

SRC: 乌鲁木齐市卫健委主任张卫26日称，乌鲁木齐全市免费核酸检测工作多数区已基本完成。
HYP: Zhang Wei, director of the Urumqi Municipal Health Commission, said on the 26th that free nucleic acid testing in Urumqi has been basically completed in most districts.

SRC: 他还说，从国内其他地区的经验看，影响核酸检测结果的因素很多，比如检测试剂灵敏度、受检测人员的感染时间和排毒时间、标本取材时受检测者配合情况(配合度差可能导致标本没有取到位)以及检测环境、检验人员的操作熟练程度等。
HYP: He also said that from the experience of other regions in China, there are many factors that affect the nucleic acid test results, such as the sensitivity of the detection reagent, the infection time and detoxification time of the tested person, the cooperation of the tested person when the specimen is taken (poor cooperation may lead to the specimen not being taken in place), the detection environment, the operational proficiency of the inspectors, etc.

SRC: 由于各种原因，核酸检测也会出现假阴性的结果。
HYP: For various reasons, nucleic acid testing will also show false negative results.

SRC: 所谓假阴性，就是指受检测者确实是感染者，但是核酸检测结果却为阴性。
HYP: The so-called false negative means that the tested person is indeed infected, but the nucleic acid test result is negative.

SRC: 另外，对于和确诊病例、疑似病例有过密切接触的人员，通常需要两次核酸检测才能排除。
HYP: In addition, two nucleic acid tests are usually needed to exclude people who have been in close contact with confirmed cases and suspected cases.

SRC: 对于去过疫情中高风险地区的人员，如果出现发热和呼吸道症状，一次核酸检测阴性存在假阴性可能，所以也需要两次核酸检测才能排除。
HYP: For people who have been to high-risk areas in the epidemic, if fever and respiratory symptoms occur, one negative nucleic acid test may be false negative, so two nucleic acid tests are also needed to rule out.

SRC: 他表示，鉴于以上情况，为了全市各族群众的身体健康，从今天开始，乌鲁木齐市将对天山区、沙依巴克区等重点地区进行二次免费核酸检测，同时开展“查遗补漏” 。
HYP: He said that in view of the above situation, for the sake of the health of the people of all ethnic groups in the city, from today, Urumqi will conduct two free nucleic acid tests in key areas such as Tianshan District and Shaybak District, and carry out " checking and filling leaks " at the same time.

SRC: 据悉，天山区、沙依巴克区是疫情高风险地区。
HYP: It is reported that Tianshan District and Shaybak District are high-risk areas for epidemic diseases.

SRC: 白宫疫情专家福奇：对2021年初研制出疫苗持谨慎乐观
HYP: White House epidemic expert Forge: cautiously optimistic about the development of a vaccine in early 2021

SRC: 福奇25日在国际领袖基金会主办的一场网络视频会议上作上述表示。
HYP: Forge made the above remarks at an online video conference hosted by the International Leadership Foundation on the 25th.

SRC: 他提醒说，目前尚不清楚新冠疫情在秋冬季将如何发展，也不知道疫情的最终影响会如何，“而结束这一切的唯一办法就是我们每个人都选择成为解决问题的一部分”。
HYP: He reminded that it is not clear how the COVID-19 epidemic will develop in autumn and winter, or what the ultimate impact of the epidemic will be. " The only way to end all this is for each of us to choose to be part of the problem. "

SRC: 据美国约翰斯·霍普金斯大学数据，截至25日21时，美国新冠确诊病例已达417.6万，死亡14.6万人。
HYP: According to the data of Johns Hopkins University in the United States, as of 21: 00 on the 25th, there were 4.176 million confirmed cases and 146000 deaths in the United States.

SRC: 福奇表示，美国一些地区目前正在艰难地同反弹的疫情作斗争。
HYP: Forge said that some parts of the United States are currently struggling with the rebound of the epidemic.

SRC: 尽管各地疫情有所不同，需要因地制宜的应对方案，但多样化的抗疫策略并不意味着地区之间没有紧密联系。
HYP: Although the epidemic situation varies from place to place and needs to be adapted to local conditions, diversified anti-epidemic strategies do not mean that there is no close connection between regions.

SRC: 一个地区的疫情最终会影响到其他地区。
HYP: An epidemic in one area will eventually affect other areas.

SRC: “现在不是自满的时候”，福奇说，“我们的工作没有完成，必须加紧努力，也必须对未来的不确定性保持警惕。”
HYP: " This is not the time for complacency, " Forge said. " Our work is not finished. We must intensify our efforts and be vigilant about the uncertainty of the future. "

SRC: 美国华裔医学专家、治疗艾滋病“鸡尾酒疗法”创始人何大一在会上指出，美国新冠疫情尚未到达顶峰。
HYP: He Dayi, a Chinese-American medical expert and founder of " cocktail therapy " to treat AIDS, pointed out at the meeting that the COVID-19 epidemic in the United States has not yet reached its peak.

SRC: “我们每个人都必须尽自己的一份力来减缓这一病毒的传播。”
HYP: " Each of us must do our part to slow the spread of this virus. "

SRC: 何大一呼吁，公众用自己的实际行动为科学家争取时间，以加紧研发新冠治疗药物和疫苗。
HYP: He Daichi called on the public to use their own practical actions to buy time for scientists to step up the research and development of COVID-19 therapeutic drugs and vaccines.

SRC: 国际领袖基金会是一家以促进美国及亚太地区国际交流活动为宗旨的非营利性组织，致力于提升美国亚太裔地位，培育国际青年领袖。
HYP: The International Leadership Foundation is a non-profit organization that aims to promote international exchange activities in the United States and the Asia-Pacific region. It is committed to enhancing the status of Asia-Pacific Americans and cultivating international young leaders.

SRC: 当天，美国运输部长赵小兰、美联邦众议员孟昭文以及国际领袖基金会创会会长董继玲等分别在会上发言。
HYP: On the same day, US Secretary of Transportation Zhao Xiaolan, US Representative Meng Zhaowen and Dong Jiling, founding president of the International Leadership Foundation, spoke at the meeting respectively.

SRC: 他们特别向在一线抗疫的亚太裔医务工作者和志愿者致敬，并呼吁美国公众继续坚持“社交距离”等防疫准则，遏制疫情扩散。
HYP: They paid special tribute to the Asia-Pacific medical workers and volunteers who were fighting the epidemic on the front line, and called on the American public to continue to adhere to epidemic prevention guidelines such as " social distance " to curb the spread of the epidemic.

SRC: 美中贸谈代表传8月会面
HYP: Representatives of the US-China Trade Talks met in August

SRC: 香港《南华早报》25日引述一名匿名知情人士报导，中国贸易谈判团队负责人、国务院副总理刘鹤与美方团队共同领导人、贸易代表赖海哲可望在8月举行正式会谈，评估双方履行中美第一阶段贸易协议的情况。
HYP: Hong Kong's South China Morning Post quoted an anonymous person familiar with the matter as reporting on the 25th that Liu He, head of the Chinese trade negotiation team and Vice Premier of the State Council, and Lai Haizhe, co-leader of the US team and trade representative, are expected to hold formal talks in August to assess the implementation of the first phase of the Sino-US trade agreement.

SRC: 报导说，虽然中国过去几个月已大幅提高采购美国农产品数量，但因新冠病毒疫情等因素，中方采购量距离贸易协议中承诺的数量仍有一段距离。
HYP: The report said that although China has significantly increased the amount of US agricultural products purchased in the past few months, due to factors such as the virus epidemic, the amount of Chinese purchases is still some distance from the amount promised in the trade agreement.

SRC: 分析家说，近来美中相互关闭对方领事馆，加上其他争端，可能破坏双方在贸易方面的任何进展。
HYP: Analysts said that the recent closure of each other's consulates between the United States and China, together with other disputes, could undermine any progress in trade between the two sides.

SRC: 中美第一阶段贸易协议在1月15日签署后一个月生效，协议中规定双方高层组成的贸易框架小组，每半年应举行一次会谈。
HYP: The first phase of the China-US trade agreement entered into force one month after it was signed on January 15. The agreement stipulates that the high-level trade framework group of the two sides should hold talks every six months.

SRC: 知情人士透露，此次会议将是“一个重要的转折点”，让双方得以评估协议进展。
HYP: According to people familiar with the matter, the meeting will be " an important turning point " for both sides to assess the progress of the agreement.

SRC: 但这名人士也说，若美中紧张关系导致此时会谈意愿不高，双方可能会同意，赖海哲与刘鹤5月8日的电话会议，即已满足贸易协议中每半年会谈一次的条款。
HYP: However, this person also said that if the tension between the United States and China leads to a low willingness to talk at this time, the two sides may agree that the conference call between Lai Haizhe and Liu He on May 8 has met the clause of semi-annual talks in the trade agreement.

SRC: 今年以来，中美关系急速恶化，双方争端包括新冠病毒起源、贸易、香港、新疆、南海与意识形态等一系列问题。
HYP: Since the beginning of this year, China-US relations have deteriorated rapidly. The disputes between the two sides include a series of issues such as the origin of the COVID-19 virus, trade, Hong Kong, Xinjiang, the South China Sea and ideology.

SRC: 美国总统特朗普虽在年初吹嘘自己在首阶段协议中取得的成就，但近来态度改变。
HYP: Although US President Donald Trump boasted about his achievements in the first phase of the agreement at the beginning of the year, his attitude has changed recently.

SRC: 他23日在白宫记者会上说，虽然中国近来单日采购美国玉米数量破纪录，也买了很多大豆，“但这份贸易协议现在对我的意义，已不如当初达成时” 。
HYP: He said at the White House press conference on the 23rd that although China has recently purchased a record amount of US corn in a single day and bought a lot of soybeans, " this trade agreement is not as meaningful to me as it was when it was reached. "

SRC: 一位匿名北京政府顾问也认为，由于美中关系不佳，新一轮贸易谈判不太可能进行， “贸易议题在中美关系已失去分量”。
HYP: An anonymous Beijing government adviser also believes that due to the poor US-China relations, a new round of trade negotiations is unlikely to take place, and " trade issues have lost weight in Sino-US relations. "

SRC: 但他透露，中国经贸相关单位23日仍开会讨论了一系列问题，包括如何增加从美国的进口量， “我们已经尽力买了，所以任何追加采购会有困难” 。
HYP: However, he revealed that China's economic and trade-related units still met on the 23rd to discuss a series of issues, including how to increase imports from the United States. " We have tried our best to buy, so any additional purchases will be difficult. "

SRC: 美中贸易全国委员会副会长彭捷宁表示，保持首阶段协议动能“比以往任何时候都更重要”， 并指中国今年在进一步向美企开放金融市场上有所进展。
HYP: Peng Jining, vice president of the US-China National Committee on Trade, said that it was " more important than ever " to maintain the momentum of the first phase of the agreement, and said that China had made progress in further opening up its financial markets to US enterprises this year.

SRC: 独立研究公司Plenum分析师说：“谈比不谈好，尽管可能只被当成例行公事。”
HYP: " It's better to talk than not to talk, although it may only be seen as routine, " said an analyst at Plenum, an independent research firm.

SRC: 余额宝收益下行“90后”反而“报复性”存钱？
HYP: Yubao earnings down " after 90 " but " retaliatory " to save money?

SRC: 随着余额宝收益下行， “90后”不仅没有逃离余额宝，反而开始“报复性”存钱了？
HYP: With the decline in Yuanbao's earnings, the " post-90s " not only did not escape Yuanbao, but began to " retaliate " to save money?

SRC: 中国新经济研究院联合支付宝日前发布的《余额宝90后攒钱报告》（2020版）显示，上半年，“90后”更爱攒钱了：人均攒钱金额比2019年增长近四成。
HYP: The " Yu Bao Post-90s Savings Report " (2020 Edition) recently released by the China New Economic Research Institute and Alipay shows that in the first half of the year, the " post-90s " prefer to save money: the amount of money saved per capita increased by nearly 40% compared with 2019.

SRC: 有意思的是，“90后”更倾向于从一笔笔“小钱”开始攒，有六成平均每笔攒钱金额在20元以下… …
HYP: Interestingly, the " post-90s " tend to start with a small sum of money, and 60% of the average amount of money saved is less than 20 yuan...

SRC: 用余额宝攒钱，也成为“90后”的攒钱习惯。
HYP: Saving money with Yu Bao has also become the saving habit of " post-90s. "

SRC: 数据显示，在7亿余额宝用户中，有1.34亿用户是“90后” 。
HYP: Data show that out of the 700 million Yubao users, 134 million users are " post-90s. "

SRC: 中国有1.74亿“90后” ，也就是说，全国每4个“90后”中约有3个在用余额宝攒钱。
HYP: There are 174 million " post-90s " in China, that is to say, about three out of every four " post-90s " in the country are saving money with Yu Bao.

SRC: 目前，余额宝等货币基金的7日年化收益率从年初高于2%的水平，下滑到1.5%左右。
HYP: At present, the 7-day annualized yield of Yuanbao and other monetary funds has fallen to about 1.5% from above 2% at the beginning of the year.

SRC: 即使如此，也没有影响“90后”攒钱的步伐。
HYP: Even so, it did not affect the pace of saving money in the " post-90s. "

SRC: 而在余额宝“攒钱效应”提升背景下，不少习惯使用余额宝的年轻人还直接转化为“基民”。
HYP: Under the background of the promotion of Yuanbao's " saving effect, " many young people who are accustomed to using Yuanbao have also been directly transformed into " basic people. "

SRC: 支付宝数据显示，截至7月13日，近一个月支付宝上的新“基民”同比增长1倍多，越来越多年轻人在支付宝上实现“进阶”理财。
HYP: Alipay data show that as of July 13, the number of new " basic people " on Alipay has more than doubled year-on-year in the past month, and more and more young people have achieved " advanced " financial management on Alipay.

SRC: 有分析师认为，资金从余额宝流入股市，也是6月货币基金份额明确下滑的重要原因。
HYP: Some analysts believe that the inflow of funds from Yubao into the stock market is also an important reason for the clear decline in the share of the International Monetary Fund in June.

SRC: 报告还显示，“90后”女生更倾向于多攒钱，平均比男生攒钱金额高两成；在支付宝平台上持有基金的用户中，6成是男性，女性与男性相比倾向于选择更为稳健的理财方式。
HYP: The report also shows that " post-90s " girls are more likely to save more money, with an average of 20% higher than that of boys. Among the users holding funds on Alipay platform, 60% are men, and women tend to choose a more robust financial management method than men.

SRC: 存钱之后，“90后”有何计划？
HYP: After saving money, what are the plans for the " post-90s "?

SRC: 支付宝数据显示，“90后”有为目标攒钱的习惯，将旅行作为攒钱目标的用户最多。
HYP: Alipay data shows that the " post-90s " have the habit of saving money for the goal, and the largest number of users take travel as the goal of saving money.

SRC: 受疫情影响，许多“90后”攒钱为疫情后的旅行做准备；电影院恢复营业，也为从攒钱转向消费提供了新途径。
HYP: Affected by the epidemic, many " post-90s " saved money to prepare for travel after the epidemic; the resumption of cinemas also provided a new way to switch from saving money to consumption.

SRC: 让一面面鲜艳的党旗在抗洪大堤上高高飘扬
HYP: Let the bright party flag fly high on the flood-fighting levee

SRC: 近期我国南方受连续降雨影响，防汛抗洪形势十分严峻，造成贵州、四川、湖南、广西、广东、湖北等26省(区、市)受灾。
HYP: Recently, southern China has been affected by continuous rainfall, and the flood control and flood control situation is very severe, causing 26 provinces (districts and cities) including Guizhou, Sichuan, Hunan, Guangxi, Guangdong and Hubei to be affected.

SRC: 灾情就是命令，灾区就是战场，灾害面前，党旗就是战旗，各级党组织、广大党员干部、人民子弟兵坚决落实习近平总书记关于防汛救灾工作重要指示精神，迅速投身防汛抗洪抢险救灾第一线，成为灾区群众的主心骨、抗洪战斗的生力军。
HYP: Disaster situations are orders, disaster areas are battlefields, and in front of disasters, party flags are war flags. Party organizations at all levels, party members and cadres, and people's soldiers resolutely implement the important instructions of General Secretary Xi Jinping on flood control and disaster relief work, quickly join the front line of flood control, flood rescue and disaster relief, and become the backbone of the people in the disaster areas and a new force in the fight against floods.

SRC: 鲜艳的党旗在抗洪大堤上高高飘扬，是忠诚的体现，也是使命的召唤。
HYP: The bright party flag flying high on the flood-fighting levee is a manifestation of loyalty and a call for mission.

SRC: 灾害面前，一个党组织就是一座战斗堡垒，一名党员干部就是一面旗帜。
HYP: In the face of disasters, a party organization is a battle fortress, and a party member and cadre is a flag.

SRC: 在各地的抗洪一线，各级党组织、广大党员干部体现高度的对党忠诚，听从党中央号召，以“看我的”的行动、“跟我来”的步伐、“我先上”的勇气，筑起一座座冲不垮的钢铁堡垒，挺起一个个压不弯的中国脊梁。
HYP: On the front line of flood fighting in various places, party organizations and cadres of party members at all levels demonstrate a high degree of loyalty to the Party, listen to the call of the Party Central Committee, and build iron fortresses that cannot be washed down with the actions of " look at me, " the pace of " follow me, " and the courage of " I go first. "

SRC: 在各地的抗洪一线，各级党组织、广大党员干部体现高度的对党忠诚，听从党中央号召，以“看我的”的行动、“跟我来”的步伐、“我先上”的勇气，筑起一座座冲不垮的钢铁堡垒，<v>挺起一个个压不弯的中国脊梁</v>。
HYP: On the front line of flood fighting in various places, party organizations and cadres of party members at all levels demonstrate a high degree of loyalty to the Party, listen to the call of the Party Central Committee, and build iron fortresses that cannot be washed down with the actions of " look at me, " the pace of " follow me, " and the courage of " I go first. "

SRC: 鲜艳的党旗在抗洪大堤上高高飘扬，是阵地的坚守，也是冲锋的号角。
HYP: The bright party flag flying high on the flood-fighting levee is the adherence to the position and the horn of the charge.

SRC: 面对洪涝灾害，各级党组织迅速行动，吹响抗洪“冲锋号”，把鲜艳的党旗插在抗洪的大堤上，广大党员干部、人民子弟兵坚守在抗洪的阵地上，用“党旗在阵地就在”、“洪水不退永不收兵”的意志和行动，成为灾区群众最放心也最值得信赖的坚固屏障。
HYP: In the face of the flood, party organizations at all levels acted quickly, blew the " emergency call " for fighting the flood, and planted the bright party flag on the embankment for fighting the flood. Party members, cadres and people's soldiers adhered to the position of fighting the flood, and became the most reassuring and trustworthy solid barrier for the people in the disaster area with the will and actions of " the party flag is in the position " and " the flood will never retreat. "

SRC: 鲜艳的党旗在抗洪大堤上高高飘扬，是无私的奉献，也是责任的担当。
HYP: The bright party flag flying high on the flood-fighting levee is selfless dedication and responsibility.

SRC: 危难时刻，彰显党员本色，在人民群众生命财产受到严重威胁的时刻，党员干部、人民子弟兵舍小家、顾大家，无私奉献，敢于担当，把打赢防汛抗洪抢险救灾这场硬仗，作为全面检验能力、作风、素养的主战场、阅兵场，正是这种无私奉献和担当的精神，极大的鼓舞着灾区群众战胜灾情的信心和决心，凝聚起打赢防汛抗洪抢险救灾的强大精神力量。
HYP: At a time of crisis, it shows the true character of party members. At a time when people's lives and property are seriously threatened, party members and cadres, people's children and soldiers give up their families and take care of everyone, selfless dedication, dare to take responsibility, and take winning the tough battle of flood control, flood rescue and disaster relief as the main battlefield and military parade ground for comprehensively testing ability, style and literacy. It is this spirit of selfless dedication and responsibility that greatly encourages the confidence and determination of the people in the disaster-stricken areas to overcome the disaster, and gathers a strong spiritual force to win flood control, flood rescue and disaster relief.

SRC: “人民至上、生命至上”， 既在平时接受检验，更在关键时刻接受考验。
HYP: " People first and life first " is tested not only in peacetime, but also at critical moments.

SRC: 在抗洪大堤上，广大党员干部和人民子弟兵，要让人民群众随时随处都能看到鲜红的党旗、奋斗的身影、鼓励的声音，用洪水冲不垮的钢铁堤坝为党旗增辉添彩，让一面面鲜艳的党旗在抗洪大堤上高高飘扬！
HYP: On the flood-fighting levee, the cadres of the party members and the people's soldiers should let the people see the bright red party flag, the figure of struggle and the voice of encouragement everywhere at any time, use the steel levee that cannot be washed down by the flood to add luster to the party flag, and let the bright party flag fly high on the flood-fighting levee!

SRC: APEC成员贸易部长会议表示将加速推动区域经济复苏-新华网
HYP: APEC member trade ministers said they will accelerate regional economic recovery-Xinhuanet

SRC: 新华社吉隆坡7月25日电（记者林昊）亚太经合组织（APEC）成员贸易部长视频会议25日举行，会议承诺将致力于减少新冠疫情对本区域经济的影响，加速推动实现具有弹性、可持续性和包容性的区域经济复苏。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Kuala Lumpur, July 25 (Reporter Lin Hao) The video conference of trade ministers of APEC members was held on the 25th. The meeting pledged to work to reduce the impact of the COVID-19 epidemic on the regional economy and accelerate the realization of a resilient, sustainable and inclusive regional economic recovery.

SRC: 会议由今年APEC领导人<v>非正式</v>会议主办方马来西亚主持。
HYP: The meeting was hosted by Malaysia, the host of this year's APEC Economic Leaders' Meeting.

SRC: 会后发表的联合声明表示，APEC成员贸易部长认识到，在这一具有挑战性的时刻，一个自由、开放、公平、非歧视、透明和可预测的贸易和投资环境对于推动经济复苏的重要性。
HYP: The joint statement issued after the meeting said that the trade ministers of APEC members recognized the importance of a free, open, fair, non-discriminatory, transparent and predictable trade and investment environment to promote economic recovery at this challenging time.

SRC: 各方承诺，确保为应对疫情所采取的紧急措施是具有针对性、恰当、透明和临时的，不会制造不必要的贸易壁垒并扰乱全球供应链，同时遵守世界贸易组织规则。
HYP: All parties undertake to ensure that the emergency measures taken to deal with the epidemic are targeted, appropriate, transparent and temporary, do not create unnecessary trade barriers and disrupt global supply chains, and abide by the rules of the World Trade Organization.

SRC: APEC成员贸易部长在声明中承诺，加强合作促进必要的商品和服务流动，通过加强供应链弹性促进互联互通，将医疗物资、食品和农业产品流动所受到的干扰最小化，以应对疫情。
HYP: In the statement, the trade ministers of APEC members pledged to strengthen cooperation to promote the flow of necessary goods and services, promote connectivity by strengthening supply chain flexibility, and minimize interference in the flow of medical supplies, food and agricultural products in order to deal with the epidemic.

SRC: APEC成员贸易部长一致认为，有必要讨论如何减少限制必要商品贸易的非关税壁垒，重申将致力于在不影响为阻止疫情蔓延所采取措施的情况下促进必要的跨境人员流动。
HYP: The trade ministers of APEC members agreed that it is necessary to discuss how to reduce non-tariff barriers that restrict the trade of necessary goods, and reiterated their commitment to promoting the necessary cross-border movement of people without affecting the measures taken to stop the spread of the epidemic.

SRC: 会议还发布了有关促进必要商品流通的宣言。
HYP: The meeting also issued a declaration on promoting the circulation of necessary commodities.

SRC: 宣言表示，各经济体将确保其为应对疫情所采取的贸易措施符合世贸组织规定，并承诺在减少非关税贸易壁垒、贸易促进等方面采取行动，以促进疫情下必要的商品流动。
HYP: The declaration stated that all economies will ensure that the trade measures they take in response to the epidemic are in line with WTO regulations, and pledged to take actions in reducing non-tariff trade barriers and trade promotion to promote the necessary commodity flow under the epidemic.

SRC: 主持会议的马来西亚国际贸易和工业部部长阿兹明·阿里表示，尽管受到疫情影响，马来西亚依然致力于推动今年APEC会议取得成功，制定APEC2020年后合作愿景的工作正有序推进。
HYP: Azmin Ali, Minister of International Trade and Industry of Malaysia, who chaired the meeting, said that despite the impact of the epidemic, Malaysia is still committed to promoting the success of this year's APEC meeting, and the work of formulating the APEC post-2020 cooperation vision is progressing in an orderly manner.

SRC: 马来西亚同意以视频形式举行APEC相关会议，但不排除在年底APEC领导人非正式会议时安排实体会议的可能性。
HYP: Malaysia agrees to hold APEC-related meetings by video, but does not rule out the possibility of arranging physical meetings during the informal APEC leaders' meeting at the end of the year.

SRC: 江西财政紧急下达2.8亿元资金支持各地灾后救助重建-中新网
HYP: Jiangxi Finance urgently issued 280 million yuan to support post-disaster relief and reconstruction in various places-Chinanews.com

SRC: 7月24日，江西省九江市湖口县，驰援当地抗洪的中国人民解放军第71集团军某部官兵利用备勤间隙，帮助湖口县一蔬菜种植专业合作社抢收辣椒。
HYP: On July 24, in Hukou County, Jiujiang City, Jiangxi Province, officers and soldiers of the 71st Army Group of the Chinese People's Liberation Army who helped the local flood fighting took advantage of the standby gap to help a vegetable growing cooperative in Hukou County grab chili peppers.

SRC: 受此前强降雨影响，该合作社种植的上百亩红辣椒受灾严重，如不及时采摘损失会更加扩大。
HYP: Affected by the previous heavy rainfall, hundreds of acres of red chili peppers planted by the cooperative were seriously affected, and the losses would be even greater if they were not picked in time.

SRC: 中新社记者富田摄
HYP: Photo by China News Service reporter Futian

SRC: 中新网南昌7月26日电(袁汝晶)江西省财政厅26日消息，根据江西省防汛抗旱指挥部的工作部署和要求，该省财政紧急下达中央和省级救灾资金2.8亿元，为防汛抢险和受灾群众救助工作提供资金保障。
HYP: China News Service, Nanchang, July 26 (Yuan Rujing) Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance reported on the 26th that according to the work deployment and requirements of Jiangxi Provincial Flood Control and Drought Relief Headquarters, the provincial finance urgently issued 280 million yuan of central and provincial disaster relief funds to provide financial guarantee for flood control and rescue work and disaster relief work.

SRC: 7月份以来，江西汛期、灾情不断升级。
HYP: Since July, the flood season and disaster situation in Jiangxi have been escalating.

SRC: 洪涝灾害已导致该省农业农村直接经济损失100.7亿元、受灾面积1316.9万亩。
HYP: The floods have caused the province's agricultural and rural direct economic losses of 10.07 billion yuan and affected an area of 13.169 million mu.

SRC: 7月17和7月22日，江西省财政先后下达中央救灾资金6000万元和2亿元。
HYP: On July 17 and July 22, Jiangxi Provincial Finance issued 60 million yuan and 200 million yuan of central disaster relief funds respectively.

SRC: 同时根据灾情变化情况，从该省应急管理专项资金中连续分3批下达省级救灾资金2030万元，支持各地灾后救助和恢复重建。
HYP: At the same time, according to the changes of the disaster situation, 20.3 million yuan of provincial disaster relief funds were issued in three batches from the provincial emergency management special funds to support post-disaster relief, recovery and reconstruction in various places.

SRC: 江西省财政厅相关负责人26日称，在汛期到来之前，已下达各类防灾减灾资金1.73亿元，确保风险防患早发现、早处置、早化解，为抗洪抢险工作提供经费支持。
HYP: The relevant person in charge of Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance said on the 26th that before the flood season, 173 million yuan of various disaster prevention and mitigation funds had been issued to ensure early detection, early disposal and early resolution of risks, and to provide financial support for flood fighting and rescue work.

SRC: 目前，长江江西段和中国最大淡水湖鄱阳湖水位呈高位缓退状态。
HYP: At present, the water level of Jiangxi section of the Yangtze River and Poyang Lake, the largest freshwater lake in China, is in a state of high and slow retreat.

SRC: 江西省防指于24日18时，将防汛应急响应下调至Ⅱ级；将省级救灾应急响应级别由II级调整为III级。
HYP: Jiangxi Provincial Defense Index lowered the flood control emergency response to level II at 18: 00 on the 24th, and adjusted the provincial disaster relief emergency response level from level II to level III.

SRC: 灾情评估和灾后恢复重建等各项工作将持续进行。
HYP: Disaster assessment and post-disaster recovery and reconstruction will continue.

SRC: 国家卫健委：7月25日新增确诊病例46例，新疆22例辽宁13例- 经济观察网
HYP: National Health Commission: 46 new confirmed cases on July 25, 22 cases in Xinjiang and 13 cases in Liaoning-Economic Observation Network

SRC: 据国家卫生健康委员会消息，7月25日0—24时，31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增确诊病例46例，其中境外输入病例11例（内蒙古5例，广东3例，天津1例，福建1例，山东1例），本土病例35例（新疆22例，辽宁13例）；无新增死亡病例；新增疑似病例2例，均为境外输入病例（内蒙古1例，上海1例） 。
HYP: According to the National Health and Health Commission, from 0: 00 to 24: 00 on July 25, 31 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government) and the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 46 new confirmed cases, including 11 imported cases (5 cases in Inner Mongolia, 3 cases in Guangdong, 1 case in Tianjin, 1 case in Fujian and 1 case in Shandong) and 35 local cases (22 cases in Xinjiang and 13 cases in Liaoning); there were no new deaths; 2 new suspected cases, all imported cases (1 case in Inner Mongolia and 1 case in Shanghai).

SRC: 当日新增治愈出院病例19例，解除医学观察的密切接触者673人，重症病例较前一日增加7例。
HYP: On the same day, 19 new cases were cured and discharged, 673 close contacts were released from medical observation, and the number of severe cases increased by 7 compared with the previous day.

SRC: 境外输入现有确诊病例82例（其中重症病例2例），现有疑似病例3例。
HYP: There are 82 confirmed cases imported from abroad (including 2 severe cases) and 3 suspected cases.

SRC: 累计确诊病例2045例，累计治愈出院病例1963例，无死亡病例。
HYP: A total of 2045 cases were confirmed, 1963 cases were cured and discharged, and there were no deaths.

SRC: 截至7月25日24时，据31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告，现有确诊病例288例（其中重症病例18例），累计治愈出院病例78908例，累计死亡病例4634例，累计报告确诊病例83830例，现有疑似病例3例。
HYP: As of 24: 00 on July 25, according to reports from 31 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government) and the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps, there were 288 confirmed cases (including 18 serious cases), a total of 78908 cured and discharged cases, a total of 4634 deaths, a total of 83830 confirmed cases and 3 suspected cases.

SRC: 累计追踪到密切接触者779000人，尚在医学观察的密切接触者11762人。
HYP: A total of 779000 close contacts have been tracked, and 11762 close contacts are still under medical observation.

SRC: 31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增无症状感染者68例（境外输入8例）；当日转为确诊病例17例（无境外输入） ；当日解除医学观察10例（境外输入7例）；尚在医学观察无症状感染者292例（境外输入91例）。
HYP: Thirty-one provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government) and the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 68 new asymptomatic infections (8 imported from abroad); 17 cases were confirmed on the same day (no imported from abroad); 10 cases were released from medical observation on the same day (7 imported from abroad); 292 cases of asymptomatic infections were still under medical observation (91 imported from abroad).

SRC: 累计收到港澳台地区通报确诊病例3009例。
HYP: A total of 3009 confirmed cases were reported from Hong Kong, Macao and Taiwan.

SRC: 其中，香港特别行政区2505例（出院1455例，死亡18例），澳门特别行政区46例（出院46例），台湾地区458例（出院440例，死亡7例）。
HYP: Among them, there were 2505 cases in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region (1455 cases discharged and 18 deaths), 46 cases in the Macao Special Administrative Region (46 cases discharged) and 458 cases in Taiwan (440 cases discharged and 7 deaths).

SRC: 专家说通过美国人口普查收集移民资料用于众院席位分配违宪
HYP: Experts say it is unconstitutional to collect immigration data through the US Census for the allocation of seats in the House of Representatives

SRC: 一些民权组织和好几个美国城市和县对美国联邦政府提出起诉，称特朗普总统府试图将无证移民排除在美国人口普查之外是行不通的，也是违宪的。
HYP: Some civil rights organizations and several American cities and counties have filed a lawsuit against the US federal government, saying that the Trump presidential palace's attempt to exclude undocumented immigrants from the US census is unworkable and unconstitutional.

SRC: 美国人口普查将决定美国国会众议院席位的分配。
HYP: The US Census will determine the allocation of seats in the US House of Representatives.

SRC: 美国民权自由联盟执行律师萨拉·布兰农对美国之音说，“这么做是行不通的。”
HYP: " This will not work, " Sarah Brannon, an executive lawyer for the American Civil Liberties Union, told VOA.

SRC: 她接着说，特朗普要求在人口普查中确定接受普查的人的公民身份难以做到，而且“不是很可靠。”
HYP: She went on to say that Trump's request to determine the citizenship of people surveyed in the census is difficult to do and " not very reliable. "

SRC: 另一个公民自由组织共同事业组织星期四提出诉讼，对特朗普的行政令提出挑战。
HYP: Another civil liberties group, Common Cause, filed a lawsuit Thursday challenging Trump's executive order.

SRC: 新泽西州、乔治亚州的一些城市加入了诉讼。
HYP: Some cities in New Jersey and Georgia joined the lawsuit.

SRC: 维吉尼亚州的阿灵顿县星期五也加入了诉讼。
HYP: Arlington County, Virginia, also joined the lawsuit Friday.

SRC: 阿灵顿县的管理董事会主席加维说，“美国宪法要求每10年准确地清点我们的人口。我们必须准确地清点居住在阿灵顿县的每一个人，不能让这种非法试图吓跑人和压缩我们的移民社区人数的做法得逞。”
HYP: Garvey, chairman of the Arlington County Management Board, said, " The United States Constitution requires an accurate count of our population every 10 years. We must accurately count everyone living in Arlington County. This illegal attempt to scare people away and reduce the number of our immigrant community cannot be allowed to succeed. "

SRC: 另一些组织和个人则赞扬特朗普总统的行政令。
HYP: Other organizations and individuals praised President Trump's executive order.

SRC: 阿拉巴马州司法部长马歇尔称，该行政令是该州的一个“胜利”。
HYP: Alabama Attorney General Marshall called the executive order a " victory " for the state.

SRC: 他说，“分配各州的国会众议院席位和选举团席位的时候，必须根据居住在各州的居民人数，而且是合法居住的居民的人数。”
HYP: " The allocation of seats in the House of Representatives and electoral college seats in each state must be based on the number of residents living in each state and the number of residents living legally, " he said.

SRC: 美国最高法院去年阻止了特朗普行政当局将公民身份问题纳入2020年人口普查表中。
HYP: The US Supreme Court last year blocked the Trump administration from including the issue of citizenship in the 2020 census.

SRC: 特朗普总统本星期早些时候签署一项行政令，指令监管美国人口普查局的商业部长罗斯提交人口普查所得的无证人口的数据，以便行政当局将这些无证人口排除在各州的人口普查数字之外，并以此确定每个州究竟是增加还是减少或保持众议院议员席位。
HYP: President Trump signed an executive order earlier this week instructing Commerce Secretary Ross, who oversees the US Census Bureau, to submit data on undocumented people from the census so that the administration can exclude these undocumented people from state census figures and determine whether each state increases, decreases or maintains seats in the House of Representatives.

SRC: 美国每隔10年就要根据人口变化情况重新分配众议院席位。
HYP: The United States redistributes seats in the House of Representatives every 10 years according to demographic changes.

SRC: 新书爆料：哈利王子觉得哥哥“势利傲慢”
HYP: The new book reveals that Prince Harry thinks his brother is " snobbish and arrogant "

SRC: 英国《泰晤士报》和《星期日泰晤士报》连载名为《寻找自由》（Finding Freedom）的新书，内容描绘哈利王子（Prince Harry）与妻子梅根（Meghan Markle）的王室生活心路历程。
HYP: The British Times and Sunday Times serialized a new book called Finding Freedom, which depicts the royal life of Prince Harry and his wife, Megan Markle.

SRC: 但路透社报导，哈利和梅根已和这本书撇清关系，说他们未接受作者访问，也未提供任何内容。
HYP: But Reuters reported that Harry and Megan had disassociated themselves from the book, saying they had not been interviewed by the author or provided any content.

SRC: 《星期日泰晤士报》报导，新书引述消息人士表示，哈利和梅根婚前约会时，威廉王子（Prince William）想确认原是好莱坞女星的梅根对哈利是否别有用心。
HYP: The Sunday Times reported that the new book quoted sources as saying that when Harry and Megan were dating before marriage, Prince William wanted to confirm whether Megan, a former Hollywood actress, had ulterior motives for Harry.

SRC: 根据消息人士转述，威廉当时曾对哈利说：“你别感觉有必要仓促（娶梅根）。
HYP: According to the source, William said to Harry at the time: " Don't feel the need to rush (marry Megan).

SRC: 你可以<v>尽量</v>花时间去了解这个女孩。”
HYP: You can take the time to get to know this girl. "

SRC: 报导说，当哈利听到威廉用“这个女孩”形容梅根，他从哥哥语气中感受到傲慢势利，他也认为自己不再需要他人照顾<v>提醒</v>。
HYP: The report said that when Harry heard William use " this girl " to describe Megan, he felt arrogant and snobbish from his brother's tone, and he also thought he no longer needed to be taken care of.

SRC: 报导说，当哈利听到威廉用“这个女孩”形容梅根，他从哥哥语气中感受到傲慢势利，他也认为自己不再需要他人照顾提醒。
HYP: The report said that when Harry heard William use " this girl " to describe Megan, he felt arrogant and snobbish from his brother's tone, and he also thought he no longer needed to be taken care of.

SRC: 哈利和梅根今年1月宣布计划过更独立的生活，并将自食其力。
HYP: Harry and Megan announced in January that they plan to live a more independent life and will support themselves.

SRC: 两人3月正式卸下王室高阶成员身分后，目前带著儿子亚契（Archie）住在美国洛杉矶追求新事业。
HYP: After officially retiring as senior members of the royal family in March, the two are currently living in Los Angeles with their son Archie to pursue a new career.

SRC: 哈利和梅根在2018年5月结婚。
HYP: Harry and Megan married in May 2018.

SRC: 当时这场婚姻被视为为英国王室注入好莱坞的光鲜亮丽和新时代气息，两人也因此成为当代全球最受瞩目的名人夫妻档之一。
HYP: At that time, the marriage was seen as injecting Hollywood splendor and new era atmosphere into the British royal family, and the two became one of the most watched celebrity couples in the world.

SRC: 越南驻老挝大使馆公使衔参赞郑氏心、在老挝越南佛教协会、老挝越南人总会、万象省政府代表、老挝老兵协会等代表一同参加了祭奠仪式。
HYP: Zheng Shixin, Minister Counsellor of the Vietnamese Embassy in Laos, representatives of the Vietnamese Buddhist Association in Laos, the Lao Vietnamese Association, the Vientiane Provincial Government, and the Lao Veterans Association attended the ceremony.

SRC: 英烈祭奠仪式在庄严肃穆的气氛中举行，各位代表陆续向英烈们上香，缅怀英烈们的丰功伟绩及越老特殊团结关系。
HYP: The dedication ceremony was held in a solemn atmosphere. Delegates offered incense to the heroes one after another, remembering their great achievements and the special solidarity relationship between the elderly and the elderly.

SRC: 公使衔参赞郑氏心在讲话中表示，这是在老越南人和老挝人民共同缅怀两国革命英烈，一起对为两国独立自由牺牲的英烈表达感恩之心的机会，同时也是两国人民回顾两国并肩协作打击共同敌人，争取民族独立，国家统一，共同建设国家发展，巩固两国关系的良好机会。
HYP: Minister Counsellor Zheng Shixin said in his speech that this is an opportunity for the old Vietnamese and Lao people to jointly remember the revolutionary heroes of the two countries and express their gratitude to the heroes who died for the independence and freedom of the two countries. At the same time, it is also a good opportunity for the two peoples to recall that the two countries work together to fight the common enemy, strive for national independence, national reunification, jointly build national development and consolidate bilateral relations.

SRC: 74年前的1946年1月23日， 老越战斗联盟的28名战士在进攻Phonehe据点时英勇牺牲。
HYP: Seventy-four years ago, on January 23, 1946, 28 soldiers of the Lao-Vietnam Combat Alliance died bravely while attacking the Phonehe stronghold.

SRC: 此次进攻取得胜利，成为两国在争取民族解放革命斗争初期阶段的具有历史性意义的胜利。
HYP: The victory of this attack became a historic victory for the two countries in the early stage of the revolutionary struggle for national liberation.

SRC: 郑氏心女士强调，两国人民永远铭记为两国民族解放斗争事业牺牲的各位英烈，同时强调两国年轻一带将继续发扬老前辈英勇、坚强的传统，为越老关系持续开花结果及两国的繁荣发展作出应有的贡献。
HYP: Ms. Zheng Shixin stressed that the two peoples will always remember all the heroes who died for the cause of the national liberation struggle of the two countries. At the same time, she stressed that the young areas of the two countries will continue to carry forward the heroic and strong tradition of their predecessors and make due contributions to the continued flowering of Vietnam-Laos relations and the prosperity and development of the two countries.

SRC: 郑氏心女士强调，两国人民永远铭记为两国民族解放斗争事业牺牲的各位英烈，同时强调两国年轻<v>一带</v>将继续发扬老前辈英勇、坚强的传统，为越老关系持续开花结果及两国的繁荣发展作出应有的贡献。
HYP: Ms. Zheng Shixin stressed that the two peoples will always remember all the heroes who died for the cause of the national liberation struggle of the two countries. At the same time, she stressed that the young areas of the two countries will continue to carry forward the heroic and strong tradition of their predecessors and make due contributions to the continued flowering of Vietnam-Laos relations and the prosperity and development of the two countries.

SRC: 里程碑式跨越！
HYP: Milestone leap!

SRC: 国际米兰解锁第3000场意甲比赛-中新网
HYP: Inter Milan Unlock 3000th Serie A Match-Chinanews.com

SRC: 中新网客户端7月26日电北京时间26日凌晨，意甲传统豪门国际米兰迎来了里程碑之战。
HYP: China News Service, July 26 (Beijing time) In the early morning of the 26th, the traditional Serie A giant Inter Milan ushered in a milestone battle.

SRC: 据意大利媒体统计，客场对阵热那亚一役是国际米兰队史第3000场意甲联赛，蓝黑军团也是首个解锁这项里程碑的球队。
HYP: According to Italian media statistics, the away game against Genoa is the 3000th Serie A game in the history of Inter Milan, and the Nerazzurri are also the first team to unlock this milestone.

SRC: 自1929年联赛改制以来，国际米兰是唯一一支从未缺席意甲的队伍，也是唯一一支从未降级的球队。
HYP: Since the league restructuring in 1929, Inter Milan is the only team that has never been absent from Serie A and the only team that has never been relegated.

SRC: 据意大利媒体报道，国际米兰与热那亚的比赛是蓝黑军团队史第3000场比赛。
HYP: According to Italian media reports, the match between Inter Milan and Genoa is the 3000th game in the history of the Nerazzurri team.

SRC: 在这场里程碑之战中，国际米兰客场三球完胜热那亚。
HYP: In this landmark battle, Inter Milan beat Genoa with three goals away.

SRC: 此役卢卡库梅开二度，替补出场的桑切斯也贡献一球。
HYP: Lukacumé scored twice in this game, and substitute Sánchez also contributed a goal.

SRC: 比赛从一开始就进入了国际米兰的节奏，强攻终于在第34分钟转化为进球。
HYP: The game entered the rhythm of Inter Milan from the beginning, and the strong attack finally turned into a goal in the 34th minute.

SRC: 比拉吉左路传中，卢卡库中路包抄头球破门。
HYP: In Bilagi's left pass, Lukaku scored the goal with a header in the middle.

SRC: 第82分钟国际米兰如法炮制，摩西右路突破后传中，桑切斯中路包抄推射得手；终场前卢卡库完成梅开二度，反击中布罗佐维奇送出长距离直塞，卢卡库突入禁区晃过罗梅罗后推射空门得分，将比分定格在3：0。
HYP: In the 82nd minute, Inter Milan did the same. Moses broke through on the right and passed through, and Sánchez made a successful push in the middle. Before the end of the game, Lukaku scored twice, and Brozovic sent a long-distance direct plug in the counter-attack. Lukaku burst into the penalty area and swung past Romero and then pushed an empty goal to score, setting the score at 3: 0.

SRC: 国际米兰客场3：0完胜热那亚，积分反超亚特兰大上升至第2，在多赛一场的情况下落后领头羊尤文图斯4分，仍保留着争冠希望。
HYP: Inter Milan beat Genoa 3-0 away, surpassing Atlanta to second place in points, four points behind leader Juventus in one more game, and still retain the hope of winning the championship.

SRC: 至此，在这跨越近90载光阴的3000场意甲联赛中，国际米兰赢得了其中的1489场，打平834场，输掉677场，胜率为49.6%。
HYP: So far, in the 3000 Serie A games spanning nearly 90 years, Inter Milan have won 1489 of them, tied 834 and lost 677, with a winning rate of 49.6%.

SRC: 其间，球队共打进5038球，丢3102球，场均打进1.68球。
HYP: During this period, the team scored 5038 goals and lost 3102 goals, averaging 1.68 goals per game.

SRC: 蓝黑军团18次获得联赛冠军，并且从未降级。
HYP: The Nerazzurri have won the league 18 times and have never been relegated.

SRC: 谍战剧老面孔柳云龙演一个结巴男主角-新华网
HYP: Liu Yunlong, the old face of spy drama, plays a stuttering hero-Xinhuanet

SRC: 由柳云龙监制、殷飞执导,柳云龙、苏青、梁冠华、李立群等主演的大型谍战剧《胜算》, 于7月16日晚7:30登陆广东卫视“活力剧场” 。
