SRC: 7月24日，江西省九江市湖口县，驰援当地抗洪的中国人民解放军第71集团军某部官兵利用备勤间隙，帮助湖口县一蔬菜种植专业合作社抢收辣椒。
HYP: On July 24, in Hukou County, Jiujiang City, Jiangxi Province, officers and soldiers of a certain unit of the 71st Group Army of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, who were assisting the local flood fighting, took advantage of the spare time to help a vegetable planting cooperative in Hukou County grab peppers.

SRC: 受此前强降雨影响，该合作社种植的上百亩红辣椒受灾严重，如不及时采摘损失会更加扩大。
HYP: Affected by the previous heavy rainfall, hundreds of mu of red peppers planted by the cooperative were seriously affected, and the losses would increase if they were not picked in time.

SRC: 中新社记者富田摄
HYP: Photo by China News Agency reporter Tomita

SRC: 中新网南昌7月26日电(袁汝晶)江西省财政厅26日消息，根据江西省防汛抗旱指挥部的工作部署和要求，该省财政紧急下达中央和省级救灾资金2.8亿元，为防汛抢险和受灾群众救助工作提供资金保障。
HYP: China News Service, Nanchang, July 26 (Yuan Rujing) The Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance reported on the 26th that according to the work deployment and requirements of the Jiangxi Provincial Flood Control and Drought Relief Headquarters, the province's finance emergency issued a central and provincial disaster relief funds of 280 million yuan to provide financial guarantee for flood control and rescue and relief work for the disaster-stricken people.

SRC: 7月份以来，江西汛期、<v>灾情</v>不断升级。
HYP: Since July, the flood season in Jiangxi has been escalating.

SRC: 洪涝灾害已导致该省农业农村直接经济损失100.7亿元、受灾面积1316.9万亩。
HYP: Flood disasters have caused direct economic losses of 10.07 billion yuan in agriculture and rural areas in the province, and the affected area is 13.169 million mu.

SRC: 7月17和7月22日，江西省财政先后下达中央救灾资金6000万元和2亿元。
HYP: On July 17 and July 22, Jiangxi Provincial Finance successively issued a central disaster relief fund of 60 million yuan and 200 million yuan.

SRC: 同时根据灾情变化情况，从该省应急管理专项资金中连续分3批下达省级救灾资金2030万元，支持各地灾后救助和恢复重建。
HYP: At the same time, according to the changes of the disaster situation, 20.3 million yuan of provincial disaster relief funds were issued in three consecutive batches from the province's emergency management special funds to support post-disaster relief and recovery and reconstruction.

SRC: 江西省财政厅相关负责人26日称，在汛期到来之前，已下达各类防灾减灾资金1.73亿元，确保风险防患早发现、早处置、早化解，为抗洪抢险工作提供经费支持。
HYP: The relevant person in charge of the Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance said on the 26th that before the arrival of the flood season, 173 million yuan of various disaster prevention and mitigation funds had been issued to ensure early detection, early disposal and early resolution of risk prevention, and provide financial support for flood relief work.

SRC: 目前，长江江西段和中国最大淡水湖鄱阳湖水位呈高位缓退状态。
HYP: At present, the water level of the Jiangxi section of the Yangtze River and Poyang Lake, the largest freshwater lake in China, is at a high level and slowly retreats.

SRC: 江西省防指于24日18时，将防汛应急响应下调至Ⅱ级；将省级救灾应急响应级别由II级调整为III级。
HYP: At 18:00 on the 24th, the Jiangxi Provincial Prevention and Control Index lowered the flood control emergency response to level II; the provincial disaster relief emergency response level was adjusted from level II to level III.

SRC: 灾情评估和灾后恢复重建等各项工作将持续进行。
HYP: Various work such as disaster assessment and post-disaster recovery and reconstruction will continue.

SRC: 国家卫健委：7月25日新增确诊病例46例，新疆22例辽宁13例- 经济观察网
HYP: National Health Commission: 46 new confirmed cases on July 25, 22 in Xinjiang and 13 in Liaoning - Economic Observer

SRC: 据国家卫生健康委员会消息，7月25日0—24时，31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增确诊病例46例，其中境外输入病例11例（内蒙古5例，广东3例，天津1例，福建1例，山东1例），本土病例35例（新疆22例，辽宁13例）；无新增死亡病例；新增疑似病例2例，均为境外输入病例（内蒙古1例，上海1例） 。
HYP: According to the National Health Commission, from 0 to 24:00 on July 25, 31 provinces (autonomous regions, municipalities) and the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 46 new confirmed cases, including 11 imported cases (5 in Inner Mongolia, 3 in Guangdong, 1 in Tianjin, 1 in Fujian, 1 in Shandong), 35 local cases (22 in Xinjiang and 13 in Liaoning); no new deaths; 2 new suspected imported cases (1 in Inner Mongolia).

SRC: 据国家卫生健康委员会消息，7月25日0—24时，31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增确诊病例46例，其中境外输入病例11例（内蒙古5例，广东3例，天津1例，福建1例，山东1例），本土病例35例（新疆22例，辽宁13例）；无新增死亡病例；新增疑似病例2例，均为境外输入病例（内蒙古1例，<v>上海1例</v>） 。
HYP: According to the National Health Commission, from 0 to 24:00 on July 25, 31 provinces (autonomous regions, municipalities) and the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 46 new confirmed cases, including 11 imported cases (5 in Inner Mongolia, 3 in Guangdong, 1 in Tianjin, 1 in Fujian, 1 in Shandong), 35 local cases (22 in Xinjiang and 13 in Liaoning); no new deaths; 2 new suspected imported cases (1 in Inner Mongolia).

SRC: 当日新增治愈出院病例19例，解除医学观察的密切接触者673人，重症病例较前一日增加7例。
HYP: On the same day, 19 new cases were cured and discharged, 673 close contacts were released from medical observation, and 7 severe cases were increased from the previous day.

SRC: 境外输入现有确诊病例82例（其中重症病例2例），现有疑似病例3例。
HYP: There are 82 confirmed cases imported from abroad (including 2 severe cases) and 3 suspected cases.

SRC: 累计确诊病例2045例，累计治愈出院病例1963例，无死亡病例。
HYP: A total of 2045 confirmed cases, 1963 cured and discharged cases, and no deaths.

SRC: 截至7月25日24时，据31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告，现有确诊病例288例（其中重症病例18例），累计治愈出院病例78908例，累计死亡病例4634例，累计报告确诊病例83830例，现有疑似病例3例。
HYP: As of 24:00 on July 25, according to reports from 31 provinces (autonomous regions, municipalities) and the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps, there are 288 confirmed cases (including 18 severe cases), a total of 78908 cured and discharged cases, a total of 4634 deaths, a total of 83830 reported confirmed cases, and 3 suspected cases.

SRC: 累计追踪到密切接触者779000人，尚在医学观察的密切接触者11762人。
HYP: A total of 779000 close contacts have been traced, and 11762 close contacts are still under medical observation.

SRC: 31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增无症状感染者68例（境外输入8例）；当日转为确诊病例17例（无境外输入） ；当日解除医学观察10例（境外输入7例）；尚在医学观察无症状感染者292例（境外输入91例）。
HYP: 31 provinces (autonomous regions, municipalities directly under the Central Government) and the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 68 new cases of asymptomatic infection (8 cases imported from abroad); 17 cases were converted to confirmed cases on the same day (no foreign imports); 10 cases were released from medical observation on the same day (7 cases were imported from abroad); 292 cases of asymptomatic infection are still under medical observation (91 cases imported from abroad).

SRC: 累计收到港澳台地区通报确诊病例3009例。
HYP: A total of 3009 confirmed cases have been reported from Hong Kong, Macao and Taiwan.

SRC: 其中，香港特别行政区2505例（出院1455例，死亡18例），澳门特别行政区46例（出院46例），台湾地区458例（出院440例，死亡7例）。
HYP: Among them, 2505 cases were in Hong Kong Special Administrative Region (1455 cases were discharged, 18 cases died), 46 cases were in Macao Special Administrative Region (46 cases were discharged), and 458 cases were in Taiwan (440 cases were discharged, 7 cases died).

SRC: 专家说通过美国人口普查收集移民资料用于众院席位分配违宪
HYP: Experts say collection of immigration data through US Census for House seat allocation is unconstitutional

SRC: 一些民权组织和好几个美国城市和县对美国联邦政府提出起诉，称特朗普总统府试图将无证移民排除在美国人口普查之外是行不通的，也是违宪的。
HYP: Civil rights groups and several US cities and counties have sued the US federal government, saying the Trump administration's attempts to exclude undocumented immigrants from the US census are unworkable and unconstitutional.

SRC: <v>一些</v>民权组织和好几个美国城市和县对美国联邦政府提出起诉，称特朗普总统府试图将无证移民排除在美国人口普查之外是行不通的，也是违宪的。
HYP: Civil rights groups and several US cities and counties have sued the US federal government, saying the Trump administration's attempts to exclude undocumented immigrants from the US census are unworkable and unconstitutional.

SRC: 美国人口普查将决定美国国会众议院席位的分配。
HYP: The US Census will determine the distribution of seats in the US House of Representatives.

SRC: 美国民权自由联盟执行律师萨拉·布兰农对美国之音说，“这么做是行不通的。”
HYP: "It's not going to work," ACLU executive attorney Sarah Brannon told VOA.

SRC: 她接着说，特朗普要求在人口普查中确定接受普查的人的公民身份难以做到，而且“不是很可靠。”
HYP: She went on to say that Trump's requirement to determine the citizenship status of those taking the census in the census is difficult and "not very reliable."

SRC: 另一个公民自由组织共同事业组织星期四提出诉讼，对特朗普的行政令提出挑战。
HYP: Another civil liberties group, Common Cause, filed a lawsuit Thursday challenging Trump's executive order.

SRC: 新泽西州、乔治亚州的<v>一些</v>城市加入了诉讼。
HYP: Cities in New Jersey and Georgia joined the lawsuit.

SRC: 维吉尼亚州的阿灵顿县星期五也加入了诉讼。
HYP: Arlington County, Virginia, also joined the lawsuit Friday.

SRC: 阿灵顿县的管理董事会主席加维说，“美国宪法要求每10年准确地清点我们的人口。我们必须准确地清点居住在阿灵顿县的每一个人，不能让这种非法试图吓跑人和压缩我们的移民社区人数的做法得逞。”
HYP: "The US Constitution requires an accurate count of our population every 10 years," said Garvey, chairman of the Arlington County Board of Management. "We must accurately count everyone who lives in Arlington County and not allow this illegal attempt to scare away and shrink our immigrant community."

SRC: 另一些组织和个人则赞扬特朗普总统的行政令。
HYP: Other groups and individuals praised President Trump's executive order.

SRC: 阿拉巴马州司法部长马歇尔称，该行政令是该州的一个“胜利”。
HYP: Alabama Attorney General Marshall called the executive order a "victory" for the state.

SRC: 他说，“分配各州的国会众议院席位和选举团席位的时候，必须根据居住在各州的居民人数，而且是合法居住的居民的人数。”
HYP: "The allocation of House and Electoral College seats in each state must be based on the number of residents living in each state and the number of residents who are legally resident," he said.

SRC: 美国最高法院去年阻止了特朗普行政当局将公民身份问题纳入2020年人口普查表中。
HYP: The US Supreme Court last year blocked the Trump administration from including a citizenship question on the 2020 census form.

SRC: 特朗普总统本星期早些时候签署一项行政令，指令监管美国人口普查局的商业部长罗斯提交人口普查所得的无证人口的数据，以便行政当局将这些无证人口排除在各州的人口普查数字之外，并以此确定每个州究竟是增加还是减少或保持众议院议员席位。
HYP: President Donald Trump signed an executive order earlier this week directing Commerce Secretary Ross, who oversees the US Census Bureau, to submit census data on the undocumented population so that the administration can exclude those undocumented people from state census numbers and use that to determine whether each state is gaining, losing or maintaining House seats.

SRC: 美国每隔10年就要根据人口变化情况重新分配众议院席位。
HYP: The United States redistributes House seats every 10 years based on demographic changes.

SRC: 新书爆料：哈利王子觉得哥哥“势利傲慢”
HYP: New book reveals: Prince Harry thinks brother is 'snobbish'

SRC: 英国《泰晤士报》和《星期日泰晤士报》连载名为《寻找自由》（Finding Freedom）的新书，内容描绘哈利王子（Prince Harry）与妻子梅根（Meghan Markle）的王室生活心路历程。
HYP: The Times and The Sunday Times have published a new book titled "Finding Freedom," which describes the royal journey of Prince Harry and his wife Meghan Markle.

SRC: 但路透社报导，哈利和梅根已和这本书撇清关系，说他们未接受作者访问，也未提供任何内容。
HYP: But Reuters reported that Harry and Meghan had disassociate themselves from the book, saying they had not been interviewed by the author or provided any content.

SRC: 《星期日泰晤士报》报导，新书引述消息人士表示，哈利和梅根婚前约会时，威廉王子（Prince William）想确认原是好莱坞女星的梅根对哈利是否别有用心。
HYP: The Sunday Times reported that the new book, citing sources, said that when Harry and Meghan were dating before their marriage, Prince William wanted to confirm whether Meghan, a former Hollywood actress, had ulterior motives for Harry.

SRC: 根据消息人士转述，威廉当时曾对哈利说：“你别感觉有必要仓促（娶梅根）。
HYP: According to the source, William told Harry at the time: "Don't feel the need to rush (marry Meghan).

SRC: 你可以尽量花时间去了解这个女孩。”
HYP: You can take the time to get to know this girl as much as you can."

SRC: 报导说，当哈利听到威廉用“这个女孩”形容梅根，他从哥哥语气中感受到傲慢势利，他也认为自己不再需要他人照顾提醒。
HYP: The report said that when Harry heard William describe Meghan as "the girl", he felt the arrogance and snobbery in his brother's tone, and he also believed that he no longer needed reminders.

SRC: 哈利和梅根今年1月宣布计划过更独立的生活，并将自食其力。
HYP: Harry and Meghan announced plans in January to live a more independent life and will support themselves.

SRC: 两人3月正式卸下王室高阶成员身分后，目前带著儿子亚契（Archie）住在美国洛杉矶追求新事业。
HYP: After officially stepping down as senior members of the royal family in March, the two are currently living in Los Angeles with their son Archie to pursue a new career.

SRC: 哈利和梅根在2018年5月结婚。
HYP: Harry and Meghan married in May 2018.

SRC: 当时这场婚姻被视为为英国王室注入好莱坞的光鲜亮丽和新时代气息，两人也因此成为当代全球最受瞩目的名人夫妻档之一。
HYP: At the time, the marriage was seen as injecting Hollywood glamour and new-age flavor into the British royal family, and the two became one of the most high-profile celebrity couples in the world today.

SRC: 越南驻老挝大使馆公使衔参赞郑氏心、在老挝越南佛教协会、老挝越南人总会、万象省政府代表、老挝老兵协会等代表一同参加了祭奠仪式。
HYP: Zheng Thi Xin, Minister Counselor of the Vietnamese Embassy in Laos, representatives from the Vietnamese Buddhist Association in Laos, the Lao Vietnamese General Association, representatives of the Vientiane Provincial Government, and Lao Veterans Association attended the memorial ceremony.

SRC: 英烈祭奠仪式在庄严肃穆的气氛中举行，各位代表陆续向英烈们上香，缅怀英烈们的丰功伟绩及越老特殊团结关系。
HYP: The memorial ceremony for the heroes and martyrs was held in a solemn and solemn atmosphere. Delegates successively offered incense to the heroes and martyrs, in memory of their great achievements and the special solidarity between Vietnam and Laos.

SRC: 公使衔参赞郑氏心在讲话中表示，这是在老越南人和老挝人民共同缅怀两国革命英烈，一起对为两国独立自由牺牲的英烈表达感恩之心的机会，同时也是两国人民回顾两国并肩协作打击共同敌人，争取民族独立，国家统一，共同建设国家发展，巩固两国关系的良好机会。
HYP: Minister Counsellor Zheng Thi Xin said in his speech that this is an opportunity for the old Vietnamese and Lao people to jointly commemorate the revolutionary heroes of the two countries and express their gratitude to the heroes and martyrs who sacrificed for the independence and freedom of the two countries. It is also a good opportunity for the two peoples to recall the two countries working side by side to fight the common enemy, strive for national independence, national reunification, jointly build national development and consolidate bilateral relations.

SRC: 74年前的1946年1月23日， 老越战斗联盟的28名战士在进攻Phonehe据点时英勇牺牲。
HYP: Seventy-four years ago, on January 23, 1946, 28 soldiers of the Lao-Vietnam Combat Alliance died heroically while attacking the Phonehe stronghold.

SRC: 此次进攻取得胜利，成为两国在争取民族解放革命斗争初期阶段的具有历史性意义的胜利。
HYP: The victory of the offensive was a historic victory for the two countries in the early stage of the revolutionary struggle for national liberation.

SRC: 郑氏心女士强调，两国人民永远铭记为两国民族解放斗争事业牺牲的各位英烈，同时强调两国年轻一带将继续发扬老前辈英勇、坚强的传统，为越老关系持续开花结果及两国的繁荣发展作出应有的贡献。
HYP: Ms. Zheng said that the people of the two countries will always remember the heroes who sacrificed their lives for the national liberation struggle of the two countries. She also stressed that the younger generations of the two countries will continue to carry forward the heroic and strong traditions of the older generations, and make due contributions to the continuous blossoming of Vietnam-Laos relations and the prosperity and development of the two countries.

SRC: 里程碑式跨越！
HYP: Milestone crossing!

SRC: 国际米兰解锁第3000场意甲比赛-中新网
HYP: Inter Milan unlocks 3000th Serie A match - ChinaNews.com

SRC: 中新网客户端7月26日电北京时间26日凌晨，意甲传统豪门国际米兰迎来了里程碑之战。
HYP: Chinanews client, July 26th. In the early morning of the 26th Beijing time, the traditional giants of Serie A, Inter Milan, ushered in a milestone battle.

SRC: 据意大利媒体统计，客场对阵热那亚一役是国际米兰队史第3000场意甲联赛，蓝黑军团也是首个解锁这项里程碑的球队。
HYP: According to Italian media statistics, the away game against Genoa is the 3000th Serie A game in the history of Inter Milan, and the Nerazzurri is also the first team to unlock this milestone.

SRC: 自1929年联赛改制以来，国际米兰是唯一一支从未缺席意甲的队伍，也是唯一一支从未降级的球队。
HYP: Inter are the only team that has never missed Serie A since the league was restructured in 1929, and the only team that has never been relegated.

SRC: 据意大利媒体报道，国际米兰与热那亚的比赛是蓝黑军团队史第3000场比赛。
HYP: According to Italian media reports, the match between Inter Milan and Genoa is the 3000th game in the history of the Nerazzurri.

SRC: 在这场里程碑之战中，国际米兰客场三球完胜热那亚。
HYP: In this milestone battle, Inter Milan defeated Genoa by three goals away.

SRC: 此役卢卡库梅开二度，替补出场的桑切斯也贡献一球。
HYP: Lukaku scored twice, and Sanchez, who came off the bench, also contributed a goal.

SRC: 比赛从一开始就进入了国际米兰的节奏，强攻终于在第34分钟转化为进球。
HYP: The game entered the rhythm of Inter Milan from the start, and the storm finally turned into a goal in the 34th minute.

SRC: 比拉吉左路传中，卢卡库中路包抄头球破门。
HYP: Biraghi made a cross from the left, and Lukaku flanked the goal with a header from the middle.

SRC: 第82分钟国际米兰如法炮制，摩西右路突破后传中，桑切斯中路包抄推射得手；终场前卢卡库完成梅开二度，反击中布罗佐维奇送出长距离直塞，卢卡库突入禁区晃过罗梅罗后推射空门得分，将比分定格在3：0。
HYP: In the 82nd minute, Inter Milan followed suit. Moses made a cross from the right, and Sanchez flanked and pushed the shot in the middle. Before the end, Lukaku scored twice, and Brozovic sent a long-distance through in the counterattack. Lukaku broke into the penalty area and passed Romero and then pushed the empty goal to score the score at 3:0.

SRC: 国际米兰客场3：0完胜热那亚，积分反超亚特兰大上升至第2，在多赛一场的情况下落后领头羊尤文图斯4分，仍保留着争冠希望。
HYP: Inter Milan defeated Genoa 3-0 away, surpassed Atalanta in points and moved up to the second place, trailing the leader Juventus by 4 points in the case of one more game, and still retained the hope of winning the title.

SRC: 国际米兰客场3：0完胜热那亚，积分反超亚特兰大上升至第2，在多赛一场的情况下落后领头羊尤文图斯4分，仍保留着争<v>冠</v>希望。
HYP: Inter Milan defeated Genoa 3-0 away, surpassed Atalanta in points and moved up to the second place, trailing the leader Juventus by 4 points in the case of one more game, and still retained the hope of winning the title.

SRC: 至此，在这跨越近90载光阴的3000场意甲联赛中，国际米兰赢得了其中的1489场，打平834场，输掉677场，胜率为49.6%。
HYP: So far, in the 3000 Serie A matches spanning nearly 90 years, Inter Milan have won 1489 games, drawn 834 games, and lost 677 games, with a winning rate of 49.6%.

SRC: 其间，球队共打进5038球，丢3102球，场均打进1.68球。
HYP: During this period, the team scored 5038 goals and conceded 3102 goals, averaging 1.68 goals per game.

SRC: 蓝黑军团18次获得联赛冠军，并且从未降级。
HYP: The Nerazzurri have won the league 18 times and have never been relegated.

SRC: 谍战剧老面孔柳云龙演一个结巴男主角-新华网
HYP: Liu Yunlong, an old face of a spy war drama, plays a stuttering actor - Xinhua English.news.cn

SRC: 由柳云龙<v>监制</v>、殷飞执导,柳云龙、苏青、梁冠华、李立群等主演的大型谍战剧《胜算》, 于7月16日晚7:30登陆广东卫视“活力剧场” 。
HYP: Produced by Liu Yunlong, directed by Yin Fei, and starring Liu Yunlong, Su Qing, Liang Guanhua, Li Liqun, etc., the large-scale spy drama "Winning Odds" landed on Guangdong Satellite TV's "Dynamic Theater" at 7:30 pm on July 16.

SRC: 由柳云龙监制、殷飞执导,柳云龙、苏青、梁冠华、李立群等主演的大型谍战剧《胜算》, 于7月16日晚7:30登陆广东卫视“活力剧场” 。
HYP: Produced by Liu Yunlong, directed by Yin Fei, and starring Liu Yunlong, Su Qing, Liang Guanhua, Li Liqun, etc., the large-scale spy drama "Winning Odds" landed on Guangdong Satellite TV's "Dynamic Theater" at 7:30 pm on July 16.

SRC: 该剧讲述了潜伏在日伪警察局的中共地下党员唐飞(柳云龙饰)联合苏联特工,刺杀日本特工头目,粉碎了日军的惊天阴谋。
HYP: The drama tells the story of Tang Fei (played by Liu Yunlong), an underground member of the Communist Party of China who was lurking in the Japanese and puppet police stations, and Soviet agents to assassinate the leader of the Japanese agents and smash the shocking conspiracy of the Japanese army.

SRC: 《胜算》根据史实改编,素材取自尘封多年的苏联军事档案。
HYP: "Winning Odds" is adapted from historical facts, and the material is taken from the dusty Soviet military archives for many years.

SRC: 莫斯科保卫战期间,苏联红军远东精锐西进驰援,此时日本关东军“北进派”认为有机可乘,意欲出兵。
HYP: During the defense of Moscow, the elites of the Soviet Red Army from the Far East marched westward for assistance. At this time, the "northern faction" of the Japanese Kwantung Army thought it had an opportunity and wanted to send troops.

SRC: 为解腹背受敌之危,中共与苏共情报人员联手实施了“穆丹乌拉”计划。
HYP: In order to relieve the danger of being attacked by the enemy, the CCP and the Soviet Communist intelligence personnel jointly implemented the "Mudan-Ula" plan.

SRC: 根据此历史背景,知名编剧邓原几经打磨,令剧情曲折烧脑。
HYP: Based on this historical background, the well-known screenwriter Deng Yuan has been polished several times, making the plot twists and turns.

SRC: 柳云龙此次在《胜算》中同时担任监制和男主角。
HYP: Liu Yunlong is the producer and actor in "Winning Odds" at the same time.

SRC: 剧中,他饰演的唐飞是林河警察厅刑事科科长,是一位颇有喜感甚至有点痞气的结巴警察,真实的身份则是一名中共地下党员。
HYP: In the play, he plays Tang Fei, the chief of the criminal department of the Linhe Police Department, a stuttering policeman with a sense of joy and even a little rudeness, and his real identity is an underground member of the Communist Party of China.

SRC: 与其上演对手戏的女主角蔡梦是林河保安局科长,深得日本上司福原的赏识,与唐飞之间存在着亦敌亦友、暧昧不清的微妙关系。
HYP: Cai Meng, the heroine who plays the opposite play, is the chief of the Linhe Security Bureau, who is highly appreciated by the Japanese boss Fukuhara, and there is an ambiguous and ambiguous relationship with Tang Fei.

SRC: 苏青近年来尝试了很多不同类型的角色,从《那些年我们正年轻》中的陆若文到《延禧攻略》中的尔晴,都给观众留下深刻印象,演技受到认可。
HYP: Su Qing has tried many different types of roles in recent years, from Lu Ruowen in "Those Years We Were Young" to Erqing in "Story of Yanxi Palace", all of them left a deep impression on the audience and their acting skills were recognized.

SRC: 此次苏青与柳云龙是首次搭档,结巴警长搭配妩媚女警的设置,颇有看点与新意。
HYP: This time Su Qing and Liu Yunlong are partners for the first time. The setting of the stammer sheriff and the charming policewoman is quite interesting and innovative.

SRC: 除了两位主角外,《胜算》中还有梁冠华、李立群、钱波、雷汉、申军谊等众多实力派演员加盟,老戏骨飙戏也是该剧看点之一。
HYP: In addition to the two protagonists, many powerful actors such as Liang Guanhua, Li Liqun, Qian Bo, Lei Han, and Shen Junyi have joined in "Winning Odds". The old drama is also one of the highlights of the play.

SRC: 据了解,《胜算》制作上也十分精良,剧组跨越江苏、浙江、辽宁3省近2000公里拍摄取景。
HYP: It is understood that the production of "Winning Odds" is also very sophisticated. The crew spanned nearly 2000 kilometers to shoot scenes in Jiangsu, Zhejiang and Liaoning provinces.

SRC: 为了还原东北日据时期光怪陆离的城市风貌,剧组美工道具组日夜赶工,仔细打磨场景搭建及道具的每一个细节,令剧中场景画面精致,富有历史质感。
HYP: In order to restore the bizarre cityscape during the Japanese colonial period in Northeast China, the art and props team of the production crew worked day and night to carefully polish every detail of the scene construction and props, so that the scenes in the play were exquisite and full of historical texture.

SRC: 绿地开启新一轮混改上海国资拟转让17.5%股份-经济观察网－专业财经新闻网站
HYP: Greenland starts a new round of mixed-ownership reform, Shanghai state-owned assets intends to transfer 17.5% of shares - Economic Observer - Professional Financial News Website

SRC: 经济观察网记者饶贤君7月26日，绿地控股（600606.SH）发布《关于国有股东拟通过公开征集受让方的方式协议转让公司部分股份暨复牌的提示性公告》。
HYP: Economic Observer reporter Rao Xianjun On July 26, Greenland Holdings (600606.SH) issued the "Informative Announcement on State-owned Shareholders' Proposal to Transfer Part of the Company's Shares and Resumption of Trading by Agreement through Public Solicitation of Transferees".

SRC: 公告内容显示，为进一步深化国资国企改革，优化国资布局结构调整，完善绿地股权结构，上海地产（集团）有限公司（以下简称“上海地产”）及上海城投（集团）有限公司（以下简称“上海城投” ）拟通过公开征集受让方的方式协议转让所持有的公司部分股份，拟转让的股份比例合计不超过绿地总股本的17.5% 。
HYP: According to the announcement, in order to further deepen the reform of state-owned assets and state-owned enterprises, optimize the structure adjustment of state-owned assets, and improve the equity structure of greenland, Shanghai Real Estate (Group) Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai Real Estate") and Shanghai Urban Investment (Group) Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai Urban Investment") plan to transfer part of the company's shares through public solicitation of transferees. The total proportion of shares to be transferred shall not exceed 17.5% of the total share capital of Greenland.

SRC: 本次拟转让股份的价格不低于下列两者之中的较高者：提示性公告日（2020 年7月27日）前30个交易日的每日加权平均价格的算术平均值；最近一个会计年度公司经审计的每股净资产值。
HYP: The price of the shares to be transferred this time shall not be lower than the higher of the following two: the arithmetic average of the daily weighted average price of the 30 trading days before the reminder announcement date (July 27, 2020); the audited net asset value per share of the company in the latest fiscal year.

SRC: 目前，对绿地的新战略投资者仍无定论，按照公告公示信息估算，新战略投资者要拿下绿地此次混改中转让的17.5%股权需要支付约140亿元的资金。
HYP: At present, there is still no conclusion on the new strategic investor of Greenland. According to the information published in the announcement, the new strategic investor needs to pay about 14 billion yuan to take over the 17.5% equity transferred in the mixed reform of Greenland.

SRC: 值得注意的是，本次股份转让完成后，预计绿地仍无控股股东及实际控制人，但控制权结构可能发生较大变化。
HYP: It is worth noting that after the completion of this share transfer, it is expected that Greenland will still have no controlling shareholder and actual controller, but the control structure may undergo major changes.

SRC: 绿地控股自创立以来进行了多次体制机制改革：1992年-1997年，在纯国有体制下按照市场化规则运行；1997年-2013年，建立并不断完善国有控股、职工持股的股份制；2013年-2015年，引进战略投资者，形成国有及非公有资本交叉持股、相互融合的混合所有制；2015年至今，整体上市，成为公众公司。
HYP: Since its establishment, Greenland Holdings has carried out several institutional reforms: from 1992 to 1997, it operated under a purely state-owned system in accordance with market-oriented rules; from 1997 to 2013, it established and continuously improved the shareholding system of state-owned holding and employee stock ownership; from 2013 to 2015, it introduced strategic investors to form a mixed ownership system of cross-shareholding and mutual integration of state-owned and non-public capital; since 2015, it has been listed as a public company as a whole.

SRC: 绿地目前的混改方案与格力相似，2019年12月，高瓴资本领衔珠海明骏以416.62亿元接手格力电器（000651.SZ）15%股权，格力集团退居小股东，完成混改后，格力电器实施了高管激励计划、无实控人结构等现代化的企业管理方式。
HYP: Greenland's current mixed reform plan is similar to that of Gree. In December 2019, Hillhouse Capital led Zhuhai Mingjun to take over a 15% stake in Gree Electric Appliances (000651.SZ) for 41.662 billion yuan, and Gree Group stepped back as a minority shareholder. After completing the mixed reform, Gree Electric Appliances implemented a modern enterprise management method such as an executive incentive plan and a structure without actual controllers.

SRC: 上海地产、上海城投均为上海市国资委全资持有的国资企业集团，绿地控股董事长、总裁张玉良表示，绿地此举是上海按照党中央要求，推进国资国企综合性改革、加速新一阶段国资国企改革的重要举措，充分显示了因地制宜、量体裁衣的改革新思路，通过给上市公司引入新的优秀战略股东，支持企业进一步提高市场化程度，提升经营管理自由度，加速改革活力全面释放。
HYP: Shanghai Real Estate and Shanghai Urban Investment are both state-owned enterprise groups wholly owned by the Shanghai State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission. Zhang Yuliang, chairman and president of Greenland Holdings, said that Greenland's move is an important measure for Shanghai to promote comprehensive reform of state-owned assets and state-owned enterprises and accelerate a new stage of reform of state-owned assets and state-owned enterprises in accordance with the requirements of the CPC Central Committee.

SRC: 上海地产、上海城投均为上海市国资委全资持有的国资企业集团，绿地控股董事长、总裁张玉良表示，绿地此举是上海按照党中央要求，推进国资国企综合性改革、加速新一阶段国资国企改革的重要举措，<v>充分显示了因地制宜、量体裁衣的改革新思路，通过给上市公司引入新的优秀战略股东，支持企业进一步提高市场化程度，提升经营管理自由度，加速改革活力全面释放</v>。
HYP: Shanghai Real Estate and Shanghai Urban Investment are both state-owned enterprise groups wholly owned by the Shanghai State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission. Zhang Yuliang, chairman and president of Greenland Holdings, said that Greenland's move is an important measure for Shanghai to promote comprehensive reform of state-owned assets and state-owned enterprises and accelerate a new stage of reform of state-owned assets and state-owned enterprises in accordance with the requirements of the CPC Central Committee.

SRC: 刘德华刘青云能否“拆”出新火花-新华网
HYP: Can Andy Andy Liu Qingyun "dismantle" new sparks? - Xinhua English.news.cn

SRC: 《拆弹专家2》近日宣布将于12月24日上映,成为贺岁档首部定档的影片。
HYP: "The Hurt Locker 2" was recently announced to be released on December 24, becoming the first film to be scheduled for the Lunar New Year.

SRC: 第二部依然是邱礼涛导演,刘德华监制及主演,以全新的故事展开。
HYP: The second part is still directed by Qiu Litao, produced and starred by Andy Lau, and starts with a new story.

SRC: 据悉,第二部中“核弹”元素的加入,也让此次拆弹专家面临的挑战更为艰难,预告里几个惊鸿一瞥的镜头,已令人心悬一线,大爆炸的蘑菇云,被火光吞没的机场,场面相当震撼。
HYP: It is reported that the addition of the "nuclear bomb" element in the second part also makes the challenge faced by the bomb disposal experts even more difficult. Several glimpses of the footage in the preview have made people feel anxious. The mushroom cloud of the big explosion and the airport engulfed by the fire are quite shocking.

SRC: 三年前,由原班人马制作出品的《拆弹专家》,斩获了当年的五一档票房冠军,并在香港电影金像奖拿下了7项提名,邱礼涛×刘德华也成为观众心目中的金牌搭档。
HYP: Three years ago, "The Bomb Defenders" produced by the original team won the May 1st box office championship of the year, and won 7 nominations at the Hong Kong Film Awards. Qiu Litao x Andy Lau also became the gold medal partner in the hearts of the audience.

SRC: 此次的《拆弹专家2》,也令人再次期待这对王牌组合能否擦出新火花。
HYP: The "Bomb Defenders 2" also makes people look forward to whether this pair of trump cards can create new sparks.

SRC: 《拆弹专家2》讲述了全新的故事:前拆弹专家潘乘风(刘德华饰)晕倒在爆炸案现场,被警方列为嫌疑犯。
HYP: "Bomb disposal expert 2" tells a brand-new story: Pan Chengfeng (Andy Lau), a former bomb disposal expert, fainted at the scene of the bombing and was listed as a suspect by the police.

SRC: 为了寻找真相,他不得不向同是拆弹专家的好友董卓文(刘青云饰)求助。
HYP: In order to find out the truth, he has to seek help from his friend Dong Zhuowen (played by Liu Qingyun), who is also a bomb disposal expert.

SRC: 急于破案的女督查,也同时是潘乘风前女友的庞玲(倪妮<v>饰)</v>也被卷入其中。
HYP: The female inspector who is eager to solve the case, Pang Ling (Ni Ni), who is also Pan Chengfeng's ex-girlfriend, is also involved.

SRC: 依然是拆弹专家,但从定档预告中能感受到刘德华新角色的复杂:断了一条腿,戴上了义肢,一边被同是拆弹专家的刘青云追捕,一边又被前女友倪妮指挥行动。
HYP: He is still a bomb disposal expert, but he can feel the complexity of Andy Lau's new role from the preview of the final file: he has a broken leg, wears a prosthesis, while being chased by Liu Qingyun, who is also a bomb disposal expert, while being directed by his ex-girlfriend Ni Ni.

SRC: 三人究竟是怎样的关系,刘德华到底在香岛酒店做了什么,被牵扯到怎样的案件中,他拆弹专家的职业生涯又经历了哪些波折,种种谜团让人好奇不已。
HYP: What is the relationship between the three, what exactly did Andy Lau did at the Xiangdao Hotel, what kind of cases he was involved in, and what twists and turns did he go through in the career of the bomb disposal expert? All kinds of mysteries make people curious.

SRC: 据了解,电影的重头戏都是实地取景香港的世界地标性建筑,加上顶尖的特效制作团队,带来震撼逼真的视觉冲击。
HYP: It is understood that the main part of the film is the scene of the world's landmark buildings in Hong Kong, coupled with the top special effects production team, bringing shocking and realistic visual impact.

SRC: （记者聂青）
HYP: (Reporter Nie Qing)

SRC: 中新网7月26日电综合俄罗斯卫星网报道，7月26日是俄罗斯海军日，庆祝海军日的主要阅兵式在圣彼得堡和喀琅施塔得举行。
HYP: China News Service, July 26. According to a comprehensive Russian satellite network report, July 26 is the Russian Navy Day, and the main military parades to celebrate the Navy Day were held in St. Petersburg and Kronstadt.

SRC: 俄罗斯总统、俄联邦武装力量最高统帅普京抵达喀琅施塔得参加庆祝活动，该地15艘舰艇和潜艇接受了检阅。
HYP: Russian President Vladimir Putin, Supreme Commander of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation, arrived in Kronstadt to participate in the celebration, where 15 ships and submarines were inspected.

SRC: 当地时间2019年7月28日，俄罗斯圣彼得堡举行盛大阅兵式庆祝海军节。
HYP: On July 28, 2019 local time, a grand military parade was held in St. Petersburg, Russia to celebrate the Navy Day.

SRC: 据报道，普京向海军官兵祝贺海军日，并乘小艇在芬兰湾上从将要参加海上阅兵的舰艇旁边驶过，随后在主观礼台检阅受阅部队。
HYP: According to reports, Putin congratulated the navy officers and soldiers on the Navy Day, and passed by a small boat on the Gulf of Finland next to the ships that will participate in the sea parade, and then reviewed the troops under review at the main ceremonial platform.

SRC: 普京表示，俄海军舰队列装了最新式的舰艇和特殊装备，装备水平不断提高。
HYP: Putin said that the Russian navy fleet is equipped with the latest ships and special equipment, and the equipment level is constantly improving.

SRC: 普京在俄罗斯海军日的阅兵式上说：“俄罗斯海军舰队拥有配备了高精武器的军舰、战略潜水巡洋舰和多用途潜艇、最新式飞机等飞行器、独特的武器和特殊装备。”
HYP: "The Russian navy fleet has warships equipped with high-precision weapons, strategic diving cruisers and multipurpose submarines, aircraft such as the latest aircraft, unique weapons and special equipment," Putin said at a military parade on Russian Navy Day.

SRC: 当地时间6月24日，俄罗斯纪念卫国战争胜利75周年红场阅兵式举行。
HYP: On June 24, local time, Russia held a military parade on Red Square to commemorate the 75th anniversary of the victory in the Great Patriotic War.

SRC: 他还表示，俄海军舰队将靠数字化和有效防御手段来取得独特优势。
HYP: He also said that the Russian naval fleet will gain a unique advantage through digitalization and effective defense.

SRC: 报道称，庆祝俄罗斯海军日的主要海军阅兵式在圣彼得堡和喀琅施塔得举行，共有46艘舰艇参加，包括“卡萨托诺夫上将”号护卫舰、“海军中将库拉科夫”号大型反潜舰，以及大型登陆舰、小型导弹舰、护卫舰、潜艇等。
HYP: According to the report, the main naval parades to celebrate the Russian Navy Day were held in St. Petersburg and Kronstadt. A total of 46 ships participated, including the "Admiral Kasatonov" frigate, the "Admiral Kulakov" large anti-submarine ship, as well as large landing ships, small missile ships, frigates, submarines and so on.

SRC: 其中，系列舰艇在圣彼得堡冬宫桥旁进行静态展示，其中最引人瞩目的是经过复制的18世纪初俄罗斯首艘战列舰“波尔塔瓦”号。
HYP: Among them, a series of ships are statically displayed beside the Hermitage Bridge in St. Petersburg, the most eye-catching of which is the replica of the first Russian battleship "Poltava" in the early 18th century.

SRC: 为避免新冠病毒传播，今年海军阅兵式期间只有当地居民和特邀来宾能够进入喀琅施塔得。
HYP: In order to avoid the spread of the new crown virus, only local residents and special guests are allowed to enter Kronstadt during this year's naval parade.

SRC: 每年7月最后一个星期日是俄罗斯海军日。
HYP: The last Sunday in July is Russian Navy Day.

SRC: 中新网重庆7月26日电(记者刘贤)重庆市发展和改革委员会26日发布消息称，该市截至目前已退捕渔民4404人，占全部涉及渔民的42.54% 。
HYP: China News Service, Chongqing, July 26 (Reporter Liu Xian) Chongqing Municipal Development and Reform Commission announced on the 26th that 4404 fishermen have been repatriated in the city so far, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.

SRC: 今年53岁的李代国接受中新网记者采访时说，爷爷辈就在龙溪河打鱼，自己11岁起就跟着父亲打鱼，摇着小船，沿着龙溪河前行，上到重庆梁平，下到长寿，每次一离开家就是十天半个月，靠打鱼维持家人生活。
HYP: Li Daiguo, 53, said in an interview with a reporter from Chinanews.com that his grandfather fished in the Longxi River, and he followed his father fishing since he was 11 years old. He rode a boat along the Longxi River, up to Liangping, Chongqing, and down to Changshou. Every time he left home for ten and a half months, he depended on fishing to support his family.

SRC: 但从1997年起，随着农村人口逐渐往场镇里涌，高安场镇里的居民越来越多，造成的环境污染也越来越严重。
HYP: However, since 1997, with the gradual influx of rural population into Changzhen, the number of residents in Gaoanchang Town has become more and more serious, and the resulting environmental pollution has become more and more serious.

SRC: 龙溪河沿线修建了造纸厂、化工厂、养殖场，也污染河水。
HYP: Paper mills, chemical plants, and breeding farms have been built along the Longxi River, which also pollute the river.

SRC: 到2007年、2008年，龙溪河变成臭水沟。
HYP: By 2007 and 2008, the Longxi River had become a stinking ditch.

SRC: “捕上来的鱼鳞片都是黑的，剖开后里面也是黑的。”
HYP: "The scales of the fish that were caught were black, and the inside was also black when cut open."

SRC: 李代国说，河水污染后打鱼越来越困难。
HYP: Li Daiguo said that fishing is becoming more and more difficult after the river is polluted.

SRC: 当地开始下大力气治理龙溪河污染，包括清漂、巡河、水生资源管护等。
HYP: The local area began to make great efforts to control the pollution of the Longxi River, including clearing, river patrol, and aquatic resources management and protection.

SRC: 李代国也从渔民退捕转产，成为巡河队的一员，管护水生资源。
HYP: Li Daiguo also retired from fishermen and changed production and became a member of the river patrol team to manage and protect aquatic resources.

SRC: 从2020年1月1日起，重庆市水生生物保护区以及主城区相关水域已实行全面禁捕。
HYP: From January 1, 2020, the aquatic life reserve in Chongqing and the relevant waters in the main urban area have implemented a comprehensive ban on fishing.

SRC: 据重庆市发展改革委数据，截至目前，重庆市已累计退捕渔船3403艘、已签订退捕协议渔船4643艘，分别占三年总任务的63.3% 、 86.3% 。
HYP: According to the data of the Chongqing Municipal Development and Reform Commission, as of now, Chongqing has accumulatively withdrawn 3403 fishing vessels and signed 4643 fishing vessels with withdrawal agreements, accounting for 63.3% and 86.3% of the three-year total tasks, respectively.

SRC: 已退捕渔民4404人，占全部涉及渔民的42.54% 。
HYP: 4404 fishermen have been repatriated, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.

SRC: 已退捕4404人中，实现就业4267人，占已退捕渔民的96.89% 。
HYP: Among the 4404 people who have withdrawn their catch, 4267 people have been employed, accounting for 96.89% of the fishermen who have withdrawn from the catch.

SRC: 养老保险保障覆盖2691人，占退捕渔民的61.10% 。
HYP: The endowment insurance coverage covers 2691 people, accounting for 61.10% of the fishermen returning from fishing.

SRC: 下一步，重庆市将深入开展各专项整治行动，加快推进长江干流岸线利用项目清理整治，完成新一轮长江入河排污口普查并开展相应整治行动，基本完成“三磷” ( 指磷矿、磷化工和磷石膏库)整治任务、小水电清理整改工作，推进长江两岸造林绿化专项行动，强化绿色矿山建设，巩固长江干流非法码头、非法采砂专项整治成果，<v>深入推进长江流域禁捕退捕工作</v>。
HYP: In the next step, Chongqing will carry out various special rectification actions, accelerate the clean-up and rectification of shoreline utilization projects on the Yangtze River, complete a new round of Yangtze River sewage outfall census and carry out corresponding rectification actions, basically complete the "three phosphorus" (referring to phosphate rock, phosphate chemical and phosphogypsum reservoirs) rectification tasks, small hydropower clean-up and rectification work, promote the special campaign for afforestation and greening on both sides of the Yangtze River, strengthen the construction of green mines, and strengthen the construction of green mines, and strengthen the illegal sand catchment and illegal docks in the Yangtze River area.

SRC: 下一步，重庆市将深入开展各专项整治行动，加快推进长江干流岸线利用项目清理整治，完成新一轮长江入河排污口普查并开展相应整治行动，基本完成“三磷” ( 指磷矿、磷化工和磷石膏库)整治任务、小水电清理整改工作，推进长江两岸造林绿化专项行动，强化绿色矿山建设，巩固长江干流非法码头、非法采砂专项整治成果，深入推进长江流域禁捕退捕工作。
HYP: In the next step, Chongqing will carry out various special rectification actions, accelerate the clean-up and rectification of shoreline utilization projects on the Yangtze River, complete a new round of Yangtze River sewage outfall census and carry out corresponding rectification actions, basically complete the "three phosphorus" (referring to phosphate rock, phosphate chemical and phosphogypsum reservoirs) rectification tasks, small hydropower clean-up and rectification work, promote the special campaign for afforestation and greening on both sides of the Yangtze River, strengthen the construction of green mines, and strengthen the construction of green mines, and strengthen the illegal sand catchment and illegal docks in the Yangtze River area.

SRC: 新华社香港7月25日电香港特区政府财经事务及库务局局长许正宇表示，香港的金融市场仍保持活跃、运作有序。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 25 (Xinhua) The Secretary for Financial Services and the Treasury of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region Government, Xu Zhengyu, said that Hong Kong's financial market remains active and operates in an orderly manner.

SRC: 他对香港金融稳定及经济表示乐观。
HYP: He expressed optimism about Hong Kong's financial stability and economy.

SRC: 许正宇在香港驻多伦多经济贸易办事处及港加商会（加拿大总会）24日（多伦多时间）合办的网上研讨会上表示，香港因为“修例风波”和新冠肺炎疫情，经历着艰难的状况。
HYP: Xu Zhengyu said at a webinar co-organized by the Hong Kong Economic and Trade Office in Toronto and the Hong Kong-Canada Chamber of Commerce (Canada) on the 24th (Toronto time) that Hong Kong is going through a difficult situation because of the "revision storm" and the new crown pneumonia epidemic.

SRC: 许正宇在香港驻多伦多经济贸易办事处及港加商会（加拿大<v>总会</v>）24日（多伦多时间）合办的网上研讨会上表示，香港因为“修例风波”和新冠肺炎疫情，经历着艰难的状况。
HYP: Xu Zhengyu said at a webinar co-organized by the Hong Kong Economic and Trade Office in Toronto and the Hong Kong-Canada Chamber of Commerce (Canada) on the 24th (Toronto time) that Hong Kong is going through a difficult situation because of the "revision storm" and the new crown pneumonia epidemic.

SRC: 港元汇价稳定并偏向强方兑换保证水平。
HYP: The exchange rate of the Hong Kong dollar was stable and favored the strong-side convertibility guarantee level.

SRC: 银行体系没有明显的资金流出迹象，相反，自6月以来超过110亿<v>美元</v>资金流入。
HYP: There are no clear signs of outflows from the banking system, instead, more than $11 billion has flowed in since June.

SRC: 银行的存款总额在过去几个月也持续增加，股票市场有一连串公开招股集资活动，市场成交屡见上升。
HYP: Total bank deposits have also continued to increase over the past few months, and there has been a flurry of public offerings in the stock market, which has seen an increase in market turnover.

SRC: 许正宇说，新冠肺炎疫情为全球经济及金融市场带来压力，但香港的基本优势仍然保持不变。
HYP: Xu Zhengyu said that the new crown pneumonia epidemic has put pressure on the global economy and financial markets, but Hong Kong's basic advantages remain unchanged.

SRC: 香港拥有的多项优势，包括地理、法治、高速通讯、资讯和资金自由流通以及简单低税制，使香港持续成为领先的国际金融中心。
HYP: Hong Kong's many advantages, including geography, rule of law, high-speed communications, free flow of information and capital, and a simple and low tax system, have made Hong Kong a leading international financial center.

SRC: 许正宇指出，特区政府在“防疫抗疫基金”预留60亿港元，未来两年在公营及私营界别创造约3万个有时限的职位，涵盖不同技能及学历人士。
HYP: Xu Zhengyu pointed out that the SAR government has set aside HK$6 billion in the "Anti-epidemic Fund" to create about 30000 time-limited jobs in the public and private sectors in the next two years, covering people with different skills and education.

SRC: 为支持金融科技的发展，特区政府也已推出“千人计划”，资助本地金融科技公司、初创及其他有金融科技相关业务的企业，以创造1000个新职位，聘用本地人才及丰富香港的金融科技人才库。
HYP: To support the development of fintech, the SAR government has also launched the "Thousand Talents Program" to subsidize local fintech companies, start-ups and other companies with fintech-related businesses to create 1000 new jobs, recruit local talents and enrich Hong Kong's fintech talent pool.

SRC: 展望未来，许正宇对香港的金融稳定及经济表示乐观。
HYP: Looking ahead, Xu Zhengyu expressed optimism about Hong Kong's financial stability and economy.

SRC: 他鼓励加拿大企业善用香港的优势及其作为国际金融中心、国际资产及财富管理中心以及全球离岸人民币业务枢纽的地位，在粤港澳大湾区及附近地区发展及投资。
HYP: He encouraged Canadian companies to make good use of Hong Kong's advantages and its status as an international financial center, international asset and wealth management center and global offshore RMB business hub to develop and invest in the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area and nearby areas.

SRC: 《柳叶刀》刊文赞扬中国抗疫努力鼓励各国学习经验-中新网
HYP: The Lancet praises China's anti-epidemic efforts and encourages countries to learn from experience - China News Service

SRC: 《柳叶刀》杂志25日刊文表示，中国作为一个拥有14亿人口，规模与欧洲或美国相似的国家，现阶段新冠疫情得到有效控制，而没有再出现大范围传播的情况，在很大程度上控制住了国内的疫情。
HYP: The Lancet magazine published an article on the 25th that, as a country with a population of 1.4 billion and a size similar to that of Europe or the United States, the new crown epidemic has been effectively controlled at this stage, and there has been no large-scale transmission, which has largely controlled the domestic epidemic.

SRC: 文章表示，在近十多年时间里，中国对国内研究和公共卫生建设方面进行了大量的投资，这使得中国对新冠的准备比当年严重急性呼吸道综合征(SARS)的准备要充分得多。
HYP: The article said that in the past decade, China has made a lot of investment in domestic research and public health construction, which has made China much more prepared for the new crown than it was for severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS).

SRC: 作者表示，2002年SARS暴发时，起初中国准备不足，尤其是病原体无法确定。
HYP: The authors say that when the SARS outbreak occurred in 2002, China was initially ill-prepared, especially since the pathogen could not be identified.

SRC: 当2019年12月发现新冠病毒时，中国科学家很快就能够鉴定出病毒种类，并于2020年1月11日与国际共享了基因组测序数据。
HYP: When the novel coronavirus was discovered in December 2019, Chinese scientists were soon able to identify the virus species and shared the genome sequencing data internationally on January 11, 2020.

SRC: 到1月底，来自中国大陆和香港的医生阐明了该病毒的临床特征，通过在《柳叶刀》上发表的研究论文，向世界警告了新冠病毒的威胁。
HYP: By the end of January, doctors from mainland China and Hong Kong had elucidated the clinical features of the virus, warning the world of the threat of the new coronavirus through research papers published in The Lancet.

SRC: 中国也一直处于疫苗研究的最前沿，在国家宣布紧急状态下，通过国内的紧密合作，这样的研究非常迅速而严格地展开，5月和7月，分别在《柳叶刀》上公布了中国开发的新冠疫苗早期试验取得进展的结果。
HYP: China has also been at the forefront of vaccine research. Under the state of emergency, such research has been carried out very quickly and rigorously through close domestic cooperation. In May and July, the results of the progress of the early trials of the new crown vaccine developed in China were announced in The Lancet.

SRC: 中国的经验表明，对国家卫生和研究体系进行投资，有效提高实验室能力是非常重要的。
HYP: China's experience shows the importance of investing in national health and research systems to effectively improve laboratory capacity.

SRC: 这是国家对卫生紧急情况和全球卫生安全做出快速有效反应的基础。
HYP: This is the basis for a rapid and effective national response to health emergencies and global health security.

SRC: 其他国家，特别是低收入和中等收入国家来说，非常值得借鉴和学习。
HYP: Other countries, especially low-income and middle-income countries, are worth learning from and learning from.

SRC: 此外，中国的经验证明，在强大的研究基础上，必须有强有力的高层果断地凭借科学依据来作出正确决策，这才使得新冠疫情得到有效控制。
HYP: In addition, China's experience proves that, on the basis of strong research, there must be a strong high-level decision-making based on scientific evidence decisively, so that the new crown epidemic can be effectively controlled.

SRC: 文章强调，政府及其领导人必须尊重科学，理解科学的价值，并以对社会最有利的方式对其采取行动。
HYP: The article emphasizes that governments and their leaders must respect science, understand its value, and act on it in the best way for society.

SRC: 在暴发初期，中国国家卫建委派出三组传染病专家前往武汉，调查新冠病毒的风险和传播，他们的建议为1月23日武汉“封城”的决定提供了依据；当有专家提出建设方舱医院必要性和紧迫性时，政府很快做出了决定并快速实施；同时，社区和群众的广泛参与，也使得疫情快速有效地被控制。
HYP: In the early stage of the outbreak, China's National Health and Construction Commission sent three groups of infectious disease experts to Wuhan to investigate the risk and spread of the new coronavirus. Their recommendations provided the basis for Wuhan's decision to "lock down the city" on January 23; when experts raised the necessity and urgency of building a shelter hospital, the government quickly made a decision and implemented it quickly; at the same time, the widespread participation of the community and the masses also brought the epidemic under control quickly and effectively.

SRC: 在暴发初期，中国国家卫建委派出三组传染病专家前往武汉，调查新冠病毒的风险和传播，他们的建议为1月23日武汉“封城”的决定提供了依据；当有专家提出建设<v>方舱</v>医院必要性和紧迫性时，政府很快做出了决定并快速实施；同时，社区和群众的广泛参与，也使得疫情快速有效地被控制。
HYP: In the early stage of the outbreak, China's National Health and Construction Commission sent three groups of infectious disease experts to Wuhan to investigate the risk and spread of the new coronavirus. Their recommendations provided the basis for Wuhan's decision to "lock down the city" on January 23; when experts raised the necessity and urgency of building a shelter hospital, the government quickly made a decision and implemented it quickly; at the same time, the widespread participation of the community and the masses also brought the epidemic under control quickly and effectively.

SRC: 文章最后强调，应对全球性的卫生紧急情况，各国需要加强全球合作，联合应对。
HYP: The article concludes by emphasizing that in response to global health emergencies, countries need to strengthen global cooperation and jointly respond.

SRC: 总台记者杨洪
HYP: Main station reporter Yang Hong

SRC: 当地时间25日下午，一架小型飞机在德国北威州韦瑟尔县撞上一座多层住宅楼的顶层，事故共造成三人死亡。
HYP: On the afternoon of the 25th local time, a small plane crashed into the top floor of a multi-storey residential building in Wesel, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany, killing three people.

SRC: 杜伊斯堡检方、韦瑟尔县警察局和韦瑟尔市消防部门当天晚间联合发布声明称，当天14时40分左右，一架两座小型飞机撞上位于韦瑟尔县辉柏斯坎普街一栋多层住宅楼顶层阁楼的住宅，造成三人丧生。
HYP: The Duisburg prosecutor, the Wesel County Police Department and the Wesel City Fire Department jointly issued a statement that evening that at about 14:40 that day, a two-seat small plane crashed into the residence on the top floor of a multi-storey residential building on Faberskamp Street in Wesel County, killing three people.

SRC: 其当天从北威州鲁尔区马尔市起飞，在韦瑟尔县的机场中途停靠后再度起飞，随后撞上住宅楼。
HYP: It took off from the city of Mull in the Ruhr district of North Rhine-Westphalia on the same day, stopped at the airport in Wesel County and took off again, and then crashed into a residential building.

SRC: 死者身份或为遭撞击住宅内的一名女性住户和小型飞机上两名乘客。
HYP: The identity of the deceased may be a female occupant in the house that was hit and two passengers on a small plane.

SRC: 房内一名两岁儿童仅受轻伤，被平安救出。
HYP: A two-year-old child in the room suffered only minor injuries and was rescued safely.

SRC: 房内其余住户未在事故中受伤，但情绪仍未平复。
HYP: The rest of the occupants of the house were not injured in the accident, but their emotions have not calmed down.

SRC: 德新社报道的现场画面显示，遭遇事故的住宅一度冒出滚滚浓烟，消防队员扑灭火情后可见房屋损毁严重。
HYP: The scene of the scene reported by the German Press Agency showed that the house where the accident was involved was once billowed with thick smoke. After the firefighters extinguished the fire, it could be seen that the house was seriously damaged.

SRC: 目前，飞机失事原因尚不明确。
HYP: The cause of the plane crash is currently unknown.

SRC: 《莱茵邮报》援引警方说法报道称，有线索表明，飞机或在撞上住宅楼前就已解体。
HYP: "Rhine Post" quoted police sources as saying that there are clues that the plane may have disintegrated before hitting the residential building.

SRC: 警方表示，在事故现场一带发现了失事飞机的多块零部件。
HYP: Police said several parts of the crashed plane were found in the vicinity of the accident scene.

SRC: 德国刑警正与杜伊斯堡检方、德国联邦航空事故调查局共同调查导致这一事故的原因。
HYP: The German Criminal Police is working with the Duisburg prosecutor and the German Federal Aviation Accident Investigation Agency to investigate the cause of the accident.

SRC: 记者当天从中国驻杜塞尔多夫总领事馆了解到，该馆与当地警局及消防部门取得联系，据现场判断，伤亡人员中无中国公民。
HYP: The reporter learned from the Chinese Consulate General in Düsseldorf on the same day that the embassy contacted the local police station and the fire department. According to the scene, there were no Chinese citizens among the casualties.

SRC: 大鹏导演《吉祥如意》入围金爵奖-新华网
HYP: Director Dapeng's "Lucky Wishes" nominated for Golden Goblet Award - Xinhuanet

SRC: 7月18日，第二十三届上海国际电影节公布了金爵奖官方入选影片名单。
HYP: On July 18, the 23rd Shanghai International Film Festival announced the official list of films selected for the Golden Goblet Award.

SRC: 大鹏导演的首部现实题材影片《吉祥如意》，成功入围本届上影节金爵奖，同时影片官方发布了首款海报。
HYP: Dapeng's first reality-themed film "Lucky Wishes" was successfully nominated for the Golden Goblet Award at this year's Shanghai Film Festival. At the same time, the film officially released its first poster.

SRC: 海报<v>片方供图</v>
HYP: Poster

SRC: 影片《吉祥如意》是大鹏导演的第一部现实题材作品，也是他与金爵奖的二度结缘。
HYP: The film "Lucky Wishes" is the first realistic work directed by Dapeng, and it is also his second association with the Golden Goblet Award.

SRC: 该片讲述了这样一个故事：一位喜剧片导演突发奇想，回到东北农村老家，希望将一家人如何过年拍成一部文艺电影，结果遭遇一系列意外。
HYP: The film tells such a story: a comedy director came back to his hometown in the northeast countryside on a whim, hoping to make a movie about how the family celebrates the New Year, but encountered a series of accidents.

SRC: 因拍电影而聚齐的家庭成员们，完成了最后的聚会。
HYP: The family members gathered for the filming completed the final gathering.

SRC: 在今日发布的电影海报中，这个家庭中的一员— — “三舅”王吉祥坐在画面中央抽着烟，背景是披上银装的东北黑土地，前景是中国人逢年过节必挂的红灯笼。
HYP: In the movie poster released today, Wang Jixiang, a member of the family, is sitting in the center of the picture, smoking a cigarette. The background is the black land of Northeast China dressed in silver, and in the foreground is the red lantern that Chinese people always hang on New Year's Day.

SRC: 象征着喜庆、团圆的红灯笼与身影落寞的王吉祥形成了巨大反差，似乎也透露了这个大家庭关系中的复杂与纠结。
HYP: The red lanterns symbolizing joy and reunion form a huge contrast with the lonely Wang Jixiang, which seems to reveal the complexity and entanglement in this big family relationship.

SRC: 据悉，影片中，除了“三舅”王吉祥的女儿由演员刘陆扮演，其余戏份均由真实的导演家人完成，影片实验性的视听风格，打破了戏剧与真实的边界，带给观众全新的浸入式观影体验。
HYP: It is reported that in the film, except for the daughter of "third uncle" Wang Jixiang, who is played by actor Liu Lu, the rest of the scenes are completed by the real director's family. The experimental audio-visual style of the film breaks the boundaries between drama and reality, bringing the audience a brand-new immersive viewing experience.

SRC: 据导演大鹏介绍，《吉祥如意》的创作源自“一场天意” ， 拍摄期间家庭突如其来的一系列变故，让原本的拍摄计划不得不随之改变，没有剧本的生活最终被记录成电影，却释放出超越设计的张力。
HYP: According to director Dapeng, the creation of "Auspicious Ruyi" originated from "a providence". During the filming period, a series of sudden family changes forced the original shooting plan to change accordingly. The life without a script was finally recorded as a movie, but it released a tension beyond the design.

SRC: 导演大鹏究竟如何面对这场“天意” ， 又该如何继续迎接这场天意带来的种种改变呢？
HYP: How did director Dapeng face this "destiny", and how should he continue to meet the various changes brought about by this providence?

SRC: 毫无疑问《吉祥如意》是充满实验性的，几乎全素人的阵容和创新的视听风格将镜头前的生活变成了一部电影，在真实影像的包裹下，观众也会从影片所呈现的家庭中找到自己和家人的影子，随着影片中这场家庭聚会的落幕，唤起一系列思考。
HYP: There is no doubt that "Lucky Wishes" is full of experiments. The almost all-amateur lineup and innovative audio-visual style turn the life in front of the camera into a movie. Under the wrapping of real images, the audience will also find the shadow of themselves and their families from the family presented in the movie. With the end of the family gathering in the movie, a series of thoughts will be aroused.

SRC: NEWS.GOV.MO: 新型冠状病毒感染应变协调中心查询热线统计数字(7月25日08H00-7月26日08H00)
HYP: NEWS.GOV.MO: Statistics on the inquiry hotline of the Novel Coronavirus Infection Response Coordination Center (July 25th 08H00 - July 26th 08H00)

SRC: 由2020年07月25日08H00 至7月26日08H00，新型冠状病毒感染应变协调中心的查询热线共接获292宗电话查询。
HYP: From 08H00 on July 25, 2020 to 08H00 on July 26, 2020, the Novel Coronavirus Infection Response and Coordination Centre's enquiry hotline received a total of 292 telephone enquiries.

SRC: 关于疫情的291宗查询，已即时转线至相关部门代表跟进，情况如下：
HYP: The 291 inquiries about the epidemic have been immediately transferred to representatives of relevant departments for follow-up. The situation is as follows:

SRC: 卫生局271宗(涉及：查询关于隔离；查询核酸检测；查询两地牌；健康码；其他。）
HYP: 271 cases from the Health Bureau (involving: inquiries about isolation; inquiries about nucleic acid testing; inquiries about license plates in two places; health codes; others.)

SRC: 治安警察局17宗(涉及：查询出入境措施；查询粤澳两地牌车辆出入境措施；查询珠海政务热线；查询证件逗留问题。）
HYP: 17 cases at the Public Security Police Station (involving: enquiry on immigration measures; enquiries on immigration measures for vehicles with license plates from Guangdong and Macao; enquiries on the Zhuhai government affairs hotline; enquiries on visa stay issues.)

SRC: 旅游局1宗(涉及：查询隔离酒店问题。）
HYP: 1 case from the Tourism Bureau (Involved: Inquiry about the issue of quarantine hotels.)

SRC: 教育暨青年局1宗(涉及：查询澳门学生返回英国读书的方法。）
HYP: 1 case from the Education and Youth Bureau (Involves: inquiring about how Macao students return to study in the UK.)

SRC: 海事及水务局1宗(涉及：询问香港渔船进港是否需要向海事及水务局申报及核酸检测相关事宜。）
HYP: 1 case from the Maritime and Water Affairs Bureau (Involving: asking whether Hong Kong fishing vessels need to declare to the Maritime and Water Affairs Bureau and nucleic acid testing related matters when entering the port.)

SRC: 马里尼切夫说，价值的变化受卢布贬值和疫情等影响。
HYP: Malinichev said that the change in value was affected by the depreciation of the ruble and the epidemic.

SRC: 他说“服务成本正在增加。
HYP: "Service costs are increasing," he said.

SRC: 由于疫情，人们开始在互联网上花费更多的时间。”
HYP: People are starting to spend more time on the internet because of the pandemic."

SRC: 马里尼切夫不排除年互联网价格将严重上涨，认为运营商可以为客户提供更高的速度和更多服务抵消人们对价格上涨的不满。
HYP: Malinichev did not rule out a serious increase in internet prices this year, arguing that operators could offer customers higher speeds and more services to offset people's dissatisfaction with price increases.

SRC: 《中国医生》筹拍致敬抗疫英雄-新华网
HYP: "Chinese Doctor" filming to pay tribute to anti-epidemic heroes - Xinhuanet

SRC: 近日，带着中国电影人对抗疫英雄的敬意，博纳影业集团董事长于冬、导演刘伟强(图左）在广州与钟南山院士，就抗疫题材影片《中国医生》的拍摄制作工作进行了座谈交流。
HYP: Recently, with the respect of Chinese filmmakers fighting the epidemic, Yu Dong, chairman of Bona Film Group, and director Liu Weiqiang (left) held a discussion with Academician Zhong Nanshan in Guangzhou on the filming and production of the anti-epidemic film "Chinese Doctor".

SRC: 博纳影业希望能借由《中国医生》，向所有战斗在疫情防控一线的医护、防疫工作者致敬！
HYP: Bona Film hopes to use "Chinese Doctor" to pay tribute to all the medical care and epidemic prevention workers who are fighting on the front line of epidemic prevention and control!

SRC: 2021年，该片将作为庆祝中国共产党建党100周年献礼影片全国公映。
HYP: In 2021, the film will be released nationwide as a tribute film to celebrate the 100th anniversary of the founding of the Communist Party of China.

SRC: 目前，博纳影业正在中宣部和国家电影局的安排部署下，广东省电影局及湖北省电影局的支持下，组织电影《中国机长》原班人马筹拍电影《中国医生》，这是一部反映在党中央的坚强领导下，全国人民团结一心抗击新冠肺炎疫情的影片。
HYP: At present, Bona Films is organizing the film "Chinese Doctor" under the arrangement of the Central Propaganda Department and the National Film Bureau, with the support of the Guangdong Film Bureau and the Hubei Provincial Film Bureau, to organize the film "Chinese Doctor". This is a film that reflects the strong leadership of the CPC Central Committee and the unity of the people across the country to fight the new crown pneumonia epidemic.

SRC: 影片聚焦武汉抗疫一线，将以武汉医护人员及各省市援鄂医疗队为人物背景，从人性的角度，运用独特的叙事，以及极具冲击力的镜头语言，全景展现抗疫一线充满奉献和牺牲精神的中国医护人员的感人故事。
HYP: The film focuses on the front line of Wuhan's anti-epidemic battle. It will take Wuhan medical staff and the medical teams of various provinces and cities as the background of the characters. From the perspective of human nature, it uses a unique narrative and highly impactful lens language to show a panoramic view of the touching stories of the Chinese medical staff who are full of dedication and sacrifice in the anti-epidemic front line.

SRC: 据了解，武汉解封之日的第一时间，博纳公司便克服重重困难，派出采拍小组深入疫情一线，与数百位医护工作者面对面交流了解、搜集资料，目前已经采访到了包括钟南山院士本人、广州驰援武汉第一人、广东援鄂医疗队，以及武汉金银潭医院、武汉协和医院、武汉大学中南医院、武汉中心医院等抗疫战线最前沿的白衣天使们，拍下了大量珍贵的第一手视频资料。
HYP: It is understood that as soon as Wuhan was unblocked, Bona Company overcame many difficulties and sent a shooting team to go deep into the front line of the epidemic to communicate face-to-face with hundreds of medical workers and collect information. At present, we have interviewed Academician Zhong Nanshan himself, the first person from Guangzhou to assist Wuhan, the Guangdong medical team to assist Hubei, and Wuhan Jinyintan Hospital, Wuhan Union Hospital, Wuhan University Zhongnan Hospital, Wuhan Central Hospital and other frontline anti-epidemic angels.

SRC: 据了解，武汉解封之日的第一时间，博纳公司便克服重重困难，派出采拍小组深入疫情一线，与数百位医护工作者面对面交流了解、搜集资料，目前已经采访到了包括钟南山院士本人、广州驰援武汉第一人、广东援鄂医疗队，以及武汉金银潭医院、武汉协和医院、武汉大学中南医院、武汉中心医院等抗疫战线最前沿的白衣天使们，<v>拍下了大量珍贵的第一手视频资料</v>。
HYP: It is understood that as soon as Wuhan was unblocked, Bona Company overcame many difficulties and sent a shooting team to go deep into the front line of the epidemic to communicate face-to-face with hundreds of medical workers and collect information. At present, we have interviewed Academician Zhong Nanshan himself, the first person from Guangzhou to assist Wuhan, the Guangdong medical team to assist Hubei, and Wuhan Jinyintan Hospital, Wuhan Union Hospital, Wuhan University Zhongnan Hospital, Wuhan Central Hospital and other frontline anti-epidemic angels.

SRC: 钟南山院士在此次座谈会中亦对电影的拍摄提出了期待和希望：“ 我很期待，希望你们不仅要走访一些抛头露面比较多的专家，还要更多地采访在一线埋头苦干的医务人员，他们是大多数。”
HYP: Academician Zhong Nanshan also put forward expectations and hopes for the filming in this symposium: "I am looking forward to it. I hope you will not only visit some experts who are more visible, but also interview more medical personnel who are working hard on the front line. They are the majority."

SRC: 他表示，他之前看过《我和我的祖国》《中国机长》，认为以普通人视角讲述大格局故事的方法就很好。
HYP: He said that he had seen "Me and My Motherland" and "Captain of China" before, and thought it would be a good way to tell a large-scale story from the perspective of ordinary people.

SRC: “现在一些国外朋友对中国还是有一些误解。”
HYP: "Now some foreign friends still have some misunderstandings about China."

SRC: 在谈到影片的传播时，钟南山院士表示，目前国外有些人喜欢将病毒贴上政治化标签，他希望电影能从人性的角度打动观众：“ 这部电影除了在中国放映以外，最好也能在国外放映，要用国内外观众都能理解的方式，用真正的人文精神打动观众。”
HYP: When talking about the spread of the film, Academician Zhong Nanshan said that at present, some people in foreign countries like to label the virus as politicized. He hopes that the film can impress the audience from a human point of view: "This film is not only screened in China, but it is also best to be screened abroad. In a way that can be understood by domestic and foreign audiences, it should impress the audience with a true humanistic spirit."

SRC: 钟南山院士还深情回忆了上世纪80年代的影片《人到中年》，“这么多年过去了，我对改革开放后电影印象最深的还是《人到中年》，当时我国外的医生朋友们都看哭了，如果《中国医生》能够起到这样的作用，那就很了不起了。”
HYP: Academician Zhong Nanshan also fondly recalled the film "People Reaching Middle Ages" in the 1980s. "After so many years, the film I have had the deepest impression on after the reform and opening up is "People Reaching Middle Ages". At that time, my foreign doctors and friends all cried. If "Chinese Doctor" can play such a role, it will be very remarkable."

SRC: 钟南山院士表示，如果《中国医生》能引起国外观众的共鸣，那就非常成功。
HYP: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that if "Chinese Doctor" can resonate with foreign audiences, it will be very successful.

SRC: 在座谈交流时，钟南山院士还分享了对当前国际疫情防控的意见和建议，“ 我相信人永远比病毒聪明。”
HYP: During the discussion and exchange, Academician Zhong Nanshan also shared his opinions and suggestions on the current international epidemic prevention and control, "I believe that people are always smarter than viruses."

SRC: 钟南山院士表示，虽说病毒难以预测，但从原始社会至今，人类已渡过了千难万险，如今现代社会有发达的医疗科技和社会管理措施，再加上全世界的医务人员、甚至老百姓都对科学应对新冠肺炎疫情有了基本认识，人们不会再像以前那么被动，“接下来要注意两个方面的工作，一是要研究全世界怎么加强合作，二是注重对人们心灵的抚慰” 。
HYP: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that although the virus is difficult to predict, human beings have survived thousands of hardships since the primitive society. Nowadays, modern society has advanced medical technology and social management measures. In addition, medical staff and even ordinary people all over the world have a basic understanding of the scientific response to the new crown pneumonia epidemic. People will no longer be as passive as before. "Next, we should pay attention to two aspects of work. One is to study how the world can strengthen cooperation, and the other is to focus on comforting people's hearts."

SRC: （记者王金跃）
HYP: (Reporter Wang Jinyue)

SRC: 文旅“红果”聚韶山—湘潭首届红博会见闻-今日要闻-湖南日报网-华声在线
HYP: Cultural Tourism "Red Fruit" Gathers in Shaoshan - News of the First Red Expo in Xiangtan - Today's News - Hunan Daily - Huasheng Online

SRC: 湖南日报·新湖南客户端记者蒋睿通讯员肖燕
HYP: Hunan Daily·New Hunan Client Reporter Jiang Rui Correspondent Xiao Yan

SRC: 嘉兴红船模具、韶山毛泽东铜像、延安布堆花工艺品、湘西永顺腊肉…… 7月25日，2020湖南红色旅游文化节在韶山开幕。
HYP: Jiaxing Red Boat Mould, Shaoshan Mao Zedong Bronze Statue, Yan'an Budui Flower Crafts, Xiangxi Yongshun Bacon... On July 25th, the 2020 Hunan Red Tourism Culture Festival opened in Shaoshan.

SRC: 作为主体活动之一，湘潭首届红色文化产业博览会在韶山全域旅游咨询集散中心开展。
HYP: As one of the main activities, the first Xiangtan Red Cultural Industry Expo was held in the Shaoshan Global Tourism Consulting Distribution Center.

SRC: 展览区红色文创产品、革命老区土特产品等琳琅满目，引来各地游客争相购买。
HYP: The exhibition area is full of red cultural and creative products, native products from the old revolutionary base areas, etc., attracting tourists from all over the world to buy them.

SRC: “此次红博会，既是全国红色文化产业成果的一次展示，也是参展单位和企业交流经验、探讨发展路径的一个重要平台。”
HYP: "The Red Expo is not only a display of the achievements of the national red cultural industry, but also an important platform for exhibitors and enterprises to exchange experiences and discuss development paths."

SRC: 湘潭首届红博会执委会相关负责人介绍，这届红博会以“弘扬红色文化助推文旅升温”为主题，展览总面积近3000平方米，设置了氛围营造区、景区展示展陈区和红色文旅网游网购体验区。
HYP: According to the relevant person in charge of the executive committee of the first Xiangtan Red Expo, the theme of this Red Expo is "promoting red culture and boosting cultural tourism". The total exhibition area is nearly 3000 square meters, and it has set up an atmosphere creation area, a scenic area exhibition and exhibition area and a red cultural tourism online shopping experience area.

SRC: 邀请浙江嘉兴、贵州遵义、陕西延安等8个外省地市以及我省长沙、株洲、岳阳、郴州等地137家企业、单位参展，共展出展品768种，包括红色文物、工艺品、食品特产、旅游线路、红色培训课程、红色文创产品等。
HYP: Eight provinces and cities including Jiaxing, Zhejiang, Zunyi, Guizhou, Yan'an, Shaanxi, and 137 enterprises and units from Changsha, Zhuzhou, Yueyang, Chenzhou and other places in our province were invited to participate in the exhibition. A total of 768 exhibits were exhibited, including red cultural relics, handicrafts, food specialties, tourist routes, red training courses, and red cultural and creative products.

SRC: 展销区将展至7月29日。
HYP: The exhibition area will be on display until July 29.

SRC: 作为红博会东道主，湘潭展区亮点纷呈。
HYP: As the host of the Red Expo, the Xiangtan exhibition area is full of highlights.

SRC: 展区负责人介绍，湘潭展区分为红色工业、红色文化产业发展两大部分。
HYP: According to the person in charge of the exhibition area, the Xiangtan exhibition area is divided into two parts: the development of red industry and the development of red cultural industry.

SRC: 红色工业展区展出华菱湘钢、华菱线缆、湘电动力等6家企业的展品31件，红色文化产业发展展区展出红色系列图书、红色系列食品、红色系列文创产品等27家单位产品近200个。
HYP: The red industry exhibition area exhibited 31 exhibits from 6 companies including Valin Xianggang, Valin Cable and Xiangdian Power, and the red cultural industry development exhibition area exhibited nearly 200 products from 27 units including red series books, red series food, and red series cultural and creative products.

SRC: 在延安展区，不少游客被陈展的布堆花手工艺品和剪纸艺术品所吸引。
HYP: In the Yan'an exhibition area, many tourists were attracted by the cloth pile flower handicrafts and paper-cut artworks on display.

SRC: 延安市文旅局局长马东坡介绍，此次参展精心选择了延安近两年来优秀的红色文创产品，其中16种产品是2019全国红色文创产品优秀作品。
HYP: Ma Dongpo, director of the Yan'an Municipal Bureau of Culture and Tourism, introduced that the exhibition has carefully selected excellent red cultural and creative products in Yan'an in the past two years, of which 16 products are outstanding works of national red cultural and creative products in 2019.

SRC: 同时，他们邀请了国家级非物质文化遗产保护项目“安塞剪纸”、“陕北民歌”与省级非遗项目延川布堆画传承人，重点推介延安民俗特色产品，并借此机会与其他展区单位企业沟通交流，推动跨区域合作。
HYP: At the same time, they invited the inheritors of the national intangible cultural heritage protection project "Ansai Paper-cutting", "Northern Shaanxi Folk Song" and the provincial intangible cultural heritage project Yanchuan Budui Painting, focusing on promoting Yan'an folk custom products, and taking this opportunity to communicate with other companies in the exhibition area to promote cross-regional cooperation.

SRC: 膜分离技术助力破解“温室效应” - 中新网
HYP: Membrane Separation Technology Helps Crack the "Greenhouse Effect" - Xinhua English.news.cn

SRC: 膜分离技术助力破解“温室效应”
HYP: Membrane Separation Technology Helps Crack the "Greenhouse Effect"

SRC: 新型混合基质膜制备技术示意图
HYP: Schematic diagram of the preparation technology of a new mixed matrix membrane

SRC: 本报讯记者商瑞报道：日前，天津大学大气环境与生物能源团队针对“膜分离法捕集二氧化碳”取得重大进展，成功研发出新型混合基质膜制备技术，大幅提升膜材料二氧化碳捕集性能。
HYP: Reporter from this newspaper Shang Rui reported: Recently, Tianjin University's atmospheric environment and bioenergy team has made significant progress in the "capture of carbon dioxide by membrane separation method", and successfully developed a new hybrid matrix membrane preparation technology, which greatly improves the carbon dioxide capture performance of the membrane material.

SRC: 相关成果已作为国际期刊《温室气体：科学与技术》封面文章发表。
HYP: The relevant results have been published as the cover article of the international journal Greenhouse Gases: Science and Technology.

SRC: “温室效应”是困扰人类发展的重大环境问题，二氧化碳排放则是造成“温室效应”的元凶。
HYP: The "greenhouse effect" is a major environmental problem plaguing human development, and carbon dioxide emissions are the culprit of the "greenhouse effect".

SRC: 如何高效捕获并利用人类排放的二氧化碳是科学家关注的焦点。
HYP: How to efficiently capture and use the carbon dioxide emitted by humans is the focus of scientists.

SRC: “膜分离法”是一种新兴的二氧化碳捕集技术，它在膜材料帮助下分离二氧化碳气体，具有高效节能、操作简单的特点。
HYP: "Membrane separation method" is an emerging carbon dioxide capture technology, which separates carbon dioxide gas with the help of membrane materials, and has the characteristics of high efficiency, energy saving and simple operation.

SRC: 如何让膜材料“深呼吸”， 提高气体分离效率，是采用膜分离法捕集二氧化碳的瓶颈难点。
HYP: How to make the membrane material "breathe deeply" and improve the gas separation efficiency is the bottleneck and difficulty of using the membrane separation method to capture carbon dioxide.

SRC: 天津大学科研团队创新思路，通过反复实验，探究不同溶剂对膜气体分离性能的影响。
HYP: The scientific research team of Tianjin University has innovative ideas, and through repeated experiments, explores the influence of different solvents on the membrane gas separation performance.

SRC: 实验结果表明，以N-甲基吡咯烷酮作为制备溶剂，生成的膜材料中碳纳米管分布更加均匀，“更透气”，有效提升了膜材料气体分离效能和速率。
HYP: The experimental results show that using N-methylpyrrolidone as the preparation solvent, the carbon nanotubes in the produced membrane material are more evenly distributed and "more breathable", which effectively improves the gas separation efficiency and rate of the membrane material.

SRC: 用这种新技术制备的混合基质膜，二氧化碳分离性能接近目前此类膜材料的理论分离上限。
HYP: The carbon dioxide separation performance of the mixed matrix membrane prepared by this new technology is close to the theoretical separation upper limit of the current type of membrane material.

SRC: “新技术为膜分离法捕集二氧化碳提供了新思路。”
HYP: "The new technology provides new ideas for the capture of carbon dioxide by membrane separation."

SRC: 天津大学大气环境与生物能源团队成员李润表示：“ 我们希望这种技术能够为未来燃煤电厂与化工企业处理烟气提供有力支持，在控制温室气体排放等领域发挥重大作用。”
HYP: Li Run, a member of Tianjin University's atmospheric environment and bioenergy team, said: "We hope that this technology can provide strong support for the treatment of flue gas in coal-fired power plants and chemical companies in the future, and play a major role in controlling greenhouse gas emissions."

SRC: 首度成立专委会、集体签“长约” 第三届进博会参展商联盟构筑“进博纽带” - 新华网
HYP: Establishing a special committee for the first time and collectively signing a "long-term contract" The third China International Import Expo Exhibitor Alliance builds a "China Import and Export Fair" - Xinhuanet

SRC: 7月26日在上海拍摄的第三届进博会参展商联盟第一次会议现场。
HYP: The first meeting of the Exhibitor Alliance of the Third China International Import Expo was filmed in Shanghai on July 26.

SRC: 新华社上海7月26日电（记者周蕊）26日，第三届进口博览会参展商联盟在此间首次成立专业委员会，首批成立的专委会包括公共卫生防疫专委会和乳业专委会，35家成员企业还签订了3年长期参展合作备忘录，进博会参展商联盟的纽带作用不断增强。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Shanghai, July 26 (Reporter Zhou Rui) On the 26th, the Exhibitor Alliance of the Third China International Import Expo established a professional committee here for the first time. The first batch of committees included the Public Health and Epidemic Prevention Committee and the Dairy Industry Committee. 35 member companies have also signed a three-year long-term cooperation memorandum of participation, and the role of the alliance of exhibitors in the Expo has been continuously strengthened.

SRC: 26日在此间举行的第三届进博会参展商联盟第一次会议上，韩国现代、美国陶氏化学、日本资生堂、新西兰纽仕兰、德国西门子、法国米其林、英国阿斯利康等一批展盟成员企业签订了3年长期参展合作备忘录，<v>修订和完善后的展盟章程也首次公布</v>。
HYP: At the first meeting of the Exhibitor Alliance of the 3rd China International Import Expo held here on the 26th, a group of member enterprises of the exhibition alliance, including Hyundai, Dow Chemical, Shiseido, New Zealand, Siemens, Michelin of France, and AstraZeneca of the United Kingdom, signed a three-year long-term cooperation memorandum of cooperation.

SRC: 26日在此间举行的第三届进博会参展商联盟第一次会议上，韩国现代、美国陶氏化学、日本资生堂、新西兰纽仕兰、德国西门子、法国米其林、英国阿斯利康等一批展盟成员企业签订了3年长期参展合作备忘录，修订和完善后的展盟章程也首次公布。
HYP: At the first meeting of the Exhibitor Alliance of the 3rd China International Import Expo held here on the 26th, a group of member enterprises of the exhibition alliance, including Hyundai, Dow Chemical, Shiseido, New Zealand, Siemens, Michelin of France, and AstraZeneca of the United Kingdom, signed a three-year long-term cooperation memorandum of cooperation.

SRC: 7月26日在上海拍摄的乳业专业委员会成立仪式现场。
HYP: The inauguration ceremony of the Dairy Professional Committee was filmed in Shanghai on July 26.

SRC: 根据最新的章程，展盟将引入牵头单位轮值机制，加强专委会功能。
HYP: According to the latest charter, Zhanmeng will introduce a rotation mechanism for the lead unit to strengthen the function of the special committee.

SRC: 专委会将为行业发展趋势分析提出建议，推动行业可持续发展。
HYP: The special committee will make recommendations for the analysis of industry development trends and promote the sustainable development of the industry.

SRC: 同时，整合行业全产业链资源，以大带小，带动关联企业参展，将进博会打造成为行业企业聚集高地。
HYP: At the same time, the whole industry chain resources of the industry will be integrated, large and small, and related enterprises will be driven to participate in the exhibition, and the Expo will become a gathering place for industry enterprises.

SRC: 首次成立公共卫生防疫专委会，对于当前抗击新冠肺炎疫情来说显得尤为重要。
HYP: The establishment of a special committee for public health and epidemic prevention for the first time is particularly important for the current fight against the new crown pneumonia epidemic.

SRC: 作为第三届进博会公共卫生防疫<v>专委会</v>副会长单位，雅培快速诊断业务大中华区总经理仇建平说，下一步，雅培会携手更多行业伙伴，探索新的解决方案和合作模式，助力中国以及全世界抗击新冠肺炎疫情。
HYP: As the vice chairman unit of the Public Health and Epidemic Prevention Committee of the third China International Import Expo, Qiu Jianping, general manager of Abbott's rapid diagnostic business in Greater China, said that in the next step, Abbott will work with more industry partners to explore new solutions and cooperation models to help China and the world fight against the new crown pneumonia epidemic.

SRC: 7月26日在上海拍摄的公共卫生防疫专业委员会成立仪式现场。
HYP: The inauguration ceremony of the Public Health and Epidemic Prevention Committee was filmed in Shanghai on July 26.

SRC: 据悉，第三届进博会首次设立公共卫生防疫专区，截至目前已有近50家全球企业报名参展，展览面积超过1万平方米。
HYP: It is reported that the third China International Import Expo has set up a special area for public health and epidemic prevention for the first time. Up to now, nearly 50 global companies have signed up to participate in the exhibition, with an exhibition area of more than 10000 square meters.

SRC: 在2018年首届进博会期间，进博会参展商联盟由展商自发倡议成立，旨在成为优质参展企业交流合作平台、连接参展各方信息与资源共享平台，以及为促进中国与世界各国（地区）之间经贸商务往来与发展建言献策的智囊平台。
HYP: During the first CIIE in 2018, the CIIE Exhibitor Alliance was established by exhibitors on their own initiative, aiming to become a platform for high-quality exhibitors to communicate and cooperate, to connect exhibitors with information and resource sharing platforms, and to provide a think tank for promoting economic and trade exchanges and development between China and countries (regions) around the world.

SRC: 截至目前，已有142家企业加入参展商联盟，覆盖全球23个国家和地区。
HYP: Up to now, 142 companies have joined the exhibitor alliance, covering 23 countries and regions around the world.

SRC: 比利时3岁女童死于新冠病毒感染-新华网
HYP: Belgian 3-year-old girl dies from coronavirus - Xinhua English.news.cn

SRC: 比利时卫生部门24日说，一名3岁女童死于新冠病毒感染，是该国最年幼的新冠病亡患者。
HYP: The Belgian health department said on the 24th that a 3-year-old girl died of a new crown virus infection, the youngest person in the country to die from the new crown virus.

SRC: 比利时卫生部门发言人布德温·卡特里说，这名女童感染新冠病毒前已经有其他严重疾病；除了这名女童，近期还有一名18岁青年死于新冠病毒感染。
HYP: Belgian health department spokesman Budwin Carter said that the girl had other serious illnesses before she contracted the new coronavirus; in addition to the girl, an 18-year-old young man recently died from the new coronavirus infection.

SRC: 卡特里说，上周比利时85%新增新冠确诊人员年龄在60岁以下。
HYP: Katri said that 85 percent of new cases of coronavirus in Belgium last week were under the age of 60.

SRC: 他提醒身体健康、年龄较轻的民众不要掉以轻心。
HYP: He reminded healthy, younger people not to take it lightly.

SRC: “虽然年轻人死于新冠病毒感染的情况较为罕见，但没有任何人现在具备免疫力。 ”
HYP: "While it is rare for young people to die from COVID-19, no one is immune now."

SRC: 上周，比利时新增新冠确诊病例比前一周增长89 % ， 每日平均2.9人死于新冠病毒感染，高于前一周的日均1.7人。
HYP: Last week, the number of new confirmed cases of new crown in Belgium increased by 89% compared with the previous week, and the daily average of 2.9 people died from the new crown virus infection, up from the previous week's daily average of 1.7.

SRC: 欧洲疫情高峰期间，比利时人口中新冠病毒感染者占比在欧洲“名列前茅” 。
HYP: During the peak of the European epidemic, the proportion of people infected with the new crown virus in the Belgian population was "the highest" in Europe.

SRC: 比利时有1100多万人口。
HYP: Belgium has a population of over 11 million.

SRC: 最新数据显示，比利时累计64847人感染新冠病毒。
HYP: The latest data show that a total of 64847 people in Belgium have been infected with the new crown virus.

SRC: 卡特里本周早些时候警告，在雪球越滚越大、最终造成“雪崩”前，人们必须采取行动。
HYP: Carter warned earlier this week that people must act before the snowballs get bigger and bigger and eventually create an "avalanche".

SRC: 为抑制疫情反弹，比利时首相索菲·维尔梅斯23日宣布，人们在公共场所佩戴口罩的有关规定将更加严格，8月进一步解除限制性措施的方案也将暂缓执行。
HYP: In order to curb the rebound of the epidemic, Belgian Prime Minister Sophie Vermes announced on the 23rd that the relevant rules for people to wear masks in public places will be stricter, and the plan to further lift restrictive measures in August will also be suspended.

SRC: （郭倩） 【 新华社微特稿】
HYP: (Guo Qian) [Xinhua News Agency Micro Feature]

SRC: 大型融媒体行动《走村直播看脱贫》出发- 今日要闻- 湖南日报网- 华声在线
HYP: Large-scale financial media campaign "Walking Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation" starts - Today's News - Hunan Daily - Huasheng Online

SRC: 湖南日报·新湖南客户端7月25日讯(本报记者)7月25日，由中央广播电视总台财经节目中心主办的大型融媒体行动《走村直播看脱贫》从江苏徐州出发，两辆携带5G新媒体移动云制播系统的大篷车在现场嘉宾目送下，缓缓驶出现场。
HYP: Hunan Daily·New Hunan Client July 25th (our reporter) On July 25th, the large-scale financial media action "Walking Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation" sponsored by the Financial Program Center of the Central Radio and Television Station departed from Xuzhou, Jiangsu. Two caravans carrying 5G new media mobile cloud production and broadcasting systems slowly drove to the scene under the watch of the guests.

SRC: 习近平总书记指出，“2020年是具有里程碑意义的一年，我们将全面建成小康社会，实现第一个百年奋斗目标，2020年也是脱贫攻坚决战决胜之年”。
HYP: General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out that "2020 is a year of milestone significance. We will build a moderately prosperous society in all respects and achieve the first centenary goal. 2020 is also a decisive year in the fight against poverty."

SRC: 大型融媒体行动《走村直播看脱贫》是中央广播电视总台财经节目中心为配合这一重大主题，做好脱贫攻坚宣传的重要举措。
HYP: The large-scale financial media action "Walking the Village to Watch Poverty Alleviation" is an important measure for the Financial Program Center of the Central Radio and Television General Station to do a good job in promoting poverty alleviation in order to cooperate with this major theme.

SRC: 该行动将走进全国20多个省、自治区、直辖市的脱贫村，挖掘鲜活脱贫故事，直击村容村貌巨变，展现村民如何突破生存发展困境、走向致富之路的历程。
HYP: The action will go to poverty alleviation villages in more than 20 provinces, autonomous regions and municipalities across the country, excavate vivid stories of poverty alleviation, directly address the dramatic changes in the appearance of villages, and show how villagers have broken through the difficulties of survival and development and walked towards the road to prosperity.

SRC: 这次行动将持续3个多月。
HYP: The operation will last for more than 3 months.

SRC: 记者从徐州出发，兵分两路，一路走西南线，途经安徽、湖北、江西、湖南、广西、贵州、四川、重庆、云南、西藏等地;另一路走西北线，途经河南、陕西、甘肃、青海、新疆、宁夏、内蒙古、山西、河北等地，行程超过1万公里。
HYP: The reporter set off from Xuzhou and divided his troops into two routes. One route took the southwest route, passing through Anhui, Hubei, Jiangxi, Hunan, Guangxi, Guizhou, Sichuan, Chongqing, Yunnan, Tibet and other places; the other route took the northwest route, passing through Henan, Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Xinjiang, Ningxia, Inner Mongolia, Shanxi, Hebei and other places, with a journey of more than 10000 kilometers.

SRC: 在报道形式上，《走村直播看脱贫》大胆融合。
HYP: In the form of reporting, "Walking Village Live Watching Poverty Alleviation" boldly integrated.

SRC: 大篷车所到村庄的经济发展情况，都将通过中央广播电视总台央视财经频道、央广经济之声、中国交通广播、央视财经新媒体进行播出。
HYP: The economic development of the villages visited by the caravan will be broadcast through the CCTV Financial Channel of the Central Radio and Television General Station, the Voice of Economics of the Central Broadcasting Corporation, China Communications Broadcasting, and the new media of CCTV Finance and Economics.

SRC: 其中，电视直播将主要在央视财经频道的午间新闻节目《天下财经》完成(首播时间：周一至周日12：00-13:00 )，央视财经频道的黄金档新闻栏目《经济信息联播》将开设脱贫报道专栏(首播时间：周一至周日20：30-21:30 )。
HYP: Among them, the TV live broadcast will be mainly completed on CCTV Finance Channel's noon news program "World Finance" (first broadcast time: Monday to Sunday 12:00-13:00), CCTV Finance Channel's prime news column "Economic Information Network" will set up a poverty alleviation report column (first broadcast time: Monday to Sunday 20:30-21:30).

SRC: 同时，大篷车将对所到的每个村庄在央视财经客户端进行长达1小时的直播，观众通过下载央视财经APP，可以观看直播，参与抽奖活动。
HYP: At the same time, the caravan will broadcast live broadcasts for up to one hour on the CCTV Finance client for each village it visits. Viewers can watch the live broadcast and participate in the lottery by downloading the CCTV Finance APP.

SRC: 在技术应用和演播室设计上，《 走村直播看脱贫》勇于突破，首创了“外场新媒体大篷车”。
HYP: In terms of technology application and studio design, "Walking Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation" made a breakthrough and pioneered the "Outfield New Media Caravan".
