SRC: 该车搭载5G新媒体移动云制播系统，利用5G+4K/8K+AI技术，实现线上线下、大屏小屏，电视广播的有机结合。
HYP: The car is equipped with a 5G new media mobile cloud production and broadcast system, and uses 5G 4K/8K AI technology to realize the organic combination of online and offline, large and small screens, and TV broadcasting.

SRC: 配置三讯演播区，演播区由集装箱改装而成，长12米、宽2.55米、高3.98米，箱体采用液压自动展开结构，最大可以上翻120度。
HYP: Equipped with Sanxun studio area, the studio area is converted from a container, 12 meters long, 2.55 meters wide and 3.98 meters high. The box body adopts hydraulic automatic expansion structure, which can be turned up to 120 degrees at most.

SRC: 演播区也可以自动展开，并外接扩展平台，面积50多平方米，可以满足大部分节目的场景要求。
HYP: The studio area can also be automatically expanded, and an external expansion platform is connected, covering an area of more than 50 square meters, which can meet the scene requirements of most programs.

SRC: 张继科林小宅组队力挺有肌少年-新华网
HYP: Zhang Jikelin Xiaozhai team up to support muscular teenagers-Xinhua English.news.cn

SRC: 运动少年热血竞技秀《运动吧少年》在7月11日正式登陆湖南卫视。
HYP: Sports youth hot-blooded competition show "Sports Boys" officially landed on Hunan Satellite TV on July 11.

SRC: 运动领队张继科和运动助理林小宅跨界同台,林丹和傅园慧点评各有风格,而“庞然大物”般的力量拔杆装置的硬核上场,更让节目“燃”力十足。
HYP: Sports leader Zhang Jike and sports assistant Lin Xiaozhai cross-border on the same stage. Lin Dan and Fu Yuanhui commented on their own styles, and the hard core of the "monster"-like power pulling device made the show more "burning".

SRC: 首集中,11位运动少年亮相力量赛道,外形惊艳现场观众的同时,竞技台上的“强冲突”“强对抗”“强心脏”也受到关注。
HYP: In the first episode, 11 young athletic teenagers appeared on the power track, and their appearance was amazing to the audience. At the same time, the "strong conflict", "strong confrontation" and "strong heart" on the arena also attracted attention.

SRC: 其中,“ 强冲突”来自超A体育生乔文一,他在比赛前公然挑衅同赛道中有“花美男”之称的徐志滨,呛声徐志滨的外形条件应该去唱跳节目,甚至放出“输了别把妆哭花了”的狠话。
HYP: Among them, the "strong conflict" comes from Super A sports student Qiao Wenyi. He openly provoke Xu Zhibin, who is known as the "Beautiful Man" on the track before the game. He choked that Xu Zhibin's appearance conditions should be sung and jumped on the show, and even put out the cruel words of "If you lose, don't cry your makeup."

SRC: 一番言论让场上的少年和运动领队们都倒吸一口凉气。
HYP: The remarks made the teenagers and sports leaders on the field take a breath.

SRC: 而“强对抗”更像是神仙打架,被誉为“大魔王”的孙健淇碰上同样实力强劲的张鑫栋,上演强强对决。
HYP: The "strong confrontation" is more like a fight between the gods. Sun Jianqi, known as the "big devil", meets the equally powerful Zhang Xindong and staged a strong confrontation.

SRC: 而他们的身份也让人始料未及,孙健淇是热爱健身的演员,张鑫栋则是退役特战队员、三次勇士勋章获得者。
HYP: And their identities are unexpected. Sun Jianqi is an actor who loves fitness, and Zhang Xindong is a retired special forces member and three-time Warrior Medal winner.

SRC: 比赛一开始,两位少年就拼尽全力快速拔出小杆,在大杆上的持久对抗让现场观众为他们捏了一把汗。
HYP: At the beginning of the game, the two teenagers tried their best to quickly pull out the small pole. The long-lasting confrontation on the big pole made the audience sweat for them.

SRC: 在紧张的赛况下,张继科作为《运动吧少年》运动领队之一,也在一旁认真观战。
HYP: In the tense situation, Zhang Jike, as one of the sports leaders of "Sports Boy", also watched the game seriously.

SRC: 在点评环节,他也十分细心,对输了比赛的一方少年耐心鼓励,帮助复盘过程中的每一个失误点。
HYP: In the comment section, he was also very careful, patiently encouraged the teenager who lost the game, and helped every mistake in the process of resuming the game.

SRC: 而运动助理林小宅则是花式助攻,她毫不掩饰对颜值实力在线的少年们的欣赏。
HYP: Sports assistant Lin Xiaozhai is a fancy assist. She makes no secret of her appreciation for the youths who are online.

SRC: 在了解到运动少年们超负荷的日常训练时,更是心生敬佩。
HYP: When I learned about the daily training of sports teenagers who are overloaded, I admire them even more.

SRC: 同样是运动领队的林丹和傅园慧则各有风格,一个是气定神闲派“预言家” , 一个则是用笑容驱散紧张氛围的“洪荒少女” 。
HYP: Lin Dan and Fu Yuanhui, who are also the sports leaders, have their own styles. One is a "prophet" of the calm and relaxed school, and the other is a "preliminary girl" who uses a smile to dispel the tension.

SRC: 另外,吉克隽逸和刘烨作为运动助理,也围绕运动少年制造了不少爆笑话题。
HYP: In addition, Jike Junyi and Liu Ye, as sports assistants, also created a lot of hilarious topics around sports teenagers.

SRC: 法国南特教堂大火：教区志愿者承认纵火平时和善寡言-中新网
HYP: Church fire in Nantes, France: diocese volunteers admit to arson, usually kind and reticent-Chinanews.com

SRC: 中新网7月26日电据外媒报道，7月18日，法国南特的宗教历史建筑瑰宝、著名的圣彼得与圣保罗大教堂，在一场火灾当中受到严重损毁，大管风琴完全毁坏。
HYP: China News Service, July 26. According to foreign media reports, on July 18, the famous religious and historical architectural treasures in Nantes, France, the famous St. Peter and St. Paul Cathedral, were severely damaged in a fire, and the large pipe organ was completely destroyed.

SRC: 当地时间26日，南特检察官宣布，一名在大教堂当中负责保卫工作的教区志愿者已经被起诉，罪名是“纵火毁坏” 。
HYP: On the 26th local time, the Nantes prosecutor announced that a diocese volunteer who was responsible for the security of the cathedral had been charged with "arson and destruction."

SRC: 他已承认，是自己在教堂里点火。
HYP: He has admitted that he was lighting the fire in the church.

SRC: 报道称，当地检察官塞纳斯表示，这名39岁、来自卢旺达的教区志愿者承认，自己夜里在大教堂当中的三处点火。
HYP: According to the report, the local prosecutor Cenas said that the 39-year-old volunteer from the diocese of Rwanda admitted that he had set fire to three places in the cathedral at night.

SRC: 此人的律师则表示，纵火者现在很后悔做出这种事。
HYP: The person's lawyer said that the arsonists now regret doing such a thing.

SRC: 此人几年前通过避难的途径，进入法国，在本次火灾事发地教区得到庇护，在教堂里得到收留。
HYP: This person entered France through the route of asylum a few years ago, was sheltered in the parish where the fire happened, and taken in in the church.

SRC: 检方指出，最近，他尝试更新签证，正在和警察局对此进行对话沟通。
HYP: The prosecutor pointed out that recently, he tried to renew his visa and was in dialogue with the police station.

SRC: 但教堂方面表示仍然不敢相信，这名平时非常善良、面带笑容，但不怎么说话的信徒，会毁坏他如此热爱的教堂。
HYP: But the church said that he still couldn't believe that this very kind, smiling, but quiet believer would destroy the church he loves so much.

SRC: 7月18日火灾发生的当天，这名志愿者就已经因为叙述当中出现逻辑不通的问题，而接受过警方问询调查，但他后来被释放。
HYP: On the day the fire broke out on July 18, the volunteer had already been questioned and investigated by the police because of a logical problem in the narrative, but he was later released.

SRC: 图为消防员在现场进行救援。
HYP: The picture shows firefighters at the scene rescue.

SRC: 25日晚间，由于巴黎中央警察局实验室的专业工程师获取了新的证据，此人又再一次被传讯。
HYP: On the evening of the 25th, as professional engineers from the laboratory of the Central Police Department in Paris obtained new evidence, this person was once again interrogated.

SRC: 这一次，男子承认了自己纵火的行为。
HYP: This time, the man admitted to his arson.

SRC: 据报道，如果蓄意纵火毁坏的罪名成立，嫌犯将可能面临10年监禁和15万欧元的罚款。
HYP: According to reports, if the crime of deliberate arson and destruction is convicted, the suspect may face 10 years in prison and a fine of 150000 euros.

SRC: 报道称，此次大火给圣皮埃尔与圣保罗大教堂造成了严重损失，教堂内的管风琴被完全烧毁，管风琴后面的彩色玻璃窗也受损严重。
HYP: According to reports, the fire caused serious damage to the Cathedral of St. Pierre and St. Paul. The pipe organ in the church was completely burned and the stained glass window behind the pipe organ was also seriously damaged.

SRC: 法国历史保护建筑首席建筑师布鲁内认为，保守估计，南特大教堂复原工作至少要有3年。
HYP: Brunel, the chief architect of the French historical preservation building, believes that it is conservatively estimated that the restoration of the Nantes Cathedral will take at least three years.

SRC: 飓风“汉娜”登陆美得州或引发河水暴涨和山洪-中新网
HYP: Hurricane "Hanna" landed in the United States, may trigger river surges and flash floods-Chinanews.com

SRC: 中新网7月26日电综合外媒报道，当地时间25日下午5时，飓风“汉娜”登陆美国得克萨斯州，将给得州带来强风暴雨、河水暴涨，还可能引发威胁生命的山洪。
HYP: China News Service, July 26. According to comprehensive foreign media reports, at 5 pm local time on the 25th, Hurricane Hannah landed in Texas, USA. It will bring strong storms and rain to Texas, surge in river water, and may also trigger life-threatening flash floods.

SRC: 国家飓风中心说，预计飓风“汉娜”会挟带暴雨，扫过得州南部与东北部部分地区，雨势或引发部分溪水暴涨以及威胁生命的山洪爆发。
HYP: The National Hurricane Center said that hurricane "Hanna" is expected to carry heavy rain, sweeping through parts of southern and northeastern Texas, and the rain may cause some streams to skyrocket and life-threatening flash floods.

SRC: 报道称，受飓风“汉娜”影响最严重的是科珀斯克里斯蒂市以南到格兰德河河口地区，而里奥格兰德山谷可能爆发大范围的山洪。
HYP: According to reports, the most severely affected by Hurricane Hannah is the area south of Corpus Christi to the mouth of the Rio Grande River, and the Rio Grande Valley may have a large-scale flash flood.

SRC: 得州州长阿博特25日表示：“任何飓风都是一个巨大的挑战。”
HYP: Texas Governor Abbott said on the 25th: "Any hurricane is a huge challenge."

SRC: 该州有32个郡因为飓风进入灾难紧急状态。
HYP: Thirty-two counties in the state entered a disaster emergency due to the hurricane.

SRC: 科珀斯克里斯蒂市这座人口超32万的城市，已关闭图书馆与博物馆，居民严阵以待。
HYP: Corpus Christi, a city with a population of more than 320000, has closed libraries and museums, and residents are waiting.

SRC: 阿博特还说，在得州正在遭遇新冠疫情重创之际，不能再让这场飓风给得州带来更多伤亡。
HYP: Abbott also said that as Texas is hit hard by the new crown epidemic, the hurricane can no longer bring more casualties to Texas.

SRC: 据报道，得州南部地区降水量预计将在26日夜间达到6至12英寸，得克萨斯州北部地区和路易斯安那州沿海地区也将出现3至5英寸的降雨。
HYP: According to reports, precipitation in southern Texas is expected to reach 6 to 12 inches on the night of the 26th, and 3 to 5 inches of rain will also appear in northern Texas and coastal areas of Louisiana.

SRC: 由于全球变暖等因素影响，“汉娜”的形成早于以往的大西洋飓风季。
HYP: Due to global warming and other factors, "Hannah" formed earlier than the previous Atlantic hurricane season.

SRC: 一般情况下，大西洋的第一场飓风通常要到8月中旬才会形成。
HYP: Under normal circumstances, the first hurricane in the Atlantic Ocean usually does not form until mid-August.

SRC: 波兰将退出欧洲防止对女子施暴的条约
HYP: Poland will withdraw from European treaty to prevent violence against women

SRC: 波兰司法部星期六表示，波兰下个星期将采取步骤，退出欧洲防止对妇女施暴条约。
HYP: The Polish Ministry of Justice said on Saturday that Poland will take steps next week to withdraw from the European Treaty for the Prevention of Violence against Women.

SRC: 波兰右翼的政府内阁表示，该条约要求学校教授学生有关性别问题的议题，践踏了学生父母的权利。
HYP: The cabinet of the Polish right-wing government stated that the treaty required schools to teach students on gender issues and violated the rights of students' parents.

SRC: 波兰司法部长焦布洛举行记者会说，他领导的司法部星期一将向劳工和家庭部提出开始退出条约的要求。
HYP: Polish Minister of Justice Giobro held a press conference and said that his Ministry of Justice will ask the Ministry of Labor and Family to start withdrawing from the treaty on Monday.

SRC: 那项条约又名伊斯坦布尔公约。
HYP: That treaty is also known as the Istanbul Convention.

SRC: 焦布洛说，“该条约包含一些我们认为是有害的意思形态性质的元素。”
HYP: Giobro said, "The treaty contains some elements that we consider to be harmful."

SRC: 波兰执政的法律与公正党及其及其执政联盟伙伴跟罗马天主教教会有密切的同盟关系，提倡保守的社会议程。
HYP: Poland's ruling Law and Justice Party and its ruling coalition partners have a close alliance with the Roman Catholic Church and promote a conservative social agenda.

SRC: 波兰总统杜达在这个月成功的连任竞选期间将敌视同性恋权利作为主要议题之一。
HYP: Polish President Duda made hostility to gay rights one of the main issues during his successful re-election campaign this month.

SRC: 星期五，成千上万的波兰人(其中大部分是妇女)在华沙和其他一些城市举行反对退出公约的抗议。
HYP: On Friday, thousands of Poles (most of them women) held protests against withdrawal from the convention in Warsaw and other cities.

SRC: 抗议的组织者之一莱姆帕特在华沙举行的抗议游行中说，“退出条约的目的就是将家暴合法化”。
HYP: Lempat, one of the organizers of the protest, said in a protest march in Warsaw that "the purpose of withdrawing from the treaty is to legalize domestic violence."

SRC: 一些抗议者举着横幅，上面写着“法律与公正党是妇女的地狱”。
HYP: Some protesters held up banners that read "Law and Justice Party is a hell for women."

SRC: 法律与公正党长久以来抱怨伊斯坦布尔公约。
HYP: The Law and Justice Party has long complained about the Istanbul Convention.

SRC: 波兰先前的中间派执政的政府2015年批准了该公约。
HYP: The previous centrist government in Poland ratified the convention in 2015.

SRC: 法律与公正党政府表示，该条约不尊重宗教，要求在学校里教授自由派的社会政策。
HYP: The Law and Justice Party government stated that the treaty does not respect religion and requires that liberal social policies be taught in schools.

SRC: 但截至目前该党一直没有决定退出该公约。
HYP: But so far the party has not decided to withdraw from the convention.

SRC: （根据路透社报道）
HYP: (According to Reuters report)

SRC: 据越通社报道，格里沃里认为，越南25年来为东盟的发展作出巨大贡献。
HYP: According to Viet News Agency, Grivori believes that Vietnam has made great contributions to the development of ASEAN in the past 25 years.

SRC: 越南不仅是东盟负责任的一员，更是东盟的火车头。
HYP: Vietnam is not only a responsible member of ASEAN, but also the locomotive of ASEAN.

SRC: 格里沃里表示，俄罗斯乃至亚欧经济联盟认为，越南为东盟提高其地位，对外推广其形象做出贡献。
HYP: Greivoli said that Russia and the Asia-Europe Economic Union believe that Vietnam has contributed to ASEAN's improvement of its status and the promotion of its image to the outside world.

SRC: 他强调，“东盟因此应该感谢越南。”
HYP: He emphasized, “ASEAN should thank Vietnam for this.”

SRC: 格里沃里表示，分析人士对越南所提出的和平倡议给予认可。
HYP: Grivori said that analysts approve of Vietnam's peace initiative.

SRC: 越南愿意同东盟各国分享经验，对包括东海问题在内的亚太地区面临的问题提出建设性的和平措施。
HYP: Vietnam is willing to share experience with ASEAN countries and propose constructive peace measures on the issues facing the Asia-Pacific region, including the East China Sea issue.

SRC: 关于越南与俄罗斯在东盟框架下的合作，格里沃里认为，越南为俄罗斯与东盟的合作关系提供支持，帮助俄罗斯在这一合作框架下获得利益。
HYP: Regarding the cooperation between Vietnam and Russia under the ASEAN framework, Greivoli believes that Vietnam provides support for the cooperative relationship between Russia and ASEAN and helps Russia gain benefits under this cooperation framework.

SRC: 包括俄罗斯在内的亚欧经济联盟与越南签署自贸协定后能够进军东盟市场。
HYP: The Asia-Europe Economic Union, including Russia, can enter the ASEAN market after signing a free trade agreement with Vietnam.

SRC: 格里沃里建议最大限度扩大亚欧经济联盟与东盟各国的自由贸易区，进而创造经济和安全稳定的平台。
HYP: Greivoli proposed to maximize the free trade area between the Asia-Europe Economic Union and ASEAN countries, thereby creating a platform for economy, security and stability.

SRC: 格里沃里同时相信，俄罗斯、越南与东盟正在步入正轨并将实现其目标。
HYP: Greivoli also believes that Russia, Vietnam and ASEAN are on the right track and will achieve their goals.

SRC: 从现在到2020年底，北江省将具备必要条件，尤其是在基础设施，人力资源和土地等方面，以便主动迎来外资流入，特别是拥有价值链和转让先进技术的跨国集团。
HYP: From now to the end of 2020, Bac Giang Province will have the necessary conditions, especially in terms of infrastructure, human resources and land, in order to actively welcome the inflow of foreign capital, especially multinational groups that have value chains and transfer advanced technologies.

SRC: 此外，北江省将办理好递交政府总理决定对越韩工业区基础设施建设与经营项目投资的主张和批准将本省安山-北陇和安闾两个工业-城市-服务业区补充列入至2020年越南工业区发展总体规划的文件。
HYP: In addition, Bac Giang Province will complete the submission of the Prime Minister's decision to invest in infrastructure construction and operation projects in the Vietnam-Korea Industrial Zone and approve the addition of the province's Ansan-Beilong and Anlu industrial-urban-service industry zones to the 2020 Vietnam's industrial zone development master plan.

SRC: 与此同时，北江省着力加快各项目的进度，尤其是在和富、光州，双溪-内皇等工业园区集群的基础设施建设经营项目，为招商引资形成土地基金。
HYP: At the same time, Bac Giang Province is striving to accelerate the progress of various projects, especially the infrastructure construction and operation projects in the industrial park clusters of Hephu, Gwangju, Sungai Neihuang, etc., to form a land fund for investment promotion.

SRC: 在2020年内，北江省工贸局参就定工业区、工业集群规划建言献策，以纳入省规划。
HYP: In 2020, the Beijiang Provincial Bureau of Industry and Trade will participate in the planning of industrial parks and industrial clusters and provide suggestions and suggestions for inclusion in the provincial planning.

SRC: 北江省确定将发展工业园区集群与保障国防安全，保护生态环境，保障粮食安全相结合，进而助推工业均衡发展；拥有全面的电力，供水，交通和电信等基础设施，并与城市建设，贸易服务，工人住房和医疗卫生、教育等其他社会基础设施等相结合。
HYP: Bac Giang Province has decided to combine the development of industrial park clusters with the protection of national defense, the protection of the ecological environment, and the protection of food safety, thereby boosting the balanced development of industry; it has comprehensive infrastructure such as electricity, water supply, transportation and telecommunications, and is integrated with urban construction, trade services, workers' housing, and other social infrastructures such as health care and education.

SRC: 在工业区，北江省着力呼吁对电力，电子，电信设备，精密机械，辅助工业等领域中的高科技，清洁技术的投资项目。
HYP: In the industrial zone, Bac Giang Province is calling for investment projects in high-tech and clean technology in the fields of electric power, electronics, telecommunications equipment, precision machinery, and auxiliary industries.

SRC: 在工业园区集群，该省呼吁对生产、利用就地劳动力、尤其是农产品、食品加工等领域的中小型规模投资项目。
HYP: In the cluster of industrial parks, the province calls for small and medium-sized investment projects in the production and utilization of local labor, especially in the fields of agricultural products and food processing.

SRC: 未来，北江省将着力加快对北江市后勤物流中心的基础设施的投资，与工业园区集群同步发展，以优化货物、货币流通和有助于降低生产成本，提高货物价值，优化供应链，发展多式联运，从而为投资者投资于本省创造吸引力。
HYP: In the future, Beijiang Province will focus on accelerating the investment in the infrastructure of Beijiang City's logistics center and develop simultaneously with industrial park clusters to optimize the circulation of goods and currency and help reduce production costs, increase the value of goods, optimize the supply chain, and develop multimodal transportation, thereby creating attractiveness for investors to invest in the province.

SRC: （德国之声中文网）过去两周内，西班牙的新冠确冠病例大幅回升，多日出现上千新增病例。
HYP: (Deutsche Welle Chinese website) In the past two weeks, the number of confirmed new crown cases in Spain has risen sharply, with thousands of new cases in multiple days.

SRC: 英国政府周六（7月25日）晚间临时决定，从当地时间26日零点起，将西班牙从安全旅行名单中移除，从西班牙入境英国的人必须隔离14天。
HYP: The British government made an interim decision on Saturday night (July 25) to remove Spain from the safe travel list starting at midnight on the 26th local time. People entering the UK from Spain must be quarantined for 14 days.

SRC: 正在西班牙度假的英国游客听闻此项决定纷纷表示惊讶、担心、甚至愤怒，因为消息突如其来，令人措手不及。
HYP: British tourists who were on vacation in Spain expressed surprise, worry, and even anger when they heard this decision, because the news came unexpectedly and caught them off guard.

SRC: 据报道，英国交通大臣沙普斯（Grant Shapps）目前也在西班牙度假。
HYP: According to reports, British Transport Secretary Grant Shapps (Grant Shapps) is currently on holiday in Spain.

SRC: 英国发布隔离措施前，挪威也已宣布从西班牙返回挪威的人要进行为期10天的隔离。
HYP: Before the United Kingdom issued the quarantine measures, Norway had also announced that people returning from Spain to Norway would undergo a 10-day quarantine.

SRC: 法国和比利时建议本国居民放弃前方巴塞罗那以及周边地区度假的计划。
HYP: France and Belgium advise their residents to abandon their plans for vacations in Barcelona and surrounding areas ahead.

SRC: 这些地区的海滩人满为患，人与人之间无法保持社交距离，警察一度需要采取措施，以减少海滩游客的数量。
HYP: The beaches in these areas are overcrowded and social distancing cannot be maintained between people. At one time, the police needed to take measures to reduce the number of beach tourists.

SRC: 旅游业是西班牙的重要支柱产业
HYP: Tourism is an important pillar industry in Spain

SRC: 西班牙：这里是安全的
HYP: Spain: It's safe here

SRC: 针对英国做出的决定，西班牙外交部周日表示，该国疫情得到控制。
HYP: In response to the decision made by the United Kingdom, the Spanish Foreign Ministry said on Sunday that the country's epidemic was under control.

SRC: 西班牙外交部长冈萨雷斯（Arancha Gonzalez Laya）向媒体强调：" 西班牙是安全的，不仅对西班牙人而言，对游客来说也是安全的。"
HYP: Spanish Foreign Minister Arancha Gonzalez Laya emphasized to the media: "Spain is safe, not only for Spaniards, but also for tourists."

SRC: 西班牙政府将试图说服英国政府将巴利阿里群岛（Balearic Islands）和加那利群岛（Canary Islands）排除在隔离措施之外。
HYP: The Spanish government will try to persuade the British government to exclude the Balearic Islands and Canary Islands from the quarantine measures.

SRC: 理由是，这两个旅游胜地的感染率远低于英国本土。
HYP: The reason is that the infection rate of these two tourist destinations is much lower than that of the British mainland.

SRC: 为防止疫情扩散，西班牙加泰罗尼亚地区也已重启"禁足令"。
HYP: In order to prevent the spread of the epidemic, the Catalonia region of Spain has also restarted the "foot ban".

SRC: 旅游业是西班牙的重要支柱产业，而西班牙是最受英国游客青睐的度假地之一。
HYP: Tourism is an important pillar industry in Spain, and Spain is one of the most popular holiday destinations for British tourists.

SRC: 英国的这一决定预计将会使西班牙的旅游业大受影响。
HYP: The British decision is expected to greatly affect Spain's tourism industry.

SRC: 安静/任琛（德新社，路透社）
HYP: Quiet/Ren Chen (German News Agency, Reuters)

SRC: 中伏首日：北京暂别高温酷暑开启降雨模式-新华网
HYP: The first day of Zhongfu: Beijing bids farewell to the high temperature and heat, opens the rain mode-Xinhuanet.com

SRC: 新华社北京7月26日电（记者倪元锦）7月26日是今年的“中伏”首日。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 26 (Reporter Ni Yuanjin) July 26 is the first day of this year's "Zhong Fu".

SRC: 26日凌晨的大风骤雨对流天气，驱散了连日来笼罩在北京地区的高温酷暑，新一轮降雨天气将持续数日。
HYP: In the early morning of the 26th, the strong winds and showers and convective weather dispelled the high temperature and heat that had been shrouded in Beijing for several days, and a new round of rainy weather will continue for several days.

SRC: 北京市气象台26日11时发布称，26日北京有分散性阵雨（伴有弱雷电），日最高气温仅为27℃；夜间阴有小到中雨（伴有弱雷电），夜间最低气温为23℃。
HYP: The Beijing Meteorological Observatory announced at 11 o'clock on the 26th that there were scattered showers (with weak thunder and lightning) in Beijing on the 26th, and the daily maximum temperature was only 27℃; at night, there were light to moderate rain (with weak lightning) and the lowest temperature at night was 23℃.

SRC: 而在此前的24日至25日，北京全市处在高温蓝色预警中，大部地区日最高气温在37℃左右，局地出现超过40℃的高温。
HYP: From the 24th to the 25th, the city of Beijing was in the blue warning of high temperature. The daily maximum temperature in most areas was around 37℃, and the local high temperature exceeded 40℃.

SRC: 伏天是一年之中气温最高、潮湿、闷热的日子，一年有“三伏”，最热在中伏，中国百姓说的“苦夏”就在此时。
HYP: Futian is the hottest, humid, and sultry day of the year. There are "three-volts" throughout the year, and the hottest is in the mid-volt. The Chinese people say "bitter summer" at this time.

SRC: 入伏时，家家填满谷仓，民间有“一伏饺子二伏面”的说法。
HYP: When entering the vault, every family fills up the barn. There is a folk saying that "one dumpling and two noodles".

SRC: 根据目前预报，未来三天，北京多阴雨天气。
HYP: According to the current forecast, there will be more rainy weather in Beijing in the next three days.

SRC: 气象部门提示公众尽量减少山区游玩，谨防地质灾害。
HYP: The Meteorological Department reminds the public to minimize travel in the mountains and beware of geological disasters.

SRC: 据了解，今年的“中伏”有20天，从7月26日开始，至8月14日结束。
HYP: It is understood that this year's "Zhong Fu" has 20 days, starting on July 26 and ending on August 14.

SRC: 进入“中伏”后，人会感到身体乏力、食欲不振。
HYP: After entering the "Zhong Fu", people will feel fatigue and loss of appetite.

SRC: 饮食上可选择绿豆、薏仁等具有清热解暑、健脾开胃作用的食物，以及苦菜、苦瓜等苦味食物，可有助于增进食欲、祛除暑气。
HYP: In the diet, you can choose mung beans, barley, and other foods that have the effects of clearing heat and relieving heat, invigorating the spleen and appetizing, as well as bitter foods such as bitter vegetables and bitter gourd, which can help increase appetite and eliminate heat.

SRC: 《叮咚上线!老师好》下周上线薛兆丰领衔“知识发起人-新华网
HYP: "Dingdong Online! Hello Teacher" will be online next week, Xue Zhaofeng leads the "Knowledge Promoter"-Xinhuanet

SRC: 又有新综艺上线。
HYP: There is another variety show online.

SRC: 互动知识分享节目《叮咚上线!老师好》,将于7月20日起在湖南卫视播出。
HYP: The interactive knowledge sharing program "Dingdong Online! Hello Teacher" will be broadcast on Hunan Satellite TV from July 20th.

SRC: 据了解,节目将打造全新的全年龄青春课堂,一批有颜有型又有才的老师将上阵,挑战趣味性知识输出。
HYP: It is understood that the program will create a brand-new youth classroom for all ages, and a group of handsome and talented teachers will enter the battle to challenge the output of interesting knowledge.

SRC: 与以往老师群体在大众心中的严肃印象不同,《叮咚上线!老师好》集结的是一群颜值和才华兼具的知识代表。
HYP: Different from the serious impression of teachers in the public minds in the past, "Ding Dong is online! Teacher is good" gathers a group of knowledge representatives with both beauty and talent.

SRC: 他们既是来自各学科的青年知识榜样,还是一群会抖包袱、擅长寓教于乐的全能“段子手”。
HYP: They are not only young intellectual role models from various disciplines, but also a group of all-around "joke players" who can shake their burdens and are good at entertaining and entertaining.

SRC: 节目中,这群优秀青年知识榜样作为“知识分享官”,将要挑战趣味性的知识课堂。
HYP: In the program, this group of outstanding young knowledge role models as "knowledge sharing officers" will challenge interesting knowledge classes.

SRC: 他们需要通过有态度的知识输出,展现所在学科最有趣的一面,来打动在场的观众。
HYP: They need to show the most interesting aspect of their subject through an attitude of knowledge output to impress the audience present.

SRC: 而全年龄观众组成的“有道问问团”现场会提出百变问题,给“知识分享官”的授课提高难度,也给节目增添些许刺激的氛围。
HYP: The "You Dao Questioning Group" composed of audiences of all ages will raise ever-changing questions on the spot, making it more difficult to teach the "Knowledge Sharing Officer" and adding a little stimulating atmosphere to the program.

SRC: 据透露,此次“知识分享官”中有中国人民大学附属中学物理教师李永乐、考研指导名师张雪峰以及拥有十年从业经验的历史教师王磊等优秀青年教师,他们将以意想不到的方式向现场观众展现各个学科的“硬核”知识。
HYP: According to reports, the "Knowledge Sharing Officer" includes outstanding young teachers such as Li Yongle, a physics teacher in the middle school affiliated to Renmin University of China, Zhang Xuefeng, a famous teacher for postgraduate entrance examinations, and Wang Lei, a history teacher with ten years of experience. They will present the "hard core" knowledge of various subjects to the audience in an unexpected way.

SRC: 另外,节目还邀请经济学教授薛兆丰作为节目的“知识发起人”,联合“叮咚助教”杜海涛和靳梦佳,与观众畅谈青春,打造“<v>全民</v>青春公开课”。
HYP: In addition, the program also invited economics professor Xue Zhaofeng as the "knowledge initiator" of the program, and joined the "Dingdong Assistants" Du Haitao and Jin Mengjia to talk about youth with the audience and create a "public youth youth class".

SRC: 香港特区政府政务司司长：形势严峻全力抗疫-中新网
HYP: The Chief Secretary for Administration of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region Government: The situation is grim and the fight against the epidemic is fully committed-Chinanews.com

SRC: 新华社香港7月26日电香港特区政府政务司司长张建宗26日表示，香港新冠肺炎疫情形势持续严峻，若疫情转坏，特区政府将果断采取更严厉管控措施，进一步限制经营场所营业和减少市民外出空间。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 26. The Chief Secretary for Administration of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region Government Zhang Jianzong said on the 26th that the new crown pneumonia epidemic situation in Hong Kong continues to be severe. If the epidemic worsens, the Special Administrative Region government will decisively adopt more stringent control measures to further restrict business premises and reduce public outing space.

SRC: 但现阶段特区政府无意推出“居家令”或“禁足令”限制市民外出。
HYP: However, at this stage, the SAR government has no intention to introduce a "stay at home order" or a "foot-free order" to restrict citizens from going out.

SRC: 张建宗当日发表题为《形势严峻全力抗疫》的网志。
HYP: On the same day, Zhang Jianzong published a blog titled "The Situation is Severe, Fighting the Epidemic with All Strength".

SRC: 他表示，这一波疫情是半年以来最严峻的，未来两星期将会十分关键，要尽力防止病毒在社区进一步扩散。
HYP: He said that this wave of epidemic is the most severe in half a year, and the next two weeks will be very critical. We must do our best to prevent the virus from spreading further in the community.

SRC: 除了特区政府采取必要措施之外，市民自律和配合也非常重要。
HYP: In addition to the necessary measures taken by the SAR government, self-discipline and cooperation of citizens are also very important.

SRC: 他呼吁市民务必尽量留在家中，减少社交接触和外出用餐。
HYP: He urged citizens to stay at home as much as possible, reduce social contacts and eat out.

SRC: 市民应配合佩戴口罩的强制措施保护自己及他人，并注重个人和环境卫生及勤洗手，更应暂停非必要的亲友聚会或聚餐及减少到街市。
HYP: Citizens should cooperate with the compulsory measures to wear masks to protect themselves and others, and pay attention to personal and environmental hygiene and frequent hand washing. They should also suspend non-essential gatherings or gatherings of relatives and friends and reduce them to markets.

SRC: 他表示，中央一直十分关心香港疫情变化及支持特区政府防疫抗疫工作，并积极回应行政长官最新要求，在加大检测能力和改装亚洲国际博览馆为类似“方舱医院”的工作上提供协助。
HYP: He said that the central government has always been very concerned about the changes in the Hong Kong epidemic and supported the SAR government's epidemic prevention and anti-epidemic work, and actively responded to the latest request of the Chief Executive to provide assistance in increasing testing capabilities and refitting the Asia World Expo to work similar to "square cabin hospitals."

SRC: 张建宗表示，特区政府为特定高风险群组，即安老院舍、残疾院舍及护养院员工、餐厅员工、出租车司机和物业管理员工提供的免费病毒检测已全面展开，涉及人数多达40万。
HYP: Zhang Jianzong said that the SAR government has provided free virus testing for specific high-risk groups, namely, elderly homes, disabled homes and nursing home employees, restaurant employees, taxi drivers, and property management employees, and the free virus testing has been fully launched, involving as many as 400000 people.

SRC: 他十分关注出现在安老院舍的感染个案，特区政府已为安老院舍院友安排特定的临时检疫中心。
HYP: He is very concerned about the infection cases in residential care homes for the elderly. The SAR government has arranged specific temporary quarantine centers for residents of residential care homes for the elderly.

SRC: 他表示，特区政府正在位于新界大屿山的竹篙湾检疫中心附近兴建隔离检疫设施，预计可在9月底前提供额外700套隔离房。
HYP: He said that the SAR government is building an isolation and quarantine facility near the Penny's Bay Quarantine Center on Lantau Island in the New Territories and is expected to provide 700 additional isolation rooms by the end of September.

SRC: 行政长官也在19日宣布，特区政府将在竹篙湾检疫中心多兴建2000间隔离房，并争取于今年年底前落成。
HYP: The Chief Executive also announced on the 19th that the SAR government will build 2000 more quarantine rooms at the Penny's Bay Quarantine Center and strive to be completed by the end of this year.

SRC: 加上该隔离检疫中心已经投入使用的800间，年底前竹篙湾检疫中心预计可提供共3500间隔离房。
HYP: In addition to the 800 quarantine centers already in use, the Penny's Bay Quarantine Center is expected to provide a total of 3500 quarantine rooms by the end of the year.

SRC: 香港目前共有四个正在运作的隔离检疫中心，共提供约2600间隔离房。
HYP: There are currently four quarantine centers in operation in Hong Kong, providing a total of about 2600 quarantine rooms.

SRC: 此外，特区政府于24日重新启用位于香港岛的鲤鱼门公园度假村作为社区隔离设施，用于收治50岁以下有独立自理能力的患者。
HYP: In addition, the SAR government reopened the Lei Yue Mun Park Resort on Hong Kong Island on the 24th as a community isolation facility to treat patients under the age of 50 who have the ability to take care of themselves.

SRC: 美国首次以“人民币汇率低估”对中国展开反补贴调查
HYP: The US launches an anti-subsidy investigation against China for the first time with the "undervaluation of the renminbi exchange rate"

SRC: 针对美国商务部近日宣布，决定对原产于中国的扎带（束线带）产品发起反倾销反补贴调查，并就“人民币汇率低估“项目发起调查。
HYP: In response to the recent announcement of the US Department of Commerce, it has decided to initiate an anti-dumping and anti-subsidy investigation on cable ties (cable ties) originating in China, and to initiate an investigation on the "RMB exchange rate undervaluation" project.

SRC: 中国商务部指出，这是美国首次在反补贴案件中立案调查所谓”人民币汇率低估“项目，中方对此坚决反对。
HYP: The Ministry of Commerce of China pointed out that this is the first time that the United States has initiated an investigation into the so-called "RMB undervaluation" project in an anti-subsidy case. China firmly opposes this.

SRC: 中国商务部23日晚间特别就此发布新闻稿表示，中国实行以市场供求为基础、参考一篮子货币进行调节、有管理的浮动汇率制度，市场在汇率形成中起决定性作用。
HYP: China's Ministry of Commerce issued a press release on the evening of the 23rd, stating that China implements a managed floating exchange rate system based on market supply and demand, with reference to a basket of currencies, and that the market plays a decisive role in the formation of the exchange rate.

SRC: 新闻稿强调，总体上，人民币汇率处于合理均衡水平，并没有被低估。
HYP: The press release emphasizes that, in general, the RMB exchange rate is at a reasonable equilibrium level and has not been undervalued.

SRC: 自2005年以来，人民币对美元已<v>累计</v>升值超过17% 。
HYP: Since 2005, the RMB has appreciated against the US dollar by more than 17%.

SRC: 根据国际清算银行公布的数据，2005年初至2020年5月，人民币名目有效汇率升值38%，实际有效汇率升值49%，是G20经济体中最强势的货币，在全球范围内也是升值幅度最大的货币之一。
HYP: According to data released by the Bank for International Settlements, from the beginning of 2005 to May 2020, the nominal effective exchange rate of the renminbi appreciated by 38%, and the real effective exchange rate appreciated by 49%. It is the strongest currency in the G20 economy and one of the currencies with the largest appreciation in the world.

SRC: 商务部指出，汇率问题超出了成员按照世界贸易组织规则进行反补贴调查的权限。
HYP: The Ministry of Commerce pointed out that the exchange rate issue is beyond the competence of members to conduct countervailing investigations in accordance with the rules of the World Trade Organization.

SRC: 美国今年2月修改法规以对别国汇率进行反补贴调查，已涉嫌违反世贸组织WTO规则，受到多方面反对。
HYP: The United States revised its regulations in February this year to conduct countervailing investigations on the exchange rates of other countries. It has been suspected of violating WTO rules and has been opposed by many quarters.

SRC: 新闻稿称，即使按照美国法规，申请人的申诉内容也存在大量错误，不具备财政资助、利益授予和专向性等反补贴必备要素。
HYP: The press release stated that even in accordance with US regulations, the applicant's complaint contained a large number of errors and did not possess the necessary elements for countervailing such as financial assistance, granting of benefits, and specificity.

SRC: 中方敦促美方遵守现有国际规则，停止对所谓“人民币汇率低估”进行反补贴调查。
HYP: China urges the United States to abide by existing international rules and stop countervailing investigations into the so-called "undervaluation of the RMB exchange rate."

SRC: 受中美关系紧张情势进一步升高影响，离岸、在岸人民币对美元汇率22日盘中一度大贬，双双跌破1美元兑人民币7.0元关口。
HYP: Affected by the increased tension in Sino-US relations, the offshore and onshore RMB exchange rates against the US dollar fell sharply on the 22nd, and both fell below the US$1 to RMB 7.0 mark.

SRC: 受中美关系紧张情势进一步升高影响，离岸、在岸人民币对美元汇率22日<v>盘中</v>一度大贬，双双跌破1美元兑人民币7.0元关口。
HYP: Affected by the increased tension in Sino-US relations, the offshore and onshore RMB exchange rates against the US dollar fell sharply on the 22nd, and both fell below the US$1 to RMB 7.0 mark.

SRC: 美国商务部此举是否意在逼升人民币值得关注。
HYP: Whether the US Department of Commerce's move is intended to force the yuan to rise is worth watching.

SRC: 人民币对美元即期汇价23日升破7.0大关，收在6.9961。
HYP: The spot exchange rate of the RMB against the US dollar rose above the 7.0 mark on the 23rd to close at 6.9961.

SRC: 受官方调控的人民币对美元汇率中间价，24日下调17个基本点，报6.9938。
HYP: The central parity of the renminbi against the US dollar under official regulation was lowered by 17 basis points to 6.9938 on the 24th.

SRC: 26日是菲律宾总统杜特尔特发表<v>任内</v>第五份国情咨文(SONA)前一日，当天菲律宾累计确诊新冠肺炎病例过8万，其中总统府新闻部(PCOO)及其直属机构职员确诊数增到25例。
HYP: The 26th was the day before Philippine President Duterte issued his fifth State of the Union address (SONA). On that day, the Philippines had a total of 80000 confirmed cases of new coronary pneumonia. Among them, the number of confirmed cases by the staff of the President's Office of Information (PCOO) and its directly affiliated institutions increased to 25.

SRC: 26日是菲律宾总统杜特尔特发表任内第五份国情咨文(SONA)前一日，当天菲律宾累计确诊新冠肺炎病例过8万，其中总统府新闻部(PCOO)及其直属机构职员确诊数增到25例。
HYP: The 26th was the day before Philippine President Duterte issued his fifth State of the Union address (SONA). On that day, the Philippines had a total of 80000 confirmed cases of new coronary pneumonia. Among them, the number of confirmed cases by the staff of the President's Office of Information (PCOO) and its directly affiliated institutions increased to 25.

SRC: 为此，PCOO已专门准备一个未接触过确诊职员的工作组，配合杜特尔特总统发表SONA的新闻发布工作。
HYP: To this end, PCOO has specially prepared a working group that has not contacted the confirmed staff to cooperate with President Duterte's press release of SONA.

SRC: PCOO部长马丁·安达纳尔26日接受DZBB电台采访表示，已为杜特尔特总统发表SONA方式预备两套方案。
HYP: PCOO Minister Martin Andanal said in an interview with DZBB Radio on the 26th that two plans have been prepared for President Duterte's SONA method.

SRC: 按A计划，杜特尔特27日下午将在位于奎松市的菲律宾国会(Batasang Pambansa)大楼发表SONA。
HYP: According to plan A, Duterte will announce SONA at the Philippine Congress (Batasang Pambansa) building in Quezon City on the afternoon of the 27th.

SRC: 因为疫情原因，现场只为部分政府内阁成员和立法者安排50个席位，另专设视频会议室供其他内阁成员、地方政府官员等观看。
HYP: Due to the epidemic, only 50 seats were arranged for some government cabinet members and legislators at the scene, and a special video conference room was set up for other cabinet members and local government officials to watch.

SRC: 所有参会人员当天通过快速检测才能进入国会大楼。
HYP: All participants can enter the parliament building after passing a quick test on the same day.

SRC: 一旦参会者有一人检测呈阳性，即启动B计划，即杜特尔特总统在总统府马拉卡南宫发表SONA，现场则安排更少的听会席位。
HYP: Once one of the participants tested positive, plan B was initiated, that is, President Duterte announced SONA at the Presidential Palace in Malacañang, and fewer seats were arranged for the audience.

SRC: 按照惯例，SONA将实时向菲全国直播。
HYP: As usual, SONA will broadcast live to the Philippines in real time.

SRC: 截至发稿时，菲总统府尚未确认杜特尔特的家人是否会出席SONA。
HYP: As of press time, the Philippine Presidential Palace has not confirmed whether Duterte's family will attend SONA.

SRC: 安达纳尔说，杜特尔特总统的SONA，将重点说明政府将如何带领菲律宾应对新冠肺炎疫情、恢复社会经济生活；还会提到他上任时的承诺，即反政府腐败、打击非法毒品和减贫。
HYP: Andanar said that President Duterte's SONA will focus on how the government will lead the Philippines to respond to the new crown pneumonia epidemic and restore social and economic life; he will also mention his promises when he took office, namely, anti-government corruption, combating illegal drugs and poverty reduction.

SRC: 杜特尔特还将说明本届政府的其他计划，包括创造更多的就业机会、振兴经济、促进教育，以及帮助在疫情中受难的海外菲律宾劳工等。
HYP: Duterte will also explain other plans of the current administration, including creating more job opportunities, revitalizing the economy, promoting education, and helping overseas Filipino workers who are suffering from the epidemic.

SRC: 深圳就出台健康条例公开征求意见-新华网
HYP: Shenzhen publicly solicits opinions on the introduction of health regulations-Xinhua English.news.cn

SRC: 新华社深圳7月26日电（记者毛思倩、白瑜）鼓励居民勤做体检，及早发现问题；禁止向未成年人销售酒精饮料；建立网络游戏健康审查制度；用人单位要配备专兼职健康管理人员…… 日前《深圳经济特区健康条例（征求意见稿）》正式发布，深圳居民将有自己的“健康法”。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Shenzhen, July 26 (Reporters Mao Siqian and Bai Yu) Encourage residents to do physical examinations frequently to detect problems early; prohibit the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors; establish a health review system for online games; employers must be equipped with full-time and part-time health management personnel... The Shenzhen Special Economic Zone Health Regulations (Draft for Comment) was officially released a few days ago, and Shenzhen residents will have their own health laws.

SRC: 新华社深圳7月26日电（记者毛思倩、白瑜）鼓励居民勤做体检，及早发现问题；禁止向未成年人销售酒精饮料；建立网络游戏健康审查制度；用人单位要配备专兼职健康管理人员…… 日前《深圳经济特区健康条例（征求意见稿）》正式发布，深圳居民将有自己的“健康法<v>”</v>。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Shenzhen, July 26 (Reporters Mao Siqian and Bai Yu) Encourage residents to do physical examinations frequently to detect problems early; prohibit the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors; establish a health review system for online games; employers must be equipped with full-time and part-time health management personnel... The Shenzhen Special Economic Zone Health Regulations (Draft for Comment) was officially released a few days ago, and Shenzhen residents will have their own health laws.

SRC: 新华社深圳7月26日电（记者毛思倩、白瑜）鼓励居民勤做体检，及早发现问题；禁止向未成年人销售酒精饮料；建立网络游戏健康审查制度；用人单位要配备专兼职健康管理人员…… 日前《深圳经济特区健康条例（征求意见稿）》正式发布，深圳居民将有自己的<v>“</v>健康法”。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Shenzhen, July 26 (Reporters Mao Siqian and Bai Yu) Encourage residents to do physical examinations frequently to detect problems early; prohibit the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors; establish a health review system for online games; employers must be equipped with full-time and part-time health management personnel... The Shenzhen Special Economic Zone Health Regulations (Draft for Comment) was officially released a few days ago, and Shenzhen residents will have their own health laws.

SRC: 为了鼓励居民勤做体检，及早发现问题，上述征求意见稿提出，卫生健康部门应当根据不同年龄、职业等因素制定健康体检项目基本目录。
HYP: In order to encourage residents to do physical examinations frequently and find problems early, the above-mentioned draft for comments proposes that the health department should develop a basic catalog of health examination items based on factors such as different ages and occupations.

SRC: 属于健康体检项目基本目录范围内的健康体检费用，按照每人每年一次的标准由社会医疗保险统筹基金支付。
HYP: The cost of the health check-up within the scope of the basic list of the health check-up items shall be paid by the social medical insurance overall fund according to the standard of once per person per year.

SRC: 征求意见稿明确，用人单位应当合理配置人力资源，安排员工作息时间，对脑力和体力劳动负荷较重的员工，实行轮休制度，避免对员工健康造成人体机能过度损耗或者身心健康伤害，同时严格执行员工带薪休假制度。
HYP: The draft for comments clearly stated that employers should rationally allocate human resources, arrange staff working hours, and implement a rotation system for employees with heavy mental and physical workloads to avoid excessive loss of human function or physical and mental health damage to employees' health, and strictly implement the employee's paid vacation system.

SRC: 此外，用人单位要配备专兼职健康管理人员，并定期组织开展员工健康体检。
HYP: In addition, the employer must be equipped with full-time and part-time health management personnel, and regularly organize and carry out employee health checkups.

SRC: 在未成年人身心健康方面，征求意见稿提出，禁止向未成年人销售酒精饮料，同时对酒精饮料的售卖位置进行了限制，对于违反规定的，将由市场监督管理部门责令改正，处3万元罚款。
HYP: Regarding the physical and mental health of minors, the draft for comments proposes that the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors is prohibited, and the location of alcoholic beverages is restricted. For violations of the regulations, the market supervision and management department will order corrections and impose a fine of 30000 yuan.

SRC: 除了“禁酒” ，未成年人也要“多运动” 。
HYP: In addition to "prohibition", minors must also "exercise more."

SRC: 根据征求意见稿要求，学校要每天安排学生体育活动时间一小时以上。
HYP: According to the requirements of the draft, the school should arrange more than one hour of student sports activities every day.

SRC: 对于网络游戏，公安、文化广电旅游体育、网络监管、卫生健康等部门应当完善互联网上网服务营业场所健康监管制度，建立网络游戏健康审查制度，为促进青少年健康成长营造良好的交往空间、交往文化。
HYP: For online games, the public security, culture, radio, television, tourism, sports, network supervision, health and health departments should improve the health supervision system of Internet service business premises, establish a health review system for online games, and create a good communication space and culture for promoting the healthy growth of young people.

SRC: 此外，征求意见稿还提出流感病人出入公共场所必须戴口罩，医疗卫生机构未经同意泄露病人隐私罚款2万元等。
HYP: In addition, the draft also proposes that influenza patients must wear masks when entering and exiting public places, and that medical and health institutions will be fined 20000 yuan for leaking patients' privacy without consent.

SRC: 值得注意的是，除了居民的身心健康外，征求意见稿还要求，深圳各部门在制定涉及城市空间规划与建设、工业园区规划与建设、资源开发利用与生态环境保护、生物医药产业发展等规划、规范性文件以及批准重大建设工程和实施重大公共服务项目前，应当评估公共政策实施对人群健康的影响。
HYP: It is worth noting that, in addition to the physical and mental health of residents, the draft also requires that all departments in Shenzhen should assess the impact of public policy implementation on population health before formulating plans and regulatory documents involving urban spatial planning and construction, industrial park planning and construction, resource development and utilization and ecological environmental protection, biomedical industry development, and approval of major construction projects and implementation of major public service projects.

SRC: 未经评估或者经评估将对城市公共卫生或者居民健康产生较严重不利影响的，不得制定出台或者批准实施。
HYP: Those that have not been assessed or will have a serious adverse impact on urban public health or residents' health shall not be formulated or approved for implementation.

SRC: 可可西里藏羚羊进入回迁季-新华网
HYP: Hoh Xil Tibetan antelope enters the migration season-Xinhua English.news.cn

SRC: 新华社西宁7月25日电（记者王金金）记者从三江源国家公园管理局长江源园区可可西里管理处五道梁保护站获悉，监测显示，此前前往可可西里腹地卓乃湖区域迁徙产仔的藏羚羊正陆续结束产仔，开始携幼仔返回原栖息地。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Xining, July 25 (Reporter Wang Jinjin) The reporter learned from the Wudaoliang Protection Station of the Hoh Xil Management Office of the Yangtze River Source Park of the Sanjiangyuan National Park Administration that monitoring showed that the Tibetan antelopes that had migrated to the Zhuonai Lake area in the hinterland of Hoh Xil are gradually ending their calves and are beginning to return to their original habitats with their cubs.

SRC: 五道梁保护站附近的监控画面显示，7月25日，大约40只雌性藏羚羊带领3只藏羚羊幼仔陆续通过青藏公路3002公里处、青藏铁路五道梁北大桥，藏羚羊已经开始回迁。
HYP: Monitoring pictures near the Wudaoliang Conservation Station showed that on July 25, about 40 female Tibetan antelopes led 3 Tibetan antelope cubs through the 3002 kilometers of the Qinghai-Tibet Highway and the Wudaoliang North Bridge on the Qinghai-Tibet Railway. The Tibetan antelopes have begun to relocate.

SRC: 专家分析，近年来，回迁羊群中藏羚羊幼仔数量占藏羚羊群总体数量的四分之一至五分之一。
HYP: According to expert analysis, in recent years, the number of Tibetan antelope cubs in the relocating flock accounted for one-quarter to one-fifth of the total number of Tibetan antelope flocks.

SRC: 中国科学院西北高原生物研究所副研究员连新明说：“回迁初期，藏羚羊面临较高的被捕食风险，因此羊群中的幼仔数量会比较少，甚至可能出现没有幼仔的情况。”
HYP: Lian Xinming, an associate researcher at the Northwest Plateau Institute of Biology, Chinese Academy of Sciences, said: "In the early stage of the migration, Tibetan antelopes face a higher risk of predation, so the number of cubs in the flock will be relatively small, and there may even be no cubs."

SRC: 根据三江源国家公园管理局长江源园区可可西里管理处统计，藏羚羊回迁数量总体呈逐年上升态势，2019年藏羚羊回迁数量为4860只，比2018年增加338只。
HYP: According to statistics from the Kekexili Management Office of the Yangtze River Source Park of the Sanjiangyuan National Park Administration, the number of Tibetan antelopes returning has been increasing year by year. In 2019, the number of Tibetan antelopes returning was 4860, an increase of 338 from 2018.

SRC: 连新明说：“预计今年藏羚羊回迁将在9月初结束，回迁藏羚羊数量仍有望继续增加。”
HYP: Lian Xinming said: "It is expected that the relocation of Tibetan antelopes this year will end in early September, and the number of relocated Tibetan antelopes is expected to continue to increase."

SRC: 藏羚羊属国家一级保护动物。
HYP: Tibetan antelope is a national first-class protected animal.

SRC: 每年5月底，来自青海三江源、西藏羌塘、新疆阿尔金山等地的藏羚羊都要前往位于可可西里腹地的卓乃湖产羔。
HYP: At the end of May every year, Tibetan antelopes from Qinghai Sanjiangyuan, Qiangtang of Tibet, Altyn Mountains of Xinjiang and other places go to Zhuonai Lake in the hinterland of Hoh Xil to give birth.

SRC: 我国藏羚羊保护专家、陕西省动物研究所（西北濒危动物研究所）研究员吴晓民说：“藏羚羊回迁是雌性藏羚羊结束产仔后，陆续带着幼仔回到栖息地的过程。起初离开产仔地的回迁群体较为庞大，但随后藏羚羊将根据不同的地理种群、沿不同路径回到它们各自的栖息地。”
HYP: Wu Xiaomin, a Tibetan antelope conservation expert in China and a researcher at the Shaanxi Institute of Zoology (Northwestern Endangered Animals Research Institute), said: “Tibetan antelope migration is a process in which female Tibetan antelopes return to their habitats with their cubs one after another after their calving is finished. Initially, the relocating groups leaving the calving area are relatively large, but then the Tibetan antelopes will return to their respective habitats along different paths according to different geographic populations."

SRC: 为确保藏羚羊群安全回迁，记者了解到，日前三江源国家公园管理局长江源园区可可西里管理处已安排工作人员在主要回迁区域，持续开展视频监测和辖区巡逻。
HYP: In order to ensure the safe relocation of the Tibetan antelope herd, the reporter learned that the Kekexili Management Office of the Yangtze River Source Park of the Sanjiangyuan National Park Administration has arranged for staff to continue to carry out video surveillance and patrols in the main relocation area.

SRC: 如发现有藏羚羊群试图穿越公路，巡山队员会在第一时间进行临时交通管制，让羊群安全通过野生动物通道，保证其在回迁途中尽可能少受人类干扰。
HYP: If a Tibetan antelope flock is found trying to cross the highway, the mountain patrol team will conduct temporary traffic control as soon as possible to allow the flock to safely pass through the wildlife passage to ensure that it is as little as possible to be disturbed by humans on the way back.

SRC: 那么，日常生活中到底该如何解暑？
HYP: So, how to relieve heat in daily life?

SRC: 专家建议，夏日外出尽量避开高温时段，最好不要在中午前后在烈日下行走或劳动，因为这个时间段的阳光最强烈，发生中暑的可能性较高。
HYP: Experts suggest that you should avoid high temperature periods when you go out in summer, and it is best not to walk or work in the hot sun around noon, because the sun is the strongest during this time period and the possibility of heat stroke is higher.

SRC: 如果此时段必须外出，一定要做好防护工作，如打遮阳伞、戴遮阳帽、戴太阳镜，有条件的最好涂抹防晒霜，以防晒伤。
HYP: If you must go out during this period, you must do a good job of protection, such as playing a parasol, wearing a sun hat, and wearing sunglasses. If possible, it is best to apply sunscreen to prevent injuries.

SRC: 衣服尽量选用浅色、透气性好的棉、麻、丝类质地，少穿化纤品类服装，以免大量出汗时不能及时散热，引起中暑。
HYP: Choose light-colored, breathable cotton, linen, and silk as much as possible for clothes, and wear less chemical fiber clothing, so as not to lose heat in time when you sweat a lot, causing heat stroke.

SRC: 高温闷热天气时，要准备充足的水饮，及时饮用，不要等口渴了才喝水，因为一旦感觉口渴表示身体已经缺水了，每次喝水控制在150毫升至200毫升，喝温开水，不要喝冰水。
HYP: In the hot and sultry weather, you should prepare enough water and drink it in time. Don't drink water when you are thirsty, because once you feel thirsty, it means that your body is already short of water. Drink 150ml to 200ml of water each time. Drink warm water instead of ice water.

SRC: 根据气温高低，一般人员每天喝1.5升至2升水，高温作业人员，每天喝3升至5升水。
HYP: According to the temperature, the average person drinks 1.5 to 2 liters of water a day, and the high temperature workers drink 3 to 5 liters of water a day.

SRC: 出汗较多时可适当补充一些盐水，弥补人体因出汗而失去的盐分。
HYP: When you sweat a lot, you can add some salt water appropriately to make up for the salt lost by the body due to sweating.

SRC: 另外，夏季人体容易缺钾，使人感到倦怠疲乏，含钾茶水是极好的消暑饮品。
HYP: In addition, the human body is prone to lack of potassium in summer, which makes people feel tired and tired. Potassium-containing tea is an excellent refreshing drink.

SRC: 夏天多食含水量高的蔬果，如生菜、黄瓜、西红柿等；新鲜水果，如桃子、杏、西瓜、甜瓜等水分含量为80％至90％，都可以用来补充水分；乳制品既能补水，又能满足身体的营养之需。
HYP: In summer, eat more fruits and vegetables with high water content, such as lettuce, cucumber, tomatoes, etc.; fresh fruits, such as peaches, apricots, watermelons, melons, etc., with a water content of 80% to 90%, can be used to supplement water; dairy products can not only replenish water, but also meet the body's nutritional needs.

SRC: 此外，在高温环境中工作的人群，应适当补充含有钾、镁等元素的饮品。
HYP: In addition, people who work in a high-temperature environment should appropriately supplement drinks containing potassium, magnesium and other elements.

SRC: 夏天日长夜短，气温高，人体新陈代谢旺盛，消耗也大，容易感到疲劳。
HYP: In summer, the days are long and the nights are short, the temperature is high, the body's metabolism is strong, and the consumption is also high, and it is easy to feel tired.

SRC: 充足的睡眠，可使大脑和身体各系统都得到放松，既利于工作和学习，也是预防中暑的措施。
HYP: Adequate sleep can relax the brain and body systems, which is not only conducive to work and study, but also a measure to prevent heat stroke.

SRC: 专家称，最佳就寝时间是22时至23时，最佳起床时间是5时30分至6时30分。
HYP: Experts say that the best bedtime is from 22:00 to 23:00, and the best time to wake up is from 5:30 to 6:30.

SRC: 睡眠时注意不要躺在空调出风口和电风扇下，以免患上空调病和热伤风。
HYP: Be careful not to lie under the air-conditioning vents and electric fans during sleep to avoid air-conditioning diseases and thermal colds.

SRC: 专家建议，在户外活动或进行高温作业的人群，可随身携带十滴水、人丹、藿香正气水或藿香正气丸等防暑药品，或放置在就近工作场所，随时使用，以防发生中暑。
HYP: Experts suggest that people who are outdoors or working at high temperatures can carry ten drops of water, Rendan, Huoxiang Zhengqi Water or Huoxiang Zhengqi Pills and other heatstroke prevention medicines, or place them in the nearest workplace for use at any time to prevent heat stroke.

SRC: 毕业生艺术展搬进商场公益展出-新华网
HYP: Graduate art exhibition moved into shopping mall for charity exhibition-Xinhuanet

SRC: 在各大院校“云毕业”的季节里，一场难得的线下毕业生艺术展上周末温暖启幕。
HYP: In the "cloud graduation" season of major colleges and universities, a rare offline graduate art exhibition opened last weekend warmly.

SRC: 不过它既不在美术馆，也不在校园里，而是出现在了朝阳大悦城的公共空间，并对公众免费开放，将持续至8月23日。
HYP: However, it is neither in the art museum nor on the campus, but in the public space of Chaoyang Joy City. It is open to the public for free and will last until August 23.

SRC: 记者了解到，这场2020毕业生艺术展，征集了来自中央美术学院、中国传媒大学及天津美术学院的57位青年艺术家的50件/组作品，展览空间从2层延伸至6层，并充分利用楼内灯箱进行平面作品展示，最大程度烘托出毕业季的艺术氛围。
HYP: The reporter learned that this 2020 graduate art exhibition has collected 50 works/groups of 57 young artists from the Central Academy of Fine Arts, Communication University of China and Tianjin Academy of Fine Arts. The exhibition space extends from the 2nd to the 6th floor, and makes full use of the light boxes in the building to display flat works to maximize the artistic atmosphere of the graduation season.

SRC: 在疫情之下，这场展览的意义显得尤为特殊。
HYP: Under the epidemic situation, the significance of this exhibition is particularly special.

SRC: 朝阳大悦城美陈负责人葛平坦言：“我们选择将走向'云端'的毕业展再度带回线下空间，也希望让更多人看到青年对自身的探索和对世界的理解，放大艺术对于社会和心灵的疗愈力量。”
HYP: Ge Pingyan, head of Chaoyang Joy City Meichen, said: "We have chosen to bring the graduation exhibition to the'cloud' back to the offline space again. We also hope that more people can see the youth's exploration of themselves and the understanding of the world, and magnify the healing power of art for society and the soul."

SRC: 她透露，此次参展的作品是向几大艺术院校的毕业生们征集而来，又从中挑选了适合商业空间展示的，作品形式从传统的架上绘画、雕塑，到新媒体装置、交互动画、VR全景，体量与丰富程度为历年之最。
HYP: She revealed that the works in this exhibition were collected from graduates of several major art colleges and selected suitable for commercial space display. The forms of works range from traditional shelf paintings and sculptures to new media installations, interactive animations, and VR panoramas. The volume and richness are the most in history.

SRC: 其中，李云肖在《2020的第一场战役》中通过机械和手工混合的创作语言，表达了自己在这场疫情中的感受；刘嘉颖通过以太坊区块链创作的作品《Sound Money》探讨了“加密货币” 、“信用创造” 、“交易”等主题；张家祺的《猫林》与邱达强的《羁》表现的都是经常与人类相伴的动物，从中可以看到青年艺术家对人与动物关系的理解；而朱仲鱼的作品《信仰的冬天—礼物》则是在提醒成长中的年轻人，“当有一天事业有成时，不忘初心，记得那份单纯与真诚。”
HYP: Among them, Li Yunxiao expressed his feelings in the epidemic through a mixture of mechanical and manual creative language in "The First Battle of 2020"; Liu Jiaying's work "Sound Money" created through the Ethereum blockchain explored themes such as "cryptocurrency", "credibility creation" and "transaction"; Zhang Jiaqi's "Cat Forest" and Qiu Daqiang's "Winter" show that young people who have always seen the faith in humans and can not be associated with humans and can never be accompanied by the young people who have a sincere understanding of their lives and can never be associated with humans and animals.

SRC: 在为数不多的亲自布展的毕业生中，就有来自天津美术学院雕塑系的李敬寅。
HYP: Among the few graduates who personally set up the exhibition is Li Jingyin from the Sculpture Department of Tianjin Academy of Fine Arts.

SRC: “我是7月7日来北京的，当时其实有点担心疫情，还提前三天做了核酸检测，是带着酒精棉和检测报告来布展的。”
HYP: "I came to Beijing on July 7, when I was actually a little worried about the epidemic, and I did a nucleic acid test three days in advance. I brought the alcohol cotton and the test report to the exhibition."

SRC: 他的作品《昨日如谜》结构比较复杂，必须亲力亲为。
HYP: His work "Yesterday is Like a Mystery" has a complicated structure and must be done by himself.

SRC: 同时，他还承担着帮助同学修补破损作品的任务。
HYP: At the same time, he also undertakes the task of helping his classmates repair damaged works.

SRC: “布展到凌晨四点半，然后再做修补，时间很紧，都忘了和作品合个影，也有点遗憾。”
HYP: "The exhibition was set up until 4:30 in the morning, and then repairs were made. The time is very tight, and I forgot to take a photo with the work, which is a bit regrettable."

SRC: 他希望，等疫情更稳定了，<v>再</v>和同学们来北京看看自己的作品展。
HYP: He hoped that when the epidemic became more stable, he and his classmates would come to Beijing to see his work exhibition.

SRC: 他希望，等疫情更稳定了，再和同学们来北京看看自己的作品展。
HYP: He hoped that when the epidemic became more stable, he and his classmates would come to Beijing to see his work exhibition.

SRC: （记者李俐）
HYP: (Reporter Li Li)

SRC: 奖励5万元湖北恩施表扬沙子坝滑坡“预警第一人” - 中新网
HYP: Rewarded 50000 yuan, Hubei Enshi praised Shaziba landslide "first person in early warning"-Chinanews.com

SRC: 湖北日报讯(记者林晶)7月26日，恩施市通报表扬为沙子坝滑坡预警作出重要贡献的地质灾害点监测员陈光明，并为他送去5万元奖金。
HYP: Hubei Daily (Reporter Lin Jing) On July 26, Enshi City reported to Chen Guangming, a geological hazard point monitor who had made an important contribution to the early warning of Shaziba landslide, and gave him a bonus of 50000 yuan.

SRC: 同时，号召全市党员干部学习他恪尽职守、敢于担当、主动作为、乐于奉献的精神。
HYP: At the same time, we call on the city's party members and cadres to learn from his spirit of dedication, daring to take responsibility, initiative and dedication.

SRC: 7月21日，恩施市屯堡乡马者村沙子坝发生滑坡，导致清江干流河道形成堰塞湖，58岁的陈光明是预警此次滑坡的第一人。
HYP: On July 21, a landslide occurred in the sand dam of Mazhe Village, Tunpu Township, Enshi City, resulting in the formation of a barrier lake in the main stream of the Qingjiang River. Chen Guangming, 58, was the first person to warn of the landslide.

SRC: 7月17日下午，陈光明得知村民家中墙壁开裂的消息，立即到现场查看。
HYP: On the afternoon of July 17, Chen Guangming learned of the cracks in the walls of the villagers' homes and immediately went to the scene to check.

SRC: 他刚从家中走出五六百米，便看到村组公路裂开四五厘米，沿着公路一直延伸到玉米地，长度约50米。
HYP: As soon as he walked five to six hundred meters from his home, he saw the village road split four to five centimeters, extending along the road to the corn field, about 50 meters in length.

SRC: 陈光明顿生警觉，第一时间将公路开裂的照片发到乡“地质灾害监测员联系群”里。
HYP: Chen Guangming was suddenly alert and immediately sent photos of the road cracking to the township "geological disaster monitor contact group".

SRC: 经屯堡乡自然规划所相关负责人现场查看和判断，滑坡的可能性很大，随即作出撤离群众的决定。
HYP: The relevant person in charge of the Natural Planning Institute of Tunpu Township inspected and judged on the spot that the possibility of a landslide was very high, and the decision to evacuate the masses was made immediately.

SRC: 陈光明的及时预警，为影响区内315户1339名群众的安全撤离贏得了36小时的宝贵时间。
HYP: Chen Guangming's timely warning gave 36 hours of precious time for the safe evacuation of 1339 people from 315 households in the affected area.

SRC: 此次重大地质灾害，无一人伤亡。
HYP: No one was injured or killed in this major geological disaster.

SRC: 陈光明认真负责的敬业精神得到群众的称赞。
HYP: Chen Guangming's conscientious and responsible professionalism was praised by the masses.

SRC: 面对赞誉，他说：“不存在救了谁，这是我的责任。 ”
HYP: In the face of praise, he said: "There is no one saved, this is my responsibility."

SRC: 警方通报“女大学生赴青海旅游失联”细节搜救工作仍在继续-新华网
HYP: The police informed the details of "female college students who went to Qinghai to travel and lost contact", search and rescue work continues-Xinhua English.news.cn

SRC: 新华社西宁7月26日电（记者王金金周喆）近日，“一名女大学生前往青海格尔木旅游后失联”一事引发网民关注。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Xining, July 26 (Reporter Wang Jinjin and Zhou Zhe) Recently, "a female college student lost contact after traveling to Golmud, Qinghai" has attracted the attention of netizens.

SRC: 青海省海西蒙古族藏族自治州格尔木市公安局26日通报称，南京某大学学生黄某某目前仍处于失联状态，多地警方正深入黄某某失联地沿线，积极开展寻找工作。
HYP: The Public Security Bureau of Golmud City, Haixi Mongolian-Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture in Qinghai Province reported on the 26th that Huang Moumou, a student from a certain university in Nanjing, is still out of contact. Police in many places are going deep along the route where Huang Moumou lost contact and are actively seeking work.

SRC: 2020年7月10日，海西州格尔木市公安局治安支队接到上级通知，南京某大学学生黄某某于7月5日乘坐Z164列车由南京至格尔木，于7月9日在青海省玉树藏族自治州曲麻莱县索南达杰保护站清水河西南区域处手机关机并失联，要求协助查找。
HYP: On July 10, 2020, the Public Security Detachment of Golmud City Public Security Bureau in Haixi Prefecture received a notice from a superior that Huang Moumou, a student from a certain university in Nanjing, took the Z164 train from Nanjing to Golmud on July 5 and was shut down and lost contact with his mobile phone in the southwestern area of Qingshui River at Suonandajie Protection Station, Qumalai County, Yushu Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, Qinghai Province on July 9.

SRC: 根据格尔木市公安局的调查情况，黄某某于7月6日19时54分进入青海省境内，7日4时抵达格尔木市。
HYP: According to the investigation by the Public Security Bureau of Golmud, Huang Moumou entered Qinghai Province at 1954 on July 6, and arrived in Golmud at 4 on the 7th.

SRC: 当日8时，失联人员黄某某乘坐出租车由格尔木市黄河大酒店朝G109国道出发，并于12时到达可可西里索南达杰保护站，出租车司机单独返回，黄某某7日15时到达索南达杰保护站附近清水河区域直至9日18时许在该区域关机。
HYP: At 8 o'clock that day, Huang Moumou, a missing person, took a taxi from the Yellow River Hotel in Golmud to G109 National Highway and arrived at the Kekexili Sonan Dage Protection Station at 12 o'clock. The taxi driver returned alone. Huang arrived at the Qingshui River area near the Sonan Dage Protection Station at 15:00 on the 7th and shut down at the area at 18:00 on the 9th.

SRC: 在进一步调查中，警方发现黄某某曾于7月13日17时07分通过乃吉沟检查站。
HYP: During further investigation, the police discovered that Huang Moumou had passed through the Naijigou checkpoint at 17:07 on July 13.

SRC: 乃吉沟检查站是西藏自治区那曲市在格尔木市南山口设立的检查站，由于该检查站无视频监控，无法确定本人及所乘车辆信息，警方只能驾车在沿途进行查找，协调西藏沿途各检查站若发现黄某某，立即与格尔木市公安局取得联系。
HYP: The Naijigou checkpoint is a checkpoint set up at Nanshankou in Golmud City, Nagqu City, Tibet Autonomous Region. Since the checkpoint does not have video surveillance, it is impossible to determine the information of the person and the vehicle he was traveling on. The police can only search along the way and coordinate with the checkpoints along the Tibet to find Huang Moumou immediately contact the Golmud City Public Security Bureau.

SRC: 根据最新情况，7月26日凌晨1时，格尔木市公安局组织救援力量携带救援装备，前往青藏公路沿线不冻泉保护站、索南达杰保护站进行查找，并积极与四川警方、西藏警方、南京警方取得联系，共同开展工作，目前查找搜救工作仍在继续。
HYP: According to the latest situation, at 1:00 am on July 26, the Golmud City Public Security Bureau organized rescue forces to carry rescue equipment to the Bhushan Spring Protection Station along the Qinghai-Tibet Highway and the Sonang Dage Protection Station for search, and actively contacted the Sichuan police, Tibet police, and Nanjing police to work together. The search and rescue work is still continuing.

SRC: 当地警方希望广大网友和社会各界如有相关线索，及时向格尔木警方和南京江宁警方提供，争取早日找到失联人员黄某某。
HYP: The local police hope that if the majority of netizens and all walks of life have relevant clues, they will provide them to the Golmud police and Nanjing Jiangning police in a timely manner, so as to find the missing person Huang Moumou as soon as possible.

SRC: 同时，有关专家提示，游客在户外活动时要规范、理性、文明，随时留意路边警示标志，切勿冒险进入无人区，遇到突发情况，要及时报警。
HYP: At the same time, relevant experts reminded that tourists should be standardized, rational, and civilized during outdoor activities, always pay attention to roadside warning signs, do not risk entering no-man's land, and call the police in time for emergencies.

SRC: 俄罗斯举办阅兵式庆祝海军节-新华网
HYP: Russia holds military parade to celebrate Naval Day-Xinhua English.news.cn

SRC: 7月26日，在俄罗斯圣彼得堡，舰艇列队参加海军节庆祝活动。
HYP: On July 26, in St. Petersburg, Russia, ships lined up to participate in the Navy Day celebrations.

SRC: 新华社发（莫京娜摄）
HYP: Issued by Xinhua News Agency (Photo by Mo Jingna)

SRC: 新华社莫斯科7月26日电（记者鲁金博）俄罗斯各舰队26日举行阅兵式庆祝海军节，纪念俄海军成立324周年。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Moscow, July 26 (Reporter Lu Kimbo) Russian fleets held a military parade on the 26th to celebrate the Naval Day and commemorate the 324th anniversary of the establishment of the Russian Navy.

SRC: 当天，俄罗斯北海、波罗的海、黑海、里海和太平洋舰队分别在各自基地所在海域举行了阅兵式，共有1.5万军人、219艘各类舰艇和71架军用飞机参加。
HYP: On the same day, the Russian North Sea, Baltic Sea, Black Sea, Caspian Sea and Pacific Fleet held military parades in the waters where their respective bases are located. A total of 15000 soldiers, 219 ships of various types and 71 military aircraft participated.

SRC: 俄总统、武装力量最高统帅普京出席了波罗的海舰队的阅兵式。
HYP: Russian President and Supreme Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces Putin attended the military parade of the Baltic Fleet.

SRC: 约4000名军人、46艘舰艇和40余架战机参加了当地的阅兵式。
HYP: About 4000 soldiers, 46 ships and more than 40 fighters participated in the local military parade.

SRC: 普京首先在位于波罗的海喀琅施塔得海军基地水域检阅了舰艇列队。
HYP: Putin first inspected the fleet of ships in the waters of the Kronstadt naval base in the Baltic Sea.

SRC: 之后，他乘坐快艇抵达圣彼得堡市中心的涅瓦河水域并上岸，观看了在涅瓦河上举行的阅兵式。
HYP: After that, he took a speedboat to the waters of the Neva River in the center of St. Petersburg and went ashore to watch the military parade held on the Neva River.

SRC: 普京在阅兵式上发表讲话说，俄海军装备的现代化技术水平近年来持续提升，俄海军2020年将总共接收约40艘配备独特高超音速打击系统的新型舰艇。
HYP: Putin said in a speech at the military parade that the modern technical level of Russian naval equipment has continued to improve in recent years. The Russian navy will receive a total of about 40 new ships equipped with a unique hypersonic strike system in 2020.

SRC: 另外，俄海军总司令叶夫梅诺夫日前在接受俄国防部机关报《红星报》采访时说，俄建造舰艇的计划得到了有效落实，2020年俄海军计划接收的新舰艇数量是近年来规模较大的。
HYP: In addition, the Russian Navy Commander-in-Chief Yevmenov recently said in an interview with the Russian Ministry of Defense newspaper "Red Star" that Russia's plan to build ships has been effectively implemented, and the number of new ships that the Russian Navy plans to receive in 2020 is a larger scale in recent years.

SRC: 1696年，沙皇彼得大帝着手组建海上舰队，开创了俄海军历史。
HYP: In 1696, Tsar Peter the Great set out to form a naval fleet, creating the history of the Russian navy.

SRC: 每年7月最后一个星期日是俄罗斯海军节。
HYP: The last Sunday in July is the Russian Navy Day.

SRC: 针对疫情防控工作出现的新变化，自7月17日以来，新疆各级工会响应自治区总工会的号召，积极参与疫情防控工作。
HYP: In response to new changes in the epidemic prevention and control work, since July 17, the trade unions at all levels in Xinjiang have responded to the call of the Autonomous Region Federation of Trade Unions to actively participate in the epidemic prevention and control work.

SRC: 天山南北工会干部、职工、劳动模范走进街道社区、居民群众中，开展送菜送药、消毒灭菌、宣传防疫知识等活动，服务职工群众，用实际行动彰显工会“硬核力量”。
HYP: The cadres, employees, and model workers of the Tianshan North and South Trade Union walked into the neighborhood communities and residents to carry out activities such as food delivery, disinfection and sterilization, and epidemic prevention knowledge, to serve the employees and demonstrate the "hard core power" of the labor union with practical actions.

SRC: 天山南北工会干部、职工、劳动模范走进街道社区、居民群众中，开展送菜送药、消毒灭菌、<v>宣传</v>防疫知识等活动，服务职工群众，用实际行动彰显工会“硬核力量”。
HYP: The cadres, employees, and model workers of the Tianshan North and South Trade Union walked into the neighborhood communities and residents to carry out activities such as food delivery, disinfection and sterilization, and epidemic prevention knowledge, to serve the employees and demonstrate the "hard core power" of the labor union with practical actions.

SRC: 近日，乌鲁木齐市天山区总工会慰问组一行，将一批急需的疫情防控生活物资送到了12个隔离点的工作人员手中。
HYP: Recently, the consolation team of the Tianshan District Federation of Trade Unions in Urumqi City sent a batch of urgently needed living materials for epidemic prevention and control to the staff in 12 quarantine points.

SRC: 疫情发生后，天山区总第一时间投入经费105万余元，紧急下拨给23个直属基层工会。
HYP: After the outbreak, Tianshan District invested more than 1.05 million yuan in the first time, which was urgently allocated to 23 directly affiliated grass-roots trade unions.

SRC: 中建新疆建工一建党委副书记、工会主席赵相国接到公司关于疫情防控的通知后，主动请缨，选择留在单位值班，为职工保驾护航。
HYP: Zhao Xiangguo, deputy secretary of the Party Committee of the First Construction of China Construction Xinjiang Construction Engineering Co., Ltd., and chairman of the labor union, received the company's notice on the prevention and control of the epidemic and took the initiative to ask for it and chose to stay on duty in the unit to escort the employees.

SRC: 他为居住在单位宿舍和新入职的职工送去做饭的炊具、食品及日用品，并组织人员每隔两天为他们送一次生活必备物资。
HYP: He sent cooking utensils, food and daily necessities for the workers who lived in the unit dormitory and newly recruited employees, and organized personnel to send them daily necessities every two days.

SRC: “7月21日起，对坚守战'疫'一线的干部职工进行摸底，并采取线上下单、商家送货上门的方式，先行为乌鲁木齐地区704名一线职工群众补充购买防疫用品和生活物资。”
HYP: "Starting from July 21st, we will investigate the cadres and employees who are fighting the epidemic and adopt the method of placing orders online and delivering them to the door. First, 704 front-line employees in Urumqi will supplement the purchase of anti-epidemic supplies and living materials."

SRC: 新疆交通运输工会负责人告诉记者，面对突发疫情，他们全力做好疫情防控服务保障、稳步推进交通运输发展各项工作，营造齐心战“疫”的浓厚氛围。
HYP: The person in charge of the Xinjiang Transportation Union told reporters that in the face of sudden epidemics, they will do their best to ensure epidemic prevention and control services, steadily promote various tasks in transportation development, and create a strong atmosphere for fighting the "epidemic" together.

SRC: 当前正值夏季高温，各级工会紧盯疫情防控重点地区的一线职工，把“送清凉”关心关爱落到实处。
HYP: At present, it is the high temperature in summer. Trade unions at all levels are keeping an eye on front-line workers in key areas for epidemic prevention and control, and putting "sending coolness" into practice.

SRC: 7月19日，乌鲁木齐县总工会启动向疫情防控一线职工“送清凉”慰问活动，全县警务站、卡点和卫生系统收到了饮料、水果等慰问品。
HYP: On July 19, the Urumqi County Federation of Trade Unions launched a “sending cool” sympathy activity to front-line workers for epidemic prevention and control. Police stations, checkpoints, and health systems throughout the county received such sympathy items as drinks and fruits.

SRC: “工会干部要进一步提高政治站位、强化责任担当，用关怀温暖人心，用行动鼓舞斗志。
HYP: "Trade union cadres must further improve their political positions, strengthen their responsibilities, warm people's hearts with care, and inspire fighting spirit with actions.

SRC: 要充分发挥工会组织凝聚职工、团结职工的作用，做好疫情防控服务保障，积极维护广大职工的健康权益，把关爱送到一线职工身边。”
HYP: It is necessary to give full play to the role of trade unions in rallying and uniting employees, ensure epidemic prevention and control services, actively safeguard the health rights and interests of employees, and send care to frontline employees."

SRC: 自治区总工会相关负责人表示。
HYP: The relevant person in charge of the Autonomous Region Federation of Trade Unions said.

SRC: 2020年直招士官工作全面展开-新华网
HYP: Direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers is in full swing in 2020-Xinhuanet

SRC: 新华社北京7月26日电（记者贾启龙）军委政治工作部、军委国防动员部近日联合印发通知，部署展开2020年从普通高等学校毕业生中直接招收士官工作。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 26 (Reporter Jia Qilong) The Political Work Department of the Military Commission and the National Defense Mobilization Department of the Military Commission recently jointly issued a notice to deploy the direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers from ordinary colleges and universities graduates in 2020.

SRC: 今年直招士官涵盖计算机、自动化、机械等64类270余个军地通用专业，重点加大无人机、航海、航空航天、电子信息、小语种等专业招收力度，招收规模相比去年增加近2000人。
HYP: This year, the direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers covers more than 270 general military and civilian majors in 64 categories, including computer, automation, and machinery. The focus is on increasing the recruitment of drones, navigation, aerospace, electronic information, and minor languages. The recruitment scale has increased by nearly 2000 compared with last year.

SRC: 今年直招士官工作与义务兵征集同步组织实施，8月1日开始，9月30日结束。
HYP: This year, the direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers was organized and implemented simultaneously with the recruitment of conscripts, starting on August 1 and ending on September 30.

SRC: 应征青年可以通过全国征兵网（网址：http://www.gfbzb.gov.cn）查询直招士官条件和各地招收专业分布情况，符合专业范围和招收条件的在线提交报名信息，并根据应征地兵役机关统一要求，参加体格检查、政治考核等后续招收工作。
HYP: Young recruits can check the requirements for direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers and the distribution of recruiting majors in various regions through the National Recruitment Website (URL: http://www.gfbzb.gov.cn), submit registration information online that meets the professional scope and recruitment requirements, and participate in the follow-up recruitment work such as physical examinations and political assessments according to the unified requirements of the military service agencies for land requisitions.

SRC: 因招收专业和计划限制未能被招收为士官的合格青年，可以参加义务兵征集，服义务兵役期满选取为士官时，在普通高等学校按规定学制就读的年数视同服役时间。
HYP: Qualified young people who cannot be recruited as non-commissioned officers due to the recruitment of majors and program restrictions can participate in the recruitment of conscripts. When they are selected as non-commissioned officers at the end of their compulsory military service, the number of years enrolled in ordinary colleges and universities according to the prescribed school system is regarded as service time.

SRC: 今年士官招收工作由省级或地市级人民政府征兵办公室统一组织，报名潜力丰富专业将在综合衡量报名对象学历层次、在校期间专业课成绩、取得职业资格证书等情况基础上择优遴选；稀缺专业将面向本地符合专业要求、具备招收优势的院校定向对口招收。
HYP: The recruitment of non-commissioned officers this year will be organized by the recruitment office of the provincial or prefecture-level people's government. Majors with rich potential for registration will be selected based on a comprehensive evaluation of the applicant's academic level, professional course performance during school, and vocational qualification certificates obtained; rare majors will be targeted to local colleges that meet professional requirements and have recruitment advantages.

SRC: 根据疫情常态化防控要求，今年直招士官原则上不安排自行报到，将与义务兵同步组织运输入营。
HYP: In accordance with the requirements for the normalization of the epidemic prevention and control, in principle, the direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers this year will not arrange self-registration, and will be organized and transported to the camp simultaneously with the conscripts.

SRC: 直接招收士官入伍时间从2020年9月1日起算，部队下达士官任职命令的时间为2020年12月1日。
HYP: The time for direct enlistment of non-commissioned officers shall be calculated from September 1, 2020, and the time for the army to issue the appointment of non-commissioned officers is December 1, 2020.

SRC: 部队接收单位将科学制定入伍和专业训练方案，认真组织施训；训练完成后按照专业对口、招用一致的原则，将招收士官统一精准分配到对口专业技术岗位。
HYP: The army receiving unit will scientifically formulate enlistment and professional training plans, and carefully organize training; after the training is completed, in accordance with the principle of professional counterparts and consistent recruitment, the recruited non-commissioned officers will be uniformly and accurately assigned to the corresponding professional and technical positions.

SRC: 驻英使馆发言人：中国政府是网络安全的坚定维护者-<v>中新网</v>
HYP: Spokesperson of the Chinese Embassy in the UK: The Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security

SRC: 中新网7月26日电据中国驻英国大使馆网站消息，25日，中国驻英国使馆发言人就有关网络攻击错误言论答记者问。
HYP: China News Service, July 26. According to the website of the Chinese Embassy in the United Kingdom, on the 25th, the spokesperson of the Chinese Embassy in the United Kingdom responded to reporters' questions about erroneous statements about cyber attacks.

SRC: 发言人强调，中国政府是网络安全的坚定维护者，一贯坚决反对并打击任何形式的网络攻击和网络犯罪。
HYP: The spokesperson emphasized that the Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security and has always resolutely opposed and cracked down on any form of cyber attacks and cyber crimes.

SRC: 有记者提问：据媒体称，与中国有关的黑客组织曾干扰一家英国公司网络系统、向存有专利数据的英美技术公司发动攻击、入侵欧盟国家政府网络。
HYP: A reporter asked: According to the media, hacker organizations related to China have interfered with the network system of a British company, launched attacks on British and American technology companies that have patent data, and invaded the government networks of EU countries.

SRC: 发言人表示，中国政府是网络安全的坚定维护者，一贯坚决反对并打击任何形式的网络攻击和网络犯罪。
HYP: The spokesman said that the Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security and has always resolutely opposed and combated any form of cyber attacks and cyber crimes.

SRC: 网络空间虚拟性强，溯源难，行为体多样，在调查和定性网络事件的时候应拿出充分的证据，不能无端猜测。
HYP: Cyberspace is highly virtual, difficult to trace, and diverse actors. Sufficient evidence should be presented when investigating and identifying cyber incidents, and no unreasonable guesses should be made.

SRC: 发言人称，以往的“棱镜门”等一系列事件证明，美国一直都在进行全球最大范围的网络窃密行动。
HYP: The spokesperson said that a series of incidents such as the "Prism Gate" in the past proved that the United States has been conducting the world's largest cyber theft.

SRC: 维护网络空间的和平与稳定符合所有国家的共同利益。
HYP: Maintaining peace and stability in cyberspace is in the common interest of all countries.

SRC: 发言人指出，中国在科技创新方面的成就不是偷来的、不是抢来的，而是通过自力更生、艰苦奋斗得来的。
HYP: The spokesperson pointed out that China's achievements in technological innovation were not stolen or robbed, but were obtained through self-reliance and hard work.

SRC: 2019年中国通过《专利合作条约》(PCT)途径提交了约5.9万件专利申请，年增长率为10.6%，成为提交国际专利申请量最多的国家。
HYP: In 2019, China submitted about 59000 patent applications through the Patent Cooperation Treaty (PCT), with an annual growth rate of 10.6%, making it the country with the largest number of international patent applications.

SRC: 中国已经成为创新和知识产权<v>大国</v>。
HYP: China has become a country of innovation and intellectual property rights.

SRC: 乌鲁木齐免费核酸检测多数区已基本完成高风险地区进行二次检测-中新网
HYP: Urumqi free nucleic acid testing has been basically completed in most districts, high-risk areas conduct secondary testing

SRC: 乌鲁木齐免费核酸检测多数区已基本完成高风险地区进行二次检测<v>-中新网</v>
HYP: Urumqi free nucleic acid testing has been basically completed in most districts, high-risk areas conduct secondary testing

SRC: 中新网乌鲁木齐7月26日电(记者孙亭文赵雅敏)乌鲁木齐市卫健委主任张卫26日在通报乌鲁木齐市最新疫情和核酸检测<v>情况</v>时称，目前，乌鲁木齐全市免费核酸检测工作多数区已基本完成。
HYP: China News Service, Urumqi, July 26 (Reporter Sun Tingwen and Zhao Yamin) Zhang Wei, director of the Urumqi Health and Health Commission, said on the 26th when reporting the latest epidemic situation and nucleic acid testing in Urumqi, most districts in Urumqi City have basically completed free nucleic acid testing.

SRC: 中新网乌鲁木齐7月26日电(记者孙亭文赵雅敏)乌鲁木齐市卫健委主任张卫26日在通报乌鲁木齐市最新疫情和核酸检测情况时称，<v>目前</v>，乌鲁木齐全市免费核酸检测工作多数区已基本完成。
HYP: China News Service, Urumqi, July 26 (Reporter Sun Tingwen and Zhao Yamin) Zhang Wei, director of the Urumqi Health and Health Commission, said on the 26th when reporting the latest epidemic situation and nucleic acid testing in Urumqi, most districts in Urumqi City have basically completed free nucleic acid testing.

SRC: 中新网乌鲁木齐7月26日电(记者孙亭文赵雅敏)乌鲁木齐市卫健委主任张卫26日在通报乌鲁木齐市最新疫情和核酸检测情况时称，目前，乌鲁木齐全市免费核酸检测工作多数区已基本完成。
HYP: China News Service, Urumqi, July 26 (Reporter Sun Tingwen and Zhao Yamin) Zhang Wei, director of the Urumqi Health and Health Commission, said on the 26th when reporting the latest epidemic situation and nucleic acid testing in Urumqi, most districts in Urumqi City have basically completed free nucleic acid testing.

SRC: 国务院专家组和自治区、乌鲁木齐市专家正在根据核酸检测和流行病学调查结果，对疫情的发展做进一步评估。
HYP: The expert group of the State Council and the experts of the autonomous region and Urumqi city are making further assessments of the development of the epidemic based on the results of nucleic acid testing and epidemiological investigations.

SRC: 新疆维吾尔自治区新闻办公室26日召开新闻发布会通报新疆疫情和防控<v>情况</v>。
HYP: The Press Office of the Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region held a press conference on the 26th to report on the epidemic situation and its prevention and control in Xinjiang.

SRC: 据他介绍，7月25日0时至24时，乌鲁木齐市新增新冠肺炎确诊病例22例(其中5例为无症状感染者转确诊病例) ，新增无症状感染者38例。
HYP: According to him, from 0:00 to 24:00 on July 25, 22 new cases of new coronary pneumonia were confirmed in Urumqi (5 of them were asymptomatic infections transferred to confirmed cases), and 38 new cases of asymptomatic infections were added.

SRC: 截至7月25日24时，乌鲁木齐市现有确诊病例135例，无症状感染者147例。
HYP: As of 24:00 on July 25, Urumqi City has 135 confirmed cases and 147 asymptomatic infections.

SRC: 25日新增的无症状感染者也基本上都是通过全市免费核酸检测、主动筛查出来的。
HYP: The newly-added asymptomatic infections on the 25th were basically detected through the city's free nucleic acid test and active screening.

SRC: 乌鲁木齐市卫健委主任张卫26日称，乌鲁木齐全市免费核酸检测工作多数区已基本完成。
HYP: Zhang Wei, director of the Urumqi Health and Health Commission, stated on the 26th that most districts in Urumqi Quanquan City have basically completed free nucleic acid testing.

SRC: 他还说，从国内其他地区的经验看，影响核酸检测结果的因素很多，比如检测试剂灵敏度、受检测人员的感染时间和排毒时间、标本取材时受检测者配合情况(配合度差可能导致标本没有取到位)以及检测环境、检验人员的操作熟练程度等。
HYP: He also said that from the experience of other regions in the country, there are many factors that affect the results of nucleic acid testing, such as the sensitivity of the test reagent, the time of infection and detoxification of the tested person, the cooperation of the tested person (poor cooperation may lead to the failure of the sample), the testing environment, and the operational proficiency of the inspector.

SRC: 他还说，从国内其他地区的经验看，影响核酸检测结果的因素很多，比如检测试剂灵敏度、受检测人员的感染时间和排毒时间、标本取材时受检测者配合情况(配合度差可能导致标本没有<v>取</v>到位)以及检测环境、检验人员的操作熟练程度等。
HYP: He also said that from the experience of other regions in the country, there are many factors that affect the results of nucleic acid testing, such as the sensitivity of the test reagent, the time of infection and detoxification of the tested person, the cooperation of the tested person (poor cooperation may lead to the failure of the sample), the testing environment, and the operational proficiency of the inspector.

SRC: 他还说，从国内其他地区的经验看，影响核酸检测结果的因素很多，比如检测试剂灵敏度、受检测人员的感染时间和排毒时间、<v>标本取材时</v>受检测者配合情况(配合度差可能导致标本没有取到位)以及检测环境、检验人员的操作熟练程度等。
