HYP: When talking about the dissemination of the film, Academician Zhong Nanshan said that at present, some people in foreign countries like to label the virus as politicized. He hopes that the film can impress the audience from the perspective of human nature: "In addition to being shown in China, the film should also be shown abroad. It must be understood by domestic and foreign audiences and impress the audience with a true humanistic spirit."

SRC: 钟南山院士还深情回忆了上世纪80年代的影片《人到中年》，“这么多年过去了，我对改革开放后电影印象最深的还是《人到中年》，当时我国外的医生朋友们都看哭了，如果《中国医生》能够起到这样的作用，那就很了不起了。”
HYP: Academician Zhong Nanshan also fondly recalled the film "Man to Middle Age" in the 1980s. "After so many years, I am most impressed with the movie "Man to Middle Age" after the reform and opening up. At that time, my doctor friends abroad were crying. If "Chinese Doctor" could play such a role, it would be great."

SRC: 钟南山院士表示，如果《中国医生》能引起国外观众的共鸣，那就非常成功。
HYP: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that if "Chinese Doctor" can resonate with foreign audiences, it will be very successful.

SRC: 在座谈交流时，钟南山院士还分享了对当前国际疫情防控的意见和建议，“ 我相信人永远比病毒聪明。”
HYP: During the discussion and exchange, Academician Zhong Nanshan also shared his opinions and suggestions on the current international epidemic prevention and control, "I believe that people are always smarter than viruses."

SRC: 钟南山院士表示，虽说病毒难以预测，但从原始社会至今，人类已渡过了千难万险，如今现代社会有发达的医疗科技和社会管理措施，再加上全世界的医务人员、甚至老百姓都对科学应对新冠肺炎疫情有了基本认识，人们不会再像以前那么被动，“接下来要注意两个方面的工作，一是要研究全世界怎么加强合作，二是注重对人们心灵的抚慰” 。
HYP: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that although the virus is unpredictable, humans have survived all kinds of dangers since primitive society. Nowadays, modern society has advanced medical technology and social management measures. Coupled with the basic understanding of scientific response to the new crown pneumonia epidemic by medical staff and even the common people all over the world, people will no longer be as passive as before. “Next, we must pay attention to two aspects of work, one is to study how the world can strengthen cooperation with people's souls.”

SRC: （记者王金跃）
HYP: (Reporter Wang Jinyue)

SRC: 文旅“红果”聚韶山—湘潭首届红博会见闻-今日要闻-湖南日报网-华声在线
HYP: "Red Fruits" of Cultural Tourism Gathering in Shaoshan-Information about the first Xiangtan Red Fair-Today's News-Hunan Daily-Huasheng Online

SRC: 湖南日报·新湖南客户端记者蒋睿通讯员肖燕
HYP: Hunan Daily·New Hunan Client Correspondent Jiang Rui Correspondent Xiao Yan

SRC: 嘉兴红船模具、韶山毛泽东铜像、延安布堆花工艺品、湘西永顺腊肉…… 7月25日，2020湖南红色旅游文化节在韶山开幕。
HYP: Jiaxing Red Boat Mould, Shaoshan Mao Zedong Bronze Statue, Yan'an Budun Flower Crafts, Xiangxi Yongshun Bacon... On July 25, the 2020 Hunan Red Tourism Cultural Festival opened in Shaoshan.

SRC: 作为主体活动之一，湘潭首届红色文化产业博览会在韶山全域旅游咨询集散中心开展。
HYP: As one of the main activities, the first Xiangtan Red Cultural Industry Expo was launched at the Shaoshan Global Tourism Consulting Center.

SRC: 展览区红色文创产品、革命老区土特产品等琳琅满目，引来各地游客争相购买。
HYP: The red cultural and creative products in the exhibition area and the native products of the revolutionary old area are dazzlingly dazzling, attracting tourists from all over the world to buy them.

SRC: “此次红博会，既是全国红色文化产业成果的一次展示，也是参展单位和企业交流经验、探讨发展路径的一个重要平台。”
HYP: "This Red Expo is not only a showcase of the achievements of the national red cultural industry, but also an important platform for exhibitors and enterprises to exchange experiences and explore development paths."

SRC: 湘潭首届红博会执委会相关负责人介绍，这届红博会以“弘扬红色文化助推文旅升温”为主题，展览总面积近3000平方米，设置了氛围营造区、景区展示展陈区和红色文旅网游网购体验区。
HYP: The relevant person in charge of the executive committee of the first Xiangtan Red Expo introduced that the theme of this Red Expo is "Promoting Red Culture and Boosting Cultural Tourism". The total exhibition area is nearly 3000 square meters. It has set up an atmosphere creation area, a scenic display area and a red cultural tourism online shopping experience area.

SRC: 邀请浙江嘉兴、贵州遵义、陕西延安等8个外省地市以及我省长沙、株洲、岳阳、郴州等地137家企业、单位参展，共展出展品768种，包括红色文物、工艺品、食品特产、旅游线路、红色培训课程、红色文创产品等。
HYP: Inviting 8 other provinces and cities, including Jiaxing, Zhejiang, Zunyi, Guizhou, and Yan'an, Shaanxi, as well as 137 enterprises and units from Changsha, Zhuzhou, Yueyang, Chenzhou and other places in our province, exhibited 768 kinds of exhibits, including red cultural relics, handicrafts, food specialties, tourist routes, red training courses, red cultural and creative products, etc.

SRC: 展销区将展至7月29日。
HYP: The exhibition area will be on until July 29.

SRC: 作为红博会东道主，湘潭展区亮点纷呈。
HYP: As the host of the Red Fair, the Xiangtan exhibition area is full of highlights.

SRC: 展区负责人介绍，湘潭展区分为红色工业、红色文化产业发展两大部分。
HYP: According to the person in charge of the exhibition area, the Xiangtan Exhibition is divided into two parts, the red industry and the development of the red cultural industry.

SRC: 红色工业展区展出华菱湘钢、华菱线缆、湘电动力等6家企业的展品31件，红色文化产业发展展区展出红色系列图书、红色系列食品、红色系列文创产品等27家单位产品近200个。
HYP: The red industrial area exhibited 31 exhibits from 6 companies including Valin Xianggang, Valin Cable, and Xiangdian Power. The red cultural industry development area exhibited nearly 200 products from 27 units including red series books, red series foods, and red series cultural and creative products.

SRC: 在延安展区，不少游客被陈展的布堆花手工艺品和剪纸艺术品所吸引。
HYP: In the Yan'an exhibition area, many tourists were attracted by the exhibited handicrafts of cloth pile flowers and paper-cut art.

SRC: 延安市文旅局局长马东坡介绍，此次参展精心选择了延安近两年来优秀的红色文创产品，其中16种产品是2019全国红色文创产品优秀作品。
HYP: Ma Dongpo, director of Yan'an Municipal Bureau of Culture and Tourism, introduced that the exhibition carefully selected Yan'an's outstanding red cultural and creative products in the past two years, of which 16 products are the 2019 national red cultural and creative products.

SRC: 延安市文旅局局长马东坡介绍，此次参展精心选择了延安近两年来优秀的红色文创产品，其中16种产品是2019全国红色文创产品<v>优秀作品</v>。
HYP: Ma Dongpo, director of Yan'an Municipal Bureau of Culture and Tourism, introduced that the exhibition carefully selected Yan'an's outstanding red cultural and creative products in the past two years, of which 16 products are the 2019 national red cultural and creative products.

SRC: 同时，他们邀请了国家级非物质文化遗产保护项目“安塞剪纸”、“陕北民歌”与省级非遗项目延川布堆画传承人，重点推介延安民俗特色产品，并借此机会与其他展区单位企业沟通交流，推动跨区域合作。
HYP: At the same time, they invited the national intangible cultural heritage protection projects "Ansai Paper-cutting", "Northern Shaanxi Folk Songs" and the provincial intangible cultural heritage project Yanchuan Budui painting inheritors to focus on the promotion of Yan'an folk custom products, and take this opportunity to communicate with other exhibition area units and enterprises to promote cross-regional cooperation.

SRC: 膜分离技术助力破解“温室效应” - 中新网
HYP: Membrane separation technology helps crack the "greenhouse effect"-Chinanews

SRC: 膜分离技术助力破解“温室效应”
HYP: Membrane separation technology helps crack the "greenhouse effect"

SRC: 新型混合基质膜制备技术示意图
HYP: Schematic diagram of new mixed matrix membrane preparation technology

SRC: 本报讯记者商瑞报道：日前，天津大学大气环境与生物能源团队针对“膜分离法捕集二氧化碳”取得重大进展，成功研发出新型混合基质膜制备技术，大幅提升膜材料二氧化碳捕集性能。
HYP: News from our newspaper reporter Shang Rui reported: A few days ago, the Tianjin University Atmospheric Environment and Bioenergy Team made significant progress on the "membrane separation method to capture carbon dioxide" and successfully developed a new hybrid matrix membrane preparation technology, which greatly improved the carbon dioxide capture performance of membrane materials.

SRC: 相关成果已作为国际期刊《温室气体：科学与技术》封面文章发表。
HYP: Related results have been published as the cover article of the international journal "Greenhouse Gas: Science and Technology".

SRC: “温室效应”是困扰人类发展的重大环境问题，二氧化碳排放则是造成“温室效应”的元凶。
HYP: The "greenhouse effect" is a major environmental issue that plagues human development, and carbon dioxide emissions are the culprit responsible for the "greenhouse effect".

SRC: 如何高效捕获并利用人类排放的二氧化碳是科学家关注的焦点。
HYP: How to efficiently capture and use carbon dioxide emitted by humans is the focus of attention of scientists.

SRC: “膜分离法”是一种新兴的二氧化碳捕集技术，它在膜材料帮助下分离二氧化碳气体，具有高效节能、操作简单的特点。
HYP: "Membrane separation method" is an emerging carbon dioxide capture technology, which separates carbon dioxide gas with the help of membrane materials, and has the characteristics of high efficiency, energy saving, and simple operation.

SRC: 如何让膜材料“深呼吸”， 提高气体分离效率，是采用膜分离法捕集二氧化碳的瓶颈难点。
HYP: How to let the membrane material "breathe deeply" and improve the efficiency of gas separation is the bottleneck difficulty in the use of membrane separation to capture carbon dioxide.

SRC: 天津大学科研团队创新思路，通过反复实验，探究不同溶剂对膜气体分离性能的影响。
HYP: The scientific research team of Tianjin University has innovated ideas and through repeated experiments, explored the influence of different solvents on the performance of membrane gas separation.

SRC: 实验结果表明，以N-甲基吡咯烷酮作为制备溶剂，生成的膜材料中碳纳米管分布更加均匀，“更透气”，有效提升了膜材料气体分离效能和速率。
HYP: The experimental results show that using N-methylpyrrolidone as the preparation solvent, the carbon nanotubes in the produced membrane material are more evenly distributed and "more air-permeable", which effectively improves the gas separation efficiency and rate of the membrane material.

SRC: 用这种新技术制备的混合基质膜，二氧化碳分离性能接近目前此类膜材料的理论分离上限。
HYP: The mixed matrix membrane prepared by this new technology has a carbon dioxide separation performance close to the current theoretical separation upper limit of this type of membrane material.

SRC: “新技术为膜分离法捕集二氧化碳提供了新思路。”
HYP: "The new technology provides new ideas for the capture of carbon dioxide by membrane separation."

SRC: 天津大学大气环境与生物能源团队成员李润表示：“ 我们希望这种技术能够为未来燃煤电厂与化工企业处理烟气提供有力支持，在控制温室气体排放等领域发挥重大作用。”
HYP: Li Run, a member of the Atmospheric Environment and Bioenergy Team of Tianjin University, said: "We hope that this technology can provide strong support for the future coal-fired power plants and chemical companies to deal with flue gas, and play a major role in the control of greenhouse gas emissions and other fields."

SRC: 首度成立专委会、集体签“长约” 第三届进博会参展商联盟构筑“进博纽带” - 新华网
HYP: Established a special committee for the first time and collectively signed a "long agreement" The third CIIE exhibitors alliance to build a "CIIE link"-Xinhuanet

SRC: 7月26日在上海拍摄的第三届进博会参展商联盟第一次会议现场。
HYP: The scene of the first meeting of the 3rd CIIE Exhibitors Alliance, which was filmed in Shanghai on July 26.

SRC: 新华社上海7月26日电（记者周蕊）26日，第三届进口博览会参展商联盟在此间首次成立专业委员会，首批成立的专委会包括公共卫生防疫专委会和乳业专委会，35家成员企业还签订了3年长期参展合作备忘录，进博会参展商联盟的纽带作用不断增强。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Shanghai, July 26 (Reporter Zhou Rui) On the 26th, the 3rd CIIE Exhibitors Alliance established a professional committee here for the first time. The first special committees established include the Public Health and Epidemic Prevention Committee and the Dairy Industry Committee. 35 member companies have also signed a 3-year long-term participation memorandum. The role of the CIIE Exhibitor Alliance has been continuously strengthened.

SRC: 26日在此间举行的第三届进博会参展商联盟第一次会议上，韩国现代、美国陶氏化学、日本资生堂、新西兰纽仕兰、德国西门子、法国米其林、英国阿斯利康等一批展盟成员企业签订了3年长期参展合作备忘录，修订和完善后的展盟章程也首次公布。
HYP: At the first meeting of the 3rd CIIE Exhibitors Alliance held here on the 26th, a group of exhibition alliance member companies such as Hyundai Korea, Dow Chemical of the United States, Shiseido of Japan, New Zealand New Zealand, Siemens of Germany, Michelin of France, and AstraZeneca of the United Kingdom signed a three-year long-term participation memorandum. The revised and improved Articles of the Exhibition were also announced for the first time.

SRC: 7月26日在上海拍摄的乳业专业委员会成立仪式现场。
HYP: The scene of the establishment ceremony of the Dairy Professional Committee filmed in Shanghai on July 26.

SRC: 根据最新的章程，展盟将引入牵头单位轮值机制，加强专委会功能。
HYP: According to the latest charter, Zhanmeng will introduce a rotation mechanism for the lead unit to strengthen the function of the special committee.

SRC: 专委会将为行业发展趋势分析提出建议，推动行业可持续发展。
HYP: The special committee will make suggestions for the analysis of industry development trends and promote the sustainable development of the industry.

SRC: 同时，整合行业全产业链资源，以大带小，带动关联企业参展，将进博会打造成为行业企业聚集高地。
HYP: At the same time, it will integrate the resources of the entire industry chain to drive related companies to participate in the exhibition, and build the CIIE into a gathering place for industry companies.

SRC: 首次成立公共卫生防疫专委会，对于当前抗击新冠肺炎疫情来说显得尤为重要。
HYP: The establishment of a public health and epidemic prevention committee for the first time is particularly important for the current fight against the new crown pneumonia epidemic.

SRC: 作为第三届进博会公共卫生防疫专委会副会长单位，雅培快速诊断业务大中华区总经理仇建平说，下一步，雅培会携手更多行业伙伴，探索新的解决方案和合作模式，助力中国以及全世界抗击新冠肺炎疫情。
HYP: As the vice chairman of the Public Health and Epidemic Prevention Committee of the 3rd CIIE, Qiu Jianping, general manager of Abbott's rapid diagnostics business in Greater China, said that in the next step, Abbott will work with more industry partners to explore new solutions and cooperation models to help China and the world fight the new crown pneumonia epidemic.

SRC: 7月26日在上海拍摄的公共卫生防疫专业委员会成立仪式现场。
HYP: The inauguration ceremony of the Public Health and Epidemic Prevention Committee was filmed in Shanghai on July 26.

SRC: 据悉，第三届进博会首次设立公共卫生防疫专区，截至目前已有近50家全球企业报名参展，展览面积超过1万平方米。
HYP: It is reported that the third CIIE set up a special area for public health and epidemic prevention for the first time. So far, nearly 50 global companies have signed up for the exhibition, with an exhibition area of more than 10000 square meters.

SRC: 在2018年首届进博会期间，进博会参展商联盟由展商自发倡议成立，旨在成为优质参展企业交流合作平台、连接参展各方信息与资源共享平台，以及为促进中国与世界各国（地区）之间经贸商务往来与发展建言献策的智囊平台。
HYP: During the first CIIE in 2018, the CIIE Exhibitor Alliance was established voluntarily by exhibitors. It aims to become a platform for high-quality exhibitors' exchange and cooperation, a platform for sharing information and resources between exhibitors, and a think-tank platform for promoting economic, trade and business exchanges and development between China and countries (regions) around the world.

SRC: 截至目前，已有142家企业加入参展商联盟，覆盖全球23个国家和地区。
HYP: Up to now, 142 companies have joined the Exhibitor Alliance, covering 23 countries and regions around the world.

SRC: 比利时3岁女童死于新冠病毒感染-新华网
HYP: Belgian 3-year-old girl dies from new coronavirus infection-Xinhua English.news.cn

SRC: 比利时卫生部门24日说，一名3岁女童死于新冠病毒感染，是该国最年幼的新冠病亡患者。
HYP: The Belgian health department said on the 24th that a 3-year-old girl died of a new crown virus infection and was the youngest patient in the country to die from the new crown virus.

SRC: 比利时卫生部门发言人布德温·卡特里说，这名女童感染新冠病毒前已经有其他严重疾病；除了这名女童，近期还有一名18岁青年死于新冠病毒感染。
HYP: Belgian health department spokesperson Budwin Catri said that the girl had already had other serious diseases before contracting the new crown virus; in addition to this girl, another 18-year-old recently died of the new crown virus infection.

SRC: 卡特里说，上周比利时85%新增新冠确诊人员年龄在60岁以下。
HYP: Catery said that 85% of newly diagnosed new crowns in Belgium last week were under 60 years old.

SRC: 他提醒身体健康、年龄较轻的民众不要掉以轻心。
HYP: He reminded people who are healthy and younger not to take it lightly.

SRC: “虽然年轻人死于新冠病毒感染的情况较为罕见，但没有任何人现在具备免疫力。 ”
HYP: "Although it is rare for young people to die from the new coronavirus infection, no one is now immune."

SRC: 上周，比利时新增新冠确诊病例比前一周增长89 % ， 每日平均2.9人死于新冠病毒感染，高于前一周的日均1.7人。
HYP: Last week, the number of new confirmed cases of new crowns in Belgium increased by 89% compared with the previous week, and the daily average of 2.9 people died from new crown virus infections, which was higher than the daily average of 1.7 people in the previous week.

SRC: 欧洲疫情高峰期间，比利时人口中新冠病毒感染者占比在欧洲“名列前茅” 。
HYP: During the peak of the epidemic in Europe, the proportion of people infected with the new crown virus in the Belgian population was “ranked among the best” in Europe.

SRC: 比利时有1100多万人口。
HYP: Belgium has a population of more than 11 million.

SRC: 最新数据显示，比利时累计64847人感染新冠病毒。
HYP: The latest data show that a total of 64847 people in Belgium have been infected with the new crown virus.

SRC: 卡特里本周早些时候警告，在雪球越滚越大、最终造成“雪崩”前，人们必须采取行动。
HYP: Carter warned earlier this week that people must take action before the snowballs get bigger and bigger and eventually cause an "avalanche."

SRC: 为抑制疫情反弹，比利时首相索菲·维尔梅斯23日宣布，人们在公共场所佩戴口罩的有关规定将更加严格，8月进一步解除限制性措施的方案也将暂缓执行。
HYP: In order to curb the rebound of the epidemic, Belgian Prime Minister Sophie Wilmes announced on the 23rd that the relevant regulations on people wearing masks in public places will be stricter, and the plan for further lifting of restrictive measures in August will also be suspended.

SRC: （郭倩） 【 新华社微特稿】
HYP: (Guo Qian) 【Xinhua News Agency Micro Feature】

SRC: 大型融媒体行动《走村直播看脱贫》出发- 今日要闻- 湖南日报网- 华声在线
HYP: The large-scale integrated media operation "Live Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation" starts-today's news-hunan daily net-huasheng online

SRC: 湖南日报·新湖南客户端7月25日讯(本报记者)7月25日，由中央广播电视总台财经节目中心主办的大型融媒体行动《走村直播看脱贫》从江苏徐州出发，两辆携带5G新媒体移动云制播系统的大篷车在现场嘉宾目送下，缓缓驶出现场。
HYP: Hunan Daily · New Hunan Client, July 25 (Reporter from this newspaper) On July 25, the large-scale media integration campaign "Live Village Live Watching Poverty Alleviation" sponsored by the Financial Program Center of China Central Radio and Television set out from Xuzhou, Jiangsu. Two caravans carrying 5G new media mobile cloud production and broadcasting systems were watched by the guests and slowly drove into the scene.

SRC: 习近平总书记指出，“2020年是具有里程碑意义的一年，我们将全面建成小康社会，实现第一个百年奋斗目标，2020年也是脱贫攻坚决战决胜之年”。
HYP: General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out that “2020 is a year of milestone significance. We will build a moderately prosperous society in all respects and achieve the first centennial goal. 2020 is also a year of resolute victory in poverty alleviation”.

SRC: 大型融媒体行动《走村直播看脱贫》是中央广播电视总台财经节目中心为配合这一重大主题，做好脱贫攻坚宣传的重要举措。
HYP: The large-scale financial media action "Walking the Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation" is an important measure taken by the Financial Program Center of China Central Radio and Television to cooperate with this major theme and promote poverty alleviation.

SRC: 该行动将走进全国20多个省、自治区、直辖市的脱贫村，挖掘鲜活脱贫故事，直击村容村貌巨变，展现村民如何突破生存发展困境、走向致富之路的历程。
HYP: This action will go into poverty alleviation villages in more than 20 provinces, autonomous regions, and municipalities across the country, dig out live poverty alleviation stories, directly hit the huge changes in the appearance of the village, and show how the villagers can break through the plight of survival and development and become rich.

SRC: 这次行动将持续3个多月。
HYP: This operation will last more than three months.

SRC: 记者从徐州出发，兵分两路，一路走西南线，途经安徽、湖北、江西、湖南、广西、贵州、四川、重庆、云南、西藏等地;另一路走西北线，途经河南、陕西、甘肃、青海、新疆、宁夏、内蒙古、山西、河北等地，行程超过1万公里。
HYP: The reporter departed from Xuzhou and divided the troops into two routes, all the way to the southwest line, passing through Anhui, Hubei, Jiangxi, Hunan, Guangxi, Guizhou, Sichuan, Chongqing, Yunnan, Tibet and other places; the other way to the northwest line, passing through Henan, Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Xinjiang, Ningxia, Inner Mongolia, Shanxi, Hebei and other places, the travel distance exceeded 10000 kilometers.

SRC: 在报道形式上，《走村直播看脱贫》大胆融合。
HYP: In terms of report form, "Walking the Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation" boldly integrated.

SRC: 大篷车所到村庄的经济发展情况，都将通过中央广播电视总台央视财经频道、央广经济之声、中国交通广播、央视财经新媒体进行播出。
HYP: The economic development of the villages visited by the caravan will be broadcasted through the CCTV Finance Channel, CCTV Economic Voice, China Communications Broadcasting, and CCTV Finance New Media.

SRC: 其中，电视直播将主要在央视财经频道的午间新闻节目《天下财经》完成(首播时间：周一至周日12：00-13:00 )，央视财经频道的黄金档新闻栏目《经济信息联播》将开设脱贫报道专栏(首播时间：周一至周日20：30-21:30 )。
HYP: Among them, the live TV broadcast will be mainly completed in the noon news program "Tianxia Finance" of the CCTV Finance Channel (first broadcast time: Monday to Sunday 12:00-13:00), and the prime news section of the CCTV Finance Channel "Economic Information Network" will open a poverty alleviation report column (first broadcast time: Monday to Sunday 20:30-21:30).

SRC: 同时，大篷车将对所到的每个村庄在央视财经客户端进行长达1小时的直播，观众通过下载央视财经APP，可以观看直播，参与抽奖活动。
HYP: At the same time, the caravan will conduct a 1-hour live broadcast on the CCTV Finance client for every village it visits. The audience can watch the live broadcast and participate in the lucky draw by downloading the CCTV Finance APP.

SRC: 在技术应用和演播室设计上，《 走村直播看脱贫》勇于突破，首创了“外场新媒体大篷车”。
HYP: In terms of technology application and studio design, "Walking Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation" has the courage to make breakthroughs and pioneered the "Outfield New Media Caravan".

SRC: 该车搭载5G新媒体移动云制播系统，利用5G+4K/8K+AI技术，实现线上线下、大屏小屏，电视广播的有机结合。
HYP: The car is equipped with a 5G new media mobile cloud production and broadcasting system, and uses 5G 4K/8K AI technology to achieve an organic combination of online and offline, large and small screens, and TV broadcasting.

SRC: 配置三讯演播区，演播区由集装箱改装而成，长12米、宽2.55米、高3.98米，箱体采用液压自动展开结构，最大可以上翻120度。
HYP: Equipped with Sanxun studio area, the studio area is converted from a container, with a length of 12 meters, a width of 2.55 meters, and a height of 3.98 meters. The box body adopts a hydraulic automatic deployment structure, which can be turned up by 120 degrees.

SRC: 演播区也可以自动展开，并外接扩展平台，面积50多平方米，可以满足大部分节目的场景要求。
HYP: The studio area can also be expanded automatically, with an external expansion platform, covering an area of more than 50 square meters, which can meet the scene requirements of most programs.

SRC: 张继科林小宅组队力挺有肌少年-新华网
HYP: Zhang Jikelin Xiaozhai team up to support young muscles-Xinhua

SRC: 运动少年热血竞技秀《运动吧少年》在7月11日正式登陆湖南卫视。
HYP: The sports youth passionate sports show "Sports Boys" officially landed on Hunan Satellite TV on July 11.

SRC: 运动领队张继科和运动助理林小宅跨界同台,林丹和傅园慧点评各有风格,而“庞然大物”般的力量拔杆装置的硬核上场,更让节目“燃”力十足。
HYP: Sports leader Zhang Jike and sports assistant Lin Xiaozhai cross the stage, Lin Dan and Fu Yuanhui commented on their own style, and the hard core of the "monster" power-pulling device appeared, which made the program "burning" full of power.

SRC: 运动领队张继科和运动助理林小宅跨<v>界</v>同台,林丹和傅园慧点评各有风格,而“庞然大物”般的力量拔杆装置的硬核上场,更让节目“燃”力十足。
HYP: Sports leader Zhang Jike and sports assistant Lin Xiaozhai cross the stage, Lin Dan and Fu Yuanhui commented on their own style, and the hard core of the "monster" power-pulling device appeared, which made the program "burning" full of power.

SRC: 首集中,11位运动少年亮相力量赛道,外形惊艳现场观众的同时,竞技台上的“强冲突”“强对抗”“强心脏”也受到关注。
HYP: In the first episode, 11 sports teenagers appeared on the power circuit. While the appearance was amazing to the audience, the "strong conflict", "strong confrontation" and "strong heart" on the arena also attracted attention.

SRC: 其中,“ 强冲突”来自超A体育生乔文一,他在比赛前公然挑衅同赛道中有“花美男”之称的徐志滨,呛声徐志滨的外形条件应该去唱跳节目,甚至放出“输了别把妆哭花了”的狠话。
HYP: Among them, the "strong conflict" comes from Super A sports student Qiao Wenyi. Before the game, he publicly provoked Xu Zhibin, who is also known as the "flower beautiful man" in the track. The appearance of Xu Zhibin should sing and dance programs, and even release the cruel words "Don't lose your makeup and cry."

SRC: 一番言论让场上的少年和运动领队们都倒吸一口凉气。
HYP: A few words made the teenagers and sports leaders on the field take a breath.

SRC: 而“强对抗”更像是神仙打架,被誉为“大魔王”的孙健淇碰上同样实力强劲的张鑫栋,上演强强对决。
HYP: The "strong confrontation" is more like a fairy fight. Sun Jianqi, known as the "big devil", met Zhang Xindong, who is also strong, and staged a strong confrontation.

SRC: 而他们的身份也让人始料未及,孙健淇是热爱健身的演员,张鑫栋则是退役特战队员、三次勇士勋章获得者。
HYP: Their identity is also unexpected, Sun Jianqi is an actor who loves fitness, and Zhang Xindong is a retired special team member and a three-time warrior medal winner.

SRC: 比赛一开始,两位少年就拼尽全力快速拔出小杆,在大杆上的持久对抗让现场观众为他们捏了一把汗。
HYP: At the beginning of the game, the two teenagers tried their best to quickly pull out the small pole, and the enduring confrontation on the big pole made the audience squeeze for them.

SRC: 在紧张的赛况下,张继科作为《运动吧少年》运动领队之一,也在一旁认真观战。
HYP: Under tight conditions, Zhang Jike, as one of the sports leaders of "Sports Boys", also watched the game seriously.

SRC: 在点评环节,他也十分细心,对输了比赛的一方少年耐心鼓励,帮助复盘过程中的每一个失误点。
HYP: In the comment session, he was also very attentive. He patiently encouraged the boy who lost the game and helped every mistake in the replay.

SRC: 而运动助理林小宅则是花式助攻,她毫不掩饰对颜值实力在线的少年们的欣赏。
HYP: While sports assistant Lin Xiaozhai is a fancy assist, she has not concealed her appreciation of the young men who are strong online.

SRC: 在了解到运动少年们超负荷的日常训练时,更是心生敬佩。
HYP: It is even more admirable to learn about the overloaded daily training of sports teenagers.

SRC: 同样是运动领队的林丹和傅园慧则各有风格,一个是气定神闲派“预言家” , 一个则是用笑容驱散紧张氛围的“洪荒少女” 。
HYP: Lin Dan and Fu Yuanhui, who are also sports leaders, have their own styles. One is the "Prophet" who is calm and calm, and the other is the "Honghuang Girl" who uses a smile to dispel the tension.

SRC: 另外,吉克隽逸和刘烨作为运动助理,也围绕运动少年制造了不少爆笑话题。
HYP: In addition, Jike Junyi and Liu Ye, as sports assistants, also created a lot of hilarious topics around sports teenagers.

SRC: 法国南特教堂大火：教区志愿者承认纵火<v>平时和善寡言</v>-中新网
HYP: Church fire in Nantes, France: Parish volunteers admit arson

SRC: 中新网7月26日电据外媒报道，7月18日，法国南特的宗教历史建筑瑰宝、著名的圣彼得与圣保罗大教堂，在一场火灾当中受到严重损毁，大管风琴完全毁坏。
HYP: China News Service, July 26. According to foreign media reports, on July 18, the religious and historical buildings of Nantes, France, and the famous St. Peter and St. Paul Cathedral were severely damaged in a fire, and the organ was completely destroyed.

SRC: 当地时间26日，南特检察官宣布，一名在大教堂当中负责保卫工作的教区志愿者已经被起诉，罪名是“纵火毁坏” 。
HYP: On the 26th local time, the Nantes prosecutor announced that a parish volunteer who was in charge of the security work in the cathedral has been prosecuted on charges of "arson destruction".

SRC: 他已承认，是自己在教堂里点火。
HYP: He has confessed that he is igniting himself in the church.

SRC: 报道称，当地检察官塞纳斯表示，这名39岁、来自卢旺达的教区志愿者承认，自己夜里在大教堂当中的三处点火。
HYP: According to reports, local prosecutor Cenas said that the 39-year-old diocese volunteer from Rwanda admitted that he set fire to three places in the cathedral at night.

SRC: 此人的律师则表示，纵火者现在很后悔做出这种事。
HYP: The person's lawyer said that the arsonist now regrets doing this kind of thing.

SRC: 此人几年前通过避难的途径，进入法国，在本次火灾事发地教区得到庇护，在教堂里得到收留。
HYP: The man entered France by refuge a few years ago, was sheltered in the parish where the fire broke out, and was taken in in the church.

SRC: 检方指出，最近，他尝试更新签证，正在和警察局对此进行对话沟通。
HYP: The prosecutor pointed out that recently, he tried to renew his visa and was in dialogue with the police.

SRC: 但教堂方面表示仍然不敢相信，这名平时非常善良、面带笑容，但不怎么说话的信徒，会毁坏他如此热爱的教堂。
HYP: But the church said that he still couldn't believe it. This believer who was usually very kind and smiling, but didn't talk much would destroy the church he loved so much.

SRC: 7月18日火灾发生的当天，这名志愿者就已经因为叙述当中出现逻辑不通的问题，而接受过警方问询调查，但他后来被释放。
HYP: On the day of the fire on July 18, the volunteer had been questioned by the police for investigation because of illogical problems in the narrative, but he was later released.

SRC: 图为消防员在现场进行救援。
HYP: The picture shows the firefighters rescue at the scene.

SRC: 25日晚间，由于巴黎中央警察局实验室的专业工程师获取了新的证据，此人又再一次被传讯。
HYP: On the evening of the 25th, because the professional engineer of the Paris Central Police Laboratory obtained new evidence, this person was summoned again.

SRC: 这一次，男子承认了自己纵火的行为。
HYP: This time, the man admitted his arson.

SRC: 据报道，如果蓄意纵火毁坏的罪名成立，嫌犯将可能面临10年监禁和15万欧元的罚款。
HYP: According to reports, if the charge of deliberate arson damage is established, the suspect may face 10 years in prison and a fine of 150000 euros.

SRC: 报道称，此次大火给圣皮埃尔与圣保罗大教堂造成了严重损失，教堂内的管风琴被完全烧毁，管风琴后面的彩色玻璃窗也受损严重。
HYP: According to reports, the fire caused severe damage to the Basilica of St. Pierre and St. Paul, the pipe organ in the church was completely burned, and the stained glass windows behind the pipe organ were also severely damaged.

SRC: 法国历史保护建筑首席建筑师布鲁内认为，保守估计，南特大教堂复原工作至少要有3年。
HYP: Brune, the chief architect of the French historical protection building, believes that it is conservatively estimated that the restoration of the Nantes Cathedral will take at least 3 years.

SRC: 飓风“汉娜”登陆美得州或引发河水暴涨和山洪-中新网
HYP: Hurricane "Hannah" landed in Texas, may cause river surges and flash floods

SRC: 中新网7月26日电综合外媒报道，当地时间25日下午5时，飓风“汉娜”登陆美国得克萨斯州，将给得州带来强风暴雨、<v>河水暴涨</v>，还可能引发威胁生命的山洪。
HYP: China News Service, July 26th. Comprehensive foreign media reports that the hurricane "Hannah" landing in Texas, United States at 5 pm local time on the 25th will bring strong storms and storms to the Texas River, and may cause life-threatening flash floods.

SRC: 国家飓风中心说，预计飓风“汉娜”会挟带暴雨，扫过得州南部与东北部部分地区，雨势或引发部分溪水暴涨以及威胁生命的山洪爆发。
HYP: The National Hurricane Center said that Hurricane Hannah is expected to carry heavy rain and sweep across parts of southern and northeastern Texas. The rain may cause some rivers to surge and life-threatening flash floods.

SRC: 报道称，受飓风“汉娜”影响最严重的是科珀斯克里斯蒂市以南到格兰德河河口地区，而里奥格兰德山谷可能爆发大范围的山洪。
HYP: According to reports, the most severely affected by Hurricane Hannah is the area south of the city of Corpus Christi to the mouth of the Grand River, and a large-scale flash flood may occur in the Rio Grande Valley.

SRC: 得州州长阿博特25日表示：“任何飓风都是一个巨大的挑战。”
HYP: Texas Governor Abbot said on the 25th: "Any hurricane is a huge challenge."

SRC: 该州有32个郡因为飓风进入灾难紧急状态。
HYP: There are 32 counties in the state that have entered a disaster emergency due to hurricanes.

SRC: 科珀斯克里斯蒂市这座人口超32万的城市，已关闭图书馆与博物馆，居民严阵以待。
HYP: The city of Corpus Christi, with a population of over 320000, has closed its libraries and museums, and residents are waiting in line.

SRC: 阿博特还说，在得州正在遭遇新冠疫情重创之际，不能再让这场飓风给得州带来更多伤亡。
HYP: Abbott also said that while Texas is suffering from a new crown epidemic, the hurricane cannot be allowed to cause more casualties in Texas.

SRC: 据报道，得州南部地区降水量预计将在26日夜间达到6至12英寸，得克萨斯州北部地区和路易斯安那州沿海地区也将出现3至5英寸的降雨。
HYP: According to reports, precipitation in southern Texas is expected to reach 6 to 12 inches at night on the 26th, and there will also be 3 to 5 inches of rain in northern Texas and coastal areas of Louisiana.

SRC: 由于全球变暖等因素影响，“汉娜”的形成早于以往的大西洋飓风季。
HYP: Due to global warming and other factors, "Hannah" was formed earlier than the previous Atlantic hurricane season.

SRC: 一般情况下，大西洋的第一场飓风通常要到8月中旬才会形成。
HYP: In general, the first hurricane in the Atlantic Ocean will not form until mid-August.

SRC: 波兰将退出欧洲防止对女子施暴的条约
HYP: Poland will withdraw from European treaty to prevent violence against women

SRC: 波兰司法部星期六表示，波兰下个星期将采取步骤，退出欧洲防止对妇女施暴条约。
HYP: The Polish Ministry of Justice said on Saturday that Poland will take steps next week to withdraw from the European treaty to prevent violence against women.

SRC: 波兰右翼的政府内阁表示，该条约要求学校教授学生有关性别问题的议题，践踏了学生父母的权利。
HYP: The Polish government cabinet on the right said that the treaty requires schools to teach students about gender issues, trampling the rights of students' parents.

SRC: 波兰司法部长焦布洛举行记者会说，他领导的司法部星期一将向劳工和家庭部提出开始退出条约的要求。
HYP: Polish Minister of Justice Gibro held a press conference and said that the Ministry of Justice he headed will make a request to the Ministry of Labor and Family on Monday to start withdrawing from the treaty.

SRC: 那项条约又名伊斯坦布尔公约。
HYP: That treaty is also known as the Istanbul Convention.

SRC: 焦布洛说，“该条约包含一些我们认为是有害的意思形态性质的元素。”
HYP: Giobolo said, "The treaty contains some elements that we believe are harmful to form."

SRC: 波兰执政的法律与公正党及其及其执政联盟伙伴跟罗马天主教教会有密切的同盟关系，提倡保守的社会议程。
HYP: Poland's ruling Law and Justice Party and its ruling alliance partners have a close alliance with the Roman Catholic Church and promote a conservative social agenda.

SRC: 波兰总统杜达在这个月成功的连任竞选期间将敌视同性恋权利作为主要议题之一。
HYP: During the successful re-election campaign this month, Polish President Duda made hostility to homosexual rights one of the main issues.

SRC: 星期五，成千上万的波兰人(其中大部分是妇女)在华沙和其他一些城市举行反对退出公约的抗议。
HYP: On Friday, thousands of Poles (most of them women) held protests in Warsaw and some other cities against the withdrawal of the Convention.

SRC: 抗议的组织者之一莱姆帕特在华沙举行的抗议游行中说，“退出条约的目的就是将家暴合法化”。
HYP: Lempat, one of the organizers of the protest, said in a protest march in Warsaw that “the purpose of withdrawing from the treaty is to legalize domestic violence”.

SRC: 一些抗议者举着横幅，上面写着“法律与公正党是妇女的地狱”。
HYP: Some protesters held banners that read "The Law and Justice Party is a hell of women."

SRC: 法律与公正党长久以来抱怨伊斯坦布尔公约。
HYP: The Law and Justice Party has long complained about the Istanbul Convention.

SRC: 波兰先前的中间派执政的政府2015年批准了该公约。
HYP: Poland's previous centrist ruling government ratified the convention in 2015.

SRC: 法律与公正党政府表示，该条约不尊重宗教，要求在学校里教授自由派的社会政策。
HYP: The Law and Justice Party government stated that the treaty does not respect religion and requires that liberal social policies be taught in schools.

SRC: 但截至目前该党一直没有决定退出该公约。
HYP: But so far the party has not decided to withdraw from the convention.

SRC: （根据路透社报道）
HYP: (According to Reuters report)

SRC: 据越通社报道，格里沃里认为，越南25年来为东盟的发展作出巨大贡献。
HYP: According to Vietnam News Agency, Grivori believes that Vietnam has made tremendous contributions to the development of ASEAN in the past 25 years.

SRC: 越南不仅是东盟负责任的一员，更是东盟的火车头。
HYP: Vietnam is not only a responsible member of ASEAN, but also a locomotive of ASEAN.

SRC: 格里沃里表示，俄罗斯乃至亚欧经济联盟认为，越南为东盟提高其地位，对外推广其形象做出贡献。
HYP: Griveri said that Russia and even the Asia-Europe Economic Union believes that Vietnam has contributed to ASEAN's improvement of its status and its image.

SRC: 他强调，“东盟因此应该感谢越南。”
HYP: He emphasized that "ASEAN should therefore thank Vietnam."

SRC: 格里沃里表示，分析人士对越南所提出的和平倡议给予认可。
HYP: Grivori said that analysts give recognition to the peace initiative proposed by Vietnam.

SRC: 越南愿意同东盟各国分享经验，对包括东海问题在内的亚太地区面临的问题提出建设性的和平措施。
HYP: Vietnam is willing to share experiences with ASEAN countries and propose constructive peace measures to the problems facing the Asia-Pacific region, including the East China Sea issue.

SRC: 关于越南与俄罗斯在东盟框架下的合作，格里沃里认为，越南为俄罗斯与东盟的合作关系提供支持，帮助俄罗斯在这一合作框架下获得利益。
HYP: Regarding cooperation between Vietnam and Russia under the framework of ASEAN, Griveri believes that Vietnam provides support for the cooperative relationship between Russia and ASEAN and helps Russia gain benefits under this framework of cooperation.

SRC: 包括俄罗斯在内的亚欧经济联盟与越南签署自贸协定后能够进军东盟市场。
HYP: The Asia-Europe Economic Union, including Russia, and Vietnam can enter the ASEAN market after signing a free trade agreement.

SRC: 格里沃里建议最大限度扩大亚欧经济联盟与东盟各国的自由贸易区，进而创造经济和安全稳定的平台。
HYP: Grivori suggested maximizing the free trade area between the Asia-Europe Economic Union and ASEAN countries to create an economic, safe and stable platform.

SRC: 格里沃里同时相信，俄罗斯、越南与东盟正在步入正轨并将实现其目标。
HYP: Griveri also believes that Russia, Vietnam and ASEAN are on the right track and will achieve their goals.

SRC: 从现在到2020年底，北江省将具备必要条件，尤其是在基础设施，人力资源和土地等方面，以便主动迎来外资流入，特别是拥有价值链和转让先进技术的跨国集团。
HYP: From now until the end of 2020, Beijiang Province will have the necessary conditions, especially in infrastructure, human resources and land, in order to actively welcome foreign capital inflows, especially multinational groups that own value chains and transfer advanced technologies.

SRC: 此外，北江省将办理好递交政府总理决定对越韩工业区基础设施建设与经营项目投资的主张和批准将本省安山-北陇和安闾两个工业-城市-服务业区补充列入至2020年越南工业区发展总体规划的文件。
HYP: In addition, Beijiang Province will handle the submission and approval of the Prime Minister's decision to invest in infrastructure construction and operation projects in the Vietnam-Korea Industrial Zone to add the two industrial-city-services zones of Anshan-Beilong and Anlu in the province to the overall plan for the development of Vietnam's industrial zone by 2020.

SRC: 与此同时，北江省着力加快各项目的进度，尤其是在和富、光州，双溪-内皇等工业园区集群的基础设施建设经营项目，为招商引资形成土地基金。
HYP: At the same time, Beijiang Province strives to accelerate the progress of various projects, especially in infrastructure construction and operation projects in industrial park clusters such as Hefu, Gwangju, and Shuangxi-Neihuang, and forms a land fund for investment attraction.

SRC: 在2020年内，北江省工贸局参就定工业区、工业集群规划建言献策，以纳入省规划。
HYP: In 2020, the Beijiang Provincial Industry and Trade Bureau will participate in making suggestions on the planning of the designated industrial zones and industrial clusters to be included in the provincial planning.

SRC: 北江省确定将发展工业园区集群与保障国防安全，保护生态环境，保障粮食安全相结合，进而助推工业均衡发展；拥有全面的电力，供水，交通和电信等基础设施，并与城市建设，贸易服务，工人住房和医疗卫生、教育等其他社会基础设施等相结合。
HYP: Beijiang Province has decided to combine the development of industrial park clusters with the protection of national defense security, protection of the ecological environment, and food security, thereby promoting balanced industrial development; it has comprehensive power, water supply, transportation, and telecommunications infrastructure, and is combined with urban construction, trade services, worker housing, and other social infrastructures such as health and education.

SRC: 在工业区，北江省着力呼吁对电力，电子，电信设备，精密机械，辅助工业等领域中的高科技，清洁技术的投资项目。
HYP: In the industrial zone, Beijiang Province is striving to appeal for high-tech and clean technology investment projects in the fields of power, electronics, telecommunications equipment, precision machinery, and auxiliary industries.

SRC: 在工业园区集群，该省呼吁对生产、利用就地劳动力、尤其是农产品、食品加工等领域的中小型规模投资项目。
HYP: In industrial park clusters, the province calls for small and medium-sized investment projects in the fields of production and utilization of local labor, especially agricultural products, food processing and other fields.

SRC: 未来，北江省将着力加快对北江市后勤物流中心的基础设施的投资，与工业园区集群同步发展，以优化货物、货币流通和有助于降低生产成本，提高货物价值，优化供应链，发展多式联运，从而为投资者投资于本省创造吸引力。
HYP: In the future, Beijiang Province will focus on accelerating investment in the infrastructure of Beijiang City's logistics center, and develop it in parallel with industrial park clusters to optimize the flow of goods and currency and help reduce production costs, increase the value of goods, optimize the supply chain, and develop multimodal transport, thereby creating attractiveness for investors to invest in the province.

SRC: （德国之声中文网）过去两周内，西班牙的新冠确冠病例大幅回升，多日出现上千新增病例。
HYP: (Voice of Deutschland China) Over the past two weeks, Spain's new crown and confirmed crown cases have rebounded sharply, and thousands of new cases have appeared in many days.

SRC: 英国政府周六（7月25日）晚间临时决定，从当地时间26日零点起，将西班牙从安全旅行名单中移除，从西班牙入境英国的人必须隔离14天。
HYP: The British government temporarily decided on the evening of Saturday (July 25) to remove Spain from the safe travel list from 0:00 local time on the 26th, and people entering the UK from Spain must be quarantined for 14 days.

SRC: 正在西班牙度假的英国游客听闻此项决定纷纷表示惊讶、担心、甚至愤怒，因为消息突如其来，令人措手不及。
HYP: British tourists who are on vacation in Spain expressed surprise, worry, and even anger at the decision, because the news was unexpected and unexpected.

SRC: 据报道，英国交通大臣沙普斯（Grant Shapps）目前也在西班牙度假。
HYP: According to reports, British Transport Minister Grant Shapps is currently on vacation in Spain.

SRC: 英国发布隔离措施前，挪威也已宣布从西班牙返回挪威的人要进行为期10天的隔离。
HYP: Before the release of isolation measures in the UK, Norway has also announced that people returning from Spain to Norway will be subject to a 10-day quarantine.

SRC: 法国和比利时建议本国居民放弃前方巴塞罗那以及周边地区度假的计划。
HYP: France and Belgium advise their residents to abandon their vacation plans in Barcelona and the surrounding area.

SRC: 这些地区的海滩人满为患，人与人之间无法保持社交距离，警察一度需要采取措施，以减少海滩游客的数量。
HYP: The beaches in these areas are overcrowded and there is no way to maintain social distance between people. The police once needed to take measures to reduce the number of beach tourists.

SRC: 旅游业是西班牙的重要支柱产业
HYP: Tourism is an important pillar industry in Spain

SRC: 西班牙：这里是安全的
HYP: Spain: here is safe

SRC: 针对英国做出的决定，西班牙外交部周日表示，该国疫情得到控制。
HYP: In response to the British decision, the Spanish Ministry of Foreign Affairs said on Sunday that the country's epidemic was under control.

SRC: 西班牙外交部长冈萨雷斯（Arancha Gonzalez Laya）向媒体强调：" 西班牙是安全的，不仅对西班牙人而言，对游客来说也是安全的。"
HYP: Spanish Foreign Minister Arancha Gonzalez Laya emphasized to the media: "Spain is safe, not only for Spaniards, but also for tourists."

SRC: 西班牙政府将试图说服英国政府将巴利阿里群岛（Balearic Islands）和加那利群岛（Canary Islands）排除在隔离措施之外。
HYP: The Spanish government will try to persuade the British government to exclude the Balearic Islands and Canary Islands from the isolation measures.

SRC: 理由是，这两个旅游胜地的感染率远低于英国本土。
HYP: The reason is that the infection rate of these two tourist resorts is much lower than that of the British mainland.

SRC: 为防止疫情扩散，西班牙加泰罗尼亚地区也已重启"禁足令"。
HYP: In order to prevent the spread of the epidemic, the Catalonia region of Spain has also restarted the "foot ban".

SRC: 旅游业是西班牙的重要支柱产业，而西班牙是最受英国游客青睐的度假地之一。
HYP: Tourism is an important pillar industry in Spain, and Spain is one of the most popular holiday destinations for British tourists.

SRC: 英国的这一决定预计将会使西班牙的旅游业大受影响。
HYP: The British decision is expected to greatly affect the Spanish tourism industry.

SRC: 安静/任琛（德新社，路透社）
HYP: Quiet/Ren Chen (German News Agency, Reuters)

SRC: 中伏首日：北京暂别高温酷暑开启降雨模式-新华网
HYP: The first day of mid-voltage: Beijing will not say goodbye to the high temperature and scorching heat

SRC: 中伏首日：北京暂别高温酷暑开启降雨模式<v>-新华网</v>
HYP: The first day of mid-voltage: Beijing will not say goodbye to the high temperature and scorching heat

SRC: 新华社北京7月26日电（记者倪元锦）7月26日是今年的“中<v>伏</v>”首日。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 26th (Reporter Ni Yuanjin) July 26th is the first day of this year's "middle".

SRC: 26日凌晨的大风骤雨对流天气，驱散了连日来笼罩在北京地区的高温酷暑，新一轮降雨天气将持续数日。
HYP: The strong wind and shower convection in the early morning of the 26th dispelled the high temperature and scorching heat that have enveloped the Beijing area for days. A new round of rain will continue for several days.

SRC: 北京市气象台26日11时发布称，26日北京有分散性阵雨（伴有弱雷电），日最高气温仅为27℃；夜间阴有小到中雨（伴有弱雷电），夜间最低气温为23℃。
HYP: The Beijing Meteorological Observatory announced at 11:00 on the 26th that there were scattered showers (with weak lightning) in Beijing on 26th, and the daily maximum temperature was only 27℃; there were light to moderate rain at night (with weak lightning), and the minimum temperature at night was 23℃.

SRC: 而在此前的24日至25日，北京全市处在高温蓝色预警中，大部地区日最高气温在37℃左右，局地出现超过40℃的高温。
HYP: In the previous 24 to 25 days, the whole city of Beijing was in the high-temperature blue warning. The daily maximum temperature in most areas was around 37℃, and local high temperatures exceeded 40℃.

SRC: 伏天是一年之中气温最高、潮湿、闷热的日子，一年有“三伏”，最热在中伏，中国百姓说的“苦夏”就在此时。
HYP: Futian is the hottest, humid, and sultry day of the year. There are "three volts" in a year, and the hottest is in the middle. The "bitter summer" that Chinese people say is at this time.

SRC: 入伏时，家家填满谷仓，民间有“一伏饺子二伏面”的说法。
HYP: When entering the downfall, every family fills up the barn, and there are folk sayings that "one dumpling makes two dumplings".

SRC: 根据目前预报，未来三天，北京多阴雨天气。
HYP: According to current forecasts, it will be rainy in Beijing in the next three days.

SRC: 气象部门提示公众尽量减少山区游玩，谨防地质灾害。
HYP: The meteorological department reminds the public to minimize mountain play and beware of geological disasters.

SRC: 据了解，今年的“中伏”有20天，从7月26日开始，至8月14日结束。
HYP: It is understood that this year's "medium" has 20 days, starting from July 26 and ending on August 14.

SRC: 进入“中伏”后，人会感到身体乏力、食欲不振。
HYP: After entering the "medium", people will feel weak and lack of appetite.

SRC: 饮食上可选择绿豆、薏仁等具有清热解暑、健脾开胃作用的食物，以及苦菜、苦瓜等苦味食物，可有助于增进食欲、祛除暑气。
HYP: In the diet, you can choose foods such as mung beans, barley, etc. that have the effect of clearing heat and relieving heat, strengthening the spleen and appetizing, and bitter foods such as bitter vegetables and bitter gourd, which can help increase appetite and eliminate summer heat.

SRC: 《叮咚上线!老师好》下周上线薛兆丰领衔“知识发起人-新华网
HYP: "Dingdong Goes Online! Good Teacher" comes online next week, Xue Zhaofeng leads "Knowledge Promoter-Xinhua Net

SRC: 又有新综艺上线。
HYP: There are new variety shows online.

SRC: 互动知识分享节目《叮咚上线!老师好》,将于7月20日起在湖南卫视播出。
HYP: The interactive knowledge sharing program "Dingdong is online! Good teacher" will be broadcast on Hunan Satellite TV starting July 20.

SRC: 据了解,节目将打造全新的全年龄青春课堂,一批有颜有型又有才的老师将上阵,挑战趣味性知识输出。
HYP: It is understood that the program will create a new all-age youth classroom, a group of talented and talented teachers will be on the battlefield, challenging the output of interesting knowledge.

SRC: 与以往老师群体在大众心中的严肃印象不同,《叮咚上线!老师好》集结的是一群颜值和才华兼具的知识代表。
HYP: Different from the serious impressions of teachers in the past in the public's mind, "Ding Dong Goes Online! Good Teacher" gathers a group of knowledge representatives with both value and talent.

SRC: 他们既是来自各学科的青年知识榜样,还是一群会抖包袱、擅长寓教于乐的全能“段子手”。
HYP: They are not only role models of youth knowledge from various disciplines, but also a group of all-round "satin hand" who can carry the burden and be good at entertaining.

SRC: 节目中,这群优秀青年知识榜样作为“知识分享官”,将要挑战趣味性的知识课堂。
HYP: On the show, this group of outstanding young people's role models as "knowledge sharing officers" will challenge interesting knowledge classrooms.

SRC: 节目中,这群优秀青年<v>知识</v>榜样作为“知识分享官”,将要挑战趣味性的知识课堂。
HYP: On the show, this group of outstanding young people's role models as "knowledge sharing officers" will challenge interesting knowledge classrooms.

SRC: 他们需要通过有态度的知识输出,展现所在学科最有趣的一面,来打动在场的观众。
HYP: They need to impress the audience by outputting knowledge with attitude and showing the most interesting aspect of their subject.

SRC: 而全年龄观众组成的“有道问问团”现场会提出百变问题,给“知识分享官”的授课提高难度,也给节目增添些许刺激的氛围。
HYP: The "Youdao group" composed of audiences of all ages will ask a variety of questions at the scene, which will increase the difficulty of the "knowledge sharing officer" teaching and add a little exciting atmosphere to the program.

SRC: 据透露,此次“知识分享官”中有中国人民大学附属中学物理教师李永乐、考研指导名师张雪峰以及拥有十年从业经验的历史教师王磊等优秀青年教师,他们将以意想不到的方式向现场观众展现各个学科的“硬核”知识。
HYP: According to reports, among the "knowledge sharing officers" were outstanding young teachers such as Li Yongle, a physics teacher affiliated to Renmin University of China, Zhang Xuefeng, a master teacher in postgraduate examinations, and Wang Lei, a history teacher with ten years of experience. They will present the "hard core" knowledge of various disciplines to the audience in an unexpected way.

SRC: 另外,节目还邀请经济学教授薛兆丰作为节目的“知识发起人”,联合“叮咚助教”杜海涛和靳梦佳,与观众畅谈青春,打造“全民青春公开课”。
HYP: In addition, the program also invited economics professor Xue Zhaofeng as the "knowledge promoter" of the program, together with "Dingdong Assistant Teachers" Du Haitao and Jin Mengjia, to talk with the audience about youth and create "Open Youth Class for All."

SRC: 香港特区政府政务司司长：形势严峻<v>全力抗疫</v>-中新网
HYP: The Chief Secretary for Administration of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region: the situation is grim

SRC: 香港特区政府政务司司长：形势严峻全力抗疫-<v>中新网</v>
HYP: The Chief Secretary for Administration of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region: the situation is grim

SRC: 新华社香港7月26日电香港特区政府政务司司长张建宗26日表示，香港新冠肺炎疫情形势持续严峻，若疫情转坏，特区政府将果断采取更严厉管控措施，进一步限制经营场所营业和减少市民外出空间。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 26. The Chief Secretary for Administration of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, Zhang Jianzong, said on the 26th that the situation of the new coronary pneumonia epidemic in Hong Kong continues to be severe. If the epidemic situation deteriorates, the SAR government will resolutely take stricter control measures to further restrict the operation of business sites and reduce the space for citizens to go out.

SRC: 但现阶段特区政府无意推出“居家令”或“禁足令”限制市民外出。
HYP: However, at this stage, the SAR Government has no intention to introduce a "home order" or "foot restraint order" to restrict citizens from going out.

SRC: 张建宗当日发表题为《形势严峻全力抗疫》的网志。
HYP: Zhang Jianzong published a blog titled "Severe Situation and Fighting against Epidemic Diseases" that day.

SRC: 他表示，这一波疫情是半年以来最严峻的，未来两星期将会十分关键，要尽力防止病毒在社区进一步扩散。
HYP: He said that this outbreak is the most severe in half a year, and it will be critical in the next two weeks, and we must do our best to prevent the virus from spreading further in the community.

SRC: 除了特区政府采取必要措施之外，市民自律和配合也非常重要。
HYP: In addition to the necessary measures taken by the SAR government, self-discipline and cooperation among citizens are also very important.

SRC: 他呼吁市民务必尽量留在家中，减少社交接触和外出用餐。
HYP: He urged citizens to stay at home as much as possible to reduce social contact and dining out.

SRC: 市民应配合佩戴口罩的强制措施保护自己及他人，并注重个人和环境卫生及勤洗手，更应暂停非必要的亲友聚会或聚餐及减少到街市。
HYP: The public should cooperate with the mandatory measures of wearing masks to protect themselves and others, and pay attention to personal and environmental hygiene and washing hands frequently, and should suspend non-essential family and friends gatherings or dinners and reduce to the market.

SRC: 他表示，中央一直十分关心香港疫情变化及支持特区政府防疫抗疫工作，并积极回应行政长官最新要求，在加大检测能力和改装亚洲国际博览馆为类似“方舱医院”的工作上提供协助。
HYP: He said that the central government has always been very concerned about the changes in the epidemic situation in Hong Kong and supported the SAR government's anti-epidemic and anti-epidemic work, and actively responded to the latest request of the Chief Executive to provide assistance in increasing testing capabilities and refitting the Asia World Expo to work similar to "square cabin hospitals".

SRC: 张建宗表示，特区政府为特定高风险群组，即安老院舍、残疾院舍及护养院员工、餐厅员工、出租车司机和物业管理员工提供的免费病毒检测已全面展开，涉及人数多达40万。
HYP: Zhang Jianzong said that the SAR Government has provided free virus detection for specific high-risk groups, namely, elderly homes, disabled homes and nursing home employees, restaurant employees, taxi drivers and property management employees, involving up to 400000 people.

SRC: 他十分关注出现在安老院舍的感染个案，特区政府已为安老院舍院友安排特定的临时检疫中心。
HYP: He is very concerned about the cases of infections that appear in residential care homes for the elderly. The SAR Government has arranged specific temporary quarantine centers for the residents of residential care homes for the elderly.

SRC: 他表示，特区政府正在位于新界大屿山的竹篙湾检疫中心附近兴建隔离检疫设施，预计可在9月底前提供额外700套隔离房。
HYP: He said that the SAR Government is constructing isolation and quarantine facilities near the Penny's Bay Quarantine Center on Lantau Island in the New Territories. It is expected that an additional 700 isolation rooms will be provided by the end of September.

SRC: 行政长官也在19日宣布，特区政府将在竹篙湾检疫中心多兴建2000间隔离房，并争取于今年年底前落成。
HYP: The Chief Executive also announced on the 19th that the SAR Government will build an additional 2000 isolation rooms in the Penny's Bay Quarantine Center and strive to complete it by the end of this year.

SRC: 加上该隔离检疫中心已经投入使用的800间，年底前竹篙湾检疫中心预计可提供共3500间隔离房。
HYP: In addition to the 800 isolation and quarantine centers already in use, the Penny's Bay Quarantine Center is expected to provide a total of 3500 isolation rooms by the end of the year.

SRC: 香港目前共有四个正在运作的隔离检疫中心，共提供约2600间隔离房。
HYP: There are currently four isolation and quarantine centres in operation in Hong Kong, providing a total of about 2600 isolation rooms.

SRC: 此外，特区政府于24日重新启用位于香港岛的鲤鱼门公园度假村作为社区隔离设施，用于收治50岁以下有独立自理能力的患者。
HYP: In addition, the SAR Government reopened the Lei Yue Mun Park Resort on Hong Kong Island as a community isolation facility on the 24th for the treatment of patients under the age of 50 with independent self-care capabilities.

SRC: 美国首次以“人民币汇率低估”对中国展开反补贴调查
HYP: US launches anti-subsidy investigation against China with “undervalued RMB exchange rate” for the first time

SRC: 针对美国商务部近日宣布，决定对原产于中国的扎带（束线带）产品发起反倾销反补贴调查，并就“人民币汇率低估“项目发起调查。
HYP: In response to the US Department of Commerce's recent announcement, it has decided to launch an anti-dumping and anti-subsidy investigation on cable ties (string ties) originating in China, and launched an investigation into the “undervalued RMB exchange rate” project.

SRC: 中国商务部指出，这是美国首次在反补贴案件中立案调查所谓”人民币汇率低估“项目，中方对此坚决反对。
HYP: The Chinese Ministry of Commerce pointed out that this is the first time that the United States has initiated investigations into the so-called “undervalued RMB exchange rate” project in anti-subsidy cases, and China firmly opposes this.

SRC: 中国商务部23日晚间特别就此发布新闻稿表示，中国实行以市场供求为基础、参考一篮子货币进行调节、有管理的浮动汇率制度，市场在汇率形成中起决定性作用。
HYP: The Ministry of Commerce of the People's Republic of China issued a press release on this evening on the 23rd, stating that China implements a managed floating exchange rate system based on market supply and demand, with reference to a basket of currencies, and the market plays a decisive role in the formation of exchange rates.

SRC: 新闻稿强调，总体上，人民币汇率处于合理均衡水平，并没有被低估。
HYP: The press release emphasized that, generally speaking, the RMB exchange rate is at a reasonable equilibrium level and has not been underestimated.

SRC: 自2005年以来，人民币对美元已<v>累计</v>升值超过17% 。
HYP: Since 2005, the RMB has appreciated against the US dollar by more than 17%.

SRC: 根据国际清算银行公布的数据，2005年初至2020年5月，人民币名目有效汇率升值38%，实际有效汇率升值49%，是G20经济体中最强势的货币，在全球范围内也是升值幅度最大的<v>货币</v>之一。
HYP: According to data released by the Bank for International Settlements, from the beginning of 2005 to May 2020, the renminbi's nominal effective exchange rate appreciated by 38%, and the real effective exchange rate appreciated by 49%. It is the strongest currency in the G20 economy and one of the largest appreciations in the world.

SRC: 商务部指出，汇率问题超出了成员按照世界贸易组织规则进行反补贴调查的权限。
HYP: The Ministry of Commerce pointed out that exchange rate issues exceed the authority of members to conduct countervailing investigations in accordance with WTO rules.

SRC: 美国今年2月修改法规以对别国汇率进行反补贴调查，已涉嫌违反世贸组织WTO规则，受到多方面反对。
HYP: The United States revised its regulations in February this year to conduct an anti-subsidy investigation on the exchange rates of other countries. It has been suspected of violating WTO rules and has been opposed in many ways.

SRC: 新闻稿称，即使按照美国法规，申请人的申诉内容也存在大量错误，不具备财政资助、利益授予和专向性等反补贴必备要素。
HYP: The press release stated that even in accordance with US regulations, the content of the applicant's complaint contains a large number of errors and does not have the necessary elements of anti-subsidies such as financial assistance, grant of benefits and specificity.

SRC: 中方敦促美方遵守现有国际规则，停止对所谓“人民币汇率低估”进行反补贴调查。
HYP: China urges the United States to abide by existing international rules and stop countervailing investigations of the so-called "undervalued RMB exchange rate."

SRC: 受中美关系紧张情势进一步升高影响，离岸、在岸人民币对美元汇率22日盘中一度大贬，双双跌破1美元兑人民币7.0元关口。
HYP: Affected by the further increase of tensions in Sino-US relations, the offshore and onshore RMB exchange rate against the US dollar depreciated sharply on the 22nd, and both fell below the 7.0 yuan mark of 1 dollar to RMB.

SRC: 美国商务部此举是否意在逼升人民币值得关注。
HYP: Whether the move by the US Department of Commerce intends to force the RMB to rise is worth watching.

SRC: 人民币对美元即期汇价23日升破7.0大关，收在6.9961。
HYP: The spot exchange rate of RMB against the US dollar rose above the 7.0 mark on the 23rd and closed at 6.9961.

SRC: 受官方调控的人民币对美元汇率中间价，24日下调17个基本点，报6.9938。
HYP: The central parity rate of the RMB against the US dollar, which is subject to official regulation, was lowered by 17 basis points on the 24th to 6.9938.

SRC: 26日是菲律宾总统杜特尔特发表任内第五份国情咨文(SONA)前一日，当天菲律宾累计确诊新冠肺炎病例过8万，其中总统府新闻部(PCOO)及其直属机构职员确诊数增到25例。
HYP: The 26th is the day before the fifth State of the Union Address (SONA) issued by Philippine President Duterte. In the same day, the Philippines has accumulatively diagnosed 80000 new cases of pneumonia. Among them, the number of confirmed diagnoses by the staff of the Presidential Department of Public Information (PCOO) and its direct agencies increased to 25.

SRC: 为此，PCOO已专门准备一个未接触过确诊职员的工作组，配合杜特尔特总统发表SONA的新闻发布工作。
HYP: To this end, PCOO has specially prepared a working group that has not been in contact with the confirmed staff to cooperate with President Duterte's press release of SONA.

SRC: PCOO部长马丁·安达纳尔26日接受DZBB电台采访表示，已为杜特尔特总统发表SONA方式预备两套方案。
HYP: PCOO Minister Martin Andanar said in an interview with DZBB Radio on the 26th that two sets of plans have been prepared for President Duterte's SONA approach.

SRC: 按A计划，杜特尔特27日下午将在位于奎松市的菲律宾国会(Batasang Pambansa)大楼发表SONA。
HYP: According to plan A, Duterte will announce SONA in the Philippine Congress (Batasang Pambansa) building in Quezon City on the afternoon of the 27th.

SRC: 因为疫情原因，现场只为部分政府内阁成员和立法者安排50个席位，另专设视频会议室供其他内阁成员、地方政府官员等观看。
HYP: Due to the epidemic situation, only 50 seats were arranged for some government cabinet members and legislators, and a video conference room was set up for other cabinet members and local government officials to watch.

SRC: 所有参会人员当天通过快速检测才能进入国会大楼。
HYP: All participants can pass the quick test on the same day to enter the Congress building.

SRC: 一旦参会者有一人检测呈阳性，即启动B计划，即杜特尔特总统在总统府马拉卡南宫发表SONA，现场则安排更少的听会席位。
HYP: Once one of the participants tested positive, Plan B was initiated, that is, President Duterte issued SONA at the Maracañang Palace of the Presidential Palace, and fewer hearing seats were arranged on site.

SRC: 按照惯例，SONA将实时向菲全国直播。
HYP: By convention, SONA will broadcast live to the Philippines in real time.

SRC: 截至发稿时，菲总统府尚未确认杜特尔特的家人是否会出席SONA。
HYP: As of press time, the Philippine Presidential Palace has not confirmed whether Duterte's family will attend SONA.

SRC: 安达纳尔说，杜特尔特总统的SONA，将重点说明政府将如何带领菲律宾应对新冠肺炎疫情、恢复社会经济生活；还会提到他上任时的承诺，即反政府腐败、打击非法毒品和减贫。
HYP: Andanal said that President Duterte's SONA will focus on how the government will lead the Philippines to respond to the new coronary pneumonia epidemic and restore social and economic life; it will also mention his commitment when he took office, namely, anti-government corruption, combating illegal drugs and poverty reduction.

SRC: 杜特尔特还将说明本届政府的其他计划，包括创造更多的就业机会、振兴经济、促进教育，以及帮助在疫情中受难的海外菲律宾劳工等。
HYP: Duterte will also explain other plans of the current government, including creating more job opportunities, revitalizing the economy, promoting education, and helping overseas Filipino workers who suffered in the epidemic.

SRC: 深圳就出台健康条例公开征求意见-新华网
HYP: Shenzhen publicly seeks opinions on promulgating health regulations-Xinhuanet

SRC: 新华社深圳7月26日电（记者毛思倩、白瑜）鼓励居民勤做体检，及早发现问题；禁止向未成年人销售酒精饮料；建立网络游戏健康审查制度；用人单位要配备专兼职健康管理人员…… 日前《深圳经济特区健康条例（征求意见稿）》正式发布，深圳居民将有自己的“健康法”。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Shenzhen, July 26 (Reporters Mao Siqian and Bai Yu) Encourage residents to perform physical examinations and find problems early; prohibit the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors; establish an online game health review system; employers must be equipped with full-time and part-time health management personnel... The "Shenzhen Special Economic Zone Health Regulations (Consultation Draft)" was officially released a few days ago, and Shenzhen residents will have their own "Health Law".

SRC: 为了鼓励居民勤做体检，及早发现问题，上述征求意见稿提出，卫生健康部门应当根据不同年龄、职业等因素制定健康体检项目基本目录。
HYP: In order to encourage residents to do medical check-ups and find problems early, the above-mentioned consultation draft proposes that the health department should formulate a basic list of health check-up items based on factors such as different ages and occupations.

SRC: 属于健康体检项目基本目录范围内的健康体检费用，按照每人每年一次的标准由社会医疗保险统筹基金支付。
HYP: The cost of health checkups that fall within the scope of the basic list of health checkup items shall be paid by the Social Medical Insurance Co-ordination Fund at the rate of once per person per year.

SRC: 征求意见稿明确，用人单位应当合理配置人力资源，安排员工作息时间，对脑力和体力劳动负荷较重的员工，实行轮休制度，避免对员工健康造成人体机能过度损耗或者身心健康伤害，同时严格执行员工带薪休假制度。
HYP: The draft for solicitation of opinions clearly stated that the employing unit should reasonably allocate human resources, arrange staff rest time, implement a rotation system for employees with heavy mental and physical workload, to avoid excessive loss of human function or physical and mental health damage to employees' health, and strictly implement the paid leave system for employees.

SRC: 此外，用人单位要配备专兼职健康管理人员，并定期组织开展员工健康体检。
HYP: In addition, employers should be equipped with full-time and part-time health management personnel, and organize regular health examinations for employees.

SRC: 在未成年人身心健康方面，征求意见稿提出，禁止向未成年人销售酒精饮料，同时对酒精饮料的售卖位置进行了限制，对于违反规定的，将由市场监督管理部门责令改正，处3万元罚款。
HYP: With regard to the physical and mental health of minors, the consultation draft proposes that the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors is prohibited, and the sales locations of alcoholic beverages are restricted. Any violation of the regulations will be ordered to be corrected by the market supervision and management department and imposed a fine of 30000 yuan.

SRC: 除了“禁酒” ，未成年人也要“多运动” 。
HYP: In addition to "prohibition", minors also have to "exercise more".

SRC: 根据征求意见稿要求，学校要每天安排学生体育活动时间一小时以上。
HYP: According to the request for comments, the school should arrange for students to spend more than one hour in sports activities every day.

SRC: 对于网络游戏，公安、文化广电旅游体育、网络监管、卫生健康等部门应当完善互联网上网服务营业场所健康监管制度，建立网络游戏健康审查制度，为促进青少年健康成长营造良好的交往空间、交往文化。
HYP: For online games, public security, cultural, radio, television, tourism, sports, online supervision, and health and other departments should improve the health supervision system of Internet access service business sites, establish an online game health review system, and create a good communication space and communication culture for the healthy growth of young people.

SRC: 此外，征求意见稿还提出流感病人出入公共场所必须戴口罩，医疗卫生机构未经同意泄露病人隐私罚款2万元等。
HYP: In addition, the consultation draft also proposed that influenza patients must wear masks when entering and leaving public places, and medical and health institutions should disclose patient privacy fines of 20000 yuan without consent.

SRC: 值得注意的是，除了居民的身心健康外，征求意见稿还要求，深圳各部门在制定涉及城市空间规划与建设、工业园区规划与建设、资源开发利用与生态环境保护、生物医药产业发展等规划、规范性文件以及批准重大建设工程和实施重大公共服务项目前，应当评估公共政策实施对人群健康的影响。
HYP: It is worth noting that in addition to the physical and mental health of the residents, the consultation draft also requires that all departments in Shenzhen should evaluate the impact of public policy implementation on the health of the population before formulating plans, regulatory documents related to urban spatial planning and construction, industrial park planning and construction, resource development and utilization, ecological environmental protection, biomedical industry development, and approval of major construction projects and major public service projects.

SRC: 未经评估或者经评估将对城市公共卫生或者居民健康产生较严重不利影响的，不得制定出台或者批准实施。
HYP: Without assessment or after assessment, it will have a more serious adverse impact on urban public health or residents' health, shall not be formulated or approved for implementation.

SRC: 可可西里藏羚羊进入回迁季-新华网
HYP: Kekexili Tibetan antelope enters relocation season-Xinhua

SRC: 新华社西宁7月25日电（记者王金金）记者从三江源国家公园管理局长江源园区可可西里管理处五道梁保护站获悉，监测显示，此前前往可可西里腹地卓乃湖区域迁徙产仔的藏羚羊正陆续结束产仔，开始携幼仔返回原栖息地。
HYP: Xinhua, Xining, July 25 (Reporter Wang Jinjin) The reporter learned from the Wudaoliang Protection Station of the Kekexili Management Office of the Yangtze River Source Park of the Sanjiangyuan National Park Administration that monitoring showed that the Tibetan antelopes who had previously moved to the Zonai Lake area in the hinterland of Kekexili were ending their litters and returning to their original habitats.

SRC: 五道梁保护站附近的监控画面显示，7月25日，大约40只雌性藏羚羊带领3只藏羚羊幼仔陆续通过青藏公路3002公里处、青藏铁路五道梁北大桥，藏羚羊已经开始回迁。
HYP: Surveillance footage near the Wudaoliang Protection Station shows that on July 25, about 40 female Tibetan antelopes led three antelope cubs through the Qinghai-Tibet Highway at 3002 kilometers and the Wudaoliang North Bridge on the Qinghai-Tibet Railway. The Tibetan antelope has begun to move back.

SRC: 专家分析，近年来，回迁羊群中藏羚羊幼仔数量占藏羚羊群总体数量的四分之一至五分之一。
HYP: Experts analyzed that in recent years, the number of Tibetan antelope cubs in the repatriating flocks accounted for one quarter to one fifth of the total number of Tibetan antelopes.

SRC: 中国科学院西北高原生物研究所副研究员连新明说：“回迁初期，藏羚羊面临较高的被捕食风险，因此羊群中的幼仔数量会比较少，甚至可能出现没有幼仔的情况。”
HYP: Lian Xinming, an associate researcher at the Northwest Plateau Institute of Biology, Chinese Academy of Sciences, said: "In the early period of relocation, Tibetan antelope faced a higher risk of predation, so the number of cubs in the flock will be relatively small, and there may even be no cubs."

SRC: 根据三江源国家公园管理局长江源园区可可西里管理处统计，藏羚羊回迁数量总体呈逐年上升态势，2019年藏羚羊回迁数量为4860只，比2018年增加338只。
HYP: According to the statistics of the Kekexili Management Office of the Yangtze River Source Park of the Sanjiangyuan National Park Administration, the number of Tibetan antelope repatriations is increasing year by year. In 2019, the number of Tibetan antelope repatriations was 4860, an increase of 338 from 2018.

SRC: 连新明说：“预计今年藏羚羊回迁将在9月初结束，回迁藏羚羊数量仍有望继续增加。”
HYP: Lian Xinming said: "It is expected that the relocation of Tibetan antelopes will end in early September this year, and the number of relocated Tibetan antelopes is expected to continue to increase."

SRC: 藏羚羊属国家一级保护动物。
HYP: Tibetan antelope is a national first-level protected animal.

SRC: 每年5月底，来自青海三江源、西藏羌塘、新疆阿尔金山等地的藏羚羊都要前往位于可可西里腹地的卓乃湖产羔。
HYP: At the end of May every year, Tibetan antelopes from the Three River Sources in Qinghai, Qiangtang in Tibet, and Altun Mountains in Xinjiang all go to Zhuonai Lake in the hinterland of Kekexili to produce lambs.

SRC: 我国藏羚羊保护专家、陕西省动物研究所（西北濒危动物研究所）研究员吴晓民说：“藏羚羊回迁是雌性藏羚羊结束产仔后，陆续带着幼仔回到栖息地的过程。起初离开产仔地的回迁群体较为庞大，但随后藏羚羊将根据不同的地理种群、沿不同路径回到它们各自的栖息地。”
HYP: Wu Xiaomin, an expert on Tibetan antelope protection in China and a researcher from the Shaanxi Institute of Zoology (Northwest Endangered Animals Research Institute) said: "Tibetan antelope repatriation is a process in which female Tibetan antelopes return to their habitats with their cubs after they give birth. Initially, the repatriation group leaving the littering place is relatively large, but then Tibetan antelopes will return to their respective habitats according to different geographic populations and along different paths."

SRC: 为确保藏羚羊群安全回迁，记者了解到，日前三江源国家公园管理局长江源园区可可西里管理处已安排工作人员在主要回迁区域，持续开展视频监测和辖区巡逻。
HYP: In order to ensure the safe relocation of Tibetan antelope herds, the reporter learned that a few days ago, the Sankeyuan National Park Administration Yangtze River Source Park Cocoa Xili Management Office has arranged staff in the main relocation area to continue to carry out video surveillance and patrol in the jurisdiction.

SRC: 如发现有藏羚羊群试图穿越公路，巡山队员会在第一时间进行临时交通管制，让羊群安全通过野生动物通道，保证其在回迁途中尽可能少受人类干扰。
HYP: If it is found that a herd of Tibetan antelopes is trying to cross the road, the mountain patrol team will perform temporary traffic control at the first time to allow the flock to safely pass through the wild animal passage and ensure that it is as little as possible from human interference on the way back.

SRC: 那么，日常生活中到底该如何解暑？
HYP: So, how to relieve the heat in daily life?

SRC: 专家建议，夏日外出尽量避开高温时段，最好不要在中午前后在烈日下行走或劳动，因为这个时间段的阳光最强烈，发生中暑的可能性较高。
HYP: Experts suggest that when you go out in summer, try to avoid the high temperature period. It is best not to walk or work in the hot sun around noon, because the sun is the strongest in this period, and the possibility of heat stroke is higher.

SRC: 如果此时段必须外出，一定要做好防护工作，如打遮阳伞、戴遮阳帽、戴太阳镜，有条件的最好涂抹防晒霜，以防晒伤。
HYP: If you have to go out during this period, you must do a good job of protection, such as wearing a parasol, wearing a sun hat, and wearing sunglasses. It is best to apply sunscreen if possible to prevent sun damage.

SRC: 衣服尽量选用浅色、透气性好的棉、麻、丝类质地，少穿化纤品类服装，以免大量出汗时不能及时散热，引起中暑。
HYP: Try to use light-colored, breathable cotton, linen, and silk as much as possible, and wear less chemical fiber clothing to avoid heat dissipation and sweating.

SRC: 高温闷热天气时，要准备充足的水饮，及时饮用，不要等口渴了才喝水，因为一旦感觉口渴表示身体已经缺水了，每次喝水控制在150毫升至200毫升，喝温开水，不要喝冰水。
HYP: In hot and sultry weather, prepare plenty of water and drink it in time. Don't wait for thirst before drinking. Because once the body feels thirsty, it means that the body is already dehydrated. Each time the water is controlled at 150ml to 200ml. Drink warm water and don't drink ice water.

SRC: 根据气温高低，一般人员每天喝1.5升至2升水，高温作业人员，每天喝3升至5升水。
HYP: According to the temperature, the average person drinks 1.5 liters to 2 liters of water per day, and the high temperature workers drink 3 liters to 5 liters of water every day.

SRC: 出汗较多时可适当补充一些盐水，弥补人体因出汗而失去的盐分。
HYP: When you sweat more, you can add some salt water to make up for the salt lost by the body due to sweating.

SRC: 另外，夏季人体容易缺钾，使人感到倦怠疲乏，含钾茶水是极好的消暑饮品。
HYP: In addition, the human body is prone to lack of potassium in summer, which makes people feel tired and tired. Potassium-containing tea is an excellent summer drink.

SRC: 夏天多食含水量高的蔬果，如生菜、黄瓜、西红柿等；新鲜水果，如桃子、杏、西瓜、甜瓜等水分含量为80％至90％，都可以用来补充水分；乳制品既能补水，又能满足身体的营养之需。
HYP: In summer, eat more fruits and vegetables with high water content, such as lettuce, cucumbers, tomatoes, etc.; fresh fruits, such as peaches, apricots, watermelons, melons, etc., with a moisture content of 80% to 90%, can be used to replenish moisture; dairy products can not only replenish water, but also meet the nutritional needs of the body.

SRC: 此外，在高温环境中工作的人群，应适当补充含有钾、镁等元素的饮品。
HYP: In addition, people working in high-temperature environments should properly supplement drinks containing potassium, magnesium and other elements.

SRC: 夏天日长夜短，气温高，人体新陈代谢旺盛，消耗也大，容易感到疲劳。
HYP: In summer, the days are long and the nights are short, the temperature is high, the body's metabolism is strong, the consumption is large, and it is easy to feel tired.

SRC: 充足的睡眠，可使大脑和身体各系统都得到放松，既利于工作和学习，也是预防中暑的措施。
HYP: Adequate sleep can relax the brain and body systems, which is not only conducive to work and study, but also a measure to prevent heat stroke.

SRC: 专家称，最佳就寝时间是22时至23时，最佳起床时间是5时30分至6时30分。
HYP: Experts say that the best time to go to bed is from 22:00 to 23:00, and the best time to get up is from 5:30 to 6:30.

SRC: 睡眠时注意不要躺在空调出风口和电风扇下，以免患上空调病和热伤风。
HYP: When sleeping, be careful not to lie under the air outlet of the air conditioner and the electric fan, so as not to cause air conditioning disease and fever.

SRC: 专家建议，在户外活动或进行高温作业的人群，可随身携带十滴水、人丹、藿香正气水或藿香正气丸等防暑药品，或放置在就近工作场所，随时使用，以防发生中暑。
HYP: Experts suggest that people who are outdoors or performing high-temperature operations can carry ten heat-reducing medicines such as ten drops of water, dandan, Huoxiangzhengqi water or Huoxiangzhengqi pills, or place them in the nearest workplace and use them at any time to prevent heat stroke.

SRC: 毕业生艺术展搬进商场公益展出-新华网
HYP: Graduate Art Exhibition Moved into the Public Welfare Exhibition of the Mall-Xinhuanet

SRC: 在各大院校“云毕业”的季节里，一场难得的线下毕业生艺术展上周末温暖启幕。
HYP: In the "Cloud Graduation" season of various universities, a rare offline graduate art exhibition warmly opened last weekend.

SRC: 不过它既不在美术馆，也不在校园里，而是出现在了朝阳大悦城的公共空间，并对公众免费开放，将持续至8月23日。
HYP: However, it is neither in the art gallery nor on the campus, but appears in the public space of Chaoyang Joy City and is open to the public free of charge until August 23.

SRC: 记者了解到，这场2020毕业生艺术展，征集了来自中央美术学院、中国传媒大学及天津美术学院的57位青年艺术家的50件/组作品，展览空间从2层延伸至6层，并充分利用楼内灯箱进行平面作品展示，最大程度烘托出毕业季的艺术氛围。
HYP: The reporter learned that this 2020 graduate art exhibition has collected 50 pieces/groups of works from 57 young artists from the Central Academy of Fine Arts, Communication University of China and Tianjin Academy of Fine Arts. The exhibition space extends from the second floor to the sixth floor, and fully utilizes the light boxes in the building for the display of flat works to maximize the artistic atmosphere of the graduation season.

SRC: 在疫情之下，这场展览的意义显得尤为特殊。
HYP: Under the epidemic, the significance of this exhibition is particularly special.

SRC: 朝阳大悦城美陈负责人葛平坦言：“我们选择将走向'云端'的毕业展再度带回线下空间，也希望让更多人看到青年对自身的探索和对世界的理解，放大艺术对于社会和心灵的疗愈力量。”
HYP: Ge Pingping, person in charge of Chaoyang Joy City Beauty Chen, said: "We have chosen to bring the graduation exhibition to the "cloud" back to the offline space again. We also hope that more people will see the youth's exploration of themselves and their understanding of the world, and amplify the healing power of art for society and soul."

SRC: 她透露，此次参展的作品是向几大艺术院校的毕业生们征集而来，<v>又</v>从中挑选了适合商业空间展示的，作品形式从传统的架上绘画、雕塑，到新媒体装置、交互动画、VR全景，体量与丰富程度为历年之最。
HYP: She revealed that the works in this exhibition were collected from graduates of several major art colleges, and they were selected for commercial space display. The forms of the works range from traditional easel paintings and sculptures to new media installations, interactive animations, and VR panoramas. The volume and richness are the highest in the years.

SRC: 其中，李云肖在《2020的第一场战役》中通过机械和手工混合的创作语言，表达了自己在这场疫情中的感受；刘嘉颖通过以太坊区块链创作的作品《Sound Money》探讨了“加密货币” 、“信用创造” 、“交易”等主题；张家祺的《猫林》与邱达强的《羁》表现的都是经常与人类相伴的动物，从中可以看到青年艺术家对人与动物关系的理解；而朱仲鱼的作品《信仰的冬天—礼物》则是在提醒成长中的年轻人，“当有一天事业有成时，不忘初心，记得那份单纯与真诚。”
HYP: Among them, Li Yunxiao expressed his feelings in this epidemic through the creative language of mechanical and manual in the first battle of 2020. Liu Jiaying's work "Sound Money" through the Ethereum blockchain explores the theme of "cryptocurrency", "credit creation", "transaction". Zhang Jiaqi's "cats don't remind you of the day". The artist's works are related to people. The animals that are seen in the world are always accompanied by humans.

SRC: 其中，李云肖在《2020的第一场战役》中通过机械和手工混合的创作语言，表达了自己在这场疫情中的感受；刘嘉颖通过以太坊区块链创作的作品《Sound Money》探讨了“加密货币” 、“信用创造” 、“交易”等主题；张家祺的《猫林》与<v>邱达强的《羁》表现的都是经常与人类相伴的动物，从中可以看到青年艺术家对人与动物关系的理解；而朱仲鱼的作品《信仰的冬天—礼物》则是在提醒成长中的年轻人，“当有一天事业有成时，不忘初心，记得那份单纯与真诚。”</v>
HYP: Among them, Li Yunxiao expressed his feelings in this epidemic through the creative language of mechanical and manual in the first battle of 2020. Liu Jiaying's work "Sound Money" through the Ethereum blockchain explores the theme of "cryptocurrency", "credit creation", "transaction". Zhang Jiaqi's "cats don't remind you of the day". The artist's works are related to people. The animals that are seen in the world are always accompanied by humans.

SRC: 在为数不多的亲自布展的毕业生中，就有来自天津美术学院雕塑系的李敬寅。
HYP: Among the few graduates who personally set up exhibitions is Li Jingyin from the Sculpture Department of Tianjin Academy of Fine Arts.

SRC: “我是7月7日来北京的，当时其实有点担心疫情，还提前三天做了核酸检测，是带着酒精棉和检测报告来布展的。”
HYP: "I came to Beijing on July 7. At that time, I was actually a bit worried about the epidemic situation. I also did a nucleic acid test three days in advance. I brought it with alcohol cotton and a test report."

SRC: 他的作品《昨日如谜》结构比较复杂，必须亲力亲为。
HYP: The structure of his work "Yesterday Like a Mystery" is relatively complicated, and must be done by oneself.

SRC: 同时，他还承担着帮助同学修补破损作品的任务。
HYP: At the same time, he also undertakes the task of helping his students repair damaged works.

SRC: “布展到凌晨四点半，然后再做修补，时间很紧，都忘了和作品合个影，也有点遗憾。”
HYP: "The exhibition will be held until 4:30 in the morning, and then it will be repaired. The time is very tight. I forgot to take a picture with the work, which is a bit regretful."

SRC: 他希望，等疫情更稳定了，再和同学们来北京看看自己的作品展。
HYP: He hoped that when the epidemic became more stable, he would come to Beijing with his classmates to see his exhibition.

SRC: （记者李俐）
HYP: (Reporter Li Li)

SRC: 奖励5万元湖北恩施表扬沙子坝滑坡“预警第一人” - 中新网
HYP: Reward 50000 yuan, Hubei Enshi commends the "first warning person" of the sand dam landslide

SRC: 奖励5万元湖北恩施表扬沙子坝滑坡“预警第一人” - <v>中新网</v>
HYP: Reward 50000 yuan, Hubei Enshi commends the "first warning person" of the sand dam landslide

SRC: 湖北日报讯(记者林晶)7月26日，恩施市通报表扬为沙子坝滑坡预警作出重要贡献的地质灾害点监测员陈光明，并为他送去5万元奖金。
HYP: Hubei Daily News (Reporter Lin Jing) On July 26, Enshi City reported that Chen Guangming, a geological disaster site monitor who had made an important contribution to the early warning of the sand dam landslide, gave him a 50000 yuan bonus.

SRC: 同时，号召全市党员干部学习他恪尽职守、敢于担当、主动作为、乐于奉献的精神。
HYP: At the same time, the city's party cadres were called on to learn his spirit of fulfilling his duties, daring to act, take the initiative, and be willing to give.

SRC: 7月21日，恩施市屯堡乡马者村沙子坝发生滑坡，导致清江干流河道形成堰塞湖，58岁的陈光明是预警此次滑坡的第一人。
HYP: On July 21, a landslide occurred in the sand dam of Mazhe Village, Tunpu Township, Enshi City, which resulted in the formation of a dammed lake on the main channel of the Qingjiang River. Chen Guangming, 58, was the first person to warn of the landslide.

SRC: 7月17日下午，陈光明得知村民家中墙壁开裂的消息，立即到现场查看。
HYP: On the afternoon of July 17, Chen Guangming learned of the cracks in the walls of the villagers' home and immediately went to the scene to check.

SRC: 他刚从家中走出五六百米，便看到村组公路裂开四五厘米，沿着公路一直延伸到玉米地，长度约50米。
HYP: He had just walked five or six hundred meters from his home, and he saw the village group road split by four or five centimeters, extending along the road to the corn field, about 50 meters in length.

SRC: 陈光明顿生警觉，第一时间将公路开裂的照片发到乡“地质灾害监测员联系群”里。
HYP: Chen Guangming was alert and sent the photos of the cracked road to the "Geological Disaster Monitor Group" in the township as soon as possible.

SRC: 经屯堡乡自然规划所相关负责人现场查看和判断，滑坡的可能性很大，随即作出撤离群众的决定。
HYP: After checking and judging on site by the relevant person in charge of the Natural Planning Institute of Tunpu Township, the possibility of a landslide is very high, and a decision was made to evacuate the masses.

SRC: 陈光明的及时预警，为影响区内315户1339名群众的安全撤离贏得了36小时的宝贵时间。
HYP: Chen Guangming's timely warning has won 36 hours of valuable time for the safe evacuation of 1339 people in 315 households in the affected area.

SRC: 此次重大地质灾害，无一人伤亡。
HYP: There were no casualties in this major geological disaster.

SRC: 陈光明认真负责的敬业精神得到群众的称赞。
HYP: Chen Guangming's earnest and responsible professionalism was praised by the masses.

SRC: 面对赞誉，他说：“不存在救了谁，这是我的责任。 ”
HYP: Faced with praise, he said: "There is no one who saved, this is my responsibility."

SRC: 警方通报“女大学生赴青海旅游失联”细节搜救工作仍在继续-新华网
HYP: Police report details of "female college students lost contact in Qinghai tourism" search and rescue work continues-Xinhua

SRC: 新华社西宁7月26日电（记者王金金周喆）近日，“一名女大学生前往青海格尔木旅游后失联”一事引发网民关注。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Xining, July 26 (Reporter Wang Jinjin and Zhou Zhe) Recently, "a female college student lost contact after traveling to Golmud, Qinghai Province" attracted netizens' attention.

SRC: 青海省海西蒙古族藏族自治州格尔木市公安局26日通报称，南京某大学学生黄某某目前仍处于失联状态，多地警方正深入黄某某失联地沿线，积极开展寻找工作。
HYP: The Public Security Bureau of Golmud, Haixi Mongolian-Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, Qinghai Province reported on the 26th that Nanjing University student Huang Mou is still in a state of loss of contact.

SRC: 2020年7月10日，海西州格尔木市公安局治安支队接到上级通知，南京某大学学生黄某某于7月5日乘坐Z164列车由南京至格尔木，于7月9日在青海省玉树藏族自治州曲麻莱县索南达杰保护站清水河西南区域处手机关机并失联，要求协助查找。
HYP: On July 10, 2020, the Security Detachment of the Public Security Bureau of Golmud City, Haixi Prefecture received a notification from a superior that Huang Moumou, a Nanjing University student, took the Z164 train from Nanjing to Golmud on July 5th. On July 9th, the mobile phone was shut down and lost contact at the southwestern area of Qingshuihe River, Sonam Dage Protection Station, Qumalai County, Yushu Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, Qinghai Province.

SRC: 根据格尔木市公安局的调查情况，黄某某于7月6日19时54分进入青海省境内，7日4时抵达格尔木市。
HYP: According to the investigation of the Golmud City Public Security Bureau, Huang Moumou entered Qinghai Province at 19:54 on July 6 and arrived in Golmud at 4 on the 7th.

SRC: 当日8时，失联人员黄某某乘坐出租车由格尔木市黄河大酒店朝G109国道出发，并于12时到达可可西里索南达杰保护站，出租车司机单独返回，黄某某7日15时到达索南达杰保护站附近清水河区域直至9日18时许在该区域关机。
HYP: At 8:00 on the same day, the missing person Huang Moumou took a taxi from the Yellow River Hotel, Golmud City, toward G109 National Road, and arrived at the Cococili Sonan Dajie Protection Station at 12 o'clock. The taxi driver returned alone. Huang Mou arrived at the Qingshui River area near the Sonan Dajie Protection Station at 15:00 on the 7th and was shut down in the area until 18:00 on the 9th.

SRC: 在进一步调查中，警方发现黄某某曾于7月13日17时07分通过乃吉沟检查站。
HYP: In further investigation, the police found that Huang Moumou had passed the Naijigou checkpoint at 17:07 on July 13.

SRC: 乃吉沟检查站是西藏自治区那曲市在格尔木市南山口设立的检查站，由于该检查站无视频监控，无法确定本人及所乘车辆信息，警方只能驾车在沿途进行查找，协调西藏沿途各检查站若发现黄某某，立即与格尔木市公安局取得联系。
HYP: The Naijigou checkpoint is a checkpoint set up by the Nanqu City of Tibet Autonomous Region in Nanshankou, Golmud City. Since the checkpoint has no video surveillance, it is impossible to determine the identity of the person and the vehicle. The police can only drive the car to search along the way. If the various checkpoints along the Tibet line find Huang Moumou, they will immediately contact the Golmud Public Security Bureau.

SRC: 根据最新情况，7月26日凌晨1时，格尔木市公安局组织救援力量携带救援装备，前往青藏公路沿线不冻泉保护站、索南达杰保护站进行查找，并积极与四川警方、西藏警方、南京警方取得联系，共同开展工作，目前查找搜救工作仍在继续。
HYP: According to the latest situation, at 1 am on July 26, the Golmud City Public Security Bureau organized rescue forces to carry rescue equipment to the Non-Frozen Spring Protection Station and Sonan Dajie Protection Station along the Qinghai-Tibet Highway to search, and actively contacted the Sichuan Police, Tibet Police, and Nanjing Police to work together.
