At this stage, the new crown epidemic has been effectively controlled, and there has been no further widespread transmission, which has largely controlled the domestic epidemic.

SRC: 文章表示，在近十多年时间里，中国对国内研究和公共卫生建设方面进行了大量的投资，这使得中国对新冠的准备比当年严重急性呼吸道综合征(SARS)的准备要充分得多。
HYP: The article said that in the past ten years or so, China has made a lot of investment in domestic research and public health construction, which makes China's preparation for the new crown much better than that of severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS).

SRC: 作者表示，2002年SARS暴发时，起初中国准备不足，尤其是病原体无法确定。
HYP: The author said that when the SARS outbreak occurred in 2002, China was initially unprepared, especially the pathogens could not be determined.

SRC: 当2019年12月发现新冠病毒时，中国科学家很快就能够鉴定出病毒种类，并于2020年1月11日与国际共享了基因组测序数据。
HYP: When the new coronavirus was discovered in December 2019, Chinese scientists were soon able to identify the type of virus and shared genome sequencing data with the international community on January 11, 2020.

SRC: 到1月底，来自中国大陆和香港的医生阐明了该病毒的临床特征，通过在《柳叶刀》上发表的研究论文，向世界警告了新冠病毒的威胁。
HYP: By the end of January, doctors from mainland China and Hong Kong clarified the clinical characteristics of the virus, and warned the world of the threat of the new crown virus through a research paper published in The Lancet.

SRC: 中国也一直处于疫苗研究的最前沿，在国家宣布紧急状态下，通过国内的紧密合作，这样的研究非常迅速而严格地展开，5月和7月，分别在《柳叶刀》上公布了中国开发的新冠疫苗早期试验取得进展的结果。
HYP: China has also been at the forefront of vaccine research. Under the state's declaration of emergency, through close domestic cooperation, such research was carried out very quickly and rigorously. In May and July, the results of the early trials of the new crown vaccine developed by China were announced on the Lancet.

SRC: 中国的经验表明，对国家卫生和研究体系进行投资，有效提高实验室能力是非常重要的。
HYP: China's experience shows that it is very important to invest in the national health and research system to effectively improve laboratory capabilities.

SRC: 这是国家对卫生紧急情况和全球卫生安全做出快速有效反应的基础。
HYP: This is the basis for rapid and effective national response to health emergencies and global health security.

SRC: 其他国家，特别是低收入和中等收入国家来说，非常值得借鉴和学习。
HYP: Other countries, especially low- and middle-income countries, are very worthy of reference and learning.

SRC: 此外，中国的经验证明，在强大的研究基础上，必须有强有力的高层果断地凭借科学依据来作出正确决策，这才使得新冠疫情得到有效控制。
HYP: In addition, China's experience proves that on the basis of strong research, a strong senior must resolutely rely on scientific evidence to make correct decisions, which will effectively control the new crown epidemic.

SRC: 文章强调，政府及其领导人必须尊重科学，理解科学的价值，并以对社会最有利的方式对其采取行动。
HYP: The article emphasizes that the government and its leaders must respect science, understand the value of science, and act on it in the most beneficial way to society.

SRC: 在暴发初期，中国国家卫建委派出三组传染病专家前往武汉，调查新冠病毒的风险和传播，他们的建议为1月23日武汉“封城”的决定提供了依据；当有专家提出建设方舱医院必要性和紧迫性时，政府很快做出了决定并快速实施；同时，社区和群众的广泛参与，也使得疫情快速有效地被控制。
HYP: In the early stage of the outbreak, the China National Health and Construction Commission sent three groups of infectious disease experts to Wuhan to investigate the risk and spread of the new coronavirus. Their recommendations provided the basis for the decision to close the city on January 23 in Wuhan. When an expert proposed the necessity and urgency of building a sheltered hospital, the government quickly made the decision and implemented it quickly. At the same time, the community and the masses of the people participated in the situation quickly and effectively.

SRC: 文章最后强调，应对全球性的卫生紧急情况，各国需要加强全球合作，联合应对。
HYP: The article finally emphasized that in response to global health emergencies, countries need to strengthen global cooperation and jointly respond.

SRC: 总台记者杨洪
HYP: Correspondence reporter Yang Hong

SRC: 当地时间25日下午，一架小型飞机在德国北威州韦瑟尔县撞上一座多层住宅楼的顶层，事故共造成三人死亡。
HYP: On the afternoon of the 25th local time, a small plane hit the top floor of a multi-storey residential building in Wesel, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. The accident killed three people.

SRC: 杜伊斯堡检方、韦瑟尔县警察局和韦瑟尔市消防部门当天晚间联合发布声明称，当天14时40分左右，一架两座小型飞机撞上位于韦瑟尔县辉柏斯坎普街一栋多层住宅楼顶层阁楼的住宅，造成三人丧生。
HYP: The Duisburg prosecutor, Wesel County Police Department and Wesel City Fire Department jointly issued a statement that evening, at about 14:40 that day, a small plane crashed into a penthouse at the top of a multi-storey residential building on Faberscamp Street in Wessel County, killing three people.

SRC: 其当天从北威州鲁尔区马尔市起飞，在韦瑟尔县的机场中途停靠后再度起飞，随后撞上住宅楼。
HYP: It took off from Mar, Ruhr, North Rhine-Westphalia that day, stopped again at Wessel County Airport, and then took off again, then crashed into a residential building.

SRC: 死者身份或为遭撞击住宅内的一名女性住户和小型飞机上两名乘客。
HYP: The deceased may be a female resident in the impacted house and two passengers on a small plane.

SRC: 房内一名两岁儿童仅受轻伤，被平安救出。
HYP: A two-year-old child in the room suffered only minor injuries and was rescued safely.

SRC: 房内其余住户未在事故中受伤，但情绪仍未平复。
HYP: The rest of the residents in the room were not injured in the accident, but their emotions have not calmed down.

SRC: 德新社报道的现场画面显示，遭遇事故的住宅一度冒出滚滚浓烟，消防队员扑灭火情后可见房屋损毁严重。
HYP: The scenes reported by the German News Agency showed that the houses in the accident had thick smoke, and the firefighters showed that the houses were seriously damaged after extinguishing the fire.

SRC: 目前，飞机失事原因尚不明确。
HYP: At present, the cause of the plane crash is unclear.

SRC: 《莱茵邮报》援引警方说法报道称，有线索表明，飞机或在撞上住宅楼前就已解体。
HYP: "Rheinland Post" quoted police as saying that there were clues that the plane had disintegrated before it hit a residential building.

SRC: 警方表示，在事故现场一带发现了失事飞机的多块零部件。
HYP: Police said that many parts of the crashed aircraft were found in the vicinity of the accident site.

SRC: 德国刑警正与杜伊斯堡检方、德国联邦航空事故调查局共同调查导致这一事故的原因。
HYP: The German Criminal Police is investigating the cause of this accident with the Duisburg prosecutor and the German Federal Aviation Accident Investigation Bureau.

SRC: 记者当天从中国驻杜塞尔多夫总领事馆了解到，该馆与当地警局及消防部门取得联系，据现场判断，伤亡人员中无中国公民。
HYP: The reporter learned from the Chinese Consulate General in Düsseldorf that day that the museum contacted the local police station and fire department. According to the scene judgment, there were no Chinese citizens among the casualties.

SRC: 大鹏导演《吉祥如意》入围金爵奖-新华网
HYP: Director Dapeng's "Auspicious Ruyi" shortlisted for Jinjue Award-Xinhuanet

SRC: 7月18日，第二十三届上海国际电影节公布了金爵奖官方入选影片名单。
HYP: On July 18, the 23rd Shanghai International Film Festival announced the list of officially selected films for the Golden Jubilee Awards.

SRC: 大鹏导演的首部现实题材影片《吉祥如意》，成功入围本届上影节金爵奖，同时影片官方发布了首款海报。
HYP: Director Dapeng's first real-life film "Auspicious Ruyi" was successfully shortlisted for this year's Golden Jury Award, and the film officially released its first poster.

SRC: 海报片方供图
HYP: Poster for photo

SRC: 影片《吉祥如意》是大鹏导演的第一部现实题材作品，也是他与金爵奖的二度结缘。
HYP: The film "Auspicious Ruyi" is the first realistic work directed by Dapeng and his second connection with the Golden Jubilee Award.

SRC: 该片讲述了这样一个故事：一位喜剧片导演突发奇想，回到东北农村老家，希望将一家人如何过年拍成一部文艺电影，结果遭遇一系列意外。
HYP: The film tells a story: a comedy director had a whimsy and returned to his hometown in the northeast of the country, hoping to make a family festival into a literary film, resulting in a series of accidents.

SRC: 因拍电影而聚齐的家庭成员们，完成了最后的聚会。
HYP: The family members gathered for making the movie completed the final gathering.

SRC: 在今日发布的电影海报中，这个家庭中的一员— — “三舅”王吉祥坐在画面中央抽着烟，背景是披上银装的东北黑土地，前景是中国人逢年过节必挂的红灯笼。
HYP: In the movie poster released today, a member of the family — “Uncle San” Wang Jixiang sits in the middle of the screen smoking a cigarette. The background is silver-covered black earth in the northeast. The foreground is a red lantern that Chinese people must hang every year.

SRC: 象征着喜庆、团圆的红灯笼与身影落寞的王吉祥形成了巨大反差，似乎也透露了这个大家庭关系中的复杂与纠结。
HYP: The red lantern, which symbolizes the celebration and reunion, forms a huge contrast with the lonely Wang Jixiang. It also seems to reveal the complexity and entanglement in this big family relationship.

SRC: 据悉，影片中，除了“三舅”王吉祥的女儿由演员刘陆扮演，其余戏份均由真实的导演家人完成，影片实验性的视听风格，打破了戏剧与真实的边界，带给观众全新的浸入式观影体验。
HYP: It is reported that in the film, except for the daughter of "Three Uncles" Wang Jixiang is played by actor Liu Lu, the rest of the scenes are completed by the real family of the director. The experimental audio-visual style of the film breaks the boundary between drama and reality and brings the audience a new immersive movie watching experience.

SRC: 据导演大鹏介绍，《吉祥如意》的创作源自“一场天意” ， 拍摄期间家庭突如其来的一系列变故，让原本的拍摄计划不得不随之改变，没有剧本的生活最终被记录成电影，却释放出超越设计的张力。
HYP: According to director Dapeng, the creation of "Auspicious Ruyi" originated from "a god's will". During the shooting, a series of sudden changes in the family made the original shooting plan have to change accordingly. Life without a script was eventually recorded as a movie, but it released tension beyond design.

SRC: 导演大鹏究竟如何面对这场“天意” ， 又该如何继续迎接这场天意带来的种种改变呢？
HYP: How does director Dapeng face this "Providence" and how can he continue to meet the changes brought about by this Providence?

SRC: 毫无疑问《吉祥如意》是充满实验性的，几乎全素人的阵容和创新的视听风格将镜头前的生活变成了一部电影，在真实影像的包裹下，观众也会从影片所呈现的家庭中找到自己和家人的影子，随着影片中这场家庭聚会的落幕，唤起一系列思考。
HYP: There is no doubt that "Auspicious Ruyi" is full of experimentation. The almost all-person lineup and innovative audio-visual style have turned the life in front of the camera into a movie. Under the package of real images, the audience will also find the shadow of themselves and their family from the family presented in the film. With the ending of the family party in the film, a series of thoughts are evoked.

SRC: NEWS.GOV.MO: 新型冠状病毒感染应变协调中心查询热线统计数字(7月25日08H00-7月26日08H00)
HYP: NEWS.GOV.MO: New Coronavirus Infection Response Coordination Center query hotline statistics (July 25, 08H00 to July 26, 08H00)

SRC: 由2020年07月25日08H00 至7月26日08H00，新型冠状病毒感染应变协调中心的查询热线共接获292宗电话查询。
HYP: From 08H00 on July 25, 2020 to 08H00 on July 26, the hotline of the New Coronavirus Infection Response Coordination Center received 292 telephone inquiries.

SRC: 关于疫情的291宗查询，已即时转线至相关部门代表跟进，情况如下：
HYP: The 291 enquiries about the epidemic situation were immediately transferred to the relevant department representatives for follow-up. The situation is as follows:

SRC: 卫生局271宗(涉及：查询关于隔离；查询核酸检测；查询两地牌；健康码；其他。）
HYP: 271 cases from the Health Bureau (involves: inquiries about isolation; inquiries about nucleic acid detection; inquiries about the licenses of the two places; health codes; others.)

SRC: 治安警察局17宗(涉及：查询出入境措施；查询粤澳两地牌车辆出入境措施；查询珠海政务热线；查询证件逗留问题。）
HYP: 17 cases of Public Security Police Station (involves: enquiries on immigration measures; enquiries on immigration measures for vehicles from Guangdong and Macao; enquiries on Zhuhai's government hotline; enquiries on the stay of documents.)

SRC: 旅游局1宗(涉及：查询隔离酒店问题。）
HYP: 1 case from the Tourism Bureau (involves: inquiries about segregated hotels)

SRC: 教育暨青年局1宗(涉及：查询澳门学生返回英国读书的方法。）
HYP: 1 case from Education and Youth Bureau (Involves: Inquiry about the method of Macao students returning to the UK to study.)

SRC: 海事及水务局1宗(涉及：询问香港渔船进港是否需要向海事及水务局申报及核酸检测相关事宜。）
HYP: 1 case from the Maritime and Water Affairs Bureau (Involves: Inquiring whether Hong Kong fishing vessels need to declare to the Maritime and Water Affairs Bureau and nucleic acid detection related matters when entering Hong Kong.)

SRC: 马里尼切夫说，价值的变化受卢布贬值和疫情<v>等</v>影响。
HYP: Marinichev said that the change in value was affected by the depreciation of the ruble and the epidemic.

SRC: 他说“服务成本正在增加。
HYP: He said "Service costs are increasing.

SRC: 由于疫情，人们开始在互联网上花费更多的时间。”
HYP: Due to the epidemic, people started to spend more time on the Internet."

SRC: 马里尼切夫不排除年互联网价格将严重上涨，认为运营商可以为客户提供更高的速度和更多服务抵消人们对价格上涨的不满。
HYP: Marinychev does not rule out that Internet prices will rise sharply in the year, and believes that operators can provide customers with higher speed and more services to offset people's dissatisfaction with price increases.

SRC: 《中国医生》<v>筹拍</v>致敬抗疫英雄-新华网
HYP: "Chinese Doctor" to pay tribute to anti-epidemic heroes-Xinhuanet

SRC: 《中国医生》筹拍致敬抗疫英雄-新华网
HYP: "Chinese Doctor" to pay tribute to anti-epidemic heroes-Xinhuanet

SRC: 近日，带着中国电影人对抗疫英雄的敬意，博纳影业集团董事长于冬、导演刘伟强(图左）在广州与钟南山院士，就抗疫题材影片《中国医生》的拍摄制作工作进行了座谈交流。
HYP: Recently, with the respect of Chinese filmmakers to fight against epidemic heroes, Bona Film Group Chairman Yu Dong and director Liu Weiqiang (pictured left) and academician Zhong Nanshan in Guangzhou had a discussion on the production of the anti-epidemic movie "Chinese Doctor".

SRC: 博纳影业希望能借由《中国医生》，向所有战斗在疫情防控一线的医护、防疫工作者致敬！
HYP: Bona Films hopes to use "Chinese Doctor" to pay tribute to all the medical and epidemic prevention workers who are fighting on the front line of epidemic prevention and control!

SRC: 2021年，该片将作为庆祝中国共产党建党100周年献礼影片全国公映。
HYP: In 2021, the film will be screened nationwide as a gift to celebrate the 100th anniversary of the founding of the Communist Party of China.

SRC: 目前，博纳影业正在中宣部和国家电影局的安排部署下，广东省电影局及湖北省电影局的支持下，组织电影《中国机长》原班人马筹拍电影《中国医生》，这是一部反映在党中央的坚强领导下，全国人民团结一心抗击新冠肺炎疫情的影片。
HYP: Currently, Bona Pictures is under the arrangement of the Central Propaganda Department and the National Film Administration, with the support of the Guangdong Film Bureau and the Hubei Film Bureau, to organize the film "Chinese Captain" to make the film "Chinese Doctor". This is a film reflecting the strong leadership of the Party Central Committee and the people of the whole country to unite to fight the new crown pneumonia epidemic.

SRC: 影片聚焦武汉抗疫一线，将以武汉医护人员及各省市援鄂医疗队为人物背景，从人性的角度，运用独特的叙事，以及极具冲击力的镜头语言，全景展现抗疫一线充满奉献和牺牲精神的中国医护人员的感人故事。
HYP: Focusing on Wuhan's anti-epidemic line, the film will use Wuhan's medical staff and various provinces and cities' medical aid teams as backgrounds. From the perspective of human nature, it will use unique narrative and powerful lens language to provide a panoramic view of the moving story of the Chinese medical staff full of dedication and sacrifice.

SRC: 据了解，武汉解封之日的第一时间，博纳公司便克服重重困难，派出采拍小组深入疫情一线，与数百位医护工作者面对面交流了解、搜集资料，目前已经采访到了包括钟南山院士本人、广州驰援武汉第一人、广东援鄂医疗队，以及武汉金银潭医院、武汉协和医院、武汉大学中南医院、武汉中心医院等抗疫战线最前沿的白衣天使们，拍下了大量珍贵的第一手视频资料。
HYP: It is understood that on the first day of Wuhan's unblocking, Bona Company overcame many difficulties, sent a team to go to the epidemic front, exchanged face-to-face exchanges with hundreds of medical workers, and collected information. At present, interviews have been made with academician Zhong Nanshan, the first person in Guangzhou Chi aid Wuhan, Guangdong medical aid team, as well as the video of the Jinyitan Hospital in Wuhan, Wuhan Union Hospital, Wuhan Central Hospital, Wuhan Central Hospital, etc.

SRC: 钟南山院士在此次座谈会中亦对电影的拍摄提出了期待和希望：“ 我很期待，希望你们不仅要走访一些抛头露面比较多的专家，还要更多地采访在一线埋头苦干的医务人员，他们是大多数。”
HYP: Academician Zhong Nanshan also put forward expectations and hopes for the filming of the film in this symposium: "I am looking forward to it. I hope that you will not only visit some experts who have made a lot of appearances, but also interview more medical staff working hard on the front line. They are the majority."

SRC: 他表示，他之前看过《我和我的祖国》《中国机长》，认为以普通人视角讲述大格局故事的方法就很好。
HYP: He said that he had read "My Motherland" and "Captain of China" before, and thought that it would be good to tell the story of the big pattern from the perspective of ordinary people.

SRC: “现在一些国外朋友对中国还是有一些误解。”
HYP: "Now some foreign friends still have some misunderstandings about China."

SRC: 在谈到影片的传播时，钟南山院士表示，目前国外有些人喜欢将病毒贴上政治化标签，他希望电影能从人性的角度打动观众：“ 这部电影除了在中国放映以外，最好也能在国外放映，要用国内外观众都能理解的方式，用真正的人文精神打动观众。”
HYP: When talking about the spread of the film, Academician Zhong Nanshan said that currently some people abroad like to label the virus politicized. He hopes that the film can impress the audience from the perspective of humanity: "In addition to screening in China, this film is best to be screened abroad. It is necessary to impress the audience with real humanism in a way that can be understood by domestic and foreign audiences."

SRC: 钟南山院士还深情回忆了上世纪80年代的影片《人到中年》，“这么多年过去了，我对改革开放后电影印象最深的还是《人到中年》，当时我国外的医生朋友们都看哭了，如果《中国医生》能够起到这样的作用，那就很了不起了。”
HYP: Academician Zhong Nanshan also fondly recalled the movie "People to Middle Age" in the 1980s. "After so many years, the most impressive thing about the movie after the reform and opening up was "People to Middle Age". At that time, my doctor friends abroad all cried. If "Chinese Doctor" can play such a role, it will be amazing."

SRC: 钟南山院士表示，如果《中国医生》能引起国外观众的共鸣，那就非常成功。
HYP: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that if "Chinese Doctor" can resonate with foreign audiences, it will be very successful.

SRC: 在座谈交流时，钟南山院士还分享了对当前国际疫情防控的意见和建议，“ 我相信人永远比病毒聪明。”
HYP: During the discussion and exchange, Academician Zhong Nanshan also shared his opinions and suggestions on the prevention and control of the current international epidemic. "I believe people are always smarter than viruses."

SRC: 钟南山院士表示，虽说病毒难以预测，但从原始社会至今，人类已渡过了千难万险，如今现代社会有发达的医疗科技和社会管理措施，再加上全世界的医务人员、甚至老百姓都对科学应对新冠肺炎疫情有了基本认识，人们不会再像以前那么被动，“接下来要注意两个方面的工作，一是要研究全世界怎么加强合作，<v>二是注重对人们心灵的抚慰” 。</v>
HYP: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that although the virus is unpredictable, since the primitive society, humans have survived all kinds of dangers. Nowadays, modern society has developed medical technology and social management measures. In addition, medical personnel around the world and even ordinary people have a basic understanding of the scientific response to the new crown pneumonia epidemic. People will not be as passive as before. "The next thing is to pay attention to two aspects of work. The first is to study how the world strengthens cooperation.

SRC: 钟南山院士表示，虽说病毒难以预测，但从原始社会至今，人类已渡过了千难万险，如今现代社会有发达的医疗科技和社会管理措施，再加上全世界的医务人员、甚至老百姓都对科学应对新冠肺炎疫情有了基本认识，人们不会再像以前那么被动，“接下来要注意两个方面的工作，一是要研究全世界怎么加强合作，二是注重对人们心灵的抚慰” 。
HYP: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that although the virus is unpredictable, since the primitive society, humans have survived all kinds of dangers. Nowadays, modern society has developed medical technology and social management measures. In addition, medical personnel around the world and even ordinary people have a basic understanding of the scientific response to the new crown pneumonia epidemic. People will not be as passive as before. "The next thing is to pay attention to two aspects of work. The first is to study how the world strengthens cooperation.

SRC: （记者王金跃）
HYP: (Reporter Wang Jinyue)

SRC: 文旅“红果”聚韶山—湘潭首届红博会见闻-今日要闻-湖南日报网-华声在线
HYP: Cultural Tourism "Red Fruit" Gathers in Shaoshan-Xiangtan's First Red Expo Meeting-News Today-Hunan Daily-Huasheng Online

SRC: 湖南日报·新湖南客户端记者蒋睿通讯员肖燕
HYP: Hunan Daily·New Hunan Client Reporter Jiang Rui Correspondent Xiao Yan

SRC: 嘉兴红船模具、韶山毛泽东铜像、延安布堆花工艺品、湘西永顺腊肉…… 7月25日，2020湖南红色旅游文化节在韶山开幕。
HYP: Jiaxing Red Boat Mould, Shaoshan Bronze Statue of Mao Zedong, Yan'an Budui Flower Crafts, Xiangxi Yongshun Bacon... On July 25, the 2020 Hunan Red Tourism Culture Festival opened in Shaoshan.

SRC: 作为主体活动之一，湘潭首届红色文化产业博览会在韶山全域旅游咨询集散中心开展。
HYP: As one of the main activities, Xiangtan's first Red Cultural Industry Expo was held in Shaoshan Tourism Consulting and Distribution Center.

SRC: 展览区红色文创产品、革命老区土特产品等琳琅满目，引来各地游客争相购买。
HYP: The exhibition area is full of red cultural and creative products, and native products from the old revolutionary areas, attracting tourists from all over the world to buy it.

SRC: “此次红博会，既是全国红色文化产业成果的一次展示，也是参展单位和企业交流经验、探讨发展路径的一个重要平台。”
HYP: "The Red Expo is not only a showcase of the achievements of the national red cultural industry, but also an important platform for exhibitors and companies to exchange experiences and discuss development paths."

SRC: 湘潭首届红博会执委会相关负责人介绍，这届红博会以“弘扬红色文化助推文旅升温”为主题，展览总面积近3000平方米，设置了氛围营造区、景区展示展陈区和红色文旅网游网购体验区。
HYP: The relevant person in charge of the Executive Committee of the First Red Fair in Xiangtan introduced that the theme of this Red Fair is "Promoting Red Culture and Boosting the Temperature of Cultural Tourism". The total exhibition area is nearly 3000 square meters. An atmosphere creation area, scenic exhibition exhibition area and red cultural tourism online shopping experience area are set up.

SRC: 邀请浙江嘉兴、贵州遵义、陕西延安等8个外省地市以及我省长沙、株洲、岳阳、郴州等地137家企业、单位参展，共展出展品768种，包括红色文物、工艺品、食品特产、旅游线路、红色培训课程、红色文创产品等。
HYP: 137 enterprises and units from 8 provinces and municipalities including Jiaxing, Zunyi, Guizhou, and Yan'an, Shaanxi, and Changsha, Zhuzhou, Yueyang, Chenzhou, and other places in our province were invited to exhibit. A total of 768 exhibits were exhibited, including red cultural relics, handicrafts, special food products, tourist routes, red training courses, red cultural and creative products, etc.

SRC: 展销区将展至7月29日。
HYP: The exhibition area will be displayed until July 29.

SRC: 作为红博会东道主，湘潭展区亮点纷呈。
HYP: As the host of the Red Expo, the highlights of the Xiangtan exhibition area were numerous.

SRC: 展区负责人介绍，湘潭展区分为红色工业、红色文化产业发展两大部分。
HYP: According to the person in charge of the exhibition area, the Xiangtan exhibition is divided into two parts: red industry and red cultural industry development.

SRC: 红色工业展区展出华菱湘钢、华菱线缆、湘电动力等6家企业的展品31件，红色文化产业发展展区展出红色系列图书、红色系列食品、红色系列文创产品等27家单位产品近200个。
HYP: The Red Industrial Zone exhibited 31 exhibits from 6 companies including Hualing Xianggang, Hualing Cable and Xiangdian Power. The Red Culture Industry Development Zone exhibited nearly 200 products from 27 units including Red Series Books, Red Series Foods, and Red Series Cultural and Creative Products.

SRC: 在延安展区，不少游客被陈展的布堆花手工艺品和剪纸艺术品所吸引。
HYP: In the Yan'an exhibition area, many tourists were attracted by Chen Zhanfu's handicrafts and paper-cut artworks.

SRC: 延安市文旅局局长马东坡介绍，此次参展精心选择了延安近两年来优秀的红色文创产品，其中16种产品是2019全国红色文创产品优秀作品。
HYP: Ma Dongpo, Director of Yan'an Cultural Tourism Bureau, introduced that the exhibition carefully selected Yan'an's outstanding red cultural and creative products in the past two years, of which 16 products were excellent works of national red cultural and creative products in 2019.

SRC: 同时，他们邀请了国家级非物质文化遗产保护项目“安塞剪纸”、“陕北民歌”与省级非遗项目延川布堆画传承人，重点推介延安民俗特色产品，并借此机会与其他展区单位企业沟通交流，推动跨区域合作。
HYP: At the same time, they invited national-level intangible cultural heritage protection projects "Ansai Paper-cutting", "Northern Shaanxi Folk Songs" and provincial-level non-heritage projects Yanchuan Budui Painting inheritors, focusing on the promotion of Yan'an folk custom products, and taking this opportunity to communicate with other exhibition units and promote cross-regional cooperation.

SRC: 膜分离技术助力破解“温室效应” - 中新网
HYP: Membrane separation technology helps to crack the "greenhouse effect"-chinanews

SRC: 膜分离技术助力破解“温室效应”
HYP: Membrane separation technology helps solve the "greenhouse effect"

SRC: 新型混合基质膜制备技术示意图
HYP: Schematic diagram of new hybrid matrix membrane preparation technology

SRC: 本报讯记者商瑞报道：日前，天津大学大气环境与生物能源团队针对“膜分离法捕集二氧化碳”取得重大进展，成功研发出新型混合基质膜制备技术，大幅提升膜材料二氧化碳捕集性能。
HYP: Reporter Shangrui reported: Recently, the Tianjin University Atmospheric Environment and Bioenergy team has made significant progress on the "membrane separation method for capturing carbon dioxide", and has successfully developed a new mixed matrix membrane preparation technology to greatly improve the carbon dioxide capture performance of membrane materials.

SRC: 相关成果已作为国际期刊《温室气体：科学与技术》封面文章发表。
HYP: Related achievements have been published as cover articles in the international journal "Greenhouse Gases: Science and Technology".

SRC: “温室效应”是困扰人类发展的重大环境问题，二氧化碳排放则是造成“温室效应”的元凶。
HYP: The "greenhouse effect" is a major environmental problem that plagues human development, and carbon dioxide emissions are the culprit of the "greenhouse effect."

SRC: 如何高效捕获并利用人类排放的二氧化碳是科学家关注的焦点。
HYP: How to efficiently capture and use carbon dioxide emitted by humans is the focus of scientists.

SRC: “膜分离法”是一种新兴的二氧化碳捕集技术，它在膜材料帮助下分离二氧化碳气体，具有高效节能、操作简单的特点。
HYP: "Membrane separation method" is an emerging carbon dioxide capture technology, which separates carbon dioxide gas with the help of membrane materials, and has the characteristics of high efficiency, energy saving and simple operation.

SRC: 如何让膜材料“深呼吸”， 提高气体分离效率，是采用膜分离法捕集二氧化碳的瓶颈难点。
HYP: How to make the membrane material "breathe deeply" and improve the efficiency of gas separation is the bottleneck of the membrane separation method to capture carbon dioxide.

SRC: 天津大学科研团队创新思路，通过反复实验，探究不同溶剂对膜气体分离性能的影响。
HYP: The research team of Tianjin University has innovated ideas and explored the effects of different solvents on membrane gas separation performance through repeated experiments.

SRC: 实验结果表明，以N-甲基吡咯烷酮作为制备溶剂，生成的膜材料中碳纳米管分布更加均匀，“更透气”，有效提升了膜材料气体分离效能和速率。
HYP: The experimental results show that with N-methylpyrrolidone as the preparation solvent, the distribution of carbon nanotubes in the produced membrane material is more uniform and "more breathable", which effectively improves the gas separation efficiency and rate of the membrane material.

SRC: 用这种新技术制备的混合基质膜，二氧化碳分离性能接近目前此类膜材料的理论分离上限。
HYP: With the mixed matrix membrane prepared by this new technology, the carbon dioxide separation performance is close to the theoretical upper limit of the current separation of such membrane materials.

SRC: “新技术为膜分离法捕集二氧化碳提供了新思路。”
HYP: "New technology provides new ideas for membrane separation to capture carbon dioxide."

SRC: 天津大学大气环境与生物能源团队成员李润表示：“ 我们希望这种技术能够为未来燃煤电厂与化工企业处理烟气提供有力支持，在控制温室气体排放等领域发挥重大作用。”
HYP: Li Run, a member of the atmospheric environment and bioenergy team at Tianjin University, said: "We hope this technology will provide strong support for future coal-fired power plants and chemical companies to deal with flue gas, and play a major role in the control of greenhouse gas emissions."

SRC: 首度成立专委会、集体签“长约” 第三届进博会参展商联盟构筑“进博纽带” - 新华网
HYP: Established a special committee for the first time, signed a "long contract" collectively, and joined the Exhibitors' Union of the 3rd Expo to build a "connection link"-Xinhua

SRC: 7月26日在上海拍摄的第三届进博会参展商联盟第一次会议现场。
HYP: The scene of the first meeting of the Exhibitors' Union of the 3rd China International Expo in Shanghai on July 26th.

SRC: 新华社上海7月26日电（记者周蕊）26日，第三届进口博览会参展商联盟在此间首次成立专业委员会，首批成立的专委会包括公共卫生防疫专委会和乳业专委会，35家成员企业还签订了3年长期参展合作备忘录，<v>进博会参展商联盟的纽带作用不断增强</v>。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Shanghai, July 26 (Reporter Zhou Rui) On the 26th, the Exhibitors Union of the Third Import Expo set up a professional committee for the first time here. The first batch of established special committees included the Public Health and Epidemic Prevention Committee and the Dairy Industry Special Committee. 35 member companies also signed a three-year long-term exhibition cooperation memorandum.

SRC: 26日在此间举行的第三届进博会参展商联盟第一次会议上，韩国现代、<v>美国</v>陶氏化学、日本资生堂、新西兰纽仕兰、德国西门子、法国米其林、英国阿斯利康等一批展盟成员企业签订了3年长期参展合作备忘录，修订和完善后的展盟章程也首次公布。
HYP: At the first meeting of the Exhibitors' Union of the Third China World Expo held here on the 26th, a group of member companies of Hyundai, Dow Chemical, Shiseido, New Zealand, New Zealand, Siemens, Michelin, France, and AstraZeneca signed a three-year long-term participation memorandum of cooperation. The revised and improved regulations of the exhibition are also announced for the first time.

SRC: 26日在此间举行的第三届进博会参展商联盟第一次会议上，韩国现代、美国陶氏化学、<v>日本</v>资生堂、新西兰纽仕兰、德国西门子、法国米其林、英国阿斯利康等一批展盟成员企业签订了3年长期参展合作备忘录，修订和完善后的展盟章程也首次公布。
HYP: At the first meeting of the Exhibitors' Union of the Third China World Expo held here on the 26th, a group of member companies of Hyundai, Dow Chemical, Shiseido, New Zealand, New Zealand, Siemens, Michelin, France, and AstraZeneca signed a three-year long-term participation memorandum of cooperation. The revised and improved regulations of the exhibition are also announced for the first time.

SRC: 26日在此间举行的第三届进博会参展商联盟第一次会议上，韩国现代、美国陶氏化学、日本资生堂、新西兰纽仕兰、德国西门子、法国米其林、英国阿斯利康等一批展盟成员企业签订了3年长期参展合作备忘录，修订和完善后的展盟章程也首次公布。
HYP: At the first meeting of the Exhibitors' Union of the Third China World Expo held here on the 26th, a group of member companies of Hyundai, Dow Chemical, Shiseido, New Zealand, New Zealand, Siemens, Michelin, France, and AstraZeneca signed a three-year long-term participation memorandum of cooperation. The revised and improved regulations of the exhibition are also announced for the first time.

SRC: 26日在此间举行的第三届进博会参展商联盟第一次会议上，<v>韩国</v>现代、美国陶氏化学、日本资生堂、新西兰纽仕兰、德国西门子、法国米其林、英国阿斯利康等一批展盟成员企业签订了3年长期参展合作备忘录，修订和完善后的展盟章程也首次公布。
HYP: At the first meeting of the Exhibitors' Union of the Third China World Expo held here on the 26th, a group of member companies of Hyundai, Dow Chemical, Shiseido, New Zealand, New Zealand, Siemens, Michelin, France, and AstraZeneca signed a three-year long-term participation memorandum of cooperation. The revised and improved regulations of the exhibition are also announced for the first time.

SRC: 7月26日在上海拍摄的乳业专业委员会成立仪式现场。
HYP: The scene of the establishment ceremony of the Dairy Professional Committee photographed in Shanghai on July 26.

SRC: 根据最新的章程，展盟将引入牵头单位轮值机制，加强专委会功能。
HYP: According to the latest regulations, Zhanmeng will introduce the rotation mechanism of the leading unit to strengthen the function of the special committee.

SRC: 专委会将为行业发展趋势分析提出建议，推动行业可持续发展。
HYP: The Special Committee will make recommendations for industry development trend analysis and promote sustainable development of the industry.

SRC: 同时，整合行业全产业链资源，以大带小，带动关联企业参展，将进博会打造成为行业企业聚集高地。
HYP: At the same time, the integration of the industry's entire industry chain resources to promote the participation of related companies to participate in the Expo will build the Expo into an industry gathering place.

SRC: 首次成立公共卫生防疫专委会，对于当前抗击新冠肺炎疫情来说显得尤为重要。
HYP: The establishment of the Public Health and Epidemic Prevention Committee for the first time is particularly important for the fight against the new coronary pneumonia epidemic.

SRC: 作为第三届进博会公共卫生防疫专委会副会长单位，雅培快速诊断业务大中华区总经理仇建平说，下一步，雅培会携手更多行业伙伴，探索新的解决方案和合作模式，助力中国以及全世界抗击新冠肺炎疫情。
HYP: As the vice chairman unit of the Public Health and Epidemic Prevention Committee of the Third Expo, Qiu Jianping, general manager of Abbott's rapid diagnosis business in Greater China, said that in the next step, Abbott will work with more industry partners to explore new solutions and cooperation models to help China and the world fight the new coronary pneumonia epidemic.

SRC: 7月26日在上海拍摄的公共卫生防疫专业委员会成立仪式现场。
HYP: The scene of the establishment ceremony of the Public Health and Epidemic Prevention Professional Committee photographed in Shanghai on July 26.

SRC: 据悉，第三届进博会首次设立公共卫生防疫专区，截至目前已有近50家全球企业报名参展，展览面积超过1万平方米。
HYP: It is reported that the third public expo set up a public health and epidemic prevention zone for the first time. Up to now, nearly 50 global companies have signed up for the exhibition, and the exhibition area exceeds 10000 square meters.

SRC: 在2018年首届进博会期间，进博会参展商联盟由展商自发倡议成立，旨在成为优质参展企业交流合作平台、连接<v>参展</v>各方信息与资源共享平台，以及为促进中国与世界各国（地区）之间经贸商务往来与发展建言献策的智囊平台。
HYP: During the first Expo in 2018, the Exhibitors Alliance was established by the exhibitors on its own initiative. It aims to become a platform for high-quality exhibitors to exchange and cooperate, to connect all parties to the information and resource sharing platform, as well as a think-tank platform to promote economic and trade exchanges and development between China and other countries (regions).

SRC: 在2018年首届进博会期间，进博会参展商联盟由展商自发倡议成立，旨在成为优质参展企业交流合作平台、连接参展各方信息与资源共享平台，以及为促进中国与世界各国（地区）之间经贸商务往来与发展建言献策的智囊平台。
HYP: During the first Expo in 2018, the Exhibitors Alliance was established by the exhibitors on its own initiative. It aims to become a platform for high-quality exhibitors to exchange and cooperate, to connect all parties to the information and resource sharing platform, as well as a think-tank platform to promote economic and trade exchanges and development between China and other countries (regions).

SRC: 截至目前，已有142家企业加入参展商联盟，覆盖全球23个国家和地区。
HYP: Up to now, 142 companies have joined the Exhibitor Union, covering 23 countries and regions around the world.

SRC: 比利时3岁女童死于新冠病毒感染-新华网
HYP: Belgian 3-year-old girl dies of New Coronavirus infection-Xinhua

SRC: 比利时卫生部门24日说，一名3岁女童死于新冠病毒感染，是该国最年幼的新冠病亡患者。
HYP: The Belgian health department said on the 24th that a 3-year-old girl died of a new coronavirus infection and is the youngest death case in the country.

SRC: 比利时卫生部门发言人布德温·卡特里说，这名女童感染新冠病毒前已经有其他严重疾病；除了这名女童，近期还有一名18岁青年死于新冠病毒感染。
HYP: Belgian health department spokesman Budwin Catri said that the girl had other serious diseases before being infected with the new coronavirus; in addition to the girl, an 18-year-old young man recently died of new coronavirus infection.

SRC: 卡特里说，上周比利时85%新增新冠确诊人员年龄在60岁以下。
HYP: Catri said that 85% of the newly diagnosed new crowns in Belgium were under 60 years old last week.

SRC: 他提醒身体健康、年龄较轻的民众不要掉以轻心。
HYP: He reminded healthy and young people not to be taken lightly.

SRC: “虽然年轻人死于新冠病毒感染的情况较为罕见，但没有任何人现在具备免疫力。 ”
HYP: "Although it is rare for young people to die from infection with the new coronavirus, no one is immune now."

SRC: 上周，比利时新增新冠确诊病例比前一周增长89 % ， 每日平均2.9人死于新冠病毒感染，高于前一周的日均1.7人。
HYP: Last week, the number of newly diagnosed cases of new crowns in Belgium increased by 89% compared with the previous week, with an average of 2.9 deaths per day due to new crown virus infections, higher than the average of 1.7 persons in the previous week.

SRC: 欧洲疫情高峰期间，比利时人口中新冠病毒感染者占比在欧洲“名列前茅” 。
HYP: During the peak of the European epidemic, the proportion of new coronavirus infections among the Belgian population was "top of Europe".

SRC: 比利时有1100多万人口。
HYP: Belgium has a population of more than 11 million.

SRC: 最新数据显示，比利时累计64847人感染新冠病毒。
HYP: The latest data shows that 64847 people in Belgium have been infected with the new coronavirus.

SRC: 卡特里本周早些时候警告，在雪球越滚越大、最终造成“雪崩”前，人们必须采取行动。
HYP: Cathar warned earlier this week that people must take action before the snowball rolls over and eventually causes an "avalanche."

SRC: 为抑制疫情反弹，比利时首相索菲·维尔梅斯23日宣布，人们在公共场所佩戴口罩的有关规定将更加严格，8月进一步解除限制性措施的方案也将暂缓执行。
HYP: In order to curb the rebound of the epidemic, Belgian Prime Minister Sophie Vermes announced on the 23rd that the relevant regulations for people to wear masks in public places will be stricter, and the plan to further lift restrictive measures in August will also be suspended.

SRC: （郭倩） 【 新华社微特稿】
HYP: (Guo Qian) [Xinhua News Agency Micro Feature]

SRC: 大型融媒体行动《走村直播看脱贫》出发- 今日要闻- 湖南日报网- 华声在线
HYP: Large-scale financial media action "Let's go live in the village to see poverty alleviation" set off-today's news-Hunan Daily-Huasheng Online

SRC: 湖南日报·新湖南客户端7月25日讯(本报记者)7月25日，由中央广播电视总台财经节目中心主办的大型融媒体行动《走村直播看脱贫》从江苏徐州出发，两辆携带5G新媒体移动云制播系统的大篷车在现场嘉宾目送下，缓缓驶出现场。
HYP: Hunan Daily, New Hunan Client, July 25 (Reporter) On July 25, the large-scale financial media action "Going Live in the Village and Watching Poverty Alleviation" hosted by the Financial Program Center of the Central Radio and Television Station departed from Xuzhou, Jiangsu. Two caravans carrying 5G new media mobile cloud production and broadcasting systems were sent to the scene by the guests and slowly drove to the scene.

SRC: 习近平总书记指出，“2020年是具有里程碑意义的一年，我们将全面建成小康社会，实现第一个百年奋斗目标，2020年也是脱贫攻坚决战决胜之年”。
HYP: General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out: "2020 is a landmark year. We will build a well-off society in an all-round way and achieve the goal of the first century of struggle. 2020 will also be a year of decisive battle against poverty."

SRC: 大型融媒体行动《走村直播看脱贫》是中央广播电视总台财经节目中心为配合这一重大主题，做好脱贫攻坚宣传的重要举措。
HYP: The large-scale financial media action "Going Live in the Village and Watching Poverty Alleviation" is an important measure of the Central Radio and Television Central Financial and Economic Program Center to cope with this major theme and do a good job in promoting poverty alleviation.

SRC: 该行动将走进全国20多个省、自治区、直辖市的脱贫村，挖掘鲜活脱贫故事，直击村容村貌巨变，展现村民如何突破生存发展困境、走向致富之路的历程。
HYP: The action will walk into poverty alleviation villages in more than 20 provinces, autonomous regions, and municipalities directly under the Central Government, dig out fresh stories of poverty alleviation, and see how villages and villages change dramatically, showing how villagers have broken through the dilemma of survival and development and are on the road to prosperity.

SRC: 这次行动将持续3个多月。
HYP: This operation will last for more than 3 months.

SRC: 记者从徐州出发，兵分两路，一路走西南线，途经安徽、湖北、江西、湖南、广西、贵州、四川、重庆、云南、西藏等地;另一路走西北线，途经河南、陕西、甘肃、青海、新疆、宁夏、内蒙古、山西、河北等地，行程超过1万公里。
HYP: The reporter departed from Xuzhou, divided into two roads, taking the southwest route all the way, passing Anhui, Hubei, Jiangxi, Hunan, Guangxi, Guizhou, Sichuan, Chongqing, Yunnan, Tibet and other places; the other route was taking the northwest route, passing Henan, Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Xinjiang, Ningxia, Inner Mongolia, Shanxi, Hebei and other places, with a journey of more than 10000 kilometers.

SRC: 记者从徐州出发，兵分两路，<v>一路</v>走西南线，途经安徽、湖北、江西、湖南、广西、贵州、四川、重庆、云南、西藏等地;另一路走西北线，途经河南、陕西、甘肃、青海、新疆、宁夏、内蒙古、山西、河北等地，行程超过1万公里。
HYP: The reporter departed from Xuzhou, divided into two roads, taking the southwest route all the way, passing Anhui, Hubei, Jiangxi, Hunan, Guangxi, Guizhou, Sichuan, Chongqing, Yunnan, Tibet and other places; the other route was taking the northwest route, passing Henan, Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Xinjiang, Ningxia, Inner Mongolia, Shanxi, Hebei and other places, with a journey of more than 10000 kilometers.

SRC: 在报道形式上，《走村直播看脱贫》大胆融合。
HYP: In terms of reporting format, "Let's Live in the Village to Watch Out of Poverty" is a bold fusion.

SRC: 大篷车所到村庄的经济发展情况，都将通过中央广播电视总台央视财经频道、央广经济之声、中国交通广播、央视财经新媒体进行播出。
HYP: The economic development of the villages visited by the caravans will be broadcasted through CCTV Financial Channel of CCTV, CCTV Economic Voice, China Communications Radio and CCTV New Media.

SRC: 其中，电视直播将主要在央视财经频道的午间新闻节目《天下财经》完成(首播时间：周一至周日12：00-13:00 )，央视财经频道的黄金档新闻栏目《经济信息联播》将开设脱贫报道专栏(首播时间：周一至周日20：30-21:30 )。
HYP: Among them, the live TV broadcast will be mainly completed on the midday news program "World Finance" of CCTV Finance Channel (first broadcast time: Monday to Sunday 12:00-13:00), the CCTV Finance Channel's golden news column "Economic Information Network" will open a poverty alleviation report column (first broadcast time: Monday to Sunday 20:30-21:30).

SRC: 同时，大篷车将<v>对所到的每个村庄</v>在央视财经客户端进行长达1小时的直播，观众通过下载央视财经APP，可以观看直播，参与抽奖活动。
HYP: At the same time, the caravan will broadcast live for up to one hour on each CCTV Finance client. The audience can watch the live broadcast and participate in the lottery by downloading the CCTV Finance APP.

SRC: 在技术应用和演播室设计上，《 走村直播看脱贫》勇于突破，首创了“外场新媒体大篷车”。
HYP: In terms of technology application and studio design, "Going Live in the Village and Watching Poverty Alleviation" has the courage to make breakthroughs and pioneered the "outfield new media caravan."

SRC: 该车搭载5G新媒体移动云制播系统，利用5G+4K/8K+AI技术，实现线上线下、大屏小屏，电视广播的有机结合。
HYP: The car is equipped with a 5G new media mobile cloud production and broadcast system, using 5G 4K/8K AI technology to achieve an organic combination of online and offline, large and small screens, and TV broadcasting.

SRC: 配置三讯演播区，演播区由集装箱改装而成，长12米、宽2.55米、高3.98米，箱体采用液压自动展开结构，最大可以上翻120度。
HYP: It is equipped with a three-information broadcasting area. The broadcasting area is converted from a container, with a length of 12 meters, a width of 2.55 meters, and a height of 3.98 meters. The box body adopts a hydraulic automatic deployment structure, which can be turned up to 120 degrees.

SRC: 演播区也可以自动展开，并外接扩展平台，面积50多平方米，可以满足大部分节目的场景要求。
HYP: The performance area can also be automatically expanded and connected to an expansion platform with an area of more than 50 square meters, which can meet the scene requirements of most programs.

SRC: 张继科林小宅组队力挺有肌少年-新华网
HYP: Zhang Jikelin's small house team supports muscular teenagers - Xinhua English.news.cn

SRC: 运动少年热血竞技秀《运动吧少年》在7月11日正式登陆湖南卫视。
HYP: The sports youth hot-blooded competitive show "Sports Youth" officially landed on Hunan Satellite TV on July 11.

SRC: 运动领队张继科和运动助理林小宅跨界同台,林丹和傅园慧点评各有风格,而“庞然大物”般的力量拔杆装置的硬核上场,更让节目“燃”力十足。
HYP: Sports leader Zhang Jike and sports assistant Lin Xiaozhai cross-border on the same stage, Lin Dan and Fu Yuanhui commented on their own styles, and the hard core of the "monstrous" power pulling device made the program "burning" full.

SRC: 首集中,11位运动少年亮相力量赛道,外形惊艳现场观众的同时,竞技台上的“强冲突”“强对抗”“强心脏”也受到关注。
HYP: In the first episode, 11 sports teenagers appeared on the power track, and their appearance shocked the audience. At the same time, the "strong conflict", "strong confrontation" and "strong heart" on the arena also attracted attention.

SRC: 其中,“ 强冲突”来自超A体育生乔文一,他在比赛前公然挑衅同赛道中有“花美男”之称的徐志滨,呛声徐志滨的外形条件应该去唱跳节目,甚至放出“输了别把妆哭花了”的狠话。
HYP: Among them, the "strong conflict" comes from Qiao Wenyi, a super A sports student. He openly provoked Xu Zhibin, who is known as the "flower beauty" in the same track before the game, and choked Xu Zhibin's appearance conditions should go to sing and dance the program, and even released the ruthless words "don't lose your makeup and cry".

SRC: 一番言论让场上的少年和运动领队们都倒吸一口凉气。
HYP: The words made the youths and sports leaders on the field gasp.

SRC: 而“强对抗”更像是神仙打架,被誉为“大魔王”的孙健淇碰上同样实力强劲的张鑫栋,上演强强对决。
HYP: And "strong confrontation" is more like a fairy fight. Sun Jianqi, known as the "big devil", meets Zhang Xindong, who is also strong, and staged a strong showdown.

SRC: 而他们的身份也让人始料未及,孙健淇是热爱健身的演员,张鑫栋则是退役特战队员、三次勇士勋章获得者。
HYP: And their identity is also unexpected, Sun Jianqi is an actor who loves fitness, Zhang Xindong is a retired special operations team, three-time warrior medal winner.

SRC: 比赛一开始,两位少年就拼尽全力快速拔出小杆,在大杆上的持久对抗让现场观众为他们捏了一把汗。
HYP: At the beginning of the game, the two teenagers tried their best to quickly pull out the small pole, and the long-lasting confrontation on the big pole made the audience sweat for them.

SRC: 在紧张的赛况下,张继科作为《运动吧少年》运动领队之一,也在一旁认真观战。
HYP: In the tense situation, Zhang Jike, as one of the sports leaders of "Sports Juvenile", is also watching the battle seriously.

SRC: 在点评环节,他也十分细心,对输了比赛的一方少年耐心鼓励,帮助复盘过程中的每一个失误点。
HYP: In the comment section, he was also very careful, patiently encouraging the youngsters who lost the game, and helping every mistake in the process of reviewing.

SRC: 而运动助理林小宅则是花式助攻,她毫不掩饰对<v>颜值实力</v>在线的少年们的欣赏。
HYP: The sports assistant Lin Xiaozhai is a fancy assist, and she makes no secret of her appreciation for the young people who are online.

SRC: 而运动助理林小宅则是花式助攻,她毫不掩饰对颜值实力在线的少年们的欣赏。
HYP: The sports assistant Lin Xiaozhai is a fancy assist, and she makes no secret of her appreciation for the young people who are online.

SRC: 在了解到运动少年们超负荷的日常训练时,更是心生敬佩。
HYP: When I learned that the athletes were overloaded with daily training, it was even more admirable.

SRC: 同样是运动领队的林丹和傅园慧则各有风格,一个是气定神闲派“预言家” , 一个则是用笑容驱散紧张氛围的“洪荒少女” 。
HYP: Lin Dan and Fu Yuanhui, who are also the leaders of the sports team, have their own styles, one is a calm and idle "prophet", and the other is a "preventive girl" who uses a smile to disperse the tension.

SRC: 另外,吉克隽逸和刘烨作为运动助理,也围绕运动少年制造了不少爆笑话题。
HYP: In addition, Jike Junyi and Liu Ye, as sports assistants, also created a lot of hilarious topics around sports teenagers.

SRC: 法国南特教堂大火：教区志愿者承认纵火平时和善寡言-中新网
HYP: Church fire in Nantes, France: Parish volunteers admit to arson

SRC: 法国南特教堂大火：教区志愿者承认纵火<v>平时和善寡言-中新网</v>
HYP: Church fire in Nantes, France: Parish volunteers admit to arson

SRC: <v>中新网7月26日电据外媒报道，</v>7月18日，法国南特的宗教历史建筑瑰宝、著名的圣彼得与圣保罗大教堂，在一场火灾当中受到严重损毁，大管风琴完全毁坏。
HYP: The cathedral of Saint Peter and Saint Paul in Nantes, France, was severely damaged in a fire on July 18, with the large organ completely destroyed.

SRC: 中新网7月26日电据外媒报道，7月18日，法国南特的宗教历史建筑瑰宝、著名的圣彼得与圣保罗大教堂，在一场火灾当中受到严重损毁，大管风琴完全毁坏。
HYP: The cathedral of Saint Peter and Saint Paul in Nantes, France, was severely damaged in a fire on July 18, with the large organ completely destroyed.

SRC: 中新网7月26日电据外媒报道，7月18日，法国南特的<v>宗教历史建筑瑰宝</v>、著名的圣彼得与圣保罗大教堂，在一场火灾当中受到严重损毁，大管风琴完全毁坏。
HYP: The cathedral of Saint Peter and Saint Paul in Nantes, France, was severely damaged in a fire on July 18, with the large organ completely destroyed.

SRC: 当地时间26日，南特检察官宣布，一名在大教堂当中负责保卫工作的教区志愿者已经被起诉，罪名是“纵火毁坏” 。
HYP: Prosecutors in Nantes announced on Tuesday that a parish volunteer who was responsible for the security of the cathedral has been charged with "arson destruction".

SRC: 他已承认，是自己在教堂里点火。
HYP: He confessed that he set fire to the church.

SRC: 报道称，当地检察官<v>塞纳斯</v>表示，这名39岁、来自卢旺达的教区志愿者承认，自己夜里在大教堂当中的三处点火。
HYP: The 39-year-old parish volunteer from Rwanda admitted to setting fires in three places in the cathedral during the night, the local prosecutor said.

SRC: <v>报道称，</v>当地检察官塞纳斯表示，这名39岁、来自卢旺达的教区志愿者承认，自己夜里在大教堂当中的三处点火。
HYP: The 39-year-old parish volunteer from Rwanda admitted to setting fires in three places in the cathedral during the night, the local prosecutor said.

SRC: 此人的律师则表示，纵火者现在很后悔做出这种事。
HYP: The man's lawyer said the arsonist now regrets doing this.

SRC: 此人几年前通过避难的途径，进入法国，在本次火灾事发地教区得到庇护，在教堂里得到收留。
HYP: A few years ago, the man entered France through asylum and was sheltered in the diocese where the fire occurred.

SRC: 检方指出，最近，他尝试更新签证，正在和警察局对此进行对话沟通。
HYP: Prosecutors said he recently tried to renew his visa and is in dialogue with the police.

SRC: 但教堂方面表示仍然不敢相信，这名平时非常善良、面带笑容，但不怎么说话的信徒，会毁坏他如此热爱的教堂。
HYP: But the church said it still couldn't believe that the normally kind, smiling, but not very talkative believer would destroy the church he loved so much.

SRC: 7月18日火灾发生的当天，这名志愿者就已经因为叙述当中出现逻辑不通的问题，而接受过警方问询调查，但他后来被释放。
HYP: On the day of the fire on July 18, the volunteer had already been questioned by police because of a logical problem in his account, but he was later released.

SRC: 图为消防员在现场进行救援。
HYP: Pictured are firefighters at the scene.

SRC: 25日晚间，由于巴黎中央警察局实验室的专业工程师获取了新的证据，此人又再一次被传讯。
HYP: On the evening of the 25th, the person was once again arraigned, thanks to new evidence obtained by professional engineers in the laboratory of the Paris Central Police.

SRC: 这一次，男子承认了自己纵火的行为。
HYP: This time, the man confessed to his arson.

SRC: 据报道，如果蓄意纵火毁坏的罪名成立，嫌犯将可能面临10年监禁和15万欧元的罚款。
HYP: According to reports, if convicted of arson and destruction, the suspect could face 10 years in prison and a fine of 150000 euros.

SRC: 报道称，此次大火给圣皮埃尔与圣保罗大教堂造成了严重损失，教堂内的管风琴被完全烧毁，管风琴后面的彩色玻璃窗也受损严重。
HYP: According to reports, the fire caused heavy damage to the Saint Pierre and Saint Paul Cathedral, the organ inside the church was completely destroyed, and the stained glass window behind the organ was also badly damaged.

SRC: 法国历史保护建筑首席建筑师布鲁内认为，保守估计，南特大教堂复原工作至少要有3年。
HYP: Brunet, the chief architect of historic buildings in France, believes that the conservative estimate is that the restoration of Nantes Cathedral will take at least three years.

SRC: 飓风“汉娜”登陆美得州或引发河水暴涨和山洪-中新网
HYP: Hurricane Hannah makes landfall in Texas, causing flooding and flooding

SRC: 中新网7月26日电综合外媒报道，当地时间25日下午5时，飓风“汉娜”登陆美国得克萨斯州，将给得州带来强风暴雨、河水暴涨，还可能引发威胁生命的山洪。
HYP: Hurricane Hannah made landfall in Texas at 5 pm local time on July 25, bringing severe storms, swollen rivers and potentially life-threatening flash floods.

SRC: 国家飓风中心说，预计飓风“汉娜”会挟带暴雨，扫过得州南部与东北部部分地区，雨势或引发部分溪水暴涨以及威胁生命的山洪爆发。
HYP: The National Hurricane Center said Hurricane Hannah is expected to bring heavy rains across southern and northeastern Texas, causing some creeks to swell and life-threatening flash floods.

SRC: 报道称，受飓风“汉娜”影响最严重的是科珀斯克里斯蒂市以南到格兰德河河口地区，而里奥格兰德山谷可能爆发大范围的山洪。
HYP: Hurricane Hannah was the worst affected area south of Corpus Christi to the estuary of the Rio Grande River, while the Rio Grande Valley could see widespread flash flooding.

SRC: 得州州长阿博特25日表示：“任何飓风都是一个巨大的挑战。”
HYP: "Any hurricane is a huge challenge," Texas Governor Abbott said.

SRC: 该州有32个郡因为飓风进入灾难紧急状态。
HYP: Thirty-two counties in the state have declared a state of disaster emergency because of the hurricane.

SRC: 科珀斯克里斯蒂市这座人口超32万的城市，已关闭图书馆与博物馆，<v>居民严阵以待</v>。
HYP: Corpus Christi, a city of more than 320000 people, has closed its libraries and museums.

SRC: 科珀斯克里斯蒂市这座人口超32万的城市，已关闭图书馆与博物馆，居民严阵以待。
HYP: Corpus Christi, a city of more than 320000 people, has closed its libraries and museums.

SRC: 阿博特还说，在得州正在遭遇新冠疫情重创之际，不能再让这场飓风给得州带来更多伤亡。
HYP: Abbott also said that while the state is being hit hard by the new crown epidemic, the hurricane cannot be allowed to cause more casualties in Texas.

SRC: 据报道，得州南部地区降水量预计将在26日夜间达到6至12英寸，得克萨斯州北部地区和路易斯安那州沿海地区也将出现3至5英寸的降雨。
HYP: According to reports, southern Texas is expected to reach 6 to 12 inches of rain overnight on the 26th, and northern Texas and coastal Louisiana will also see 3 to 5 inches of rain.

SRC: 由于全球变暖等因素影响，“汉娜”的形成早于以往的大西洋飓风季。
HYP: Due to global warming and other factors, the formation of "Hannah" earlier than the previous Atlantic hurricane season.

SRC: 一般情况下，大西洋的第一场飓风通常要到8月中旬才会形成。
HYP: In general, the first hurricanes in the Atlantic do not usually form until mid-August.

SRC: 波兰将退出欧洲防止对女子施暴的条约
HYP: Poland to withdraw from European treaty to prevent violence against women

SRC: 波兰司法部星期六表示，波兰下个星期将采取步骤，退出欧洲防止对妇女施暴条约。
HYP: Poland will take steps next week to withdraw from the European Treaty on the Prevention of Violence against Women, Poland's Justice Ministry said Saturday.

SRC: 波兰右翼的政府内阁表示，该条约要求学校教授学生有关性别问题的议题，践踏了学生父母的权利。
HYP: Poland's right-wing government cabinet said the treaty, which requires schools to teach students about gender issues, tramples on the rights of parents.

SRC: 波兰司法部长焦布洛举行记者会说，他领导的司法部星期一将向劳工和家庭部提出开始退出条约的要求。
HYP: Poland's Justice Minister Giublo said at a news conference that his ministry would on Monday make a request to the Ministry of Labour and Family to start withdrawing from the treaty.

SRC: 那项条约又名伊斯坦布尔公约。
HYP: That treaty is also known as the Istanbul Convention.

SRC: 焦布洛说，“该条约包含一些我们认为是有害的意思形态性质的元素。”
HYP: "The treaty contains some elements of morphological nature that we consider harmful," said Giublo.

SRC: 波兰执政的法律与公正党及其及其执政联盟伙伴跟罗马天主教教会有密切的同盟关系，提倡保守的社会议程。
HYP: Poland's ruling Law and Justice Party and its coalition partners have close alliances with the Roman Catholic Church and advocate a conservative social agenda.

SRC: 波兰总统杜达在这个月成功的连任竞选期间将敌视同性恋权利作为主要议题之一。
HYP: Polish President Andrzej Duda has made hostility to gay rights one of the main issues during his successful re-election campaign this month.

SRC: 星期五，成千上万的波兰人(其中大部分是妇女)在华沙和其他一些城市举行反对退出公约的抗议。
HYP: On Friday, thousands of Poles, most of them women, protested in Warsaw and some other cities against withdrawing from the convention.

SRC: 抗议的组织者之一莱姆帕特在华沙举行的抗议游行中说，“退出条约的目的就是将家暴合法化”。
HYP: One of the organizers of the protest, Lempart, said at a protest march in Warsaw that "the purpose of withdrawing from the treaty is to legalize domestic violence."

SRC: 一些抗议者举着横幅，上面写着“法律与公正党是妇女的地狱”。
HYP: Some protesters held banners that read "Law and Justice is a hell for women".

SRC: 法律与公正党长久以来抱怨伊斯坦布尔公约。
HYP: Law and Justice has long complained about the Istanbul Convention.

SRC: 波兰先前的中间派执政的政府2015年批准了该公约。
HYP: Poland's previous centrist government ratified the convention in 2015.

SRC: 法律与公正党政府表示，该条约不尊重宗教，要求在学校里教授自由派的社会政策。
HYP: The Law and Justice government says the treaty does not respect religion and requires that liberal social policies be taught in schools.

SRC: 但截至目前该党一直没有决定退出该公约。
HYP: But so far the party has not decided to withdraw from the convention.

SRC: （根据路透社报道）
HYP: (according to Reuters)

SRC: <v>据越通社报道，格里沃里认为</v>，越南25年来为东盟的发展作出巨大贡献。
HYP: “Vietnam has made great contributions to ASEAN's development over the past 25 years.

SRC: 据越通社报道，格里沃里认为，越南25年来为东盟的发展作出巨大贡献。
HYP: “Vietnam has made great contributions to ASEAN's development over the past 25 years.

SRC: 越南不仅是东盟负责任的一员，更是东盟的火车头。
HYP: Vietnam is not only a responsible member of ASEAN, but also the locomotive of ASEAN.

SRC: 格里沃里表示，俄罗斯乃至亚欧经济联盟认为，越南为东盟提高其地位，对外推广其形象做出贡献。
HYP: Grivory said that Russia and the Eurasian Economic Union (EEU) believe that Vietnam has contributed to the promotion of ASEAN's status and its image abroad.

SRC: 他强调，“东盟因此应该感谢越南。”
HYP: “Asean should thank Vietnam for this,” he said.

SRC: 格里沃里表示，分析人士对越南所提出的和平倡议给予认可。
HYP: Grivori said analysts recognized Vietnam's peace initiative.

SRC: 越南愿意同东盟各国分享经验，对包括东海问题在内的亚太地区面临的问题提出建设性的和平措施。
HYP: Vietnam is willing to share its experience with ASEAN countries and propose constructive and peaceful measures on issues facing the Asia-Pacific region, including the East China Sea issue.

SRC: 关于越南与俄罗斯在东盟框架下的合作，格里沃里认为，越南为俄罗斯与东盟的合作关系提供支持，帮助俄罗斯在这一合作框架下获得利益。
HYP: Regarding the cooperation between Vietnam and Russia under the ASEAN framework, Grivory said that Vietnam supports the cooperation between Russia and ASEAN and helps Russia to benefit from this cooperation framework.

SRC: 包括俄罗斯在内的亚欧经济联盟与越南签署自贸协定后能够进军东盟市场。
HYP: The Eurasian Economic Union, including Russia, will be able to enter the ASEAN market after signing a free trade agreement with Vietnam.

SRC: 格里沃里建议最大限度扩大亚欧经济联盟与东盟各国的自由贸易区，进而创造经济和安全稳定的平台。
HYP: Grivori proposed to maximize the expansion of the Eurasian Economic Union and ASEAN countries in the free trade area, thereby creating a platform for economic and security stability.

SRC: 格里沃里同时相信，俄罗斯、越南与东盟正在步入正轨并将实现其目标。
HYP: Grivori also believes that Russia, Vietnam and ASEAN are on the right track and will achieve their goals.

SRC: 从现在到2020年底，北江省将具备必要条件，尤其是在基础设施，人力资源和土地<v>等方面</v>，以便主动迎来外资流入，特别是拥有价值链和转让先进技术的跨国集团。
HYP: Between now and the end of 2020, Bac Giang will have the necessary conditions, especially in terms of infrastructure, human resources and land, to actively welcome foreign inflows, especially for multinational groups with value chains and transfer of advanced technologies.

SRC: 从现在到2020年底，北江省将具备必要条件，尤其是在基础设施，人力资源和土地等方面，以便主动迎来外资流入，特别是拥有价值链和转让先进技术的跨国集团。
HYP: Between now and the end of 2020, Bac Giang will have the necessary conditions, especially in terms of infrastructure, human resources and land, to actively welcome foreign inflows, especially for multinational groups with value chains and transfer of advanced technologies.

SRC: 此外，北江省将办理好递交政府总理决定对越韩工业区基础设施建设与经营项目投资的主张和批准将本省安山-北陇和安闾两个工业-城市-服务业区补充列入至2020年越南工业区发展总体规划的文件。
HYP: In addition, Bac Giang province will process documents to submit to the Prime Minister's decision to invest in infrastructure construction and operation projects in Vietnam-Korea Industrial Zones and to approve the addition of the two industrial-city-service zones of Ansan-Bac Lung and Anlu in the province's master plan for the development of Vietnam's industrial zones up to 2020.

SRC: 与此同时，北江省着力加快各项目的进度，尤其是在和富、光州，双溪-内皇等工业园区集群的基础设施建设经营项目，为招商引资形成土地基金。
HYP: At the same time, Bac Giang province has made great efforts to accelerate the progress of projects, especially infrastructure construction and operation projects in industrial park clusters such as Hwaphu, Gwangju, and Sungai-Naehwang, and form land funds for investment promotion.

SRC: 在2020年内，北江省工贸局参就定工业区、工业集群规划建言献策，以纳入省规划。
HYP: In 2020, the Bureau of Industry and Trade of Bac Giang Province will participate in the planning of industrial parks and industrial clusters to provide advice and suggestions for inclusion in provincial planning.

SRC: 北江省确定将发展工业园区集群与保障国防安全，保护生态环境，保障粮食安全相结合，进而助推工业均衡发展；拥有全面的电力，供水，交通和电信等基础设施，并与城市建设，贸易服务，工人住房和医疗卫生、教育等其他社会基础设施等相结合。
HYP: Bac Giang province has decided to combine the development of industrial park clusters with safeguarding national defense security, protecting the ecological environment, and ensuring food security, thereby boosting balanced industrial development; it has comprehensive infrastructure such as electricity, water, transportation and telecommunications, combined with urban construction, trade services, workers' housing and other social infrastructure such as health care and education.

SRC: 在工业区，北江省<v>着力</v>呼吁对电力，电子，电信设备，精密机械，辅助工业等领域中的高科技，清洁技术的投资项目。
HYP: In the industrial zone, Bac Giang province has called for high-tech, clean technology investment projects in the fields of power, electronics, telecommunications equipment, precision machinery, auxiliary industries and other fields.

SRC: 在工业区，北江省着力呼吁对电力，电子，电信设备，精密机械，辅助工业等领域中的高科技，清洁技术的投资项目。
HYP: In the industrial zone, Bac Giang province has called for high-tech, clean technology investment projects in the fields of power, electronics, telecommunications equipment, precision machinery, auxiliary industries and other fields.

SRC: 在工业园区集群，该省呼吁对生产、利用就地劳动力、尤其是农产品、食品加工等领域的中小型规模投资项目。
HYP: In the cluster of industrial parks, the province called for small and medium-sized investment projects in the fields of production, utilization of local labor, especially agricultural products and food processing.

SRC: 未来，北江省将着力加快对北江市后勤物流中心的基础设施的投资，与工业园区集群同步发展，以优化货物、货币流通和有助于降低生产成本，提高货物价值，优化供应链，发展多式联运，从而为投资者投资于本省创造吸引力。
HYP: In the future, Bac Giang province will focus on accelerating investment in the infrastructure of Bac Giang's logistics and logistics center, which will be developed in parallel with the industrial park cluster to optimize the flow of goods and currency and help to reduce production costs, increase the value of goods, optimize the supply chain, and develop intermodal transportation, thus creating attractiveness for investors to invest in the province.

SRC: （德国之声中文网）过去两周内，西班牙的新冠确冠病例大幅回升，多日出现上千新增病例。
HYP: In the past two weeks, the number of confirmed cases of the new crown in Spain has rebounded sharply, with thousands of new cases in several days.

SRC: 英国政府周六（7月25日）晚间临时决定，从当地时间26日零点起，将西班牙从安全旅行名单中移除，从西班牙入境英国的人必须隔离14天。
HYP: The British government decided on Saturday night (July 25) to remove Spain from the safe travel list from 0:00 local time on the 26th, and people entering the UK from Spain must self-isolate for 14 days.

SRC: 正在西班牙度假的英国游客听闻此项决定纷纷表示惊讶、担心、甚至愤怒，因为消息突如其来，令人措手不及。
HYP: British tourists on holiday in Spain were surprised, worried and even angry when they heard about the decision.

SRC: 据报道，英国交通大臣沙普斯（Grant Shapps）目前也在西班牙度假。
HYP: Transport Secretary Grant Shapps is reportedly on holiday in Spain.

SRC: 英国发布隔离措施前，挪威也已宣布从西班牙返回挪威的人要进行为期10天的隔离。
HYP: The UK's quarantine measures came after Norway announced that people returning from Spain would be subject to a 10-day quarantine.

SRC: 法国和比利时建议本国居民放弃前方巴塞罗那以及周边地区度假的计划。
HYP: France and Belgium are advising their residents to abandon plans for a holiday in Barcelona and surrounding areas.

SRC: 这些地区的海滩人满为患，人与人之间无法保持社交距离，警察一度需要采取措施，以减少海滩游客的数量。
HYP: Beaches in these areas are overcrowded and social distancing cannot be maintained, and police at one point needed to take steps to reduce the number of beachgoers.

SRC: 旅游业是西班牙的重要支柱产业
HYP: Tourism is an important pillar industry in Spain

SRC: 西班牙：<v>这里</v>是安全的
HYP: Spain: it's safe

SRC: 西班牙：这里是安全的
HYP: Spain: it's safe

SRC: 针对英国做出的决定，西班牙外交部周日表示，该国疫情得到控制。
HYP: Spain's foreign ministry said on Sunday that the outbreak was under control in the country.

SRC: 西班牙外交部长冈萨雷斯（Arancha Gonzalez Laya）向媒体强调：" 西班牙是安全的，不仅对西班牙人而言，对游客来说也是安全的。"
HYP: Spanish Foreign Minister Arancha Gonzalez Laya said: "Spain is safe, not only for Spaniards, but also for tourists."

SRC: 西班牙政府将试图说服英国政府将巴利阿里群岛（Balearic Islands）和加那利群岛（Canary Islands）排除在隔离措施之外。
HYP: The Spanish government will try to persuade the British government to exclude the Balearic and Canary Islands from quarantine measures.

SRC: 理由是，这两个旅游胜地的感染率远低于英国本土。
HYP: The reason is that the infection rate in these two tourist destinations is much lower than in the UK.

SRC: 为防止疫情扩散，西班牙加泰罗尼亚地区也已重启"禁足令"。
HYP: In order to prevent the spread of the epidemic, Spain's Catalonia region has also resumed a "foot ban".

SRC: 旅游业是西班牙的重要支柱产业，而西班牙是最受英国游客青睐的度假地之一。
HYP: Tourism is an important pillar industry in Spain, and Spain is one of the most popular holiday destinations for British tourists.

SRC: 英国的这一决定预计将会使西班牙的旅游业大受影响。
HYP: The UK's decision is expected to have a major impact on Spain's tourism industry.

SRC: 安静/任琛（德新社，路透社）
HYP: Quiet/Ren Chen (DPA, Reuters)

SRC: 中伏首日：北京暂别高温酷暑开启降雨模式-新华网
HYP: The first day of Zhongfu: Beijing bids farewell to high temperature and heat and opens rainfall mode - Xinhua English.news.cn

SRC: 中伏首日：北京<v>暂</v>别高温酷暑开启降雨模式-新华网
HYP: The first day of Zhongfu: Beijing bids farewell to high temperature and heat and opens rainfall mode - Xinhua English.news.cn

SRC: 新华社北京7月26日<v>电</v>（记者倪元锦）7月26日是今年的“中伏”首日。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 26 (Reporter Ni Yuanjin) July 26 is the first day of this year's "Zhongfu".

SRC: 26日凌晨的大风骤雨对流天气，驱散了连日来笼罩在北京地区的高温酷暑，新一轮降雨天气将持续数日。
HYP: On the morning of the 26th, strong winds, showers and convection weather dispersed the high temperature and heat that have shrouded in Beijing for days, and a new round of rain will continue for several days.

SRC: 北京市气象台26日11时发布称，26日北京有分散性阵雨（伴有弱雷电），日最高气温仅为27℃；夜间阴有小到中雨（伴有弱雷电），夜间最低气温为23℃。
HYP: The Beijing Meteorological Observatory released at 11 o'clock on the 26th that there were scattered showers (with weak lightning) in Beijing on the 26th, and the daily maximum temperature was only 27 ° C; at night, there were light to moderate rain (with weak lightning), and the minimum night temperature was 23 ° C.

SRC: 而在<v>此前的</v>24日至25日，北京全市处在高温蓝色预警中，大部地区日最高气温在37℃左右，局地出现超过40℃的高温。
HYP: On the 24th to 25th, Beijing was in a high temperature blue warning, with the daily maximum temperature in most areas around 37 °C, and local temperatures exceeding 40 °C.

SRC: 而在此前的24日至25日，北京全市处在高温蓝色预警中，大部地区日最高气温在37℃左右，局地出现超过40℃的高温。
HYP: On the 24th to 25th, Beijing was in a high temperature blue warning, with the daily maximum temperature in most areas around 37 °C, and local temperatures exceeding 40 °C.

SRC: 伏天是一年之中气温最高、潮湿、闷热的日子，一年有“三伏”，最热在中伏，中国百姓说的“苦夏”就在此时。
HYP: Futian is the hottest, humid and sultry day of the year. There are "three volts" in the year, and the hottest is in the middle. The Chinese people say "bitter summer" at this time.

SRC: 入伏时，家家填满谷仓，民间有“一伏饺子二伏面”的说法。
HYP: When entering the Fu, every family fills the barn, and the folk have the saying of "one volt dumplings and two fu noodles".

SRC: 根据目前预报，未来三天，北京多阴雨天气。
HYP: According to the current forecast, the next three days, Beijing and more rainy weather.

SRC: 气象部门提示公众尽量减少山区游玩，谨防地质灾害。
HYP: The meteorological department advised the public to avoid mountain travel as much as possible and beware of geological disasters.

SRC: 据了解，今年的“中伏”有20天，从7月26日开始，至8月14日结束。
HYP: It is understood that this year's "Zhong Fu" has 20 days, from July 26 to August 14 end.

SRC: 进入“中伏”后，人会感到身体乏力、食欲不振。
HYP: After entering the "medium volt", people will feel tired, loss of appetite.

SRC: 饮食上可选择绿豆、薏仁等具有清热解暑、健脾开胃作用的食物，以及苦菜、苦瓜等苦味食物，可有助于增进食欲、祛除暑气。
HYP: Dietary choice of mung beans, barley and other heat-relieving, spleen appetizer of food, as well as bitter herbs, bitter gourd and other bitter foods, can help increase appetite, eliminate summer heat.

SRC: 《叮咚上线!老师好》下周上线薛兆丰领衔“知识发起人-新华网
HYP: "Ding Dong on the line! Teacher is good" on the line next week Xue Zhaofeng led "knowledge initiator" - Xinhua English.news.cn

SRC: 又有新综艺上线。
HYP: A new show is online.

SRC: 互动知识分享节目《叮咚上线!老师好》,将于7月20日起在湖南卫视播出。
HYP: The interactive knowledge sharing program "Ding Dong is online! Teacher is good" will be broadcast on Hunan Satellite TV on July 20.

SRC: 据了解,节目将打造全新的全年龄青春课堂,一批有颜有型又有才的老师将上阵,挑战趣味性知识输出。
HYP: It is understood that the program will create a new all-age youth classroom, and a group of talented and talented teachers will go into battle to challenge the output of interesting knowledge.

SRC: 与以往老师群体在大众心中的严肃印象不同,《叮咚上线!老师好》集结的是一群颜值和才华兼具的知识代表。
HYP: Different from the serious impression of the teacher group in the minds of the public in the past, "Ding Dong is online! Teacher is good" is a group of knowledge representatives with both face value and talent.

SRC: 他们既是来自各学科的青年知识榜样,还是一群会抖包袱、擅长寓教于乐的全能“段子手”。
HYP: They are not only young knowledge models from various disciplines, but also a group of all-round "duanzis" who can shake their burdens and are good at entertaining.

SRC: 节目中,这群优秀青年知识榜样作为“知识分享官”,将要挑战趣味性的知识课堂。
HYP: In the program, this group of outstanding young knowledge models, as "knowledge sharing officers", will challenge the interesting knowledge classroom.

SRC: 他们需要通过有态度的知识输出,展现所在学科最有趣的一面,来打动在场的观众。
HYP: They need to impress the audience by showing the most interesting aspects of their disciplines through the attitude of knowledge output.

SRC: 而全年龄观众组成的“有道问问团”现场会提出百变问题,给“知识分享官”的授课提高难度,也给节目增添些许刺激的氛围。
HYP: The "Youdao Asking Group" composed of audiences of all ages will raise various questions on the spot, which will make the teaching of the "Knowledge Sharing Officer" more difficult and add a little stimulating atmosphere to the program.

SRC: 据透露,此次“知识分享官”中有中国人民大学附属中学物理教师李永乐、考研指导名师张雪峰以及拥有十年从业经验的历史教师王磊等优秀青年教师,他们将以意想不到的方式向现场观众展现各个学科的“硬核”知识。
HYP: According to reports, there are outstanding young teachers such as Li Yongle, a physics teacher in the Middle School Affiliated to Renmin University of China, Zhang Xuefeng, a famous postgraduate instructor, and Wang Lei, a history teacher with ten years of experience.

SRC: 另外,节目还邀请经济学教授薛兆丰作为节目的“知识发起人”,联合“叮咚助教”杜海涛和靳梦佳,与观众畅谈青春,打造“全民青春公开课”。
HYP: In addition, the program also invited economics professor Xue Zhaofeng as the "knowledge initiator" of the program, together with "Dingdong Assistant" Du Haitao and Jin Mengjia, to talk about youth with the audience and create a "National Youth Open Class".

SRC: 香港特区政府政务司司长：形势严峻<v>全力抗疫-中新网</v>
HYP: Chief Secretary for Administration of the Hong Kong SAR Government: The situation is grim

SRC: 新华社香港7月26日电香港特区政府政务司司长张建宗26日表示，香港新冠肺炎疫情形势持续严峻，若疫情转坏，特区政府将果断采取更严厉管控措施，进一步限制经营场所营业和减少市民外出空间。
HYP: HONG KONG, July 26 (Xinhua) -- The Hong Kong Special Administrative Region (HKSAR) Government's Chief Secretary for Administration Zhang Jianzong said on the 26th that the situation of the new crown pneumonia epidemic in Hong Kong continues to be severe.

SRC: 但现阶段特区政府无意推出“居家令”或“禁足令”限制市民外出。
HYP: However, at this stage, the government has no intention of introducing a “stay-at-home order” or a “confinement order” to restrict people from going out.

SRC: 张建宗当日发表题为《形势严峻全力抗疫》的网志。
HYP: On the same day, Zhang Jianzong published a blog titled "The Situation is Serious and Fight the Epidemic".

SRC: 他表示，这一波疫情是半年以来最严峻的，未来两星期将会十分关键，要尽力防止病毒在社区进一步扩散。
HYP: He said the outbreak was the worst in six months and the next two weeks would be critical to try to prevent further spread of the virus in the community.

SRC: 除了特区政府采取必要措施之外，<v>市民</v>自律和配合也非常重要。
HYP: Apart from the necessary measures taken by the SAR Government, self-discipline and cooperation are also very important.

SRC: 他呼吁市民务必尽量留在家中，减少社交接触和外出用餐。
HYP: He urged the public to stay at home as much as possible, reduce social contact and eat out.

SRC: 市民应配合佩戴口罩的强制措施保护自己及他人，并注重个人和环境卫生及勤洗手，更应暂停非必要的亲友聚会或聚餐及减少到街市。
HYP: Members of the public should cooperate with the mandatory measures of wearing masks to protect themselves and others, pay attention to personal and environmental hygiene and wash hands frequently.

SRC: 他表示，中央一直十分关心香港疫情变化及支持特区政府防疫抗疫工作，并积极回应行政长官最新要求，在加大检测能力和改装亚洲国际博览馆为类似“方舱医院”的工作上提供协助。
HYP: He said that the central government has always been very concerned about the changes in the epidemic situation in Hong Kong and supported the SAR government's anti-epidemic work.

SRC: 张建宗表示，特区政府为特定高风险群组，即安老院舍、残疾院舍及护养院员工、餐厅员工、出租车司机和物业管理员工提供的免费病毒检测已全面展开，涉及人数多达40万。
HYP: Cheung Kin-chung said that the free virus tests provided by the SAR Government for specific high-risk groups, namely RCHEs, residential care homes for the disabled and nursing home staff, restaurant staff, taxi drivers and property management staff, have been fully implemented, involving up to 400000 people.

SRC: 他十分关注出现在安老院舍的感染个案，特区政府已为安老院舍院友安排特定的临时检疫中心。
HYP: He is very concerned about the cases of infection in RCHEs. The SAR Government has arranged specific temporary quarantine centres for RCHE residents.

SRC: 他表示，特区政府正在位于新界大屿山的竹篙湾检疫中心附近兴建隔离检疫设施，预计可在9月底前提供额外700套隔离房。
HYP: He said the SAR Government is building an isolation and quarantine facility near the Penny Bay Quarantine Centre on Lantau Island in the New Territories, which is expected to provide an additional 700 isolation rooms by the end of September.

SRC: 行政长官也在19日宣布，特区政府将在竹篙湾检疫中心多兴建2000间隔离房，并争取于今年年底前落成。
HYP: The Chief Executive also announced on the 19th that the SAR Government will build an additional 2000 isolation rooms at the Penny Bay Quarantine Centre and strive to complete it by the end of this year.

SRC: 加上该隔离检疫中心已经投入使用的800间，年底前竹篙湾检疫中心预计可提供共3500间隔离房。
HYP: Together with the 800 units that have been put into use, Penny Bay Quarantine Centre is expected to provide a total of 3500 isolation rooms by the end of the year.

SRC: 香港目前共有四个正在运作的隔离检疫中心，共提供约2600间隔离房。
HYP: There are currently four operating quarantine centres in Hong Kong, providing a total of about 2600 isolation rooms.

SRC: 此外，特区政府于24日重新启用位于香港岛的鲤鱼门公园度假村作为社区隔离设施，用于收治50岁以下有独立自理能力的患者。
HYP: In addition, the SAR Government reopened the Lei Yue Mun Park Resort on Hong Kong Island on the 24th as a community isolation facility for patients under the age of 50 who are able to take care of themselves.

SRC: 美国首次以“<v>人民币汇率低估</v>”对中国展开反补贴调查
HYP: US launches first anti-subsidy investigation against China

SRC: 针对美国商务部近日宣布，决定对原产于中国的扎带（束线带）产品发起反倾销反补贴调查，并就“人民币汇率低估“项目发起调查。
HYP: The US Department of Commerce recently announced that it decided to launch an anti-dumping and countervailing investigation on cable ties originating in China, and launched an investigation into the "undervaluation of the RMB exchange rate" project.

SRC: 中国商务部指出，这是美国首次在反补贴案件中立案调查所谓”人民币汇率低估“项目，中方对此坚决反对。
HYP: China's Ministry of Commerce pointed out that this is the first time that the United States has filed a case in a countervailing case to investigate the so-called "undervalued RMB exchange rate" project.

SRC: 中国商务部23日晚间特别就此发布新闻稿表示，中国实行以市场供求为基础、参考一篮子货币进行调节、有管理的浮动汇率制度，市场在汇率形成中起决定性作用。
HYP: The Chinese Ministry of Commerce issued a press release on the evening of the 23rd, saying that China implements a managed floating exchange rate system based on market supply and demand, with reference to a basket of currencies, and the market plays a decisive role in the formation of the exchange rate.

SRC: 新闻稿强调，总体上，人民币汇率处于合理均衡水平，并没有被低估。
HYP: The press release emphasizes that, in general, the RMB exchange rate is at a reasonable and balanced level and is not undervalued.

SRC: 自2005年以来，人民币对美元已累计升值超过17% 。
HYP: Since 2005, the renminbi has appreciated more than 17% against the US dollar.

SRC: 根据国际清算银行公布的数据，2005年初至2020年5月，人民币名目有效汇率升值38%，实际有效汇率升值49%，是G20经济体中最强势的货币，在全球范围内也是升值幅度最大的货币之一。
HYP: According to data released by the Bank for International Settlements, from the beginning of 2005 to May 2020, the RMB appreciated by 38% in nominal effective exchange rate and 49% in real effective exchange rate.

SRC: 商务部指出，汇率问题超出了成员按照世界贸易组织规则进行反补贴调查的权限。
HYP: The Ministry of Commerce pointed out that the exchange rate issue is beyond the competence of members to conduct countervailing investigations under WTO rules.

SRC: 美国今年2月修改法规以对别国汇率进行反补贴调查，已涉嫌违反世贸组织WTO规则，受到多方面反对。
HYP: The United States in February this year amended regulations to carry out countervailing investigations on other countries' exchange rates, has been suspected of violating WTO rules, has been opposed by many sides.

SRC: 新闻稿称，即使按照美国法规，申请人的申诉内容也存在大量错误，不具备财政资助、利益授予和专向性等反补贴必备要素。
HYP: According to the press release, even under US regulations, the applicant's complaint contains a large number of errors and does not have the necessary countervailing elements such as financial assistance, benefit grant and specificity.

SRC: 中方敦促美方遵守现有国际规则，停止对所谓“人民币汇率低估”进行反补贴调查。
HYP: China urges the US to abide by existing international rules and stop conducting countervailing investigations on the so-called "undervaluation of the RMB."

SRC: 受中美关系紧张情势进一步升高影响，离岸、在岸人民币对美元汇率22日盘中一度大贬，双双跌破1美元兑人民币7.0元关口。
HYP: Affected by the further escalation of Sino-US tensions, the offshore and onshore yuan exchange rates against the US dollar fell sharply on the 22nd, and both fell below the 7.0 yuan per dollar mark.

SRC: 美国商务部此举是否意在逼升人民币值得关注。
HYP: Whether the US Commerce Department's move is intended to force up the yuan is worth watching.

SRC: 人民币对美元即期汇价23日升破7.0大关，收在6.9961。
HYP: The spot exchange rate of the RMB against the US dollar rose above the 7.0 mark on the 23rd to close at 6.9961.

SRC: 受官方调控的人民币对美元汇率中间价，24日下调17个基本点，报6.9938。
HYP: The central parity of the renminbi against the US dollar, which is subject to official control, fell 17 basis points on the 24th to 6.9938.

SRC: 26日是菲律宾总统杜特尔特发表任内第五份国情咨文(SONA)前一日，当天菲律宾累计确诊新冠肺炎病例过8万，其中总统府新闻部(PCOO)及其直属机构职员确诊数增到25例。
HYP: On the 26th, the day before President Rodrigo Duterte delivered his fifth State of the Union (SONA) address, the total number of confirmed cases of new coronary pneumonia in the Philippines on the same day exceeded 80000, of which the number of employees of the Presidential Office of Information (PCOO) and its direct agencies increased to 25.

SRC: 为此，PCOO已专门准备一个未接触过确诊职员的工作组，配合杜特尔特总统发表SONA的新闻发布工作。
HYP: To this end, the PCOO has prepared a task force that has not been in contact with the infected staff to cooperate with President Rodrigo Duterte's press release on SONA.

SRC: PCOO部长马丁·安达纳尔26日接受DZBB电台采访表示，已为杜特尔特总统发表SONA方式预备两套方案。
HYP: PCOO Secretary Martin Andanar said in an interview with DZBB radio on the 26th that two sets of proposals have been prepared for President Duterte's SONA approach.

SRC: 按A计划，杜特尔特27日下午将在位于奎松市的菲律宾国会(Batasang Pambansa)大楼发表SONA。
HYP: According to Plan A, Duterte will deliver the SONA at the Batasang Pambansa Building in Quezon City this afternoon.

SRC: 因为疫情原因，现场只为部分政府内阁成员和立法者安排50个席位，另专设视频会议室供其他内阁成员、地方政府官员等观看。
HYP: Due to the epidemic, only 50 seats were arranged for some government cabinet members and legislators, and a video conference room was set up for other cabinet members and local government officials to watch.

SRC: 所有参会人员当天通过快速检测才能进入国会大楼。
HYP: All participants will be allowed to enter the Capitol building on the same day through rapid testing.

SRC: 一旦参会者有一人检测呈阳性，即启动B计划，即杜特尔特总统在总统府马拉卡南宫发表SONA，现场则安排更少的听会席位。
HYP: Once one of the participants tests positive, Plan B will be launched, in which President Rodrigo Duterte will deliver the SONA at the Malacañang Palace, with fewer seats for the hearing.

SRC: 按照惯例，SONA将实时向菲全国直播。
HYP: As is customary, SONA will broadcast live to the whole country in real time.

SRC: 截至发稿时，菲总统府尚未确认杜特尔特的家人是否会出席SONA。
HYP: As of press time, Malacañang has not confirmed whether Duterte's family will attend SONA.

SRC: 安达纳尔说，杜特尔特总统的SONA，将重点说明政府将如何带领菲律宾应对新冠肺炎疫情、恢复社会经济生活；还会提到他上任时的承诺，即反政府腐败、打击非法毒品和减贫。
HYP: President Rodrigo Duterte's SONA will focus on how the government will lead the Philippines in tackling the COVID-19 pandemic and restoring socio-economic life, Andanar said, referring to his commitments when he took office to fight government corruption, fight illicit drugs and reduce poverty.

SRC: 杜特尔特还将说明本届政府的其他计划，包括创造更多的就业机会、振兴经济、促进教育，以及帮助在疫情中受难的海外菲律宾劳工等。
HYP: Duterte will also outline other plans of the administration, including creating more jobs, revitalizing the economy, promoting education, and helping overseas Filipino workers who have suffered during the pandemic.

SRC: 深圳就出台健康条例公开征求意见-新华网
HYP: Shenzhen seeks public comments on health regulations - Xinhua English.news.cn

SRC: 新华社深圳7月26日电（记者毛思倩、白瑜）鼓励居民勤做体检，及早发现问题；禁止向未成年人销售酒精饮料；建立网络游戏健康审查制度；<v>用人单位要配备专兼职健康管理人员…… 日前《深圳经济特区健康条例（征求意见稿）》正式发布，深圳居民将有自己的“健康法”。</v>
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Shenzhen, July 26 (Reporters Mao Siqian, Bai Yu) Encourage residents to do physical examinations to detect problems early; prohibit the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors; establish a health review system for online games;

SRC: 新华社深圳7月26日电（记者毛思倩、白瑜）鼓励居民勤做体检，及早发现问题；禁止向未成年人销售酒精饮料；建立网络游戏健康审查制度；用人单位要配备专兼职健康管理人员…… 日前《深圳经济特区健康条例（征求意见稿）》正式发布，深圳居民将有自己的“健康法”。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Shenzhen, July 26 (Reporters Mao Siqian, Bai Yu) Encourage residents to do physical examinations to detect problems early; prohibit the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors; establish a health review system for online games;

SRC: 为了鼓励居民勤做体检，及早发现问题，上述征求意见稿提出，卫生健康部门应当根据不同年龄、职业等因素制定健康体检项目基本目录。
HYP: In order to encourage residents to take physical examinations frequently and detect problems early, the above-mentioned draft proposes that the health and health departments should formulate a basic catalogue of health examination items according to different ages, occupations and other factors.

SRC: 属于健康体检项目基本目录范围内的健康体检费用，按照每人每年一次的标准由社会医疗保险统筹基金支付。
HYP: The medical examination fees within the scope of the basic catalogue of health examination items shall be paid by the social medical insurance pooling fund at the rate of once per person per year.

SRC: 征求意见稿明确，用人单位应当合理配置人力资源，安排员工作息时间，对脑力和体力劳动负荷较重的员工，实行轮休制度，避免对员工健康造成人体机能过度损耗或者身心健康伤害，同时严格执行员工带薪休假制度。
HYP: The Draft for Comments clearly states that employers shall reasonably allocate human resources, arrange employees' work and rest time, and implement a rotation system for employees with heavy mental and physical workloads to avoid excessive loss of human body functions or physical and mental health injuries to employees' health. At the same time, strictly implement the paid leave system for employees.

SRC: 此外，用人单位要配备专兼职健康管理人员，并定期组织开展员工健康体检。
HYP: In addition, the employer should have full-time and part-time health management personnel, and organize regular health examinations for employees.

SRC: 在未成年人身心健康方面，征求意见稿提出，禁止向未成年人销售酒精饮料，同时对酒精饮料的售卖<v>位置</v>进行了限制，对于违反规定的，将由市场监督管理部门责令改正，处3万元罚款。
HYP: In terms of the physical and mental health of minors, the draft proposes that the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors is prohibited, and at the same time, the sale of alcoholic beverages is restricted. For those who violate the provisions, the market supervision and management department will order corrections and impose a fine of 30000 yuan.

SRC: 在未成年人身心健康方面，征求意见稿提出，禁止向未成年人销售酒精饮料，同时对酒精饮料的售卖位置进行了限制，对于违反规定的，将由市场监督管理部门责令改正，处3万元罚款。
HYP: In terms of the physical and mental health of minors, the draft proposes that the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors is prohibited, and at the same time, the sale of alcoholic beverages is restricted. For those who violate the provisions, the market supervision and management department will order corrections and impose a fine of 30000 yuan.

SRC: 除了“禁酒” ，未成年人也要“多运动” 。
HYP: In addition to "prohibition", minors should also "more exercise."

SRC: 除了“<v>禁酒</v>” ，未成年人也要“多运动” 。
HYP: In addition to "prohibition", minors should also "more exercise."

SRC: 根据征求意见稿要求，学校要每天安排学生体育活动时间一小时以上。
HYP: According to the requirements of the draft, the school should arrange more than one hour of physical activity for students every day.

SRC: 对于网络游戏，公安、文化广电旅游体育、网络监管、卫生健康等部门应当完善互联网上网服务营业场所健康监管制度，建立网络游戏健康审查制度，为促进青少年健康成长营造良好的交往空间、交往文化。
HYP: For online games, the departments of public security, culture, radio, television, tourism and sports, network supervision, health and health shall improve the health supervision system of Internet access service business places, establish a health review system for online games, and create a good communication space and communication culture for promoting the healthy growth of adolescents.

SRC: 此外，征求意见稿还提出流感病人出入公共场所必须戴口罩，医疗卫生机构未经同意泄露病人隐私罚款2万元等。
HYP: In addition, the draft also proposes that influenza patients must wear masks when entering and exiting public places, and medical and health institutions will be fined 20000 yuan for leaking patients' privacy without consent.

SRC: 值得注意的是，除了居民的身心健康外，征求意见稿还要求，深圳各部门在制定涉及城市空间规划与建设、工业园区规划与建设、资源开发利用与生态环境保护、生物医药产业发展等规划、规范性文件以及批准重大建设工程和实施重大公共服务项目前，应当评估公共政策实施对人群健康的影响。
HYP: It is worth noting that in addition to the physical and mental health of residents, the Draft also requires that all departments in Shenzhen should assess the impact of public policy implementation on population health before formulating plans and normative documents involving urban spatial planning and construction, industrial park planning and construction, resource development and utilization and ecological environmental protection, and biomedical industry development, as well as approving major construction projects and implementing major public service projects.

SRC: 未经评估或者经评估将对城市公共卫生或者居民健康产生较严重不利影响的，不得制定出台或者批准实施。
HYP: Where it has not been evaluated or will have a more serious adverse impact on urban public health or residents' health, it shall not be formulated or approved for implementation.

SRC: 可可西里藏羚羊进入回迁季-新华网
HYP: Tibetan antelope in Hoh Xil enter relocation season - Xinhua English.news.cn
