HYP: It is reported that the addition of the "nuclear bomb" element in the second part also makes the challenge faced by the bomb disposal experts more difficult.

SRC: 据悉,第二部中“核弹”元素的加入,也让此次拆弹专家面临的挑战更为艰难,预告里几个惊鸿一瞥的镜头,已令人心悬一线,大爆炸的蘑菇云,被火光吞没的机场,场面相当震撼。
HYP: It is reported that the addition of the "nuclear bomb" element in the second part also makes the challenge faced by the bomb disposal experts more difficult.

SRC: 三年前,由原班人马制作出品的《拆弹专家》,斩获了当年的五一档票房冠军,并在香港电影金像奖拿下了7项提名,邱礼涛×刘德华也成为观众心目中的金牌搭档。
HYP: Three years ago, the bomb disposal expert produced by the original team won the May 1 box office champion of the year and won 7 nominations at the Hong Kong Film Awards. Qiu Litao × Andy Lau also became the gold medal partner in the minds of the audience.

SRC: 此次的《拆弹专家2》,也令人再次期待这对王牌组合能否擦出新火花。
HYP: The "bomb disposal experts 2", but also once again look forward to this pair of ace combination can rub off new sparks.

SRC: 《拆弹专家2》讲述了全新的故事:前拆弹专家潘乘风(刘德华饰)晕倒在爆炸案现场,被警方列为嫌疑犯。
HYP: The bomb disposal expert 2 tells a brand new story: Pan Chengfeng (Andy Lau), a former bomb disposal expert, faints at the scene of the explosion and is listed as a suspect by the police.

SRC: 为了寻找真相,他不得不向同是拆弹专家的好友董卓文(刘青云饰)求助。
HYP: In order to find out the truth, he has to ask his friend Dong Zhuowen (Liu Qingyun), who is also a bomb disposal expert, for help.

SRC: 急于破案的女督查,也同时是潘乘风前女友的庞玲(倪妮饰)也被卷入其中。
HYP: The female inspector who is eager to solve the case and Pang Ling (Ni Ni), who is also Pan Chengfeng's ex-girlfriend, is also involved.

SRC: 依然是拆弹专家,但从定档预告中能感受到刘德华新角色的复杂:断了一条腿,戴上了义肢,一边被同是拆弹专家的刘青云追捕,一边又被前女友倪妮指挥行动。
HYP: He is still a bomb disposal expert, but he can feel the complexity of Andy Lau's new role from the preview of the file: he broke a leg, put on a prosthesis, while being chased by Liu Qingyun, who is also a bomb disposal expert, while being directed by his ex-girlfriend Ni Ni.

SRC: 三人究竟是怎样的关系,刘德华到底在香岛酒店做了什么,被牵扯到怎样的案件中,他拆弹专家的职业生涯又经历了哪些波折,种种谜团让人好奇不已。
HYP: What is the relationship between the three, what did Andy Lau do in the Xiangdao Hotel, what kind of cases were involved, and what twists and turns did his bomb disposal expert's career have experienced, all kinds of mysteries are curious.

SRC: 据了解,电影的重头戏都是实地取景香港的世界地标性建筑,加上顶尖的特效制作团队,带来震撼逼真的视觉冲击。
HYP: It is understood that the highlight of the film is the scene of Hong Kong's world landmarks, coupled with the top special effects production team, bringing shocking and realistic visual impact.

SRC: （记者聂青）
HYP: (Reporter Nie Qing)

SRC: <v>中新网7月26日电综合俄罗斯卫星网报道</v>，7月26日是俄罗斯海军日，庆祝海军日的主要阅兵式在圣彼得堡和喀琅施塔得举行。
HYP: Russia's Navy Day is celebrated on July 26, with military parades in Saint Petersburg and Kronstadt.

SRC: 俄罗斯总统、俄联邦武装力量最高统帅普京抵达喀琅施塔得参加庆祝活动，该地15艘舰艇和潜艇接受了检阅。
HYP: Russian President Vladimir Putin, Supreme Commander of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation, arrived in Kronstadt to attend the celebrations, where 15 ships and submarines were inspected.

SRC: 当地时间2019年7月28日，俄罗斯圣彼得堡举行盛大阅兵式庆祝海军节。
HYP: On July 28, 2019 local time, a grand military parade was held to celebrate the Navy Day in Saint Petersburg, Russia.

SRC: 据报道，普京向海军官兵祝贺海军日，并乘小艇在芬兰湾上从将要参加海上阅兵的舰艇旁边驶过，随后在主观礼台检阅受阅部队。
HYP: According to reports, Putin congratulated the navy officers and soldiers on the Navy Day, and sailed by a small boat in the Gulf of Finland next to the ships that will participate in the sea parade, and then reviewed the troops at the main ceremonial platform.

SRC: 普京表示，俄海军舰队列装了最新式的舰艇和特殊装备，装备水平不断提高。
HYP: Putin said that the Russian naval fleet is equipped with the latest ships and special equipment, and the equipment level is constantly improving.

SRC: 普京在俄罗斯海军日的阅兵式上说：“俄罗斯海军舰队拥有配备了高精武器的军舰、战略潜水巡洋舰和多用途潜艇、最新式飞机等飞行器、独特的武器和特殊装备。”
HYP: "The Russian naval fleet has warships equipped with high-precision weapons, strategic diving cruisers and multi-purpose submarines, aircraft such as the latest aircraft, unique weapons and special equipment," Putin said at a military parade on Russian Navy Day.

SRC: 当地时间6月24日，俄罗斯纪念卫国战争胜利75周年红场阅兵式举行。
HYP: On June 24, local time, Russia held a military parade on Red Square to commemorate the 75th anniversary of the victory of the Great Patriotic War.

SRC: 他还表示，俄海军舰队将靠数字化和有效防御手段来取得独特优势。
HYP: He also said that the Russian naval fleet will rely on digitalization and effective defense means to achieve a unique advantage.

SRC: 报道称，庆祝俄罗斯海军日的主要海军阅兵式在圣彼得堡和喀琅施塔得举行，共有46艘舰艇参加，包括“卡萨托诺夫上将”号护卫舰、“海军中将库拉科夫”号大型反潜舰，以及大型登陆舰、小型导弹舰、护卫舰、潜艇等。
HYP: The main naval parades celebrating Russian Navy Day were held in St. Petersburg and Kronstadt, with 46 ships participating, including the frigate Admiral Kasatonov, the large anti-submarine ship Admiral Kulakov, as well as large landing ships, small missile ships, frigates and submarines.

SRC: <v>报道称</v>，庆祝俄罗斯海军日的主要海军阅兵式在圣彼得堡和喀琅施塔得举行，共有46艘舰艇参加，包括“卡萨托诺夫上将”号护卫舰、“海军中将库拉科夫”号大型反潜舰，以及大型登陆舰、小型导弹舰、护卫舰、潜艇等。
HYP: The main naval parades celebrating Russian Navy Day were held in St. Petersburg and Kronstadt, with 46 ships participating, including the frigate Admiral Kasatonov, the large anti-submarine ship Admiral Kulakov, as well as large landing ships, small missile ships, frigates and submarines.

SRC: 其中，系列舰艇在圣彼得堡冬宫桥旁进行静态展示，其中最引人瞩目的是经过复制的18世纪初俄罗斯首艘战列舰“波尔塔瓦”号。
HYP: Among them, a series of ships are statically displayed next to the Hermitage Bridge in St. Petersburg, the most eye-catching of which is a replica of the first Russian battleship of the early 18th century, Poltava.

SRC: 为避免新冠病毒传播，今年海军阅兵式期间只有当地居民和特邀来宾能够进入喀琅施塔得。
HYP: In order to avoid the spread of the new crown virus, only local residents and special guests will be allowed to enter Kronstadt during the naval parade this year.

SRC: 每年7月最后一个星期日是俄罗斯海军日。
HYP: The last Sunday of July is Russian Navy Day.

SRC: 中新网重庆7月26日电(记者刘贤)重庆市发展和改革委员会26日发布消息称，该市截至目前已退捕渔民4404人，占全部涉及渔民的42.54% 。
HYP: China News Service, Chongqing, July 26 (Reporter Liu Xian) Chongqing Municipal Development and Reform Commission announced on the 26th that the city has so far returned 4404 fishermen, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.

SRC: 今年53岁的李代国接受中新网记者采访时说，爷爷<v>辈</v>就在龙溪河打鱼，自己11岁起就跟着父亲打鱼，摇着小船，沿着龙溪河前行，上到重庆梁平，下到长寿，每次一离开家就是十天半个月，靠打鱼维持家人生活。
HYP: Li Daiguo, 53, said in an interview with Chinanews.com that his grandfather had fished in the Longxi River. Since the age of 11, he had followed his father to fish, rocking a boat, moving along the Longxi River, up to Liangping, Chongqing, down to longevity, every time he left home for ten days and a half months, relying on fishing to support his family.

SRC: 今年53岁的李代国接受中新网记者采访时说，爷爷辈就在龙溪河打鱼，自己11岁起就跟着父亲打鱼，摇着小船，沿着龙溪河前行，上到重庆梁平，下到长寿，每次一离开家就是十天半个月，靠打鱼维持家人生活。
HYP: Li Daiguo, 53, said in an interview with Chinanews.com that his grandfather had fished in the Longxi River. Since the age of 11, he had followed his father to fish, rocking a boat, moving along the Longxi River, up to Liangping, Chongqing, down to longevity, every time he left home for ten days and a half months, relying on fishing to support his family.

SRC: 但从1997年起，随着农村人口逐渐往场镇里涌，高安场镇里的居民越来越多，造成的环境污染也越来越严重。
HYP: However, since 1997, as the rural population gradually swarmed into the town, the number of residents in the town of Gao'anchang has become more and more serious, and the environmental pollution caused by it has become more and more serious.

SRC: 龙溪河沿线修建了造纸厂、化工厂、养殖场，也污染河水。
HYP: Paper mills, chemical plants and farms have been built along the Longxi River, which also pollute the river.

SRC: 到2007年、2008年，龙溪河变成臭水沟。
HYP: By 2007 and 2008, the Longxi River became a stinking ditch.

SRC: “捕上来的鱼鳞片都是黑的，剖开后里面也是黑的。”
HYP: "The scales of the fish that were caught were black, and the inside was black when they were cut."

SRC: 李代国说，河水污染后打鱼越来越困难。
HYP: Li Daiguo said that fishing after the river pollution is becoming more and more difficult.

SRC: 当地开始下大力气治理龙溪河污染，包括清漂、巡河、水生资源管护等。
HYP: Local efforts began to make great efforts to control Longxi River pollution, including drifting, river patrol, aquatic resources management and protection.

SRC: 李代国也从渔民退捕转产，成为巡河队的一员，管护水生资源。
HYP: Li Daiguo also retired from the fishermen to change production and became a member of the river patrol team to manage and protect aquatic resources.

SRC: 从2020年1月1日起，重庆市水生生物保护区以及主城区相关水域已实行全面禁<v>捕</v>。
HYP: From January 1, 2020, the aquatic life reserve and related waters in the main urban area of Chongqing have been completely banned.

SRC: 从2020年1月1日起，重庆<v>市</v>水生生物保护区以及主城区相关水域已实行全面禁捕。
HYP: From January 1, 2020, the aquatic life reserve and related waters in the main urban area of Chongqing have been completely banned.

SRC: 据重庆市发展改革委数据，截至目前，重庆市已累计退捕渔船3403艘、已签订退捕协议渔船4643艘，分别占三年总任务的63.3% 、 86.3% 。
HYP: According to the data of Chongqing Municipal Development and Reform Commission, up to now, Chongqing has accumulatively retired 3403 fishing vessels and 4643 fishing vessels have signed withdrawal agreements, accounting for 63.3% and 86.3% of the total tasks of the three years.

SRC: 已退捕渔民4404人，占全部涉及渔民的42.54% 。
HYP: 4404 fishermen have been repatriated, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.

SRC: 已退捕4404人中，实现就业4267人，占已退捕渔民的96.89% 。
HYP: Among the 4404 people who have been recaptured, 4267 people have been employed, accounting for 96.89% of the fishermen who have been recaptured.

SRC: 养老保险保障覆盖2691人，占退捕渔民的61.10% 。
HYP: Endowment insurance coverage covers 2691 people, accounting for 61.10% of fishermen returning from fishing.

SRC: 下一步，重庆市将深入开展各专项整治行动，加快推进长江干流岸线利用项目清理整治，完成新一轮长江入河排污口普查并开展相应整治行动，基本完成“三磷” ( 指磷矿、磷化工和磷石膏库)整治任务、小水电清理整改工作，推进长江两岸造林绿化专项行动，强化绿色矿山建设，巩固长江干流非法码头、非法采砂专项整治成果，深入推进长江流域禁捕退捕工作。
HYP: In the next step, Chongqing will carry out various special rectification actions, accelerate the clean-up and rectification of the shoreline utilization projects of the Yangtze River, complete a new round of census of sewage outlets into the Yangtze River and carry out corresponding rectification actions, basically complete the "three phosphorus" (referring to phosphate rock, phosphate chemical and phosphogypsum reservoirs) rectification tasks, small hydropower clean-up and rectification.

SRC: 下一步，重庆市将深入开展各专项整治行动，加快推进长江干流岸线利用项目清理整治，完成新一轮长江入河排污口普查并开展相应整治行动，基本完成“三磷” ( 指磷矿、磷化工和磷石膏库)整治任务、小水电清理整改工作，<v>推进长江两岸造林绿化专项行动，强化绿色矿山建设，巩固长江干流非法码头、非法采砂专项整治成果，深入推进长江流域禁捕退捕工作</v>。
HYP: In the next step, Chongqing will carry out various special rectification actions, accelerate the clean-up and rectification of the shoreline utilization projects of the Yangtze River, complete a new round of census of sewage outlets into the Yangtze River and carry out corresponding rectification actions, basically complete the "three phosphorus" (referring to phosphate rock, phosphate chemical and phosphogypsum reservoirs) rectification tasks, small hydropower clean-up and rectification.

SRC: 新华社香港7月25日电香港特区政府财经事务及库务局局长许正宇表示，香港的金融市场仍保持活跃、运作有序。
HYP: HONG KONG, July 25 (Xinhua) -- The Secretary for Financial Services and the Treasury of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region (HKSAR), Mr Hui Ching-yu, said that Hong Kong's financial market remained active and operated in an orderly manner.

SRC: 他对香港金融稳定及经济表示乐观。
HYP: He expressed optimism about Hong Kong's financial stability and economy.

SRC: 许正宇在香港驻多伦多经济贸易办事处及港加商会（加拿大总会）24日（多伦多时间）合办的网上研讨会上表示，香港因为“修例风波”和新冠肺炎疫情，经历着艰难的状况。
HYP: Xu Zhengyu said at a webinar co-organized by the Hong Kong Economic and Trade Office in Toronto and the Hong Kong-Canada Chamber of Commerce (Canada Federation) on the 24th (Toronto time) that Hong Kong is going through a difficult situation because of the "revision storm" and the new crown pneumonia epidemic.

SRC: 港元汇价稳定并偏向强方兑换保证水平。
HYP: The Hong Kong dollar exchange rate is stable and biased towards the strong-side convertibility guarantee level.

SRC: 银行体系没有明显的资金流出迹象，相反，自6月以来超过110亿美元资金流入。
HYP: There are no clear signs of outflows from the banking system, instead, more than $11 billion has flowed in since June.

SRC: 银行的存款总额在过去几个月也持续增加，股票市场有一连串公开招股集资活动，市场成交屡见上升。
HYP: Total bank deposits have also continued to increase over the past few months, and there has been a flurry of public offerings in the stock market, with market turnover rising on a regular basis.

SRC: 许正宇说，新冠肺炎疫情为全球经济及金融市场带来压力，但香港的基本优势仍然保持不变。
HYP: Hui said the COVID-19 pandemic has put pressure on the global economy and financial markets, but Hong Kong's fundamental strengths remain intact.

SRC: 香港拥有的多项优势，包括地理、法治、高速通讯、资讯和资金自由流通以及简单低税制，使香港持续成为领先的国际金融中心。
HYP: Hong Kong's many advantages, including geography, the rule of law, high-speed communications, free flow of information and capital, and a simple and low tax system, continue to make Hong Kong a leading international financial centre.

SRC: 许正宇指出，特区政府在“防疫抗疫基金”预留60亿港元，未来两年在公营及私营界别创造约3万个有时限的职位，涵盖不同技能及学历人士。
HYP: Hui pointed out that the HKSAR Government has set aside HK$6 billion in the Anti-epidemic Fund to create about 30000 time-limited jobs in the public and private sectors in the next two years, covering people with different skills and academic qualifications.

SRC: 为支持金融科技的发展，特区政府也已推出“千人计划”，资助本地金融科技公司、初创及其他有金融科技相关业务的企业，以创造1000个新职位，聘用本地人才及丰富香港的金融科技人才库。
HYP: To support the development of fintech, the HKSAR Government has also launched the “Thousand Talents Programme” to subsidise local fintech companies, start-ups and other enterprises with fintech-related businesses to create 1000 new jobs, recruit local talents and enrich Hong Kong's fintech talent pool.

SRC: 展望未来，许正宇对香港的金融稳定及经济表示乐观。
HYP: Looking ahead, Mr Hui expressed optimism about Hong Kong's financial stability and economy.

SRC: 他鼓励加拿大企业善用香港的优势及其作为国际金融中心、国际资产及财富管理中心以及全球离岸人民币业务枢纽的地位，在粤港澳大湾区及附近地区发展及投资。
HYP: He encouraged Canadian companies to leverage on Hong Kong's strengths and its status as an international financial centre, international asset and wealth management centre and global offshore RMB business hub to develop and invest in the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area and nearby regions.

SRC: 《柳叶刀》刊文赞扬中国抗疫努力鼓励各国学习经验-中新网
HYP: The Lancet praises China's anti-epidemic efforts and encourages countries to learn from experience - Xinhua English.news.cn

SRC: 《柳叶刀》杂志25日刊文表示，中国作为一个拥有14亿人口，规模与欧洲或美国相似的国家，现阶段新冠疫情得到有效控制，而没有再出现大范围传播的情况，在很大程度上控制住了国内的疫情。
HYP: The Lancet magazine published an article on the 25th that China, as a country with a population of 1.4 billion and a size similar to that of Europe or the United States, has effectively controlled the new crown epidemic at this stage, and there has been no further large-scale transmission, which has largely controlled the domestic epidemic.

SRC: 文章表示，在近十多年时间里，中国对国内研究和公共卫生建设方面进行了大量的投资，这使得中国对新冠的准备比当年严重急性呼吸道综合征(SARS)的准备要充分得多。
HYP: China has invested heavily in domestic research and public health for more than a decade, making China much better prepared for the new crown than it was for severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS).

SRC: 作者表示，2002年SARS暴发时，起初中国准备不足，尤其是病原体无法确定。
HYP: The authors say that when the SARS outbreak occurred in 2002, China was initially ill-prepared, especially since the pathogen could not be identified.

SRC: 当2019年12月发现新冠病毒时，中国科学家很快就能够鉴定出病毒种类，并于2020年1月11日与国际共享了基因组测序数据。
HYP: When the new coronavirus was discovered in December 2019, Chinese scientists were soon able to identify the virus species and shared the genome sequencing data internationally on January 11, 2020.

SRC: 到1月底，来自中国大陆和香港的医生阐明了该病毒的临床特征，通过在《柳叶刀》上发表的研究论文，向世界警告了新冠病毒的威胁。
HYP: By the end of January, doctors from mainland China and Hong Kong had elucidated the clinical features of the virus, warning the world of the threat of the coronavirus through research papers published in The Lancet.

SRC: 中国也一直处于疫苗研究的最前沿，在国家宣布紧急状态下，通过国内的紧密合作，这样的研究非常迅速而严格地展开，5月和7月，分别在《柳叶刀》上公布了中国开发的新冠疫苗早期试验取得进展的结果。
HYP: China has also been at the forefront of vaccine research. Such research has been carried out very quickly and rigorously through close cooperation at home under the state of emergency. In May and July, the results of the progress of early trials of the new crown vaccine developed in China were published in The Lancet.

SRC: 中国的经验表明，对国家卫生和研究体系进行投资，有效提高实验室能力是非常重要的。
HYP: China's experience shows that it is important to invest in national health and research systems to effectively improve laboratory capacity.

SRC: 这是国家对卫生紧急情况和全球卫生安全做出快速有效反应的基础。
HYP: This is the basis for a rapid and effective national response to health emergencies and global health security.

SRC: 其他国家，特别是低收入和中等收入国家来说，非常值得借鉴和学习。
HYP: Other countries, especially low- and middle-income countries, are worth learning from and learning from.

SRC: 此外，中国的经验证明，在强大的研究基础上，必须有强有力的高层果断地凭借科学依据来作出正确决策，这才使得新冠疫情得到有效控制。
HYP: In addition, China's experience proves that, on the basis of strong research, it is necessary to have a strong high-level and decisive decision-making based on scientific evidence, so that the new crown epidemic can be effectively controlled.

SRC: 文章强调，政府及其领导人必须尊重科学，理解科学的价值，并以对社会最有利的方式对其采取行动。
HYP: The article emphasizes that governments and their leaders must respect science, understand the value of science, and act on it in the best way for society.

SRC: 在暴发初期，中国国家卫建委派出三组传染病专家前往武汉，调查新冠病毒的风险和传播，他们的建议为1月23日武汉“封城”的决定提供了依据；当有专家提出建设方舱医院必要性和紧迫性时，政府很快做出了决定并快速实施；同时，社区和群众的广泛参与，也使得疫情快速有效地被控制。
HYP: In the early stages of the outbreak, China's National Health and Construction Commission sent three teams of infectious disease experts to Wuhan to investigate the risk and spread of the new coronavirus. Their recommendations provided the basis for Wuhan's decision to “lock down the city” on January 23. When experts raised the necessity and urgency of building a shelter hospital, the government quickly made a decision and quickly implemented it; at the same time, the extensive participation of the community and the masses also led to the epidemic being controlled quickly and effectively.

SRC: 文章最后强调，应对全球性的卫生紧急情况，各国需要加强全球合作，联合应对。
HYP: The article concludes by emphasizing that countries need to strengthen global cooperation and joint response in response to global health emergencies.

SRC: 总台记者杨洪
HYP: Headquarters reporter Yang Hong

SRC: 当地时间25日下午，一架小型飞机在德国北威州韦瑟尔县撞上一座多层住宅楼的顶层，事故共造成三人死亡。
HYP: On the afternoon of the 25th local time, a small plane crashed into the top floor of a multi-storey residential building in Wesel, North Rhine-Westphalia, killing three people.

SRC: 杜伊斯堡检方、韦瑟尔县警察局和韦瑟尔市消防部门当天晚间联合发布声明称，当天14时40分左右，一架两座小型飞机撞上位于韦瑟尔县辉柏斯坎普街一栋多层住宅楼顶层阁楼的住宅，造成三人丧生。
HYP: The Duisburg prosecution, the Wesel County Police Department and the Wesel City Fire Department said in a joint statement on the evening of the same day that a two-seater small plane crashed into the attic of a multi-storey residential building on Faberskamp Street in Wesel County at about 14:40, killing three people.

SRC: 其当天从北威州鲁尔区马尔市起飞，在韦瑟尔县的机场中途停靠后再度起飞，随后撞上住宅楼。
HYP: It took off from the city of Mull in the Ruhr district of North Rhine-Westphalia on the same day, stopped at the airport in Wesel County, took off again, and then crashed into a residential building.

SRC: 死者身份或为遭撞击住宅内的一名女性住户和小型飞机上两名乘客。
HYP: The identity of the deceased may be a female resident in the house that was hit and two passengers on the small plane.

SRC: 房内一名两岁儿童仅受轻伤，被平安救出。
HYP: A two-year-old child was rescued with only minor injuries.

SRC: 房内其余住户未在事故中受伤，但情绪仍未平复。
HYP: The rest of the occupants of the house were not injured in the accident.

SRC: 德新社报道的现场画面显示，遭遇事故的住宅一度冒出滚滚浓烟，消防队员扑灭火情后<v>可见房屋损毁严重</v>。
HYP: Footage from the scene showed smoke billowing out of the house, and firefighters extinguished the blaze.

SRC: 目前，飞机失事原因尚不明确。
HYP: The cause of the plane crash is currently unknown.

SRC: 《莱茵邮报》援引警方说法报道称，有线索表明，飞机或在撞上住宅楼前就已解体。
HYP: The Rheinische Post quoted police as saying there were clues that the plane might have disintegrated before it hit the residential building.

SRC: 警方表示，在事故现场一带发现了失事飞机的多块零部件。
HYP: Police said several parts of the plane were found near the crash site.

SRC: 德国刑警正与杜伊斯堡检方、德国联邦航空事故调查局共同调查导致这一事故的原因。
HYP: Interpol is working with Duisburg prosecutors and the German Federal Aviation Accident Investigation Agency to investigate the cause of the accident.

SRC: 记者当天从中国驻杜塞尔多夫总领事馆了解到，该馆与当地警局及消防部门取得联系，据现场判断，伤亡人员中无中国公民。
HYP: The reporter learned from the Chinese Consulate General in Dusseldorf on the same day that the Embassy contacted the local police and fire department. According to the scene, there were no Chinese citizens among the casualties.

SRC: 大鹏导演《吉祥如意》入围金爵奖-新华网
HYP: Dapeng's 'Lucky Wishes' nominated for Golden Goblet Award - Xinhua English.news.cn

SRC: 7月18日，第二十三届上海国际电影节公布了金爵奖官方入选影片名单。
HYP: On July 18, the 23rd Shanghai International Film Festival announced the official list of films selected for the Golden Goblet Awards.

SRC: 大鹏导演的首部现实题材影片《吉祥如意》，成功入围本届上影节金爵奖，同时影片官方发布了首款海报。
HYP: Dapeng's first realistic film "Auspicious Ruyi" was successfully nominated for the Golden Goblet Award of this year's Shanghai Film Festival. At the same time, the film officially released the first poster.

SRC: 海报片方供图
HYP: Poster

SRC: 影片《吉祥如意》是大鹏导演的第一部现实题材作品，也是他与金爵奖的二度结缘。
HYP: The film "Lucky Ruyi" is Dapeng's first realistic theme work, and it is also his second association with the Golden Goblet Award.

SRC: 该片讲述了这样一个故事：一位喜剧片导演突发奇想，回到东北农村老家，希望将一家人如何过年拍成一部文艺电影，结果遭遇一系列意外。
HYP: The film tells the story of a comedy director who returns to his hometown in the northeast rural area on a whim, hoping to make a literary movie about how the family will celebrate the New Year. As a result, he encounters a series of accidents.

SRC: 因拍电影而聚齐的家庭成员们，完成了最后的聚会。
HYP: The family members gathered for the filming finished the final party.

SRC: 在今日发布的电影海报中，这个家庭中的一员— — “三舅”王吉祥坐在画面中央抽着烟，背景是披上银装的东北黑土地，前景是中国人逢年过节必挂的红灯笼。
HYP: In the movie poster released today, Wang Jixiang, a member of the family, is sitting in the center of the frame smoking a cigarette against the background of the black land of the northeast dressed in silver, and in the foreground is the red lantern that Chinese people always hang on New Year's Day.

SRC: 象征着喜庆、团圆的红灯笼与身影落寞的王吉祥形成了巨大反差，似乎也透露了这个大家庭关系中的复杂与纠结。
HYP: The red lantern symbolizing joy and reunion forms a huge contrast with the lonely Wang Jixiang, which seems to reveal the complexity and entanglement of this big family relationship.

SRC: 据悉，影片中，除了“三舅”王吉祥的女儿由演员刘陆扮演，其余戏份均由真实的导演家人完成，影片实验性的视听风格，打破了戏剧与真实的边界，带给观众全新的浸入式观影体验。
HYP: It is reported that in the film, in addition to the daughter of "three uncle" Wang Jixiang, played by actor Liu Lu, the rest of the scenes are completed by the real director's family. The experimental audio-visual style of the film breaks the boundary between drama and reality and brings the audience a new immersive viewing experience.

SRC: 据导演大鹏介绍，《吉祥如意》的创作源自“一场天意” ， 拍摄期间家庭突如其来的一系列变故，让原本的拍摄计划不得不随之改变，没有剧本的生活最终被记录成电影，却释放出超越设计的张力。
HYP: According to director Dapeng, the creation of "Auspicious Ruyi" originated from "a providence". During the shooting, a series of sudden changes in the family caused the original shooting plan to have to be changed. Life without a script was eventually recorded into a movie, but it released the tension beyond the design.

SRC: 导演大鹏究竟如何面对这场“天意” ， 又该如何继续迎接这场天意带来的种种改变呢？
HYP: How does director Dapeng face this "destiny", and how can he continue to meet the changes brought about by this providence?

SRC: 毫无疑问《吉祥如意》是充满实验性的，几乎全素人的阵容和创新的视听风格将镜头前的生活变成了一部电影，在真实影像的包裹下，观众也会从影片所呈现的家庭中找到自己和家人的影子，随着影片中这场家庭聚会的落幕，唤起一系列思考。
HYP: There is no doubt that “Good Luck” is full of experimentation. The almost all-amateur lineup and innovative audiovisual style turn life in front of the camera into a movie. Under the wrapping of real images, the audience will also find themselves and their families from the family presented in the film. The shadow, with the end of the family party in the film, evoke a series of reflections.

SRC: NEWS.GOV.MO: 新型冠状病毒感染应变协调中心查询热线统计数字(7月25日08H00-7月26日08H00)
HYP: NEWS.GOV.MO: Statistics of Novel Coronavirus Infection Response and Coordination Centre Enquiry Hotline (25 July 08H00 - 26 July 08H00)

SRC: 由2020年07月25日08H00 至7月26日08H00，新型冠状病毒感染应变协调中心的查询热线共接获292宗电话查询。
HYP: From 08H00 on 25 July 2020 to 08H00 on 26 July 2020, the enquiry hotline of the Novel Coronavirus Response Coordination Centre received a total of 292 telephone enquiries.

SRC: 关于疫情的291宗查询，已即时转线至相关部门代表跟进，情况如下：
HYP: The 291 enquiries on the epidemic have been immediately transferred to representatives of relevant departments for follow-up. The situation is as follows:

SRC: 卫生局271宗(涉及：查询关于隔离；查询核酸检测；查询两地牌；健康码；其他。）
HYP: 271 cases of Health Bureau (Involving: enquiry about isolation; enquiry about nucleic acid testing; enquiry of two places license; health code; others.)

SRC: 治安警察局17宗(涉及：查询出入境措施；查询粤澳两地牌车辆出入境措施；查询珠海政务热线；查询证件逗留问题。）
HYP: 17 cases (involving: enquiries on immigration measures; enquiries on immigration measures for vehicles with Guangdong and Macao licenses; enquiries on Zhuhai government affairs hotline; enquiries on visa stay.)

SRC: <v>治安警察局</v>17宗(涉及：查询出入境措施；查询粤澳两地牌车辆出入境措施；查询珠海政务热线；查询证件逗留问题。）
HYP: 17 cases (involving: enquiries on immigration measures; enquiries on immigration measures for vehicles with Guangdong and Macao licenses; enquiries on Zhuhai government affairs hotline; enquiries on visa stay.)

SRC: 旅游局1宗(涉及：查询隔离酒店问题。）
HYP: 1 case from MGTO (Involving: Enquiries about quarantined hotels.)

SRC: 教育暨青年局1宗(涉及：查询澳门学生返回英国读书的方法。）
HYP: Education and Youth Bureau 1 case (Involving: Enquiry about the methods of Macao students returning to study in the UK.)

SRC: 海事及水务局1宗(涉及：询问香港渔船进港是否需要向海事及水务局申报及核酸检测相关事宜。）
HYP: Marine and Water Bureau 1 case (Involving: enquiry whether Hong Kong fishing vessels need to declare to the Marine and Water Bureau and nucleic acid testing related matters when entering Hong Kong.)

SRC: 马里尼切夫说，价值的变化受卢布贬值和疫情等影响。
HYP: Marinichev said that the change in value was affected by the depreciation of the ruble and the epidemic.

SRC: 他说“服务成本正在增加。
HYP: "Service costs are increasing," he said.

SRC: 由于疫情，人们开始在互联网上花费更多的时间。”
HYP: Because of the pandemic, people are starting to spend more time on the internet.”

SRC: 马里尼切夫不排除年互联网价格将严重上涨，认为运营商可以为客户提供更高的速度和更多服务抵消人们对价格上涨的不满。
HYP: Marinichev did not rule out a serious rise in internet prices next year, arguing that carriers could offer customers higher speeds and more services to offset people's dissatisfaction with price increases.

SRC: 《中国医生》筹拍致敬抗疫英雄-新华网
HYP: 'Chinese Doctor' to pay tribute to anti-epidemic heroes

SRC: 近日，带着中国电影人对抗疫英雄的敬意，博纳影业集团董事长于冬、导演刘伟强(图左）在广州与钟南山院士，就抗疫题材影片《中国医生》的拍摄制作工作进行了座谈交流。
HYP: Recently, with the respect of Chinese filmmakers in the fight against the epidemic, Yu Dong, chairman of Bona Film Group, and director Liu Weiqiang (left) held a discussion with academician Zhong Nanshan in Guangzhou on the shooting and production of the anti-epidemic film "Chinese Doctor".

SRC: 近日，带着中国电影人对抗疫<v>英雄</v>的敬意，博纳影业集团董事长于冬、导演刘伟强(图左）在广州与钟南山院士，就抗疫题材影片《中国医生》的拍摄制作工作进行了座谈交流。
HYP: Recently, with the respect of Chinese filmmakers in the fight against the epidemic, Yu Dong, chairman of Bona Film Group, and director Liu Weiqiang (left) held a discussion with academician Zhong Nanshan in Guangzhou on the shooting and production of the anti-epidemic film "Chinese Doctor".

SRC: 博纳影业希望能借由《中国医生》，向所有战斗在疫情防控一线的医护、防疫工作者致敬！
HYP: Bona Film hopes to use "Chinese Doctor" to pay tribute to all the medical and epidemic prevention workers fighting on the front line of epidemic prevention and control!

SRC: 2021年，该片将作为庆祝中国共产党建党100周年献礼影片全国公映。
HYP: In 2021, the film will be released nationwide as a tribute to the 100th anniversary of the founding of the Communist Party of China.

SRC: 目前，博纳影业正在中宣部和国家电影局的安排部署下，广东省电影局及湖北省电影局的支持下，组织电影《中国机长》原班人马筹拍电影《中国医生》，这是一部反映在党中央的坚强领导下，全国人民团结一心抗击新冠肺炎疫情的影片。
HYP: At present, with the arrangement and deployment of the Central Propaganda Department and the National Film Administration, and with the support of the Guangdong Film Bureau and the Hubei Provincial Film Bureau, Bona Film is organizing the original team of the film "China Captain" to prepare the film "Chinese Doctor", which is a reflection of the strong leadership of the CPC Central Committee.

SRC: 影片聚焦武汉抗疫一线，将以武汉医护人员及各省市援鄂医疗队为人物背景，从人性的角度，运用独特的叙事，以及极具冲击力的镜头语言，全景展现抗疫一线充满奉献和牺牲精神的中国医护人员的感人故事。
HYP: Focusing on the front line of Wuhan's anti-epidemic, the film will take Wuhan medical staff and medical teams from various provinces and cities as the background of the characters. From the perspective of human nature, using unique narratives and highly impactful lens language, the panorama shows the touching stories of Chinese medical staff who are full of dedication and sacrifice in the anti-epidemic front line.

SRC: 据了解，武汉解封之日的第一时间，博纳公司便克服重重困难，派出采拍小组深入疫情一线，与数百位医护工作者面对面交流了解、搜集资料，目前已经采访到了包括钟南山院士本人、广州驰援武汉第一人、广东援鄂医疗队，以及武汉金银潭医院、武汉协和医院、武汉大学中南医院、武汉中心医院等抗疫战线最前沿的白衣天使们，拍下了大量珍贵的第一手视频资料。
HYP: It is understood that the first time on the day of the unblocking of Wuhan, Bona Company overcame many difficulties, sent a shooting team to the front line of the epidemic, and communicated with hundreds of medical workers face-to-face to understand and collect information.

SRC: 据了解，武汉解封之日的第一时间，博纳公司便克服重重困难，派出采拍小组深入疫情一线，与数百位医护工作者面对面交流了解、搜集资料，<v>目前已经采访到了包括钟南山院士本人、广州驰援武汉第一人、广东援鄂医疗队，以及武汉金银潭医院、武汉协和医院、武汉大学中南医院、武汉中心医院等抗疫战线最前沿的白衣天使们，拍下了大量珍贵的第一手视频资料。</v>
HYP: It is understood that the first time on the day of the unblocking of Wuhan, Bona Company overcame many difficulties, sent a shooting team to the front line of the epidemic, and communicated with hundreds of medical workers face-to-face to understand and collect information.

SRC: 据了解，武汉解封之日的第一时间，博纳公司便克服重重困难，派出采拍小组<v>深入疫情一线</v>，与数百位医护工作者面对面交流了解、搜集资料，目前已经采访到了包括钟南山院士本人、广州驰援武汉第一人、广东援鄂医疗队，以及武汉金银潭医院、武汉协和医院、武汉大学中南医院、武汉中心医院等抗疫战线最前沿的白衣天使们，拍下了大量珍贵的第一手视频资料。
HYP: It is understood that the first time on the day of the unblocking of Wuhan, Bona Company overcame many difficulties, sent a shooting team to the front line of the epidemic, and communicated with hundreds of medical workers face-to-face to understand and collect information.

SRC: 钟南山院士在此次座谈会中亦对电影的拍摄提出了期待和希望：“ 我很期待，希望你们不仅要走访一些抛头露面比较多的专家，还要更多地采访在一线埋头苦干的医务人员，他们是大多数。”
HYP: Academician Zhong Nanshan also put forward expectations and hopes for the filming of the film at this symposium: "I am looking forward to it. I hope that you will not only visit some experts who are more exposed, but also interview more medical staff who are working hard on the front line. They are the majority."

SRC: 他表示，他之前看过《我和我的祖国》《中国机长》，认为以普通人视角讲述大格局故事的方法就很好。
HYP: He said that he had seen "Me and My Motherland" and "Captain of China" before, and thought it was good to tell the big picture from the perspective of ordinary people.

SRC: “现在一些国外朋友对中国还是有一些误解。”
HYP: "Some foreign friends still have some misunderstandings about China."

SRC: 在谈到影片的传播时，钟南山院士表示，目前国外有些人喜欢将病毒贴上政治化标签，他希望电影能从人性的角度打动观众：“ 这部电影除了在中国放映以外，最好也能在国外放映，要用国内外观众都能理解的方式，用真正的人文精神打动观众。”
HYP: When talking about the spread of the film, Academician Zhong Nanshan said that at present, some people in foreign countries like to label the virus as politicized.

SRC: 钟南山院士还深情回忆了上世纪80年代的影片《人到中年》，“这么多年过去了，我对改革开放后电影印象最深的还是《人到中年》，当时我国外的医生朋友们都看哭了，如果《中国医生》能够起到这样的作用，那就很了不起了。”
HYP: Academician Zhong Nanshan also fondly recalled the film "People to Middle Ages" in the 1980s. "After so many years, my deepest impression on the film after the reform and opening up is "People to Middle Ages". At that time, my foreign doctors and friends all cried. If "Chinese Doctor" can play such a role, it will be great. "

SRC: 钟南山院士表示，如果《中国医生》能引起国外观众的共鸣，那就非常成功。
HYP: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that if "Chinese Doctor" can resonate with foreign audiences, it will be very successful.

SRC: 在座谈交流时，钟南山院士还分享了对当前国际疫情防控的意见和建议，“ 我相信人永远比病毒聪明。”
HYP: At the symposium, Academician Zhong Nanshan also shared his opinions and suggestions on the current international epidemic prevention and control, "I believe that people will always be smarter than the virus."

SRC: 钟南山院士表示，虽说病毒难以预测，但从原始社会至今，人类已渡过了千难万险，如今现代社会有发达的医疗科技和社会管理措施，再加上全世界的医务人员、甚至老百姓都对科学应对新冠肺炎疫情有了基本认识，人们不会再像以前那么被动，“接下来要注意两个方面的工作，一是要研究全世界怎么加强合作，二是注重对人们心灵的抚慰” 。
HYP: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that although the virus is difficult to predict, since the primitive society, human beings have survived thousands of difficulties. Nowadays, modern society has developed medical technology and social management measures. In addition, medical personnel and even ordinary people all over the world have a basic understanding of the scientific response to the new crown pneumonia epidemic. People will no longer be as passive as before.

SRC: （记者王金跃）
HYP: (Reporter Wang Jinyue)

SRC: 文旅“红果”聚韶山—湘潭首届红博会见闻-<v>今日要闻-湖南日报网-华声在线</v>
HYP: Cultural Tourism "Red Fruit" Gathers in Shaoshan - Xiangtan's First Red Expo

SRC: 文旅“红果”聚韶山—湘潭首届红博会见闻-今日要闻-湖南日报网-华声在线
HYP: Cultural Tourism "Red Fruit" Gathers in Shaoshan - Xiangtan's First Red Expo

SRC: 湖南日报·新湖南客户端记者蒋睿通讯员肖燕
HYP: Hunan Daily New Hunan Client Reporter Jiang Rui Correspondent Xiao Yan

SRC: <v>嘉兴红船模具、韶山毛泽东铜像、延安布堆花工艺品、湘西永顺腊肉</v>…… 7月25日，2020湖南红色旅游文化节在韶山开幕。
HYP: On July 25th, the 2020 Hunan Red Tourism Culture Festival opened in Shaoshan.

SRC: 作为主体活动之一，湘潭首届红色文化产业博览会在韶山全域旅游咨询集散中心开展。
HYP: As one of the main activities, the first Xiangtan Red Cultural Industry Expo was held in the Shaoshan Global Tourism Consulting and Distribution Center.

SRC: 展览区红色文创产品、革命老区土特产品等琳琅满目，引来各地游客争相购买。
HYP: The exhibition area is full of red cultural and creative products, native products from the old revolutionary base areas, and so on, attracting tourists from all over the world to buy.

SRC: “此次红博会，既是全国红色文化产业成果的一次展示，也是参展单位和企业交流经验、探讨发展路径的一个重要平台。”
HYP: "The Red Expo is not only a display of the achievements of the national red cultural industry, but also an important platform for exhibitors and enterprises to exchange experience and explore development paths."

SRC: 湘潭首届红博会执委会相关负责人介绍，这届红博会以“弘扬红色文化助推文旅升温”为主题，展览总面积近3000平方米，设置了氛围营造区、景区展示展陈区和红色文旅网游网购体验区。
HYP: According to the relevant person in charge of the executive committee of the first Xiangtan Red Expo, the theme of this Red Expo is "promoting red culture and boosting cultural tourism". The total exhibition area is nearly 3000 square meters, and the atmosphere creation area, scenic area exhibition and exhibition area and red cultural tourism online shopping experience area are set up.

SRC: 邀请浙江嘉兴、贵州遵义、陕西延安等8个外省地市以及我省长沙、株洲、岳阳、郴州等地137家企业、单位参展，共展出展品768种，包括红色文物、工艺品、食品特产、旅游线路、红色培训课程、红色文创产品等。
HYP: Invited to Jiaxing, Zhejiang, Guizhou Zunyi, Shaanxi Yan'an and other eight provinces and cities as well as Changsha, Zhuzhou, Yueyang, Chenzhou and other places in our province 137 enterprises and units to participate in the exhibition, a total of 768 exhibits, including red cultural relics, handicrafts, food specialties, tourist routes, red training courses, red cultural and creative products, etc.

SRC: 展销区将展至7月29日。
HYP: The exhibition area will be on display until July 29.

SRC: 作为红博会东道主，湘潭展区亮点纷呈。
HYP: As the host of the Red Expo, the Xiangtan exhibition area is full of highlights.

SRC: 展区负责人介绍，湘潭展区分为红色工业、红色文化产业发展两大部分。
HYP: According to the person in charge of the exhibition area, the Xiangtan exhibition area is divided into two parts: the development of red industry and the development of red cultural industry.

SRC: 红色工业展区展出华菱湘钢、华菱线缆、湘电动力等6家企业的展品31件，红色文化产业发展展区展出红色系列图书、红色系列食品、红色系列文创产品等27家单位产品近200个。
HYP: The red industry exhibition area exhibited 31 exhibits of 6 enterprises such as Valin Xianggang, Valin Cable and Xiangdian Power, and the red cultural industry development exhibition area exhibited nearly 200 products of 27 units such as red series books, red series food, and red series cultural and creative products.

SRC: 在延安展区，不少游客被陈展的布堆花手工艺品和剪纸艺术品所吸引。
HYP: In the Yan'an exhibition area, many tourists are attracted by the cloth pile flower handicrafts and paper-cut artworks on display.

SRC: 延安市文旅局局长马东坡介绍，此次参展精心选择了延安近两年来优秀的红色文创产品，其中16种产品是2019全国红色文创产品优秀作品。
HYP: Ma Dongpo, director of the Yan'an Municipal Bureau of Culture and Tourism, introduced that the exhibition has carefully selected excellent red cultural and creative products in Yan'an in the past two years, of which 16 products are outstanding works of national red cultural and creative products in 2019.

SRC: 同时，他们邀请了国家级非物质文化遗产保护项目“安塞剪纸”、“陕北民歌”与省级非遗项目延川布堆画传承人，重点推介延安民俗特色产品，并借此机会与其他展区单位企业沟通交流，推动跨区域合作。
HYP: At the same time, they invited the inheritors of the national intangible cultural heritage protection project “Ansai Paper-cutting” and “Northern Shaanxi Folk Songs” and the provincial intangible cultural heritage project Yanchuan Budui Painting, focusing on promoting Yan'an folk products, and taking the opportunity to communicate with other exhibition units and enterprises to promote cross-regional cooperation.

SRC: 膜分离技术助力破解“温室效应” - 中新网
HYP: Membrane separation technology helps crack the "greenhouse effect"

SRC: 膜分离技术助力破解“温室效应”
HYP: Membrane separation technology helps solve the "greenhouse effect"

SRC: 新型混合基质膜制备技术示意图
HYP: Schematic diagram of the preparation technology of a new mixed matrix membrane.

SRC: 本报讯记者商瑞报道：日前，天津大学大气环境与生物能源团队针对“膜分离法捕集二氧化碳”取得重大进展，成功研发出新型混合基质膜制备技术，大幅提升膜材料二氧化碳捕集性能。
HYP: Recently, the Atmospheric Environment and Bioenergy Team of Tianjin University has made significant progress in the "capture of carbon dioxide by membrane separation method" and successfully developed a new mixed matrix membrane preparation technology, which greatly improves the carbon dioxide capture performance of membrane materials.

SRC: 相关成果已作为国际期刊《温室气体：科学与技术》封面文章发表。
HYP: The results have been published as a cover article in the international journal Greenhouse Gases: Science and Technology.

SRC: “温室效应”是困扰人类发展的重大环境问题，二氧化碳排放则是造成“温室效应”的元凶。
HYP: The "greenhouse effect" is a major environmental problem that plagues human development, and carbon dioxide emissions are the culprit causing the "greenhouse effect".

SRC: 如何高效捕获并利用人类排放的二氧化碳是科学家关注的焦点。
HYP: How to efficiently capture and use carbon dioxide emitted by humans is the focus of scientists.

SRC: “膜分离法”是一种新兴的二氧化碳捕集技术，它在膜材料帮助下分离二氧化碳气体，具有高效节能、操作简单的特点。
HYP: "Membrane separation method" is an emerging carbon dioxide capture technology, which separates carbon dioxide gas with the help of membrane materials, and has the characteristics of high efficiency, energy saving and simple operation.

SRC: 如何让膜材料“深呼吸”， 提高气体分离效率，是采用膜分离法捕集二氧化碳的瓶颈难点。
HYP: How to let the membrane material "breathe deeply" and improve the gas separation efficiency is the bottleneck and difficulty of using the membrane separation method to capture carbon dioxide.

SRC: 天津大学科研团队创新思路，通过反复实验，探究不同溶剂对膜气体分离性能的影响。
HYP: The scientific research team of Tianjin University has innovated ideas and explored the effects of different solvents on the gas separation performance of membranes through repeated experiments.

SRC: 实验结果表明，以N-甲基吡咯烷酮作为制备溶剂，生成的膜材料中碳纳米管分布更加均匀，“更透气”，有效提升了膜材料气体分离效能和速率。
HYP: The experimental results show that using N-methylpyrrolidone as the preparation solvent, the carbon nanotubes in the membrane material are more uniformly distributed and "more breathable", which effectively improves the gas separation efficiency and rate of the membrane material.

SRC: 用这种新技术制备的混合基质膜，二氧化碳分离性能接近目前此类膜材料的理论分离上限。
HYP: The mixed matrix membrane prepared by this new technology has a carbon dioxide separation performance close to the theoretical upper limit of the current separation of such membrane materials.

SRC: “新技术为膜分离法捕集二氧化碳提供了新思路。”
HYP: "The new technology provides a new idea for the capture of carbon dioxide by membrane separation."

SRC: 天津大学大气环境与生物能源团队成员李润表示：“ 我们希望这种技术能够为未来燃煤电厂与化工企业处理烟气提供有力支持，在控制温室气体排放等领域发挥重大作用。”
HYP: Li Run, a member of the Atmospheric Environment and Bioenergy Team at Tianjin University, said: "We hope that this technology can provide strong support for the treatment of flue gas in coal-fired power plants and chemical companies in the future, and play a significant role in controlling greenhouse gas emissions."

SRC: 首度成立专委会、集体签“长约” 第三届进博会参展商联盟构筑“进博纽带” - 新华网
HYP: The first special committee was established and the "long-term contract" was collectively signed. The third CIIE Exhibitor Alliance builds the "Imbo Link" - Xinhua English.news.cn

SRC: 7月26日在上海拍摄的第三届进博会参展商联盟第一次会议现场。
HYP: The first meeting of the Exhibitor Alliance of the 3rd China International Import Expo was filmed in Shanghai on July 26.

SRC: 新华社上海7月26日电（记者周蕊）26日，第三届进口博览会参展商联盟在此间首次成立专业委员会，首批成立的专委会包括公共卫生防疫专委会和乳业专委会，35家成员企业还签订了3年长期参展合作备忘录，进博会参展商联盟的纽带作用不断增强。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Shanghai, July 26 (Reporter Zhou Rui) On July 26, the Exhibitor Alliance of the Third China Import Expo established its first professional committee here. The first batch of special committees included the Public Health and Epidemic Prevention Committee and the Dairy Special Committee. 35 member enterprises also signed a three-year long-term exhibition cooperation memorandum.

SRC: 26日在此间举行的第三届进博会参展商联盟第一次会议上，韩国现代、美国陶氏化学、日本资生堂、新西兰纽仕兰、德国西门子、法国米其林、英国阿斯利康等一批展盟成员企业签订了3年长期参展合作备忘录，修订和完善后的展盟章程也首次公布。
HYP: At the first meeting of the 3rd CIIE Exhibitor Alliance held here on the 26th, a group of member companies such as Hyundai, Dow Chemical of the United States, Shiseido of Japan, New Zealand New Zealand, Siemens of Germany, Michelin of France, and AstraZeneca of the United Kingdom signed a three-year long-term exhibition cooperation memorandum.

SRC: 7月26日在上海拍摄的乳业专业委员会成立仪式现场。
HYP: The inauguration ceremony of the Dairy Professional Committee was filmed in Shanghai on July 26.

SRC: 根据最新的章程，展盟将引入牵头单位轮值机制，加强专委会功能。
HYP: According to the latest charter, the exhibition alliance will introduce the rotation mechanism of the lead unit to strengthen the function of the special committee.

SRC: 专委会将为行业发展趋势分析提出建议，推动行业可持续发展。
HYP: The committee will make recommendations for the analysis of industry development trends and promote the sustainable development of the industry.

SRC: 同时，整合行业全产业链资源，以大带小，带动关联企业参展，将进博会打造成为行业企业聚集高地。
HYP: At the same time, the whole industry chain resources of the industry will be integrated, and the related enterprises will be driven to participate in the exhibition, and the CIIE will become a gathering highland for industry enterprises.

SRC: 同时，整合行业全产业链资源，<v>以大带小</v>，带动关联企业参展，将进博会打造成为行业企业聚集高地。
HYP: At the same time, the whole industry chain resources of the industry will be integrated, and the related enterprises will be driven to participate in the exhibition, and the CIIE will become a gathering highland for industry enterprises.

SRC: 首次成立公共卫生防疫专委会，对于当前抗击新冠肺炎疫情来说显得尤为重要。
HYP: The establishment of a special committee on public health and epidemic prevention for the first time is particularly important in the current fight against the new crown pneumonia epidemic.

SRC: 作为第三届进博会公共卫生防疫专委会副会长单位，雅培快速诊断业务大中华区总经理仇建平说，下一步，雅培会携手更多行业伙伴，探索新的解决方案和合作模式，助力中国以及全世界抗击新冠肺炎疫情。
HYP: Qiu Jianping, general manager of Abbott Rapid Diagnostics Greater China, said that Abbott will work with more industry partners to explore new solutions and cooperation models to help China and the world fight the new crown pneumonia epidemic.

SRC: 作为<v>第三届进博会公共卫生防疫专委会副会长单位</v>，雅培快速诊断业务大中华区总经理仇建平说，下一步，雅培会携手更多行业伙伴，探索新的解决方案和合作模式，助力中国以及全世界抗击新冠肺炎疫情。
HYP: Qiu Jianping, general manager of Abbott Rapid Diagnostics Greater China, said that Abbott will work with more industry partners to explore new solutions and cooperation models to help China and the world fight the new crown pneumonia epidemic.

SRC: 7月26日在上海拍摄的公共卫生防疫专业委员会成立仪式现场。
HYP: The inauguration ceremony of the Public Health and Epidemic Prevention Committee in Shanghai, China, July 26, 2018.

SRC: 据悉，第三届进博会首次设立公共卫生防疫专区，截至目前已有近50家全球企业报名参展，展览面积超过1万平方米。
HYP: It is reported that the third CIIE has set up a special area for public health and epidemic prevention for the first time. Up to now, nearly 50 global enterprises have signed up to participate in the exhibition, with an exhibition area of more than 10000 square meters.

SRC: 在2018年首届进博会期间，进博会参展商联盟由展商自发倡议成立，旨在成为优质参展企业交流合作平台、连接参展各方信息与资源共享平台，以及为促进中国与世界各国（地区）之间经贸商务往来与发展建言献策的智囊平台。
HYP: During the first CIIE in 2018, the Exhibitor Alliance was established on the initiative of exhibitors. It aims to become a platform for high-quality exhibitors to exchange and cooperate, a platform for information and resource sharing between exhibitors, and a think-tank platform for promoting economic and trade exchanges and development between China and other countries (regions).

SRC: 截至目前，已有142家企业加入参展商联盟，覆盖全球23个国家和地区。
HYP: Up to now, 142 companies have joined the Exhibitor Alliance, covering 23 countries and regions around the world.

SRC: 比利时3岁女童死于<v>新冠</v>病毒感染-新华网
HYP: 3-year-old Belgian girl dies from coronavirus - Xinhua English.news.cn

SRC: 比利时3岁女童死于新冠病毒<v>感染</v>-新华网
HYP: 3-year-old Belgian girl dies from coronavirus - Xinhua English.news.cn

SRC: 比利时3岁女童死于新冠病毒感染-新华网
HYP: 3-year-old Belgian girl dies from coronavirus - Xinhua English.news.cn

SRC: 比利时卫生部门24日说，一名3岁女童死于新冠病毒<v>感染</v>，是该国最年幼的新冠病亡患者。
HYP: A three-year-old girl has died from the new coronavirus, Belgium's health ministry said on Tuesday, making her the country's youngest person to die from the disease.

SRC: 比利时卫生部门24日说，一名3岁女童死于新冠病毒感染，是该国最年幼的新冠病亡患者。
HYP: A three-year-old girl has died from the new coronavirus, Belgium's health ministry said on Tuesday, making her the country's youngest person to die from the disease.

SRC: 比利时卫生部门发言人布德温·卡特里说，这名女童感染新冠病毒前已经有其他严重疾病；除了这名女童，近期还有一名18岁青年死于新冠病毒感染。
HYP: Belgian health department spokesman Budwin Carter said that the girl had other serious illnesses before contracting the new coronavirus, and that in addition to the girl, an 18-year-old young man recently died of the new coronavirus infection.

SRC: 卡特里说，上周比利时85%新增新冠确诊人员年龄在60岁以下。
HYP: Katri said 85 per cent of new coronavirus cases in Belgium last week were under the age of 60.

SRC: 卡特里说，上周比利时85%新增新冠<v>确诊</v>人员年龄在60岁以下。
HYP: Katri said 85 per cent of new coronavirus cases in Belgium last week were under the age of 60.

SRC: 他提醒身体健康、年龄较轻的民众不要掉以轻心。
HYP: He reminded healthy, young people not to take it lightly.

SRC: “虽然年轻人死于新冠病毒感染的情况较为罕见，但没有任何人现在具备免疫力。 ”
HYP: "While it is rare for young people to die from COVID-19, no one is immune now."

SRC: 上周，比利时新增新冠确诊病例比前一周增长89 % ， 每日平均2.9人死于新冠病毒感染，高于前一周的日均1.7人。
HYP: Last week, Belgium saw an 89% increase in new coronavirus cases compared to the previous week, with an average of 2.9 deaths per day, up from 1.7 the previous week.

SRC: 上周，比利时新增新冠确诊病例比前一周增长89 % ， 每日平均2.9人死于新冠病毒感染，高于前一周的<v>日均</v>1.7人。
HYP: Last week, Belgium saw an 89% increase in new coronavirus cases compared to the previous week, with an average of 2.9 deaths per day, up from 1.7 the previous week.

SRC: 上周，比利时新增新冠确诊病例比前一周增长89 % ， 每日平均2.9人死于<v>新冠病毒感染</v>，高于前一周的日均1.7人。
HYP: Last week, Belgium saw an 89% increase in new coronavirus cases compared to the previous week, with an average of 2.9 deaths per day, up from 1.7 the previous week.

SRC: 上周，比利时新增新冠<v>确诊</v>病例比前一周增长89 % ， 每日平均2.9人死于新冠病毒感染，高于前一周的日均1.7人。
HYP: Last week, Belgium saw an 89% increase in new coronavirus cases compared to the previous week, with an average of 2.9 deaths per day, up from 1.7 the previous week.

SRC: 欧洲疫情高峰期间，比利时人口中新冠病毒感染者占比在欧洲“名列前茅” 。
HYP: During the peak of the epidemic in Europe, the proportion of new coronavirus infections in the Belgian population was among the highest in Europe.

SRC: 比利时有1100多万人口。
HYP: Belgium has more than 11 million people.

SRC: 最新数据显示，比利时累计64847人感染<v>新冠</v>病毒。
HYP: According to the latest figures, 64847 people have been infected with the coronavirus in Belgium.

SRC: 最新数据显示，比利时累计64847人感染新冠病毒。
HYP: According to the latest figures, 64847 people have been infected with the coronavirus in Belgium.

SRC: 最新数据显示，比利时<v>累计</v>64847人感染新冠病毒。
HYP: According to the latest figures, 64847 people have been infected with the coronavirus in Belgium.

SRC: 卡特里本周早些时候警告，在雪球越滚越大、最终造成“雪崩”前，人们必须采取行动。
HYP: Carter warned earlier this week that people must act before the snowball grows bigger and bigger and eventually causes an "avalanche".

SRC: 为抑制疫情反弹，比利时首相索菲·维尔梅斯23日宣布，人们在公共场所佩戴口罩的有关规定将更加严格，8月进一步解除限制性措施的方案也将暂缓执行。
HYP: Belgian Prime Minister Sophie Vermes announced on Wednesday that the rules on people wearing masks in public places will be tightened and plans to further lift restrictions in August will be suspended.

SRC: <v>为抑制疫情反弹</v>，比利时首相索菲·维尔梅斯23日宣布，人们在公共场所佩戴口罩的有关规定将更加严格，8月进一步解除限制性措施的方案也将暂缓执行。
HYP: Belgian Prime Minister Sophie Vermes announced on Wednesday that the rules on people wearing masks in public places will be tightened and plans to further lift restrictions in August will be suspended.

SRC: （郭倩） 【 新华社微特稿】
HYP: (Guo Qian) [Xinhua News Agency micro feature]

SRC: 大型融媒体行动《走村直播看脱贫》出发- <v>今日要闻- 湖南日报网- 华声在线</v>
HYP: Large-scale financial media operation "Walking Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation" Starts

SRC: 大型融媒体行动《走村直播看脱贫》出发- 今日要闻- 湖南日报网- 华声在线
HYP: Large-scale financial media operation "Walking Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation" Starts

SRC: 湖南日报·新湖南客户端7月25日讯(本报记者)7月25日，由中央广播电视总台财经节目中心主办的大型融媒体行动《走村直播看脱贫》从江苏徐州出发，两辆携带5G新媒体移动云制播系统的大篷车<v>在现场嘉宾目送下，缓缓驶出现场</v>。
HYP: Hunan Daily, New Hunan Client, July 25 (Reporter) On July 25, the large-scale financial media action "Walking Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation" sponsored by the Central Radio and Television General Station Financial Program Center started from Xuzhou, Jiangsu, and two caravans carrying 5G new media mobile cloud production and broadcasting system.

SRC: 湖南日报·新湖南客户端7月25日讯(本报记者)7月25日，由中央广播电视总台财经节目中心主办的大型融媒体行动《走村直播看脱贫》从江苏徐州出发，两辆携带5G新媒体移动云制播系统的大篷车在现场嘉宾目送下，缓缓驶出现场。
HYP: Hunan Daily, New Hunan Client, July 25 (Reporter) On July 25, the large-scale financial media action "Walking Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation" sponsored by the Central Radio and Television General Station Financial Program Center started from Xuzhou, Jiangsu, and two caravans carrying 5G new media mobile cloud production and broadcasting system.

SRC: 习近平总书记指出，“2020年是具有里程碑意义的一年，我们将全面建成小康社会，实现第一个百年奋斗目标，2020年也是脱贫攻坚决战决胜之年”。
HYP: General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out that 2020 is a year of milestone significance. We will build a moderately prosperous society in all respects and achieve the first centenary goal. 2020 is also a year of decisive victory in the fight against poverty.

SRC: 大型融媒体行动《走村直播看脱贫》是中央广播电视总台财经节目中心为配合这一重大主题，做好脱贫攻坚宣传的重要举措。
HYP: The large-scale financial media action "Walking the Village to Watch Poverty Alleviation" is an important measure for the Financial Program Center of the Central Radio and Television General Station to cooperate with this major theme and do a good job in poverty alleviation.

SRC: 该行动将走进全国20多个省、自治区、直辖市的脱贫村，挖掘鲜活脱贫故事，直击村容村貌巨变，展现村民如何突破生存发展困境、走向致富之路的历程。
HYP: The action will go to poverty alleviation villages in more than 20 provinces, autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government, excavate fresh stories of poverty alleviation, directly attack the dramatic changes in the appearance of villages and villages, and show the villagers how to break through the difficulties of survival and development and move towards prosperity.

SRC: 这次行动将持续3个多月。
HYP: This action will last for more than 3 months.

SRC: 记者从徐州出发，兵分两路，一路走西南线，途经安徽、湖北、江西、湖南、广西、贵州、四川、重庆、云南、西藏等地;另一路走西北线，途经河南、陕西、甘肃、青海、新疆、宁夏、内蒙古、山西、河北等地，行程超过1万公里。
HYP: The reporter started from Xuzhou and divided his troops into two routes. One way took the southwest route, passing through Anhui, Hubei, Jiangxi, Hunan, Guangxi, Guizhou, Sichuan, Chongqing, Yunnan, Tibet and other places; the other route took the northwest route, passing through Henan, Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Xinjiang, Ningxia, Inner Mongolia, Shanxi, Hebei and other places, with a journey of more than 10000 kilometers.

SRC: 在报道形式上，《走村直播看脱贫》大胆融合。
HYP: In the form of reporting, “Walking the Village Live to See Poverty Alleviation” boldly integrated.

SRC: 大篷车所到村庄的经济发展情况，都将通过中央广播电视总台央视财经频道、央广经济之声、中国交通广播、央视财经新媒体进行播出。
HYP: The economic development of the villages visited by the caravan will be broadcast through the CCTV Financial Channel of the Central Radio and Television General Station, the Voice of the Central Broadcasting Economy, China Communications Radio, and CCTV Financial New Media.

SRC: 其中，电视直播将主要在央视财经频道的午间新闻节目《天下财经》完成(首播时间：周一至周日12：00-13:00 )，央视财经频道的黄金档新闻栏目《经济信息联播》将开设脱贫报道专栏(首播时间：周一至周日20：30-21:30 )。
HYP: Among them, the TV live broadcast will be mainly completed on the afternoon news program “World Finance” of CCTV Financial Channel (premier time: Monday to Sunday 12:00-13:00), and the prime news column “Economic Information Network” of CCTV Financial Channel will set up a poverty alleviation report column (first broadcast time: Monday to Sunday 20:30-21:30).

SRC: 同时，大篷车将对所到的每个村庄在央视财经客户端进行长达1小时的直播，观众通过下载央视财经APP，可以观看直播，参与抽奖活动。
HYP: At the same time, the caravan will broadcast a live broadcast of up to 1 hour to each village in the CCTV financial client. The audience can watch the live broadcast and participate in the lottery by downloading the CCTV financial APP.

SRC: 在技术应用和演播室设计上，《 走村直播看脱贫》勇于突破，首创了“外场新媒体大篷车”。
HYP: In terms of technology application and studio design, "Walking Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation" has the courage to break through and pioneered the "outfield new media caravan".

SRC: 该车搭载5G新媒体移动云制播系统，利用5G+4K/8K+AI技术，实现线上线下、大屏小屏，电视广播的有机结合。
HYP: The car is equipped with a 5G new media mobile cloud production and broadcast system, using 5G 4K/8K AI technology to realize the organic combination of online and offline, large screen and small screen, and TV broadcasting.

SRC: 配置三讯演播区，演播区由集装箱改装而成，长12米、宽2.55米、高3.98米，箱体采用液压自动展开结构，最大可以上翻120度。
HYP: Equipped with Sanxun studio area, the studio area is converted from a container, 12 meters long, 2.55 meters wide and 3.98 meters high. The box body adopts hydraulic automatic expansion structure, which can be turned up to 120 degrees at most.

SRC: 演播区也可以自动展开，并外接扩展平台，面积50多平方米，可以满足大部分节目的场景要求。
HYP: The studio area can also be automatically expanded and an external expansion platform is connected, covering an area of more than 50 square meters, which can meet the scene requirements of most programs.

SRC: 张继科林小宅组队力挺有肌少年-新华网
HYP: Zhang Jike Lin Xiaozhai team up to support muscular teenagers-Xinhuanet.

SRC: 运动少年热血竞技秀《运动吧少年》在7月11日正式登陆湖南卫视。
HYP: The sports youth hot-blooded competitive show "Sports Bar Boys" officially landed on Hunan Satellite TV on July 11th.

SRC: 运动领队张继科和运动助理林小宅跨界同台,林丹和傅园慧点评各有风格,而“庞然大物”般的力量拔杆装置的硬核上场,更让节目“燃”力十足。
HYP: Sports leader Zhang Jike and sports assistant Lin Xiaozhai crossed the stage, Lin Dan and Fu Yuanhui commented on their own styles, and the hard core of the "behemoth"-like power pole pulling device went on stage, which made the show "burning" with full power.

SRC: 首集中,11位运动少年亮相力量赛道,外形惊艳现场观众的同时,竞技台上的“强冲突”“强对抗”“强心脏”也受到关注。
HYP: In the first episode, 11 sports teenagers appeared on the power track, and their appearances stunned the audience, while the "strong conflict" "strong confrontation" and "strong heart" on the arena also attracted attention.

SRC: 其中,“ 强冲突”来自超A体育生乔文一,他在比赛前公然挑衅同赛道中有“花美男”之称的徐志滨,呛声徐志滨的外形条件应该去唱跳节目,甚至放出“输了别把妆哭花了”的狠话。
HYP: Among them, "strong conflict" came from Super A sports student Qiao Wenyi, who before the game blatantly provoked Xu Zhibin, who is known as "Flower Beauty Boy" on the same track, choking that Xu Zhibin's appearance condition should go to sing and dance the show, and even let out the ruthless words of "don't put makeup on and cry when you lose".

SRC: 一番言论让场上的少年和运动领队们都倒吸一口凉气。
HYP: The remarks made the teenagers and the sports leaders on the field gasp a sigh of relief.

SRC: 而“强对抗”更像是神仙打架,被誉为“大魔王”的孙健淇碰上同样实力强劲的张鑫栋,上演强强对决。
HYP: And "strong confrontation" was more like an immortal fight, and Sun Jianqi, known as the "big devil", met the equally strong Zhang Dongxin to stage a strong confrontation.

SRC: 而他们的身份也让人始料未及,孙健淇是热爱健身的演员,张鑫栋则是退役特战队员、三次勇士勋章获得者。
HYP: And their identities were also unexpected, Sun Jian is a fitness-loving actor, and Zhang Xindong is a retired special combat team member and three-time warrior medal winner.

SRC: 比赛一开始,两位少年就拼尽全力快速拔出小杆,在大杆上的持久对抗让现场观众为他们捏了一把汗。
HYP: At the beginning of the game, the two teenagers tried their best to quickly pull out the small pole, and the lasting confrontation on the big pole made the audience squeeze a sweat for them.

SRC: 在紧张的赛况下,张继科作为《运动吧少年》运动领队之一,也在一旁认真观战。
HYP: Under the tense competition situation, Zhang Jike, as one of the sports team leaders of "Sports Bar Junior", also watched the battle seriously.

SRC: 在点评环节,他也十分细心,对输了比赛的一方少年耐心鼓励,帮助复盘过程中的每一个失误点。
HYP: In the commenting session, he was also very attentive, patiently encouraging the teenagers who lost the game, and helping every mistake in the review process.

SRC: 而运动助理林小宅则是花式助攻,她毫不掩饰对颜值实力在线的少年们的欣赏。
HYP: While the sports assistant Lin Xiaozhai was a fancy assist, she made no secret of her appreciation for the online teenagers with good looks and strength.

SRC: 在了解到运动少年们超负荷的日常训练时,更是心生敬佩。
HYP: When learning about the overloaded daily training of sports teenagers, it was more admiration.

SRC: 同样是运动领队的林丹和傅园慧则各有风格,一个是气定神闲派“预言家” , 一个则是用笑容驱散紧张氛围的“洪荒少女” 。
HYP: Lin Dan and Fu Yuanhui, who are also the sports leaders, have their own styles, one is a calm and idle "prophet", and the other is a "Honghuang girl" who uses a smile to dispel the tension.

SRC: 另外,吉克隽逸和刘烨作为运动助理,也围绕运动少年制造了不少爆笑话题。
HYP: In addition, as sports assistants, Ji Kejunyi and Liu Ye have also created a lot of hilarious topics around sports teenagers.

SRC: 法国南特教堂大火：教区志愿者承认纵火平时和善寡言-中新网
HYP: Church fire in Nantes, France: Parish volunteer admits to arson, usually kind and reticent - China News Service.

SRC: 中新网7月26日电据外媒报道，7月18日，法国南特的宗教历史建筑瑰宝、著名的圣彼得与圣保罗大教堂，在一场火灾当中受到严重损毁，大管风琴完全毁坏。
HYP: Chinanews.com, July 26 (Xinhua) -- On July 18, the religious historical architectural treasure of Nantes, France, the famous St. Peter and St. Paul Cathedral, was seriously damaged in a fire, and the grand organ was completely destroyed, according to foreign media reports.

SRC: 当地时间26日，南特检察官宣布，一名在大教堂当中负责保卫工作的教区志愿者已经被起诉，罪名是“纵火毁坏” 。
HYP: On the 26th local time, the Nantes prosecutor announced that a parish volunteer who was in charge of guarding among the cathedral has been charged with "arson damage".

SRC: 他已承认，是自己在教堂里点火。
HYP: He has admitted that it was himself who set the fire in the church.

SRC: 报道称，当地检察官塞纳斯表示，这名39岁、来自卢旺达的教区志愿者承认，自己夜里在大教堂当中的三处点火。
HYP: According to reports, local prosecutor Cenas said that the 39-year-old parish volunteer from Rwanda admitted that he set fire to three places in the middle of the cathedral at night.

SRC: 此人的律师则表示，纵火者现在很后悔做出这种事。
HYP: The man's lawyer said that the arsonist now regrets doing such a thing.

SRC: 此人几年前通过避难的途径，进入法国，在本次火灾事发地教区得到庇护，在教堂里得到收留。
HYP: The man entered France several years ago through the route of refuge, was sheltered in the parish where this fire occurred, and was received in the church.

SRC: 检方指出，最近，他尝试更新签证，正在和警察局对此进行对话沟通。
HYP: The prosecution pointed out that recently, he tried to renew his visa and was communicating with the police department about it.

SRC: 但教堂方面表示仍然不敢相信，这名平时非常善良、面带笑容，但不怎么说话的信徒，会毁坏他如此热爱的教堂。
HYP: But the church side said it still couldn't believe that the believer, who is usually very kind and smiling, but didn't speak much, would destroy the church he loved so much.

SRC: 7月18日火灾发生的当天，这名志愿者就已经因为叙述当中出现逻辑不通的问题，而接受过警方问询调查，但他后来被释放。
HYP: On the day of the fire on July 18, the volunteer had already been questioned by the police because of an illogical problem in the narrative, but he was later released.

SRC: 图为消防员在现场进行救援。
HYP: The picture shows firefighters at the scene for rescue.

SRC: 25日晚间，由于巴黎中央警察局实验室的专业工程师获取了新的证据，此人又再一次被传讯。
HYP: On the evening of the 25th, the man was interrogated again because the professional engineers of the laboratory of the Paris Central Police Department obtained new evidence.

SRC: 这一次，男子承认了自己纵火的行为。
HYP: This time, the man admitted his act of arson.

SRC: 据报道，如果蓄意纵火毁坏的罪名成立，嫌犯将可能面临10年监禁和15万欧元的罚款。
HYP: According to reports, if convicted of deliberate arson destruction, the suspect could face 10 years in prison and a fine of 150000 euros.

SRC: 报道称，此次大火给圣皮埃尔与圣保罗大教堂造成了严重损失，教堂内的管风琴被完全烧毁，管风琴后面的彩色玻璃窗也受损严重。
HYP: Reports said that the fire caused serious damage to the Cathedral of St. Pierre and St. Paul, the organ in the church was completely burned, and the stained glass window behind the organ was also seriously damaged.

SRC: 法国历史保护建筑首席建筑师布鲁内认为，保守估计，南特大教堂复原工作至少要有3年。
HYP: Brunet, the chief architect of the historic preservation building in France, believes that conservative estimates will take at least three years to restore the cathedral of Nantes.

SRC: 飓风“汉娜”登陆美得州或引发河水暴涨和山洪-中新网
HYP: Hurricane "Hanna" makes landfall in the United States or triggers soaring rivers and flash floods - Chinanews.com.cn, July 26 (Xinhua) -- At 5 pm, local time on the 25th, Hurricane "Hanna" made landfall in Texas, the United States, and will bring strong storms and soaring rivers to Texas, and may also trigger life-threatening flash floods, according to comprehensive foreign media reports.

SRC: 中新网7月26日电综合外媒报道，当地时间25日下午5时，飓风“汉娜”登陆美国得克萨斯州，将给得州带来强风暴雨、河水暴涨，还可能引发威胁生命的山洪。
HYP: The National Hurricane Center said that Hurricane "Hanna" is expected to carry heavy rain, sweep over parts of southern and northeastern Texas, and the rain or trigger the outbreak of some streams and flash floods that are life-threatening.

SRC: 国家飓风中心说，预计飓风“汉娜”会挟带暴雨，扫过得州南部与东北部部分地区，雨势或引发部分溪水暴涨以及威胁生命的山洪爆发。
HYP: Reports said that the most severely affected by Hurricane "Hanna" is the area south of Corpus Christi to the mouth of the Rio Grande River, while widespread flash floods may break out in the Rio Grande Valley.

SRC: 报道称，受飓风“汉娜”影响最严重的是科珀斯克里斯蒂市以南到格兰德河河口地区，而里奥格兰德山谷可能爆发大范围的山洪。
HYP: "Any hurricane is a huge challenge," Texas Governor Abbott said on the 25th.

SRC: 得州州长阿博特25日表示：“任何飓风都是一个巨大的挑战。”
HYP: There are 32 counties in the state that have entered a state of disaster emergency because of the hurricane.

SRC: 该州有32个郡因为飓风进入灾难紧急状态。
HYP: Corpus Christi, a city with a population of over 320000, has closed libraries and museums, and residents are on guard.

SRC: 科珀斯克里斯蒂市这座人口超32万的城市，已关闭图书馆与博物馆，居民严阵以待。
HYP: Abbott also said that at a time when Texas is being hit hard by the new crown epidemic, the hurricane cannot be allowed to bring more casualties to Texas.

SRC: 阿博特还说，在得州正在遭遇新冠疫情重创之际，不能再让这场飓风给得州带来更多伤亡。
HYP: According to reports, precipitation in southern Texas is expected to reach 6 to 12 inches on the night of the 26th, and 3 to 5 inches of rain will also be seen in northern Texas and coastal Louisiana.

SRC: 据报道，得州南部地区降水量预计将在26日夜间达到6至12英寸，得克萨斯州北部地区和路易斯安那州沿海地区也将出现3至5英寸的降雨。
HYP: Due to factors such as global warming, "Hanna" formed earlier than previous Atlantic hurricane seasons.

SRC: 由于全球变暖等因素影响，“汉娜”的形成早于以往的大西洋飓风季。
HYP: Under normal circumstances, the first hurricane in the Atlantic usually does not form until mid-August, according to reports.

SRC: 一般情况下，大西洋的第一场飓风通常要到8月中旬才会形成。
HYP: According to reports, precipitation in southern Texas is expected to reach 6 to 12 inches on the night of the 26th, and 3 to 5 inches of rain will also occur in northern Texas and coastal Louisiana.

SRC: 波兰将退出欧洲防止对女子施暴的条约
HYP: Poland to withdraw from the European treaty to prevent violence against women.

SRC: 波兰司法部星期六表示，波兰下个星期将采取步骤，退出欧洲防止对妇女施暴条约。
HYP: Poland will take steps next week to withdraw from the European treaty to prevent violence against women, Poland's justice ministry said on Saturday.

SRC: 波兰右翼的政府内阁表示，该条约要求学校教授学生有关性别问题的议题，践踏了学生父母的权利。
HYP: Poland's right-wing government cabinet said the treaty, which requires schools to teach students about gender issues, tramples on the rights of students' parents.

SRC: 波兰司法部长焦布洛举行记者会说，他领导的司法部星期一将向劳工和家庭部提出开始退出条约的要求。
HYP: Poland's Justice Minister Gioblo said at a press conference that his ministry on Monday would submit a request to the Ministry of Labour and Family to start withdrawing from the treaty.

SRC: 那项条约又名伊斯坦布尔公约。
HYP: That treaty is also known as the Istanbul Convention.

SRC: 焦布洛说，“该条约包含一些我们认为是有害的意思形态性质的元素。”
HYP: “The treaty contains elements of a morphological nature of meaning that we believe are harmful,” Gioblo said.

SRC: 焦布洛说，“该条约包含一些我们认为是有害的<v>意思</v>形态性质的元素。”
HYP: “The treaty contains elements of a morphological nature of meaning that we believe are harmful,” Gioblo said.

SRC: 波兰执政的法律与公正党及其及其执政联盟伙伴跟罗马天主教教会有密切的同盟关系，提倡保守的社会议程。
HYP: Poland's ruling Law and Justice party and its ruling coalition partners have close alliances with the Roman Catholic Church and promote a conservative social agenda.

SRC: 波兰总统杜达在这个月成功的连任竞选期间将敌视同性恋权利作为主要议题之一。
HYP: Polish President Duda has made hostility to gay rights one of the main issues during his successful re-election campaign this month.

SRC: 星期五，成千上万的波兰人(其中大部分是妇女)在华沙和其他一些城市举行反对退出公约的抗议。
HYP: Thousands of Poles, most of them women, staged protests in Warsaw and some other cities on Friday against withdrawing from the pact.

SRC: 抗议的组织者之一莱姆帕特在华沙举行的抗议游行中说，“退出条约的目的就是将家暴合法化”。
HYP: Lempat, one of the protest's organizers, said at a protest march in Warsaw that “the purpose of withdrawing from the treaty is to decriminalize domestic violence.”

SRC: 一些抗议者举着横幅，上面写着“法律与公正党是妇女的地狱”。
HYP: Some protesters carried banners that read “The Law and Justice Party is a hell for women.”

SRC: 法律与公正党长久以来抱怨伊斯坦布尔公约。
HYP: The Law and Justice party has long complained about the Istanbul Convention.

SRC: 波兰先前的中间派执政的政府2015年批准了该公约。
HYP: Poland's previous centrist ruling government ratified the convention in 2015 .

SRC: 法律与公正党政府表示，该条约不尊重宗教，要求在学校里教授自由派的社会政策。
HYP: The Law and Justice party government has said the treaty does not respect religion and requires liberal social policies to be taught in schools.

SRC: 但截至目前该党一直没有决定退出该公约。
HYP: But as of now the party has not decided to withdraw from the convention.

SRC: （根据路透社报道）
HYP: (According to Reuters)

SRC: 据越通社报道，格里沃里认为，越南25年来为东盟的发展作出巨大贡献。
HYP: According to the Vietnam News Agency, Grivori believes that Vietnam has made great contributions to the development of ASEAN over the past 25 years.

SRC: 越南不仅是东盟负责任的一员，更是东盟的火车头。
HYP: Vietnam is not only a responsible member of ASEAN, but also the locomotive of ASEAN.

SRC: 格里沃里表示，俄罗斯乃至亚欧经济联盟认为，越南为东盟提高其地位，对外推广其形象做出贡献。
HYP: Grivory said that Russia and even the ASEM believe that Vietnam contributes to ASEAN to enhance its status and promote its image externally.

SRC: 他强调，“东盟因此应该感谢越南。”
HYP: He emphasized that “ASEAN should therefore thank Vietnam.”

SRC: 格里沃里表示，分析人士对越南所提出的和平倡议给予认可。
HYP: Grivory said that analysts recognize the peace initiative proposed by Vietnam.

SRC: 越南愿意同东盟各国分享经验，对包括东海问题在内的亚太地区面临的问题提出建设性的和平措施。
HYP: Vietnam is willing to share its experience with ASEAN countries and put forward constructive peace measures on issues facing the Asia-Pacific region, including the East Sea issue.

SRC: 关于越南与俄罗斯在东盟框架下的合作，格里沃里认为，越南为俄罗斯与东盟的合作关系提供支持，帮助俄罗斯在这一合作框架下获得利益。
HYP: Regarding the cooperation between Vietnam and Russia under the ASEAN framework, Grivory believes that Vietnam provides support for Russia's cooperation with ASEAN, helping Russia gain benefits under this cooperation framework.

SRC: 包括俄罗斯在内的亚欧经济联盟与越南签署自贸协定后能够进军东盟市场。
HYP: The ASEM, including Russia, was able to enter the ASEAN market after signing a free trade agreement with Vietnam.

SRC: 格里沃里建议最大限度扩大亚欧经济联盟与东盟各国的自由贸易区，进而创造经济和安全稳定的平台。
HYP: Grivory suggested maximizing the free trade area between the ASEM and ASEAN countries, in turn creating a platform for economic and security stability.

SRC: 格里沃里同时相信，俄罗斯、越南与东盟正在步入正轨并将实现其目标。
HYP: At the same time, Grivory believes that Russia, Vietnam and ASEAN are on track and will achieve their goals.

SRC: 从现在到2020年底，北江省将具备必要条件，尤其是在基础设施，人力资源和土地等方面，以便主动迎来外资流入，特别是拥有价值链和转让先进技术的跨国集团。
HYP: From now to the end of 2020, Bac Giang Province will have the necessary conditions, especially in terms of infrastructure, human resources and land, in order to proactively usher in the inflow of foreign capital, especially multinational groups with value chains and transfer of advanced technologies.

SRC: 此外，北江省将办理好递交政府总理决定对越韩工业区基础设施建设与经营项目投资的主张和批准将本省安山-北陇和安闾两个工业-城市-服务业区补充列入至2020年越南工业区发展总体规划的文件。
HYP: In addition, Bac Giang Province will handle the submission of the government premier's decision to proposition and approve the investment in infrastructure construction and operation projects in the Vietnam-Korean industrial zone to supplement the two industrial-city-service industry zones in the province, Ansan-Bac Long and An Lu, for inclusion in the overall plan for the development of Vietnam's industrial zones by 2020. Bac Giang Province will focus on accelerating the progress of various projects, especially in infrastructure construction and operation projects in industrial park clusters such as Wo Phuong, Gwangju, Sungai-Nai Hwang, etc., to form a land fund for attracting investment.

SRC: 与此同时，北江省着力加快各项目的进度，尤其是在和富、光州，双溪-内皇等工业园区集群的基础设施建设经营项目，为招商引资形成土地基金。
HYP: Within 2020, Bac Giang Provincial Bureau of Industry and Trade will participate in providing suggestions on the planning of Ding industrial zones and industrial clusters to be incorporated into provincial planning.

SRC: 在2020年内，北江省工贸局参就定工业区、工业集群规划建言献策，以纳入省规划。
HYP: Bac Giang Province has determined to combine the development of industrial park clusters with safeguarding national defense security, protecting the ecological environment, and ensuring food security, in turn boosting the balanced development of industry; it has comprehensive infrastructure such as electricity, water supply, transportation and telecommunications, and combines them with other social infrastructure such as urban construction, trade services, housing for workers and medical and health care, and education.

SRC: 北江省确定将发展工业园区集群与保障国防安全，保护生态环境，保障粮食安全相结合，进而助推工业均衡发展；拥有全面的电力，供水，交通和电信等基础设施，并与城市建设，贸易服务，工人住房和医疗卫生、教育等其他社会基础设施等相结合。
HYP: In industrial parks, Bac Giang Province focuses on calling for investment projects in high-tech, clean technologies in the fields of electricity, electronics, telecommunications equipment, precision machinery, auxiliary industries, and so on.

SRC: 北江省确定将发展工业园区集群与<v>保障国防安全，保护生态环境，保障粮食安全相结合，进而助推工业均衡发展；拥有全面的电力，供水，交通和电信等基础设施，并与城市建设，贸易服务，工人住房和医疗卫生、教育等其他社会基础设施等相结合</v>。
HYP: In industrial parks, Bac Giang Province focuses on calling for investment projects in high-tech, clean technologies in the fields of electricity, electronics, telecommunications equipment, precision machinery, auxiliary industries, and so on.

SRC: 在工业区，北江省着力呼吁对电力，电子，电信设备，精密机械，辅助工业等领域中的高科技，清洁技术的投资项目。
HYP: In industrial park clusters, the province calls for small and medium-sized investment projects in the fields of production, utilization of local labor, especially agricultural products and food processing.

SRC: 在工业园区集群，该省呼吁对生产、利用就地劳动力、尤其是农产品、食品加工等领域的中小型规模投资项目。
HYP: In the future, Bac Giang Province will focus on accelerating investment in infrastructure for the logistics center of Bac Giang City, developing synchronously with industrial park clusters to optimize the circulation of goods, currency, and help to reduce production costs, increase the value of goods, optimize supply chains, and develop multimodal transport, thereby creating attractiveness for investors to invest in the province.

SRC: 未来，北江省将着力加快对北江市后勤物流中心的基础设施的投资，与工业园区集群同步发展，以优化货物、货币流通和有助于降低生产成本，提高货物价值，优化供应链，发展多式联运，从而为投资者投资于本省创造吸引力。
HYP: In the industrial park clusters, Bac Giang Province is calling for small and medium-sized investment projects in the fields of production, utilization of local labor, especially agricultural products, food processing, etc.

SRC: （德国之声中文网）过去两周内，西班牙的新冠确冠病例大幅回升，多日出现上千新增病例。
HYP: (Deutsche Welle Chinese Network) In the past two weeks, Spain's new crown confirmed cases have rebounded significantly, with thousands of new cases appearing in multiple days.

SRC: 英国政府周六（7月25日）晚间临时决定，从当地时间26日零点起，将西班牙从安全旅行名单中移除，从西班牙入境英国的人必须隔离14天。
HYP: The British government temporarily decided on Saturday (July 25) evening to remove Spain from the list of safe travel from 00:00 local time on the 26th, and people entering the UK from Spain must quarantine for 14 days.

SRC: 正在西班牙度假的英国游客听闻此项决定纷纷表示惊讶、担心、甚至愤怒，因为消息突如其来，令人措手不及。
HYP: British tourists who are vacationing in Spain have expressed surprise, worry, and even anger when they heard the decision, because the news came out of the blue and was caught off guard.

SRC: 据报道，英国交通大臣沙普斯（Grant Shapps）目前也在西班牙度假。
HYP: According to reports, British Transport Minister Grant Shapps is also currently vacationing in Spain.

SRC: 英国发布隔离措施前，挪威也已宣布从西班牙返回挪威的人要进行为期10天的隔离。
HYP: Before the UK issued the quarantine measures, Norway has also announced that people returning from Spain to Norway will undergo a 10-day quarantine.

SRC: 法国和比利时建议本国居民放弃前方巴塞罗那以及周边地区度假的计划。
HYP: France and Belgium have advised their residents to abandon plans for vacations in Barcelona ahead and the surrounding areas.

SRC: 这些地区的海滩人满为患，人与人之间无法保持社交距离，警察一度需要采取措施，以减少海滩游客的数量。
HYP: The beaches in these areas are overcrowded, and social distancing cannot be maintained between people, and the police once needed to take measures to reduce the number of beach tourists.

SRC: 旅游业是西班牙的重要支柱产业
HYP: Tourism is an important pillar industry in Spain.

SRC: 西班牙：这里是安全的
HYP: Spain: It is safe here.

SRC: 针对英国做出的决定，西班牙外交部周日表示，该国疫情得到控制。
HYP: In response to the decision made by the United Kingdom, the Spanish Foreign Ministry said on Sunday that the outbreak in the country was under control.

SRC: 西班牙外交部长冈萨雷斯（Arancha Gonzalez Laya）向媒体强调：" 西班牙是安全的，不仅对西班牙人而言，对游客来说也是安全的。"
HYP: Spanish Foreign Minister Arancha Gonzalez Laya stressed to the media: "Spain is safe, not only for Spaniards, but also for tourists."

SRC: 西班牙政府将试图说服英国政府将巴利阿里群岛（Balearic Islands）和加那利群岛（Canary Islands）排除在隔离措施之外。
HYP: The Spanish government will try to persuade the British government to exclude the Balearic Islands and the Canary Islands from the quarantine measures.

SRC: 理由是，这两个旅游胜地的感染率远低于英国本土。
HYP: The reason is that the infection rate in these two tourist destinations is much lower than that of the British mainland.

SRC: 为防止疫情扩散，西班牙加泰罗尼亚地区也已重启"禁足令"。
HYP: To prevent the spread of the epidemic, the Catalonia region of Spain has also restarted the "foot ban".

SRC: 旅游业是西班牙的重要支柱产业，而西班牙是最受英国游客青睐的度假地之一。
HYP: Tourism is an important pillar industry in Spain, and Spain is one of the most popular holiday destinations for British tourists.

SRC: 英国的这一决定预计将会使西班牙的旅游业大受影响。
HYP: This decision by the United Kingdom is expected to greatly affect Spain's tourism industry.

SRC: 安静/任琛（德新社，路透社）
HYP: Quiet / Renchen (News, Reuters)

SRC: 中伏首日：北京暂别高温酷暑开启降雨模式-新华网
HYP: The first day of Zhongfu: Beijing bid farewell to high temperature and heat, turn on rainfall mode-Xinhua.

SRC: 新华社北京7月26日电（记者倪元锦）7月26日是今年的“中伏”首日。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 26 (Reporter Ni Yuanjin) July 26 is the first day of "Zhongfu" this year.

SRC: 26日凌晨的大风骤雨对流天气，驱散了连日来笼罩在北京地区的高温酷暑，新一轮降雨天气将持续数日。
HYP: The convective weather of strong winds and showers in the early morning of the 26th has dispelled the high temperature and heat that has enveloped the Beijing area for several days, and a new round of rainy weather will continue for several days.

SRC: 北京市气象台26日11时发布称，26日北京有分散性阵雨（伴有弱雷电），日最高气温仅为27℃；夜间阴有小到中雨（伴有弱<v>雷电</v>），夜间最低气温为23℃。
HYP: The Beijing Meteorological Observatory issued at 11 o'clock on the 26th that there were scattered showers (accompanied by weak thunder and lightning) in Beijing on the 26th, and the daily maximum temperature was only 27 °C; there were light to moderate rain (accompanied by weak lightning) at night, and the minimum temperature at night was 23 °C.

SRC: 北京市气象台26日11时发布称，26日北京有分散性阵雨（伴有弱雷电），日最高气温仅为27℃；夜间阴有小到中雨（伴有弱雷电），夜间最低气温为23℃。
HYP: The Beijing Meteorological Observatory issued at 11 o'clock on the 26th that there were scattered showers (accompanied by weak thunder and lightning) in Beijing on the 26th, and the daily maximum temperature was only 27 °C; there were light to moderate rain (accompanied by weak lightning) at night, and the minimum temperature at night was 23 °C.

SRC: 而在此前的24日至25日，北京全市处在高温蓝色预警中，大部地区日最高气温在37℃左右，局地出现超过40℃的高温。
HYP: On the 24th to 25th before this, the whole city of Beijing was under the blue warning of high temperature, with the daily maximum temperature in most areas around 37 °C, and high temperatures exceeding 40 °C locally.

SRC: 伏天是一年之中气温最高、潮湿、闷热的日子，一年有“三伏”，最热在中伏，中国百姓说的“苦夏”就在此时。
HYP: Futian is the highest temperature, humid, and sultry day in the year. There are "three volts" in a year, and the hottest is in Zhongfu, and the "bitter summer" that the Chinese people say is at this time.

SRC: 入伏时，家家填满谷仓，民间有“一伏饺子二伏面”的说法。
HYP: When entering Futian, homes fill up barns, and the folk have a saying of "one-volt dumplings and two-fu noodles".

SRC: 根据目前预报，未来三天，北京多阴雨天气。
HYP: According to the current forecast, it will be cloudy and rainy in Beijing for the next three days.

SRC: 气象部门提示公众尽量减少山区游玩，谨防地质灾害。
HYP: The meteorological department reminds the public to minimize mountain trips and beware of geological disasters.

SRC: 据了解，今年的“中伏”有20天，从7月26日开始，至8月14日结束。
HYP: It is understood that this year's "Zhongfu" has 20 days, starting on July 26 and ending on August 14th.

SRC: 进入“中伏”后，人会感到身体乏力、食欲不振。
HYP: After entering "Zhongfu", people will feel physically weak and lose their appetite.

SRC: 饮食上可选择绿豆、薏仁等具有清热解暑、健脾开胃作用的食物，以及苦菜、苦瓜等苦味食物，可有助于增进食欲、祛除暑气。
HYP: Foods that have the effect of clearing heat and relieving heat and strengthening the spleen and appetite, as well as bitter foods such as bitter cabbage and bitter gourd, can help increase appetite and dispel summer heat.

SRC: 饮食上<v>可选择绿豆、薏仁</v>等具有清热解暑、健脾开胃作用的食物，以及苦菜、苦瓜等苦味食物，可有助于增进食欲、祛除暑气。
HYP: Foods that have the effect of clearing heat and relieving heat and strengthening the spleen and appetite, as well as bitter foods such as bitter cabbage and bitter gourd, can help increase appetite and dispel summer heat.

SRC: 《叮咚上线!老师好》下周上线薛兆丰领衔“知识发起人-新华网
HYP: "Dingdong Online! Hello Teacher" will be launched next week, with Xue Zhaofeng leading the "Knowledge Initiator - Xinhuanet.

SRC: 又有新综艺上线。
HYP: There is another new variety show on the line."

SRC: 互动知识分享节目《叮咚上线!老师好》,将于7月20日起在湖南卫视播出。
HYP: The interactive knowledge sharing program "Dingdong Online! Hello Teacher" will be broadcast on Hunan Satellite TV from July 20th.

SRC: 据了解,节目将打造全新的全年龄青春课堂,一批有颜有型又有才的老师将上阵,挑战趣味性知识输出。
HYP: It is understood that the program will create a brand new all-age youth classroom, and a group of beautiful and talented teachers will go into battle to challenge the interesting knowledge output.

SRC: 与以往老师群体在大众心中的严肃印象不同,《叮咚上线!老师好》集结的是一群颜值和才华兼具的知识代表。
HYP: Different from the serious impression of the teacher group in the public's mind in the past, "Dingdong Online! Hello Teacher" gathers a group of knowledge representatives with both face value and talent.

SRC: 他们既是来自各学科的青年知识榜样,还是一群会抖包袱、擅长寓教于乐的全能“段子手”。
HYP: They are not only youth knowledge role models from various disciplines, but also a group of all-round "Duanzis" who can shake their baggage and are good at entertaining and entertaining.

SRC: 节目中,这群优秀青年知识榜样作为“知识分享官”,将要挑战趣味性的知识课堂。
HYP: In the program, this group of excellent young knowledge role models, as "Knowledge Sharing Officers", will challenge the interesting knowledge classroom.

SRC: 他们需要通过有态度的知识输出,展现所在学科最有趣的一面,来打动在场的观众。
HYP: They need to impress the audience present by presenting the most interesting side of their discipline through knowledge output with attitude.

SRC: 而全年龄观众组成的“有道问问团”现场会提出百变问题,给“知识分享官”的授课提高难度,也给节目增添些许刺激的氛围。
HYP: And the "Youdao Asking Group" composed of all-age audiences will ask ever-changing questions on the spot, increase the difficulty of teaching for the "Knowledge Sharing Officers", and also add a little stimulating atmosphere to the program.

SRC: 据透露,此次“知识分享官”中有中国人民大学附属中学物理教师李永乐、考研指导名师张雪峰以及拥有十年从业经验的历史教师王磊等优秀青年教师,他们将以意想不到的方式向现场观众展现各个学科的“硬核”知识。
HYP: It is revealed that this "Knowledge Sharing Officer" includes outstanding young teachers such as Li Yongle, a physics teacher at the Middle School affiliated to Renmin University of China, Zhang Xuefeng, a famous instructor of the entrance examination, and Wang Lei, a history teacher with ten years of experience, who will present the "hardcore" knowledge of various disciplines to the audience in an unexpected way.

SRC: 另外,节目还邀请经济学教授薛兆丰作为节目的“知识发起人”,联合“叮咚助教”杜海涛和靳梦佳,与观众畅谈青春,打造“全民青春公开课”。
