HYP: In addition, the program also invites Xue Zhaofeng, an economics professor, as the "knowledge initiator" of the program, and joins "Dingdong Teaching Assistants" Du Haitao and Jin Mengjia to talk about youth with the audience and create a "National Youth Open Class."

SRC: 香港特区政府政务司司长：形势严峻全力抗疫-中新网
HYP: Chief Secretary for Administration of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region Government: The Situation is Grim and Fully Fight Against the Epidemic - China News Service.

SRC: 新华社香港7月26日电香港特区政府政务司司长张建宗26日表示，香港新冠肺炎疫情形势持续严峻，若疫情转坏，特区政府将果断采取更严厉管控措施，进一步限制经营场所营业和减少市民外出空间。
HYP: Hong Kong, July 26 (Xinhua) -- The Chief Secretary for Administration of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region Government, Zhang Jianzong, said on the 26th that the situation of the new crown pneumonia epidemic in Hong Kong continues to be severe, and if the epidemic situation turns bad, the SAR government will decisively adopt more stringent control measures to further restrict the operation of business premises and reduce the space for citizens to go out.

SRC: 但现阶段特区政府无意推出“居家令”或“禁足令”限制市民外出。
HYP: But at this stage, the SAR government has no intention to introduce a "stay-at-home order" or a "stay-at-home order" to restrict citizens from going out.

SRC: 张建宗当日发表题为《形势严峻全力抗疫》的网志。
HYP: Zhang Jianzong published a weblog titled "Fighting Against the Epidemic in a Grim Situation" on the same day.

SRC: 他表示，这一波疫情是半年以来最严峻的，未来两星期将会十分关键，要尽力防止病毒在社区进一步扩散。
HYP: He said that this wave of the epidemic is the most severe in half a year, and that the next two weeks will be very critical, and we must try our best to prevent the virus from spreading further in the community.

SRC: 除了特区政府采取必要措施之外，市民自律和配合也非常重要。
HYP: In addition to the SAR government taking necessary measures, citizens' self-discipline and cooperation are also very important.

SRC: 他呼吁市民务必尽量留在家中，减少社交接触和外出用餐。
HYP: He called on citizens to stay at home as much as possible, reduce social contact and go out to eat.

SRC: 市民应配合佩戴口罩的强制措施保护自己及他人，并注重个人和环境卫生及勤洗手，更应暂停非必要的亲友聚会或聚餐及减少到街市。
HYP: Citizens should cooperate with the mandatory measures to wear masks to protect themselves and others, and pay attention to personal and environmental hygiene and frequent hand washing, and moreover, suspend non-essential gatherings or gatherings of relatives and friends and reduce to the market.

SRC: 他表示，中央一直十分关心香港疫情变化及支持特区政府防疫抗疫工作，并积极回应行政长官最新要求，在加大检测能力和改装亚洲国际博览馆为类似“方舱医院”的工作上提供协助。
HYP: He said that the central government has always been very concerned about the changes in the epidemic situation in Hong Kong and supported the SAR government's anti-epidemic work, and actively responded to the latest request of the Chief Executive to provide assistance in increasing testing capacity and refitting the AsiaWorld-Expo into a similar "fangcang hospital".

SRC: 张建宗表示，特区政府为特定高风险群组，即安老院舍、残疾院舍及护养院员工、餐厅员工、出租车司机和物业管理员工提供的免费病毒检测已全面展开，涉及人数多达40万。
HYP: Zhang Jianzong said that the free virus testing provided by the SAR government for specific high-risk groups, namely residential care homes for the elderly, disabled residents and nursing home employees, restaurant employees, taxi drivers and property management employees, has been fully launched, involving up to 400000 people.

SRC: 他十分关注出现在安老院舍的感染个案，特区政府已为安老院舍院友安排特定的临时检疫中心。
HYP: He is very concerned about the cases of infection appearing in residential care homes for the elderly, and the SAR government has arranged specific temporary quarantine centers for residents of residential care homes for the elderly.

SRC: 他表示，特区政府正在位于新界大屿山的竹篙湾检疫中心附近兴建隔离检疫设施，预计可在9月底前提供额外700套隔离房。
HYP: He said that the SAR government is constructing an isolation and quarantine facility near the Chuk Kho Wan Quarantine Center in Taishan, New Territories, and is expected to provide 700 additional isolation rooms by the end of September.

SRC: 行政长官也在19日宣布，特区政府将在竹篙湾检疫中心多兴建2000间隔离房，并争取于今年年底前落成。
HYP: The Chief Executive also announced on the 19th that the SAR government will build more than 2000 isolation rooms at the Chuk Kho Wan Quarantine Center, and strive to be completed by the end of this year.

SRC: 加上该隔离检疫中心已经投入使用的800间，年底前竹篙湾检疫中心预计可提供共3500间隔离房。
HYP: In addition to the 800 quarantine centers that have already been put into use, the Chu Kho Bay Quarantine Center is expected to provide a total of 3500 quarantine rooms by the end of the year.

SRC: 香港目前共有四个正在运作的隔离检疫中心，共提供约2600间隔离房。
HYP: There are currently four operational isolation and quarantine centers in Hong Kong, providing a total of about 2600 isolation rooms.

SRC: 此外，特区政府于24日重新启用位于香港岛的鲤鱼门公园度假村作为社区隔离设施，用于收治50岁以下有独立自理能力的患者。
HYP: In addition, the SAR government re-activated the Lei Yue Mun Park Resort on Hong Kong Island on the 24th as a community isolation facility for the treatment of patients under the age of 50 who are capable of taking care of themselves independently.

SRC: 美国首次以“人民币汇率低估”对中国展开反补贴调查
HYP: For the first time, the United States launched a countervailing investigation against China over the “undervaluation of the RMB exchange rate.”

SRC: 针对美国商务部近日宣布，决定对原产于中国的扎带（束线带）产品发起反倾销反补贴调查，并就“人民币汇率低估“项目发起调查。
HYP: In response to the recent announcement by the US Department of Commerce, it decided to launch an anti-dumping and countervailing investigation on cable ties (tie-ties) products originating in China, and to launch an investigation on the “undervaluation of the RMB exchange rate” project.

SRC: 中国商务部指出，这是美国首次在反补贴案件<v>中立案</v>调查所谓”人民币汇率低估“项目，中方对此坚决反对。
HYP: The Ministry of Commerce pointed out that this is the first time that the United States has filed a case to investigate the so-called “undervaluation of the RMB exchange rate” project in a countervailing case, and the Chinese side is firmly opposed to this.

SRC: 中国商务部指出，这是美国首次在反补贴案件中立案调查所谓”人民币汇率低估“项目，中方对此坚决反对。
HYP: The Ministry of Commerce pointed out that this is the first time that the United States has filed a case to investigate the so-called “undervaluation of the RMB exchange rate” project in a countervailing case, and the Chinese side is firmly opposed to this.

SRC: 中国商务部23日晚间特别就此发布新闻稿表示，中国实行以市场供求为基础、参考一篮子货币进行调节、有管理的浮动汇率制度，市场在汇率形成中起决定性作用。
HYP: The Ministry of Commerce of China issued a press release on this issue in particular on the evening of the 23rd, saying that China implements a managed floating exchange rate system based on market supply and demand, adjusted with reference to a basket of currencies, and the market plays a decisive role in the formation of the exchange rate.

SRC: 新闻稿强调，总体上，人民币汇率处于合理均衡水平，并没有被低估。
HYP: The press release emphasized that, on the whole, the RMB exchange rate is at a reasonable and balanced level and has not been undervalued.

SRC: 自2005年以来，人民币对美元已累计升值超过17% 。
HYP: Since 2005, the RMB has appreciated against the US dollar by more than 17 percent cumulatively.

SRC: 根据国际清算银行公布的数据，2005年初至2020年5月，人民币名目有效汇率升值38%，实际有效汇率升值49%，是G20经济体中最强势的货币，在全球范围内也是升值幅度最大的货币之一。
HYP: According to the data released by the Bank for International Settlements, from the beginning of 2005 to May 2020, the nominal effective exchange rate of the RMB appreciated by 38%, and the real effective exchange rate appreciated by 49%, making it the most powerful currency in the G20 economies and one of the most appreciated globally.

SRC: 商务部指出，汇率问题超出了成员按照世界贸易组织规则进行反补贴调查的权限。
HYP: The Ministry of Commerce pointed out that the exchange rate issue is beyond the competence of members to conduct countervailing investigations in accordance with the rules of the World Trade Organization.

SRC: 美国今年2月修改法规以对别国汇率进行反补贴调查，已涉嫌违反世贸组织WTO规则，受到多方面反对。
HYP: The United States amended its regulations in February this year to conduct countervailing investigations on the exchange rates of other countries, which has been suspected of violating WTO rules and has been opposed from many sides.

SRC: 新闻稿称，即使按照美国法规，申请人的申诉内容也存在大量错误，不具备财政资助、利益授予和专向性等反补贴必备要素。
HYP: The press release said that even in accordance with the US regulations, the applicant's complaint contained a large number of errors, and did not have the necessary elements of countervailing duties such as financial assistance, granting of benefits, and obligatory nature.

SRC: 中方敦促美方遵守现有国际规则，停止对所谓“人民币汇率低估”进行反补贴调查。
HYP: The Chinese side urges the US side to abide by existing international rules and stop conducting countervailing investigations on the so-called “undervaluation of the RMB exchange rate”.

SRC: 受中美关系紧张情势进一步升高影响，离岸、在岸人民币对美元汇率22日盘中一度大贬，双双跌破1美元兑人民币7.0元关口。
HYP: Affected by the further increase in Sino-US tensions, the exchange rates of offshore and onshore RMB against the US dollar fell sharply on the 22nd, and both fell below the 7.0 mark against the US dollar.

SRC: 美国商务部此举是否意在逼升人民币值得关注。
HYP: Whether this move by the US Department of Commerce intends to force the RMB to rise is worthy of attention.

SRC: 人民币对美元即期汇价23日升破7.0大关，收在6.9961。
HYP: The spot exchange rate against the US dollar rose above the 7.0 mark on the 23rd and closed at 6.9961.

SRC: 受官方调控的人民币对美元汇率中间价，24日下调17个基本点，报6.9938。
HYP: The officially regulated central parity of the RMB exchange rate against the US dollar was lowered by 17 basis points on the 24th to 6.9938.

SRC: 26日是菲律宾总统杜特尔特发表任内第五份国情咨文(SONA)前一日，当天菲律宾累计确诊新冠肺炎病例过8万，其中总统府新闻部(PCOO)及其直属机构职员确诊数增到25例。
HYP: The 26th is the day before Philippine President Duterte's fifth State of the Nation Address (SONA) during his term of office, when the cumulative number of confirmed cases of new coronary pneumonia in the Philippines surpassed 80000 on that day, of which the number of confirmed cases of the staff of the Presidential Office (PCOO) and its directly affiliated agencies increased to 25 cases.

SRC: 为此，PCOO已专门准备一个未接触过确诊职员的工作组，配合杜特尔特总统发表SONA的新闻发布工作。
HYP: To this end, the PCOO has specially prepared a working group who has not been in contact with the confirmed staff members to cooperate with President Duterte's press release of the SONA.

SRC: 为此，PCOO已专门准备一个未接触过确诊职员的工作组，配合杜特尔特总统发表SONA的新闻发布<v>工作</v>。
HYP: To this end, the PCOO has specially prepared a working group who has not been in contact with the confirmed staff members to cooperate with President Duterte's press release of the SONA.

SRC: PCOO部长马丁·安达纳尔26日接受DZBB电台采访表示，已为杜特尔特总统发表SONA方式预备两套方案。
HYP: PCOO Secretary Martin Andanar said in an interview with DZBB radio on the 26th that two sets of plans have been prepared for the way President Duterte will deliver the SONA.

SRC: 按A计划，杜特尔特27日下午将在位于奎松市的菲律宾国会(Batasang Pambansa)大楼发表SONA。
HYP: According to Plan A, Duterte will deliver the SONA at the Philippine Congress (Batasang Pambansa) building in Quezon City on the afternoon of the 27th.

SRC: 因为疫情原因，现场只为部分政府内阁成员和立法者安排50个席位，另专设视频会议室供其他内阁成员、地方政府官员等观看。
HYP: Because of the epidemic, only 50 seats are arranged on site for some government cabinet members and lawmakers, and a video conference room is set up for other cabinet members, local government officials, and others to watch.

SRC: 所有参会人员当天通过快速检测才能进入国会大楼。
HYP: All participants can enter the Congress building through rapid testing on the same day.

SRC: 一旦参会者有一人检测呈阳性，即启动B计划，即杜特尔特总统在总统府马拉卡南宫发表SONA，现场则安排更少的听会席位。
HYP: Once one of the participants tests positive, Plan B will be launched, that is, President Duterte will deliver the SONA at the Malacañang Palace, the presidential palace, and fewer listening seats will be arranged on-site.

SRC: 按照惯例，SONA将实时向菲全国直播。
HYP: As is customary, the SONA will be broadcast live to the Philippine nation in real time.

SRC: 截至发稿时，菲总统府尚未确认杜特尔特的家人是否会出席SONA。
HYP: As of press time, the Philippine Presidential Office has not confirmed whether Duterte's family members will attend the SONA.

SRC: 安达纳尔说，杜特尔特总统的SONA，将重点说明政府将如何带领菲律宾应对新冠肺炎疫情、恢复社会经济生活；还会提到他上任时的承诺，即反政府腐败、打击非法毒品和减贫。
HYP: Andanar said that President Duterte's SONA will focus on how the government will lead the Philippines to respond to the new crown pneumonia epidemic and restore social and economic life, and will also mention his commitments when he took office, namely anti-corruption, combating illegal drugs, and reducing poverty.

SRC: 杜特尔特还将说明本届政府的其他计划，包括创造更多的就业机会、振兴经济、促进教育，以及帮助在疫情中受难的海外菲律宾劳工等。
HYP: Duterte will also explain other plans of the current administration, including creating more job opportunities, revitalizing the economy, promoting education, and helping overseas Filipino workers who are suffering in the epidemic.

SRC: 深圳就出台健康条例公开征求意见-新华网
HYP: Shenzhen publicly solicits opinions on the introduction of health regulations - Xinhuanet.

SRC: 新华社深圳7月26日电（记者毛思倩、白瑜）鼓励居民勤做体检，及早发现问题；禁止向未成年人销售酒精饮料；建立网络游戏健康审查制度；用人单位要配备专兼职健康管理人员…… 日前《深圳经济特区健康条例（征求意见稿）》正式发布，深圳居民将有自己的“健康法”。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Shenzhen, July 26 (Reporter Mao Siqian, Bai Yu) Encourage residents to do physical examinations frequently and find problems early; prohibit the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors; establish a health review system for online games; employers should equip full-time and part-time health management personnel... The Shenzhen Special Economic Zone Health Regulations (Consultation Draft) was officially released a few days ago, and Shenzhen residents will have their own "health law".

SRC: 为了鼓励居民勤做体检，及早发现问题，上述征求意见稿提出，卫生健康部门应当根据不同年龄、职业等因素制定健康体检项目基本目录。
HYP: In order to encourage residents to do physical examinations frequently and detect problems early, the above-mentioned consultation draft proposes that the health department should formulate a basic catalogue of health checkup items based on factors such as different ages, occupations, and so on.

SRC: 属于健康体检项目基本目录范围内的健康体检费用，按照每人每年一次的标准由社会医疗保险统筹基金支付。
HYP: The health checkup fees that fall within the scope of the basic catalogue of health checkup items are paid by the social medical insurance coordinating fund according to the standard of once per person per year.

SRC: 征求意见稿明确，用人单位应当合理配置人力资源，安排员工作息时间，对脑力和体力劳动负荷较重的员工，实行轮休制度，避免对员工健康造成人体机能过度损耗或者身心健康伤害，同时严格执行员工带薪休假制度。
HYP: The consultation draft makes clear that employers should rationally allocate human resources, arrange staff working hours, implement a rotation system for employees with heavy mental and physical labor load, avoid excessive wear and tear of human functions or physical and mental health damage to employees' health, and strictly implement the employee paid leave system.

SRC: 此外，用人单位要配备专兼职健康管理人员，并定期组织开展员工健康体检。
HYP: In addition, employers should be equipped with full-time and part-time health management personnel, and regularly organize and carry out employee health checkups.

SRC: 在未成年人身心健康方面，征求意见稿提出，禁止向未成年人销售酒精饮料，同时对酒精饮料的售卖位置进行了限制，对于违反规定的，将由市场监督管理部门责令改正，处3万元罚款。
HYP: In terms of the physical and mental health of minors, the consultation draft proposes that it is forbidden to sell alcoholic beverages to minors, while restrictions on the sales positions of alcoholic beverages are imposed, and for violations of the regulations, the market supervision and management department will order corrections and impose a fine of 30000 yuan.

SRC: 除了“禁酒” ，未成年人也要“多运动” 。
HYP: In addition to "prohibition of alcohol", minors should also "exercise more".

SRC: 根据征求意见稿要求，学校要每天安排学生体育活动时间一小时以上。
HYP: According to the consultation draft, schools should arrange for students' physical activity time for more than one hour every day.

SRC: 对于网络游戏，公安、文化广电旅游体育、网络监管、卫生健康等部门应当完善互联网上网服务营业场所健康监管制度，建立网络游戏健康审查制度，为促进青少年健康成长营造良好的交往空间、交往文化。
HYP: For online games, public security, culture, radio and television tourism, sports supervision, and health departments should improve the health supervision system for Internet service business premises, establish a health review system for online games, and create a good communication space and communication culture for promoting the healthy growth of young people.

SRC: 此外，征求意见稿还提出流感病人出入公共场所必须戴口罩，医疗卫生机构未经同意泄露病人隐私罚款2万元等。
HYP: In addition, the consultation draft also proposes that flu patients must wear masks when entering and exiting public places, and medical and health institutions shall be fined 20000 yuan for leaking patient privacy without consent.

SRC: 值得注意的是，除了居民的身心健康外，征求意见稿还要求，深圳各部门在制定涉及城市空间规划与建设、工业园区规划与建设、资源开发利用与生态环境保护、生物医药产业发展等规划、规范性文件以及批准重大建设工程和实施重大公共服务项目前，应当评估公共政策实施对人群健康的影响。
HYP: It is worth noting that, in addition to the physical and mental health of residents, the consultation draft also requires that all departments in Shenzhen should evaluate the impact of public policy implementation on population health before formulating planning and normative documents involving urban space planning and construction, industrial park planning and construction, resource development and utilization and ecological environmental protection, biomedical industry development, and approving major construction projects and implementing major public service projects.

SRC: 未经评估或者经评估将对城市公共卫生或者居民健康产生较严重不利影响的，不得制定出台或者批准实施。
HYP: Those that have not been evaluated or will have a relatively serious adverse impact on urban public health or residents' health shall not be formulated or approved for implementation.

SRC: 可可西里藏羚羊进入回迁季-新华网
HYP: Kekexili Tibetan antelope enters back migration season-Xinhua.

SRC: 新华社西宁7月25日电（记者王金金）记者从三江源国家公园管理局长江源园区可可西里管理处五道梁保护站获悉，监测显示，此前前往可可西里腹地卓乃湖区域迁徙产仔的藏羚羊正陆续结束产仔，开始携幼仔返回原栖息地。
HYP: Xining, July 25 (Reporter Wang Jinjin) The reporter learned from the Wudaoliang Conservation Station of the Kekexili Management Office of the Yangtze Riveryuan Park of the Sanjiangyuan National Park Administration that monitoring shows that Tibetan antelopes that had previously migrated to the Zhuonai Lake area in the hinterland of Kekexili are ending their calves one after another and began to return to their original habitat with their cubs.

SRC: 五道梁保护站附近的监控画面显示，7月25日，大约40只雌性藏羚羊带领3只藏羚羊幼仔陆续通过青藏公路3002公里处、青藏铁路五道梁北大桥，藏羚羊已经开始回迁。
HYP: The monitoring footage near the Wudaoliang Conservation Station shows that on July 25, about 40 female Tibetan antelopes led three Tibetan antelope cubs through 3002 kilometers of the Qinghai-Tibet Highway and the Wudaoliang North Bridge of the Qinghai-Tibet Railway, and the Tibetan antelopes have begun to move back.

SRC: 专家分析，近年来，回迁羊群中藏羚羊幼仔数量占藏羚羊群总体数量的四分之一至五分之一。
HYP: Experts analyzed that in recent years, the number of Tibetan antelope pups in the relocated herd accounted for one-fourth to one-fifth of the overall number of Tibetan antelope flocks.

SRC: 中国科学院西北高原生物研究所副研究员连新明说：“回迁初期，藏羚羊面临较高的被捕食风险，因此羊群中的幼仔数量会比较少，甚至可能出现没有幼仔的情况。”
HYP: "In the early stage of relocation, Tibetan antelopes face a high risk of predation, so the number of cubs in the flock will be relatively small, and there may even be no cubs," said Lian Xinming, an associate researcher at the Northwest Institute of Plateau Biology of the Chinese Academy of Sciences.

SRC: 根据三江源国家公园管理局长江源园区可可西里管理处统计，藏羚羊回迁数量总体呈逐年上升态势，2019年藏羚羊回迁数量为4860只，比2018年增加338只。
HYP: According to statistics from the Kekexili Management Office of the Yangtze River Source Park of the Sanjiangyuan National Park Administration, the overall number of Tibetan antelope relocating is increasing year by year, and the number of Tibetan antelope relocating back in 2019 was 4860, an increase of 338 from 2018 .

SRC: 连新明说：“预计今年藏羚羊回迁将在9月初结束，回迁藏羚羊数量仍有望继续增加。”
HYP: "It is expected that the relocation of Tibetan antelopes will end in early September this year, and the number of relocated Tibetan antelopes is still expected to continue to increase," Lian Xinming said.

SRC: 藏羚羊属国家一级保护动物。
HYP: Tibetan antelopes are a first-class national protected animal.

SRC: 每年5月底，来自青海三江源、西藏羌塘、新疆阿尔金山等地的藏羚羊都要前往位于可可西里腹地的卓乃湖产羔。
HYP: At the end of May every year, Tibetan antelopes from Sanjiangyuan in Qinghai, Qiangtang in Tibet, and Aerjin Mountain in Xinjiang go to Zhuonai Lake, located in the hinterland of Kekexili, to lamb.

SRC: 我国藏羚羊保护专家、陕西省动物研究所（西北濒危动物研究所）研究员吴晓民说：“藏羚羊回迁是雌性藏羚羊结束产仔后，陆续带着幼仔回到栖息地的过程。起初离开产仔地的回迁群体较为庞大，但随后藏羚羊将根据不同的地理种群、沿不同路径回到它们各自的栖息地。”
HYP: Wu Xiaomin, a Tibetan antelope conservation expert in China and a researcher at the Shaanxi Institute of Zoology (Northwestern Institute of Endangered Animals), said, "Tibetan antelope relocation is a process in which female Tibetan antelopes return to their habitat with their cubs one after another after the end of calving. At first, the relocated group that left the calving area is relatively large, but then Tibetan antelopes will return to their respective habitats along different paths according to different geographical populations."

SRC: 为确保藏羚羊群安全回迁，记者了解到，日前三江源国家公园管理局长江源园区可可西里管理处已安排工作人员在主要回迁区域，持续开展视频监测和辖区巡逻。
HYP: In order to ensure the safe relocation of the Tibetan antelope herd, the reporter learned that the Kekexili Management Office of the Changjiangyuan Park of the Sanjiangyuan National Park Administration has arranged staff to continue video monitoring and area patrols in the main relocation area.

SRC: 如发现有藏羚羊群试图穿越公路，巡山队员会在第一时间进行临时交通管制，让羊群安全通过野生动物通道，保证其在回迁途中尽可能少受人类干扰。
HYP: If a herd of Tibetan antelopes is found trying to cross the highway, the mountain patrol team will conduct temporary traffic control at the first time to allow the flock to pass through the wildlife passage safely, ensuring that they are as little disturbed by humans as possible during the relocation.

SRC: 那么，日常生活中到底该如何解暑？
HYP: So, how to relieve heatstroke in daily life?

SRC: 专家建议，夏日外出尽量避开高温时段，最好不要在中午前后在烈日下行走或劳动，因为这个时间段的阳光最强烈，发生中暑的可能性较高。
HYP: Experts suggest that when going out in summer, try to avoid high temperature periods, and it is best not to walk or labor under the hot sun around noon, because the sun is strongest during this period, and the possibility of heat stroke is higher.

SRC: 如果此时段必须外出，一定要做好防护工作，如打遮阳伞、戴遮阳帽、戴太阳镜，有条件的最好涂抹防晒霜，以防晒伤。
HYP: If you must go out during this period, you must do protective work, such as taking a parasol, wearing a sun hat, wearing sunglasses, and if conditions permit, it is best to apply sunscreen to prevent sunburn.

SRC: <v>衣服尽量选用</v>浅色、透气性好的棉、麻、丝类质地，少穿化纤品类服装，以免大量出汗时不能及时散热，引起中暑。
HYP: Try to use light-colored, air-permeable cotton, hemp, and silk textures as far as possible, and wear less chemical fiber clothing, so as not to dissipate heat in time when sweating a lot, causing heat stroke.

SRC: 衣服尽量选用浅色、透气性好的棉、麻、丝类质地，少穿化纤品类服装，以免大量出汗时不能及时散热，引起中暑。
HYP: Try to use light-colored, air-permeable cotton, hemp, and silk textures as far as possible, and wear less chemical fiber clothing, so as not to dissipate heat in time when sweating a lot, causing heat stroke.

SRC: 高温闷热天气时，要准备充足的水饮，及时饮用，不要等口渴了才喝水，因为一旦感觉口渴表示身体已经缺水了，每次喝水控制在150毫升至200毫升，喝温开水，不要喝冰水。
HYP: When it is hot and sultry, prepare plenty of water and drink it in time, and don't wait to drink water when you are thirsty, because once you feel thirsty, the body is already dehydrated, and each time you drink water is controlled at 150 ml to 200 ml, drink warm water, and do not drink ice water.

SRC: 高温闷热天气时，要准备充足的水饮，及时饮用，不要等口渴了才喝水，因为一旦感觉口渴<v>表示</v>身体已经缺水了，每次喝水控制在150毫升至200毫升，喝温开水，不要喝冰水。
HYP: When it is hot and sultry, prepare plenty of water and drink it in time, and don't wait to drink water when you are thirsty, because once you feel thirsty, the body is already dehydrated, and each time you drink water is controlled at 150 ml to 200 ml, drink warm water, and do not drink ice water.

SRC: 根据气温高低，一般人员每天喝1.5升至2升水，高温作业人员，每天喝3升至5升水。
HYP: According to the temperature, the average person drinks 1.5 liters to 2 liters of water a day, and the high temperature workers drink 3 liters to 5 liters of water a day.

SRC: 出汗较多时可适当补充一些盐水，弥补人体因出汗而失去的盐分。
HYP: When sweating more, some salt water can be properly added to make up for the salt lost by the body due to sweating.

SRC: 另外，夏季人体容易缺钾，使人感到倦怠疲乏，含钾茶水是极好的消暑饮品。
HYP: In addition, the body is prone to potassium deficiency in summer, which makes people feel tired and tired, and potassium-containing tea is an excellent summer drink.

SRC: 夏天多食含水量高的蔬果，如生菜、黄瓜、西红柿等；新鲜水果，如桃子、杏、西瓜、甜瓜等水分含量为80％至90％，都可以用来补充水分；乳制品既能补水，又能满足身体的营养之需。
HYP: In summer, eat more fruits and vegetables with high water content, such as lettuce, cucumbers, tomatoes, etc. Fresh fruits, such as peaches, apricots, watermelons, and melons, have a water content of 80% to 90%, which can be used to replenish water. Dairy products can not only replenish water, but also meet the nutritional needs of the body.

SRC: 此外，在高温环境中工作的人群，应适当补充含有钾、镁等元素的饮品。
HYP: In addition, people who work in a high temperature environment should properly supplement drinks containing elements such as potassium and magnesium.

SRC: 夏天日长夜短，气温高，人体新陈代谢旺盛，消耗也大，容易感到疲劳。
HYP: The length of summer days and nights, high temperature, the body's metabolism is strong, it is also consumed, and it is easy to feel fatigued.

SRC: 充足的睡眠，可使大脑和身体各系统都得到放松，既利于工作和学习，也是预防中暑的措施。
HYP: Adequate sleep can relax the brain and body systems, which is not only conducive to work and study, but also a measure to prevent heat stroke.

SRC: 专家称，最佳就寝时间是22时至23时，最佳起床时间是5时30分至6时30分。
HYP: Experts say that the best bedtime is 22 to 23 hours, and the best time to get up is 5:30 to 6:30.

SRC: 睡眠时注意不要躺在空调出风口和电风扇下，以免患上空调病和热伤风。
HYP: Pay attention not to lie under the air conditioning outlet and electric fan during sleep, so as to avoid air conditioning diseases and heat stroke.

SRC: 专家建议，在户外活动或进行高温作业的人群，可随身携带十滴水、人丹、藿香正气水或藿香正气丸等防暑药品，或放置在就近工作场所，随时使用，以防发生中暑。
HYP: Experts suggest that people who are active outdoors or working at high temperatures can carry ten drops of water, Rendan, Huoxiang Zhengqi water or Huoxiang Zhengqi pills and other heatstroke prevention drugs, or place them in the nearest workplace and use them at any time to prevent heatstroke.

SRC: 毕业生艺术展搬进商场公益展出-新华网
HYP: Graduate art exhibition moved into the mall for public welfare exhibition - Xinhuanet.com.

SRC: 在各大院校“云毕业”的季节里，一场难得的线下毕业生艺术展上周末温暖启幕。
HYP: In the season of "cloud graduation" of major colleges and universities, a rare offline graduate art exhibition opened warmly last weekend.

SRC: 不过它既不在美术馆，也不在校园里，而是出现在了朝阳大悦城的公共空间，并对公众免费开放，将持续至8月23日。
HYP: However, it was neither in the art museum nor on the campus, but appeared in the public space of Chaoyang Joy City, and was open to the public for free, and will last until August 23rd.

SRC: 记者了解到，这场2020毕业生艺术展，征集了来自中央美术学院、中国传媒大学及天津美术学院的57位青年艺术家的50件/组作品，展览空间从2层延伸至6层，并充分利用楼内灯箱进行平面作品展示，最大程度烘托出毕业季的艺术氛围。
HYP: The reporter learned that this 2020 graduate art exhibition has solicited 50 pieces/group works from 57 young artists from the Central Academy of Fine Arts, Communication University of China and Tianjin Academy of Fine Arts. The exhibition space extends from the 2nd floor to the 6th floor, and makes full use of the light boxes in the building for the flat display of works to maximize the artistic atmosphere of the graduation season.

SRC: 在疫情之下，这场展览的意义显得尤为特殊。
HYP: Under the epidemic situation, the significance of this exhibition is particularly special.

SRC: 朝阳大悦城美陈负责人葛平坦言：“我们选择将走向'云端'的毕业展再度带回线下空间，也希望让更多人看到青年对自身的探索和对世界的理解，放大艺术对于社会和心灵的疗愈力量。”
HYP: Ge Pingyan, the head of Chaoyang Joy City Meichen: "We chose to bring the graduation exhibition to the 'cloud' back to the offline space again, and we also hope that more people can see the youth's exploration of themselves and understanding of the world, and amplify the healing power of art for society and the soul."

SRC: 她透露，此次参展的作品是向几大艺术院校的毕业生们征集而来，又从中挑选了适合商业空间展示的，作品形式从传统的架上绘画、雕塑，到新媒体装置、交互动画、VR全景，体量与丰富程度为历年之最。
HYP: She revealed that the works exhibited this time were solicited from graduates of several major art colleges, and from them, they selected works suitable for commercial space display, ranging from traditional shelf paintings and sculptures to new media installations, interactive animations, and VR panoramas, with the most volume and richness in the calendar year.

SRC: 其中，李云肖在《2020的第一场战役》中通过机械和手工混合的创作语言，表达了自己在这场疫情中的感受；刘嘉颖通过以太坊区块链创作的作品《Sound Money》探讨了“加密货币” 、“信用创造” 、“交易”等主题；张家祺的《猫林》与邱达强的《羁》表现的都是经常与人类相伴的动物，从中可以看到青年艺术家对人与动物关系的理解；而朱仲鱼的作品《信仰的冬天—礼物》则是在提醒成长中的年轻人，“当有一天事业有成时，不忘初心，记得那份单纯与真诚。”
HYP: Among them, Li Yunxiao expressed his feelings in the epidemic through a mixed language of mechanical and manual creation in "The First Battle of 2020"; Liu Jiaying's work Sound Money created through the Ethereum blockchain explored themes such as "cryptocurrency", "creation", "transaction"; Zhang Jiaqi's "Cat" and Qiu Daqiang's "Reinforcement" are both animals that often accompany human beings, from which you can see young artists' understanding of the relationship between humans and animals; and Zhu Zhongyu's work "Faith—Gift in Winter" is to remind young people growing up, "When you have a career one day, don't forget the original heart, remember the simplicity and sincerity."

SRC: 在为数不多的亲自布展的毕业生中，就有来自天津美术学院雕塑系的李敬寅。
HYP: Among the few graduates who set up the exhibition in person was Li Jingyin from the Sculpture Department of Tianjin Academy of Fine Arts.

SRC: “我是7月7日来北京的，当时其实有点担心疫情，还提前三天做了核酸检测，是带着酒精棉和检测报告来布展的。”
HYP: "I came to Beijing on July 7. I was actually a little worried about the epidemic at that time, and I also did a nucleic acid test three days in advance, and I brought alcohol cotton and a test report to set up the exhibition."

SRC: 他的作品《昨日如谜》结构比较复杂，必须亲力亲为。
HYP: His work "Yesterday as a Mystery" has a relatively complicated structure, and he must do it himself.

SRC: 同时，他还承担着帮助同学修补破损作品的任务。
HYP: At the same time, he is also undertaking the task of helping his classmates repair the damaged works.

SRC: “布展到凌晨四点半，然后再做修补，时间很紧，都忘了和作品合个影，也有点遗憾。”
HYP: "The exhibition was set up until 4:30 in the morning, and then the repair was done. The time was very tight, and I forgot to take a photo with the work, which is also a bit regretful."

SRC: 他希望，等疫情更稳定了，再和同学们来北京看看自己的作品展。
HYP: He hopes that when the epidemic situation is more stable, he will come to Beijing with his classmates to see his work exhibition.

SRC: （记者李俐）
HYP: (Reporter Li Li)

SRC: 奖励5万元湖北恩施表扬沙子坝滑坡“预警第一人” - 中新网
HYP: Rewarding 50000 yuan, Hubei Enshi commends the "first person for early warning" of the sand dam landslide - Chinanews.com.au.

SRC: 湖北日报讯(记者林晶)7月26日，恩施市通报表扬为沙子坝滑坡预警作出重要贡献的地质灾害点监测员陈光明，并为他送去5万元奖金。
HYP: Hubei Daily (Reporter Lin Jing) On July 26, Enshi City commended Chen Guangming, a geological disaster point monitor who made important contributions to the early warning of the sand dam landslide, and sent him a 50000 yuan bonus.

SRC: 同时，号召全市党员干部学习他恪尽职守、敢于担当、主动作为、乐于奉献的精神。
HYP: At the same time, party members and cadres in the city were called on to learn his spirit of dedication, daring to take responsibility, taking initiative, and willingness to sacrifice.

SRC: 7月21日，恩施市屯堡乡马者村沙子坝发生滑坡，导致清江干流河道形成堰塞湖，58岁的陈光明是预警此次滑坡的第一人。
HYP: On July 21, a landslide occurred in the sand dam of Mazhe Village, Tunbao Township, Enshi City, which led to the formation of a barrier lake in the main stream of the Qingjiang River, and 58-year-old Chen Guangming was the first person to warn of the landslide.

SRC: 7月17日下午，陈光明得知村民家中墙壁开裂的消息，立即到现场查看。
HYP: On the afternoon of July 17, Chen Guangming learned the news of the cracking of the wall in the villagers' home and immediately went to the site to check it.

SRC: 他刚从家中走出五六百米，便看到村组公路裂开四五厘米，沿着公路一直延伸到玉米地，长度约50米。
HYP: He just walked five or six hundred meters from his home, and saw that the village group road was cracked by four or five centimeters, extending along the road to the cornfield, with a length of about 50 meters.

SRC: 陈光明顿生警觉，第一时间将公路开裂的照片发到乡“地质灾害监测员联系群”里。
HYP: Chen Guangming became alert and sent photos of the cracking of the highway to the township "Geological Disaster Monitor Contact Group" for the first time.

SRC: 经屯堡乡自然规划所相关负责人现场查看和判断，滑坡的可能性很大，随即作出撤离群众的决定。
HYP: After the relevant person in charge of the Tunbao Township Natural Planning Institute inspected and judged on the spot, the possibility of a landslide was very high, and the decision to evacuate the masses was immediately made.

SRC: 陈光明的及时预警，为影响区内315户1339名群众的安全撤离贏得了36小时的宝贵时间。
HYP: Chen Guangming's timely early warning won 36 hours of precious time for the safe evacuation of 1339 people from 3315 households in the affected area.

SRC: 此次重大地质灾害，无一人伤亡。
HYP: No one was injured or killed in this major geological disaster.

SRC: 陈光明认真负责的敬业精神得到群众的称赞。
HYP: Chen Guangming's serious and responsible dedication was praised by the masses.

SRC: 面对赞誉，他说：“不存在救了谁，这是我的责任。 ”
HYP: In the face of the praise, he said, "There is no one who saved, it is my responsibility."

SRC: 警方通报“女大学生赴青海旅游失联”细节搜救工作仍在继续-新华网
HYP: Police report details of "female college student lost contact on tour in Qinghai" Search and rescue work continues - Xinhuanet.

SRC: 新华社西宁7月26日电（记者王金金周喆）近日，“一名女大学生前往青海格尔木旅游后失联”一事引发网民关注。
HYP: Xining, July 26 (Reporter Wang Jinjin Zhou Zhe) Recently, the incident of "a female college student lost contact after traveling to Golmud, Qinghai" has attracted the attention of netizens.

SRC: <v>新华社</v>西宁7月26日电（记者王金金周喆）近日，“一名女大学生前往青海格尔木旅游后失联”一事引发网民关注。
HYP: Xining, July 26 (Reporter Wang Jinjin Zhou Zhe) Recently, the incident of "a female college student lost contact after traveling to Golmud, Qinghai" has attracted the attention of netizens.

SRC: 青海省海西蒙古族藏族自治州格尔木市公安局26日通报称，南京某大学学生黄某某目前仍处于失联状态，多地警方正深入黄某某失联地沿线，积极开展寻找工作。
HYP: The Public Security Bureau of Golmud City, Haixi Mongolian and Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, Qinghai Province, reported on the 26th that Huang Moumou, a student from a university in Nanjing, is still in a state of missing contact, and the police in many places are going deep into the area where Huang Moumou lost contact and actively carry out search work.

SRC: 2020年7月10日，海西州格尔木市公安局治安支队接到上级通知，南京某大学学生黄某某于7月5日乘坐Z164列车由南京至格尔木，于7月9日在青海省玉树藏族自治州曲麻莱县索南达杰保护站清水河西南区域处手机关机并失联，要求协助查找。
HYP: On July 10, 2020, the public security detachment of Golmud City Public Security Bureau, Haixi Prefecture, received a notification from the superior that Huang Moumou, a student from a university in Nanjing, took the Z164 train from Nanjing to Golmud on July 5, and on July 9th, his mobile phone was turned off and lost contact at the southwest area of Qingshui River at Sonandajie Protection Station in Qumalai County, Yushu Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, Qinghai Province, and requested assistance in finding it.

SRC: 根据格尔木市公安局的调查情况，黄某某于7月6日19时54分进入青海省境内，7日4时抵达格尔木市。
HYP: According to the investigation of Golmud City Public Security Bureau, Huang Moumou entered Qinghai Province at 19:54 on July 6 and arrived in Golmud City at 4:00 on the 7th.

SRC: 当日8时，失联人员黄某某乘坐出租车由格尔木市黄河大酒店朝G109国道出发，并于12时到达可可西里索南达杰保护站，出租车司机单独返回，黄某某7日15时到达索南达杰保护站附近清水河区域直至9日18时许在该区域关机。
HYP: At 8 o'clock on the same day, Huang Moumou, a lost person, took a taxi from Golmud Yellow River Hotel towards G109 National Road, and arrived at Korsili Sonandajie Protection Station at 12:00, and the taxi driver returned alone, Huang Moumou arrived at the Qingshui River area near Sonandajie Protection Station at 7:15 AM until it was shut down in the area at around 18:00 on 9th.

SRC: 在进一步调查中，警方发现黄某某曾于7月13日17时07分通过乃吉沟检查站。
HYP: In further investigation, the police found that Huang Moumou had passed Naijigou Checkpoint at 17:07 on July 13th.

SRC: 乃吉沟检查站是西藏自治区那曲市在格尔木市南山口设立的检查站，由于该检查站无视频监控，无法确定本人及所乘车辆信息，警方只能驾车在沿途进行查找，协调西藏沿途各检查站若发现黄某某，立即与格尔木市公安局取得联系。
HYP: Naijigou Checkpoint is a checkpoint set up by Nagqu City, Tibet Autonomous Region at the Nanshan Pass of Golmud City. Since the checkpoint has no video surveillance, it is impossible to determine the information of himself and the vehicle he was traveling in, and the police can only drive along the way to find out, and coordinate the various checkpoints along the way in Tibet. If Huang Moumou is found, immediately contact the Golmud City Public Security Bureau.

SRC: 根据最新情况，7月26日凌晨1时，格尔木市公安局组织救援力量携带救援装备，前往青藏公路沿线不冻泉保护站、索南达杰保护站进行查找，并积极与四川警方、西藏警方、南京警方取得联系，共同开展工作，目前查找搜救工作仍在继续。
HYP: According to the latest situation, at 1 am on July 26, Golmud Public Security Bureau organized rescue forces to carry rescue equipment and went to the Unfrozen Spring Protection Station and Sonam Dajie Protection Station along the Qinghai-Tibet Highway to find out, and actively contacted the Sichuan police, Tibet police, and Nanjing police to carry out joint work. The search and rescue work is still continuing.

SRC: 当地警方希望广大网友和社会各界如有相关线索，及时向格尔木警方和南京江宁警方提供，争取早日找到失联人员黄某某。
HYP: The local police hope that the majority of netizens and all walks of life will provide relevant clues to the Golmud police and Nanjing Jiangning police in a timely manner, and strive to find the lost person Huang Moumou as soon as possible.

SRC: 同时，有关专家提示，游客在户外活动时要规范、理性、文明，随时留意路边警示标志，切勿冒险进入无人区，遇到突发情况，要及时报警。
HYP: At the same time, relevant experts have suggested that tourists should be standardized, rational and civilized when they are outdoors, pay attention to roadside warning signs at all times, never venture into no-man's land, and call the police in time in case of emergencies.

SRC: 俄罗斯举办阅兵式庆祝海军节-新华网
HYP: Russia holds a military parade to celebrate the Navy Day - Xinhuanet.

SRC: 7月26日，在俄罗斯圣彼得堡，舰艇列队参加海军节庆祝活动。
HYP: On July 26, in St. Petersburg, Russia, a fleet of ships participated in the celebration of the Navy Day.

SRC: 新华社发（莫京娜摄）
HYP: Xinhua News Agency (photo by Motina).

SRC: 新华社莫斯科7月26日电（记者鲁金博）俄罗斯各舰队26日举行阅兵式庆祝海军节，纪念俄海军成立324周年。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Moscow, July 26 (Reporter Lukinbo) All Russian fleets held a military parade on the 26th to celebrate the Navy Day to commemorate the 324th anniversary of the founding of the Russian Navy.

SRC: 当天，俄罗斯北海、波罗的海、黑海、里海和太平洋舰队分别在各自基地所在海域举行了阅兵式，共有1.5万军人、219艘各类舰艇和71架军用飞机参加。
HYP: On the same day, the Russian North Sea, Baltic Sea, Black Sea, Caspian Sea and Pacific Fleets held military parades in the waters where their respective bases are located, with a total of 15000 servicemen, 219 ships of various types and 71 military aircraft participating.

SRC: 俄总统、武装力量最高统帅普京出席了波罗的海舰队的阅兵式。
HYP: Russian President and Supreme Commander of the Armed Forces Putin attended the military parade of the Baltic Sea Fleet.

SRC: 约4000名军人、46艘舰艇和40余架战机参加了当地的阅兵式。
HYP: About 4000 servicemen, 46 ships and more than 40 warplanes participated in the local military parade.

SRC: 普京首先在位于波罗的海喀琅施塔得海军基地水域检阅了舰艇列队。
HYP: Putin first inspected the fleet of ships in the waters of the Kronstadt naval base in the Baltic Sea.

SRC: 之后，他乘坐快艇抵达圣彼得堡市中心的涅瓦河水域并上岸，观看了在涅瓦河上举行的阅兵式。
HYP: After that, he arrived in the waters of the Neva River in the center of St. Petersburg by speedboat and went ashore to watch the military parade held on the Neva River.

SRC: 普京在阅兵式上发表讲话说，俄海军装备的现代化技术水平近年来持续提升，俄海军2020年将总共接收约40艘配备独特高超音速打击系统的新型舰艇。
HYP: Putin made a speech at the military parade, saying that the modernization and technical level of Russian naval equipment has continued to improve in recent years, and that the Russian Navy will receive a total of about 40 new ships equipped with unique hypersonic strike systems in 2020. In a recent interview, Russian Navy Commander-in-Chief Yevmenov said in an interview with the Russian defense ministry newspaper Red Star newspaper that the plan to build Russian ships has been effectively implemented, and the number of new ships the Russian Navy plans to receive in 2020 is on a larger scale in recent years.

SRC: 另外，俄海军总司令叶夫梅诺夫日前在接受俄国防部机关报《红星报》采访时说，俄建造舰艇的计划得到了有效落实，2020年俄海军计划接收的新舰艇数量是近年来规模较大的。
HYP: In 1696, Tsar Peter the Great set out to build a maritime fleet, which opened up the history of the Russian Navy.

SRC: 1696年，沙皇彼得大帝着手组建海上舰队，开创了俄海军历史。
HYP: The last Sunday in July every year is the Russian Navy Day. #Russian Navy Day;

SRC: 每年7月最后一个星期日是俄罗斯海军节。
HYP: EMPTY

SRC: 针对疫情防控工作出现的新变化，自7月17日以来，新疆各级工会响应自治区总工会的号召，积极参与疫情防控工作。
HYP: In response to the new changes in epidemic prevention and control work, since July 17, trade unions at all levels in Xinjiang have responded to the call of the Autonomous Region Federation of Trade Unions to actively participate in epidemic prevention and control work.

SRC: 天山南北工会干部、职工、劳动模范走进街道社区、居民群众中，开展送菜送药、消毒灭菌、宣传防疫知识等活动，服务职工群众，用实际行动彰显工会“硬核力量”。
HYP: Tianshan North and South trade union cadres, workers, and model workers walked into street communities and residents to carry out activities such as delivering food and medicine, disinfection and sterilization, and publicizing epidemic prevention knowledge to serve the workers and masses, and demonstrate the “hard core strength” of the trade union with practical actions.

SRC: 近日，乌鲁木齐市天山区总工会慰问组一行，将一批急需的疫情防控生活物资送到了12个隔离点的工作人员手中。
HYP: Recently, the condolence team of the Tianshan District Federation of Trade Unions in Urumqi City delivered a batch of urgently needed epidemic prevention and control living materials to the staff of 12 isolation points.

SRC: 疫情发生后，天山区总第一时间投入经费105万余元，紧急下拨给23个直属基层工会。
HYP: After the outbreak, Tianshan District total invested more than 1.05 million yuan at the first time, which was urgently allocated to 23 directly-affiliated grassroots labor unions.

SRC: 中建新疆建工一建党委副书记、工会主席赵相国接到公司关于疫情防控的通知后，主动请缨，选择留在单位值班，为职工保驾护航。
HYP: After receiving the company's notice on epidemic prevention and control, Zhao Xiangguo, deputy secretary of the Party Committee of China Construction Xinjiang Construction Engineering First Construction and chairman of the trade union, took the initiative to ask for help and chose to stay on duty at the unit to escort the employees.

SRC: 他为居住在单位宿舍和新入职的职工送去做饭的炊具、食品及日用品，并组织人员每隔两天为他们送一次生活必备物资。
HYP: He sent cooking utensils, food, and daily necessities for the employees living in the unit dormitories and newly recruited employees, and organized personnel to send them essential supplies for life every two days.

SRC: “7月21日起，对坚守战'疫'一线的干部职工进行摸底，并采取线上下单、商家送货上门的方式，先行为乌鲁木齐地区704名一线职工群众补充购买防疫用品和生活物资。”
HYP: “From July 21, the cadres and employees who are on the front line of the 'war epidemic' will be touched down, and the method of online orders and door-to-door delivery will be adopted, and the 704 front-line workers and workers in Urumqi will be the first to purchase supplementary anti-epidemic supplies and living materials.”

SRC: 新疆交通运输工会负责人告诉记者，面对突发疫情，他们全力做好疫情防控服务保障、稳步推进交通运输发展各项工作，营造齐心战“疫”的浓厚氛围。
HYP: The head of the Xinjiang transportation trade union told reporters that in the face of the sudden epidemic, they did their best to ensure epidemic prevention and control services, steadily promote various work in transportation development, and create a strong atmosphere of fighting the “epidemic” together.

SRC: 当前正值夏季高温，各级工会紧盯疫情防控重点地区的一线职工，把“送清凉”关心关爱落到实处。
HYP: At present, it is the high temperature in summer, and labor unions at all levels are keeping an eye on the frontline workers in key areas for epidemic prevention and control, and put the “sending cool” care and care into practice.

SRC: 7月19日，乌鲁木齐县总工会启动向疫情防控一线职工“送清凉”慰问活动，全县警务站、卡点和卫生系统收到了饮料、水果等慰问品。
HYP: On July 19, the Urumqi County Federation of Trade Unions launched the “sending cool” condolences to frontline workers in epidemic prevention and control, and the county police stations, card points, and health systems received condolences such as drinks and fruits.

SRC: “工会干部要进一步提高政治站位、强化责任担当，用关怀温暖人心，用行动鼓舞斗志。
HYP: “The union cadres should further improve their political standing, strengthen their responsibilities, warm people's hearts with care, and inspire fighting spirit with actions.

SRC: 要充分发挥工会组织凝聚职工、团结职工的作用，做好疫情防控服务保障，积极维护广大职工的健康权益，把关爱送到一线职工身边。”
HYP: It is necessary to give full play to the role of trade unions in cohesive and unite workers, do a good job in epidemic prevention and control service guarantees, actively safeguard the health rights and interests of the majority of workers, and send care to frontline workers.”

SRC: 自治区总工会相关负责人表示。
HYP: The relevant person in charge of the Autonomous Region Federation of Trade Unions said.

SRC: 2020年直招士官工作全面展开-新华网
HYP: The direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers in 2020 is in full swing-Xinhua.

SRC: 新华社北京7月26日电（记者贾启龙）军委政治工作部、军委国防动员部近日联合印发通知，部署展开2020年从普通高等学校毕业生中直接招收士官工作。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 26 (Reporter Jia Qilong) The Political Work Department of the Central Military Commission and the National Defense Mobilization Department of the Central Military Commission recently jointly issued a notice to deploy and launch the direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers in 2020 from graduates of ordinary colleges and universities.

SRC: 今年直招士官涵盖计算机、自动化、机械等64类270余个军地通用专业，重点加大无人机、航海、航空航天、电子信息、小语种等专业招收力度，招收规模相比去年增加近2000人。
HYP: This year's direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers covers more than 270 military and local general majors in 64 categories such as computer, automation, and machinery, focusing on increasing the recruitment of majors such as drones, navigation, aerospace, electronic information, and small languages, and the recruitment scale has increased by nearly 2000 people compared with last year.

SRC: 今年直招士官工作与<v>义务兵</v>征集同步组织实施，8月1日开始，9月30日结束。
HYP: This year's direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers is organized and implemented synchronously with the recruitment of conscripts, starting on August 1st and ending on September 30th.

SRC: 应征青年可以通过全国征兵网（网址：http://www.gfbzb.gov.cn）查询直招士官条件和各地招收专业分布情况，符合专业范围和招收条件的在线提交报名信息，并根据应征地兵役机关统一要求，参加体格检查、政治考核等后续招收工作。
HYP: The enlisted youth can inquire about the conditions of direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers and the distribution of specialties in various regions through the National Recruitment Website (website: http://www.gfbzb.gov.cn), submit the registration information online that meets the scope of specialty and recruitment conditions, and participate in the follow-up recruitment work such as physical examination and political assessment according to the unified requirements of the military service organs in the conscripted areas.

SRC: 因招收专业和计划限制未能被招收为士官的合格青年，可以参加义务兵征集，服义务兵役期满选取为士官时，在普通高等学校按规定学制就读的年数视同服役时间。
HYP: Qualified youth who fail to be recruited as non-commissioned officers due to the recruitment specialty and program restrictions can participate in the compulsory recruitment, and when the compulsory military service expires, they will be selected as non-commissioned officers, and the years of studying in ordinary colleges and universities according to the prescribed academic system will be regarded as service time.

SRC: 今年士官招收工作由省级或地市级人民政府征兵办公室统一组织，报名潜力丰富专业将在综合衡量报名对象学历层次、在校期间专业课成绩、取得职业资格证书等情况基础上择优遴选；稀缺专业将面向本地符合专业要求、具备招收优势的院校定向对口招收。
HYP: The recruitment of non-commissioned officers this year will be uniformly organized by the recruitment offices of the provincial or prefecture-level people's governments, and majors with rich registration potential will be selected on the basis of comprehensively measuring the academic level of the applicants, academic performance in professional courses during school, and obtaining vocational qualification certificates, etc. Scarce majors will be targeted for targeted counterpart recruitment from colleges and universities that meet the local professional requirements and have recruitment advantages.

SRC: 根据疫情常态化防控要求，今年直招士官原则上不安排自行报到，将与义务兵同步组织运输入营。
HYP: According to the requirements of normalized epidemic prevention and control, this year's direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers will not in principle be arranged to report on their own, and will be entered into operation battalions synchronously with the compulsory soldiers.

SRC: 直接招收士官入伍时间从2020年9月1日起算，部队下达士官任职命令的时间为2020年12月1日。
HYP: The enrollment time for direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers will be counted from September 1, 2020, and the time when the troops issue the non-commissioned officer appointment order is December 1, 2020 .

SRC: 部队接收单位将科学制定入伍和专业训练方案，认真组织施训；训练完成后按照专业对口、招用一致的原则，将招收士官统一精准分配到对口专业技术岗位。
HYP: The receiving unit will formulate a scientific enlistment and professional training plan, carefully organize the training, and after the completion of training, the recruited non-commissioned officers will be uniformly and accurately assigned to the counterpart professional and technical posts in accordance with the principle of counterpart professional and consistent recruitment.

SRC: 驻英使馆发言人：中国政府是网络安全的坚定维护者-中新网
HYP: Spokesperson of the Embassy in the UK: The Chinese government is a staunch defender of cybersecurity - Chinanews.com.

SRC: 中新网7月26日电据中国驻英国大使馆网站消息，25日，中国驻英国使馆发言人就有关网络攻击错误言论答记者问。
HYP: Chinanews.com, July 26 (Xinhua) -- According to the website of the Chinese Embassy in the UK, on the 25th, the spokesperson of the Chinese Embassy in the UK answered a reporter's question on wrong remarks about cyber attacks.

SRC: 发言人强调，中国政府是网络安全的坚定维护者，一贯坚决反对并打击任何形式的网络攻击和网络犯罪。
HYP: The spokesperson stressed that the Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security and has always resolutely opposed and cracked down on any form of cyber attacks and cyber crimes.

SRC: 有记者提问：据媒体称，与中国有关的黑客组织曾干扰一家英国公司网络系统、向存有专利数据的英美技术公司发动攻击、入侵欧盟国家政府网络。
HYP: Some reporters asked: According to the media, a hacking organization related to China has interfered with a British company's network system, launched attacks on British and American technology companies that hold patent data, and invaded the government networks of EU countries.

SRC: 发言人表示，中国政府是网络安全的坚定维护者，一贯坚决反对并打击任何形式的网络攻击和网络犯罪。
HYP: The spokesperson said that the Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security and has always resolutely opposed and cracked down on any form of cyber attacks and cyber crimes.

SRC: 网络空间虚拟性强，溯源难，行为体多样，在调查和定性网络事件的时候应拿出充分的证据，不能无端猜测。
HYP: Cyberspace is highly virtual, difficult to trace, and diverse actors. When investigating and qualifying cyber incidents, sufficient evidence should be presented and no unwarranted guesses should be made.

SRC: 发言人称，以往的“棱镜门”等一系列事件证明，美国一直都在进行全球最大范围的网络窃密行动。
HYP: According to the spokesperson, a series of incidents such as the "Prism Gate" in the past have proved that the United States has always carried out the world's largest cyber-stealing operation.

SRC: 维护网络空间的和平与稳定符合所有国家的共同利益。
HYP: It is in the common interest of all countries to maintain peace and stability in cyberspace.

SRC: 发言人指出，中国在科技创新方面的成就不是偷来的、不是抢来的，而是通过自力更生、艰苦奋斗得来的。
HYP: The spokesperson pointed out that China's achievements in scientific and technological innovation are not stolen or looted, but obtained through self-reliance and hard work.

SRC: 2019年中国通过《专利合作条约》(PCT)途径提交了约5.9万件专利申请，年增长率为10.6%，成为提交国际专利申请量最多的国家。
HYP: In 2019, China submitted about 59000 patent applications through the Patent Cooperation Treaty (PCT) route, with an annual growth rate of 10.6%, becoming the country with the largest number of international patent applications filed.

SRC: 中国已经成为创新和知识产权大国。
HYP: China has become a powerhouse in innovation and intellectual property.

SRC: 乌鲁木齐免费核酸检测多数区已基本完成高风险地区进行二次检测-中新网
HYP: Most areas of free nucleic acid testing in Urumqi have basically completed secondary testing in high-risk areas - China News Service.

SRC: 中新网乌鲁木齐7月26日电(记者孙亭文赵雅敏)乌鲁木齐市卫健委主任张卫26日在通报乌鲁木齐市最新疫情和核酸检测情况时称，目前，乌鲁木齐全市免费核酸检测工作多数区已基本完成。
HYP: Chinanews.com, Urumqi, July 26 (Reporter Sun Tingwen Zhao Yamin) When reporting the latest epidemic situation and nucleic acid testing situation in Urumqi, Zhang Wei, director of the Urumqi Municipal Health and Health Committee, said on the 26th that at present, most areas of free nucleic acid testing in Urumqi have been basically completed.

SRC: 国务院专家组和自治区、乌鲁木齐市专家正在根据核酸检测和流行病学调查结果，对疫情的发展做进一步评估。
HYP: The State Council expert group and experts from the autonomous region and Urumqi are making further assessments on the development of the epidemic based on the results of nucleic acid testing and epidemiological investigations.

SRC: 新疆维吾尔自治区新闻办公室26日召开新闻发布会通报新疆疫情和防控情况。
HYP: The Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region Information Office held a press conference on the 26th to inform the situation of the epidemic and prevention and control in Xinjiang.

SRC: 据他介绍，7月25日0时至24时，乌鲁木齐市新增新冠肺炎确诊病例22例(其中5例为无症状感染者转确诊病例) ，新增无症状感染者38例。
HYP: According to him, from 00:00 to 24:00 on July 25, 22 new confirmed cases of new coronary pneumonia were added in Urumqi (5 of which were asymptomatic infected persons transferred to confirmed cases), and 38 new asymptomatic infected persons were added.

SRC: 截至7月25日24时，乌鲁木齐市现有确诊病例135例，无症状感染者147例。
HYP: As of 24:00 on July 25, there were 135 confirmed cases and 147 asymptomatic infected persons in Urumqi.

SRC: 25日新增的无症状感染者也基本上都是通过全市免费核酸检测、主动筛查出来的。
HYP: The newly added asymptomatic infected persons on the 25th were also basically obtained through the city's free nucleic acid testing and active screening.

SRC: 乌鲁木齐市卫健委主任张卫26日称，乌鲁木齐全市免费核酸检测工作多数区已基本完成。
HYP: Zhang Wei, director of the Urumqi Municipal Health and Health Committee, said on the 26th that most of the free nucleic acid testing work areas in Urumqi have been basically completed.

SRC: 他还说，从国内其他地区的经验看，影响核酸检测结果的因素很多，比如检测试剂灵敏度、受检测人员的感染时间和排毒时间、标本取材时受检测者配合情况(配合度差可能导致标本没有取到位)以及检测环境、检验人员的操作熟练程度等。
HYP: He also said that from the experience of other areas in China, there are many factors that affect the results of nucleic acid testing, such as the sensitivity of the detection reagent, the infection time and detoxification time of the tested person, the cooperation of the tested person when the specimen is taken (poor cooperation may lead to the specimen not being taken in place), as well as the testing environment, and the operating proficiency of the inspection personnel.

SRC: 由于各种原因，核酸检测也会出现假阴性的结果。
HYP: For various reasons, nucleic acid tests will also have false negative results.

SRC: 所谓假阴性，就是指受检测者确实是感染者，但是核酸检测结果却为阴性。
HYP: The so-called false negative means that the tested person is indeed an infected person, but the nucleic acid test result is negative.

SRC: 另外，对于和确诊病例、疑似病例有过密切接触的人员，通常需要两次核酸检测才能排除。
HYP: In addition, for people who have had close contact with confirmed and suspected cases, two nucleic acid tests are usually required to rule out.

SRC: 对于去过疫情中高风险地区的人员，如果出现发热和呼吸道症状，一次核酸检测阴性存在假阴性可能，所以也需要两次核酸检测才能排除。
HYP: For people who have been to high-risk areas in the epidemic, if they have fever and respiratory symptoms, a negative nucleic acid test may have a false negative, so two nucleic acid tests are also required to rule out.

SRC: 他表示，鉴于以上情况，为了全市各族群众的身体健康，从今天开始，乌鲁木齐市将对天山区、沙依巴克区等重点地区进行二次免费核酸检测，同时开展“查遗补漏” 。
HYP: He said that in view of the above situation, and for the health of the people of all ethnic groups in the city, starting today, Urumqi City will conduct secondary free nucleic acid testing in key areas such as Tianshan District and Shayibak District, and at the same time carry out "investigating omissions and filling omissions".

SRC: 据悉，天山区、沙依巴克区是疫情高风险地区。
HYP: It is reported that Tianshan District and Shayibak District are high-risk areas for the epidemic.

SRC: 白宫疫情专家福奇：对2021年初研制出疫苗持谨慎乐观
HYP: White House epidemic expert Fauci: Cautiously optimistic that a vaccine will be developed in early 2021. Fauci said.

SRC: 福奇25日在国际领袖基金会主办的一场网络视频会议上作上述表示。
HYP: Fauci made the above remarks at a network video conference hosted by the International Leadership Foundation on the 25th.

SRC: 他提醒说，目前尚不清楚新冠疫情在秋冬季将如何发展，也不知道疫情的最终影响会如何，“而结束这一切的唯一办法就是我们每个人都选择成为解决问题的一部分”。
HYP: He reminded that it is not clear how the new crown epidemic will develop in the autumn and winter, and what the final impact of the epidemic will be, “and the only way to end it all is for each of us to choose to be part of the problem.”

SRC: 据美国约翰斯·霍普金斯大学数据，截至25日21时，美国新冠确诊病例已达417.6万，死亡14.6万人。
HYP: According to data from Johns Hopkins University in the United States, as of 21 o'clock on the 25th, the number of confirmed cases of the new crown in the United States has reached 4.176 million, and 146000 people have died.

SRC: 福奇表示，美国一些地区目前正在艰难地同反弹的疫情作斗争。
HYP: Fauci said that some regions in the United States are currently struggling to fight the rebounding epidemic.

SRC: 尽管各地疫情有所不同，需要因地制宜的应对方案，但多样化的抗疫策略并不意味着地区之间没有紧密联系。
HYP: Although the outbreaks are different in different places and need to respond to local conditions, a diversified anti-epidemic strategy does not mean that there is no close ties between regions.

SRC: 一个地区的疫情最终会影响到其他地区。
HYP: The epidemic in one region will eventually affect other regions.

SRC: “现在不是自满的时候”，福奇说，“我们的工作没有完成，必须加紧努力，也必须对未来的不确定性保持警惕。”
HYP: “Now is not the time to be complacent,” Fauci said, “our work is not done, we must step up our efforts, and we must also be vigilant about the uncertainties of the future.”

SRC: 美国华裔医学专家、治疗艾滋病“鸡尾酒疗法”创始人何大一在会上指出，美国新冠疫情尚未到达顶峰。
HYP: Dayi He, a Chinese American medical expert and founder of “Cocktail Therapy” for the treatment of AIDS, pointed out at the meeting that the new crown epidemic in the United States has not yet reached its peak.

SRC: “我们每个人都必须尽自己的一份力来减缓这一病毒的传播。”
HYP: “Each of us must do our part to slow the spread of this virus.”

SRC: 何大一呼吁，公众用自己的实际行动为科学家争取时间，以加紧研发新冠治疗药物和疫苗。
HYP: Dayi He called on the public to use their actual actions to buy time for scientists to step up the development of new crown treatments and vaccines.

SRC: 国际领袖基金会是一家以促进美国及亚太地区国际交流活动为宗旨的非营利性组织，致力于提升美国亚太裔地位，培育国际青年领袖。
HYP: The International Leadership Foundation is a non-profit organization with the purpose of promoting international exchange activities in the United States and the Asia-Pacific region, and is committed to promoting the status of Asian-Pacific Americans and nurturing young international leaders.

SRC: 当天，美国运输部长赵小兰、<v>美</v>联邦众议员孟昭文以及国际领袖基金会创会会长董继玲等分别在会上发言。
HYP: On the same day, US Secretary of Transportation Zhao Xiaolan, Federal Congressman Meng Zhaowen, and International Leadership Foundation founding president Dong Jiling, and others, spoke at the meeting respectively.

SRC: 当天，美国运输部长赵小兰、美联邦众议员孟昭文以及国际领袖基金会创会会长董继玲等分别在会上发言。
HYP: On the same day, US Secretary of Transportation Zhao Xiaolan, Federal Congressman Meng Zhaowen, and International Leadership Foundation founding president Dong Jiling, and others, spoke at the meeting respectively.

SRC: 他们特别向在一线抗疫的亚太裔医务工作者和志愿者致敬，并呼吁美国公众继续坚持“社交距离”等防疫准则，遏制疫情扩散。
HYP: They paid special tribute to the Asian-Pacific American medical workers and volunteers fighting the epidemic on the frontline, and called on the American public to continue to adhere to epidemic prevention guidelines such as “social distancing” to curb the spread of the epidemic.

SRC: 美中贸谈代表传8月会面
HYP: Representatives of US-China trade talks rumored to meet in August.

SRC: 香港《南华早报》25日引述一名匿名知情人士报导，中国贸易谈判团队负责人、国务院副总理刘鹤与美方团队共同领导人、贸易代表赖海哲可望在8月举行正式会谈，评估双方履行中美第一阶段贸易协议的情况。
HYP: Hong Kong's South China Morning Post quoted an anonymous person familiar with the matter on the 25th that the head of China's trade negotiation team, Vice Premier Liu He and co-leader of the US team, trade representative Lai Haizhe, are expected to hold formal talks in August to assess the two sides' implementation of the first phase of the China-US trade agreement.

SRC: 报导说，虽然中国过去几个月已大幅提高采购美国农产品数量，但因新冠病毒疫情等因素，中方采购量距离贸易协议中承诺的数量仍有一段距离。
HYP: The report said that although China has significantly increased the amount of US agricultural purchases in the past few months, due to factors such as the new coronavirus epidemic, the Chinese side's purchases are still some distance away from the amount promised in the trade agreement.

SRC: 分析家说，近来美中相互关闭对方领事馆，加上其他争端，可能破坏双方在贸易方面的任何进展。
HYP: Analysts said that the recent mutual closure of each other's consulates by the United States and China, combined with other disputes, may undermine any progress on trade between the two sides.

SRC: 中美第一阶段贸易协议在1月15日签署后一个月生效，协议中规定双方高层组成的贸易框架小组，每半年应举行一次会谈。
HYP: The China-US phase one trade agreement, which took effect one month after the signing on January 15, stipulates that a trade framework group formed by high-level leaders of the two sides should hold talks every six months.

SRC: 知情人士透露，此次会议将是“一个重要的转折点”，让双方得以评估协议进展。
HYP: The meeting will be “an important turning point” for both sides to assess the progress of the agreement, the person said.

SRC: 但这名人士也说，若美中紧张关系导致此时会谈意愿不高，双方可能会同意，赖海哲与刘鹤5月8日的电话会议，即已满足贸易协议中每半年会谈一次的条款。
HYP: But the person also said that if the US-China tensions lead to low willingness to talks at this time, the two sides may agree that the May 8 conference call between Lai Haizhe and Liu He has met the terms of the semi-annual talks in the trade agreement.

SRC: 今年以来，中美关系急速恶化，双方争端包括新冠病毒起源、贸易、香港、新疆、南海与意识形态等一系列问题。
HYP: This year, China-US relations have deteriorated rapidly, with disputes between the two sides including a series of issues such as the origin of the new coronavirus, trade, Hong Kong, Xinjiang, the South China Sea, and ideology.

SRC: 美国总统特朗普虽在年初吹嘘自己在首阶段协议中取得的成就，但近来态度改变。
HYP: Although US President Trump boasted about his achievements in the first phase agreement at the beginning of the year, his attitude has changed recently.

SRC: 他23日在白宫记者会上说，虽然中国近来单日采购美国玉米数量破纪录，也买了很多大豆，“但这份贸易协议现在对我的意义，已不如当初达成时” 。
HYP: He said at a White House press conference on the 23rd that although China has recently purchased a record amount of US corn and bought a lot of soybeans in a single day, “this trade agreement is not as meaningful to me now as it was when it was reached”.

SRC: 一位匿名北京政府顾问也认为，由于美中关系不佳，新一轮贸易谈判不太可能进行， “贸易议题在中美关系已失去分量”。
HYP: An anonymous Beijing government adviser also believes that a new round of trade talks is unlikely due to poor US-China relations, and “trade issues have lost weight in China-US relations.”

SRC: 但他透露，中国经贸相关单位23日仍开会讨论了一系列问题，包括如何增加从美国的进口量， “我们已经尽力买了，所以任何追加采购会有困难” 。
HYP: But he disclosed that relevant Chinese economic and trade units still met on the 23rd to discuss a series of issues, including how to increase imports from the United States, “We have already done our best to buy, so any additional purchases will be difficult”.

SRC: 美中贸易全国委员会副会长彭捷宁表示，保持首阶段协议动能“比以往任何时候都更重要”， 并指中国今年在进一步向美企开放金融市场上有所进展。
HYP: Peng Jiening, vice chairman of the US-China National Trade Commission, said that maintaining momentum in the phase one agreement is “more important than ever,” and pointed to China's progress in further opening up the financial market to US companies this year.

SRC: 独立研究公司Plenum分析师说：“谈比不谈好，尽管可能只被当成例行公事。”
HYP: "Talking is better than not talking, although it may be seen as routine," said analysts at independent research firm Plenum.

SRC: 余额宝收益下行“90后”反而“报复性”存钱？
HYP: Yu'ebao's earnings decline “Post-90s” instead “retaliate” saving money?

SRC: 随着余额宝收益下行， “90后”不仅没有逃离余额宝，反而开始“报复性”存钱了？
HYP: With Yu'ebao's earnings going down, “Post-90s” not only did not flee Yu'ebao, but began to “retaliate” saving money?

SRC: 中国新经济研究院联合支付宝日前发布的《余额宝90后攒钱报告》（2020版）显示，上半年，“90后”更爱攒钱了：人均攒钱金额比2019年增长近四成。
HYP: The “Yuebao Post-90s Saving Money Report” (2020 edition) released by the China Academy of New Economic Research jointly with Alipay a few days ago shows that in the first half of the year, “post-90s” love saving money more: the amount of money saved per capita has increased by nearly 40% compared to 2019 .

SRC: 有意思的是，“90后”更倾向于从一笔笔“小钱”开始攒，有六成平均每笔攒钱金额在20元以下… …
HYP: Interestingly, “post-90s” are more inclined to start saving from a “small amount of money”, and 60% of the average amount of money saved per transaction is below 20 yuan... ....

SRC: 用余额宝攒钱，也成为“90后”的攒钱习惯。
HYP: Saving money with Yu'ebao has also become the “post-90s” saving habit.

SRC: 数据显示，在7亿余额宝用户中，有1.34亿用户是“90后” 。
HYP: The data shows that of the 700 million Yu'ebao users, 134 million are “post-90s”.

SRC: 中国有1.74亿“90后” ，也就是说，全国每4个“90后”中约有3个在用余额宝攒钱。
HYP: There are 174 million “post-90s” in China, that is, about 3 out of every 4 “post-90s” across the country are saving money with Yu'ebao.

SRC: 目前，余额宝等货币基金的7日年化收益率从年初高于2%的水平，下滑到1.5%左右。
HYP: At present, the 7-day annualized rate of return of money funds such as Yu'ebao has slipped to about 1.5% from a level above 2% at the beginning of the year.

SRC: 即使如此，也没有影响“90后”攒钱的步伐。
HYP: Even so, it has not affected the pace of “post-90s” saving money.

SRC: 而在余额宝“攒钱效应”提升背景下，不少习惯使用余额宝的年轻人还直接转化为“基民”。
HYP: And in the context of the “money saving effect” of Yu'ebao, many young people who are used to using Yu'E Bao have also been directly converted into “basic people”.

SRC: 支付宝数据显示，截至7月13日，近一个月支付宝上的新“基民”同比增长1倍多，越来越多年轻人在支付宝上实现“进阶”理财。
HYP: Alipay data shows that as of July 13, the “new Jimin” on Alipay in the past month has more than doubled year-on-year, and more and more young people are achieving “advanced” financial management on Alipay.

SRC: 有分析师认为，资金从余额宝流入股市，也是6月货币基金份额明确下滑的重要原因。
HYP: Some analysts believe that the inflow of funds from Yu'ebao into the stock market is also an important reason for the clear decline in the share of money funds in June.

SRC: 报告还显示，“90后”女生更倾向于多攒钱，平均比男生攒钱金额高两成；在支付宝平台上持有基金的用户中，6成是男性，女性与男性相比倾向于选择更为稳健的理财方式。
HYP: The report also shows that “post-90s” girls are more inclined to save more money, with an average amount of money saved by two percent higher than that of boys; among the users who hold funds on the Alipay platform, 60% are men, and women tend to choose a more robust financial management method compared to men.

SRC: 存钱之后，“90后”有何计划？
HYP: After saving money, what is the plan for the “post-90s”?

SRC: 支付宝数据显示，“90后”有为目标攒钱的习惯，将旅行作为攒钱目标的用户最多。
HYP: Alipay data shows that the “post-90s” have the habit of saving money as a goal, and the users who take travel as their goal to save money are the most.

SRC: 受疫情影响，许多“90后”攒钱为疫情后的旅行做准备；电影院恢复营业，也为从攒钱转向消费提供了新途径。
HYP: Affected by the epidemic, many "post-90s" have saved money to prepare for travel after the epidemic; the resumption of cinemas has also provided a new way to switch from saving to consumption.

SRC: 让一面面鲜艳的党旗在抗洪大堤上高高飘扬
HYP: Let a brightly-colored party flag fly high on the flood-fighting embankment.

SRC: 近期我国南方受连续降雨影响，防汛抗洪形势十分严峻，造成贵州、四川、湖南、广西、广东、湖北等26省(区、市)受灾。
HYP: Recently, the south of our country has been affected by continuous rainfall, and the situation of flood control and flood-fighting is very grim, causing disasters in 26 provinces (districts and cities) including Guizhou, Sichuan, Hunan, Guangxi, Guangdong, and Hubei.

SRC: 灾情就是命令，灾区就是战场，灾害面前，党旗就是战旗，各级党组织、广大党员干部、人民子弟兵坚决落实习近平总书记关于防汛救灾工作重要指示精神，迅速投身防汛抗洪抢险救灾第一线，成为灾区群众的主心骨、抗洪战斗的生力军。
HYP: The disaster is the order, the disaster-stricken area is the battlefield, and in the face of the disaster, the party flag is the battle flag. Party organizations at all levels, the majority of party members and cadres, and the people's disciples resolutely follow the spirit of General Secretary Jinping's important instructions on flood control and disaster relief work, and quickly devote themselves to the front line of flood control and flood-fighting rescue and relief, becoming the backbone of the masses in the disaster-stricken area and the fresh force of the flood-fighting battle.

SRC: 鲜艳的党旗在抗洪大堤上高高飘扬，是忠诚的体现，也是使命的召唤。
HYP: The brightly-colored party flag flying high on the flood-fighting embankment is a manifestation of loyalty and a call of mission.

SRC: 灾害面前，一个党组织就是一座战斗堡垒，一名党员干部就是一面旗帜。
HYP: In the face of disasters, a party organization is a battle fortress, and a party member cadre is a flag.

SRC: 在各地的抗洪一线，各级党组织、广大党员干部体现高度的对党忠诚，听从党中央号召，以“看我的”的行动、“跟我来”的步伐、“我先上”的勇气，筑起一座座冲不垮的钢铁堡垒，挺起一个个压不弯的中国脊梁。
HYP: On the flood-fighting front lines everywhere, party organizations at all levels and the majority of party members and cadres embody a high degree of loyalty to the party, obey the call of the Party Central Committee, and with the actions of “see me,” the pace of “come with me,” and the courage of “I go first,” to build an unbreakable steel fortress and stand up a sturdy and unbending Chinese ridge.

SRC: 鲜艳的党旗在抗洪大堤上高高飘扬，是阵地的坚守，也是冲锋的号角。
HYP: The brightly-colored party flag fluttering high on the flood-fighting embankment is the perseverance of the position and the clarion call to charge.

SRC: 面对洪涝灾害，各级党组织迅速行动，吹响抗洪“冲锋号”，把鲜艳的党旗插在抗洪的大堤上，广大党员干部、人民子弟兵坚守在抗洪的阵地上，用“党旗在阵地就在”、“洪水不退永不收兵”的意志和行动，成为灾区群众最放心也最值得信赖的坚固屏障。
HYP: In the face of flood disasters, party organizations at all levels acted quickly, sounded the “charge trumpets” for flood fighting, and planted the bright-colored party flags on the flood-fighting embankment. The vast number of party members and cadres and the people's disciples stood firm on the flood-fighting positions, and with the will and actions of “the party flag is at the position,” and “the flood will never recede, never withdraw troops,” became the most assured and trustworthy strong barrier for the masses in the disaster-stricken areas.

SRC: 鲜艳的党旗在抗洪大堤上高高飘扬，是无私的奉献，也是责任的担当。
HYP: The brightly-colored party flag flying high on the flood-fighting embankment is a selfless dedication and a responsibility.

SRC: 危难时刻，彰显党员本色，在人民群众生命财产受到严重威胁的时刻，党员干部、人民子弟兵舍小家、顾大家，无私奉献，敢于担当，把打赢防汛抗洪抢险救灾这场硬仗，作为全面检验能力、作风、素养的主战场、阅兵场，正是这种无私奉献和担当的精神，极大的鼓舞着灾区群众战胜灾情的信心和决心，凝聚起打赢防汛抗洪抢险救灾的强大精神力量。
HYP: In times of crisis, show the true character of party members, and at a time when the lives and property of the people are seriously threatened, party members and cadres, the people's children and soldiers, take care of everyone, selflessly and dare to take responsibility, and regard winning the hard battle of flood control, flood relief, rescue and disaster relief as the main battlefield and parade ground for comprehensive testing of ability, style, and literacy. It is this spirit of selfless dedication and responsibility that greatly inspires the confidence and determination of the people in the disaster-stricken areas to win the battle against floods, and gathers a strong spiritual force to win the flood control, rescue, and disaster relief.

SRC: “人民至上、生命至上”， 既在平时接受检验，更在关键时刻接受考验。
HYP: “People first, life first” is not only tested in peacetime, but also at critical moments.

SRC: 在抗洪大堤上，广大党员干部和人民子弟兵，要让人民群众随时随处都能看到鲜红的党旗、奋斗的身影、鼓励的声音，用洪水冲不垮的钢铁堤坝为党旗增辉添彩，让一面面鲜艳的党旗在抗洪大堤上高高飘扬！
HYP: On the flood-fighting embankment, the majority of party members, cadres, and people's children and soldiers, let the people see the bright red party flag, the figure of struggle, and the voice of encouragement at any time and anywhere, add luster to the party flag with the steel embankment that cannot be washed away by the flood, and let a bright party flag fly high on the flood-fighting embankment!

SRC: APEC成员贸易部长会议表示将加速推动区域经济复苏-新华网
HYP: APEC member trade ministers say they will accelerate regional economic recovery - Xinhua.

SRC: 新华社吉隆坡7月25日电（记者林昊）亚太经合组织（APEC）成员贸易部长视频会议25日举行，会议承诺将致力于减少新冠疫情对本区域经济的影响，加速推动实现具有弹性、可持续性和包容性的区域经济复苏。
HYP: KUALA LUMPUR, July 25 (Reporter Lin Hao) The Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) member trade ministers video conference held on the 25th pledged to work to reduce the impact of the new crown epidemic on the regional economy and accelerate the promotion of a resilient, sustainable and inclusive regional economic recovery.

SRC: 会议由今年APEC领导人非正式会议主办方马来西亚主持。
HYP: The meeting was hosted by Malaysia, the host of this year's APEC leaders' informal meeting.

SRC: 会后发表的联合声明表示，APEC成员贸易部长认识到，在这一具有挑战性的时刻，一个自由、开放、公平、非歧视、透明和可预测的贸易和投资环境对于推动经济复苏的重要性。
HYP: A joint statement issued after the meeting said that APEC member trade ministers recognize the importance of a free, open, fair, non-discriminatory, transparent and predictable trade and investment environment to drive economic recovery at this challenging time.

SRC: 各方承诺，确保为应对疫情所采取的紧急措施是具有针对性、恰当、透明和临时的，不会制造不必要的贸易壁垒并扰乱全球供应链，同时遵守世界贸易组织规则。
HYP: All parties committed to ensure that the emergency measures taken to respond to the outbreak are targeted, appropriate, transparent and temporary, do not create unnecessary trade barriers and disrupt global supply chains, while complying with World Trade Organization rules.

SRC: APEC成员贸易部长在声明中承诺，加强合作促进必要的商品和服务流动，通过加强供应链弹性促进互联互通，将医疗物资、食品和农业产品流动所受到的干扰最小化，以应对疫情。
HYP: In the statement, APEC member trade ministers committed to strengthen cooperation to promote the flow of essential goods and services, promote interconnectivity by strengthening supply chain resilience, and minimize disruptions to the flow of medical supplies, food and agricultural products in response to the outbreak.

SRC: APEC成员贸易部长一致认为，有必要讨论如何减少限制必要商品贸易的非关税壁垒，重申将致力于在不影响为阻止疫情蔓延所采取措施的情况下促进必要的跨境人员流动。
HYP: APEC member trade ministers unanimously agreed that it is necessary to discuss how to reduce non-tariff barriers that restrict trade in essential goods, reaffirming their commitment to promoting essential cross-border movement of people without affecting the measures taken to stem the spread of the outbreak.

SRC: 会议还发布了有关促进必要商品流通的宣言。
HYP: The meeting also issued a declaration on promoting the flow of essential goods.

SRC: 宣言表示，各经济体将确保其为应对疫情所采取的贸易措施符合世贸组织规定，并承诺在减少非关税贸易壁垒、贸易促进等方面采取行动，以促进疫情下必要的商品流动。
HYP: The declaration stated that economies will ensure that the trade measures they have taken to respond to the outbreak are in line with WTO regulations, and committed to taking actions in reducing non-tariff trade barriers and promoting trade to facilitate the flow of essential goods under the outbreak.

SRC: 主持会议的马来西亚国际贸易和工业部部长阿兹明·阿里表示，尽管受到疫情影响，马来西亚依然致力于推动今年APEC会议取得成功，制定APEC2020年后合作愿景的工作正有序推进。
HYP: Malaysian Minister of International Trade and Industry Azmin Ali, who chaired the meeting, said that despite the impact of the epidemic, Malaysia remains committed to promoting the success of this year's APEC meeting, and the work of formulating APEC's post-2020 cooperation vision is progressing in an orderly manner.

SRC: 马来西亚同意以视频形式举行APEC相关会议，但不排除在年底APEC领导人非正式会议时安排实体会议的可能性。
HYP: Malaysia agreed to hold relevant APEC meetings in video format, but did not rule out the possibility of arranging a physical meeting at the end of the APEC informal leaders' meeting.

SRC: 江西财政紧急下达2.8亿元资金支持各地灾后救助重建-中新网
HYP: Jiangxi Finance Emergency Issued 280 Million Yuan Funds to Support Post-Disaster Relief and Reconstruction in Various Places - China News Service.

SRC: 7月24日，江西省九江市湖口县，驰援当地抗洪的中国人民解放军第71集团军某部官兵利用备勤间隙，帮助湖口县一蔬菜种植专业合作社抢收辣椒。
HYP: On July 24, in Hukou County, Jiujiang City, Jiangxi Province, officers and soldiers of a department of the 71st Group Army of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, which rushed to aid the local flood fighting, used the reserve gap to help a vegetable planting professional cooperative in Hukou County rush to harvest peppers.

SRC: 受此前强降雨影响，该合作社种植的上百亩红辣椒受灾严重，如不及时采摘损失会更加扩大。
HYP: Affected by the previous heavy rainfall, hundreds of acres of red peppers planted by the cooperative were severely affected, and the losses would be even greater if they were not picked in time.

SRC: 中新社记者富田摄
HYP: Photo by China News Service reporter Tomita.

SRC: 中新网南昌7月26日电(袁汝晶)江西省财政厅26日消息，根据江西省防汛抗旱指挥部的工作部署和要求，该省财政紧急下达中央和省级救灾资金2.8亿元，为防汛抢险和受灾群众救助工作提供资金保障。
HYP: China News Service Nanchang, July 26 (Yuan Rujing) The Jiangxi Provincial Finance Department announced on the 26th that according to the work deployment and requirements of the Jiangxi Provincial Flood Control and Drought Relief Headquarters, the provincial fiscal emergency issued 280 million yuan of central and provincial disaster relief funds to provide financial guarantee for flood prevention and rescue and relief work for the affected people.

SRC: 7月份以来，江西汛期、灾情不断升级。
HYP: Since July, the flood season and disaster situation in Jiangxi have been escalating.

SRC: 洪涝灾害已导致该省农业农村直接经济损失100.7亿元、受灾面积1316.9万亩。
HYP: The flood disaster has caused 10.07 billion yuan of direct economic losses in the province's agriculture and rural areas, and the affected area is 13.169 million mu.

SRC: 7月17和7月22日，江西省财政先后下达中央救灾资金6000万元和2亿元。
HYP: On July 17 and July 22, Jiangxi Provincial Finance has successively issued 60 million yuan and 200 million yuan in central disaster relief funds.

SRC: 同时根据灾情变化情况，从该省应急管理专项资金中连续分3批下达省级救灾资金2030万元，支持各地灾后救助和恢复重建。
HYP: At the same time, according to the changes in the disaster situation, 20.3 million yuan of provincial disaster relief funds have been issued in three consecutive batches from the province's emergency management special funds to support post-disaster relief and reconstruction in various places.

SRC: 江西省财政厅相关负责人26日称，在汛期到来之前，已下达各类防灾减灾资金1.73亿元，确保风险防患早发现、早处置、早化解，为抗洪抢险工作提供经费支持。
HYP: The relevant person in charge of the Jiangxi Provincial Finance Department said on the 26th that before the arrival of the flood season, 173 million yuan of various types of disaster prevention and mitigation funds have been issued to ensure early detection, early disposal and early resolution of risks and disasters, and to provide financial support for flood fighting and rescue work.

SRC: 目前，长江江西段和中国最大淡水湖鄱阳湖水位呈高位缓退状态。
HYP: At present, the water level in the Jiangxi section of the Yangtze River and Poyang Lake, China's largest freshwater lake, is in a state of high and slow receding.

SRC: 江西省防指于24日18时，将防汛应急响应下调至Ⅱ级；将省级救灾应急响应级别由II级调整为III级。
HYP: Jiangxi Provincial Prevention Pointer lowered the emergency response level for flood prevention to level II at 18 o'clock on the 24th, and adjusted the provincial disaster relief emergency response level from level II to level III.

SRC: 灾情评估和灾后恢复重建等各项工作将持续进行。
HYP: Various work such as disaster assessment and post-disaster recovery and reconstruction will continue.

SRC: 国家卫健委：7月25日新增确诊病例46例，新疆22例辽宁13例- 经济观察网
HYP: National Health Commission: 46 new confirmed cases on July 25, 22 cases in Xinjiang, 13 cases in Liaoning - Economic Observatory.

SRC: 据国家卫生健康委员会消息，7月25日0—24时，31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增确诊病例46例，其中境外输入病例11例（内蒙古5例，广东3例，天津1例，福建1例，山东1例），本土病例35例（新疆22例，辽宁13例）；无新增死亡病例；新增疑似病例2例，均为境外输入病例（内蒙古1例，上海1例） 。
HYP: According to the National Health Commission, from 0-24 o'clock on July 25, 31 provinces (autonomous regions, municipalities directly under the Central Government) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 46 new confirmed cases, including 11 imported cases from abroad (5 in Inner Mongolia, 3 in Guangdong, 1 in Tianjin, 1 in Fujian, 1 in Shandong), 35 local cases (22 in Xinjiang, 13 in Liaoning), no new deaths, and 2 new suspected cases, both imported from abroad (1 in Inner Mongolia and 1 in Shanghai).

SRC: 当日新增治愈出院病例19例，解除医学观察的密切接触者673人，重症病例较前一日增加7例。
HYP: There were 19 newly cured and discharged cases on the same day, 673 close contacts released from medical observation, and 7 severe cases compared with the previous day.

SRC: 境外输入现有确诊病例82例（其中重症病例2例），现有疑似病例3例。
HYP: There were 82 existing confirmed cases imported from abroad (including 2 severe cases), and 3 existing suspected cases.

SRC: 累计确诊病例2045例，累计治愈出院病例1963例，无死亡病例。
HYP: A total of 2045 confirmed cases, 1963 cured and discharged cases, and no deaths.

SRC: 截至7月25日24时，据31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告，现有确诊病例288例（其中重症病例18例），累计治愈出院病例78908例，累计死亡病例4634例，累计报告确诊病例83830例，现有疑似病例3例。
HYP: As of 24:00 on July 25, according to reports from 31 provinces (autonomous regions, municipalities directly under the Central Government) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps, there are 288 existing confirmed cases (including 18 severe cases), 78908 cured and discharged cases, 4634 deaths, 83830 confirmed cases and 3 existing suspected cases.

SRC: 累计追踪到密切接触者779000人，尚在医学观察的密切接触者11762人。
HYP: A total of 779000 close contacts have been traced, and 11762 close contacts are still under medical observation.

SRC: 31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增无症状感染者68例（境外输入8例）；当日转为确诊病例17例（无境外输入） ；当日解除医学观察10例（境外输入7例）；尚在医学观察无症状感染者292例（境外输入91例）。
HYP: Thirty-one provinces (autonomous regions, municipalities directly under the Central Government) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 68 new asymptomatic infections (8 imported from abroad), 17 transferred to confirmed cases (no imported from abroad) on the same day, 10 released from medical observation (7 imported from abroad) on the same day, and 292 asymptomatic infections (91 imported from abroad) still under medical observation.

SRC: 累计收到港澳台地区通报确诊病例3009例。
HYP: A total of 9300 confirmed cases were notified in Hong Kong, Macao and Taiwan.

SRC: 其中，香港特别行政区2505例（出院1455例，死亡18例），澳门特别行政区46例（出院46例），台湾地区458例（出院440例，死亡7例）。
HYP: Among them, 2505 cases were reported in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region (1455 cases discharged, 18 deaths), 46 cases were in the Macao Special Administrative Region (46 cases discharged), and 458 cases were in Taiwan (440 cases discharged, 7 deaths).

SRC: 专家说通过美国人口普查收集移民资料用于众院席位分配违宪
HYP: Experts say collecting immigration data through the US Census for allotment of House seats is unconstitutional.

SRC: 一些民权组织和好几个美国城市和县对美国联邦政府提出起诉，称特朗普总统府试图将无证移民排除在美国人口普查之外是行不通的，也是违宪的。
HYP: Some civil rights groups and several US cities and counties have sued the US federal government, saying President Trump's attempt to exclude undocumented immigrants from the US Census is unworkable and unconstitutional.

SRC: 美国人口普查将决定美国国会众议院席位的分配。
HYP: The US Census will determine the allocation of seats in the US House of Representatives.

SRC: 美国民权自由联盟执行律师萨拉·布兰农对美国之音说，“这么做是行不通的。”
