HYP: "It's not going to work," Sarah Brannon, executive attorney for the American Civil Liberties Coalition, told VOA.

SRC: 她接着说，特朗普要求在人口普查中确定接受普查的人的公民身份难以做到，而且“不是很可靠。”
HYP: She went on to say that Trump's requirement to determine the citizenship status of people receiving the census in the census is difficult to do and "is not very reliable."

SRC: 另一个公民自由组织共同事业组织星期四提出诉讼，对特朗普的行政令提出挑战。
HYP: Another civil liberties group, Common Cause, filed a lawsuit Thursday challenging Trump's executive order.

SRC: 新泽西州、乔治亚州的一些城市加入了诉讼。
HYP: Some cities in New Jersey, Georgia joined the lawsuit.

SRC: 维吉尼亚州的阿灵顿县星期五也加入了诉讼。
HYP: Arlington County, Virginia, joined the lawsuit Friday.

SRC: 阿灵顿县的管理董事会主席加维说，“美国宪法要求每10年准确地清点我们的人口。我们必须准确地清点居住在阿灵顿县的每一个人，不能让这种非法试图吓跑人和压缩我们的移民社区人数的做法得逞。”
HYP: Garvey, president of Arlington County's board of management, said, "The US Constitution requires an accurate count of our population every 10 years. We must accurately count every single person who lives in Arlington County and cannot allow this illegal attempt to scare people away and squeeze the number of people in our immigrant community."

SRC: 另一些组织和个人则赞扬特朗普总统的行政令。
HYP: Other organizations and individuals praised President Trump's executive order.

SRC: 阿拉巴马州司法部长马歇尔称，该行政令是该州的一个“胜利”。
HYP: Alabama Attorney General Marshall called the executive order a "victory" for the state.

SRC: 他说，“分配各州的国会众议院席位和选举团席位的时候，必须根据居住在各州的居民人数，而且是合法居住的居民的人数。”
HYP: He said that "the allocation of state House seats and Electoral College seats must be based on the number of residents who live in each state and are legally resident."

SRC: 美国最高法院去年阻止了特朗普行政当局将公民身份问题纳入2020年人口普查表中。
HYP: The US Supreme Court last year blocked the Trump administration from including the citizenship question on the 2020 census form.

SRC: 特朗普总统本星期早些时候签署一项行政令，指令监管美国人口普查局的商业部长罗斯提交人口普查所得的无证人口的数据，以便行政当局将这些无证人口排除在各州的人口普查数字之外，并以此确定每个州究竟是增加还是减少或保持众议院议员席位。
HYP: President Trump signed an executive order earlier this week directing the US Census Bureau's Commerce Secretary Ross to submit data on undocumented populations obtained from the census, so that the administration can exclude those undocumented people from state census numbers and, as a result, determine whether each state increases or decreases or keeps House seats.

SRC: 美国每隔10年就要根据人口变化情况重新分配众议院席位。
HYP: The US is to reallocate House seats every 10 years based on population changes.

SRC: 新书爆料：哈利王子觉得哥哥“势利傲慢”
HYP: New book broke: Prince Harry feels brother is 'snobbish and arrogant'.

SRC: 英国《泰晤士报》和《星期日泰晤士报》连载名为《寻找自由》（Finding Freedom）的新书，内容描绘哈利王子（Prince Harry）与妻子梅根（Meghan Markle）的王室生活心路历程。
HYP: The British “Times” and “Sunday Times” have serialized a new book titled “Finding Freedom” that depicts Prince Harry's journey of royal life with his wife Meghan Markle.

SRC: 但路透社报导，哈利和梅根已和这本书撇清关系，说他们未接受作者访问，也未提供任何内容。
HYP: But Reuters reported that Harry and Meghan have brushed off their relationship with the book, saying that they have not interviewed the author and have not provided any content.

SRC: 《星期日泰晤士报》报导，新书引述消息人士表示，哈利和梅根婚前约会时，威廉王子（Prince William）想确认原是好莱坞女星的梅根对哈利是否别有用心。
HYP: The Sunday Times reported that the new book quoted a source as saying that when Harry and Meghan were dating before marriage, Prince William wanted to confirm whether Meghan, who was originally a Hollywood actress, had ulterior motives for Harry.

SRC: 根据消息人士转述，威廉当时曾对哈利说：“你别感觉有必要仓促（娶梅根）。
HYP: According to the source, William had said to Harry at the time: “You don't feel the need to rush (to marry Meghan).

SRC: 你可以尽量花时间去了解这个女孩。”
HYP: You can try to take your time to get to know the girl.”

SRC: 报导说，当哈利听到威廉用“这个女孩”形容梅根，他从哥哥语气中感受到傲慢势利，他也认为自己不再需要他人照顾提醒。
HYP: The report said that when Harry heard William describe Meghan with “this girl”, he felt the arrogance and snobbery from his brother's tone, and he also felt that he no longer needed reminders to take care of others.

SRC: 哈利和梅根今年1月宣布计划过更独立的生活，并将自食其力。
HYP: Harry and Meghan announced in January this year that they plan to live a more independent life and will support themselves.

SRC: 两人3月正式卸下王室高阶成员身分后，目前带著儿子亚契（Archie）住在美国洛杉矶追求新事业。
HYP: After officially unloading their high-ranking members of the royal family in March, the two are currently living in Los Angeles, the United States, with their son Archie to pursue a new career.

SRC: 哈利和梅根在2018年5月结婚。
HYP: Harry and Meghan got married in May 2018 .

SRC: 当时这场婚姻被视为为英国王室注入好莱坞的光鲜亮丽和新时代气息，两人也因此成为当代全球最受瞩目的名人夫妻档之一。
HYP: At the time, the marriage was seen as injecting the glitz and new age of Hollywood into the British royal family, and the two also became one of the most high-profile celebrity couples in the contemporary world.

SRC: 越南驻老挝大使馆公使衔参赞郑氏心、在老挝越南佛教协会、老挝越南人总会、万象省政府代表、老挝老兵协会等代表一同参加了祭奠仪式。
HYP: Minister Counsellor of the Vietnamese Embassy in Laos, Mrs. Tseng Thi Sin, along with representatives from the Vietnam Buddhist Association in Laos, the Lao Vietnamese Federation, the Vientiane Provincial Government, the Lao Veterans Association and other representatives attended the memorial ceremony.

SRC: 英烈祭奠仪式在庄严肃穆的气氛中举行，各位代表陆续向英烈们上香，缅怀英烈们的丰功伟绩及越老特殊团结关系。
HYP: The memorial ceremony for the heroes was held in a solemn atmosphere, and the representatives successively offered incense to the martyrs to commemorate the heroes' great achievements and the special solidarity between Vietnam and Laos.

SRC: 公使衔参赞郑氏心在讲话中表示，这是在老越南人和老挝人民共同缅怀两国革命英烈，一起对为两国独立自由牺牲的英烈表达感恩之心的机会，同时也是两国人民回顾两国并肩协作打击共同敌人，争取民族独立，国家统一，共同建设国家发展，巩固两国关系的良好机会。
HYP: In his speech, Minister Counsellor Tseng Thi Sin said that this is an opportunity for the Lao Vietnamese and the Lao people to jointly remember the revolutionary martyrs of the two countries and together to express their gratitude to the martyrs who sacrificed for the independence and freedom of the two countries, as well as a good opportunity for the two peoples to recall that the two countries worked side by side to fight the common enemy, strive for national independence, national reunification, jointly build national development, and consolidate the relations between the two countries.

SRC: 74年前的1946年1月23日， 老越战斗联盟的28名战士在进攻Phonehe据点时英勇牺牲。
HYP: 74 years ago on January 23, 1946, 28 soldiers of the Lao-Vietnamese Fighting Union died heroically while attacking the Phonehe stronghold.

SRC: 此次进攻取得胜利，成为两国在争取民族解放革命斗争初期阶段的具有历史性意义的胜利。
HYP: The victory in this offensive became a historic victory for the two countries in the initial stage of the struggle for national liberation revolution.

SRC: 郑氏心女士强调，两国人民永远铭记为两国民族解放斗争事业牺牲的各位英烈，同时强调两国年轻一带将继续发扬老前辈英勇、坚强的传统，为越老关系持续开花结果及两国的繁荣发展作出应有的贡献。
HYP: Ms. Zheng Thi Sin emphasized that the two peoples will always remember the heroes and martyrs who sacrificed for the cause of the national liberation struggle of the two countries, while stressing that the younger areas of the two countries will continue to carry forward the heroic and strong traditions of the elders, and make due contributions to the continued blossoming of the Vietnam-Laos relations and the prosperity and development of the two countries.

SRC: 里程碑式跨越！
HYP: Milestone leap!

SRC: 国际米兰解锁第3000场意甲比赛-中新网
HYP: Inter Milan unlocks the 3000th Serie A match - Chinanews.com |

SRC: 中新网客户端7月26日电北京时间26日凌晨，意甲传统豪门国际米兰迎来了里程碑之战。
HYP: Chinanews.com Client, July 26th, Beijing time on the early morning of the 26th, Inter Milan, the traditional giant of Serie A, ushered in a milestone battle.

SRC: 据意大利媒体统计，客场对阵热那亚一役是国际米兰队史第3000场意甲联赛，蓝黑军团也是首个解锁这项里程碑的球队。
HYP: According to Italian media statistics, the away game against Genoa was the 3000th Serie A match in the history of Inter Milan, and the Nerazzurri was also the first team to unlock this milestone.

SRC: 自1929年联赛改制以来，国际米兰是唯一一支从未缺席意甲的队伍，也是唯一一支从未降级的球队。
HYP: Since the league reorganization in 1929, Inter Milan is the only team that has never been absent from Serie A, and the only team that has never been relegated.

SRC: 据意大利媒体报道，国际米兰与热那亚的比赛是蓝黑军团队史第3000场比赛。
HYP: According to Italian media reports, the match between Inter Milan and Genoa was the 3000th match in the history of the Nerazzurri team.

SRC: 在这场里程碑之战中，国际米兰客场三球完胜热那亚。
HYP: In this milestone battle, Inter Milan won three goals away from Genoa.

SRC: 此役卢卡库梅开二度，替补出场的桑切斯也贡献一球。
HYP: Lukaku scored twice in this campaign, and Sanchez, who came off the bench, also contributed a goal.

SRC: 比赛从一开始就进入了国际米兰的节奏，强攻终于在第34分钟转化为进球。
HYP: The game entered the rhythm of Inter from the beginning, and the storm was finally converted into a goal in the 34th minute.

SRC: 比拉吉左路传中，卢卡库中路包抄头球破门。
HYP: Biraghi crossed from the left, and Lukaku outflanked a header to break the goal.

SRC: 第82分钟国际米兰如法炮制，摩西右路突破后传中，桑切斯中路包抄推射得手；终场前卢卡库完成梅开二度，反击中布罗佐维奇送出长距离直塞，卢卡库突入禁区晃过罗梅罗后推射空门得分，将比分定格在3：0。
HYP: In the 82nd minute, Inter Milan concocted as per the law, and Moses broke through from the right, and Sanchez copied the shooter in the middle; before the end, Lukaku completed the second goal, and Brozovic sent a long-distance straight in the counterattack, and Lukaku burst into the penalty area to sway past Romero and pushed an empty goal, setting the score at 3:0.

SRC: 国际米兰客场3：0完胜热那亚，积分反超亚特兰大上升至第2，在多赛一场的情况下落后领头羊尤文图斯4分，仍保留着争冠希望。
HYP: Inter won 3:0 away from Genoa, and the points surpassed Atalanta to rise to No. 2, 4 points behind the leader Juventus in the case of multiple games, and still retains the hope of competing for the title.

SRC: 至此，在这跨越近90载光阴的3000场意甲联赛中，国际米兰赢得了其中的1489场，打平834场，输掉677场，胜率为49.6%。
HYP: So far, in the 3000 Serie A games spanning nearly 90 years, Inter Milan has won 1489 of them, tied 834, lost 677, and the winning rate is 49.6%.

SRC: 其间，球队共打进5038球，丢3102球，场均打进1.68球。
HYP: In the meantime, the team scored a total of 5038 goals, lost 3102 goals, and scored 1.68 goals per game.

SRC: 蓝黑军团18次获得联赛冠军，并且从未降级。
HYP: The Nerazzurri won the league championship 18 times and never relegated.

SRC: 谍战剧老面孔柳云龙演一个结巴男主角-新华网
HYP: The old face of spy war drama Liu Yunlong plays a stammering male protagonist - Xinhuanet.com.

SRC: 由柳云龙监制、殷飞执导,柳云龙、苏青、梁冠华、李立群等主演的大型谍战剧《胜算》, 于7月16日晚7:30登陆广东卫视“活力剧场” 。
HYP: The large-scale spy war drama "Winning", supervised by Liu Yunlong and directed by Yin Fei, starring Liu Yunlong, Su Qing, Liang Guanhua, Li Liqun, etc., landed on Guangdong Satellite TV's "Vitality Theater" at 7:30 pm on July 16th.

SRC: 该剧讲述了潜伏在日伪警察局的中共地下党员唐飞(柳云龙饰)联合苏联特工,刺杀日本特工头目,粉碎了日军的惊天阴谋。
HYP: The play tells about Tang Fei (played by Liu Yunlong), an underground party member of the Chinese Communist Party lurking in the Japanese puppet police station, teaming up with Soviet agents to assassinate the Japanese spy chief and crush the shocking conspiracy of the Japanese army.

SRC: 《胜算》根据史实改编,素材取自尘封多年的苏联军事档案。
HYP: "Winning" is adapted according to historical facts, and the material is taken from the Soviet military archives that have been dusty for many years.

SRC: 莫斯科保卫战期间,苏联红军远东精锐西进驰援,此时日本关东军“北进派”认为有机可乘,意欲出兵。
HYP: During the Moscow Defense War, the Soviet Red Army's Far East elites advanced westward to help, at this time the Japanese Kwantung Army "Northern Advancing Faction" thought it was an opportunity and intended to send troops.

SRC: 为解腹背受敌之危,中共与苏共情报人员联手实施了“穆丹乌拉”计划。
HYP: To relieve the enemy's backsliding, the CCP teamed up with the Soviet Communist Party intelligence personnel to implement the "Mudan Ula" plan.

SRC: 根据此历史背景,知名编剧邓原几经打磨,令剧情曲折烧脑。
HYP: According to this historical background, the well-known screenwriter Deng Yuan has been tortured several times, making the plot twists and turns brain-burning.

SRC: 柳云龙此次在《胜算》中同时担任监制和男主角。
HYP: Liu Yunlong plays the role of both the producer and the leading actor in "Winning" this time.

SRC: 剧中,他饰演的唐飞是林河警察厅刑事科科长,是一位颇有喜感甚至有点痞气的结巴警察,真实的身份则是一名中共地下党员。
HYP: In the play, Tang Fei, who he plays, is the chief of the criminal section of Linhe Police Department, a rather hilarious and even a little sulky stammer, and his real identity is a CCP underground member.

SRC: 与其上演对手戏的女主角蔡梦是林河保安局科长,深得日本上司福原的赏识,与唐飞之间存在着亦敌亦友、暧昧不清的微妙关系。
HYP: The heroine Cai Meng, who plays his opponent in the play, is the head of the Linhe Security Bureau, and is highly appreciated by his Japanese boss, Fukuhara, and there is a delicate relationship with Tang Fei who is also friend or foe, and ambiguous.

SRC: 苏青近年来尝试了很多不同类型的角色,从《那些年我们正年轻》中的陆若文到《延禧攻略》中的尔晴,都给观众留下深刻印象,演技受到认可。
HYP: Su Qing has tried many different types of roles in recent years, from Lu Ruowen in "Those Were Young" to Erqing in "The Raiders of Yanxi Palace", all impressing the audience and being recognized for her acting skills.

SRC: 此次苏青与柳云龙是首次搭档,结巴<v>警长</v>搭配妩媚女警的设置,颇有看点与新意。
HYP: This time, Su Qing and Liu Yunlong are partnering for the first time, and the setting of a stammer with a charming policewoman is quite interesting and novel.

SRC: 除了两位主角外,《胜算》中还有梁冠华、李立群、钱波、雷汉、申军谊等众多实力派演员加盟,老戏骨飙戏也是该剧看点之一。
HYP: In addition to the two protagonists, "Winning" also features Liang Guanhua, Li Liqun, Qian Bo, Lei Han, Junyi and many other powerful actors to join forces, and the old bone-biao drama is also one of the highlights of the play.

SRC: 据了解,《胜算》制作上也十分精良,剧组跨越江苏、浙江、辽宁3省近2000公里拍摄取景。
HYP: It is understood that "Odds of Victory" is also very good in production, with the crew spanning nearly 2000 kilometers in Jiangsu, Zhejiang, and Liaoning provinces for filming and framing.

SRC: 为了还原东北日据时期光怪陆离的城市风貌,剧组美工道具组日夜赶工,仔细打磨场景搭建及道具的每一个细节,令剧中场景画面精致,富有历史质感。
HYP: In order to restore the bizarre urban landscape of the Northeast Japanese occupation period, the crew's art and props team rushed to work day and night, carefully polishing every detail of the scene construction and props, making the scenes in the play exquisite and rich in historical texture.

SRC: 绿地开启新一轮混改上海国资拟转让17.5%股份-经济观察网－专业财经新闻网站
HYP: Greenland Opens a New Round of Mixed Reform Shanghai State-owned Assets to Transfer 17.5% of Shares - Economic Observer Network - Professional Financial News Website |

SRC: 经济观察网记者饶贤君7月26日，绿地控股（600606.SH）发布《关于国有股东拟通过公开征集受让方的方式协议转让公司部分股份暨复牌的提示性公告》。
HYP: Economic Observer Network reporter Rao Xianjun On July 26, Greenland Holdings (600606.SH) issued the "Indicative Announcement on State-owned Shareholders' Proposed Transfer of Part of the Company's Shares by Agreement and Resumption of Trading by Public Solicitation of Transferees".

SRC: 公告内容显示，为进一步深化国资国企改革，优化国资布局结构调整，完善绿地股权结构，上海地产（集团）有限公司（以下简称“上海地产”）及上海城投（集团）有限公司（以下简称“上海城投” ）拟通过公开征集受让方的方式协议转让所持有的公司部分股份，拟转让的股份比例合计不超过绿地总股本的17.5% 。
HYP: The contents of the announcement show that in order to further deepen the reform of state-owned assets and state-owned enterprises, optimize the structural adjustment of state-owned assets, and improve the equity structure of Greenland, Shanghai Real Estate (Group) Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai Property") and Shanghai Urban Investment (Group) Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai Urban Investment") intend to transfer part of the company's shares held by agreement through public solicitation of transferees, and the total proportion of shares to be transferred shall not exceed 17.5% of the total share capital of Greenland.

SRC: 本次拟转让股份的价格不低于下列两者之中的较高者：提示性公告日（2020 年7月27日）前30个交易日的每日加权平均价格的算术平均值；最近一个会计年度公司经审计的每股净资产值。
HYP: The price of the shares to be transferred this time shall not be lower than the higher of the following two: the arithmetic average of the daily weighted average prices of the 30 trading days before the prompt announcement date (July 27, 2020); and the audited net asset value of each share of the company in the most recent fiscal year.

SRC: 目前，对绿地的新战略投资者仍无定论，按照公告公示信息估算，新战略投资者要拿下绿地此次混改中转让的17.5%股权需要支付约140亿元的资金。
HYP: At present, there is still no conclusion on the new strategic investors of Greenland. According to the information published in the announcement, it is estimated that the new strategic investors will need to pay about 14 billion yuan in order to take the 17.5% equity transferred in the mixed reform of Greenland.

SRC: 值得注意的是，本次股份转让完成后，预计绿地仍无控股股东及实际控制人，但控制权结构可能发生较大变化。
HYP: It is worth noting that after the completion of this share transfer, it is expected that Greenland will still have no controlling shareholder and actual controller, but the control structure may undergo major changes.

SRC: 绿地控股自创立以来进行了多次体制机制改革：1992年-1997年，在纯国有体制下按照市场化规则运行；1997年-2013年，建立并不断完善国有控股、职工持股的股份制；2013年-2015年，引进战略投资者，形成国有及非公有资本交叉持股、相互融合的混合所有制；2015年至今，整体上市，成为公众公司。
HYP: Greenland Holdings has carried out several institutional and mechanism reforms since its establishment: from 1992 to 1997, it operated in accordance with market-oriented rules under a purely state-owned system; from 1997 to 2013, it established and continuously improved the shareholding system with state-owned holdings and employee shares; from 2013-2015, it introduced strategic investors, forming a hybrid ownership system with cross-shareholding and mutual integration of state-owned and non-public capital; and since 2015, it has been listed as a whole and became a public company.

SRC: 绿地目前的混改方案与格力相似，2019年12月，高瓴资本领衔珠海明骏以416.62亿元接手格力电器（000651.SZ）15%<v>股权</v>，格力集团退居小股东，完成混改后，格力电器实施了高管激励计划、无实控人结构等现代化的企业管理方式。
HYP: Greenland's current mixed-reform plan is similar to Gree. In December 2019, Hillhouse Capital led Zhuhai Mingjun to take over 15% of Gree Electric Appliances (000651.SZ) with 41.662 billion yuan, and Gree Group retreated to a minority shareholder. After the mixed reform was completed, Gree Electric implemented modern enterprise management methods such as executive incentive plans and no actual controller structure.

SRC: 绿地目前的混改方案与格力相似，2019年12月，高瓴资本领衔珠海明骏以416.62亿元接手格力电器（000651.SZ）15%股权，格力集团退居小股东，完成混改后，格力电器实施了高管激励计划、无实控人结构等现代化的企业管理方式。
HYP: Greenland's current mixed-reform plan is similar to Gree. In December 2019, Hillhouse Capital led Zhuhai Mingjun to take over 15% of Gree Electric Appliances (000651.SZ) with 41.662 billion yuan, and Gree Group retreated to a minority shareholder. After the mixed reform was completed, Gree Electric implemented modern enterprise management methods such as executive incentive plans and no actual controller structure.

SRC: 上海地产、上海城投均为上海市国资委全资持有的国资企业集团，绿地控股董事长、总裁张玉良表示，绿地此举是上海按照党中央要求，推进国资国企综合性改革、加速新一阶段国资国企改革的重要举措，充分显示了因地制宜、量体裁衣的改革新思路，通过给上市公司引入新的优秀战略股东，支持企业进一步提高市场化程度，提升经营管理自由度，加速改革活力全面释放。
HYP: Both Shanghai Real Estate and Shanghai Urban Investment are state-owned enterprise groups wholly owned by Shanghai SASAC. Zhang Yuliang, chairman and president of Greenland Holdings, said that Greenland's move is an important measure for Shanghai to promote the comprehensive reform of state-owned and state-owned enterprises and accelerate the reform of state-owned state-owned enterprises in a new stage in accordance with the requirements of the Party Central Committee. It fully demonstrates the new reform ideas of adapting measures to local conditions and tailoring to genre. By introducing new excellent strategic shareholders to listed companies, it supports enterprises to further improve the degree of marketization, enhance the freedom of operation and management, and accelerate the full release of reform vitality.

SRC: 刘德华刘青云能否“拆”出新火花-新华网
HYP: Can Andy Lau Tsing-Yun "Dismant" New Sparks - Xinhuanet.com.

SRC: 《拆弹专家2》近日宣布将于12月24日上映,成为贺岁档首部定档的影片。
HYP: "The Bomb Disposal Expert 2" recently announced that it will be released on December 24, becoming the first film of the Chinese New Year to be fixed.

SRC: 第二部依然是邱礼涛导演,刘德华监制及主演,以全新的故事展开。
HYP: The second film is still directed by Qiu Litao, produced and starring Andy Lau, and unfolds with a brand-new story.

SRC: 据悉,第二部中“核弹”元素的加入,也让此次拆弹专家面临的挑战更为艰难,预告里几个惊鸿一瞥的镜头,已令人心悬一线,大爆炸的蘑菇云,被火光吞没的机场,场面相当震撼。
HYP: It is reported that the addition of the "nuclear bomb" element in the second film also makes the challenge faced by the Bomb Disposal Expert even more difficult. Several shocking glimpses in the preview have made the heart hang in the air, the mushroom cloud of the big explosion, the airport engulfed by fire, and the scene is quite shocking.

SRC: 三年前,由原班人马制作出品的《拆弹专家》,斩获了当年的五一档票房冠军,并在香港电影金像奖拿下了7项提名,邱礼涛×刘德华也成为观众心目中的金牌搭档。
HYP: Three years ago, "The Bomb Disposal Expert", produced by the original team, won the fifth-tier box office champion of the year, and won 7 nominations at the Hong Kong Film Awards, and Qiu Litao × Andy Lau also became the gold medal partner in the audience's mind.

SRC: 此次的《拆弹专家2》,也令人再次期待这对王牌组合能否擦出新火花。
HYP: This time, "The Bomb Disposal Expert 2" also makes people look forward to whether this ace combination can wipe out new sparks.

SRC: 《拆弹专家2》讲述了全新的故事:前拆弹专家潘乘风(刘德华饰)晕倒在爆炸案现场,被警方列为嫌疑犯。
HYP: "The Bomb Disposal Expert 2" tells a brand-new story: the former bomb disposal expert Pan Chengfeng (played by Andy Lau) fainted at the scene of the bombing case and was listed as a suspect by the police.

SRC: 为了寻找真相,他不得不向同是拆弹专家的好友董卓文(刘青云饰)求助。
HYP: In order to find the truth, he had to ask his friend Dong Zhuowen (played by Liu Qingyun), who is also a bomb disposal expert, for help.

SRC: 急于破案的女督查,也同时是潘乘风前女友的庞玲(倪妮饰)也被卷入其中。
HYP: Pang Ling (played by Ni Ni), who is anxious to solve the case and who is also Pan Chengfeng's ex-girlfriend, was also involved.

SRC: 依然是拆弹专家,但从定档预告中能感受到刘德华新角色的复杂:断了一条腿,戴上了义肢,一边被同是拆弹专家的刘青云追捕,一边又被前女友倪妮指挥行动。
HYP: Still a bomb disposal expert, but from the fixed-file trailer, one can feel the complexity of Andy Lau's new role: a leg was broken and a prosthetic limb was worn, while being chased by Liu Qingyun, who is also a bomb disposal expert, while being commanded by his ex-girlfriend Ni Ni to act.

SRC: 三人究竟是怎样的关系,刘德华到底在香岛酒店做了什么,被牵扯到怎样的案件中,他拆弹专家的职业生涯又经历了哪些波折,种种谜团让人好奇不已。
HYP: What exactly is the relationship between the three, what exactly did Andy Lau do at the Xiangdao Hotel, what kind of case he was involved in, what twists and turns his career as a bomb disposal expert has gone through, and all kinds of mysteries make people curious.

SRC: 据了解,电影的重头戏都是实地取景香港的世界地标性建筑,加上顶尖的特效制作团队,带来震撼逼真的视觉冲击。
HYP: It is understood that the highlights of the film are the world landmarks in Hong Kong, which are filmed on the spot, and the top special effects production team brings a shocking and realistic visual impact.

SRC: （记者聂青）
HYP: (Reporter Nie Qing)

SRC: 中新网7月26日电综合俄罗斯卫星网报道，7月26日是俄罗斯海军日，庆祝海军日的主要阅兵式在圣彼得堡和喀琅施塔得举行。
HYP: China News Service, July 26 (Xinhua) -- Comprehensive Russian Satellite Network reported that July 26 is the Russian Navy Day, and the main military parade to celebrate the Navy Day was held in St. Petersburg and Kronstadt.

SRC: 俄罗斯总统、俄联邦武装力量最高统帅普京抵达喀琅施塔得参加庆祝活动，该地15艘舰艇和潜艇接受了检阅。
HYP: Russian President and Supreme Commander of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation, Putin, arrived in Kronstadt to participate in the celebration, where 15 ships and submarines were reviewed.

SRC: 当地时间2019年7月28日，俄罗斯圣彼得堡举行盛大阅兵式庆祝海军节。
HYP: On July 28, 2019 local time, a grand military parade was held in St. Petersburg, Russia to celebrate the Navy Day.

SRC: 据报道，普京向海军官兵祝贺海军日，并乘小艇在芬兰湾上从将要参加海上阅兵的舰艇旁边驶过，随后在主观礼台检阅受阅部队。
HYP: According to reports, Putin congratulated the naval officers and soldiers on the Navy Day, and sailed by a small boat next to the ships that will participate in the maritime military parade on the Gulf of Finland, and then inspected the paraded troops at the subjective stand.

SRC: 普京表示，俄海军舰队列装了最新式的舰艇和特殊装备，装备水平不断提高。
HYP: Putin said that the Russian Navy fleet was loaded with the latest ships and special equipment, and the level of equipment has been continuously improved.

SRC: 普京在俄罗斯海军日的阅兵式上说：“俄罗斯海军舰队拥有配备了高精武器的军舰、战略潜水巡洋舰和多用途潜艇、最新式飞机等飞行器、独特的武器和特殊装备。”
HYP: "The Russian Navy fleet has warships equipped with high-precision weapons, strategic submersible cruisers and multi-purpose submarines, aircraft such as the latest aircraft, unique weapons and special equipment," Putin said at the military parade of the Russian Navy Day.

SRC: 当地时间6月24日，俄罗斯纪念卫国战争胜利75周年红场阅兵式举行。
HYP: On June 24 local time, the Red Square military parade commemorating the 75th anniversary of the victory in the Great Patriotic War was held in Russia.

SRC: 他还表示，俄海军舰队将靠数字化和有效防御手段来取得独特优势。
HYP: He also said that the Russian Navy fleet will rely on digitalization and effective defense methods to gain unique advantages.

SRC: 报道称，庆祝俄罗斯海军日的主要海军阅兵式在圣彼得堡和喀琅施塔得举行，共有46艘舰艇参加，包括“卡萨托诺夫上将”号护卫舰、“海军中将库拉科夫”号大型反潜舰，以及大型登陆舰、小型导弹舰、护卫舰、潜艇等。
HYP: Reports said that the main naval parade to celebrate the Russian Navy Day was held in St. Petersburg and Kronstadt, with a total of 46 ships participating, including the "Admiral Kasatonov" frigate, the "Veteran Admiral Kulakov" large anti-submarine ship, as well as large landing ships, small guided missile ships, frigates, submarines, and so on.

SRC: 其中，系列舰艇在圣彼得堡冬宫桥旁进行静态展示，其中最引人瞩目的是经过复制的18世纪初俄罗斯首艘战列舰“波尔塔瓦”号。
HYP: Among them, the series of ships were statically displayed beside the Hermitage Bridge in St. Petersburg, and the most notable of them was the copied Russian first battleship "Poltava" in the early 18th century.

SRC: 为避免新冠病毒传播，今年海军阅兵式期间只有当地居民和特邀来宾能够进入喀琅施塔得。
HYP: In order to avoid the spread of the new crown virus, only local residents and specially invited guests were able to enter Kronstadt during this year's naval parade.

SRC: 每年7月最后一个星期日是俄罗斯海军日。
HYP: The last Sunday in July every year is Russian Navy Day.

SRC: 中新网重庆7月26日电(记者刘贤)重庆市发展和改革委员会26日发布消息称，该市截至目前已退捕渔民4404人，占全部涉及渔民的42.54% 。
HYP: China News Service, Chongqing, July 26 (Reporter Liu Xian) The Chongqing Municipal Development and Reform Commission released a news on the 26th that the city has so far returned 4404 fishermen, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.

SRC: 今年53岁的李代国接受中新网记者采访时说，爷爷辈就在龙溪河打鱼，自己11岁起就跟着父亲打鱼，摇着小船，沿着龙溪河前行，上到重庆梁平，下到长寿，每次一离开家就是十天半个月，靠打鱼维持家人生活。
HYP: Li Daiguo, 53, said in an interview with a reporter from China News Network that his grandfather was fishing in the Longxi River, and since he was 11 years old, he followed his father to catch fish, shaking the boat, and walking along the Longxi River, up to Liangping, Chongqing, and down to Changshou, every time he left home for ten days and a half months, relying on fishing to support his family's livelihood.

SRC: 但从1997年起，随着农村人口逐渐往场镇里涌，高安场镇里的居民越来越多，造成的环境污染也越来越严重。
HYP: But since 1997, as the rural population gradually rushed to Changzhen, there were more and more residents in Gao'anchang Town, causing more and more serious environmental pollution.

SRC: 龙溪河沿线修建了造纸厂、化工厂、养殖场，也污染河水。
HYP: Paper mills, chemical factories, and breeding farms were built along the Longxi River, which also polluted the river.

SRC: 到2007年、2008年，龙溪河变成臭水沟。
HYP: By 2007 and 2008, the Longxi River turned into a stinking ditch.

SRC: “捕上来的鱼鳞片都是黑的，剖开后里面也是黑的。”
HYP: “The scales of the fish caught are all black, and the inside is also black after being cut open.”

SRC: 李代国说，河水污染后打鱼越来越困难。
HYP: Li Daiguo said that fishing after the pollution of the river became more and more difficult.

SRC: 当地开始下大力气治理龙溪河污染，包括清漂、巡河、水生资源管护等。
HYP: The local area began to make great efforts to control the pollution of the Longxi River, including Qingping, patrolling the river, and protecting aquatic resources.

SRC: 李代国也从渔民退捕转产，成为巡河队的一员，管护水生资源。
HYP: Li Daiguo also changed from fishermen to returning to production, becoming a member of the river patrol team, and protecting aquatic resources.

SRC: 从2020年1月1日起，重庆市水生生物保护区以及主城区相关水域已实行全面禁捕。
HYP: From January 1, 2020, a comprehensive fishing ban has been implemented in Chongqing's aquatic biological protection zone and related waters in the main urban area.

SRC: 据重庆市发展改革委数据，截至目前，重庆市已累计退捕渔船3403艘、已签订退捕协议渔船4643艘，分别占三年总任务的63.3% 、 86.3% 。
HYP: According to the data of the Chongqing Municipal Development and Reform Committee, as of now, Chongqing has accumulated 3 340 return fishing vessels and 4643 have signed back fishing agreements, accounting for 63.3% and 86.3% of the total three-year task.

SRC: 已退捕渔民4404人，占全部涉及渔民的42.54% 。
HYP: There have been 4404 return fishermen, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.

SRC: 已退捕4404人中，实现就业4267人，占已退捕渔民的96.89% 。
HYP: Of the 4404 returned fishermen, 4267 have achieved employment, accounting for 96.89% of the total returning fishermen.

SRC: 养老保险保障覆盖2691人，占退捕渔民的61.10% 。
HYP: Endowment insurance coverage covers 1269 people, accounting for 61.10% of the returning fishermen.

SRC: 下一步，重庆市将深入开展各专项整治行动，加快推进长江干流岸线利用项目清理整治，完成新一轮长江入河排污口普查并开展相应整治行动，基本完成“三磷” ( 指磷矿、磷化工和磷石膏库)整治任务、小水电清理整改工作，推进长江两岸造林绿化专项行动，强化绿色矿山建设，巩固长江干流非法码头、非法采砂专项整治成果，深入推进长江流域禁捕退捕工作。
HYP: In the next step, Chongqing will carry out in-depth special rectification actions, accelerate the clean-up and rectification of the use of the coastline of the main stream of the Yangtze River, complete a new round of surveys of the discharge outlets of the Yangtze River and carry out corresponding rectification actions, basically complete the rectification tasks of “three phosphorus” (referring to phosphate rock, phosphate chemical industry and phosphogypsum storage), clean up and rectify small hydropower, promote the special actions of afforestation and greening on both sides of the Yangtze River, strengthen the construction of green mines, consolidate the special rectification results of illegal docks and illegal sand mining in the main stream of the Yangtze River, and further promote the ban on capture and withdrawal in the Yangtze River Basin.

SRC: 新华社香港7月25日电香港特区政府财经事务及库务局局长许正宇表示，香港的金融市场仍保持活跃、运作有序。
HYP: HONG KONG, July 25 (Xinhua) -- Hong Kong's financial market remains active and operating in an orderly manner, according to the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region Government's Secretary for Financial Affairs and the Treasury, Mr Hui Zhengyu.

SRC: 他对香港金融稳定及经济表示乐观。
HYP: He expressed optimism about Hong Kong's financial stability and economy.

SRC: 许正宇在香港驻多伦多经济贸易办事处及港加商会（加拿大总会）24日（多伦多时间）合办的网上研讨会上表示，香港因为“修例风波”和新冠肺炎疫情，经历着艰难的状况。
HYP: At a webinar co-organised by the Hong Kong Economic and Trade Office in Toronto and the Hong Kong Canadian Chamber of Commerce (Canadian Federation) on the 24th (Toronto time), Mr Hui said that Hong Kong is experiencing difficult conditions because of the "revision storm" and the new crown pneumonia epidemic.

SRC: 港元汇价稳定并偏向强方兑换保证水平。
HYP: The exchange rate of the Hong Kong dollar is stable and skews to the strong side's exchange guarantee level.

SRC: 银行体系没有明显的资金流出迹象，相反，自6月以来超过110亿美元资金流入。
HYP: The banking system has no obvious signs of outflow of funds, on the contrary, more than $11 billion in capital has flowed in since June.

SRC: 银行的存款总额在过去几个月也持续增加，股票市场有一连串公开招股集资活动，市场成交屡见上升。
HYP: Total bank deposits have also continued to increase in the past few months, the stock market has had a series of public offerings to raise funds, and market transactions have repeatedly risen.

SRC: 许正宇说，新冠肺炎疫情为全球经济及金融市场带来压力，但香港的基本优势仍然保持不变。
HYP: Xu Zhengyu said that the new crown pneumonia epidemic has brought pressure to the global economy and financial markets, but Hong Kong's basic advantages remain unchanged.

SRC: 香港拥有的多项优势，包括地理、法治、高速通讯、资讯和资金自由流通以及简单低税制，使香港持续成为领先的国际金融中心。
HYP: Hong Kong has several advantages, including geography, rule of law, high-speed communications, free flow of information and capital, and a simple and low tax system, making Hong Kong a leading international financial centre consistently.

SRC: 许正宇指出，特区政府在“防疫抗疫基金”预留60亿港元，未来两年在公营及私营界别创造约3万个有时限的职位，涵盖不同技能及学历人士。
HYP: Hui Zhengyu pointed out that the SAR government has set aside 6 billion Hong Kong dollars in the "Anti-epidemic Fund" to create about 30000 time-bound positions in the public and private sectors in the next two years, covering people with different skills and educational backgrounds.

SRC: 为支持金融科技的发展，特区政府也已推出“千人计划”，资助本地金融科技公司、初创及其他有金融科技相关业务的企业，以创造1000个新职位，聘用本地人才及丰富香港的金融科技人才库。
HYP: To support the development of fintech, the SAR government has also launched the "Thousand Talents Plan" to fund local fintech companies, start-ups and other enterprises with fintech-related businesses to create 1000 new jobs, employ local talents and enrich Hong Kong's fintech talent pool.

SRC: 展望未来，许正宇对香港的金融稳定及经济表示乐观。
HYP: Looking forward to the future, Xu Zhengyu expressed optimism about Hong Kong's financial stability and economy.

SRC: 他鼓励加拿大企业善用香港的优势及其作为国际金融中心、国际资产及财富管理中心以及全球离岸人民币业务枢纽的地位，在粤港澳大湾区及附近地区发展及投资。
HYP: He encouraged Canadian businesses to make good use of Hong Kong's advantages and its status as an international financial center, an international asset and wealth management center, and a global offshore RMB business hub to develop and invest in the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area and nearby areas.

SRC: 《柳叶刀》刊文赞扬中国抗疫努力鼓励各国学习经验-中新网
HYP: The Lancet article commends China's anti-epidemic efforts and encourages countries to learn from their experiences - Chinanews.com.

SRC: 《柳叶刀》杂志25日刊文表示，中国作为一个拥有14亿人口，规模与欧洲或美国相似的国家，现阶段新冠疫情得到有效控制，而没有再出现大范围传播的情况，在很大程度上控制住了国内的疫情。
HYP: The Lancet magazine published an article on the 25th that as a country with a population of 1.4 billion and a size similar to that of Europe or the United States, China has effectively controlled the new crown epidemic at this stage without recurring widespread transmission, largely controlling the domestic outbreak.

SRC: 文章表示，在近十多年时间里，中国对国内研究和公共卫生建设方面进行了大量的投资，这使得中国对新冠的准备比当年严重急性呼吸道综合征(SARS)的准备要充分得多。
HYP: The article said that in the past more than a decade, China has invested heavily in domestic research and public health construction, which has made China's preparation for the new crown much better than that of severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS) that year.

SRC: 作者表示，2002年SARS暴发时，起初中国准备不足，尤其是病原体无法确定。
HYP: The authors said that when the SARS outbreak occurred in 2002, China was initially underprepared, especially the pathogen could not be identified.

SRC: 当2019年12月发现新冠病毒时，中国科学家很快就能够鉴定出病毒种类，并于2020年1月11日与国际共享了基因组测序数据。
HYP: When the new coronavirus was discovered in December 2019, Chinese scientists were soon able to identify the virus species, and on January 11, 2020, they shared genome sequencing data with the world.

SRC: 到1月底，来自中国大陆和香港的医生阐明了该病毒的临床特征，通过在《柳叶刀》上发表的研究论文，向世界警告了新冠病毒的威胁。
HYP: By the end of January, doctors from mainland China and Hong Kong had clarified the clinical characteristics of the virus, and warned the world of the threat of the new coronavirus through research papers published in The Lancet.

SRC: 中国也一直处于疫苗研究的最前沿，在国家宣布紧急状态下，通过国内的紧密合作，这样的研究非常迅速而严格地展开，5月和7月，分别在《柳叶刀》上公布了中国开发的新冠疫苗早期试验取得进展的结果。
HYP: China has also been at the forefront of vaccine research, and such research was carried out very quickly and rigorously through close domestic cooperation when the state declared a state of emergency, and in May and July, the results of the early trials of the new crown vaccine developed by China were announced in The Lancet, respectively.

SRC: 中国的经验表明，对国家卫生和研究体系进行投资，有效提高实验室能力是非常重要的。
HYP: China's experience shows that it is very important to effectively invest in the national health and research system and improve laboratory capacity.

SRC: 这是国家对卫生紧急情况和全球卫生安全做出快速有效反应的基础。
HYP: This is the basis for a rapid and effective response to national health emergencies and global health security.

SRC: 其他国家，特别是低收入和中等收入国家来说，非常值得借鉴和学习。
HYP: It is very worthwhile for other countries, especially low- and middle-income countries, to learn from and learn from.

SRC: 此外，中国的经验证明，在强大的研究基础上，必须有强有力的高层果断地凭借科学依据来作出正确决策，这才使得新冠疫情得到有效控制。
HYP: In addition, China's experience proves that on the basis of strong research, a strong high-level executive must decisively make correct decisions with scientific evidence, which makes the new crown epidemic under effective control.

SRC: 文章强调，政府及其领导人必须尊重科学，理解科学的价值，并以对社会最有利的方式对其采取行动。
HYP: The article emphasizes that the government and its leaders must respect science, understand the value of science, and act on it in the most beneficial way to society.

SRC: 在暴发初期，中国国家卫建委派出三组传染病专家前往武汉，调查新冠病毒的风险和传播，他们的建议为1月23日武汉“封城”的决定提供了依据；当有专家提出建设方舱医院必要性和紧迫性时，政府很快做出了决定并快速实施；同时，社区和群众的广泛参与，也使得疫情快速有效地被控制。
HYP: In the early stages of the outbreak, China's National Health Commission sent three groups of infectious disease experts to Wuhan to investigate the risk and spread of the new coronavirus, and their recommendations provided the basis for the decision to "close the city" on January 23. When experts raised the necessity and urgency of building a Fangcang shelter hospital, the government quickly made a decision and implemented it quickly; at the same time, the extensive participation of the community and the masses also enabled the epidemic to be controlled quickly and effectively.

SRC: 文章最后强调，应对全球性的卫生紧急情况，各国需要加强全球合作，联合应对。
HYP: At the end of the article, it is emphasized that countries need to strengthen global cooperation and joint response in response to global health emergencies.

SRC: 总台记者杨洪
HYP: Yang Hong, reporter of the main station

SRC: 当地时间25日下午，一架小型飞机在德国北威州韦瑟尔县撞上一座多层住宅楼的顶层，事故共造成三人死亡。
HYP: On the afternoon of the 25th local time, a small plane crashed into the top floor of a multi-story residential building in Wessel County, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany, and the accident resulted in a total of three deaths.

SRC: 杜伊斯堡检方、韦瑟尔县警察局和韦瑟尔市消防部门当天晚间联合发布声明称，当天14时40分左右，一架两座小型飞机撞上位于韦瑟尔县辉柏斯坎普街一栋多层住宅楼顶层阁楼的住宅，造成三人丧生。
HYP: The Duisburg Prosecutor, Wessel County Police Department and Wessel City Fire Department jointly issued a statement that evening that at around 14:40 that day, a two-seat small plane crashed into a residence on the top floor of a multi-storey residential building on Faberskamp Street in Wessel County, killing three people.

SRC: 其当天从北威州鲁尔区马尔市起飞，在韦瑟尔县的机场中途停靠后再度起飞，随后撞上住宅楼。
HYP: It took off from the city of Mar in the Ruhr District of NRW on the same day, took off again after a midway stop at the airport in Wessel County, and then crashed into the residential building.

SRC: 死者身份或为遭撞击住宅内的一名女性住户和小型飞机上两名乘客。
HYP: The identity of the deceased may be a female resident in the impacted residence and two passengers on the small plane.

SRC: 房内一名两岁儿童仅受轻伤，被平安救出。
HYP: A two-year-old child in the house suffered only minor injuries and was rescued safely.

SRC: 房内其余住户未在事故中受伤，但情绪仍未平复。
HYP: The rest of the occupants in the house were not injured in the accident, but their emotions have not yet calmed down.

SRC: 德新社报道的现场画面显示，遭遇事故的住宅一度冒出滚滚浓烟，消防队员扑灭火情后可见房屋损毁严重。
HYP: The scene footage reported by the German Press Agency showed that the residence that encountered the accident was billowing smoke at one point, and firefighters could see that the house was seriously damaged after extinguishing the fire.

SRC: 目前，飞机失事原因尚不明确。
HYP: At present, the cause of the plane crash is not clear.

SRC: 《莱茵邮报》援引警方说法报道称，有线索<v>表明</v>，飞机或在撞上住宅楼前就已解体。
HYP: The Rhein Post reported, citing police accounts, that there were clues that the plane had disintegrated or disintegrated before it hit the residential building.

SRC: 《莱茵邮报》援引警方说法报道称，有线索表明，飞机或在撞上住宅楼前就已解体。
HYP: The Rhein Post reported, citing police accounts, that there were clues that the plane had disintegrated or disintegrated before it hit the residential building.

SRC: 警方表示，在事故现场一带发现了失事飞机的多块零部件。
HYP: The police said that multiple parts of the crashed plane were found in the vicinity of the accident site.

SRC: 德国刑警正与杜伊斯堡检方、德国联邦航空事故调查局共同调查导致这一事故的原因。
HYP: The German Interpol is working with the Duisburg Prosecutor's Office and the German Federal Aviation Accident Investigation Agency to jointly investigate the cause of the accident.

SRC: 记者当天从中国驻杜塞尔多夫总领事馆了解到，该馆与当地警局及消防部门取得联系，据现场判断，伤亡人员中无中国公民。
HYP: The reporter learned from the Chinese Consulate General in Dusseldorf that day that the embassy got in touch with the local police station and the fire department, and it was judged at the scene that there were no Chinese nationals among the casualties.

SRC: 大鹏导演《吉祥如意》入围金爵奖-新华网
HYP: Dapeng's director "Auspicious Ruyi" was shortlisted for the Golden Jubilee Award-Xinhuanet.

SRC: 7月18日，第二十三届上海国际电影节公布了金爵奖官方入选影片名单。
HYP: On July 18, the 23rd Shanghai International Film Festival announced the official list of films selected for the Golden Jubilee Award.

SRC: 大鹏导演的首部现实题材影片《吉祥如意》，成功入围本届上影节金爵奖，同时影片官方发布了首款海报。
HYP: Director Dapeng's first reality-themed film, "Auspicious Ruyi", was successfully shortlisted for the Golden Jubilee Award at this year's Shanghai Film Festival, and the film officially released its first poster.

SRC: 海报片方供图
HYP: Poster courtesy of the film.

SRC: 影片《吉祥如意》是大鹏导演的第一部现实题材作品，也是他与金爵奖的二度结缘。
HYP: The film "Auspicious Ruyi" is Dapeng's first realistic-themed work, and it is also his second bond with the Golden Jubilee Award.

SRC: 该片讲述了这样一个故事：一位喜剧片导演突发奇想，回到东北农村老家，希望将一家人如何过年拍成一部文艺电影，结果遭遇一系列意外。
HYP: The film tells a story: a comedy director had a whim and returned to his hometown in rural northeast China, hoping to make how a family spends the New Year into a literary film, but encountered a series of accidents as a result.

SRC: 因拍电影而聚齐的家庭成员们，完成了最后的聚会。
HYP: The family members, who gathered because of the filming, completed the final reunion.

SRC: 在今日发布的电影海报中，这个家庭中的一员— — “三舅”王吉祥坐在画面中央抽着烟，背景是披上银装的东北黑土地，前景是中国人逢年过节必挂的红灯笼。
HYP: In the film poster released today, one member of this family — "Three Uncle" Wang Jixiang, sits in the center of the picture smoking a cigarette. The background is the black land of Northeast China draped in silver clothes, and in the foreground is the red lantern that Chinese people must hang during the New Year festival.

SRC: 象征着喜庆、团圆的红灯笼与身影落寞的王吉祥形成了巨大反差，似乎也透露了这个大家庭关系中的复杂与纠结。
HYP: The red lantern, which symbolizes the joy and reunion, forms a huge contrast with the lonely figure Wang Jixiang, and also seems to reveal the complexity and entanglements in the relationship of this extended family.

SRC: 据悉，影片中，除了“三舅”王吉祥的女儿由演员刘陆扮演，其余戏份均由真实的导演家人完成，影片实验性的视听风格，打破了戏剧与真实的边界，带给观众全新的浸入式观影体验。
HYP: It is reported that in the film, except for the daughter of the "three uncle" Wang Jixiang, played by actor Liu Lu, the rest of the scenes are completed by real family directors. The film's experimental audio-visual style breaks the boundary between drama and reality and brings the audience a brand new immersive viewing experience.

SRC: 据导演大鹏介绍，《吉祥如意》的创作源自“一场天意” ， 拍摄期间家庭突如其来的一系列变故，让原本的拍摄计划不得不随之改变，没有剧本的生活最终被记录成电影，却释放出超越设计的张力。
HYP: According to director Dapeng, the creation of "Auspicious Ruyi" originated from "a heavenly will", a series of sudden family changes during filming, so that the original shooting plan had to be changed along with it, and the life without a script was eventually recorded into a film, but released the tension beyond the design.

SRC: 导演大鹏究竟如何面对这场“天意” ， 又该如何继续迎接这场天意带来的种种改变呢？
HYP: How exactly does director Dapeng face this "heaven's will", and how can he continue to meet the various changes brought about by this heavenly will?

SRC: 毫无疑问《吉祥如意》是充满实验性的，几乎全素人的阵容和创新的视听风格将镜头前的生活变成了一部电影，在真实影像的包裹下，观众也会从影片所呈现的家庭中找到自己和家人的影子，随着影片中这场家庭聚会的落幕，唤起一系列思考。
HYP: There is no doubt that "Auspicious Ruyi" is full of experiments, with an almost all-amateur lineup and innovative audio-visual style turning life in front of the camera into a film, and wrapped in real images, the audience will also find the shadow of themselves and their family members from the family presented in the film, and as this family gathering falls in the film, a series of thoughts are evoked.

SRC: NEWS.GOV.MO: 新型冠状病毒感染应变协调中心查询热线统计数字(7月25日08H00-7月26日08H00)
HYP: NEWS.GOV.MO: Statistics of the Enquiry Hotline of the Novel Coronavirus Infection Response Coordination Center (July 25 08H00 - July 26 08H00) .

SRC: 由2020年07月25日08H00 至7月26日08H00，新型冠状病毒感染应变协调中心的查询热线共接获292宗电话查询。
HYP: From July 25, 2020 08H00 to July 26, 08H00, the Enquiry Hotline of the Novel Coronavirus Infection Response Coordination Center received a total of 292 telephone enquiries.

SRC: 关于疫情的291宗查询，已即时转线至相关部门代表跟进，情况如下：
HYP: The 291 enquiries about the epidemic situation have been immediately transferred to the representatives of relevant departments for follow-up, and the situation is as follows;

SRC: 卫生局271宗(涉及：查询关于隔离；查询核酸检测；查询两地牌；健康码；其他。）
HYP: 271 cases from the Health Bureau (Involving: enquiring about quarantine; enquiring about nucleic acid testing; enquiring about the license plate of the two places; health code; others.);

SRC: 治安警察局17宗(涉及：查询出入境措施；查询粤澳两地牌车辆出入境措施；查询珠海政务热线；查询证件逗留问题。）
HYP: 17 cases of the Public Security Police Bureau (involving: enquiring about immigration measures; enquiring about the immigration measures for vehicles with license plates in Guangdong and Macao; enquiring about the Zhuhai Government Affairs Hotline; enquiring about the stay of documents.) ii.

SRC: 旅游局1宗(涉及：查询隔离酒店问题。）
HYP: Tourism Bureau 1 case (involving: enquiring about the issue of quarantine hotels.).

SRC: 教育暨青年局1宗(涉及：查询澳门学生返回英国读书的方法。）
HYP: Education and Youth Bureau 1 case (involving: enquiring about the method of Macao students returning to study in the UK.)

SRC: 海事及水务局1宗(涉及：询问香港渔船进港是否需要向海事及水务局申报及核酸检测相关事宜。）
HYP: 1 case of the Maritime and Water Affairs Bureau (involving: enquiring about whether Hong Kong fishing vessels entering the port need to declare and nucleic acid testing related matters to the Maritime and Water Authority.)

SRC: 马里尼切夫说，价值的变化受卢布贬值和疫情等影响。
HYP: Marinichev said the change in value was affected by the devaluation of the ruble and the epidemic, among other things.

SRC: 他说“服务成本正在增加。
HYP: He said “the cost of services is increasing.

SRC: 由于疫情，人们开始在互联网上花费更多的时间。”
HYP: Because of the epidemic, people are starting to spend more time on the internet.”

SRC: 马里尼切夫不排除年互联网价格将严重上涨，认为运营商可以为客户提供更高的速度和更多服务抵消人们对价格上涨的不满。
HYP: Marinichev did not rule out a serious increase in annual internet prices, arguing that operators can offset people's dissatisfaction with the price increase by offering customers higher speeds and more services.

SRC: 《中国医生》筹拍致敬抗疫英雄-新华网
HYP: "Chinese Doctor" prepares to pay tribute to anti-epidemic heroes - Xinhuanet.

SRC: 近日，带着中国电影人对抗疫英雄的敬意，博纳影业集团董事长于冬、导演刘伟强(图左）在广州与钟南山院士，就抗疫题材影片《中国医生》的拍摄制作工作进行了座谈交流。
HYP: Recently, with the tribute of Chinese filmmakers to the anti-epidemic heroes, Bona Film Group Chairman Yu Dong and director Liu Weiqiang (pictured left) held a discussion and exchange with Academician Zhong Nanshan in Guangzhou on the filming and production of the anti-epidemic theme film "Chinese Doctor".

SRC: 博纳影业希望能借由《中国医生》，向所有战斗在疫情防控一线的医护、防疫工作者致敬！
HYP: Bona Film hopes to use "Chinese Doctor" to pay tribute to all the medical care and epidemic prevention workers fighting on the frontline of epidemic prevention and control!

SRC: 2021年，该片将作为庆祝中国共产党建党100周年献礼影片全国公映。
HYP: In 2021, the film will be released nationwide as a tribute film celebrating the 100th anniversary of the founding of the Communist Party of China.

SRC: 目前，博纳影业正在中宣部和国家电影局的安排部署下，广东省电影局及湖北省电影局的支持下，组织电影《中国机长》原班人马筹拍电影《中国医生》，这是一部反映在党中央的坚强领导下，全国人民团结一心抗击新冠肺炎疫情的影片。
HYP: At present, Bona Film is organizing the original cast of the film "Chinese Captain" under the arrangement and deployment of the Central Propaganda Department and the National Film Bureau, and with the support of the Guangdong Provincial Film Bureau and Hubei Provincial Film Bureau, to prepare the film "Chinese Doctor", which is a film that reflects that under the strong leadership of the Party Central Committee, the people of the whole country are united in the fight against the new crown pneumonia epidemic.

SRC: 影片聚焦武汉抗疫一线，将以武汉医护人员及各省市援鄂医疗队为人物背景，从人性的角度，运用独特的叙事，以及极具冲击力的镜头语言，全景展现抗疫一线充满奉献和牺牲精神的中国医护人员的感人故事。
HYP: Focusing on the frontline of Wuhan's fight against the epidemic, the film will take Wuhan medical workers and the provincial and municipal aid medical teams as the background, from a human perspective, using unique narratives, and highly impactful lens language, to show the touching stories of Chinese medical workers who are full of dedication and sacrifice on the frontline of the anti-epidemic frontline.

SRC: 据了解，武汉解封之日的第一时间，博纳公司便克服重重困难，派出采拍小组深入疫情一线，与数百位医护工作者面对面交流了解、搜集资料，目前已经采访到了包括钟南山院士本人、广州驰援武汉第一人、广东援鄂医疗队，以及武汉金银潭医院、武汉协和医院、武汉大学中南医院、武汉中心医院等抗疫战线最前沿的白衣天使们，拍下了大量珍贵的第一手视频资料。
HYP: It is understood that on the first day of the unblocking of Wuhan, Bona Company overcame many difficulties and sent a shooting team to go deep into the frontline of the epidemic to communicate face-to-face with hundreds of medical workers to learn about and collect information. Currently, it has interviewed academician Zhong Nanshan himself, the first person in Guangzhou to aid Wuhan, the Guangdong medical team to aid Hubei, and the angels in white at the forefront of the anti-epidemic frontline such as Wuhan Jinyintan Hospital, Wuhan Union Hospital, Wuhan University Zhongnan Hospital, and Wuhan Central Hospital, and took a lot of precious first-hand video materials.

SRC: 钟南山院士在此次座谈会中亦对电影的拍摄提出了期待和希望：“ 我很期待，希望你们不仅要走访一些抛头露面比较多的专家，还要更多地采访在一线埋头苦干的医务人员，他们是大多数。”
HYP: Academician Zhong Nanshan also raised his expectations and hopes for the filming during this symposium: "I am looking forward to it, and I hope that you will not only visit some experts who have shown more heads, but also interview more medical staff who are buried in the frontline, who are the majority."

SRC: 他表示，他之前看过《我和我的祖国》《中国机长》，认为以普通人视角讲述大格局故事的方法就很好。
HYP: He said that he has seen "My Motherland and I" "Chinese Captain" before, and thinks it is good to tell the story of the big pattern from the perspective of ordinary people.

SRC: “现在一些国外朋友对中国还是有一些误解。”
HYP: "Now some foreign friends still have some misunderstandings about China."

SRC: 在谈到影片的传播时，钟南山院士表示，目前国外有些人喜欢将病毒贴上政治化标签，他希望电影能从人性的角度打动观众：“ 这部电影除了在中国放映以外，最好也能在国外放映，要用国内外观众都能理解的方式，用真正的人文精神打动观众。”
HYP: When talking about the spread of the film, Academician Zhong Nanshan said that at present, some people abroad like to label the virus as politicized, and he hopes that the film can impress the audience from the perspective of humanity: "In addition to being screened in China, it is best that this film can also be screened abroad, and it should impress the audience with a real humanistic spirit in a way that audiences at home and abroad can understand."

SRC: 钟南山院士还深情回忆了上世纪80年代的影片《人到中年》，“这么多年过去了，我对改革开放后电影印象最深的还是《人到中年》，当时我国外的医生朋友们都看哭了，如果《中国医生》能够起到这样的作用，那就很了不起了。”
HYP: Academician Zhong Nanshan also fondly recalled the film "People to Middle Age" in the 1980s, "After so many years, the one that impressed me the most about the movie after the reform and opening up is "People to Middle Age", when doctor friends outside our country all watched and cried. If "Chinese Doctor" can play such a role, it will be remarkable."

SRC: 钟南山院士表示，如果《中国医生》能引起国外观众的共鸣，那就非常成功。
HYP: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that if "Chinese Doctor" can resonate with foreign audiences, it will be very successful.

SRC: 在座谈交流时，钟南山院士还分享了对当前国际疫情防控的意见和建议，“ 我相信人永远比病毒聪明。”
HYP: During the discussion and exchange, Academician Zhong Nanshan also shared his opinions and suggestions on the prevention and control of the current international epidemic, "I believe that people are always smarter than the virus."

SRC: 钟南山院士表示，虽说病毒难以预测，但从原始社会至今，人类已渡过了千难万险，如今现代社会有发达的医疗科技和社会管理措施，再加上全世界的医务人员、甚至老百姓都对科学应对新冠肺炎疫情有了基本认识，人们不会再像以前那么被动，“接下来要注意两个方面的工作，一是要研究全世界怎么加强合作，二是注重对人们心灵的抚慰” 。
HYP: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that although the virus is difficult to predict, human beings have survived many hardships from the primitive society to the present day. Nowadays, modern society has developed medical technology and social management measures, coupled with the fact that medical staff and even the common people all over the world have a basic understanding of the scientific response to the new crown pneumonia epidemic, and people will no longer be as passive as before, "The next thing to pay attention to is two aspects of work, one is to study how to strengthen cooperation around the world, and the other is to focus on soothing people's hearts."

SRC: （记者王金跃）
HYP: (Reporter Wang Jinyue)

SRC: 文旅“红果”聚韶山—湘潭首届红博会见闻-今日要闻-湖南日报网-华声在线
HYP: Cultural Tourism "Red Fruit" Gathers in Shaoshan — News of the First Red Expo in Xiangtan - Today's Highlights - Hunan Daily Network - Huasheng Online.

SRC: 湖南日报·新湖南客户端记者蒋睿通讯员肖燕
HYP: Hunan Daily · New Hunan Client Reporter Jiang Rui Correspondent Xiao Yan.

SRC: 嘉兴红船模具、韶山毛泽东铜像、延安布堆花工艺品、湘西永顺腊肉…… 7月25日，2020湖南红色旅游文化节在韶山开幕。
HYP: Jiaxing Red Boat Mould, Shaoshan Mao Zedong Bronze Statue, Yan'an Buduihua Crafts, Xiangxi Yongshun Bacon... On July 25, the 2020 Hunan Red Tourism Culture Festival opened in Shaoshan.

SRC: 作为主体活动之一，湘潭首届红色文化产业博览会在韶山全域旅游咨询集散中心开展。
HYP: As one of the main activities, the first Xiangtan Red Cultural Industry Expo was held at the Shaoshan Global Tourism Consulting Distribution Center.

SRC: 展览区红色文创产品、革命老区土特产品等琳琅满目，引来各地游客争相购买。
HYP: The exhibition area was full of red cultural and creative products, native products from the old revolutionary areas, etc., attracting tourists from all over to rush to buy.

SRC: “此次红博会，既是全国红色文化产业成果的一次展示，也是参展单位和企业交流经验、探讨发展路径的一个重要平台。”
HYP: "This Red Expo is not only a display of the achievements of the national red cultural industry, but also an important platform for exhibitors and enterprises to exchange experiences and explore development paths."

SRC: 湘潭首届红博会执委会相关负责人介绍，这届红博会以“弘扬红色文化助推文旅升温”为主题，展览总面积近3000平方米，设置了氛围营造区、景区展示展陈区和红色文旅网游网购体验区。
HYP: According to the relevant person in charge of the Executive Committee of the First Xiangtan Red Expo, this Red Expo, with the theme of "Promoting Red Culture Boosts Cultural Tourism Warming", has a total exhibition area of nearly 3000 square meters, and sets up an atmosphere creation area, a scenic display exhibition area, and a red cultural tourism online shopping experience area.

SRC: 邀请浙江嘉兴、贵州遵义、陕西延安等8个外省地市以及我省长沙、株洲、岳阳、郴州等地137家企业、单位参展，共展出展品768种，包括红色文物、工艺品、食品特产、旅游线路、红色培训课程、红色文创产品等。
HYP: Eight foreign provinces and cities such as Zhejiang Jiaxing, Guizhou Zunyi, and Shaanxi Yan'an, as well as 137 enterprises and units from Changsha, Zhuzhou, Yueyang, Chenzhou and other places in our province are invited to participate in the exhibition, with a total of 768 exhibits, including red cultural relics, handicrafts, food specialties, tourist routes, red training courses, red cultural and creative products, and so on.

SRC: 展销区将展至7月29日。
HYP: The exhibition area will be on display until July 29.

SRC: 作为红博会东道主，湘潭展区亮点纷呈。
HYP: As the host of the Xiangtan Red Expo, there are many highlights in the Xiangtan exhibition area.

SRC: 展区负责人介绍，湘潭展区分为红色工业、红色文化产业发展两大部分。
HYP: The person in charge of the exhibition area introduced that the Xiangtan exhibition area is divided into two parts: red industry and red cultural industry development.

SRC: 红色工业展区展出华菱湘钢、华菱线缆、湘电动力等6家企业的展品31件，红色文化产业发展展区展出红色系列图书、红色系列食品、红色系列文创产品等27家单位产品近200个。
HYP: The red industrial exhibition area exhibits 31 exhibits from 6 enterprises including Valin Xianggang, Valin Cable, and Xiang Electric Power, and the red cultural industry development area exhibits nearly 200 products from 27 units including red book series, red food series, and red series of cultural and creative products.

SRC: 在延安展区，不少游客被陈展的布堆花手工艺品和剪纸艺术品所吸引。
HYP: In the Yan'an exhibition area, many tourists are attracted by the exhibited cloth pile flower handicrafts and paper-cut artworks.

SRC: 延安市文旅局局长马东坡介绍，此次参展精心选择了延安近两年来优秀的红色文创产品，其中16种产品是2019全国红色文创产品优秀作品。
HYP: Ma Dongpo, director of the Yan'an Municipal Bureau of Culture and Tourism, introduced that the exhibitors carefully selected the outstanding red cultural and creative products of Yan'an in the past two years, of which 16 products are the outstanding works of the national red cultural and creative products in 2019.

SRC: 同时，他们邀请了国家级非物质文化遗产保护项目“安塞剪纸”、“陕北民歌”与省级非遗项目延川布堆画传承人，重点推介延安民俗特色产品，并借此机会与其他展区单位企业沟通交流，推动跨区域合作。
HYP: At the same time, they invited the national intangible cultural heritage protection project "Ansai Paper-cut", "North Shaanxi Folk Song" and the inheritors of the provincial intangible cultural heritage project Yanchuan Budui painting to focus on promoting Yan'an folk special products, and take this opportunity to communicate with other exhibition units and enterprises to promote cross-regional cooperation.

SRC: 膜分离技术助力破解“温室效应” - 中新网
HYP: Membrane Separation Technology Helps Crack the "Greenhouse Effect" - Chinanews.com.

SRC: 膜分离技术助力破解“温室效应”
HYP: Membrane Separation Technology Helps Crack the "Greenhouse Effect" - China News Service |

SRC: 新型混合基质膜制备技术示意图
HYP: Membrane Separation Technology Helps Crack the "Greenhouse Effect" |

SRC: 本报讯记者商瑞报道：日前，天津大学大气环境与生物能源团队针对“膜分离法捕集二氧化碳”取得重大进展，成功研发出新型混合基质膜制备技术，大幅提升膜材料二氧化碳捕集性能。
HYP: Schematic diagram of a new mixed matrix membrane preparation technology.

SRC: 相关成果已作为国际期刊《温室气体：科学与技术》封面文章发表。
HYP: Our reporter Shang Rui reported: A few days ago, the Tianjin University Atmospheric Environment and Bioenergy team made significant progress in the "membrane separation method to capture carbon dioxide", and successfully developed a new mixed matrix membrane preparation technology, which greatly improved the carbon dioxide capture performance of the membrane material.

SRC: “温室效应”是困扰人类发展的重大环境问题，二氧化碳排放则是造成“温室效应”的元凶。
HYP: The relevant results have been published as the cover article of the international journal Greenhouse Gas: Science and Technology.

SRC: 如何高效捕获并利用人类排放的二氧化碳是科学家关注的焦点。
HYP: The "greenhouse effect" is a major environmental problem that plagues human development, and carbon dioxide emissions are the culprit of the "greenhouse effect".

SRC: “膜分离法”是一种新兴的二氧化碳捕集技术，它在膜材料帮助下分离二氧化碳气体，具有高效节能、操作简单的特点。
HYP: How to efficiently capture and use the carbon dioxide emitted by humans is the focus of scientists' attention.

SRC: 如何让膜材料“深呼吸”， 提高气体分离效率，是采用膜分离法捕集二氧化碳的瓶颈难点。
HYP: "Membrane separation method" is an emerging carbon dioxide capture technology, which separates carbon dioxide gas with the help of membrane materials, and has the characteristics of high efficiency, energy saving, and simple operation.

SRC: 天津大学科研团队创新思路，通过反复实验，探究不同溶剂对膜气体分离性能的影响。
HYP: How to make the membrane material "deep breath" and improve the gas separation efficiency is the bottleneck and difficulty of using membrane separation method to capture carbon dioxide.

SRC: 实验结果表明，以N-甲基吡咯烷酮作为制备溶剂，生成的膜材料中碳纳米管分布更加均匀，“更透气”，有效提升了膜材料气体分离效能和速率。
HYP: The scientific research team of Tianjin University has innovated ideas and explored the effects of different solvents on the membrane gas separation performance through repeated experiments.

SRC: 用这种新技术制备的混合基质膜，二氧化碳分离性能接近目前此类膜材料的理论分离上限。
HYP: The experimental results show that with N-methylpyrrolidone as the preparation solvent, the carbon nanotubes in the resulting membrane material are more uniformly distributed and "breathable", effectively improving the gas separation efficiency and rate of the membrane material.

SRC: “新技术为膜分离法捕集二氧化碳提供了新思路。”
HYP: The carbon dioxide separation performance of the mixed matrix membrane prepared with this new technology is close to the theoretical upper limit of the current membrane separation of such materials.

SRC: 天津大学大气环境与生物能源团队成员李润表示：“ 我们希望这种技术能够为未来燃煤电厂与化工企业处理烟气提供有力支持，在控制温室气体排放等领域发挥重大作用。”
HYP: "The new technology provides a new idea for the membrane separation method to capture carbon dioxide." "We hope that this technology can provide strong support for the treatment of flue gas by coal-fired power plants and chemical enterprises in the future, and play a major role in controlling greenhouse gas emissions and other fields," said Li Run, a member of the Atmospheric Environment and Bioenergy team of Tianjin University.

SRC: 首度成立专委会、集体签“长约” 第三届进博会参展商联盟构筑“进博纽带” - 新华网
HYP: First-time establishment of special committee, collective signing of "long-term contract" The 3rd Import Expo Exhibitor Alliance Builds "Import Bond" - Xinhua.com.

SRC: 7月26日在上海拍摄的第三届进博会参展商联盟第一次会议现场。
HYP: The scene of the first meeting of the 3rd Import Expo Exhibitor Alliance filmed in Shanghai on July 26th.

SRC: 新华社上海7月26日电（记者周蕊）26日，第三届进口博览会参展商联盟在此间首次成立专业委员会，首批成立的专委会包括公共卫生防疫专委会和乳业专委会，35家成员企业还签订了3年长期参展合作备忘录，进博会参展商联盟的纽带作用不断增强。
HYP: Xinhua News Agency, Shanghai, July 26 (Reporter Zhou Rui) On the 26th, the 3rd Import Expo Exhibitor Alliance established a professional committee for the first time here, and the first batch of established special committees included the Public Health Epidemic Prevention Special Committee and the Dairy Industry Special Committee, and 35 member enterprises also signed a 3-year long-term exhibition cooperation memorandum, and the linking role of the Import Expo Exhibitor Alliance has been continuously strengthened.

SRC: 26日在此间举行的第三届进博会参展商联盟第一次会议上，韩国现代、美国陶氏化学、日本资生堂、新西兰纽仕兰、德国西门子、法国米其林、英国阿斯利康等一批展盟成员企业签订了3年长期参展合作备忘录，修订和完善后的展盟章程也首次公布。
HYP: At the first meeting of the 3rd Import Expo Exhibitor Alliance held here on the 26th, a group of exhibition alliance member enterprises, including Hyundai of Korea, Dow Chemical of the United States, Shiseido of Japan, New Zealand New Zealand, Siemens of Germany, Michelin of France, and AstraZeneca of the UK, signed a 3-year long-term cooperation memorandum of cooperation for exhibitors, and the revised and improved articles of association of the exhibition alliance were also announced for the first time.

SRC: 7月26日在上海拍摄的乳业专业委员会成立仪式现场。
HYP: The scene of the establishment ceremony of the Dairy Professional Committee filmed in Shanghai on July 26th.

SRC: 根据最新的章程，展盟将引入牵头单位轮值机制，加强专委会功能。
HYP: According to the latest charter, the exhibition alliance will introduce a rotation mechanism of the lead unit to strengthen the function of the special committee.

SRC: 专委会将为行业发展趋势分析提出建议，推动行业可持续发展。
HYP: The special committee will make recommendations for industry development trend analysis and promote the sustainable development of the industry.

SRC: 同时，整合行业全产业链资源，以大带小，带动关联企业参展，将进博会打造成为行业企业聚集高地。
HYP: At the same time, the industry will integrate the entire industrial chain resource to drive large and small and affiliated enterprises to participate in the exhibition, and build the CIIE into a highland for industry enterprises to gather.

SRC: 首次成立公共卫生防疫专委会，对于当前抗击新冠肺炎疫情来说显得尤为重要。
HYP: The establishment of a special committee for public health and epidemic prevention for the first time is even more important for the current fight against the new crown pneumonia epidemic.

SRC: 作为第三届进博会公共卫生防疫专委会副会长单位，雅培快速诊断业务大中华区总经理仇建平说，下一步，雅培会携手更多行业伙伴，探索新的解决方案和合作模式，助力中国以及全世界抗击新冠肺炎疫情。
HYP: As the vice chairman unit of the public health epidemic prevention special committee of the 3rd CIIE, Qiu Jianping, general manager of Greater China of Abbott Rapid Diagnostics Business, said that next, Abbott will join hands with more industry partners to explore new solutions and cooperation models to help China and the world fight the new crown pneumonia epidemic.

SRC: 7月26日在上海拍摄的公共卫生防疫专业委员会成立仪式现场。
HYP: The scene of the establishment ceremony of the public health and epidemic prevention professional committee filmed in Shanghai on July 26th.

SRC: 据悉，第三届进博会首次设立公共卫生防疫专区，截至目前已有近50家全球企业报名参展，展览面积超过1万平方米。
HYP: It is reported that the third CIIE has set up a special public health and epidemic prevention area for the first time, and as of now, nearly 50 global enterprises have signed up to participate in the exhibition, with an exhibition area of more than 10000 square meters.

SRC: 在2018年首届进博会期间，进博会参展商联盟由展商自发倡议成立，旨在成为优质参展企业交流合作平台、连接参展各方信息与资源共享平台，以及为促进中国与世界各国（地区）之间经贸商务往来与发展建言献策的智囊平台。
HYP: During the first CIIE in 2018, the Alliance of Exhibitors of the International Import Expo was established by exhibitors spontaneously, aiming to become a platform for exchanges and cooperation of high-quality exhibitors, a platform for information and resource sharing of all exhibitors, and a think tank platform for promoting economic and trade exchanges and development between China and countries (regions) in the world.

SRC: 截至目前，已有142家企业加入参展商联盟，覆盖全球23个国家和地区。
HYP: As of now, 142 enterprises have joined the Alliance of Exhibitors, covering 23 countries and regions around the world.

SRC: 比利时3岁女童死于新冠病毒感染-新华网
HYP: 3-year-old girl in Belgium dies of new coronavirus infection - Xinhuanet.com.

SRC: 比利时卫生部门24日说，一名3岁女童死于新冠病毒感染，是该国最年幼的新冠病亡患者。
HYP: Belgian health authorities said on the 24th that a 3-year-old girl who died of new coronavirus infection was the youngest person to die from the new crown virus in the country.

SRC: 比利时卫生部门发言人布德温·卡特里说，这名女童感染新冠病毒前已经有其他严重疾病；除了这名女童，近期还有一名18岁青年死于新冠病毒感染。
HYP: Belgian health department spokesman Budwin Kateri said that the girl had other serious illnesses before contracting the new coronavirus; in addition to the girl, an 18-year-old youth recently died of new coronavirus infection.

SRC: 卡特里说，上周比利时85%新增新冠确诊人员年龄在60岁以下。
HYP: Kateri said that 85% of newly confirmed new coronavirus patients in Belgium last week were under 60 years old.

SRC: 他提醒身体健康、年龄较轻的民众不要掉以轻心。
HYP: He reminded the healthy and younger people not to take it lightly.

SRC: “虽然年轻人死于新冠病毒感染的情况较为罕见，但没有任何人现在具备免疫力。 ”
HYP: "While it is rare for young people to die from new coronavirus infection, no one is immune now."

SRC: 上周，比利时新增新冠确诊病例比前一周增长89 % ， 每日平均2.9人死于新冠病毒感染，高于前一周的日均1.7人。
HYP: Last week, Belgium's newly confirmed new crown cases increased by 89% from the previous week, and the daily average of 2.9 people died from new crown virus infection, higher than the daily average of 1.7 the previous week.

SRC: 欧洲疫情高峰期间，比利时人口中新冠病毒感染者占比在欧洲“名列前茅” 。
HYP: During the peak of the epidemic in Europe, the proportion of new coronavirus infections in the Belgian population was "highest" in Europe.

SRC: 比利时有1100多万人口。
HYP: Belgium has a population of more than 11 million.

SRC: 最新数据显示，比利时累计64847人感染新冠病毒。
HYP: The latest data shows that a total of 64847 people in Belgium have been infected with the new coronavirus.

SRC: 卡特里本周早些时候警告，在雪球越滚越大、最终造成“雪崩”前，人们必须采取行动。
HYP: Earlier this week, Kateri warned that people must take action before the snowball gets bigger and bigger, eventually causing an "avalanche".

SRC: 为抑制疫情反弹，比利时首相索菲·维尔梅斯23日宣布，人们在公共场所佩戴口罩的有关规定将更加严格，8月进一步解除限制性措施的方案也将暂缓执行。
HYP: To curb the rebound of the epidemic, Belgian Prime Minister Sophie Mayville announced on the 23rd that the relevant regulations for people to wear masks in public places will be stricter, and the program of further lifting of restrictive measures in August will also be suspended.

SRC: （郭倩） 【 新华社微特稿】
HYP: (Guo Qian) [Xinhua News Agency Weibo]

SRC: 大型融媒体行动《走村直播看脱贫》出发- 今日要闻- 湖南日报网- 华声在线
HYP: The large-scale financial media action "Walking the Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation" departs - Today's Highlights - Hunan Daily Network - Huasheng Online.

SRC: 湖南日报·新湖南客户端7月25日讯(本报记者)7月25日，由中央广播电视总台财经节目中心主办的大型融媒体行动《走村直播看脱贫》从江苏徐州出发，两辆携带5G新媒体移动云制播系统的大篷车在现场嘉宾目送下，缓缓驶出现场。
HYP: Hunan Daily · New Hunan Client July 25th (Reporter from this newspaper) On July 25, the large-scale financial media action "Going the Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation" hosted by the Financial Program Center of the Central Radio and Television General Station set off from Xuzhou, Jiangsu Province, and two caravans carrying the 5G new media mobile cloud production and broadcasting system slowly drove to the scene, watched by on-site guests.

SRC: 习近平总书记指出，“2020年是具有里程碑意义的一年，我们将全面建成小康社会，实现第一个百年奋斗目标，2020年也是脱贫攻坚决战决胜之年”。
HYP: General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out that "2020 is a milestone year, we will build a moderately prosperous society in all respects, achieve the first centennial goal, and 2020 is also the year of a decisive victory in poverty alleviation."

SRC: 大型融媒体行动《走村直播看脱贫》是中央广播电视总台财经节目中心为配合这一重大主题，做好脱贫攻坚宣传的重要举措。
HYP: The large-scale financial media action "Going the Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation" is an important measure by the Central Radio and Television General Station's Financial Program Center to cooperate with this major theme and do a good job in poverty alleviation propaganda.

SRC: 该行动将走进全国20多个省、自治区、直辖市的脱贫村，挖掘鲜活脱贫故事，直击村容村貌巨变，展现村民如何突破生存发展困境、走向致富之路的历程。
HYP: The action will go into poverty alleviation villages in more than 20 provinces, autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government, unearth fresh stories of poverty alleviation, directly attack the dramatic changes in the appearance of villages and show how villagers break through the predicament of survival and development and go on the road to becoming rich.

SRC: 这次行动将持续3个多月。
HYP: This operation will last for more than 3 months.

SRC: 记者从徐州出发，兵分两路，一路走西南线，途经安徽、湖北、江西、湖南、广西、贵州、四川、重庆、云南、西藏等地;另一路走西北线，途经河南、陕西、甘肃、青海、新疆、宁夏、内蒙古、山西、河北等地，行程超过1万公里。
HYP: The reporter starts from Xuzhou, divides soldiers into two routes, one walks the southwest line, passing through Anhui, Hubei, Jiangxi, Hunan, Guangxi, Guizhou, Sichuan, Chongqing, Yunnan, Tibet and other places; the other takes the northwest line, passing through Henan, Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Xinjiang, Ningxia, Inner Mongolia, Shanxi, Hebei and other places, with a journey of more than 10000 kilometers.

SRC: 在报道形式上，《走村直播看脱贫》大胆融合。
HYP: In terms of reporting form, "Going the Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation" boldly integrates.

SRC: 大篷车所到村庄的经济发展情况，都将通过中央广播电视总台央视财经频道、央广经济之声、中国交通广播、央视财经新媒体进行播出。
HYP: The economic development of the villages to which the caravans go will all be broadcast through the CCTV Financial Channel, CCTV Economic Voice, China Communications Radio, and CCTV New Media Media.

SRC: 其中，电视直播将主要在央视财经频道的午间新闻节目《天下财经》完成(首播时间：周一至周日12：00-13:00 )，央视财经频道的黄金档新闻栏目《经济信息联播》将开设脱贫报道专栏(首播时间：周一至周日20：30-21:30 )。
HYP: Among them, the live TV will be mainly completed on the noontime news program "Tianxia Finance" of the CCTV Finance Channel (first broadcast time: Monday to Sunday 12:00-13:00 ), and the golden news column "Economic Information Network" of the CCTV Finance Channel will open a column for poverty alleviation reporting (first broadcast time: Monday to Sunday 20:30-21:30 ).

SRC: 同时，大篷车将对所到的每个村庄在央视财经客户端进行长达1小时的直播，观众通过下载央视财经APP，可以观看直播，参与抽奖活动。
HYP: At the same time, the caravan will conduct a live broadcast of up to 1 hour on the CCTV Finance client for each village it visits, and the audience can watch the live broadcast and participate in the lottery by downloading the CCTV Finance APP.

SRC: 在技术应用和演播室设计上，《 走村直播看脱贫》勇于突破，首创了“外场新媒体大篷车”。
HYP: In terms of technology application and studio design, "Walking the Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation" bravely made a breakthrough and pioneered the "outfield new media caravan".

SRC: 该车搭载5G新媒体移动云制播系统，利用5G+4K/8K+AI技术，实现线上线下、大屏小屏，电视广播的有机结合。
HYP: The car is equipped with a 5G new media mobile cloud production and broadcasting system, and uses 5G+4K/8K+AI technology to realize the organic combination of online and offline, large screens and small screens, and TV broadcasts.

SRC: 配置三讯演播区，演播区由集装箱改装而成，长12米、宽2.55米、高3.98米，箱体采用液压自动展开结构，最大可以上翻120度。
HYP: The three-communication studio is configured, which is converted from a container, 12 meters long, 2.55 meters wide, and 3.98 meters high, and the box body adopts a hydraulic automatic unfolding structure, which can be turned up to 120 degrees at most.

SRC: 演播区也可以自动展开，并外接扩展平台，面积50多平方米，可以满足大部分节目的场景要求。
HYP: The studio area can also be automatically expanded, and is connected to an external expansion platform with an area of more than 50 square meters, which can meet the scene requirements of most programs.

SRC: 张继科林小宅组队力挺有肌少年-新华网
HYP: Zhang Jike and Lin Xiaozhai Form a Team to Support Youth with Great Muscles - Xinhua Net

SRC: 运动少年热血竞技秀《运动吧少年》在7月11日正式登陆湖南卫视。
HYP: The inspiring competitive show for youth sports, We Are The One, was officially broadcast on Hunan TV on July 11.

SRC: 运动领队张继科和运动助理林小宅跨界同台,林丹和傅园慧点评各有风格,而“庞然大物”般的力量拔杆装置的硬核上场,更让节目“燃”力十足。
HYP: The team leader Zhang Jike and Sports Assistant Lin Xiaozhai are from different fields, but worked together, and commenters Lin Dan and Fu Yuanhui were each unique in their own way, but the appearance of the hardcore “enormous” strength gin pole made the program more “exciting”.

SRC: 首集中,11位运动少年亮相力量赛道,外形惊艳现场观众的同时,竞技台上的“强冲突”“强对抗”“强心脏”也受到关注。
HYP: During the first episode, 11 young athletes came to the strength arena, and their appearance stunned the audience while arousing significant attention to their “fierce conflict” “robust confrontation”, and “strong hearts”.

SRC: 其中,“ 强冲突”来自超A体育生乔文一,他在比赛前公然挑衅同赛道中有“花美男”之称的徐志滨,呛声徐志滨的外形条件应该去唱跳节目,甚至放出“输了别把妆哭花了”的狠话。
HYP: Among them, the “fierce conflict” was from the awe-inspiring student athlete Qiao Wenyi, who publicly provoked “handsome boy” Xu Zhibin on the same racetrack with him when he joked that Xu Zhibin should be on a singing and dancing show, insulting his competitor's appearance, and even saying that “if you lose, don't cry or your make-up will run”.

SRC: 一番言论让场上的少年和运动领队们都倒吸一口凉气。
HYP: His words made all the young people and sports officials gasp.

SRC: 而“强对抗”更像是神仙打架,被誉为“大魔王”的孙健淇碰上同样实力强劲的张鑫栋,<v>上演强强对决</v>。
HYP: The “robust confrontation” was more like a battle between masters, with “Big Devil” Sun Jianqi competing against the formidable Zhang Xindong in a stunning match.

SRC: 而“强对抗”更像是神仙打架,被誉为“大魔王”的孙健淇碰上同样实力强劲的张鑫栋,上演强强对决。
HYP: The “robust confrontation” was more like a battle between masters, with “Big Devil” Sun Jianqi competing against the formidable Zhang Xindong in a stunning match.

SRC: 而他们的身份也让人始料未及,孙健淇是热爱健身的演员,张鑫栋则是退役特战队员、三次勇士勋章获得者。
HYP: Their identity was also surprising, with Sun Jianqi an actor who is passionate about fitness, while Zhang Xindong is a retired commando who has won military medals three times.

SRC: 比赛一开始,两位少年就拼尽全力快速拔出小杆,在大杆上的持久对抗让现场观众为他们捏了一把汗。
HYP: At the start of the match, the two pulled on the small gin pole with all their strength, and the audience was anxious to see their more intense confrontation at the large gin pole.

SRC: 在紧张的赛况下,张继科作为《运动吧少年》运动领队之一,也在一旁认真观战。
HYP: The atmosphere was tense as one of the hosts of the program, Zhang Jike, also watched the battle intently.

SRC: 在点评环节,他也十分细心,对输了比赛的一方少年耐心鼓励,帮助复盘过程中的每一个失误点。
HYP: When giving commentary, he was very careful, patiently encouraging the loser and helping him review his mistakes.

SRC: 而运动助理林小宅则是花式助攻,她毫不掩饰对颜值实力在线的少年们的欣赏。
HYP: But sports assistant Lin Xiaozhai was a marvelous helper, who never concealed her appreciation for these good-looking and competitive young athletes.

SRC: 在了解到运动少年们超负荷的日常训练时,更是心生敬佩。
HYP: After learning about their over-loaded daily training, she admired them a lot.

SRC: 同样是运动领队的林丹和傅园慧则各有风格,一个是气定神闲派“预言家” , 一个则是用笑容驱散紧张氛围的“洪荒少女” 。
HYP: The other team leaders, Lin Dan and Fu Yuanhui, were each unique in their own way, with one being a calm “predictor”, while the other was the “bubbly optimistic girl” who eased the tension with her warm smile.

SRC: 另外,吉克隽逸和刘烨作为运动助理,也围绕运动少年制造了不少爆笑话题。
HYP: As sports assistants, Jike and Liu Ye also discussed several funny topics around young athletes.

SRC: 法国南特教堂大火：教区志愿者承认纵火平时和善寡言-中新网
HYP: Fire in Cathédrale Saint-Pierre-et-Saint-Paul de Nantes, France: Parochial Volunteer Who was Kind and Taciturn Confessed to Arson-Ecns.cn

SRC: 中新网7月26日电据外媒报道，7月18日，法国南特的宗教历史建筑瑰宝、著名的圣彼得与圣保罗大教堂，在一场火灾当中受到严重损毁，大管风琴完全毁坏。
HYP: July 26 (Ecns.cn) According to reports from foreign media, on July 18, the Cathédrale Saint-Pierre-et-Saint-Paul de Nantes, a religious, historical, and architectural treasure, was seriously damaged in a fire, and the great organ was completely destroyed.

SRC: 当地时间26日，南特检察官宣布，一名在大教堂当中负责保卫工作的教区志愿者已经被起诉，罪名是“纵火毁坏” 。
HYP: On the 26th (CET), Nantes prosecutors announced that a parochial volunteer who was responsible for the security of the cathedral had been charged with "arson and destruction."

SRC: 他已承认，是自己在教堂里点火。
HYP: The suspect has already pleaded guilty.

SRC: 报道称，当地检察官塞纳斯表示，这名39岁、来自卢旺达的教区志愿者承认，自己夜里在大教堂当中的三处点火。
HYP: According to the report, the local prosecutor Cenas said that the 39-year-old parochial volunteer from Rwanda admitted that he had set fire to three places in the cathedral at night.

SRC: 此人的律师则表示，纵火者现在很后悔做出这种事。
HYP: His lawyer said that the arsonist now regrets doing such a thing.

SRC: 此人几年前通过避难的途径，进入法国，在本次火灾事发地教区得到庇护，在教堂里得到收留。
HYP: He entered France via an asylum claim a few years ago, was sheltered in the parish where the fire happened, and was taken in by the church.

SRC: 检方指出，最近，他尝试更新签证，正在和警察局对此进行对话沟通。
HYP: Prosecutors noted that recently, the suspect tried to update his visa and was in the process of dialogue with the police.

SRC: 但教堂方面表示仍然不敢相信，这名平时非常善良、面带笑容，但不怎么说话的信徒，会毁坏他如此热爱的教堂。
HYP: But workers in the cathedral couldn't believe that the believer, who was kind and taciturn, would destroy the church he loved so much.

SRC: 7月18日火灾发生的当天，这名志愿者就已经因为叙述当中出现逻辑不通的问题，而接受过警方问询调查，但他后来被释放。
HYP: On the day of the fire on July 18, the volunteer was questioned by police about inconsistencies in his narrative, but he was later released.

SRC: 图为消防员在现场进行救援。
HYP: Image shows rescue by firefighters at the scene.

SRC: 25日晚间，由于巴黎中央警察局实验室的专业工程师获取了新的证据，此人又再一次被传讯。
HYP: On the evening of the 25th, the man was again subpoenaed as a result of new evidence obtained by professional engineers of the laboratory of the Paris Central Police Station.

SRC: 这一次，男子承认了自己纵火的行为。
HYP: This time, the man admitted to his arson.

SRC: 据报道，如果蓄意纵火毁坏的罪名成立，嫌犯将可能面临10年监禁和15万欧元的罚款。
HYP: If convicted of the crime of deliberate arson and destruction, the suspect will face 10 years' imprisonment and a fine of 150000 euros.

SRC: 报道称，此次大火给圣皮埃尔与圣保罗大教堂造成了严重损失，教堂内的管风琴被完全烧毁，管风琴后面的彩色玻璃窗也受损严重。
HYP: It was reported that the fire caused serious damage to the Cathédrale Saint-Pierre-et-Saint-Paul de Nantes: the pipe organ in the church was completely burned and the stained glass window behind the pipe organ was also seriously damaged.

SRC: 法国历史保护建筑首席建筑师布鲁内认为，保守估计，南特大教堂复原工作至少要有3年。
HYP: Brunel, the chief architect of French Built Heritage Conservation, believes that a conservative estimate of the required cathedral restoration work would take at least three years.

SRC: 飓风“汉娜”登陆美得州或引发河水暴涨和山洪-中新网
HYP: Hurricane "Hanna" Landing in Texas May Trigger Surges and Flash Floods - China News

SRC: 中新网7月26日电综合外媒报道，当地时间25日下午5时，飓风“汉娜”登陆美国得克萨斯州，将给得州带来强风暴雨、河水暴涨，还可能引发威胁生命的山洪。
HYP: July 26 (China News) According to reports in foreign media, hurricane “Hanna” landed in Texas at 5:00 pm local time on July 25th, bringing strong breeze and rainstorms, surges, and life-threatening flash floods to Texas.

SRC: 国家飓风中心说，预计飓风“汉娜”会挟带暴雨，扫过得州南部与东北部部分地区，雨势或引发部分溪水暴涨以及威胁生命的山洪爆发。
HYP: According to the National Hurricane Center, Hanna is expected to carry rainstorms across parts of southern and northeastern Texas, causing surges and life-threatening flash floods.

SRC: 报道称，受飓风“汉娜”影响最严重的是科珀斯克里斯蒂市以南到格兰德河河口地区，而里奥格兰德山谷可能爆发大范围的山洪。
HYP: It was reported that the area from the south of Corpus Christi to the estuary of the Rio Grande River was the area most seriously affected by Hanna, while large flash floods may break out in the Rio Grande Valley.

SRC: 得州州长阿博特25日表示：“任何飓风都是一个巨大的挑战。”
HYP: Abbott, governor of Texas, said on July 25th: "Any hurricane is a huge challenge. "

SRC: 该州有32个郡因为飓风进入灾难紧急状态。
HYP: Thirty two counties in the state have entered a state of emergency due to the hurricane.

SRC: 科珀斯克里斯蒂市这座人口超32万的城市，已关闭图书馆与博物馆，居民严阵以待。
HYP: Corpus Christi, a city with a population of more than 320000, has closed its libraries and museums, and its residents were ready for action.

SRC: 阿博特还说，在得州正在遭遇新冠疫情重创之际，不能再让这场飓风给得州带来更多伤亡。
HYP: Abbott also said that the hurricane cannot allowed to bring more casualties to Texas during the pandemic outbreak.

SRC: 据报道，得州南部地区<v>降水量</v>预计将在26日夜间达到6至12英寸，得克萨斯州北部地区和路易斯安那州沿海地区也将出现3至5英寸的降雨。
HYP: According to reports, precipitation in southern Texas was expected to reach 6 to 12 inches at night on July 26th, and 3 to 5 inches in northern Texas and coastal areas of Louisiana.

SRC: 由于全球变暖等因素影响，“汉娜”的形成早于以往的大西洋飓风季。
HYP: Due to global warming and other factors, Hanna formed earlier than in the previous Atlantic hurricane seasons.

SRC: 一般情况下，大西洋的第一场飓风通常要到8月中旬才会形成。
HYP: Normally, the first hurricanes in the Atlantic don't form until mid-August.

SRC: 波兰将退出欧洲防止对女子施暴的条约
HYP: Poland to Withdraw from the European Treaty on Violence against Women

SRC: 波兰司法部星期六表示，波兰下个星期将采取步骤，退出欧洲防止对妇女施暴条约。
HYP: Poland will take steps next week to withdraw from the European Treaty on the Prevention of Violence against Women, the country's Justice Ministry said Saturday.

SRC: 波兰右翼的政府内阁表示，该条约要求学校教授学生有关性别问题的议题，践踏了学生父母的权利。
HYP: Poland's right-wing government cabinet said the treaty violated the rights of parents by requiring schools to teach students about gender issues.

SRC: 波兰司法部长焦布洛举行记者会说，他领导的司法部星期一将向劳工和家庭部提出开始退出条约的要求。
HYP: Justice Minister Ziobro said at a press conference that his ministry will submit a request on Monday to the Ministry of Labor and the Family to begin withdrawing from the treaty.

SRC: 那项条约又名伊斯坦布尔公约。
HYP: That treaty is also called the Istanbul Convention.

SRC: 焦布洛说，“该条约包含一些我们认为是有害的意思形态性质的元素。”
